text: Sangano reZimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti ZIMSTAT rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti mitengo yezvinhu-inflation yaderera nechikamu chimwe nezviga makumi mana nematatu kubva muzana kana kuti 1 ,43% pagore mumwedzi waNyamavhuvhu mushure mekudzikazve nechikamu chimwe nezviga makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kana kuti 1, 60% muna chikumi. Pachitariswa mwedzi nemwedzi, mitengo yezvinhu yaderera nezvikamu zviga negumi nenhatu kana kuti 0,13% mushure mekudonhazve nezviga gumi nepfumbamwe kana kuti 0,19%. Vanotungamira kambani yePeakford Management VaAlbert Mandizvidza vanoti hurumende inofanira kusunga dzisimbe panyaya yekugadzirisa hupfumi. Vati vanhu vakawanda havasi kutambiriswa mari kumabasa zvopa kuti pashaye anotenga zvinhumuzvitoro izvo zvopa kuti mitengo ideredzwe nevemabhizimisi.
title: ZIMSTAT Inoti Mitengo yeZvinhu Yoderera Zvekare

text: Gurukota rezvezvicherwa, VaWinston Chitando, vavhura gungano reMine Entra zviri pamutemo muBulawayo vamwe vanhu vachikurudzira kuti pave nehurongwa hwekuti zvicherwa zviri munyika nehuwandu hwazvo, zviziikanwe kuitira kuti nyika isarasikirwe nehupfumi. Mumashoko avo ekuvhura gungano reMine Entra zviri pamutemo, VaChitando vati zvicherwa ndizvo zviri kunyanya kuunza mari munyika, vakatiwo zvicherwa zvinogona kutungamira pakuvandudza hupfumi zvichienderana nechinangwa chehurumende chekuti hupfumi hwenyika hunge hwakura panosvika gore ra2030. Vati hurongwa hwekuvandudza mutemo weMines and Minerals Act kuti uenderane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika hwave pachinhanho chepamusoro. VaChitando vabvuma kuStudio7 kuti pane zvimhingamupinyi zvakawanda zvinogona kuvhiringidza huwandu hwemari inobva kuzvicherwa kusanganisira dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari yekunze munyika pamwe nekuburitswa zvisiri pamutemo kwezvicherwa zvakadai segoridhe nemangoda. Asi vati hurumende iri pakati pekugadzirisa matambudziko aya. Panyaya yekutsutsumwa kwevamwe vanhu kuti vamwe vevashandi vemubazi ravo vanonoka kugadzirisa magwaro anenge achidiwa nevanoita zvezvicherwa, VaChitando vabvumawo dambudziko iri vakatiwo bazi ravo riri kudzidzisa vashandi varo kuti vaite mabasa avo nemazvo. Vamwe vanhu pamusangano uyu vati zvakakosha kuti vakuru vakuru vehurumende vasangotaura chete nezvechinangwa chekuti hupfumi hwenyika hunge hwasimukira panosvika gore ra2030 asi kuti vaite zvose zvavanogona kuti veruzhinji vave vanofamba pamwe chete nehurumende mukuti chinangwa ichi chiitike. Mumwe weavo vapinda mumusangano uyu, VaTendai Choto, vakurudzira hurumende kuti ive nehurongwa hwekuti zvicherwa zviri munyika pamwe nehuwandu hwazvo zviziikanwe kuitira kuti nyika isarasikirwe nehupfumi uhu.  VaChitando vabvuma kukosha kwakaita kuti nyika izive zvicherwa zvainazvo uye huwandu hwazvo vakati bazi ravo riri mushishi kugadzirisa kuti ripe marezenisi kune vanogona kuita izvi. VaChoto, avo vane kambani yeQuipHire inotengesa zvimwe zvinoshandiswa nevanoita zvezvicherwa, vati aka ndekekutanga kuuya kugungano reMine Entra uye vati vanoona kuita izvi kuchivabatsira kushambadza kambani yavo. Mumwe wevanhu vari kuMine Entra, VaEdson Kayerudza, vanoshandira kambani inotengesa mimwe michina inoshandiswa nevanoita zvezvicherwa. VaKayerudza vatiwo ndekekutanga kuti kambani yavo ive paMine Entra vachitsinhirawo kuti kuve pagungano iri kunobatsira kuti kambani yavo iziikanwe. Gungano reMine Entra regore rino, rakatanga neChitatu, uye riri kupera neChishanu. Gungano iri rinowanzoitwa muna Chikunguru gore rega rega, asi gore rino rakanonoka kuitwa nekuda kwesarudzo. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kuziva Huwandu hweZviwanikwa Zvayo

text: Vanhu vazhinji munyika vanoti vanotarisira kuti sarudzo dziri kuitwa Muvhuro Chikunguru 30 dzichange dziri sarudzo dzine runyararo kudarika sarudzo dzose dzakaitwa munyika kubva muna 1980. Vamwe vevane maonero ekuti sarudzo dzichange dziri murunyararo ndaVaEdmore Major Kaima vemuHarare, asi vanoti kuti munyika muve neshanduko zvinenge zvadiwa nevanhu musi wesarudzo zvinofanirwa kuteverwa. VaCollins Tsvangirai vekuBuhera, vanove munun’una wevaive mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanotiwo kunyange hazvo Zanu PF yave nenguva iri mumasimba, vanhu vanofanirwa kusarudza mutungamiri wavanoda vakasununguka kwete kuburikidza nekutengwa. Vari kukwikwidza kuGoromonzi West musarudzo dzemakanzuru vakamirira MDC Alliance VaTongogara Machimbidza vanoti havawirirane nevari kuti sarudzo dzichange dziri murunyararo. VaMachimbidza vanoti muwadhi yavari kukwikwidza, iyo iri mumapurazi akagariswa vanhu patsva, vanhu vari kutyisidzirwa kunzi kana vakasavhotera Zanu PF vanozodzingwa paminda yavagere. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF kuBuhera VaElisha Mutambara vanoti vanhu vachavhota murunyararo, uye vanofairwa kuvhotera bato rine nhoroondo inotevereka. VaMutambara vanoti Zanu PF yakakwanisa kuwanisa vanhu munyika dzidzo yakaita kuti Zimbabwe ive pamusoro penyika dzose muAfrica, pamwe nekuvaka zvipatara kubva pawana nyika kuzvitonga. Asi vanoti bato rezvematongerwo enyika haringazogoni zvese. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaCharles Mutasa, vanoti maonero avo vana veZimbabwe vakagadzirira kuvhota murunyararo, kunyange hazvo panga paine kukwikwidzana pakati peZEC nemamwe mapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Idzi isarudzo dzekutanga vaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe pamwe nevaitungamira bato rinopikisa reMDC-T VaTsvangirai vasiri pamagwaro ekuvhotesa, chiitiko chinonzi nevamwe ndiyo shanduko yekutanga musarudzo dzegore rino. Chasara ndechekuona kuti zvido zvevanhu zvichateverwa here kana kuti kwete nemapato ose ari kukwikwidza kana musi wa 30 Chikunguru wadarika.
title: Vanhu Vove neTarisiro Yekuti Sarudzo Dzichaitwa muRunyararo

text: Mukuru mubazi rinoona nezvenjodzi reCivil Protection Unit VaNathan Nkomo vanoti nhasi vabatana negurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reManicaland Doctor Ellen Gwaradzimba kuenda panzvimbo yakaitikira tsaona yakauraya vanhu gumi nevatanhatu nezuro. Izvi zvakatevera kubonderana kwebazi reGeneral Bande nerori pedyo nemusha wekwaShamu mumugwagwa weHarare-Mutare nezuro. VaNkomo vati vanhu gumi vakashaya vatokwanisa kuzivikanwa uye hama dzavo dzepedyo dzaziviswa. Vanhu gumi nevatatu vakafira pakaitikira njodzi vamwe vatatu vakafira kuchipatara. Makambani akaita seNyaradzo, Doves neEconet anonzi ari kubatsira hama dzevakafa nekukuvara munjodzi iyi. VaNkomo vativo hurumende nevemamwe makambani vari kubatsira vakawirwa netsaona ava. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC Vanelson chamisa vatumirawo mashoko enyaradzo kumhuri dzakafirwa uye dzine hama dzakakuvara mutsaona iyi. No media source currently available
title: Makambani Makuru Obatsira Vakashaya muNjodzi Yakaitika Pedyo neMumugwagwa weMutare-Harare neMugovera

text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira vanorarama nekuzvishandira, reVendors Initiative For Social And Economic Transformation, VISET, rinoti rinotambira nemufaro kunyevenutswa kwakaitwa mutemo weLockdown wakaziviswa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kutanga kwesvondo rino wakanangana nevanozvishandira voga. Asi mukuru weVISET, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti vazhinji vevanhu vanozvibatira mabasa vari kutadza kudzoka kumabasa nekuda kwekushaiwa mari dzekuti vavhure zvakare sezvo vanga vave nenguva yakareba vasiri kushanda nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19. VaMnangagwa vakazivisa kuti vanozvishandira vave kukwanisa kuvhura kana chete vachitevera mitemo yakatarwa neWorld Health Organization yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. VaWadzayi vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuchivabatsirawo nemari dzavakambovimbiswa kuti dzichapiwa vemabhizimusi madiki munguva ino yeCovid-19 kuitira kuti vakwanise kusimuka zvakare. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko egurukota rezvekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, VaPaul Mavima, avo vakavimbisa kubatsira vanozviitira mabasa avo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaMavima kuti vasvika papi nenyaya yerubatsiro urwu. Ngatinzweyi VaWadzayi vachitaura. No media source currently available
title: Vanozvishandira Votarisira Kuti Vabatsirwe neHurumende

text: Dunhu reMashonaland Central rasiya mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, vari pamhene zvichitevera kusadomwa kwavo kuti vapinde muCentral Committee yeZanu-PF musarudzo dzaitwa neChipiri mudunhu iri. Magwaro a Amai Mujuru ekuti vapinde musarudzo anonzi aramba kutambirwa sezvo humwe hutungamiri hwedunhu iri hwati vanhu vose vari kupomerwa mhosva dzekuda kubvisa mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pachigaro nechisimba havasi kuzotambirwa kuti vamirire dunhu iri muCentral Committee. Izvi zvikatambirwa ne Politiburo yebato zvinoreva kuti ndiyo inenge yava sarungano ya Amai Mujuru munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika mubato iri. Kunyange hazvo Amai Mujuru vari kupomerwa mhosva dzinonzi neveruzhinji dzekutsvagirwa uye dzisipo, mapurisa haasati abuda pachena kuti achavaferefeta here kana kuti kwete. Gurukota rezvevechidiki nekuendeswa kwehupfumi kuvatema, VaFrancis Nhema, vanonziwo vakundikanawo kupinda muCentral cCmmittee mushure mekukundwa musarudzo dzaiitwa kuMidlands Province neChipiri. VaNhema vanonzi vari kutsigiri Amai Mujuru muhondo yekurwira masimba iri kuitika muZanu PF. Chikwata chiri kurwisa Amai Mujuru chinonzi chiri kutungamirwa negurukota rezvemitemo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Makurukota ehurumende gumi anonzi anotsigira Amai Mujuru anonzi akatarisira kuburiswa muCentral Committee nevanonzi vatsigiri vaVaMnangagwa. Vari kuziva zviri kuitika muZanu PF vanoti VaMnangagwa vari kushanda negurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaJonathan Moyo, mukubvisa vose vari kutsigira Amai Mujuru kuitira kuti VaMnangagwa vawane rutsigiro rwekuzotora masimba kana mutungamiri webato, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiya chigaro chavo. VaMoyo, avo vanova nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, ndivo vanonzi vari kuronga tsoro muchivande yekubvisa Amai Mujuru pachigaro chavanacho mubato. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaMoyo, VaMnangagwa pamwe naAmai Mujuru pane zviri kuitika mubato riri kutonga iro ratarisana nekomgiresi mwedzi unouya. Munyori anoona nezvemutemo muZanu-PF Youth League, VaTongai Kasukuwere, vanoti zvave kuPolitiburo kudzora kana kusadzora Amai Mujuru muCentral Commitee nekuti dunhu ravo ratora matanho pavari. No media source currently available Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru we Media Centre, VaErnest Mudzengi, vanoti vanotsigira VaMnangagwa vari kubudirira kusiya Amai Mujuru vasina simba mubato. Zanu PF iri kutarisirwa kuvandudza bumbiro kuitira kuti VaMugabe vave nemasimba ekudoma vanhu vavanoshanda navo mubato. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa naVaMoyo Vanodhingura Amai Mujuru?

text: Mapurisa anodzivirira nyonga nyonga asunga nhengo dzesangano rinomirira varairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, apo dzange dzichiratidzra pamahofisi ebazi rezvemari. Mapurisa aya asungawo mutapi wenhau wekambani yeNewZimbabwe.Com, Leopold Munhende, uyo ange achitora mifananidzo yezvange zvichiitika. Mapurisa aya ange aine mboma paasunga vanhu gumi ndokuvakanda mumotokari achienda navo kukamba yemapurisa yepaHarare Central Police Station. Nhengo dzeARTUZ dzanga dzichiratidzira dzichiti hadzisi kufara nemari dziri kutambiriswa varairidzi idzo dzinoti ishoma zvikuru. ARTUZ yakabuda nedanho rekuti ichange ichiratidzira musi unotambira mari nhengo dzaro mwedzi wega senzira yekuudza gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, kuti mari iri kupihwa varairidzi ishoma zvikuru. Vakasanobata chinzvimbo chemunyori muARTUZ, VaMunyaradzi Ndawana, vati vasungwa vanga vari pachirongwa chavo chavanoti Funeral Day icho chichangwe chichiitwa zura rega rega pavanotambira mihoro yavo. VaNdawana vati vanhu vasungwa vasati vatombosvitsa gwaro ravo renyunyuto kugurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube. Vasungwa vanosanganisira mutungamiriri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, gweta resangano iri, VaDoug Coltart, dzimwe nhengo dzinoti VaAndrew Munguri, VaGerald Tavengwa, VaNation Mudzitirwa, Tryvine Musokeri, VaGodfrey Chanda, Simon Drury, Shepherd Tazvivinga, pamwe naMunhende weNew Zimbabwe.Com. Mumwe anoshanda naMunhende, VaCosta Nkomo, vaudza Studio7 kuti Munhende asungwa kunyange hazvo aratidza mapurisa magwaro ebasa. Sangano rinomirira vatapi venhau vechidiki reYoung Journalists Association, YOJA, rashora kusungwa kwenhengo yaro Munhende, uyo anove mutauriri wesangano iri. Gweta riri kumirira Munhende, VaChris Mhike, vaudza Studio7 kuti vaudza mapurisa kuti Munhende ange ari kuita basa rake, uye hapana chikonzero chekuti asungwe. Munhende azoregedzwa achienda mushure mekupindira kwegweta rake. Mukuru weMedia Insitute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vashora kumbunyikidzwa kuri kuitwa vatori venhau munyika. Zvichakadai gweta renhengo dzeARTUZ, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti nhengo dzeARTUZ dzapomerwa mhosva yePublic Nuisance uye vari kunzi vabhadhare faindi. Amai Mtetwa vati zviri pachena kuti kusungwa kwevanhu ava kuri kunze kwemutemo nekudaro mapurisa ave kuda kuvabhadharisa faindi. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vaudza Studio7 kuti nyaya Munhende yagadziriswa uye aburitswa sezvo ari mutori wenhau. Vatiwo VaColtart vachiri kubvurudzwa nemapurisa sezvo vaudza mapurisa kuti igweta reARTZU. Asi vati nhengo sere dzeARTUZ dziri kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeARTUZ Dzasungwa Dzisati Dzapa VaNcube Nyunyuto Dzadzo

text: Vedzimotokari pamwe nevanotakura vafambi nedzimotokari diki dzino zivikanwa nezita rekuti “tsviriyo”, vari kupomera vashandi veVehicle Inspection Department kana kuti VID, mhosva yekuita zvechioko muhomwe izvo vanoti zvaiitwa nemapurisa mumigwagwa. Vatyairi vedzimotokari ava vanoti vari kumanikidzwa kubhadhara mari inoita madhora mashanu kuti vakwanise kufamba mumigwagwa vasingatorerwe motokari dzavo vachinzi havana mapepa akakwana. Vatyairi ava vanoti zviri kuitika izvi hazvina kusiyana nemazuva akare apo mapurisa aipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuori vachibhadhariva vemichovha mari dzakawanda. Mumwe mutyairi wemota diki anotakura vafambi pakati peChinhoyi neBanket VaChristopher Magureyi vanoti veVID ava havavashaire mhosva pamotokari dzavo. VaMagureyi vanoti vashandi veVID vave kuomesera vanhu mumigwagwa kudarika mapurisa sezvo vachitora motokari izvo zvinozovadhurira kuitora. Mumwe mutyairi wemotokari diki anoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Lazarus anotakura vafambi pakati peChinhoyi neMhangura anoti vashandi veVID havasi kubuda pachena kuti vari kuda mari nekudaro vanotora motokari kuti munhu avape mari kuti motokari yake isatorwe. Vashandi veVID vanonzi vari kushungurudzawo vanhu vanenge vaine motokari dzavo dzinenge dzisina kutakura vanhu. VaShame Nyakudya avo vanorima pedyo neChinhoyi mumwe wevakatorerwa motokari yavo asi vachiti hapana mhosva yavakapara. VaNyakudya vanotsanangura mabatirwo avakaitwa. Asi mukuru weVID muChinhoyi, VaJohn Makaza, vanoti havakwanise kurambira munhu asi vanoti kana pane munhu ane humbowo hwekuti mushandi wavo ari kuita zvechioko muhomwe anofanira kuzomhan’ara kumahofisi avo kuti vamusungise. Chimwe chinonzi chiri kurwadza vedzimotokari ndechekuti vashandi veVID vari kungotora motokari vachienda nadzo kumahofisi kwavo kuti vadziongorore izvo zvinobhadharwa mari madhora makumi maviri. Vakawanda vanoona danho iri sekutsvaga mari kwebazi iri. Huori hwevashandi veVID hunonzi hwatekeshera nenyika yose zvekuti gurukota rezvemigwagwa VaJorum Gumbo vakazivisa paramende svondo rapera kuti vashandi makumi mashanu nevana vakatodzingwa basa. No media source currently available
title: Vedzimotokari muChinhoyi Vopomera Vashandi veVID Huwori paMigwagwa

text: Magweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anoti ari kufara zvikuru nemutongo waitwa nevatongi vatatu veHigh Court vanoti; Justice Edith Mushore, Justice Happias Zhou naJustice Jesta Charehwa, avo vamanikidza vanga vari mukuru wevatongi vematare edzimhosva, VaLuke Malaba, kuenda pamudyandigere sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika rakatambirwa nevanhu muna 2013. Mutongo uyu unotevera chikumbiro chakakwidzwa kudare iri nemukuru weZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, Dr Musa Kika, pamwe nesangano rinomirira magweta echidki reYoung Lawyers Association of Zimbabwe. Rimwe remagweta ange achimirira VaKika, VaTendai Biti, vati vafara zvikuru nemutongo wanhasi sezvo zvakanga zvaitwa panyaya yaVaMalaba zvanga zviri kunze kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaKika vatiwo zvinofadza kuti dare ratambira zvichemo zveveruzhinji munyika. VaBiti vati mutevedzeri waVaMalaba, Justice Elizabeth Gwaunza, ndivo vanofanira kutora matomu kudzamara padomwa mukuru wevatongi vematare mutsva. Zvichitevera mutongo wekuti VaMalaba havasisiri mutongi zviri pamutemo, Judicial Services Commission, JSC, yabva yadoma Justice Gwaunza kuti vafanobata matomu kudzamara mutongi mukuru mutsva adomwa zviri pamutemo. Rimwe remwagweta ange achimirira hurumende panyaya iyi, VaThabo Magwaliba, vati vachanzwa kuhurumende kuti vopikisa mutongo uyu here kana kuti kwete. Gweta guru rehurumende, Advocate Prince Machaya, nemunyori anoona nezvemutemo mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaPaul Mangwana, avo vange varimudare, varamba kutaura pamusoro pemutongo wanhasi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemutemo uye vari mutungamiri weNational Constitutional Assembly, VaLovemore Madhuku, vati mutongo uyu unogona kupikiswa uye kana izvi zvikaitika, zvinoreva kuti VaMalaba vanogona kuenderera mberi nebasa sekudomwa kwavange vaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika. Vatiwo nyaya iyi inogona kugara mumatare kwenguva yakareba nekuti kana mutongo uyu ukapikiswa pachaita dambudziko rekuti ndiana achatonga nyaya iyi sezvo vatongi vose vedare reConstitutional Court nereSupreme Court vakaendeswawo kudare munyaya iyi. Hapana kana mutongi mumwe chete zvake vanogara mumatare aya vakapikisa nyaya yakakwidzwa mudare neZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum pamwe neYoung Lawyers Association of Zimbabwe. Mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vanoti vatambirawo mutongo wanhasi asi vakati vanoda kuti vana veZimbabwe vave nechekuita nemadomerwo emukuru wevatongi nevatongi vacho. Kumanikidzwa kwemutongi wematare edzimhosva kuenda kumatare chinhu chekutanga haitika pana VaMalaba kubva nyika yawana kuzvitonga muna 1980. Mutongo wapihwa nhasi unorevawo kuti zvakaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, zvekuwedzera nguva yaVaMalaba vari pabasa, zvakange zvisiri pamutemo. VaMnangagwa vakatora danho iri mushure mekunge dare Senate ratambira kuvandudzwa kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mutemo uyu unopa mutungamiri wenyika masimba ekuwedzera nguva yevatongi vematare eConstitutional Court neSupreme Court, izvo zvanzi nedare reHigh Court zvinotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika rakatanga kushanda muna 2013.
title: Magweta Ofarira Mutongo Unomanikidza VaMalaba Kuenda kuMudyandigere

text: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti kunyange hazvo bato ravo risiri muhurumende zvakakosha kuti rinzwisise matambudziko akatarisana nemakanzuru emumadhorobha nemaguta ari munyika sezvo bato ravo riri iro riri kutungamira makanzuru aya mazhinji. No media source currently available Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure mekushanyira zvirongwa zviri kuitwa nekanzuru yeGweru neChina masikati, VaTsvangirai vati makanzuru ari munyika akatarisana nematambudziko akafanana anosanganisira kushaikwa kwemari yekuita mabasa aanotarisirwa kuita nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi. Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti bato ravo ringabatsira sei pakugadzirisa matambaudziko akatarisana nemakanzuru aya iro risiri muhurumende, VaTsvangirai vati zvakakosha kuti bato ravo rigare richiziva mashandiro ari kuita makanzuru ari munyika uye matambudziko akatarisana nemakanzuru aya pamwe neveruzhinji sezvo bato ravo richitarisira kuzotonga nyika. VaTsvangirai vashanyira misika iri mumisha yeveruzhinji yeAscot, Mambo, Mkoba 6, Mkoba14, pamwe neMkoba 15 vakazopeta kushanya kwavo panzvimbo yeRange Booster panopombewa mvura inomwiwa nevanhu muguta reGweru. Mukushanya kwavaita VaTsvangirai vagamuchirwa nemufaro nevanhu vakasiyana-siyana uye vamwe veavo vakwanisa kuonana naVaTsvangirai vataurira Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo VaTsvangirai vasiri muhurumende, vane vimbo yekuti vanogona kubatsira veruzhinji kubuda mumatambudziko avari. VaTsvangirai vati vari kusiririswa zvikuru nenyaya yekuti vanhu vakawanda kunyanya vechidiki vave kurarama nekutenga nekutengesa zvinhu nekuda kwekuti hakuna mabasa. Pavabvunzwa nenyaya yekuti bato ravo rasvika papi nehurongwa hwekuratidzira hwavakati vachaita senzira yekuedza kusafara kwavo nehutongi hwehurumende yemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, VaTsvangirai vati bato ravo harizi kuda kungoratidzira zvisina kurongeka zvinogona kuzokonzera mhirizhonga nekudeuka kweropa vakati vachiri mushishi rekutaura nevatsigiri vavo pamusoro pehurongwa uhu. VaTsvangirai vakaurudzira vechidiki kuti vasashandiswe munyaya dzemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika asi kuti vaise musoro pamwe chete vatarisane nehurumende yeZanu PF iyo vati ndiyo iri kuunza kutambura kweveruzhinji. Kunyange hazvo vamwe vagari vachiti havazi kufara nekusashanda zvakanaka kwekanzuru yeguta reGweru, VaTsvangirai varumbidza meya weguta iri, VaHamutendi Kombayi, pamwe nemakanzura avo vachivati vari kuedza zvose zvavanogona kuita basa ravo nemhazvo zvisinei nezvimhingamupinyi zvavakatarisana nazvo. Kushanya kwaVaTsvangirai kukanzuru yeGweru kunotevera kushanya kwavakaita kuChitungwiza munguva pfupi yapfuura uye vati vachaenderera mberi vachishanya kune mamwe maguta nemadhorobha kuitira kuti vanzwisise mabasa ari kuitwa munzvimbo idzi pamwe nezvimhingamupinyi zviri kusangana nemakanzuru aya.
title: VaTsvangirai Vanoti Bato Ravo Ngarinzwisise Mashandiro eMakanzuru

text: Mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vakavhara miganhu yenyika yavo kutanga nezuro, Muvhuro, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. VaRamaphosa vakati nyika yavo yatora danho iri mushure mekukwira kuri kuita huwanda hwevanhu vari kufa, pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere ichi. Asi vakati miganhu iyi icharamba ichishandiswa nemotokari dzinotakura zvinhu zvakaita semafuta edzimotokari, midziyo pamwe nevanhu vanenge vachipinda munyika kuzorapwa. Asi VaRamaphosa havana kujekesa zvakazara pamusoro pezvizvarwa zvekunze izvo zvakange zvapinda muSouth Africa mitemo iyi isati yadzikwa. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaCosmas Zowa, vati vanotambira zvakatarwa naVaRamaphosa kunyange hazvo zvichaomesera vanhu vakawanda. VaZowa vati mhuri yeZimbabwe inogara muSouth Africa, inorarama nekushanda munzvimbo dzinotengeserwa hwahwa kana dzinodyirwa idzo dzakavharwa pasi pemitemo mitsva iyi Sachigaro weZimbabwe Exiles Forum, VaGabriel Shumba, vatiwo mhuri zhinji dzinorarama nekushanya muSouth Africa kuzotenga nekutengesa, ndidzo dzichaomerwa zvikuru nehupenyu. Mudzidzisi pachikoro chepamusoro cheTswane University of Technology, Dr Ricky Mukonza, vati kunyange hazvo ruzhinji ruchichema nekuvharwa kwemiganhu, chakakosha inyaya yekuti VaRamaphosa hapana zvakawanda zvavasandurwa kunze kwekukurudzira kukosha kwekuzvichengetedza. Mumiririri pamuzinda weZimbabwe muSouth Africa, VaDavid Hamadziripi, vati havakwanisi kutaura nezvenyaya iyi, sezvo vari kunze kwenyika. Pari zvino South Africa yave nevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanopfuura zviuru makumi matatu nezvitatu nemazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 33,579, uye vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nemazana maviri nemakumi mashanu ezviuru, kana kuti 1.25 million. Asi hazvzivikanwe kuti kune zvizvara zvingani zveZimbabwe zvakafa, kana kubatwa nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available
title: South Africa Inovhara Zvakare Miganhu Yayo Yose

text: Apo nyika yatarisana nezororo reKisimusi, iro ririko neChitatu, vakawanda vanonzi vave kuita chipatapata kutandasina nenguva kuunganidza zvanga zvasarira. Asi ruzhinji rwunonzi rwuri kusangana nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari kumabhanga, kana kuti kana yawanikwa inenge iri shomashoma, isina zvainokwana pane zvose zvavanenge vachida kutenga. Munyori mukuru wesangano rinomirira vashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari kumabhanga iri rasiya vakawanda vari parumananzombe. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi uye vakambotungamira sangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti igaroziva kuti nguva ino yezororo reKisimusi idambudziko kuwana mari yemusvo mumabhanga. Nekudaro, VaJokonya vanoti veruzhinji vaifanirwa kunge vadzidza kushandisa dzimwe nzira dzekubhadhara nadzo dzisiri dzemari yemusvo. Izvi zvinotsinhirwa neimwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi, vachishanda nesangano rinomirira varimi vanochengeta zvipfuyo, reZimbabwe Agricultural Growth, VaNewton Chari, avo vanoti kana mari iri dambudziko kuwana, vanhu vanogona kushandisa nzira dzekubhadhara nadzo dzakaita semakadhi ekumabhanga kana kushandisa nharembozha dzavo kuburikidza ne Eco-Cash. Asi VaMoyo vanoti havasi vese vanotengesa zvinhu vanotambira dzimwe nzira dzekubhadhara nadzo dzisiri mari yemusvo. VaMoyo vanoti vezvitoro havamanikidzwe nemutemo kutambira dzimwe nzira dzekubhadhara nadzo dzakaita se swipe kana eco-cash, uye vamwe vanoti kana usingashandise mari yemusvo unobhadhariswa kamutero pamusoro. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vemabhanga, reBankers Association of Zimbabwe, VaWebster Rusere vakaudza bepanhau reChronicle kuti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari mumabhanga riri kukonzerwa nekunyaya yekuti vanhu havasi kuchengetera mari dzavo kumabhanga. Asi VaJokonya vanoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nekushaya chivimbo nemabhanga kwave muvanhu. Svondo rapera gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakazivisa kuti bhanga guru renyika rakanga radira mari inoita mamiriyoni makumi maviri emadhora, asi mari iyi inonzi nevakawanda yakundikana kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari ragara riri munyika. Kusvika pave nechivimbo munyaya dzekuchengetedzwa kwemari kumabhanga, nyika icharamba ichisangana nedambudziko rekushomeka kwemari kwenguva yakareba. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Votadza Kugadzirira Kisimusi Nekuda kweKushaikwa kweMari kuMabhanga

text: Hurumende yeBritain yakazivisa svondo rino kuti kubva neMuvhuro unouya zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinenge zvave kubvumidzwa kushanyira nyika iyi zvichitevera kubviswa kweZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika panyika dzairambidzwa kupinda munyika iyi dzichinzi dzaive nedambudziko redenda reCovid-19 rakakurisa. Gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu muBritain, VaGrant Shapps, vakazivisa nemusi weChina chapfuura kuti vachabvisa nyika makumi mana nenomwe, kusanganisira Zimbabwe, panyika makumi mashanu neina dziri kurambidzwa kushanyira Britain sezvo denda reCovid-19 radzikira munyika idzi. Zimbabwe imwe yenyika makumi maviri dzemuAfrica dzinosanganisira South Africa, Zambia, Tunisia neUganda dziri kutarisira kutanga kushanyira Britain kutanga Muvhuro. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vari kuBritain, Dr. Edgar Munatsi, vanoti Britain ine nhomba nhatu dzayakati inotambira dzinoti Pfizer, Mordena neJohnson and Johnson uye vanhu vanenge vakaiwa nhomba idzi vanenge vasisasungirwa kutanga vavhenekwa kana vaine Covid-19 vasati vasimuka, asi vanozotarisirwa kuvhenekwa vachibhadhara mari dzavo pazuva repiri vapinda munyika iyi. Asi Dr. Munatsi vanoti Britain yakazivisa kuti haicherechedzi nhomba dzerudzi rweSinopharm, Sinovac neSputnik, idzo dzinove dzakabaiwa vanhu muZumbabwe, zvichireva kuti vanhu ava pavanopinda muBritain vanenge vachionekwa sevasina kubaiwa nhomba. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Imwe yeNyika Dzave Kubvumidzwa Kupinda muBritain Zvichitevera Kudzikira kweCovid-19 muNyika

text: Chikamu chekutanga chekunyoreswa kwevanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota chapera neChitatu munzvimbo dzakawanda munyika. Asi kushomeka kwevanhu vanyoresa kuvhota mumatunhu eMatabeleland kusvika pari zvino kwasiya vamwe vaine mibvunzo kuti sei vanhu mumatunhu aya vari kusada kunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Mukuru anoona nezvesarudzo muBulawayo, Amai Sithembiso Khupe, vati kusvika neChipiri hofisi yavo yange yanyoresa vanhu zviuru makumi matatu nezvinomwe mudunhu reBulawayo. Huhwandu uhu hahuna kunyanya kusiyana nehuhwandu hwevanhu vakanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota mumatunhu eMatabeleland North neMatabeleland South uye matunhu matatu aya ndiwo ane vanhu vashoma vanyoresa kuvhota kusvika pari zvino munyika mose. Vachinyora paFacebook page yavo munguva pfupi yapfuura mukuru wesangano reRestoration of Human Rights mudunhu reMatabeleland South, VaBekezela Fuzwayo, vakaratidza kushushikana nenyaya yekuti vanhu vemumatunhu eMatabeleland ndivo vashoma pane vanyoresa kuvhota munyika mose, vachiti vanhu vemumatunhu aya havafanirwe kuzvitora sevanhu vasiri zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe. Murongi wemabasa musangano reAbammeli Human Rights Lawyers Network, VaTineyi Mukweva, vanoti ongororo yesangano ravo inoratidza kuti pane zvikonzero zvakawanda zviri kuita kuti vanhu vemumatunhu eMatabeleland vasanyorese zvinosanganisira nyaya yekuti veZimbabwe Electoral Commission havana kushambadza chirongwa ichi zvakakwana uye vamwe vanhu vakawanda munzvimbo idzi havana magwaro ekuzvarwa nawo nekuda kwenyaya yeGukurahundi. VaMukwewa vanotiwo vanhu vakawanda, kunyanya vemumatunhu aya, vawora moyo nekuda kwekuti vanoona hurumende isina hany’a nekuunza budiriro munzvimbo idzi uye ichivabata neseri kweruoko. Mutevedzeri wemukuru wesangano reCentre for Public Engagement vachishandawo nemubatanidzwa wePlatform for Leveraging Elections, Democracy and Governance, VaButler Tambo, vanotiwo nyaya yekuti vanhu vemumatunhu ekuMatabeleland vanoona sevanobatwa sevasiri zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe, ine chekuita nekusada kwavo kunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights mudunhu reMatabeleland, VaLizwe Jamela, vanotsinhirawo izvi vachiti zvisinei kuti vangave nezvikonzero zvakajeka zvekuita izvi, kuregedza kwevanhu kunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kwakafanana nekuramwira munda kumakudo. Chikamu chechipiri chichatanga musi wa29 Gumiguru chichizopetwa musi wa 13 Mbudzi. Bulawayo ine nzvimbo dzinopfuura mazana mana kuchange kuchinyoreswa vanhu kusvika panopera chikamu chechina chinove chekupedzisira chechirongwa ichi musi wa 19 Zvita. No media source currently available
title: Chirongwa cheBVR Chotadza Kubudirira kuMatabeleland

text:
Sangano rinomiririra vashandi vemumabhangi, reZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union rinoti nhasi richapa vashandirwi tsamba yekuvasuma nezvekuda kuratidzirwa kwavo mushure mekunge vatadza kuwirirana nenyaya yemari yemuhoro. Vashandi vanoti vave nemakore mashanu vasina kuwedzerwa mari uye vanotiwo nezuro vakaita musangano nevashandirwi asi hapana chakabuda. Munyori wesangano reZimbabwe banks and allied Workers Union uye vachitungamirawo Zimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Mutasa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vashandi havana kuwedzerwa mari kwemakore mashanu zvekuti mari yavari kutambira haichisina chainobatsira. title: Vashandi vemuMabhanga Voronga Kuratidzira

text: Rakwana gore mauto munyika apindira mukubvisa pachigaro vaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe achipomerwa mhosva yekuparadza upfumi hwenyika pamwe nekukonzeresa kutambura kukuru kweveruzhinji munyika. VaMugabe vakatsiviwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vakambenge vatiza munyika mushure mekupomerwa mhosva yekuda kubvisa VaMgabe pachigaro. Chiitiko chekubviswa kwaVaMugabe pachigaro ichi chakatambirwa nemufaro mukuru nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri munyika pamwe nekunze kwenyika, sezvo vazhinji vaiona VaMugabe semunhu aitadzisa nyika kuenda mberi. Vakawanda vari kunze kwenyika vakaronga kudzokera kumusha, vamwe vakatodzokera. Asi kusvika nhasi vamwe vachiri kunze kwenyika vakaita saVaKingstone Jambawo, avo vari kuLondon, vanoti havana kumhanyira kudzokera kumusha nekuti hapana chakashanduka pakupinda kwakaita hurumende yaVaMnangagwa panyanga. No media source currently available Asi chimwe chizvarwa chezimbabwe chiri muWashington D.C., vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaFrenk Guni, vanoti hurumende itsva iripo munyika yakanunura vana veZimbabwe vakanga vasina rusununguko kwemakore akawanda kwazvo pasi paVaMugabe. VaGuni vanoti vana veZimbabwe vanofanirwa chete kupa hurumende iyi nguva yekugadzirisa zvinhu. No media source currently available
title: Vari Kunze kweNyika Voita Maonero Akasiyana paMwedzi Gumi neMiviri Hurumende yaShandurwa

text: Sangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum riri kukurudzira zvizvara zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa zvakanyorera magwaro eZimbabwe Special Permit (ZSP) zvisati zvawana magwaro azvo kuti zviende kumahofisi e Visa & Permit Facilitation Centre (VFS) emunharaunda dzazvo nechimbichimbi. Chirongwa chemagwaro ekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvibvumidzwe kugara pamwe nekushanda zviri pamutemo munyika iyi chiri kupera nemusi weChitatu, izvo zvoita kuti vazhinji vasati vawana magwaro avo neavo vakanyimwa vasaziva kuti remangwana ravo rakamiria seyi munyika iyi. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko musangano reZimbabwe\nExiles Forum, Muzvare Diana Zimbudzana vanoti sangano ravo rakanyorera kugurukota rezvemukati menyika muSouth Africa muna Chivabvu richi bvunza kuti vasina kuwana magwaro nevamwe vasati vapihwa mapepa aya vachaita seyi, asi havasati vanzwa kubva kugurokota iri. Muzvare Zimbudzana vanoti pari zvino avo vasati vawana mapepa avo vanotofanirwa kubata jongwe muromo kuenda kumahofisi eVFS kuitira kuti vakwanise kubatsirwa mahofisi aya asati avharwa. No media source currently available
title: Chirongwa chekupa Zvizvarwa ZveZimbabwe Zviri MuSouth Africa Magwaro eZSP Chopera

text: Vaimbova makurukota ehurumende ezvekuchengetedzwa kwemukati menyika VaKembo Mohadi avo vave mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vari kuendeswa kumatare mangwana nerimwe gweta remuHarare vachipomerwa mhosva yekurishungurudza vari muhusungwa. Vamwe vari munyaya iyi pamwe naVaMohadi vanosanganisa vaivewo rimwe gurukota rezvemukati menyika muhurumende yemubatanidzwa Amai Theresa Makone veMDC, vaive mukuru wemapurisa VaAugustine Chihuri, vaive muchuchusi mukuru wehurumende VaJohannes Tomana, Assistant Inspector Henry Dowa naVaClever Ntini. Gweta iri VaMordecai Mahlangu vesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vanoti vose ava vanofanira kuvaripa nekuti vakatyora kodzero dzavo muna 2009 apo vaimirira VaPeter Hitschmann avo vaipa huchapupu pamhosva yaipomerwa muchakabvu Roy Bennet yekuti vainge vachida kupidigura hurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaMahlangu vakagariswa mutirongo kuHarare Central Police Station husiku hwose vachinyeperwa kuti vaida kukanganisa mafambiro enyaya iyi. Asi Vachuchusi vehurumende vanonziwo vari kuramba kumiririra VaChihuri zvopa kuti vabatwe nemhosva yekuzvidza dare nyaya iyi isati yatombopida mudariro. Mutauriri wesangano reZLHR, VaKumbirai Mafunda vanoti VaMahlangu vane chivimbo chekuti vanobudirira uye vachiti mapurisa anofanira kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu nguva dzose.
title: VaMohadi Voendeswa KuMatare Hurumende Ichiramba Kupa VaChihuri Magweta

text: Matambudziko munyaya dzezvehutano munyika ari kuramba achiwedzera zvichitevera kuramwawo mabasa kwevanoshanda kunotorwa mifananidzo yema X-ray kutanga nemusi weChina. Vanachiremba vachangopedza zvidzidzo zvavo vapindawo muzuva rechinomwe vachiramwa mabasa vachida kuti hurumende igadzirise mashandiro avo pamwe nekuvawanisa zvekushandisa pamabasa avo. Vanachiremba ava vanotiwo vanoda kuti hurumende itarise zvakare mari dzavo dzemihoro nekubatsirikana uye varerutsirwe pavanopinza munyika motokari dzavanenge vatenga kunze. Kuramwa mabasa kwevashandi vemuzvipatara zvehurumende uku kunonzi kuri kurwadzisa zvikuru varwere, avo vave kudzoserwa kudzimba dzavo. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Fortune Nyamande, avo vari ku Umea, ku Sweden, vanoti sesangano vari kukurudzira kuti mapazi ehurumende ane chekuita nematambudziko ari mune zvahutano aya agare pasi nekukasika varwere vasati vanyanyoomerwa nehupenyu. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vashandi Vobatana neMadhokotera Kuramwa Mabasa

text: Bazi rezvehutano rakaparura mushonga mutsva uchapiwa vanhu varikurarama nehutachiwana hweHIV unonzi Dolutegravir kana kuti DTG muchidimbu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Clorata Gwanzura, vakaudza Studio 7 varipamusangano wemadzimai anorarama nehutachiwana hweHIV kuGweru vhiki yapfuura,kuti mushonga weDTG waiva wakanakisa zvikuru nokuti unodzikisa huhwandu hwehutachiwana mumuviri wemurwere munguva pfupi pfupi. Dr Gwanzura vanoti mapiritsi eDTG achatanga kupiwa varwere vachangotanga kubatwa chirwere ichi kozotevera vose vanenge vapedza kunwa mapiritsi e Tenofovir, Lamuvudine and Efavirenz kana kuti TLE, ayo ainwiwa neruzhinji rwunorarama neHIV. Chiremba ava vanoti bazi rehutano rinogara richiita tsvagurudzo yokuona kuti ndeupi mushonga ungave nani pakurapa chirwere ichi, nokudaro mushonga weDTG wakaonekwa kuti ndiwo mumwe wemishonga inokwanisa kudzikisa hutachiwana hweHIV mumuviri munguva pfupi pfupi. Vanotiwo chirongwa ichi chakatangiswa mwedzi wapera zvokuti bazi rehutano riri mushishi rekudzidzisa vanamukoti nevamwe vashandi vehutano maererano nezveDTG kuti vazokwanisa kutsanangurirawo vose vachaupiwa. Dr Gwanzura vakatsanangura zvinoreva DTG vachiti mimwe yemishonga irikuwedzerwa panemimwe inodzivirira kupararira kwechirwere che HIV munyika muno. Vanotiwo piritsi reDTG idikidiki izvo zvicharerukira munhu wese acharinwa uye richizodzikisa hutachiwana hweHIV mumwedzi mishomanani. Amai Isabel Dzvova, avo vanomirira kodzero dzemadzimai vanorarama nehutachiwana hweHIV, vanoti mushonga uyu wakatambirwa nemadzimai muZimbabwe, asi vanoda kudzidziswa nezvawo zvakazara. Mukuru wesangano reMeaningful Involvement of People Living with Aids kana kuti MIPA, iro riripasi pesangano reNational Aids Council, VaSilebele Mpofu vanoti vakadzi vakawanda ndivo varikurarama nehutachiwana hweHIV. VaMpofu vanoti varume vazhinji havadi kuongororwa ropa ravo vasati varwarisa zvokuti vanozouya chirwere chanyanyisa kuvhiringidza hutano hwavo. Zimbabwe imwe yenyika shomanani dzemuAfrica dzatangisa kushandisa mushonga weDTG uyo wakapasiswa nenyika yeAmerica mugore ra 2013 mushure mokunge nyanzvi dzehutano dzakaona kuti waikurumidzisa kurapa vanhu vanorarama nehutachiwana hweHIV. Sangano reWorld Health Organisation rinoti vakadzi vachirikuda kuzoita vana vanofanira kutsanangurirwa zvakadzama zviri maererano nemushonga weDTG nokuti pane pausinganwiwe kana mudzimai akazvitakura. Masangano ePan African Positive Women’s Coalition Zimbabwe Chapter, akabatana neZimbabwe Women Living with HIV National Forum neUNAIDS, ndiwo akaunganidza madzimai makumi matatu vanotungamirira zvikwata zvevakadzi vanorarama nehutachiwana hweHIV avo vakabva kumatunhu ese enyika, kuti vauye kumusangano wekuGweru kwavaidzidziswa nekujekeserwa zviri maererano nezvemushonga mutsva uyu. Madzimai makumi matatu aya achazonodzidzisawo vamwe maererano nezvemushonga uyu kana vadzokera kumatunhu avo. No media source currently available
title: Bazi rezveHutano Roparura Piritsi Idzva reKuderedza Hukasha hweHIV

text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden vakazivisa nezuro kuti hurumende yavo ichaita misangano nevatungamiri venyika dzeku Africa musi wa13 kusvika musi wa 15 Zvita gore rino muguta reWashington DC. VaBiden, mutsamba yavo yavakanyora nezuro , vakati misangano iyi icharatidza kuti hurumende yeAmerica ine chido chekushanda nenyika dzese dzemuafrica munyaya dze kodzero dzevanhu, kupedzwa kwe denda reCovid 19, nemamwe matenda achauya, kudzivirirwa kwematunhu uye nyaya dzeku chinja kwe mamiriro ekunze. Hazvisati zvajeka kuti vatungamiri vachakokwa ndevenyika dzipi asi vakawanda vanoti havatarisire kuti mutungamiri weZimbabwe, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakatemerwa zvirango zvehupfumi neAmerica vachakokwa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaFredrick Shava kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paTswane University kuSouth Africa, Muzvinafundo Ricky Munyaradzi Mukonza vati havaone havo VaMnangagwa vachikokwa kumusangano wakakosha uyu.
title: VaBiden Vodaidzira Musangano neVatungamiri veAfrica Asi Vakawanda Vanoti VaMnangagwa Havaone Vachikokwa

text: Kushandiswa zvakanyanya kwezvinodhaka nevanhu kunonzi nemukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reHarare kwawedzera zvakanyanyisa dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa. Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reHarare VaInnocent Hove vanoti nekuda kwekuwedzera kwedambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa zvakakosha kuti vanhu vapihwe dzidziso. VaHove vakataura mashoko aya paiitwa mhemberero dzekucherechedza dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa nemusi weChitatu. Pasi rose, United Nations inoti zuva iri rinocherechedzwa musi wa10 Gumiguru asi zvakanonoka kuitwa nedunhu reHarare. Amai Betty Zephania vanova mumwe wevakaronga mhemberero idzi vachishanda kubazi rinoona nezvehutano vatsigira vachiti dambudziko rehutano hwepfungwa idambudziko ririkukura. Amai Zephania vati vazhinji vari kutamburawo nezvirwere zvepfungwa izvi varikushandisa zvinodhaka vachiti munhu wese arikufanirwa kushanda kuona kuti dambudziko iri rapedzwa. Mumwe wevechidiki, VaFarai Gutu vati vechidiki vanoda kudzidziswa kuti zvinodhaka zvine njodzi. Mumwe aishandisa zvinodhaka akakwanisa kuzobuda mazviri aona kuti zvinokuvadza, ndiVaJacob Shamuyarira, avo vakazotanga sangano rakazvimiririra rinobatsira avo vanoda kusiya zvinodhaka. Vati kushandisa zvinodhaka kunokanganisa hupenyu hwevanhu vachiti zvakakoshawo kuti vanhu vazive kwekuwana rubatsiro kana vawirwa nedambudziko iri. Kutanga kwegore rino mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakazivisa kuti gore rino igore rekurwisa dambudziko rekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka. Vechidiki ndivo vanonzi vari kunyanyoshandisa zvinodhaka izvi zvakaita semutoriro, krango, mbanje, mishonga yechikosoro yakaita seHistalix kana bronco nezvimwewo. Mhemberero dzegore rino dzakaitwa paine kurudziro yekuti pasi rese rikoshese hutano hwepfungwa. World Health organization inoti muAfrica, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri kana kuti 792 million vane chirwere chepfungwa. No media source currently available
title: Kushandiswa Zvakanyanya kweZvinodhaka Kunonzi Kwawedzera Zvakanyanyisa Dambudziko reChirwere chePfungwa muHarare

text: Mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nhasi vaparura boka revarairiridzi vanozviti Teachers for Economic Development vachiti vakakatyamadzwa kunzwa kuti varairidzi vanovatsigira pamwe nehurumende yavo. Vachitaura pagungano iri raungana kuHarare International Conference Centre VaMnangagwa vati zvakavatorera nguva kutenda kuti kune varairidzi vari kutsigira hurumende yavo VaMnangagwa vati nekuda kwerutsigiro rwavapiwa nevarairidzi urwu zuva ranhasi hava rikanganwi. Vati hurumende yavo inokoshesa zvakanyanya varairidzi vachitiwo vatungamiriri vakaita sevashakabvu VaRobert Mugabe naVaJoshua Nkomo vaive varairidzi. Mutungamiri wenyika ati varairidzi vanofanirwa kuramba zvekushandiswa neavo vavati imharadzi . Vakurudzirawo varairidzi kuti vatore mikana yekuvandudzawo hupfumi hwenyika kuburikidza nekuitawo mabhizimusi ane chekuita nezvavanodzidzisa. Vatiwo varairidzi vanofanirwa kuona kuti munyika mune kubata. VaMnangagwa vazvirovawo dundundu vachiti hurumende yavo iri kusimudzira mabhizimusi anotangwa nezvikoro zvedzidzo yepamusoro. Vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo kune zvirango zvehupfumi zvavati zvakatemerwa nyika vati vanofadzwa kuti zvirango izvi hazvimisi kushandiswa kwepfungwa izvo zvoita kuti hurumende yavo itange mabhizimusi vakabatana nezvikoro ekushadisa zvinowanikwa munyika kugadzira zvinhu zvakaita sesipo, zvekunwa nezvimwewo kubva mumuchero wemasawu pamwe nevarikugadzira zvekunwa kubva mumapfura. Mumwe wevarongi vemusangano uyu vachitungamirira Teachers for Economic Development VaAmon Chihocha vati varairidzi vese vachange vachida kuva vave nhengo dzebandiko iri vachange vachitanga vaenda kuchikoro cheHerbert Chitepo Ideological Office icho chinova chikoro chinonzi nebato reZanuPF chinodzidzisa vanhu gwara remusangano. Vachibvunzwa kuti saka zvinoreva kuti nhengo dzavo dzirikutsigira bato reZanu PF, vaChihocha vati Kunyangwe hazvo vamwe vamiririri vevarairidzi nemapato anopikisa vanga vachinyunyuta negungano iri vachiti rinokanganisawo mazamanishoni ekupera kwegore arikunyorwa muzvikoro, VaChihocha vazviramba vachiti/…. Mumwe wevarairidzi vanga varipamusangano uyu Va…..vachiti vabva kwaMutoko vatiwo vauya nekuda vachiti vanotenderana nezvinangwa zvebandiko revaraidzi raparurwa iri. Asi mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarairidzi reAlmagamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure vati vanoshungurudzika zvikuru nekuona vashandi vehurumende vachiita zvematongerwo enyika. Vachinyorawo padandemutande reTwitter, mutauriri webato rinopikisa Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere vashora zvikuru gungano ranhasi vachiti uku kushandisa varairidzi mune zvematongerwo enyika. Vati varairidzi vanofanira kunge vachidzisa vana panguva ino kwete kubatana nehurumende kushandisa mari dzemitero yevanhu kuita zvematongerwo enyika. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu gurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi Amai Evelyn Ndlovu vati bazi ravo rinotsigira zvakanyanya varairidzi ava vavati vanoda pundutso pamwe nekushanda pamwechete nehurumende mukuvandudza nyika. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vorumbidza Varairidzi veSangano Idzva reTeachers for Economic Development

text: Zimbabwe nemusi weSvondo yakabatana nedzimwe nyika mukucherechedza zuva revapoteri kana kuti World Refugee Day apo Unieted Nations iri kuchechema chema nekuwedzera kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kumanikidzwa kusiya misha yavo vachienda muhupoteri. Zuva iri raimbonzi Africa Refugee Day rakatanga kucherechedzwa musi wa 20 Chikumi 2001 senzira yekucherechedzawo makore makumi matatu United Nations yaita musangano mukuru wevapoteri kana kuti World Refugee Day muna 1951. Nyanzvi munezvehupoteri VaNorman Pinduka vaudza Studio 7 kuti African Union, SADC nemamwe masangano vanofanira kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika muAfrica kuti vakawanda vasagume vave muhupoteri. Muzvinafundo Donald Chimanikire vati ino inguva yakaoma kune vanoda kuenda muhupoteri nekuti zvinonetsa nekuda kwekupararira kuri kuita chirwere cheCovid-19. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chirikuSouth Africa VaLiberty Mapuranga vati vanhu vari kutiza hurombo munyika vanofanirawo kutorwa sevapoteri vakati nyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoda kugadziriswa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute Dr Prosper Chitamba vaudzawo studio 7 kuti nyaya dzehupfumi dzinoda kugadziriswa. Kunyangwe zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kupotera kunyika dzakaita seBotswana ne South Africa, Zimbabwe iri kuchengetawo zvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika kuTongogara Refugees Camp kuChipinge. Vachitaura neStudio 7 nezvezuva revapoteri, munyori mukuru mubazi rezvemagariro evanhu, VaSimon Masanga vatiwo Zimbabwe vapoteri vari munyika vanosvika zviuru gumi nezvishanu. VaMasanga vati havo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakaenda kunotsvaga mafuro manyoro hazvibatwe sevapoteri. Asi vati havo hurumende yakaisa mutemo wekubatsira vanoshanda kunze ava kana kuti Labour Migration Policy Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden vati vanocherechedza zuva iri vachiti vakazvipira kubatsira vapoteri nechikafu uye kuita hurukuro dzekupedza hondo pasi rose. Sangano reUnited Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR) rinoti pasi pese vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni makumi masere nemaviri nechidimbu vairarama muhupoteri pakapera gore ra2020 nekuda kwekusagadzikana munyika dzavo. UNHCR inotiwo vakawanda vevapoteri ava varikubva kunyika shanu dzinoti Syrian Arab Republic, Venezuela, Afghanistan, South Sudan neMyanmar. UNHCR inoti nyika yeTurkey ndiyo irikuchengeta vapoteri vakawanda ichitevererwa neColumbia Zuva revapoteri rinocherechedzwa musi wa20 Chikumi gore rega rega Mukuru weUNHCR kana kuti Assistant High Commissioner Amai Gillian Triggs vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane vari muhupoteri ava, pane zviuru makumi mana nevasere kubva muzana kana kuti 48% vana kana kuti ndevechidiki.
title: Zimbabwe Yobatana neDzimwe Nyika Kucherechedza Zuva reVapoteri

text: Sangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, ZNCC, rinoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya yemabhizimisi nenyaya yekushaya mari yekunze uye kudhura kuri kuita mitero yekukwereta mari kumabhanga emunyika. Sangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, ZNCC, rinoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya yemabhizimisi nenyaya yekushaya mari yekunze uye kudhura kuri kuita mitero yekukwereta mari kumabhanga emunyika. ZNCC inoti iri kuda kuti hurumende itaure nevemabhanga emunyika kuitira kuti vadzikise mari iyi. Mutungamiri weZNCC, VaDavid Norupiri, vanotiwo mabhizmisi ari kukwanisa kushanda achingosvika pazvikamu makumi matatu nezvishanu kubva muzana nepamusana pezvimhingamupinyi zvakawanda zvavari kusangano nazvo. Vatiwo ZNCC yaumba bazi rinenge richishanda nevemabhizimisi makuru nemadiki vachivakurudzira kuti vakweretewo mari kumabhanga kuti mari dzavo dzipinde mumabhanga. Vakawanda vemabhizimisi ava vanonzi havaendese mari dzavo kumabhanga uye havabhadhare mitero zvoita kuti mari iri kutenderera mumabhizimisi iderere. Sangano iri rasangana neChipiri nechikwata che International Monetary Fund chiri munyika richikurudzirawo IMF kuti idyidzane neZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: ZNCC Inoti Kushaikwa kweMari Kwokanganisa Mabhizinesi

text: Vatsigiri veZanu PF vekuMasvingo vanotsigira chikwata chinonzi chiri kuda kuti mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmerson Munangagwa, cheTeam Lacoste, kuti vatore chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, vanoti havasi kufara nekubatwa kuri kuitwa mukuru wavo ne mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nemudzimai wavo. Vatsigiri ava vanoti kunyadziswa nekutukwa kwakaitwa VaMunangagwa pamwe nedunhu ravo na Amai Grace Mugabe kuBindura masvondo apfuura kunovarwadza uye kuchaita kuti vatambire bhora musango pasarudzo dzegore rinouya. Vachitaura neStudio 7 vazhinji vanoti kunyange hazvo Amai Mugabe vachiti hakuna chikwata chinonzi G40, chikwata chinorwisana neTeam Lacoste, vanofunga kuti Amai Mugabe nevamwe vavo vari kuda kutora masimba ose munyika, uye kuti vabvise VaMnangagwa pamakwikwi ekuzotsiva VaMugabe kana vasiya chigaro. VaLameck Chimbunde, avo vanotsigira Team Lacoste, vanoti havasi kuzosiya mukuru wavo achishungurudzwa, nokudaro vachasangana neG40 pasarudzo gore rinouya vachiti ndivo vane chaunga. Mumwe mutsigiri waVaMnangagwa, Muzvare Sekesai Homba, vanoti kutsutsumwa kuri kuitwa muMasvingo nenyaya iyi, kuchaita kuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaMugabe vashaye rutsigiro rwavo. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwe enyika, dzakaita sa VaUshe Murinde, vanoti kugumbutswa kwakaitwa vatsigiri va VaMunangagwa kuchaita kuti Zanu PF isare isina kusimba uye itorerwe zvigaro pasarudzo dze gore rinouya. Dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti Zanu PF ikaramba yakadai, ichatadza kutsvaira zvigaro zvose zvemuparamende makumi maviri nezvitanhatu sezvayakaita musarudzo dzemuna 2013. VaMurinde vati izvi zvinogona kushandira zvakanaka divi remapato anopikisa sezvo Zanu PF isina kubatana sezvayakanga yakaita muna 2013. Mukuru wevechidiki muZanu PF muMasvingo, VaNobert Ndaarombe, avo vanonzi mumwe weve Team Lacoste, varamba kutipa pfungwa dzavo nezvenyaya iyi vachiti inovapisa zvigumwe. Asi mumwe kanzura wemuMasvingo anofungidzirwa kuti ndeve G40, VaGeshom Mundondo, vanoti zviri kutaura vamwe vavo hazvina maturo uye hazviiti kuti Zanu PF ikundwe musarudzo gore rinouya. VaMugabe vakatodoma komiti huru yeZanu PF ichange ichitungamira sarudzo. Komiti iyi ine vanhu vashanu vanoti munyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muZanu PF, VaIgnatius Chombo, munyori wezvemitemo, VaPatrick Chinamasa, murongi wemisangano, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, munori wezvechidiki, VaKudzai Chipanga, pamwe nemunyori wezvemadzimai, Amai Grace Mugabe. Pavashanu ava, VaChinamasa chete ndivo munhu asinganyatsozivikanwe kuti akamira papi kunyange hazvo vamwe vachiti vakarerekera kuTeam Lacoste. Vamwe vose vana ava vanozivikanwa kuti ndeve G40. Vatsigiri veTeam Lacoste vanoti veG40 vanoda kubvisa VaMnangagwa kuitira kuti pasarudzo dzegore rinouya vaise vanhu vavo vachakwikwidzana nemamwe mapato pazvigaro zveparamende nemakanzura. Asi vanoti izvi zvikaitika, havasi kuzovhotera vanhu vanenge vaiswa pamwe naivo VaMugabe vacho, izvo zvichaita kuti vakundwe zvine mutsindo kudarika zvavakaitwa muna 2008. No media source currently available
title: Vatsigiri Vakawanda veZanu PF kuMasvingo Votsamwiswa naAmai Mugabe

text: Munyori mukuru mubato rePeople's Democratic Party inotungamirirwa naVaTendai Biti, VaGorden Moyo, vanoti bato ravo harisi kuzosaina chibvumirano chekuumba mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weMDC Alliance, sezvo nhaurirano pane zvikuru zvinofanirwa kutanga zviwiriranwa dzisati dzapera. Gwaro raburitswa naVaMoyo rinoti chikuru pane zvisati zvawiriranwa inyaya yekugovanwa kwezvigaro zveparamende munyika yose, uye zvigaro makumi maviri nechimwe zvakarasikirwa nebato iri parakabuda kubva muMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, izvo zvave pasi peZanu PF. PDP inoti kusvika nyaya idzi dzagadziriswa nenzira inorigutsa harisi kuzosaina chibvumirano ichi. Zvimwe zvinonzi zviri kudiwa nebato iri kupiwa mukana wekuti nhengo dzaro dzakawanda dzipiwe mukana wekukwikwidza muzvigaro zvakawanda kubva kumakanzuru kusvika kuparamende. Mapato matanhatu anoti MDC-T, MDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, Zanu-Ndonga, Zimbabwe People First, Transform Zimbabwe, neMultiracial Christian Democratic Party ari kutarisirwa kusaina chibvumirno ichi neMugovera pamusangano uchaitirwa kuZimbabwe Grounds mumusha weHighfields. Asi mutauriri we PDP, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti bato ravo rakazvipira kuona kuti mubatanidzwa uyu wabudirira, richitarisirawo zvakare kuti zvinetswa zvose zvawiriranwa. VaMafume vanoti bato ravo richange riri kuZimbabwe Grounds neMugovera. No media source currently available
title: VaGorden Moyo vePDP Votaura Pamusoro peMDC Alliance

text: Zimbabwe yapinda muzuva rechina vanhu vachigara kudzimba senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana weCoronavirus, veruzhinji vari kutadza kutevedza nzira dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus, dzakaita sekusagara pedyo nepedyo kana kuti Social Distancing, sezvo vari kugara vachitsikirirana mumitsetse yekuchera mvura pazvibhorani pamwe nekutenga zvinhu zviri kushaikwa zvakaita sehupfu muzvitoro. Pasi rose vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete vabatwa nechirwere ichi, kusanganisira vasere vemuZimbabwe, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi mashanu nechimwe, vafa nechirwere ichi kusanganisirawo Zororo Makamba wemuZimbabwe. Vakawanda pamwe nemapurisa akawanda ayo ari kuona kuti vanhu vatevedza mutemo wekuti vagare kudzimba dzavo, havanawo zvipfeko zvinovadzivirira kubva kuCoronavirus zvakaita semamasiki. Pavakaparura chirongwa chekuti vanhu vagare kumba, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakavimbisa kuti hurumende ichaona kuti vanhu vawaniswa mvura kuti vakwanise kugeza nekugara kudzimba dzavo kuti chirwere cheCoronavirus chisapararira. Asi mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaThomsen Lizwe, vanoti izvi handizvo zviri kuitika sezvo vanhu vari kuungana kuzvibhorani nekuti hakuna mvura iri kubuda mupombi. Vamwewo vakawanda varatidzawo kusafara nekuti zvitoro zvikuru zvakavhurwa zvakaita seOK, mumisha inogara vazhinji, kune mitsetse yakakura sezvo vanhu vari kuda kutenga hupfu nechikafu. Panzvimbo idzi vanhu havasi kutevedza nzira dzekudzivirira kuparara kweCoronavirus. Mumiriri weMufakose muNational Assembly, Amai Susan Matsunga, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanoona sekuti vanhu vanogona kutevedza mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus kana vakapihwa mvura mudzimba kuitira kuti vasanoungana kuzvibhorani. Asi mutauririri weHarare Council, VaMike Chideme, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru yavo yave kutora matanho ekupa vagari mvura pamwe nekuona kuti havaungani zvichitevera mutongo wakapihwa nedare repamusoro nemusi weMuvhuro. Dare iri rakati kanzuru yeHarare nehurumende kuburikidza nemapazi aro anoti remadhorobha nematunhu neremari anofanira kuona kuti vanhu vawaniswa mvura yakachena muguta reHarare panguva ino apo nyika iri kudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus. Mutongo uyu wakapihwa zvichtevera chikumbiro cherimwe remasangano anomirira vagari vemuHarare, reCombined Harare Residents Association. Zvichakadai, mapurisa akawanda ayo ari kutenderera achiona kuti mitemo yekudzivirira Coronavirus ari kuita izvi asina zvipfeko zvekuzvichengetedza kubva kuchirwere ichi. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaJeans Phiri, vati vanoona sekuti zviri kuitika izvi hazvina kukokdzera vachiti mapurisa anofanirawo kuchengetedzwa kubva kuCoronavirus. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mukuru wemapurisa nemuhurumende vanokoshesha hutano hwemapurisa uye vari kuita zvese zvavanokwanisa kuti mapurisa achengetedzwe kubva kuCoronavirus. Vati pane zvekuchengetedza mapurisa zvakaita semaMask zvavakawana asi vakati hazvina kukwanira mapurisa ese uye pane hurongwa kwekuti mapurisa ese awane zvipfeko izvi nezvimwe zvekushandisa nekuadzivirira kuti asabate Coronavirus apo anenge ari pabasa. VaNyathi vazivisawo kuti kusvika pari zvino vasunga vanhu mazana mana nemakumi masere nevashanu vakatyora mutemo weLockdown. Vati vazhinji vavo vanhu vaivhura mabhawa kana kutengesa hwahwa zviri kunze kwemutemo. Veruzhinji vari kuchema chemawo kuti vamwe vemabhizimisi vari kukwidza mitengo zvakanyanya panguva ino uye vanoda kuti hurumende irange vanhu ava. Zimbabwe yakaita chisungo chekuti vanhu vambogara kudzimwa dzavo kwemasvondo matatu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hweCoronavirus. Coronavirus iyo yauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi mana nezvisere pasi rose, kusanganisira Zororo Makamba wemuZimbabwe. Munyika mune vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevana vakaongorora kuti vane chirwere ichi, uye vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevatanhatu vakawanikwa vasina chirwere ichi. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Inopinda Muzuva reChina Nyika Yakavharwa, Asi Vanhu Vachinyunyuta

text: NeChitatu dare redzimhosva rakagara pachipatara cheParktown chiri muHarare apo rakanzwa nyaya iri kupomerwa nhengo nhatu dzeMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa dzinoti Muzvare Joana Mamombe, vanove mumiriri weHarare West muparamende, Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri naMuzvare Netsai Marova. Madzimai matatu aya ari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo unorambidza vanhu kufamba-famba munguva ino yeCovid-19, mushure mekunge vapinda mukuratidzirwa kwakaitwa nenhengo dzevechidiki dzebato ravo kuWarren Park masvondo maviri adarika. Mushure medare iri, vatatu ava vanonzi vakabva vachengetedzwa nemagadhijeri mapfumbamwe pamusoro pemapurisa anonzi anga agara akavachengetedza vari muchipatara ichi. Nemusi weChina mutongi wedare anonzi azotara kuti vatatu ava vabvise mari yechibatiso inoita chiuru chemadhora emunyika pamunhu kuitira kuti vakwanise kutongwa vachibva kudzimba dzavo. Vanziwo vanofanirwa kunozviratidza kumapurisa kamwe chete mumasvondo maviri, uye vagare makero dzavakapa kudare. Nhengo dzebato rinopikisa idzi dzinoti dzakasungwa nemapurisa mushure mekuratidzira kuWarren Park uku, asi dzakazopambwa kubva mumaoko emapurisa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori dzakashungurudzwa zvakanyanya pashure dzakazosiiwa panzvimbo yeMuchapondwa kuBindura, makiromita anodarika makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muHarare. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoshanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, vanoti zviri kuitwa nehurumende kumadzimai matatu aya kutyora kodzero dzavo, sezvo vari ivo vakatoshungurudzwa vari mumaoko ehurumende. VaMavhinga vanoti hurumende yaifanirwa kutanga nekuferefeta kupambwa kunonzi kwakaitwa madzimai aya, vakaita izvi votorerwa matanho, kwete kuvedzera marwadzo pavanhu vari panhoo yerufu nekuvatonga vari muchipatara. Asi rimwe gweta vari nhengo yeZanu PF, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti zvakaitwa nehurumende ndizvo chaizvo zvekutanga nekuvatonga nemhosva yekutyora kwavaikaita mutemo we lockdown. Doctor Mavaza vanoti nyaya yekupambwa kwenhengo nhatu idzi haina humbowo hwekuti zvakaitika, vachiti bato reMDC rinozivikanwa nekuda kusvibisa zita renyika kuburikidza nekunyepa kuti vanhu vari kupambwa vachiitwa kafira mberi. Asi VaMavhinga vanoti zviri kutoitwa nehurumende zvekumbunyikidza kodzero dzeavnhu ndizvo zviri kutosvibisa zita renyika, kwete zvinonzi zviri kuitwa nenhengo dzeMDC zvekuburitsa pachena kushungurudzwa kwevanhu munyika. Ukuwo, Doctor Mavaza vanoti hurumende ichiri kuongorora nyaya yavo yekupambwa iyi, uye iri kuferefetwa kusvika kumagumo. No media source currently available
title: Kutongwa kweNhengo Nhatu dzeMDC Dziri muChipatara Kwokonzera Mutauro

text: Vechidiki mubato reMovement for Democratic Change mudunhu reHarare vanoti vawirirana kutsigira VaNelson Chamisa semutungamiriri webato iri musarudzo dzirikutarisirwa muna Chivabvu. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau muHarare nhasi, vakasanobata chigaro chemutungamiriri wevechidiki mudunhu reHarare VaStanley Manyenga vati pamusangano yavakaita neMugovera neSvondo vakawirirana kuti vachazenge vachitsigira VaNelson Chamisa. Munyori muboka revechidiki iri VaDenford Ngadziore vaudza Studio 7 kuti huwandu hwemavhoti akawanikwa naVaChamisa musarudzo dzapera ndiwo aita kuti vafunga kuvadzorera vachiti zvinobatsira kusimudzira bato ravo. Mumwe mutungamiriri wesangano revechidiki rakazvimiririra rePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku vati hapana chakaipa kuti mapoka adome vatungamiriri vavachatsigira asi vanofanirwa kupa munhu wese mukana wekukwikwidza nekutsvaka rutsigiro. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaFarai Mabeza vanoti havaoni bato reMDC richiita sarudzo dzejekerere. VaMabeza vanoti vanokatyamadzwa kuti murongi wemusangano muMDC T inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa VaAmos Chibaya vakati hapana anofanirwa kukwikwidza VaChamisa kumusangano wavo wekutsvaka hutungamiriri hutsva. Vechidiki mudunhu reHarare vaudzawo vatori venhau kuti vanofungidzira kuti bato reZanu PF richashandisa dzimwe nhengo dzebato iri kuti dzikwikwidze VaChamisa. Asi mutauriri weZanu PF VaSimon Khaya Moyo nezuro vakaudza vatori venhau kuti havanei nezviri kuitika mubato reMDC T uye vakaramba mashoko ekuti vanoda kuti VaChamisa vasatungamire bato iri. No media source currently available
title: VeChidiki muHarare Vanoti Vanotsigira VaChamisa

text: Nhengo dzemapato ezvematongerwo enyika ose ari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzeparamende dzakaswera dzichisvitsa mapepa adzo ekuti dzikwikwidze musarudzo idzi kudare rinotambira mazita evanhu varikuda kukwkwidza musarudzo. Rakaswera riri besanwa padare ramejasitiriti muHarare nezuro apo vari kuda kukwikwidza musarudzo dzeparamende mudunhu reHarare vakamirira mapato akasiyana-siyana vanga vachisvitsa mapepa avo kudare re nomination court. Mumwe wevakasvitsa mapepa avo kudare iri ndiVaGodwin Gomwe vanove sachigaro wevechidiki muZanu PF mupurovhinzi yeHarare avo vari kuda kukwikwidza vakamirira bato ravo kuBudiriro. VaGomwe vakati kunyange hazvo vakwanisa kusvitsa mapepa avo kudare iri, havasi kufara nekuti dare rinotambira mapepa aya ragariswa munzvimbo diki yanga isingakwane gurumwandira revanhu vanga vachisvitsa mapepa kudare. Mumwe asvitsa mapepa ekukwikwidza musarudzo dzeparamende ndiAmai Tendai Ndoro avo vari kukwikwidza vakazvimirira kuHatfield. Amai Ndoro vakati sezvo vanga vasiri nhengo yeripi bato riri munyika, vati vaona zvakakodzera kuti vamire musarudzo vachiti sezvo vari chiremba vane ruzivo rwakawanda rwunogona kubatsira nyika. Vakatiwo havana kufara nekunonoka kwanga kuchiita vashandi vedare re nomination court pakutambira kwavanga vachiita mapapa. Mwana wevaimbova mutungamiri weMDCT, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, Amai Vimbai Java-Tsvangirai, vakakwanisa kuisa mapepa avo kudare re nomination kuti vakwikwidze vakamirira MDC Alliance kuGlen View South. Mumwe aida kumirira MDC Alliance kuGlen View South uko kusina kuzoitwa sarudzo kuchinzi ndekwemadzimai, VaGladman Hakata, vakasvitsawo mapepa kudare iri uye vachange vakazvimirira musarudzo idzi. Vacharlton Hwende vakasvitsawo mapepa avo kuti vamirire MDC Alliance kuKuwadzana East uko kusina kuzoitwa sarudzo dzema primary mushure memhirizhonga inonzi yakaitika ikoko. Vachakwikwidzana naAmai Betty Kaseke veZanu PF pamwe nenhengo mbiri dzeMDC dzinoti VaIshamel Kauzani naVaUrayayi Mangwiro avo vanove kanzura mukanzuru yeHarare. Zvichakadai, MDC Alliance ichange ichimiriirirwa naVaShadreck Mashayamombe avo vaimbova sachigaro weZanu PF mupurovhinzi yeHarare, avo vakadzingwa muZanu PF. VaMashayamombe vachange vachikwikwidzana naVaTongai Mnangagwa veZanu PF vanove hama yemutungamiri wenyika pamwe nevemamwe mapato akaita seNational Patriotic Front, People’s Rainbow Coalition, Zipp, nemamwe. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mupurvhinzi yeHarare mubato reNationa Patriotic Fron inotungamiriwa naVaAmbrose Mutinhirit, VaKudzai Saruwaka, vakaudza Studio7 kuti vachakwikwidza zvigaro zvese sebato mupurovhinzi yeHarare. Nhengo yepurovhinzi muNational People’s Party uye vari mumubatanidzwa wePRC unotungamirwa naAmai Joice Mujuru, VaFriday Muleya, vakati vaisawo nhengo dzavo munzvimbo dzose dziri mudunhu reHarare. Zvichakadai, sachigaro weMDCT inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa mupurovhinzi yeHarare, VaEric Murai, vakati havasi kuzoshaya hope nenhengo dzebato ravo idzo dzasarudza kupinda musarudzo idzi dzakazvimirira. MDCT inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe yakati yakanga iri mubishi kuti iwone kuti yaisawo nhengo dzichaimirira munzvimbo dzose muHarare nekune dzimwe nzvimbo. Nhengo yeMDCT yaVaChamisa, VaPeter Mudavanhu,ndevamwe vevachapinda musarudzo dzeparamende vakazvimirira sezvo vachiti havasi kufara kuti VaTendai Biti ndivo vakanzi vakwikwidze kuHarare East vakamirira MDC Alliance uko kwavachatatsurana nemutevedzeri waMuzvare Khupe, VaObert Gutu pamwe naVaTerence Mukupe veZanu PF. VaSimon Chidhakwa vanove nhengo yeparamende parizvino vakamirira MDCT yaVaChamisa vachapinda kusarudzo idzi vakazvimirira mushure mekusvitsa kwavaita mapepa avo kudare. VaChidhakwa vakati vakabirirwa musarudzo dzema primary pavakakundwa naVaJob Sikhala. Umwewo achakwikwidza akazvimirira musarudzo dzeparamende ndivaZakeli Makari vanove nhengo yeZanu PF avo vakakundwa musarudzo dzema primary mubato iri, Zvichakadai, sachigaro weZEC, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vakati varikufadzwa nemafambisirwo arikuitwa basa nedare re nomination court kunyange hazvo vachiti pamboita kurwisana kunzvimbo dzakaita seChitungwiza uko kunonzi nhengo dzeMDCT yaVaChamisa dzabvutira vamwe vanhu mapepa avanga vachida kusvitsa kudare re nomination court vakamirira MDCT yaMuzvare Khupe. Amai Chigumba vakati kutambirwa kwemapepa uku kuchasvika pakati pehusiku kuitira kuti vose vari kuda kukwikwidza musarudzo vakwanise kusvitsa mapepa avo. No media source currently available
title: Dzimwe Nhengo dzeMDC-T Dzokwikwidza Dzakazvimirira muHarare

text: Kunetsana kunoenderera mberi mubato reZanu-PF kunyangwe hazvo vakuru vebato vari kuti vakagadzirisa zviri kunetsa mubato mumusangano wePolitburo wakatora maawa gumi. Matare emuSouth Africa anoti vanenge vabatwa nemhosva dzekutyora mutemo wekushanyira nyika iyi vanofanira kuendeswa kumatere mukati memaawa makumi mana nemasere. Sangano reJoint Operation Command rotadza kuwirirana nevesangano reZimbabwe Activists Alliance pamusoro pehurongwa hwesangano iri hwekuda kufora vachicherechedza Valentine's Day. Munhau dzemitambo, chikwata chenhabvu cheChicken Inn chotamba neSundowns neSvondo mumutambo we CAF Champions League wekutanga kuLuveve Stadium. Muchirongwa cheWomen’s Round Table na 8:30 pm tiri kutarisa zuva reValentine’s Day. Iyi ndiyo misoro yenhau dzedu dzanhasi...munotibata pa 909 am, 4930, kana pa 12080, ne 15460 Kilohertzs pa Shortwave kana paFacebook page yedu yeVOA Shona. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau, China Kukadzi 11, 2016

text: Hurumende kuburikidza nechikamu chehurumende cheZimbabwe National Statistics Agency-ZIMSTAT yaburitsa magwaro matanhatu anobatsira pakufambisa mabasa nezvirongwa zvehurumende uye kuburitsa pachena matambudziko makukutu akatarisana nevana. Magwaro aya akaparurwa nemusi weChipiri kuHoliday Inn muHarare. Magwaro aparurwa aya anotarisa nyaya dzakaita semagariro evanhu, achitarisa nyaya dzemabasa uye magariro evanhurume nevanhukadzi. Zimstat yabuditsawo kekutanga gwaro rinotarisa magariro evana. Vachitaura neStudio 7 mushure mekuparurwa kwemagwaro aya, mukuru wechikamu chehurumende chinoona nezvemagariro evanhu VaMutasa Dzinotizei vati zvakakosha kubuditsa magwaro aya kubatsira vanogadzira mitemo nezvirongwa zvehurumende kuti vazadzikise zvinodiwa pasi neruzhinji. VaPiason Mlambo vanoshanda nesangano re United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA) iro remamwe masangano akabatsira ZIMSTAT kubuda nemagwaro aya vati vanogutsikana nekuti hurumende inobatsirikana nemagwaro avo. VaMlambo avo vakaongorora magariro evanhu vakuru munyika vati gwaro iri richabatsira zvikuru mapazi ehurumende akadai seemagariro evanhu. VaWhatmore Makokoba mumwe wevange vari pamusangano wekuparura magwaro aya vati vafadzwa zvikuru nekuparurwa kwemagwaro akanangana nevana. VaMakokoba vakurudzira hurumende kuti iverenge zvizere magwaro aya kuti igadzirise matambudziko akatarisana nevana. Gwaro revana iri rabuditsawo pachena kuti chikamu chepakati nepakati chevana varimu Zimbabwe hachiende kuzvikoro zvesekondari . Gwaro iri rinotiwo zvikamu zvitanhatu kubva muzana zvevana vari pasi pemakore gumi nemashanu munyika zviri kushanda kunyangwe zvazvo mitemo yenyika dzese isinga zvibvumudzi. Muzvare Chipo Majuta vange vari pamusangano uyu vati havana chivimbo chekuti hurumende ichagadzirisa matambudziko ese ari mumagwaro aya. Magwaro aya ari kushandisa zvakaunganidzwa pakaverengwa vanhu munyika mugore ra2012. ZIMSTAT inoti pamusoro pekuziva vanhu vari munyika vanozoenderera mberi votarisa magariro emapoka akasiyana-siyana. Kubva pakuverengwa kwevanhu muna2012 , ZimStat yaburitsa magwaro anosvika mapfumbamwe. No media source currently available
title: VeZimstat neUNFPA Voburitsa Pachena Kuti Vana Vakawanda Vononga Svosve neMuromo muNyika

text: Paita mheremhere pamahofisi ekwa Registrar-General panotorerwa mapasipoti muChinhoyi nhasi apo vanhu vakawandisa vavasundana kuti vaforere magwaro ekufambisa aya. Kusundana kwevanhu uku pamwe nekupomerwa huwori kwevashandi vepamahofisi aya kwasimudza gurukota redunhu reMashonaland West, Amai Mary Mliswa-Chikoka, avo vabva vasvikoita musangano wechimbichimbi nevashandi vekwaRegistrar-General ava mangwanani akare. Amai Mliswa-Chikoka vaudza vatori venhau kuti huwandu hwevanhu vauya nhasi hwakonzerwawo nemashoko ari kutenderera pamadandemutande ekuti mari yekutora pasipoti iri kukwira kubva svondo rinouya neMuvhuro. Vanoti pane vanhu vakawanda vari kudawo magwaro ekufambisa asiri mapasipoti anonzi maEmegency Travel Document – kana kuti ETD, uye vamwe vari kuda kuwedzera mari dzavakabhadhara kutora mapasipoti kuti akurumidze kubuda kana kuti top-up. Panyaya yehuwori yanzi yatekeshera pamahofisi aya, Amai Mliswa-Chikoka vanoti vataura nezvayo vakayambira vashandi kuti vasiyane netsika yehuwori vachiti vachaongorora nyaya iyi. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wepamahofisi aya, Muzvare Emily Zinyemba, varamba kutaura nevatori venhau vachiti havabvumidzwe nemutemo webasa vakati titaure namabharani mukuru wehurumende VaClemence Masango, avo vanga vasingadavire nharembozha yavo. VaJim Shoko, avo vabva kuChegutu, vanoti vave nemazuva matatu vachirara pamahofisi emapasipoti apa asi vachitadza kutora garwo rekufambisa iri nekuda kwehuwori hwavanoti huri kusanganisira vashandi nemapurisa epamahofisi aya. Vazhinji vataura neStudio 7 vanoti vari kuda kutora mapasipoti kuti vaende kunotsvaka mafuro manyoro kune dzimwe nyika sezvo hupenyu hwaoma munyika. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti ichakwidza mari dzekutora mapasipoti asi hapana kuzivisa kuti ichakwidza riini uye kuti nemarii. Pari zvino pasipoti yemutengo wepasi iri kuita madhora makumi mashanu nematatu emari yemunyika, uye inotora mwedzi mitanhatu kuti ibude, asi inobuda nezuva rimwe chete ichiita madhora mazana matatu negumi nemasere. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vanoda Mapasipoti Vanotsikirirana paMahofisi aRegistrar-General kuChinhoyi

text: Bato reMDC T ritoti riri kuronga kuparura chirongwa chekusatenga muzvitoro kana zvigadzirwa zvemakambani evanhu vanodyidzana nehurumende iri kutonga yeZanu PF. Mutauriri weMDC T, VaDouglas Mwonzora vanoti bato ravo rafunga kutora danho iri sezvo vanhu vari kudyidzana nehurumende yeZanu PF vari kuita zvehuwori mukuwanisana mabasa muhurumende vachipedzisira vokama hurumende. VaMwonzora vanoti pari zvino bato ravo rave nemakambani anosvika gumi nemapfumbamwe avachakurudzira veruzhunji kuti vasadyidzana nawo, anosanganisira kambani yemutungamiri wenyika yeGushungo Dairy, pamwe nezvitoro zveChoppies, inove yemutevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, vaPhelekezela Mphoko. Vanoti hurongwa hwavo hwakatwasuka zvikuru sezvo husiri kuzoparadza zvitoro kana makambani aya kana kuita zvemhirizhonga, asi kuti vachangorega kutenga zvigadzirwa zvakaita semukaka weGushungo nemuzvotoro zvakaita seChoppies. "Hatisi kuzorwisana navom kana kuparadza zvitoro zvavo. Tiri kungoti hatitengi muzvitoro zvavo kana kushandisa zvigadzirwa zvavo chete," VaMwonzora vanotsanangura. MDC T iri kuedza kutora matanho akawanda anosanganisira kuratidzira, senzira yekumanikidza hurumende yaVaMugabe kubva pachigaro. No media source currently available
title: MDC T Yoronga Kusatenga Muzvitoro neZvigadzirwa zveVanodyidzana neZanu PF

text: Chirongwa cheZimbabwe International Trade Fair, ZITF, chegore rino chatanga neChipiri muBulawayo pasina zvakawanda zvange zvichiitika, vamwe vari kuratidza zvinhu zvavo vachiti chirongwa ichi chinoramba chakakoshera vemaindasitiri nemamwe mabhizimisi. Vamwe vevari kuratidza zvinhu zvavo paZITF vanoti chirongwa ichi chinoramba chakakosha sezvo chichivapa mukana wekuzvishambadza, zvisinei kuti zvehupfumi munyika hazvina kumira zvakanaka. VaSasha Zivanai ndivo mumwe wevakuru vakuru vekambani yeFamily Castings Private Limited iyo inogadzira simbi dzakasiyana-siyana dzinoshandiswa mumigodhi pamwe nemuma indasitiri. VaZivanai, avo vati kambani yavo yakavambwa mugore ra1992, vatiwo gore rino ndiko kekutanga vachitadza zvavanogadzira paZITF vachiti vakawona kuita izvi kwakanakira kambani yavo. Amai Sikhangezokuhle Simali ndivo mukuru wezve kufambiswa kwemabasa mukambani yeMillenium Footwear iyo inogadzira shangu. Amai Simali vati sezvo kambani yavo ichagadzira zvinhu zvainozotengesa kune vanhu vanozozvitengesawo, zvakakosha kuti izvishambadze pachirongwa chakadai seZITF. VaPhillemon Mupupa veNamibia Port Authority iyo inove kambani yehurumende yeNamibia inowona nezvekufambiswa pamwe nekuchengetedzwa kwezvinhu zvinosvikira pamahombekombe egungwa munyika umu. VaMupupa vati rino ndiro gore rechitanhatu kambani yavo ichiuya paZITF vakatiwo hapana zvavati vawona zvinobatika zvati zvawanikwa nekambani yavo nekuve muchirongwa ichi asi vati vanotarisira kuti izvi zvichachinja. Hurumende yeNamibia yakapa hurumende yeZimbabwe nzvimbo yepanosvikira zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana zvinoda kutakurwa nezvikepe muguta reWalvis Bay. VaMupupa vati vanotarisira kuti kupera kuvakwa kwenzvimbo iyi uko kunotarisirwa kuitika pakati pegore rino, kuchaita kuti Zimbabwe iwedzere kufambiswa kwezvinhu zvinobva kana kuenda mhiri kwemakungwa ichishandisa Windhoek. Pari zvino Zimbabwe inonyanya kushandisa guta reBeira riri muMozambique. Gore rino nyika gumi neina dziri kuratidza zvigadzirwa zvadzo, uye nzvimbo inosvika zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana zvenzvimbo dzekuratidzira zvigadzirwa, dzakatotorwa nemakambani akasiyana siyana. Mutungamiri weNamibia, VaHage Geingob, ndivo vachavhura ZITF yegore rino zviri pamutemo nemusi weChishanu Kubvumbi 28, uye mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanotarisirwa kuve varipo pachiitiko ichi. No media source currently available
title: ZITF Inotanga muBulawayo

text: Mutongi wedare ramejastiriti muHarare VaStanford Mambanje nezuro vkaapa chirango chavasendeka parutivi kunhengo dzekereke yeMirirai Jehovha Apostolic Church dzakabatwa nemhosva yekuratidzira zvisiri pautemo muHarare. Anotungamira kereke iyi ari zvekare mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reZimbabwe Transformative Party kana kuti ZTP ndiBishop Kanyenzura Parere. Gweta renhengo dzekereke iyi, VaEvans Moyo vanoshanda nesangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vaudza Studio 7 kuti, “Vapihwa charango chiri suspended che 3 months on condition yekuti pamakore mashanu anotevera havange vachibatwa nemhosva inosanganisira criminal nuisance. Vazopihwa zvekare imwe one-month yasendekwa parutivi yekuti vanobhadhara fine yeZWD12, 000 by 28 December 2022.” VaPerere nevamwe vavo vakasungwa musi wa9 Chikunguru dzikapomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo wekuita musarinya muchikamiu chesection 46 of the Criminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act. Vanonzi vaifamba vachiimba muHarare kuti, "Emmanuel tisunungureiwo tanzwa nenhamo" No media source currently available Asi VaMoyo vati vachapikisa mutongo wapihwa nedare uyu. VaMambanje vanoti vakagutsikana nehuchapupu hwakapihwa. Nhengo dzakabatwa nemhosva idzi dzinosanganisirawo mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato reZTP VaSimon Goshomi, sachigaro VaRichard Mhurushoma, mutevedzeri wasachigaro VaFortune Chapeyama, munyori mukuru VaPrince Mukozho nevamwe vanosanganisira Solomon Duwa, Shongai Mushinje, Noah Dabvu, Jasper Muringanidza, Honoured Mutangadura, Sherperd Mutsonhi, Edson Shonhiwa, Chaora Rovesai, Tafadzwa Musere, Tsverukai Harava, Shamiso Majecha, Runia Musere, Margret Chibwana, Sakile Nkomo, Helen Kuudzewe, Liah Munakandafa, Victoria Changadzo, Restar Kunyenzura, Emmanuel Musere, Godfrey Mashava, Givemore Bandera, Pangai Kurehwatira, Edward Mhindu, Leon Mukopfa, Pride Charedzera, Irvin Musenze, Jefta Takaedza, Thomas Zengeya na Felix Zengeya.
title: Mutungamiri weBato Rinopikisa reZTP neVatsigiri Vake Vobatwa neMhosva yeKuita Musarinya Mushure Mekuratidzira muHarare

text: Varwi vehondo yerusununguko pasi peboka reZIPRA votarisira kumutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti vadzorerwe mapurazi, midziyo pamwe nemahofisi avo zvakatorwa nehurumende. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano wakaitwa nevamwe vevaive varwi vebato reZAPU, veZIPRA nezuro muBulawayo. Murongi wemabasa musangano reZIPRA Veterans Association, Amai Tiisang Dale vakaudza Studio 7 mushure memusangano uyu kuti vakabvumirana kuti varwi veZIPRA, vari pamwe nebato reZAPU vanofanirwa kuronga kuona VaMnangagwa nekukasika kuti vazeye nezvezvivakwa pamwe nemapurazi avo. Amai Dale vakati veZIPRA neveZAPU vakambotaura nezve nyaya nevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nevamwe vaive muhurumende yavo asi hakuna kwayakasvika. Vakati vave kuisa tariro yekugadziriswa kwenyaya iyi kuna VaMnangagwa vachiti vane chivimbo ichi nekuti mutungamiri wenyika vanoziva zvose pamusoro penyaya iyi. VeZIPRA neZAPU vakatorerwa zvivakwa zvavo, makambani, midziyo, pamwe nemapurazi mukati memakore mashoma nyika ichangowana kuzvitonga mushure mekunge zvikwata zviviri izvi zvanzi zvaida kupandukira hurumende. Zvimwe zvezvivakwa nemapurazi aya zvine mukurumbira zvinosanganisira Magnet House iri muguta reBulawayo iyo iri kushandiswa semahofisi evasori pamwe neSnake Park iri kunze kweguta reHarare. Amai Dale vakatiwo imwe nyaya iri kunetsa yavanoda kukwidza kumutungamiri wenyika inyaya yekutambura kuri kuita vaive varwi veZIPRA vechidzimai, kunyanya avo vakafirwa nevarume avo vavakati vari kutadza kuriritira mhuri dzavo nekuti havawane mari yemudyandigere seinopiwa vamwe varwi vehondo yerusununguko. Mumwe murwi weZIPRA Retired Colonel Baster Magwizi vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti zvibudiswe pachena kuti sangano reZIPRA harisisiri sangano rechitororo sezvaraideedzwa richiitwa pasi pehurumende yevachena. Rtd Col. Magwizi vakatiwo kune varwi veZIPRA vakawanda vasina kuongororwa kuti vagowana mari yemudyandigere sezvaifanirwa kuitwa, vachiti hururmende inofanirwa kubuda pachena ichitaura kuti yakaregerera vanhu ava mhosva dzavaipomerwa.
