Mutauriri webato reZAPU VaIphithule Maphosa vanoti hapana ibvi kana mupimbira pakati pebato ravo nevaive varwi veZIPRA vachiti vachaita mushandirapamwe panyaya yekuti zvivakwa pamwe nemapurazi avo zvidzorerwe kwavari sezvakafanira. No media source currently available
title: Varwi veZIPRA Voisa Tariro kunaVaMnangagwa Kuti Vadzorerwe Midziyo Yavo

text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuchema chema nenyaya yekukwira zvakanyanya kwoita mitengo kunyangwe vasiri kuenda kumabasa nekuda kwekurudziro yehurumende yekuti vagare mudzimba nekuyedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Ko chii chapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu irambe ichiwedzerwa zvakadai kunyangwe hurumende yange ichiti zvinhu zviri kugadzikana munyaya dzezvehupfumi? Mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari nemitero inobhadharwa pamatoll gates yakawedzerwa mavhiki apera izvo zvakapa kuti zvinhu zvakawanda zvitange kuwedzerwa mutengo. Mabhazi eZUPCO nemakombi acho akawedzerawo mutengo. Panzendo dzaibhadhariswa madhora gumi nematanhatu, vanhu vave kunzi vabhadhare madhora makumi matatu nemaviri. Makombi panzendo dzaibhadharwa makumi matatu emadhora, ave kubhadharisa madhora makumi matanhatu. Mukuru weConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vanoti zvinhu zvakawanda zvakwira mutengo kusanganisira hupfu, mupunga, chingwa munyu nemafuta ekubukisa. Sachigaro we CEO Africa Roundtable uye vari nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaOswell Binha, vanotiwo nyika iri kutanda botso nenyaya yekusagadzirisa nyaya yekuti yoshandisa mari ipi, yekunze here kana yemunyika. Vanoti mari yekunze inenge yotanga kunetsa zvopa kuti vamwe vatange kuenda pamukoto kunotsvaga mari zvokwidza mitengo yezvinhu. Munyori mukuru musangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti mitengo yezvinhu munyika yakwira kunyangwe mihoro yevashandi isiri kuwedzerwa zvavanoti zvaomera mushandi munyika. Mutauriri webato riri kutonga reZanu-PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vakaburitsa mashoko ekushora zvikuru nyaya yekukwidzwa kwemitengo yezvinhu asi vamwe vanoti hurumende ndiyo iri kutanga kukwidza mitero zvopa kuti vemabhizimisi vaitweo zvimwe chetezvo. Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vainge vati vanotarisira kuti hupfumi huchakwira nezvikamu zvinodarika zvinomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 7,4% gore rino asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti izvi zvinonetsa kuti zvizadzikiswe nenyaya yeCovid-19 nemamwe matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. No media source currently available
title: Mitengo yeZvinhu Yokwira Zvakanyanya Zvosiya Vakawanda Vasina Chekubata

text: Munyori mukuru wesangano reCatholic Bishop’s Conference of Zimbabwe, Father Frederick Chiromba vanoti semakereke vari kushushikana zvikuru nemamiriro aita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Vachitaura nenhepfenyuro yeVatican Radio, Father Chiromba vanoti kusabuda pachena kwemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe kuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chavo kana vasiya basa kuri kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. Vatiwo munyika mave kuda nhaurirano dzemapato ezvematongerwo enyika, masangano akazvimirira oga uye vemakereke. Vemachechi vakawanda vave kubudawo pachena vachiti zvinhu munyika zvinoda kugadziriswa. Asi VaMugabe vanoti nyaya yezvirango ndiyo yapa kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo. No media source currently available
title: VeChechi yeRoma Vanoti Havasi Kufara neMamiriro Aita Zvinhu muNyika

text:
Panguva yezororo reKisimisi negore idzva munyika munopindazvinhu zvakawanda zvakasiyana siyana zvinotengwa kubva kunze. Sangano reBuy Zimbabwe rinoti nyika inrasikirwa nemari yekunze yakawanda uye maindasitiri emuno anotadza kusimukira nekuda kwekutengwa kubva kunze kwenyika kwezvinhu zvinogona kugadzirwa muno. Nekudaro sangano iri riri kukurudzira kuti veruzhinji vafarire kutenga zvinhu zvinogadzirwa munyika

Mukuru wesangano reBuy Zimbabwe VaAlois Burutsa vanoti zvakakoshera nyika kuti veruzhinji vatenge zvinhu zvinogadzirwa munyika kuitira kubatsira kuchengetedza mari yekunze iyo inogona kushandiswa pakutenga zvimwe zvakaksoha zvisingagadzirwe muno zvakadai semichina.

VaBurutsa vaudza Studio 7 kuti kubvira zvakatanga sangano ravo muna2011 vanofara kuti chinangwa chavo chabatsira kusimudzira kutengwa kwezvigadzirwa zvemuno munyika. Zimbabwe inoshandisa mari yakawanda gore rega rega mukutenga zvinhu kubva kunze kwenyika. Gore rakapera nyika yakashandisa mabhiriyoni manomwe nemamiriyoni mazana matanhatu kana kuti 7.6 billion zvichienzaniswa ne4.6 billion yakashandiswa muna2020.

Zvimwe zvezvinhu zvinonyanya kutengwa kunze zvinosanganisira mafuta edzimotokari, mafetireza, nemichina asi pane zvimwewo zvakawanda zvinogadzirwa muno zvinobvawo kunze.

Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries VaKurai Matsheza vatsinhirawo kuti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vafarire kutenga zvinhu zvinogadzirwa muno vachiti izvi zvinobatsirawo kuti munyika muve nemabasa.

CZI inoti pari zvino maindasitiri emunyika ari kushanda zvinosvika pazvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana uye kushomeka kwemagetsi nderimwe dambudziko guru rinoita kuti asashanda nemazvo.

VaBurutsa vanopokana nemaonero ekuti zvnhu zvakawanda zvinogadzirwa munyika zvinodhura uye hazvinyatsogadzirwa nemhando yepamusoro sezvinoita zvinobva kunze.

VaFelix Chari, mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro panyaya yezvehupfumi vanoti vanobvumirana nemaonero ekuti zvinhu zvakawanda zvinogadzirwa munyika zvinodhura vachiti izvi zvinoitika nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakawanda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vaachishanda nesangano relabour and Economic Developmemt Research Institute of Zimbabwe Dr Prosper Chitambara vatiwo chirongwa cheBuy Zimbabwe chakanaka asi zvimwe zvinogadzirwa zvinozodhura sezvo kugadzira zvinhu munyika kuchidhura. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwevhiki rekukurudzira kutengwa kwezvinhu zvinogadzirwa muno muHarare nezuro, mutungamirir wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakati hurumende inotsigira chirongwa ichi nekuti chinobatsira kudzivirira kuunzwa munyika kwezvinhu zvinogadzirwa kunze
zvinenge zvine mutengo wakadereresa izvo vakati zvinokanganisa budiriro yenyika.  Zvitoro zvikuru zvinosanganisira OK Zimbabwe zvirimowo muchirongwa cheBuy Zimbabwe ichi. Zimbabwe inonyanya kutenga nekutengesearana neSouth Africa, China, United Araba Emirates, Singapore, United Kingdom neRussia. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzedzvehupfumi dzinoti VaMnangagwa vanotaura zvinhu zvisiri kuitwa nehurumende. Semuenzaniso, mushure mekunge zvigadziraw zvemunyika zvawedzerwa mutengo nekuda kwekushaya simba kwedhora remunyika, gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakabva vabvumidza vezvitoro kutenga zvinhu kunze pasina kubhadhara mitero.
title: Buy Zimbabwe Yokurudzira Vanhu Kutenga Zvinogadzirwa muNyika

text: ​Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato reMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti vachaenderera mberi nemisangano yavo neMugovera muguta reKaroi pamwe nekuHurungwe mudunhu reMashonaland West, zvisineyi nekuti mapurisa akavanyima mvumo yekuenderera mberi nemisangano iyi. VaChamisa vanoti ivo sebato vakaita zvose zvinotarisirwa kuitwa pamutemo zvekuzivisa mapurisa paine nguva, saka havaoni chinovatadzisa kuenderera mberi nemisangano yavo. Bato iri rakanyorera mapurisa musi wa 31 Gumiguru richivazivisa nezvehurongwa hwekusangana nevatsigiri varo uhwu, asi musi wa 7 Mbudzi mapurisa akazopindura tsamba iyi achiti MDC yakanga isingakwanisi kuenderera mberi nemisangano iyi. Mapurisa anoti pasi pechikamu 26(10) chemutemo wePOSA, bato iri harikwanise kuita musangano nekuti nhengo dzaro dzakakundikana kuenda kumapurisa kuti vakurukure nezvezvinyunyuto zvinonzi zvakasimudzwa nevemabhizimusi pamwe nevamwe vagari vemuKaroi. Pamusoro pezvo, mapurisa anoti haakwanisi kuchengetedza musangano uyu sezvo vari kushanda munzvimbo dziri kunyoreserwa kuvhota kwavari kuchengetedza. VaChamisa vanoti misangano yavo iyi yakanangana nekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaende kunonyoresa kuvhota kuitira sarudzo dziri kuuya gore rinouya. No media source currently available
title: MDC Yoenderera Mberi neMisangano Yayo kuMash West

text: Dare redzimhosva riri kutarisirwa kupa mutongo waro neChina pachikumbiro chekubvisa mari yechibatiso chakaiswa mudare iri nemumiriri weMDC Alliance mudunhu reHarare West muNational Assembly, Muzvare Joanna Mamombe, pamwe nemutevedzeri wasachigaro wevechidiki muMDC Alliance, Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri. Mutongi wedare, VaStanford Mambanje, vati vachatura mutongo wavo mangwana, China, pachikumbiro chevaviri ava vachiti vazoshaya nguva yekunyora mutongo wavo. Gweta raMuzvare Mamombe naMuzvare Chimbiri, VaCharles Kwaramba, vaudza dare kuti kusungwa kwakaita vaviri ava kunosvibisa zita rehurumende sezvo vaitozvibvira havo kunorapwa pavakasungwa. VaKwaramba vati vasungwa ava, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza mapurisa pamwe nekutyora mirawu yeCovid-19 Regulations, vakangopomerwa mhosva idzi kunyange hazvo mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, vakaburitsa mashoko neMuvhuro ekuti vasungwa vainge vabatirwa nyaya ine chekuita nekuratidzira kwakange kwaitwa nedzimwe nhengo dzeMDC Alliance pamahofisi ehurumende eNew Government Complex. VaKwaramba vati kuzopomerwa kwakaitwa vaviri ava mhosva dzavave kumiirwa mudare kunoratidza kuti hurumende iri kungotsvaga kuvashungurudza sezvo vachiti vaviri ava vainge vasipo panonzi pakaratidzirwa apa. VaKwaramba vati izvi hazviratidze chimiro chakanaka chehurumende. Vatiwo vasungwa ava vakaunzwa kudare nezuro vasainiswa mapepa ekupomerwa mhosva pamhosva yekutyora mirawu yeCovid-19 yakadzikwa nemutungamiri wenyika asi vakazoshamisika vave kupomerwa imwe mhosva yekuzvidza mapurisa vave pamatare iyo yavasina kumbenge vaudzwa nezvayo kana kusainira mapepa ayo. Nokudaro, VaKwaramba vati izvi zvinoratidza pachena kuti vasungwa ava vaunzwa kudare zvisiri pamutemo. Vaudzawo dare kuti mhosva yevaviri ava imhosva yakaunzwa kudare pasi pemutemo wakabviswa mumagwaro emitemo yenyika. Izvi zvinotevera kuvandudzwa kwakaitwa Statutory Instrument 83 of 2020 neumwe mutemo wakadzikwa nehurumende. Asi muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, Amai Audrey Chogumaira, vaudza dare kuti vasungwa ava vanofanira kugara mujeri sezvo vane chidakadaka chekupara mhaka ivo vane nyaya dzakawanda dzichiri mumatare. Amai Chogumaira vapikisa kuti vaviri ava vasapihwe mukana wekutongwa vachibva kumba kwavo sezvo vachigona kuramba vachingokoromora dzimwe mhosva. Mutongi wedare ati achaturan mutongo wake mangwana sezvo ange ave kunzwa nyaya yaVaFredrick Mabamba avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekubira vanhu vakawanda mari zhinji kuChitungwiza vachivatengesera masitendi ekanzuru zvisiri pamutemo. VaMabamba, avo vanga vachisvitsa chikumbiro chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo, vanzi naVaMambanje vadzoke kudare mangwana sezvo nguva dzanga dzapera. VaMabamba vakasungwa nezuro neZimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission vachipomerwa mhosva yekutengesera vanhu nzvimbo dzekuvakira dzimba kuChitungwiza zvisiri pamutemo. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rotura Mutongo Waro neChina paChikumbiro chaMuzvare Mamombe naMuzvare Chimbiri

text: Nhepfenyuro yeStudio7 yasvitsa neChishanu makore gumi nemana ichitepfenyura mururimi rweChishona neNdebele. Vakawanda vanoti nhepfenyuro iyi iri kuita basa guru nekutepfenyura nhau dzisina divi radzakarerekera. Vamwewo vanoti Studio7 inofanira kupihwa mukana wekutepfenyura iri munyika. Vakawanda kubva kumativi mana enyika vanoti vanofara chose nebasa riri kuitwa neStudio7 sezvo ichivapa nhau dzisina divi radzakarekera. Vazhinji vavo vanoti nhepfenyuro iyi inopawo mukana kune vakawanda zvisinei kuti vanomirira bato ripi. VaTapiwa Clayton Mupfava vekuMaramba Pfungwe vanoti Studio7 inhepfenyuro inosvika kunzvimbo kwavo uye inonzikwa zvakanaka chose kudarika nhepfenyuro dzemuno. VaMupfava vanoti dai Studio7 yaramba ichiita basa nemazvo uyewo dai vatori vayo venhau vapinda mumaruwa nekuti ndimo mune nyaya dzakawanda dzevanhu vari kudzvinyirirwa nekunyimwa chikafu nembeu. Kanzura weWard 27 kuGutu South, VaJeffreys Tangemahare, vati vanofarira Studio7 nekuti ndiyo nhepfenyuro inovapa nhau dzechokwadi. Mumwe anoita zvemitambo yemumaterevhezheni achigara kuEpworth, VaProsper Ngomashi, vanoti Studio7 iri kuburitsa nhau dzakasiyana nedzimwe nhepfenyuro dzese uye inofanira kupihwa mukana wekuita basa rayo pachena muZimbabwe. Mumiriri weMufakose mudare reNational Assembly, Amai Paurina Mpariwa, vanoti vanofara chose kuti Studio7 yave nemakore akawanda kudai ichitepfenyura uyewo inoendesa nhau pasi rese. Asi vanotiwo dai pagadzirwa maredhiyo anonatso bata Studio7 vachiti maredhiyo mazhinji munyika haabati nhepfenyuro iyi. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Amai Winnie Mambo, vanoti kunyange hazvo Studio7 iri kuita basa rakanaka, inofanirawo kupinda mumaruwa sezvo ichinyanya kuburitsa nhau dzemumadhorobha chete. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaOrbert Gutu, vanoti Studio7 inhepfenyuro yevanhu uye izvi zvinoonekwa nemukurumbira wainayo kumaruwa nemunzvimbo dzese munyika. Izvi zvatsigirwawo nemutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, VaKurauone Chihwayi, avo vanoti dai Studio7 yatepfenyura nemitauro yese inotaurwa muZimbabwe. Asi mumiri weMakonde muNational Assembly, VaKindness Paradza veZanu PF, vanoti nhepfunyuro iyi inofanira kutevedza mitemo yekutepfenyura muZimbabwe. Asi vaimbonyorera bepanhau reDaily News zvakare vari mukuru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisai Ruhanya, vanoti Studio7 iri kupa chitsvambe kunhepfenyuro dzese dziri munyika nekuti iri kuita basa rakanaka chose nekuburitsa nhau dzakajeka isingatuke kana kunyomba vanhu. Doctor Ruhanya vanoti hazvivashamise kuti vamwe muhurumende havafariri Studio 7 nekuti vane zvakawanda zvavasingade kuti zviburitswe. Vanoona nezvekushambadzwa kwezvirongwa musangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa Zimbabwe Chapter, VaTabani Moyo, vanoti Studio7 iri kubudirira uye iri kuita mukurumbira nekuti inoburitsa nyaya dzinofarirwa neveruzhinji. Studio7 yakatanga kutepfenyura muna 2003 apo zvinhu zvainge zvakaoma panyaya dzekutepfenyura munyika. Kunyange hazvo pave nenhepfenyuro dzakawanda munyika pari zvino vanhu vanoti nhepfenyuro idzi hadzina kunyanyosiyana nenhepfenyuro dzeZimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation sezvo vanhu vazhinji vakapihwa marezenisi vari mubato riri muhurumende reZanu PF. No media source currently available
title: Studio7 Inosvitsa Makore Gumi neMana Ichitepfunyura

text: Komisheni inodzivirira huori, yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, ZACC, inoti iri kutadza kuita basa rayo nemazvo nepamusana pekuti komisheni iyi haina mvumo yekuenda kumatare edzimhosva nevanhu vainenge yasunga. Vachitaura nhasi muChinhoyi pakuvharwa kwemusangano wavanga vachiita nevanhu vanobva kwakasiyanasiya, imwe nhengo yeZACC, VaGabriel Chaibva, vati dzimwe nyaya dzavari kuferefeta dzehuori dziri kutadza kuenda kumatare nekuda kwekuti mamwe mapazi ehurumende avanoshanda nawo akaita seNational Prosecuting Authority nemapurisa, ane mashandiro akasiyana navo. VaChaibva vatiwo vanokurudzira kushandurwa kwemutemo kuitira kuti komisheni yavo ipihwe masimba ekumira mumatare nemunhu wainenge yawana aine mhosva kwete kuti mupari wemhosva aendeswe kuvachuchisi izvo vati zviri kudzosera basa ravo kumashure nekuti dzimwe nguva vanozoona munhu wavaiti ane mhosva asunungurwa asati atongwa. Panyaya yekuti vanosunga vanhu vovasunungura vasina kuenda navo kumatare, VaChaibva vati ichokwadi kuti izvi zvinoitika uye hazvipe muono wakanaka. Vati izvi zvinokonzerwa nemutemo usingavape simba rekuenda nemupari wemhosva kumatare. VaChaibva vati komisheni yavo iri kufara kuti yakaita chibvumirano neJudiciary Service Commission kuti nyaya dzezvehuori dzitongwe nekukurumidza kwete kumirira mumutsetse wemhosva dzinenge dzichitongwa. Vachitaura pamusangano mumwe mushandi wehurumende, VaJames Chingwe, vati huori hunokonzerwa nekupindira kwevezvematongerwo enyika avo vanomanikidza vashandi vehurumende kuti vaite huori. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reCenter for Natural Resource Governance, Va Farai Maguwu, vanoti ZACC inofanirwa kupihwa masimba ekupinda nemunhu wavanenge vasunga mudare uye panofanirwa kuiswa mutongo wekuti munhu akawanikwa aine mhosva dzehuori, agare mujeri kwemakore akati. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reCenter for Natural Resource Governance, Va Farai Maguwu, vati ZACC inofanirwa kupihwa masimba ekupinda nemunhu wainenge yasunga mudare uye panofanirwa kuiswa mutongo wekuti munhu akawanikwa aine mhoswa dzehuori anogara mujeri kwemakore akati. Musangano wakadai mumwe wemisangano iri kuitwa neZACC matunhu ose munyika paine chinangwa chekuumba hurongwa hwekufambisa mabasa ekupedza huori munyika. Gwaro raAuditor General reongororo yakaitwa muna 2018 rinoratidza kuti mapazi ehurumende akashandisa mari inodarika mabhiriyoni maviri emadhora ekuAmerica zvisiri pamutemo, uye pasina mvumo yeparamende. Ongororo iyi yakaburitsawo huori hwakaitika kukambani yeNational Social Security Authority, izvo zvakaita kuti vaive gurukota rezvevashandi panguva iyi, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, vasungwe neZACC vachipoimerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuori pamari dzekuNational Social Security Authority. Nyaya iyi ichiri mumatare edzimhosva. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo dzinoti sezvo Zimbabwe iri kuzivikanwa nenyaya yehuori hunosemesa, panofanirwa kumbwa dare rinotonga nyaya dzehuori chete kuitira kuti huori hurwiswe zvakasimba munyika. No media source currently available
title: ZACC Inoti Inoda Masimba eKupinda Mumatare neVasungwa Vayo

text: Rimwe remabhanga akazivisa vanhu neChitatu kuti rainge risingavimbise kuti vacharamba vachiwana madhora eku America kana maBond Notes atanga kushanda, razivisa kuti rave kusiyana nepfungwa idzi uye richaramba richipa vanhu madhora ekuAmerica. Ukuwo vezvitoro vave kuramba kupa mari kune vanenge vatenga zvinhu kana kuti “Cash Back” sezvo dambudziko remari riri kuramba richikura munyika. Muchiziviso kuvanhu vanoshandisa bhanga iri, bhanga reStanbic rati hapana chichashanduka pane mashandiro arinenge richiita nevanhu uye vati vatora danho iri zvichitevera zvichemo zvakapihwa vevanhu nezuro. Kunyange hazvo bhanga iri range rapa vanhu kusvika musi wa30 Mbudzi kuti rinenge risati ratanga kupa vanhu dzimwe mari dzisiri madhora ekuAmerica, vanhu pamwe nemagweta vakapenga zvakaipisisa vachiti vainge vasingabvume zvairongwa nebhanga iri neveReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Asi kunyange hazvo veStanbic vati vasandura pfungwa dzavo vanhu vakawanda vaenda kumabhanga avo vange vari kuudzwa kuti hapana anoziva kuti zvichafamba sei kana maBond Notes achinge avepo. Amai Estella Mapaure vanoti vaudzwa pachena kubhanga ravo kuti vachange vave kupihwa mari inenge yavepo panguva iyoyo. Amai Elizabeth Shonhiwa vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti hapana zvavangaite kana zviri izvo zvave kudiwa nehurumende asi vati havasi kuda mari itsva iri kuuya iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaJames Johwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanonzwisiza kuchema-chema kweveruzhinji zvichitevera kurasikirwa nemari kwakaita vanhu kumakore a2007 na2008. Gavhuna we R-B-Z, Doctor John Mangudya, vanoti maBond Notes achatanga kushanda mwedzi uno asi havasati vataura musi chaiwo waachatanga kushanda. Zvichakadaro, apo mari iri kuramba ichi netsa munyika, vezvitoro nevemamwe mabhizimisi vave kuramba kupa vanhu mari kana vachinge vatenga kana kuti Cash Back paChirungu. Kunyange hazvo veRBZ vari kukurudzira kushandiswa kwemakadhi ekubhanga, zvitoro zvakawanda pamwe nemagaraji vave kuramba makadhi aya vachiti vanoda mari chaiyo. Pane dzimwe nguva vezvitoro nemagaraji vave kukwidza mitengo kune vaye vanoshandisa makadhi. Mukuru weConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vanoti zviri kuitika zvakashata uye vachatora matanho kune avo vari kuzviita. Zviri kuitikika izvi hazvienderani nezviri kutaurwa nemasangano anomirira vemabhizimisi, zvitoro nemaindasitiri akaita seZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, neConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, ekukurudzira kushandiswa kwemakadhi kuti vanhu nevemabhizimisi vasagare vaine mari dzakawanda. Zimbabwe yatarisana nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari zvekuti vanhu vave kurara vari mumitsetse pamabhanga apo vanoita mazuva vasatai vawana mari. Mabhanga ese munyika ave kupa madhora makumi mashanu kana zana pamunhu pazuva kana mari ichinge iripo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti dambudziko iri rinopera chete kana nyika yave kugadzira nekutengesa zvinhu zvakawanda kunze kwenyika kwete kushandisa mari dzakaita semaBond Notes. No media source currently available
title: Dambudziko reMari Rokonzera Kuti Vamwe veZvitoro Varambe Kupa Mari Kune Vanenge Vatenga zvinhu

text: Vagari vemuguta reHarare vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari yekuchenesa mvura kunyange hazvo bhanga guru rakavimbisa mwedzi uno kupa guta iri mari yekuchenesa mvura. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeguta reHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti vakapihwa mari yekunze kwenyika nebhanga guru renyika kuitira kuti vatenge mishonga inoshandiswa mukuchenesa mvura. Kunyange hazvo bhanga guru renyika rakakwanisa kuwanira kanzuru mari, hapana kujeka kuti bhanga iri richange richipa kanzuru mari iyi mwedzi wega wega here, kana kuti kwete. VaChideme vati idambudziko guru kwavari kuti mishonga inodiwa pamwedzi wega wega nemari yazvinoda hazvienderani nekuti kune zvimwewo zvavanofanira kutarisa zvinoda mari kuti basa rese remvura rifambe zvakanaka.
title: Dambudziko reMvura Yakachena Rorwadza Vagari muHarare

text: Zvinhu mukanzuru yeHarare hazvina kumira zvakanaka zvichitevera kumbomiswa basa kwemunyori weguta, VaTendai Mahachi, nameya weHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni. Meya veguta vanoti panoda kuti paitwe ongororo yemafambisirwo emari nehumwe hurongwa hwekanzuru. Asi aka hakasi kekutanga VaMahachi vachimbomiswa basa naVaManyenyeni. Gore rapera VaMahachi vakambomiswa basa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuramba kuzivisa kanzuru kuti vakuru vakuru vekanzuru vaitambira marii pamwedzi. Asi VaMahachi vakazodzorwa pabasa negurukota rezvematunhu, VaIgnatious Chombo. Vanhu vakawanda vari kutenderana kuti nekuda kwekupindira kwaVaChombo mumabasa ekanzuru, uye kunetsana kwevakuru vekanzuru, zvinhu mudhorobha hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Vamwe mukanzuru vanoti nyaya yekuti VaMahachi vari kuramba kuudza makanzura kuti mamaneja ari kutambira marii, uye kusaterera zvinenge zvasungwa nemakanzura, ndiyo yapa kuti vamiswezve basa. Asi ivo VaManyenyeni vanoti pari zvino havasi kuda kutaura zvakawanda nezvezvikonzero zvekumisa VaMahachi basa. VaManyenyeni vanoti rwendo rwuno vakatanga vasuma VaChombo here vasati vatora danho iri. Pange paine mashoko ekuti VaManyenyeni vakaita zano ndega vasina kusuma makanzura nezvedanho iri. Asi mutevedzeri wavo, VaThomas Muzuva, vati pamutemo VaManyenyeni vanokwanisa kuita zvavakaita. Hatina kubata VaMahachi mbune panharembozha yavo sezvo vanzi vange vari mumusangano wechimbi chimbi naVaChombo. Asi munhu adaira nharembozha iyi ati VaMahachi vari pabasa. Masangano ose anomiririra vagari vemu Hararare anoti ari kufara zvikuru nedanho rekumbomisa basa VaMahachi kuitira kuti vaferefetwe. Sachigaro weCombined Harare Residents Association, VaSimbarashe Moyo, vanoti vari kufara zvikuru nedanho iri. VaMoyo vati naivowo havasi kufara nemabasa ekanzuru. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemukuru weHarare Resident Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, avo vatiwo kanzuru yeHarare haina zvairi kuita mukugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nevagari vemuguta. Mumwe mugari wekuMabvuku, Amai Jocelyn Manyeruke, vanoti vaona nhamo nekushaikwa kwemvura vachiti kanzuru haina chairi kuvaitira. Kanzuru yeHarare iri kunetsana nevagari sezvo yatanga chirongwa chekutora midziyo yevanhu vanenge vaine zvikwereti. VaShumba naVaMoyo vari kushora zvikuru danho iri. Amai Manyeruke vatiwo vari kushushikana zvikuru nenyaya iyi. Asi Kanzura Muzuva vati kanzuru haina chaingaite sezvo ichida kuti iitewo mabasa ayo. Kare guta reHarare rainge rakachena zvinonwisa mvura uye kanzuru yaishanda zvakanaka. Asi vakawanda vanoti ave manatsa mukanwa eharawa kurota ichiyamwa. Migwagwa yakazara marara, marobotsi haasi kushanda, uye vanhu vari kugara vachirwara nekorera nezvimwe zvirwere zvinokonzerwa nekunwa mvura isina kuchena. Nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi, muguta mazarawo nevanhu vanenge vachitengesa zvinhu zvekuti munhu ave kushaya pekuisa tsoka. No media source currently available
title: Kunetsana Kwoenderera Mberi muKanzuru yeHarare

text: Sangano re European Union, EU, rakasendeka parutivi nemusi weMuvhuro zvirango zvakatemera vanhu vana muZimbabwe.  Vakasendekerwa parutivi zvirango kwegore rose vanoti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga; gurukota rezvekurima, VaPerence Shiri, mukuru wemauto munyika, Va Phillip Valerio Sibanda, pamwe nemudzimai wevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, muchakabvu Robert Mugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe.  Asi EU haina kunyevenutsa zvirango izvi kumutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nekambani yemauto, ye Zimbabwe Defence Industries. Kunyange hazvo tisina kukwanisa bata gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende padanho rakatorwa neEU iri, hurumende yakaburitsa mashoko ichi kunyange hazvo iri kufara nekunyevenutswa kwaitwa neEU panyaya yezvirango, Zimbabwe icharamba yakamira neshoko rayo rekuti zvirango izvi hazvina nematuro ose. Mumashoko avo avaisa pa Twitter yebazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, gurukota rebazi iri, Retired Lt. General Sibusiso Moyo, vati hurumende inoti zvirango zvose zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe hazvitambirike, uye nguva yazvo yakapera kare.  Vatiwo zvirango izvi zviri kuvhiringa hurongwa hwehurumende hwekuvandudza zvinhu munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu uye vari mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti danho ratorwa neEU rinopa Zimbabwe mukana wekuti igadzirise nyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kuitira kuti ive nehukana hwakanaka nenyika dziri muEU.  VaMavhinga vanoti chitsvambe chave kuZimbabwe kuti ichiratidza kuti ine chido chekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu, uye vose vanowanikwa vachityora kodzero dzevanhu, vasungwe nemitemo yenyika. VaMavhinga vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe ionekwe ichiita zvakakurudzirwa neMotlanthe Commission, iyo yakaferefeta kuurayiwa kwakaitwa vanhu nemasoja munhirizhonga yakaitika muna Nyamavhuvhu 2018. No media source currently available
title: VaMavhinga Vanoti Zimbabwe Yapihwa neEU Mukana Wekuti Igadzirise Hukama Hwayo neNyika Idzi

text: Imwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi inoti kushandurwa kwemazuva achaburitswa mari itsva ye ma bond notes kunotowedzera kuderera kwechivimbo muvanhu. Doctor Prosper Chitamba vanoshanda neshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe vanoti sezvo vanhu vanga vagara vasina chivimbo nemari itsva iyi, kunonoka kubuda kwayo kuchatoita kuti vanhu vairambe zvakanyanya. “I think dambudziko rangoitika mu economy kana kuti mu market ndere kuti nyaya ye confidence yabva yakanganisika zvakanyanyisa. Vanhu havachisina confidence mumabhanga, mu financial system,” Doctor Chitambara vanodaro. Vanoti izvi zvatowedzera kuti vanhu vade kuchengetera mari dzavo kudzimba, kana kuda kutora mari dzavo shoma dzanga dzasara dzichiri kumabhanga. “Even kana zvakanzi ma bond notes auya, hazvisi zvinhu zvichabatsira kudzereredza confidence mu economy kana mu banking sector,” Vanowedzera. Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, Dr John Mangudya vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti bhanga ravo harichakwanisa kuburitsa ma bond notes muna Chikumi sezvakange vambozivisa. VaMangudya vakati mari idzi dzave kuzoparurwa muna Nyamavhuvhu wegore rino, sezvo dzichiri kukwenenzverwa, izvo zvinoda nguva kugadziriswa. Asi vakawanda vanonzi vari kuramba kutambira mari idzi vachiti inzira yehurumende yekuda kudzora nayo ma bearer cheque, ayo akapedzisira asisina huremu hwemari inobatika.  No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Mune zveUpfumi Inoti Kunonoka Kubuda kwemaBond Notes Kwowedzera Kushaikwa kweChivimbo neMari iyi.

text: Sangano reAfrobarometer, richishanda neMass Public Opinion Institute, rinoti Zanu PF ichawana zvikamu makumi mana nezviviri kubva muzana, MDC Alliance ichiwana zvikamu makumi matatu nechimwe kubva muzana, uye vanhu zvikamu makumi maviri nezvishanu kubva muzana, vanoti havasati voziva kuti vanovhotera ani. Sarudzo dzikabuda seongororo iyi, zvichaita kuti sarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika idzokororwe sezvo panenge pasina akunda zvine mutsindo. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kweongororo yavakaita, muongorori mukuru wesangano reMass Public Opinion Institute, VaStephen Ndoma, vati zvakabuda zvinoratidza kuti pavanhu vakanyoresa kuvhota vakabvunzwa muongororo iyi, zvikamu makumi mana nezviviri kubva muzana, zvakati zvichavhotera bato reZanu PF ukuwo zvikamu makumi matatu nechimwe kubva muzana zvichiti zvhichavhotera MDC Alliance. VaNdoma vati vanhu vanoda kusvika zviuru zviviri nemazana mana vakabvunzwa muongororo iyi uye zvikamu makumi maviri nezvishanu kubva muzana zvakati zvaive zvisati zvaziva kuti zvichavhotera bato rirpi. VaNdoma vati zvimwe zvakabuda muongororo iyi inyaya yekusafara kwevanhu vakawanda nekupindira kwemauuto mune zvematongerwo enyika vachiti zvikamu makumi mashanu nezviviri kubva muzana zvakati hazvifare nekupidigura hurumende kwakaitwa nemauto muna Mbudzi. Vatiwo Vanhu zvikamu makumi matanhatu nezviviri kubva muzana havazi kufara nekuri kuenda nyika.\n\nMurwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaMichael Ndiweni, vati vamwe vanhu vanogona kusatambira zvaburitswa neongororo vachiti hazvizi zvechokwadi asi vati zvakakosha kuti vemapato anopikisa kunyanya vatambire ongororo iyi vachitiwo ongororo dzesangano reMPOI dzakaitwa munguva yapfuura dzakaratidza kuve chokwadi. Muzvare Sibusisiwe Adams avo vati mutsigiri weMDC Alliance vati vanotambira havo zvaburitswa muongororo yeMPOI asi vati vane chivimbo chekuti zvinhu zvinogona kuchinja. Tichaona Mubayira uyo ati mutsigiri webato reMDC T ati zvinomunetsa kutambira zvaburitswa muongororo iyi achiti haafunge kuti nyaya yekutyisidzirwa kwevanhu kumaruwa hakuna kunyatsobatwa zvakanaka muongororo iyi. Asi veMPOI vati pose pavanoita ongororo vanoedza nepose pavanogona napo kuti vaite ongororo nenzira yakarurama uye yakajeka. Sangano reMPOI rinoti rinoda kuita imwezve ongororo sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Sangano iri rakaita ongororo iyi richishanda nesangano reAfrobarometer richishanda nereInternational Justice and Reconciliation uye richaparura ongororo imwe chete muHarare neChishanu. No media source currently available
title: Afrobarometer Inoti Zanu PF Ichakunda Zvisina Mutsindo MDC Alliance Musarudzo

text: Dare remuSpain rapa mvumo yekuti mutumbi wevaive mutungamiri wenyika yeAngola VaJose Eduardo dos Santos vakafira muguta reBarcelona munyika iyi nemusi weChishanu uvhiyiwe kuti paonekwe kuti vakashaya nei. VaJose dos Santos vakashaya vave nemakore makumi manomwe nemapfumbamwe ekuberekwa uye vanonzi vange vave nenguva vachirwara. Mwanasikana wavo Tchize do Santos akakumbira kuti izvi zviitwe nekuti anofungidzira kuti panogona kunge paine zvisina kutsarukana zvakaitika zvikakonzera rufu rwavo. Vanoti vanogona kunge vakaurayiwa sezvo vaida kutsigira bato rinopikisa. Nhepfenyuro yeBBC inoti mufi akati aida kuvigwa kuSpain nemhuri yake chete asi Angola iri kuda kuti vadzorwe kumusha. Kubva zvavasiya basa muna 2017, VaDos Santos vange vachigara kuSpain. Vainge vatanga kutungamira nyika muna 1979. Mutungamiri weAngola VaJoao Lourenco vakatara mazuva mashanu ekuchema VaDos Santos. (Zvimwe zvabva kuBBC, Reuters)
title: Mhuri yaVaJose Eduardo dos Santos Inoti Vanogona Kunge Vakaurayiwa

text: Zvinhu muzvipatara zvehurumende hazvina kumira zvakanaka sezvo vamwe vanachiremba nevakoti vari kuramwa mabasa vachiti havasi kufara nemari dzavari kutambiriswa. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa necoronavirus hwasvika pamazana mashanu negumi nevaviri kana kuti 512. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevatatu nechirwere ichi neChipiri. Pavanhu ava, makumi maviri nemumwe vakabva kuSouth Africa vamwe vaviri vakachitapurirwa munyika. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vachiri vatanhatu. Vapora vave makumi matanhatu nevana kana kuti 64. Vanhu vavhenekwa hutachiona uhu vadarika zviuru makumi matanhatu nezviviri kana kuti 62,000. Kuramwa mabasa kwavanchiremba kunonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano kuchapa kuti zvinhu zvinange kumawere. Munyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti vashandi vari kutambiriswa mutero wembwa. Vanoti vanoda kudzokera kumabasa kunobatsira panguva ino yakaoma yecoronavirus asi vachiti hurumende haisi kuratidza chido chekutaura navo. No media source currently available Asi vachitaura nebepanhau reHerald, mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru wedare remakurukota VaGeorge Charamba vanoti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnanagwa vakazvipira kuona kuti vashandi vehurumende vatambiriswa mari iri nani. Vanoti mari yakawedzerwa nehurumende vhiki rapera kuvashandi haimisi nyaya yenhaurirano yekuvawedzera imwe mari. Asi vari kuramwa mabasa vanoti havasi kuona kuzvipira kwehurumende panyaya iyi. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kugurukota rezvehutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo kana vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru mubazi ravo Dr Gibson Mhlanga sezvo vasina kupindura mibvunzo yatavatumira paWhatsApp. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu nezvitanhatu nevanomwe kana kuti 306, 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica uye vashaya vadarika zviuru zvisere nezana rine gumi neshanu kana kuti 8,115. Vapora vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi mana nematanhatu kana kuti 146,000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni masere nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 8,9 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi ichiteverwa neBrazil. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vave kusvika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri kana kuti 120,000.  Vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana maviri, 2,2 million. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zviuru mazana mana nemakumi matanhatu nemasere kana kuti 468, 000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni mana nezviuru mazana mana kana kuti 4,4 million
title: Vabatwa neCoronavirus Vodarika Mazana Mashanu Uko VanaChiremba Vachiramwa Mabasa

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muRussia VaSergei Lavrov vazivisa vatori venhau kuti zviri kunyika yeUkraine kuti hondo pakati penyika mbir idzi inopera riini. Russia yakatanga kurwisa Ukraine mwedzi gumi yadarika. Asi VaLavrov vati Ukraine haifanire kurwisa matunhu mana akapambwa neRussia anoti Donetsk, Luhansk, Kherson neZaporizhzhia. Vati kana Ukraine ikaramba izvi hondo inopedzwa nemauto eRussia. Asi mutungamiri wenyika yeUkrain VaVolodymyr Zelenskyy vati Russia ndiyo inofanira kumisa hondo nekubuda munzvimbo dzose dzayakapamba. Vati zvekupinza vanhu vakawanda basa muchiuto nekutsvaga zvombo kunyika dzakaita seIran hazvisi kuzobatsira Russia muhondo iyi. Kurwisana kunyotyisa kuri kuenderera mberi munzvimbo dzakaita seBakhmut ne Kreminna mudunhu reDonbas.
title: Russia Inoti Ukraine Ikasakanda Zvombo Pasi, Mauto Ayo Ndiwo Achapedza Hondo, Asi Ukraine Inoti Haisi Kuzokundwa

text: Vana chiremba, vachitsigirwa nemamwe masangano evashandi, varatidzira pachipatara cheParirenyatwa vachitsutsumwa nekwavanoti kupambwa kwakaitwa nezuro mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, ZHDA, Doctor Peter Magombeyi. Vana chiremba vataura neStudio7 vati vari kurwadzikana zvikuri nekutyorwa kuri kuitwa kodzero, uye havasi kuzodzokera kubasa kusvika Dr Magombeyi vadzoswa nevakavapamba. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZHDA, Doctor Masimba Ndoro, vati havasi kufara nekupambwa kwaDr. Magombeyi avo vakapedzisira kuonekwa neMugovera VaNdoro vati Doctor Peter Magombeyi vange vakataurira vamwe vavo kuti vari kutyityidzirwa nevavanofungidzira kuti vasori. VaNdoro vati vazivisa mapurisa epakamba yekuBudiriro. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Dr Ndoro vashoropodza kwavanoti kutyorwa kwekodzero dzavo vachiti vanachiremba vanoda kuti avo vakapamba VaMagombeyi vavadzose vari mupenyu, uye hutano hwavo husina kuvhiringwa. Imwe nhengo zvakare yeZHDA, VaTapiwa Mungofa, avo vanoshanda pamwe chete naDr Magombeyi paHarare Central Hospital, vati VaMagombeyivakatumira mashoko paWhatsApp kuma 10 manheru apfuura vachizivisa kuti nezvekupambwa kwavo nevarume vatatu. VaMungofa vati kunyange hazvo kune kutya kukuru munanachiremba, vawirirana sesangano kuti vanachiremba havasi kuzodzokerakumabasa kusvika VaMagombeyi vadzoswa kumba kwavo. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vari kukurudzira mapurisa kuti aite basa rawo nemazvo kuitira kuti zvizivikanwe kuna VaMagombeyi. Vanachiremba vachangopedza zvidzidzo zvavo vava nemazuva gumi nemaviri vasingaendi kubasa vachiti havana mari dzinovakwanira dzekuti vaende kubasa. Hurumende yakawedzera mari yavana chiremba nezvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, asi vana chiremba ava vakati yavaiva shoma. Sangano reZHDA rati richange richizivisa matanho arichange richitora kusvika VaMagombeyi vawanikwa. No media source currently available
title: Doctor Peter Magombeyi Vanopambwa neVanhu Vasiri Kuzivikanwa

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe nezvinobva kune dzimwe nyika zvinogara muBotswana zvatura befu guru mushure mekunge hurumende yenyika iyi yatora danho rekunyewenutsa kufamba kwevanhu pakati penyika dzakatenderedza Botswana. Mugwaro rakaturwa nehurumende yeBotswana kuburikidza nebazi rezvehutano, vana vechikoro vari kuda kudzokera kunyika dzavanodzidzira, vanhu vari kutsvaga rubatsiro rwezvehutano uye vanenge vaine hama dzafa vanotenderwa kudzokera kunyika dzavo. Muzvare Hannah Rammorogo, avo vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi rekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu munyika iyi, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti ichikwadi kuti kwatorwa danho rakadai. Botswana yakavhara mabhodha ayo munaKurume gore rino senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hweCoronavirus uhwo hunokonzeresa chirwere che COVID-19. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chine bhizinesi rekuruka vhudzi mudhorobha reFrancistown, Muzvare Christinah Zvinavashe vanoti danho iri ratambirwa nemufaro. VaTerrence Machokoto vanoti chiitiko ichi chinotaridza kuti kuvhurwa zvizere kwemabhodha enyika iyi kwave pedyo izvo zvichaita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvizhinji zvinorarama nekutenga nekutengesa zvivane chouviri. Nyanzwi munyaya dzekufamba kwevanhu uye vari mudzidzisi wemutemo paGaborone University of Law and Professional Studies, VaTafadzwa Matambo vayambira vanhu kuti vanofanira kutevedzera mitemo yeCOVID-19 kuitira kuti huwandu hwevanobatwa nehutachiona uhu husawedzere. Svondo rapera, hurumende yeZimbabwe yakazivisawo kuti ichatanga kuvhura mabhodha zvishoma nezvishoma kubva musi wa1 Zvita kune avo vanofamba nedzimotokari dzavo nevanofamba netsoka chete. Gurukota rinoona nezve kuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vakaudza vatori venhau kuti hurumende yakatora danho rekuvhura mabhodha zvishoma nezvishoma senzira yekuoona kuti vashandi vezve hutano vane zvikwanisiro zvekukubatsira vanhu vakawanda here kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available
title: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri muBotswana Zvofarira Kuvhurwa kweMuganhu weNyika Mbiri Idzi

text: Muzukuru wevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe uye vaimbova gurukota muhurumende VaPatrick Zhuwao vanoti vari kutsigira mutungamiri weMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa musarudzo dzemwedzi unoiya. VaZhuwao ndemumwe wevanhu gumi nevashanu vakavamba bato rinopikisa reNational Patriotic Front kana kuti NPF. Vanoti bato ravo rakatenderana kuti ritsigire mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa musarudzo dzemwedzi unouya. VaZhuwao vati chinangwa chekutsigira VaChamisa ndechekubvisa hurumende yemauto iyo vanoti inotungamirwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa naVaConstantine Chiwenga. Vaimbova gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro muzvinafundo Jonathan Moyo vakatiwo vari kutsigira VaChamisa. No media source currently available
title: VaZhuwao Voudza Studio 7 Kuti Sei Vari Kutsigira VaChamisa

text: Mamwe makambani ave kutora matanho ekudzivirira chirwere cheCoronavirus munzvimbo dzekushandira dzakasiyana. Imwe kambani iri kutora matanho aya, iZimbabwe Electricity Supply Authourity, kana kuti Zesa, iyo yakazivisa muchinyorwa chakaiswa pamagedhe ekambani iyi kuti vanoshanya havachabvumirwa kupinda mukati kana vachida kuona vashandi vekambani iyi. Munhu anenge auya kuzoonekwa ndiye anotoshevedzwa kuzoona muyenzi wake panze pegedhe uye kana ave kudzokera mukati anofanirwa kugeza maoko pagedhe apo pakaiswa mvura ine mushonga wekuuraya hutachiona. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri weZesa, VaFullard Gwasira, kuti tinzwe zvakawanda nezvehurongwa hwekambani yavo. Asi mumwe mushandi weZESA anoona vanopinda nekubuda pamahofisi eMegawatt muChinhoyi, uyo asina kuda kuzivikanwa nezita sezvo asingabvumirwe kutaura nevatori venhau, anoti mutemo uyu wakatanga neChina uye wakabva kumukuru wavo kuHarare vachiti ivo basa ravo kutevedzera zvinenge zvataurwa. Kambani inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko, yeTelOne, yazivisawo kuti ichaedza nepainogona napo kuti vanhu vafambise mashoko echirwere cheCoronavirus pasina kukanganisika kana kudonha kwemasaisai izvo zvinomisa kufambiswa kwemashoko pamadandemutande. TelOne inoti vanoshanya kumakambani kwayo vachange vasingabvumirwe kungopinda pose pose vachiti vose vavanoita bhizinisi navo vanofanirwa kushandisa dandemutande kuita bhizinisi navo kwete kuenda kumahofisi avo. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Federation of Miners, Muzvare Chiedza Chipangura, vanoti vari kutyira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus sezvo pasina ruzivo uye pane hutsvina pakucherwa kwezvicherwa nemakorokoza. Muzvare Chiedza vanoti dzidziso mumabasa inofanirwa kuitwa nguva dzose. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kusangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries kuti makambani ari kutora matanho api zvichitevera dambudziko reCoronavirus rabata pasi rose, kunyange hazvo paine mashoko ekuti kune mamwe makambani ari kuvhara nepoamusana pedambudziko iri. Asi munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti zvinosuwisa kuti mamwe makambani ari kuvhara zviri kusiya vashandi nemhuri dzevashandi dzichitambudzika. Dzimwe nyika dziri kuvhiringwa neCoronavirus dziri kuudza vashandi vadzo kuti vashandire vari kudzimba dzavo pachityirwa kupararira kwechirwere ichi, icho chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi, uye kubata vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu ezviuru pasi rose. No media source currently available
title: Mamwe Makambani Otanga Kutora Matanho Anodzivirira Vashandi kuCovid-19

text: Sangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, rinoti riri kukurudzira vashandi vehurumende vese, pamwe neveruzhinji kuti varamwe mabasa pamwe nekuvhara mabhizimusi kutanga. Sangano iri rinoti izvi zvinofanira kutanga Muvhuro, Mbudzi 20, 2017 kusvika mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiya basa. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaRobert Masaraure, vanoti vapawo gurukota rezvedzidzo, VaLazarus Dokora, maawa makumi maviri nemana kuti vasiye basa nekuti vakundikana kugadzirisa matambudziko evarairidzi. No media source currently available
title: Vadzidzisi Vokurudzira Vashandi Kuramwa Mabasa Kudzamara VaMugabe Vasiya Basa

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vanoti mauto achiri mubishi rekutsvaga mitumbi yevanhu vakashaya kunjodzi redutumupengo kana kuti Tropical Cyclone Idai kuManicaland. Asi vatenda kuti pane vamwe vanhu vave kuzigwa kuMozambique sezvo mitumbi yavo yakayeredzwa nemvura yainge yoora. No media source currently available Hurumende iri kukumbira madzishe nemasabhuku kuti vagari pasi vanhu vose vakapona kuti paonekwe kuti ndevapi vakayeredzwa nemvura kana kufushirwa nemadhaka. Asi vanhu vakawanda vanoti hurumende iri kunonoka kutsvaga hama dzavo nekudaro vave kuzviitira vega vamwe vachienda kuMozambique vachitevera rwizi kuti vayedze kutsvaga hama dzavo dzakayeredzwa. Sangano reInternational Organization for Migration rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vafa munyika hunosvika pamazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe. Pachikoro cheDzingire Primary School kuChimanimani panonzi pane vana vechikoro makumi matatu nevapfumbamwe nevarairidzi vana vakayeredzwa nemvura vasiri kuzivakanwa kuti varipi. Zimbabwe iri kutarisirwa kutanga nemusi weMugovera neSvondo kubatana mukuchema vanhu vakawirwa nedambudziko redutumupengo iri kuManicaland neMasvingo. Izvi zvakaziviswa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Mumwe mugari wekwaRusitu kuChimanimani VaShindton Mlambo vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka sezvo parizvino vasati vawana chikafu. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inoti Mimwe Mitumbi yekuZimbabwe Yovigwa nevekuMozambique

text: Mapurisa azivisa nhasi kuburikidza nedandemutande reTwitter kuti huwandu hwevanhu vakafa munjodzi yebhazi rainge rakatakura vatendi vekereke yeZion Christian Church pamugwagwa weJopa-Skyline kuChimanimani hwasvika pamakumi matatu nevasere. Tsaona iyi yakaitika nemusi weChina manheru vatendi ava vachienda kumuzinda wekereke yavo kuZCC Mbungu kuMasvingo. Mazita evanhu vakashaya munjodzi iyi anzi achaburitswa chero nguva kana ongororo iri kuitwa yapera uye hama dzavo dzaziviswa. Mapurisa anotiwo vamwe vanhu vaviri vafa mangwanani anhasi mumugwagwa weBulawayo-Victoria Falls apo bhazi rekwaStalion raita njodzi nerori nenguva dza2 mangwanani. Kufa kwevanhu pazororo reEaster uku kuri kunetsa zvikuru sangano rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe. Vanokokera mabasa musangano iri VaTafadza Goliati. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachazivisa nemusi weChipiri nezvetsaona dzose dzakaitika pazororo reEaster. Mapurisa atiwo chero nguva vachaburitsa mazita evanhu vakashaya munjodzi iyi. Vanokokera mabasa musangano rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe VaTafadzwa Goliati vati vari kushushikana zvikuru nenjodzi idzi dzavati dziri kukunzerwa nevatyairi, migwagwa isina kumira zvakanaka uye motokari dzisingafanire kunge dziri pamugwagwa nekuda kwekusava nezvinotarisirwa kuti dzisaite njodzi. No media source currently available
title: Huwandu hweVatendi veZCC Vafa Munjodzi yeBhazi Svondo Rapera Hwosvika paMakumi Matatu neVasere (38)

text: Imwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi inoti danho rakatorwa nebazi rinoona nezvekupinda pamwe nekubuda kwezvinhu munyika, reZimbabwe Revenue Authority, ZIMRA, rekubhadharisa mari pazvimwe zvinhu zvinenge zvichipinzwa munyika kubva kunze, inzira yekuti homwe yehurumende ipinde mari munguva ino yekuoma kwezvinhu. Vapropser Chitambara, avo vanoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, vanotizve neimwe nzira hurumende iri kuzama kuchengetedza makambani emunyika, anogadzira zvinhu zvakafanana nezviri kubva kunze kwenyika. Asi VaChitambara vanoti kunyange hazvo hurumende yatora danho rakanaka iri, havaoni makambani aya achizogutsa misika inoda zvigadzirwa zvawo sezvo michina mizhinji yave yekare isingakwanisi kufambidzana neyechizvinozvino. ZIMRA yakaburitswa gwaro rinozivisa kuti kubva musi wa 1 Gunyana 2015, zvinhu zvakaita semagumbeze, mafiriji, zvitovhu, mafuta ekubikisa pamwe nesipo dzekuwachisa, mibhedha, furawu, upfu, shuga, nyama, mazai, hove mukaka weupfu, uchi pamwe nejamu zvinenge zvobhadhariswa mitero yekupinzwa munyika kana kuti customs duty. Asi VaChitambara vanoti nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika, danho iri rinogona kutowedzera kupinzwa kwezvinhu izvi munyika zvisiri pamutemo. “Harisi dambudziko remuZimbabwe chete asi kuti nyika dzose dzinoedza kuisa mitemo yekupinzwa kwezvinhu dzinosangana nematambudziko iwayo, ekuti vamwe vanenge vopinza zvinhu izvozvo zvisiri pamutemo,” vanodaro VaChitambara. Vanotiwo izvi zvinoita kuti nyaya dzehuwori dziwande, dzimwe nguva vashandi veZIMRA yacho vachitoshandwa navo muhuwori ihwohwo. No media source currently available
title: ZIMRA Yobhadharisa Mitero paZvinhu Zvakaita seMagumbeze, Upfu, Mafuta neShuga Zvinobva Kunze

text: Vaimbova mumiriri weZanu-PF mudare reparamende kuRushinga, VaWonder Mashange, avo vakadzingwa mubato iri mukupera kwegore rapera vachinzi vainge vari muchikwata cheG40 chaitsigira vaimbova mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika Amai Grace Mugabe, vanoti vakadzingwa papurazi ravo rePabwino Farm kuBindura zvisiri pamutemo. VaMashange vange vachinetsana zvikuru naVaTinashe Matangira, vanove mwana wenhengo yedare reparamende inomirira Zanu-PF kuBindura South VaRemigious Matangira. VaMashange vanotiwo nyaya yekudzingwa iyi yakawedzerwa nekuda kwekupindira kwegurukota rezveminda VaPerrance Shiri. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaShiri kana VaTinashe Matangira kuti tinzwewo mativi avo sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. No media source currently available
title: Yaimbove Nhengo yeZanu PF Yotorerwa Purazi

text: Kanzuru yeguta reHarare inonzi yakavhura hofisi yechizvinozvino yekuti vagari vabhadhare mitero yavo zvisina dambudziko panzvimbo yemabhizimusi yeSam Levy mumusha weBorrowdale. Mutauriri wekanzuru, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti hofisi yavo itsva iyi inoita kuti vanhu vakwanise kushandisa dandemutande sezvo iine wi-fi. VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yavo yakavhurawo nzira itsva inoita kuti vagari vabhadhare mitero yavo kana zvikwereti zvavo vari kana kunze kwenyika chaiko vachishandisa internet pachirongwa chavo chinonzi Pay-Now. Vanoti izvi zvose zviri pasi pehurongwa hwekanzuru yavo hwekuti vagari varerukirwe nekuita bhizinesi nekanzuru vari chero kwavanenge vari. Kanzuru yakavandudza mahofisi ayo ematunhu kuti vagari varerkuirwe nekubhadhara mitero yavo uye VaChideme vanoti vari kutarisira kuvhura mahofisi akawanda echizvinozvino. No media source currently available
title: Harare Inorerutsira Vagari Zvichitevera Kuvhura Hofisi paSam Levy Village

text: No media source currently available Sangano re MISA Zimbabwe raisa magwaro aro zvechimbi chimbi mudare re Constitutional Court richikumbira dare iri kuti ribvumidze kutepfenyurwa kwenyaya iri kunzwikwa mudare iri nemusi weChitatu. Dare iri riri kunzwa chikumbiro chemutungamiri we MDC Alliance, Va Nelson Chamisa, avo vari kupikisa zvakaburitswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, zvekuti mutungamiri weZanu PF, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Misa Zimbabwe, ichitsigirwa nemutori wenhau ari muBulawayo, Busani Bafana, inoti nyaya iri mudare iri yakakosha zvikuru, nokudaro munhu wese anofanirwa kuona kutongwa kwayo. MISA Zimbabwe inotiwo dare iri rinofanirwa kubvumidza kuti nyaya iyi itepfenyurwewo pa Facebook ne Twitter, nokudaro rinofanirwa kubvumidza kushandiswa kwenharembozha mudare iri. Sachigaro ve MISA Zimbabwe, Va Golden Maunganidze, vanoti sangano ravo rakatotarisira kuti vachawana mhinduro ichavafadza neMuvhuro. Parizvino nepfenyuro ye ZBC iri kunzi ndiyo yapihwa mvumo neJudicial Services Commission yekutepfenyura kutongwa kwenyaya hombe iyi..
title: MISA Zimbabwe Yokumbira ConCourt Kuti Vatori veNhau Vatepfenyure paFacebook neTwitter

text:
Kushaya kwenhengo idzi kunoitika panguva iyo misodzi ichiri pamatama zvichitevera kushaya neChishanu kwegurukota reManicaland, Doctor Ellen Gwaradzimba, uye nhengo yeZanu PF Central Committee, VaMorton Malianga, avo vakashaya zvakare nechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available  Vaimbove nhengo yeparamende yeChiredzi Central, uye vari mutauriri weZanu PF mudunhu reMasvingo, VaRonald Ndava, vashaya nechirwere che Covid-19. Kushaya kwaVaNdava kwaitika panguva iyo imwe nhengo yeZanu PF, uye vari sachigaro wevechidiki mudunhu reMashonald Central, VaFrenado Ruwizhi, vashayawo nechirwere ichi. Kushaya kwenhengo idzi kunoitika panguva iyo misodzi ichiri pamatama zvichitevera kushaya neChishanu kwegurukota reManicaland, Doctor Ellen Gwaradzimba, uye nhengo yeZanu PF Central Committee, VaMorton Malianga, avo vakashaya zvakare nechirwere cheCovid-19. VaNdava vakashaya manheru apfuura muchipatara cheChiredzi General Hospital. Mutauriri wemhuri yaVaNdava, VaStephen Goto, vaudza Studio7, kuti
VaNdava vakashaya mushure mekunge vabatwa nechirwerecheCovid-19. Mutevedzeri wegurukota revashandi munyika uye vari seneta kwaGutu,
VaLovemore Matuke, vati bato ravo pamwe chete nenyika zvarasikirwa
negamba raida budiriro. VaGoto vati vachazivisa munguva inotevera kuti VaNdava vachavigwa rini. Mutauriri wekomiti yeCovid-19 muMasvingo, VaRodgers Irimai, vati
nekuwanda kuri kuita chirwere ichi vanhu vanokurudzirwa kugara
mudzimba nekutevedzera mitemo yeLockdown Lever Four. Mutauririri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vaudza vatori venhau kuti bato ravo richazivisa munguva pfupi inotevera kuti Amai Gwarazimba, pamwe naVaMalianga, vachavigwa rinhi uye kupi. Mashoko atiri kutambira anotiwo mudzimai wevaimbove gurukota muhofisi yemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika munguva yehutongi hwaVaMugabe, VaSlyvester Nguni, vashayawo neMugovera nedenda reCovid-19. VaNguni, avo vakafirwa naamai vavo nechirwere ichi apo chakapinda munyika gore rapera, vati mudzimai wavo azorodzwa asi vange vakabatikana kuti vataure zvakawanda.
title: Nhengo dzeZanu PF Ina Dzinofa neChirwere cheCovid-19 Musi Mumwe Chete

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nemusi weChitatu vakaita musangano nevarairidzi uye vemabhizimisi paCelebration Centre muHarare. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, VaMnangagwa vakati zvakakosha zvikuru kuti hurumende ikoshese nyaya yekuvaka zvikoro mukusimudzira mabasa edzidzo munyika. Musangano uyu wakawarongwa nebazi rezvedzidzo uyu wange uchiitwa pasi pedingindira rekukurudzira kuwaniswa kwedzidzo kuvanhu nenzira iri nyore kana kuti, “Promoting Access to Education through Infrastructure Investment”. Gurukota rinoona nezvedzidzo, VaPaul Mavima, vaudza Studio7 kuti musangano uyu wange wakakosha zvikuru pakusimudzira nyaya yedzidzo. No media source currently available Kunyange hazvo mamwe masangano evadzidzisi akaita seProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti PTUZ neZIMTA ange ari pamusangano uyu, rimwe sangano revarairidzi reAmalgamated Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti ARTUZ rinoti harina kuenda kuenda kumusangano uyu. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti musangano uyu unenge wange wakanangana nekutsvagira Zanu-PF rutsigiro. No media source currently available
title: VaMnanangwa Voita Musangano neVarairidzi neveMabhizimisi

text: Chikwata chesangano rinokweretesa mari pasi rose, re International Monetary Fund, chiri kushanya munyika murwendo rwacho rwepiri pasi pehurongwa hwe Staff Monitored Programme, uhwo hunotarisirwa kubatsira Zimbabwe kuti ikwanise kuwana zvakare mukana wekukwereteswa mari. Asi nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti havaoni Zimbabwe ichiwaniswa mumwe mukana wekukwereteswa mari nekuda kwezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru muhurumende pamwe nemakambani anodyidzana nehurumende, sezvo America iine zvkamu zvakati kuti zvemasheya musangano reIMF. Muzvinafundo Mugano vanotiwo hurumende yeZimbabwe haifanirwe kugadzirisa zvakaita kuti itemerwe zvirango senzira yekuti ikwanise kukwereteswa mari, asi kuti inofanirwa kuzvigadzirisa sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika, iro rinopa chizvarwa chese kodzero yekusununguka. Zvichabuda murwendo rwechikwata ichi zvinotarisirwa kuziviswa mukupera kwesvondo. No media source currently available
title: Chikwata cheIMF Choshanyira Zimbabwe

text: Bato ririkutonga reZanu PF rinonzi ririkumanikidza vakuru vezvikoro uye makomiti eSchool Development Committee muManicaland kuti vavape madutavanhu ezvikoro zvavo ekutakurisa vechidiki vari kuda kunofora kuguta reHarare mangwana, kuOne Million Man March. Bato iri rinonzi rave kuita zvekumanikidza vanhu mushure mekunge rakundikana kuunganidza mari iri kudiwa. Vatsigiri veZanu-PF vanonzi vari kumanikidzawo vanamuzvinabhizimisi kuvapa zvekudya. Munyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi revechidiki muZanu-PF, Muzvare Passionate Dandajena vakatombotenda kuti kuwana zvikwanisiro kwange kuchinetsa zvakanyanya sezvo vamwe vange vachiramba kusunungura homwe. Asi panyaya yekuti Zanu-PF yainge yoita zvetsvimbo mugotsi, munyori wezvedzidzo muZanu-PF Youth League kuManicaland VaKudzi Mudhara vati ichi handi chokwadi sezvo vaine nzira dzavo dzekuunganidza nadzo mari. VaMudhara vanoti chavakangoita kukumbira mabhazi pasina kumanikidza vanhu. Asi mashoko aya ari kurambwa nevakuru vezvikoro, vazhinji vacho vachiti vakatyisidzirwa nevechidiki veZanu-PF. Vamwe vezvikoro vanoti vari kutomanikidzwawo kupa dhiziri pachena kuZanu-PF. Mumwe mubereki muguta reMutare VaGodwin Sithole vanoti havafari nezvaitwa izvi. "Tinoona sekuti uku kumbunyikidza vakuru vemuzvikoro pamwechete nevana vacho kuvamanikidza kuenda nemabhazi kumisangano yezvemapoka ezvematongerwo enyika. "Mabhazi aya kutanga akatengwa nemari yevabereki pasina rubatsiro kubva kuZanu yacho, saka gurukota rezvedzidzo rakati misangano yezvenyika imiswe saka zvimwechetezvo nemabhazi edu haafanirwi kushandiswa mahara nemapoka ezvematongerwo enyika," VaSithole vadaro. VaTrevor Saruwaka ndivo mutauriri webato reMDC-T kudunhu reManicaland, uye vari mumiriri weMutasa Central mudare reparamende. VaSaruwaka vashora zviri kuitwa izvi vachiti kuda kuparadza zvakare midziyo yemuzvikoro kuri kuda kuitwa neZanu PF sekukanganisa kwavakaita hupfumi hwenyika. VaPishai Muchauraya, vanove nhengo yebato rinopikisa reRenewal Democrats of Zimbabwe vanoti zviri kuitwa izvi hazvina maturo ose. "Chekutanga ndechekuti Zanu PF haichina tsigiro nokudaro ndosaka vave kuita zvekumanikidza zvikoro kuti zvivape zvekufambisa uye nevamwe vana kuti vaende kuhurongwa hwavo. Bato iri zvakare harichina mari yekuti vakwanise kuita fund ma-activities avo sekuondonga kwavakaita hupfumi hwenyika," vadaro VaMuchauraya. Zanu PF yaichisimboshandisa madutavanhu ekambani yehurumende yeZimbabwe United Passenger Company kana kuti Zupco mukutakura vatsigiri vayo pachena kumagungano akafanana neiri. Asi nekuda kwekuti kambani iyi yakawira pasi, zvave kunetsa kuti ichiwana chekutakurisa vatsigiri vayo kumisangano yayo. National Railways of Zimbabwe, NRZ imwewo kambani yaitakuriswa nhengo dzebato iri pachena kusvikira yagwadamawo zvakare. No media source currently available Asi sachigaro wevechidiki muZanu PF mudunhu reManicaland VaMbuso Chinguno varamba mashoko ekuti nhengo dzavo dziri kumanikidza vanhu kubvisa zvikwanisiro zvekushandisa pakukufora kwemusi weChitatu uku. "KuManicaland kwanidnove ndini provincial youth chair weprovince hurongwa hwedu huri kufamba zvakanaka. Mangwana makuseni tiri kumukira kunanga kuHarare, we have mobilized enough resources. Hapana ari kumanikidzwa nekuti fundraising takaita seManicaland Province," VaChinguno vanodaro. No media source currently available
title: Zanu PF Yopomerwa Mhosva yekuManikidza Zvikoro Kupa Mabhazi eKushandisa kuOne Million Man March.

text: Sangano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti ARTUZ, rinoti mumwe wevatungamiriri vesangano iri, VaGodfrey Chanda, vambotorwa nevasori ndokuchengetedzwa muGweru kwemaawa maviri, veruzhinji vasingazivi kuti varipi. Asi VaChanda, avo vanove nhengo yekomiti ye ARTUZ mudunhu reMidlands, vazoregedzwa vachienda kumba mushure mekunge vakomekedzwa kuti vasaite misangano nevarairidzi muGweru. Mutungamiriri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti kutorwa kwaVa Chanda kunoitika panguva iyo varairidzi vari pasi pesangano ravo vapinda muzuva repiri vachiramwa mabasa muhurongwa hwavo hwemazuva matatu ekuramwa mabasa. VaMasaraure vanoti mamwe masangano evarairidzi ari kuramwavo mabasa senzira yekutsigira sangano ravo. Kuratidzira uku kunopera nemusi weChitatu. Asi VaMasaraure vati pachaitwa musangano mushure mekuramwa mabasa kuti varonge nhano yekutora. Tatadza kubata gurukota rezvemabasa, Amai Sekai Nzenza, kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende panyaya iyi asi nharembozha yavo yange isingadavirwi. No media source currently available
title: ARTUZ Inoti Kuramwa Mabasa Kuchapera neMusi weChitatu

text: Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaKindness Paradza vari kukurudzira mapato ezvematongerwo enyika kuti asarove vatori venhau vachitiwo vatori venhau vanofanira kufamba nemagwaro avo ebasa panguva dzose. Izvi zvinotevera kurohwa kemutori wenhau weStudio 7 Godwin Mangudya nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori nevatsigiri veZanu-PF nemusi weMugovera kuKuwadzana. Vatsigiri veZanu-PF ava vaiita sarudzo dzeCentral Committee yebato ravo. Mangudya anoti kunyangwe akaratidza mgwaro ake ekuti mutori wenhau, vanhu ava vakamurova ndokumutorera nharembozha yake nezvimwe zvaanoshandisa pabasa. VaParadza vaudza Studio 7 kuti vange vasina havo ruzivo rwakakwana nezvakaitika asi vati vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika havafanire kurova vatori venhau. Vatiwo vatori venhau havafanire kuramba vachitora mavhidhiyo nemifananidzo yevanhu vanenge vasingadi. Asi Mangudya akaudza MISA- Zimbabwe kuti ainge apihwa mvumo yekutora nhau nebato reZanu-PF apo akaenda kumuzinda webato iri nemusi weChishanu nevamwe vataori venhau. Mutauriri webato reZanu-PF VaChris Mutsvangwa vakaudz Studio 7 kuti Mangudya anofanira kunomhan’ara kumapurisa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi sezvo vange vasingadaire nharembozha yavo.
title: Hurumende Inoti veMapato ezveMatongerwo eNyika Ngavasarove Vatori veNhau

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vasvika muNew York nemusi weChitatu kumusangano wevatungamiri venyika unoitwa pagore weUnited Nations General Assembly. Uyu musangano wechimakumi manomwe uri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rakanangana nenyaya dzerunyararo nekodzero dzevanhu. VaMugabe vaperekedzwa nemudzimai wavo amai Grace Mugabe, gurukota rezvehupfumi VaSamuel Mumbengegwi uye gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa. VaMugabe vari kubatana nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzepasi rino kuti vazozeye kuti votambira here gwara itsva reUnited Nations rakanangana nebudiriro rinonzi Sustainable Development Goals iro richatsiva gwara rainzi Millenium Development Goals. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vatosvika kumuzinda weUnited Nations, Amai Nyaradzayi Gumbonzvanda vayambira vatungamiri venyika dzepasi rino kuti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi nekudaro vanofanira kuzadzikisa zvavanenge vataura.      Amai Gumbonzvanda vati vari kushushikana zvikuru nenyaya yekuti madzimai nevanasikana munyika dzakawanda vari kurarama hupenyu hwakaoma uye vachibatwa neseri kweruoko. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe neVamwe Vatungamiri Vosvika muNew York

text: Gweta riri kumirira murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu akapambwa akatsakatika, VaItai Dzamara, rinoti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanofanira kuti vataure nezvekupambwa kwaVaDzamara kuitira kuti nyaya iyi ikurumidze kuferefetwa senyaya yakakosha zvikuru. Mashoko aVaCharles Kwaramba anotevera mashoko emutauriri waVaMugabe, VaGeorge Charamba, ekuti VaMugabe havana nguva yekutaura nezvenyaya yeVaDzamara sezvo iri mumaoko emapurisa. No media source currently available VaCharamba vanoti pane vanhu vakawanda vave kuda kuita zvematongerwo enyika vachishandisa nyaya yaVaDzamara. VaDzamara vanotungamira chikwata cheOccupy Africa Unity Square, icho chaikurudzira kuti VaMugabe vasiye chigaro nekuti vatadza kutonga. VaDzamara vakapambwa muGlen View muHarare nemusi wa 9 Kurume nevarume vashanu vaive nepfuti nemotokari. Masangano anopikisa, akazvimirira oga, hurumende dzekunze vave nenguva vachishora hurumende nekutadza kuchimbidza kuongorora kupambwa kwaVaDzamara. Mupurisa anonzi ari kutungamira kuferefetwa kwenyaya iyi, Assistant Commisioner Crispen Makedenge, varamba kuti ndivo mutikitivha mukuru panyaya iyi vakati titaure nevakuru vemapurisa kuPolice General Headquarters. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwemukati menyika, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vati mapurisa ari kuyedza kuongorora nyaya iyi uye vatiwo VaDzamara handivo chete munhu akatsakatika munyika vachipa muenzaniso gamba renyika, VaEdison Sithole, vakatsakatika muna 1975 nyika isati yawana kuzvitonga kuzere. No media source currently available
title: Gweta raVaDzamara Rinoti VaMugabe Ngavashore Kutsakatika Kwavo

text: Vanhu mu America vari kucherechedza zororo rezuva reMuvhuro senzira yekuyeukwa kuberekwa kwamuchakabvu Martin Luther King Junior. Va King vakaita mukurumbira mugore ra 1955 apo vakaronga kuramwa kukwira mabhazi muguta re Montgomery mudunhu re Alabama. Izvi zvakamanikidza kanzuru yeguta iri kubvisa murawo unoita rusarura pavanhu vatema vanenge vachishandisa mabhazi. Kubva ipapo VaKing vakabva vava munhu aizivikanwa mukurwira kodzero dzemunhu wese kuma 1950 nekuma 1960. Mashoko avo ekuti “I have a dream,” avakataura pamusangano wakaitirwa mu Washington muna kurume 1963, akapa mamiriyoni nemamiriyoni evanhu vemu America kuti vapinde mukurwira kodzero dzemunhu wese. Muna 1964, va King vakapihwa mubairo we Nobel Peace Prize, rinovawo gore rakasainwa mutemo unoremekedza kodzero dzemunhu wese nevaive mutungamiri we America panguva iyi, muchakabvu Lyndon Johnson. Va King vakapfurwa vakafa musi wa 4 Kubvumbi 1968 muguta re Memphis mudunhu re Tennessee, uko vakanga vaenda kunobatsira vanhu vatema vanoita basa rekurasa marara vairamwa mabasa vachiti vari kuitwa rusarura pamari dzavanotambiriswa. Zororo re Martin Luther King rakatarwa kuva zororo zviri pamutemo muna 1983 naVa Ronald Reagan, sezuva rekurangarira VaKing, avo vakaberekwa musi wa Ndira 15, 1929. Mumwe muzvinabhizinisi wechidiki, Va Samuelle Dimairo, vanoti kurangarirwa kwaVa King kwakosha sezvo vari mumwe wevakatanga zvirongwa zvekurwisa rusaruraganda muAmerica. No media source currently available
title: America Yorangarira Muchakabvu Martin Luther King Junior

text: Sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, kana kuti ZLHR, rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru kuti pane vanhu vanogona kunge vakusungwa panguva iyo mauto ari kuti ari kugadzirisa zvinhu munyika pasi pechirongwa cheOperation Restore Legacy. Sangano iri rinoti vanhu vava vanofanira kupihwa kodzero dzavo vasati vaendeswa kumatare edzimhosva. Mumashoko avaburitsa nhasi, veZLHR vati veZimbabwe Defence Forces vanofanira kuita zvese zvinodiwa pasi pebumbiro remitemo yenyika zvikuru sei Section 50 iyo inoti vanhu vanofanira kupihwa kodzero dzavo vasati vaendeswa kumatare. Magweta aya atiwo mauto anofanira kucherechedza Section 53 yebumbiro iyo inoti vasungwa vanofanira kuvawo nekodzero kwete kurohwa, kushungurudzwa kana kubatwa nenzira dzisina chiremera. Sangano remagweta iri ratiwo Zimbabwe yakasaina zvibvurano zvakawanda zvemuAfrica nepasi rese zvinoisungira kuti icherechedze kodzero dzevasungwa uye tariro yavo ndeyekuti Zimbabwe icharemekedza zvisungo izvi zvakaita seAfrican Charter on Human and Peoples Rights neUniversal Declaration of Human Rights. Mukuru wesangano ravana nyanduri vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaRobson Isaac Shooes Lambada, vanoti kunyange havo vachifara nedanho rekugadzirisa zvinhu munyika rakatorwa nemauto, vanhu vese vakasungwa vanofanira kumiswa pamberi pematare edzimhosva. Mukuru weZimrights, VaOkay Machisa, vati kunyange hazvo vanhu vari kufara nezvakaitwa nemauto zvakakoshawo kuti vese avo vakasungwa panguva iyi vachiendeswa kumatare kuti vanotongwa nemhosva dzavo. Muzvare Mainah Dube vanotiwo izvi zvakakosha sezvo mhuri dzavo dzichifanira kuziva kuti vakachengetedzwa kupi. Kutanga musi wa15 mwedzi uno mauto akazivisa kuti ainge atora danho rekugadzirisa zvinhu munyika nekusunga nhubu idzo anoti dzaifurira kana kushandisa vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kuvhiringa zvinhu munyika. Vamwe vevanhu ava vanosanganisira makurukota ehurumende akaita saVaignatius Chombo, nevaimbove nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakaita saVaKudzanai Chipanga. Pari zvino hazvizikanwi kuti vanhu vangani vakachengetedzwa nemauto. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remauto panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: ZLHR Inoti Mauto Ari Kutyora Kodzero dzeVanhu Munyika

text: Sangano reZimstat rinoti ongororo yarakaita pakuverengwa kwakaitwa vanhu gore rino inoratidza kuti varume vakawanda ndivo vanoshanda zvichienzaniswa nevanhukadzi uyewo vanhu vakawanda munyika vabvazera vari kunzi varipamabasa. Vachitura ongororo yavo, mukuru weZimstats VaTaguma Mahonde vati ongororo yavo yakaratidza kuti munyika varume vakawanda ndivo vari pamabasa zvichienzaniswa nevanhukadzi. VaMahonde vati pavanhu vasina mabasa vaitarisa kune avo var ikutotsvaka mabasa vachiti vainge vasina kuisawo avo vainge vaneta nekutsvaka mabasa zvekuti vanga vambomira. VaAdolphus Chinomwe vanoshanda nesangano reInternational Labour Organization kana kuti ILO vati zvabudiswa neZimstats izvi zvinoratidza kuti madzimai akawanda ari mumabasa avasingapihwi mihoro akadai sekuchengeta pamba, kubika nekuchengeta varwere vachiti izvi zvine njodzi huru sezvo zvichizoita kuti madzimai arambe achitambura. VaChinomwe vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vasiri pamabasa huchichi hushoma, chakakosha kuongorora ndechekuti vari pamabasa vacho vangani uye vari kuita mabasa anovapa mari yekuti vakwanise kuzviriritira. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya vatiwo zvabuditswa neZimStats zvinoratidza kuti muono wehurumende weVision 2030 hwekuti hapana anofanirwa kusarira kumashure hausi mugwara. VaManyanya vati huwandu hwapiwa neZimstats hunoratidza kuti madzimai nevechiki vari kusarira kumashure. VaMahonde vatiwo ruzivo rwezvemabasa munyika hunobatsirawo hurumende muzvirongwa zvayo kunyanya kuziva kuti hurongwa hwebudiriro hwehurumende huri mugwara here. Gawaro rabuditswa neZimStats iri nderechisere uye riri rekupedzisira pamagwaro aitarisirwa kubuditswa nesangano iri pachitariswa zvakabuda mukuverengwa kwevanhu kunoitwa kamwechete pamakore gumi. No media source currently available
title: ZIMSTAT Inoti Kuverengwa kweVanhu Kwakaburitsa Pachena Kuti Madzimai Mashoma Ari Kushanda Mabasa Anovapa Mari Yakawanda

text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kukurudzira mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti vadzinge basa mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehupfumi VaTerrence Mukupe vanonzi vave kusvibisa hurumende nebato reZanu-PF nemaitiro avo ekunyomba uye kuda kurova vanhu vavanenge vasingawirirane navo uye vave kupomerwa mhosva yekuba nharembozha yemudzimai wemumwe mutori wenhau. Mutori wenhau webepanhau reNewsday, Blessed Mhlanga vanoti nemusi weChina akapona nepasaka reshumba mushure mekunge VaMukupe vada kumurova pachirongwa chavaiita panhepfenyuro yeZBC yeSport FM. VaMhlanga vanoti apo vainge voda kurohwa, mudzimai wavo ainge avaperekedza sezvo chirongwa chaiiitwa manheru akayedza kutora vhidhiyo nenharembozha yake achibva aibvutirwa nechisimba naVaMukupe. Kusvika parizvino foni iyi haisati yawanikwa. VaMhlanga vanoti pavakada kuyedza kunomhan’ara myaya yavo kumapurisa ekuHighlands vakaona VaMukupe vatosvikako vave kuti ivo ndivo vaida kuvarova. Asi VaMhlanga vanoti kunyangwe VaMukupe vakatora nharembozha yemudzimai wavo pakazara vanhu vari kuramba nayo. Nemusi weChina wakare, VaMukupe vanonzi vakanyomba VaBiti panhepfenyuro nezvenyaya yekumwa mapiritsi anodzivirira hutachiona hweHIV/AIDS. Mazuva mashoma apfuura VaMukupe vanonziwo vakaudza vamwe vatsigiri veZanu PF pamusangano kuti mauto haaizobvuma kuti mutungamiri webato rinopikisa VaNelson Chamisa vatungamire nyika vakakunda musarudzo. Mutauriri webato reNPP rinotungamirwa naAmai Joyce Mujuru VaJefferyson Chitando vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMukupe vanofanira kudzingwa basa. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube VaKurauone Chihwayi vati VaMukupe vave nenguva vachitadza kutaura. VaChihwayi vatiwo vari kuenderera mberi vachisvibisa bato reZanu PF vakati zvave kumutungamiriri weZanu PF VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuona kuti vavadzinge pazvigaro zvehutungamiriri pamwe nemubato Imwe nyanzvi munezvematongerwo enyika Amai Eustinah Muchegwa vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti nyika yakatarisana nesarudzo, veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuongorora vanhu vavanoisa pazvigaro. Amai Muchegwa vatiwo vanhu vanehunhu sehwaVaMukupe havafanirwi kutombosarudzwa muhutungamiriri zvachose. VaFarai Mabeza vanotiwo vanoshamiswa kuti munhu ane hunyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi saVaMukupe vangaita hunhu hunonyadzisa. Vatiwo pamusoro pekusarudza vane hunyanzvi vatungamiriri vanofanirwa kuvawo nehunhu hunoyemurika. Munyori musangano reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Evans Masitara vatiwo havatarisiri kuti vatungamiri vakasarudzwa neveruzhinji vashore vamwe vanhu nenyaya dzehutano. VaMasitara vati mashoko emutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemari aya anowedzera kusarudzwa nekutarisirwa pasi kwevanorarama nehutachiona vakati vanovimba kuti mukuru wenyika VaMnangagwa vachatora matanho kune gurukota ravo. VaTendai Biti varamba kutaura neStudio 7 nezvakaitika nezuro pakati pavo naVaMukupe. VaMukupe vanga vasingadairi nharembozha yavo kuti tinzwe zvavanofunga pamusoro penyaya irikutaurwa neveruzhinji kuti vadzingwe basa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri webato reZanu PF VaSimon Khaya Moyo kuti tinzwe kana bato iri richatora matanho nehunhu hwaVaMukupe. Asi munguva shoma yapfuura, VaKhaya Moyo vakabudisa gwaro rekushoropodza VaMukupe mushure mekunge vati vemauto havazopi masimba kune mapato anopikisa kunyangwe akakunda musarudzo dzegore rino. VaMukupe vaswerawo vachishoropodzwa neveruzhinji pamadandemutande akaita seFacebook netwitter. Asi vamwewo vanga vachishorawo VaBiti vachiti naivowo havagoni kutaura semutungamiriri. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vokurudzirwa Kuti Vadzinge VaMukupe Basa

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, kuburikidza nebazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, vakaburitsa neMuvhuro mashoko ekuti havana mutauriri pari zvino uye vanongotaura kuburikidza nebazi iri. Vakatiwo havasati vaumba inonzi Communication Taskforce iyo inonzi naVaAcie Lumumba vakasarudzwa kuva sachigaro wayo naVaNcube vacho. Asi vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika vanoti paita kusawirirana pakati paVaNcube nebazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko iro rinoti VaLumumba vave kutora basa rinofanira kuitwa nebazi iri. VaLumumba vakakonzerawo mutauro wakanyanya apo vakapomera vamwe vashandi vekuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, mhosva yekuita zvehuori nekutengesa mari yema bond notes mumigwagwa. Gavhuna weRBZ, VaJohn Mangudya, vakabva vamisa neMuvhuro vashandi ava basa vachiti vari kuda kuti vamboferefetwe. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. No media source currently available VaNcube naVaLumumba vange vasiri kudairawo nharembozha dzavo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaEarnest Mudzengi, vanova mukuru weMedia Centre vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitika izvi munongedzo wekuti bato reZanu-PF rakundikana kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi zvopa kuti riite basa rekunakurirana nyoka mhenyu.
title: Vakuru veHurumende Vonakurirana Nyoka Mhenyu paNyaya yaVaLumumba

text: Vanhu verudzi rwechikaradhi vari kunyunyuta kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe haisi kutevedzera bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinokomekedza kurekedzwa kwemarudzo ose ari munyika. Vachitaura pamusangano wakarongwa nevagari vemumusha weWard 2 uyo wakaitirwa kuBraeside Shopping Center, Amai Irene Francis vanoti kunyange hazvo vari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chakakwana, havaremekedzwe kana kuwaniswawo mikana sevamwe munyaya dzebudiriro. Amai Francis vanoti kune makharadhi akarwa muhondo yerusununguko asi vazhinji vavo havana kuwana minda iyo iri kupihwa vamwe. Vanotiwo zviri kunetsa kuti vechidiki vari makaradhi vawanewo mabasa zvichiwedzerwawo nenyaya yekuti makambani akawanda akavharwa. Nekuda kwekushaya mabasa, vamwe vechidiki vave kunwa nekuputa zvinodhaka. Amai Francis vanoti nyaya iyi yavarwadza nekuvachemedza kwenguva yakarebesesa zvokuti kuuya kwakamboita mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantine Chiwenga, munguva pfupi yapfuura kuzotaura nemakharadhi emumusha weArcadia, zvakaonekwa sokunge yaiva nzira yokutsvaga chete mavhoti kubva kumakharadhi. Muzvare Rhoda Mandaza vanoti vamwe vechikaradhi vane zvitupa zvinoita sekunge vabvakure kana kuti alien izvo zvakatombopa kuti kuvhota mumakore akare kunetse. Vanoti ivo havo havana dambudziko iri. Musangano wekuBraeside wakarongwa nevagari vemuWard 2 kuti vasangane nevanhu vari kuda kuzovamiririra semakanzura nevamiriri vedunhu iri muparamende musarudzo dziri kuitwa neMuvhuro. Muzvare Mandaza vanoti sevagari vaidawo humbowo hwekuti vanhu ava vaigara muWard 2 here kuti vanyatsomirira zvido zvavo. Dunhu reWard 2 rinosanganisira nzvimbo dzinoti Braeside, Arcadia, Hillside, Eastlea North neSouth, Cranborne Park, Wilmington Park, St. Martins nechimwe chikamu cheHarare Central. Muzvare Stella Arab, vekubato re Build Zimbabwe Alliance naEngineer Taona Mutungwazi vakazvimirira, ndivo vamwe vevanhu vana vakauya kuzotaura nevagari vemuWard 2. Vamwe vaviri vanomirira bato reZanuPF havana kuuya kuzosangana nevagari ava. Muzvare Linda Masarira veMDC-T inotungamirirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe ndemumwe wevanhu vasere vanoda kukwikwidza chigaro cheHarare Central chinobatanidzawo Ward 2 musarudzo yepararemende. Muzvare Masarira vaivewo pamusangano uyu, vakataurawo zvavari kuda kuzoitira nzvimbo iyi kana vasarudzwa.
title: Rwudzi rweMakaradhi Rwunoti Hurumende Haisi Kurwuremekedza

text: Kunyange hazvo vachibvuma kuti kambani iyi yakatarisana nematambudziko makukutu vakuru vakuru pamwe nevashandi vekambani yeNational Railways of Zimbabwe, NRZ, vanoti vanovimba kuti hurongwa hwekumutsurudza kambani iyi huchabudirira. Vachitaura pamusangano hwekutsanangura hurongwa hwekumutsurudza kambani yeNRZ kune vamwe vemabhizimisi vari kuda kusima mari mukambani iyi muBulawayo nhasi, sachigaro webhodhi reNRZ, VaLarry Mavhima, vabvuma kuti kambani iyi yakatarisana nematambudziko akawanda. Vati mamwe ematambudziko aya anosanganisira kutadza kutakura zvinhu zvakawanda nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi munyika uye kuve nenjanji nezvitima zvachembera. VaMavhima vaudza Studio7 kuti kambani yeNRZ yakakosha zvikuru munyika vakati vari kufara nekubvuma kwakaita hurumende hurongwa hwekuti kambani iyi imutsurudzwe vachitiwo vanotarisira kuti hurongwa uhu huchabudirira. Kambani iyi yakatoshambadza kuti iri kutsvaga vemabhizimisi vanoda kusima mari mairi uye mari iyi inotarisirwa kuve mamiriyoni mazana mana emadhora. Pamubvunzo wekuti havawone here hurongwa uhu huchizokundikana nekuda kwekupindira kwezvematongerwo enyika, VaMavhima vabvuma dambudziko iri asi vati vanotarisira kuti hurongwa uhu huchabudirira. Nekuda kwebasa rayo rekutakura zvinhu zvinorema zvakawanda panguva imwe chete Kambani yeNRZ ndeimwe yemakambani makuru uye akakosha munyika. Asi kusashanda zvakanaka kwekambani iyi kwasiya vashandi vakawanda vachirasikirwa nemabasa uye vamwe vachishanda vasingawane mari yavo yemuhoro kwemwedzi yakawanda. Pari zvino kambani yeNRZ ine chikwereti chinodarika madhora mamiriyoni makumi mapfumbamwe kuvashandi. Mukuru weZimbabwe Railways Artisans Union, VaEdmore Africa, vati vashandi vari kufarawo nehurongwa hwekumutsurudza kambani iyi vakatiwo itarisiro yavo kuti hurongwa uhu hauzogumire munzira sezvakaitika pakuda kumutsurudzwa kwekambani yeZiscosteel. VaAfrica vabvuma kuti vashandi vari kuziviswa zvose zviri kuitika pahurongwa hwekumutsurudzwa kwekambani iyi vakati vanotarisira kuti chikwereti chevashandi chichabhadharwa sekuvimbiswa kwevakuru vakuru vekambani iyi. NRZ yaive nevashandi vaisvika zviuru zvisere muna 2008, asi huori nekutadza kufambisa zvakanaka mabasa mukambani iyi kwaita kuti zvinhu zviipe, izvo zvakasiya kambani iyi iine vashandi vangangosvika zviuru zvina. Nekuomerwa nezvinhu NRZ gore rino yakati ichagumira vanhu vanosvika zviuru zviviri kuitira kuti ikwanise kubhadhara vashandi vayo pamwe nekuita basa rayo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemabasa nehupfumi, uye vari murongi wemabasa musangano reCentre for Public Engagement, VaAlfred Ncube, vati kumutsurudzwa kweNRZ kunofanirwa kuitwa nekukasika sezvo kambani iyi yakakosha zvikuru mune zvehupfumi hwenyika, uye kuitira kuti ibhadhare vashandi vayo.
