Musangano waitwa nhasi wapindwa nevemabhizimisi makumi mashanu nematatu kusanganisira vekuChina, Malaysia, South Africa pamwe nevemuZimbabwe uye hurongwa hwekusarudzwa kwekambani ichasima mari muNRZ huchapera musi wa4 Chikunguru. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Votarisira Kumutsurudzwa kweNRZ

text: Mutungamiri we America, Va Donald Trump, nemusi weChipiri vakataura kumubatanidzwa wenyika dzepasi pose we United Nations General Assembly vachishoropodza zvikuru nyika dze Iran, Afghanistan, Venezuela ne North Korea. VaTrump vakati musangano we United Nations uyu wakange uchiitwa panguva iyo nyika dzepasi rose dzisina kumira zvakanaka nepamusana pedzimwe nyika dzavakati dzinokonzera nyonga nyonga pasi pose dzichibatsira mapoka anopfuuridza mwero. VaTrump vakadoma nyika dze Iran neSyria vachiti dzinobatsira zvikwata zvinopfurikidza mwero uye vakadoma mutungamiri we Venezuela, Va Nicholas Moduro, semutungamiri auraya nyika yake nenyaya yekutevedza nzira yegutsa ruzhinji. Pa North Korea, VaTrump vakati kana nyika iyi ikaramba ichiita zvairikuita, America ichasara isina zvokuita kunze kokuparadza nyika iyi. Va Trump vakati nyika dzese dzinofanira kukudza zvido zvevanhu vadzo vakapamhidzira zvekare vachiti kubudirira kwesangano reUnited Nations kunoitika chete nekubudirira kwakazvimirira uye nekusimba kwenhengo dzesangano iri. Vakatiwo kuti tikunde zvimhingamipinyi zvatakatarisana nazvo parizvino, uye kubudirira kwevimbiso yeremangwana redu, tinofanirwa kuita izvi nenjere dzezvakaitika kare zvatinoziva, uye kuzvimirira kwenyika dze United Nations, kusumudzira runyararo nebudiriro kwenyika idzi pachazvo, uye budiro yenyika dzepasi rose. Vachizeya mashoko aVaTrump avakataura kuUnited Nations, chimwe chizvarwa che Zimbabwe chinogara mu America, VaPromise Sande, vakati mashoko aVaTrump haana kuvafadza nekuti vakange vachifanira kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro pe zvirikuitika kuAfrica, zvikuru sei pamusoro pezvinhu zvizhinji zvisina kufanira zviri kuitwa nevatongi vekuAfrica. No media source currently available No media source currently available
title: VaTrump Vanoshora North Korea ne Iran kuMusangano weUNGA

text: Magweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rightskana kuti ZLHR anoti hurumende yeZimbabwe haisi kubatsira vanhu vanosiiswa misha yavo nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyasiyan kana kuti Internally Displaced Persons pachirungu. Magweta aya anoti hurumende inofanira kuvanduza mitemo kuitira kuti ikwanise kubatsira vanhu ava, avo vanofungidzirwa kuti vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete. Vachitaura pamusangano wekuzeya kuti mitemo ungagadziriswa sei kuti hurumende ikwanise kupa vanhu ava kodzero dzavo, imwe nhengo ye ZLHR, VaJeremia Bamu, vati pane mitemo yakawanda inobata bata nyaya dzevanhu asi mitemo iyi ionfanira kusimbaradzwa. Vati bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinopa vanhu kodzero dzavo asi mitemo inoona nezvevanhu vanenge vasiiswa misha yavo haisati yavandudzwa kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo iri. VaBamu vati kunyange hazvo hurumende yakasaina chisungo cheAfrican Union chinosungira kuti nyika dziremekedze kodzero dzevanhu ava, che African Union Convention for the Protection and Assitance of Internally Displaced Persons in Africa, kana kuti Kampala Convention, hurumende haisi kutevedza chisungo ichi. Pasi pechisungo ichi, hurumende dzinosungirwa kuchengetedza vanhu vanenge vasiiwa misha yavo asi Zimbabwe haina mutemo unosungira hurumende kuita izvi. VaBamu vati mitemo yakaita seCivil Protection Act, Refugee Act, Missing Persons Act, Citizenship Act neBirth and Registry Act iyo inobata nyaya dzevanhu vanenge vasiiswa misha yavo, inofanira kuvandudzwa kuti hurumende ikwanise kubatsira vanhu ava zvakakwana. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumende iumbe homwe yemari yekubatsira vanhu ava. Imwe nhengo yeparamende yapinda mumusangano wanhasi, Amai Revayi Muguti, vemuHarare, vati mhuri idzi dziri kutambura zvakanyanya uye zvakakosha kuti hurumende idzibatsire. Imwe nhengo yeparamende, Amai Machirarwa Mugidho vekuChiredzi, vakumbira magweta eZLHR kuti arambe achibatsira vanhu ava zvikuru sei vanogara kumaruwa. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vanosiiswa misha yevo nekuda kwemabasa ebudiriro zvakaita sekubviswa kwakaitwa vanhu paivakwa dhamu reTokwe Mukosi. Amai Muguti vatiwo havawoni chikonzero chekuti sei hurumende isina kuripa vanhu vakabviswa kwaMarange sezvo kwaicherwa mangoda. Chimwe chikonzero chinosiiswa vanhu mishayavo imhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika uye nhengo dzeparamende dzakumbira veZLHR kuti vavandudze basa ravo sezvo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo gore rino. Rimwe gwera reZLHR, Muzvare Belinda Chinowawa, vati sangano ravo rinobatsira pese apo panenge patyorwa kodzero dzevanhu uye vanhu vakasununguka kuenda kusangano iri kana kodzero dzavo dzatyorwa. Zimbabwe ine nhoroondo yevanhu vanosiiswa misha yavo kubvira nyika isati yawana rusunguko kusvika pari zvino pasina chavanopihwa nehurumende. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kuvandudza Mitemo Kuitira Kuti Vanotamiswa neHurumende Varipwe

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti hurumende yeZimbabwe inofanira kusunga dzisimbe kuti hupfumi hwenyika hubude mumadhaka mairi mushure mekunge zvabuda pachena kuti vekunze vari kusunga homwe vachizengurira kutanga mabhizimisi munyika. Izvi zvave kupa kuti mari iri kutumirwa nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika iwande kudarika yevemabhizimisi kana kuti Foreign Direct Investment. Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe inoti mumwedzi mina yekutanga yegore mari iri kubva kuzvizvarwa zvekunze kwenyika yasvika pamamiriyoni zana nemakumi masere uye ichitarisira kusvika pamamiriyoni mazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu mukupera kwegore. Asi mari yevari kuda kutanga mabhizimisi yange ichidzika zvakanya kusvika kuma mamiriyoni mazana mashanu. Hurumende kuburikidza neRBZ nemamwe mapazi inoti iri kuda kuti ishande nevekunze ava kuti vakwanise kutanga mabhizimisi. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi VaTendai Biti vanoti zvekuda kumutsiridza mari nemari yezvizvarwa zvekunze munongedzo wekukundika kwehurumende. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachitungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe Dr Godfrey Kanyenze vanotenderana naVaBiti. VaKanyenze vanoti mari iyi hakuna kwainosvitsa Zimbabwe sezvo nyika ichida vanovamba mabhizimisi. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muFlorida muAmerica VaPromise Sande vanoti hakuna zvimwe zvavangaite kunze kwekutumira mari kuZimbabwe kuti mhuri yavo iwane kurarama. VaBiti vati mari iri kutumirwa iyi hainyanye kubatsira nekuti haisi kuenda mukutanga mabasa. VaKanyenze vatiwo Zimbabwe inofanira kusunga dzisimbe kuti ione kuti yavandudza hupfumi. Dr Kanyenze vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanira kudzika mitemo inokwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze uye kumira nyaya dzehuori. Hurumende yeZimbabwe kusanganisa mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vanogara vachiti chiri zviri kupa kuti vekunze vasauye munyika inyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa nyika nevekunze nenyaya yekutora minda kubva kuvachena ichipihwa vatema. Asi vanopikisa vanoti nyaya yehuori nekutonga nedemo ndiyo yapa kuti Zimbabwe iite seyakageza negoka munyama. Nenyaya yekushaya vemabhizimisi vanouya kuzotanga mabasa, vanhu vanosvika zvikamu zvipfumbamwe kubva muzana vanonzi havana mabasa. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzoyambira Kuti Mari yeZvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze Chete Haingagadzirise Hupfumi hweZimbabwe

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kushorwa zvikuru nevanhu vakawanda zvichitevera kuenda kwavo kuAngola panguva iyo nyika iri kuchema. VaMnangagwa vaenda kumusangano wemapato akarwa muhondo yerusununguko munyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica. Aka hakasi kekutanga VaMnangagwa vachinzi nevamwe vari kutadza kuratidza hutungamiri panguva iyo nyika inenge yakatarisana nematambudziko. Pakatanga dambudziko reCyclone Idai kuMozambique risati rapinda muZimbabwe, VaMnangagwa vakabuda munyika vachienda kuUnited Arab Emirates vachiziva kuti dutumupengo iri richapinda munyika. Asi rwendo rwavo rwakazodimurirwa panzira vodzoka kumusha zvichitevera kuvhiringwa kwakaitwa matunhu eManicaland neMasvingo nedutumupengo reCyclone Idai. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti VaMnangagwa vanga vasingafanire kuenda “kumabiko” kuAngola sezvo munyika muine kuchema. VaMafume vanoti hazvina musoro kuti munhu unotara mazuva ekuchema munyika asi iwe wobuda munyika munguva yekuchema vana veZimbabwe vakavhiringirwa upenyu hwavo neCyclone Idai. No media source currently available Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi, vanoti VaMnangagwa vakaita zvakanaka chose kutara mazuva maviri ekuchema hama neshamwari dzakarasikirwa nevadikani vavo mudambudziko rakakonzerwa nedutumupengo. VaMutodi vanoti kushanya kwaVaMnangagwa kuAngola kunopa mukana wekuti Zimbabwe ibatsirwe nerubatsiro nedzimwe nyika dzavachasangana nadzo kumusangano uyu. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Voshorwa Zvichitevera Kubuda Munyika Apo Nyika Iri Kuchema

text: South Africa, iyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vafa nekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica, yatenga nhomba yekubatsira kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi, mushonga unosvika miriyoni imwe chete yenhomba uchipinda munyika iyi neMuvhuro. Kupinda kwenhomba iyi muSouth Africa kunonzi kuchaona vashandi vari pamberi mukurwisana nechirwere ichi vanosvika miriyoni imwechete nezviru mazana maviri vachibaiwa. Nhomba iyi inonzi yakagadzirwa nekambani yeAstraZeneca uye iri kubva kuIndia. Gurukuota rezvehutano muSouth Africa, VaZweli Mkhize, vakatozivisa kluti nhomba iyi ichapiwa kuzvizvarwa zvenyika iyi chete. VaMkhize vakaudza nhepfenyuro yeSABC kuti hurumeende yavo haina hudzamu hwekuti ibatsire zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zvisina magwaro ekugara munyika iyi. Panguva iyo South Africa yawana nhomba yayo yekutanga, hurumende yeZimbabwe yakazivisawo kuburikidza nemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvemari, VaGeorge Guvamatanga, avo vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti ine mari inosvika mamiriyoni zana emadhora ekuAmerica yakamirira kutenga nhomba. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano uye vakambove gurukota revehutano uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr. Henry Madzorera, vanoti vanokorokotedza South Africa nekuve imwe yenyika dzemuAfrica kutanga kuwana nhomba iyi. Asi Dr. Madzorera vanoti vanokurudzira kuti nyika iyi isave nerusarura pakupiwa kwenhomba iyi vachiti havaoni nyaya iyi seine huchenjeri sezvo ichitopikisana nekurudziro yekuti vana vemuAfrica vabatane. Vanotiwo kusabaya vanhu vese nhomba kunoisa vanenge vakabaiwa ava munjodzi yekutapurirwa zvakare nevaya vanenge vasina kubaiwa nhomba iyi, sezvo vachizosara vaine hutachiwana uhwu. Vanoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kuzobaya vanhu vose vanenge vachigara munyika kana yobaya vanhu nhomba iyi, kusanganisira zvizvarwa zvekunze zvinenge zvichigara munyika panguva iyoyo. Panyaya yekuti Zimbabwe ine mari inosvika zana remamiriyoni emadhora yekutenga nhomba, Dr. Madzorera vanoti kana ichi chiri chokwadi, idanho rakanaka chose rinofanirwa kutendwa, sezvo mari iyi ichikwanisa kutenga nhomba inogona kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi. No media source currently available
title: South Africa Inotambira Nhomba Yayo yeKudzivirira Covid-19 Yekutanga

text: MDCT-T inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe inoti haisi kufara nezvakataurwa nemutauriri wemutungamiri weimwe MDC-T, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, mushure medare redzimhosva ratonga kuti bato raMuzvare Khupe rine mvumo yekushandisa zita nemifananidzo yebato reMDC-T. Vachitaura vakamirira VaNelson Chamisa, VaTamborinyoka vakati mutongi wenyaya iyi, Justice Francis Bere, vakapindira munyaya yakange isiri pamberi pedare ravo. Vakati izvi zvaisa nyaya yemakakatanwa aya kuti ive pakati peMDC-T yaVaChamisa nevatsigiri vavo, ichirwisana naMuzvare Khupe nevatsigiri vavo veZanu-PF. Mutauriri waMuzvare Khupe, VaWitness Dube, vaudza Studio7 kuti Muzvare Khupe havasi munhu weZanu-PF uye ndivo mutungamiri chaiye weMDC-T. Dare remuBulawayo rakati zvikwata zviri kurwisana zvose zvine mvumo yekushandisa zita reMDC-T kudzamara matare atonga nyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Khupe Vanoti Havasi Kushanda neZanu-PF

text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano reZim-SA Forum Muzvare Yvonne Katsande vanoti musangano wavo wekuyedza kukwezva vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika nevamwe vekunze kuti vauye kuzouchika mari munyika yeZimbabwe wakafamba zvakanaka. Musangano uyu wange uchiitirwa kuJohannesburg, South Africa. Muzvare Katsande vanoti chinangwa chemisangano yakadai ndechekusimudzira nyika yeZimbabwe kuburikidza nekushambadza nyika kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe nevamwewo vekunze vauye kuzouchika mari munyika. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa ndivo vakatungamira chikwata chemakurukota eZimbabwe kumusangano uyu. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, VaMnangagwa vakati Zimbabwe yakagadzirira kuita bhizimisi nevekunze uye munyika mune mikana yakawanda. Vakatiwo Zimbabwe iri kuyedza kuvandudza mitemo kuti zvive nyore kutanga mabhizimisi munyika. Nyazvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzange dzichichema chema kuti zvinonetsa zvikuru kutanga bhizimisi munyika sezvo paine zvirehwa rehwa zvakawanda. VaMnangagwa vakatiwo pane mikana yakawanda inogona kubuditswa nenzvimbo dzekuitira mabhizimisi nhatu dzakaparurwa nehurumende kana kuti Special Economic Zones sector kuSunway City Integrated Industrial Park, Victoria Falls Integrated Tourism Park ne Bulawayo Industrial Hub. Vanhu vanonzi vanokwanisa kutanga mabhizimisi munyaya dzekurima, zvicherwa nehumhizha mukufambiswa kwemashoko. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti nyaya yemitemo yeZimbabwe isina kunyatsojeka ndiyo inopa kuti nyika iite seyakageza negoka munyama. Asi hurumende inoti hupfumi hwaenda kumawere nenyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa nyika nevekunze. No media source currently available
title: Zim-SA Forum Yoyedza Kukwezva veMabhizimisi Kuti Vatange Mabasa muZimbabwe

text: Kunyange hazvo dhora rekuAmerica rakamboti dererei huremu zvichienzaniswa nemari yemunyika yemaRTGS, zvinhu zvichiri kuramba zvichidhura zvakanyanya. Ko chii chiri kupa kuti zvidai, uye mari yeRTGS icharamba iine simba here? Muzvinabhizimisi, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF yakakwikwidza ikakundikana musarudzo yekutsvaga mumiriri weWarren Park muparamende, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti zvichatora mavhiki angangosvika matanhatu kuti zvinhu zvigadzikane. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paNelson Mandela Metropolitan University, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti nedanho rekudzora dhora remunyika havaona hupfumi huchigadzikana. Vanoti pane zvakawanda zvinoda kugadziriswa dhora risati radzoka zvisingazope kuti hurumende irambe ichidhinda mari zvakazopa kuti dhora rishaye simba mumakore ekuma 2008. Asi VaMuponda vanoti zvinhu zvakanaka kuti nyika ishandise dhora rayo kana ichida kubudirira. Ko chii chaizvo chakapa kuti dhora rekuAmerica rimboshaya simba mazuva apera? Muzvinafundo Mugano vanoti nyaya yebhanga guru renyika, reRserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, yekutora zvikwereti zvemakambani ndeimwe yakaita kuti izvi zviitike. RBZ yakati yaizopa vemakambani mari yekuAmerica inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana maviri pama RTGS yairi kutora. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vanoti chiri kudererdza dhora rekuAmerica inyaya yekuti vanhu vari kuda kutanga vanzwisisa kuti zvichafamba sei. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti danho rakatorwa negurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, zvichinzi zvichabatsira vashandi hazvisi kubatsira pari zvino. Chimwe chizvarwa chenyika, uye vari gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaGodfrey Mupanga, vaendesa gurukota rinoona nezvemari nebhanga guru renyika kumatare vachivapomera mhosva yekudzika zvisiri pamutemo, mutemo unoshanda kwemwedzi mitanhatu kana kuti Statutory Instrument 142 yakarambidza kushandiswa kwemari dzekunze kwenyika. No media source currently available
title: Hupfumi Hworamba Huchitatarika Asi Hurumende Ichiti Iri Kugadzirisa Zvinhu

text: Vaimbova mutungamiri wesangano guru revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaLovemore Matombo, vakashaya muHarare neMuvhuro mushure mekurwara kwenguva yakareba. VaMatombo vakatora chigaro chekutungamira ZCTU kubva kuna VaGibson Sibanda, avo vainge vasiya chigaro ichi vachinoita mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC. Aive munyori mukuru muZCTU panguva yaVaMatombo ndiVaWellington Chibebe, avo vave kushanda kuILO. VaMatombo vakashandirawo kambani yedzinhare kubva ichiri PTC kusvika izonzi Tel-One kwemakore akawanda kubva kumakore ekuma 1960, vakashandira kuMsasa kwenguva ndefu, vakazobva voenda kudivi rematsamba reZimpost vakashanda vari paMain Post OfficemuHarare. Vakatungamirawo sangano revashandi vekambani iyi reCommunication and Allied Services Workers' Union of Zimbabwe vasati vaenda kuZCTU. Muna 2011 VaMatombo nevamwe vavo vainge vasina kufara nesarudzo dzemuZCTU vakazoumba rimwe sangano revashandi reConfederation of Zimbabwe Trade Unions (COZITU) . Vakambosungwawo kakawanda nekushungurudzwa nenyaya dzekurwira kodzero dzevashandi. Mwanakomana waVaMatombo, VaFfred Matambo, vanoti baba vavo vanga varwara kwenguva ndufe kubva muna 2012, vachipinda nekubuda muchipatara kusvika neMuvhuro apo zvakazovakunda. VaFred Matombo vanoti semhuri varasikirwa zvikuru nekushaya kwemumwe wevabereki vavo anga asara mushure mekushaya kwaamai vavo muna 2015. Vanhu vakaungana kumba kwaVaMatombo kuGreendale muHarare, uye panguva yataenda pamhepo panga pasati pave nehurongwa kwekuradzikwa kwavo. No media source currently available
title: Vakambotungamira Sangano reVashandi reZCTU, VaMatombo, Vanoshaya

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzemutemo zvakare vari mutungamiriri webato, reBethel Christian Party, VaWillard Taonezvi Mugadza, ndemumwe wevanhu vari kukwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Dr Mugadza vanoti kana vakakunda hurumende yavo ichange iine makurukota gumi nemaviri chete. VaMugadza, avo vane makore makumi mana nematatu, vanoti havana kupinda mune zvematongerwo enyika asi vakasangana nazvo apo vaitsvaga mwari. Dr Mugadza vanoti vakatendeuka muna 2000 uye mukunamata ndimo mavakaudzwa nezvekuti vachaitwa mutungamiriri. Vanoti chiporofita chekuti vachaita mutungamiri chakabuda zvakare muna 2011 uye vakatochiburitsa padandemutande reYouTube. Dr Mugadza vanoti kunyange hazvo vakazonyoresa bato ravo gore rino, bato ravo ibato rakaumbwa gore rapfuura uye ibato richiri kukura. Vanoti chikuru chichaita kuti vanhu vavhotere Bethel Christian Party inyaya yekutukana kukuru mumapato makuru ezvematongerwo enyika uye ivo vane donzvo rekubatanidza vanhu munyika. Vanotiwo kana vakakunda musarudzo vachaumba hurumende inenge ine makurukoata gumi nemaviri uyewo kuchange kuine hurumende dzematuhunu dzinenge dzine makurukota gumi nemaviri zvekare. Vanotiwo hurumende yavo ichasimudzira vechidiki munyaya dzemabhizimisi nekuvabatsira kutanga makambani pamwe nekupa makambani avo basa muhurumende. VaMugadza, avo vane mudzimai, Amanda nevana vana, vakomana vatatu nemusikana mumwe chete, vanoti vane hunyanzvi munyaya dzekurwisa huwori uye ndizvo zvinota kuti vakwanise kutungamira Zimbabwe. VaMugadza vakakurira kuChitungwiza vakaita zvidzidzo zvemutemo kuNamibia neSouth Africa uye vanoti vana veZimbabwe vanofanira kumbovapa mukana kuti vasimudzire nyika. No media source currently available
title: VaMugadza Vari Kukwidza Musarudzo dzeMutungamiri weNyika Vanoti Vakatozodzwa Hutungamiri neDenga

text: Vamwe vana vasati vabvazera vanoti havasi kufara nedanho rehurumende rekuti vasapihwe zvekudzivirira kubata pamuviri vasati vasvika makore ekuita zvepabonde pasina mvumo yevabereki. Hurumende iri kutsika madziro panyaya iyi kunyangwe dare reparamende riri kuti mutemo uvandudzwe kuti vana ava vakwanise kuzvidzivirira kana voita zvepabonde. Izvi zviri kuuya pangua iyo hurumende yakazivisa kuti mumwedzi waNdira naKukadzi chete, vana vasati vabva zera zviuru zvishanu vainge vabatira pamuviri uye vamwe chiuru chimwe chete nemazana masere vainge varoorwa vasati vavzazera. Nyanzvi munyaya dzevana dzinoti kusaenda kuchikoro nekuda kwekupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus kuri kupawo kuti dambudziko iri rikombe. Mumwe musikana wechidiki akasiira chikoro panzira ave muform yechipiri ati anoda kungozivikanwa nekuti Amai Shantel audza Studio 7 kuti dai akawana zvekuzvidzivirira pamwe angadai asina kubata pamuviri. Rimwe sangano riri kushandawo nevasikana vechidiki vari kubata pamuviri vasati vabva zera mumusha weMbare re I am Zimbabwe Trust Mbare , Muzvare Margaret Yalard vaudza Studio 7 kuti dambudziko revana vechidiki vari kubatira pamuviri vasati vabve zera rakakura. Muzvare Yalard vanoti kunyangwe hazvo pachivanhu nepachrikristu vana vadiki vasiri muwanano vasingabvumirwi bonde, zviripachena kuti vari kungozviita muchivande nekudaro zviri nani kuti vakwanise kuzvidzivirira. Asi mumwe mubereki ane vanasikana vatatu, Amai Precious Mhere vanogara mumusha weMbare vanoti vanoda kuti mutemo urambe uchidzivirira vana vasati vabvezera kuti vasanopiwa zvekushandisa pabonde. Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr. Ruth Labode, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachitarisa vana vechidiki varikuita nhumbu pamwe neavo vanozoedza kubvisa zvisiri pamutemo vanokurudzira kuti vana vasati vabva zera vanoenda kumakirinika vachitsvaka nzira dzekuzvidzivirira pabonde vawane rubatsiro uye vati Amai mitemo kusanganisira wePublic Health Act inofanira kuvandudzwa. Parizvino mutemo wePublic Health Act vana vasati vabve zera ava vanokwanisa kuwaniswa zvekushandisa pabonde izvi kana vaine munhu mukuru chete. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzebudiriro yevana, Amai Chinga Govhati vatsinhira mashoko aya vachiti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kuvandudza mitemo yayo. Vachipindura mibvunzo mudare reparamende mwedzi wapera, gurukota rezvehutano vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika , VaConstantino Chiwenga vakati hurumende haisi kutambira gwaro rakaitwa nedare reparamende rakakurudzira kuti vana vawaniswe zvekuzvidzivirira pabonde pasina mubereki. Mutevedzeri waVaChiwenga Dr John Mangwiro vaudza Studio 7 kuti vange vari mumusangano nekudaro vange vasingakwanise kupindura mibvunzo yedu pakutudziro iri kuramba ichiitwa nevamwe iyi. No media source currently available
title: Vana Vasati Vabva Zera Vopihwa Here Zvokudzivirira Nhumbu?

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kutarisirwa mangwana kuenda kuVictoria Falls kunoparura zviri pamutemo chirongwa chepiri chekuti vanhu vemunyika vabayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19. Vagari vose vemunzvimbo iyi vanonzi vachabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 chinova chirongwa chekutanga kuitwa izvi. VaMnangagwa nevamwe vatungamiri vemapato ari mugungano rePOLAD vari kutarisirwa kubayiwa nhomba kekutanga. Nhomba iyi inobayiwa vanhu kaviri kuti itange kushanda zvakanaka. Asi muchikamu chekutanga vamwe vaifanira kubayiwa kusanganisira vashandi vemuzvipatara nevatori venhau vakaratidza kuzengurira zvapa kuti Zimbabwe itatarike kubaya zviuru zana zvekutanga panhomba yakapihwa nyika neChina. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr Enock Mayida, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Voparura Zviri Pamutemo neMusi weChitatu Chirongwa cheNhomba yeCovid-19 Munyika

text: Mumiriri webato rinopikisa reCitizen’s Coalition for Change ku Europe, Advocate Wilson Mtetwa, vanoti bato ravo riri kubatsirawo kuburitsa vana veZimbabwe vari muUkraine vakatarisana nedambudziko rehondo yakakonzerwa nekupinda kweRussia nechisimba munyika iyi. Advocate Mtetwa, avo vanove sachigaro webato reCCC Europe Assembly, vanoti vari kubatsira kuburikidza nekuwanisa vana vechikoro ava zvekufambisa kubva munzvimbo dzavagere kuenda kumuganhu wenyika iyi nePoland uko vari kuzobatsirwa nevamiriri vehurumende kuti vaendeswe kunzvimbo dzine runyararo. Vanotiwo pari zvino pane vana vanosvika gumi nevasere vakavharirwa mumupanda wepasi, kana kuti basement mune chimwe chivakwa muguta reSumy, avo vavanoti vari kutaura navo vachivashingisa vakamirira kubatsirwa. Hurumende yakazivisa nemusi weChipiri kuti yakanga yakwanisa kuburitsa vana zana negumi nevasere kubva muUkraine ichivaendesa kunzvimbo dzine runyararo uye vamirira kuwaniswa matikiti endege ekuti vaende kumusha. Hondo yemuUkraine yakanganisa zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi pamwe nezve kune dzimwe nyika kusanganisirawo Zimbabwe, iyo inonzi ine zvizvarwa zvingangodarika mazana mashanu. No media source currently available
title: Bato reCitizens' Coalition for Change Robatsira kuBuritsa Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Kubva muUkraine

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaita musangano masikati eSvondo nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica. VaMnangagwa, avo vari kumusangano we United Nations General Assembly ku New York, vataura pamusoro pegwara ravo ravachatevera kwemakore mashanu anotevera, pamwe nekunzwa shuviro yezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri mu America. VaMnangagwa vataurawo pamusoro pekomisheni yavakaumba kuti iongorore mhirizhonga yakaitika musi wa Nyamavhuvhu 1, 2018, iyo yakasiya vanhu vanodarika gumi vakafa mushure mekupfurwa nemauto. VaMnangagwa vati vari kuda kuziva zvakaitika pamwe nezvakazokonzeresa kufa kwevanhu. Mumwe wevari kubatsira kuronga misangano yaVaMnangagwa muNew York, Doctor Frenk Guni, vanoti chizvarwa chose chekuZimbabwe chine kodzero dzekupinda mumisangano yaVaVaMnangagwa. Asi MDC USA inotsigira VaNelson Chamisa inoti haisi kuzopinda mumisangano yaVaMnangagwa. Mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvekurongwa kwemisangano muMDC – USA, VaCharles Mutama, vanoti vari kuronga kuratidzira kuitira kuti pasi rose rizive kuti VaMnangagwa Havana kusarudzwa neruzhinji rwevanhu. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kutaura kekutanga kumusangano weUnited Nations General Assembly nemusi Chitatu, Gunyana 26, 2018. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoita Musangano neZvizvarwa zveZimbabwe muAmerica

text: Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC Amai Rita Makarau vanoti vakaendesa nzvimbo dzekunyoresa kuvhota dzakawanda kumaruwa kwete mumadhorobha nenyaya yekuti vanhu vari munzvimbo idzi vanogara kure nekure. Asi vanopikisa varikushora sangano reZEC vachiti riri kuda kuti vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vanotsigira bato reZanu-PF vakwanise kunyoresa kuvhota asi vari mumadhorobha vanofungidzirwa kuti vanotsigira vanopikisa vachishaya mukana wekunyoresa kuvhota. ZEC inoti inoda kunyoresa vanhu mamiriyoni manomwe kuti vakwanise kuvhota. Panyaya yekuumba gwaro idzva revavhoti, Amai Makarau vanoti panosvika muna Zvita vanenge vapedza gwaro rekutanga revavhoti kana kuti "draft voters roll". Vati nguva yekuita izvi ichiripo kunyangwe vamwe vari kuti zvave kunetsa kugadzira gwaro iri gore rino risati rapera. No media source currently available
title: Amai Makarau Votaura nezveKuwanda kweNzvimbo dzeKunyoresa kuVhota kuMaruwa

text: Dare remakurukota rave kuzeya bhiri rekuvandudza kurapwa kweveruzhinji munyika, rePublic Health Management Act Ammendement Bill, kuti rizoende kuparamende uko nhengo dzeparamende dzati dzichapasisa bhiri iri nekukasika kuti veruzhinji vawane hutano hunokodzera. Izvi zvaziviswa nemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano nekuchengetedzwa kwevana, Dr Gerald Gwinji, avo vati bazi ravo rakatora makore akawanda kugadzirisa mutemo uyu nekuti raida kuona kuti zvese zvinonetsa vanhu zvagadziriswa. Vati mutemo uyu wakagadzirwa mugore ra1924 uye pave nezvirwere zvakawanda zvavepo kubvira panguva iyi, uye mutemo uyo wave kugadziriswa kuti ufambirane nenguva. Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr. Ruth Labode, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinofadza kuti hurumende yave kugadzirisa mutemo uyu kuti ufambirane nezviri kuitika mazuvano. Mutemo wePublic Health Act sezvauri, haubvumidze vanachiremba nanamukoti kuti varape vechidiki vanenge vaine zvirwere zvepabonde kunyange hazvo paine humbowo hwekuti vechidiki vakawanda munyika vave kuita zvepabonde vasati vasvika pazera rino bvumidzwa kuita izvi. Dr. Labode vati kuvandudzwa kwemutemo uyu kuchagadzirisa izvi pamwe nedzimwe nyaya dzakaita sekuti vana amai vakazvitakura vano fanirwa kubatsirwa pachena muzvipatara zvehurumende. Imwe nyaya inotarisirwa kugadziriswa nemutemo uyu inyaya yekupa mari kunyaya dzehutano munyika. Pari zvino zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika panyaya dzehutano sezvo hurumende iri kutadza kuisa mari inokwana kunyaya dzehutano, izvo zvave kukonzera kuti vakawanda munyika vashaye mishonga nezvimwe zvikwanisiro muzvipatara zveveruzhinji. Vamwewo vanowana munyika kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe, mhuri yavo, makurukota pamwe nevamwe vakuru-vakuru muhurumende, havachina chivimbo nezvipatara zvemunyika zvekuti vave kuno rapwa kunyika dzakaita seSingapore, India neSouth Africa. Dangwe raVaMugabe, Amai Bona Chikore, vakanobatsirwa mwana wavo kuSingapore, uye kutaura kudai VaMugabe pachavo vari kunyika iyi uko vari kufungidzirwa kuti vari kurapwa maziso nezvimwe zviri kuvanetsa. Zvikamu makumi masere kubva muzana zvemari yese iri kushandiswa muzvipatara muZimbabwe zviri kubva kumasangano anopa rubatsiro pamwe nenyika dzakaita seAmerica. No media source currently available
title: Dare reMakurukota Rozeya Bhiri reKuvandudza Kurapwa kweVeruzhinji Munyika

text: Komiti yesangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica reSouthern African Development Community, SADC, inoona nezvematongerwo enyika, kuzvidzivirira pamwe nekuchetedzeka kwedunhu, kana kuti SADC Troika Organ on Politics, Defense and Security yasangana muHarare neChipiri ichizeya nyaya yematororo anonzi anetsa kuMozambique. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, uyo waitirwa paState House muHarare, mutungamiri wenyika uye vari sachigaro wekomiti iyi, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati zvakakosha kuti muMozambique muve nerunyararo vachiti chitororo chiri kuitwa ikoko chinogona kukonzera kusagadzikana mudunhu reSADC pamwe nepasi rose. Vachiverenga gwaro rezvabuda mumusangano uyu, gurukota rinoona nezvinoitika kunze kwenyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vati Troika Organ on Politics, Defense and Security yeSADC yabvumirana kuti nyika dzemuSADC dzibatsire Mozambique kurwisana nematororo. Zvichakadai, mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vati Zimbabwe haikodzere kutaura zvechitororo chiri kuitwa kune dzimwe nyika vachiti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa irikuita chitororo kuzvizvarwa zvenyika zveZimbabwe. Zvichakadai, VaMoyo vatiwo musangano wekomiti yeSADC watarisawo zviri kuitika kuLesotho uko mutungamiri wehurumende yeko, VaThomas Thabani, vasiya basa vakakurudzira kuti kuchichanjanwa kuchaitwa masimba ikoko kuitwe pasina ropa radeuka. VaThabani vakatarisana nenyaya yekunzi vakakonzera kufa kweaimbova mudzimai wavo. Musangano weTroika waitwa zvechimbichimbi pachityorwa mutemo wekuvharwa kwakaitwa nyika dzevatungamiri vanga vari pamusangano uyu nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid19. Vapinda musangano uyu naVaMnangagwa ndiVaEdgar Lungu vanove mutungamiri weZambia, VaMokgweetsi Masisi vanove mutungamiri weBotswana pamwe nemutungamiri weMozambique, VaFilipppe Jacinto Nyusi, avo vakokwa nekomiti iyi kuti vazoiturira mamiriro akaita zvinhu kuMozambique zvichitevera musanganao wavakaita naVaMnangagwa kuChimoio mwedzi wapera. No media source currently available
title: SADC Troika Inozeya Zviri Kunetsa muMozambique

text: Imwe nhengo yedare reparamende inoti nyika iri kurasikirwa nemari yakawanda zvisina maturo zvichitevera kupihwa basa kuimwe kambani yechipiri muAmerica kuitira kuti igadziridze hukama hwehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa nehurumende yaVaDonald Trump. Nhengo yeparamende yeMDC, Amai Concelia Chinanzvavana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitwa nehurumende hazvibatsiri. Amai Chinanzvavana vati Zimbabwe ikaremekedza bumbiro remitemo yenyika nekutevedzera mitemo yavo, zvinochenesa chimiro chenyika kunze pasina kushandisa mari yakawanda sezvairi kuita pakubhadhara makambani ekuAmerica, Avenue Strategies neBallard Partners, mari yakawanda. Izvi zvatsigirwawo nemutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, avo vatiwo hurumende iri kupedza mari yenyika nezvinhu zvisina maturo. VaChamisa vatiwo mari iri kushandiswa kubhadhara makambani ekunze aya inofanirwa kugadzirisa mamwe matambudziko ari munyika muno. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende yezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaKindness Paradza, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanga vasingakwanisi kutaura nezvenyaya iyi. Asiwo mumwe muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika, VaFarai Mabeza, vati zviri kuitwa neZimbabwe izvi hazvisi zvinhu zvinoshamisa sezvo dzimwe nyika dzichitora matanho aya mukutsvaka kuti dziwane kudyidzana kuri nani neAmerica. Gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, ndivo vanonzi vakasaina muna Kubvumbi magwaro ekupa basa kukambani yeAvenue Strategies Global LLC kuti imiririre Zimbabwe muvaka hukama hwayo nehurumende yeAmerica kuti zvirango zvehupfumi zvakatemerwa nyika zvibviswe. Izvi zviri mumagwaro mubazi rezvimutemo pasi pechikamu chinonyoreswa masangano ose anoshandira nyika dzekunze muAmerica, cheForeign Agents Registration Act. Magwaro aya anoonekwa pachena kuburikidza nekuenda padandemutande reForeign Agents Registration Act. Kambani yeAvenue Strategies ichange ichibhadharwa neZimbabwe mari inoita miriyoni yemadhora ekuAmerica izvo zviri kupa vamwe vagari kuti vanyunyute vachiti mari iyi ingadai yashandiswa kuzvipatara, kuwanisa varairidzi mari dzemihoro nezvimwewo zviri kunetsa munyika. VaMoyo vakasainazve gore rino chibvumirano nekambani yeBallard Partners kuti imirire Zimbabwe mukugadzirisa hukama hwayo nehurumende yaVaTrump. Makambani aya ane vakuru vakuru vakamboshanda sezvipangamazano zvaVaTrump munguva yavaitsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica. Avenue Strategies yakavambwa neumwe wevaimbove chipangamazano chaVaTrump, Va Corey Lewandowski, avo vakazosiya kambani iyi muna 2017. Ukuwo Ballard Partners ikambani yaive nevanhu vaishandawo sezvipangamazano zvaVaTrump muna 2016, apo vaitsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. VaTrump vakakunda Amai Hilary Clinton musarudzo iyi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri wehurumende, VaNick Mangwana, padanho rakatorwa nehurumende. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yoshorwa neKubhadhara Makambani ekuAmerica Kuti Vakuru Vayo Vabvisirwe Zvirango

text: Vamwe vagari vekwaNzvimbo kuMazowe Central, mudunhu reMashonaland Central vanoti vakanyimwa neChina fotereza yaitambiriswa varimi pasi pechirongwa chemutungamiri wenyika chekubatsira varimi nezvekurimisa. Mumwe mugari wemu Ward 8, VaKudzanai Kaseke veMDC-T, vanoti ivo nevamwe vavo pamwe nevamwe vainzi ndeve Gamatox, zita rinopihwa vanhu vanotsigira vakadzingwa mubato iri, VaDidymus Mutasa, vanoti vakadzingwa paitambiriswa fotereza iyi, mushure mekunge makanzura nemasabhuku aigovera ashevedzera mazita avo vachinzi vavengi vehurumende. VaKaseke vanoti chinonyanyovarwadza ndechekuti mukati mevanhu vakanyimwa ava, mune chembere neharahwa vasina kumwe kwavanotarisira kuwana zvekurimisa izvi. Varimi mumaruwa akawanda vari kuchema chema kuti bato reZanu PF riri kushandisa mbeu nefotereza mukushungurudza nhengo dzemapato anopikisa. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata Ishe Negomo Lucias Chitsinde, sezvo munyori wavo adaira nhare yavo, VaGodfrey Kunzekwenyika, vati havataure neStudio7. Hatinawo zvakare kukwanisa kubata mumiriri weMazowe Central, Amai Tabitha Kanengoni-Malinga, kuti tinzwe divi ravo. No media source currently available
title: Zanu PF Yonyimisa Fotereza Vatsigiri veMDC-T

text: Vaive nhengo dzeNational Council yeMDC yaitungamirirwa nemushakabvu, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, muna 2014 vakaita musangano wechimbichimbi muHarare neChina vakabuda nechisungo chekuti, National Standing Committee yebato iri yakasarudzwa pakongiresi ya2014, inofanira kukoka musangano wekuzeya mutongo weSupreme Court uyo wakapa masimba ekutungamira bato iri kune vakasarudzwa semutevedzeri waVaTsvangirai pakongiresi iyi, Dr Thokhozani Khupe, wofambiswa sei. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wakaitwa neChina pamuzinda weMDC paMorgan Tsvangirai House, Amai Paurina Mpariwa-Gwanyanya, avo vakasarudzwa semutevedzeri wenyori mukuru webato pakongiresi ya2014, vati musangano wavo wanezuro wakaona mutongo weSupreme Court senzira yekuda kuparadza bato ravo. Vakati vamwe vakuru vakuru vakasarudzwa pakongiresi ya 2014 vakaita saMuzvare Khupe, mutevedzeri wasachigaro, VaMorgen Komichi, pamwe nemunyori mukuru, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vaiziva nezvemutongo uyu ndosaka vakatanga kutodzinga dzimwe nhengo dzeMDC Alliance muparamende. Vamwe vakapinda mumusangano uyu, VaJameson Timba, vakati chisungo chekukoka hutungamiriri hwese hwakasarudzwa muna 2014, zvakaitirwa kuti hutungamiri uhu huzotsanangura kuti vofamba sei sebato. Asi VaKomichi vakaudza Studio7 kuti musangano uyu wakaitwa zviri kunze kwemutemo, uye havasi kuzotevedza zvakabuda mumusangano uyu. Asi VaTimba vakaudza Studio7 kuti hapana chinofanira kunetsa sezvo VaKomichi nechaikwata chavo vakati vanoda kutevedza bumbiro rebato pamwe nemutemo wenyika. Zvimwe zvisungo zvakabuda mumusangano uyu ndezveekuti VaKomichi, Muzvare Khupe naVaMwonzora, vanofanira kumbomira kumiriria vamwe vakuru vebato iri kudzamara musangano wavari kuda waitwa musi wa 6 Chikumi. VaUrayayi Zembe vebato reDemocractic Party vanoti makakatanwa ari muMDC anokonzerwa nekuti mubato iri mawanda zvitubu. Asi vanoti musangano uyu wakakosha sezvo uine chinangwa chekuti vese vari kunetsana vagare pasi vogadzirisa zviri kunetsa. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanotiwo kuungana kwehutungamiriri hweMDC muHarare uyu wakakosha uye zvakakosha kuti vazeye nekuona kuti voita sei nemutongo weSupreme Court. Dare reSupreme Court rakati makongiresi akaitwa naVaChamisa naMuzvare Khupe haina kuitwa zviri pamutemo zvichitevera kushaya kwaVaTsvangirai muna Kurumed 2018. Dare iri rakati Muzvare Khupe, avo vakasarudzwa pakongiresi yemuna 2014 semutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato, ndivo vanofanirwa kufanobata matomu vodaidzira kongiresi inozosarudza mutungamiri mutsva. Kana Muzvare Khupe vakatadza kudaidzira kongiresi iyi, dare rakati izvi zvinofanirwa kuitwa naVaKomichi. Kunetsana muMDC kuri mumatare edzimhosva zvichitevera danho rakatorwa neMDC yaVaChamisa rekupikisa kudzingwa kwakaitwa nhengo ina dzebato iri muparamende neMDC yaMuzvare Khupe, iyo inoti yakatora masimba zvichitevera mutongo weSupreme Court. Matsamba ekudzinga nhengo idzi akanyorwa naVaMwonzora, avo vakaudza Studio7 kuti vakatora danho iri mushure mekunge vaona kuti nhengo idzi dzakange dzisisaite zvido zvebato, uye mumwe wavo, VaChalton Hwende, vakanga vazivisawo paramende kuti vaida kudzinga VaMwonzora naVaKomichi. Mutongi wedare reHigh Court, Justice Tawanda Chitapi, vari kutarisirwa kupa mutongo wavo panyaya iyi svondo rinouya. No media source currently available
title: MDC National Council yeMuna 2014 Yodaidzira Musangano weStanding Committe Yaivepo Mugore Iri

text: Mukuru wechikoro cheBulawayo Polytechnic Engineer Gilbert Mabasa vakashaya nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weChishanu manheru. Engineer Mabasa vaizivikanwawo zvikuru nenyaya dzekuparidzavhangeri vainge vatungamira chikoro ichi kubva mun 2014. Pavakabatwa nechirwere ichi mwedzi wapera, Engineer Mabasa vakazivisa vadzidzidzisi nevana vechikoro kuti vainge vabatwa nechirwere ichi uye vakapinda muchipatara musi wa 6 Nyamavhuvhu. Muna Chikunguru, chikoro cheBulawayo Polytechnic chakambovharwawo mushure mekunge vadzidzi vatatu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19.
title: Mukuru weBulawayo Polytechnic Engineer Gilbert Mabasa Vanoshaya neChirwere cheCovid-19

text: Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri we MDC Alliance, Amai Lynette Karenye-Kore, vanoti mapazi avo ehutano neremadzimai ari kushanda zvakasimba achipa dzidziso yakasimba kuvanhu pamusoro pekukosha kwakaita kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. Vanoti vari kupa zvakare zvikwanisiro zvakaita semamasiki kune avo vasina kuitira kuti vagare vakazvidzivirira kubva kudenda reCovid-19. Amai Karenye-Kore vanoti pari zvino vabereki vari kutarisana dedambudziko rekubhadharira vana mari yekuti varambe vari muzvikoro izvo zvakavhurwa svondo rino. Vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kushandisa mari dzairi kuwana kubva kunze kuti igadzirise mihoro yevarairidzi nekufirita muzvikoro kuti vana nevarairidzi vasabatwe nedenda reCovid-19. "Zvinhu zvakawomera vaberiki zvakanyanya sezvo tichiri mulock down uye vamwe vaberiki vasiri kuenda kumabasa, kuti vakwanise kubhadharira vana vavo vari yezvikoro. Dai hurumende yashandisa dzimwe mari dzairi kuwana kunze kuti ibatsire nekukwidza mihoro yeva dzidzisi uye kufirita muzvikoro kuti denda reCovid-19 risa pararire," vadaro Amai Karenye-Kore. No media source currently available
title: Bato reMDC Alliance Robatsira Mukurwisa Denda reCovid-19

text: Vadzidzi vepachikoro chikuru cheMasvingo Polytechnic neChishanu vaisa mabhuku pasi vachiratidzira mari dzavanopihwa nehurumende dze Zimbabwe Manpower Development Funds, ZIMDEF, idzo dzavari kubatirwa nevakuru vechikoro chavo vachinzi mari iyi ndeyekubhadhara mari yechikoro kuti vadzidze. Vadzidzi vanga vachisvika zviuru zvina varamba kudzidza vakafamba vakaenda kuhofisi yemukuru wechikoro, Va Evans Musara, vachida mari dzavovachiti varikubhdhariswa mari yechikoro kaviri. Vazhinji vanyunyuta kuti vakatorerwa mari iyi gore rose rapera apo vakaendeswa kumakambani kunodzidziswa basa. Mumwe mudzidzi, VaGift Mathews, vanoti vanga vachida kutsanangurirwa zvizere uye vadzorerwe mari dzavo. "Tiri kubatirwa mari iyi tiri kuma attachements, saka mari dzatinopuwa kuti tiwane kubatsirikana tiri kuma attachment, asi ndidzo dzavanotora, mari dziri kubhadharwa that’s why vamwe vari kuda mari iyi asi vari kungobatirwa," vadaro Mathews. Vadzidzi ava vanoti kana vari kumakambani kwavanodzidziswa basa vasati vapedza zvidzidzo, vanopuhwa mari inoita zana remadhora mwedzi woga woga asi chikoro kunova kunosvikira mari iyi, inotora makumi masere emadhora dzimwe nguva yose. Muzvare Miriam Dondofema vanoti chikoro che Masvingo Polytechnic chiri kuvhabhadharisa mari yakawanda vachienzanisa nezvimwe zvikoro munyika. VaDesmond Martin vanoti mari yavanobhadhara haisi kuenderana nemabatirwo avanoitwa kunyanya pachikafu. "Tiri kuita challenge yekuti mari tobhadhara yakakwana asi kana takupuwa chaikafu hazvienderani, asi tichibvisa mari, chikafu chacho hachiiti," vadaro VaMartin. Vadzidzi ava vazoita musangano nevakuru vechikoro avo vavaudza kuti vaisa nyaya yavo kumunyori webazi rezvedzidzo yepamusoro asi varamba kubuda vachiti vanoda mari yavo. Mukuru wechikoro, VaMusara, vazama kubuda mumusangano uyu asi vana vechikoro vava vharira muhoro inodyirwa vachiti vanoda mari yavo vakatanga kuimba nziyo vachiratidzira. VaMusara, avo varamba kutaura nevatori venhau, vazobudiswa mushure mekupindira kwemapurisa. Mari yeZimdef gore rapera yakamboita mutauro mushure mekunge yatorwa zvisiri pamutemo neaimbova gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro, Professor Jonathan Moyo, avo vainzi vakashandisa zvisiri pamutemo mari inopfuura zviuru mazana mana emadhora. Asi VaMoyo vanoramba nyaya iyi vachiti vakashandisa mari iyi pazvirongwa zveZanu PF uye vachiti zvaiva pamutemo. No media source currently available
title: Vadzidzi Voratidzira paMasvingo Polytechnic

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanotarisirwa kutaura mberi kwesangano re United Nations General Assembly muma awa mashoma. Uku kuchave kekutanga VaMnangagwa vachitaura mberi kwedare iri semutungamiri wenyika. MDC Alliance inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inoti haina chainotarisira kubva mune zvichataurwa naVaMnangagwa nekuti Zimbabwe ine zvinoinetsa zvakawanda zvinoda mutungamiri ari pamutemo. Mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kutaura kusangano reUnited Nations hakuna zvakunoreva sezvo sangano iri richingotambira vanhu vese vese pasina rusarura. VaMafume vapa muenzaniso wevatungamiri vakaita saVaSaddam Hussein, Fidel Castro nevamwe vavanoti dzaive mhondi dzakamira mberi kweUnited Nations General Assembly. VaMafume vanoti VaMnangagwa vanofanira kukuridzirwa kuti vagadzirise nyaya dzekodzero yavo kuve mutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available
title: MDC Inoti Hapana Zvine Musoro Pane Zvichataurwa naVaMnangagwa kuUnited Nations

text: Mutungamiriri wenyika yeSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, nezuro manheru vakazivisa kuti kutanga nhasi nyika yavo yapinda muchikamu chechina chekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19, kana kuti Lockdown Level 4, kwemazuva gumi nemana ari kutevera. VaRamaphosa vakati vatora danho iri senzira yekuderedza nayo kutekeshera kwedenda reCovid 19, iro rauraya vanhu vapfuura makumi mashanu ezviuru, kana kuti 50,500 munyika yavo pari zvino. Asi matanho aya anonzi nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe achaita kuti zviomerwe nehupenyu zvakanyanya, zvekuti vamwe vave kutofunga kumbodzokera kumusha. Mutori wedu wenhau, Moreblessing Munjoma, anotipa nyaya iyi.... Matanho aya, anosanganisira kupfekwa kwema mask nguva dzose, kuvharwa kwenzvimbo dzinotengesa pamwe nekunwira doro, kurambidza kuungana kwevanhu pamwe nekusimbisa mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu zvisina chikonzero kubva neguva dzesere manheru kusvika nnguva dzeina mangwanani ezuva rinotevera.. South Africa ndeimwe yenyika dzepasi rose iri kutora matanho akadai mukuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere chaura vanhu vave kuda kusvika mumamiriyoni manauye kubata vamwe vanodarika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi masere, kana kuti 180 million pasi rose. Danho reSouth Africa iri rinonzi raita kuti dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvedzidzo pamwe nemhuri yeZimbabwe vanogara nekushanda munyika iyi vayambire mhuri yeZimbabwe iri kumusha kuti kana ichifunga zvekuenda kuzogara kana kuzotsvaga chouviri muSouth Africa inyatsofungisisa nezvazvo. Vanhu ava vanoti zvinhu hazvisisina kumira zvakanaka munyika iyi nekuda kweCovid-19, izvo zvaita kuti makambani akawanda apfike mikova. VaAmos Moyo, vanove nhengo yebato reMDC asi vachitaura vakazvimiriria, vati South Africa pari zvino yangove nyika isina zvikuru zvainopa nekuda kwemamiriro aita zvinhu zvhcikonzerwa nedenda iri. VaTrust Nhete, nhengo yeProudy263, sangano revemabhizimisi emhuri yeZimbabwe achiri kusimukira muSouth Africa, vanoti iye zvino mhuri yeZimbabwe iri munyika iyi yave kuzotambura zvino siririsa nekuda kwekuomeswa kwemutemo unodzivirira Covid-19 uyu, uyo vanoti uchatadzisa vakawanda kuwana cheuviri. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaAlois Nyamuranga vanoti vave kufunga zvekutombodzokera zvavokumusha, naizvozvo, vave kungoshandira kuti vawane mari yekuti vabatsirikane kana vadzokera kumusha, kunyange hazvo South Africa isiri nyika yoga iri kutora matanho aya. Mudzidzisi pachikoro chepamusoro cheTswane University of Technology, Doctor Rick Mukonza vatsigirawo mashoko aya vakati mhuri yeZimbabwe muSouth Africa, ngaitambe yakangwarira. Asi Doctor Mkonza vaenderera mberi vachiti kunyange hazvo aya ariwo maomere aita zvinhu muSouth Africa, pachine mukana kune avo vanopinda munyika iyi vachizotenga zvekutengesa kuti vawane pundutso. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, chinoimba chiri muSouth Africa, uyewo ari mwana wemushakabvu James Chimombe, muimbi akaita mukurumbira, Davida Chimombe, akurudzirawo vaimba vari kumusha kuti vafunge zvakadzama vasati vauya kuSouth Africa sezvo mararamirao acho aoma kudarika zvaaive akaita Covid-19 isati yapararira. South Africa, ine zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvingangosvika kana kupfuura mamironi matatu, zvizhinji zvacho zviri kutarisana nematambuziko akasiyanasiyana. Pavanhu ava, kune vanosvika 180 000 vakawana magwaro ano vabvumidza kugara nekushanda munyika iyi, ano zivikanwa kuti maZimbabwe Exemption Permits. Asi magwaro aya achange asingachashandi, kubva musi wa 31 Zvita gore rino izvo zvave kushaisa veruzhinji mufaro. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoshanda kunze kwenyika zvinonzi ndizvo zviri kupinza mari yekunze yakawanda muhupfumi hwenyika. Naizvozvo, kana zvinhu zvaita manyama amire nerongo kudayi munyika yeSouth Africa, zvinoreva kuti mhuri zhinji dziri muZimbabwe dzichatarisana nenguva yakoma. Pari zvino nyika yeSouth Africa, inoti yakabaya nhomba, vanhu vanosvika mamirioni maviri nemazana manomwe ezviuru, kana kuti 2.7 miillion.
title: South Africa Inosimbisa Mutemo weKudzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19

text: Kambani yemagetsi yehurumende, yeZESA Holdings, yakakwira kudare repamusoro neChipiri manheru ichida kuti imise kuratidzira kwevashandi vayo avo vari kutsutsumwa nehuwori huri kuitwa nevakuru vakuru vekambani iyi. Kuratidzirwa kwange kuchifanira kuitwa neChitatu kwange kwakatopihwa mvumo nemapurisa asi hakuna kuzoitika mushure mekunge kambani iyi yaenda kudare repamusoro. Vashandi vekambani iyi vaungana pamuzinda wekambani iyi mangwanani muHarare uye kuratidzira hauna kuzoenderera mberi sezvo dare reHigh Court rati richanzwa nyaya yeZESA neChina. Gweta revashandi ava, Professor Lovemore Madhuku, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mutongi Justice Owen Tagu ndivo vachanzwa nyaya yeZESA. ZESA iri kuda kuti vashandi vayo vese vari mumasangano akaita se Energy Sectors Workers Union of Zimbabwe, National Energy Workers of Zimbabwe, Zimbabwe Energy Workers Union pamwe neZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions vasaratidzire uye haisi kuda kuti mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police ape vashandi ava mvumo yekuratidzira. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri weEnergy Workers Union of Zimbabwe, VaAdmire Mudzonga, vati zviri kuitwa nemukuru weZESA, VaJosh Chifamba, nevamwe, kutyora kodzero dzavo. VaMudzonga vati nyaya dzehuwori muZESA dzanetsa uye kambani iyi inobhadhara mari dzakawanda dzehuwori asi vashandi vasiri kuwedzerwa mari dzavo dzemihoro kubva muna 2012. Vati kambani iyi iri kurasikirwa nemari yakawanda chose mumabasa ehuwori uye vashandi vangadai vachiwedzerwa mari dai pasina huwori. Vachibvunzurudzwa nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari yehurumende, yePublic Accounts, masikati ano pamusoro pemafambisirwo ari kuitwa mari mukambani iyi, mukuru wekambani iyi, VaJosh Chifamba, vati kambani iyi iri kunetseka kuwana mari nekuti inotengesa magetsi nemutengo uri pasi pasi. Vatiwo vashandi vekambani iyi vanogara vari migwagwa vachiratidzira kuti vawedzerwa mari asi vati ZESA haikwanisi kuvawedzerwa mari. Vabvuma kuti ZESA yakapedzesera kuwedzera mihoro muna 2012. Vati pari zvino zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana zvebhajeti reZESA zvinoenda kumihoro uye vakatevedzera zvido zvevashandi zvinoreva kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu nezvina zvinenge zvave kuenda kumihoro uye ZESA haikwanisi kuita izvi. Paramende iri kuongorora kambani yeZESA nenyaya dzakawanda dzehuwori pamwe nekushandisa mari zvisina mwero izvo zvave kuita kuti vashandi vayo, nhengo dzeparamende pamwe neveruzhinji vagunun’une. Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemhando dzemoto yakatozivisa kuti ichakoka vakuru vakuru vehurumende pamwe nemakurukota ayo muongororo yavo yezviri kuitika mukambani iyi. No media source currently available
title: Kuratidzira kweVashandi veKambani yeZESA Holdings Kunombomiswa

text: Mamwe magweta munyika achishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights anoti ari kuzoenda kumatare vachinopikisa mutemo wakashandiswa nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe wekuti Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe riparure mari yemabond notes. VaMugabe vakashandisa masimba avo neMuvhuro kudzika mutemo wekuti mabond notes aya achitanga kushanda. Asi magweta anoti iri ibasa reparamende. No media source currently available Veruzhinji muHarare vanoti havasi kufara nehurongwa hwehurumende kweparura kushandiswa kwema bond notes mwedzi uno vachiti pane mukana wekuti vacharasikirwa nemari dzavo dzagara dziri mumabhanga. Asi vamwewo vanoti idanho rakanaka riri kutorwa nehurumende. Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vakaita saAmai Christine Chabikwa vanogara muWestgate muno muHarare vanoti havasi kufara ne hurongwa uhwu. Amai Chabikwa vanoti varikutyira kuti vangangoruza mari yavo iri mubhanga kana ma bond notes akatanga kushandiswa. Izvi zvatainhirwa naMuzvare Talent Mugoni avo vati vanogara kuDzivarasekwa. Amai Fildah Chiware vanogara muMabelreign vane chitoro chiri mudhorobha. Amai Chiware vati vanowona sekuti kushandiswa kuti kuda kuitwa mabond notes nehurumende kubirana kuri pachena. Asi mumwe mugari weku Ashdown Park, VaGarikai Govero vati vari kutambira ma bond notes aya vachiti zvakakosha kuti nyika ivewo nemari yainoti ndeyayo. Bhanga guru renyika reRBZ rinoti ma bond notes achatanga kushanda mwedzi uno mushure mekunge vashambadzira kuwunzwa kwawo kuitira kuti veruzhinji vanzwisise nezvawo. Gavhuna webhanga iri, VaJohn Mangudya vanoti mabond notes achaehandiswa senzira yekukurudzira kuti vanhu vatengese kunze kwenyika kana kuti export incentive. Varikupikisana nehurongwa uhwu vanoti hurumende iri kuedza kudzosa mari yemuZimbabwe nerweseri. No media source currently available
title: Nyaya yemaBond Notes Yokonzera Mutauro muNyika Magweta Achienda kuMatare

text: Mutauriri wedare reNational Assembly, Advocate Jacob Mudenda, vanoti makakatanwa nekukunyuta kuri kuita vanhu musarudzo dzekutsvaga vachamirira mapato ezvematongerwo enyika musarudzo anoburitsa pachena kuti veZimbabwe Electoral Commission (ZEC) vanofanira kuva nechekuita nesarudzo dzemapato aya kuti dzifambe zvakanaka. Vachitaura pamusangano wange wakarongwa neveElections Resource Centre (ERC) pamusoro pesarudzo dzegore rino, Advocate Mudenda vati ma primary elections ndiwo anoburitsa vanozokwikwidza musarudzo dzenyika uye kana akasafamba zvakanaka sarudzo hadzigoni kuitwa zvakajeka kana ma primary asina kuitwawo pajekerere. VaMudenda vatiwo masangano anotya kudyiwa musarudzo ndiwo anowanzochema-chema sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu rapinda mumusangano uyu, VaTrust Maanda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pfungwa yaVaMudenda yakanaka chose asi zvinonetsa kuti ZEC ikwanise kuitisa sarudzo dzemapato ese munyika nekuda kwekuwanda kwaakaita. VaMaanda vatiwo ZEC inofanira kuramba yakazvimirira kwete kupindira munyaya dzesarudzo dzemapato ematongerwo enyika. VaMaanda vati chiri kukonzera mutauro mumapato ezvematongerwo enyika inyaya yekuti haana mitemo yakajeka yekuita sarudzo dzawo. Mukuru weERC, VaTawanda Chimhini, vati vanobvumirana naVaMudenda kuti sarudzo dzemapato dzinofanira kuitwa zvakajeka kuti sarudzo dzenyika dziitwewo zvakanaka. VaChimhini vanoti sangano ravo rinoda chose kunge richiongorora sarudzo dzema primary emapato ezvematongerwo enyika asi hapana hwaro kana mutemo wekuti vaiite izvi vakachengetedzwa. VaChimhini vanoti mapato ezvematongerwo enyika haadi kuongororwa kuti anofambisa sei sarudzo dzawo dzeketsvaga vachaamirira. Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mumapato makuru munyika eZanu PF neMDC-T inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, umo mamuka mutauro nekuda kwenyaya yema primary. MuZanu PF vazhinji vakasara vatsamwa uye vari kugunun’una nemafambisirwe akaitwa sarudzo idzi vachti pakaitwa chizivano nechikiribidi. Nhengo dzeMDC-T dzinoti hazvina kujeka kuti sarudzo idzi dzichafamba sei. MDC-T inotarisirwa kuita sarudzo dzema primary mangwana Mugovera pamwe nemusi weSvondo. No media source currently available
title: VaJacob Mudenda Vanoti ZEC Ngaibatsire Mapato Anopikisa Kuita Sarudzo Dzavo

text: Nhumwa yeUnited Nations, Amai Alena Douhan, avo vanga vari munyika kwemazuva gumi adarika vachiongorora nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzevanhu uye kuti zvirango zvinonzi zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzekumavirira vakurudzira Zimbabwe kuti iite nhaurirano dzechokwadi nenyika dzakatemera zvirango nechinangwa chekuti zvirango izvi zvigobviswa. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamahofisi eUnited United emuno vachipendera rwendo rwavo rwemazuva gumi vari munyika umo mavanga vachiongorora nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzevanhu uye kuti zvirango zvakanganisa hupenyu hweveruzhinji zvakadii, Amai Douhan vati zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzekumavirira dzakaita seAmerica, Australia, Canada, neSwitzerland pamwe nesangano reEuropean Union, hazvisi pamutemo. Amai Douhan vati zvirango izvi hazvina kubvumirwa neUnited Nations Security Council. Vatiwo zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vanhu pamwe nemabhanga nemamwe makambani nehurumende yeAmerica ichishandisa mutemo weZidera hazviwirirane nezvinangwa zvemitemo yeInternational Monetary Fund, IMF, iyo inosimbaradza nyaya dzekudyidzana munyika dzakasiyana-siyana zvakazokonzera kuti vanhu vakawanda varasikirwe nemabasa munyika uye hupfumi hwenyika huwire pasi. Amai Douhan vati zvirango izvi zvakanganisa veruzhinji muZimbabwe mukuwana chikafu, hutano hwakanaka, dzidzo, mvura yokunwa yakachena nezvimwe. Vatiwo zvirango izvi zvakakonzera kuti veruzhinji vatadze kuwana chokufambisa sezvo makambani mazhinji arikutadza kutenga ma spare parts kubva kunyika dzakatemera Zimbabwe zvirango. Amai Douhan vati zvirango izvi zvinotyorawo kodzero dzeveruzhinji uye vatiwo zvirango izvi zviri kukonzera kuti vanhu vakawanda vatize munyika vachienda kunze kwenyika kunotsvaga mafuro manyoro. Asi Amai Douhan vakaurudzira kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe iite nhaurirano nenyika dzakaisa zvirango izvi kuitira kuti zvigobviswa vachiti Zimbabwe pamwe nenyika dzekunze dzakaisa zvirango izvi hadzifanire kushandisa nyaya dzezvirango kuti dzitsvage rutsigiro kususukidza zvinenge zvichidiwa kuti zviitwe neZimbabwe kana nyika dzakatemera zvirango izvi. Amai Douhan, avo vakurudzirawo kuti muZimbabwe mutevedzerwe mitemo pamwe nekuita nhaurirano dzechokwadi pakati pehurumende, mapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira mukugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika, vakurudzirawo America kuti isiyane nekushandisa mutemo weZidera vachiti haufambirane nechisungo chenyika dzepasi rose chinobata nyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu che International Covenent on Civil and Political Rights. Mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vati vane chivimbo chekuti nyika dzakaisa zvirango izvi dzichazvibvisa sezvo hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa yakatotanga nhaurirano nenyika idzi pasi pehurongwa hwekugadzirisa hukama hweZimbabwe nenyika dzekunze kana kuti international re-engagement. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaRashweat Mukundu, vati havaone nyika idzi dzichikurumidza kubvisa zvirango izvi vachiti hurumende inofanira kutanga yagadzirisa nyaya dzekutyorwa kuri kuitwa kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nehuori hwapfunya chisero munyika. Vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter, nhengo yekomiti inoona nezvinoitika kunze kwenyika mudare reSeneti muAmerica, VaJames Risch, vatiwo Zimbabwe iri kuswera ichiimbira mugaba kunze kwekuti igadzirise matambudziko akatarisa nenyika akafanana nekumisa nyaya dzehuori nekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu vakakuruidzira kuti Zimbabwe ivandudze nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nezvehupfumi. Amai Douhan vati vakasangana nevamasangano anoshanda akazvimirira vashomanana vachiti mamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira akaramba kusangana navo. Asi mutauriri wemubatanidzwa wemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vati havaoni nyika dzakatemera vakuru vakuru muZimbabwe zvirango dzichitambira gwaro raAmai Douhan. Amai Douhan vakurudzira mamwe masangano avasina kukwanisa kuona pamwe neveruzhinji kuti vavatumire miono yavo vachinge vadzokera vachiti vachine nguva yakawanda yekunyora gwaro ravo rizere iro ravachasvitsa kumusangano weUnited Nations Human Rights Council uchaitwa muna Gunyana wegore rinouya. No media source currently available
title: Amai Douhan Vanoti Zvirango Hazvisi Pamutemo

text: Vamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi vari kupomera hurumende mhosva yekutadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi zvapa kuti makambani akawanda akaita seNRZ, Air Zimbabwe nemamwe atatarike. Gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJoel Biggie Matiza, vakaudza nhengo dzedare reparamende kuti hurumende iri kuda kutora chikwereti cheAir Zimbabwe chinosvika mamiriyoni mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nemanomwe, kana kuti $377 million. Muongorori wezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano rePersycon Financial Advisors, VaPersistence Gwanyanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti makambani ese ehurumende anofanira kutengeswa nekuti hurumende haifanirwi kuita zvemabhizimisi. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoronga Kutora Chikwereti cheAir Zimbabwe

text: Nyanzvi dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nenyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti kusaremekedzwa kwemitemo, huori uye kutadza kufambiswa kwemari dzenyika nemazvo, zvimwe zvezvinhu zviri kukonzera kuti Zimbabwe ipinde parumananzombe pairi. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vari mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu kuchamhembe kweAfrica, reHuman Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti chikonzero chikuru chiri kukonzera matambudziko ari munyika kusaremekedzwa kwemitemo yenyika, zvikuru nehurumende. VaMavhinga vanotiwo pasvika zvinhu muZimbabwe, pave kuda kuti masangano akaita seUnited Nations achipindira muZimbabwe nekuti hurumende iripo haisi kuremekedza mitemo yenyika. Mumwe muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika, Va Rejoice Ngwenya, vachitaura vakazvimirira, vanoti hutongi huripo hune hudzvinyiriri nehuori izvo zvinopa kuti nyika iende kumawere. VaNgwenya vanotiwo hutungamiri huripo hwatadza kuzadzisa zvahwakavimbisa kuti huchaitira veruzhinji. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, uye vachishanda nesangano re Percycon Financial Services, Va Persistance Gwanyanya, vanoti hurumende ine huori uye haibati mari dzenyika zvakanaka. Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanotiwo sangano reSouthern African Development Community neAfrican Union anofanirwa kupindira muZimbabwe kuitira kuti abatsirewo kugadzirisa matambudziko ari munyika. Mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vanotiwo zviri kuitika munyika zvave kuda kuti vekunze vapindire sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichiipa muZimbabwe. Ukuwo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti nyika dzekunze, zvikuru dzekumavirira zuva, ndidzo dziri kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muZimbabwe zvichitevera mhirizhonga yakaitika mwedzi wapera iyo yakasiya vanhu gumi nevashanu vafa mushure mekupfurwa nepfuti. Sangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti vanhu vanodarika makumi manomwe vakarapwa maronda akakonzerwa nemabara epfuti. VaMnangagwa vanoti vakaisa mauto mumigwagwa kuitira kuti achengetedze runyararo. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzinoti Huori, Kutyora Kodzero Zvimwe Zvauraya Zimbabwe

text: Vamwe vabereki vanoti havasi kufara kuti zvimwe zvikoro zvakakwidza mari dzevana dzechikoro zvave kupa kuti vana vavo vadzingwe panguva iyo vadzidzisi vaswera vachitamba bhora pamahofisi egurukota rezvemari vachiti vanoda kuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro. Mumwe wevabereki ava, Amai Irene Muzondo vekuArcturus, vaudza Studio7 kuti havasi kufara nekukwidzwa kwakaitwa mari yechikoro panguva iyo hurumende yakati zvikoro zvinofanira kutanga zvakumbira mvumo yekukwidza mari dzechikoro kwairi. Mumwe mubereki ane mwana anodzidza kuArcturus zvakare, Amai Margaret Muronzi, vanoti vana vavo vari kudzingwa kuzvikoro nepamusana pekukwidzwa kwemari dzechikoro idzi panguva iyo zvakare vadzidzisi vari kuramwa mabasa. Amai Tecla Bhomba avo vanogara kuChitungwiza vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti ikurumidze kugadzirisa gakava riri pakati payo nevadzidzisi sezvo vachiti vana vari kunyora bvunzo gore rino ndivo vari kunyanyorasikirwa nenguva yekudzidza. Kunyange hazvo vabereki vari kugunun’una nemamiriro akaita zvinhu muzvikoro, nhengo dzesangano rinomirira vadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti ARTUZ, dzaswera dzichitamba bhora netsoro pamahofisi egurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube. Munyori mukuru muARTUZ, VaRobson Chere, vati vacharamba vari pamahofisi aVaNcube kudzamara bazi remari ranzwa zvichemo zvavo. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vati VaNcube vave kufanira kusiya basa sezvo vatadza kugadzirisa nhuna dzavo sevarairidzi pamwe nevashandi vose vehurumende. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaNcube pamwe nemunyori mubazi rezvemari, VaGeorge Guvamatanga ,sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzanga dzisiri kupinda. Kunyange hazvo vashandi vehurumende, avo vanosanganirawo vana chiremba vari kuramwa mabasa vachiti vanoda kubhadharwa nemari yekunze, hurumende inoti homwe yayo yakabooka. Zvichakadai, masangano anomirira vashandi vehurumende akatarisirwa kuita musangano nehurumende mangwana kuti vazeye nyaya dzemari yemihoro pasi peNational Joint Negotiating Council, NJNC kunyange hazvo masangano akaita seARTUZ neProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe akazivisa kuti haasi kuzopinda musangano uyu achiti boka reNJNC harisi pamutemo. No media source currently available
title: Vabereki Vakawanda Vochema neMari Dzechikoro Dzavanoti Dzakawandisa

text: Mapurisa anonzi arambidza bato reCitizens Coalition for Change kuenderera mberi nemusangano waro wekutsvaga rutsigiro kuEpworth mangwana panguva iyo dare redzimhosva raturawo mutongo wekuti mapurisa asavhiringidze musangano webato iri wanga uchiitirwa mumusha weTafara nhasi. Mapurisa anonzi anyorera bato reCCC nhasi achiramba kuti musangano wanga uchida kuitwa kuEpworth mangwana nemutungamiri webato iri VaNelson Chamisa nevatsigiri vavo wekutsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzema by-election dziri kuitwa neMugovera. Tsamba yanyorwa nemapurisa iyi inouyawo panguva iyo mutongi wedare ramejasitiri, VaLanzini Ncube, vatura mutongo nhasi wekuti mapurisa asavhiringidze musangano webatoro reCCC kuTafara uyo wanga warambidzwa zvakare nemapurisa. Tsamba yemapurisa yekurambidza musangano wekuEpworth iyo iri mumaoko eStudio 7 yanyorwa naChief Superintendent C. Muzivi inoti mapurisa mazhinji anoendeswa kunzvimbo dzichazovhoterwa neMugovera saka hapana mapurisa anozokwanisa kuchengetedza runyararo pamusangano weCCC uyu. Mutauriri weCCC, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere, bato ravo rinofanira kupihwa mukana wekutsvaga rutsigiro sezviri kungoitwawo bato reZanu PF iro rapeta misangano yaro yekutsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo idzi nhasi vachiti zvekuvarambidza kuita misangano izvi zvinoita kuti sarudzo dzisafambe zvakanaka. Muzvare Mahere vati bato ravo rave mubishi kutora matanho pamusoro pekurambidzwa kwaraitwa kuita musangano wekuEpworth uyu. VaChamisa vakamborambidzwa nemapurisa kuita misangano nevatsigiri vavo kuMarondera, Gokwe, Binga, neMasvingo asi misangano iyi yakazoenderera kuBinga neMasvingo chete mushure mekunge bato reCCC raenda kumatare. Muzvare Mahere vatiwo havasi kufara nedanho ratorwa nekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission rekubvumidza munhu mumwechete chete panenge pachivhoterwa anenge akamirira munhu anenge achikwikwidza musarudzo dzema by-election neMugovera. ZEC yazivisa kuti kunyange pachibvumirwa kuti vari kuvhoterwa vave nevamiriri vanokwana vatatu, munhu mumwe chete ndiye chete anobvumira panenge pachivhoterwa panguva imwechete. Muzvare Mahere vati danho ratorwa neZEC iri hariwirirane nezviri mubumbiro remitemo uye vati pane zvakawanda zvinofanira kuvandudzwa zvinobata nyaya dzesarudzo. Zvisinei nekunyunyuta kuri kuitwa neCCC, mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vati bato ravo ragadzirira zvakakwana kupinda musarudzo dzemusi weMugovera. VaMugwadi vatiwo bato ravo harinei nemafambisirwo anoitwa basa neZEC vachiti chavo kutaura neveruzhinji kuti vagovavhotera neMugovera. Vatiwo nyaya yekuti mapepa ekuvhotera haana ruvara rwunozivikanwa nevatsigiri haisi nyaya ine chekuita navo sebato vachiti ZEC isangano rinoshanda rakazvimirira. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri weZEC, VaJasper Mangwana, avo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi komisheni padandemutande rayo reTwitter kuti mutemo hausungire komisheni yavo kushandisa ruvara rwunenge rwuchishandiswa nevanenge vachikwikwidza uye komisheni iyi yatiwo vachange vachimirira vari kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi kana kuti ma polling agent vanosungirwa kusvitsa nhuna dzavo kumukuru anenge achitungamira nyaya dzekuvhota panzvimbo dzinenge dzchivhoterwa uye kuti vaite zvinhu zvisingazoite kuti panenge pavhoterwa nemunhu musi wekuvhota uyu pasazivikanwe.
title: Mapurisa Oenderera Mberi Nekurambidza VaChamisa Kuita Misangano

text: Bato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, rinoti riri kushora zvikuru danho rakatorwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, rekupa chipo chemombe dzinotsika mazana matatu kusangano re African Union. Bato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, rinoti riri kushora zvikuru danho rakatorwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, rekupa chipo chemombe dzinotsika mazana matatu kusangano re African Union. MDC-T inoti izvi zvinoshamisa kuti VaMugabe vanoita zvakadai, panguva iyo nyika iri kukangwa nenzara inotysa. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti zvaitwa naVaMugabe hazvina kusiyana nababa vemusha vanosiya imba yavo ichitsva vachimhanyira kunodzima moto uri kupisa imba yemuvakidzani wavo. Pakusiya kwavo husachigaro hwesangano re African Union, VaMugabe vakashoropodza tsika yenyika dzemuAfrica yekutarisira zvipo nerubatsiro kubva kunyika dzekunze, vakavimbisa kuti vaizopa mombe senzira yekukurudzira nyika dzemuAfrica kuti dzisangovimba nerubatsiro rwekumawirira chete. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti mombe idzi dzakasvitswa kusangano iri kuburikidza nemutevedzeri wasachigaro we African Union Commission, VaErastus Mwencha, avo vakasvika munyika neChina kuzotambira chipo ichi. Mombe idzi dzinonzi dzakabviswa nevanhuwo zvavo vaida kubatsira. Kusvika pari zvino nyika inonzi yarasikirwa nezviuru zvemombe kubva kunzara yakabata nyika. No media source currently available
title: MDC-T Yoshora Danho raVaMugabe Vopa AU Chipo cheMombe Mazana Matatu

text: Apo bato reZanu PF rave kupeta sarudzo dzekutsvaga vacharimirira pasarudzo dzegore rino, mamwe mapato anopikisa ashora bato iri nekushandisa mari dzehurumende, mapurisa nezvikoro pasarudzo dzaro dzema primary. Sarudzo dzemuZanu PF dzange dziri kuritirwa muzvikoro, nzvimbo dzakaita semakambani ehurumende akaita seDistrict Development Fund nedzimwe uye mapurisa ndiwo ange achivhotesa kana kutakura mapepa ekuvhotesa pamwe nekuachengetedza. Vezvimwe zvikoro nemakanzuru varamba kuti tivadome mazita avo sezvo vachitya kuzoshungurudzwa vati bato iri harina kubhadhara kushandisa zvikoro zvavo uye rinozivikanwa nekusabhadhara. Zvakaitwa neZanu PF izvi hazvina kufadza vemapato anopikisa pamwe namasangano anoshanda akazvimirira avo vanoti zviri kuitwa neZanu PF zviri kunze kwemutemo. Munyori anoona nezvesarudzo muMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaMurisi Zwizwai, vaudza Studio7 kuti zviri kuitwa neZanu PF izvi hazvina kunaka zvachose. Vashorawo kushandiswa kwemapurisa nebato iri uye vati izvi zvinoratidza pachena zvavagara vachitaura kuti mapurisa anoita zvematongerwo enyika nekushandira Zanu PF. Vatiwo nyaya yekushandisa mapurisa ane zvombo mumaprimary inyaya yekutyityidzira vanhu uye izvi zvichaitwa zvekare musarudzo dzenyika yese. Mutauriri weMDC inotugamirirurwa naVaWelsham Ncube, VaKuraoune Chihwayi, vashorawo Zanu PF nekushandisa mapurisa. VaItai Munyoro vebato reNational People’s Party vatiwo nezviri kuitika havawoni nyika ichiita sarudzo dzakachena. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri webato reZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi vanoona nezvekurongwa kwemusangano mubato iri mudunhu reHarare, VaDouglas Mahiya, vati hapana chakapa kuti vashandise zvikoro panopinda vana vavo. Vatiwo mapurisa anoshandira bato riri kutonga kwete mapato anopikisa. Mukuru wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaJoey Mabhenge, vaudza Studio7 kuti izvi zvinoratidza pachena kuti sarudzo dzichange dzisina kuchena. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, Muzvare Gladys Hltashwayo, vati hapana chinoshamisa pane zviri kuitwa nemapurisa vachiti ndozvavanogaro chema kuti mapurisa nemasoja anoita zvematongerwo enyika achishandiswa neZanu PF. Vati iri ndiro dambudziko guru rakatarisana nenyika apo yave kupinda musarudzo dzakakosha. Zvichakadai, sarudzo dzema primary munzvimbo zhinji munyika dzapera uye zvakabudamo zvinotarisirwa kuzviswa zviri pamutemo mangwana nemukuru anoona nezvekurongwa kwemusangano mubato iri, VaEngelbert Rugeje. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Voshora Zanu PF Zvichitevera Kushandisa Zvinhu zveHurumende Musarudzo Dzayo

text: Zvinonzi pakave nekukandirana makobvu nematete pakati penhengo dzebato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai nenhengo dzeMDC Renewal Team neMugovera mudunhu reBuhera West mushure mekunge veMDC T vapomera veMDC Renewal Team mhosva yekunyomba mutungamiri wavo VaTsvangirai. Izvi zvinonzi zvakaitika pakuvigwa kwaAmai veimwe nhengo yeMDC Renewal Team, VaToendepi Shonhe. Zvinonzi nyaya yakatangira pakasimuka mumwe mukuru muRenewal Team, VaElton Mangoma, vachitaura vakamirira bato ravo, avo vanonzi vakapomera VaTsvangirai mhosva yekushanda nebato reZanu PF. Izvi zvinonzi hazvina kutambirwa zvakanaka nevamwe vaive parufu urwu vachitsigira bato raVaTsvangirai izvo zvakazoita kuti imwe nhengo uye vari kanzura muBuhera makare, VaPaul Makuvise, vasimuke vachimisa VaMangoma kutaura. Bato reMDC T rinogaronyunyuta kuti veMDC Renewal Team vanongotuka VaTsvangirai kana nepasina kukodzera sezvinonzi ndivo vari kutonga nyika. Mashoko anombotaurwawo neMDC Renewal kuti vatsigiri vaVaTsvangirai vanovashorawo zvisina kukodzera. VaMakuvise vanoti senhengo dzeMDC T havasi kuzorega vanhu vachiita madiro aJojina vachituka mutungamiri wavo, zvikuru vari kudunhu rakaberekerwa VaTsvangirai reBuhera. Asi munyori anoona nezvekurongwa kwemisangano muMDC Renewal Team mudunhu reManicaland, VaPishai Muchauraya, vanoramba kuti kune zvakadaro zvakaitika. VaMuchauraya vanoti rufu urwu rwaive mumaoko evanhu vebato ravo saka hapana mukana waivepo kuti nhengo dzeMDC T dzivaudze zvekuita. No media source currently available No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeMDC T neMDC Renewal Team Dzinotosvorana paRufu

text: Mutungamiririri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakasvika munyika yeQatar mangwanani eMuvhuro kurwendo rwemazuva matatu rwavakakokwa ne mutungamiriri we nyika iyi Sheik Tamin bin Hamad Al Thani. VaMnangagwa vatambirwa nemunyarikani wemhuri yekwa Tani vachibva vatonanga kumusangano wavo wekutanga nemukuru wenyika. Musangano uyu wakapindirwa kumuzinda weRitz Carlton kumahofisi a Shaik Tamin bin Hamad Al Thani. VaMnangagwa vakaperekedzwa nemakurukota anosanganisira Rtd Air Marshal Perrance Shiri, VaPatrick Chinamasa, VaMike Bimha, VaWinston Chitando na gavhuna we bhanga renyika, Doctor John Mangudya. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvriri muQatar zvinonzi zviri kusangana nemutungamiri wenyika nemakurukota ariko mangwana kuti zvinzwewo mharidzo yavo yekuti vemabhizinesi vakasununguka kupinda munyika yeZimbabwe kana kuti “Zimbabwe is Open for Business”. Kuchapindwawo mimwe misangano yakasiyana siyana nevemabhizinesi veku Qatar mumazuva maviri anotevera. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara kuQatar zvinotiwo zvakamirira kuona zvichabuda mumisangano iyi. Nyika yeQatar imwe yenyika dzinozivikanwa pasi rese nenyaya dzehupfumi hunobva mukutengesa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemari VaTerrence Mukupe vanoti chakakosha ndechekuti VaMnangagwa havana kukumbira musangano nenyika iyi asi kutoti vakakokwa kuti vazoita hurukuro idzi.  No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiririri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa Voshanya KuQatar kuMisangano yeMazuva Matatu

text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato reMDC-T VaElias Mudzuri vari kuramba mashoko ekuti mutungamiri webato iri VaMorgan Tsvangirai vane hurongwa hwekusiya chigaro mukati memazuva mashoma anotevera. VaMudzuri varambawo mashoko ainge ambotaurwa nemutauriri waVaTsvangirai VaLuke Tamborinyoka ekuti VaTsvangirai vainge vabuda munyika neChishanu vachienda kuSouth Africa kunorapwa vachiti vakabuda munyika neChipiri manheru. Mashoko ekuti VaTsvangirai vainge voronga kusiya basa anotevera mashoko avo kuvatori venhau ekuti kudoma kwavakaita VaMudzuri naVaNelson Chamisa kuti vabatsirane nemumwe mutevedzeri wavo Muzvare Thokozani Khupe kwainge kwakanangana nekuti vainge vachiona zvemberi uye kuti ushe madzoro. VaTsvangirai vakazivisa kare kuti vari kurwara nechirwere chegomarara uye vari kupota vachienda kunorapwa kuSouth Africa. No media source currently available
title: VaMudzuri Voramba Kuti VaTsvangirai Vari Kuda Kusiya Chigaro cheKutungamira MDC

text: Vatsigiri veZanu PF mudunhu reMasvingo vayambira VaFrancis Nhando, avo vanoona nezvegwara resangano revarwiri verusununguko reZINLWVA, kuti vabude mudunhu reMasvingo, kukundikana kwavo vanozorasikirwa nehupenyu hwavo. Izvi zvinotevera kuverenga kwavanonzi vakaita gwaro resangano ravo iro raiudza mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe kuti vachibva pachigaro nekuti vakonewa kutonga nyika.  VaNhando, avo vanogara kuChiredzi, vari panguva yakaoma zvichitevera musanagano wakaitwa nenhengo dzeZanu PF munzvimbo iyi mukupera kwesvondo dzichiti idzo hadzichadi kuvaona mudunhu rino uye vanoda kuvatorera zvose zvavakawana kuburikidza neZanu PF, kusanganisira munda wenzimbe. Nhengo yeparamende yeZanu PF kuChiredzi West, VaDarlington Chiwa, vakaudza musangano uyu kuti munhu wese anoti haachadi kutsigira VaMugabe anenge aramba kurarama panyika. "Zvakataurwa naVaNhando isu kwatiri its a non-starter. Munhu ukati hauchadi Mugabe hauchadi upenyu. Vanhu vakati havachamudi vanosara vasina kana chinhu. "Munhu ari kupuwa penjeni vamwe vasingatoiwani vakanyatsorwa hondo. Tiri kuti kana munhu akati haachadi VaMugabe adeclare hondo kana tikasangana naye mu street tisingagoni kunonga dombo totoita wekuruma," VaChiwa vakadaro. Mumwe mutsigiri asina kuda kutaura zita rake akatiwo musangano wavo hauchadi kuona VaNhando muMasvingo. "Cde Nhando vapanduka vajoina the likes of vanaMutsvangwa. Saka isu sevanhu vemuno hatikwanisi kuremekedza mu war vet anotuka mutungamiriri wenyika. "Sevanhu veMasvingo pamusangano uno tiri kuti Nhando hatichadi kumuona muno mupanduki." VaLloyd Simango wemuWard Five muChiredzi vakati ivo vechidiki veZanu PF vakawirirana kuti munhu wese asingasadi kutsigira VaMugabe anotorerwa zvose zvaakawana kumusangano wavo. "Tiri kuda kuita state of emergence yekuti munhu wese anoita against the president tinotora zvinhu zvose zvaakawana kumusungano, mangwana tiri kundotora munda waNhando," VaSimango vakadarowo. Sachigaro weZanu PF muMasvingo, VaAmasi Nenjana, vakati ivo havachadi kusevenza naVaNhando. "Isu hatisevenzi naye. Kwaari izvezvi ari kutotya nezvaakataura tinozviva hazvisi zvitsva," VaNenjani vakadaro. Izvi zvinotevera kushata kuri kuramba kuchiti hukama hwemusangano weZanu PF nevarwi verusununguko avo vakati havachatsigiri VaMugabe, avo vavakati vasiye chigaro nekuti vakawondonga nyika. Asi VaNhando vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakanzwa zvose zvakataurwa pamusangano uyu uye havasi kutyira hupenyu hwavo nezvakaturwa nevatsigiri veZanu. Vati vakazvipira kufa uye havatozivi kuti vakararama sei panguva yehondo yavairwira kusunungura nyika. Vati ivo zvavakataura kuti havachatsigiri VaMugabe pasarudzo dza 2018 hazvishanduki. No media source currently available
title: VeZanu PF kuMasvingo Vodzinga muDunhu iri Nhengo yeSangano reVakarwa Hondo

text: Kuramwa mabasa kwavana mukoti vanoshanda muzvipatara zvehurumende kuri kuenderera mberi zvisinei nekutyiotyidzwa kwavakaitwa negurukota rezveutano, VaDavid Parirenyatwa, vachiti vashandi vemuzvipatara ava vadzokere kumabasa panguva iyo nyaya dzavo dzinenge dzichigadziriswa. Pashanyirwa chipatara chikuru cheParirenyatwa, Studio 7 yawona kutambura kuri kuita veruzhinji sezvo vasiri kurapwa. Varwere vazhinji vanga vachinzi vadzokere kudzimba dzavo zvisinei nekurwara kwavo uye vamwe vachiudzwa kuti vanotsvaga rubatsiro kuzvipatara zvisiri zvehurumende. Mu Ward A1 iyo inoshandiswa nevarwere vakamirira kupiwa mibhedha, yanga yakavharwa. Srudio 7 yaona varwere vanga vachiratidza kuti vachiri kudzimbikana nemuviri vachiburitswa muchipatara ichi sezvo kusina vanamukoti. Mumwe wevadzoserwa kumba ndiSekuru Wilson Mazhambe avo vanogara kwaMutoko. VaMazhambe vati vari kushungurudzika zvikuru nekuti pavakambouya kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa vakawana vana chiremba vachiramwa mabasa vakasarapwa, rwendo vawana vanamukoti vasingashandi. Sekuru Mazhambe, avo vange vatove kuda kubudisa misodzi vaudza Studio7 kuti havana mari yekuenda kuzvipatara zvisiri zvehurumende. Vati kunange hazvo vari kurwadziwa zvakanyanya, vange vave kudzokera kumba kwaMutoko.
