VaMazhambe vachema chema kuhurumende kuti dai yapa vashandi vezveutano mari vadzokera kumabasa Mumwe murwere ada kuzivikanwa nezaita rekuti Amai Matilda vashora zvikuru hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa nekuramwa ramwa mabasa kwevashandi vehurumende. Amai Matilda vati vanoshamiswa kuti hurumemde yaVaMnangagwa iri kuitira zvakanaka vari mumajeri asi ichitadza kuchengetedza varwere. VaMoses Murenya, avo vadzoserwawo kumba, vati vanoshamiswa kuti kunyange hazvo nyika yakatarisana nesarudzo, hurumende iri kuratidza kuti haina basa neveruzhinji. VaMurenya vati vanorwadziwa zvikuru kuti vauye kuchipatara chehurumende vonzi vanotariswa kune zvimwe zvipatara ivo vasina mari. Mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Medical Association, VaShingi Bopoto, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kuzvipatara zvehurumende vakati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende ikurumidze kugadzirisa dambudziko iri kuti hupenyu hwevanhu husaramba huchirasika. VaBopoto vakurudzirawo Sangano reHealth Services Board kuti richengetedze utano hweveruzhinji nekugadzirisa zvinyunyuto zvevashandi vehutano pasati paramwiwa mabasa. No media source currently available
title: Varwere Voudzwa Kudzokera Kumba neVakuru veChipatara cheParirenyatwa

text: Bazi re Urban Development Corporation (UDCORP) riri kukurudzira kanzuru yeguta reMutare kuti iregedze kuramba ichibhadharisa vagari vemumusha wevazhinji we Gimboki South, mari yemitero yezvinhu zvaisiri kupa vagari ava. UDCORP iri pasi pebazi rehurumende rezvekutongwa kwematunhu. Vagari venzvimbo iyi havana mvura yakachena, masiwegi uye havatakurirwe marara. Mukuru we UDCORP VaBright Mudzvova vati vachakumbira kanzuru kuti irege tsika yekubhadharisa vagari zvinhu zvaisiri kuvapa. “Ticharequesta kuti kana paine macharges avenge vachiti imimi mubvise tichataura navo kuti vaite write off izvozvo nekuti we know kuti kuno hapana maservices amange muchiwana saka we are going to tell them that is in writing kuti vaite write off for now kudzimara vave kuita maservices acho.” VaMudzvova vakataura mashoko aya pamusangano wavakaita nevagari venharaunda iyi apo vainyunyuta nezvemaitiro ekanzuru. Vakatiwo UdCorp ichabatsira vagari ava kuti vawane mvura nezvimwe zvose zvinodiwa. “Mutare city council ichaita write off nekuti takatombovaruma nzeve nezvazvo. Panezvivakwa zvandiri kutaura nezvazvo tichaita macostings ekuti tizive kuti kugadzira maroads zvichaita mari yakati, sewerage mari yakati, mvura mari yakati saka tichaita flight maadverts ematenders acho then will let you know through mavarious media ari kuno.” Asi meya weguta reMutare kanzura Tatenda Nhamarare vanoti havasati vaziviswa nezvenyaya yekuti vabvise kana kurasa chikwereti chevagari vekuGimboki South. Asi vabvuma kuti kanzuru yavo yange isiri kupa vanhu zvavange vachibhadharira mari. VaNhamarare vanoti zvakare kanzuru yavo yaitarisira kuti vagari ava kana vachinge vachibvisa mari kukanzuru ndizvo zvaizoita kuti vagadzirise musha wavo. Bazi reUDCORP range richitarisirwa kuti rishandewo nemushandirapamwe uyu kuti rigadzirise zviri kunetsa mumusha uyu zvakafanana nenyaya dzehuori dzange dzoitwa nevamwe vakuru veGimbok. VaIsau Mupfumi ndivo mumiriri weDangamvura-Chikanga mudare reparamende iyo inosanganisira nzvimbo yeGimboki. VaMupfumi vanoti zvaivashungurudza kwazvo kuti kanzuru yeguta reMutare yaiteresa vagari zvinhu zvaisiri kuita. “Vanounza mapepa kwamuri ekuti bhadhari mvura, padharai masewer asipo, bhauza rouyisa mvura kuvanhu ivavo vovharazve kwandinoichera vachiti ndinoitengesa, hatidi huwori hwakadaro kukakanzuru, tinoda zvinhu zvinobatsira vanhu remangwana.” Muzvare Eunice Sibanda mugari wekuGimboki South kuno kwaMutare uyo ari kufara nedanho ratorwa neUDCORP. “Aaah UDCORP zvayaita tiri kufara nazvo uye tinovimba kuti haiiti zvechitsotsi sezvakaitwa nevakuru vemushandirapamwe. Asi vakaita zvechitsotsi zvinenge zvatoshata nekuti tinotarisira kuti vabatsiri.” VaBenard Mwanyisa vanofarawo nehurongwa hwekuraswa kwechikwereti chainzi vanacho kukanzuru asi vachiri kuchema nenyaya yavo yekuda kuziva kuti mari yavaibvisa kumushandirapamwe nevamwe ichaitwa seyi sezvo bazi reUdCorp ratora mabasa aiitwa nemushandirapamwe uyu. “Ini ndave nechichemo chimwe chekuti ndizive kuti imwe mari yandaibvisa kare kuprivate company yemushandirapamwe ichaitwa sei sezvo veUdCorp vatora mabasa ose manje. Zvinoreva here kuti yatonyura iyi mari here?” Vakuru veUDCORP, bazi rehurumende rezvematunhu vanoti vagari vanemari dziri mumabhanga emushandirapamwe wakamiswa mabasa vasashushikane sezvo mari yakasara mubhanga yakachengetedzeka, uye yave mumaoko mavo. UdCorp ichange ichishanda nevekanzuru yeguta reMutare, rePhysical Planning mukupedzisa basa rekugadzirisa musha weGimboki South.
title: Kanzuru yeMutare Yokurudzirwa Kusabhadharisa Vagari Mari Isina Zvairi Kuvaitira

text: Mwanakomana wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, Emmerson Mnangagwa Junior aramba mashoko ekuti akakwereta mari kubhanga reCommercial Bank of Zimbabwe akakundikana kudzosera mari yacho. Pane gwaro rine mazita evanhu makumi maviri nevatanhatu vanova vakuru vakuru munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vari kunzi vakakwereta mari yavari kukungikana kudzosera kusanganisa Amai Grace Mugabe mudzimai wevaive mutungamiri wenyika. Hatina kukwanisa kubata Amai Mugabe avo vari kuSingapore kuri kurapwa murume wavo kutanga muna Kubvumbi. Mumashoko kuStudio 7 padandemutande reWhatsApp, Emmerson Junior ati pane vanhu vari kuda kumusvibisa vachinyora manyepo. Ati iye haana kumbobvira adyidzana nebhanga reCBZ. Aenderera mberi achiti nenyaya yekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu. Vamwe vezvematongerwo enyika vari kungoda kumusvibisa kuitira kuti vanhu vapandukire mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Vamwe vanonzi vapihwa mari vanosanganisira mudzimai wevaive mutungamiri wenyika Amai Grace Mugabe, mwanakomana wemutungamiri wenyika Emmerson Mnangagwa Junior. Hatisati takwanisa kubata vaviri ava sezvo nharembozha dzavo kana magweta anombovamirira dzange dzisiri kudairwa. Asi vamwe vanonzi vakakwereta mari igurukota rezvedzidzo Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima avo vati vari kubhadhara chikwereti chavo sezvo vakaita chubvumirano chekubhadhara nebhanga iri. VaMavima vanonzi vakatora mari inosvika chuuru zana nemakumi maviri yavati havo handiyo chaiyo sezvo vakatora shoma. VaMavima varamba kuti vakashandisa nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kuti vawane chikwereti ichi vachiti vane zvibatiso zvavakapa bhanga. Nhengo yedare reparamende inomirira Zengeza West mudare reparamende vari mutevedzeri wasachigaro webato iri VaJob Sikhala vanoti havana chikwereti sezvo bhanga iri rakatengesa zvivakwa zvavainge vavaka kuChitungwiza zvakazotengeswa nebhanga iri. VaSikhala vanonzi vane chikwereti chemari inozvika zviuru zana. Munyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muZanu-PF uye vaimbova gurukota rehurumende VaObert Mpofu vanonzi vapihwa chikwereti chemari inosvika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu vati vakakwereta mari yakawanda kudarika apa asi vakadzosera nekudaro havaone chikonzero chekuti vasvibiswe zita ravo. Doctor Mpofu vatiwo kukwereta mari kumabhanga kunoratidza kuti havaite zvehuori. Amai Edna Madzongwe avo vaimbova mutungamiri wedare reSenate varamba kuti vane chikwereti kuCBZ. Vaimbova chipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika VaChris Mutsvangwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti havana kutora chikwereti asi kuti bhondi kuZIMRA rezvinhu zvavainge vatenga kunze. Vati zvimwe zvezvinhu zvacho zvakazotorwa sechibatiso. Mari inonzi VaMutsvangwa havana kubhadhara neCBZ inosvika zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata vakuru veCBZ zvekare nhasi kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi gweta riri kunzi ritevere zvikwereti izvi VaTendai Biti vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vainge vapihwa basa asi vakati hadzisi nyaya dzavanotaura nevatori venhau sezvo vasingakwanise kufukura hapwa. No media source currently available
title: Emmerson Mnangagwa Junior Anoti Haana Chikwereti kuCBZ

text: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, votarisirwa kutaura nhasi manheru mudare re Congress pamusoro pemashandiro ehurumende yavo pamwe nehurongwa hwayo hwekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika zvichitevera kusvitsa kwayaita mazuva zana kubva musi wagadzwa vabiden semutungamiri weamerica musi wa Ndira 20, 2021. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, Doctor Moses Rumano, vanoti vakatarisira kuti VaBiden vachataurawo pamusoro pemabatiro avaita chirwere cheCovid-19 mu America uye vachitsinhira kukosha kwakaita kuvandudzwa hwehupfumi hwenyika yavo pamwe nehukama hweAmerica nedzimwe nyika. "Takatarisira kuti tinzwe zvizere pamusoro pemabasa abatwa naVaBiden panyaya yekurwisa denda reCovid-19 parizvino, hwaro hwavo munyaya dzezvehupfumi, nyaya yekudyidzana kwenyika yavo nedzimwe nyika, nyaya yekuremekedza zvimwe zvibvumirano zvanga zvaraswa nevaimbove mutungamiri VaDonald Trump nezvimwewo zvavakaita kubvira vatora matomhu kutanga kwegore," vadaro Doctor Rumano. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, Vakataura Pamusoro peHwaro hweHurumende Yavo Manheru eChitatu Mudare reCongress

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemusi weChitatu vakati havasi kuzosiya masimba kunyange zvodii. VaMugabe vakataura mashoko aya pamberi pevatsigiri vavo avo vakaratidzira muHarare vachiti vari kuratidza rutsigiro rwakasimba kumutungamiri webato ravo. Vachitaura pagungano iri, VaMugabe vakati havasi kuzobva pachigaro kunyange hazvo mapato anopikisa nevamwe vekunze vachiti havasi kufadzwa nehutongo hwavo. Vakaenderera mberi vachishora kusawirirana kuri muZanu PF vachiti vari kuita zvezvipoka-zvipoka vanhu vari kuronga zvekupidigura hurumende. MuZanu-PF munonzi mune zvipoka zviviri zvirikurwira kuda kutora matomu kubva kunaVaMugabe kana vachinge vabva pachigaro. Chimwe chezvipoka ichi, icho chiri kuzvidaidza kuti Generation 40 kana kuti G40, chinonzi chiri kutungamirwa nemudzimai waivo VaMugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe, avo vaudza chita chevanhu varatidzira ava kuti VaMugabe hapana anokwanisa kuvatsiva. ​Chimwe chipoka chechipiri, icho chiri kuzvidaidza kuti Team Lacoste, chinonzi chiri kutungamirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mngangagwa. Vaviri ava vanoramba havo kuti vane zvikwata zvavanotungamira. Munyori muboka revechidiki reZanu PF, VaKudzai Chipanga, vakaudza VaMugabe kuti havasi kufara nemashandiro ari kuita mamwe makurukota ehurumende avati ari kuswera achidya mari dzehurumende pazvinhu zvisina maturo uye kutenga motokari dzinodhura vechidiki vasina mabasa. VaChipanga vakakumbirawo VaMugabe kuti vechidiki vawaniswe minda pamwe nedzimba izvo zvazovimbiswa naVaMugabe. Panyaya yemabasa, VaMugabe vakati vechidiki vanofanira kuzvigadzirira mabasa vega kunyange hazvo ivo VaMugabe vakavimbisa mbune pavaitsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2013 kuti hurumende yavo ichaita kuti munyika muumbwe mabasa anosvika mamiriyoni maviri. VaMugabe vakakurudzirawo kuti vari kugovera chikafu munzvimbo dzisina zvokudya munyika yose vasapinze zvematongerwo enyika mukati vachiti nzara hainei nekuti munhu anotsigira bato. Mashoko aVaMugabe aya anouya apo MDCT ichiti nhengo dzayo dziri kunyimwa chikafu. Zvichakadaro, nhengo dzeZanu PF dzanga dzichifora idzi dzati kuuya kwaita vanhu nehuwandu hwavo kunoratidza pachena kuti VaMugabe vachine rutsigiro rwakakura kwazvo. Mumwe wevanhu ava ndiVaKindness Paradza, avo vanove nhengo yeparamende inomirira Makonde. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo nemumwe muratidziri ati anonzi VaGodfrey Chimwanda vanobva mudunu reMashonaland East. Vakaratidziri ava vanonzi vakarovawo vanhu mudhorobha vaifungidzirwa kuti inhengo dzemapato anopikisa. Mabhizimusi akawanda anonzi akavhariswa uye vechidiki vakawanda vanga vachionekwa vachinwa nekuputa zvinodhaka mapurisa achingovasiya vakadaro. Dzimwe motokari dzemapurisa dzakaonekwawo dzichitakura vanhu vanga vachiuya kuzoratidzira ava uye zvinonzi mabhazi nemotokari dzakawanda dzakatuta vanhu kubva kunzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana dzanga dzichiramba kubhadhara mitero yekushandisa migwagwa kana kuti ma toll fees. Kunyange hazvo boka revechidiki mubato riri kutonga, reZanu PF Youth League ranga rakatarisira vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete. Asi vanhu vakaratidzira ava vanga vachisvika zviuru zana chete. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Vanoti Havasi Kuzosiya Chigaro Vachishorawo Kunetsana Mubato Ravo

text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akafa nemusi weMugovera kuBulawayo nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira munyika vave mazana matatu nevanomwe kana kuti 307. NeMugovera wakare vamwe vanhu makumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 57 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu ava kunze kwemumwe chete akabva nacho kuMozambique vakachitapurirwa munharaunda vakawanda vacho vari kubulawayo nemasvingo. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vave zvuru gumi nechimwe chete nemazana maviri ane gumi nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 11, 219. Vanhu vapora vave zvuru zvipfumbamwe zvine mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 9359 mushure mekunge vanhu makumi matatu nevashanu vapora kubulawayo. Vanhu vachiri kurwara churu nemazana mashanu ane makumi mashanu nevatatu kana kuti 1, 553. Vanhu vachiri kukatyamadzwa nemashoko akabuda svondo rapera kuti pane mazuva akafa vanhu gumi uye vamwe vapfumbamwe. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambotungamira chipatara chechitungwiza hopdital Dr Enoch Mayida vanoti vamwe vanhu ava vakange vafa kare kunyangwe zvakabuda mukuvhenekwa kwavo zvakazoratidza kuti iCovid-19. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana matatu kana kuti 2, 3 million vabatwa nechirwere checovid-19 muafrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi mashanu nemashanu zvine mazana mapfumbamwe ane makumi masere nevapfumbamawe kana kuti 55,989 Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri kana kuti 2 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nechimwe ane zviuru mazana masere kana kuti 71, 8 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe ane mazana masere kana kuti 297, 800, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu kana kuti 16 million. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 1, 6 million. Asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nematanhatu ane zvuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 46, 9 million.
title: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kufa neCovid-19 Hworamba Huchiwedzera

text: Vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri vakasungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita mhirizhonga mushure mekuratidzira kwakaitwa neChitatu, vacharamba vari mutirongo, zvichitevera kuraswa kwaitwa nedare chikumbiro chemagweta avo chekuti vabviswe muhusungwa . Rimwe remagweta eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, iro riri kumirira vasungwa ava, VaGift Mtisi, vati chikumbiro chavo chekuti vasungwa ava vabudiswe muhusungwa charaswa. VaMtisi vatiwo mushure mekuraswa kwechikumbiro ichi, vazokumbirawo dare zvakare kuti vasungwa ava vatongwe vachibva kumba mushure mekunge vapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso. VaMtisi vati chikumbiro chavo ichi chichanzwikwa nematare neMuvhuro. VaMtisi vati vasungwa vavari kumirira vanhu vakasungwa vari pamuzinda weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, paMorgan Tsvangirai House. Vatiwo mumwe wevasungwa ava, uyo ari kumirirwa negweta rake, akasungwawo ari kumatare edzimhosva, uko kwakanga kusina vanhu vairatidzira. Vasungwa ava vakawanikwa vaine mhosva yavari kupomerwa, vanogona kukandwa mujeri kwemakore gumi. No media source currently available
title: Vakasungirwa Kukonzera Mhirizhonga neChitatu Votarisirwa Mudare neMuvhuro

text: Hurumende yeAmerica neChitatu yakatemera zvirango mumwe muzvinabhizimisi ane mukurumbira munyika, VaKudakwashe Tagwirei, pamwe nekambani yavo yeSakunda Holdings ichivapomera mhosva yekuita zvehuwori. VaTagwirei, avo vanove zvakare chipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmeron Mnangangwa, vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutsigira pamwe nekusimudzira hutungamiri hwehurumende iri kuita zvehuwori pamwe nekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Muchiziviso chakaburitswa nehofisi inoongorora mafambisirwo epfuma yevekunze, ye Office of Foreign Assets Control, iyo iri pasi pebazi rezvemari kana kuti Treasury Department, America yakabvisawo pazvirango mushakabvu VaJohn Bredenkamp, avo vaidyidzanawo nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa. VaBredenkamp vakabviswawo pamwe nemakambani avo anokwana kuita makumi maviri, ayo anoti Alpha International (Private) Ltd., Breco (Asia Pacific) Ltd., Breco (Eastern Europe) Ltd., Breco (South Africa) Ltd., Breco (U.K.) Ltd., Breco Group, Breco International, Breco Nominees Ltd., neBreco Services Ltd. Corybantes Ltd., Echo Delta Holdings Ltd., Kababankola Mining Company, Masters International Ltd., Masters International, Inc., Piedmont (UK) Limited, Raceview Enterprises, Scottlee Holdings (Pvt) Ltd., Scottlee Resorts, Timpani Ltd., ne Tremalt Ltd. Mukutanga kwegore rino, America yakatemerawo zvirango gurukota rezvevasori, VaOwen Ncube pamwe nemumiriri weZimbabwe kuTanzania, VaAncelom Sanyatwe, vachipomerwa mhosva yekutungamira mukutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Kambani yeSakunda Holdings inonzi ndiyo ine mvumo yekupinza mafuta edzimotokari munyika, pamusoro pemamwe mabasa akawanda ainonzi inoitira hurumende yaVaMnangagwa. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti vanotambira nemufaro danho rehurumende yeAmerica iri, vachiti VaTagwirei vagere panhongonya yehuwori hwose huri kuitika muhurumende. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti hapana chakatadzwa naVaTagwirei chingaita kuti vaiswe pazvirango nekuti havasi muhurumende, uye vanoti zvirango izvi zvinotorwadzisa vana veZimbabwe kudarika ivo VaTagwirei nekambani yavo. Asi VaMaguwu vanopokana naDoctor Mavaza vachiti zvirango izvi zvicharwadza VaTagwirei nekambani yavo sezvo zvichavatadzisa kufambisa mari dzavo dziri kunze kwenyika kana kuendesa kunze kwenyika, uyewo zvichasvibisa zita ravo pasi rose. No media source currently available
title: Kutemerwa Zvirango kwaVaTagwirei Kwopepembedzwa Pamwe neKushoropodzwa neVamwe

text: Pane kunetsana kuri kuitika muMDC-Alliance kuMasvingo zvichitevera kuvhoterwa kwakaitwa mumwe kanzura weZanu PF kuti aite mutevedzeri wameya weguta iyo MDC Alliance iine makanzura akawanda muguta iri. Vamwe vatsigiri vanoti makanzura akavhotera munhu weZanu PF anofanira kudzingwa mubato nekuti vakatengesa. Asi vamwe vachiti hapana chakaipa chero munhu achigona kuita basa raakasarudzirwa. VaCollen Maboke veMDC Alliance ndivo vakasarudzwa kuita meya weguta reMasvingo, VaWellington Mahwende veZanu PF vakaitwa mutevedzeri wameya weguta. MDC Alliance ine makanzura manomwe, ukuwo Zanu PF iine matatu, asi VaMahwende vakakunda Amai Serina Maridza musarudzo nemavhoti mana. Mumwe mutsigiri we MDC-Alliance, Muzvare Alaika Taimu, vanoti makanzura akavhotera Zanu PF vakarasa gwara remusangano wavo nekudaro vanofanira kurangwa nebato. Izvi zvatsigirwa na Muzvare Ruth Mavedzenge avo vati makanzura akaramba kuteerera zvakanga zvasungwa nevakuru veMDC Alliance, vatengesi. Asi vamwe vatsigiri vataura neStudio7 vakaita saVaMorgan Sibanda vanoti hapana chakaipa kuvhotera munhu we Zanu PF vachiti zvinoratidza kukura mune zvamatongerwe enyika uye zvinobatanidza vanhu kuti vashandire guta pamwe chete. Asi VaStephen Nhatare vanotiwo havaoni chakaipa kuti makanzura avo avhotere verimwe bato kana vachiona kuti vanogona kuita basa. Vanotiwo mapato haafanire kupindira mumashandiro emakanzuru. VaMaboke vanoti vachashanda nemakanzura ose zvakanaka vasingatarisi kuti munhu anobvepi nekuti kana munhu wasarudzwa unomirira vagari vose. Vati vatove mubishi rekuona kuti vagadzirisa dambudziko remvura sechinhu chekutanga pakuita basa ravo. Zvinhu zvinenge zvisina kumira zvakanaka mumamwe makanzuru akatorwa neMDC Alliance munyika yose zvichitevera kupesana kwemakanzura aya pazvinhu zvinenge zvichidiwa neMDC Alliance. Sachigaro weMDC muMasvingo, VaJames Gumbi, vanoti makanzura anofanirwa kuziva kwaanobva. VaGumbi vanotiwo kana vachiita basa ravo mukanzuru vanofanirwa kuziva gwara rebato, uye kuzadzisa zvisungo zvinobva kumuzinda webato. No media source currently available
title: Bhora Musango Mukanzuru yeMDC Alliance kuMasvingo?

text: Nyaya yekushandiswa kwemutemo uchinzi unotarisa kuti munhu abuda mumba maani munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika inonzi yave kuonekwa zvakare mugadziriro dzesarudzo dzema by-election dziri kuitwa musi wa 26 Kurume, apo vebato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change vari kunyunyuta kuti vari kurambidzwa nemapurisa kuungana kuti vatsvage rutsigiro asi vebato riri kutonga veZanu PF vachibvumidzwa kuita madiro aJojina. Meya veHarare vakambomiswa basa uye vari munyori anoona nezvekutongwa kwematunhu muCitizens Coalition for Change, VaJacob mafume vanoti mutungamiri wavo VaNelson Chamisa vakatadziswa nemapurisa kuenda kuBulawayp kunosangana nenhengo dzavo, uye nhengo dzavo dzakasungwa kuGweru mushure mekuungana. VaMafume vanotiwo nhengo dzakarambidzwa nemapurisa kuungana muHighfields muHarare pamwe nekwaMutare kuti dziite zvirongwa zvebato radzo pamberi pesarudzo dziri kuuya idzi. Bato reCCC rinotiwo nhengo dzaro mumaguta nemadhorobha akasiyanasiyana dziri kushungurudzwa nemapurisa nekuda kwekuti dzinenge dzakapfeka ruvara rwebato rwe yellow. Nekune rumwe rutivi, mutungamiri weZanu PF vari mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kuita musangano uri kunzi neZanu PF uchange uri mukuru zvisati zvamboonekwa mumusha weEpworth zvisina dambudziko, izvo zviri kunzi nevanopikisa ava zviri kupa bato riri kutonga mukana uri kunyimwa vamwe. Asi nhengo yevechidiki mubato reZanu PF muHarare, VaAlex Gakanje, vanoti havaoni paine chikonzero chingaita kuti mapurisa arambidze nhengo dzeCCC kuungana sezvo bato iri risipo. Asi VaMafume vanoramba mashoko ekuti bato ravo harizivikanwe vachiti dai raisavepo dai raisazivikanwa dai risina kupinda musarudzo dzema by-election dziri kuuya idzi. Ukuwo VaGakanje vanoti CCC inopomera mapurisa mhosva yekutadzisa nhengo dzayo kuungana kunyange hazvo ichinge yatadza kuita musangano nekuda kwekushaya vanhu. VaGakanje vanoti chinotadzisa bato rinopikisa iri kuungana inyaya yekuti nhengo dzaro dzinotya mapurisa sezvo dzichigara dzakapara dzimhosva uyewo dzinosungwa nekuti dzinotuka mapurisa. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi sezvo takundikana kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi. No media source currently available
title: Citizens Coalition for Change Yonyunyuta neKwainoti Kunyimwa Mukana weKutsvaga Rutsigiro Sezviri Kuitwa Zanu PF

text: Vaive mukuru weboka rematikitivha muAmerica, reFederal Bureau of Investigations, FBI, VaJames Comey, vamira pamberi pekomiti yedare reseneti inoona nezvekusora muAmerica vachipa humbowo pamusoro pekufambidzana pamwe nekudyidzana kwavo nevaimirira bato reRepublican musarudzo, avo vave mutungamiri wenyika, VaDonald Trump. Dare iri rabatabatawo kuferefetwa kwenyaya iri kupomerwa Russia yekuti yakapindira mumafambisirwo esarudzo dzemuAmerica dzakaitwa gore rapera. VaComey vataurawo pamusoro pekurudziro yavanoti yakabva kunaVaTrump yekuti varase kuferefetwa kwevaive chipangamazano chavo, VaMichael Flynn. Panyaya yeRussia VaComey vati ivo vanofunga kuti Russia yakapindira musarudzo dzemuAmerica. VaComey vapindura mibvunzo yanga ichinaya kubva kunhengo dzekomiti iyi, vachiti chikuru chavakaona kubva mukusangana kwavo naVaTrump ndechekuti VaTrump vaida kuti FBI imire kuferefetwa kwenyaya yeRussia. VaComey, avo vainyora pasi zvavanenge vakurukura naVaTrump mumisangano yavaiita, vaudza komiti iyi kuti vaitora danho iri senzira yekuchengetedza kutendeseka kwekuferefetwa kwenyaya iyi. Vachipindura kana yaive tsika yavo yekunyora pasi zvavanenge vakurukura nevatungamiri venyika, VaComey, avo vakambosanganawo naVaGeorge Bush pamwe naVaBarack Obama munguva dzavaive vatungamiri venyika, vati aka kaive kekutanga kuita izvi sezvo vakaona zvakakodzera kuti vanyore pasi zvavaikurukura naVaTrump. Vatiwo havana ruzivo rwekuti sei vakamiswa basa, asi vakati vanofunga kuti zvine chekuita nenyaya yeRussia. VaComey vati vakaudzwa kakawanda naVaTrump kuti vainge vataura nevanhu vakawanda, kusanganisira gweta guru renyika, uye vakanga vaudzwa kuti vaiita basa ravo nemazvo. Vati saka zvakavadzungaidza apo vakaona paterevhizheni VaTrump vachiti vakanga vavadzinga basa nepamusana pekuti vaiferefeta vanhu veku Russia, uye kunzwa kuti VaTrump vaiudza vamwe vanhu muchivande, kuti kudzingwa kwavo kwainge kwanyevenutsa zvakawanda pahurongwa hwekuferefetwa kweRussia. VaComey vatiwo hurumende yaVaTrump yakasarudza kuvashora nekuvazvidza, zvikuru boka reFBI, ichiti boka iri harichina kugadzikana, uye vashandi havachina chivimbo nemukuru wavo. Vati aya manyepo, vachiti vane hurombo kuti FBI yakanzwa mashoko emanyepo uyewo kuti vanhu vemu America vakanzwa manyepo. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paGettysburg College muPennyslvania, Doctor Chipo Dendere, vanoti chiitiko chekuti vaive mukuru wematikitivha anomiswa pamberi pekomiti yeparamende chiratidzo chekuti hutongi hwegutsaruzhinji hunoteverwa muAmerica. Doctor Dendere vanoti zvakakosha zvikuru kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe iteverewo hurongwa hwakadai, vanhu vanenge vari mumabasa epamusoro vachi bvumidzwa kupa humbowo, uye veruzhinji vachipiwa mukana wekuziva zvinenge zvakatora nzvimbo. Asi vanoti nenyaya dzekutonga nedemo, zvakaoma kuti hurumende dzakawanda dzepasi rino dzitevere hurongwa hwakadai. No media source currently available
title: VaJames Comey Vanopa Humbowo Pamusoro peKudyidzana Kwavo naVaTrump

text: Mukuru wesangano reAssociation of the Victims of Political Violence VaAlois Mutanga vanoti vanhu vose vakashungurudzwa nenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vanofanira kuripwa. Mashoko aya anouya apo nyika dzepasi rino dziri kurangarira vanhu vakashungurudzwa nenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye pachipihwa kurudziro yekuti varipwe uye kuti chokwadi chibude kwete kuti vanhu varove imbwa vakaviga mupini. Zuvairi rinocherechedzwa richinzi UN International Day for the Right To The Truth Concerning Gross Human Rights Violations and for the Dignity of Victims. VaMutage avo vakashungurudzwa muZimbabwe vasati vaenda kuSouth Africa vanoti vanofanira kuripwa. “Tinofanira kuti tiripwe, nekuti vamwe vedu vakapisirwa dzimba, vamwe vakatorerwa dzimba. Nyaya yekushungurudza vanhu inofanira kumira.” Muna 2006, United Nations yakati vanhu vanenge vatyorerwa kodzero dzavo vanofanira kutaurirwa chokwadi chezvakaitika nevanenge vavshungurudza. Hurumende dzinosungirawo kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Kutanga muna 2010 United Nations ndipo payakatanga kucherechedza zuva iri. No media source currently available
title: Vakatyorerwa Kodzero Dzavo muNyaya dzezveMatongerwo eNyika Vanoti Vanoda Kuripwa

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti kunyange hazvo VaEmmerson Mnangangwa vaikodzera kuva mutungamiri webato ravo reZanu PF pamwe nehurumende nekuda kwehukuru hwavo, mukana uyu wakapedzwa kutanga kwemwedzi uno apo vakadzingwa zvese muhurumende nemubato. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti VaMnangagwa vanofanira kutenda mauto nekuvadzora mubato pamwe nekuvagadza pachigaro chekutungamiri nyika. Pakadzingwa VaMnangagwa, vamwe vakaona sekuti VaMnangagwa vakange vaparara munyaya dzematongerwe enyika. Zvichitevera kudzingwa muhurumende, VaMnangagwa vakambonopotera kuSouth Africa asi vakanyora tsamba vachiti vaizodzoka munyika mukati menguva pfupi kuzotonga, Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika zvakare vachidzidzisa pachikoro cheSokusi University, VaTinashe Muzamindo, vanoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti pange pagara paine hurongwa hwekuti VaMnangagwa vatore chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika. Vati kuita kwemauto kunoratidza kuti vanga vakaronga nechakare uye change chasara inguva chete. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaVivid Gwede, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hazvina kuvashamisa kuti mauto akatsigira VaMnangagwa pakurwisana kwaitika mubato reZanu PF. Vati chikwata cheG40 change chisina vanhu vakaenda kuhondo vanga vari pamusoro, nekudaro mauto akaita zvaakataura kare kuti haazotsigira munhu asina kuenda kuhondo kuti atonge Zimbabwe. VaGwede vanoti mauto haana kufara nekudzingwa kwaVaMnangagwa uye zvange zvave pachena kuti Amai Grace Mugabe, kana mumwe wavo muchikwata cheG40, ndiye atozotungamira nyika sezvo VaMugabe vakwegura. Vati izvi ndizvo zvakazoita kuti mauto atange Operation Restore Legacy apo akasunga nhengo dzechikwata cheG40 pamwe nekubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro. Ukuwo bato rakabva radzora VaMnangagwa ndokuvadoma semutungamiri waro pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika. Asi VaGwede naVaMuzamindo vanoti kunyange hazvo veruzhinji vari kufara nekuenda kwaVaMugabe, vanofanira kuziva kuti mauto anogona kutadza kutambiraa zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo kana pakakunda munhu asina kurwa muhondo sekutaura kwawo. VaGwede vanoti zvakakosha kuti vatungamiri venyika vabviswe nesarudzo. Muna 2008, bato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rakakunda musarudzo dzeparamende nemutungamiriri wenyika asi mauto akaramba kuti VaMugabe vabve pachigaro izvo zvakazoita kuti paumbwe hurumende yemubatanidzwa. Vakawanda vanoti vanotyira kuti mauto achapindira zvakare musarudzo kana VaMnangagwa nebato ravo vakakundwa gore rinouya. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzoudza VaMnangagwa Kuti Vatende Mauto

text: Varairidzi votambira mari dzemihoro asi vachigunun’una nekubatirwa mari dzemudyandigere pasina kutaurirana. Vanotungamira sangano reRural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe vosungwa nekurohwa nemapurisa mushure mekuratidzira kunonoka kutambira. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kunyange hazvo hurumende ichibvuma kuti hupfumi hausi kufamba zvakanaka gore rino yakatora matanhano akawedzera kutambudzika kweveruzhinji akaita sekuvatandanisa mumigwagwa umo vaitengesa zvinhu. Murairidzi wemaWarriors Callisto Pasuwa onyorerana chibvmirano neZIFA kuti ashande kwemakore matatu. Muchirongwa cheLivetalk- The Youth Connection na 8:30 pm tiri kutarisa nyaya yedzidzo kune vechidiki. Iyi ndiyo misoro yenhau dzedu dzanhasi...munotibata pa 909 am, 4930, kana pa 12080, ne 15460 Kilohertzs pa Shortwave kana paFacebook page yedu yeVOAShona. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau, Chipiri Zvita 29, 2015

text: Mutungamiri weMDC T, VaMorgan Tsvangirai nemusi weChina chapfuura vakasangana nevamwe vehutungamiri hwesangano revakarwa hondo yerusununguko reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association vakazeya matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Mutauriri waVaTsvangirai, VaLuke Tamborinyoka vatenda kuti VaTsvangirai vakasangana nevakarwa hondo ava vakatungamirirwa nemunyori mukuru wesangano iri, VaVictor Matemadanda. VaTamborinyoka vanoti nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika havaoni paine chakapia kuti vana veZimbabwe varovane masoro pamatambudziko akatarisana nenyika aya. “Ndinoziva kuti vanhu vese vave kuziva kuti vana veZimbabwe vari kunonga svosve nemuromo, asi chave kuitika ndechekuti vana veZimbabwe vaakuungana vachikurukura vachiona kuti vangagadzirisa nyika yavo sei,” VaTamborinyoka vanodaro. “Saka imomo mukusangana nekudaona kuona kuti vangaita sei kuti nyika yedu ifambe zvakanaka, ndo musangano wakaitwawo navaTsvangirai nevatungamiri vema war veteran.” VaTamborinyika varamba kudura zvakabuda mumusangano uyu, kunyange hazvo vachiti zvakangokosha kuti vana veZimbabwe vazive kuti VaTsvangirai nevakarwa hondo yerusununguko ava vakasangana. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata Vamatemadanda kanawo vamwe vesangano ravo kuti tinzwe divi ravo pamusoro pemusangano uyu. No media source currently available
title: VaTsvangirai Vanosangana neVakarwa Hondo yeRusununguko

text: Bato reMDC-T rinonzi nevamwe ratarisana nematambudziko seakanga ari muZanu PF, ezvimapoka, ayo anonzi anogona kuita kuti bato rinopikisa iri riparare zvachose. Vari kuona zviri kuitika muMDC-T vanoti kusamira zvakanaka kwehutano hwemutungamiri webato iri, VaMorgan Tsvangirai kwavhurira mhepo dzakaipa dzinogona kukanganisa gadziriro yebato iri musarudzo dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa gore rino. Zvinonzi vatevedzeri vatatu vaVaTsvangirai, vanoti Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaElias Mudzuri, pamwe naVaNelson Chamisa, vatove nevanhu vari kuvatsigira kuti vatore chigaro ichi kana VaTsvangirai vakazofunga zvekusiya basa. Izvi zvinonzi zvakonzera kuti mubato iri muve nezvimapoka zvitatu zviri kudhonzera kwakasiyana. Asi mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vanoti manyepo kuti mubato ravo mune zvimapoka zvanyuka zvinogona kukanganisa gadziriro dzesarudzo, vachiti vanhu vari kukanda panyepo aya vachishandisa madandemutande. VaGutu vanoti vatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato ravo vakabatana chose, uye vari kushanda pamwechete. Vanongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakarerekera kuZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti vanoseka chose mashoko aVaGutu aya, sezvo zvisingadi mwana ari kuita zvidzidzo zvechishanu (Grade 5) kuziva kuti muMDC-T mune matambudziko. Kurwisana kwaive muZanu PF kwekuda kutsiva vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe kwakazopomhodzwa nemauto ayo akazotorera VaMugabe masimba muna Mbudzi gore rapera. No media source currently available
title: Makakatanwa eHutungamiri muMDC-T Otyirwa Kuti Angangotsemura Bato nePakati

text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika vave zana nemakumi mashanu nevshanu kana kuti 155 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu vaviri vafa mudunhu reManicaland nemusi weSvondo. Dunhu reHarare ndiro dunhu rine vanhu vakawandisa vafa nechirwere ichi vanosvika makumi masere nevatatu kana kuti 83, richiteverwa neBulawayo yave nemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 29. Dunhu reManicaland ndiro riri pachidanho chechitatu nevanhu gumi nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 19. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi nyika yose vasvika zviuru zvishanu nemazana mapfumbamwe ane makumi matatu kana kuti 5, 930, vapora vachisvika zviuru zvina nemazana masere ane makumi manomwe nemaviri kana kuti 4,872. Vanhu vari kurwara mazana mapfumbamwe nevatatu kana kuti 903 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi mana nevatatu kana kuti 243 vapora . Vanhu makumi matatu nevanomwe kana kuti 37 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nemusi weSvondo uye vanhu vose ava vakachitapurirwa munyika sezvo vasina nhoroondo yekuenda kunze kwenyika. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu varambe vachitvedzera zviri kukurudzirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru zana nemakumi masere kana kuti 1,180 million. Vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica, vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi maviri nemazana matanhatu zvine gumi kana kuti 27, 610, vapora vadarika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 900.000 . Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nematatu ane zviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 23, 3 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana ne makumi manomwe nematanhatu kana kuti 176, 000. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vadarika zviuru mazana masere nematanhatu kana kuti 806, 000. Vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemashanu kuti 15 million
title: Huwandu hweVanhu Vafa neCovid-19 Hwowedzera

text: Sarudzo dzemusangano weZanu PF kuno kuManicaland dzekutsvaga vachange vari nhengo dzeDistrict Coordinating Committee, DCC, dziri kunetsa kubatanidza nekuda kwekushomeka kwemapepa ekuvhotesa, ayo anonzi mashoma. Rimwe dambudziko rinonzi nderekuti vanhu vanotarisirwa kuvhota vari kuwandisa kupfurikidza vanotarisirwa kunge vachivhota, uye kune dzimwe nzvimbo mapepa ekuvhotesa asiri kuwanikwa. Nzvimbo dzashanyirwa neStudio 7 dzange dzichitarisirwa kunge dzichivhoterwa nevanhu dzange dzisina vanhu vakawanda uye kune dzimwe nzvimbo kuchinzi kwange kusina zvakanyanya zvaiitika. Dzimwe dzenzvimbo dzange dzichivhotera vanhu pasarudzo dzeDCC idzi dzinosanganisira Baring Primary School, Mutare Junior School, Chiefs’ Hall, nekumwewo. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato reZanu PF kuManicaland VaKenneth Saruchera vanoti vanofara nekufamba kuri kuita basa. VaSaruchera vanoti vanotarisira kuti zvichabuda musarudzo zvinoziviswa neSvondo. VaDaniel McKenzie Ncube, sachigaro veZanu PF kudunhu reMidlands ndivo vari kuona nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa sarudzo kuno kuManicaland. VaNcube vanoti vakatarisana nedambudziko rekuti mapepa ekuvhotesa mashoma. "Tine dambudziko rekuti maballot papars edu mashoma saka pamwe pacho tiri kuti tiite even pakuti kune dzimwe nzvimbo tave kuvapa mapepa akaindirana sekuti toti 80 pamwe pacho 90 kana kuti 100, uye zvakare tichange tichizomuvha mamwe ma ballot papers kuendesa kudzimwe nzvimbo kuti munhu wese akwanise kuvhota." VaMckenzie-Ncube vanoti kunyangwe hazvo chiitiko ichi chanonoka, vari kuedza napose pavanogona napo kuti zvinhu zviitwe pajekerere. Vanoti zvakare mamiriro ekunze akanganisa kufambiswa kwebasa rekuvhota nhasi. "Parizvino tichangopedza kudeploya asi vanhu vatoenda out kuitira kuti vanhu vose vange vavhota pazuva ranhasi sekuti tiri vanhu vanoda democracy kuti vanhu vavhotere munhu wavanoda. Saka izvi ndizvo zviri kuitika nekudaro takamiririra kuti tione kuti zvinofamba seyi." Zvichakadaro VaMackenzie-Ncube vanoti Zanu PF iri kucherechedza zvakare kuti sarudzo idzi dziitwe pasina njodzi yekuti pane vangabatwa nechirwere cheCovid 19, kuburikidza nekutevedzera zvakatarwa nevehutano. "We know kuti tine chirwere ichi saka vanhu vedu tiri kuvaudza kuti vatevedzere zvese social distancing, face mask kupfeka uye kuita sanitise nekuti we know kuti tinacho chirwere ichi saka we are aware tiri kuita saizvozvo." Vari kukwikwidzana pachigaro chepamusoro chedunhu reManicaland chehusachigaro vanosanganisira vaimbove murwiri wehondo yerusununguko VaIrwene Mbengo, Muzvare Cecilia Gambe, VaMparutsa naAmai Loreene Mukodza. No media source currently available
title: Sarudzo dzeZanu PF DCC kuManicaland Dzinokanganiswa neKushomeka kweMapepa eKuvhotesa

text: Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights raendesa mabharani mukuru wenyika kana kuti Registrar General VaTobaiwa Mudede kudare repamusoro reHigh Court kuti vabvise mutori wenhau Muzvare Violet Gonda pavanhu vanonzi nehurumende havafanire kupihwa magwaro ekufambisa kana kuti mapassport. Magweta aya aendesa kumatare VaMudede uye vange vari gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaObert Mpofu kuti vape Muzvare Gonda gwaro iri. Gweta raMuzvare Gonda, VaDenford Halimani veZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vanoti Muzvare Gonda vaida kuyedza kutora gwaro rekufambisa idzva sezvo ravange vainaro rainge razvika mazuva ekupera vari kuBritain. VaHalimani vanoti Muzvare Gonda vakaudzwa kuti zita ravo rainge riri pakati pevanhu vainge vasingafanire kupihwa magwaro zvachose nekudaro rainge rakanyorwa kuti “Stop List.” Muzvare Gonda vainge vabhadhara mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nematatu kuti vapihwe gwaro ravo rekufambisa mukati memazuva matatu. VaHalimani vanoti Muzvare Gonda havana mhosva yavakapara nekudaro kuvanyima gwaro rekufambisa sezvo uku kuri kutyora bumbiro remutemo. Muzvare Gonda vanodawo kuti vamMudede vabvise mazita evanhu vose vavanoti havafanire kupihwa magwaro ekufambisa. Dare harisati ratonga kuti nyaya iyi inonzwikwa rini.
title: Muzvare Violet Gonda Voendesa VaMudede naVaObert Mpofu kuMatare

text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika nekunze vari kubagtana kuchema mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu kuchamhembe kweAfrica reHuman Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga vakashaya nemusi weMugovera kuSouth Africa. VaMavhinga vakashaya mushure mekurwara kwenguva pfupi nechinofungidzirwa kuti nchirwere cheCovid 19. Kushaya kwaVaMavhinga kwasiya vanhu vakawanda munyika vaine misodzi pamatama zvikurusei vanoshaya avo vaimirira kana vatyorerwa kodzero dzavo. Gweta vachidzidzisa paKent University Dr Alex Magaisa vakaziva mufi kwenguva yakareba vati vaive munhu akashinga. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights VaKumbirai Mafunda vati nyika yarasikirwa negamba. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachitungamira sangano reZimrights VaDzikamai Bere vati nyika yarasikirwa zvikuru. Vamwe vati varwadziwa nerufu urwu mukuru wesangano reWomen’s Academy for Leadership and Political Excellence Muzvare Stabile Dewa. Mutauriri wemubatanidzwa wemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, sangano rakamboshandirwa naVaMavhinga, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vati varwadziwa zvikuru nekufa kwaVaMavhinga. Mutevedzeri wemutariri weMDC Alliance, VaGift Ostallos Siziba, vati VaMavhinga raiva gamba kwete muZimbabwe chete asi nekuchamhembe kweAfrica panyaya dzekurwira kodzero dzevanhu nehutongi hwejekerere. Mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vati varwadziwa nekufa kwaVaMavhinga kunyange hazvo vanga vasingawirirane mumafungiro panyaya yemabatirwo enyaya dzesarudzo dzema by-elections pamwe nezvirango zvakatemerwa mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nevamwe vavo vari muZanu PF. Mutungamiri webato reDemocratic Party, VaUrayayi Zembe, vati vanga vakatarisira zvakawanda kubva kuna VaMavhinga. Mumwe anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaPride Mkono, vatsanangura VaMavhinga semunhu aibatsira zvikuru vanoita zvekurwira kodzero dzevanhu. Mutungamiri weInternational Cross Border Traders Association VaDeniss Juru vatiwo Vamavhinga vakabatsira sangano ravo zvakanyanya. VaMavhinga vakaita zvidzidzo zvemutemo paUniversity of Zimbabwe apo vaivewo mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzi reSudents Representative Council. Vakazoitawo zvidzidzo zvepamusoro munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu paEssex University kuBritain. Vasati vaenda kunoshanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch, VaMavhinga vakamboshanda nesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition vari kuJohanessburg kubva muna 2009 kusvika muna 2012. Muna 2012, VaMavhinga ndeumwe weavo vakaumba sangano rinoita zvekutsvakurudzo munyaya dzehutongo hwejekerere reZimbabwe Democracy Institute. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau mutungamiri wesangano reHuman Rights Watch VaKenneth Roth vati VaMavhinga vakashanda zvikuru kurwira kodzero dzevanhu v mudunhu rose rekuchamhebe kweAfrica uye vaive munhu aive neruzivo rwakadzama. VaMavhinga vasiya mudzimai, Amai Fiona Mavhinga nevana vana.Vanhu vakaungana kumba kwaVaMavhinga panhamba 484 Sandon Close kuHoughton Park muno muHarare. Vari kutaura vakamirira mhuri yekwaMavhinga uye vari munin’ina wemufi, Doctor Edgar Munatsi, vaudza Studio 7 vari kuBritain kuti vachiri mubishi rekugadzirisa hurongwa hwekuradzikwa kwemukoma wavo vozozivisa veruzhinji kana hurongwa hwacho hwanyatsoti tsvikiti.
title: Vanhu Vakawanda Voenderera Mberi Vachichema VaDewa Mavhinga

text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaElias Mudzuri, vari kukurudzira nhengo dzebato ravo kuti dzibatane kuitira kuti vakunde Zanu PF musarudzo zvine mutsindo. Vachitaura apo vanga vachishanyira mhuri dzevanhu vakafa nechirwere chekorera muChegutu, VaMudzuri vakurudzira zvikuru nhengo dzavo kuti dzibatane kuitira kuti dzikunde musarudzo dzegore rino. VaMudzuri vati bato reZanu PF rakatoparara kare sezvo nhengo dzaro dziri kuuya mumusasa mukuru weMDC. Asi patabvunza VaMudzuri kuti sei nhengo dzemubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance dzave kutungana, VaMudzuri vati kusawirirana kuri kuitika kuHarare East kuri kukonzerwa nekupesana kuri kuita vanhu panayaya iyi. VaMudzuri vati vakaudzwa naVa Obert Gutu kuti havasi ivo vakafambisa mashoko ekuti vari kuda kukwikwidza munzvimbo yeHarare East. Zvinonzi nzvimbo yeHarare East yakapihwa kuti imirirwe musarudzo nenhengo yebato rePeople's Democratic Party inotungamirwa naVaTendai Biti pasi pehurongwa hwechibvumirano chemubatanidzwa wemapato. Bato raVaBiti ndiro rinosarudza munhu waro anokodzera kunge achimirira MDC Alliance musarudzo yemuHarare East. Vachitaurawo pamusangano wavaitira pane imwe imba yenhengo yavo muChegutu, sachigaro weMDC-T, VaMorgan Komichi, vati nhengo dzose dziri mumubatanidzwa dzakakosha nekuti pane zvadzinounza mumubatanidzwa uyu. VaMudzuri vaperekedzwa nenhengo dzehutungamiri hwebato ravo dzinoti sachigaro webato, VaKomichi, munyori mukuru, VaDouglas Mwonzora, mutevedzeri wemurongi wemisangano, VaAmos Chibaya, mutevedzeri wemubati wehomwe, VaChalton Hwende, mutungamiri wevechidiki, VaHappymore Chidziva, pamwe nemunyori mukuru wevechidiki, VaLovemore Chinoputsa. VaMudzuri vashanyira kiriniki yepaChinengundu uko kune vanhu vavhiringwa nedambudziko rekorera. Panyaya yechirwere chekorera, VaMudzuri vati hurumende iripo iri kutadza kupa mari kumakanzuru inoita zvikamu zvishanu kubva muzana pabhajeti ravo. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nachiremba mukuru anoona nezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaBlessing Masocha, avo vanoti mararamiro evanhu haasi kushanduka kubvira pakamboitika chirwere chekorera mugore ra2008 na 2009 apo vanhu makumi matatu nevanomwe vakafa muChegutu. Vanhu vana vafa muChegutu kubva musiwa 8 Ndira kusvika pari zvino. No media source currently available
title: VaMudzuri Vokurudzira Vanhu Kubatana muMDC Kuitira Kuti Vakunde Zanu PF Musarudzo

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMavambo Kusile Dawn uye vaimbova munyori mukuru weSADC Doctor Simba Makoni vanoti zvakakosha kuti nyika dzemuSADC dzipindire muhondo iri muMozambique iyo yaurayawo chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe VaNyasha Mugwagwa. VaMakoni vanoti chimwe chinangwa chakaumbirwa SADC chaive chekubatsirana munguva yehondo seiri muMozambique parizvino yaona vanhu vakawanda kusanganisira vana vadiki nemadzimai vachipondwa nevanopfurikidza mwero vanotsigira chikwata cheIslamic State kana kuti ISIS. Doctor Makoni vanoti vatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC vanogona kunge vakanonoka havo asi hapana chakaipa kuti vatumire mauto ikozvino. Vanotiwo nhaurirano pakati pevatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC hadzisi kunyatsoburitswa pachena kuti vanhu vazive kuti ndeapi matanho avari kuda kutora. VaMakoni vakatungamira SADC kubva muna 1983 kusvika 1993. vatungamiri veSADC vakasangana kuMozambique mazuva mashoma adarika vakabuda nechisungo chekuti vatumire chikwata chenyanzvi dzechiuto kuti dzitange gadziriro yekuti vapindire muhondo iyi. Bazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika raburitsa mashoko ekuti VaMugwagwa vainge vachinzi vakashaika kuMozambique pakarwiswa nzvimbo yavaishandira vakatovigwa nekuti mutumbi wavo wainge watoora. Vanonzi vakaurayiwa nevamwe vanhu gumi nevaviri. Asi rinoti riri kushanda neMozambique kuti afukunurwe avigwe zvakanaka. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, mhuri yaVaMugwagwa yati mufi aive nemakore makumi matatu nemasere ekuberekwa uye ainge asiri kuzivikanwa kuti ari kupi kubva musi wa28 Kurume pakarwiswa nzvimbo yaaigara nevanopfurikidza mwero muMozambique. Nzvimbo yakarwiswa inonzi weWentworth Camp, muCabo Delgado. Mhuri yaVaMugwagwa inoti vave kuyedza kuunza mutumbi wavo kumusha asi zvichatora nguva. VaMugwagwa vaishanda pahotera yeRemote Site Solutions muMozambique. No media source currently available
title: Doctor Simba Makoni Vokurudzira SADC Kubatsira Mozambique Apo Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chinourayiwa neISIS

text: Hurumende dzeZimbabwe, Botswana neSouth Africa dziri kutarisirwa kusainirana chibvumirano chekuchengetedzwa kwemhuka dzesango dzinowanika munzvimbo yeGreater Mapungubwe Transfrontier Conservation Area mukutanga kwegore rinouya. Greater Mapungubwe Transfrontier Conservation Area inzvimbo yakakura chinhambwe chemakiromita zviuru zvishanu zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemapfumbabwe uye ine nzvimbo dzinoyevedza kumativi eZimbabwe, Botswana neSouth Africa. Nokuda kwekuyevedza kwenzvimbo iyi, nyika nhatu idzi dzave kuita mushandirapamwe mukuchengetedza mhuka dzesango dzinowanika munzvimbo iyi dzinosanganisira shumba, nzou, ingwe uye matindingwe. Vachitaura mudare reparamende reBotswana nhasi, vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvezviwanikwa (environment) nekuchengetedzwa kwemhuka dzesango munyika iyi, VaMachana Shamukuni, vazivisa kuti nyika nhatu idzi dziri kutarisirwa kusainirana chibvumirano ichi gore rinouya. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekuchengetedzwa kwemhuka dzesango uye vari mumiriri wenzvimbo iyi kudivi reBotswana, VaKgoberego Nkawana, vaudza Studio7 kuti nzvimbo iyi inodiwa nevashanyi vakawanda izvo zvichaita kuti nyika idzi dzikwanise kuwana mari. VaNkawana vaenderera mberi vachiti nzvimbo iyi inokwanisa kuunza mari inosvika kubhiriyoni rimwe chete remadhora ekuAmerica iyo ichagovaniwa nenyika nhatu idzi. Hurongwa uhu hunofanana nehurongwa hweKavango-Zambezi kana kuti KAZA Transfrontier Conservation Area hwuri pakati peZimbabwe, Botswana, Angola, Namibia neSouth Africa uhwo hunobvumidza kuti vashanyi vekunyika dzekumawirira vakwanise kubvakachira nyika shanu idzi nevisa rimwe chete. Muridzi weTapinda Lodge iyo iri muguta reBobonong iro riri mukati meMapungubwe Transfrontier Conservation Area, VaInnocent Maphosa vanoti hurongwa uhwu hungasimudzira kwazvo varidzi venzvimbo dzinogara vanhu pamwe nemahotera, avo vange votarisana nenguva yakaoma zvikuru nokuda kwedenda reCOVID-19. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekushanyirwa kwenyika uye vachidzidzisa zvidzidzo zve Hotel and Catering pachikoro chikuru cheFrancistown College of Technical and Vocational Education, VaTichaona Chikodzi vaudza Studio7 kuti Zimbabwe ndiyo iri kutarisirwa kudya pahombe kuburikidza nehurongwa uhu. MunaChikunguru wegore ra2003, nzvimbo iyi yeMapungubwe yakakomekedzwa senzvimbo inoyewedza samare kana kuti World Heritage Site nesangano repasi rose reUnited Nations. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe, Botswana neSouth Africa Dzotarisira Kusainirana Chibvumirano Chekuchengetedzwa kweMhuka

text: Bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF sezvange zvakatarisirwa nevakawanda munyika rakabuda nechisungo pamusangano wayo wepagore weannual conference kuMasvingo mukupera kwesvondo chekuti mutungamiri waro uye vari mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ndivo vachamiririra bato iri musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika muna 2018. Bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF sezvange zvakatarisirwa nevakawanda munyika rakabuda nechisungo pamusangano waro wepagore kuMasvingo mukupera kwesvondo chekuti mutungamiri waro uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ndivo vachamiririra bato iri musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika muna 2018. VaMugabe vanenge vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemana uye vakakunda vanenge vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe pavanopedza temu yavo. Asi vanhu vange vachitevera zvange zvichiitika kumusangano uyu vanoti bato iri rave kufanira kutaura zvizere nezvekuti ndiyani achavatsiva sezvo vari kuratidza kuti vakwegura uye kufamba kana kuita zvimwe zvinhu zvakaita sekudyara miti zvave kuvaremera. Asi mukuru weZanu-PF Youth League, VaKudzai Chipanga, vanoti ivo sebato reZanu-PF vanomira naVaMugabe uye vanoda kuti vatonge nekusingaperi kana kusvika madhongi amera nyanga. VaChipanga vanoti bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinotendedzawo VaMugabe kuti varambe vachitonga sezvo pasina makore akatarwa ekuguma kwekutungamira kwemutungamiri wenyika asi panongonzi anofanira kukwikwidza aine makore makumi mana chete. Mutauririri webato rinopikisa uye vari gweta, VaObert Gutu, vanotenderana naVaChipanga panyaya yebumbiro remitemo asi vanoti VaMugabe havachakwanisa kutungamira nyika sezvo nyika yoda vanotemwa dzinobva ropa. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti dziri kushamisika kuti ko vanopikisa vanodei pamuchato wedhongi nebere sezvo kana vachiti VaMugabe havachakwanise kutonga ndivo vanozobudirira musarudzo. Asi VaGutu vanoti zvavo ndezvetsiye nyoro. Asi mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association, VaDouglas Mahiya, vanotiwo VaMugabe vanenge voremerwa nemutoro wekutonga. Chimwe chisungo chakabuda pamusangano uyu kubva kubazi remadzimai reWomens League chiri kutiwo pavandudzwe bumbiro remitemo sezvakataurwa kare kuti mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika ave mudzimai. Chisungo ichi chakabviswa pakabviswa Amai Joice Mujuru pachigaro chekuva mutevedzeri webato iri muna 2014. Asi ikozvino chave kukonzera mutauro mubato sezvo vamwe vari kuti chakanangana nekuda kubvisa VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pachigaro chekuva mutevedzeri. VaMahiya vanotenderana nenyaya iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaEarnest Mudzengi, vanotungamira sangano reMedia Center vanoti VaMugabe vanokwanisa kutungamira pamutemo asi nyika yananga kumawere. Ko remangwana renyika rakamira sei kana VaMugabe vachiramba vari panyanga pasina kujeka kuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chavo? VaMudzengi vanoti remangwana renyika harina kujeka. Vamwe vari kuyambira kuti remangwana renyika richavarima kana VaMugabe vakasagadzirisa zviri mubato ravo. Mubato iri mune zvikwata zviviri zvinoti Team Lacoste inonzi inotungamirwa naVaMnangagwa uye Generation 40 inonzi ine vatungamiri vakaita segurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro, VaJonathan Moyo, gurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, pamwe nemuzukuru waVaMugabe vari gurukota rezvevechidiki, VaPatrick Zhuwao. No media source currently available
title: Kukwegura kwaVaMugabe Kwokonzeresa Mutauro Munyika

text: Boka rinoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu musangano reUnited Nations, reUnited Nations Human Rights Council, riri kutarisirwa kutumira nhume dzakakosha kuZimbabwe kuzoongoorora nezvekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kunonzi kuri kuitwa nehurumende. Mutauriri webazi rezvekudyidzana pamwe nekutengeserana nedzimwe nyika, VaGideon Gapare vanoti chikwata ichi chiri kutarisirwa munyika mushure mekubvumidzwa nehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti chiite basa racho. No media source currently available Vanoti sangano reUN rakatonyorera kubazi ravo richikumbira kuti nhengo dzaro dzibvumidzwe munyika. VaGapare vanotiwo Zimbabwe inhengo yesangano reUnited Nations, zvichireva kuti inofanirwa kutevedzera zvisungo zvesangano iri, vchiti nyika haina chekutya pane zvose zviri kuda kuferefetwa izvi. “President VaMnangagwa vakataura kuti Zimbabwe is open for business. Hapana chatinovanza. Hapana chinoitika muZimbabwe chatinonyara nacho. Saka kana kuchiuya mukuru anobva kuHuman Rights Council, kana kuti rapporteur on human rights, anenge achiuya zvichisanganisa nekunzwisisa ikoko kwekuti President vakati vanenge vachida kuuya muno muZimbabwe vanobvumidzwa kuuya, asi havagone kungouya vasina kunyorera kuMinistry of Foreign Affairs,” vanodaro VaGapare. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights VaKumbirai Mafunda vanotiwo danho reUnited Nations iri rakakosha zvikuru nemhaka yekuti Zimbabwe ine chisungo chayakazvipira yega kuchengetedza kodzero sezvinoitawo dzimwe nyika pasi rose. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inobvumidza Chikwata cheUN Kuzoferefeta Kutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu

text: Vamwe vagarii vemuChinhoyi vanoti havasi kufara nekukwira kuri kuita mitengo yezvekudya zvikuru sei nyika ichibva musarudzo. Vakawanda vevanhu ava vanoti mitengo yezvinhu zvinoshandiswa mazuva ose zvakaita semafuta, upfu, nyama nesipo zvakakwira mitengo kubva svondo rapera. Amai Senzeni Marimirofa vanoti chigubhu chemarita maviri chemafuta chakakwira kubva pamadhora maviri nemasendi makumi masere kusvika pamadhora matatu nemasendi makumi manomwe. Amai Marimirofa vanoti mafuta aya anobva kuSouth Africa izvo vanofunga kuti ndizvo zviri kuita kuti adhure. Amai Marimirofa vanoti zvinhu zvakawanda zvaakwira. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, Amai Getrude Chimedza, vanoti zvinhu zvakawanda zvakaita semafuta nemupunga zvakwirawo mutongo. Amai Chimedza vanoti zvimwe zvitoro zviri kutengesa nemari chaiyo kwete Ecocash kana Swipe mitengo yakadzikira. Amai Chimedza vanoti vanofunga kuti kushayikwa kwemari munyika ndiko kuri kuita kuti mitengo ikwire. Mumwe mugari, VaMcdonald Chaitezvi, vanoti kushayikwa kwemari mumabhangi ndiko kuri kuita kuti zvinhu zvikwire sezvo vanotengesa vave kutenga mari pamusika mutema. VaChaitezvi vanoti rimwe dambudziko riri kukonzera kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu ndezvematongerwo enyika sezvo vamwe vemabhizinisi vave kukwidza mitengo nekuda kwekusafara nezvakabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. VaChaitezvi vanoti kukwira kwemitengo kuri kuitika kuri kuratidza kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, havana samba rekuti mitengo igadzikane. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachishanda neLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanoti kusagadzikana munyaya yezvakabuda musarudzo zvimwe zvave kuita kuti vemabhizinisi vakwidze mitengo sezvo vasingazive kuti ramangwana rakamira sei. No media source currently available
title: Kukwira kweMitengo yeZvinhu Kworwadza Vakawanda

text: Vanachiremba vachangopedza zvidzidzo vari muzvipatara zvehurumende vanonzi vangangoramwa mabasa chero nguva zvichitevera kupera kwemazuva gumi nemana avakanga vakapa kuhurumende kuti igadzirise nyaya dzemashandiro avo. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vanachiremba vehurumende reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors’ Association, Doctor Edgar Munatsi, vanoti vachiri kurovana misoro nenhengo dzavo, asi mukupera kwemazuva matatu kana mana vanenge vave nechisungo chekuti voramwa mabasa here kana kuti vopa zvakare mukana kunhauriraro nehurumende. Doctor Munatsi vanoti vanachiremba vachangopedza zvidzidzo vari kuda kuti mari dzekubatsirikana pamwe nemihoro yavo dziwedzerwe uyewo kuti vapiwe mukana wekushanda vakazvimirira pavanenge vapedza nguva yavanoshanda vari pasi penyanzvi. Vanoti hurumende makore matatu apfuura yakambovapa vimbiso yekuti mari dzavo dzemihoro dzichawedzerwa zvichienderana nekuti munhu anenge achishanda zvakadii, asi vanoti kusvika pari nhasi hapana chati chaitwa. "Chikuru ndechekuti tinoda kuti vashandirwi vatipewo tsamba dzinoita kuti vanhu vakwanise kuzvishandira pachezvavo, kungava kuvhura ma surgery kana kushandawo kuma private mushure mekunge vanhu vapedza makore maviri anoshandwa munhu achitariswa nevakuru kuti akugona kushanda ari oga here," vanodaro Doctor Munatsi. Vanoti chimwe chiri kushungurudza vanachiremba inyaya yekusawedzerwa kwavo mari dzekubatsirikana pavanoshevedzwa kubasa usiku kana kuti on-call allowances kunyange hazvo muna 2015 hurumende yakabvuma kutarisisa nezvavo. Pari zvino vanachiremba ava vari kupiwa mari inota $288.00, asi vanoti hurumende yakanga yabvuma kuti ikwidzwe kuenda pa $720.00. Sangano reZHDA rinoti zvinenge zviri kuratidza kuti hurumende haina hurongwa hwekuti ingagadzirise sei matambudziko aya, sezvo hurumende yacho iri kuti hainawo mari. No media source currently available
title: Vana Chiremba Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa

text: Mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti PTUZ, VaTakavafira Zhou, vakurudzira masangano evashandi muBotswana pamwe neSADC kuti akomekedze nyika dzawo kuitira kuti dzigadzirise mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi, uye kuti dzitore matanho akasimba pane zviri kuitika muZimbabwe. Vachitaura pamusangano wepagore wesangano re Botswana Sectors of Educators Trade Unions, Bosetu, muBotswana, VaZhou vakurudzira kuti sangano iri nemamwe ari mudunhu reSADC akurudzire hurumende dzenyika dzawo kuti dzipindire mukugadzirisa gakava riri muZimbabwe. VaZhou vaenderera mberi vachiti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa iri kushungurudza vashandi munyika nekuvasunga senzira yekuvatyityidzira kuti vasaramwe mabasa kana kuratidzira. Pakati pemwedzi uno, sangano rePTUZ kuburikidza nemunyori mukuru varo, VaRaymond Majongwe, rakati zvichanetsa kuti zvikoro zvivhurwe mukotoro yechitatu sezvo varairidzi vari kutadza kurarama nekuda kwemari shoma dzavari kutambiriswa muZimbabwe. VaZhou vati mashoko aVaMajongwe aya, ayo vakataura masvondo maviri apfuura, akaita kuti vasungwe nemapurisa senzira yekutyityidzira vashandi. Vachitaurawo neStudio7 pamucheto wemusangano uyu, imwe nhengo ye PTUZ, Amai Lindiwe Hlabangane, vati vanoshuwira kuti hukama huri pakati pehurumende yeBotswana nevashandi vayo huitikewo kuZimbabwe. Munyori mukuru weBosetu, VaTobokani Rari, vaudza Studio7 kuti sangano ravo richaita zvose mukubatsirana nevashandi muZimbabwe, kunyanya vadzidzisi. VaZhou, avo vanova nhengo yeMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, vaudza vamwe vavo vemuBotswana kuti hurumende yemuZimbabwe iri kumwaya mapurisa mumaguta ose senzira yekutyityidzira vanhu kuti vasaratidzire. VaZhou vanga vakokwa semunyarikani pahurongwa hwe Bosetu muPalapye. No media source currently available
title: PTUZ Yokurudzira Masangano eVashandi muSADC Kutorera Zimbabwe Matanho

text: Hutungamiriri hwebato reZanuPF mudunhu reHarare West Constituency nemuwi weSvondo hwakagovera vanhu vanoshaya chibage mumusha weTynwald North richitenda kuvhota kwavakaita. Vanhu vakawanda vakaungana munhandare yemumusha uyu vachitambiriswa masagi ema50kgs echibage. Nhengo yebato reZanuPF avo vakakundwa musarudzo dzenhengo yedare reparamende pasarudzo yakaitwa musi wa30 Chikunguru VaGeorge Mashavave vanoti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangaggwa vakati vanhu havafanire kunonga svosve nemuromo. VaBlessing Chimanga avo vakakundwa neMDCA Alliance musarudzo dzakanzura muward 41 vakatiwo mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakawana mavhoti asina kumbowanikwa nevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe munharaunda iyi. VaMashavave vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vachaenderera mberi nekupa vanoshupika ava chikafu chakaita semupunga nemafuta ekubikisa munguva pfupi inotevera. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti chibage ichi vakachirimwa kupurazi kwavo uye zvimwe zvinhu zvichapiwa vagari vemu Harare West Constiuency vachatenga nemari yavo neimwe yavachapiwa nehama neshamwari vanoona kukosha kwekubatsira vanotambura. Imwe shirikadzi Amai Axillia Mudhonga vanoti kuti zvinofadza kuti bato reZanu-PF rapa vanhu chibage pasina rusarura. Gogo Mary Masoka vakaratidzwo kufara nechiitiko ichi. Asi VaThomas Moyo vakati havana kufara nevanhu vemabato anopikisa vaiuya kuzotora chibage asi vasingadi kuvhotera bato ravo. Bato reZanuPF rakawana mavhoti mazana maviri mumusha weTynwald North gore rino mushure mekuwana mavhoti gumi nemana muna 2013. Muzvare Joana Mamombe vebato reMDC ndivo vakakunda musarudzo dzedare reparamende uye VaKudzai Kadzombe vebato rimwe chetero vakakunda musarudzo dzekuva kanzura. No media source currently available
title: Zanu-PF Inotenda Vavhoti VemuTynwald North neChibage

text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti vachakunda musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika zvine mutsindo musi wa 30 Chikunguru. VaChamisa vakataura mashoko aya vari muMidlands neChishanu uko vakaita misangano yekutsvaga rutsigiro kuMataga neMberengwa. Asi VaChamisa vakati kukunda kwavo kunogona kukanganiswa nesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, iyo vakati haisi kubata sarudzo zvakanaka. Vakati Zec inofanira kurega zvekuvanza zvinhu panyaya yegwaro revavhoti uye bepa rekuvhotera. Mashoko aya ari kutsinhirwawo nemamwe mapato anopikisa, Zimbabwe Election Support Network nevaongorori veEuropean Union. Asi Zec ichitsigirwa nevamwe vebato reZanu-PF inoti iri kuita zvose zvinodiwa. VaChamisa vakatiwo vari kushushikana zvikuru nemararamiro ari kuita vanhu munzvimbo yeMberengwa umo vakati hamuna migwagwa yakanaka kana mazambuko. MDC Alliance iri kumirirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, Doctor Tyanai Masiya, avo vachatatsurana negurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJoram Gumbo veZanu PF, musarudzo yekutsvaga mumiriri weMberengwa West muNational Assembly. Vamwe vari kukwikwidza musarudzo iyi ndiva Vincent Moyo veMthwakazi Republican Party naVaHamufadzi Zhou cePeople's Rainbow Coalition. Vakatiwo vakasarudzwa kuti vatungamire nyika, vachayedza napose pavanogona napo kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nevagari vemunharaunda iyi nemamwe maruwa. VaChamisa vachange vari kuZvishavane neMugovera vachienderera mberi nekutsvaga rutsigiro. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Vanoti Vachakunda Musarudzo Zvine Mutsindo

text: Svondo rapera mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vakasaina kuti uve mutemo Zimbabwe Democracy and economic Recovery Amendment Act, ZIDERA, zvichitevera kuvandudzwa kwezvimwe zvikamu zvemutemo uyu. Zvikamu izvi zvakavandudzwa kuti zvipe mukana kuZimbabwe kuti igadzirise zvinhu zvairi kunzi neAmerica ivandudze. Zvinhu izvi zvinosanganisira sarudzo dzakachena, uye nyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu, senzira yekuti zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru muhurumende yeZanu PF zvibviswe. Asi hurumende yeZimbabwe svondo rino yakazivisa kuti kuvandudzwa pamwe nekusimbiswa kwemutemo uyu kwakatowedzera kushupika kwevana veZimbabwe kuburikidza nezvirango izvi. Vachitaura kuvatori venhau, gurukota rezvekunze kwenyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vakatiwo Zimbabwe iri kuedza napose painogona napo kugadzirisa zviri kunzi zvigadziriswe izvi, kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe iri nyika yakazvimirira, isina imwe nyika inoipa mitemo. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paTswane University of Technology, Doctor Ricky Mukonza, vanoti shanduko yakanga yavepo zvayo pasi pehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, asi zvakazoitika zvekupfurwa kwevanhu mushure mesarudzo zvinogona kunge zvakakanganisa zvinhu zvose. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Voita Maonero Akasiyana paMutemo weZIDERA

text: Madzimai anobva kumativi mana enyika ari kuzeya zvavari kuda kuti hurumende itsva yagadzwa neChishanu iitire vanhukadzi senzira yekuremekedza mabasa avanoita mukusimudzira nyika. Vakawanda vemadzimai aya vanotiwo vakashamiswa kuona vakuru vakuru vemauto vari kutungamira chirongwa che Operation Restore Legacy, pasina vanhukadzi pakati pavo. Mukuru wesangano reFemprist, Amai Rita Nyamupinga, vanoti havana kufara nemamiriro akanga akaita vakuru vakuru vaifambisa zvinhu muchiuto pasi pechirongwa che Operation Restore Legacy, sezvo pakanga pasina vanhukadzi. Amai Nyamupingidza vanoti izvi munongedzo wemafungiro ehurumende itsva ichange iri pasi paVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Aimbova murwiri werusununguko, Amai Thandiwe Ngulube, vanoti madzimai akadzikiswa chimiro kubudikidza zvakaitwa naAmai Grace Mugabe, avo vakapotsa vapinza nyika yese mumhirizhonga. Amai Ngulube vanoti madzimai vaisafanira kuita humbimbindoga nokuti ndiko kurasika kwavange votoita sezvo varume vachibatana kusvika vabuda nesungano. Mutungamiri wesangano reDisabled Womens Organisation, Amai Rejoice Timire, vanoti madzimai akaremara ane pfungwa dzokuronga zvine hungwaru nokuti vane pfungwa dzakarodzeka zvakatonyanyisa. Mukuru weWomens Action Group, Amai Edna Masiiwa, vanoti hurumende inofanira kuona kuti zvinodiwa nemadzimai zviri kucherechedzwa kubudikidza sezvakanyorwa mubumbiro remitemo yenyika yeZimbabwe. Mashoko aya anotsigirwa negweta rinoona nezvekodzero dzemadzimai, Amai Nyaradzayi Gumbonzvanda, vanoti vane zvisungo zvina zvinofanirwa kuongororwa nekukurumidza nehurumende itsva. Amai Sally Ncube vesangano reWomens Coalition iro rakaronga musangano uyu vanoti hakuna munhu akakosha kudarika mumwe nokuti Zimbabwe inhaka yakasiirwa munhu wese nemadzitateguru edu. No media source currently available
title: Madzimai Ozeya Zvichemo Zvokusvitsa kuHurumende Itsva

text: Zvichitevera kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kuri kuitika munyika, sangano reZimbabwe Human Rights Commission rinoti hurumende yeZimbabwe inofanirwa kuchengetedza kodzero dzemunhu wese munyika sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mumashoko avaburitsa, munyori kuru weZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, Amai Delis Mazambani, vati kunyange hazvo kuine denda reCovid-19 munyika, zvakakosha kuti hurumende iremekedze kodzero dzevanhu sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo pamwe nezviga zvakaita seUniversal Declaration of Human Rights pamwe neInternational Covenant on Civil and Political Rights. Komisheni iyi iri kukurudzirawo vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika kuti asaite kana kutaura zvinowedzera kana kukonzera kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu asi kuti munyika muve nerunyararo vanhu vachigara zvakanaka sezvinodiwa pasi pebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission yatiwo veruzhinji pamwe nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanofanira kunakidzwa nekodzero dzavo vasingabatsire kuparadzira hutachiwana hweCoronavirus pamwe nekutaura manyepo pamusoro pedenda iri. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, Dr Musa Kika, vati hakazi kekutanga Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission ichiburitsa mashoko akaita seayaburitswa nhasi vachiti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iterere nekugadzirisa zviri kunetsa. Vatiwo kunyange hurumende ikasaterera, vana veZimbabwe vanofanira kuramba vachitaura matambudziko avo vachiti kutaurwa kwave kuitwa nyaya yeZimbabwe kunze kwenyika kunoratidza kuti pane vari kuteerera zviri kuitika munyika. Gurukota rinoona nzvemutemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vati kunyange hazvo vange vasati vaona gwaro reZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, panoitika denda rakaita seCovid pane dzimwe kodzero dzinombomiswa ndosaka hurumende yakatora matanho ekumbhovhara nyika pasi pemitemo Covid-19 National Lockdown Regulations Vatiwo vanhu vanofanira kutaura chokwadi pamusoro penyika yavo uye vanhu vane mhosva vanofanira kupedzerana nematare kwete kuda kuti hurumende ipindire panyaya idzi. Zimbabwee Human Rights Commission inoti nzira dziri kuwanzoshandiswa pakutyora kodzero dzevanhu dzinosanganinisira, kunyombwa, kusungirwa mhosva dzisina maturo kana dzemanyepo, kunyangariswa pamwe nekurambidzwa kutaura, kuratidzira kana kuita misangano pamadiro. Zvichakadai mutori wenhau, Hopewell Chin’ono, apinda muzuva rechipiri achipa humbowo hwemaririro akaita zvinhu kumajeri pachikumbiro chake chekuti atonngwe achibva kumba panyaya yaari kupomerwa yekukurudzira kutti vanhu varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga mwedzi wapfuura. Chin’ono achaenderera mberi achipa humbowo neChina. Nyaya iyi iri kunzikwa mudare mune magweta, vachuchusi nemutongi chete zvichitevera chkiumbiro chakaitwa nevachuchusi kuti veruzhinji nevatori venhau vasabvumidzwe sezvo Chin’ono achikwanisa kutaura zvinhu zvinozopa kuti mumajeri musagadzikane. Chin’ono naVaJacob Ngarivhume vakasungwa musi 20 Chikunguru vachipomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira kuti vanhu varatidzire. Vaviri ava vava nemwedzi vari muhusungwa vachinyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso. Masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, mapato anopikisa munyika pamwe nevamwe vedzisvondo vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyikaapo vanhu vanodarika makumi matanhatu vakasungwa pamusoro pekuratidzra kwainge kwarongwa musi wa31 Chikunguru nesangano reJuly 31st Movement.. Masangano eSADC, African Union pamwe neUnited Nations anotiwo haasiri kufara nemabatirwo ari kuitwa kodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe nehurumendev yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. South Africa yakatodoma nhume dzichabatsira kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa muZimbabwe, idzo dzaifanirwa kunge dzakasangana naVaMnangagwa, mapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano akazvimirira, asi nhumwa idzi dzakadzokera mushure mekunge dzaita musangano naVaMnangagwa dzikazoudza masangano akanga akadzimirira kuti musangano wanga wakarongwa hauchaitwa sezvo nhumwa idzi dzaida kutanga dzataura nemutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa. No media source currently available
title: Komisheni yeHurumende Inoudza Hurumende Kuti Ichengetedze Kodzero dzeVanhu Vose Munyika

text: Sangano reAmnesty International nemusi weChitatu rakaparura gwaro remamiriro akaita nyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu munyika dzepasi rino kusanganisa Zimbabwe. Gwaro iri rinotarisa nyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu mumakore a2015 na 2016 rakaparurwa paNelson Mandela Foundation muJohannesburg, South Africa. Amnesty International inoti chiri kufadza chete panyaya yeZimbabwe inyaya yekuti yasvitsa makore gumi isina kuuraya kana musungwa mumwe chete akatongerwa rufu. Nyaya yekutsakatika kwemurwiri wekodzero dzevanhu VaItai Dzamara inonzi neAmnesty International munongedzo wekuti muZimbabwe zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. VaDzamara vakapambwa pamba pavo muHarare musi wa 9 Kurume gore rapera nevarume vashanu kusvika parizvino hakuna anoziva kuti vari kupi. VaDzamara ndivo vakavamba sangano reOccupy Africa Unity Square iro rairatidzira muHarare richiti VaMugabe vaende pamudyandigere richivapomera mhosva yekutadza kutonga. Amnesty International inoti kunyangwe hazvo dare rakati mapurisa atsvage kuna VaDzamara havaone paine zviri kuitwa zvinoratidza kuti nyaya iyi iri kuferefetwa. Amnesty International yatiwo hurumende haisi kuzadzikisa zviga zvebumbiro remitemo uye iri kumbunyikidza vanhu vanenge vachida kuratidzira, kuputsa dzimba dzevanhu pasina mutongo wedare uye kusunga vatori venhau. Vatori venhau gumi kubva kumapepa akazvimirira uye ehurumende akasungawo munguva iyi. Vemasangano akazvimirira oga vakasungwawo vachipomerwa mhosva dzakasiyana siyana. Mapurisa achishnadisa mutemo wePublic Order and Security Act anonzi akamisawo masangano akawanda aida kuratidzira. Sangano rekodzero dzevanhu iri rinotiwo kodzero dzevashandi hadzisi kuchengetedzwawo munyika zvopa kuti vashandi vadzingwe mabasa vasina kupihwa mari dzemudyandigere. Imwe nyaya yanzi kutyora kodzero dzevanhu kudzinga mumigwagwa vanhu vanorarama nekutengesa zvinhu zvakasiyana siyana mumadhorobha. Amnesty International yatiwo hurumende haisi kuzadzikisa zviga zvebumbiro remitemo uye iri kumbunyikidza vanhu vanenge vachida kuratidzira, kuputsa dzimba dzevanhu pasina mutongo wedare uye kusunga vatori venhau. Vatori venhau gumi kubva kumapepa akazvimirira uye ehurumende akasungawo munguva iyi. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaMarufu Mandevere vari kuita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro paAmerican University muWashington DC vanoti hurumende inofanira kuona kuti kodzero dezevanhu dzazadzikiswa.
title: Amnesty Internationa Inoti Zimbabwe Yave neMakore Gumi Isati Yauraya Vakatongerwa Rufu, Asi Ichityora Hayo Kodzero dzeVanhu.

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vodoma mamwe makurukota gumi nemana asi vamwe vanoti nyika haina mari yekuita zvakadai. Kirsty Coventry otora imwe menduru yegoridhe kumakwikwi ema All Africa Games. Nyika yeAmerica nhasi iri kurangarira makore gumi nemana vanhu vanoda kusvika zviuru zvitatu vaurayiwa nematororo ayo akashandisa ndege dzaive nevanhuwo zvavo kurwisa zvivakwa munew york, muPennsylvania pamwe nemuzinda wemauto wePentagon uri muWashington DC. Bato idzva rePeople’s Democratic Party ropeta Congress yaro muHarare VaTendai Biti vachisarudzwa kuti vari tungamire. Musakanganwa kuteerera kuchirongwa chedu che LiveTalk na 8:30 pm apo tichange tichitarisa kudomwa kwemamwe makurukota gumi nemana nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe, panguva iyo nyika iri kunzi haina mari yekuita madanha akadai. Iyi ndiyo misoro yenhau dzedu dzanhasi...munotibata pa 909 am, 4930, kana pa 12080, ne 15460 Kilohertzs paShortwave kana paFacebook page yedu yeVOA Shona. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau Dzanhasi Chishanu 11 Gunyana 2015

text: Amai Grace Mugabe, mudzimai wevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakaendeswa kumatare nemumwe mushandi wavo aive mutyairi VaColumbus Madzinga avo vakadzingwa basa pachikoro chavo cheAmai Mugabe Junior School kuMazowe. VaMadzinga vanoti vaishandiswa nguva yakareba vasingabhadharwe kunova kutyora mutemo wevashandi. Nyaya iyi yakamboda kuzeyiwa kudare rekuyananisa vashandi nevashandirwi asi magweta aAmai Mugabe haana kuuya kudare. Kubva zvabviswa VaMugabe pachigaro, zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kumhuri yavo sezvo vhiki rapera vamwe vanokorokoza goridhe vanonzi vainge vari papurazi ravo kuMazowe vachichera goridhe zvisiri pamutemo. Amai Mugabe vakamhan’ara nyaya iyi kumapurisa asi hurumende inoti nyaya yavo ndeyemugotsi matsuro. No media source currently available
title: Amai Grace Mugabe Voendeswa kuMatare neMumwe Mushandi Wavo

text: Gungano reMining Engineering and Transport Expo kana kuti Mine Entra iro rinosanganisa makambani anoita zvezvicherwa nemamwe mabasa anoenderana neizvi ratanga muBulawayo neChitatu vanhukadzi vachikurudzirwa kuti vapinde mumabasa kana kuvamba mabhizimisi ane chekuita nezvezvicherwa. Kurudziro iyi yapiwa pamusangano wekutanga wekuzeya mikana ingavepo kuvanhukadzi mumabasa kana mabhizimisi ezvicherwa. Mutevedzeri wemukuru weZimbabwe Chamber of Mines, Amai Elizabeth Nerwande-Chibanda, vati vanhukadzi vanosangana nezvimhingamupinyi zvakasiyana-siyana zvakafanana nekuwoma kwakaita mabasa ane chekuita nezvezvicherwa uye kushaya vanhu vangavabatsira kuti vakwanise kupinda mumabasa aya. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Miners Federation, Amai Apolonia Munzverengwi, avo vati madzimai akawanda ave kuda kupindawo mumabhizimisi ezvezvicherwa asi vanoshaya mari inodiwa kuti vaite izvi. Pamusangano uyu pabudawo nyaya yekuti vamwe vanhukadzi vanenge vawana nzvimbo dzekuchera zvicherwa, kunyanya goridhe, vanosangana nedambudziko rekushungurudzwa nevamwe vanhu vanzi vanenge vachishandisa mazita evakuru vakuru munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, senzira yekuvabvisa panzvimbo idzi. Mutevedzeri webazi rezvicherwa, VaFred Moyo, vaudza vatapi venhau kuti vange vasingakwanise kutaura zvakwanda pamusoro penyaya iyi sezvo vange vasati vambonzwa nezvayo. Amai Munzverengwi vati zvisinei nezvhimhingamupinyi zvingavepo vanhukadzi vanofanirwa kutora mikana iripo yekupinda mumabasa kana mabhimisi ezvicherwa. Muzvare Barbara Mutambanengwe ndivo mudzimai wekutanga munyika kuve nekambani inosuka mangoda. Muzvare Mutambanegwe, avo vati vakashingirira kuenda mberi nekutanga kambani yavo yeKe Nako Diamond Processing zvisinei kuti vaisangana nezvimhingamupinyi zvakawanda, vatsinhirawo kuti vanhukadzi vatore mikana yekupinda mumabasa pamwe nemabhizimisi ezvezvicherwa. Mumwe wevakuru veZimplats, VaStanley Segula, vati chinhu chinoziikanwa kuti vanhukadzi vanoita mabasa avanoita nemazvo nekuda kwekuzvipira vakatiwo kambani yavo yakatanga hurongwa hwekuwedzera vanhukadzi vanoshanda mukambani iyi pamwe nekubatsira mamwe madzimai kutanga mabhizimisi senzira yekubatsira kusimudzira hupenyu hwevanhu vemunharaunda yavanochera chicherwa chePlatinum. Zvichakadaro vamwe vevanhu vari vane zviratidzwa zvavo pagungano iri vanoti chiitiko ichi, icho chinoitwa gore rega rega, chinoramba chakavakoshera nekuvapa mukana wekushambadza zvinhu zvavo. VaKennedy Charimba veHardrock Mining Tools Private Limited, avo vanotengesa michina yakasiyana-siyana inoshandiswa mumabasa ezvicherwa vatiwo vanotarisira kuti kuvepo kwavo paMine Entra kuchabatsira kambani yavo. Gungano reMine Entra regore rino nderechimakumi maviri nemaviri kubva zvakatanga kuitwa chirongwa ichi. Makambani anosvika zana nemakumi maviri kusanganisira ekuSouth Africa neChina ari kuratidzira pachiitiko chegore rino. No media source currently available
title: Vanhukadzi Vokurudzirwa Kupinda Mubhizinesi reZvicherwa kuMusangano weMine Entra

text: Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe People First, Amai Joice Mujuru, vakataura mashoko akakatyamadza vanhu neSvondo apo vakati vanhu vavakadzinga mubato vaida kuvamanikidza kuita zvepabonde navo. Vachitaura pamusangano wavakaita nehutungamiri hwebato ravo mudunhu reMasvingo neSvondo, Amai Mujuru vakati vakadzinga vamwe vavakavamba navo bato ravo, VaDidymus Mutasa, VaRugare Gumbo, nevamwe vavo nekuti vaida kuvachinjanisa pabonde vachivaita mudzimai wavo varume vose ava. Amai Mujuru vakaenderera mberi vachiti vakatanga kunetsana na VaMutasa, VaGumbo nevamwe vavo apo vakavarambidza kuti vasashandise mari yebato vachizvipfumisa. Vakatiwo VaMutasa pamwe na VaGumbo vairamba kuti vabatane nemamwe mapato kuitira kuti vakwikwdze uye vabvise mutungamiiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pachigaro musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Vakati vakazoona kuti varume ava vaive vachiri kushandira Zanu PF nokudaro vakavadzinga kuti vasavavhiringe pachirongwa chekubatana nemamwe mapato akaita se MDC inotungamirwa na VaMorgan Tsvangirai. Asi mumwe wevatauriri vevakadzingwa ava, VaKudakwashe Bhasikiti, vakaramba mashoko aAmai Mujuru vachiti manyepo.
