VaBhasikiti vakati ivo hurongwa hwezimai renyuchi hwaisava hwekuita zvepabonde asi kuti hwaive hwekuvatsigira nekuvharidzira hurema hwavo hwekusagona kutungamirira bato. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaMutasa kanawo VaGumbo kuti tinzwe mativi avo sezvo nhare dzavo dzanga dzichinetsa kubata kubva neMuvhuro.
title: Amai Mujuru Vosvibisa VaGumbo naVaMutasa?

text: Vagari vekuHurungwe West mudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti havasi kufara nezvakaitwa nebato ravo zvekudzinga mubato vaimbova sachigaro weMashonaland West, VaTemba Mliswa, ivo pasina chavakadza. Vatsigiri veZanu PF ava vanoti pakadaidzirwa sarudzo ye by election, vanoda kuti VaMliswa vakwikwidze senhengo yakazvimirira. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamusangano wakaitwa neSvondo, nhengo dzeZanu PF mudunhu iri dzakabuda pachena kuti dzinotsigira kuti VaMliswa vamire senhengo yakazvimirira musarudzo ye by-election ichadaidzirwa zvichitevera kudzingwa kwavakaita mubato masvondo maviri apera. Sabhuku Modekai Chareya ndivo vakaparura nyaya yekuti VaMliswa vavamiririre vachiti VaMliswa ngavataure pamberi pechitsa chevanhu kuti vanoda here kana kuti kwete kukwikwidza vakazvimirira. VaMliswa vakabvuma vachiti vanonzwa kuninipiswa zvikuru kuti vanhu vakawanda muHurungwe West vachine chivimbo nehutungamiriri hwavo. Musangano uyu wakapindwa nemasachigaro evechidiki nemadzimai ematunhu madiki gumi nemasere, madzishe, masadunhu, masabhuku pamwe nevaimbove varwiri verusununguko. Mumwe wevaimbove varwiri verusununguko vanoda kudanwa nezita rekuti Air Marshall vanoti vanotsigira danho rekuti VaMliswa vakwikwidze vakazvimirira kuitira kuti vapedzise mabasa avakatanga apo vakasarudzwa muna 2013. Va Air Marshall vanoti hakuna munhu anoita mhirizhonga muHurungwe West sezvo nguva yehondo yakadarika, vakati havazi kuzotambira mhirizhonga mudunhu iri. VaMliswa vanoti pari zvino havasati vatambira mashoko ekuti havachisiri nhengo yeparamende. Zanu PF haisati yanyorerawo paramende ichiyizivisa nezvekudzingwa kwaVaMliswa mubato iri. Musangano wekuHurungwe West wakaitirwa pachikoro chepa Karambazungu, uye waive wekupemberera kugona kwakaita vana vepachikoro ichi mudunhu iri zvichienzaniswa nezvimwe zvikoro zvemumaguta makuru. Asi wakazopedzisira wava wezvematongerwo enyika vanhu voburitsa kusafara kwavo nezviri kuitika muZanu PF zvichitevera kupinda mune zvematongerwo enyika kwakaitwa nemudzimai wemutungamiri webato, Amai Grace Mugabe. Vanhu vakawawanda vanosanganisira vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, vakadzingwa muhurumende vachipomerwa mhosva dzinonzi ndedzekunyeba dzekuda kupfuudza VaMugabe.
title: Hurungwe West Yotsigira VaMliswa Vakadzingwa muZanu PF

text: Masangano akakosha ekunze ari kutsika madziro panyaya yekubatsira Zimbabwe munyaya dzezvehupfumi izvo zvinonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi zvave kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. Paris Club, IMF neWorld Bank, masangano akakosha zvikuru pakukweretesa nyika dzepasi rino mari anoti haasi kuzobatsira Zimbabwe nezvikwereti kana isina kuvandudza zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye zvematongerwo enyika. Vachipindura chikumbiro cherubatsiro kubva kugurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, mutsamba iri mumaoko eStudio 7, sachigaro weParis Club Amai Odile Renaud-Basso vakati hakuna kukanganwirwa zvikwereti kana kupihwa zvimwe kuchaitwa Zimbabwe kana isina kuvandudza zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi nematongerwo enyika. Ichi chibhakara chematsenanzungu kuZimbabwe nekuti yange iine chivimbo chekuwana donhodzo kuParis Club uko yagara iine chikwereti chinodarika mabhiriyoni matatu. Gungano iri rinotiwo mari dziri kupihwa Zimbabwe kubatsira kurwisa chirwere cheCovid19 dzinofanira kushandiswa zvakanaka kuti vanokweretesa mari vazode kubatsira mune remangwana. Kushaya zvikwereti uku kwave kupa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hutatarike zvakanyanya uye kuti hurumende iburitse meno ayo. Mubatanidzwa wenyika dzenyika dzekumawirira weEuropean Union unoti kunyangwe hazvo mubatanidzwa wemapato ezvematongerwo wePOLAD wakanaka, hapana chinobatika chinobuda kana pasina mutungamiri weMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa avo vakawana mavhoti akawanda pamapato ose anopikisa musarudzo dza2018. Asi vachitaura kudare resenate nemusi weChina, VaNcube vakati vaisa mitemo yekumutsiridza hupfumi asi pane makoronyera ari kuvhiringidza hupfumi nekutengesa mari pamukoto. Vanoti nyaya yekuparurawo musika wemari yekunze wecurrency exchange munongedzo wekuti vakazvipira kugadzirisa hupfumi. Mapurisa anotiwo vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri vasungwa kusvika parizvino nekuramba kutambira dhora remunyika vachinzi vari kutyora mutemo weBank Use and Suppression of Money Laundering Act unoti wose anoramba kushandisa mari iri pamutemo anosungwa. Kuti danho iri rinoshanda? Nyanzvi munyaya dzemabhanga VaGilbert Muponda vanoti mutemo unomanikidza vanhu kutambira mari yakaparurwa neRBZ.. Asi Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paDurban University of Technology Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti mitemo yehurumende yekurambidza kunyatsoshanda kwemari yapanharembozha kwapa kuti vanhu vashaye chivimbo nemari yemunyika. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo neimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Dr Prosper Chitambara vesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute avo vanoti kushaya simba kwedhora remunyika kunoreva kuti hazvichave nyore kushandisa mari diki nekuti kuitakura watove mutoro. Kunyangwe paine maonero akasiyana pamatanho ari kutorwa nehurumende, vakawanda vari kutenderana kuti Zimbabwe inofanira kuvandudza zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi nekutengesa zvinhu zvakawanda kunze kwenyika. Mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika anozni ari kupa vemabhizimisi vekunze kuti vazengurire kuzouchika mari yavo muZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yonyimwa Zvikwereti neveKunze Zvopa Kuti Zvinhu Zvisagadzikane

text: America yagadza mutungamiri wayo wechimakumi mana nemashanu, VaDonald Trump pahurongwa hwanga huchionekwa nepasi rose. Vanga vari mutungamiri weAmerica, VaBarack Obama, vatambidza VaTrump masimba sezvinodiwa nemitemo yeAmerica. Nyaya yekugadza vatungamiri zvakadai yakatangwa musi wa30 Kubvumbi 1789 pakatora mhiko mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica wekutanga VaGeorge Washington. Zuva iri rakazoitwa zororo naVaDwight D Eisenhower vakambotungamirawo America. Kubva muna 1789 kusvika muna 1933 mutungamiri wenyika nemutevedzeroi wake vaitora mhiko musi wa 4 Kurume. Asi bumbiro remitemo rakazovandudzwa muna 1933 rikazotanga kushanda muna 1937 apo vatungamiri vainge votora mhiko musi wa20 Ndira. Mwedzi waKurume wainge wasarudzwa sezvo zvainetsa makare kuunganidza mavhoti. Asi kubva kumakore ekuma1800, vatungamiri veAmerica havagadzwe musi weSvondo nekudaro kana musi weSvondo uri iwo musi wa20 Ndira, mutungamiri anotoreswa mhiko kuWhite House pane vanhu vashoma ozotora mhiko zvakare musi weMuvhuro. Izvi zvakaitwa muna 1985 apo VaRonald Reagan vakatoreswa mhiko kaviri kuWhite House nepadare reparamende kana kuti Capitol. Vatungamiri vasati vagadzwa makare vaibva vambotura mashoko avo kunyika, asi ikozvino vanotanga vatoreswa mhiko nemutongi mukuru wematare vochizotura mashoko kunyika yavo. VaWilliam Henry Harrison ndivo vakataura kwenguva yakareba munhoroondo yevatungamiri veAmerica musi wa 4 Kurume 1841. Muna 1921 VaWarren G Harding ndivo vakave mutungamiri wekutanga kushandisa loud speaker. Muna 1925, VaHarry S Truman ndivo vakatanga kutura mashoko kunyika vachibuda pazvivhiti vhiti neparhedhiyo. Kugadzwa kwaVaBill Clinton muna 1997 ndiko kwakatanga kubuda padandemutande reinternet. VaGeorge Washington ndivo vakatangawo kutaura mashoko ekuti mwari ndibatsirei pakutora mhiko kana kuti “So help me God” zvave kuitwa nevatungamiri vakawanda pasi rose. Asi kunyangwe vatungamiri vachienda havo murunyararo, vamwe vanhu vanenge vachiratidzira nekusafarira vatungamiri vatsva vanenge vachipinda. Zvose izvi zvinoitwa murunyararo. Ko chii chingadzidzwe neZimbabwe panyaya yekusiya masimba muAmerica? Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye richishanda neHuman Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga, vatiwo zviri kuitwa muAmerica zvinonetsa kuona zvichiitika muZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica nekuda kwekutonga nedemo uye kusaremekedza zvabuda musarudzo. Asi vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vakarerekera kuZanu-PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti havatenderane naVaMavhinga vachiti hakuna dunhu risina datya. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaJoy Mabenge, vanoti zvakawanda zvinodzidzwa neZimbabwe vachiti kunyangwe vamwe vari kugunun’una uye vakawanda vachifarira VaObama vachiri kudiwa nevanhu, havasi kurambira pachigaro. Vakakundwao musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica, Amai Hillary Clinton, vange vari pagungano rekutambidzana masimba kuratidza zvanzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika munongedzo wekuti vanhu vemuAmerica vanoremekedza sarudzo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nevanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vari kuFlorida, VaPromise Sande, avo vati musarudzo dzinotevera munyika, mapato ose anofanira kuremekedza zvido zvevanhu. Sarudzo dzemuAmerica dzinotevera dzichaitwa muna 2020 uye mutungamiri wenyika achizotora mhiko muna 2021. No media source currently available
title: Kutambidzanwa Masimba muAmerica - Chidzidzo Chakanakira Zimbabwe?

text: Imwe ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reZimbabwe Vulnerability Assessment Committee kana kuti ZIMVAC inoratidza kuti varume vakawanda vanoti vari kumbunyikidzwa mudzimba nemadzimai kuMatabeleland South. Varume vanoda kusvika zvikamu zvinomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 6,9% zvichienzaniswa nemadzimai anodarika zvikamu zvina kubva muzana kana kuti 4,1% vakati vari kushungurudzwa mudzimba. Varume vanoti vari kushungurudzwa nenyaya dzebonde, kutukwa nekurohwa. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rePadare/ Enkundleni Mens Forum iro rinorwira kuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pemadzimai nevanhurume VaPaul Vingi vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvirikubuda muoongoro iyi hazvishamise sezvo varume vakawanda vasinga bude pachena kana vachimbunyikidzwa nemadzimai avo. "Kurudziro yedu ndeyekuti kana varume vatarisana nedambudziko rekushungurudzwa mudzimba vanofanirwa kubuda pachena vawane rubatsiro kwete kunyarara izvo zvinozoita kuti vapinde munataisireva." Vaenderera mberi vachitiwo, " Tiri kuwona huwandu hwevarume vari kutora hupenyu hwavo uchikwira nekuti dzimwe tsika nemagariro edu sevatema hadzi kukurudzira kuti vanhurume vabude pachena nekukurukura pamusoro pezvavanenge vachisangana nazvo mudzimba," No media source currently available
title: ZIMVAC Inoti Varume Vakawanda Vari Kumbunyikidzwa Mudzimba neMadzimai kuMatabeleland South

text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti neMugovera hakuna munhu akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya huwandu hwevafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera huchiri pachiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi masere nevaviri 1, 582. Vanhu gumi nevapfumbamwe vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi pazviuru makumi matatu nezvisere nemazana mashanu nemana, 38, 554. Vamwe vanhu gumi vakaporawo zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nematanhatu nemazana matatu negumi nevasere kana kuti 36, 318. Vanhu vachiri kurwara munyika vave mazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevana kana kuti 654. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisawo kuti vanhu vabayiwa nhomba munyika yose vainge vava zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nepfumbamwe zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti kuti 579, 769 Pavanhu ava, vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano vave zviuru mazana maviri negumi nevatatu nemazana mashanu nemakumi mana nevaviri kana kuti 213, 542. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi senzira yekumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Mukuru wezvekudzivirirwa kwedenda iri munyika Doctor Agnes Mahomva vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu vanofanira kuenda kunobayiwa nhomba nekuti kusvika parizvino hapana vabayiwa vambosangana nematambudziko. Zimbabwe iri kubaya nhomba yeSinopharm neSinovac kubva kuChina uye Covaxin kubva kuIndia. Zvinhu hazvinawo kumira zvakanaka kuSouth Africa uko bazi rezvehutano riri kuti huwandu hwevari kubatwa nechirwere ichi hwawedzera nezvikamu makumi mana nematanhatu kubva muzana kana kuti 46% mumazuva mashoma adarika. MuSouth Africa mune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvinopota zvichipinda nekubuda munyika. Dr Enoch Mayida vaimbotungamira chipatara cheChitungwiza vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba vakawanda kuti ikwanise kushanda zvakanaka. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kubayiwa Nhomba Apo Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chodzoka Zvine Mutsingo kuSouth Africa

text: Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Doctor Muthuli Ncube vakaburitsa mashoko kuvatori venhau nemusi weMuvhuro vachiti vambomisa basa vashandi vana vekubhanga iri vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuori. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko evanozviti vachangopihwa basa rekutaura vakamirira bazi rezvemari VaAcie Lumumba paFacebook yavo ekuti vana ava vari kuita zvehuori nekutengesa mari pamukoto. Asi mashoko ekuti VaLumumba vakapihwa basa iri kurambwa nebazi rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko rinoti VaLumumba havana kumbobvira vapihwa basa rekutaura vakamirira VaNcube vachiti vanotaura chete kuburikidza nebazi ravo. VaLumumba vakataura mashoko aya nezuro vachiti vaitaura vakazvimiririra kwete kumiririra bazi rezvemari. Vamiswa basa ava vanosanganisa VaMirirai Chiremba, VaNorman Mataruka, VaGresham Muradzikwa uye VaAzvinandawa Saburi. VaMangudya vati vari kuda kuferefeta nyaya iyi. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti VaMthuli vanofanira kuumba chikwata chavanachipangamazano munyaya dzezvehupfumi kwete VaLumumba. No media source currently available
title: VaMangudya Vomisa Vashandi veRBZ Basa neNyaya yaVaLumumba yeKuti Vari Kuita zveHuori

text: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vakazivisa neChipiri kuti bato ravo richaita musangano waro mukuru weOrdinary Congress mukupera kwemwedzi unouya waChikumi. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaWitness Dube, vatsinhira mashoko aya vachiti musangano uyu uchapindwa nehutungamiriri hwebato hunodarika zviuru zvina hunobva kumatunhu ose uye ndipo pachasarudzwa hutungamiri hwepamusoro hwebato, vachiti zvgar zvichakwikwidzwa zvinosanganisira chemutungamiri webato. VaDube vanoti musangano mukuru uyu waifanirwa kunge wakaitwa muna Kurume wegore rino asi wakazosendekwa kuitira kupa mukana wekuti vapinde musarudzo dzema by-election dzakaitwa musi wa 26 Kurume. VaMwonzora vakasarudzwa kuve mutungamiri weMDC-T pamusangano we Extra-ordinary Congress muna Zvita 2020 vachikunda Muzvare Thokozani Khupe avo vakabuda mumusangano uyu vachinyunyuta kuti VaMwonzora vakanga vabiridzira sarudzo idzi. No media source currently available
title: MDC-T Inotungamirirwa naVaMwonzora Yozivisa Kuti Ichaita Kongiresi Yayo Muna Chikumi weGore Rino

text: Hurumende haina kutevedzera zvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika apo yakabvisa midziyo yeMbada Diamonds kwaChiadzwa zvichitevera kusapihwa nehurumende kwekambani iyi rezenisi rekuramba ichiita basa rekuchera mangoda. Hurumende haina kutevedzera zvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika apo yakabvisa midziyo yeMbada Diamonds kwaChiadzwa zvichitevera kusapihwa nehurumende kwekambani iyi rezenisi rekuramba ichiita basa rekuchera mangoda. Izvi zviri mumutongo waturwa neChitatu nedare repamusoro. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, Va Joseph Mafusire, vatura mutongo wekuti kambani yaichera mangoda kwaMarange yeMbada Diamonds yakabvisirwa michina yayo yekucheresa mangoda panzvimbo iyi zvisiri pamutemo. Mumutongo wavo, Va Mafusire vati michina iyi inofanira kuramba iripo kusvikira nyaya yairi kukwikwidza kumatare kuti irambe ichichechera mangoda aya yapedzwa kuzeyewa mumatare. Zvaturwa nedare zvatsinhirwa nerimwe remagweta ari kumirira panyaya iyi, Va Lewis Uriri. Asi Va Uriri vati havasi kubvumirana nemutongo waturwa nedare vachiti vachakwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro-soro re Supreme Court vachiti hurumende yakapa makambani aya mwedzi mitatu sezvinodiwa pamurawu kuti vabvise michina yavo kuminda yemangoda kwaMarange. Mutongi wedare ati kambani yeMbada ibvumidzwe kuisa vanhu vayo vanochengetedza michina iyi kudzamara nyaya yayo iri mumatare yapera kuzeyewa mumatare. Izvi zvinotevera kudzingwa kunonzi kwakaitwa vashandi vekambani iyi nemapurisa akaenda kunochengetedza kwaMarange zvichitevera kurambidzwa kwakaitwa makambani ese aichera mangoda kwaChiadzwa nehurumende kuti aenderere mberi nebasa. Zvisinei, Va Mafusire vati Mbada Diamonds haibvumidzwe kuchera mangoda kwaChiadzwa sezvo isina kumutsurudza rezenesi rayo rekuchera mangoda sezvinodiwa nemutemo. Hurumende yakadzinga makambani ese aichera mangoda kwaChiadzwa ichiti akange asina kumutsurudza marezenesi awo uye makambani aya anga achiramba kubatana kuti awumbe kambani imwechete izvo zvinonzi nehurumende zvaizoita kuti inyatsokwanisa kuongorora mafambiro aiita mangoda kwaChiadzwa. Mutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, vanoti pane mari inodarika mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu emadhora ($15 billion) yakanyangadika mukutengeswa kwaiitwa mangoda nemakambani aichera mangoda kwaMarange. Kunyange hazvo Va Mugabe vakataura izvi, hapana kana munhu mumwe chete ati asungwa achipomerwa mhosva iyi izvo zvakonzera kuti vemapato anopikisa vanyunyute. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rinoti Mbada Diamonds Ngaibvumidzwe Kuchengetedza Midziyo Yayo kwaMarange

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vari kutarisirwa kutaura pamusangano webato ravo repagore kuMasvingo. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vari kutarisirwa kutaura pamusangano webato ravo repagore kuMasvingo nemusi weChishanu asi vari kupinda mumusangano uyu nyika ichitatarika uye bato ravo riine kunetsana kunotyisa. VaMugabe mbune vakaudza musangano weNational Committee webato ravo kuti mumusangano mavo mapindwa napongwe nenyaya yekurwira zvigaro. Vanoti bato ravo rakundikana kugadzirisa nyaya yezvehupfumi uho hwaenda kumawere zvichikonzerwa nenyaya yekurwira zvigaro. Kunyange uyu musangano usiri wekongiresi inoitwa kamwe chete pamakore mashanu kutsvaga vatungamiri vatsva, vamwe munyika vanoti nemakore aVaMugabe zvave kuda kuti vataure kuti voenda pamudyandigere riini kuitira kuti kurwisana kupere. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu richishanda sechipangamazano musangano reHuman Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti VaMugabe vakundikana kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Asi gweta remuHarare rakarerekera kuZanu-PF, VaStephen Zvinavakobvu, vanoti VaMugabe vakasarudzwa nevanhu nekudaro vanofanira kusiyiwa vachitonga. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Vanobvuma Kuti Kunetsana muZanu-PF Kwauraya Bato

text: Komisheni yakadomwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti iongorore mhirizhonga yakaitika muHarare muna Nyamavhuvhu yakoka mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, kuti vazopindura nyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuti ndivo vakakonzeresa mhirizhonga iyi. Asi VaChamisa vanoti havasi kuzomira pamberi pekomisheni iyi kana VaMnangagwa vasina kushevedzwa. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamuzinda webato ravo paMorgan Tsvangirai House muHarare neChina, VaChamisa vati vatambira tsamba yakanyorwa nasachigaro wekomisheni iyi avo vaimbova mutungamiri weSouth Africa kwechinguvana yekuvakoka kuti vazopa humbowo kukomisheni. Mutsamba iyi, iyo iri mumaoko eStudio 7, VaMotlanthe vati VaChamisa vanofanira kupindura kumhosva yavakapomerwa nevamwe vakapa hufakazi kukomisheni yavo hwekuti ndivo vakakonzeresa mhirizhonga yemusi wa1 Nyamavhuvhu yakazoita kuti vanhu vatanhatu vafe uye vazhinji vakuvare mushure mekupfurwa nevari kufungidzirwa kuti masoja. Vamwe vakumbirwa nekomisheni iyi kuti vazopa hufakazi mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC, VaTendai Biti, vakakwikwidza vakamirira MDC Alliance kuHarare South avo vaimbova nhengo yeZanu PF vaShadreck Mashayamombe pamwe naVaJim Kunaka vebato reNational Patriotic Front. Asi VaChamisa vati havasi kuzonomira pamberi pekomisheni iyi kana VaMnangagwa nemutevedzeri wavo VaConstantino Chiwenga vasina kushevedzwa kuzopa humbowo kukomisheni iyi. Mukuru-mukuru wemapurisa VaGodwin Matanga vakaudza komisheni iyi kuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakapa masoja mvumo yekupinda mumigwagwa zvavakati zvaizivikanwawo naVaChiwenga avo vaivawo zvakare gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika. Mutauriri wekomisheni yaVaMotlanthe, VaJohn Masuku, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakanakira VaChamisa kuti vamire pamberi pekomisheni yavo kuti vataurewo pavamire panyaya iyi. VaMasuku vati komisheni yavo ichiri kuongorora kuti VaMnangagwa naVaChiwenga vomiswa here pamberi pekomisheni yavo. Gweta uye vachishanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaChamisa havasungirwe nemutemo kuenda kunomirira pamberi pekomisheni yaVaMotlanthe iyi kana vasingade zvichitevera kukokwa kwavaitwa vachiti tsamba yatumirwa VaChamisa iyi harisi gwaro riri pamutemo rinovasungira kuti vamire pamberi pekomisheni iyi kana kuti subpoena. VaChamisa vati ivo nebato ravo havasirivo vakaudza vanhu vakaratidzira musi uyu kuti vapinde mumugwagwa vachiratidzira. Vachitaurawo pamusangano uyu, munyori mukuru muMDC, VaDouglas Mwonzora vati ivo pamwechete nemunyori anoona nezvemutemo muZanu PF, VaPaul Mangwana, vakamboyambira komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, kuti ichimbidze kuburitsa zvaizobuda musarudzo kudzivirira mhirizhonga munyika sezvo vachiti veruzhinji havavimbe neZEC. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMnagwana kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya iyi. VaMwonzora vatiwo mavhidhiyo anoratidza masoja akazvivhara kumeso achiridza pfuti musi uyu humbowo hwakakwana hunoratidza kuti masoja ndiwo akauraya vanhu vachiti masoja anenge achichengetedza runyararo haafanire kunge akavhara zviso zvawo. Varambawo zvakare kuti mubato ravo mune boka rinodaidzwa kuti Vanguard iro rakapomerwawo mhosva yekukonzeresa mhirizhonga yemusi wa1 Nyamavhuvhu vachiti boka reVanguard rakaparadzwa kare muna Kurume wegore rino sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. VaChamisa vatiwo hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuparadza MDC ndosaka ichipomera mhosva iyi kubato ravo. Vati zviri pachena kuti vanhu vakafa musi uyu vakapfurwa nemasoja pakatariswa humbowo hwemavhidhiyo akabuditswa nemasangano enhau paiitika mhirizhonga iyi. Vaenderera mberi komisheni yaifanira kuumbwa ikomisheni yaifanira kutarisa kushayikwa kwakaita VaItai Dzamara mushure mekupambwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori kwete kutambisa mari yehurumende nezvinhu zvinozivikanwa nemunhu wese kuti vanhu vakapfurwa ava vakapfurwa nemauto. yezvesarudzo iyi. VaMatanga vakaudza komisheni yaVaMotlanthe kuti pangadai pakafa vanhu vakawanda musi uyu dai masoja akashandisa pfuti dzawo zvisina mwero uye vanoti havazivi kuti aiudza masoja zvekuita musi uyu ndiyani sezvinodiwa pamutemo kana masoja apinda mumigwagwa kunobatsira mapurisa mukuchengetedza runyararo uyo unoti masoja anofanira kunge ari pasi pemapurisa. Nekune rumwe rutivi, mukuru wemauto VaPhillip Valerio Sibanda vakati havazivi kuti akapfura vanhu vakafa ndiyani sezvo vakaudza komisheni iyi kuti masoja akazopinda mumigwagwa vanhu vapfurwa kare. Mumwe mukuru muchiuto VaAncelem Nhamo Sanyatwe vakatiwo masoja aridzira pfuti asingapfuri varatidziri. Kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti kwakafa vanhu vatanhatu musi uyu, masangano akazvimira anoti vanhu vakafa musi uyu vanogona kudarika gumi sezvo vamwe vevakapfurwa ava vachinzi vakafa vachiendeswa kuzvipatara.
title: VaChamisa Vanoti Havasi Kuzopa Huchapupu Kukomisheni yaVaMothlante Kana VaMnagagwa Vasinawo Kukokwa

text: Vamiriri vevashandi vehurumende nevamiriri vehurumende vari kutarisirwa kusangana neMuvhuro pamusangano unonzi wakakosha zvikuru weNational Joint Negotiating Council. Musangano uyu unonzi nevashandi ukasaburitsa chimuko vachamira kuenda kumabasa sezvo vasisina mari dzekufambisa. Svondo rapera hurumende yakaisa patafura mari inoita madhora makumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe pamunhu, asi vashandi vakaramba kutambira, vachiti yaive chiseko chaicho sezvo yaive shoma zvakanyanya. Sachigaro veApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti vashandi vehurumende vari kuda kuti hurumende ipete kagumi mihoro yavaitambira gore rapera kuitira kuti vakwanise kurarama. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veHurumende Voisa Tariro kuMusangano weNJNC paNyaya yeMihoro

text: Castle Premier Soccer yakazivisa nemusi weMuvhuro kuti mafinals emakwikwi eChibuku Super Cup pakati peNgezi Platinum ne FC Platinum kuBaobab Stadium nemusi weMugovera. Zvichakadaro Chikwata cheCaps United chadongorera mumhango memukombe weCastle Lager Premier Soccer League. Kwasara mitambo miviri kuti mitambo isvike kwamvura yacheka makumbo, Caps United yave nemapoinzi maviri pamusoro peFC Platinum zvichitevera mitambo yakatambwa mukupera kwesvondo. Izvi zvinotevera kukunda kwavakaita Harare City 1-0 nechibodzwa chaLeonard Tsipa izvo zvavasiya vave nemapoinzi makumi mashanu nemanomwe, maviri pamusoro peFC Platinum iyo yadarika Highlanders mushure mekunge yakunda Chapungu 2-0 kuAscot Stadium. Highlanders yadonha kusvika pachinhanho chechitatu, mapoinzi mana pasi peCaps United, uyezve poindi imwechete pasi pe FC Platinum zvichitevera kurohwa pamusha kwayakaitwa 2-1 nechikwata chakatarisana nekuwira muDivision One cheTsholotsho Pirates. Asi Makepekepe ndiyo inongove nyaya mushure mekukunda maSunshine City Boys mumutambo waive wakaoma zvikuru uyezve wakaunganidza vatsigiri veCaps United zviuru nezviuru. Kunyange hazvo Caps United yakakunda, vakomana vechidiki vemaSunshine City Boys vakamira mira zvakasimba izvo zvirikufadza murairidzi wavo Moses Chunga. Caps United yave ne 57 points, FC Platinum 55 points, Highlanders 53 points asi vamwe vatambi vemaGreen Machine vanoti pachiri nemutoro mukukutu vachiti ivo vachapemberera chete kana zvichinge zvaitika musi unopera mitambo. Mutevedzeri wakaputeni wemaGreen Machine Stephen Makatuka anoti pamutambo wekugumisira ndipo pavachaona kuti vatora here mukombe weligi uyu. Makatuka anoti zvakawanda zvinokwanisa kuitika pamitambo miviri yasara. Mubati wepagedhe Edmore Sibanda anoti zvave kuda kuti vemumhuri yese yeCaps United vabatane panguva ino. Dynamos yave pachinhanhoo chechina mushure mekurova Mutare City Rovers 2-0 ndokuenda pamusoro peZPC Kariba iyo yakadamburwa 3-1 neBulawayo City muBabourfields Stadium. Chikwata chine mukombe uyu cheChicken Inn chakatora mapoinzi matatu mushure mekurova How Mine 1-0 panguva iyo Border Strikers yakaita mangange 0-0 neTriangle muDulivhadzimu. Border Strikers yakatobuda kare muPremier Soccer League asi ingangobatana nezvimwe zvikwata zvitatu Mutare City Rovers (26 points), Tsholotsho Pirates (26 points), nechimwe pakati peChapungu (31 points), Hwange (35 points) ne Triangle (35 points), mushure mekunge veZifa Council mukupera kwesvondo vakaputsa chibvumirano icho vakamboita chekuti kubude zvikwata zviviri kubva muPSL. VeZifa Council ava vave kuti kubude zvikwata zvina kuchipinda zvekare zvimwe zvina kubva kuma Division One mana ari munhabvu yemuZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: MaFinals eChibuku Super Cup Otambwa neMugovera

text: Bazi redzidzo yepasi rinoti harizivi kuti zvikoro zvichavhurwa riinhi, uye rinoti richanzwa kubva kumapoka ane chekuita nedzidzo kuti rotevera gwara ripi panyaya yenguva yekudzidza yasara kana zvikoro zvichinge zvazobudirira kuvhurwa. Kotoro yepiri yaifanirwa kunge yakatanga musi wa 10 Chikumi ichipera musi wa 10 Gunyana asi nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19 hazvisati zvavhurwa. Mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vanoti bazi ravo rinozoziva chete kuti kotoro yepiri ingamira sei kana chete vanzwa kumutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti zvikoro zvinovhurwa riinhi. Zvikoro zvakavharwa pakadzikwa mutemo weCovid-19 Level 4 Lockdown uye VaMnangagwa vakawedzera zvakare mutemo uyu kusvika musi wa 24 Nyamavhuvhu, apo vanotarisirwa kunyevenutsa kana kuwedzera zvakare mutemo uyu. Nekuda kwekuti nguva yaifanirwa kunge iri yekotoro yepiri yave kutosvika kumagumo, pave netarisiro yekuti zvikoro zvakazovhura chero nguva zvinenge zvangove kuvhurwa kusvika panopera gore muna Zvita. No media source currently available Asi rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe (ARTUZ) rinoti hurumende inofanirwa kutungamira, ichiunza pfungwa itsva kuti zvinhu zvirambe zvichifamba. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vati hapana nzvimbo muZimbabwe ingatadza kubata masayisayi eredhiyo, televhizhini kana nharembozha kana hurumende ichida kuti zviitike. VaMasaraure vanoti zvichitevera kutadza kuwirirana mumusangano wakaitwa nemusi weChishanu pakati pevarairidzi nebazi rezvedzidzo, sangano ravo rinokurudzira hurumende kuti iyedze kufungawo dzimwe nzira dzekubatsira kuti vana vaende kuchikoro, vachiti vana vechikoro varasikirwa nenguva yekudzidza yakawandisa. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inoti Haisati Yaziva Kuti Zvikoro Zvichavhurwa Riini

text: Mubairo uyu unopiwa kune vechidiki vari kusimukira munyaya dzehutungamiri, uye unotungamirwa nesangano reAfrican Leadership Institute. Nekuda kwemabasa avo akanaka ekusimudzira vemabhizimusi, kubatsira vanotambura, kudzidzisa zvehupenyu pamwe nezvemabhizimusi, kutaura zvinosimudzira vamwe nekudzidzisa, Doctor Patson Dzamara vakasarudzwa kuve pakati pevanhu vachakwikwidzana kuve pavanhu makumi maviri nevashanu vachawana mubairo weArchbishop Tutu Fellowship Programme. Mubairo uyu unopiwa kune vechidiki vari kusimukira munyaya dzehutungamiri, uye unotungamirwa nesangano reAfrican Leadership Institute. Doctor Dzamara, avo vanorwirawo kodzero dzevanhu, munyori wemabhuku anodzidzisa nezvehutungamiri munyaya dzemabhizimusi variwo zvakare mukuru wesangano reOff The Hook Consultancy. Vanoti vaninipiswa zvikuru nekudomwa kuve pakati pevanhu vacharwira mubairo uyu. Vanenge vabudirira vachaziviswa mugore rinouya iri, uye vanenge vachizotarisirwa kupinda muzvirongwa zvekudzidza paMont Fleur kuSouth Africa pamwe nekuOxford University, Oxford uye muguta reLondon kuBritain kwakare. Doctor Dzamara ndivo chete chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chakadomwa kukwikwidza muchirongwa ichi. No media source currently available
title: Doctor Dzamara Vopinda muMakwikwi eArchbishop Tutu Leadership Fellowship Program

text: Kune vana vanodarika mazana mana vanozvarwa nechirwere checlubfoot, icho chinoita kuti makumbo atarisane nechemukati zvokuti vabereki vazhinji vanotozviona mwana ave kuda kumbaira kana kufamba. Chirwere ichi chikasagadziriswa nenyanzvi dzinoona nezvedenda iri, zvinokonzera kuti vana ava vazokura vakaremara makumbo aya vamwe vacho vachizoguma vaakufamba nezvigumwe zvekutsoka. Kiri Mudzamiri anotipa nyaya izere. Mubereki anemwana anechirwere ichi VaJazinta Machache vekuChivhu vanoti mwana wavo akazvarwa akaremara nenzira iyi zvokuti varikubatsirwa nenyanzvi dzinozivikanwa nezita rokuti orthopaedic surgeons vanotasanura makumbo akaremara aya. Chirwere che clubfoot chinoita kuti gumbo risakwanise kutsika pasi zvokuti tsinga dzekumashure kwemakumbo aya anenge ari mapfupi zvokuti mwana haakwanise kutsika chitsitsinho pasi. VaMachache vanoti vakaona mwana wavo anonoka kufamba vakakurumidza kumuendesa kunyanzvi dzehutano kwavakazowana rubatsiro. VaMachache vanoti kuremara uku kunofanirwa kuongororwa mwana achiri mucheche zvokuti vehutano vekumakiriniki avaienda kunorapisa mwana havana kuona dambudziko kusvikira vazoona kuti mwana uyu aiva anonoka kukambaira. VaMachache vanoti mwana wavo akapfekedzwa butsu inesimbi inobata imwe butsu zvokuti hadzibviswe kwemwedzi mitatu ozoitwa oparesheni yokutwasanudza tsinga dzirikuseri kwemakumbo. VaMachache vanoti zvinotora makore mana kuti makumbo aya agadzirike zvokutozofamba zvakanaka sezvinoitawo vamwe vana. Nyazvi yezvehutano Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga vanoti denda iri harizivikanwe kuti rinokonzerwa nei zvokuti haisi mhosva yevabereki kuti mwana anozvarwa akaremara. Imwe nyanzvi yaimiririra kodzero dzaana chiremba KuZimbabwe Association Of Doctors For Human Rights, muchakabvu Dr Rutendo Bonde avo vakashaya mwedzi wakapfuura, mumwe wevanhu vakazvarwa nechirwere ichi asi makumbo avo akagadziriswa mushure kwekunge vaitwa maoparesheni masere vakakwanisa kukura vasina makumbo akaremara. Zimbabwe inechirongwa chiripasi peZimbabwe Sustainable Clubfoot Prgramme, ZSCP, chinoshanda nezvipatara zvese zvemunyika muno panyaya yekugadzirisa makumbo akadai icho chakatangiswa mugore 2011 nenyanzvi dzakabva kuUnited Kingdom, Canada neKenya idzo dzakadzidzisawo nyanzvi dzehutano dzemunyika muno. Vana vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri pasi rose vanozvarwa nechirwere ichi zvokuti vazhinji vacho vanokwanisa kurapwa zvokutozorarama zvakanaka vasina hurema uhwu.  No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzozeya Chirwere cheKuzvarwa Mwana Akaremara Makumbo

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvinoti kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kumusha, pamwe nemhirizhonga inowanzoitika munguva dzesarudzo, zvinoita kuti zvitadze kuita mabasa ebudiriro anosimudzira matunhu ekwazvinobva. Vamwe vanoti chinhu chinosiririsa kuona vana veZimbabwe vachirwisana panguva dzesarudzo, asi dzimwe nyika dzichiita sarudzo murunyararo. Chimwe chezvizvarwa izvi ndiMuzvare Gladys Hlatshwayo, avo vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika. Muzvare Hlatshwayo vanoti zvakakosha zvikuru kuti bato riri kutonga reZanu PF, rionewo zvinoitika mune dzimwe nyika dzakaita seAmerica ne United Kingdom, idzo dzinokwanisa kuita sarudzo vanhu vachiyanana pasina kukakavadzana. Muzvare Hlatshwayo vanoti kuratidza kuti bato reZanu PF rinoda zvemhirizhonga, zvave kuonekwa nekurwisana kwave kuita nhengo dzebato iri kuHurungwe West. Kunyange hazvo nhengo yeZanu PF kudunhu reUnited Kingdom, VaNick Mangwana, vachitsinhira mashoko ekushoropodza mhirizhonga, vanoti kuratidza kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakana mumapato ose kwete reZanu PF chete, nhengo dzeMDC T dziri kurwisanawo pachadzo. Asi VaMangwana vanoti havaoni izvi zvichitadzisa zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika kuenda kumusha kana kupinda mune zvematongerwo enyika, sezvakaitwa nevari kukwikwidza vakamirira Zanu PF muHarare East musarudzo ye by-election, VaTerence Mukupe, avo vaimbogara muno muAmerica. VaMangwana vanoti chinofanirwa kuitwa nevana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika kuti vakwanise kunotambirwa kumusha, vanofanirwa kutanga kupinda muzvirongwa zvebudiriro mumatunhu avanogara munyika dzavari. No media source currently available
title: Vari Kunze Vokurudzirwa Kupindawo Mune zveMatongerwo eNyika Kumusha

text: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuHague kuNetherlands, VaNeville Mkhululi Mehluli Mchina, vakagadzira muchina unobatanidza varimi vanenge vaine zvirimwa zvakawandisa zvinogona kuzoguma zvaraswa pamwe nevatengi kana vemisika. VaMchina, kuburikidza nekambani yavo yeInvisible Food, vakaparura muchina uyu, uyo unoshandisa njere yepadandemutande kana kuti Artificial Intelligence, kuziva kunenge kuine murimi anenge aine zvirimwa zvakawandisa zvekuti anogona kutozorasa zvimwe kana zvisina kupera kutengwa. Kana muchina uyu waziva kune murimi uyu, unozomubatanidza nemisika pamwe nezvitoro zvinenge zvichida zvirimwa zvake, angava mabhanana kana mimwe michero yakaita semango nemaranjisi, kusanganisira. Izvi zvinonzi naVaMchina zvinozobatsira zvikuru kudzivirira kuraswa kwemichero nemiriwo izvi sezvo zvichizopedzisira zvagadziriswa zvimwe dyiwa kana zvinwiwa kugutsa nyika. VaMchina vanoti pari zvino kambani yavo iri kushanda iri kwakare kuNetherlands nekuGermany, asi vanoti vari mubishi kuunganidza mari inoita miriyoni imwe chete yema Euro (1 million euros), yekuti vakwanise kuumba michina inoita kuti vazokwanisa kushandawo munyika dzichiri kusimukira dzakaita seZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: VaNeville Mehluli Mchina Voshandura Nzira dzeKuchengetedzwa kweChikafu

text: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika dzinoti zviri kuitika muZanu PF zvekuswero tsoropodzana pamwe nekudzingana mubato iri hazvisi zvinhu zvitsva sezvo bato iri richizivikanwa nenhoroondo yekurwisana kubva kare. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika yakazvimirira, Muzvare Gladys Hlatshwayo, vanoti kubva panguva yapinda VaMugabe panyanga vachitungamira bato reZanu PF, zvakave pachena kuti vachatora masimba ose senzira yekuvharira ani nani zvake ane pfungwa yekudawo kutonga. Mashoko aya anotsigirwawo neimwe nyanzvi inoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaChamunorwa Madiridze, avo vanotiwo zvinhu muZanu PF zvagara zvichingoitwa semadiro aVaMugabe. Vachitaura pakuvhurwa kwekongiresi yebato ravo, VaMugabe vashoropodza mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuda kubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro nechisimba. Asi Amai Mujuru vanoti aya manyepo chaiwo. Kongiresi yeZanu PF iri kutarisirwa kupera iine vatungamiri vatsva vose vanodomwa naVaMugabe. Sezvo zvava pachena kuti hapachina hukama pakati paVaMugabe naAmai Mujuru, akawanda vari kubvunza kuti ndiyani achatora chinzvimbo chaAmai Mujuru, uye kutsiva chinzvimbo chakasiyiwa nevaive mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato, muchakabvu VaJohn Nkomo. VaMugabe vachadoma zvakare sachigaro mutsva. Chigaro ichi china VaSimon Khaya Moyo pari zvino. Muzvare Hlatshwayo vanoti VaMugabe vanogona kushamisa vanhu nekudoma vamwe vasiri kufungidzirwa kuti vatsive zvigaro zvichasiiwa naAmai Mujuru pamwe nevamwe vavo vavari kupomerwa mhosva mubato iri nechikwata chiri pachena kuti chiri kutsigira gurukota rezvemitemo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Asi VaMadiridze vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti vanhu vari kupomerwa mhosva ava vaongororwe uye kumiswa pamberi pematare edzimhosva kana vakadzipara. No media source currently available
title: Dzimwe Nyanzvi Dzoshora Zviri Kuitika muZanu PF

text: Gore idzva ra 2016 ratanga zvakaipa vana chiremba navana mukoti vachitadza kuenda kubasa vachiti havana mari dzekufambisa dzinovakwanira kunyange hazvo hurumende yakanga yati ichavapa madhora maviri pamunhu pazuva semari yekufambisa. Mutungamiri wesangano ravana chiremba, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Fortune Nyamande, vanoti kunyange hazvo vachiri kuunganidza mashoko kubva kumativi ose enyika, zvavawana kusvika pari zvino zvinoratidza kuti vana chiremba navana mukoti vari pakati pezvikamu makumi matanhatu nemakumi manomwe kubva muzana havana kukwanisa kuenda kumabasa. No media source currently available Asi Dr Nyamande vanoti sevashandi vane hupenyu hwevanhu pamwoyo, varongawo kuti dzimwe nhengo dzavo dzinoshandira munzvimbo dzakakosha dzinge dziri pamabasa panguva iyo vazhinji vavo vari kudzimba. Vanoti chipatara cheHarare kudivi rekunosunungukira madzimai akazvitakura, ndechimwe chezvipatara zvakasika kuwirwa nedambudziko rekushaiwa vana mukoti. Hurumende yakakundikana kupa vashandi vayo mari dzavo dzemihoro paine nguva izvo zvoita kuti vashaye mari dzekuendesa kumabasa. Mukuedza kurerutsa ndima, munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Gerald Gwinji, vakazivisa kuti zvipatara zvinofanirwa kuwanira vana mukoti navana chiremba mari dzekufambisa kusvika vatambira mari dzavo musi wa 5 Ndira. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende pakusaenda kwaitwa kumabasa navana chiremba nevana mukoti.
title: Zvipatara Zvoomerwa Zvichitevera Kusaenda Kubasa kweVashandi Vazvo

text: Zanu PF iri kutungamira zvine mutsindo musarudzo dzeparamende mudunhu reMasvingo, pari zvino iine zvigaro zvipfumbamwe, kubva pagumi zvabudiswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec. MDC-Alliance inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa ndiro riri kutevera Zanu PF mudunhu reMasvingo, mushure mekukunda muMasvingo Urban. Mukuru weZec muMasvingo, VaZex Pudurai, vaudza vatori venhau zvabuda musarudzo munzvimbo dzatumirwa kwavari panguva yekupera kwezuva asi vati zvimwe zvichiri kuuya. KuZaka West, VaOphius Murambiwa ve Zanu PF vakunda VaFestas Dumbu ve MDC-Alliance. KuMasvingo South, VaCladious Maronge veZanu PF vakunda vachiteverwa naVaTawanda Mavhaire ve People’s Rainbow Party. Sachigaro we Zanu PF muMasvingo, Va Ezra Chadzamira, vakundawo vachiteverwa na Amai Rosewita Madzivire ve MDC-Alliance. KuChiredzi East, Chiredzi West neChiredzi South, Zanu PF yatora matunhu ose, ikankunda zvakare ku Zaka East neZaka Central. VaPudurai, avo vaimbove mudzidzisi uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF District Coordinating Committee vasati vaenda kuZec, vati sarudzo dzakaitwa zvakanaka uye vanhu veMasvingo zvikamu makumi masere nezvitatu kubva muzana pane vakanyoresa kuvhota, vakavhota neMuvhuro. VaPudurai vati vachabudisa zvimwe nekuunzwa kwazvichatwa kuhofisi yavo. Mashoko atiri kutambira anoti Zanu PF yatora zvigaro makumi maviri nezvishanu MDC Alliance ikatora chimwe chete pazvigaro zvose zviri makumi maviri nezvitanhatu mudunhu reMasvingo. Musarudzo dza 2013, Zanu PF yakatora zvigaro zvose zveparamende muMasvingo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vakunda nevakundwa kuti vatipewo pfungwa dzavo. Musarudzo dzemakanzura MDC Alliance yakunda Zanu PF mudhorobha re Masvingo apo yatora zvigaro zvinomwe pazvigaro gumi zvirimo. Dhorobha reMasvingo raswera rakanyarara vazhinji vakamirira kunzwa zvabuda musarudzo asi vamwe havasi kufara mushure memashoko ari kubuda musai-sai. VaTerence Chikwanda vati vaswera vakamirira zvabuda musarudzo asi zvirikubuda muma sai-sai zvavatyisa. Vamwewo vakaita saVa Walter Mataranyika vanoti vamirira kunzwa zvichabuda musarudzo yemutungamirir wenyika pakati paVaNelson Chamisa veMDC Alliance naVaEmerson Mnangawa ve Zanu PF. Asi mumwe mutsigiri weZanu PF, VaDavis Guyo, vati vatomirira kuita mabiko vachipemberera kukunda kwemusangano wavo.
title: Zanu PF Yotarisirwa Kukunda Mudunhu reMasvingo

text: Vamwe vanhu vakapwanyirwa dzimba kuBudiriro vari kuramba kutambira kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vaende kunogara mumatende kuZimbabwe Grounds. Mumwe akaputsirwa imba VaEddison Zibwowa avo vave nemakore gumi vari paTembwe pakapwanywa apa vati havana chido chekuenda kunogara mumatende kuZimbabwe Grounds sezvo vasingazive kuti vachazodii mune remangwana. Bazi rezvemagariro evanhu ndiro rinonzi rakatumira nhume kunotaura nevanhu ava nezvekuti vambotamiswa. Kanzuru yeHarare nemusi weChitatu yakapwanya dzimba dzinodarika zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe mushure mekurudziro yehurumende yekuti dzipwanywe sezvo dzakavakwa zvisina mvumo uye dzimwe dzakavakwa pari kuda kuvakwa chikoro. Vanonzi vaipa vanhu kune mushandirapamwe weTembwe Housing Cooperativa vakatosungwa nemapurisa. Nyaya yekuputsa dzimba idzi kuchinaya yakonzera mutauro wakanyanya munyika. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoronga Kuendesa Mhuri Dzakaputsirwa Dzimba kuBudiro kuZimbabwe Grounds

text: Retired Brigadier Agrippa Mutambara vebato rinopikisa reZimbabwe People First rinotungamirwa naAmai Joyce Mujuru avo vakarohwa zvakaipisisa paDunaventy Farm kuGuruve, Mashonaland Central Province vanonzi ivo nevamwe vavo vashanu vaiswa mumaoko emapurisa kuchipatara chiri kuBindura uko vari kurapwa. Mhirizhonga iyi yakaitika nemusi weSvondo. Brigadier General Mutambara nevamwe vavo vakarohwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF apo vainge vaenda kunonunura nhengo yebato ravo VaWilbert Mubayirwa avo vanonzi vaida kupisirwa mumba nenhengo dzeZanu-PF dziri kuda kutora nzvimbo yavarikurima. Mutauriri weZimbabwe People First VaJelousy Mawarire vanoti nyaya yemhirizhonga yeZanu-PF ioratidza kuti bato iri rapererwa. “Makamboona bere rikapererwa, rinogona kuvhima dhongi rakasungirirwa pangoro.” Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri weZanu-PF VaSimon Khaya Moyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Rtd Brigadier General Mutambara neVamwe veZIMPF Vosungwa

text: Gurukota rezvemabasa nevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vanoti vari kutarisira kuti musangano wavachaita nevashandi vehurumende neMuvhuro unouya uchabatsira kuti hurumende iratidze vashandi vayo mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi pamwe nemamiriro akaita bhajeti renyika. Muzvinafundo Mavima vanoti musangano uyu uchaita kuti mapoka ose aonesane nekupana nhunha mukutsvaga kuti chii chingaitwa kugadzirisa dambudziko renyaya dzemihoro yevashandi vehurumende. Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvanafduno Mthuli Ncube, vari kutarisirwawo kupinda mumusangano uyu. Musangano uyu uri kuuya panguva iyo vashandi vehurumende vari kubva mukuramwa mabasa kwemazuva maviri vachida kumanikidza hurumende kuti igadzirise zvichemo zvavo, uko kunonzi nehurumende hakuna kubudirira. Nhaurirano dzeMuvhuro unouya idzi dziri kumutsiridzawo nhaurirano dzemihoro dzakambenge dzichiitwa pakati pevashandi nehurumende asi dzakatadza kuburitsa chimuko, izvo zvakasvitsa pakuti vashandi varambe zvikamu zana kubva muzana zvemari yemunyika zvavakanga vawedzerwa nazvo mihoro yavo nehurumende. Kunyange hazvo vashandi vakaramba zvavipiwa nehurumende, hurumende inonzi yakaenderera mberi ndokuita zano ndega ichiwedzera mihoro yevashandi vayo zviri mumadhora emunyika. Vashandi vehurumende vari kuda kuti mihoro yavo idzoserwe pamari dzavaitambira muna 2018 dzichiuya dziri mumadhora ekuAmerica. Asi VaMavima vakatozivisa kare kuti hurumende haikwanise kubhadhara vashandi vayo nemari yekuAmerica sezvo isina mari yacho. No media source currently available Mutungamiri wesangano revashandi vehurumende ,reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vatenda kuti kune musangano uchaitwa neMuvhuro asi vachiti musangano uyu hausi weNational Joint Negotiating Forum kwete. Amai Alexander vanoti vatora danho rekusangana negurukota rezvemari, VaNcube, kuti patsvagwe nzira dzekugadzirisa dambudziko ravo nekuda kwekuramba mari yemunyika iri kuramba ichishaya simba. No media source currently available
title: Makurukota eHurumende Otarisirwa Kusangana neVashandi veHurumende neMuvhuro UnoUya muNhaurirano dzeMihoro

text: Nyaya yekumbovharwa kwemakambani akawanda uye kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba kuyedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus chakomba munyika iri kunzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi ichapa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hutoramba hwakananga kumawere. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti gurukota rezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube ndivo chete mushanyi muJerusarema ange asiri kuziva zviri kuitika apo vakavimbisa kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchawedzera nezvikamu zvinodarika zvinomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 7,4% gore rino apo vaiparura bhajeti. Asi nyanzvi idzi dzinoti aka handi kekutanga VaNcube vachivimbisa mashura asi vachikundikana nekuti vakambozviita muna 2019 na 2020 kuti hupfumi huchaita nani asi akava manyautsa mukanwa harawa kurota ichiyamwa. Mutungamiri wesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe Doctor Israel Murefu vanoti nemamiriro aita zvinhu hapana chekuita kunze kwekuvhara mamwe makambani. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vati hurumende yaifanira kutanga kuvhara nzvimbo dzanyanya kukomba chirwere kwete nyika yose. VaMugano vatiwo kungvhara vanhu vasiri kuvhenekwa hazvina zvazvinobatsira. Munyori mukuru musangano revashandi reZimbabwe congress of Trade Union kana kuti ZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vatiwo vashandi havana kunge vasumwawo nezvedanho rekuvharwa kwemakambani vakati pakambonzi makambani avharwe vakawanda vakarasikirwa nemabasa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga VaGilbert Muponda vatenda kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka asi vakati kumboti vanhu vagare mudzimba kunobatsira kuti chirwere chisanyanye kupararira. Vati kuvhurwa kwemakambani akakosha seemiodhi nekurima kunobatsira kuti hupfumi husabvaa hwagwadama. Nyanzvi dzakawanda dzakagara dzayambira kuti zvinonetsa kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika sezvo mari yekunze ichishaikwa, vanhu vakawanda vasina mabasa uye mamiriro ekunze achingochinja. Asi VaNcube vainge vati vanotarisira mwaka wakanaka wekurima uye kuwana mari kubva muzvicherwa. Nyiak dzakawanda pasi rose dziri kutatarika munyaya dzezvehupfumi nekuda kwedenda iri. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzoyambira Kuvhiringidzika Kwakanyanya kweHupfumi neNyaya yeKuti Vanhu Vagare Mudzimba

text: Vamwe vanhu vane chitsama vakaratidzira panze pedare raMajastiriti kuMbare nemusi weChina vachigunun’una nekunyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kuri kuitwa muzvare Linda Masarira vesangano reWomen in Politics Alliance. Muzvare Masarira vari mujeri remadzimai reChikurubi Maximum Prison vakamirira kutongwa pamhosva dzakawanda dzavari kupomerwa. Gweta raMuzvare Masarira reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights anoti haasi kufara zvachose nekunonoka kunzwikwa kwenyaya dzavari kupomerwa. Gweta iri, VaKudzai VaKadzere veZimbabwe Lawyers For Human Rights vari kumirira Muzvare Linda Masarira pamwe nevamwe vanorwira vekodzero dzevanhu gumi nevana vakasungwa musi wa 6 Chikunguru pakuratidzira kwainge kwakarongwa nesangano reTajamuka/Sesijikile Campaign pamwe naPastor Evan Mawarire veHash Tag This Flag. VaKadzere vari kugunun'una nekunonoka kunyorwa kwemagwaro ezvakaita mudare redzimhosva pamwe nemhosva yavari kupomerwa. VaKadzere vaudza Studio 7 kuti kusavapo kwemagwaro aya anozivikanwa pachirungu kuti Transcription of the record of proceedings ndiko kwavamisa kuti vaende kudare repamusoro reHigh court kuedza kuti Muzvare Linda Masarira vatongwewo vachibva kumba. Vamwe vari kutongwa pamwe naMuzvare Masarira vari kutongwa vachibva kumba mushure mekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kudare. Muzvare Masarira vari kutongwa vachibva kujeri reChikurubi sezvo vachinzi vane imwe mhosva yavari kupomerwa kwaMutare. Dare rakaramba kupa mvumo Muzvare Masarira yekuenda kwaMutare kunogadzirisa nyaya yegwaro iri rakakonzera kuti vanyimwe mari yechibatiso. VaKadzere vanoti vachaongorora nyaya yekuti Muzvare Masarira vanonzi havasi kunzwa zvakanaka havasi kuwana mimwe mishonga yavanoda vari muhusungwa. Shamwari yaMuzvare Masarira, Muzvare Mandowa Manezhu vaudza Studio 7 kuti Muzvare Masarira vari kurwara vakatiwo tariro yavo yange iri yekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba sevamwe. VaElvis Mugari vebato rinopikisa rePeople Democratic Party ndemumwe wevange vari kuMbare. Vati nyaya yekuramba Muzvare Masarira vari mujeri ichavapa kuti vatange kuratidzira. Mutongi wedare VaStan Mambanje vazivisa muchuchusi kuti agadzire magwaro ari kudiwa aya vakati Muzvare Masarira nevamwe vavo vachadzoka kudare musi wa 25 Nyamavhuvhu pachatanga kutongwa nyaya yavo. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Linda Masarira Voramba Vari muJeri kuChikurubi Vamwe Vachiratidzira Panze peDare

text: Meya vatsva weguta reHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, vanoti vagari vemuHarare vanofanira kutarisira maitirwo ezvinhu matsva uye anovagutsa. VaGomba vanoti vane hurongwa hwavo hwemazuva zana hwekuyedza kugadzirisa zvinhu muguta reHarare. Vagomba vanoti kanzuru yavo yakazvipa mazuva zana kuti vavandudze zvinhu muguta, zvinosanganisa kuisa pombi itsva dzemvura, kugadzira migwagwa, kugadzira zvinonetsa kuHarare South uye kudzikisa mutengo wekuita basa rekanzuru. VaGomba vakatora basa kubva kuna VaBernard Manyenyeni vakazivisa gore rapera kuti havaida kukwikwidza chigaro ichi zvekare. No media source currently available
title: Meya weHarare Ouya neHurongwa hweMazuva Zana Hwekuyedza Kugadzirisa Zvinhu muGuta

text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti vanotarisira kuti nyika inenge yave nemari yemu Zimbabwe gore rino risati rapera. VaMnangagwa vataura mashoko aya apo vange vachibatsira mukuchenesa nzvimbo ye Southlea muHarare VaMnangagwa vati hurumende yagadzira zvirongwa zvichaita kuti Zimbabwe ive nemari yayo nekuti nyika haingabudiriri kana ichishandisa mari yekune dzimwe nyika. Asi nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi hwenyika uye vari mukuru we Labour and Economic Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vati izvi hazvisi kuzoitika gore rino nekuti pane zvinhinji zvinofanirwa kuitwa Zimbabwe isati yave nemari yayo. Doctor Kanyenze vaudza Studio7 kuti vanhu havana chivimbo nemabhanga pamwe chete nehurumende nekuti Zimbabwe payakamboita mari yayo, vanhu vakarasikirwa nemari dzavo. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Zimbabwe Ichave neMari Yayo Gore Risati Rapera

text: Komiti yakaumbwa nemutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, yekuona kuti nhengo dzabato iri dziri mumakanzuru, paramende nemamwe mapazi ehurumende dzaita basa zvakajeka uye pasina huwori, yeAccountability and Integrity Panel, yazivisa kuti ichatanga basa rayo nekuongorora kanzuru yeHarare. Vachitaura muHarare, sachigaro wekomiti iyi, Advocate Tabani Mpofu, vati vachatanga kuongorora ma contracts ese akapihwa nekanzuru yeHarare kuti vaone kuti zvinhu zvese zvakaitwa pachitevedzwa gwara here. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi zvakare vari gweta, VaPaidamoyo Saurombe, vati vanoda kuona kuti kanzuru iyi yaita basa rayo zviri pamwero uye kuti iri kutevedza here mutemo pabasa rayo. VaMpofu naVaSaurombe vati basa richaitwa pachena uye hapana acharoverwa pachipiyaniso asina kupihwa mukana wekunzikwa. Vaviri ava vatiwo kunze kwekubvurudza vanenge vachipomerwa mhaka, veruzhinji vachapihwawo mukana wekupa humbowo panenge pachiitwa ongororo idzi. Vati panenge paonekwa kuti pakaitwa zvechitsotsi kana huwori, komiti yavo ichakwidza nyaya idzi kumapurisa kana masangano akaita seZimbabwe Anti- Corruption Commission. VaMpofu vati komiti yavo ichashandisawo madandemutande akaita seWhatsApp neTwitter kuti veruzhinji varerukirwe kusvitsa zvichemo nehumbowo kwavari. Sachigaro vesangano reHarare Metropolitan Province Residents Forum, zvakare vari mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vati sebato rinotonga makanzuru akawanda munyika, zvaitwa neMDC zvakanaka uye vanovimba kuti zvichapedza huwori hunonzi hwatekeshera mumakanzuru awa. Vatiwo vanovimba kuti MDC haisi kuzoshandisa komiti iyi kushungurudza kana kudzinga makanzura asingawirane nevakuru vakuru vebato iri. Asi VaMpofu vati izvi hazvisizo zviri kuzoitika vachiti komiti yavo ichaita basa rayo pachena pamwe nekupa munhu wese mukana wekuti anzikwe. Komiti iyi yakaumbwa naVaChamisa muna Gumiguru gore rapfuura. Dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi ndaVaDevine Tendere, Amai Dudu Nyirongo naVaPaidamoyo Saurombe uye Kelsey Smyth ndiye anenge ari mukuru wevashandi vekomiti iyi. No media source currently available
title: Komiti yeMDC Yotanga Kuongorora Mashandiro eKanzuru yeHarare

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati mhirizhonga, kuparadzwa kwemidziyo pamwe nekuita kuti nyika isatongeke hazviunze hutongo hwejekerere munyika. Vachitaura kumarinda eNational Heroes’ Acre pakuvigwa kwegamba renyika, mushakabvu Brigadier-General Ruphus Chigudu neMuvhuro masikati, VaMnangagwa vashoropodzawo kukwira kwekuparwa kwedzimhosva pachishandiswa zvombo, pamwewo nenyaya dzekuurayiwa kwevana vadiki zvine chekuita nemishonga. Mutungamiri wenyika vati nekuda kwekuwanda kwenyaya idzi, vatuma vanoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika kuti vaone kuti kushandiswa kwezvombo mukuparwa kwedzimhosva pamwe nekuurayiwa kwevana vadiki zvamiswa. VaMnangagwa vabato nyaya yevhu vachiti zvinofadza kuti ivhu rave mumaoko evanhu, asi vakurudzirawo kuti ivhu iroro rishandiswe zvine pundutso zvekuwanisa nyika chikafu. Vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti varambe vachichengetedza mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, vachiti kuvhota pamwe nehutongo hwejekerere zvinowanikwa chete nevanhu vapenyu, kwete nevarwere. Brigadier General Chigudu vakashaya musi wa 24 Gunyana mushure mekurwara nechirwere cheshuga kwenguva ndefu. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti vanowirirana naVaMnangagwa panyaya yekuti munyika musave nemhirizhonga, asi vanokurudzira hurumende kuti isave iyo iri pamberi mukukonzera mhirizhonga iyi munyika. VaNgwenya vanoti kazhinji hurumende inotarisa kuti munhu abuda mumba maani kana dziri nyaya dzekuratidzira zvine runyararo, izvo zvinoita kuti ionekqwe ichibvumidza chete vanobva kubato reZanu PF, asi ichitumira mauto kana vanpopikisa hurumende vakapindawo mumigwagwa vachiratidzira. Panyaya yekukwira kwekuparwa kwedzimhosva pachishandiswa zvombo uyewo kuurayiwa kwevana vadiki zvine chekuita nemishonga, VaNgwenya vanoti zvinodzoka zvakare kuhurumende kuti kukundikana kwayo kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika ndiko kunopedzisira kwatuma vanhu kuba pamwe nekuchekeresa vana senzira yekutsvaga kurarama. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa Vanoshoropodza Mhirizhonga, Kuparadzwa kweMidziyo

text: Mutongi wedare ramejastiriti muHarare Valazini Ncubenemusi weChina vakapa mutongo wekuti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga vape huchapupu hwavo mudare musina vanhu kana vatori venhau panyaya yavari kunetsana nemudzimai wavo wavari kurambana naye Muzvare Mary Mubaiwa vachivapomera mhosva yekutyora mutemo wezvemichato kana kuti Marriages Act. Gweta uye vaimbobva mejastiriti VaWilbert Mandinde vaudza Studio 7 kuti dare haraifanira vanhu kurambidzwa kunzwa nyaya iyi nekuti haine nezvekugadzikana kwenyika. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nerimwe gweta vachidzidzisa mutemo paUnivesity of Kent Doctor Alex Magaisa vati matare emuZimbabwe ave chiseko pasi rose nekuti anotonga achiuudzwa zvekuita nevematongerwo enyika. Asi gweta vari nhengo yeZanu-PF VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka vanoti zvakakosha kuchengetedza vana panenge pachirambana vabereki nekudaro hazvina kukosha kuti veruzhinji vange vari mudare panyaya yekurambana kwaVChiwenga nemudzimai wavo. Muzvare Mubayiwa vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuti vaida kuita chikiribidi vachinyoresa muchato kudare nekukoka mutongi VaMunamato Mutevedzi kumba kwavo kuti vatorese mhiko vaviri ava kumba kwavo. Asi VaMutevedzi vanonzi vakawana pamba pacho pasina vanhu. Vaviri ava vainge vakaroorana pachivanhu. Asi Muzvare Mubayiwa vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa iyi. Vachuchusi vehurumende vakange vaisa chikumbiro ichi kudare kuti vanhu vasanzwe huchapupu hwaVaChiwenga vachiti vaizviitira kuchengetedza hoffisi yavo yemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika. Asi Muzvare Mubayiwa vange vachiramba kuti nyaya iyi isanzwikwe neveruzhinji vachiti zvinotyora kodzero dzavo dzekuti vanhu vanzwewo matongerwo enyaya iyi. Rimwe gweta raMuzvare Mubayiwa Amai Beatrice Mtetwa vakaudza dare kuti hapana munhu ari pamusoro pemutemo nekudaro VaChiwenga havafanire kubatwa zvakasiyana nevamwe munyika.
title: Nyaya yeKurambidza Vanhu Kunzwa VaChiwenga Vachipa Huchapupu Yokonzera Mutauro muNyika

text: Vamwe vakarwa muhondo yerusununguko vari pasi pekomiti inoona nezvekuchengetedzwa zvakanaka, kana kuti Welfare Team, vaenda neChipiri kumahofisi emutungamiri wenyka, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, uko varatidzira vachiti hurumende inofanira kuita zvese zvayakavimbisa kuita muna 1997. Nhengo dzeZimbabwe Liberation War Veterans Association idzo dzange dzisingadarike makumi maviri dzamacha kubva paAfrica Unity Square dzakachengetedzwa nemapurisa kuenda kumahofisi emutungamiriri wenyika uko dzatadza kusangana naVaMangangwa sezvo vange vari mudare remakurukota. Mumwe wevarwiri verusununguko, VaFederick Ngombe, vati vashandi vemumahofisi aVaMnangagwa vatambira gwaro rezvichemo zvavo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, kuti tinzwe kuti VaMnangagwa vachafambisa seyi nyaya iyi. Vamwe vararitidzira ndiVa Gina Mutzinze, avo vati vakavimbiswa nehurumende kuti vachapihwa zviuru zviviri zvemadhora mwedzi ga wega semari yemudya ndigere kubva muna 1997 kusvika pari zvino. Kana izvi zvikaitika zvinoreva kuti nhengo imwe chete yesangano iri inofanira kupihwa mazana mana nemakumi mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora. Pari zvino vanhu ava vari kupihwa mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nemadhora mana pamwedzi. Mu 1997 mekare maWar Veterans akapihwa zviuru makumi mashanuzvemadhorapamunhu wega wega izvo zvakadonhedza hupfumi wenyika pasi. Zvimwewo zviri kudiwa nekomiti iyi ndezvekuti pajekeswe nezvemari yakaiswa mukambani yeTelecel nesangano ravo, pamwe nekuti bira guru munyika yose rekutambira vese vakadzoka kuhondo. Zvabuda pachena kuti hapana kuwirirana musangano revakarwa hondo sezvo vamwe vavo vange vari kushora munyori mukuru wesangano iri zvakare vari gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika pamwe nekuchengedzwa kwevakarwa hondo yerusununguko, VaVictor Matemadenda. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuna VaMatemadanda pamusoro penyaya iyi. Hatinawo kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumutauriri wesangano revakarwa hondo, VaDouglas Mahiya, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira mbozhanhare yavo. No media source currently available
title: Vakarwira Rusununguko Voratidzira paMahofisi aVaMnangagwa

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reIdeal Party Zimbabwe VaTinashe Jonasi vakasungwa nemusi weMuvhuro nemapurisa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. VaJonasi vanonziwo vange vachironga kusunga VaMnangagwa, nevatevedzeri vavo General Constantino Chiwenga naVaKembo Mohadi. Gweta raVaJonasi VaDenford Halimana vesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vanoti vaJonasi vakasungwa vari paJameson Hotel vakananga kuMunhumutapa Building kunosunga VaMnangagwa nevamwe vatungamiri venyika vachiti izvi chete ndizvo zvingaunze hutongo hwejekerere. VaJonasi vari kutarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare muHarare nemusi weChitatu. No media source currently available
title: VaJonasi Vosungwa Mushure Mekuda "Kunosunga" VaMnangagwa, VaChiwenga naVaMohadi

text: Madzimai ari kukurudzirwa kuti aende kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa kuitira kuti vanovhengekwa kana vaine chirwere chegomarara repamuromo wechibereko. Kuvhenekwa uku kuri kuitwa pasina muripo, uye madzimai anosvika churu chimwe chete achaongororwa gomarara iri pamwe nekurapwa pasina muripo kana vachinge vawanikwa vaine dambudziko iri richiri kungotanga. Madzimai aya ari kubatsirwa ne Parirenyatwa Group of Hospitals yakabatana nechipatara chekuChina chinonzi Hunan Provincial Maternal and Child Health Hospital. Madzimai akatanga kunyoresa musi wa10 Ndira uye anofanirwa kunge anyoresa musi wa 27 Ndira usati wapera kuitira kuti vabatsirwe pachena. Madzimai aya achange achiongororwa nenzira itsva yekuongorora gomarara remuromo wechibereko inonzi Human Papilloma Virus Screening, HPV, kana kuti High Risk Test. Mukoti mukuru kukirinika yeVIAC paParirenyatwa, Amai Bernardette Mandaza, vati nzira iyi inobata zviratidzo zvegomarara rechibereko zvakanyanya kudarika dzimwe nzira dzanga dziri kushandiswa munyika. Amai Mandaza vati donzvo ravo nderekubatsira madzimai kuti vakurumidze kutariswa zviratidzo zvegomarara rechibereko kuti varapwe gomarara iri risati radzika midzi. Amai Mandaza vati aka kanenge kari kekutanga chipatara cheParirenyatwa chichishandisa nzira iyi. Amai Mandaza vati kusvika pari zvino nzira iyi yange isiko kuzvipatara zvehurumende uye vakati kuzvipatara zvisiri zvehurumende nzira iyi inoda mari iri pakati pemadhora makumi matanhatu kusvika kumadhora makumi manomwe nemanomwe. Mumwe wemadzimai anga auya kuzonyoresa, Amai Mercy Mondoga, vatenda zvikuru chirongwa chekuongororwa pachena. Amai Mondoga vati huwandu hwevanhu vavanoziva vari kufa negomarara ndizvo zvapa kuti vatore mukana wechirongwa chekuongororwa pachena kuti vazive kuti vakamira sei. Mumwe anga achinyoresa kuzoongororwa ndiAmai Bianca Ngulube. Amai Ngulube vanoti vakashaikirwa naamai vavo nekuda kwegomarara rechibereko nokudaro vauya kuzoongororwa kuitira kuti kana pane zviratidzo zvegomarara varapwe nguva ichipo sezvo vachiziva kuti kuzorapwa gomarara radzika midzi kunoda mari yakawanda zvikuru. Vati chirongwa chemahara ichi chichabatsira veruzhinji vari kunonga svosve nemuromo zvekuti havawani mari yekunoongororwa. Vari kutungamirira chironga ichi, Doctor Ndabaningi Simango, vati chipatara chekuChina ichi chakavabatsira nemuchina wekuongorora vakati kunyange panopera chirongwa ichi, chipatara chiri kusara nemichina yavawana iyi. Chipatara cheParirenyatwa chambenge chichiongorora gomarara remuromo wechibereko nenzira ye Pap Smear ne VIAC. Vanhukadzi vanoshandisa nzira idzi vanofanirwa kuongororwa panopera makore matatu. Asi nenzira yeHPV iyi madzimai anozoongororwa mushure memakore mashanu. Chipatara ichi chiri kukurudzirawo kuti madzimai ari pakati pemakore makumi maviri nemashanu nemakumi matanhatu nemashanu vazonyoresa kuongororwa kuti vawane rubatsiro pachine nguva. No media source currently available
title: Parirenyatwa Yovheneka Gomarara reMuromo weChibereko Pasina Muripo

text: Magweta anoti gakava riri pakati paVaNelson Chamisa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe rekuti ndechipi chikwata chine kodzero dzekushandisa zita rekuti MDC-T rinogona kupedzwa chete nematare kana nhaurirano dzekuumba bato rimwe chete rakasimba. Mamwe magweta anoti kukakavadzana pakati paVaChamisa naMuzvare Khupe panyaya yekuti ndiyani mutungamiri weMDC-T chaiye kunopera chete kana nyaya iyi yazeyiwa mumatare. Gweta remuHarare rinoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaJeremiah Mutongi Bhamu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mutongo wakaturwa nemutongi wedare repamusoro muBulawayo nemusi weChipiri, VaFrancis Bere, uri pachena kuti nyaya iyi inogadziriswa chete nematare. VaBhamu vati pakati paVaChamisa naMuzvare Khupe hapana anokwanisa kurambidza mumwe kuita chinhu achishandisa zita rekuti MDC-T kudzamara matare agura kuti mutungamiri weMDC-T chaiye ndiyani. Rimwe gweta uye vachishanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mutongo waVaBere unoburitsa pachena kuti MDC-T yatsemuka nepakati zvakare. VaMavhinga vati gakava riri muMDC-T pari zvino rinogona kugadziriswawo nekutaurirana pakati paVaChamisa naMuzvare Khupe vachiti kazhinji kacho nyaya dzezvematongerwo hadziwanzoda kuendeswa kumatare. VaMavhinga vati mapoka maviri aya anosara asina kusimba pamberi pesarudzo kana akaramba kudzokerana kuti aite chinhu chimwe. Zvichakadai, mashoko aburitswa nebenhau reNewsDay anoti mapoka maviri eMDC-T aya akzvipira kuita nhaurirano dzekuti abatane zvakare. Aka hakasi kekutanga kuti bato iri ritsemuke. VaWelshman Ncube, avo vave kutungamira rimwe bato riri kuzvidaidza kuti MDC vakapatsanurana nevaimbova mutungamiri webato iri VaMorgan Tsvangirai muna 2005 zvakazopa kuti VaTsvangirai vadaidze bato ravo kuti MDC-T munguva dzesarudzo kunyange hazvo zita rebato riri MDC. Makore mashanu akatevera, vaimbove mumiriri weMDC mu St Marys, VaJob Sikhala, vakabudawo muMDC vachinoumba bato ravo reMDC99 muna 1010 Mushure mesarudzo dzemuna 2013, VaTsvangirai vakapatsanurana zvakare nevaimbove munyori mukuru muMDC, VaTendai Biti, nevamwe vakaita saVaElton Mangoma, vakanoumba bato ravo. Asi vaviri ava havana kugarisana zvakanaka, vachibva vazvipatsanura VaMangoma vachinoumba bato ravo rinonzi Renewal Democrats of Zimbabwe, ukuwo VaBiti vachiumba People’s Democratic Party. VaBiti vakapatsanuranawo nevamwe vavo, bato iri rikaita vatungamiri vaviri, VaBiti vari kwavo, ukuwo Amai Lucia Matibenga vachitungamirawo imwe People’s Democratic Party. VaNcube vakapatsanuranawo nevamwe vavo vakaita saVaMoses Mzila mushure mekunetsana. VaTsvangirai vasati vashaya, vakashanda zvakasimba kuti VaBiti naVaNcube vapinde mumubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance, uyo vari kuenderera mberi vachitsigira VaChamisa. No media source currently available
title: Kutaurirana Kana Matare Ndizvo Chete Zvinopedza Gakava Riri muMDC-T

text: Zimbabwe inonzi iri kuramba ichinyura mumatambudziko mune zveupfumi pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika, zvichiwedzerwawo nenzara yakakonzerwa nekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura mwaka wapfuura. Matambudziko aya anonzi nevamwe ave kutoda kuti vanhu vaise musoro pamwe vaite muonera pamwe chuma chemuzukuru kuti zvinhu zvigadziriswe nekukasika. Asi vamwewo ndivo vari kuti mamiriro aita zvinhu ave kutoda kuti munyika muitwe munamato kana bira chairo kuti nyika ichenurwe, sezvo yave kuita seyakageza negoka munyama. Vari munyika vanonzi vari kunetsaka kuwana zvacho zvavanoda zuva nezuva zvakaita semvura, magetsi, uye chikafu, ukuwo mitengo yezvinhu ichiramba ichiita chamurambamhuru kukwira. Ko, vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika zvii zvavangaitewo mukubatsira kugadzirisa matambudziko ari kumusha aya? Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri Kunze kwenyika chichidzidzisa paUniversity of Bergen kuNorway, Doctor Victor Chumhutu, chinoti vari kunze kwenyika vanokwanisa kuumba makomiti anokwanisa kuunganidza mari pamwedzi wega wega, iyo vanoti inozokwanisa kubatsira kugadzirisa mamwe matambudziko ari kumusha. Doctor Chimhutu vanoti dambudziko riripo chete nderekuti hurumende haisati yarakidza vari kunze ava kuti vakakosha zvakadii, sezo pachiita sekunge pasina chivimbo pakati pemapoka maviri aya. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri Kunze zvinoti sezvo zviine bandiko guru kwazvo razviri kuita munyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika, zvinofanirwa kupiwawo kodzero yekuvhota zviri munyika dzazvigere.
title: Vari Kunze Vokurudzirwa Kubatana Mukugadzirisa Matambudziko Ari Kumusha

text: Sangano rakazvimirira roga richioona nezvesarudzo reZimbabwe Election Support Network (ZESN) riri kukurudzira vatungamiri vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika nevatsigiri vavo kuti vasaite zvemhirizhonga pamberi pesarudzo dza2023 sezvo zvichidzosera kumashure hutongo hwejekerere. Izvi zvinotevera mhirizhonga iri kuitika kuMatobo neInsiza pamberi pesarudzo dzema by-elections ekutsvaga makanzura. Sangano iri riri kukurudzira vezvematongerwo enyika kuti vaumbe hwaro hwekugadzirisa nyaya dzemhirizhonga Vatsigiri vebato reCCC usanganisira nhengo dzedare reparamende vanoti vakarwiiswa nevatsigiri veZanu-PF. Asi Zanu-PF iri kuramba izvi. Mapurisa anoti akatambira mashoko kubva kumapato ose achichema chema nenyaya yemhirizhonga. ZESN yakurudzirawo komisheni inoona nezverunyararo yeNational Peace and Reconciliation kuti iferefete nyaya idzi uye vanenge vachikonzera mhirizhonga vosungwa. Gwaro reZESN riri kukurudzira runyararo nekucherechedzwa kwemitemo inobata sarudzo munyika. Vafanobata chigaro chemukuru weZESN Muzvare Ellen Kandororo Dingane vanoti vanhu vane kodzero yekutsigira bato ravanoda vakasungunuka. No media source currently available
title: ZESN Yokurudzira Runyararo Pamberi peSarudzo dza2023

text: Richiti nhengo dzaro dzaneta nekusabatwa zvakanaka nevashandirwi, sangano rinomirira vatyairi vemarori, mabhazi, makombi nematekisi anoshandira munyika nemudunhu reSADC, pamwe nevanovabatira basa, reZimbabwe Union of Drivers And Conductors, (ZUDAC) rinoti ririkurwisa kuti riwane chigaro musangano re National Employment Council (NEC) kuti zvichemo zvenhengo dzaro zvikurukurwe uye kuti zvigadziriswe. Mutungamiri we ZUDAC, VaFredrick Maguramhinga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende haifanirwi kushorwa pamusoro pemabatirwo anoitwa vashandi vezvekutakurwa kwevanhu nezvunhu, vachiti vashandirwi ndivo vasingadi kuona masangano anomirira vashandi naizvozvo vanoita madiro mukumbunyikidza vashandi vavo. Vanoti sangano ravo harifari nemasarudzirwo anoitwa vanhu vari muNEC naizvozvo sangano ravo riri kurwira chigaro mu NEC kuti varwirwe kodzero dzevashandi vavo, vachiti vashandi vaneta nekumirira kuti zvunhu zvifambiswe zvakanaka asi pasina chinoitika. VaMaguramhinga vanoti sangano rese zvaro rakanyoreswa sesangano rinomirira vashandi rinobvumidzwa kupinda mu NEC umo vanoti mungavapa mukana wekugara pasi nevashandirwi vachitaurirana zvinonetsa pasina zvekutsvenganzvenga sezvavari kuita ikozvino kana zvichemo zvevashandi zvasvitswa kwavari. No media source currently available Sachigaro we sangano re Transporters Association of Zimbabwe, VaAlbert Bere, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havana chekutaura pamusoro penyaya iyi.
title: Sangano reZimbabwe Union of Drivers And Conductors Rinoda Chigaro muNational Employment Council

text: Dare reparamende neChipiri rakadzinga nhengo makumi maviri neimwe kubva kumatare eSeneti neNational Assembly zvichitevera kudzingwa kwadzo mubato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai gore rapfuura. Nhengo ina dzakadzingwa kubva kuSeneti kwozoti makumi manomwe nenomwe dzikadzingwa kubva kuNational Assembly. Aka ndekekutanga dare iri richidzinga nhengo dzakawanda kudai kubva pakawana Zimbabwe rusunguko muna 1980. Kudzingwa kwenhengo dzeMDC Renewal kunotevera tsamba yakanyorwa kudare iri nemunyori mukuru weMDC T VaDouglas Mwonzora masvondo maviri apfuura vachizivisa dare iri kuti nhengo idzi dzainge dzisisamirire zvido zvebato ravo muparamande. Vachitura mutongo wavo, mutauriri weNational Assembly, VaJacob Mudenda vakati nhengo idzi dzakadzingwa pachitevera chikamu chebumbiro remutemo chinoti munhu anomira kuve nhengo yadare iri kana achinge abuda kana kumiswa kuve nhengo yebato raaimirira apo akasarudzwa kupinda mudare reparamende. Vanoti apo vakambonzi vape mutongo panyaya iyi gore rapfuura, havana kukwanisa kuita izvi sezvo painge paine makakatanwa ekuti ndiyani aitungamira MDC T. Asi vati pari zvino zvave pachena sezvo nyaya dzaive kumatare dzakabviswa uye chikwata chenhengo dzadzingwa dzisina kumisa musangano weMDC T wekusarudza vatungamiri wakaitwa muna Zvita gore rapera ukatora danho rekuvadzinga mubato iri. Vatiwo chikwata ichi hachina kupikisa zvakabuda mumusangano uyu vakati pasina izvi vaona zvakakodzera kuti vadzinge nhengo idzi mudare iri. Vati vachazivisa mutungamiri wenyika pamwe nevekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo kuti mugoitwa sarudzo mumatatunhu ese aya. Vadzingwa vanosanganisira VaTendai Biti (Harare East) , VaWillias Madzimure ( Kambuzuma), Amai Lucia Matibenga (Kuwadzana), VaPaul Madzore (Glen View) VaSolomon Madzore (Dzivaresekwa), VaBekitemba Nyathi (Mpopoma Pelandaba), VaRegie Moyo (Luveve), VaAlbert Mhlanga (Pumula), VaMoses Manyengavana (Highfield West), VaSamuel Sipepa Nkomo (Lobengula), Amai Roseline Nkomo, (Tsholotsho North), VaSettlement Chikwinya (Mbizo), VaGorden Moyo (Makokoba), VaAnorld Tsunga (Dangamvura) , Amai Evelyn Masaiti, Judith Muzhavazhe na Amai Gladys Mathe avo vaimirira Harare, Masvingo neBulawayo pasi pechirongwa chevanosarudzwa nehuwandu hwevanhu vanenge vachota kana kuti Proprotional Representation. Vadzingwa kuSeneti ndaAmai Rorina Muchihwa vaimirira Chikomo, Amai Sekai Hollanda vaimirira Chizhanje, VaWatchy Sibanda veMatabeleland South naVaPatrick Chitaka vekuManicaland. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure mekudzingwa kwavo VaSolomon Madzore vati vanotambira mutongo waVaMudenda pari zvino asi vakati dare ravo richatora matanho. Amai Muchihwa vati vanotambira zvaturwa nedare reparamende asi vakati vakati dambudziko rapinda mubato reMDC T rinofanira kugadziriswa.Mutauriri weMDC Renewal VaJacob Mafume vashora mutongo wapihwa neparamende vakati vachukwikwidzw kumatare edzimhosva. Zvichakadai vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vanoti zvakaitika neChipiri zvinosiya bato rinopikisa risina simba mudare uye vakati zvinodzikisa mukana wekuti masangano anopikisa abatane kuti arwise Zanu PF munguva yesarudzo dzemuna 2018. Mukuru weMedia Centre Earnest Mudzengui vanoti kunyange hazvo bato reMDC T rakati harisi kuzopinda musarudzo dzemaby-elections, vanoona bato iri richikwikwidza sezvo sarudzo dziri kuitwa mumaguta munova munerutsigiro rwebato iri rwakanyanya. Kusvika parizvino pave nenhengo dzeparamende makumi maviri nenhatu dzadzingwa mushure mekunge Zanu PF yadzinga VaDidymus Mutasa naVaTemba Mliswa mwedzi wapfuura. No media source currently available Mutauriri weMDC Renewal Team VaJacob Mafume vati vachapikisa mutongo uyu. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vati VaMudenda vabaya dede nemukanwa. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeMDC Renewal Team Dzodzingwa Mudare reParamende

text: Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaHarry K Thomas Jnr vanoti kunyange hazvo vasingakwanise kuduzira hutongo hwaVaTrump, hurongwa hweAmerica mukutsigira Zimbabwe munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu, kutsigira sarudzo dzakachena, nekutsigira munyaya dzezvehutano kuchaenderera mberi. Vachitaura kuvanhu vakungana pamuzinda weAmerica vachitevera zvange zviri kubuda musarudzo dzeku America, VaThomas vati nyika yavo icharamba ichitsigirawo nyaya dzekupedza nzara pamwe nechirongwa cheYoung African Leadership Initiative kana kuti Mandela Washington Fellowship icho chinopa mukana vechidiki vemuAfrica kuenda kuAmerica kunodzidzira zvehutungamiri. VaThomas vati vafara chose kuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe vafarira sarudzo dzenyika yavo uye kuonawo kuti hutongi hwejekerere hunofamba sei. Vatiwo vaonawo sekuti vamwe vanhu vange vasiri kufara nezvamuda musarudzo idzi vati vanofanira kuzvitambira nekuti ndizvo zvinoita sarudzo vamwe vanokunda vamwe vachikundwa. Mumwe wevasina kufara nezvabuda musarudzo idzi ndiVaNyasha Dhliwayo avo vati vashamiswa zvikuru nekukunda kwaVaTrump. Asi vati havana zvavangaite nekuti vahu vekuAmerica vaita kuda kwavo. Vatiwo havaoni VaTrump vachishandura mitemo yeAmerica pakudyidzana neZimbabwe. Muzvinabhizimisi Patronella Maturure vanoti havanyanyinkufarira nyaya yaVaTrump yekuda kudzinga vanhu vekune dzimwe nyika vari muAmerica zvisiri pamutemo. VaTrust Mamombe vati chabuda kuAmerica kuti munhu anokwanisa kukwikwidza kunyange asingadiwe nevamwe vebato rake. Vatiwo chasara kuvanhu veZimbabwe kugadzirira kushanda naVaTrump kunyange hazvo vari munhu anokwanisa kuita zvisingafungirwe. Vanoongorora zvematomgerwo enyika VaVivid Gwede vatiwo zvakakosha kutambira zvabuda musarudza vachiti sarudzo idzi dzakaitwa zvakajeka.
title: Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe VaHarry Thomas Votaura nezveSarudzo dzemuNyika Yavo

text: Vana veZimbabwe vanonzi vave nemaonero akasiyanasiyana pamusoro pekurudziro yezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinonzi zvave kukurudzira kuti munyika muve mamwe maoko anofanofambisa zvinhu kusvika nyika yaita sarudzo. Chikwata chavanamuzvinafundo, icho chiri kuzvidaida kuti Platform for Concerned Citizens, (PCC), neChitatu chakakurudzira kuti munyika muumbwe boka risina divi rarakarerekera rinofanobata matomu kusvika sarudzo dzaitwa muna 2018. Chikwata ichi chinoti boka iri, iro rinenge richinzi National Transitional Authority, ndiro chete nzira inokwanisa kuita kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzakachena uye murunyararo, idzo Platform for Concerned Citizens inoti hadzikwanisi kuitwa chero nguva, kunyange muna 2018 macho. Mumwe wevari muchikwata chePCC, Doctor Ibbo Mandaza vakaudza vatori venhau kuti National Transitional Authority ndiyo chete inokwanisa kudzivirira nyika kuti isapinde muna taisireva zvichi konzerwa nekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyaya dzeupfimu pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika. Asi sachigaro weZanu PF mudunhu reUnited Kingdom, VaNick Mangwana vanoti vanhu vari kukurudzira kuti munyika muve nevanofanobata matomu ndiwo mafungiro avo, asi izvi hazvisi mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. "Aah, ipfungwa dzavo, pfungwa dzavo dzinoti vanhu vakafungawo, kana vakafunga dzinoti ware, vamwe vakafungawo dzezvimbwamupengo mafungiro avo. hapana chakaipa," VaMangwana vanodaro. Asi mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu vanoti nemamiriro akaita zvinhu boka rinofanobata matomu ndiro chete ringatofambisa zvinhu sezvo vanhu vatambura. "Ndoda kuti Nick azive kuti zviri kuitika muZimbabwe mazuvano zvakaoma. Iye zvinganomunetsa kuti azive matamburiro atiri kuita kuno nekuti iye ari kumafura mhepo, ari kuEngland, kuLondon saka pamwe haa, zviri kumufambira. Kuno Jonga, vana neZimbabwe vatambura," VaGutu vanodaro. VaGutu vanoti munzvimbo dzavari kumbofamba vachisvika, zvikuru kumamisha aya ari kumatunhu ari kure, vanhu vatambura zvekuti vanokuudza kuti havachazivi sadza. Asi VaMugabe vakatozivisa kare kuti havana kwavari kuenda, kunyange hazvo vari kukurudzirwa nemapoka evanhu akawanda kusanganisira revakarwa hondo reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association. Asi izvi zvaita kuti hutungamiri hwesangano iri huzvigokere moto muziso, sezvo vamwe vatungamiri vakatosungwa uye vamwe vakatotiza misha yavo. No media source currently available
title: Kurudziro yeKuti muNyika Muumbwe Boka Rinofanobata Matomu Yopesanisa Vanhu

text: Vana chiremba vemuHarare varatidzira kekutanga kubvira zvavatanga kuramwa mabasa kutanga kwedzi uno vachipika kuti kunyange hurumende ikavatyityidzira zvakadii, havasi kuzodzokera kumabasa zvichemo zvavo zvisati zvagadziriswa. Vana chiremba ava vati zviri pachena kuti hurumende haina hany’a nehutano hweveruzhinji sezvo zvichemo zvavo zvave nemakore akawanda hurumende ichivimbisa kugadzirisa asi pasina chinobuda. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association (ZHDA), Dr Amos Tsopo, vati hapana chine musoro chakabuda panhaurirano dzavakaita nehurumende. VaTsopo vati nekuda kwekuti vanoshanda muzvipatara zvinorapwa vanotambura, vanorwadzikana zvakanyanya kuti vari kufirwa nevarwere vavanofanirwa kunge vachibatsira nekuda kwekushaikwa kwezvekushandisa muzvipatara.
