VaTsopo vatiwo vanoshungurudzika zvikuru nemari yavakawedzerwa nehurumende masenzi makumi manomwe nemashanu chete paawa rimwe chete. Vanachiremba vari kuda kuti mari yavanoshandira paawa imwechete isvike pagumi remadhora kubva padhora nechidimbu ravari kuwana pari zvino. Mumwe wevanachiremba vanga vachiratidzira vangoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Dr Jessica vati sevanhu vasinawo mari vanorapwa pazvipatara zvehurumende, vanoda kutiwo zvipatara izvi zvive nezvekushandisa zvakakwana. Dr Jessica vatiwo kushanda vasina zvakakwana kuri kuisawo hutano hwavo panjodzi. Izvi zvatsigirwa naDr Lina Mambondiyani avo vati vanoshandira kuchipatara cheHarare Hospital. Dr Mambondiyani vati kwavanoshandira kana mvura chaiyo inonetsa kuwana. Vanotaura vakamirira ZHDA, Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya, vati havasi kuzodzokera kumabasa kana zvichemo zvavo zvisati zvagadziriswa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya yavana chiremba. Asi hurumende inoti iri kuedza kutaurirana nanachiremba ava kuti vadzokere kumabasa. No media source currently available
title: Vana Chiremba Vanoti Hurumende Ngaigadzirise Zvichemo Zvavo Kuti Vadzokere Kubasa

text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuchema chema kuti zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi nematongerwo enyika zvasvika pakaipisisa zvekuti kurarama yave nyasha dzaNyadenga. Mitengo yezvinhu iri kuramba ichiita chamurambamhuuru ichikwira ukuwo zvinhu zvakaita semvura nemagetsi zvave kunetsa kuwana zvopa kuti vanhu varare vakapfeka shangu sezvo zvave kuuya husiku kunge muroyi. Vanhu vakawanda havana mabasa uye vari kushanda vacho vashoma vave kutarisana nechigumura sezvo makambani asiri kushanda zvakanaka nekushaya magetsi nemari yekunze inodiwa kutenga zvimwe zvaanoshandisa. Ko dambudziko rapinda mumusha iri ringagadziriswe sei chaizvo? Vamwe vanoti pave kuda kuitwa hurukuro pakati pemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nemutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC, VaNelson Chamisa. Asi izvi zvingabastira here? Gweta uye vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaTinomuda Chinyoka, vanoti nhaurirano hadzina zvadzinobatsira vachiti veMDC inofanira kungobvuma kuti yakakundwa musarudzo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru weMedia Center, VaEarnest Mudzengi, vanoti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa inofanira kunyatsovandudza zvinhu nekuti iri kungoita zvimwe chete zvaiitwa nevaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. No media source currently available
title: Dzimwe Nyanzvi Dzoyambira Kuti Zimbabwe Yananga Kumawere

text: Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanogara munzvimbo dzine zviwanikwa, reCenter for Natural Resource Governance, Va Farai Maguwu, vanoti zvitokisi zvemunyika hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Izvi zvinotevera kurara kwakaita VaMaguwu nevamwe makumi maviri nevatatu muchitokisi chepa Mutare Central Police Station usiku hwemusi weChisnahu mushure mekusungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekupinda zvisina mvumo muminda yemangoda ekwaChiadzwa. VaMaguwu vanoti muchitokisi mavakanga vari makanga musina magumbeze, asi kuti vakarara vakafuka zvikorobho chaizvo. Vanoti nekuda kwekuti twumagumbeze utwu hatwuwachiwe, inda dziri kuita madiro aJojina muvasungwa. Chimwe chavanoti chakavashungurudza kusashambidzika kwechimbuzi, icho chinodirwa mvura kamwe chete pazuva, uye zvichiitwa nemunhu ari kunze. VaMaguwu nevamwe vavo vaibva kunyika dzinoti Brazil, Britain, Kenya, South Africa, Swaziland, Uganda neZambia, vakasungwa munzvimbo yekwa Mukwada uko vakanga vaungana vachida kucherechedza kushungurudzwa kwevanhu vaichera mangoda nehurumende. Vakazomiswa pamberi pedare ramejasiteriti kwaMutare neMugovera vakazobhadhariswa mari inoita zana remadhora pamunhu oga-oga yenhenda murandu kana kuti faindi. Asi VaMaguwu vanoti mamiriro ezvinhu muzvitokisi ndiwo akaita kuti vabhadhare mari iyi, kwete kuti vakabvuma mhosva dzavaipomerwa. Vanoti vane hurongwa hwekukwira kumatare edzimhosva kuti angorore zvakare mhosva dzavari kupomera, sezvo ivo vachiti havana mhosva yavakapara mushure mekunge vashanyira kwaChiadzwa. No media source currently available
title: VaMaguwu Vanoti Mamiriro eZvinhu muZvitokisi Akashata

text: Vakuru vebato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition fpr Change avo vanoti vakakandirwa bhambo rinofungidzrwa kuti ndere peturu nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri vebato reZanu-PF vanoti havasi kuzobvuma kutyisidzirwa rwendo rwuno. Bhambo iri rinonzi rakakandwa maminetsi mashoma mutungamiri webato reCCC VaNelson Chamisa vasati vasvika. Vanhu vainge vari mumutokari yeHonda Fit yesilver, Kunyangwe vatsigiri vebato iri vainge vaungana panhandare yeGadzema vakamboda kutiza, vakafaniobata chigaro chemurongi wemabasa muCCC VaAmos Chibaya vakavakurudzira kuti vasatize vachidi uku kwainge kuri kuda kungovatyisidzira. Mumwe akafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri webato iri Amai Lynette Karenyi Kore vakatiwo chasara kuZanu-PF kuda kutyisidzira vanopikisa nemhirizhonga akati hana zvitsva. VaChamisa vakakurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti vatsvage rutsigiro murunyararo. Vakati igaroziva kuti zizi harina nyanga nekudaro havasi kuzobvuma kuhundutsirwa. Vakati manyepo anofamba achitaurwa nevamwe vakuru veZanu-PF kuti vakakunda musarudzo havatongi mauto ndeenyika kwete bato. Studio 7 yakayedza kubata gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe asi havana kuda kutaura nesu patakavaudza parunhare kuti tiri kufona kubva kuStudio 7. Hatinawo kubata mutauriri webato reZanu-PF VaChris Mutsvangwa. Mapurisa ari kupomerwa mhosva yekutora divi achitsigira Zanu-PF zvopa kuti zvinhu zvisagadzikane munyika. Asi mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Vapaul Nyathi avo vasinawo kubatika panharembozha yavo vakamboudza Studio 7 kuti mapurisa haatarise kuti wabuda mumba maani. Bato reCCC riri kushorwawo nemasangano evatori venhau sezvo mumwe anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwebato akarova mutori wenhau weNewshawk, Muzvare Ruvimbo Muchenje. Bato iri rinoti izvi zvakaitika mushure mekukandwa kwebhambo sezvo zvinhu zvange zvisisina kugadzikana. No media source currently available
title: CCC Yokandirwa Bhambo neVanofungidzirwa Kuti Vatsigiri veZanu-PF Asi Ichiti Hayo "Zizi Harina Nyanga"

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakatiza mhirizhonga iri kuitika kuSouth Africa yakananangana nevanhu vasiri venyika iyi, zvinoti zvave kudzokera ku South Africa kwakare sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka muZimbabwe. Studio7 yasvika panzvimbo inokwirirwa mabhazi anoenda kuSouth Africa mu Harare panozivikanwa nekuti Roadport payaona vanhu vanga vachienda ku South Africa avo vanoti mhirizhonga iyi iri kuitika kuSouth Africa iri nani pane kugarira nhamo iri mu Zimbabwe. Mumwe wevanhu ava, ndiVa Naison Musiyambiri, avo vanoti vakatiza ku Kwa Zulu Natal ku South Africa svondo rapera. Va Musiyambiri vanoti zviri nani kuti vadzokere kuSouth Africa pane kuona nhamo iri muZimbabwe. Mumwe wevanga vachienda ku South Africa ava, Muzvare Benhilda Murinda, vati kunyange hazvo kari kekutanga kwavari kuenda ku South Africa, kusamira zvakanaka kwaita hupfumi hwenyika mu Zimbabwe ndiko kwaita kuti vati vanonozvionera mberi. Mukuru we Civil Protection Union, Va Madzudzo Pawadyira, vaudza Studio 7 parunharare kuti vachange vachiongorora zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvave pamuganhu weZimbabwe neSouth Africa ku Beit Bridge kuti vanhu here zveshuwa vakatiza kusagadzikana kuri mu South Africa kana kuti vanhuwo zvavo vari kuda kungoshandisa mukana uyu kukwira mabhazi mahara. Hurumende inonzi yaendeswa mabhazi kuBeit Bridge kunotora vanhu vari kutiza mhirizhonga kuSouth Africa. Va Pawadyira vati vari mumusangano ku Beitbridge kwakare wekuedza kutsvaga kuti vanenge vasina pekugara muno vawane pekugara kana vatutwa kubva ku Beitbridge. Vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vakakuvadzwa mumhirizhonga ye xenophobia ku South Africa uye pane vamwe vanonzi vakatofa vanosvika vashanu. Zvichakadai, dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzashora mutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, nekubuda munyika vachienda kumusangano we Non Aligned Movement uri kuitirwa ku Indonesia. Mutungamiri we South Africa, Va Jacob Zuma, vakatoregedza kuenda kumusangano uyu nepamusana penyaya yerusarura rudzi muSouth Africa iyo iri kushorwa pasi rose. Studio7 yaedza kutaura negurukota rezvemukati menyika, Va Kembo Mohadi, asi vati havataure ne Studio7.
title: Vakatiza Mhirizhonga kuSouth Africa Vodzokera kuSouth Africa Vachiti Zimbabwe Yaoma

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kusimuka neMuvhuro vakananga kuNamibia mukuenderera mberi nerwendo rwavo rwekusangana nevatungamiri venyika dzemuchamhembe kweAfrica vachiudza mamiriro akaita zvinhu muZimbabwe kubva patora hurumende yavo masimba kubva kune vaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kusangana nemutungamiri wenyika yeNamibia, VaHage Geingob. Rwendo urwu rwunotevera kushanya kwavakaita svondo rapera kuAngola uko vakasanganawo nemutungamiri wenyika iyi uye vari sachigaro veSADC Organ on Politics, Defense and Security, VaJoao Lourenco. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwawo kushanyira mutungamiri weZambia VaEdgar Lungu neChishanu Svondo rino, vachizoendawo kuBotswana kunosangana nemutungamiri wenyika iyi VaSeretse Khama Ian Khama. Mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba vaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti chekutanga parwendo urwu kushanyira vatungamiri ava, asi chimwe chechipiri ndechekuvazivisa nezvekugadzikana kwezvinhu muZimbabwe pamwe negadziriro dzesarudzo dzegore rino, idzo dzinofanirwa kuve dzakasununguka, dzakachena uye dzichitambirika. VaMnangagwa vakaparura rwendo rwavo rwekusangana nevatungamiri vekuchmhembe kweAfrica kuburikidza nekushanyira mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaJacob Zuma, avo vanove sachigaro weSADC pari zvino.
title: Mutungamiri weNyika VaMnangagwa Vosimuka Vakananga kuNamibia

text: Vamwe vanhu vane chitsama vakaratidzira panze pedare raMajastiriti kuMbare nemusi weChina vachigunun’una nekunyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kuri kuitwa muzvare Linda Masarira vesangano reWomen in Politics Alliance. Muzvare Masarira vari mujeri remadzimai reChikurubi Maximum Prison vakamirira kutongwa pamhosva dzakawanda dzavari kupomerwa. Gweta raMuzvare Masarira reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights anoti haasi kufara zvachose nekunonoka kunzwikwa kwenyaya dzavari kupomerwa. Gweta iri, VaKudzai VaKadzere veZimbabwe Lawyers For Human Rights vari kumirira Muzvare Linda Masarira pamwe nevamwe vanorwira vekodzero dzevanhu gumi nevana vakasungwa musi wa 6 Chikunguru pakuratidzira kwainge kwakarongwa nesangano reTajamuka/Sesijikile Campaign pamwe naPastor Evan Mawarire veHash Tag This Flag. VaKadzere vari kugunun'una nekunonoka kunyorwa kwemagwaro ezvakaita mudare redzimhosva pamwe nemhosva yavari kupomerwa. VaKadzere vaudza Studio 7 kuti kusavapo kwemagwaro aya anozivikanwa pachirungu kuti Transcription of the record of proceedings ndiko kwavamisa kuti vaende kudare repamusoro reHigh court kuedza kuti Muzvare Linda Masarira vatongwewo vachibva kumba. Vamwe vari kutongwa pamwe naMuzvare Masarira vari kutongwa vachibva kumba mushure mekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kudare. Muzvare Masarira vari kutongwa vachibva kujeri reChikurubi sezvo vachinzi vane imwe mhosva yavari kupomerwa kwaMutare. Dare rakaramba kupa mvumo Muzvare Masarira yekuenda kwaMutare kunogadzirisa nyaya yegwaro iri rakakonzera kuti vanyimwe mari yechibatiso. VaKadzere vanoti vachaongorora nyaya yekuti Muzvare Masarira vanonzi havasi kunzwa zvakanaka havasi kuwana mimwe mishonga yavanoda vari muhusungwa. Shamwari yaMuzvare Masarira, Muzvare Mandowa Manezhu vaudza Studio 7 kuti Muzvare Masarira vari kurwara vakatiwo tariro yavo yange iri yekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba sevamwe. VaElvis Mugari vebato rinopikisa rePeople Democratic Party ndemumwe wevange vari kuMbare. Vati nyaya yekuramba Muzvare Masarira vari mujeri ichavapa kuti vatange kuratidzira. Mutongi wedare VaStan Mambanje vazivisa muchuchusi kuti agadzire magwaro ari kudiwa aya vakati Muzvare Masarira nevamwe vavo vachadzoka kudare musi wa 25 Nyamavhuvhu pachatanga kutongwa nyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Linda Masarira Voramba Vari muJeri reChikurubi Asi Vamwe Vachiratidzira

text: Sangano revarairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rinoti kusvika pari zvino vashandi vehurumende havasati vajekeserwa kuti vanotora sei mari kubva kumabhanga avo dzekubatsirikana munguva ino yeCovid-19 dzinoita madhora makumi manomwe nemashanu emari yekuAmerica, izvo sangano iri rinoti zvave kuita kuti vashandi ava vabiridzirwe nemabhanga pamwe nevezvitoro. Munyori mukuru wePTUZ, VaRaymond Majongwe, vanoti sangano ravo riri kuwana mashoko ekuti varairidzi vakawanda vave kumanikidzwa nemabhanga avo kutora idzi dziri mumadhora emunyika, uye nemutengo uri pasi kudarika wakatarwa svondo iroro wedhora rekuAmerica. VaMajongwe vanoti vamwe vave kumanikidzwa nevezvitoro kutenga zvavasingade kuti vakwanise kushandisa mari idzi. Vanotiwo vamwe vezvitoro vari kuramba kutambira makadhi ari kuiswa mari idzi, izvo zviri kuomesera vashandi vehurumende. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi, asi gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vakaudza bepanhau reHerald nemusi weChitatu kuti hurumende yakanga yaita chibvumirano nevemabhanga pamwe nevezvitoro kuti vashandi vehurumende ngashandisa sei mari dzavo dzekubatsirika idzi. Vaimbove vashandi vehurumende vave pamudyandigere vakapiwawo madhora makumi matatu emari yekuAmerica yekuti vabatsirikane munguva ino ye Covid-19. Ngatinzweyi hurukuro yaitwa naJonga Kandemiiri weStudio 7 naVaMajongwe pamusoro penyaya iyi.
title: PTUZ Inoti Hurumende Inofanirwa Kujekesa Mapirwo Achaitwa Vashandi Mari dzeKubatsirikana

text: Mhuri yevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, mushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe, inoti inotsigira kupinda kwemwanakomana wavo Robert Junior munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Mutauriri wemhuri uye vari muzukuru waVaMugabe, VaLeo Mugabe, vanoti vanotsigira kupinda mune zvematongerwo enyika kwaRobert Jnr., vachiti havana kubvira vamboita dambudziko nemusangano weZanu PF, asi nevanhu vakapidigura hurumende yaVaMugabe. VaLeo Mugabe vanoti kunyange VaMugabe vakafa vakagumbukira mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vakavatorera masimba nechisimba, nyaya iyi yakapera nekufa kwavo, vachiti zvakaitika zvakapera. VaLeo Mugabe vanoti bato reZanu PF harisi remunhu nekudaro nhengo dzemhuri yavo dzinogonawo kupinda nekutora zvigaro mubato iri. Kutaura kwaVaLeo Mugabe kunotevera kuenda kwakaita Robert Jnr kumusangano weZanu PF wakaitirwa kuChitungwiza apo VaMnangagwa vaitsvagira rutsigiro nhengo dzavo pamberi pesarudzo dzema by-elections dzakaita musi wa26 Kurume. Mutauriri webato rinopikisa reMDC-T inotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora, VaWitness Dube, vanoti kupinda kwevana vevatungamiri vezvematongerwo enyika mune zvematongerwo enyika kuri paviri. VaDube vanoti kupinda kwemwana waVaMugabe munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kuri kukonzerwa nevanhu vari kuda kuita sevaifarira VaMugabe asi vari ivo vakavashungurudza kusvika vafa. Patavabvunza kuti inga wani vana vevaimbove mutungamiri webato ravo VaMorgan Tsvangirai vakapihwa zvigaro, VaDube vanoti vana vaVaTsvangirai vakaita zvematongerwo enyika nekuda kwemhodzi yeshanduko yakadyarwa nababa vavo, kwete zvekushandiswa. Mukuru wePlatform for Youth and Community Development, VaClaris Madhuku vanoti nyaya dzekuti vana vevatungamiri venyika vapinde mune zvematongerwo enyika chinhu chinoitika zvakanyanya munyika dzemu Africa, vachiti zvakaitika kunyika dzakaita seKenya, Botswana, South Africa nedzimwe. VaMadhuku vanoti chakakosha ndechekuti vana ava vane kodzero semunhu wese munyika kuita zvematongerwo enyika. Zvinonziwo mwana waVaMnangagwa, Kudakwashe David, ari kuda kupindawo munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Mutauriri weZanu PF, VaChrsitopher Mutsvangwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanofara kwazvo kana vana vemagamba ehondo vachipinda mune zvematongerwo enyika kuchengetedza nhaka yavo. Mune dzimwe nyika, vatungamiri venyika pamwe nevamwe vanenge vari mumasimba mune zvematongerwo enyika vanopinza vana vavo mune zvematongerwo enyika senzira yekuchengetedza nayo hupfumi hwavanenge vaunganidza, kuitira kana vakazosiya masimba. No media source currently available
title: Mhuri yekwaMugabe Inoti Inotsigira Kupinda Mune zveMatongerwo eNyika kwaRobert Mugabe Jnr.

text: Musangano wakadaidzirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri we MDC T, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, uri kuenderera mberi mangwana sekurongwa kwazvakaitwa. Muzvare Khupe vakakokera musangano uyu urukutarisirwa kuti utaurwe nezveramangwana maererano nehutungamiriri hwavanoti hwakatorwa naVa Nelson Chamisa zviri kunze kwe bumbiro remutemo re MDC T. Muzvare khupe, avo vari kuzviti ndivo vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri we MDC T vanoti musangano wavo uri kuenderera mberi mu Bulawayo mangwana, zvisineyi kuti kune vanhu vari kufambisa mashoko ekuti musangano uyu hauchaitwa. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemunyori wezvekurongwa kwemisangano, VaAbednico Bhebhe. Va Bhebhe vataura izvi vari mumusanagano wekuronga nezvamangwana nevamwe vatungamiririr ve bato iri ku Bulawayo. Mutevedzeri wemunyori wezvemadzimai mu MDC T, Amai Dorothy “Gonyeti’ Ndlovu, vanoti musangano uyu uchaitwa mangwana kunyange hazvo vavengi vari kuedza kuda kuvhiringa hurongwa hwavo. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Khupe Voenderera Mberi neMusangano Wavo neSvondo muBulawayo

text: Vakasarudzwa kutungamira nyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden vebato remaDemocrats vari kutarisirwa nhasi kudomwa zviri pamutemo nematunhu ose pachasangana vamiriri vematunhu aya kumatare avo vachiumba inonzi Electoral College. Vamiriri ava vanotarisirwa kuti vangovhota sezvakaita vanhu mumatunhu avo vakasarudza VaBiden musi wa 3 Mbudzi. Asi kunyangwe matare aya ari kugara nhasi mumatunhu makumi mashanu, mutungamiri wenyika VaDonald Trump avo vakundwa musarudzo naVaJoe Biden vebato remaDemocrats vari kuramba kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo vachinyepa kuti ndivo vakakunda. Kunyangwe matare ari kurasa nyaya dzaVaTrump nekushaya humbowo, vakaudza nhepfenyuro yeFox News neSvondo kuti vachiri kuenderera mberi nekupikisa zvakabuda musarudzo uye vachakunda. Asi VaBiden vakave senata kwemakore makumi matatu nematanhatu uye mutevedzeri wevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaBarack Obama vari kutarisirwa kutora mhiko musi wa 20 Ndira. Dare reCongress richatambidzwa zviri pamutemo zvinenge zvabva kuElectoral College musi wa 6 Ndira. Mamwe maRepublicans anonzi ari kudazve kuyedza kuvhiringidza VaBiden mudare reHouse of Representatives asi izvi zvinonetsa nekuti maDemocrats ndiwo akawanda mudare iri.​ VaBiden avo vari kumba kwavo muguta reWilmington, Delaware vari kutarisirwa kutaura kunyika manheru ano muAmerica nezveElectoral College uye kusimba kwehutongo hwejekerere muAmerica.
title: Electoral College Yotarisirwa Nhasi Kusarudza VaBiden Zviri Pamutemo Kuti Vatungamire Nyika

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika pamwe nedzehupfumi dzinoti hadzioni paine chinochinja pakudyidzana pakati peZimbabwe neAmerica zvisinei nei nekuti ndiyani akunda musarudzo idzi. Sachigaro musangano reZimbabwe Editors Forum, VaDumisani Muleya, vanoti vakawanda muZimbabwe neAfrica yose vane tarisiro yekuti vari kumirira Democratic Party musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vakunde nekuti vari kumirira Republican Party, VaDonald Trump, vanogara vachinyomba vanhu vanobva kune dzimwe nyika uye havadi kuti vanhu ava vagare muAmerica. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour Economic Development Research Institute, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vanoti hapana chichachinja zvakanyanya kunyange VaBiden, avo vakambove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, vakakunda. Vanotiwo VaTrump, avo vanova mutungamiri weAmerica pari zvino, vakakunda, vanogona kutoomesera Zimbabwe nedzimwe nyika dzepasi rese. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika vachidzisa paUnversity of Zimbabwe, Dr Prolific Mataruse, vanoti kunyange hazvo VaTrump naVaBiden vakasiyana, vane muonero akafanana paZimbabwe. Asi vanoti zvinhu zvingatorerukira Zimbabwe pasi paVaTrump nekuti munhu anoita zvemabhizimisi uye vakasununguka kushanda nenyika dzakaoma musoro seZimbabwe izvo zvinocherechedzwa nekusangana kwavakaita nemutungamiriri weNorth Korea. Dr Mataruse vanoti America inyika inoomesera hurumende dzinotyora kodzero dzevanhu seZimbabwe, zvisineyi kuti ndiyani anenge ari mutungamiri. VaMuleya vanoti kunyange VaBiden vakakunda, zvirango zvinoramba zviripo kudzamara Zimbabwe yagadzirisa zvinodiwa pasi pemutemo wezvirango weZimbabwe Democracy and Recovery Act of 2001. Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nekudziyadzana nedzimwe nyika, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaKindness Paradza, vanoti vanoziva kuti kusanduka kwemutungamiri weAmerica hakusandure zvirango kana mutemo wenyika iyi wekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika. Asi vanoti vachataura nehurumende neparamende itsva yekuAmerica kuti zvirango zvibviswe. Gurukota rinoona nekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusisio Moyo, vanoti kunyange hazvo pachimboiita kupopotedzana pakati peAmerica neZimbabwe, vari kutaurirana nenyika iyi nechinangwa chekugadzirisa hukama pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Kunyange hazvo paine zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende, America ndiyo nyika inopa rubatsiro rwakanyanya kuZimbabwe munyaya dzehutano, chikafu, dzidzo nezvimwe. Kubva muna 1980, America yapa Zimbabwe rubatsiro rwemabhiriyoni matatu nemazana mashanu ezviru zvemadhora ekuAmerica. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzozeya Zvinoreva Sarudzo Dziri Kuitwa muAmerica

text: Sangano reZimbababwe Lawyers for Human Rights ratumira magweta kumativi mana enyika kunobatsira vanhu vakasungwa nemapurisa mukuratidzira kwakaitika munyika nemusi weChitatu. Vanhu zana nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu vakasungwa nemapurisa mukuratidzira kwainzi #ShutdownZimbabwe. KuBulawayo vanhu vanodarika makumi masere nevatanhatu vakasungwa uye vari kukamba yemapurisa yeMzilikazi. Hapana mhosva yati yapomerwa vanhu ava asi magweta avo anoti vazhinji vavo vakangokumbwa manheru eChitatu. Vamwe vasere vakanzi vaiita zvemisarinya paruzhinji kana kuti public nuisance vari kukamba yemapurisa yeBulawayo Central. Vamwe vashanu vari kukamba yemapurisa yeLuveve vachinzi vaidzivisa vanhu kufamba mudhorobha. MuHarare varume gumi nevatatu uye mudzimai mumwe chete vakasungwa kuMufakose uye vamwe vapfumbamwe vakasungwa kuBudiriro. KuVictoria Falls, vanhu gumi nevatanhatu vakasungwa vakagara mujeri husiku hwose mushure mekuratidzira murunyararo. Vamwe vemichovha vapfumbamwe vakasungwawo. kuZvishavane vanhu vatanhatu vakasungwawo uye vachaendeswa kukamba yeGweru Central. KuMasvingo vanhu vatanhatu vakasungwa vachinzi vaiita zvisina kufanira. KuChipinge varume vaviri vakasungwa vamwe vaviri vakasungwa kwaGutu. Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinotiwo vanhu makumi maviri nevasere vakasungwawo kuBeitbridge vakatongerwa mhosva yekuita mhirizhonga zvichitevera kuratidzira kwakaitika svondo rapera. Vamwe vanhu zana neshanu vakasungwawo kuMabvuku neBeitbridge. Mukuru weZLHR Muzvare Irene Petras vanori vazhinji vevanhu ava vakarohwa uye magweta akasimudza nyaya iyi mudare apo paizeyiwa nyaya yemari yechibatiso. Vakawanda vari kutarisira kumiswa pamberi pedare nemusi weChishanu.
title: Mapurisa Osunga Vanhu Mazana Matatu Mukuratidzira

text: MaWarriors emuZimbabwe atarisana nemutambo ungangokwanisa kuti vaende kumakundano e2017 Africa Cup of Nations. Mutambo uyu uchatambirwa kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium muHarare. Kukunda kwemaWarriors kukasangana nekukundwa kana kuita mangange kweGuinea apo irikutamba neSwaziland kunobva kwapa Zimbabwe tikiti rekuenda kumakundano makukuru emuAfrica aya. Parizvino, Zimbabwe irikutungamira nemapoinzi masere ichiteverwa neGuinea neSwaziland idzo dzine maponzi mashanu. Malawi ndiyo iri pasi pasi nemapoinzi maviri. MaWarriors akakundwa kana kuita mangange vanenge vazviomesera sezvo Guinea yakamirira kuendawo kumafainari aya ichitamba mutambo wayo wekugumisira iripamusha neZimbabwe. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Football Association VaPhillip Chiyangwa vanoti havana chimwe chavari kutaisira kubva kumutambo uyu kunze kwemapoinzi matatu akakwana. VaChiyangwa vayambira varairidzi vemaWarriors kuti chibvumirano chavo neZifa ndechekuendesa maWarriors kumaAfrica Cup of Nations Finals vachiti izvi zvikakona veZifa vanotora matanho. Pakapedzisira kutamba Zimbabwe neMalawi, maWarriors akakunda 2-1 nechibodzwa chakanwisa naKhama Billiart kuLilongwe. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association VaMathias Kufandirimbwa vanoti Zimbabwe irikudzokorora zvayakamboita asi ikozvino ichikunda nezvibodzwa zvakawanda Tichitarisa vatambi vezvikwata zviviri izvi, zvirikuratidza kuti Zimbabwe iri pamberi zvakanyanya. Panguva iyo Zimbabwe yakaunganidza vatambi varikutamba zvinemutsindo kunyika dzekunze, Malawi haina kana mutambi mumwechete anotamba kuEurope, vavanavo vanotamba kunze kwenyika vari avo varikubva kuSouth Africa nekuMozambique. Zvinonetsa kufunga kuti chikwata chine vatambi vakaita saKnowledge Musona (Denmark) Marvelous Nakamba (Netherlands) Costa Nhamoinesu (Czech Republic), Mathew Rusike (Sweden), Khama Biliart (Mamelodi Sundowns) Willard Katsande (Kaiser Chiefs), na Tendai Ndoro (Orlando Pirates) chingarohwe neMalawi iyo vatambi vavo vanemukurumbira vari Joseph Kwamwendo (Mozambique), John Banda (Mozambique), Limbikani Mzava (South Africa), Gerald Phiri (South Africa) naMicium Mhone (South Africa). VaMuchaneta Dzuwa avo vanozivikanwa zvikuru nemhaka yekubheja zvenhabvu vanoti varikuiisa mari yavo pamaWarriors vachiwedzera ivo kuti Zimbabwe ichanwisa zvibodzwa zvinosvika kana kudarika zviviri. Zimbabwe yakagumisira kuenda kumakwikwi aya muna 2006. Vakawanda vanoti maWarriors aisa gumbo rimwe chete mukuenda kumakwikwi aya. Asi mumutambo wenhabvu munopemberera chete kana mitambo yese yemumakundano yapera.
title: Makuwerere Pakati peZimbabwe Warriors neMalawi muMakwikwi eAFCON 2017

text: Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika vari kupomera hurumende mhosva yekushungurudza nekusunga vanhu vari kuratidzira kuti zvinhu munyika zvaita manyama amire nerongo. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano wakaitwa nezuro kuCrown Plaza Hotel wakakokerwa nesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition muHarare nezuro. Musangano uyu wakatevera kusungwa kuri kuitwa vanhu vari kuratidzira munyika mumaguta akasiyana siyana. Vari kusungwa ava vanobva kumasangano akaita seHash Tag This Flag, Tajamuka. Occupy Africa Unity Square nemamwe. Nhengo yeTajamuka VaDenford Ngadziore vakati nyaya yekushungurudza vanhu haina zvainobatsira. Muzvare Maurine Kademaunga, mumwe mudzimai wechidiki vakatiwo hurumende irikupedza nguva ichifunga kuti pane hurumende dzekunze dzirikufurira vana veZimbabwe. Vati nhamo ndiyo yopa kuti vanhu varatidzire. VaJoel Nyazura mumwe wechidiki aive pamusangano apa akati iye verumwe ruzhinji munyika varikuzvipira kukukurudzira VaMugabe kuti vasiye basa kunayngwe zvichiuya nemavanga. Izvi zvakatsinhirwawo naVaStanley Zvorwadza, sachigaro weNational Vendors Union of Zimbabwe vakaramba kuti pane vekunze varikufurira vanhu kuti varatidzire Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition VaGeorge Makon vakashorawo hurumende nekusunga vanhu varikuratidzira murunyararo Zvichakadaro masangano nemapato ekunze nemunyika ari kushora zvikuru kwaanoti kushungurudzwa kwevanhu munyika. Masangano akaita seWOZA, Amnesty International neFreedom House, muzinda weCanada muZimbabwe, vati hurumende iri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu dziri mubumbiro remitemo dzinovapa mvumo yekuratidzira murunyararo. Vanotungamira bato rinopikisa muSouth Africa reEconomic Freedom Front VaJulius Malema vati vanomira nevana veZimbabwe vari kurwira kodzero dzavo. Asi hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kuramba yakatsika madziro ichi vari kuratidzira vari kufurirwa nehurumende yeAmerica neFrance. No media source currently available
title: Masangano Akazvimirira Oga Onetseka neNyaya yeKusungwa kweVanhu Munyika

text: Hama neshamwari dzevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, idzo dzakaungana kwaKutama, dzinoti dzinofara zvikuru kana mutumbi waVaMugabe ukavigwa kwaZvimba kumusha kwavo. Vanhu vaswera vachiimba nekudya vari pamariro aVaMugabe. Mutumbi wavo uchaendeswa kwaZvimba nemusi weSvondo. Mumwe mugari, Amai Jesca Sande, vati zvingavafadze zvikuru kana VaMugabe vakavigwa kwaZvimba sezvo changa chiri chishuwo chavo. Mumwe mugari wekuKariba, Amai Chiwoniso Mupfurutsa, avo vanga vari kwaKutama, vati vanorwadziwa nekubviswa kwakaitwa VaMugabe pachigaro. Asi vamwe vakaita saAmbuya Maria Nhowe vati havafare nekuti VaMugabe vakavigwa kwaZvimba, hazvina chiremerera uye vanofanirwa kuvigwa pachikomo chavaiti ndechavo. Muzvare Cornilia Masiyambwa vati hazvina basa kuti VaMugabe vavigirwa kupi chero vavigwa murunyararo. Vanhu vakawanda vanga vasina nhumbi dzine mufananidzo waVaMugabe izvo zvanzi nevakawanda zvinoratidza kuti hurumende yanga isina hany'a navo. No media source currently available
title: Hama dzaVaMugabe Dzinoti Dzingafare Zvikuru Kana Vakavigirwa Kumusha

text: Vanhu vapfumbamwe vakafa munjodzi dzemumugwagwa muHarare nekuMakuti idzo dzkaitika neChina. Panjodzi yaitika mangwanani pana Borrowdale Road naHarare Drive vanhu vashanu vashaya vamwe gumi nemumwe vakakuvara apo motokari diki yakapabonderana nerori. Vakakuvara vakaendeswa kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa. KuMakuti, Mashonaland West bhazi rekwaTrip Trans rakabheuka masikati rikauraya vanhu vana. Vakakuvara vakaendeswa kuchipatara cheMakuti. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vatyairi vanofanira kungwarira tsaona dzemumigwagwa. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vapfumbamwe Vofa Munjodzi yeMumugwagwa

text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neSvondo kuti vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvinomwe nemazana masere ane gumi nevaviri kana kuti 7 812, zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe vapfumbamwe vaine chirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa vachiri pamazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevanomwe kana kuti 227, sezvo pasina munhu akafa neSvondo yakare. Vanhu vapora kubva kudenda iri vakanga vasvika zviuru zvitanhatu zvine zana nevatanhatu, izvo zvakasiya vanhu chiuru nemazana mana nemakumi manomwe nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 1 479 vachiri kurwara. Izvi zvinotevera kupora kwevanhu makumi matatu nevapfumbamwe. Dunhu reMidlands harichisina kana munhu mumwechete ane chirwere ichi, ukuwo dunhu reMasvingo riine munhu mumwechete ari kurwara. Harare ndiro dunhu rine vanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara vanosvika chiuru chimwechete nemazana maviri ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevana, kana kuti 1 294, Bulawayo iine vanhu zana nemumwe chete vari kurwara. Nyanzvi dzehutano dzinoti vari muHarare neBulawayo vanofanira kuramba vakangwarira sezvo pari kuonekwa kuti vanhu vakawanda havachadi kupfeka zvivhara miromo nemhino, kana kuti ma mask, uye kusiya mikaha pakati pavo. Imwe yenyanzvi idzi, Dr. Gilson Mandigo, vanoti vari kutambira nemufaro mukuru kudzikira kwehuwandu hwevanhu huri kubatwa kana kufa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vachiti matanho akatorwa nehurumende kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi akashanda chose. Asi Dr. Mandigo vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vasatora kudzikira uku sekunge chirwere chapera nekuti kune dzimwe nyika chirwere ichi chave kutosimuka zvakare, zvekuti nyika idzi dzave kutodzika zvakare mitemo inorambidza vanhu kufambafamba nezvimwe zvakadaro. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana nemakumi mashanu nezvipfumbamwe kana kuti 1,459 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Vafa vasvika zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu nemazana mana ane nemakumi mana kana kuti 35, 440, vapora muAfrica vachidarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 1,2 million. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu nematatu kana kuti 33 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica, iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 200,000. Vanhu vafa pasi rose vadarika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvisere kana kuti 998 000. Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemaviri kana kuti 22 million. No media source currently available
title: Veruzhinji Voyambirwa Kusakanganwa Kuzvichengetedza Zvichitevera Kuderera kweVari Kubatwa neCovid-19

text: Zvikoro zvavhurwa munyika kupasrura kotoro yetatu, vamwe vana vechikoro pamwe nevamwe varairidzi vachinzi vakundikana kuenda kuzvikoro zvavo. Sangano revarairidzi reRural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe rinoti raita ongororo muzviko rakaona kuti vana vanosvika zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana ndivo chete vakwanisa kuenda kuzvikoro zvemabhodhingi, kuchitiwo zvikamu makumi matanhatu nezvishanu kubva muzana vevana vanopinda zvikoro zvekumaruwa ndivo vakwanisa kuenda kuzvikoro. Mutungamiri we Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure vanoti chikonzero chikuru chatadzisa vana pamwe nevarairidzi kuenda kuzvikoro inyaya yekunetsa kwemari. VaMasaraure vanotiwo varairidzi, zvikuru nhengo dzavo dzinoshandira kumaruwa, dziri kutyisidzirwa nevezvematongerwo enyika dzichinzi dziri kuda kubvisa hurumende nechisimba zvichitevera kuratidzira kwakaitwa nesangano ravo mwedzi wapera. "Saka tanyorera VaChihuri kuti vaudze mapurisa avo kuti achengetedze varairidzi. Tanyorerawo kubazi rezvedzidzo nekuparamende," VaMasaraure vanodaro. No media source currently available
title: Kotoro yeTatu Inotanga Vana veChikoro neVarairidzi Vakawanda Vachikundikana Kuenda kuZvikoro

text: Musi weChitatu range riri zuva rekupedzisira kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvange zvakapotera pachechi yeMethodist Church muJohannesburg zvinge zvabva panzvimbo iyi. Kutanga neChina panzvimbo iyi panonzi hapafanire kunge paine munhu. Vanhu vanosvika mazana mana ndivo vasina pekugara vakawanda vari zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kusanganisira vana vadiki vanosvika zana havana pekugara. Vanhu ava vakanopotera kuSouth Africa nezvikonzero zvakasiyanaya siyana kusanganisa zvematongerwo enyika nekusamira zvakanaka munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Bishop Paul Verryn vaibatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe izvi vanoti vachaona kuti vapoteri ava vose vawanirwa pekugara. Asi zvinenge zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. Vamwe vakapotera panzvimbo iyi, VaNoel Muguti, avo vakapotera kunyika iyi mushure mekuti vainge vaitwa kafiramberi nenhengo dzeZanu-PF musarudzo dzemuna 2008 apo vaimirira MDC senhengo yeparamende kuGokwe neMbudziya, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka sezvo vanhu vakawanda vasina kwekugara. No media source currently available Vanhu vakatanga kupotera pachechi iyi makore gumi apfuura mushure mekunge muSouth Africa maita mhirizhonga yemarudzi zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa zvichirwisana nevekunze.
title: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvakapotera paChechi yeMethodist muJohanneburg Zvodzingwa.

text: Mapurisa emuHarare neChina vakasunga mutevedzeri wemupepeti mukuru webepanhau reNewsday, Nqaba Matshazi, uye mutori wenhau, Xolisani Ncube, vachipomerwa mhosva yekunyora manyepo. Mapurisa emuHarare neChina vakasunga mutevedzeri wemupepeti mukuru webepanhau reNewsday, Nqaba Matshazi, uye mutori wenhau, Xolisani Ncube, vachipomerwa mhosva yekunyora manyepo. Matshazi na Ncube vari kupomerwa mhosva yekunyora manyepo pasi pemutemo we Criminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act. Vatori venhau ava vanonzi vakanyora nyaya yekuti nhengo dzesangano revasori reCentral Intelligence Organization dzainge dzapihwa mari dzemabhonasi kunyange hazvo vamwe vashandi vehurumende vasati vapihwa mari idzi. Gweta riri kumirira vatori venhau ava, VaTaona Nyamakura, vati Matshazi naNcube vari kurara mutirongo sezvo vasina kubudirira kuendeswa kudare. No media source currently available Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, Chief superintendent Paul Nyathi, sezvo vange vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. Hapasati pajekeswa kuti ndiyani akamhang'ara nyaya iyi kumapurisa. Asi munyori mukuru wesangano revatori venhau reZimbabwe Union of Journalists, VaFoster Dongozi, vashora zvikuru kusungwa kwevatori venhau ava. No media source currently available
title: ZUJ Inoshora Kusungwa kweVatori veNhau veNewsday

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa, reMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vaburitsa mashoko ekuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanofanirwa kusiya chigaro nechimbichimbi sezviri kutarisirwa neruzhinji, pachitariswawo zvavakaitira nyika isati yawana kuzvitonga pamwe nekunge yawana kuzvitonga. VaTsvangirai vati panofanirwa kuvepo kwehurumende inofanobata matomu, vachiti izvi zvinofanirwa kuwiriranwa nemapoka ose ane chekuita munyika. Izvi zvabuda mumusangano webato ravo weStanding Committee waitwa muHarare, uyo wavati wasungawo kuti panofanirwa kuve nehurumende inofanobata matomu inobatanidza mapoka ose. VaTsvangiari vati zvakakoshawo kuti nyika idzokere kuhutongi hwejekerere kuburikidza nesarudzo dzakasununguka uye dzakachena dzichiongororwa nemasangano akazvimirira anobva kunze. Vati matambudziko emunyika anogadziriswa chete nevana veZimbabwe vachibatsirwa nevekunze. VaTsvangirai vatiwo danho rakatorwa nevarwi verusungunguko pamwe nemunhu wese akabatsira mukusungura nyika rinotendwa zvikuru. Vati vanotendawo kuti mauto akavimbisa kuzvipira kwavo kuti munyika muve nerunyararo, kukosha kwehupenyu kusanganoisirawo kuremekedza kodzero dzezvizvarwa zvezimbabwe. Vati vanozivawo kushushikana kwenyika dzekunze nemasangano anoti re SADC, neAfrican Union, United Nations, neEuropean Union pamusoro pezviri kuitika muZimbabwe. VaTsvangirai vatiwo masangano iwaya pamwe nevekunze ndivo vakakodzera kuti vaumbe hwaro hwesarudzo dzakasununguka, uye dzachena. VaTsvangirai vati nekuda kwezvose izvozvo, vasunga sebato kuti patsvagwe nzira dzekuti pave nevanofanobata matomu, uyewo kuti VaMugabe vanofanirwa kusiya chigaro nekukasika, sezvakatarisirwa nevana veZimbabwe, pogadzirwa hwaro hwekuti masimba ochinjanwa sei.
title: VaTsvangirai Vokurudzira VaMugabe Kusiya Masimba

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvematunhu, VaIgnatious Chombo, vakandirana neChishanu makobvu nematatete nechikwata chavana muzvinabhizimisi chekuBritain nenyaya yekuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kana vasiya basa. No media source currently available Zvimwe zvaita kuti pave nekukakavadzana inyaya yemitemo yenyika inonzi haina kujeka yakaita semutemo wekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema. Chikwata chavana muzvinabhizimisi chevanhu gumi nevapfumbamwe chakauya kuburikidza nesangano reInvestment Africa uye vemabhizimisi ava vari kubva kumakambani gumi nemaviri. Asi musangano naVaChombo unonzi hauna kuzonyatsofamba zvakanaka mushure mekunge vemabhizimisi ava vatanga kubvunza zvanzi naVaChombo ndezve matongerwo enyika zvisineyi navo. Asi mutemo wekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema uri kutemesa vakawanda musoro avo vari kuti hauna kujeka uye makurukota ehurumende haasi kutaura nezwi rimwe chete. VaChombo vanoti vaudza vemabhizinesi ava kuti vaite zvematongerwo enyika kumusha kwavo, sezvo Zimbabwe iine muitiro wayo unochengetedza zvehupfumi kuti zvigare munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaProsper Chitambara, avo vanoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, vanoti vekunze vanoda kuziva mamiriro akaita zvinhu vasati vadyara mari dzavmunyika. No media source currently available
title: VaChombo Vonetsana neChikwata Chabva kuBritain

text: Vashandi vehurumende vanoti vari kufara nekuedza kumutsiridzwa kwenhaurirano dzemihoro pakati pehurumende nevashandi vayo, dzeNational Joint Negotiating Council, NJNC, zvichitevera kuendeswa kwemazita matatu kuhurumende kuti idome sachigaro wenhaurirano idzi nemutevedzeri wake. Mazita anonzi akazoendeswa kugurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Priscah Mupfumira, anonzi ndera vangonzi VaChimbunde, VaChigwendere nevamwe vanzi VaJambwa. VaChimbunde naVaChigwendere vanonzi vakatombovewo masachigaro e NJNC. Sachigaro weApex Council, VaRichard Gundani, vanoti kusavepo kwasachigaro weNJNC kwegore rose kunonzi kwakatadzisa vashandi vehurumende kuti vawane mukana wekutaurirana nehurumende pamusoro penyaya dzakawanda dzinosanganisira dzemihoro. VaGundani vanotiwo havatambiri kurudziro yegurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, pamwe nagavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, yekuti vashandi vambomira kuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro sezvo hupfumi hwenyika husina kumira zvakanaka. VaGundani vanoti nyaya dzemihoro dzinofanirwa kutaurwa nezvadzo pamatare akaita sereNJNC nereTripartite Negotiating Forum. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veHurumende Votambira Hurongwa hweKumutsiridza Nhaurirano dzeNJNC

text: Mutungamiri weMDC T VaMorgan Tsvangirai vanoti bato ravo richaongorora nyaya yekuti vechidiki vebato ravo vakanetsana pakuvigwa kwevaive mumiriri weNkulumane, VaThamsanqa Mahlangu. Vashandirwi vari kupikisa mutemo wemabasa uchangobva kuvandudzwa weLabour Amendment Act vobatana nesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ kukwikwidza mutemo uyu kumatare. Zimbabwe Investment Authority inoramba mashoko ekuti muzvinabhizimusi wekuNigeria VaAliko Dangote havachadi zvekuita mabhizimusi munyika. Muchirongwa chedu cheLiveTalk che The Connection na 8:30pm tiri kutarisa mararamiro anoita vechidiki kumaruwa. Iyi ndiyo mimwe yemisoro yenhau dzedu dzanhasi...... Munotibata pa 909 AM, kana pa 12080, ne 15460 Kilohertz paShortwave kana paFacebook peji redu reVOAShona. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau, Chipiri Gumiguru 13, 2015

text: Dare repamusorosoro reSupreme Court raburitsa mujeri nhengo mbiri dzeMDC, VaLast Maengehama naVaTungamirai Madzokere, avo vanga vari mujeri kwemakore gumi mushure mekupomerwa mhosva yekuponda mumwe mupurisa kuGlen View muna 2011. Dare iri rati hapana humbowo hunoratidza kuti vaviri ava vakapara mhosva yavanga vachipomerwa. Vatongi vedare reSupreme Court vanoti Amai Rita Makarau, Amai Elizabeth Gwaunza pamwe naAmai Susan Mavangira, varasa mutongo wakaturwa nedare repamusoro muna 2016 wekuti VaMaengehama naVaMadzokere vapike kwemakore makumi maviri pamhosva yavanga vachipomerwa yekuponda mupurisa VaPetros Mutedza mumusha weGlenView muna Chivabvu 2011 pamhirizhonga ine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika yakaitika panzvimbo yemabhizimusi mumusha uyu. Vachitura mutongo wedare iri, Amai Makarau vati hurumende yakatadza kupa humbowo hunonwisa mvura hunoratidza zvechokwadi kuti vasungwa ava ndivo vakaponda VaMutedza vachiti dare repamusoro reHigh Court raifanira kurasa nyaya iyi payanzwikwa. Dare ratiwo hapana humbowo hunoratidza kuti vasungwa ava vakaita zvavakaita vaine chinangwa chimwe chete chekuuraya VaMutedza saka nokudaro dare raona zvakakodzera kuti mutongo wakaturwa naVaChinembiri Bhunu usendekwe parutivi. Rimwe remagweta evaviri ava VaCharles Kwaramba vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vafara zvikuru nemutongo wedare Supreme Court vakati vanga vasiri kukwanisa kutaura zvakawanda sezvo vanga vari mubishi kugadzirisa mapepa ekuti VaMaengehama naVaMadzokere vabuditswe mujeri zvichitevera mutongo wedare uyu. Mudzimai waVaMaengehama, Amai Georgina Maengehama, vati vafara zvikuru vachiti hupenyu hwanga hwavaomera kwemakore masere apfuura murume wavo paange ari mujeri nemhosva yaasina kupera. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vatiwo mutongo uyu unoratidza pachena kuti hurumende yeZanu PF iri kushandisa matare kuzadzisa zvido zvayo. Rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaObey Shava, vakurudzira VaMaengehama naVaMadzokere kuti vakwidze nyaya yavo kumatare kuti vagoripwa kugara kwavakaita mujeri kwenguva refu vasina mhosva. Asi gurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti mutongo waturwa nedare nhasi unoratidza zviri pachena kuti matare emunyika anoshanda akazvimirira. VaMaengehama naVaMadzokere vakasungwa pamwechete nedzimwe nhengo dzeMDC makumi maviri nenomwe asi dzimwe nhengo idzi dzakawanikwa dzisina mhosva. Mumwe akabatwa nemhosva, Muzvare Yvvone Musarurwa, vakaburitswa mujeri mushure mekunzwirwa tsitsi nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, muna 2018. Pakatongwa nyaya iyi, nhengo dzeMDC idzi dzairamba mhosva dzichiti dzaishungurudzwa zvine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. No media source currently available
title: Dare reSupreme Court Rinoburitsa Mujeri Nhengo Mbiri dzeMDC, VaMaengahama naVaMadzokere

text: Vaimbove varwi verusununguko vanoti vakakatyamadzwa pamwechete nekugumbutswa nekusasiya basa kwemutungamiri wenyika mushure mekutaura kwaVaMugabe pachivhitivhiti chehurumende vachiti vachagadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nebato ravo kumusangano weCongress. Varwi verusununguko vadaidzira kuruzhinji rweZimbabwe kuti neChipiri kuitwe kumwe kuratidzira uye pakuratidzira uku vanhu vanenge vasingadzokeri kudzimba. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau nhasi mangwanani, sachigaro wevaive varwi verusununguko VaChristopher Mutsvangwa vati VaMugabe vanofanirwa kuenda chero zvodii. VaMutsvangwa vati boka ravo rakasvotwa zvikuru pamwe nekushungurudzika nekusasiya basa kwaVaMugabe izvo zvaitarisirwa neruzhinji, asi vati mhedzisiro VaMugabe vachaenda chete. VaMutsvangwa vati nekubudirira kwakaita kuratidzira kwakaitwa neMugovera neruzhinji rweZimbabwe, varongazve kumwe kuratidzira mangwana Chipiri vakati vanhu vanofanirwa kugara pedyo nekumba kwaVaMugabe kusvikira vasiya chigaro. Vaimbove varwi verusununguko ava vashoropodzawo mashoko emunyori anoona nezvemitemo muZanu PF, VaPatrick Chinamasa nedzimwe nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakati mushure menyonganyonga iri munyika, bato reZanu PF richaita hurumende itsva inenge ichingova yeZanu PF chete vaisa VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pachigaro. Mutauriri wesangano revakarwira rusununguko, Va Douglas Mahiya,vati havazotevedzeri vanhu vanoda kudzosera nyika kumashure, vakakurudzira veruzhinji kuti hondo yekubviswa kwaVaMugabe ihondo yezvizvarwa zvese zvemunyika. Vaive varwi verusununguko ava vanyorera kudare repamusoro reHigh Court zvakare kuti dare iri riburitse pachena kuti zvakaitwa nemauto neChipiri hazvityori bumbiro remutemo. Vaive varwi verusununguko ava vatiwo sezvo VaMugabe vakabvuma vega kuti vakatadza kuita basa nemazvo nezuro vanofanirwa kusiya chigaro. Vachitaura pachivhivhiti chehurumurumende, VaMugabe vakabvuma kuti nyika yaenda kumawere asi pachinzvimbo chekusiya basa vakati vachagadzirisa mhosho dzavo. No media source currently available
title: Vakarwa Hondo Votsamwiswa neKusasiya Basa kwaVaMugabe

text: Sangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, ZHDA ranyorera tsamba kuzvipatara zvehurumende, richizivisa vakuru vakuru vezvipatara izvi, kuti nhengo dzaro hadzichakwanisi kuenda kubasa kutanga nemusi wa Gunyana 3, 2019. Sangano iri rinoti nhengo dzaro hadzichakwanisi kuenda kubasa nekuti mihoro yavana chiremba haisi kuvakwanira. ZHDA inoti harukuro dzayaita nehurumende, hapana zvadzaburitsa kusvika pari zvino. Tsamba iyi yatumirwa kuzvipatara zvinoti Mpilo, Bulawayo United, Parirenyatwa, Harare neChitungwiza, uye yaziviswawo kugurukota rezvehutano, Va Obadiah Moyo, munyori webazi rezvehutano, Doctor Agnes Mahomva, pamwe nasachigaro we Health Services Board. Vana chiremba vanoti sangano re Health Services Board riri kunonoka kugadzirisa mihoro yavo, izvo zvava kupa kuti vatadze kuwana mari yekuendesa kumabasa. Vanotiwo mitengo yezvinhu yakwira zvokuti havachakwanisi kurarama zvakanaka nemihoro yavanotambira. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri we ZHDA, Doctor Peter Magombeyi, vanoti vana chiremba havasi kuramwa basa asi kuti havana mari yekuti vaende kumabasa sezvo zvinhu zvakawanda zvakwira mitengo yazvo. Doctor Magombeyi vati munhaurirano dzavakaita muBipartite Negotiating Panel, hurumende, kuburikidza neHealth Services Board, yakati yaikwanisa kuwedzera vana chiremba mihoro yavo nezvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva pazana, mari iyo vanoti ishoma zvikuru pachitariswa kukwira kwaita mitengo yezvinhu. Taedzawo kubata gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Obadiah Moyo, asi munhu adaira nharembozha yavo, ati titaure naVa Donald Mujiri, vanova public relations manager mubazi rezvehutano. VaMujiri vabvuma kuti vagamuchira tsamba yabva kusangano re ZHDA, uye vati bazi ravo rakamirira kunzwa ku Health Services Board, iro rinobata nyaya dzavana chiremba. Doctor Magombeyi vanoti vakatadza kuwirirana nehurumende pamari dzavanofanirwa kutambira nokudaro, vanotarisira kuti hurumende ichanyatsofungisisa pamusoro pedambudziko rakatarisana navana chiremba. Doctor Magombeyi vanoti vanoda zvikuru kuenda kubasa kuitira kuti vanobatsira varwere, asi mari yekuti vaende kubasa Havana. No media source currently available
title: Madhokotera Ozivisa Zvipatara Kuti Haachakwanisi Kuenda Kubasa

text: Mutungamiri weMovement for Democratic Change, MDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vaudza neChina kanzuru yeHarare kuti ivake migwagwa, pamwe nekupa mvura yakachena kuvanhu vanogara kunzvimbo dzakaita seHopely kuitira kuti vasabatwe nezvirwere sezviri kuitika pari zvino. No media source currently available Vachitaura nevagari vekuHopely mushure mekushanyira nzvimbo iyi, VaTsvangirai vati vagari venzvimbo iyi vakatarisana nematambudziko akawanda sezvo vasina mvura, zvimbuzi nedzimwe dzimba dzakavakwa zvakanaka. Vati kanzuru yeHarare inofanira kugadzirisa matambudziko aya nechimbi chimbi kuitira kuti kuti vanhu vagare zvakanaka. Mumwe mugari wemunzvimbo iyi, VaTrouble Hasha, vati hapana chiri kuitwa nekanzuru mukuvawanira mvura yakachena nezvimwe. Vatiwo kanzuru haitakure kana marara munzvimbo iyi. VaHasha vaenderera mberi vachiti zvirwere zvemanyoka zvakawanda chose munzvimbo iyi uye mashoko aya atsinhirwa nanamukoti vekiriniki iri munzvimbo iyi. Meya veHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, avo vange vaina VaTsvangirai, vati kanzuru yavo yakazvipira kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nevanhu vemumisha yakaita seHopely, asi vakati ine dambudziko rekushaya mari. Vatiwo panodiwa hunyanzvi hwekuona kuti zvinhu zvogadziriswa sei sezvo vanhu vakangogadzwa munzvimbo iyi pasati pagadzirwa migwagwa nekuvaka mapaipi nemvura nesiweji. Vatiwo dambudziko rave kuitika muHarare rekungovaka pese pese rave kukonzerwa nehurumende iri kupa vanhu nzvimbo dzekuvaka dzisina kugadzirwa sezvinodiwa pamutemo wekuvaka mumadhorobha weUrban Planning uye vati izvi zvinoomesera kanzuru. Musha weHopely nemimwe yakaita seCaledonia yakatangwa muna 2005 apo hurumende yakaendesa vanhu vainge vaparadzirwa dzimba dzavo pasi peOperation Murambatsvina. Vanhu vakanzi vasavake dzimba kwadzo sezvo vainzi vachagara panzvimbo idzi kwenguva diki hurumende ichatsvagira kwekuvaka asi kusvika pari zvino izvi hazvisati zvaitika.
title: VaTsvangirai Vanoudza Kanzuru Kuti Igadzirse Zvinetswa muHopley

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari nhengo yebato reZanu PF, Va Simba Mujuru, vanoti havawoni pane chinotadzisa mutungamiri mutsva weAmerica, Va Joe Biden, kuti vagadzwe zviri pamutemo mwedzi unouya, kunyange hazvo mutungamiri we America, VaDonald Trump nedzimwe nhengo dzebato ravo re Republican Party, vachiri kupikisa zvakabuda musarudzo. Electoral College yakatambira kuti VaBiden ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri we America asi dzimwe nhengo dzebato remaRepublican naivo VaDonald Trump varikupikisa izvi. "Zvatiri kuona zvichiitika ndiko kunonzi kutonga kwejechetere chaiko nekuti parizvino VaTrump vane vhumo yekupikisa zvakabuda musarudzo kana vasiri kufara nazvo asi chikuru chatirikuda kuwona ndechekuti vane rudo rwenyika yavo here pamoyo zvichaita kuti vasiye matomhu pasina bopoto mwedzi uno uya pachagadzwa VaBiden," VaMujuru vaudza Marvellous Mhlanga-Nyahuye weStudio7. Vanoti vakatarisira kuti hurumende idzva yaVaBiden ichapa nyika yeAmerica hwaro hwekurwisa denda reCovid-19 rapfunya chisero munyika iyi asi zvinoda kuti veruzhinji vabatane nehurumende mukurwisa denda iri. Vachitaura pamusoro pemakurukota adomwa naVaBiden parizvino VaMujuru vanoti varikufadzwa nenyanzvi dzapihwa mabasa parizvino uye vanetarisiro yekuti zvinhu zvicha sanduka muAmerica kusanganisira kudyidzana kwenyika iyi neZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: Kutambidzana Masimba muAmerica Koramba Kuchikonzera Mutauro

text: Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vari kuchema-chema nekushomeka kwemotokari dzekanzuru dzinotakura varwere, kana kuti maamburenzi, dzinova idzo dzine muripo uri nani zvichienzaniswa nedzemakambani akazvimirira. VaTaurai Zviripamwoyo, avo vakarwarirwa mazuva mashoma achangodarika, vanoti kunyangwe hazvo motokari dzinotakura varwere dzekanzuru yeHarare dziine muripo uri nani, hadziwanikwi zviri nyore. VaZviripamwoyo vanoti mamwe makambani ane motokari dzinotakura varwere akazvimirira anodhura zvakanyanya. Vachitaura neStudio 7, mumwe zvakare mugari wemuHarare, VaTanatsiwa Dambuza, vati kodzero yehutano iri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika haigoni kuzadzikiswa kana vagari vasiri kuwana motokari dzinotakura varwere dzine muripo uri pasi sedzekanzuru yeHarare. VaDambuza vakurudzira kanzuru kuti igadzirise dambudziko iri. Meya veguta reHarare, VaJacob Mafume, vatendawo kuti motokari dzinotakura varwere muguta ishoma zvakanyanya vachiti pari zvino dzinogona kunga dziri nomwe kana sere. Vawedzerawo vachiti kanzuru yavo ichange ichizeya nezvenyaya yekushomeka kwemotokari dzinotakura varwere kuti vagadzirise dambudziko iri. Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti imotokari ngani dzingakwanira kanzuru, VaMafume vati kanzuru inoda mota dzinotakura varwere makumi maviri neshanu. Tsvakiridzo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti motokari dzekanzuru dzinotakura varwere ndidzo dzine mutengo yepasi inogonekwa nevagari vasina mari yakawanda. Pari zvino motokari dzinotakura varwere dzekanzuru yeHarare dzinobhadharisa makumi maviri emadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$20.00, vagari vachitenderwa kubhadhara nemari yemunyika. Ukuwo, makambani akazvimiririra achibhadarisa varwere mari inogona kusvika kuzana remadhora kana kuti US$100.00, kutakura murwere panguva yega yega. No media source currently available
title: Vagari vemuHarare Vochemachema neKushomeka kweMotokari dzeKanzuru Yavo Dzinotakura Varwere

text: Hurumende neChipiri yakakomekedza bazi rekwaRegistrar-General kuti riongorore nyaya yekubhadharisa vanhu mari kaviri zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwakaitwa mumwe mushandi muChinhoyi achibhadharisa mumwe munhu akanga achida pasipoti mari yemadhora ekuAmerica pamwe nemabhondi. Izvi zvakaitika gurukota rezvemukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe, vachiona nemaziso avo apo mumwe mudzimai, Muzvare Memory Kasipo, vakanzi vabhadhare mabhondi makumi mashanu nematatu, pamusoro pezvo ndokunzi vabhadhare zvakare madhora mazana matatu ane gumi nesere emadhora ekuAmerica, sezvo vakanga vachida pasipoti yechimbi-chimbi. VaKazembe vakaonawo kusabatwa zvakanaka kuri kuitwa vanhu nevashandi vekwaRegistrar General, avo vaichenamira vanhu vakange vari mumitsetse vachida kutora magwaro avo. VaKazembe vakati vaudza vakuru vepamahofisi emuChinhoyi kuti vaferefete zvakaitwa nemushandi uyo akanga achida kubhadharisa Muzvare Kasipo mari zvisiri pamutemo. VaKazembe vakatiwo zvavakaona zvinopa kuti zvizvarwa zvenyika zvinoshandira kune dzimwe nyika, zvishore zvikuru hurumende nekuita huori. Muzvare Kasipo vakati vakanzi vatange kubhadhara madhora makumi mashanu nematatu emabhondi kunyange vakaudza mushandi uyu kuti vaida pasipoti yechimbi chimbi iyo inobhadharwa nemadhora ekuAmerica chete. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumukuru wepamahofisi epaChinhoyi kuti vachaita seyi nenyaya yakanzi iferefetwe naVaKazembe, sezvo zvakaitwa nemushandi uyu zvisiri pamutemo. VaKazembe vakazoudza vatori venhau pavakapedza kushanya kwavo kuti havana kufara nehunhu hwavamwe vashandi vekumahofisi a Registrar General. VaKazembe vakashoropodza kutadza kushanda kwevashandi nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemagetsi vachiti bazi rekwaRegistrar General rinofanirwa kushandisa moto wezuva kana kuti solar. VaKazembe vakati mutengo wepasipoti hausati wakwira asi pane hurongwa hwekukwidza mari sezvo zvikwanisiro zvakugadzira mapasipoti zviri kuvadhurira. Hurumende inogadzira mapasipoti zviuru zviviri pazuva ichiti inokwanisa kuwedzera kana ikawana zvikwanisiro zvinotengwa nemari yekuAmerica iyo iri kushaikwa munyika. VaKazembe vakati pane vanhu vanosvika mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu ezviuru vakamirira mapasipoti avo munyika yose, ukuwo makumi mana ezviuru vari vagari vekuMashonaland West chete. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inokomekedza Hofisi yekwaRegistrar-General Kuti Iongorore Mari dziri Kubhadhariswa Vanoda Mapasipoti

text: Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vane maonero akasiyanasiyana panyaya yemamiriro achange akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika mugore ra2016. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira uye vari sachigaro weZanu PF mudunhu reUnited Kingdom, VaNick Mangwana, vanoti vanofunga kuti hapana chinoshanduka sezvo zvinhu zvakagadzikana kwazvo munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika munyika. VaMangwana vanoti kuwanda kwemapato ezvematongerwo enyika hausi mucherechedzo wekuti zvinhu zviri kuoma kwete, asi kuti vamwe vave kuita izvi senzira yekutsvaga nayo mari. “Zvinhu muZimbabwe zvakanakana kwazvo, chinongoda kugadziriswa chete inyaya yehupfumi,” VaMangwana vanodaro. Asi vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika Vachitungamira sangano reYouth Intiative for Democracy in Zimbabwe, VaSydney Chisi, vanotiwo vanofunga kuti 2016 achange akaomera vana veZimbabwe, sezvo Zanu PF inenge yogadzirira sarudzo, uye kunetsana kuri mubato iri kunogona kuwedzera kuparara kweupfumi. VaChisi vanoti gore rino ndiro richaratidza kuti zvinhu zvakamira sei kusvika nyika yaita sarudzo. "Panyaya yekutongwa kuri kuita Zimbabwe panguva ino iyi zvinhu handingati zvakamira zvakanaka, nekuti VaMangwana vangati zvavo zvinhu zvakamira zvakanaka, asi tingaiti negative peace nekuti vanhu magariro avakaita haana kumira zvakanaka," vanodaro VaChisi. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzoita Maonero Akasiyana Gore ra2016

text: Bato reZanu PF rinoti manyepo ari kutaurwa nevanhu ekuti riri kumanikidza vanhu kuti vaite nhengo dzaro. Vachitaura nevatori venhau nhasi kumuzinda webato ravo muHarare, mutauriri we Zanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vati bato ravo harina warinomanikidza kuva nhengo vakati vanhu vari kubuditsa mashoko aya vanhu vari kuda kusvibisa bato ravo iro vati richakunda zvine mutsindo musarudzo dza2023. VaMoyo vatiwo kana zvakadai zvikaitika vanhu vanofanirwa kunomhan’ara kumapurisapamwe nekubato ravo. Asi VaSolomon Bosibunu, avo vanoshanda nesangano reElection Resource Center, vati havasati vanzwa nyaya dzevanhu vari kumanikidzwa kunyoresa kuve nhengo dzemapato ezvematongerwo enyika avasingadi vakatiwo kana pane vari kuzviita zvakaipa. VaMoyo vatiwo bato reZanuPF riri kufadzwa nemashandiro ehurumende yeVaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakavarumbidza vachiti vakwanisa kuvandudza nyaya dzebudiriro, kugadzirisa maindasitiri pamwe nekukoshesa nyaya dzehupfumi hwenyika, izvo zviri kuita kuti vanhu vawane mabasa. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, vaClifford Hlatywayo, vapokana nemashoko aVaMoyo vachiti nyaya yekuvandudza mararamiro evanhu zvinhu zvinofanirwa kuonekwa nekuchinja kwehupenyu. Vati pari zvino hapana chiri kuchinja munyika vakati zvinhu zviri kuwedzera kuipa. Mumwe wechidiki, Muzvare Eustina Chari, avo vanoti vakapedza zvidzidzo zvavo zvepamusorosoro makore matatu apfuura vatiwo havaoni kuvandudzwa kwehupfumi kana vanhu vakadzidza vasina mabasa. Zanu PF yatsinhirawo mashoko ekuva nematare akasununguka ichiti hakuna munhu anofanirwa kutuka vematare pamwe nekutaura zvinokanganisa nyaya dziri kumatare. No media source currently available
title: Zanu PF Inoti Haimanikidze Vanhu Kupinda Mubato Iri

text:
Vamwe vagari veku Tyrone kuMhondoro-Ngezi mudunhu reMashonaland West vakatorerwa nzvimbo yemafuro emombe dzavo ichipihwa kambani yekupfuya mombe vanoti hapana pundutso yavari kuwana sezvavainge vakavimbiswa. Vagari ava vanosvika makumi masere vakatorerwa imwe nzvimbo yavo
yemafuro emombe inosvika mahekita zviuru zvishanu ikapihwa kambani
yekupfuya mombe dzemukaka nedzenyama yePalmline Investments makore mana apfuura nehurumende kuburikidza nebazi rezvekurima.

Kunyange pakutanga vagari ava vainge vatsika madziro vachiti havadi
nenzvimbo yavo vebazi rezveminda pamwe namudzviti vakavavimbisa kuti
chirongwa chekuchengeta mombe ichi chaitsigirwa nehurumende.

Vagari vainge vavimbiswa kuti vaizowaniswa mabasa, kutengwa
kwechibage chavo chekupa mombe pamwe nekuchinjana mombe nevagari kuti vagari vaite mombe dzakakura uye dzemhando yepamusoro kana kuti cross breeding.

Asi vagari vanoti hapana zviri kuitika vachiti purojekiti iyi yave
kuyamura vakuru vemugodhi weNgezi-Platinum.

Mumwe mugari wekuTyron, VaAndrew Manyowa, vanoti vagari hapana chavari kuwana pane zvose zvakavimbiswa.

Mumwe mugari, VaNyasha Chamisa, avo vainge vavimbiswa
kuzovandudzirwa mhando yemombe dzavo, vanoti hapana chati chaitika
sezvo vekambani yePalmline vave kuti mombe dzavo hadzifanirwe
kusangana nedzavo.

VaChamisa vanoti mombe dzavo dzave kunzi dzine zvirwere zvekuti
pakatoiswa waya kuti dzisasangane.

Mumwe mudzimai, Amai Chenai Kadhani, avo vanoti vainge vavimbiswa
bhizinisi rekutengesa mukaka, vanoti hapana chavari kuwana. Palmline Holdings, iyo inove muridzi wePalmline Investments, ine chibvumirano neZimplats, iyo yakapa kambani yekupfuya mombe nzvimbo inosvika mazana matatu nemakumi maviri ezviuru zvemahekita.

Mutauriri weZimplats, Amai Busi Chindove, varamba kutaura nezvenyaya iyi kana kujekesa kuti kambani yavo inowana chii kubva muchibvumirano chayo nePalmline Investments.

Mukuru wekambani ye Palmline Investments, VaTafadzwa Chinyanyiwa,
varamba kutaura neStudio 7 nezvenyaya iyi. Asi kanzura wenzvimbo iyi, VaAgripa Chiwara, vanoti purojekiti iyi hapana
zvayati yave kuyamura vagari nazvo. Vanotiwo havawone ramangwana
rakajeka nekambani iyi.

Kambani yePalmline Investments yakakoka mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, gore rapera kuti vaparure chirongwa chekupfuya mombe ichi muna Nyamavhuvhu. Chirongwa ichi chakaparurwa nemari inosvika mamiriyoni gumi nemashanu emadhora ekuAmerica. Hurumende inoti pasi pehurongwa hwayo hwekupfuya mombe, inotarisira kuti bhizinesi iri richakwira kusvika pamabhiriyoni masere nemazana maviri emamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica panosvika gore ra 2025. Palmline yakazivisawo kuti ine hurongwa hwekukudza kuchengetwa kwemombe kusvika pabhiriyoni imwechete nemazana mapfumbamwe emamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica panosvika gore ra 2025. Asi vagari vemunzvimbo iyi vakaita saAmai Kadhani vanoti vakatambiswa mbora risina mweya pavakaudzwa nezvehurongwa uhu. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe vagari vekuTyrone kuMhondoro-Ngezi Vakatorerwa Mafuro eMombe Dzavo Vachakangomirira Pundutso Yavakavimbiswa.

text: Nhengo dzeparamende dzebato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change, MDC, dzashora makurukota ehurumende nekutadza kuuya kudare iri kuzopindura mibvunzo mushure mekunge makurukota aya aenda kumusangano wemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe. MDC inoti paramende inofanira kuranga makurukota aya zvakaomarara. No media source currently available Musi weChitatu wega wega paramende inoisa parutivi maawa maviri ekuti makurukota apindure mibvunzo kubva kunhengo dzedare iri asi patanga kugara paramende pange pasina kana gurukota rimwe zvaro uye pange paine vatevedzeri vemakurukota mana chete. Nhengo dzeMDC dzinoti VaPropser Mutseyami naVaNelson Chamisa vaudza mutauriri wedare iri, VaJacob Mudenda, kuti makurukota aya ari kuzvidza dare uye anofanira kurangwa pachishandiswa mitemo yeparamende yeStanding Rules and Order nebumbiro remutemo. Mushure mekunge dare rabvumirana kuti rimbomisa chikamu chemubvunzo vakamirira kuti makurukota aya auye, mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vabva vapinda mudare. VaMudenda vabva vavaudza kuti nhengo dzedare iri dzange dzisiri kufara nemaitiro emakurukota asiri kuuya kuzopindura mibvunzo sezvinodiwa nemitemo. Asi VaMnangagwa vati vange vasingazive kuti makurukota aya ange aripi uye vati anofanira kutsanangura ega kuti ange ari kupi. Makurukota mazhinji ange ari kuRushinga kumusangano waAmai Grace Mugabe. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaFortune Gwaze, vati zvinosuwisa kuti makurukota ehurumende haachakoshesa paramende. Vati paramende inofanira kutora matanho pamusoro pezviri kuitika izvi. VaGwaze vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti kurwisana kuri muZanu PF kwave kuvhiringa kushanda kweparamende. Vati zviri kuitwa nemakurukota ehurumende zvekuswera kutevera Amai Mugabe hazvina maturo sezvo amai ava vasiri muhurumende. Vaimbotungamira vadzidzi vezvikoro zvepamusoro, VaPride Mukono, vatiwo zviri kuitwa nemakurukota ehurumende kushora vana veZimbabwe vakavavhotera kuitira kuti vagovamirira muparamende. Vati musangano wanga uchitwa naAmai Mugabe hausi wehurumende uye makurukota ehurumende hasungirwi kunge aripo. Zvichakadai, nhepfenyuro yeZimbabwe Brodacasting Corporations haina kuisa paterevhizheni zvange zvichiitika muparamende sezvainoita Chitatu chega chega. ZBC haina kupa chikonzero. Asi ZBC yange ichiburitsa zvese zvange zvichiitika kumusangano waAmai Mugabe kuRushinga mudunhu reMashonaland Central. VaMukono vati zvave kuitika zvinoratidza kuti Amai Mugabe vave kuita pamadiro nemakambani ehurumende. Musi weChitatu chega chega ZBC inoburisa paterevhizheni zvinenge zvichiitika muparamende apo nhengo dzeparamende dzinenge dzichibvunza makurukota mibvunzo.
title: MDC Yokurudzira Kurangwa kweMakurukota Anotyora Mirawu yeParamende

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvange zvaenda kuZimbabwe pazororo regoredzva nekisimusi zvinoti zvakazvionera zvega pamhuno sefodya kuti zvinhu zvaita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika. South Africa, iyo ine vanhu vakawanda vanobva kuZimbabwe, yazarura makambani ayo mazhinji nhasi mushure mekuperera kwezororo. Asi dzimwe mhuri dzeZimbabwe dzakange dzashanya kumusha, dzinosanganisira avo vakange vave nemakore anopfuura maviri zvichienda mberi vasati vadzokera kumusha, dzinoti dzakashamiswa nemamiriro ezvinhu kumusha. Kushamisika uku, kunosanganisira kukwira kwemitengo, kushaikwa kwemari nezvinhu zvinokosha, kuderera kwemigwagwa, kudhura kwezvekufambisa, uyewo nekusarongeka kwemafambisirwe emabasa munyika. VaHarry Pillay, avo vakange vave nemakore mana vasati vambotsika gumbo ravo kumusha, vanoti hurumende inofanira kugadzira mamiriro ezvinhu nechimbi chimbi sezvo nyika yavekuenda kumawere. VaPanganai Tshuma, avo vange vave nemakore matatu vasati vadzokera kumusha vanoti gore rino, ivo nemudzimai wavo, vachashanda nesimba kuitira kuti vagone kubatsira hama dzavo dziri kumusha idzo dzaomerwa nehupenyu. VaTshuma vaenderera mberi vachiti vakafara zvikuru kupedza zororo nevadikani vavo asi dambudziko guru ravakasangana naro ndere kushaikwa kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Vanoti zvichavatorerezva nguva refu vasati vadzokera kumusha kunze kwekuti kana hurumende yeZimbabwe yagadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Kunyanga hazvo VaBatsirai Gondo, vakafara kusangana nevadikani vavo mushure menguva refu, vanoti havana kufadzwa, nechipitipiti chavakasangana nacho pakuenda nekudzoka, pamuganhu weZimbabwe neSouth Africa paBeitbridge kunyanya kudivi rekuZimbabwe. Vamwewo vanoti vane hama dzavo dzakawanda dzakakundikana kudzoka kuSouth Africa mushure mekunge dzadzorwa pamugano wedivi reSouth Africa nekuda kwekuti magwaro avo ekufambiswa akange asina kumira zvakanaka. VaMike Ndlovu vanoti vashandi vepamugano uyu vakange vachipomera vanhu vakawanda mhosva yekushandisa magwaro emuSouth Africa avakawana zvisiri pamutemo. VeStudio 7, havana kukwanisa kunzwa divi rebazi rinoona nezvemukati meSouth Africa sezvo vanobvumidzwa kutaura nezvazvo, vachiri pazororo. No media source currently available
title: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri muSouth Africa Zvokatyamadzwa neMamiriro eHupfumi Mushure Mekushanya paZororo

text: Vanhu vanodarika makumi mana nevanomwe vashaya mutsaona mushure mekunge mabhazi maviri anoti reSmart Express neBolt Cutter abonderana pedyo neRusape. Mabhazi aya ange achangodarika patoll gate remunzvimbo iyi. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vati kusvika pari zvino mapurisa akwanisa kuverenga mitumbi yevana vaviri nevanhu vakuru makumi mana nemakumi mashanu. Vatiwo mapurisa achiri kuenderera mberi achiferefeta nyaya iyi. Mifananidzo iri kubva panjodzi iyi iri kuratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda vatyoka mitezo.
title: Vanhu Makumi Mana neVanomwe Vanoshaya Mutsaona yeMabhazi kwaRusape

text: Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti, Amai Feresu Chakanyuka, varasa chikumbiro chemumiriri weZengeza West mudare reparamende VaJob Sikhala chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekunzi vakavhiringidza mafambisirirwo enyaya mumatare zvichitevera kupambwa nekupondwa kwaMuzvare Ali kuNyatsime. VaSikhala vakange vadzika kudare vachida kupihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso vachiti dzimwe nhengo dzeTripple C dzavajkasungwa pamwechete nadzo dzakapihwa mukana wekutongwa dzichibva kumba uye nguva yarebesa vari muhusungwa. Asi Amai Chakanyuka vati hapana chachinja kubva pavakambonyimwa mukana uyu nematare vachiti VaSikhala munhu anogara achikoromora nyaya uye vakatyora zviga zvavakapihwa nedare pane imwe nyaya yavari kupomerwa yekukurudzira mhirizhonga pavanonzi vakakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vapinde mumigwagwa vachiratidzira muna Chikunguru 2020. Amai Feresu vati VaSikhala vakapihwa mukana wekutongwa vachibva kumba kwavo vanogona kuramba vachipara mhosva zvavati zvinogona kukoknzera kusagadzikana munyika. Amai Feresu vati VaSikhala vagodzoka kudare musi waZvita 5 pakatarisirwa kutanga kutongwa kwemhosva yavari kupomerwa iyi. VaSikhala vakatarisirwawo mudare musi waZvita 7 apo dare rakatarisirwa kutura mutongo waro wekuti mutongi pane imwe nyaya yavari kupomerwa yekunzi vakakurudzira mhirizhonga zvichitevera kupambwa nekupondwa kwaMuzvare Ali ogeza mawoko ake here kana kuti kwete panyaya iyi zvichitevera chikumbiro chakasvitswa naVaSikhala.
title: VaSikhala Vonyimwa Zvakare Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso

text: Mhirizhonga ine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika inonzi yatanga pamberi pesarudzo dzegore rinouya zvichitevera kupiswa kwebhawa remumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai pamwe nekupwanywa kwaitwa imba yakanzura webato iri muKuwadzana madeko apfuura. Zvinonzi pane vanhu vanga vachifamba nemotokari dzisina manhamba vasvika vakapwanya mudhuri wepabhawa raEngineer Mudzuri vanove mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri weMDC-T, vakatora mari nezvimwe zvinwiwa zvanga zviri mubhawa iri, ndokubva vasiya varipisa. Mumwe mushandi wepabhawa iri iro riri muna Coventry Road muHarare, VaTichaona Murevanhema, vati vazosara vosvika pabasa bhawa iri ave mazimbe chete. Mushandi mukuru wepabhawa iri uye ari hama yaVaMudzuri, VaVengesai Mudzuri, vati vanofungidzira kuti kupiswa kwaitwa bhawa iri kunze koda kuedza kunogona kunge kwaitwa nevanhu vezvematongerwo enyika sezvo VaMudzuri, avo vaimbova gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, vari mune zvematongerwo enyika. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata VaMudzuri sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga isiri kubatika. Zvichakadai, imba yakanzura weMDC-T anomirira Ward 38 kuKuwadzana, VaWilton Njanjasi, inonzi yapwanywa mahwindo pamwe nemudhuri husiku nevanhu vanonzi vanga vachifamba nemotokari mbiri dzisina manhamba. VaNjanjasi vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvaitika izvi zvasiya mhuri yavo yakabatira hana mumawoko. VaNjanjasi vaenderera mberi vachiti vanhu vapwanya pamba pavo ava vasiya vazvambaradza mumwe mushandi anoshanda husiku achichengeta motokari panzvimbo inochengeteswa motokari husiku nevagari vemunzvimbo yavo vachitiwo vanhu ava vanga vaine pfuti. VaNjanjasi vati semaonero avo hadzisi mbavha asi vanogona kuve vanhu vanoita zvematongerwo enyika sezvo vasina chavatora pazvinhu zviri pamba pavo. Zvichakadai, mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vati zviri pachena kuti kupiswa kwebhawa raVaMudzuri pamwe nekupwanywa kwemba yaVaNjanjasi kwaitwa nevanhu vebato reZanu PF. VaGutu vakurudzira mapato ose kuti atsvage runyararo asingashandise mhirizhonga pamberi pesarudzo dzegore rinouya vachitiwo zvasarira mapurisa kuti aferefete nyaya mbiri idzi asina divi raakarerekera. No media source currently available Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZanu PF panyaya iyi kunyange hazvo mutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba, vachiti mapurisa ari mubishi kuferefeta nyaya iyi. Matikitivha anga ari pabhawa rapiswa iri pasvika Studio 7 panzvimbo iyi. Zvaitika izvi zvinouyawo mushure mekupiswa kwakaitwa motokari yeboka revechidiki kuKuwadzana nevanhu vari kufungidzirwa neMDC kuti ndeve Zanu PF. Gurukota rinoona nezvinoitika mukati menyika, VaIgnatius Chombo, vakati kupiswa kwemotokari yeMDC chinhu chakaitwa nevanhu veMDC. Nekune rumwe rutivi, VaJim Kunaka, avo vaimbotungamira chikwata chakarerekera kuZanu PF chinonzi Chipangano vakabuda padandemutande paFacebook vachiti bato ravo rinogona kushandisa mhirizhonga kunhengo dzeMDC pamberi pesarudzo kuti ridzoke mumasimba. Sangano rinokurudzira nyaya dzerunyararo munyika reZimbabwe Peace Project raburitsa mashoko ekukurudzira mapurisa kuti aite basa rawo nechimbichimbi nyaya dzemhirizhonga dzisati dzatekeshera nenyika yose pamberi pesarudzo dzegore rinouya. No media source currently available
title: Dandaro Bar raVaMudzuri Rinopiswa Kusara Ava Matsindo

text: Zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvinonzi zvatadza kupinda muNational Sports Stadium kuti zvinoonekana nemutumbi wemuimbi ane mukurumbira, Oliver Mtukudzi, uyo akaitwa gamba nehurumende. Mtukudzi akashaya nemusi weChitatu mushure mekurwara nechirwere cheshuga. Vatadziswa kupinda munhandare iyi vanosanganisira muimbi ane mukurumbira, Winky D, pamwe nemutungamiri weMC, VaNelson Chamisa, avo vanonzi vatadziswa kupinda munhandare iyi nevasori. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende sezvo nhare yemunyori webazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Va Nick Mangwana, yanga ichinetsa kubata. Mushure mekuonekwa muNational Sports Stadium, mutumbi wa Mtukudzi watakurwa uchiendeswa kumuzinda wemauto eOne Commando, uko wazotakurwa nechikopokopo uchiendeswa kumusha kwake. Mutukudzi acharadzikwa neSvondo kuMadziwa. Mtukudzi akashaya ave nemakore makumi matanhatu nematanhatu, uye asiya mudzimai, Daisy, vana nevazukuru. Mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume, vaudza Studio7 kuti mushure mekubvunzurudzwa pamusuwo weNational Sports Stadium kwenguva yakareba nevasori vehurumende, VaChamisa vaona zvakakodzera kuti sezvo nyika iri pakati pekuchema gamba, zviri nani kuti vasuduruke kuitira kuti kuchemwa kwaMtukudzi kuenderere mberi zvakanaka, ivo ndokubva vadzokera zvavo kumba. “Inyaya yange ichirongwa nevanhu vedu vanosanganisira munyori mukuru, VaDouglas Mwonzora, naVaCecil Zvizvai,” VaMafume vaudza Studio 7. “Pavange vachironga mapindiro anofanirwa kuitwa naVaChamisa, ndipo pavaudzwa kuti zvirikunetsa asi Havana kuudzwa chikonzero. Pange pachingononotswa kusvika tangozoona kuti zvirinani kuti mutungamiriri wedu abvepo.” Vachinyora padandemutande reTwitter, VaMwonzora vati vaedza kutaurirana nevasori vehurumende kuti vaone kuti zvavange vachiita handizvo asi Havana kuteererwa vachibva vatora VaChamisa vakaenda navo kumba. “Hatidi kutora rufu rwaMtukudzi tichipinza nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika maruri,” vadaro VaMafume. “Ngatichemei VaMtukudzi nehunhu nekuti zuva ranhasi mhuri yekwaMtukudzi ndiyo iri kudzimbiwa.” No media source currently available
title: Vasori Vanotadzisa VaChamisa Kupinda muNational Sports Stadium

text: Sangano reDiaspora Care Forum, DICAFO, rabatsirwa nezvinhu zvekushandisa zvakaita semafomu akadhindwa nezvimwe mumatunhu ari kuchamhembe kweAfrica. Zvinhu izvi zvabva kukambani ye Classy Trade and Invest, (CTI). Vachitaura pavatambidzwa zvinhu zvekushandisa, munyarikani weDICAFO, VaAustin Moyo, vati sangano ravo rinofara zvikuru nezvaitwa nekambani yemuSouth Africa yeCTI . Vati kubva nhasi, sangano ravo richange richisimudzira chirongwa chekubatsira zvizvarwa Zimbabwe zviri kutambura kunze kwenyika. Mukuru wekambani ye CTI, Va Louw Parsons, vati kambani yavo yabatsira DICAFO nechinangwa chekusimudzira basa rakanaka richazenge richiitwa nesangano iri. Mukuru we DICAFO, VaSocks Chikowero, vatiwo sangano ravo richaendesa zvavapihwa kumatunhu akasiyana siyana ari muSouth Africa uyewo nenzvimbo dziri munyika dzose dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica. Asi vati izvi zvichaitwa kana vachinge vaparura mapazi munzvimbo idzi. VaChikowero vati pane vanhu vanopfuura makumi mashanu vakaratidza chido chekuva vamiriri vesangano ravo mumatunhu akaita seSekunda, Limpopo neCape Town muSouth Africa. Vatiwo kune zvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika zviri kuratidzawo chido chekuva nhengo dzesangano ravo. No media source currently available
title: Sangano reDicafo Rowana Rubatsiro Kubva kuKambani yekuSouth Africa

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakaisa runyoro rwavo pagwaro rakakosha rino kurudzira hutongo hwejekerere munyika dzemuAfrica uye kuitwa kwesarudzo dzakachena kana kuti African Charter on Democracy, Elections and Governance. Magweta anoongorora nyaya dzezvemitemo munyika nemabasa eparamende eVeritas aburitsa mashoko kuvatori vanhau achiti azviviswa negurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi kuti mutungamiri wenyika aizoisa runyoro rwake pachibvumirano ichi. VaMnangagwa vakatanga varatidza kuzvipira kutambira chibvumirano ichi kumusangano weAfrican Union musi wa 21 Kurume muna 2018. Vakazopihwa mvumo nedare reparamende muna Kurume 2019 kuti Zimbabwe ive panyika dzinobatwa nezvisungo zveAfrica Charter iyi asi Veritas inoti zviri kuishamisa kuti sei zvatora makore matatu kuti VaMnangagwa vazoisa runyoro rwavo. Studio 7 hainawo kukwanisa kubata VaZiyambi kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi sachigaro wesangano rakazvimirira rinoongorora sarudzo reZimbabwe Election Support Network kana kuti ZESN VaAndrew Makoni vati vanotambira danho iri uye vane chivimbo chekuti Zimbabwe ichatanga kutevedzera chibvumiramo ichi musarudzo dzema by elections dziri kutarisirwa mukutanga kwegore rinouya nedza2023. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Voisa Runyoro Rwavo paChisungo cheAfrican Union Chekuita Sarudzo Dzakachena

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti danho rotorwa nehurumende rekusunga vanonzi vari kutengesa mari pamukoto harisi kuzogadzirisa dambudziko rekushaya simba kwedhora remunyika nekushaikwa kwemari yekunze. Vachitaura nebepanhau reSunday Mail, muchuchusi mukuru wehurumende VaKumbirai Hodzi vayambira kuti vachasungwa vachagara mujeri kwenguva yakareba uye RBZ yatiwo iri kusangana svondo rino nevemabhizimisi kuona kuti chii chapa kuti vatengese zvinhu nemutengo wedhora rekuAmerica. Mutengo wedhora remunyika kuRBZ zvikamu makumi masere nemashanu padhora rekuAmerica kana kuti 1:85. Asi pamukoto dhora remunyika riri kutengeswa nemari inosvika kumadhora zana nemakumi masere kana kuti 1; 180. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi muNyaya dzezveHupfumi Inoti Kusunga Vanhu Hakumise Kushaya Simba kweDhora remuNyika

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vanoti havasi kuzodaidzira sarudzo dzechimbi-chimbi sezviri kudiwa nemapato anopikisa hurumende yavo pamwe nevaratidziri. Vachitaura pamusangano wekomiti yepamusoro-soro mubato reZanu PF yeCentral Committee pamusangano waitirwa pamuzinda webato iri, VaMugabe vati nyangwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvikaratidzira zvakaita sei havasi kuzofa vakasiya chigaro kana kushevedzera sarudzo itsva vachiti veruzhinji vakataura zvido zvavo pasarudzo dzemuna 2018. Vati mapato anopikisa pamwe nevari kuratidzira vachiti varikuda sarudzo itsva vanofanira kumirira kusvika muna 2018 kwete kumhanyira kumedza kutsenga kuchada. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevemapato anopikisa kuti tinzwewo pfungwa dzavo panyaya iyi. Uku VaMugabe vachitaura izvi, boka re#Tajamuka/Sijikile ranga richiratidzira pakati pedhorobha richiti VaMugabe vanofanira kusiya basa. Varatidziri ava, avo vanga vachisvika makumi mashanu vatangira kuratidzira pedyo nemahofisi akanzuru yeHarare vakakwidza nemunaNelson Mandela vakananga kuparamende.
