Vazorwisana nemapurisa pavasvika panosangana migwagwa inoti Nelson Mandela naSam Nujoma apo mapurisa akanda hutsi hunokachidza uku varatidziri ava vachirova mapurisa nerekeni kana kuti ndandi zvaita pave nekumhanyisana kwechinguvana pakati pemapurisa nevaratidziri ava. Mumwe anga achitungamira kuratidzira kwanhasi, VaSilvanos Mudzvova, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kufarawo nekupindira kuri kuita vari muhurumende munyaya dzekutongwa kwedzimhosva vachiti vacharamba vachiratidzira kudzamara VaMugabe vasiya chigaro. Mumwe wevaratidziri ava, VaHardlife Mudzingwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane nhengo dzeTajamuka nomwe dzakuvara mukuratidzira uku uye vatsinhira mashoko aVaMudzvova vachiti VaMugabe havana masimba ekutaura kuti havabve pachigaro kana veruzhinji vachida kuda vabve. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwawo divi remapurisa kuti tinzwe kuti mapurisa mangani akuvara pachiitiko ichi. Kuratidzira kwanhasi kunouyawo apo dare rakatura mutongo wekuti mutemo wakadzikwa nemapurisa wekuti pasartidzirwe muHarare kwemasvondo maviri hausi pamurawo kunyangwe hazvo mapurisa akapihwa mazuva manomwe ekugadzirisa nzira yaangashandisa kugadzira mutemo uyu urikudaidzwa kuti Statutory Instrument 101A. Zvichakadaro, sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti mutongi wedare repamusoro VaJoseph Musakwa nhasi vapa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso inosvika zana remadhora kune vanhu vana vakasungwa mukuratidzira kwakaitika musi wa 26 Nyamavhuvhu. Vapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso ava ndiAmai Kerina Gweshe, VaTonderai Chakeredza, VaArthur Chingwari naAmai Loveness Mahlepu. Kuratidzira uku kwainge kwakarongwa nemubatanidzwa wemapato anopokisa anozivikanwa nekuti National Electoral Reform Agenda kana kuti NERA. Asi chikumbiro chaiswa kudare iri nemutauriri wesangano retajamuka VaPromise Mkwananzi chekuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso chanzi chichanzwikwa musi wa 14 Gunyana. Mune imwe nyaya yange iri kumatare, nyaya yaMuzvare Linda Masarira nevamwe gumi yanziwo ichanzwikwa musi wa19 Gunyana. Muzvare Masarira vagara mujeri kubva musi wa 6 Chikunguru. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Vanoti Havasi Kusoshevedzera Sarudzo dzeChimbichimbi

text: Mutauriri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance, muzvare Fadzayi Mahere, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuburitsa manyepo padandemutande reTwitter neMuvhuro vakabhadhariswa mari yechibatiso zviuru gumi zvemadhora emadhora emar yemuno kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba. Vachipa mutongo wavo, mutongi VaTrynos Utahwashe, vati havabvumirani nevachuchusi panyaya iyi kuti Muzvare Mahere vanogona kupara mhosva zvakare kana vakatongwa vachibva kumba uye kuti vanogona kutiza nyaya yavo isati yanzikwa vachiti magwaro avo ekufambisa anotori namabharani wedare pane imwe nyaya iri kudare iri. Vatiwo segweta Muzvare, Mahere vakazvipira kumapurisa apo vakaziva kuti vamwe vavo vanoti mutori wenhau, Hopewell Chin’ono nemutevdzeri wasachigaro webato ravo VaJob Sikhala vainge vasungwa nekuda kwenyaya imwe cheteyo. VaUtahwashe vati vaona Muzvare Mahere vari musungwa anokodzera kupihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba. Muzvare Mahare vanziwo vagare pakero yavakapa muHarare uyewo kuti vamhan’are kumapurisa ekuAvondale kamwe chete pasvondo. Vanziwo vasataure nevafakazi panyaya iyi. Kunyange hazvo Muzvare Mahere vanzi vatongwe vachibva kumba, Chin’ono naVaSikhala vakanyimwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiriri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, avo vange vari mudare neMuvhuro vati zvinofadza kuti kune vamwe vatongi vachiri kuita basa ravo nemazvo. VaBiti vati vanovimbva kuti Chin’ono naVaSikhala vachipihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso nedare repamusoro. Vaviri ava vanotarisirwa kukwidza chikumbiro chavo kuHigh Court svondo rino. Nyaya yaMuzvare Mahere ichadzoka kudare zvakare musi wa23 Kukadzi. Mune imwewo nyaya, dare ramajisitiriti, ratadza kunzwa chikumbiro chevachuchusi chekuti dare rigure mutongo wekubhadharisa meya weHarare vakamiswa basa, VaJacob Mafume , mari yechibatiso nechikonzero chekuti vanogona kuramba vachitaura nevafakazi panyaya yavari kupomerwa yehuwori. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Mahere Vopihwa Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso

text: Zimbabwe yapemberera kusvitsa makore makumi matatu nemasere nyika yawana kuzvitonga kuzere, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachiti hurumende yavo yagadzirira zvakakwana kuti sarudzo dzakachena dziitwe gore rino. Asi izvi zvashorwa nemutungamiri weMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa. Vachitaura munhandare yeNational Sports Stadium manga muchiitirwa mhemberero dzekuzvitonga, VaMnangagwa vati hurumende yavo yagadzira zvose zvinodiwa kuti paitwe sarudzo dziri pachena gore rino. VaMnangagwa vatiwo mhemberero dzanhasi dzakakosha zvikuru sezvo kari kekutanga kuti mhemberero idzi dziitwe vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasisiri panyanga. Mashoko aVaMnangagwa aya ashorwa naVaChamisa, avo vanga varipowo pamhemberero idzi. VaChamisa vati mitemo yose inobata sarudzo inofanirwa kuvandudzwa vachiti izvi hazvitore nguva kana hurumende yakazvipira kuita sarudzo dziri pachena. VaMnangwagwa vati hurumende yavo iri kushanda zvakasimba kuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika kubudikidza nekusimbaradza nyaya dzekurima, kucherwa kwezvicherwa pamwe nekusimudzira nyaya dzekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika. Vaenderera mberi vachiti hurumende yavo iri kushanda zvakasimba kuedza kupedza dambudziko rekushayikwa kwemari mumabhanga zvavati zviri kuita kuti makambani pamwe neveruzhinji vawomerwe nehupenyu. Asi VaChamisa vashora VaMnangagwa vachiti hapana chavataura chinopa pundutso kuvashandi vehurumende vari kutambira mari shoma kunyanya vadzidzisi navana mukoti avo vari kuramwa mabasa. VaChamisa, avo vanoti nyaya yerusunguko rweZimbabwe haisi yebato reZanu PF chete asi kuti chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, vatambirwawo nemufaro mukuru neveruzhinji vanga vakazadza nhandare zvekupfachukira zvaita kuti zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvitadze kupinda munhandare iyi. Mushure memashoko emutungamiri wenyika, veruzhinji varatidzwa zviratidzwa zvinoitwa nevanhu vanenge vakawanda kana kuti ma mass displays aitwa nevana vechikoro, mapurisa pamwe nemauto uye vakazoona mutambo wenhabvu watambwa pakati pechikwata cheZimbabwe nechekuBotswana. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Inosvitsa Makore Makumi Matatu Yawana Kuzvitonga

text: Zimbabwe iri kutarisirwa kuita sarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika, vamiriri veparamende, makanzura, pamwe nemameya, gore rino pakati pa 21 Chikunguru na21 Nyamavhuvhu, sezvakaziviswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC.  Sachigaro veZEC, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vakazivisawo zvakare kuti zviri kumutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kutara zuva resarudzo, sekupiwa kwavanoitwa masimba ekuita izvi nebumbiro remitemo.  Asi vamwe vakaita semunyori mukuru webato rinopikisa reMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti nguva yacho yasara, inove mwedzi mina kusvika musi wa 21 Chikunguru, yave pfupi kuti pagadzirirwe zvose zvinofanirwa kunge zvaitwa pasati paitwa sarudzo.  VaMwonzora vanoti hapasati pave negwaro revavhoti, uye mapato haasati ariongogorora, hapasati pazivikanwa kuti masangano api achapinda munyika kunoongorora sarudzo, uye hapasati paziviswa kuti ndekupi kuchadhindwa mapepa ekuvhotera.  Iwo mapato ezvematongerwo enyika haasti aitawo sarudzo dzekutsvaga vachaamirira musarudzo, vane mazita anozondeswa kudare rinoona nezvesarudzo, reNomination Court.  Nhengo yeZanu PF vachimirira Mopopoa/Pelandaba muparamende, VaJoseph Tshuma, vanoti sarudzo dzichaitwa zviri mugwara kunyange hazvo nguva iri kufamba.  Ukuwo munyori mukuru muMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka sezvo paine zvinhu zvakawanda zvisati zvaitwa kuitira kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzinotambirwa nemunhu wese.  No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Voti Gadziriro dzeSarudzo Dziri Kumashure Gore Rino

text: Kushaikwa kwemagetsi munguva dzinenge veruzhinji vari kuita mabasa akasiyana siyana kwava kupa kuti vamwe vanhu pamwe nemabhizimisi vashande kwenguva pfupi munguva dzehusiku apo magetsi anenge achiwanikwa. Vanoita mabasa emaoko akaita sekusona nemishina inoda magetsi, kuweredha, pamwe nekugadzira motokari pachidiwa moto wemagetsi, vava kuita mabasa aya munguva dzavanofanirwa kunge vakarara, sezvo iri iyo nguva iri kuwanikwa magetsi kwemaawa mashanu kana matanhatu pazuva. Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaBen Kidney Chisale, vanosona mbatya pa Mabelreign Shopping Center. VaChisale vanoti vava kushanda nguva dzavakange vasingashandi kana magetsi achiwanikwa nguva dzose. Vanoti sezvo kusina magetsi, vave kushandisa maoko avo vachitenderedza vhiri remushini wavo, uyo unoshandisa magetsi, kuitira kuti varambe vachiita basa rinovawanisa mari. VaChisale vanoti havasi kumborara zvakanaka kubva zvatanga kunetsa magetsi. Muswero wese wezuva vanenge vachitambira machira anouya nevanhu vanenge vachida kusonerwa mbatya dzavo. VaChisale vanoti panozouya magetsi pakati pehusiku, vanobva vatora mukana uyu kuita basa ravo. Makanika wemotokari kuBluffhill Industries, VaNohlipo Magadlela, vanoti vanoshanda husiku hwese kusvikira mangwanani zvokuti vaakutya kuti zvinogona kuzovhiringidza hutano hwavo. VaMagadlela vanoti vanorara mumota dzavanogadzira idzodzo nokuti hapana zvimwe zvinhu zvavanokwanisa kuita sezvo basa rokugadzira mota riri iro rinoraramisa mhuri yavo. Dambudziko iri riri kusanganawo nevasikana vakaita saMuzvare Junior Musango, avo vanoshanda mudzimba. Vanoti basa zhinji rave kuitwa husiku magetsi adzoka, izvo zvinovasiya vaine nguva shoma yekuzorora. Kambani yemagetsi, yeZimbabwe Electricity Supply Authority, Zesa, inoti ichokwadi kuti iri kudzima dzima magetsi senzira yekuti magetsi mashoma ari kuwanikwa munyika, ashandiswewo neveruzhinji munguva dzaanenge adzoka. Mutauriri weZesa, Va Fullard Gwasira, vanoti Zesa yatarisana nedambudziko iri nepamusana pekudzikira zvakanyanya kwaita mvura yemuKariba Dam, iyo inoshandiswa mukugaya magetsi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti dambudziko reZesa rekutadza kuwanira nyika magetsi riri kukonzerwa nekutadza kwayo Zesa kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvemagetsi kumakambani anoti Eskom yekuSouth Africa, neHidroelectrica deCabora Bassa yekuMozambique. Kunyange hazvo gurukota rezvemagetsi, VaFortune Chasi, vari kutaurirana nemakambani aya kuitira kuti atange zvakare kukweretesa Zimbabwe magetsi - panguva iyo Zesa inenge ichibhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kumakambani aya, chokwadi chiripo ndechekuti makambani aya, ayo ari kunetsekanawo nenyaya dzemari, ari kuda kutanga abhadharwa mari dzawo kuitira kuti atange zvakare kukweretesa Zesa magetsi. Kudzamara dambudziko iri ragadziriswa, zvinhu zvicharamba zvichioma muZimbabwe, izvo zvinodzosera shure budiriro yenyika.  No media source currently available
title: Kushaikwa kweMagetsi Kwopa Kuti Vanhu Vashande Husiku

text: Boka rinoona nezvekuferefetwa kwenyaya muAmerica, reFBI, neMugovera rakaburitsa gwaro rakambenge rakachengetedzwa rine chekuita nerutsigiro rwunonzi rwakapiwa zvizvarwa zveSaudi Arabia zviviri zvinopfurikidza mwero zvakarwiswa zvivakwa zvemuAmerica musi wa 11 Gunyana, 2001. Gwaro iri, iro rine mapeji gumi nematanhatu, rinodonongodza kudyidzana kwevarume vaviri ava nevanodyidzana neSaudi Arabia vari muAmerica, asi haripe humbowo hwekuti vakuru muhurumende yeSaudi Arabia vane chekuita here nekurwiswa kwe America uku. Gwaro iri, iro rakaburitswa neMugovera raive zuva rekurangarira makore makumi maviri kurwiswa uku kwaitika, nderekutanga kuburitswa kubva pakapiwa mvumo nemutungamiri wenyika VaJoe Biden yekuti magwaro anga agara asingaziviswi kune veruzhinji aburitswe. Hurumende yeSaudi Arabia yakanga yagara ichiramba kuti haina chekuita nekurwiswa kweAmerica uku, uye muzinda wenyika iyi muAmerica wakazivisa kuti wakatsigira danho rekuburitswa kwemagwaro aimbenge akachengetedzwa aya senzira yekupedza nayo zvipomerwa zvekuti Saudi Arabia yaive nechekuita nechiitiko ichi. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, vari nhengo yesangano reZimbabwe Citizens Initiative, VaPromise Sande, vanoti kuburitswa kwegwaro iri kune veruzhinji chinhu chakakosha zvikuru sezvo zvichibatsira vakarasikirwa nehama neshamwari kuti vazive zvakaitika. No media source currently available
title: Boka reFBI muAmerica Rinoburitswa Gwaro reKuferefetwa kweKurwiswa kweAmerica Muna 2001

text: Zimbabwe nhasi yatabatana nenyika dzepasi rese kucherechedza zuva rechirwere cheshuga kana kuti World Diabetes Day veruzhinji vachikurudzirwa kuvhenekwa navanachiremba, kudya chikafu chine hutano uye chinoita kuti vasabatwe nedenda iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzashandisa zuva ranhasi kuongorora vanhu pachena pamwe nekuvadzidzisa pamusoro pudenda iri. Mumwe murapi pane chimwe chipatara chakazvimirira muHarare, Amai Fungai Priscillar Gomba vati hirwere cheshuga chiriri kupararira munyika asi munhu anogona kurarama pasina dambudziko kana atavedza dzidziso kubva kunana chiremba. Vanoti zvimwe zvikonzero zvinoita kuti vanhu vabatwe shuga kana kuti diabetes inyaya yekuzvarwa mumhuri ine nhoorondo yechirwere ichi, mararamire anoita munhu nechikafu chaanodya kana kuti kuti Lifestyle pachirungu. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vashandisa zuva ranhasi kungorora vanhu kuti vane denda iri here pamwe nekuti vangararame sei vasingapinde munjodzi. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzekuongorora zvirwere, VaEdmore Mahureva, vanoti vashandisa zuva ranhasi kuita ongororo dzakaita seHBCa1 yekungoora shuga yemunhu mukati memwedzi mitatu yapfuura uye vaita izvi pachena vachiti zvinobatsira kuti munhu azive pamire nedenda iri. Mutungamiriri wesangano remachiremba anoshanda akazvimirira, re Medical and Dental Private Practitioners Association Dr Johannes Marisa kuti nhasi vange vachibatsirawo vanhu pachena kuti vasafe nedenda iri. Amai Maonei Tiki avo vakabatwa shuga muna Chikumi gore rino uye vakatobviswa gumbo nekuda kwedenda iri vanoti vafara chose neruzivo rwavawana nhasi. Ambuya Agnes Zioni ndevamwe vari kurarama nedenda iri uye vanoti zvakakosha kutevedza dzidziso yanachiremba. Gore rapfuura, shuga yakauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe kana kuti 3,400 uye zvinofundidzirwa kuti denda iri rinobata munhu mumwe chete pavanhu gumi pasi rese. Zuva reWorld Diabetes Day iro rinocherechedzwa musi 14 Mbudzi, racherechedzwa pasi pendingindira rine chinangwa chekuti vanhu vawane zivo yakakwana kuti vakwanise kurapwa nekuita kurarama nzira dzinoita kuti denda iri risarambe richipararira kana kuti Education to Protect Tomorrow, Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi kana mashoko ehurumende pazuva iri sezvo mutauriri webazi iri VaDonald Mujiri vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu patataenda pamhepo.
title: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kuvhenekwa Chirwere cheShuga neKudya Zvine Hutano

text: Mutongi wedare repamusoro, Amai Lavender Makoni, varasa chikumbiro change chakaiswa mudare iri nemuchuchusi mukuru wenyika, VaJohannes Tomana, chekuti vatongwe nemutongi ari pamudyandigere. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, Amai Lavender Makoni, varasa chikumbiro change chakaiswa mudare iri nemuchuchusi mukuru wenyika, VaJohannes Tomana, chekuti vatongwe nemutongi ari pamudyandigere kana kuti wokunze panyaya yavo yekuda kubviswa pachigaro neJudiciary Services Commission vachinzi vakakundikana kuita basa ravo nemazvo. VaTomana vakabatwa nemhosva yekuzvidza matare mushure mekuramba kupa magweta emwana ainzi ainge abatwa chibharo navamuyaradzi kereke mapepa ekuti vachuchise nyaya yavo vega sezvo VaTomana vainge varamba kuchuchisa nyaya yacho. VaTomana vane imwezve nyaya iri kudare ramagistrate rekuti vainge vaita zvechikiribidi apo vakabvisa vasungwa vaviri muhusungwa avo vaipomerwa mhosva yekuda kubhomba kambani yealpha and omega inonzi ndeyemumhuri yemutungamiri wenyika uyewo kumusha kwavo kwazvimba. VaTomana vakati vaviri ava vainge vatenda kuita zvapupu zvehurumende. VaTomana vange vachida kuti chikumbiro chavo ichi chiendeswe kudare repamusoro soro reConstitutional Court. Mutongo uyu wave kureva kuti nyaya yaVaTomana yave kutanga kunzwikwa nedare repamusoro uye vanogona kumbomiswa basa nyaya yavo ichizeyiwa nedare. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemitemo varizve mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly, muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vati mutongi wedare abaya dede nemukanwa. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rorasa Nyaya yaVaTomana yeKuda Vatongi veKunze

text: Zvikwangwari zvemazita emigwagwa zvakaiswa nebato reZanu PF muHarare gore rapera munguva yemusangano waro mukuru wekongiresi, zvakanyorwa kuti Doctor Grace Mugabe Way, Congress Road pamwe neGutsaruzhinji Walk, zvinonzi zvakabviswa. No media source currently available Bepanhau reZimbabwe Independent rinoti rakashanyira nzvimbo iyi neChina rikaona kuti zvikwangwari zvaive nemazita emigwagwa aya akanga abviswa. Asi mutevedzeri wameya weguta reHarare, kanzura Thomas Muzuva, vanoti kanzuru yavo hainawo ruzivo rwekuti ndiyani akabvisa mazita emigwagwa iyi, kunyange hazvo yanga ichipikisa kuiswa kwezvikwangwari izvi nebato reZanu PF zvisiri pamutemo. Gore rapera, meya weHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, vanonzi vakanyorera kugurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaIgnatius Chombo, vachida kuti mazita aya abviswe sezvo akaiswa zviri kunze kwemitemo yemakanzuru. Kanzura Muzuva vanoti pasi pemutemo wekanzuru yeHarare, hapana mugwagwa unopiwa zita remunhu mupenyu kunze chete kwemutungamiri wenyika. Studio7 yakundikana kubata mutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, kanawo mutewedzeri wemukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaPsychology Maziwisa, kunyange hazvo nhare yavo yanga ichirira.
title: Zvikwangwari Zvakaiswa neZanu PF Zvinobviswa muHarare

text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanoti varungu vakadzoka munyika vachida kukonzeresa mhirizhonga vanourayiwa apo vayambira nhengo dzebato ravo kuti dzivhotere nhengo yeZanu PF. Vachitaura nemusi weChina munhandare yeNgoni kuNorton, VaMnangagwa vanoti bato ravo richarakasha varungu vose vachada kukonzeresa kupanduka kwevanhu munyika. VaMnangagwa vapupura zvinogara zvichitaurwa nevanopikisa hurumemde kuti bato reZanu Pf rinotsigirwa nemasoja pamwe nemapurisa. "Hatidi mhirizhonga tinovhota murunyararo, tinofanirwa kuremekedzwa tisu tinevanhu vakawanda, tisu vanhu, tisu hurumemde, tisu mawuto tisu mapurisa ndangangoti tiri zvese." Vapikawo kuti hapana bato richatonga munyika kunze kweZanu PF. Vachitaura pamusangano mumwecheteyo, murongi wemisangano muZanu PF VaSaviour Kasukuwere vanoti vebato reMDC-T makwara anotya kupinda musarudzo asi vanoonekwa vachitsigira nhengo yakazvimirira VaTemba Mliswa. "Bato reMDC-T rinofanirwa kupinda musarudzo kwete kutya kupinda musarudzo." Sarudzo dzemuNorton dziri kuitwa nemusiwe Mugovera pakati pemapato maviri anoti Zanu PF, neNCA pamwe nevari kukwikwidza vakazvimirira VaTemba Mliswa. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Voyambira vechiChena Vari Kudzoka muNyika Kuti Vasakonzerese Mhirizhonga

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzeku Rwanda dziri muZimbabwe umo dziri kupangana mazano nehurumende, pamwe nevemabhizinesi. Nyanzvi idzi dziri kuita hurukuro nevakuru vakuru muZimbabwe vachitarisa nzira dzekuti Zimbabwe ingakwezva seyi vemabhizinesi vekunze. Nyanzvi dzekurwanda dziri kushandisawo nhoroondo yadzo mukuona kuti pane zvingaitwewo here neZimbabwe. Nyanzvi dzeku Rwanda dziri kutungamirwa nemukuru we Rwanda Development Board, Muzvare Clare Akamanzi, avo vakasvika mu Harare neChipiri. Mutevedzeri wavo, VaEmmanuel Hategeka, vange vachitarisirwawo kusvika nhasi manheru ano. Mmutungamuiiriri wenyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, vanonzi vakakumbira mutungamiri weRwanda, VaPaul Kagame, kuti vatume nyanzvi dzavo kuzobatsira Zimbabwe zvichitevera musangano wakaitirwa ku Kigali ukabuda nechibvumirano che Continental Free Trade Area. Muongorori wezvehupfumi, uye vachishanda nesangano re Percycon Global Fund Managers, VaPersistance Gwanyanya, vanotiwo hazvina kushata kuti kuuye vamwe vekunze kuzobatsirana nehurumende yeZimbabwe asi ruzivo rwavari kuya narwo rwuzere munyika, asi harwuzi kungoshandiswa. Vatiwo dai hurumende yagona kuitawo komiti inobatsira mutungamiriri wenyika nemazano ezvehupfumi hwenyika sezvinoita dzimwe nyika. No media source currently available
title: Rwanda Yobatsira Zimbabwe Nzira Dzinokwezva Mabhizimusi

text: Sangano rinomirira varimisi, reZimbabwe Agricultural Professionals and Technical Association (ZAPTA) rinoti haritambiri zvataurwa nemunyori mubazi rinoona nezvemari, zvokuti gore rino hurumende haisi kupa vashandi mavhocha ne ma’hamper’’. Pakutanga kwesvondo, munyori mubazi rezvemari, VaGeorge Guvamatanga, vakanyorera vanyori mumapazi mazhinji ehurumende vachivazivisa kuti gore rino hurumende haisi kuzobatsira vashandi nemari iyi sezvo hurumende iri kunetseka mukuwana mari yacho. Munyori mukuru musangano reZAPTA, VaZivaiShe Zhou, vanoti hurumende haifanirwi kuita izvi sezvo vashandi vazhinji mubazi ravo vakashanda kwenguva refu vasingapiwi mari dzavaifanirwa kupiwa kuti vashandise mukuita basa. Vanoti hurumende ine chikwereti kuvashandi vazhinji naizvozvo haifanirwi kunyima vashandi ava mavhocha nema’hamper’ aya. VaZhou vati sangano ravo ranyora tsamba kugurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vachivaudza pamire vashandi pamusoro penyaya iyi, uye vachikumbira kuita musangano navo. Tabata vanoona nezvevashandi mubazi rezvekurima, VaGibson Chijarira, kuti tinzwe divi rebazi ravo asi vangotitumira gwaro rakabva kumunyori mubazi rezvemari pasina mamwe mashoko. VaZhou vaudza Studio 7 kuti kana mhinduro inobva kuna VaNcube ikanonoka kuuya, ivo nevamwe vatungamiri vesangano ravo vachaenda kuHarare kunoona VaNcube kuti varondedzere zvakanaka kuti sei vashandi vasingakwanisi kutambira nyaya yekusapiwa mavhocha nema’hamper’ awa. No media source currently available
title: Sangano Rinomirira Varimisi Rinoti Hazvigoni Kuti Nhengo Dzaro Dzinyimwe Mavhocha

text: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muno muAmerica, VaGolden Makusha, vanoti kunyange hazvo muzimbabwe maita shanduko yehutungamiri, vanhu vanofanirwa kuenda mberi zvine hungwaru, sezvo paine zvakawanda zvakakanganiswa nehurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe zvinoda kugadziriswa. VaMakusha, vanove zvakare nhengo yesangano revana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika, re Zimbabwe Diaspora Network North America, ZDNNA, vanoti Zimbabwe haifanirwe kudzokorora mhosho dzaivepo dzekupa masimba akawandisa kumunhu mumwe chete. Vanotiwo hurumende itsva yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa ine basa guru kwazvo rekurwisana nehuwori uye kuremekedza bumbiro remitemo. No media source currently available
title: Vana veZimbabwe Vokurudzirwa Kupinda Mune reMangwana neHungwaru

text: Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti sevha kana kuti dura rinochengeterwa zvinenge zvaiswa mumichina yeBiometric Voters’ Registration Kit inoshandiswa mukunyoresa vavhoti, riri kumuzinda wesangano iri muHarare. Nyaya yesevha iyi yakonzera mutauro wakanyanya munyika zvakatopa kuti vebato reMDC-T vaende kumatare vachiti vanoda kuziva kuti iri kupi. Amai Makarau vanoti sevha yakatengwa kubva kukambani yeLaxton Group. ZEC yange isiri kubuda pachena kuti sevha iripo here kana kuti kwete ichipa mashoko akasiyana. Sangano iri rakamboti riri kuda kutenga, rikazoti rine imwe tsaru asi ikozvino rave kuimba rwumwe rwiyo. No media source currently available
title: ZEC Inoti Ine Sevha Inochetengerwa Zvaiswa muBRV

text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vatanhatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro zvasiya vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru zvina nemazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 4 891. Vanhu mazana matanhatu nevashanu vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave mazana maviri nezviuru zvina zvine mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nemumwe kana kuti 205 351. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yeCovid-19 vave mamiriyoni mana nezviuru zana nezvitatu zvine gumi nevaviri kana kuti 4 103 012. Vabayiwa nhomba yechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave mamiriyoni matatu nezana rezviuru negumi nemumwe zvine mazana matati nemakumi mashanu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 3 111 359. Hurumende yange iine chinangwa chekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba panopera mwedzi uno izvi zvinonzi nenyanzvi hazvichakwanisike nemazuva mashoma asara.
title: Vanhu Vatanhatu Vofa neChirwere cheCovid-19 neMusi weSvondo

text: Munyori mukuru musangano reZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti hurumende iri kuomesera vashandi vayo avo vave kushanda senhapwa nekunyimwa mari ichiti iri kuda kugadzirisa nyaya yebhajeti. Izvi zviri kuuya apo vashandi vehurumende vari kutarisirwa kuita hurukuro nehumende yacho mangwana pasi pegungano re National Joint Negotiating Council. Mukuita nhaurirano nevashandi, hurumende iri kutiwo zvinhu zvave kudzika mitengo nekudaro hapana chikonzero chekuti vashandi vati vanoda kutambiriswa nemadhora ekuAmerica. Zimstats yakazivisa neChitatu kuti mutengo wekukwira kwezvinhu kana kuti inflation wainge waderera kusvika pazvikamu mazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu nechimwe kubva muzana kana kuti 761% muna Nyamavhuvhu kubva pazvikamu mazana masere nemakumu matatu nemanomwe kana kuti 837% muna Chikunguru. Gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vanoti hurumende yave kushandisa mari iri kusara pane yaimbopihwa vashandi kuvaka zvivakwa zvakafanana nemigwagwa, madhamu nezvimwe. Asi VaMoyo vanoti hapana chinobatika chavari kuona chiri kugadzirwa nehurumende. Gurukota rezvevashandi VaPaul Mavima vanoti vachazotaura kana nhaurirano dzevashandi vehurumende dzapaera neChishanu asi mune dzimwe nhaurirano dzekuTripartite Negotiating Forum pakati pehurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi vanoti vari kuronga kuti dziitwe asi vachitendawo kuti mitengo yezvinhu yaderera. No media source currently available Asi VaMoyo vanoti zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvasiya mushandi ari pachena. No media source currently available
title: ZCTU Inoti Hurumende Iri Kuomesera Vashandi neKusavapa Mihoro Inokodzera

text: Vanga vari mutungamiri wechimwe chikwata chebato reMDC-T, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, vanonzi vasiya bato ravo vachipinda mubato reCitizens Coalition for Change rinotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. Izvi zvabuda mushure mekupinda kwaita Muzvare Khupe mumusangano waitwa nemutungamiri weCCC, VaChamisa nenhengo dzebato ravo mudunhu reBulawayo vachidzitenda nekuvhota kwadzakaita musarudzo dzakabva kuitwa dzema by-election pamwe nekukorokotedza vakakunda musarudzo dzakaitwa mwedzi wapera idzi. Asi zvinonzi pamboita mhirizhonga mumusangano uyu apo dzimwe nhengo dzeCitizens' Coalition for Change dzanga dzichiramidza kuti Muzvare Khupe vabude mumusangano uyu, dzichiti wanga uri wedunhu reBulawayo chete, kwete kuti wemunhu wese. Asi VaChamisa vanonzi ndivo vazopodza mhirizhonga nekukugunun'una kwenhengo dzavo uku, izvo zvazoita kuti Muzvare Khupe vazobvumidzwa kupinda. Mumwe anga ari mumusangano uyu asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo asiri mutauriri wedunhu, audza Studio 7 kuti VaChamisa vaudza musangano uyu kuti nhengo dzebato ravo dzinofanirwa kutambira munhu wese sezvo bato ravo riri idzva. Asi mutauriri waMuzvare Khupe, VaNtando Ndlovu, vanoti havana kuona kana kunzwa nezvemhirizhonga yekuti Muzvare Khupe vanga vachirambidzwa kupinda mumusangano uyu, vachiti Muzvare Khupe vatambirwa zvakanaka kwazvo. "Izvozvo isisu hatina kuzviona. Even kana mukuru wedu President Chamisa varatidza kufara zvakanyanya." Panyaya yekuti zvave kureva here kuti Muzvare Khupe havachisina bato ravanotungamira reMDC-T vave nhengo yeCitizens Coalition for Change, VaNdlovu vanoti, "Izvi zvave kureva kuti Doctor Khupe ari member yeCCC inotungamirirwa naAdvocate Nelson Chamisa. Zvinoreva kuti zvose zviri kuitika zviri kuitika pasi pebato reCCC. Hatina bato reMDC-T, ratovigwa." No media source currently available Asi mutauriri weCitizens’ Coalition for Change mudunhu reBulawayo, VaSwithern Chirowodza, vanoti musangano waitwa kuMcDonald Hall muBulawayo uyu wanga ungori musangano wenhengo dzedunhu chete, kwete weveruzhinji. Vanoti sezvo uyu wanga uri musangano wedunhu, kuzopinda kwazoita Muzvare Khupe ivo vasiri nhengo yedunhu ndiko kwatsamwisa dzimwe nhengo dzanga dzichiti vaburitswe mumusangano uyu kusvika VaChamisa vazodzikamisa nhengo dzavo. Mumwe anga ari mumusangano uyu asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo asiri mutauriri wedunhu, audza Studio 7 kuti VaChamisa vaudza musangano uyu kuti vanofanirwa kutambira munhu wese sezvo vari bato idzva. VaChirowodza havana kuda kubuda pachena kuti vatsigire mashoko aVaNdlovu ekuti Muzvare Khupe vave nhengo yebato reCCC, vachiti vari kutaura vakamirira Muzvare Khupe kana vari nhengo yebato ravo vanofanirwa kuziva muronga unofambiswa nawo mashoko mudunhu mavo. “Kana uyo ari kunzi mutairiri waMuzvare Thokozani Khupe ari nhengo yeCitizens’ Coalition for Change, anoziva tsika yedu yekuti province yeBulawayo ine mutauriri mumwechete, ane vanomuteedzera. Saka kana ari munhu weCitizen’s Coalition for Change anofanirwa kunge achiziva mutemo unenge urimo mumusangano. Hatitenderi kuti munhu wese ange achitaura nevatori venhau nekuti zvinoita kuti hurongwa husamire zvakanaka,” VaChirowodza vanodaro. Pakupindura mubvunzo wekuti Muzvare Khupe vatambirwa here kuve nhengo yebato re CCC, VaChirowodza havana kuda kubuda pachena, vachiti Muzvare Khupe vaudza vega vatori nenhau kuti vave nhengo yebato reCCC isina chigaro. “Mai Khupe vataurira vatapi venhau and zvinhu zviripo padandemutande kuti Mai Khupe vati iwo vave nhengo yeCitizens’ Coalition for Change asi isina chigaro. Ndozvavapa kuvatapi venhau,” VaChiroodza vanotsanangura. Mwedzi wapera Muzvare Khupe vakaudza vatori venhau kuti vaikurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti vavhotere nhengo dzebato reCCC musarudzo dzema by-election dzakaitwa musi wa 26 Kurume. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weChimwe Chikwata cheMDC-T, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, Vanoti Vave Nhengo yebato reCCC Rinotungamirirwa naVaChamisa

text: Mhuri dzinodarika zana, kusanganisira svikiro redunhu reVhuti, dzakabviswa papurazi reWaterloo neChitatu dzichinzi dzigere panzvimbo iyi zvisiri pamutemo. Mhuri idzi dzinoti dzakashamiswa apo chikonzi nemapurisa ayinge akapakata zvombo nemboma ayisvika gumi nevashanu vepakamba yemapurisa yeMakuti vakasvika vachipisa misha yavo vachiti vabve sezvakatarwa nedare repamusoro reHigh Court. Svikiro rekwaJenami renzvimbo iyi VaTapfumaneyi Katemanyoka vanoti kunetsana papurazi apa kwakatanga muna 2018 apo VaJames Chigwedere, hama yevaimbove gurukota rezvedzidzo VaAneas Chigwedere, vakapihwa gwaro rekuti nzvimbo iyi yave yavo asi nzvimbo iyi isiri nzvimbo inogariswa vanhu. VaKatemanyoka vanoti VaChigwedere vakazofa gakava renzvimbo iyi risina kupera. Vanoti vakazotanga kunetsana nemuzukuru waVaChigwedere, VaVincent Chigwedere avo vazouya nemapurisa pamwe nechikonzi kuzovabvisa papurazi apa. Zvinonzi mapurisa akamanikidza vose vanga vari padzimba dzavo kuisa midziyo yavo yose mumotokari hombe vachinokandwa pedyo nemugwagwa mukuru unobva kuHarare uchienda kuChirundu apo vagere pamhene kusvika pari nhasi. Mumwe wevakapisirwa dzimba, Amai Patuna Adam, vanoti zvinhu zvavo zvakawanda zvakatsvira mumba sezvo vasina kupihwa nguva yekuzviburitsa. Amai Adam vanoti vari kutambura pamugwagwa pavagere sezvo pasina mvura, zvimbuzi kana zvekudya. Amai Adam vanoti vanokumbira hurumende kuti ivawanise pekugara nekukasika. Mumwe asina kwekuenda ndiAmai Nyadzisai Govera, avo vanoti nzvimbo yavari kubviswa ndiyo yavanoziva chete uye ndipo pavakasiyiwa nemurume wavo akafirapo makore mashanu apera. Mumwe akapisirwawo dzimba ndiAmai Jesca Phiri avo vanoti havana zvekudya uye nhumbi dzavo nedzevana vavo dzakapiswa. Amai Phiri vanoti vana vacheche vavekurwara nekugara panze panemhepo yakanyanya. Gogo Eridha Mupfudza vanoti vakatadza kuburitsa mari yavo inosvika madhora mazana matatu yavaichengeta mumba yavaitora kumaroja avo kuKaroi sezvo vainge vasipo pakapiswa dzimba dzavo. VaTapfumaneyi, avo vanoti vakarwa muhondo yeChimurenga yechipiri vari kudivi reZIPRA, vanoti hapana kwavari kuenda. Mudzviti wenzvimbo uye vari sachigaro webazi rinoyamura vanhu vanenge vawirwa nematambudziko mudunhu reHurungwe, Va (First Name please) Tizora vanobvuma kuti nzvimbo yabviswa vanhu haisi yedzimwe dzinogariswa vanhu patsva vachiti vanhu vavanosungirwa kuyamura isvikiro renzvimbo nemhuri yaro asi vamwe vakawanda vanofanirwa kudzokera kwavakabva. VaTizora vanoti dambudziko revanhu vari kugara panzvimbo zvisiri pamutemo riri kuwanda uye vari kuyambira vanhu kuti vasagare panzvimbo zvisiri pamutemo. Hatina kunzwa divi raVaChigwedere sezvo vayambira vatori venhau kuburikidza nevashandi vavo vanga vachiona nekuchengetedzwa kwavo kana kuti personal security kuti havasi kuda kuona kana kutaura nevanhu. Mutauriri wemapurisa munhudu reMashonaland West, Amai Margaret Chitove vaudza Studio 7 kuti ibasa remapurisa kuona kuti vanhu vatevedzera mutongo unenge wapiwa nematare edzimhosva. Nyaya dzevanhu vari kubviswa munzvimbo dzavagere zvinonzi hazvisi pamutemo dzinowanda nguva ino yegore makore ose mudunhu reMashonaland West. No media source currently available
title: Mhuri Dzinodarika Zana, Kusanganisira Svikiro, Dzinobviswa paPurazi reWaterloo kuMashonaland West

text: MDC Alliance yaendesa kumatare mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission pamwe nevakafanobata chinzvimbo chemutungamiri weMDC-T, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe ichida kuti ma by-elections ambomiswa kuitwa munyika zvichitevera kubviswa muparamende kwakaitwa nhengo dzebato iri nechikwata chaMuzvare Khupe. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare, mutauriri waMuzvare Khupe, vari zvakare mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC-T, VaKhalipani Phugeni, vati MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa yavaendesa kumatare ichida kuti sarudzo dzekutsvaga vachatsiva nhengo dzeparamende gumi nenhatu dzakabviswa muparamende naMuzvare Khupe, dzisaitwe. Mashoko aVaPhugeni, avo vaitira musangano wavo nevatori venhau pamuzinda weMorgan Richard Tsvangirai House, atsinhirwa nenhengo yekomiti inoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muMDC-T, VaTapiwa Mashakada. Asi munyori anoona nezvinoitika muhofisi yemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaJameson Timba, varamba mashoko aya kunyange hazvo vati ma by-elections haafanirwe kuitwa kudzamara nyaya dzavakakwidza kumatare dzapera. VaTimba vati MDC Alliance yakaenda kumatare ichiti chikwata chaMuzvare Khupe hachina kodzero dzekudzinga nhengo dzakasarudzwa kuve muparamende dzichishandisa zita reMDC Alliance. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, pamwe nasachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, kuti tinzwewo kuti vatambidzwawo here magwaro neMDC Alliance kana kuti kwete. Zvichakadai, VaPhugeni vati bato ravo raita musangano nenhengo dzeparamende dzakawanda dzavati dzanga dzichidarika makumi matatu uye vati dzimwe nhengo dzeparamende dzapa zvikonzero zvekuti sei dzatadza kuuya kumusangano uyu dzichinzi dzati dzichazouya kune imwe misangano ichatevera. Chinangwa chemusangano uyu change chiri chekuzeya mafambisiro avachaita basa reparamende mudare iri. MDC-T Kongiresi – Gunyana 4-6, 2020 Mushure memusangano uyu, VaPhugeni vati komiti yavo yeNational Standing Committee yaitawo musangano umo mavanoti vabvumirana kuti kongiresi yavo ichaitanga musi waGunyana 4 ichipera musi waGunyana 6. Komgiresi yechimbichimbi iyi yekutsvaga achatsiva mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai zvichitevera mutongo wedare reSupreme Court uyo wakati VaChamisa havana kusarudzwa zviri pachena kuti vave mutungamiri weMDC. Dare iri rakatiwo haricherechedze kongiresi yakaitwawo naMuzvare Khupe, nokudaro panofanirwa kuitwa kongiresi iri pamutemo, uye panguva iyi, Muzvare Khupe ndivo vanofanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato kudzamara kongiresi yaitwa sezvo vari ivo vakasarudzwa semutevedzeri waVaTsvangirai pakongiresi yakaitwa muna 2014. Izvi zvinotevera kumbopfuudzirwa mberi kwekongiresi iyi kwakanga kwaitwa nebato reMDCT nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti MDC inogona kuparara zvachose zvichitevera kusawirirana kuri mubato iri uko kusiri kuda kupera. Kuturwa kwakaita mutongo uyu nedare kwakakonzera kuti vamwe vakaita saVaDouglas Mwonzora, VaElias Mudzuri, VaMorgen Komichi pamwe naMuzvare Khupe vati vachatevedzera mutongo uyu. Asi vamwe vari kuti havasi kuzotevedzera zvakaturwa nedare sezvo vachiti VaChamisa vakatosarudzwa kare semutungamiri webato pakongiresi yakaitirwa kuGweru gore rapera. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance Yotsvaka Rubatsiro rweMatare Kuti Imise Muzvare Khupe Kudzinga Nhengo Dzayo Muparamende

text: Kanzuru yeChitungwiza inoti kushayikwa kwemabhini nemotokari dzinotakura marara kuri kukonzera kuti itadze kutakura marara mudhorobha iri zvave kupa kuti vagari vatyire hutano hwavo. Vagari vemuChitungwiza nhasi vaungana panzvimbo yemabhizimusi paMakoni muChitungwiza pavasiya vatsvaira nekutakura marara vachishanda pamwechete nevashandi vekanzuru yedhorobha iri senzira yekucherechedza zuva rakatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa rekuti Chishanu chekutanga chemwedzi wega-wega vanhu vanofanira kuchenesa nzvimbo dzavagere. Vachitaura neStudio 7 pachiitiko ichi, mushandi mukuru wekanzuru yeChitungwiza anoona nezvehugari nehutano hwakanaka, kana senior environmental health officer, VaTongai Regis Mukomondera, vati kanzuru yavo iri kutadza kutakura marara nguva nenguva sezvo vachiti havana zvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo. VaMukomondera vati havana mabhini anokwanira veruzhinji kuti varasire marara pamwe nemotokari dzekutakurisa marara aya. Vakumbirawo hurumende kuti ikurumidze kuvapa mari dzebudiriro mumatunhu kana kuti devolution funds pamwe nevemabhizmusi akazvimirira kuti vavabatsirewo kuitira kuti kanzuru yavo ikwanise kugara ichitakura marara nguva dzose. Asi mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vagari vemuChitungwiza reChitungwiza Residents Trust, Muzvare Diana Alice Kuvheya, vatiwo chinonyanyovarwadza sevagari ndechekuti vari kubhadhara mitero yavo kukanzuru asi kanzuru ichigara yakavapa zvichemo zvisingavagutse. VaMukomondera vakurudzira vagari vemuChitungwiza kuti vasarasire marara pose pose vachiti izvi zvinovapa basa rakawanda sekanzuru iyo mari yavari kutora muvagari isiri kuvakwanira kuti vagozochenesa dhorobha iri. Mumwewo mugari wemuChitungwiza, Amai Mercy Mukandi, vakurudzirawo vagari vemuChitungwiza kuti vatorewo matanho ekuona kuti pose pavagere pakashambidzika. Zvichakadaro, mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vanga vachifanira kunge vari paMakoni panga pachiitwa chirongwa ichi havana kuzoenda kunyange hazvo vazoenda kunotsvaira kuAvondale. Ukuwo, VaMnangagwa vatungamirawo chirongwa ichi nekutsvaira kuVictoria Falls, uye chirongwa chekuchenesa nzvimbo ichi chapindawo kunzvimbo yemabhizimusi yeDema kumaruwa ekwaSeke. No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru yeChitungwiza Yochemachema neKushayikwa kweMabhini neMotokari Dzinotakura Marara muDhorobha Iri

text: Hurumende yeAmerica, kuburikidza nebazi rayo reTreasury Department, yatemera zvirango mumwe muzvinabhizimisi ane mukurumbira munyika, Va Kuda Tagwirei pamwe nekambani yavo yeSakunda Holdings. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, America yati VaTagwirei vanoita zvinofungidzirwa kuti ndezvehuori vachiita mari kuburikidza nekushandawo nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. VaTagwirei chipangamazano chaVaMnangangwa. Asi America yabvisa pazvirango muchakabvu John Bredenkamp avo vaidyidzanao naVaMnangagwa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaTagwirei kuti tinzwe divi ravo kanawo gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Muzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe wati zvirango zvinotemerwa vanotyora kodzero dzevanhu nekuita huori. America iri kuenderera mberi ichitemera zvirango vanhu nemakambani emuZimbabwe kunyange hazvo hurumende yaVaMnangagwa iri kupedza mari ichibhadhara makambani emuAmerica matatu ayo ari kuzama kuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe. Vakuru vebato reZanu-PF vari kupomerawo America mhosva yekupesvedzera vanhu muZimbabwe kuti vapandukire hurumende. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti havasi kushamiswa nenyaya yekutemerwa zvirango kwaitwa VaTagwirei sezvo vagara vachipomerwa mhosva dzehuori dzisiri kuongororwa munyika. Zvirango zvatakanga kutemerwa vatungamiri vehurumende yeZimbabwe muna 2003 nevaive mutungamiri weAmerica, VaGeorge Bush, zvikawedzerwa makore nevaive mutungamiri wenyika iyi zvekare, VaBarack Obama pamwe naVaDonald Trump vari kutungamira pari zvino. No media source currently available
title: VaKuda Tagwirei Vanotemerwa Zvirango neAmerica

text: Huwandu hwevanhu vanonzi vakafira mutsaona yemumigodhi kuBattlefields pedyo neKadoma, usiku hwemusi weChipiri hunonzi hunogona kudarika zana, hurumende ichiti yatara tsona iyi setsaona inobata nyika yose, kana kuti National Disaster. Izvi zvinonzi zvichaona mufi wega wega achiwaniswa chiuru chemadhora negumbeze zvekubatsira pakuvigwa. Vanhu vaichera goridhe mumigodhi miviri inoti Cricket Mine neSilver Moon iri kuKadoma yakasangana netsaona iyi mushure mekunge mvura yakawanda yanaya, izvo zvakaita kuti kuite mafashamu akazozadzawo mvura mwena inopinda mumigodhi iyi. Zvinonzi pave kutyirwawo kuti vamwe vevanhu ava vanogona kunge vakatoeredzwa nemvura iyi vari pasi ipapo. Mapoka akasiyanasiyana kusanganisira re Civil Protection Unit, anonzi ari mubishi kuedza kukupa mvura iyi kuti vanonunura vanhu munjodzi vakwanise kunge vachisvika kune vanhu vakavharirwa ava, asi zvinonzi basa iri riri kunonotswa nekuda kwemvura, iyo inonzi ichiri kunaya. Asi vamwe vanoti vanoona sekunge hurumende yakanonoka kutora matanho sezvo tsaona iyi yakaitika patove nemazuva matatu, asi pasina kana chati chaitwa. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira vashandi vemumigodhi, reNational Mine Workers’ Union of Zimbabwe, VaNdodana Sithole, vanoti vamwe vevaichera goridhe ava vanogona kunge vaipinda mumigodhi iyi zvisiri pamutemo, izvo zviri kuita kuti pasazivikanwa huwandu chaihwo hwevanhu vangadai vakavharirwa nemvura pasi. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inotara Tsaona yeMigodhi kuKadoma seTsaona yeNyika Yose

text: Masangano akawanda ekunze ave kusimbaradza zvirongwa zvekubatsira vanhu munyika sezvo vanhu vakawanda vatarisana nedambudziko renzara iro rinonzi riri kuramba richitekeshera nenyika yose. Masangano akawanda ekunze ave kusimbaradza zvirongwa zvekubatsira vanhu munyika sezvo vanhu vakawanda vatarisana nedambudziko renzara iro rinonzi riri kuramba richitekeshera nenyika yose. Sangano reWorld Food Programme rinoti vana vanosvika zana rezviuru vari pazera riri pasi pemakore mashanu vakatarisana nezvirwere zvinokonzerwa nekushaya zvekudya uye zviri kutarisirwa kuti huwandu uhu huchatowedzera. Nzara iyi inonzi yabatawo zvipfuyo zvapa kuti zvipfuyo zvinosvika zviuru makumi maviri nezviviri zvife. Mhuri dzinosvika makumi masere nechimwe kubva muzana dzinotiwo hadzina mvura yekushandisa mumabasa ekurima. Mukuyedza kubatsira vanhu, sangano reUnited States Agency for International Development kana kuti USAID nemusi weChitatu rakapa Zimbabwe mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri emadhora kuburikidza nesangano reUnited Nations World Food Program. Izvi zvinoreva kuti mari yapihwa neAmerica kubva muna Chikumi gore rapera yasvika pamadhora mamiriyoni makumi mashanu nemashanu. Sangano reEuropean Union nesangano reFood and Agriculture Organization kana kuti FAO anyoreranawo chibvumirano chekubatsira vairmi vekuMasvingo neMwenezi nemari inopfuura madhora zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe. Vanhu vanosvika zviuru mazana matatu vari kutarisirwa kubatsirwa. Seneta weZaka kuMasvingo, VaMisheck Marava,vanova nhengo yeMDC-T vanoti dunhu ravo ratarisana nenzara isina mukare amboona. No media source currently available
title: Masangano eKunze Obatsira Zimbabwe Sezvo Nzara Yokomba

text: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika dzinoti makakatanwa nekunetsana kuri kubuda mubato reMDC-T, kuchatokanganisa gadziriro yebato iri musarudzo dziri kutarisirwa munyika gore rino, sezvo mubato iri mave nemapoka ari kudhonzerana. Mumwe anoongorora zvematongerwo enyika akazvimirira, VaJoy Mabenge, vanoti bato reMDC-T rinofanirwa kukasika kugadzirisa nyaya yehutungamiri kubva kuna ivo VaMorgan Tsvangirai kusvika kuvatevedzeri vavo vatatu, ivo VaTsvangirai vachizivisawo pavamire kuti vachasiya riini chigaro chavo, uye vanhu vosarudza achatora matomu kubva kwavari. "Kunonoka kuzvitaura zvine dambudziko nekuti uyo achazenge aakuzonzi achifanira kunge achitsiva VaTavsngirai anogona kunge asina rutsigiro rwakafanana nerwaVaTsvangirai, kana kuti zvinogona kutonetsa kuti pasvikwe pakuti ndiano munhu iyeye," VaMabenge vanodaro. Asi vanotiwo remangwana remusangano weMDC-T ratove zinyekenyeke kana uchinge usina VaTsvangirai semukokeri mukuru. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachishandawo vakazvimirira, VaCharles Mutasa, vanotiwo dambudziko riri mubato iri rakabva pakudomwa kwevatevedzeri vemutungamiri vatatu. "Dambudziko harisi pakuti VaTsvangirai vataura here kuti 'varume chisarudzai, kana kuti mosarudza nhingi. Asi chiri kungoratidza apa ndechekuti kunyangwe dai taiti VaTvsangirai vasimba nhasi, vanaya, eeh, dambudziko rebato hombe ririko nderekuti hapatorina kubatana kwacho pavatevedzeri vatatu ava," VaMutasa vanodaro. VaTsvangirai vakasiya vadoma VaElias Mudzuri kuti vafanobata matomu, asi pave nekudhonzerana kwakanyanya pakati paVaMudzuri nemumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaTsvangirai, VaNelson Chamisa, avo vakaziviswa neChitatu nemutauriri waVaTsvangirai, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, kuti ndivo vave kufanobata matomu kusvika VaTsvangirai vadzoka. Mumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaTsvangirai, ndiMuzvare Thokozane Khupe. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Voti Kunetsana Kuri muMDC-T Kuchakanganisa Bato iri Musarudzo

text: Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano iri kukurudzira vanhu vari munzvimbo dzekuchengetera vanhu vari kubva kunze kwenyika kuti vangwarire kutapurirwa munzvimbo idzi hutachiona hwecoronavirus uho honokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19. Doctor Edgar Munatsi vanoti vanhu vanenge vakachengetwa munzvimbo idzi mushure mekupinda munyika, vanofanirwa kutevedzera kurudziro yekuti vasagare pedyo napedyo, kana kuti vaite social distancing, kuitira kuti vasatapurirane chirwere ichi. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ebazi rezvehutano ekuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakanga hwakwira neChitatu manheru kusvika pazana nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti 132. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevanhu makumi masere nevatanhatu nechirwere ichi kuBeitbridge, Harare neMasvingo. Pavanhu vose vabatwa vaine Covid-19 muZimbabwe, munhu mumwe chete pavanhu vose ava ndiye akatapurirwa chirwere ichi munyika. Asi vamwe vose ava vane chirwere ichi, vanhu vakabva kuSouth Africa nedzimwe nyika. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko akatumirwa Studio7 nezuro manheru neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zvuru zana negumi nezvipfumamwe, kana kuti 119,000 vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica uye vashaya vadarika zvuru zvitatu nemazana mashanu ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevana, kana kuti 3,594. Vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vadarika zvuru makumi mana nezvisere, kana kuti hwadarika 48,000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezvuru mazana manomwe, kana kuti 5,7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica, iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika 1,7 million, uye vafa munyika iyi vainge vadarika zviuru zana nechimwe nezuro manheru. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vadarika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nezvishanu, asi huwandu uhu hunogona kunge hwakirwa sezvo vanhu vari kufa nguva dzakasiyana siyana.
title: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzokurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vaite 'Social Distancing'

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kubva kunze kwenyika vachishandisa miganhu ye Beitbridge kuSouth Africa nePlumtree kudivi reBotswana zvinonzi zvanga zvakazara kumiganhu iyi zvichiedza kuti zvipinde munyika munguva ino yezororo. Mutungamiri wesangano reInternational Cross Border Association, VaDenis Juru, vanoti vakawanda vari kuenda kumusha vanoda kuve pamwe chete nehama neshamwari panguva yezororo reKisimusi, izvo zviri kuita kuti vaungane pamiganho iyi. Zvinonziwo kumuganhu wePlumtree, dambudziko razowedzerwa mushure mekumbomira kushanda kwemichina yeZimra. Gore rino zvinonzi vanhu vakawanda vanogara kunze kwenyika vari kudzokera kumusha, vazhinji vavo kekutanga mukati memakore akawanda vasati vadzokera munyika. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vakawanda Vodzokera Kumusha paZororo Rino reKisimusi

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinopinda zana izvo zvanga zviri muhupoteri pamuzinda weDukwi Refugee Camp muBotswana zvinoti hurumende yenyika iyi yaramba kugamuchira chichemo chavo chekuti zvisadzoserwe kumusha zvichiti kukandwa mumukanwa mamupere. Vapoteri ava vanga vakumbira hurumende yeBotswana kuti vapihwe hugari hwemunyika iyi kana kuti vatsvagirwe dzimwe nyika dzavangaende kunogara kwadziri vachiti kumusha hakuna kumira zvakanaka. Vakuru wehurumende yeBotswana varamba kudaira mibvunzo yeStudio7 munyaya iyi. Asi mugwaro raonekwa neStudio7 iro rakanyorerwa mumwe wevanhu vanodarika zana avo vanga vachikumbira kuti vasadzoserwe kumusha, hurumende yeBotswana inoti haioni kuti zvichemo zvavo zvine huremu hwekuti vakaenderera mberi iri vapoteri. Gwaro iri rinoenderera mberi richiti gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika iyi, VaKagiso Mmusi havaoni zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe izvo zvanga zviri pamuzinda weDukwi iri vapoteri vakatiza zvematongerwo enyika. Nokudaro, hurumende yenyika iyi inoti avo vanenge vasina kunyoresa kuti vadzoserwe kumusha pasi pechirongwa chevoluntary repatriation vachaitwa musenga bere nevashandi vebazi rinoona nezvekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu munyika iyi. Mutauriri wevapoteri paDukwi, VaBhekimpilo Weza vaudza Studio7 kuti Botswana iri mukavhiya katiyo nehurumende yeZimbabwe kuti avo vanga vari muhupoteri vadzoserwe kumusha zvisiri pamutemo. VaWeza vaenderera mberi vachiti mamiriro ezvematongerwo enyika haasati ashanduka munyika sezvo hurumende yeZANU PF iyo yavakatiza makore gumi nemairi apfuura ndiyo ichiri panyanga uye ichi kuenderera mberi nekupfuvisa avo vanotsigira bato reMDC. Mukokeri wesangano reHuman Rights Watch kumaodzanyemba eAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti zviri kuitwa nenyika yeBotswana kumbunyikidza kodzero dzevapoteri uye hazvienderani nezvinotarisirwa nesangano reUnited Nations High Commissioner for Refugees. Senzira yekuzadzikisa chibvumirano chakaitwa nenyika dzepasi rose muna1951, VaMavhinga vanoti Botswana inosungirwa kutsvagira vapoteri veZimbabwe nyika dzikavapa hupoteri pane kuti vadzoserwe kumusha. Mugore ra2008, vapoteri ava ruzhinji rwavo vachiti vatsigiri weMDC, vakatiza misha yavo mushure mekurohwa zvakaipisisa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri weZANU PF panguva yakaitika sarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dzedzokororo kana kuti runoff. No media source currently available
title: Botswana Yodzinga Vapoteri veZimbabwe Vari muNyika Iyi

text: Komisheni inoona nezvekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhukadzi nevanhurume, yeZimbabwe Gender Commission, iri kutanga misangano yayo Chipiri, ichisangana nevemapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Misangano iyi inonzi ichange ichipa mukana wekukuridzira kuti madzimai apiwe mikana yakaenzana nevanhurume, zvikuruseyi mune zvematongerwo enyika musarudzo dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa munyika mwedzi mishoma inotevera. Imwe nhengo ye komisheni iyi, Muzvinafundo Victor Nkiwane, vanoti vanhukadzi ndivo vakawanda kupfuura vanhurume munyika, asi vanovhotera vanhurume vachisiya madzimai nekuda kwepfungwa yekuti vachine tarisiro yekuti vanochengetwa nevanhurume. No media source currently available
title: Komisheni yeKuenzaniswa kweMikana Yosangana neVemapato eZvematongerwo eNyika

text: Mutungamiri webato reMDC-T vari zvakare mutungamiri wemubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti hurumende yavo ichaunza kutungamirwa kwenyika kutsva, kusina rusarura, kuchaita kuti vanhu vose vemunyika vanzwe kufara kuti zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe. Kunyange hazvo kwange kuchipfunha nekutonhora, zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvazadza nhandare yeMkoba Stadium muguta reGweru kuti zvinzwe VaChamisa vachitaura pamusangano wekutsvaga rutsigiro. Pamboitika zhowe-zhowe panzi vamwe vatungamiri vemamwe mapato ari mumubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance vawane mukana wekutaura, vanhu vachiramba izvi vachiti vanoda kunzwa VaChamisa. Vanhu vazogadzikana mushure mekunge VaChamisa vakumbira kuti vanzwe kubva kune vamwe vevatungamiri ava vashoma. Pavazotaura kuvanhu, VaChamisa vatsinhira mashoko avari kugara vachitaura pamisangano yakadai ekuti vanoona ivo nemubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance vari ivo vachatungamira hurumende mushure mesarudzo dzinotarisirwa kuitwa munyika mumwedzi mishoma inotevera. Vati havawone zvinovatadzisa kukunda musarudzo idzi sezvo mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nebato riri kutonga reZanu PF vave nenguva yakareba vachitadza kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. VaChamisa vati hurumende yavo ichaunza hutungamiri hutsva hunokoshesa zvido zveruzhinji rwevanhu kwete kukoshesa vatungamiri. VaChamisa vati kutonga kwebato reZanu PF kwakadyara ruvengo pakati peveruzhinji munyika zvichienderana nekuti munhu unotsigira bato ripi kana kuti uri werudzi rwupi. Vati vanoda kuti nyaya yeGukurahundi igadziriswe nekuita kuti pave nehurongwa hwekuti vanhu munyika vanzwe chokwadi chezvakaitika panguva iyi, kana kuti ‘truth telling’ muChirungu, vachiti havazoita izvi nenzira yekutsvaga kuroverera vamwe vevanonzi vane chekuita nenyaya iyi, asi kuti vanoda kuti munyika muve nekupora kwemaronda nekuregererana kwechokwadi. Vati vanodawo kuti mazita ematunhu emunyika aripo pari zvino achinjwe kuitira kuti pasave nekukurudzira kupatsanurana kwemarudzi. VaMathias Guchutu, vanove mutungamiri webato reMovement for Christian Democrats, iro rinove rimwe remapato ari mumubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance, vatiwo sezvo vanhu vakawanda munyika vachitendera muchiKristu, vanovimba kuti vanhu vachasarudza VaChamisa nemubatanidzwa wavo nekuti VaChamisa pachavo mufundisi. Vanhu vakawanda vange vari pamusangano uyu kunyanya vechidiki vange vachiratidza kufarira VaChamisa zvikuru. Mumwe weavo ndiTofarasei Danga uyo ati ane chivimbo chekuti VaChamisa vanogona kugadzirisa matambudziko ari munyika sezvo vari munhu wechidiki ane maonero matsva. Musangano waitwa muGweru ndemumwe weyakawanda iri kuitwa neMDC Alliance kutsvaga rutsigiro munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika. Pange pachiitwa musangano wemuGweru Muzvare Thokozani Khupe nevamwe vevatungamiri veMDC-T vari kupokana nehutungamiri hwaVaChamisa vange vachiitawo musangano wavo muguta reBulawayo. Asi sachigaro weMDC-T mudunhu reBulawayo VaGift Banda, mutauriri webato iri mudunhu iri VaFelix Mafa, pamwe nevamwe vakuru vakuru vebato iri mudunhu reBulawayo vange vari pamusangano wemuGweru. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mumwe wevapinda musangano waitwa kuBulawayo namuzvare Khupe, VaObert Gutu, avo vanonzi vakambomiswa kuve mutauriri weMDC-T, varamba mashoko ekuti kuitwa kwemisangano miviri yeMDC-T kuBulawayo nekuGweru kunoreva kutsemuka kwebato iri. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika uye vari paJohanesburg Univesity, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vanoti nyaya yekurwira hutungamiri iri muMDC-T pakati paVaChamisa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, ndeyezvematongerwo enyika, kwete zvemutemo. Doctor Ruhanya vanoti vanodaro nekuti matunhu ose emunyika nevanhu vazhinji vanoratidza kutsigira vanelson chamisa zvisina gakava. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Vovimbisa Vanhu Nyika Isina Rusarura rweMarudzi Kana Matunhu

text: Mafashamu emvura ari kukonzera matambudziko akawanda muzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana dzenyika zvichitevera kunayisisa kwemvura. Vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vari kuputsirwa dzimba dzavo nemafashamu aya. KuBikita kuMasvingo kune vanhu vanomwe vakaurayiwa nemheni. Bazi remamiriro ekunze rinoti mumazuva maviri anotevera mvura iyi ichatanga zvekare kunaya zvakasimba. MuHarare mvura yakanaya zvakasimba kutanga neSvondo zvikuru muHarare West uye pakati peguta. Vamwe vanhu vanonzi vakatozonunurwa mushure memaawa akawanda mushure mekunge vaedza kutyaira mumigwagwa yakazara mvura. Mapurisa ari kuyambira vanhu kuti vasatyaire munzvimbo dzine mvura yakawandisa. Munzvimbo dziri mumahombe kombe erwizi Zambezi, vanhu vari kunzi vagare vakagadzirira sezvo kuMozambique kuinewo mafashamu. Vanhu vanosvika zana nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe vakafa nemafashamu aya munyika iyi. Mumiriri weHarare West mudare reparamende, Muzvare Jessie Majome, vanoti mhuri dzakawanda muAshdown Park, Westlea, Tynawald neMalbereign dzakatarisana nedambudziko remafashamu aya. No media source currently available Mutauriri weRed Cross muZimbabwe, VaTakemore Mazurise, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari mushishi kutsvaga rubatsiro rwekupa vanhu vakawirwa nedambudziko remafashamu emvura. No media source currently available
title: Mafashamu Okanganisa Vakawanda muZimbabwe

text: Vanorwira kodzero dzekufambiswa kwemashoko zvakasununguka vnoti vari kufara zvikuru nekupihwa kwemarezinesi masere kwenhepfenyuro dzemunharaunda. Sachigaro weMedia Institute of Southern Africa Zimbabwe (Misa Zimbabwe) VaGolden Maunganidze, vanoti vakatambira nemufaro kupihwa marezinhesi kwenhepfenyuro dzemunharaunda kwakaitwa neBroadcasting Authority of Zimbabwe nemusi weChitatu. Asi VaMaunganidze vanotiwo tarisiro yavo ndeyekuti nhepfenyuro idzi dzizozadzikisa zvinotarisirwa nenharaunda zvekubudisa mashoko echokwadi. Sachigaro we Zimbabwe Association of Community Radio Stations Amai Pearlgia Kapuya, vanoti vafadzwa zvikuru sezvo nhengo dzavo shanu dzapihwawo marezinesi aya. Amai Kapuya vanotiwo itarisiro yavo yekuti nhepfenyuro dzemunharaunda dzirambe dzichiwaniswa marezinesi. Murwiri wekodzero yekusunungurwa kwemasaisai, VaKudzai Kwangwari, vanotiwo kunyange hazvo vanga varwira kodzero iyi kwemakore akawanda, vanofadzwa kuti Zimbabwe yatora danho rekusunungura masaisai. VaKwangwatri vanoti chasara kuona kuti hurumende inosiya nhepfenyuro idzi dzichitepfenyura zvakasununguka here kana kuti kwete. Broadcasting Authority of Zimbabwe yakapa marezinesi masere kunhepfenyuro dzemunharaunda zvasiya kwave nebhepfenyuro idzi gumi neina. Dzimwe dzenhepfenyuro dzakapiwa marezinesi dzinosanganisira Matobo Community Radio Trust, Chimanimani Community Radio Trust, Vemuganga Community Radio Trust, Ndau Community Radio Trust, Twasumbuka Community Radio Trust, Madziwa Community Radio Trust, Patsaka Nyaminyami Trust ne Radio Bukalanga. No media source currently available
title: Vanorwira Kodzero dzeKufambiswa kweMashoko Vofara neKupiwa kweMarezinesi kuNhepfenyuro dzeNharaunda

text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neChitatu Manheru kuti vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika vakanga vasvika pamazana matatu nemakumi maviri, vapona kuchirwere ichi vave makumi mana nevapfumbamwe, uye vafa vachiri pavana. Izvi zvinotevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe vanhu vatanhatu vakabva kuSouth Africa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu chiuru nezana nemakumi manomwe nevana (1,174) vakaongororwa nezuro wakare. Vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mashanu nezvishanu nemazana manomwe nevapfumbamwe (55, 709) vaongororwa kana vaine chirwere ichi cheCovid-19 munyika yose kusvika pari zvino. Pasi rose vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni manomwe nezviuru mazana maviri (7,2 million) vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose uye vafa vadarika zviuru mazana mana negumi nezviviri, kana kuti (412 thousand.) Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano, Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, vanoti kuramba huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi muZimbabwe huchikwira mucherechedzo wekuti pane zvinogona kunge zviri kukanganiswa nehurumende mukuedza kwayo kudzvirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Mazana Matatu neMakumi Maviri Vanobatwa neCovid-19 muZimbabwe

text: Bato reMDC Alliance rinoti mapurisa kuBiriiri kuChimanimani mudunhu reManicaland arambidza kuitwa kwemusangano wehutungamiri hwedunhu diki kana kuti distirct executuve, wanga uchida kuitirwa pane mumwe musha uri muWard 17. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaGift Ostalos Siziba, vanoti musangano uyu wanga usingade mvumo yemapurisa kana kusungira kuti bato ravo ritange razivisa mapurisa sezvo vanga usiri musangano wanga uchiitirwa pajekerere. VaSiziba vanoti mapurisa haana kupa zvikonzero zvakajeka zvekuti sei arambbidza musangano uyu, uyo vanoti wanga uchipindwa nevanhu makumi maviri chete. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mapurisa ekuChimanimani kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Mutauriri wemapurisa nyika yose, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vasati vanzwa nezvenyaya iyi, uye vanga vasati vapirwa zvaitika mumatunhu akasiyanasiyana enyika panguva yatavabata. Asi VaSiziba vanoti zviitiko zvakadai zvinoratidza kuti vari kutonga havadi kuti bato reMDC Alliance riiite misangano yaro sezvo vari kutya kubviswa pazvigaro. No media source currently available
title: Bato reMDC Alliance Ropomera Mapurisa Mhosva yeKuparadza Musangano Waro kuBiriiri

text: Bepanhau reHerald rabvuma kuti raiita basa raro rekuburitsa nhau rakakarerekera kuZanu PF musarudzo dzakaitwa gore rapera, rikati richagadzirisa mashandiro aro sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Izvi zvabuda mudare rekuMasvingo zvichitevera kuendeswa kweHerald neZimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation kumatare edzimhosva nesangano reVeritas. Gweta reVeritas, VaDoug Coltart, vaudza dare redzimhosva kuti ZBC neHerald dziri kutyora chikamu 61 chebumbiro remitemo yenyika icho chinosungira masangano enhau ari pasi pehurumende kupa mikana yakaenzana kumapato ose ezvematongerwo enyika. VaColtart vaudza dare kuti munguva yesarudzo gore rapera, Zanu PF ndiyo yakawana nguva yakakurisa munhepfenyuro ye ZBC uye mubepanhau re Herald, zvichienzaniswa nemamwe mapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Mumapepa ari mudare, ZBC ndiyo yekutanga inofanira kupindura zvairi kupomerwa neVeritsa, uye Herald iri yechipiri. Vachipikisa mashoko aVaColtart, gweta reZBC, Va Evans Moyo, varamba mhosva iyi vachiti nhepfenyuro yavo iri kuita basa rayo nemhazvo, uye inotepfenyura nhau zvakaenzana pasina kutsigira rimwe divi. Asi Herald haina kutumira magweta kuitira kuti imirirwe mudare mushure mekunge yabvuma mhosva yairi kupomerwa ikavimbisa kuti ichagadzirisa maburitsiro ayo nyaya yadzo. Veritas yakaendeswo Zimbabwe Electoral Commission mudare pamwe nesangano reBroadcasting Authority of Zimbabwe, asi yazovabvisa panyaya idzi mushure mekuona kuti vange vasineyi nenyaya iyi. Mutongi wedare, VaJoseph Mafusire, vati vachapa mutongo wavo munguva pfupi inotevera, uye vachazivisa vagweta evange ari mudare zuva ravachapa mutongo wavo. No media source currently available
title: Bepanhau reHerald Rinobvuma Kuti Raityora Bumbiro reMitemo yeNyika

text: Dare reHigh Court muBulawayo rakapa mutongo wekuti mapurisa haafanirwe kurambidza kuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa neboka remadzimai eMDC T muguta iri Mugovera. Mapurisa ainge ati anotyira kuti kusagadzikana kwakaita zvinhu munyika kungangoita kuti kuratidzira uku kukonzere mhirizhonga. Gweta range richimiririra madzimai eMDC T munyaya iyi VaKholwani Ngwenya vaudza Studio 7 kuti mutongi wedare VaNicholas Mathonzi vakapa mvumo yekuti madzimai aya aenderere mberi nekuratidzira kwaari kuda kuita vachiti bumbiro remutemo rakajeka pakupa kodzero kuvanhu kuti varatidzire murunyararo. Madzimai eMDC-T aive aita chikumbiro chechimbi-chimbi kudare repamusoro reHigh Court nemusi weChitatu mushure mekunge mapurisa emuBulawayo ati aisabvumira kuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa nemadzimai aya vachiti munyika hamuna kumira zvakanaka. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC T muzvare Thokozani Khupe vati vafara zvikuru nemutongo wedare vachiti izvi zvinoratidza kukosheswa kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Muzvare Khupe vati madzimai ebato ravo akagadzirira zvikuru kuratidzira kuri kudaidzwa kuti “Rova mapoto campaign.” Chirongwa cheRova mapoto campaign chiri kuitwa nemadzimai eMDC T senzira yekuratidza kusafara kwavo nematambudziko ari munyika ayo vanoti ari kuunza nzara mudzimba dzeve ruzhinji munyika. No media source currently available
title: Dare Robvumidza Madzimai eMDC Kuratidzira neMapoto Avo muBulawayo

text: Komiti yepamusoro mubato reZanu PF yePolitburo neMuvhuro yakabvumirana kuti vange vari makurukota muhurumende avo vasina kudomwa mudare idzva remakurukota nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vapihwe mabasa pamuzinda webato iri. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti homwe yeZanu PF yakabooka zvekuti bato iri rinogona kupinda muhomwe yenyika kuti ribhadhare vanhu ava. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure memusangano wePolitburo uyu neMuvhuro, mutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo vakati vainge yabvumirana kuti vamwe vevakange vari makurukota ehurumende vasina kuwana zvigaro mudare remakurukota rakatoreswa mhiko nemutungamiri wenyika svondo rapera vapihwe mabasa pamuzinda webato iri uye vachange e vachibhadharwa mari dzemihoro. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakasiya vamwe vakuru-vakuru mubato ravo mudare remakurokota ravakazivisa neChishanu avo vaigara vakadomwa mudare iri nguva nenguva vakaita saVaPatrick Chinamasa, VaObert Mpofu, VaSimbarashe Mumbengegwi naivo VaSimon Khaya Moyo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mudzidzisi paGreat Zimbabwe University, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vati vari kutyira kuti Zanu PF ichange ichipinda muhomwe yenyika kuti ibhadhare vanhu ava sezvo isina mari muhomwe yayo. VaMoyo vati mubato ravo mune basa rakakura kwazvo rekuzadzisa zvavakavimbisa veruzhinji pavaitsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikungu. Asi Doctor Zhou vati danho ratorwa neZanu PF iri rinoratidza kuti bato iri ratotanga kugadzirira sarudzo dzemuna 2023. VaMnangagwa vakadoma dare remakurukota rine vanhu vashoma uye vechidiki vane hunyanzvi hwakasiyana-siyana vachiti dare iri rine basa guru rekuona kuti hupfumi hwenyika hwavandudzwa kuitira kuti veruzhinji vagare zvakanaka.
title: Politburo yeZanu PF Inosunga Kuti Vasina Kupiwa Zvigaro muHurumende Vashandire Bato

text: Kusawirirana kuri kuenderera mberi pakati penhengo dzeZanu-PF dzakadzingwa mubato iri dzichinzi dzaitsigira vaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru. Amai Mujuru vaipomerwa mhosva yekuti vaida kupidigura mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pachigaro nechisimba. Asi vari kuramba nyaya iyi uye hapana kana munhu mumwe chete akasungwa. Asi vamwe vakadzingwa vanosanganisira makurukota maviri, VaWebster Shamu, naVaNicholas Goche, vari kuyedza kudzokera kuZanu-PF kunyange vasiri kutambirwa. Asi vamwe vari kupika kuti havasi kuzodzokera kuZanu-PF havasi kuwirirana kuti votora gwara ripi. Vaimbova sachigaro weZanu-PF kuMashonaland West, VaTemba Mliswa, vanoti Amai Mujuru havakwanise kutungamira uye vanofanira kusiira vechidiki vanotemwa dzinobva ropa. Asi vamwe vakaita sevaiva gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reMasvingo, VaKudakwashe Bhasikiti, vanoti VaMliswa vari kushanda nechikwata cheZanu-PF chavanoti chiri kutungamirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. No media source currently available Kunyangwe hazvo Amai Mujuru vakadzingwa mubato, kunetsana kuri kuenderera mberi muZanu-PF. Vakawanda vanoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nekuti VaMugabe vakwegura uye hapana kujeka kuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chavo zvapa kuti mubato muite donga watonga muzinda wenyuchi.
title: VaMliswa naVaBhasikiti Vokandirana Makobvu neMatete

text: Mamwe magaraji munyika anonzi awedzera mari yemutengo wemafuta edzimotokari nezvikamu zvinosvika makumi manomwe kubva muzana kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti haisi kuzozvitendera. Zimbabwe Energy Regulatory Authority, kana kuti ZERA, iri kutiwo mutengo hauna kukwira sezviri kutaurwa pamadandemutende kunyange hazvo ongororo yaitwa neStudio7 iri kuburitsa pachena kuti vamwe vemagaraji vatowedzera mutengo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau papera musangano wedare remakurukota neChipiri, gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vati dare iri ratenderana kuti vemagaraji havafanire kuwedzera mutengo kusvika pamadhora manomwe emaRTGS sezvave kuitika. VaChasi vati vasangana nevemabhizimisi vakavayambira kuti vasawedzere mitengo kana kuda kuti vanhu vatenge nemadhora ekuAmerica chete nekuti hazvisi pamutemo. Studio7 yambobata vakuru vegaraji reZuva kuMarimba ikaudzwa kuti vange vasina kukwanisa kuwana mafuta kubva mukupera kwesvondo rapera. Pane mashoko ekuti vamwe vanotengesa mafuta vari kuramba kuatengesa kusvika mutengo wacho wawedzerwa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti mafuta awedzerwa kubva pamari inodarika mashora mana kusvika kumadhora masere nemasendi makumi masere kana kudarika. VaChitambara vati izvi zviri kukonzerwa nenyaya yekushaya simba kwemari yemaRTGS zvichienzaniswa nedhora rekuAmerica pamusika mutema wariri kutengwa nevakawanda. Mutengo wemafuta wakatanga kuita chamurambamhuru kubva gavhuna webhanga guru, Doctor John Mangudya, zvavakati bhanga guru renyika haraizowanisa vanotengesa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari mari nemutengo wakaderera. Asi mukuru weAfrica Roundtable, VaOswell Binha, vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti vanhu vatenge mafuta avo vega. Asi VaBinha vatenda kuti vemabhizimisi vari kuomerwawo nezvinhu nekuda kwekusagadzikana kwemari yeRTGS. Asi mutungamiri weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti zvinhu zvaomera mushandi wose munyika. Kunyange hazvo gurukota rezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vari kuti hurongwa hwekugadzirisa hupfumi huri mugwara, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika. No media source currently available
title: Peturu neDhiziri Zwowedzerwa Mitengo Zvakanyanya

text: Vashandi vehurumende pamwe nevaive vashandi avo vave pamudyandigere vakawana mari dzekubatsirika munguva ino yeCovid-19 dzinoita madhora makumi manomwe nemashanu nemadhora makumi matatu emari yekuAmerica, vanonzi vave kuita dambudziko rekutadza kutora mari idzi kumabhanga avo, sezvo pasina kujekeswa kuti vachazodzitora sei. Mari idzi dzinonzi dzakatanga kupinda mumabhanga evashandi mukupera kwesvondo rapera asi vashandi ava vanonzi vari kuudzwa nemabhanga avo kuti vamiririre kusvikira vaziviswa kuti vanopiwa sei mari idzi, uye vanenge vachida mari idzi nekukasika vari kunzi vanopiwa dziri mumadhora emunyika nemutengo wedhora rekuAmerica wezuva iroro. Gurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vakaudzawo bepanhau reSunday Mail neSvondo kuti mari idzi dzakatanga kuiswa mumabhanga evashandi, uye vakatendawo kuti hapana hurongwa hwati hwavepo hwekuti dzingashandiswa sei muzvitoro. Hurumende inonzi yakambenge yakazivisa kuti vashandi ava vachazopiwa makadhi ekumabhanga ekuti vakwanise kushandisa mari idzi, asi zvinonzi kusvika pari zvino hapana zvati zvaitwa. Mutewedzeri wemunyori mukuru wesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende, reAPEX Council, VaGibson Mushangu, vanoti semasangano anomirira vashandi havana zvakawanda zvavanogona kutaura pamusoro pemari iyi nekuti hurumende yakangopa vashandi sechipo pasina kugarwa pasi. VaMushangu vanoti vachatozonzwa nevashandi kuti vawana mari dzavo sei kana vese vapera kuona mari dzavo dave mumabhangi. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veHurumende Vanoti Havasi Kukwanisa Kutora Mari Dzekubatsirikana muNguva yeCovid-19

text: Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti vari kurohwa nemasoja vachinzi vakaendereyi kumusangano weMDC Alliance wakaitwa neSvondo kuChinhoyi kwakare. Mumwe wevanhu vakarohwa nemasoja nemusi weChipiri ndiVaKelvin Mahwani avo vanogara mumusha unogara veruzhinji weCherima. VaMahwani vanoti musoja akavarova ayivapomera mhosva yekufarira bato reMDC-T achiti ndivo vakakokera musangano wakaitwa neSvondo. VaMahwani vanoti zviri kuitwa nemasoja zvinotyora kodzero dzavo dzekutsigira bato ravanoda. VaMahwani vanoti mapurisa pari zvino vari kuedza nepavanokwanisa kuti nyaya yavo inzwikwe nemadzitare. Mumwe mugari, VaTafadzwa Chatima, avo vakarohwa nemusoja wavanoziva vakaenda kunomhan'ara kumapurisa, vanoti masoja anogara munogara veruzhinji ave kushanda achiongorora vagari kuti vanotsigira bato ripi. VaChatima vanoti masoja mana ari muwadhi mavo vanochityisidzira vagari vanotsigira mamwe mapato asiri bato reZanu PF. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Asi mutauriri wemasoja, VaAlfios Makotore, vati tivanyorere mibvunzo padandemutande ravo asi vanga vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu pataenda pamhepo. Mumiriri weChinhoyi muparamende uye vari chiremba, Doctor Peter Matarutse, vabvuma kuti vaongorora kukuvara kwaVaMahwani. Munyori mukuru mubato reMDC-T muChinhoyi, VaEdward Kadewere, vanoti vechidiki vebato iri vakambonetsana nemasoja apo vaikokera musangano wavo pachitoro chepaChengaose muChinhoyi. No media source currently available
title: Masoja Orova Nhengo dzeMDC-T kuChinhoyi

text: Dare remuChinhoyi nhasi rarasa chikumbiro chaAmai Grace Mugabe chekuti mutongo waMambo Zvimba wekuti mutumbi wevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ufukunyurwe, uraswe. Vachipa mutongo wavo nhasi mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti, Muzvare Ruth Moyo, vati chikumbiro chaAmai Mugabe hachina musoro sezvo mwana wavo Bona Mugabe ari iye akakwidza nyaya kudare vachiti haana simba rekukwidza nyaya iyi pamutemo asi ivo mbune Amai Mugabe. Kunyange hazvo magweta aAmai Mugabe amiramira achiti Amai Mugabe vainge vasiri munyika panguva iyi ndokubva vapa mwana wavo simba kana kuti power of attorney rekukwidza nyaya kwamajisitirriti asi dare razviramba. Gweta raAmai Mugabe, VaFungai Chimwamurombe, vati havana kufara nemutongo wamajisitiriti vachiti Bona ayinge apihwa simba naAmai vake zviri pamutemo sezvo vainge vasiri munyika. VaChimwamurombe vati vachapikisa mutongo uyu zvakare kudare repamusoro. Asi gweta raVaTinos Manongovere avo vakaendesa Amai Mugabe kwaMambo Zvimba vachiti vaka viga VaMugabe zvisingabvumirwe netsika dzemaZvimba nokudaro vanofanirwa kufukunyurwa, VaPardon Nhokwara, vati havana chekuwedzera pamutongo vachiti vari kufara nemutongo wanhasi. Muzvare Moyo masvondo maviri apera vakarasazve chikumbiro chevana vaVaMugabe vanoti; Bona, Tinotenda Robert Jnr naBellaimine Mugabe chekuti dare rimise kufukunyurwa kwemutumbi wababa vavo sezvakanga zvatongwa naMambo Zvimba muna Chikumi. Muzvare Moyo vakapa chikonzero sechavapa nhasi chekuti vana vakaunza nyaya yekumisa kufukunyurwa kwaVaMugabe havasi ivo vari pamagwaro emutongo waMambo Zvimba asi kuti amai vavo, Amai Mugabe, ndivo vakapihwa mutongo uyu. VaMugabe vakashaikira kuSingapore muna Gunyana 2019 uko kwavaigara vachienda kunorapwa. VaMugabe, avo vakatonga nyika kubva muna 1980, vakabviswa pachigaro zvechisimba nemauto muna Mbudzi 2017. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rinorasa Chikumbiro chaAmai Grace Mugabe

text: Vashandi vehurumende vanoti vari kufara chose nebhajeti rakaturwa muparamende nemusi weChina negurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, iro rakaisa chikamu chemari yakawanda ichashandiswa nehurumende kumihoro yavo. VaChinamasa vakazivisa kuti nyika inotarisirwa kushandisa mari inoita mabhiriyoni mashanu nemiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora mugore ra2018. Pamari iri kutarisirwa kushandiswa nehurumende iyi, zvikamu zvinodarika zvishoma makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvinotarisirwa kuenda kumihoro yevashandi vayo. VaChinamasa vakazivisawo kuti hurumende ichaisa parutivi mari inoita $176 million ichashandiswa mukubhadhara vashandi vayo mabhonasi avo egore rino, kunyange hazvo vachizowana mari idzi mumwedzi yakasiyana. Sachigaro wesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende, reApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti bhajeti iri rarakidza kuti hurumende inokoshesa vashandi vayo. Panyaya yekumiswa kwevechidiki mabasa vanodarika zviuru zvitatu, Amai Alexander vanoti vanotarisirawo kuti hurumende yaifanirwa kutanga yagarawo navo pasi kuti vaone nzira dzekuvamisa nadzo mabasa vari pamwe chete. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veHurumende Vanotambira neMufaro Bhajeti reGore Rinouya

text: Vadzidzisi vekumaruwa vanoti kunyoresa vana ve O’Level bvunzo dzema practical ezvidzidzo zvesainzi kuchanetsa sezvo zvikoro zvekumaruwa zvizhinji zvisina midziyo kana zvikwanisiro zvekuti bvunzo idzi dzinyorwe. Izvi zvinotevera kutanga kushandiswa kwakaitwa hurongwa hutsva hwedzidzo uhwo huri kudaidzwa kuti new curriculum gore rino. Vamwe vadzidzisi vekumaruwa ekwaChihota vanoti kunyoresa vana bvunzo dzesainzi dzema practical pasi pehurongwa hutsva hwedzidzo kana kuti new curriculum kuchanetsa sezvo vasina zvinodiwa zvakakwana pakudzidziswa kwezvidzidzo zvesainzi. Mumwe mudzidzidzisi wepane chimwe chikoro chemunharaunda ino yekwaChihota, VaLiberty Mutongwizo, vanoti kuti vana vechikoro vazonyora bvunzo panotoda gadziriro yakakwana asi vanoti gadziriro iyi haisi kufamba zvakanaka muzvidzidzo zvesainzi sezvo pasina kana chavainacho chekushandisa muzvidzidzo izvi kunze kwemabhuku chete. Mumwe mwana wepachikoro apa uyo watisingakwanisi kudoma zita rake pamhepo nekuti achiri pasi pemakore atinobvumirwa kuti titaure pamhepo anoti kunyora bvunzo dzema practical esainzi kuchavanetsa kana zvikwanisiro izvi zvikazounzwa nehurumende munguva yekunyora bvunzo. Mwana uyu anoti zvave pachena kuti vana vazhinji vekumaruwa vachafoira bvunzo dzezvidzidzo zve sainzi sezvo kwasara mwedzi mishomanana kuti bvunzo idzi dzinyorwe muna Gumiguru asi pasina chavati vadzidza. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti ongororo yakaitwa nesangano ravo yakaburitsa kuti vadzidzisi vazhinji havana ruzivo rwezvavari kunzi vadzidzise vana. VaMasaraure vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende imbomisa kunyorwa kwebvunzo dzema practical esainzi. Vashandi vebazi rinoona nezvebvunzo reZimbabwe Schools Examinations Council kana kuti Zimsec, vakaramba kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vakati tibvunze hurumende. Asi mumwe mubereki, Amai Alice Kasinamunda, vanoti chinorwadza ndechekuti veZimsec vanenge vachingoda mari yavo kuti mwana wavo anyore bvunzo ivo vachiziva havo kuti hurumende haina kugadzirira zvakakwana zvakafanana nekukanda mbeu paruware uchitarisira kukohwa pakuru. Zvichakadai, gurukota rezvedzidzo, VaPaul Mavima, vakaudza Studio 7 parunharare kuti havasi kuzodzokera kumashure ne new curriculum iyo yakatanga kushandiswa muzvikoro gore rino vachiti hurongwa hwehurumende ndewekuti dzidzo yemuZimbabwe isimukire kuti iyenzane neyekune dzimwe nyika. Patakavabvunza nezvekushayikwa kwezvikwanisiro zvekuti bvunzo dzema practicals esainzi dzinyorwe zvikurusei kumaruwa, VaMavhima vakati bazi ravo riri kushanda zvakasimba kuti zvikwanisiro izvi zvinge zviri muzvikoro zvose munyika. Kana hurumende ikaramba yakaisa zvimiti munzeve panyaya iyi, vana vakawanda vanogona kutadza kubudirira muzvidzidzo zvesainzi gore rino zvinozoita kuti vatadze kupfuurira mberi nezvimwe zvidzidzo zvavanenge vachida kuita muhupenyu. No media source currently available
title: Kushaikwa kweZvikwanisiro zveZvidzidzo zveScience muZvikoro Kungangokanisa Bvunzo

text: Vanhu vanosvika zviuru zvishanu vaungana neChina kwaChiadzwa kwaMarange vachirangarira vanhu vakafa munguva yaibviswa vanhu mudunhu iri nechisimba nemauto. Hurongwa hwekubvisa vanhu nechisimba munzvimbo iyi, uhwo hwainzi ‘Operation Hakudzokwi’ muna 2008, hwakasiya vanhu vakawanda vafa. Mukuru wesangano re Center for Natural Resources Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vaudza studio 7 kuti madzishe, masabhuku nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anosanganisira, Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, National Peace and Reconciliation Commission nemamwe vange vari pamusangano uyu. “Tiri kuti vanhu vekwaMarange inhapwa dzehurumende. Nzvimbo yeMarange iri kubirwa. Hurumende haisi kudzokera shure pakupamba hupfumi hwekwaMarange pasina ‘development’ iri kuitwa munzvimbo iyoyo,” VaMaguwu vaudza Studio 7. “Migwagwa yeko haifambike. Vana vari kufamba ‘10…15 kilometers’ kuinda kuchikoro.
