Hamuna makiriniki asi inzvimbo iri kuburitsa mangoda anoita mabhirioni emadhora gore negore.” VaMaguwu, avo vazobva pagungano iri zvechimbi chimbi vachitiza mapurisa, vati kana hurumende ikasakurumidza kubvumidza vanhu vemunharaunda iyi kuchera mangoda, vanhu pachavo vachazomisa kucherwa kwemangoda zvachose. No media source currently available
title: Vakaurayiwa kwaChiadzwa Kuminda yeMangoda Vorangarirwa

text: Varairidzi vari pasi pesangano reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, avo vave muMarondera vachifamba netsoka kubva kwaMutare kuenda kuHarare, vanoti neSvondo havana kufamba sezvo vakamirira kunzwa kuti vamwe vavo vari kutarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare neMuvhuro vachabuda sei. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano iri Amai Gaudencia Mandiopera vanoti vatorawo mukana wekuzorora pamwe nekusimbisa vamwe vavo vanosanganisira mutungamiri wesangano VaObert Masaraure pamwe neimwe nhengo yekomiti, VaRobson Chere, vari kutarisirwa kumira pamberi pedare Muvhuro mangwanani. Nhengo pfumbamwe dzesangano iri dzakasungwa neMugovera padzakasvika kuMacheke dzakazombochengetedzwa nemapurisa ekuMarondera asati avaisa mumaoko emagweta avo. Sangano iri rinoti nhengo dzaro dziri kufamba netsoka kubva kwaMutare kuenda kuHarare kunosvitsa zvichemo zvinosanganisira kuti varairidzi vatambiriswe mari yemadhora ekuAmerica, kwete kupihwa ma bond note. Amai Mandiopera vanotiwo vari kufadzwa nerutsigiro rwavari kuwana kubva kune vamwe vashandi vehurumende. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeARTUZ Dzakasungwa Dzomirira Kunzwa Zvichabuda muDare neMuvhuro

text:
Hurumende yazobvuma kuti yavhara kwemasvondo maviri guta rose reKwekwe zvichitevera kufa kwemunhu wemuguta iri nechirwere cheCovid-19 chemhando yekuIndia. Zvichitevera kuvharwa kwaitwa guta iri, vanhu vachange vachibvumidzwa kufamba kubva na 6 mangwanani kusvika nguva dza7 manheru. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu havachabvumidzwi kufamba munguva dzemanheru muKwekwe. Hurumende yatiwo kutanga nhasi, hapana munhu anobvumidzwa kushanyira zvikoro zve boarding, mabhizinesi anofanirwa kuvhurwa na 8 mangwanani uye achivharwa na 5pm. Mabhawa ose haasi kubvumidzwa kuvhura munguva yelockdown, uye michato nekunamata vanhu vakaungana, zvava kurambidzwawo kwemasvondo maviri. Vanenge vafirwa vanofanirwa kunge vaine munhu abva kubazi rezvehutano, uye vanhu vanoungana parufu havafanirwe kudarika makumi matatu. Vanhu vanopfuura nemuguta reKwekwe vari kukurudzirwa zvikuru kusamira muguta iri kwenguva yakareba. Gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantine Chiwenga, vati hurumende ichaenderera mberi nedzidziso yechirwere cheCovid-19, kucheneswa kwezvitoro nenzvimbo dzose dzinopindwa neveruzhinji. Nyaya yekuvharwa kweKwekwe yatanga kuburitswa padandemutande reTwitter nemunhu anozviti Jamwanda uyo veruzhinji vanoziva semutauriri wemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raVaCharamba panyaya iyi, kunyange hazvo vamwe muhurumende vabvuma kuti lockdown iyi ndeyechokwadi. Studio7 yabata mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe kana Kwekwe yava mulockdown, asi vati vakabatikana kuti vataure nesu sezvo vanga vari mumusangano. Asi mashoko aJamwanda ari paTwitter anoti izvi zvakaitirwa kubatsira kudzivirira vanhu vemuKwekwe mukupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 chemhando yakatanga kuChina. Asi mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vaudza Studio 7 kuti
vanga vasina ruzivo nezvedanho iri asi vakati vange vachitarisira kuti
hurumende ichaburitsa chiziviso chizere mukati mezuva ranhasi.

Meya veguta reKwekwe, Amai Angeline Kasipo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti
vanga vasati vaudzwa nezvelockdown iyi.

Sachigaro weWomen’s Coalition of Zimbabwe mudunhu reMidlands, Muzvare Locadia Mavhudzi, vati zvinhu zvinoshoreka chose kuti hurumende haizi kukwanisa kubuda pachena pazvinhu zvakakosha kudai.

Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari mugari wemuKwekwe, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende ipe veruzhinji mashoko
akakwana panguva dzose pamatanho airi kutora mukurwisa chirwere
cheCovid-19.

Vatiwo maonero avo ndeekuti kana kuchiitwa lockdown muKwekwe, mune
imwe nzvimbo kana munyika mose, zvakakosha kuti patange paitwa
ongororo inopa humbowo hwakakwana hwekuti zvakakodzera here kuita
izvi.

Mumiriri weparamende pasi pechikamu cheproportional representation
variwo nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Amai Jasmine
Toffa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoona zvakakodzera kuti muKwekwe muve
nelockdown.

Zvichakadaro, mumashoko ayakabudisa nezuro hurumende yakati
munyika mune vanhu vaviri vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 uye kusvika
pari zvino pave nevanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi masere nevashanu 1585 vafa nechirwere ichi kusvika pari zvino.

Pane vanhu makumi maviri nevatatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro uye
kusvika pari zvino pave nevanhu zviuru makumi matatu nezvisere
nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu nevashanu, 38635, vabatwa
nechirwere ichi munyika mose. Vanhu zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana manomwe nemakumi mana vakabaiwa nhomba yekutanga nezuro,izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga pazviuru mazana matanhatu negumi nezvishanu nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu, 615 296. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira apo hurumende ichabudisa mamiriro ezvinhu nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi,kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available
title: Kwekwe Inovharwa kweMasvondo Maviri naVaChiwenga

text: Amai Nancy Pelosi vebato reDemocratic Party rinopikisa riri kutonga muAmerica reRepublican Party, vakasarudzwa zvekare kuti vave mutauriri wedare reparamende reHouse of Representatives muAmerica. Amai Pelosi vakambova mutauriri zvekare kubva muna 2007 kusvika 2011 uye ndivo mudzimai wekutanga kuitwa mutauriri wedare iri uye munhu wekutanga mumakore makumi matanhatu kusarudzwa kechipiri kuita mutauriri wedare iri. Izvi zvinotevera kukunda zvine mutsindo musarudzo kwakaitwa nebato ravo muna Mbudzi gore rapera. Dare reHouse of Representatives rine nhengo mazana mana nemakumi matatu nemashanu uye maDemocrats ane nhengo mazana maviri nemakumi matatu nemashanu. MuSenate maRepublicans ane nhengo makumi mashanu nenhatu maDemocrats aine nhengo makumi mana nenomwe. Nhengo dzedare iri dzakatoreswa mhiko nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaMike Pence. Mudare iri mune madzimai zana kusanganisa Muzvare Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez vekuNew York vane makore makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe vanova munhu wechidiki zvakanyanya kusarudzwa, Amai Rashida Tlaib vekuMichigan naAmai Ilhan Omar vekuMinnesota vanova madzimai ekutanga echiMuslim kusarudzwa kuve nhengo dzeHouse of Representatives. Amai Deb Haaland Sharice vekuNew Mexico naAmai Davids vekuKansas ndivo madzimai maviri ekutanga nerudzi rwechiNative American kusarudzwa kupinda mudare iri. Bato remaRepublicans ndiro rine mutungamiri wenyika VaDonald Trump uye riri kukokera mudare reSenate. Muzvare Lucy Chivasa, igweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vari muno muAmerica pasi pechirongwa cheHubert Humphrey, uye vari kuMinnessota kune mudzimai wekutanga wechitendero chechiMuslim kusarudzwa mudare reSenate. Muzvare Chivasa vanoti chakanyanyokosha ndechekuti madzimai akasarudzwa kupinda mudare reparamende aya akatokwikwidzawo akakunda musarudzo, sevanhurumende vakakundawo. No media source currently available
title: Amai Pelosi Vanosarudzwa kePiri Kuve Mutauriri weDare reParamende reAmerica

text: Mukupera kwesvondo, dunhu reMasvingo rakanaya mvura isati yaonekwa kwemakore anosvika zana. Mvura iyi sezvayaita munzvimbo dzakawanda yaparadza hupenyu, zvipfuyo nezvivakwa. Asi kuhurumende yabva yava gangaidzwa kumukwenyi mhezi yavavira mudumbu nekuti vanhu munyika vagara vasina zvekudya nenzara yegore rapera uye ikozvino pabva paita rimwe dambudziko rinoda mari yakawandisa. Gurukota rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, Doctor Joram Gumbo, vanoti hurumende ichiri kudorongodza kuti pangadiwe mari yakawanda zvakadii asi vachiti pazvivakwa chete nemigwagwa panodiwa mabhiriyoni mashanu emadhora. Ko mari iyi inobva kupi kana hurumende yacho ichiti haina mari? VaGumbo vanoti vari kutarisira rubatsiro kubva kune vemabhizimisi, masangano akazvimirira uye hurumende dzekunze. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti migwagwa yemuHarare yave kuda kuti igadzirwe nechimbi chimbi. Izvi ndizvo zviri kunziwo zviitwe kuMasvingo nekune dzimwe nzvimbo dzekuMatabeleland dzakaita se Tsholotsho. Asi nekuda kwehutungamiri hutsva muAmerica, zvinhu zvinogona kuomera Zimbabwe. Mutungamiri weAmerica mutsva, VaDonald Trump, vanoti vanoda kudzikisa mari inopihwa dzimwe nyika nehurumende yavo voiendesa kumauto nekurwisa hugandanga. America ndiyo inopa Zimbabwe rubatsiro rwakawandisa zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, avo vanoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, vanoti kuparadzwa kwezvivakwa kunokanganisa zvikuru nyaya yezvehupfumi. VaChitambara vanotiwo hurumende yange yagara kwemakore isingagadzirewo zvivakwa zvayo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemumiriri weMutasa Central mudare reparamende, VaTrevor Saruwaka, avo vanoti hurumende yeZanu-PF haina hany'a nevanhu. VaSaruwaka vanoti mudunhu ravo kune zvakawanda zvakaparadzwa nemvura zvinoda kugadziriswa asi Zanu-PF inopedza mari ichiita bhavhudhe remutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Bhavhadhe raVaMugabe rinonzi rakadya mari inodarika madhora mamiriyoni maviri ane chidimbu.  Mari iyi yakawanda zvikuru zvekuti inogona kugadzirisa zvimwe zvivakwa. Asi mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vanoti hurumende iri kuyedza nepose painogona napo kugadzirisa dambudziko rawira nyika. Asi vanoti havo kuparadzwa kwemigwagwa kuri kukanganisa vemabhizimisi vachiti vazhinji havana kunge vaine insurance dzakaita sedzemafashamu. VaGumbo vanoti nyaya yezvirango yakatemerwa nyika ndiyo inopa kuti itatarike. Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaTendai Biti, vanoti kana migwagwa nezvivakwa zvisina kugadzirwa zvinopa kuti vekunze vanenge vachida kupinda munyika vafunge kaviri. VaBiti vanoti izvi zvakaipa nekuti hurumende yagara ichitatarika kukwezva vekunze.  VaBiti vanoti migagwa yakawanda yakapedzisira kugadzirwa munguva yeRhodesia. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti hadzitarisire kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchagadzikana kana zvivakwa zvisina kugadziriswa sezvo dzimwe nzvimbo dzasiiwa dziri zvitsuva.  No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yotsvaga Mabhiriyoni Mashanu Okugadzira Migwagwa Yaparadzwa neMafashamu

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoti zvinofadzwa nematanho enhaurirano akaparurwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nevemakereke, ekuti munyika muitwe nhaurirano dzemapoka ose ane chekugadzikana kwenyika. Asi vamwewo ndivo vanoti havafungi kuti VaMngangagwa vari kuita izvi nemwoyo wese, asi kuti vari kuda kubata kumeso vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica pamberi pemusangano weAfrican Union, uyo uri kuitwa muAdis Ababa kuEthiopia svondo rinouya. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vakatotumira nhume dzavo dzinoti vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaPerrance Shiri, kuKenya neTanzania, VaChristopher Mutsvangwa, kuZambia, pamwe naVaPatrick Chinamasa, kuBotswana neNamibia, kuti vafanopira mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. Ukuwo, mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, havana kupinda musangano wakashevedzerwa naVaMnangagwa uyu vachiti vanoda nhaurirano dzinotungamirwa nemunhu asina divi raakarerekera, kwete naVaMnangagwa vavari kupikisa kuti vakabira sarudzo. Nekune rimwe divi, VaMnangagwa havanawo kupinda musangano washevedzerwa nevemakereke nemusi weChina, asi kuti vanga vakamirirwa nasachigaro webato ravo reZanu PF, Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri. Mibvunzo yavepo ndeyekuti kana vaviri ava vachinzvengana, pane chichabuda here munhaurirano idzi, kunyange hazvo vamwe vatungamiri vemapato vakakwikwidza musarudzo vakapinda misangano iyi. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakarerekera kubato reZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu vanoti zvinhu zvakanaka chose kuti munyika matanga nhaurirano dzekutsvagana. Asi VaChirumhanzu vanoti chinozoshamisa ndechekuti vamwe vezvematongerwo enyika havadi kupinda mumisangano iyi, izvo zvinozoita kuti zvionekwe kuti havasi pachokwadi. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vari mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanotiwo chinhu chakanaka chose kuti munyika matanga nhaurirano, asi vanoti vanopokana nenyaya yekuti VaMnangagwa vave ivo vari kutungamira nhaurirano idzi. VaMaguwu vanoti kuti nhaurirano idzi dziite chimiro, dzinofanirwa kutungamirwa nevanhu vasina mativi avakarerekera, uye dzichiitirwa kunzvimbo isina anoti ndepake, kwete kunzvimbo yakaita seState House. No media source currently available
title: Nyaya yeNhaurirano Munyika Yoburitsa Maonero Akasiyanasiyana

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnagagwa vakasvika muVictoria Falls nezuro sezvo vari munyarikani pamusangano uri kuitwa mudhorobha iri weSouthern African Confederation of Agicultural Unions. Musangano uyu uri kutarisirwa kutanga nhasi. VaMnangagwa vakaendawo negurukota rinoona nezvekurima VaPerrance Shiri. Nyika dzinosvika gumi nenhatu dziri kutarisirwa pamusangano uyu dzichizeya nyaya dzekutengeserana mune zvekurima. Masangano anoti Zimbabwe Farmers Union neCommercial Farmers Union ndiwo akaronga musangano uyu. Panopera musangano uyu pari kutarisirwa kuti panenge pave sachigaro mutsva wesangano iri sezvo aripo ikozvino, Doctor Theo de Jager, vanenge voenda pamudyandigere. Muzvinafundo munyaya dzezvekurima VaMandivamba Rukuni vanoti musangano uyu wakakosha zvikuru kunyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica munyaya dzekutengeserana. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Voparura Musangano weZvekurima kuVictoria Falls

text: Dare raMejastiriri rekwaMutare nemusi weChipiri rakarasa danho rainge ratorwa nemapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police rekudzivisa sangano reChiadzwa Development Trust kana kuti CCDT kurangarira kuurayiwa kunonzi kwakaitwa vanhu munharaunda yavo panguva yakawanikwa mangoda munzvimbo iyi. Mapurisa nemauto anonzi akaparurwa chirongwa chainzi "Operation Hakudzokwi" muna 2008 apo vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vakapfurwa vakafa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuchera mangoda zvisiri pamutemo. Mandoda aya ainge aonekwa muna 2006. Sangano reHuman Rights Watch rinoti vanhu mazana maviri vakaurayiwa nemauto aibva kuMechanized Brigade, Fifth Brigade ne One Commando. Vamwe vanhu vanonzi vakarumiswa nembwa vamwe vachiitwa kafiramberi. Kurangarirwa kwevanonzi vakafa uye vakapona kuri kutarisirwa kuitwa musi wa 1 Mbudzi paBambazonke Business Centre kwaMarange. Sangano reCCDT rakazivisa mapurisa kuti raida kurangarira vanhu. Asi musi wa 14 Gumiguru sangano reCCDT rakawana tsamba kubva kumapurisa kuti vasaenderere mberi nemusangano uyu. Mapurisa aiti sangano reCCDT raifanira kuuya netsamba yekuti rakanyoreswa kubva kuMutare Rural District Council. Izvi zvakaita kuti gweta resangano iri riri nhengo yeZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights Amai Peggy Tavagadza vaende kudare. Vamwe vakaendeswa kudare igurukota rezvemukati menyika VaIgnatious Chombo, mukuru wemapurisa VaAugustine Chihuri uye mukuru wepakamba yemapurisa yeBambazonke. Vose ava vange vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora bumbiro remutemo. Amai Tavagadza vakati masangano akaita seCCDT haafanire kubatwa nemutemo wePublic Order and Security Act. Dare rakati zvainge zvaitwa nemapurisa zvainge zvisiri pamutemo. Mapurisa akanzi asavhiringidze musangano uyu. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rorambidza Mapurisa Kudzivirira Vanhu VekwaChiyadzwa Kurangarira Vakaurayiwa pa"Operation Hakudzokwi"

text: Mapato anopikisa ari pasi pegungano reNational Electoral Reform Agenda, Nera, akasangana muHarare neChina akaumba makomiti matatu achabatsira kufambisa nyaya dzekuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo ivandudzwe sarudzo dziri kutarisirwa gore rinouya dzisati dzaitwa. Mutauriri weNera, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanove zvakare munyori mukuru weMDC T, vanoti makomiti matatu aya achange achitungamirwa nevatungamiri vemapato ari muNera. Komiti ichange yakanangana nenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye ichange ichitungamirwa nemutungamiri webato reNational People’s Party, Amai Joice Mujuru. Komiti ichange ichiona nezvemitemo ichenge ichitungamirwa nemutungamiri webato rePeople’s Democratic Party, VaTendai Biti, kuchitiwo komiti yetatu, iyo ichange ichiona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika ichitungamirwa nemutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai. VaMwonzora vanoti musangano wanezuro uyu wakatambirawo zvakare tsamba yekukurudzira kuparadzwa kweboka rinoona nezvesarudzo, reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, vachiti yakarerekera kubato reZanu PF. Vanoti vakatambirawo tsamba inobva kuZec ichivakoka kumusangano svondo rinouya. Nera iri kugara yakanetsana neZec ichiti vanhu vari kutungamira munyaya dzesarudzo vari muZec, vanhu vari kushanda vakarerekera kuZanu PF. Ukuwo Zec inoti iri kuita basa rayo isina divi rayakarerekera sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika. Asi Nera inoti aya mashoko ekunatsa mukanwa eZec. No media source currently available
title: Nera Inoumba Makomiti Matatu

text: Mutungamiri werimwe bato rinopikisa muSouth Africa, re Economic Freedom Fighters, VaJulius Malema, vari kushora zvakasimba hurumende yenyika yavo mukuvhara kwayakaita mabhodha ayo makumi maviri ichiti iri kurwisana nekupararira kweCovid-19. VaMalema vaudza vatori venhau kuti kuvhara mabhodha hakuna zvakunobatsira kunze kwekuwomesera vanhu vemunyika dzakavakidzana neSouth Africa. Svondo rapera, mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vakazivisa kuti mabhodha makumi maviri avharwa, vachiti achavhurwa mwedzi unouya, waKukadzi. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaDewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanobvumirana naVaMalema nekuti zvave kuita sekuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chiri kuunzwa muSouth Africa nevanhu vanobva kuZimbabwe nevamwe vemunyika dzakapoteredza South Africa. VaMalema vati kuvhara mabhodha kupedza nguva uye inzira yekuedza kufadza vechichena vari munyika nekunze sezvo vachibvumidzwa kupinda nekubuda muSouth Africa pavanodira. No media source currently available
title: VaJulius Malema Vanoshora Kuvharwa kweMabhodha eSouth Africa

text: Zimbabwe yacherechedza zuva remauto neChipiri re National Defences Forces Day pahurongwa hwaitirwa ku National Sports Stadium. Vachitaura pahurongwa uhu, mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vati Zimbabwe inotenda zvikuru Pakistan iyo iri kubatsira zvikuru mukudzidzisa mauto emunyika. VaMugabe vati mauto ekuPakistan ari kudzidzisa mauto emu Zimbabwe pazvidzidzo zviri kuitirwa paNational Defence College pamwe nekuThornhill Air Base. VaMugabe varumbidza mabasa ari kuitwa nemauto emunyika vachiti mauto aya ari kuitawo basa rinodadisa kunze kwenyika. Vatiwo mauto emunyika akatumirwa ku Lesotho zvichitevera kusagadzikana kwainge kaitika munyika iyi. VaMugabe vatiwo chikoro che National Defence College chichavandudzwa kuti chive chikoro chepamusoro soro gore rino risati rapera hurongwa hwezuva rwacherechedzwawo mumatunhu ose ari munyika, makurukota anomirira matunhu achiverenga mashoko aVa Mugabe. Mudunhu reMashonaland West, mashoko aVa Mugabe averengwa negurukota redunhu iri, Va Faber Chidarikire. Vagari vakawanda muChinhoyi vanoti hapana chekupemberera sezvo vanhu vakawanda vasiri kufara nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi, pamwe nekutyorwa kwekodzero dzavo kunoitwa nemauto.
title: Zimbabwe Inocherechedza Zuva reMauto

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kukudzirwa kuti zvitevere kurudziro dzekudzivirira kubatwa nechirwere checoronavirus, icho chave kunzi Corona Virus Disease, 2019, kana kuti COVID-2019, dziri kupiwa nemapoka ehutano munyika dzazvigere, kuitira kuderedza mikana yekuti zvibatwe nechirwere ichi. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe uye vari sachigaro vesangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Fortune Nyamande, avo vari kuSweden, vanoti nyika imwe neimwe iri kuburitsa mashoko ekushambadza nzira dzekuti vanhu vange vachizvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere ichi. Doctor Nyamande vanoti izvi zvakakosha zvikuru kuvana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika kuitita kuti vazive mamiriro akaita chirwere ichi munyika dzavagere. COVID-2019 inonzi yauraya vanhu vanodarika chiuru nezana muChina uye vaviri kunze kwenyika yakatangira chirwere ichi iyi. Vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi mana nezvishanu muChina chete vanonziwo vabatwa nechirwere ichi, kunyange hazvo zviri kunzi kupararira kwacho kwadzikira munyika iyi. No media source currently available
title: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze Zvokurudzirwa Kunzwisisa Dzidziso Pamusoro peCOVID-2019

text: Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti zvakaitwa nevechidiki veZanu PF zvekuparura chirongwa chekutsvaga rutsigiro padandemutande chinhu chakanaka chose, sezvo zvichiita kuti vanhu vasashungurudzwa vachimanikidzwa kuenda kumisangano. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Citizens Initiative, VaPromise Sande, vanoti zvakanaka chose kana chete zvisingazoshandiswe mukushungurudza vamwe pamadandemutande. Vechidiki veZanu PF neMugovera vakaparura chirongwa chavo chepadandemutande che #EDhasMYVOTE, icho chakanangana nekutsvagira rutsigiro mutungamiri webato ravo VaEmmerson Mnangagwa musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa gore rino. Vechidiki ava vanonzi vakatsinhirawo kuti sebato havachashandisa ma slogan anoti pasi nemumwe munhu, vachiti danho iri rakatotambirwa nehutungamiri hweZanu PF. VaSande vanotiwo danho rebato reZanu PF rekusiyana netsika yekuti 'pasi nanhingi' rakanaka chose, sezvo vanhu vachiziva kuti kana munhu akanzi pasi naye zvinenge zvichireva kuti ngaaurayiwe. No media source currently available
title: Chirongwa cheVechidiki veZANU PF Chekutsvaga Rutsigiro paDandemutande Chopembedzwa

text:
Vaimbove varwiri vehondo yerusununguko vabatana nevana vavo vachiratidzira muChinhoyi kusafara kwavo nekudhonzerana masimba kwavati kuri kuitika mubato ravo reZanu PF. Vachitaura nhasi kuvana vevaimbove varwiri vehondo yerusununguko pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Liberation War Collaborators Trust, ZILIWACO Trust, avo vanga vakaungana panzvimbo yakaiswa nhoroondo yematangiro ehondo yeChimurenga yechipiri pedyo nemarinda anovigwa magamba edunhu muChinhoyi, mukuru wevaimbove varwiri verusununguko mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaConillius Muoni, vati nyaya yekunetsana muZanu PF yadzika midzi zvakadzama. Vati makakatanwa ari muZanu PF anofanirwa kupera sezvo ari kuvhiringa mashandiro akanaka ebato iri. VaMuoni vatiwo dai vanhu vakaita zvipoka nezvipoka zvaidhonzerana masimba munguva yehondo, dai nyika isina kutorwa kubva kuvachena. Kunetsana kwaburitswa pamusangano wanhasi kunouya mushure mekunge bepanhau reThe NewsHawks raburitsawo nyaya yekuti kune vamwe vakuru vakuru muZanu PF vasiri kufara nehutungamiri hweZanu PF, vachiti VaMnangagwa, vakaita kuti kongiresi yaifanirwa kuitwa muna 2019, isaitwe. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vakapinda panyanga mushure me extraordinary congress yakaitwa muna 2017 mushure mekunge mauto apidigura vaive mutungamiri wenyika panguva iyi, muchakabvu Robert Mugabe. Pasi pemitemo yeZanu PF, kongiresi chaiyo yaifanirwa kuitwa muna 2019, asi yakamiswa kuitwa ichinzi ichaitwa muna 2022. Nokudaro zvinonzi VaMnangagwa havana masimba ekutungamira Zanu PF pari zvino sezvo temu yavo yakapera muna 2019 paifanirwa kuitwa kongiresi dai VaMugabe vakaramba vari pachigaro. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, kanawo kumuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubato iri, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, se3zvo vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha dzavo.

VaMuoni vati kunyange muZanu PF muine zvikwata zviri kurwira masimba, Zanu PF ichatonga kusvika madhongi amera nyanga. VaMuoni vati vatungamiri vemapato anopikisa zviri nani kwavari kuti vapinde muZanu PF nekuti vachachembera vasina kutonga.

Vachitaurawo pachiitiko chanhasi, sachigaro weZILIWACO mudunhu
reMashonaland West, VaKudzanai Matenga, vati havasi kufara kuti vari kutorerwa minda kana vabereki vavo vafa vachiti izvi hazvina kunaka.

Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo,
vati mashoko evaimbove varwiri verusununguko aya agara achitaurwa
nevashoma vavo uye anoratidza humbimbindoga.

Mukuru wePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vati
nyaya yekuti nyika inofanirwa kutungamirirwa neZanu PF chete uye
nemunhu akurisa ipfungwa dzinodzosera nyika kumashure.

Sangano reZILIWACO rabudawo nechisungo chekuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ndivo vachakwiwidza vakamirira bato reZanu PF musarudzo dza2023. Chiitiko chanhasi change chiri chekurangarira basa rakaitwa nevarwiri verusununguko, uye chatanga nekufamba kwevanhu vachibva muguta kusvika kumarinda anovigwa magamba muChinhoyi apo vatauri vakawanda vanga vachipa pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pehondo yerusununguko. No media source currently available
title: Zanu PF Yoita Makakatanwa eMasimba?

text: Vanhu vakawanda kuMasvingo vanoti mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, munhu asina chiremera kana zvichienzaniswa nemudzimai wekutanga wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Sally Mugabe, avo vakashaya muna 1992. Kune dzimwe nyika mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, mudzimai ane hunhu nechimiro chinoremekedzwa. Asi vanhu vakawanda kuMasvingo vanoti mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, munhu asina chiremera kana zvichienzaniswa nemudzimai wekutanga wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Sally Mugabe, avo vakashaya muna 1992. No media source currently available Muzvare Grace Marufu vakatanga kushanda kuhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachiita basa rekudaira foni, vachidziendesa kumahofisi evanhu vanoshanda mumahofisi emutungamiri wenyika. Pavakapinda basa kuhofisi iyi, Muzvare Marufu vaive nemurume, VaStanley Goreraza, avo vavakaita naye mwanakomana, Russell Goreraza. Nekupindana kwemazuva, VaGoreraza naMuzvare Marufu vanonzi vakatanga kunetsana, izvo zvakasiya muchato wavo uri parumana nzombe. VaGoreraza, avo vaive Wing Commander mu Air Force of Zimbabwe, vakaendeswa kunoshanda vari kumuzinda weZimbabwe muChina. Nekupindana kwemazuva, runyerekupe rwakatanga kubuda kuti Muzvare Marufu vakanga vodanana nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Vanoziva zvaiitika vanoti Muzvare Marufu vakanga votodaidzwa nerekuti Mainini, vachireva kuti vaive mukadzi mudiki wemutungamiri wenyika, sezvo Amai Sally Mugabe, vakange vachiri vapenyu. Mumakore akatevera, Muzvare Marufu vakaita mwana naVaMugabe, Bona. Izvi zvakachengetedzwa muchivande, nyika isingazvizive. Nekupindana kwenguva, mwana wechipiri akaberekwa, Robert Junior, uye nyika haina kuziviswa. Nyika yakazoziviswa nezvevana ava, kwete naVaMugabe kana Muzvare Marufu, asi kuti nebepanhau reHorizon muna Kurume 1995. Bepanhau iri rakaburitsa mufananidzo waBona achibva pachikoro chiri muHarare, aine muchengetedzi, VaOnismo Zindoga. Mushure mekuburitswa kwenyaya iyi, VaMugabe naMuzvare Marufu vakazochata muna 1996, makore mana Amai Sally Mugabe vashaya. Hazvina kujeka kuti muchato wavo naVaGoreraza wakazopera seyi, kunyange hazvo paine nyaya dzakabuda dzekuti muchato uyu wainge wagurwa kare. Izvi zvakarwadza vanhu vakawanda, asi vamwe vakatiwo Muzvare Marufu vainge vazvibatira goridhe. Vanhu vakasiyana siyana kuMasvingo vanoti hunhu hwa Amai Mugabe hunoshoreka zvikuru pane kuti huyemurike semudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika. Vanoti izvi zvakawedzerwa pavakapinda mune zvematongerwe enyika izvo zvakakaita kuti vazhinji vaone zvavari chaizvo. Vanoti Amai Mugabe pose pavanoita misangano yebato ravo, iyo iri kukosheswa zvikuru kupfuura misangano yevatevedzeri vaviri vemutungamiri wenyika, vanotanga kupopota nekutuka vamwe vatungamiri vemasangano vakasiyanan-siyana, kusanganisirawo vebato Zanu PF, pane kuti vawanikwe vachitaura mashoko ekuvaka nekukurudzira kubatana kwevanhu munyika. Va Prosper Tiringindi mugari wekuRujeko. VaTiringidi vanoti zvinoitwa nemukadzi wemutungamiriri wenyika zvinonyadzisa pane kuti zviyemurike. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, Va Takavafira Zhou, vanoti Amai Grace Mugabe vakasiyna namuchakabvu Sally Mugabe. Vanoti Amai Grace Mugabe havana pfungwa dzemunhu mukuru dzakadzama saka vanoda kutobetserwa kuti vave nechimiro chakanaka sezvo vari munhu anogara akarasika. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna Amai Grace Mugabe kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi Muzvare Tsitsi Moyo, avo vanogara mumusha wekwa Majange kuMasvongo, vanotiwo zvinoitwa nemudzimai wemutungamiriri wenyika zvinoshoresa uye zvinovagumbura. Muzvare Moyo vanoratidza kusafa chose nemasimukiro akaita Amai Mugabe kubva pavakaitwa mutungamiri we madzimai muZanu PF gore rapfuura, mushure mekutenderera nenyika vachiita misangano iyo vaituka vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, Amai Joyce Mujuru. Vanhu vazhinji vanoti kunyange mhuri yekutanga ichishora vamwe vanhu vanoita zvehupombwe uye tsika dzakaipa, kudanana nekuroorana kwavakaita Amai Sally Mugabe vachiri vapenyu kunoshoreka zvikuru. Kunze kwe izvi, Amai Grace Mugabe vanozivikanwa pasi rose nembiri yekuda kuchena nekutenga zvinhu zvinodhura izvo zvakaita kuti vapiwe zita remadunhurirwa rekuti Gucci iro rinobva pane zita rembatya dzinodhura. Mumwe mugari anoongorora zvematongerwe enyika, VaMugovera Makonese, vanoti nenyaya yembiri yekuda zvinodhura uye kungofachura mari vanhu vachitambura, zvinobudisa pachena kuti Amai Grace Mugabe havana moyo wehumai hunoremekedzeka. Kunyange vamwe vanotsigria Zanu PF vachiti Amai Grace Mugabe vanokodzera kuremekedzwa semudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, ruzhinji rwevanhu muongororo yakaitwa ne Studio 7 vanoti Amai Grace Mugabe vanoshoresa zita remutungamiriri wenyika pamwe nenyika yose, uye maitiro avo ndeekupesanisa vanhu, izvo zvinosiyana namuchakabvu Sally Mugabe. Veruzhinji vasingadi kubuda pachena muZanu PF vanoti dai Amai Sally Mugabe vanga vachiri vapenyu, kupatsanuka kuri kuitika muZanu PF kusina kuitika nokuti muchakabvu aive mai venyika vaibatanidza vanhu.
title: Voruzhinji Vobvunza Kana Amai Grace Mugabe Vachikodzera Kuremekedzwa

text: Vemabhizimusi muguta reBulawayo vakabatana nemamwe masangano akasiyanasiyana emuguta iri vasangana nevakuru vekanzuru yeguta iri kuti vazeye nezvematambudziko avanoti ari kukonzerwa nekuvharwa kwemvura, uko kunonzi kwatora nguva yakareba. Mukuru wesangano rinomirira vemabhizimusi, reAssociation for Business in Zimbabwe, (ABUZ), VaVictor Nyoni, vanoti kuvharwa kwevhura uku kwave kukanganisa mafambisirwo emabhizimusi akawanda sezvo nhengo dzavo dzichida mvura mukuita mabasa adzo zuva nezuva. VaNyoni vanoti vavimbiswa nevakuru vekanzuru vavasangana navo kuti vatarisire kuwana mvura kutanga kwesvondo rinouya, sezvo kanzuru iri kutarisira kupedza basa rairi kuita mukupera kwesvondo. Guta reBulawayo rinonzi rapinda musvondo repiri risina mvura zvichitevera danho riri kutorwa nekanzuru rekugadzirisa michina inopomba mvura paCriterion Water Works. Izvi zvinonzi zvasanganawo nekuderera kwemvura mumadhamu anowanisa guta iri mvura eCriterion neMagwegwe pamwechete nekunetsa kwemagetsi ekuti mvura ikwanise kupombwa. VaNyoni vanoti zvinozivikanwa kuti guta reBulawayo rave nemakore anodarika zana nemakumi maviri, zvekuti michina nepombi dzemvura zvachembera. Vanoti hurumende nekanzuru zvinofanirwa kutora matanho ekugadzirisa dambudziko iri kuti ripere zvachose. Studio7 yakundikana kunzwa divi rekanzuru panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Vemabhizimusi Vochemachema neKuvharwa kweMvura muBulawayo

text: Apo chikamu chekutanga chekubaya vanhu nhomba munyika chave kusvika kumagumo, vamwe vatori venhau vabayiwawo nhomba iyi mumaguta akasiyana siyana. Vatapi venhau vane chitsama vanoshandira makambani akasiyana-siyana kusanganisira mamwe ehurumende, vabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere checovid-19 muBulawayo. Izvi zvaitika mushure mekunge kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo ichishanda pamwe nebazi rezvehutano yatara zuva ranhasi sezuva rekuti vatapi venhau vange vachida kubaiwa nhomba iyi vabaiwe. Mumwe wevatapi venhau vabaiwa ndiAbigail Khupe uyo audza Studio7 kuti akamborwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 saka atora danho rekuti abaiwe senzira yekuedza kuzvidzivirira iye pamwe nemhuri yake. Mumwewo mutapi wenhau Muzvare Tanaka Gumbo ati aona zvakanaka kuti abaiwe nhomba sezvo achiziva kuti basa rake rinoita kuti asangane nevanhu vakawanda izvo zvinoita kuti ave panjodzi yekubatwa nechirwere checovid-19. Muzvare Gumbo vati vanhu havafanirwe kutya kubaiwa sezvo nhomba dzose dziripo dzakatambirwa neWorld Health Organisation, kana kuti WHO, uye dzakaitwa navana mazvikokota munyaya dzezvehutano. Muaturiri wekanzuru yeguta reBulawayo, Amai Nesisa Mpofu, vaudza Studio7 kuti kanzuru ichishanda pamwe nebazi rezvehutano yanga yasendeka parutivi zuva ranhasi kuti vatapi venhau vabaiwe sezvo vari vamwe vevanhu vanoita basa rakakosha. Vakafanobata chigaro chaProvincial Medical Director wedunhu reBulawayo, Dr Wecome Mlilo, vati havasi kukwanisa kutaura kuti vanhu vangani vabaiwa kusvika pari zvino mudunhu reBulawayo asi vati vane chokwadi chekuti vachakwanisa kusvika pavanhu vanopfuura zviuru zvitanhatu vavanotarisira kuti vabaiwe nhomba. Mukuru wezvehutano mdunhu reMatabeleland North, Dr Munekayi Padingani, vati kubaiwa nhomba kwevanhu mudunhu iri kwakati nonokei kutanga sezvo vanhu vange vasati vave neruzivo rwakakwana. Asi vati kusvika nezuro pane vanhu vanopfuura zviuru zviviri vange vabaiwa nhomba iyi mudunhu ravo. Taedza kunzwa kubva kumutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, kuti chirongwa ichi chiri kufamba sei munyika mose sezvo vati vange vari mumusangano. Chikamu chekutanga chekubaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere checovid-19 chakatanga munyika svondo rapera chakanangana nevashandi vanoshanda mune zvehutano, vechiuto nemapurisa pamwe nevanoshanda kumabhodha enyika. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti yainge yabaya vanhu zviuru makumi maviri nechimwe nemazana mana nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, 21456, vakanga vabayiwa nhomba iyi kusvika mukupera kwezuva nezuro. No media source currently available
title: Chirongwa cheNhomba yeCovid-19 Chonanaira seRwaivhi

text: Vakafanobata chinzvimbo chemutungamiriri wenyika, Retired General Constantine Chiwenga, vaparura neChitatu mwaka wekutengesa fodya vachiti fodya yave kupinda muchirongwa cheCommand Agriculture mumwaka unotevera. Mumashoko avo pachiitiko ichi chaitirwa pamusika wefodya weTSF, VaChiwenga vati fodya yakakosha chose uye hurumende yavo ichatsigira kurimwa kwefodya senzira yekuvandudza hupfumi pamwe nekusimudzira magariro evanhu munyika. Vati fodya inounza mari yekunze yakawanda sezvo zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe nesere kubva muzana zvefodya yese inorimwa munyika ichitengwa nenyika dzekunze. Nekuda kwaizvozvo, VaChiwenga vati hurumende ichatangawo kutsigira kurimwa kwefodya pasi pechirongwa chayo cheCommand Agriculture apo varimi vanopihwa mbeu, fotireza, mishonga nezvimwe vozobhadhara kana vachinge vatengesa zvirimwa zvavo. Pari zvino makambani akazvimirira ndiwo anotsigira zvikamu makumi masere nezviviri zvevarimi vefodya nembeu fotireza nezvimwe. Chirongwa cheCommand Agriculture chavevo kusanganisira varimi vemombe, gorosi hove nezvimwe. Pavhurwa musika mutengo wepamusoro soro wange uri pa$4.99 pakirogiramu, kozotiwo mutengo wepasi wange uripa $1.34 pakirogiramu imwe chete. Amai Tsitsi Nyirenda, avo vanorima vari kuGoromonzi vaudza Studio7 kuti vafara nemutengo wanhasi. VaBurzil Zenda vekuTengwe kuKaroi vanotiwo vafadzwa nemutengo wanhasi. Mumwe murimi, Amai Batsirai Handiseni, vaudza Studio7 kuti mutengo wanhasi wakanaka uye vanotarisisa mutengo wakakwira kune vaya vanenge vaine fodya yakanaka. Sachigaro wekambani yehurumende inoona nezvekutengeswa kwefodya, yeTobacco Industries Marketing Board (TIMB),Amai Monica Chinamasa, vakurudzira varimi kuti vazvibate pamusika musika kuratidzira kana vachinge vasina kufara. Amai Chinamasa vati huwandu hwevarimi vefodya hwakwira nezvikamu makuma mana nezvitatu kubva muzana kusvika pa118 549. Vakurudzira varimi kuti vatevedze zvavanoudzwa nemadhumeni kuti vawane goho rakanaka nemari yakawanda apo vanotengesa fodya yavo. Pane misika mitatu yefodya inoti TSF, Boka nePremium. Makambani anotenga fodya akazvimirira kana kuti maContract Buyers,achatanga kutenga fodya mangwana. Zvinotarisirwa kuti pachatengeswa makirogiramu efodya anodarika mamiriyoni mazana miviri mwaka uno izvo zvichaunza mari yekunze inodarika mamiriyoni mazana mashanu emadhora. No media source currently available
title: Kutengeswa kweFodya Kunotanga Varimi Vakawanda Vachifarira Mutengo Wayo

text: Mutungamiri we MDCT, Va Morgan Tsvangirai, vatambirwa zvine mutsindo mukati apo vashanyira musha unogara veruzhinji weEpworth. No media source currently available Musha uyu uri kumahombekombe kweHarare kumabvazuva kwakadziva kuchamhembe. VaTsvangirai vaenda kuEpworth kuitira kuti vanozviwonera vega pamhino sefodya magariro ari kuita vanhu ikoko. VaTsvangirai vatambirwa nemufaro apo vapinda munzvimbo nhatu dzemu Epworth dzinoti Pentagon, Solani pamwe neOverspill uko vanzwa matambudziko ari kusangana nevagari vemunharaunda iyi. Amai Lilian Maphosa vanogara ku Overspill vanoti chiri kunyanya kunetsa inyaya yepekugara sezvo dzimba zhinji dzakapwanywa nehurumende gore rapera vachiti vamwe vanhu vari kurara panze. Vanotiwo mamwe matumba ari kugara vanhu ari kuputsika nekunaya kuri kuita mvura mazuvano sezvo matumba aya akavakwa zvisina kusimba sezvo vanhu vari kutya kuti vakashandisa mari yakawanda mukuvaka dzimba vanogona kumuka vapwanyirwa dzimba dzavo nehurumende. Hurumende inoti dzimba zhinji dziri mu Epworth dzakavakwa zvisiri pamurawu. Hurumende inoti veruzhinji vanofanira kuvaka dzimba munzvimbo dzakatarwa nemakanzuru kuti ndzidzo dzinovakirwa dzimba. Mumwe mugari weku Pentagon, Va Shelton Java, vanotiwo hutano hwevanhu vazhinji hwave munjodzi sezvo vanhu vasina pekugara ava vachiitira tsvina pesepese nepamusana pekushaikwa kwezvimbuzi. Va Java vanotiwo vanhu vazhinji vari kunwa mvura isina kushambidzika yavanochera murukova, Jacha, rwunoerera tsvina inenge yaitwa nevanhu. Zvichakadai, Va Tsvangirai vati hurumende inofanira kubuda pachena panyaya yebhodhi rekanzuru yeEpworth kuti riri pasi pekanzuru ye Ruwa here kana kuti ye Harare kuitira kuti pave newekubvunza kana zvinhu zvaita manyama amire nerongo mu Epworth. Vatiwo chiri kunyanyakunetsa ndechekuti hurumende iripo pari zvino haina hany'a nevanhu vachiti kusamira kwakaita hupfumi munyika pamwe nemagariro evanhu kuri kukonzerwa nehurumende isina hurongwa hwekuvadzudza zvinhu munyika. Vati bato ravo richatora matanho nekukasika ekubatsira vagari veku Epworth zvikurusei panyaya yekuwaniswa kwemvura yakachena. Sezvavanowanzogarotaura nguva nenguva, Va Tsvangirai vakurudzira kuti vatsigiri vavo kuti vasaite zvemhirizhonga kunyange vakadenhwa nenhengo dze Zanu PF. Munzvimbo dzese dzavafamba mu Epworth, Va Tsvangirai vatambirwa nemufaro mukuru nevanotengesa mumisika pamwe nevanhu vanga vari mumigwagwa.
title: VaTsvangirai Vanotambirwa Zvine Mutsindo muEpworth

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muLondon kuBritain zvinodarika zana zvaratidzira pamahofisi anga achiitirwa musangano wekupemha mari pakati pegurukuro rezvemari VaPatrick Chinamasa nevemabhizimusi vemunyika iyi. Nhengo dzemasangano eZimbabwe Vigil neRestoration of Human Rights, ROHR, dzinonzi dzanga dzichiimba pamwe nekunyomba VaChinamasa dzichiratidzira pamusoro pekuparara kwaita hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nekushaikwa kwemari inonzi yakabva kumangoda. Chiitiko ichi chinonzi chatyisa VaChinamasa zvikuru, mushure mekunge vavharirwa kwenguva nechidimbu mumotokari yanga ichiedza kuvatakura kubva pamusangano uyu. VaFungayi Mabhunu, vanove murongi wemabasa muZimbabwe Vigil uye vari sachigaro weRestoration of Human Rights muCentral London vanoti mapurisa ndiwo atozokwanisa kubviswa vanhu vanga vachiratidzira ava avo vanonzi vanga varara mumugwagwa vachivharira motokari iyi. “Vanhu vari kuti taneta nemi. Munoba mari dzedu uko asi mouya muchida kupemha mari kuno, tiri kuti $15 billion yedu iripi?” VaMabhunu vanodaro. Vamwe vanonzi vapinda mumusangano wekudza kukwezva vemabhizimusi uyu ndava Tendai Biti, vanove mutungamiri webato re PDP, uye vaive gurukota rezvemari munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa. “VaTendai Biti vatouya vachitikwasiza vachiti vari kuda kuudza musangano uyu chokwadi nekuti VaChinamasa vari kunyepera vanhu kuti zvinhu zvakanaka muZimbabwe izvo zvisina,” VaMabhunu vanoti VaBiti vatovatsigisa vachiti varambe vachiudza vanhu chokwadi. No media source currently available Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanove nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachitungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe vanoti havaoni VaChinamasa vachibuda nechinhu mukupemha kwavo, sezvo Zimbabwe iri kukundikana kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo. “Zimbabwe yakatemerwa zviga nemasangano akaita seIMF neWorld Bank zvekuti itange yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvinosvika $1.8 billion, saka kuti ndione VaChinamsa vachiwana chekubata handifungi kudaro,” Doctor Kanyenze vanodaro. Vachinamasa pamwe nagavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Doctor John Mangudya nechikwata chavo vari kupemha mari kunyika dzeku Europe uko vashanyira nyika dzinoti Sweden, France neBritain. KuFrance chikwata ichi chinonzi chakasangana nevemabhizimusi pamwe nemamwe masangano vanonzi vane chido chekutanga mabhizimusi munyika. No media source currently available
title: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri muLondon Zvopinda Muzuva Repiri Zvichionesa VaChinamasa Chitsvuku

text: Panguva iyo ruzhinji rwuri kuchema kuti rwuri kunonga svosve nemuromo munyika, mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe nemhuri yavo, vanonzi vari kunze kwenyika, kure kure, kumabvirazuva, uko kwavanonzi vari kuzororo remwedzi wose vachipfachura. Vemapato anopikisa kusanganisira VaObert Gutu vanove mutauriri weMDC T, vanoti nekuoma kwezvinhu munyika, mutungamiri wenyika angadai akaratidza hubaba hwake nekuramba kuenda kunze kwenyika kuzororo achisiya vana vachizhamba nenzara. VaGutu vanoti munyika mune nzvimbo dzakawanda dzekushanyira nekudyira mari, pane kuenda kumhiri kwemakungwa nechikwata chevanhu chinosanganisira mukuwasha nevanakomana vavo. “Mari iri kudyiwa naVaMugabe iyoyo imari yaikwanisa kutengera vanhu chikafu, kubatsira mhuri dzakawanda dziri kutadza kuendesa vana kuzvikoro kana kupa vashandi muhoro,” VaGutu vanodaro. VaMugabe vakaenda kunze kwenyika vachisiya vashandi vehurumende vasati vatambira mihoro yavo yemwedzi yaZvita pamwechete nemabhonasi avaifanirwa kunge vakawaniswa muna Mbudzi wegore rapera. Vamwe ndivo vanoti mari yakashandiswa nemutungamiri wenyika nemhuri yavo, iyo isingazivikanwi kuti yakawanda zvakadii sezvo isingataurwe, inofanirwa kuziviswa kuvana veZimbabwe sezvo iri mari yemitero yavo. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF vachiongorora zvematongerwo enyika VaGadzira Chirumhanzu vanoti havaoni paine chakaipa pakuenda kwaVaMugabe kuzororo kwavanoda sezvo mari yavanoshandisa iri mari inotarwa nemutemo wenyika. “Ivava vanaVaGutu kuparamende kwavanoenda uku ndivo vakavhotera kuti mutungamiri wenyika apiwe mari yaanoshandisa,” VaChirumhanzu vanodaro. Vanoti hapana nyika pasi rose dzinotaura bhajeti remutungamiri wenyika, saka Zimbabwe haifanirwe kuve iyo yekutanga kuita izvi. Chimwe chinonzi chiri kunyanyobata vamwe vanhu kunyararwa kwezviri kuitika kuna VaMugabe ikoko, izvo zvinonzi zvave kukonzera kuti vamwe, zvikuru vanonyora mumadandemutande, vanyore mashoko akasiyanasiyana pamusoro pehutano hwavo. Asi mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba, vakaramba mashoko ekuti VaMugabe vari kurwa. Gore roga roga VaMugabe vanoenda kumabvazuva kuzororo asi nguva zhinji panosimudzwa mitauro yakafanana neyehutano hwavo iyi. No media source currently available
title: Zororo raVaMugabe Mhiri kweMakungwa Rokonzera Mutauro

text: Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, avo vanonzi vakambomiswa basa, vanoti vacharamba vachitaura vakamirira bato vachiti musangano wakaitwa neChina, hauna kuitwa pachitevedzerwa bumbiro remitemo yebato ravo. Vachitaura mushure memusangano weNational Council yakaitwa neChina, mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC-T, VaMorgen Komichi, vakati VaGutu vakamiswa basa vachipomerwa mhosva yekubiritsa mashoko anopesana negwara remusangano. Asi VaGutu vati zviri kutaurwa izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro vachiti bumbiro remitemo harina kutevedzerwa pakaitwa musangano wabuda nechisungo chekumbovamisa basa. Nokudaro, VaGutu vanoti ndivo vacharamba vachitaura vakamirira bato. Munyori mukuru muMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati havakwanise kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vachiti musangano wakaitwa neChina wakavarambidza kutaura vakamirira bato munyaya dzakadai. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naMuzvare Tabitha Khumalo avo vari kunzi ndivo vave kufanobata matomhu aVaGutu kuti tinzwe divi panyaya iyi. MuMDC-T mune kusawirirana kwekuti ndiyani otora chinzvimbo chevaimbova mutungamiri webato zvichitevera kushayika kwakaita VaMorgan Tsvangirai mwedzi wapera. Musangano weNational Council wakaitwa neChina wakasarudza VaNelson Chamisa kuve mutungamiri webato azere asi vamwe mubato iri vakaita semutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, vanoti panofanirwa kuitwa kongiresi yechimbichimbi yekusarudza mutungamiri webato mutsva. Muzvare Khupe vanoti ndivo vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato kudzamara vaenda kukongiresi mushure memwedzi gumi nemiviri. No media source currently available
title: Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, Vanoti Ndivo Vachiri Mutauriri weBato

text: Gungano reSanganai/Hlanganani iro rinosanganisa vemabhizimisi nevamwe vanhu vanoita mabasa ane chekuita nezvekushanyirana, rakatanga nemusi weChina i muBulawayo vamwe vevanhu vachiti vari kufara kuti gungano iri radzorwa kuguta iri. Gungano reSanganai/Hlanganani iri ndere chipfumbamwe kubva pakatanga kuitwa chirongwa ichi munyika uye richavhurwa zviri pamutemo nemusi weChishanu manheru nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaPhelekezela Mphoko. Vamwe veavo vataura neStudio 7 ndeavo vane dzimba dzinogarwa nevashanyi kana kuti ma lodge pamwe nevanoshambadza nekutengesa nzvimbo dzinokwanisa kushanyirwa nevanhu vemunyika pamwe nevekunze. Muzvare Juliet Shangare avo vanoshandira nzvimbo yekushanyira yeAntelope Park iri kunze kweguta reGweru vati kudzorwa kwegungano reSanganai/Hlanganani muguta reBulawayo kuchaita kuti vanhu vakawanda vazive nezvakembani yavo. VaItai Chitambo avo vanoshanda neimwe kambani inoita zvekushambadza nzvimbo dziri munyika dzekushanyira vatiwo kuitwa kwegungano iri muBulawayo kuchavapa mukana wekuti vazive dzimwe nzvimbo dzekushanyira dziri muBulawayo pamwe nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza guta iri. Mukuru mukuru weZimbabwe Tourism Authority vaKarikoga Kaeseke vakataurira vatori venhau nezuro kuti sangano ravo iro rinove ndiro rinoronga gungano iri, rakaona zvakakodzera kudzora chirongwa ichi muguta reBulawayo senzira yekuedza kusimudzira mabhizimisi ezvekushanya sezvo Bulawayo nedunhu reMatabeleland dziri nzvimbo dzine dzimwe nzvimbo dzekushanyira dzine mukurumbira kana pasi rose. Mune imwewo nyaya musangano wekomiti yeparamende yezvekutongwa kwematunhu wekunzwa kubva kuvanhu pamusoro pebhiri reLocal government laws amendment Act wakaitwa kuBulawayo nemusi weChitatu hauna kuzopera zvakanaka mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu vaivepo pamusangano uyu vakatanga kuimba vachishora gurukota rezvematunhu vaSavior Kasukuwere. Mumwe wevagari vakauya pamusangano uyu VaEarthman Zhou vakati vanhu vari kutsutsumwa pamusoro pekuti bhiri iri rinotaura chete nezvekuti makanzura anodzingwa sei pazvigaro zvawo risingakoshesi nyaya yekuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu kana kuti devolution. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kushora bhiri rezvekutongwa kwematunhu iri vachiti rinosiya zvinhu zvakawanda zvakakosha panyaya yekutongwa kwematunhu vachitiwo bhiri iri rinoramba rakaisa masimba akawanda mumaoko egurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu izvo zvisingawirirane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. No media source currently available
title: Musangano weSanganai/Hlanganani Wotanga muBulawayo

text: Mumwe Mufundisi weAssemblies of Pentecostal Methodists, anoimba nziyo dzechitendero Reverend Togarepi Tapera Chivariro vapa sangano re Alive Albinism Initiative mvumo yekutora dambarefu ravo rinonzi Tsitsi Dzake iHuru rakatsikiswa munaChikumi gore rino. VaChivariro vanozivikanwa nenziyo yavo yakaita mukurumbira inonzi Ebenezer -Tiri munyasha vanova munyarikani kana kuti goodwill ambassador wesangano reAlive Albinism Intiative vanoti mushure mekuona kuti mari iri kunetsa kuunganidza kubatsira vasope vakaona zvakakodzera kupa damba refu ravo iri kusangano rinovamiririra. VaChivaviro vatiwo semufundisi ishuviro ravo yekuti vanhu vagarisane pasina kusarudzana. Gwenlisa Mushonga anova musope uye zvakare akatanga sangano reAlive Albinism ati vachashingairira zvikuru kutengesa damba refu iri kuti vabatsire nhengo dzavo zhinji dzacho dzakaomerwa nehupenyu uye dzisingakwanisi kuzvitsvakira mafuta nezvimwe zvinodiwa kuti vasaite chirwere chegomarara repaganda. Gamuchirai Uzande imwe nhengo yeAlive Albinism Intiative afarawo zvikuru nekupiwa kwavo dambarefu iri akati zvichavabetsera zvikuru kuvandudza hupenyu hwavo nevamwewo vari kurarama nehusope. Madambarefu anowanzotengeswa nedhora rimwe chete mumigwagwa. VaChivaviro vaudza vatori venhau kuti kuburikidza neArtisan Studio vachabikira sangano iri dambarefu iri pachena uye mari yese yavachawana vozotangawo mabhindauko ekuti vawane mari.
title: Mufundisi Chivaviro Vopa Vasope Dambarefu Ravo Kuti Vabatsirikane

text: Komishini yeZimabwe Anti Corruption Commission, inonzi iri kuferefeta ‘doctorate degree’ rakapiwa vaive mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, neUniversity of Zimbabwe makore matatu apfuura. Izvi zvinotevera tsamba inonzi yakanyorerwa ZACC nevamwe vadzidzisi vepachikoro chepamusorosoro ichi vachinyunyuta nemawanirwo anonzi akaitwa degree iri naAmai Mugabe, ayo vanoti ane huwori mukati. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika uye vachitungamira sangano reProgressive Teachers Union Of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti izvi ndizvo zvimwe zvezvikonzero zvinoita kuti vamwe vanhu varambe kuti vatungamiri venyika vaite vakuru vema university, kana kuti chancellor. “Senyika, tinofanira kuti ma universities senzvimbo inopakura ruzivo, asiyaniswe kubva kune zvematongerwo enyika. Vakuru venyika vanofanira kuti vazvirumure kubva pakuti ndivo ma chancellor ema universities.” No media source currently available
title: ZACC Yowongorora Mawanirwo Akaitwa Degree NaAmai Mugabe?

text: Kanzuru yeChitungwiza inoti haichaendereri mberi nekupwanya zvivakwa zvevagari vemudhorobha iri zvainoiti zvakavakwa zviri kunze kwemutemo mushure mukunge vagari vedhororobha iri vapikisa hurongwa uhwu vachiti zvaida kuitwa nekanzuru iyi zvaizvidza mutongo wakaturwa nedare repamusoro gore rapera. Vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori wekanzuru yeChitungwiza, kana kuti acting chamber secretary, VaRaymond Gwinyai Wenyeve, vanyorera magweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights ayo ari kumirira sangano revagari vekuChitungwiza reChitungwiza Residents Trust vachiti kanzuru yavo yambomisa hurongwa hwekupwanyira vanhu dzimba nezvimwe zvivakwa zvinonzi nekanzuru iyi zvakavakwa zviri kunze kwemutemo panzvimbo yeChitungwiza Town Centre. Kanzuru yeChitungwiza kubudikidza nevakafanobata chigaro chamabharani wekakanzuru iyi, kana kuti town clerk, Amai Evangelista Machona, yakanga yaburitsa chiziviso kuvagari ichiti vose vane zvivakwa zvakavakwa paTown Centre nedzimwe nzvimbo dzakakomberedza nzvimbo yemabhimusi iyi vasina mvumo yekanzuru zvisinei nekuti ndivo varidzi here kana kuti kwete, vaifanira kuputsa zvivakwa izvi vega kanzuru isati yavapwanyira. Asi mutsamba yavo, iyo iri mumaoko eStudio 7, VaWenyeve vati kupwanywa kwezvivakwa izvi kuchaitwa chete kana patevedzerwa zviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika pamwe nemutemo unobata nyaya dzemadhorobha weRegional, Town and Country Planning Act. Bumbiro remitemo rinoti hapana munhu ane mvumo yekupwanyira munhu pekugara kana zvimwe zvivakwa asina kupihwa mvumo yekuita izvi nematare edzimhosva. Rimwe remagweta eZLHR riri kumirira Chitungwiza Residents Trust panyaya iyi, VaTinashe Chinopfukutwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafara zvikuru nedanho razotorwa nekanzuru yeChitungwiza mushure mekunge vanyorera kanzuru yeChitungwiza tsamba vachipikisa danho rakanga ratorwa nekanzuru iyi. VaChinopfukutwa vati vakayambira kanzuru yeChitungwiza kuti zvayaida kuita zvaizozvidza dare sezvo dare repamusoro rakamisa kupwanyirwa kwaiitwa vagari vedhorobha iri zvivakwa richiti zvaiva kunze kwemutemo uye zvaityora kodzero dzevagari ava. VaChinopfukutwa vanotiwo zvakanga zvarongwa nekanzuru zvaisave pamutemo sezvo kanzuru iyi yakanga isina kunyorera munhu umwe neumwe aizopwanyirwa chivakwa chake. Mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaObert Maraure, vati sangano ravo rafadzwa nekuti kanzuru yeChitungwiza yabvumawo kuti bumbiro remitemo rinofanira kutevedzwa zvizere pakatariswa nyaya yekuti kanzuru iyi yakambopwanyira vanhu zvivakwa zvavo gore rapera isingatarise zviri mubumbiro remitemo zvakazoita kuti Chitrest ikwire kumatare edzimhosva zvakazopedzisira zvaita kuti kupwanywa kwezvivakwa izvi kumiswe nedare repamusoro. Asi VaWenyeve vati kanzuru yavo ichine hurongwa hwekupwanya zvivakwa kana yazadzisa zvose zvinodiwa nemutemo. Gurukota rezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo vati tigozovafonera asi vazenge vasisadaire nharembozha yavo pataenda pamhepo. No media source currently available
title: Chitungwiza Yombosendeka Hurongwa hweKupwanya Zvivakwa Zvisiri paMutermo

text: Gurukota rezvekurima, VaPerrance Shiri, vari kukuridzira varimi vachena vasisina mapurazi kuti vashande pamwe chete nevarimi vane mapurazi kuwedzera goho uye nekusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika. Mashoko aya akatsinhirwawo nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vakati hurumende yamira zvachose kutora minda kubva kuvachena vasara vari muminda. Nyaya iyi inoratidza kuti VaMnangagwa vanenge vave kusiya gwara reZanu-PF rekuti vachena vose vatorerwe minda. Vaimbove sachigaro rebazi rezvekurima paUniversity of Zimbabwe, Muzvinafundo Mandivamba Rukuni, vanoti kana chirongwa ichi chikabatwa zvakanaka chinogona kubudirira zvikuru nekuti chinosanganisa vasina mapurazi asi vane ruzivo neavo vasina ruzivo asi vaine mapurazi. "Vamwe varimi vari muA2 vazhinji vanenge vachishaya mari yekuti vakwanise kurima nekuti zvinoti dhurei kurima nekuti mapurazi mahombe anoda mbeu nezvekurimisa zvakawanda." Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, "Inogona kuvawo nyaya yekushaya hunyanzwi hwacho hwekurima. Saka kana pachiitwa zvekushanda vakabatana nemumwe murungu asisina purazi vanogona kubatsirana." No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inokuridzira Varimi Vachena Vasisina Mapurazi Kuti Vashande neVatema

text: Mukuru webhanga remadzimai reZimbabwe Women’s Microfinance Bank (ZWMB), Amai Mandas Marikanda nemusi weChina vakakumbira nhengo dzeparamende kuti dzitaure nehurumende kuti vapihwe mari yakawanda yekubatsira madzimai mumabasa ekuzvisimudzira. Mashoko aya akataurwa apo nhengo dzeparamende dzekomiti inoona nezvemadzimai, kusimudzirwa kwematunhu nemabhizimisi madiki dzakashanyira bhanga iri muHarare. Amai Marikanda, vanoti nyika inogona kubudirira kana madzimai akatsigirwa nemari yekuti akwanise kuita mabasa ebudiriro akaita sekurima, kutanga mabhizisimisi pamwe nekuriritira mhuri dzawo. Amai Marikanda vati pane madzimai akawanda anoda rutsigiro rwezvikwereti kuti atange mabhisimisi uye bhanga ravo riri kutadza kuvabhadhara nekuda kwekuti harina mari yakawanda. Vati sebhanga idzva, mari yavari kupihwa nehurumende, mamiriyoni gumi pagore ishoma chose pamari yavarikuda. Vati semuenzaniso, pane vanhu zviuru makumi mashanu nechimwe vakatovhura maAccounts kubhanga iri kubva parakavhurwa pakaiti pegore rapfuura uye pavanhu ivava vanhu zviuru zvisere chete ndivo vakawanisa kuwana zvikwereti zvekuti vatange mabhizimisi nekuita zvimwe zvakasiyana siyana. Mumiriri weGweru Urban, VaBrian Dube veMDC, vanove imwe nhengo yeparamende yakashanyira bhanga iri nhasi, vati vafara chose kuona kuti bhanga iri rinogona kushandiswa kubvisa hurombo muZimbabwe pachishandiwa madzimai. Imwe nhengo yekomiti vari veMDC zvekare, VaDaniel Molokele vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vakadzidza zvakawanda pamusoro peWomen’s Bank uye separamende vachaedza kuri batsira kuti rikwanise kuita basa raro nemazvo. Bhanga iri rakavhurwa nehurumende mwedzi mina yapfuura nechinangwa chekusimudzira madzimai munyaya dzemabhisimisi uye pari zvino iri muHarare chete uye rinotarisira kuvhura rimwe bhanga muBulawaya mwedzi mishonana iri kutevera. Amai Marikanada vakati kunyange hazvo vasati vavhura mabhanga mune mamwe matunhu vanhu vavo vari kushandira mumahofisi eNetone, nemahofisi ebazi rehurumende rinoona nezvemadzimai mumatunhu ese munyika uko vave kutopa zvikwereti nekubatsira madzimai akawanda. Mumwedzi misere yapfuura, bhanga iri rapa zvikwereti zvemamiriyoni matatu emadhora uye vanhu vekuMidlanda ndivo vakatora mari yakawanda $1.4 million vachiteverwa neHarare neManicaland. No media source currently available
title: Bhanga reMadzimai Rokumbira Mari Yakawanda Kubva kuHurumende

text: Nyika dziri musangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica reSADC dzakatarisirwa kubatana neZimbabwe mangwana dzichikurudzira kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru-vakuru muhurumende yeZanu PF zvibviswe. Asi mamwe masangano evarairidzi munyika anoti haasi kufara nehurongwa hwehurumende hwekuti aite zvirongwa zvakanangana nekucherechedza zuva iri achiti izvi zvinokanganisa vana vari kunyora bvunzo. Mutauriri webazi redzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro vati varairidzi nevadzidzi mangwana vanofanira kuita zvirongwa zvekucherechedza zuva rakatarwa neSADC rekukurudzira kubviswa kwezvirango zvakatemerwa vakuru vehurumende nenyika dzekumavirira. Mamwe masangano evarairidzi akaita seAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe pamwe neProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe anoti nhengo dzawo dzakaudzwawo mashoko aya nevakuru mubazi redzidzo mumatunhu akasiyana-siyana asi masangano aya ati haasi kuzoita izvi achiti zvinokanganisa kudzidza kwevana muzvikoro zvikuru sei avo vari kunyora bvunzo dzeOrdinary ne Advanced Level. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vati zviri kurongwa nehurumende izvi zvinodzosera shure nyaya yedzidzo sezvo vana vakamborasikirwa nenguva yakawanda pakambovharwa zvikoro nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid 19. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakatarisirwawo kutura mashoko mangwana kuState House vachikurudzira kubviswa kwezvirango izvi ukuwo vaimbi vachizotarisirwawo kuita pungwe vachiimba kuChitungwiza Aquatic Complex vachihikurudzirawo kubviswa kwezvirango izvi pahurongwa huri kutungamirirwa nebazi rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko. Vanotungamira nhengo dzeZanu PF muparamende, VaPupurai Togarepi, vati zvirango izvi zvinofanira kubviswa sezvo vachiti zviri kukonzera kuti veruzhinji munyika vanonge svosve nemuromo. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaRashweat Mukundu, vati hurumende inofanira kuita zvinobatika munyaya dzekucherechedza kodzero dzevanhu kuitira kuti zvirango izvi zvigobviswa kwete kuswera ichikuma yakakwira pamusoro pegomo isina zvairi kuita. Nyika dzekumavirira dzakaita seAmerica dzakatemera Zimbabwe zvirango zvichitevera kusafambiswa zvakanaka kwesarudzo pamwe nekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika. America inoti Zimbabwe inofanira kucherechedza kodzero dzevanhu uye kunanganisa mitemo nebumbiro remitemo yenyika kana ichida kuti zvirango zvibviswe. Inoramba kuti zvirango izvi zvakanangana nevanhuwo zvavo munyika asi vanotonga nedemo chete. Zvirango izi zvakatemerwa muna 2001. America inoti nyaya yehuori nekutadza kutungamira ndiyo yapa kuti Zimbabwe iite sekunge yakageza negoka munyama kwete zvirango sezvinotaurwa nevatungamiri vehurumende. No media source currently available
title: Vadzidzisi Vonyunyuta neKukanganiswa kweZvikoro Nekunzi neHurumende Varatidzirewo Kuti Zvirango Zvibviswe

text: Zvinhu zvinonzi hazvichina kumira zvakanaka muvashandi vehuruemende zvichitevera kukundikana kwehurumende kuvazivisa kuti vachawana mari dzemabhonasi riini Zvinhu zvinonzi hazvichina kumira zvakanaka muvashandi vehuruemende zvichitevera kukundikana kwehurumende kuvazivisa kuti vachawana mari dzemabhonasi riini. Zvinonzi mauto awana mari dzemihoro neChipiri, asi pasina mari dzemabhonasi, idzo vakakundikana zvakare kuwana mwedzi wapera. Vamwe vashandi vehurumende vataura neStudio 7 vasingadi kudomwa nemazita avo vati mauto ashamisika zvakare kuenda kumabhanga vachiwana mari idzi dzisina kuiswa pamihoro yavo. Mwedzi wapera mauto, ayo anotanga kutambira mari muvashandi vehurumende vose, akakundikana zvakare kuwana mabhonasi awo, vakazovimbiswa kuti vaiwana mari idzi mumabhanga avo chero nguva, izvo zvisina kuitika. Hurumende yakanga yazivisa kuti yaizopa vashandi vayo mabhonasi muzvikwata zvikwata asi isina kutaura kuti kutanga mwedzi upi. Varairidzi ndevamwe vevashandi vehurumende vanga vachichemawo kuhurumende kuti izivise mazuva achatambirwa mabhonasi aya. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi sachigaro weApex Council, VaRichard Gundani, vanoti kunyange vachinyunyuta zvavo nekunonoka kupiwa mari dzemabhonasi idzi, vachakabatira pavimbiso yehurumende yekuti vachawana mari idzi. “Takavimbiswa nemukuru wenyika kuti bhonasi iriko, saka isu tichangomira neshoko iroro,” VaGundani vanodaro. Asi vanoti vanofanirwa kuita musangano wechimbichimbi navo kuti vajekeserwe kuti mari idzi dzinouya riini. “Christmas yave pedyo, vamwe vashandi vehurumende varimi uye vamwe vakatotsvagira vana vavo nzvimbo dze Form One, vanoda mari.” Sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rinotiwo kana mamwe makambani anoshandirwa nenhengo dzaro haasi kukwanisawo kubhadhara mabhonasi. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veHurumende Vochemachema neNyaya yeBhonasi

text: Veruzhinji vatambura neChina kupinda mudhorobha reHarare mushure mekunge vemakombi varambidzwa kuburutsira vanhu mudhorobha sezvavanoita mazuva ose. Izvi zvapa kuti vanhu vazhinji vanonoke kumabasa mushure mekunge vemakombi vavaburutsira kunze kwedhorobha zvazopedzisira zvaita kuti vanhu ava vafambe netsoka kupinda mudhorobha. Mumwe mugari wekuChitungwiza uye achishanda pane chimwe chitoro chiri pakati pedhorobha, VaLiberty Mombendambe, vati zvavatorera nguva yakareba kuti vafambe kubva kuCoca-Cola kwavaburutsirwa kuti vapinde mukati meguta. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo nemugari wekuWarren Park, VaHubert Khona, avo vati vaburutsirwa kuShowground vakazopedzisa rwendo rwavo netsoka kupinda mudhorobha. Mugari wekuKuwadzana, Muzvare Joice Chabikwa, vati vaburutsirwawo paShowground zvava kuvadhurira kuti vapinde mudhorobha sezvo vachiti vave kutoita zvekutsvaga dzimwe motokari dzinovapinza mudhorobha kana vachinge vaburutsirwa munzvimbo dzakatarwa nekanzuru kuti makombi aburutsire vanhu. Meya weHarare, VaBenard Manyenyeni, vanoti danho iri rakatorwa nehurumende zvisina kuwiririrana pakati pekanzuru, hurumende pamwe nevemasangano anomirira vagari vemuHarare nokudaro chirongwa ichi chinofanira kumiswa. Zvichitevera kunyunyuta kwaita veruzhinji, gurukota rezvematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vaburitsawo mashoko ekubvumidza vemakombi kuti vapinde mudhorobha vachikandira nyoka mhenyu kukanzuru yeHarare yavati ndiyo yakatora danho iri isina kubvunza zvakakwana. VaMoyo vati hurumende ichagara pasi nevemakanzuru ose munyika, pamwe nevemasangano anomirira vagari nechinangwa chekugadzirisa nyaya yekufamba kwevanhu kupinda mumadhorobha vachiti danho rakadai rinofanira kutorwa pachinge pagadziriswa zvose zvinodiwa kuti veruzhinji vasatambudzike pakufamba. No media source currently available
title: Kumborambidzwa kweMakombi Kupinda Mukati meHarare Kwotsamwisa Vakawanda

text: Gadziriro yesarudzo muZimbabwe yasvika padanho repamusoro soro apo mapato makuru anopikisa achisimbaradza gadziriro dzichaitwa. Mutungamiri wechimwe chikwata cheMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa, neChishanu vakasangana nenhengo dzebato ravo mazana mana nemakumi matanhatu nevasere dziri kuda kupinda musarudzo dzema primaries muHouse of Assembly neSenate. Musangano uyu wakaitirwa paJubilee Centre, Milton Park muHarare. Bato iri rinoti riri kutarisira kunge rapeta sarudzo dzaro dzema primaries musi wa 12 Chivabvu pamberi pesarudzo dziri kutarisirwa pakati paChikunguru naNyamavhuvhu. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, VaChamisa vakati bato ravo richakoshesa zvigaro zvemadzimai nevechidiki richivapa zvikamu zvavo zvakabvumiranwa. Vati vachapawo zvimwe zvigaro kune vakaremara. VaChamisa vakati makanzura anoita zvehuori nekutuka vamwe acharambidzwa kukwikwidza musarudzo. Vakasimbisawo kuti sarudzo yavo inenge yakanangana nekusimudzira vanhu vari kumaruwa uye vane chirongwa chinonzi Operation Gogoi Tisvikewo chakanangana nekukwezva vari kumaruwa kuti vavavhotere. Bato iri rine musangano neMugovera paJonas Primary School kwaSeke, mumwe uchaitirwa kwaMubaira kuMhondoro nemusi weSvondo. Vanoronga misangano yebato reMDC-T, VaAmos Chibaya, vanoti gadziriro yavo iri kufamba zvakanaka. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, bato reZanu-PF riri kutarisirwa kuita sarudzo dzaro dzema primaries nemusi weSvondo. Kunyange hazvo bato iri range rati vanhu vose vari kutsvaga rutsigiro vafambe vose kuitira kuti vasapote vachikandirana makobvu nematete uye kuita zvetsvimbo mugotsi, kunetsana kuri kuenderera mberi kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzakaita seMashonaland East, Midlands, Masvingo nedzimwe vamwe vachinzi vari kuita zvemhirizhonga. Mutevedzeri wemunyori wezvemutemo muZanu-PF vachimirirawo Mazowe South mudare reparamende, VaFortune Chasi, vati vanenge vaita zvehunhubu vanosungwa asi vati zvinhu zviri kufamba zvakanaka. No media source currently available Mune imwewo nyaya, European Union inoti iri kuzotumira vaongorori vesarudzo kuZimbabwe gore rino mushure mekukokwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. EU yakaburitsa mashoko aya nemusi weChishanu zvichitevera musangano wakaitwa negurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, nevanoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika musangano iri, VaFederica Mogherini, kuBrussels. Aka ndekekutanga kuti EU iuye kuzoongorora sarudzo muZimbabwe mushure mekunge vaongorori vayo vadzingwa munyika muna 2002.
title: Mapato Ogadzirira Sarudzo Dzekutsvaga Achaamirira Musarudzo Gore Rino

text: Vanhu vakawanda vanogara nekushanda muBotswana vanoti vakakundikana kuenda kunoonana nehama neshamwari kumusha panguva ino yezororo rekirisimusi nokuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio7 inoratidza kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvaswera zviri muguta reFrancistown, muBotswana zvichitsvaga zvingavararamisa semazuva ose. Mumwe wevanhu ava, Amai Cynthia Muzanenhamo, vaudza Studio7 kuti vaona zviri nani kuti vatumire zvekudya nezvipfeko kuvana vavo kuGokwe pane kuti vaende kumusha vosvika vakarembedza maoko. Muzvare Christinah Mashorokoto, avo vanorarama nekuruka vanhu musoro mudhorobha reFrancistown, vanoti chavakagona chete kutumira chikafu nezvipfeko kuvabereki vavo kumusha. VaTafiranyika Usavi, avo vanotungamira kereke yeJehovah’s Tabernacle, vanoti gore ra2018 ranga risina kumira zvakanaka kuruzhinji munyaya dzekubata mari. Vanhu vakawanda vari kupinda muBotswana zvisiri pamutemo nechinangwa chekunotsvaga mafuro manyoro sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka muZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vari muBotswana Votadza Kuenda kuKisimusi kuZimbabwe

text: Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano nekuchengetwa kwevana yakazvionera pamhuno sefodya kurarama kwakaoma kuri kuita vanorwara nepfungwa muChinhoyi. Vachitaura kukomiti iyi nezuro mukuru wemuwadhi inochengetwa vanorwara nepfungwa Amai Meggis Chisango vakataurira komiti iyi kuti vari kusangana nematambudziko akawanda anosanganisira kushaikwa kwemishonga, zvekudya, nhumbi dzekupfeka nemagumbeze. Amai Chisango vakati varwere gumi nevatatu vari kurara pamibhedha isina mamatiresi. Vakatiwo vashandi vanoshanda muwadhi umu vashoma zvikuru sezvinotarisirwa, parizvino pane gumi asi vanotarisirwa kuve nemakumi maviri nevashanu. Amai Chisango vanoti dambudziko guru kusachengetedzwa kwanamukoti kuvarwere vepfungwa sezvo vachikwanisa kungoita mhirizhonga nguva dzisingatarisirwe. Parizvino vanoti havasikuchengetedzwa uye magonhi emunochengeterwa varwere vepfungwa akawanda haachashanda. Izvi zvakabatabata mukuru wekomiti iyi Amai Goodlucky Kwaramba avo vakati vachaendesa nyaya yekuipa kwezvinhu muwadhi yevanorwara nepfungwa kuparamende nekukurumidza Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa Dr Henry Madzorere vatenda kuti mari dzebhajeti dziri kupihwa bazi rezvehutano hadzisi kukwana. Dr Madzorere vatiwo vanhu vakawanda munyika vave kurwara nezvirwere zvepfungwa nenyaya yekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi. Muhuruko yavakamboita neStudio 7, Doctor Sekai Nhiwatiwa, vanove nyanzvi yezvirwere zvepfungwa vachishanda nechipatara cheParirenyatwa vanoti vamwe vanorwara nezvirwere zvepfungwa vanoguma vazviuraya kana vakasawana rubatsiro. Zvichakadaro, Amai Kwaramba vanoti zvinoshamisa kuti pachipatara chemuChinhoyi hapana mvura pamwe nemafuta edzimotokari. Zvinonziwo hama dzevanhu vanenge varapwa muwadhi umu havasi kuuya kuzotora hama dzavo zvekuti pane varwere vashanu vapora asi vasati vatorwa. Izvi zvakatsigirwa nemumwe murwere anoti akanzi aende kumba svondo rapera asi hama dzake hadzisati dzauya kuzomutora. Nyaya yekudzimwa kwemagetsi inonzi inoita kuti vamwe varwere varare vachitonhorwa vasina hembe sezvo vachityirwa kuti vanozvisungirira apo vanenge vari mumipanda yakatsaurwa. Vamwe varwere vari pachipatara chemuChinhoyi vanobva kunzvimbo dziri kure dzakaita seMutoko, Chivhu neMasvingo. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yokundikana Kutenga Mishonga yeVanorwara nePfungwa

text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeBotswana VaMokgweetsi Masisi vanoti kuoma kwehupenyu muZimbabwe kwakonzerwa nezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa nyika kwave kupa kuti zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi zvirarame nekuba munyika yavo. Vachitaura nezuro manheru nevagari vemumusha weSemolale uri pedyo nemuganhu wenyika iyi neZimbabwe, VaMasisi vakati zvirango zviri kukanganisa vanhuwo zvavo muZimbabwe kwete vatungamiri zvopa kuti vagume votyora mutemo munyika mavo. VaMasisi vakadzokorora kurudziro yavanogara vachipa yekuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe. VaMasisi vakaenda kumusha uyu kunotsanangura nezvematanho ari kutorwa nehurumende yavo akanangana nekupedza kubiwa kwezvipfuyo nezvinofungidzirwa kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. Vakakumbirisa vagari vemumusha uyu kuti kusava nekurwisana nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe nokuda kwekubiwa kwezvipfuyo munzvimbo iyi vachiti zviri kusundwa nehurombo hwapfunya chisero munyika mazvo. Asi VaJohn Pamire, avo vanova sachigaro wedunhu reBotswana mubato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change, vanoti VaMasisi vanofanira kutaura chapa musoro uteme muZimbabwe kwete kurova imbwa vakaviga mupini. Vanoti kudya nhoko dzezvironda hakungave chikonzero chingaite kuti munhu aite zvehumbavha. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekudyidzana kwenyika vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Botswana, VaMoreblessing Ndlovu vanoti mashoko aVaMasisi anokukurudzira kusateerwa kwemutemo. Gore rakapera, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviviri zvakarohwa zvakaipisisa zvikafa chimwe chechitatu chikaitwa kafiramberi nevagari wemumusha weBobonong mushure mekunge zvawanikwa zvichitinhira mombe dzevarimi venzvimbo iyi kudivi reZimbabwe. Mukuru wemapurisa munyika VaGodwin Matanga vakaudza vaori venhau kuti kushaya zvikwanisiro ndiko kuri kupa kuti vasakwanise kuendesa mapurisa akawanda kumuganhu neBotswana. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakaumbawo chikwata chemakurukota kuongorora nyaya yekubiwa kwemombe kuBotswana mushure mekunge zvaonekwa kuti mamwe mapurisa ainge oita zvehuori achishanda nevaiba mombe kuBotswana. Panyaya yezvirango, VaMnangagwa vanoti Zimbabwe yakatemerwa zvirango mushure mekutora minda kubva kuvachena ichipa vatema. Asi nyika dzakaita seAmerica dzinoti VaMnangagwa nevamwe vavo vari muhurumende vanofanira kumira nyaya yekutonga nedemo, kubirira sarudzo nehuori kuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe. Vakatoudza nyika dzemuSADC kuti Zimbabwe ikasatsiurwa inoramba ichideura ropa mudunhu reSADC. No media source currently available
title: VaMasisi Vanoti Zvirango Zvopa Kuti Vamwe vemuZimbabwe Vabe muBotswana

text: Mutungamiri webato reTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vanoti bato ravo riri kuronga kukwirira hurumende yeZanu PF kusangano reSADC zvichitevera kutora kwayakaita kubva kuUNDP hurongwa hwekutengwa kwemichina yeBiometric Voter Registration, iyo ichashandiswa mukunyoreswa kwevanhu musarudzo dza 2018. VaNgarivhume vanoti serimwe remapato anopikisa vanofunga kuti Zanu PF ine chitsotsi chairi kuda kuita nekutora kwayo hurongwa uhwu. "Bato redu harisi kuwirirana zvachose nezviri kuronge hurumende. Yakatendeuka mushure mekunge tawirirana sema stakeholders pa process yekuti ma kits awanikwe. Saka seTransform Zimbabwe tiri kuona kuti ndopatotangira chitsotsi chekubiridzira sarudzo ya 2018," VaNgarivhume vanodaro. Vanoti bato ravo riri mushishi kuunganidza masiginecha evanhu kuti vagozosvitsa gwaro ravo renyunyuto kuSADC. "Tine ma strategy akasiyanasiyana etaronga kuti tirwisane navo. Yekutanga ndeyekuti tiri kubatana nemamwe mapato anopikisa kuti tiite demonstration kana kuratidzira muna March muno." Vanotiwo kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, isati yave nemichina yekuvhotesa iyi, ivo sebato vakatotanga kupa vanhu dzidziso pamusoro penzira itsva yekuvhota iyi, kuitira kuti panozotanga ZEC kuita basa rayo, veruzhinji vanenge vaine ruzivo nechakare. ZEC yakazvisawo kuti kambani ichawanisa nyika michina yekuvhotesa iyi ichazivikanwa musi wa 20 mwedzi uno. No media source currently available
title: Transform Zimbabwe Yoronga Kukwirira Hurumende kuSADC

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe nezvimwe zvekune dzimwe nyika zvange zviri muAmerica muchirongwa cheMandela Washington Fellowship zvatanga kudzokera kumba zvichifara nezvidzidzo zvazvakaita munyaya dzebudiro munyika dzemuAfrica. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe change ichi muzvinabhizinesi VaCollins Nyamadzawo vanoti vari kufadzwa nerubatsiro rwavakawana kubva kusangano re United States Agency for International Development nebhanga reCiti Bank rwekufambisa mabasa avo kana vasvika kumusha. Vamwe vange vari pagungano iri ndiVaTerry Mutsvanga avo vanoti vakadzidza zvakawanda pachirongwa ichi. VaObrien Makore vanotsinhirawo kuti vakadzidza zvakawanda mubasa ravo rezvemagariro evanhu mumadhorobha kana kuti “urban planning.” Muzvare Chido Chikomo vanoti vakadzidza zvakawanda munyaya dzezvekukurudzira mabasa emadzimai. Chimwe chirongwa chakadai chiri kutarisirwa kuitwa gore rinouya kunyangwe hazvo VaObama vanenge vasiya basa.
title: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvakasangana naVaObama Zvodzokera kuMusha

text: Vamwe vevanhu vari mumagwaro eMossack Fonseca vanosanganisira vakuru vakuru veInnscor Africa, VaZinona Koudounaris naVaMichael Fowler; mukuru weZimplats, VaAlex Mhembere, mukuru mukuru kuSable Chemicals, VaJackson Murehwa, mukuru mukuru mumakambani anoita zvemigodhi, VaVictor Robinson Gapare nevamwe. Vanhu vakawanda vari kutaura pamusoro penyaya dzemazita evanhu vari kubuda muPanama Papers. Studio7 imwe yemakambani anodarika zana ari kuongorora zviri mumagwaro eMossack Fonseca, ayo akapihwa bepanhau rekuGermany, reSueddeutsche Zeitung, nemunhu asiri kuda kuzivikanwa zita rake. Bepanhau iri rakaita mushandira pamwe neInternational Consortium of Investigative Journalists, ICIJ, mukuongorora zviri mumagwaro eMossack Fonseca. ICIJ yakazokoka masangano enhau anodarika zana, kusanganisira VOA Zimbabwe Service (Studio7) Magwaro aya ane mafaira anodarika mamiroyoni gumi nerimwe, ayo ane mazita evanhu vakapfuma pamwe nevezvematongerwo enyika vanonzi vaishandisa kambani iyi kuti ivhure makambani evanhu ava ekuchengetera mari dzavo kunze kwenyika dzavo. Izvi zvinonzi zvaikaitwa nevamwe vachityora mitemo ine chekuita nekufambiswa kwemari pasi rose. Kuvhura kambani kunze kwenyika haisi mhosva. Asi zvinozoitwa kambani yavhurwa zvinonzi zvinofanirwa kunge zvichiitwa pamutemo. Mossack Fonseca ine muzinda wayo kuPanama, uye ine mahofisi anodarika makumi mana pasi rose. Dzihurumende dzkawanda, kusanganisira France, Germany, Australia ne South Korea dzinoti dziri kuferefeta vanhu vanonzi vakavhura mabhuku ekubhanga vachishandisa kambani yeMossack Fonseca. Studio7 yakaburitsa nyaya yekambani yeZimplats, iyo inonzi yakaumba kambani yeHR Consultancy kuti itambire mari inobva kuZimplats, kambani iyi ichizobhadhara vashandi vakuru vakuru vekambani iyi. Zimplats inoti haina kana kumboumba kambani yakadai, uye zviri mumagwaro eMossack Fonseca, handi zvechokwadi. Mutauriri weMossack Fonseca, VaJordan Spencer, vanoti havakwanisi kutaura nevatori venhau nezvenyaya iyi. Kambani yeNorthern Wychwood, iyo yakabatsira mukunyoreswa kweHR Consultancy kuBritish Virgin Islands, ine vakuru vakuru vanova kuZimbabwe, asi vava nemagwaro ekufambisa ekuEngland. Vakuru ava vanosanganisira chizvarwa chekuSouth Africa, VaShaun Fergusson Cairns nemudzimai wavo, Tracy Cairns, VaBryan Campion Ellis, avo vakabva kuZimbabwe uye vakamboshandira makambani emagweta muHarare, VaPeter Whitney Fearnhead nevamwe. Vamwe vevanhu vari mumagwaro eMossack Fonseca vanosanganisira vakuru vakuru veInnscor Africa, VaZinona Koudounaris naVaMichael Fowler; mukuru weZimplats, VaAlex Mhembere, mukuru mukuru kuSable Chemicals, VaJackson Murehwa, mukuru mukuru mumakambani anoita zvemigodhi, VaVictor Robinson Gapare nevamwe. Vachitaura vakamirira VaKoudounaris naVaFowler, chipangamazano munyaya dzemitemo mu Innscor Africa, VaAddington Chinake, vanoti vaviri ava havana kutyora mitemo ine chekuita nekufambiswa kwemari, iyo inosanganisira yebanga guru renyika. Asi gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mangudya, vanoti bhanga ravo harina ruzivo rwekuti vaviri ava vane mari dzavakaisa kunze kwenyika. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaMhembere, avo vanonzi vari kunze kwenyika, sekutaura kwemutauriri weZimplats, Amai Busi Chindove. Studio7 hainawo kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaMurehwa naVaGapare. Studio7 iri kuburitsa mamwe mazita evanhu vari mumagwaro eMossack Fonseca atiri kuongorora. Ticharamba tichiburitsa mazita aya sezvo veruzhinji vari kuda kuziva nezvavanhu ava. Mukuburitsa mazita aya, hatisi kuti vanhu ava vakapara mhosva kana kuti havana kupara mhosva. Mazita aya ari kuburitswa sezvo veruzhinji munyika vari kuda kuzivawo vanhu vemuZimbabwe vari mumagwaro ePanama Papers. Kana muchida kuona mazita evanhu nemakambani acho, ayo akaumbwa kuBritish Virgin Islands neku Isle of Man, vhurai link iri pasi iyi. Kana paine mashoko amunopokana nawo, titumirewo tsambambozha kustudio7@voanews.com. Munokwanisawo kutumira mashoko paFacebook Page yedu voashona http://docs.voanews.eu/en-ZW/2016/05/10/ef555f16-d88a-48ba-b218-e5c8206c610a.doc Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwenyaya dzePanama Papers, vanhu vemuIceland vakaratidzira kudzamara mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaSigmundur David Gunnalaugsson, vasiya chigaro. Mutungamiri wenyika iyi mumwe wevatungamiri vanonzi vakaviga mari dzavo munyika dziri kushandiswa nevapfumi mukuvanza mari dzavo vachityora mitemo yekufambiswa zviri pachena kwemari pasi rose. France, Germany, Australia ne South Korea dzinoti dziri kuferefeta zvizvarwa zvenyika idzi zviri mumagwaro ePanama Papers.
title: Zita Rako Ririmo Here muPanama Papers?

text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change VaNelson Chamisa vashora zvikuru mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemashoko avo ekuti havasi kuzosiya chigaro. VaChamisa vati zviri pachena kuti VaMugabe vakwegura uye vanhu vakawanda munyika vave kuda kuti vasiye chigaro pauye vanotemwa dzinobva ropa. Vatiwo matauriro aVaMugabe anoratidza kuti havasi kuziva kuti vanhu vari kunonga svosve nemuromo munyika. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Voshora VaMugabe neKurambira paChigaro

text: Nhasi VaRobert Mueller avo vakasarudzwa nehurumende yeAmerica kuti vaongorore kana nyika yeRussia yakapindira musarudzo dzemuAmerica muna 2016 kana kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaDonald Trump vakayedza kuvhiringidza kuongororwa kwenyaya iyi vange vachipa humbowo pamberi pemakomiti maviri eCongress anoti.
