VaMueller vakabuda negwaro rine mapeji mazana mana nemakumi masere. VaMueller vatanga kupa huchapupu pamberi pedare rezvemutemo kana kuti House Judiciary Committee uye parizvino vari kupa huchapupu kukomiti yezvekusora kana kuti House Intelligence committee VaMueller vati zvakaitwa neRussia zvakanganisa zvakanyanya hutongo hwejekerer panyaya yesarudzo muAmerica. Gwaro raVaMueller rinotiwo VaTrump vakayedza kumisa kuongororwa kwenyaya iyi asi zvikakona nekuti magweta avo nezvipangamazano zvavo vakaramba kutevedzera zvavaida zvekuti VaMueller vadzingwe basa. VaMueller vati vakayedza kwegore rose kuti VaTrump vape huchapupu hwavo asi vakaramba. Vachibvunzwa nasachigaro wekomiti yezvemutemo VaJerry Nadler vemaDemocrats kuti vakachenura VaTrump here, VaMuller vati havana. Vachipindura mubvunzo waVaNadler, VaMuller vaudza dare iri kuti VaTrump vanogona kuzotongwa kana vabuda muhofisi sezvo mutemo webazi rezvemutemo uchiti mutungamiri wenyika haakwanise kutongwa achiri panyanga. Asi vachitaurawo kukomiti iyi, VaJohn Retcliff vebato remaRepublicans vashora zvikuru VaMueller vachiti zvavakanyora mugwaro ravo kuti mutungamiri wenyika haakwanise kuferefetwa ari muhofisi handi zvechokwadi. VaRatcliff vange vachitaura nezviri mugwaro raVaMueller zvekuti havanakwanise kuchenura VaTrump. Vanhu vakawamda muAmerica nekunze kusanganisa zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe vari kuteverawo kubvunzurudzwa kwaVaMueller. Vamwe vari kutevera zviri kuitika izvi ndiVaZvidzai Ruzvidzo vari kuOhio muno muAmerica avo vati varikuona sekunge VaMueller vari kutatarika nekupa humbowo. Asi vamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo vachigara kuSouth Carolina muno muAmerica VaPromise Sande vati vari kuona sekunge VaMueller vati kunyatsobaya dede nemukanwa. Vachitaura nezvenyaya yekuti Russia yakapinda musarudzo, sachigaro weZESN VaAndrew Makoni vanoti mashoko akadai anopa kuti vanhu vasave nechivimbo nesarudzo. VaTrump vange vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter vachishora VaMueller. Vati VaMueller vakasarudzwa zvisiri pamutemo uye vainge vasina kufara nenyaya yekuti vainge varamba kuvapa basa rekuvamukuru wesangano reFBI. No media source currently available
title: VaMueller Vanopa Humbowo Kudare reCongress Vachiti VaTrump Vakasiya Basa Vanogona Kusungwa

text: Mutungamiri weMDC VaNelson Chamisa nemusi weMuvhuro vakaenda kuMbare Musika kunozvionera vega makwidzirwo akaitwa mari dzekufambisa nevemabhazi izvo zvinonzi neveruzhinji zvichaita kuti vatadze kuenda kumisha yavo kunoona hama neshamwari pazororo reKisimusi. Vanhu vataura neStudio paMbare Musika vati kukwidzwa kwemari dzemabhazi kuchaita kuti vatadze kuenda kunoona hama neshamwari zvukurusei panguva ino yezororo. VaChamisa vange vachipindawo mumabhazi vachitaura nevanhu. Izvi zvaita kuti paite chipitipiti vanhu vachimhadzina kuti vaone pamwe nekutaura naVaChamisa vamwe vakabva vatanga kuimba. Mumwe wevanhu ava ndiAmai Winnet Parurai avo vanoti vatadza kuenda kumusha kwavo kuLutumba pedyo neBeit Bridge sezvo vemabhazi vakwidza mari dzavanobhadharisa vafambi. Vamwe vakaita saVaJeremiah Rimbi vanobva kuChivhu vachishanda muno muHarare vanotiwo vatadza kuenda kumusha zvazopedzisira zvaita kuti vazongotumira vabereki vavo zvokudya pazororo rekisimusi. Vamwe vatyairi vemabhazi varamba kutaura pamhepo vati chiri kukonzera kuti vakwidze mari dzvanobhadharisa vanhu pakufamba inyaya yekushayikwa kwedhiziri iro ravanoti varikutenga pamukoto sezvo risiri kuwanikwa nyore mumagaraji anotengesa mafuta. Vamwe vevanhu ava vazosiyiwa nemabhazi vachiedza kuti vatevere VaChamisa mukufamba kwavanga vachiita pamusika apa. VaChamisa vaudza vanhu vanodarika zviuru zviviri vanga vavaunganira kuti havasi kufara nekukwira kwemitengo yembhazi pamwe nekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi zvavati zvichaita kuti Kisimusi yegore ive isina zvainoreva kuvanhu vakawanda vachiti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nekutadza basa kwehurumende yaVaemmerson Mnangagwa. VaChamisa vavimbisawo vanhu ava kuti vachave neKisumisi inodakadza gore rinouya kana vachinge vagadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Mumwe wevanhu vanga vachitsvaga chekufambisa kuenda kuzororo reKisimusi, VaHendricks Jongwe avo vati vanobva kuGokwe vati vafara zvikuru kuti VaChamisa vauya kuzoona matambudziko arikusangana neveruzhinji panguva ino yezororo. Sangano reZimbabwe Passengers Transport Organization rinoti harisi kufara kuti hurumende yakangoripa dhiziri rinosvika marita zviuru makumi maviri nematanhatu pazororo rekisimusi pavhiki rose iro richiti rinoda zviuru mazana mashanu. Hurumende yaVaMnangagwa inoti veruzhinji vanofanira kumbotiwirira kwemakore mashomanana ichiedza kugadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi. No media source currently available
title: Zviuru zveVanhu Zvounganira VaChamisa paMusika weMbare

text: Mumiriri weChitungwiza West mudare reparamende vaGodfrey Sithole vebato reCCC vapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatisonhasi. Asi mumwe wavakasungwa navo, VaJob Sikhala vanzi vadzoke kudare musi wa 17 Mbudzi pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekupesvedzera mhirizhonga musi wa 31 Chikunguru 2020. Vaimbova mutungamiri weNigeri VaOlusegun Obasanjo vanoti kukundikana kweAfrica kutora matanho pane vakapidigura hurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu Robert Mugabe ndiko kwave kupa kuti mamwe mauto emuAfrica apidigure hurumende dzavo. Dare rePan African Parliament rinoti zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vatungamiri venyika yeZimbabwe zvibviswe asi vamwe vachiti kupedza nguva kuteya nzou neriva kana Zimbabwe ikatadza kutevedzera hutongo hwejekerere. Kushaya zvekukohwesa kwopa kuti vamwe varimi vatyire kuti vacharasikirwa negorosi ravo sezvo mvura yotutuka. Tichakupai maonero evanhu munyika nemabatirwo akaitwa sarudzo dzemuAmerica. Muchirongwa chedu cheLiveTalk, Women’s Round Table na8 pm. Tichazeya nyaya yesarudzo dzemuAmerica apo Zimbabwe yatarisanawo nesarudzo dzemuna 2023. Tichatarisawo nyaya yemadzimai akakwikwidza sarudzo dzemamidterms muAmerica nezvingadzidzwe nevemuZimbabwe. Kana muchida kupinda muchirongwa ichi, kanawo kutumira mashoko kuStudio7, shandisai WhatsApp nhamba dzinoti 001 202 465 0318. Vanoda kutererera Studio7, tibateyi na7 pm pamasaisai anoti 909 am 4930; 13860, 15460 Kilohertz paShort Wave mazuva ose.
title: Misoro yeNhau dzaNhasi, China, Mbudzi, 10, 2022

text: Bato reMDC riri kuita sarudzo dzakatarisirwa zvikuru nevakawanda mudunhu reManicaland. Musarudzo dzakapedzisira kuitwa muna 2014, dunhu reManicaland ndiro chete rakadoma munyori mukuru webato iri VaDouglas Mwonzora kuti vakwikwidze chigaro chavainacho ichi mushure mekunge mamwe matunhu ose ati anoda VaChamisa. VaMwonzora vakashura mare apo vakakunda VaChamisa musarudzo dzakazoitwa kukongiresi yakaitirwa muHarare. Parizvino VaChamisa vadomwa nematunhu manomwe kuti vatungamire bato VaMwonzora nemumwe mutevedzeri mukuru webato iri VaElias Mudzuri vasina kudomwa kana nedunhu rimwe kuti vakwikwidze musarudzo. Murongi webato VaAmos Chibaya vati sarudzo dzose dzavaita dziri kufamba zvakanaka uye hapana munhu ati anyora tsamba yenyunyuto sezvinodiwa nebumbiro achiti haasi kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo. Mutauriri webato VaJacob Mafume vanoti havasi kuzoshaiswa hope neimwe nhengo yebato iri VaElias Mashavire vekuGokwe vakakwira kudare repamusoro vachiti sarudzo idzi dzimiswe sezvo vachiti dziri kutyora mutemo webato. No media source currently available
title: MDC Yosarudza Vatungamiri kuManicaland

text: Bato rinopikisa, reZimbabwe African People’s Union (ZAPU) riripakati pekuita musangano waro mukuru, kana kuti Congress, muBulawayo. Musangano uyu wakatanga nezuro, China, uye uchapera mangwana, Mugovera. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato iri, VaDerek Katsenga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti musangano wavo wakanonotswa nekupararira kwedenda reCovid-19, vachiti nguva yasvika yekuita musangano wekongresi kuti pasarudzwe vatungamiri vebato iri zviripamutemo, zvikuru sei mutungamiri webato iri anotora chinzvimbo chevaimbova mutungamiri waro, muchakabvu Dumiso Dabengwa. VaDabengwa vakashaikira kuNairobi, Kenya, muna 2019. VaKatsenga vanoti zvigaro zvizhinji zvichange zvichikwikwidzwa. No media source currently available
title: Bato reZimbabwe African People’s Union Rosarudza Vatungamiri Varo Vatsva neMugovera

text: Vadzidzi vapfumbamwe vakasungwa vachiratidzira mushure mekusungwa kwemutungamiri weZimbabwe National Students Union, VaTakudzwa Ngadziore, vakapiwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kudzimba dzavo. Gweta revadzidzi ava, VaObey Shava, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mumwe nomumwe wavo akanzi abvise madhora emaRTGS anoita zviuru zviviri. VaShava vanoti vadzidzi ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuda kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika, vachiti vese vanzi vadzoke kudare redzimhosva musi wa 30 Gumiguru, 2020. No media source currently available
title: Vadzidzi Vanobvisiswa Mari yeChibatiso Kuitira Kuti Vatongwe Vachibva Kumba

text: Vanoita zvemitambo, tsika nemagariro vanoti hurumende haisi kuvakoshesa vachiti vave kuda kuti hurumende iwumbe bazi rakazvimirira rinoona nezvemitambo, tsika nemagariro. Izvi zvabuda pakuvigwa kwaVaLawrence Simbarashe avo vaizivikanwa mune zvemitambo kana kuti ma drama nezita rokuti Mudhara Bhonzo. Vachitaura pakuradzikwa kwaMudhara Bhonzo pamarinda eZororo Memorial Park kuChitungwiza, vanoita zvemimhanzi, mitambo, tsika nemagariro vati havasi kufara nekubatwa nekuseri kwemawoko kwavari kuitwa nehurumende. Vanoita zvekutsikiswa kwemimhanzi, VaAmos Mahendere, vati vaimbi pamwe nevanoita zvemitambo, tsika nemagariro havasi kuwana rutsigiro rwakakwana kubva kuhurumende mubasa ravanoita. VaMahendere vashora hurumende nekusatumira nhume pakuradzikwa kwaMudhara Bhonzo avo vaizivikanwa zvikuru munezvemitambo yaibuda pachivhitivhiti. Muimbi uye vachiita zvemitambo, Muzvare Kessia Masona, avo vanonzi Muchaneta mumutambo unonzi “Muchaneta” vanoti vanoita zvemitambo vari kurarama zvehwakumukwaku sezvo vasiri kubhadharwa zvakakodzera. Mumwe akashanda naMudhara Bhonzo mumutambo waizivikanwa uchinzi “Bhonzo nechikwata” kana kuti Timmy naBhonzo, VaTimothy Tapfumaneyi vati zvinovarwadza kuti vashaikirwa nemumwe wavo. Zvisinei, VaTapfumaneyi vakurudzira hurumende kuti sevanhu vanoita zvemitambo, tsika nemagariro, vave nebazi ravo rakazvimirira rinotungamirwa nemunhu anoziva zvinodiwa mubandiko ravo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvemitambo, tsika nemagariro, VaKazembe Kazembe, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo vati vanga vakabatikana pataedza kutaura navo panharembozha yavo. Muchakabvu Lawrence Simbarashe, avo vanga vachizivikanwa nezita remadunhurirwa rekuti Mudhara Bhonzo vakashayika neMugovera mushure mekurwara kwenguva refu nechirwere cheshuga. Mumazuva avo ekupedzisira Mudhara Bhonzo vakange vashoshoma zvakaita kuti vatadze kushandisa izwi ravo kutsvaga raramo zvakapedzisira zvoita kuti vararame nekupemha zvisinei nembiri yavaive nayo. No media source currently available
title: Mudhara Bhonzo Vanoradzikwa kuMarinda ekuChitungwiza

text: Masangano emuAmerica anoti reNational Endowment for Democracy kana kuti NED nereInternational Republican Institute kana kuti IRI akabanata nemamwe masangano akazvimirira akaita musangano muWashington DC kuzeya mamiriro akaita zvinhu muZimbabwe pamberi pesarudzo dziri kuitwa mwedzi uno uya musi wa 30. Musangano uyu wakaitirwa kumahofisi eIRI. Vamwe vakataura pamusangano uyu igweta uri vari chipangamazano paReagan-Fascell paNational Endowment for Democracy Doctor Alex Magaisa. Doctor Magaisa vanoti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vane vari kuvakwikwidza vakasimba vakaita saVaNelson Chamisa veMDC Alliance uye amai Joice Mujuru weNational People’s Rainbow Coalition. No media source currently available Pane vari kukwikwidza Doctor Magaisa vati VaChamisa vanogona kukunda kana sarudzo dzikasabirirwa. Vamwe vakataura pachiitiko ichi vanosanganisa Amai Imani Countess veSolidarity Centre, VaPatrick Merloe Vendi vakataura nyaya yemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya yesarudzo vachikokerwa naAmai Natalie kay vanoshanda neNED. Mumwe musangano waitarisa zvichaitika sarudzo kana dzapera wainge uina Doctor Ibbo Mandaza veSapes Trust, VaLars Benson ve centre for International Private Enterprise, Doctor Magaisa uye VaThomas Hastings bazi reState Department muAmerica. VaHastings vakati vanoda kuona zvinhu zvichishanduka munyaya dzezvehupfumi, zvematongerwo enyika uye kuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Vakati havo vari kuona kunge zvimwe zviri kuenda zvichiita nani. Musangano uyu waikokerwa naMuzvare Irene Petras gweta uye vaimbove mukuru weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights.
title: Masangano emuAmerica Ozeya Nyaya yeSarudzo dzemuZimbabwe

text: Kwakave nekufara, pamwe nekusuwa kuvatambi venhabvu vemuZimbabwe avo vakaita fararira pasi rese. Willard Katsande naKhama Billiat vari murufaro mushure mekunge chikwata chavo cheKaiser Chiefs chawedzera hutungamiri hwacho pamusoro pegungano reAbsa Premiership nekukunda Polokwane City 3-2 nemusi weSvondo. Kaiser Chiefs yave nemapoinzi makumi mashanu nemaviri, mapoinzi matanhatu pamusoro peMamelodi Sundowns yaPeter Ndlovu. Billiat naKatsande vakatamba mumitambo wakakosha uyu. Sundowns yakarowa 3-2 neCape Town City nemusi weMuvhuro. Kupemberera kwaKatsande naBilliat kwatevera poindi imwechete yakatorwa nemurairidzi wemuno Kaitano Tembo apo chikwata chake cheSupersport chakaita mangane 1-1 neBloemfontein Celtic. Kwasara mitambo mishanu kuti makundano aya apere. Tembo asimudza chikwata ichi zvinodakadza kubvira atambidzwa basa rehurairidzi mushure mekupedza makore akati wandei ari mutevedzeri wemurairidzi. Mutsigiri wemutambo wenhabvu VaWebster Chimusasa vanoti varairidzi vemuno vakaita saTembo ndivo vanofanira kutambidzwa basa rekurairidza maWarriors. KuFrance chikwata chaTino Kadewere cheLyon chakapinda muma semi fainari eUefa Champions League mushure mekurova Man City 3-1. Lyon yave kusangana neBayern Munich neChitatu iyo yakazvambura Barcelona 8-2. Parizvino, Kadewere ari muHarare umo ari kuchema mukoma wakePrince uyo akashaika svondo rapera. Asi Knowledge Musona haana mufaro mushure mekunge AS Eupen yazvamburwa 4-0 neClub Brugge. As Eupen yadzika kusvika pachinhanho chegumi neshanu kubva pachinzvimbo chepfumbamwe. Musona uyo akatamba neClub Brugge akazobuditswa achitsiviwa naMatinez Diaz.
title: Zvikwata ZvaKhama Billiati naTino Kadewere Zvodadisa Mumitambo yeNhabvu

text: Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vanoti vari kufarira zvikuru chirongwa chekubviswa kwaitwa nekanzuru yavo mari yemuripo pazvikwereti zvemvura zvavanazvo kukanzuru. Zvichitevera kubviswa kwemari idzi pazvikwereti zvavanazvo, vamwe vagari vatanga kubhadhara zvikwereti zvavo zvishoma nezvishoma vachivhurirwa mvura, dzimwe dzange dzave nemakore dzavharwa. Guta reMasvingo mubhajeti yaro yegore rino 2018 rakabuda nechisungo chekuti vagari havachasungirwi kubhadhara mari dzinoberekwa nezvikwereti zvavo, kana kuti interest. Danho iri rakatambirwa zvikuru nevagari avo vanonzi vakatanga kuita chipata pata vachienda kukanzuru kundobhadhara zvikwereti zvavo, izvo zvavari kataurirana nekanzuru kuti vanobhadhara zvishoma nezvishoma kusvika vapedza. Vanenge vabvumirana kubhadhara mari idzi nekanzuru vari kubva vavhurirwa mvura kuti vaishandise. Mumwe mugari, VaZororo Makore, vanoti vaive nechikwereti chakakura nenyaya yema interest asi paakabviswa vakatotanga kubhara vakavhurirwa mvura yavo iyo yakavhrwa mugore ra 2015. "Ini ndohwa kufara nezvakaita kanzuru nekuti mukatariswo chikwereti change change chiri $1000 asi ne interest change chava pa $1500 asi nekuti vakwanisa kubvisa interest iya, ndakukwanisa kubhadhara ende kubva patakaita payment plan vakabva vavhura mvura takukwanisa kushandisa mvura sevamwe vese," vadaro VaMakore. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rinomiririra kodzero dzevagari, reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, Amai Esther Nyambiya, vanoti vanotambira danho iri nemufaro. Asi vanoti kanzuru inofanira kuongorora nyaya yezvikwereti zvemvura yavakatemera vagari vainge vavhariwa mvura kwenguva yakareba. "Isu tinozvitambira tinoona zvakanaka kanzuru yaterera zvataichema kwemakore kuti ma interests charges aya anoita burden iwande kuma residents, asi tanga tichionawo kuti kune vamwewo vekuti vanenge vakavharirwa mvura kana muna 2015 bhiri roramba richiuya roratidza kunge iwe uri kushandisa mvura iyo yakavharwa mita isiri kufamba tanga tichikururdzirwo kuti vekanzuru pavabvisa maintrest emvura idzodzi vabve vabvisawo ma charges akaita seiwaya nekuti munhu anenge achibhdara zvaasina kushandisa saka tinoona zvisina kutinakira sema residents," Amai Nyambiya vatsanangura. Kanzuru yeMasvingo yaigaro chema nekuti kusabhadharwa kwezvikwereti zvemvura nevagari kwaiitadzisa kuti iuyise mvura yakachena uye inokwanira vanhu muguta. Dzimba dzakavhariwa mvura mudhorobha reMasvingo kwemakore mashoma apfuura dzinopfuura zviuru zvishanu, uye dzichigara vanhu vanopfuurawo zviuru makumi maviri. Kanzera we Ward 4 muMasvingo, VaGodfrey Kurauone, vati vanhu vazhinji vave kubhadhara vachivhuriwa mvura yavo mushure mekuita chibvumirano chekubhadhadhara chikwereti pashoma nepashoma. VaKurauone vati havasati vave nehuwandu hwedzimba dzavhurirwa mvura dzava ngani. "Isu tinofara chose nekupindura kwevanhu nenyaya yatakataurirana yekubvisira ma interest, tiri kuona ndechimwe chinhu change chakavabata vachitadza zvichivagununúnisa kubhadhara zvikwereti zvavo, ndirikuona vari kuuya vachibhadhara vaita ma payment plans vachiita zvishoma nezvishoma, hatisati tave ne ma figure asi vanhu vari kuuya," vadaro VaKurauone. Vagari muMasvingo pamwe nemapazi ehurumende ane chikwereti chekanzuru chinopfuura mamiriyoni makumi matatu emadhora izvo kanzuru inoti zviri kuitadzisa kuitira vagari mabasa ainotarisirwa kuitwa. No media source currently available
title: Vagari Vofarira Kubviswa kweMitero paZvikwereti zveMvura

text: Imwe nyanzvi munyaya yekugadzirwa kwemichina yeruzivo, VaDominic Tapfuma, vanoti vave nemakore mapfumbamwe vachigadzira nzira itsva yechishandiso, kana kuti App, inenge iri pakombiuta nenharembozha, ichaita kuti vanhu vakwanise kudzidza mutauro wemaoko. VaTapfuma, avo vanoshandira rimwe bhanga muHarare vanoti apu iyi ichaita kuti vanhu vakurumidze kubata mutauro wemaoko. "Chirongwa ichi ndakachipa zita rekuti purple signs, zvichienderana nehumambo hweruvara hwe purple, humambo hwekunzwisisana pakutaura. Saka chirongwa ichi ndechekuti kana iwewe uri munhu anonzwa kana asinganzwe ndinenge ndichida kuti munge muchinzwisisana," vadaro VaTapfuma. VaTapfuma vanoti vakapihwa shungu yekuita izvi mushure mekunge vaona dambudziko riri kusangana nevasingagone kutaura kana kunzwa. VaTapfuma vanoti vakawanda vasingagone kutaura kana kunzwa vari kushaya mikana muhupenyu nepamusana pekutadza kuenda kuchikoro chaiko. VaWonderful Mupazviribwo, avo vane makore makumi matatu nematanhatu, vanoshanda pamwechete naVaTapfuma. Vanoti zviri kushingairirwa naVaTapfuma zvinogona kuzobatsira vasingagone kutaura kana kunzwa apo vanotsvaga zvavanoda munzvimbo dzakaita semuma bhanga. Va Simba Nyakupinda vanoti chirongwa chaVa Tapfuma chikabudirira, chinofanira kuzoshandiswa muzvikoro. "Vana pavanodzidziswa kuti zita rangu ndini Tawanda, in English unoti chakati, dai paripo panonzi in sign language unodai so. Kuitira kuti nevadiki ivavo vanowaniswa ma skills ekuti vakasanga nemunhu anotaura sign language havashamisweba. Vanokwanisa kubva vataura naye nemutauro iwoyo. Vanokwanisa kutotamba naye nekuti vanenge vadzidziswa matauriro anoitwa ne sign language," vadaro VaNyakupinda. /////////End Act////////// VaNyakupinda vanoti kudzidzira mutauro wemaoko kwakakoshera munhu wese muZimbabwe, kwete vana voga. Muzvare Patience Mutipidzi, avo vari kuita zvidzidzo zvavo zvekutapa nhau vari muHarare, vanotsigira kuti dambudziko rakatarisana nevasingagone kutaura kana kunzwa, rakakura chose. Muzvare Mutipidzi vanoti matanho ari kutorwa naVaTapfuma akakosha, asi hurumende inofanira kupindirawo munyaya iyoyi kuti zvinhu zvinyatsogadzirike. "I think kunofanira kuitwa ma classes, ma lessons chaiwo kubva mwana achitanga kana grade one odzidziswa sign language, yova one of the languages dzevana ivavo achingodzidziswa ma basics. Kana azosangana nemunhu akadaro haachamunyenyeredzi, asi anokwanisa kutaura naye ma basics achona," vadaro Muzvare Matipidzi. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Mzvare Evenia Muzira, vanoti chiri kufadza ndechekuti vamwe vemachechi vave kuenda vachibatsira pamatambudziko anosangana nevasingagone kutaura kana kunzwa. "Dambudziko iri rinenge riri kugadziriswa, nekuti kuchechi kwandinopinda ku Seventh Day Adventist kutori ne department rinonzi re special needs rinova rinevanhu vasinganzwi nevamwe vasingagone kutaura. Department iroro ritori nevamwe vanorimiririra, rine vanhu vanoti kana pachitaurwa zviye muchechi ivo vanenge vachito interpreter kuti vange vachitonzwisisanawo nevamwe, vadaro Muzvare Muzira. Vakawanda vane ruzivo nezviri kuitwa naVaTapfuma, vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti apu iri kugadzirwa iyi, ibudirire, kuitira kuti remangwana revanotaura nemutauro wemaoko, pamwe nevakaremara, rijeke. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Yogadzira "App" Ichashandiswa Mumutauro weMaoko

text: Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Dr John Mangudya vanoti Zimbabwe yakwanisa kuwana mari dzinodiwa kuti ibhadhare mari dzemitero dziri kuiswa pachikwereti chayo kana kuti maarrears. Zimbabwe ine chikwereti chinosvika mabhiriyoni gumi kusanganisa mitero yekutadza kubhadhara iyi anosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete nemazana masere emadhora kana kuti US$1,8 billion. Mari iyi iri kuda kubhadharwa kumabhanga akaita seIMF, World Bank, Paris Club, African Development Bank nedzimwe nyika. Kutadza kubhadhara mari iyi kwapa kuti pashaye anokweretesa Zimbabwe mari zvopa kuti hupfumi huende kumawere. Dr Mangudya vanoti vari kukwereta mari kune mamwe masangano avasina kuda kudomwa nemutero uri pasi kuti vabhadhare chikwereti ichi. Zimbabwe yakambozivisa kuti yaizobhadhara chikwereti ichi muna Kubvumbi ikazoti ichabhadhara muna Chikumi asi zvakakona n'anga murapwa achida. No media source currently available
title: Gavhuna weRBZ Anoti Zimbabwe Yobhadhara Chikwereti kuIMF neWorld Bank neMamwe Masangano Muna Gunyana

text: Sezvinozivikanwa pasi rose kuti nhabvu inobatanidza marudzi ose zvisineyi nekuti unobvepi uye unotarura rumirimi rwupi, mutambo uyu wave kushandiswawo nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuBritain mukuunganidza mhuri yeZimbabwe iri munyika iyi. Sangano rezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe reTeam Zimbabwe, rakaronga makwikwi emutambo wenhabvu wepamusoro apo zvikwata gumi nezvina zvezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakarwira mukombe weZimbabwe Community Shield nemusi weSvondo 15 Nyamavhuvhu. Imwe nhengo yeTeam Zimbabwe, vari zvakare mumwe wevanoronga makwikwi aya, VaWellington Muringai, vanoti vanotora mukana wemutambo uyu kuunganidza zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kuti zvirambe zvichizivana, kanawo kuumba hushamwari hutsva sezvo vanhu vakawanda vachibuda kunoona nhabvu. VaMuringai vanoti vanoshandisawo zvakare makundano enhabvu aya kuona vatambi venhabvu vatsva avo vavanozosvitsa mazita avo kumasangano enhabvu ari kuZimbabwe kuitira kuti vatambi ava vazosarudzwawo pane vanenge vachizotambira zvikwata zvenyika. VaMuringai vanotiwo makore ose adarika makundano aya vanosiaita muna Kubvumbi pamhemberero yekuzvitonga, asi nekuda kwemitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda reCovid-19 iyo yairambidza kuungana kwevanhu muBritain, gore rino vakazoaita muna Nyamavhuvhu. Vanokurudzirawo vana veZimbabwe vari kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana kuti vatore mikana yekuungana kuitira kuti varambe vari mhuri imwechete. No media source currently available
title: Nhabvu Yoshandiswa kuUnganidza Mhuri yeZimbabwe kuBritain

text: Bato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rakwira kudare repamusorosoro richida kuti dare iri rimise sarudzo dzeBy-Election dzakaziviswa kuti dzichaitwa muna Kurume mumatunhu eMount Darwin West, nekuChirumhanzi-Zibagwe, richiti hurongwa hwacho hahusi pamutemo. No media source currently available Magweta ebato iri, eAtherstone and Cook, anoti asvitsa magwaro awo kudare iri neChishanu achida kuti rimise kugara kwedare rinotambira mazita evanhu vachakwikwidza. Mashoko atiri kutambira anoti anoti dare reChirumhanzi-Zibagwe rakatogara neChina rikatambira mazita evanhu vashanu vachakwikwidza musarudzo. Vachakwikwidza ava vanosanganisira mudzimai wemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, Amai Auxillia Mnangagwa. Gweta riri kumirira MDC-T, VaChris Mhike, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanga vakabatikana asi vatenda kuti vasvitsa magwaro aya. Bato reMDC-T riri kunyunyuta nekusavepo kwegwaro revavhoti pamwe nekushaiswa mukana kwevanhu vanoda kunyoresa kuti vave vavhoti. Vakwirirwa dare vanoti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vakazivisa zuva richiatwa sarudzo idzi, gurukota rezvemitemo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, mabharani mukuru wenyika, VaTobaiwa Mudede, sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Rita Makarau, pamwe nemuchuchisi wenyika, VaJohannes Tomana. Kunyange haro riri kuendesa hurumende kumatare, bato reMDC-T rakatozivisa kuti harisi kuzopinda musarudzo idzi kana mitemo inobata zvesarudzo isina kugadziriswa. Mount darwin west yamirirwa nevaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, kuchitiwo Chirumhanzi-Zibagwe yaimirirwa naVaMnangagwa. Munyori mukuru weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti ZEC inofanirwa kuita basa rayo zviri pamutemo pamwe nekutevedzera zvinodiwa nemitemo yesarudzo.
title: MDC-T Yokwirira Hurumende Matare

text: Vanhu vanodarika makumi maviri vanonzi vaurayiwa nemoto waparadza masango mudunhu reOregon riri kumawirira kweAmerica. Moto uyu unonzi wasiyawo zviuru nezviuru zvevamwe vanhu vamanikidzwa kutiza misha yavo, iyo iri kusara ichiparadzwa nemoto uyu. Mamwe matunhu ari kumawirira kweAmerica anoti Washington State neCalifornia ari mudambudziko remoto wesango uyu, uko vanhu vane chitsama vaurayiwawo vakawanda vachitizawo misha yavo. Moto uyu unonzi wave nemazuva vanodzimura moto vachinetseka kumisa kupararira kwawo. Vashandi vanodzimura moto vanodarika zviuru makumi matatu vanonzi vari mubishi kuedza kudzimura moto uri kuparadza mzvimbo dzakawanda kumawirira uyu. MuOregon moto uyu unonzi wapisa maeka anodarika miriyoni imwechete. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muguta reEugene mudunhu reOregon, uye ari muimbi ane mukurumbira, Doctor Thomas Tafirenyika Mukanya Mapfumo, vanoti kunyange hazvo ivo vari kure nekune moto uyu, guta ravo rakavharirwa neutsi hutema huri kuita kuti vasaone zuva kwemazuva. Doctor Mapfumo vanoti nekuda kwehutsi uhwu, vari kutogara vakazvivharira mudzimba, zvikuru munguva ino yechirwere cheCovid-19. Nyanzvi munze zvehutano dzinonzi dziri kukurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vasafema hutsi uhwu dzichiti hunogona kuwedzera dambudziko rechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available
title: Dunhu reOregon Nderimwe reMatunhu Aparadzwa neMoto kuMawirira eAmerica

text: Nhengo dzeparamende dzeMDC kusanganisira dzeZanu PF, dziri kukurudzira kuti vakuru muhurumende vakanokora mari muhomwe yePremier Service Medical Aid Society (PSMAS) kuti vasungwe. Vari kunzi vakawana mari kubva PSMAS vanosanganisira mutauriri waVaMugabe, VaGeorge Charamba, gurukota rezvehutano, VaDavid Parirenyatwa, nevamwe. Nhengo yeparamende inomirira Mabvuku-Tafara, VaJames Maridadi veMDC T, vanoti ivo nevamwe vavo vakakurudzirawo kuti paumbwe komiti inoongororawo bhodhi raitungamira PSMAS, uye kuti patorwe matanho ekuona kuti vanhu ava vadzosera mari idzi. Nhengo dzeZanu PF dzinosanganisira VaJoseph Chinotimba, VaMunyaradzi Kerekere pamwe naVaFortune Chasi ndevamwe vevanhu vanonzi vakakurudzira vaive mukuru wePSMAS, VaCuthbert Dube, kuti vadzosere mari inoda kusvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri emadhora yavanonzi vakatambira semuhoro pamwe neimwe inodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri yavakagowana nenhengo dzebhodhi mushure memisangano yavaigara. PSMAS inonzi yakabirwa mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi mana emadhora kuburikidza nemihoro yakakurisa yaipiwa vashandi, mari dzaibhadharwa nhengo dzebhodhi pamwe nedzimwe dzinonzi dzaibhadhrwa vanhu vainzi vachapa rubatsiro kuvashandi vaibatirwa mari dzavo dzekuti vagozorapwa pasi pechirongwa che PSMAS. VaParirenyatwa vanonziwo vakapiwa mari inodarika makumi manomwe ezviuru zvemadhora ichinzi ndeyebasa ravakanga vasati vatomboita. Nhengo yeZanu PF, vachiongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti vanofadzwa nekunzwa kuti vadare vakabatana mukutora danho rekukurudzira kuti vakamora mari idzi vasungwe. VaChirumhanzu vanoti iyi ndiyo yagara iri kurudziro yemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, yekuti vanoita zvehuwori vatorerwe matanho Asi VaMaridadi vanoti nyaya iyi ndiyo ichave munongedzo wekuti hurumende yeZanuy PF yakazvipira here kana kuti kwete kutora matanho ekuparadza huwori. No media source currently available
title: Vadare Vokurudzira Kuti Vakanokora Muhomwe yePSMAS Vasungwe

text: Masangano akazvimirira oga nemusi weChipirikuHoliday Inn muHarare akaparurwa gwaro rinotarisa mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvekodzero dzevanhu kana kuti Stakeholders Report on Zimbabwe’s Second Cycle Universal Periodic Review. Masangano anosvika makumi matanhatu ndiwo akaparura gwaro iri. Gwaro iri richaendeswa kuUnited Nations iyo yakatara zviga zana nemakumi matatu zvinofanira kutevedzwa nenyika dzepasi rino munyaya dzezvekodzero dzevanhu. United Nations yakatanga kushanda neZimbabwe mukuzadzikisa zviga izvi muna 2011 apo pakaitwa musangano weUnited Nations Universal Periodic Review. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vanokurudzirwa neUnited Nations kuti vazadzikise zviga izvi sezvo Zimbabwe iri nhengo yemubatanidzwa wenyika dzepasi rino uyu. Masangano akazvimirira aya ange achitarisa zvakagonekwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe uye zvisina kuitwa nemazvo. Mukuru we Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum VaLloyd Kuvheya vanoti pane zvinhu zvakawanda zvinoda kuitwa nehurumende mukuzadzikisa kuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available Masangano aya anoti mitemo yakaita sePublic Order and Security Act kana kuti POSA inofanira kubviswa. Masangano aya ari kukurudzirawo Zimbabwe kuti iise runyoro rwayo pamitemo yakaita seConvention Against Torture and Other Cruel, Inhuman or Degrading Treatment, International Convention for the Protection of All Persons Against Enforced Disappearances, 1961 United Nations Convention on Statelessness, Optional Protocols to the Convention on Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women, neInternational Covenant of Economic, Social and Cultural Rights.
title: MuGwaro kuUnited Nations, Masangano Akazvimirira Anoti Hurumende Yasarira paNyaya yeKodzero dzeVanhu

text: Vagari vekuMabvuku neTafara vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nekushaya hany’a kwekanzuru yeHarare kuti igadzirise dambudziko ravo rekushaya mvura. Vagari vanoti kushaya mvura uku kuri kukonzera zvirwere zvemidumbu zvisingaperi. Mumwe mugari wekuOld Tafara, VaCollen Chimuchenga, vati pamba pavo patove nemakore pasingabudi mvura. VaChimuchenga vati kunyange hazvo nguva yareba vachivimbiswa kuti dambudziko remvura iri richagadziriswa, vanoti kusvika pari zvino hapana chati chaitwa. Mumwe mugari wekuNew Tafara, Amai Matirasa Matemauswa, vatiwo zvinovashungurudza kuti vana vavo havatozivi kuti kune mvura inobuda mupombi dzemvura. Amai Matemauswa vati nekuda kwekushaya mvura uku, mhuri yavo inogarotambura nezvirwere zvemudumbu. Mumwezve mugari wekuMabvuku, Amai Sandra Kahondo, vatiwo vari kutorarama nemvura yemuzvibhorani asi vachemachema nekushomekwa kwazvo. Amai Kahondo vati nekuda kwekureba kunenge kwakaita mitsetse vanomanikidzwa kuzochera mvura pakati pehusiku asi vakati dzimwe dzenguva vanosangana nedambudziko rembavha. Vanomirira Mabvuku Tafara mudare reParamende, VaJames Maridadi, vati nzvimbo yavo yawandisa vanhu kudarika zvaitarisirwa izvo zviri kuita kuti dzimwe nzvimbo dzishaye mvura. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vati vave kukwanisa kupa dzimwe nzvimbo dzekuMabvuku neTafara mvura katatu pasvondo. VaChideme vatiwo pari zvino Mabvuku neTafara hadzisi kuwana mvura nekuda kwekuti kanzuru ir kuchenesa nzvimbo inochengeterwa mvura inoenda kunzvimbo idzi yePrince Edward Reservoir. No media source currently available
title: Mabvuku neTafara Dzoshaya Mvura yeMupombi

text: Dare repamusoro rakomekedza mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, kuti vadzosere vana vatatu kumudzimai wavo wavari kunetsana naye, Muzvare Marry Mubaiwa. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaChristopher Dube Banda, vatura mutongo wekuti VaChiwenga vadzosere vana vavo vatatu vachiri pasi pemakore gumi nemasere kuna Muzvare Mubaiwa, uyo wavari kurambana naye. VaChiwenga vanzi vadzosere vana ava mukati memaawa maviri kubva paturwa mutongo uyu nedare. VaChiwenga vakatora vana ava Muzvare Mubaiwa vari mujeri mushure mekusungwa kwavakaitwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kuuraya ivo VaChiwenga, kufojera mapepa emuchato VaChiwenga vari muhurwere pamwe nekuburitsa kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo mari inodarika miriyoni imwe nemazana mapfumbamwe emadhora ekuAmerica. Mumutongo wavo, VaDube Banda vatiwo VaChiwenga vabvumidze Muzvare Mubaiwa kugara pamba yavo yavaigara vachiri pamwe chete yekuBorrowdale sezvakanga zvaturwa nedare uye kuti vasavatadzise kugara pamba apa. VaChiwenga vakanga vachirambidza Muzvare Mubaiwa kugara pamba apa vachiti havangagare nemunhu aida kuvauraya uye ivo vari mufakazi pamhosva dziri kupomerwa Muzvare Mubaiwa. VaDube Banda vatiwo zvakare VaChiwenga vadzosere midziyo yavakatora kubhizimusi raMuzvare Mubaiwa reOrchid Gardens riri kuDomboshava vachishandisa motokari yemasoja uye kuti vasavhiringidze zvinoitwa pabhizimusi iri. Dare rati midziyo iyi idzoswe mukati memaawa makumi maviri nemana Mutongi wedare ati Muzvare Mubaiwa vadzoserwe motokari nhatu dzavakanga vatorerwa naVaChiwenga uye dare rati VaChiwenga vabhadhare magweta aMuzvare Mubaiwa panyaya iyi. Muzvare Mubaiwa vanga vakamirirwa negweta ravo, VaTaona Nyamakura, uye VaChiwenga vanga vakamirirwa naAdvicate Lewis Uriri. VaUriri vati vatokwidza kupikisa kwavo mutongo uyu mudare repamusorosoro, ukuwo VaNyamakura vati VaChiwenga vanofanirwa kutevedza mutongo wedare kudzamara chichemo chanzwikwa nedare repamusoro soro. Please add comments from Nyamakura and Uriri. Have the papers been served to Chiwenga? Did he comply with the order? Zvichakadai, rimwe gweta remuHarare, VaKudzayi Kadzere, vati chinofadza pamutongo waturwa nedare uyu ndechekuti dare rakoshesa bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mumapepa ari pamberi pematare, VaChiwenga vanoti Muzvare Mubaiwa vakabvisa zvaishandiswa nanachiremba muchipatara chekuSouth Africa pavaiyedza kuvararamisa vachirwara vaine chinangwa chekuti vafe. Vanotiwo mudzimai wavo akaburitsa mazakwatira emari kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo vakatenga dzimba mbiri nemotokari nhatu dzemhando yepamusoro kuSouth Africa kwakare. Pamusoro pezvo, VaChiwenga vanoti Muzvare Mubaiwa vakafojera mapepa ekuti vachate vose ivo VaChiwenga vari muhurwere pamuchato usina kuzobudirira. Asi Muzvare Mubaiwa vari kuramba mhosva dzose dzavari kupomerwa idzi. VaChiwenga vakazokwidza nyaya yekurambana kwavo kumatare vachida kuti vagovaniswe pfuma yavo nemudzimai wavo mushure mekudzoka munyika muna Zvita vachibva kuChina kwavairapwa. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rinoti VaChiwenga Ngavadzosere Vana Kuna Muzvare Marry Mubaiwa

text: Varairidzi vanoti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kutambisa nguva yavo vachityityidzira varairidzi vasiri kuenda kumabasa, Varairidzi ava vanoti dai VaMnangagwa vatsvaga nzira dzekugadzirisa dambudziko remihoro rakatarisana nevarairidzi munyika. Varairidzi vakawanda vanoti vari kukatyamadzwa zvikuru nemashoko emutungamiri wenyika avakataura kwaMutare vachiti hurumende yavo haizobvumi kumanikidzwa kuita zviri kudiwa nevarairidzi vakati vasiri kuenda kumabasa vachanyimwa mihoro yavo. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira varairidzi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vati hurumende ndiyo iri kutombunyikidza varairidzi nekuvamanikidza kuti vaite zvisingagoneki. VaZhou vati nyaya iripo ndeyekusakwana kwemihoro nekudaro hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa kuti varairidzi vawane mari inoita kuti vararame pamwe nekukwanisawo kuendesa vana vavo kuzvikoro. Vachipindura panyaya yekuti hurumende haina mari yekupa varairidzi, VaZhou vatiwo zvinovashamisa kuti vamwe vashandi vehurumende vakadai semasoja nemapurisa vari kutambira mari yakawanda kudarika varairidzi. VaZhou vatiwo hurumende ngaiise pachena mari dziri kutambirwa nevashandi vese muhurumende vachiti hazvibatsiri kuti vamwe vashandi vehurumende vanotambira mari yepamusorosoro vamwewo vachitambira mari isingakwani kuti vachengete nhuri dzavo. Munyori mukuru musangano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, VaRobson Chere, vati chero vakanyimwa mari nekuti havasi kumabasa hazvina musiyano wakanyanya sezvo mari yacho yavari kutambira iri shoma shoma zvichienzaniswa nemari inodiwa kuti munhu ararame pamwedzi wega wega. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Teachers Association, VaRichard Gundani, vatsinhirawo vachiti varairidzi vane chido chakanyanya chekuenda kubasa asi vakati hazvibatsiri kuvati vaende kumabasa ivo vasina zvikwanisiro zvakakwana zvinoita kuti vaveko. VaGundani vatiwo vakazvipira kuita musangano nemutungamiriri wenyika kuitira kuti vanyatsovaonesa zviri kusangana nevarairidzi. Varairidzi vanoti vanoda mari dzemihoro dzinoenderana nemadhora mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri emari yekuAmerica, uye kuti kuzvikoro zvese kuitwe hurongwa hunobatsira kudzivirira kutapuriranwakwechirwere cheCOVID-19 kuti hutano hwavo nehwevadzidzi huchengetedzwe. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri waVaMnangagwa kuti tinzwe divi ravo pamshoko ari kubva kuvarairidzi. Vachitaura kwaMutare nezuro mushure mekushanyira nzvimbo dzakavhiringwa nedutumepengo reCyclone Idai kuChimanimani, VaMnangagwa vakati, hurumende yavo hayaizobvuma kumanikidzwa kuita zviri kudiwa nevarairidzi, vakatiwo vose vari kuramwa mabasa, vachashaya mihoro yavo. Asi masangano evarairidzi ari kuramba akatsika madziro achiti hurumende inofanirwa kutanga yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo kuitira kuti vadzokere kubasa. Vana sorojena varere muhapwa dzemakomo vakasiya vataura kuti panorwa mikono, uswa ndihwo hunokuvara. Ichi ichokwadi sezvo kunetsana kwehurumende nevarariridzi kuri kuvhiringa dzidzo yevana vechikoro. No media source currently available
title: Varairidzi Voshushikana neMashoko aVaMnangagwa

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vazivisa kuti mutevedzeri wavo VaConstantino Chiwenga avo vakarambana nemudzimai wavo, Muzvare Marry Mubaiwa, vakaroora mudzimai mutsva aive muchiuto, Colonel Miniyothabo Baloyi. Mashoko aya aziviswa kuburikidza nemunyori mukuru wedare remakurukota VaMisheck Sibanda.  Uyu muchato wechitatu wavachiwenga mukati memakore gumi nemaviri. VaChiwenga vainge vakamboroora Amai Jocely Mauchaza uye Muzvare Marry Mubayiwa.  Michato miviri iyi haina kupera zvakanaka sezvo yakanoperera kumatare paine kukakavadzana kunotyisa. VaChiwenga vainge vaine mumwe mudzimai vasati varoora
title: VaChiwenga Voroora Mudzimai weChitatu Mumakore Gumi neMaviri

text: No media source currently available Musangano mukuru weUnited Nations - Commission on the Status of Women, CSW 61, wekuzeya zviri kutarisana nevanhukadzi watanga zvakare neChitatu muguta reNew York mushure mekumbomiswa kwezuva rimwe nekuda kwechandomupengo. Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemadzamai muZimbabwe, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vanoti vari kufara nekutambirwa kwakaitwa zvinyorwa zvebasa rakabatwa nehurumende nemasangano akazvimirira mukurwisa dambudziko rekupambwa kwevanhukadzi vanenge vaenda kunoshanda kunyika dzakaika seKuwait. Amai Mutsvangwa, avo vari kumusangano uyu kuNew Yorki, vanoti Zimbabwe ichaenderera mberi ichiita zvirongwa zvekurwisa kupambwa kwevanhukadzi vachinomanikidzwa kuita mabasa avasingadi. Zvimwe zviri kuzeyiwa kumusangano uyu zvinosanganisira dambudziko rekuroodzwa kwevanasikana vasati vabvazera. "Tirikutarisira kudzidza nekudzidzisawo dzimwe nyika zvatadzidza pamusoro pedambudziko rekupambwa kwemadzimai nevanasikana vanenge vaenda kunotsvaga mabasa, uye nezve dambudziko rekuroodzwa kwevanasikana vasati vabva zera," Amai Mutsvangwa vaudza Studio 7.
title: Kupambwa kweMadzimai Kwozeyiwa nuNew York

text: Mutauriri wekomisheni inorwisa huori yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission VaJohn Makamure vaudza Studio 7 kuti gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reMasvingo VaEzra Chadzamira vakambodaidzwa kumahofisi avo vakabvunzurudzwa nenyaya yehuori yavari kupomerwa. VaMakamure vati vave pedyo nekupeta kuferefeta nyaya iyi uye vari kushandawo nehofisi yemuchuchusi mukuru wehurumende. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika vanotiwo VaChadzamira vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita huori panyaya yekupa vanhu minda yekurima nzimbe kuChiredzi. Muna Kubvumbi, mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga vakaudza VaChadzamira kuti vagovere zvakanaka minda yenzimbe yeKilimanjaro Project kuHippo Valley Estates yakatora mamiriyoni makumi mana kana kuti 40 million united states dollars kugadzirwa nekamban yeTongaat Hullet. Kambani iyi inoti yaiitira chirongwa ichi hurumende. Minda yakawanda inonzi yakapihwa hama neshamwari dzaVaChadzamira uye vakuru veZanu-pf mudunhu iri. Gweta raVaChadzamira, VaCharles Ndlovu vakaramba kutaura neStudio 7 nezvenyaya pavakabatwa panharembozha yavo.
title: Gurukota reDunhu reMasvingo VaChadzamira Voferefetwa neZACC neNyaya yeHuori

text: Mamwe masangano anomirira vadzidzisi anoti haasi kutambira zvakabvumiranwa nemusi weChipiri nehurumende nerimwe remasangano anomirira vashandi vehurumende reApex Council munhaurirano dzaiitwa pasi peNational Joint Negotiating Council, kana NJNC. NeChipiri, hurumende neveApex Council vakubvumirana kuti mushandi wehurumende anotambira mari iri pasi-pasi awedzerwe mari yake yemuhoro nezvikamu 139.23 percent, kubva musi waNdira 1 wegore rino. Izvi zvinoreva kuti mushandi anga achitambira madhora chiuru chine makumi mana nemashanu ari maRTGS, achazenge ave kutambira maRTGS zviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu, uye mari yakanzi nehurumende ichatanga kubhadharwa mukupera kwemwedzi unouya asi yemwedzi uno ichibhadharwa zviri zvidimu-zvidimu kana. Munyori mukuru musangano rinomirira vadzidzisi reZimbabwe Teachers Association, kana kuti Zimta, VaTapson Nganunu Sibanda, vaburitsa mashoko ekuti zvakabvumiranwa nehurumende neApex Council ndiwo magumo enhaurirano pakati pehurumende nevashandi vayo pari zvino. VaSibanda vaudzawo Studio 7 parunhare kuti vari kukurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti kuti dzichitanga kuita basa sezvadzinotarisrwa kuti dzinge dzichiita. Asi mamwe masangano akaita seAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti ARTUZ, pamwe nesangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti PTUZ, aramba kutambira zvakabvumiranwa nehurumende neApex Council izvi achiti zvakaitwa izvi kuzvidza vashandi. Mutauriri weARTUZ, VaNation Mudzitirwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti mari yawedzerwa nehurumende iyi yakafanana nemutero wembwa. Mashoko aVaMudzitirwa atsinhirwa nemutungamiri wePTUZ, VaTakavafira Zhou. VaMudzitirwa vati chavanoda ndechekuti vapihwe mari yakaringana nemadhora ekuAmerica mazana mashanu inenge iri pamusika wemabhanga kana kuti interbank rate. VaMudzitirwa vati nhengo dzavo dzicharamba dzisingakwanise kuenda kubasa zvichitevera kushomeka kwemari yawedzerwa nehurumende yavati idonhwe mugungwa. Izvi zvatsnhirwawo naVaZhou avo vati chinodikanwa ndechekuti hurumende igadzirise gakava riripo pakati payo nevashandi vayo nekukasika kuitira kuti vashandi vehurumende vakwanise kuenda kumabasa. Gurukota rezvevashandi, VaPaul Mavhima, vati kunyange hazvo vachida kuwedzera vashandi vavo nemari yavari kuda, homwe yehurumende yakabooka zvekuti havakwanise kuita izvi sezvo hupfumi hwenyika husina kumira zvakanaka. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vashandi Voramba Kutambira Mari Dzakawedzerwa neHurumende

text: Vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika amai Joice Mujuru vanoti neMuvhuro manheru vakatambira tsamba kubva kumutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vachiti vavamisa basa. Asi amai Mujuru vakaudza Studio 7 kuti tsamba iyi yainge yakakanganiswa chikamu chebumbiro remitemo remutemo chekupa chikonzero chekuvamisa basa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, VaMugabe vakadzingawo makurukota ehurumende masere, nemutevedzeri wegurukota mumwe chete. Vakadzingwa basa ava ndivaWesbter Shamu avo vange vari gurukota rezvehumizha hwema computer, gurukota ranga richiwona nezvedzidzo yepamusoro, Amai Olivia Muchena, gurukota ranga richiwona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaDzikamai Mavhaire, mutevedzeri wavo VaMunacho Mutezo, gurukota ranga richishanda riri muhofisi maVaMugabe, VaDidymus Mutasa, gurukota ranga richiwona nezvevechidiki, VaFrancis Nhema, gurukota ranga richiwona nezvevashandi, VaNicholas Goche pamwe engurukota ranga richiwona nezvedunhu re Mashonaland East, VaSimbaneuta Mudarikwa. Mutsamba yanyorwa nemunyori mukuru wedare remakurukota VaMisheck Sibanda, iyo iri mumaowoko eStudio 7, VaMugabe vashandisa chikamu 108(1)(a) chebumbiro idzva remitemo yenyika vachiti makurukota aya anga achitadza kuita basa sezvanga akatarisirwa. Mumwe wevadzingwa ava VaMavhaire vakamboita hasha pavakabvunzwa nezvekudzingwa kwavo. Asi vakazotenda VaMugabe nekumbovapa mukana wekushanda muhurumende yavo vachiti ivo vanoziva kuti vakaita zvose zvavaikwanisa kunyange hazvo zhinhu zvakawoma panguva iyo vasati vadzingwa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano reCentre for Community Development in Zimbabwe, VaGeorge Makoni vati zvaitwa izvi zvinoburitsa pachena kuti mu Zanu-PF magara mune kurongerana. Vaimbova mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzi reZINASU, VaPride Mukono, vati kudzingwa kwaitwa amai mujuru nemakurukota aya ayo anofungidzirwa kuti ari kuchikwata chaamai Mujuru kwakureva kuti nyaya yekuti ndiani achatora matomhu kuna VaMugabe haisati yatombotanga. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari nyanzvi zvakare munyaya dzekutorwa kwenhau, VaSydney Masamvu, vati zvaitwa izvi zvatosiya Zanu-PF yave nemaburi achanetsa kuvhara. Amai Mujuru varikupomerwa mhosva yekuronga zvekubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro zvechisimba asi vari kuramba mhosva iyi pamwe nedzimwe dzinosanganisira nyaya dzehuori. Kudzingwa kwaitwa amai Mujuru nemakurukota aya muhurumende kwave kureva kuti VaMugabe vachadoma vatevedzeri vatsva pamwe nekuvandudza dare remakurukota. Vazhinji vakatura neStudio 7 vatiwo kudzingwa basa kwamai Mujuru nemamwe makurukota kuno ratidza simba remudzimai wavo amai Grace Mugabe sezvo vakataura pavaiita misangano yavo kumatunhu kana kuti maPeople’s Rallies kuti mai Mujuru nevamwe vavo vaizodzingwa basa. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare akaramba kudomwa nezita anoti haafungi kuti vamugabe vaidzinga amai mujuru nevamwe vavo basa dai mudzimai wavo asina kupinda munyaya dzematongerwo enyika. Mumwewo mugari wemuHarare vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvaitika kuna Amai Mujuru zvagara zvakarongwa uye zvinoratidza kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu mubato reZanu-PF. Muzvare Tsitsi Dube vanogara mumusha weveruzhinji weGlen Norah vanoti varwadizwa chose nekudzingwa basa kwaamai mujuru vachiti izvi zvaratidza kuti VaMugabe vaida kubata madzimai kumeso apo vakadoma amai Mujuru semutevedzeri wavo. Vati chivimbo chavo ndechekuti VaMugabe vachadoma mumwe mudzimai zvekare kuti atore chinzvimbo chasiiwa naamai mujuru.mukuru wemedia centre zvakare vachiongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaEanerst Mudzengi, vati kudzingwa kwaamai Mujuru nevamwe vavo kuchasiya bato reZanu-PF riine zinyekenyeke. Asi mumwe mutori wenhau akanyora pamusoro paamai Mujuru kwenguva yakareba zvakare ari nhengo yesangano rinomiriria vapepeti venhau, VaBarnabas Thondhlana anoti kudzingwa kwevanhu ava hakuna zvakaunobatsira nyika. Mashoko aVaThondhlana atsigirwa nemutauriri weZimbabwe Crisis Coalition VaMfundo Mlilo avo vati makatamwa ari muzanu pf ari kuramba achivhiringa hupfumi hwenyika. Vati Zanu-PF sebato ririkutonga rinofanira kugadzirirsa hupfumi kuti vanhu vawane mabasa nekugara zvakanaka asi izvi hazvisi kutika sezvo vanhu vari kuepdza nguva vachirwisana. Vati semuenzaniso neMuvhuro gurukota rezvemari, VaPartick Chinamasa vakatadza kupinda mumusangano wekuzeya bhajeti regore rinouuya nenhengo dzeparamende vari kumusangano weZanu-PF. Amai Mujuru vevamwe vavo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuti vaida kubvisa vamugabe pachinzvimbo zviri kunzwe kwemutemo. Asi hapana humbowo huzere huri kupihwa. No media source currently available
title: Amai Mujuru neMamwe Makurukota eHurumende Vodzingwa Basa

text: Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, Doctor Musa Kika, vanoti hurumende iri kuda kushandisa mabasa anoitwa nevanoprurikidza mwero mukumbunyikidza masangano anoshanda akazvimirira oga. Izvi zvinotevera danho rakatorwa nedare remakurukota rekuvandudza mutemo wePrivate Voluntary Organisations Act (Chapter 17:05). Gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati hurumende yainge yatambira bhiri rakabva kugurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, rekuvandudza kunyoreswa kunoitwa masangano akazvimirira oga nemashandiro awo senzira yekuyedza kudzivirira kuti asashandiswe kufambisa mari dzevanopfurikidza mwero. Amai Mutsvangwa vakati masangano akazvimirira oga anenge asisatarisirwe kupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vanofanira kubhadhara mari kuti vashande. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaZiyambi sezvo vasina kupindura mibvunzo yedu. Asi VaKika vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chakaipa kudzivirira mabasa evanopfurikidza mwero asi vakati maoko ehurumende haana kuchena sezvo yagara yabuda pachena kuti inotora masangano akazvimirira oga semapato anopikisa. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoronga Kumbunyikidza Masangano Akazvimirira Oga Ichiti Iri Kurwisa Matororo?

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo vamisa basa zvekare sakanzura weWard 17 meya weguta reHarare VaJacob Mafume veMDC Alliance avo vachangobva mukudzoka kubasa mushure mekunge vambomiswa zvakare basa. Asi VaMafume vari kutsika madziro vachiti vacharamba vachienda kubasa.Mutsamba kuna VaMafume, VaMoyo vati zviri pachena kuti vari kutyora zvakatarwa nedare kuti vasataure nezvapupu panyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuita zvehuori nekuenda kubasa kune vamwe vavakanzi vasataure navo. VaMoyo vati pavanenge vakamiswa basa VaMafume havafanire kutambiriswa mari nekanzuru. Mukuzeya nyaya iyi tabata vaMafume. VaMafume vakambosungwa muna Zvita 2020 vachipomerwa mhosva yehuori panyaya yekutengesa dzimba asi nyaya iyi haisati yapera kutongwa kumatare, VaMafuma vaidza Studio 7 kuti hurumende yave kushandisa mukana wekuvamisa basa kuti iite zvehuori sezvo pasina ari kupikisa zvainenge ichiita. Vanofanobata chigaro chameya kana VaMafume vasipo, VaStewart Mtizwa varamba kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vachiti VaMoyo ndivo vanokwanisa kutaura nezvayo.
title: Meya weGuta reHarare VaMafume Vomiswa Basa Zvekare Asi Vachivimbisa Kuramba Vachienda kuBasa

text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vakakundikana kuenda kudare redzimhosva reRandburg muSouth Africa nemusi weChipiri uko vanga vachitarisirwa kutongwa nemhosva yekurova nekukuvadza zvakaipisisa mumwe musikana wemunyika iyi. Izvi zvinonzi zvakaitika pane imwe hotera iri muSandton muJohannesburg usiku hwemusi weSvondo mushure mekunge Amai Mugabe vawana musikana uyu aine vanakomana vavo Chatunga Bellarmine naRobert Junior muhotera iyi. Musikana uyu, uyo anonzi Gabriella Engels, anonzi akamhan’ara nyaya yake kumapurisa izvo zvakazoita kuti Amai Mugabe vaendeswe kumatare edzimhosva uko vanga vachitarisirwa nenguva dzahwani masikati. Mamwe mashoko anoti Amai Mugabe vakazvipira voga kumapurisa mushure mekunge Gabriella amhan'ara kumapurisa, asi mamwe mashoko anoti Amai Mugabe havana kuenda kumapurisa zvichinzi vainge vatodzokera kuZimbabwe. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vari sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum, Advocate Gabriel Shumba, avo vari muSouth Africa, vanoti zvakaitwa naAmai Mugabe zvinonyadzisa, kwete ivo chete, asi kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri munyika iyi. Advocate Shumba vanoti kana chiri chokwadi kuti Amai Mugabe vadzokera kumusha vasina kupinda mudare, zvinoreva kuti pose pavachapinda muSouth Africa vanobva vangosungwa vachikandwa mujeri. "Zvazvinongoreva ndezvekuti kana vachinge vatiza sechiitiko ichi zvinenge zvichingoratidza kuti havachakwanise kudzoka kuSouth Africa, kuzhe kwokuti vachitongodzoka futi vachizviendesa kumatare edzimhosva. "Asi pavanozviindisa kumatare edzimhosva havachakwanisi kuti vangapiwa bail, kana kuti mari yekuti vahobhadhara vakatarisirwa kuzodzoka zvakare. Vanenge vakutovharirwa mujeri," Advocate Shumba vanodaro. Taedza kubata gurukota rinoona nezvemapurisa muSouth Africa VaFilike Mbalula pamwe chete nemutauriri webazi rezvekunze kwenyika iyi VaClayson Monyela sezvo vose vati vanga vari mumisangano yeSADC summit iri kuitwa munyika iyi. Zvichakadaro, bato reMDC-T rinoti rinoshora zvikuru zvakaitwa nemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika Amai Grace Mugabe. Mugwaro raburitswa nebato iri, mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu vanoti chiitiko ichi chinokanganisa zvikuru chimiro cheZimbabwe. Bato reMDC inotungamirirwa naMuzvinafundo Welshman Ncube raburitsawo mashoko ekushoropodza zvakaitwa naAmai Mugabe izvi richiti zvinoratidza kuti mhuri yekwaMugabe haichisingori chinyadzo chete asi kuti yatove kukanganisawo kugadzikana kwenyika. Bato iri rinoti saAmai venyika, Amai Mugabe vaifanirwa kuve mucherechedzo wakanaka. No media source currently available
title: Amai Mugabe Vanonzi Vanosvova Kubuda muSouth Africa Mushure Mekukwirirwa Dare

text: Nyika dzakawanda pamwe nemasangano akasiyanasiyana pasi rose vave kutora matanho akasiyanasiyana ekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hwechirwere che coronavirus, icho chinonzi chabata vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe pamwe nekuuraya vamwe vanodarika zviuru zvitatu pasi rose. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vazivisa neChitatu kuti hapana mushandi wehurumende achabvumidzwa kufamba achienda kunze kwenyika, senzira yekudzivirira kuti chirwere ichi chisapinda munyika. Gurukota rezvehutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo, vakazivisawo zvakare kuti hurumende yave kuti vanobva kumatunhu akabatwa nedambudziko rechirwere ichi vaburitse magwaro akadhindwa navanachiremba kuti havana kubata chirwere ichi Sangano rinoona nezvehutano pasi rose, reWorld Health Organisation, rinonzi riri kukurudzirawo matanho akasiyanasiyana ekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi, anosanganisira kuti vanhu vasashandisa mari mukubhadhara zvitengwa, sezvo hutachiwana huchikwanisa kubatirawo pamari. Bhanga repasi rose, reWorld Bank, pamwe neIMF vakazivisawo neChipiri kuti gore rino havasi kuita misangano yavo yepagore inosiitirwa muWashington D.C. nekutyira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Gore rino masangano maviri aya akati achaita misangano iyi achishandisa madandemutande, kana kuti “virtual format”. Nyika ye Italy inonzi yazivisawo kuti ichambovhara zvikoro kwemasvondo maviri, kuchitiwo masangano emitambo yakasiyanasiyana ave kutorawo matanho anosanganisira kumbomisa mitambo yacho. Sachigaro vesangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Fortune Nyamande, vanoti zvakakosha kwazvo kuti vana veZimbabwe vari munyika dzakasiyanasiyana vatevedzere nzira dzinenge dzichikurudzirwa kuti dzinodzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Doctor Nyamande vanotiwo vanhu vanofanirwa kutorawo matanho ekuzvichengetedza akaita sekugeza maoko, kuvhara muromo kana vachikosora, kusabatana maoko pamwe nekusaungana. No media source currently available
title: Nyika Dzakawanda Dzotora Matanho eKudzivirira Coronavirus

text: Varimi vakawanda vanoti vari kutambira nemufaro mutengo mutsva wave kutengwa navo mbesa dzavo neGrain Marketing Board, asi vari kuchema kuti mitengo yembeu nezvimwe zvavanoda pakurimisa iri kuramba ichikwira zvakanyanya. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti mbesa dzinoti chibage, zviyo, mhunga nemapfunde zvave kutengwa nemari inoita zviuru zvina zvemadhora emunyika, kubva pamadhora zviuru zviviri nezana mumwaka wekurima wa2019/2020. Mukuru werimwe sangano revarimi, reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers’ Union, VaJeremiah Tevera, vanoti zvinofadza kuti hurumende yaona kuti mutengo wanga uripo hauchakwanisa kubatsira varimi, asi vanoti mutengo mutsva wezvirimwa uyu ngausadzinganiswa nekuda kwezvimwe zvinodiwa nevarimi. "Dambudziko ratinaro muZimbabwe nderekuti pese panokwidzwa price yembesanwa dzedu tinosangana nekukwira kwema price ezvinhu zvakawanda," VaTevera vanodaro. Vanoti varimi vacharamba vakaomerwa nekuda kwekuti mutengo wembeu nefotereza nezvimwe zvavanoda mukurimisa uri kukwira zuva nezuva, pamwe chete nemutengo wemafuta edzimotokari avanoshandisa mukurima, ayo ari kukwira svondo roga roga. No media source currently available
title: Varimi Vanotambira Mutengo weChibage kuGMB Asi Vachichema neKudhura kweZvekurimisa

text: Mamwe masangano anomirira varairidzi, anoti reZimbabwe National Union of School Heads neProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, ari kukurudzira hurumende kuti iendese mberi kuvhurwa kwezvikoro kusvika panopera chando senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda reCovid-19 muzvikoro. Masangano maviri aya aya anoti nekuda kwekukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa pamwe nekufa neCovid-19, zvakakosha kutora matanho anochengetedza vana pamwe nevarairidzi. Zvikoro zvinotarisirwa kuvhurwa nemusi weChipiri svondo rinouya. Sangano renhau reThe News Hawks rinoti sangano rinomirira vatungamiri vezvikoro, reZimbabwe National Union of Schools Heads, riri kukurudzira kuti zvikoro zvizovhurwa munguva yekudziya, zvakaita sepakati paNyamavhuvhu. Ukuwo, mukuru weProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti zvikoro hazvifanirwe kuvhurwa nguva ino yechando sezvo muzvikoro musina zvikwanisiro zvekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana. Doctor Zhou vanpoti sangano ravo rave nesvondo richikurudzira kuti hurumende isaenderere mberi nehuronhwa hwekuvhurwa nwezvikoro, vachiti sevarairidzi vakazvipira kudzidzisa pamadandemutande kuburikidza nedzinharembozha. Vanoti hurumende chayo chainofanirwa kuita kupa varairidzi pari dzekuti vakwanise kutenga zvinodiwa kuti vakwanise kudzidzisa nepanharembozha, uyewo kuti iwanise vana vasina nharembozha kuitira kuti vakwanise kudzidza vari kudzimba. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dzinoti nekuda kwekuti munguva yekutonhora vanhu vanogara munzvimbo dzinodziya vakaungana, hutachiwana hunogona kupararira nekukasika. Mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bazi ravo richatanga ranzwa zvichabuda mumusangano wemakurukota wesvondo rino kuti rizoziva matanho ekutora. No media source currently available
title: Varairidzi Vokurudzira Kuvhurwa kweZvikoro Chando Chapera Kuitira Kudzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19

text: Nhengo mbiri dzeMDC Alliance mudunhu reHarare, VaAllan Moyo, naVaLameck Bizure, pamwe nemudzimai wakanzura we Ward 16, VaDenford Ngadziore, Lydia Mulenga nemwana wavo ane mwedzi minomwe, vanonzi vakapambwa nezuro manheru nevanhu vakanga vakapfeka mbatya dzemauto pamwe nedzepamurisa vachifamba nePuma yemauto. VaMoyo vanoti vakatorwa vakatotandara zvavo vari pamba paVaBizure, vakakandwa muPuma yemauto iyi vachizoendwa navo kuDzivaresekwa uko vakasiya vakandwa mushure mekurohwa pamwe nekushungurudzwa. VaMoyo vanoti vakazowanawo mumwe ane tsiye nyoro akazovatakura kuenda navo kukamba yemapurisa yeMabereign Police Station uko vakavhurisa dhoketi rekupambwa pamwe nekushurungurudzwa kwavo. Dhoketi ravakavhurisa riri pasi penhamba dzinoti R-R-B 4421892. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vakaudza Studio 7 nezuro usiku kuti vakanga vasati vanzwa nezvenyaya iyi, sezvo zvakaitika kwadoka. Asi VaMoyo vanoti vanofunga kuti kupambwa nekushurudzwa kwavo uku kune chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika, sezviri kungoitika kune dzimwe nhengo dzebato ravo dziri kungopambwa dzchishungurudzwa. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo Mbiri dzeMDC Alliance Dzinopambwa neKurohwa neVanhu Vainge Vakapfeka Mbatya dzeMauto neMapurisa

text: Rimwe remasangano anomirira vashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti hutungamiri hwaro hwakasangana mukupera kwesvondo hwakasunga kuti vashandi vapinde mukuratidzira vachinyunyuta nekuramba vachirasikirwa nemabasa pamwe nekumbunyikidzwa kwemasangano anomirira vashandi. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti kuratidzira uku kuchaitwa neMugovera mumaguta anoti Hharare, Bulawayo, Gweru, Chinhoyi neMutare. VaMoyo vanoti vashandi vakarasikirwa nemabasa kare ndivo vachapinda mukuratidzira uku, kunyange hazvo vachiri pamabasa vakasununguka kupindawo. “Vashandi vari kuratidzira ava, vakarasikirwa nemabasa, ndivo vakasarudza zuva remusi weMugovera,” vanodaro VaMoyo. “Avo vachiri pamabasa vakasununguka kuuyawo asi hatidi kuti varasikirwe nemabasa.” VaMoyo vanoti vatozivisa mapurisa pamusoro pehurongwa hwekuratidzira uhwu uye havaone paine dambudziko sezvo mutemo uchivabvumidza kuratidzira. Vashandi vari kuramba vachirasikirwa nemabasa kubva pakapiwa mutongo nedare repamusorosoro wekuti makambani anokwanisa kumisa vashandi mabasa chero nguva. Makambani ari pasi pehurumende anonzi ave kushandisawo mutongo uyu kumisa vashandi mabasa. Kambani yeZimbabwe National Road Adminstration, ZINARA, iyo inoona nezvemigwagwa, inonziwo yakamisawo vashandi vanodarika mazana matatu mabasa. Imwe kambani iri pasi pehurumende, yeNational Railways of Zimbabwe, inonzi ine hurongwa hwekumisawo vashandi vanodarika chiuru mabasa. No media source currently available
title: ZCTU Yoronga Kuratidzira kweVashandi neKurasikirwa kweMabasa

text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wasachigaro webato reCitizens Coalition for Change VaJob Sikhala vanoti bato ravo harisi kufara nemashoko akataurwa nemutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi panyaya yeimwe nhengo yavebato ravo yakatsakatika paChibhanguza Shopping Centre, Nyatsime kuBeatrice, Muzvare Moreblessing Ali. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaNyathi nhasi sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo kuti tinzwe divi ravo pane zviri kutaurwa neveTripple C. Asi mumashoko kuvatori venhau, VaNyathi vakati humbowo hwaunganidzwa nemapurisa hunoratidza kuti vakapambwa nemumwe wavaimbodanana naye VaPius Jamba musi wa 24 Chivabvu. Vaviri ava vanonzi nemapurisa vakanetsana VaJamba ndokudhonzera Muzvare Moreblessing murima husiku uye vaviri ava havasati vazivikanwa kuti varipi. Asi VaSikhala vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kutaurwa navaNyathi handizvo zvavari kunzwa. Vati VaJambwa vanozivikanwa senhengo yeZanu-PF yagara ichipomerwa mhosva dzakaita sedzekuponda asi vasingasungwe nemapurisa. No media source currently available Sezvo tichitema tisina divi ratinorerekera tabatawo mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vati veCCC vanofanira kusiya mapurisa achiita basa ravo kwete kuda kupinza zvematongerwo enyika . No media source currently available
title: VaSikhala Vanoti Mapurisa Haasi Kutaura Chokwadi Pakutsakatika kwaMuzvare Moreblessing Ali kuChitungwiza

text: Dhora remuZimbabwe rafuma rakadonha zvakanyanya mushure mekunge gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ ,VaJohn Mangudya vazivisa neChipiri kuti vavandudza zvekare mutemo panyaya yemari vachiti hurumende haichatare mari inofanira kutengwa kana kutengeswa dhora remunyika pamusika. Dhora rekuAmerica range richitengwa nemadhora makumi manomwe emari yemuZimbabwe kana kuti 1:70 range rotengeswa nemari inodarika madhora makumi manomwe nemashanu kana kuti 1:75. RBZ inotiwo kambani inenge isina kushandisa mari yayo yekunze inenge iri mubhanga mukati memazuva makumi matatu ichatorerwa mari iyi yopuhwa mari yemaRTGS zvichienderana nekuti dhora rekuAmerica rakamira sei pazuva racho. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga uye vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti vari kutambira danho ratorwa neRBZ iri vachiti richapa kuti mabhizimisi ashande zviri nyore. No media source currently available Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vanoti VaMangudya varemerwa nemutoro uye danho ravo rekudzora dhora remuZimbabwe rainge risina maturo nekuti hapana ane chivimbo naro. No media source currently available
title: Dhora reZimbabwe Rodonha Zvakanyanya

text: Vanhu vakawanda vanoti gore ra2019 igore richapinda munhoorondo yemakore akaomera nyika mune zvematongerwo enyika pamwe nezveupfumi. Mukati megore iri makaitikawo zvakawanda zvinoshungurudza vanhu, nezvimwewo zvinofadza vamwe. Mukutanga kwegore ra2019, mauto akapomerwa mhosva yekuuraya vanhu vanosvika gumi nevaviri mushure mekunge vanhu vapinda mumigwagwa vachida kuratidzira. Vakawandawo vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nevatungamiri vevashandi nevemapato anopikisa vanonzi vakasungwa pamwe nekushungurudzwa nemapurisa, vamwe vavo vachikandwa mumajeri. Mapurisa anopomerwawo mhosva yekushandisa chisimba chakanyanya pakuparadza misangano yebato rinopikisa neMDC kwaaiita muna 2019, uye kurambidza bato iri kuita misangano. Munyaya dzezvehupfumi, hurumende yakadzika mutemo unorambidza kushandiswa kwemari yekunze. Kunyange hazvo yakaisawo mari yemunyika yemhando yeRTGS vamwe vanoti hazvina zvazvakagadzirisa sezvo dambudziko remari rakaramba richipinga nyika ndare, izvo zviri kukonzera kusagadzikana mune zvehupfumi. Zvipatara zvakapindawo dambudziko rekushaiwa vanachiremba kubva muna Gunyana kusvika pari zvino mushure mekunge varamwa mabasa vachida kuti hurumende igadzirise mihoro yavo. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakaumbawo zvakare dare revatungamiri vemapato akakwikwidza kusarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, rePolitical Actors’ Dialogue, POLAD, iro ravanoti ndiro riri kutungamira nhaurirano dzekugadzirisa zvinetswa zvemunyika. Asi mutungamiri webato reMDC, VaNelson Chamisa vakaramba kupinda muPOLAD vachiti vanongoda nhaurirano pakati pavo naVaMnangagwa chete, kwete nemapato asina chaakakohwa musarudzo. Zvino gore zvarasvika pakupera kudai, vamwe vezvematongerwo enyika vari kuti kudii nazvo? Mutewedzeri wemutauriri webati rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa mudunhu reNorth America, VaTim Muringai, vanoti gore ra2019 igore rakanga rakaomera munhu wese, zvisineyi nekuti ndewebato ripi, zanu PF kana MDC. VaMuringai vanoti chakakwanisa kuita chete neveZanu PF kuratidza vanhu kuti havakwanise kutungamira munyika mavakabira sarudzo. Asi sachigaro veZanu PF mudunhu reAmerica, VaFrenk Guni, VaFrenk Guni, vanoshoropodza mashoko aVaMuringai aya vachiti hurumende yavo iri kuedza nepose painogona napo kugadzirisa hupenyu hwevana veZimbabwe, kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvakaiomera. VaGuni vanoti hurumende yavo haichaswera ichitevera zvekutungana kwembudzi zvavanoti zviri kuitwa neMDC zvekuramba kupinda munhaurirano dziri pasi pePOLAD, vachiti vave kunangaga nenyaya yekusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika muna 2020 kuti vanhu vagarike. No media source currently available
title: VeZvematongerwo eNyika Votarisa Gore ra2019 neZvingatarisirwa Muna 2020

text: Vashandi vekambani yeNational Railways of Zimbabwe, kana kuti NRZ, varatidzira muHarare nemusi weChishanu vachiti vanoda mari dzavo dzemihoro dzavave nenguva inodarika gore vasiri kuwana. Vashandi veNRZ vanodarika mazana matatu varatidzira muHarare nhasi kubva pamahofisi akambani iyi vakapfuura nepaparamende kudzamara vasvika kumahofisi egurukota rinoona nezvevashandi. Vashandi veNRZ ava, avo vanga vakasangana nevamwe vakamiswa basa kare nekambani iyi, vati nguva yareba NRZ isiri kupinza ruoko muhomwe kuti ivabhadhare. Mumwe wevaratidziri ava, VaTafadzwa Bhunu, vati hupenyu hwavakuvaomera sezvo pave negore nemwedzi mitatu vasati vawana mari dzavo dzemihoro. Mumwe wevaratidziri ava, Muzvare Linda Masarira, ayo vanove mumwe wevakadzingwa basa nekambani iyi, vanoti chinorwadza ndechekuti NRZ haina chairi kutaura pamusoro pemari dzavo dzekusiya basa kana kuti ma terminal benefits. Muzvare Masarira vanoti vachiri mushandi wekambani iyi sezvo nyaya yekudzingwa kwavo ichiri kumatare. Muzvare Masarira vashora gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Prisca Mupfumira avo vakati vashandi veNRZ vadzoke kubasa kunyange hazvo pasina kana mumwe chete akapihwa kana kobiri zvaro. Varatidziri ava vasiya magwaro enyunyuto kuparamende pamwe nekuhofisi kwegurukota rezvevashandi uye magwaro enyunyuto arikurudzira hurumende kuti iwone zvaingaite nekukasika kuitira kuti vawane mari dzavo dzemihoro. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wekambani yeNRZ, VaLewis Mukawada vati tivatumire mibvunzo yakanyorwa pasi asi pataenda pamhepo vanga vasati vapindura mibvunzo iyi. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veNRZ Voratidzira muHarare

text: Nyanzvi dzezvematongerwo enyika nemitemo dzinoti kudzokera pabasa kwemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, vachigura zororo ravo, asi vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vachiramba vari pabasa iri VaMnangagwa varipo, kunokonzera kusanzwisisa muvanhu mashandiro ehurumende. Mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge charamba, pamwe nemunyori mubazi rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vanoti kunyange hazvo VaMnangagwa vadzoka kubasa, vachiwenga ndivo vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika. Hurumende inoti VaMnangagwa vadzoka kuzogadzirisa dambudziko rekuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba, kunyange hazvo vakasiya riripo pavakaenda kuzororo. Nhasi VaMnangagwa vatambira vamiriri vatsva venyika dze Spain, Rwanda, neweUnited kingdom ne Ireland, basa raigona kuitwawo nevakafanobata chigaro chavo. Nyanzvi yezvemutemo, Doctor Alex Magaisa, vanoti hazvisi pamutemo kuti mutungamiri wenyika neakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, vese vange vari pabasa panguva imwechete. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika uye vachidzidzisa ku Tswaane University ku South Africa, Doctor Ricky Mukonza, vanotiwo zviri kuitika izvi zvinogona kureva kuti pane kusawirirana pakati pevatungamiri venyika. No media source currently available
title: Kudzokera paBasa kwaVaMnangagwa VaChiwenga Vakabata Matomu Kwosimudza Mutauro

text: Komisheni inoonarinoona nezvesarudzo munyika reZimbabwe Electoral Commission (ZEC) rinoti rinoda mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nemana emadhora yekushnda musarudzo dzakatarisirwa gore rinouya. Vachitaura pamberi pekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekusimudzirwa kwemadzimai, nekuenzaniswa kwemikana, sachigaro weZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vati vane tarisiro yekuti hurumende ichavapa mari yesarudzo iyi kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe yakatarisana nematambudziko emari. Amai Makarau vabvumawo kuti mari yavari kuda iyi inotyisa sezvo yakawanda Vachitaura nezvekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhurume nevanhukadzi musarudzo dza2018 idzi, Amai Rita Makarau vati kunyange hazvo bumbiro remitemo richitaura zvekuenzaniswa kwemikana, pari zvino hapana mutemo unopa ZEC masimba kuti irambe mazita avanenge vapihwa nevemapato ezvematongerwo enyika kana pasina kuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhukadzi nevanhurume. Sachigaro wekomiti iyi, Amai Biata Beatrice Nyamupinga vebato reZanu PF, vachimiririra Goromonzi West mudare reparamende, vatiwo senhengo dzeparamende havatarisiri kuti ZEC ingotarisa vanhukadzi vasingapiwi mikana yakaenzana nevanhurume. Amai Nyamupinga vakurudzirawo nhengo dzeZEC kuti dzidzidze kunyika dzakadai seRwanda kuti vanoenzanisa sei mikana pakati pevanhurume nevanhukadzi panguva dzesarudzo Amai Makarau vaudzawo nhengo dzeparamende kuti sangano ravo harina simba rekuti munhu chizvarwa chenyika here kana kwete. Amai Makarau vakurudzirazvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvine zvitupa zvakanzi “Alien” kuti vaende kwaRegistrar Generai kunogadzirisa zvitupa zvavo. Amai Makarau vati pachatanga chirongwa chekunyoresa vavhoti havazobvumi kunyoresa vanhu vane zvitupa zvinoratidza kuti munhu haasi chizvarwa cheZimbabwe. Amai Makarau vati vanhu havasati vatanga kunyoresa kuti vazovhota musarudzo dza2018 asi vakatiwo gwaro revavhoti idzva rinenge ravapo muna Zvita. No media source currently available
title: ZEC Inoti Inoda Mari Inoita $274m Ichashandiswa Musarudzo dza2018

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, neChitatu vakaisa shanduko kumapazi ehurumende kuburikidza nekuisa vanyori vemapazi vatsva, kumisa vamwe mabasa vamwe vachibviswa kumapazi aya vachiendeswa kune mamwe. Vaive munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, uye vari mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba, ndemumwe wevanyori vakaendeswa kune mamwe mapazi. VaCharamba ndivo vave mutevedzeri mukuru wemutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika. Vaive mabharani mukuru wehurumende, VaTobaiwa Mudede, ndemumwe wevashandi vakuru vapfumbamwe vakaendeswa pamudyandigere vanosanganisira vaimbove mumiriri weZimbabwe kuUnited Nations, VaBoniface Chidyausiku, naVaJoey Bimha. Vamwe vanoti danho ratorwa naVaMnangangwa iri rakanaka sezvo zvichipawo mukana kupfungwa itsva kuti dzipinzwe mumapazi aya. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vachitungamira sangano revarairidzi reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti izvi hazvina zvazvinoshandura mumashandiro emapazi ehurumende sezvo hurumende yacho ichingori imwechete. Doctor Zhou vanoti vese vaiswa mumapazi ava havana zvikuru zvavanoita sezvo hurumende iri kutungamirwa nevanhu vari kunzi vave kushandira kumuzinda weZanu PF, vazhinji vavo vaimbove makurukota ehurumende. No media source currently available
title: Maonero Osiyana paKuchinjwa kweVanyori veMapazi eHurumende

text: Hurumende inoti Zimbabwe yakazvipira kutevedza mitemo inoremekedza vemabhizimisi vekunze pamwe nekuchengetedza mabhizimisi aya senzira yekukwezva vekunze kuti vazosima mari dzavo munyika. No media source currently available Vachitaura mushure memusangano wavaita nemumwe mukuru anoshanda kubazi rinoona nezvekunzwe kwenyika yeGermany uye achiona nezvedunhu rekuchamhembe kweAfrica pamwe nedunhu reSahel, VaGeorg Schimdt, gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa,vati zvave pachena kuti vekunze vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi munyika dzine mitemo yakajeka uye Zimbabwe yazvipira kutevedza mitemo iyi. Pari zvino vemabhizimisi vekunze havasi kufara nemutemo unopa masimba ehupfumi kuvatema uyo unosungira makambani ekunze kupa zvikamu makumi mashanu nechimwe kubva muzana zvemabhizimisi avo kuvatema vemuno. VaChinamasa vati musangano wavo naVaSchimdt wange wakanangana nekugadziridza kudyidzana pakati Zimbabwe neGermany munyaya dzehupfumi nematongerwo enyika. Vatiwo pane chikwata chebazi ravo chichaenda kuGermany kunoenderera mberi nenhaurirano idzi. Vatiwo vabata bata nyaya yechikwereti cheZimbabwe kuGermany icho vati chinodarika mazana manomwe emamiriyoni emadhora. VaSchimdt avo vari kushanya munyika kwemazuva maviri vati zvakakosha kuti nyika ive nemitemo inoremekedza kodzero dzevanhu nevamazbhizimisi uye nyika yavo yakazvipira kutsigira Zimbabwe kuvandudza mitemo yavo sezvinodiwa nebumbiro idzva remutemo iro rinopa vanhu nevemabhizimisi kodzero dzavo. Vatiwo vanofara nenhaurirano nezvirongwa zveStaff Monitored Program zviri kuitwa neZimbabwe neInternational Monetary Fund vakati kubudirira kwezvirongwa izvi kunowedzera mukana wekudyidzana kweZimbabwe nenyika dzakabudirira pasi rose. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vati zvinofadza kuti hurumende yave kuda kuvandudza mitemo kuti iite zvinoda vemabhizimisi asi vakati izvi zvave kuitika nyika yave parumananzombe. VaKuchera vati kuoma kwaita zvinhu munyika ndiko kwave kumanikidza hurumende kuti ibude pachena kuti yave kuda kusandura mimwe mitemo kuitira kuti ikwanise kukwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze pamwe nekuvandudza hupfumi. Mune imwewo nyaya, kambanidzeEconet neNational Foods nhasi dzaparura chirongwa cheEcoshopper icho chichaita kuti avo vane EcoCash vakawanise kutengera hama neshamwari dzavo chikafu muzvitoro. Zvinhu zvinotengwa izvi zvinotangirapemadhora makumi maviri zvichikwira kusvika pazana nemakumi mashanu emadhora. Mumwe mushandi weEcocash, Amai Natalie -Jabangwe Moris, vanotipasi pechirongwa ichi anontumira grocery ndiye anobhadhariswa kamari kadiki asi uya anoritambira hapana muripo waanobhadhara. Vatiwo vakasarudza kushanda nekambani yeNational Foods sezvo kambani iyi ichigadzira zvinhu zvakawanda zvinoshandiswa nevanhu zuva rega rega uye ine zvitoro zvakawanda munzvimbo zhinji munyika.
title: VaChinamasa: Hurumende Yakazvipira Kudzika Mitemo Inokwezva Mabhizinesi eKunze

text: Zimbabwe yaisa chikumbiro kuGlobal Fund chemari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nemasere emadhora kana kuti $628 million. Mari iyi yakanangana nekurwisa zvirwere zvakaita seHIV, Malaria neTB kubva muna 2018 kusvika muna 2020. Zimbabwe iri pakati penyika shoma dzinopihwa mari yakawanda neGlobal Fund dzinosanganisa Nigeria, Tanzania, Democratic Republic Congo, Mozambique neIndia. Chikumbiro chemari yeHIV chiri kutarisirwa kusimbisa mabasa ekubatsira vanasikana, ngochani uye vanoita zvehupfambi. KuTB, Zimbabwe inoti inoda kubatsira kunyanya vana, vari mumajeri, vanochera zviwanikwa mumigodhi nevamwe. Sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezveTB muchikwata chakanyora chikumbiro cheZimbabwe yeCountry Cordinating Mechanism, VaDonald Tobaiwa, vanoti zvakakosha kuti nyika isarambe ichingopemha mari kune vekunze asi kuti isimbise kutsvaga dzimwe nzira dzekuzvibatsira. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Network for Positive People, Amai Marthe Tolana, vanoti nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika panoda mari yakawanda kuti Zimbabwe izadzise zviga zvayo zvekurwisa zvirwere izvi. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yokumbira Mamiriyoni Mazana Matanhatu eMadhora kuGlobal Fund

text: Rimwe bato riri kukwikwidza musarudzo dzema by-election, reUnited Zimbabwe Alliance, rinoti vechidiki veZanu PF vavhiringidza musangano waro waranga rakaronga kuita munhandare yeChemhanza mumusha weTafara muHarare wekutsvagira rutsigiro nhengo iri kukwikwidza muHarare East, VaGarikai Mlambo. Sachigaro wevechidiki mubato iri, VaShingirai Mikhail Chabata, vanoti vakanga vakapiwa mvumo nemapurisa yekuita musangano wavo uyu, uye vakatonobhadhara mari dzaidiwa kukanzuru, asi vazoshamiswa kuona vechidiki veZanu PF vachitamba nhabvu munhandare iyi nhasi uye vachiramba kubuda. VaChabata vanoti vamboedza kudaidza mapurisa kuti avabatsire kubvisa vanhu ava asi mapurisa avaudza kuti vanokwanisa kubviswa chete nevaridzi venhandare vanove vekanzuru. Vanoti vazobatawo vekanzuru asi vavavimbisa kuti vachadzoka kwavari, izvo vanoti hazvina kuzoitika. VaChabata vanoti vazongoenderera mberi nekuita musangano wavo parutivi penhandare iyi, vachiti musangano wavo wazopindwa nevanhu vashoma sezvo vanhu vanga vachivhundutsirwa. No media source currently available Asi mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi varamba kuti nhengo dzavo dzine chekuita nechiitiko ichi, vachiti vari kungozorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya. VaMugwadi vati havatombozivi kuti muZimbabwe mune bato rakadarovachidi havadi vanhu vanotsvaga mbiri nemusangano weZanu PF. No media source currently available
title: United Zimbabwe Alliance Yopomera Zanu PF Mhosva yeKukanganisa Musangano Wayo kuTafara, Asi Zanu PF Inoti Haizivi Kuti Kune Bato Rakadaro

text: Mhuri yekwa Mtukudzi inoti muimbi ane mukurumbira, Oliver Mtukudzi, acharadzikwa kumusha kwake kuMadziwa nemusi weSvondo. Mtukudzi akaitwa gamba renyika, asi haasi kuvigirwa kuNational Heroes Acre sekuda kwake asati afa. Gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vaudza vatori venhau kuti VaMtukudzi vachanorara mumba make kuNorton Chishanu manheru. NeMugovera, mutumbi waMtukudzi uchaendeswa kuPakare Paye Arts Center uko kuchaitwa munamato. Mushure mutumbi waMtukudzi uchendeswa kuNational Sports Stadium uko kuchange kuine vaimbi vakasiyana siyana vachaimbira vanhu nekuwonekana nemufi. Mutumbi waMtukudzi uchaendeswa kuOne Commando nenguva dza 3 masikati uko uchaiswa muchikopokopo uchienda kuMadziwa, uko mutumbi waMtukudzi ucharadzikwa neSvondo masikati.
