Amai Mutsvangwa vazivisavo kuti hurumende ichashandisa mabhazi anoita makumi matatu achaendesa vanhu kuMadziwa kubva muHarare, vachitizve dunhu rimwe nerimwe munyika richapiwa bhazi rinoenda kuMadziwa. “Tinokurudzira vanhu vemuZimbabwe kuratidza hunhu wedu; kuratidza kudanana kwedu uye kuti vaende kunochengeta Mtukudzi,” Amai Mutsvangwa vaudza vatori venhau. Mtukudzi akatanga kuimba zvine mutsindo mugore ra1977 nechikwata chainzi Wagon Wheels umo maivevo nemumwe muimbi ane mukurumbira, Thomas Mapfumo. Kambo kavo, ‘Dzandimomotera’, kakaita mukurumbira mukuru uye vaimbi vaviri ava vakaenderera mberi kusvika vazikanwa muZimbabwe, muAfrica nemhiri kwemakungwa, kunyange hazvo vanga voimba vaine zvikwata zvakasiyana. Mtukudzi akange ari muimbi, muzvinabhimisi, mubatsiri wevanonetseka, murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu uye ari munyarikani weUnited Nations Children’s Fund munharaunda yekuchamhembe nekumabvazuva kweAfrica. Mutauriri wevaivona nemashandiro aMtukudzi, VaMarcus Gora, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotenda mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nehurumende nekupa Mtukudzi hugamba vachiti chinhu change chakatarisirwa nevanhu vazhinji. No media source currently available
title: Mtukudzi Achavigwa neSvondo kuMadziwa

text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato idzva reZimbabwe People First, Amai Joice Mujuru, avo vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, vanoti ichokwadi kuti vange vachitungamira bato iri muchinyararire asi iko zvino vave kubuda pachena. Amai Mujuru vabvunzwa neStudio 7 kuti ichokwadi here kuti vari kufanotungamira bato reZimbabwe People First vakapindura kuti, “Hongu.” Aka ndekekutanga Amai Mujuru vachibuda pachena kuti vari kutungamira bato rinopikisa iri. Vachibvunzwa kuti sei vange vasiri kubuda pachena nguva yose iyi, Amai Mujuru vati chido chavo chainge chiri chekuti vaparure bato pakati pegore rapera asi vange vachida kutanga vanyatsotaura nevanhu kumativi mana ose enyika. Vatiwo Zimbabwe People First yakanyoresa zviri pamutemo neChishanu svondo rapera neZimbabwe Electoral Commission kuti ibato rezvematongerwo enyika rinoda kukwikwidza musarudzo dzinoitwa munyika. Doctor Mujuru vanoti havasi kushamisika nebata murefu bata mupfupi yave kuitika mubato riri kutonga reZanu-PF. Vati vakagara vaziva havo kuti mubato iri muchaita chimurenga zvekare nekuti riri kutungamirwa nenhema. Amai Mujuru nevamwe vakawanda vakadzingwa mubato reZanu-PF gore rapera vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kubvisa mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pachigaro nechisimba. Asi nyaya dzaipomoerwa Amai Mujuru idzi hadzina kuendeswa kumatare uye vanoti ndedzemugotsi matsuro. No media source currently available
title: Amai Mujuru Vobvuma Kekutanga Kuti Vari Kutungamira Bato reZimbabwe People First

text: Nyaya yekupambwa kunonzi kwakaitwa nhengo dzeMDC Alliance nhatu nemusi weChitatu svondo rapera dzinoti mumiriri weHarare West mudare reparamende Muzvare Joana Mamombe, mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC Youth League Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri uye mutevedzeri wemurongi wemabasa musangano revechidiki iri Muzvare Netsai Marova yakonzera mutauro wakanyanya munyika. Vatatu ava vanoti vakatorwa kubva kukamba yemapurisa yeHarare Central Police Station vakanoshungurudzwa kuBindura. Vanopikisa nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti pave kuda masangano akaita seUnited Nations kuti apindire nekuti vashaya chivimbo nemapurisa nehurumende inongoti iri kuferefeta nyaya idzi asi pasina anosungwa. Vamiriri veAmerica, EU nedzimwe nyika muZimbabwe vakati vari kushushikana zvikuru nenyaya dzekushungurudzwa kwevanhu munyika vakati dzinofanira kuongororwa. Asi vakawanda mubato reZanu-PF vari kutsika madziro vachiti dzimwe nyaya dzekupambwa kwevanhu ndedzemugotsi matsuro. Mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato reZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vanoti vanopikisa vanetsika yekunyepedzera kuti vatapwa. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachishanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti pakatariswa humbowo huripo, hurumende inoratidza kuti ine nhoroondo yekuita vanhu kafiramberi. No media source currently available
title: Kupambwa KweVanhu Kokonzera Kusawirirana muNyika

text: Hurumende yeAmerica yakarwisa neChina manheru imwe kamba yendege dzehondo dzeSyria, senzira yekutsividza kuurayiwa kunonzi kwakaitwa vanhu vanodarika zana nemuchetura wakashandiswa nemauto eSyria kuvanhu vayo kutanga kwesvondo rino. Kurwisa uku kunonzi kwakabvumidzwa nemutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, avo vakati nyika yavo yatora danho iri senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwekushandiswa kwezvombo zvemuchetura. Danho iri rinopikisa gwara raitungamidzwa naVaTrump munguva yekutsvaga rutsigiro, apo vaiti America haifanirwe kupindira muhondo dzedzimwe nyika. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika ichishanda yakazvimirira, VaCharles Mutasa, vanoti danho rakatorwa na VaTrump idanho rehurumende yeAmerica ravave kutevera, kwete ravo voga. VaMutasa vanotiwo vanhu vanofanirwa kunzwisisa kuti VaTrump munhu akaita sei, sezvo vachishanduka nemamiriro anenge akaita zvinhu panguva iyoyo. No media source currently available
title: America Yorwisa Syria neMuchadenga

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vave kushorwa zvikuru nevamwe vanhu munyika nenyaya yekuramba vachienda kunyika dzakasiyana siyana kunyange hazvo mudzimai wavo, Amai Grace Mugabe, ari kunzi ari kurwara nechirwere chinofungidzirwa kuti ndechegomarara iro vari kurapwa kuDubai. Bepanhau reZimbabwe Independent rakaburitsa mashoko ekuti Amai Mugabe vari kusimbirwa nechirwere chegomarara. Mutauriri waVaMugabe, VaGeorge Charamba, uye gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, vakatendawo kuti Amai Mugabe vari kurwarwa kunyange vasina kuzivisa chirwere chacho. Amai Mugabe ndivo mutungamiri wesangano remadzimai mu Zanu-PF, reWomens League, uye vanonzi vakamira mira kuti VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vatore chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika kubva kuna Amai Joice Mujuru. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika uye vaimboshanda kumuzinda weZimbabwe kuEthiopia, VaClifford Mashiri, vanoti mhuri yeZimbabwe ine kodzero yekuziva nezvehutano hwevatungamiri wavo. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Voshorerwa Kusagara Pasi Mudziamai Ari Muchipatara

text: Nemusi weChipiri Zimbabwe iri kucherechedza zuva rekubatana kwemapato eZanu PF ne PF Zapu, uko kunonzi kwakaunza runyararo munyika mushure mekusagadzikana kunonzi kwakasiya zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvaurayiwa, vachitiza misha yazvo. Asi bato guru rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rinoti hapana chekupemberera zuva rekubatana munyika iri sezvo muZimbabwe musina runyararo rwunoita kuti vanhu vagare vakasununguka. Musi wa 22 Zvita 1987, mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nevaive mutungamiri wePF Zapu, VaJoshua Nkomo, vakanyorerana chibvumirano cherunyararo mushure mekusagadzikana kwenyika, zvikuru mumatunhu eMatabeleland neMidlands. Mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti kunyange hazvo bato ravo risineyi nezuva iri, chikonzero chekuti rinocherechedzwa munyika yose ndicho chinoita kuti vataure pamusoro paro. VaGutu vanoti hurumende yeZanu PF iri kumbunyikidza mapato anopikisa, vanhuwo zvavo pamwechete nevamwe vanhu muZanu PF vanoona maonero akasiyana nemutungamiri webato iri, VaRobert Mugabe. VaGutu vanoti muZanu PF mune makakatanwa anotyisa zvokuti zuva rekubatana rinenge riri chiseko pakatariswa zviri kuitika mubato iri. “Pari zvino munyika hamuna kubatana, mune kudhonzerana,” Vanodaro VaGutu. “Kana imo muZanu PF macho inongove ‘amai batai mwana,’ saka hapana chekurangarira.” Vaive nhengo yePF Zapu, VaNorman Mabhena, vanoti kubatana kwemapato maviri aya kwakafa pakashaya VaNkomo. “MuZanu PF hamuchina Zapu, Zapu yakabuda yakaenda naVaDumiso Dabengwa,” VaMabhena vanodaro. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya-Moyo, sezvo vanzi vanga vari mumisangano. No media source currently available
title: MDC T Inoti "Unity Day" Yocherechedzwa Munyika Musina Kubatana

text: Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti mutongi wedare repamusoro VaDavison Foroma vakapa mumiriri weHarare West mudare reparamende vari vebato reMDC, Muzvare Joanna Mamombe, mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nemusi weChishanu. Nemusi weChina mutongi uyu akapawo sachigaro weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaRashid Mahiya, mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso. Ukuwo, vanomirira Kuwadzana East mudare reparamende vari veMDC zvekare, VaCharlton Hwende, vakapihwawo mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nemusi weChishanu. Gweta raMuzvare Mamombe uye vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaObey Shava, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mari yechibatiso iri kuramba ichikwidzwa uye imwe mitemo inotyora kodzero dzevanhu. “Mari dzechibatiso dziri kutaurwa idzi imari dzinovhundusa, dzinotyisa kwazvo.” VaShava vaudza Studio 7. Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, "Mutemo unotaura kuti kana mari dzechibatiso dzichitaurwa, ngakutaurwe dzinokwanisa kubhadharwa neavo vari muhusungwa nokuti nyaya haisi yekutaura mari dzavasingakwanisi kubhadhara kuti varambe vari muhusungwa.” Pakutanga kwesvondo rino, mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti nhengo dzebato ravo muparamende dzine nyaya kumatare dzave kupfuura gumi. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Joanna Mamombe naVaHwende Voburitswa Mutirongo

text: Vamwe vagari vamboratidzira muguta reBulawayo senzira yekuratidza kusafara kwavo nekumbomiswa basa kwemunyori wekanzuru, VaChristopher Dube. Asi meya weguta reBulawayo, VaSolomon Mguni, vange vatosendeka parutivi kumbomiswa basa kwange kwaitwa VaDube vachiti patange paferefetwa mhosva dzavari kupomerwa. Vagari varatidzira ava vaimba panze peCity Hall kwekanguva vachiratidza kusafara kwavo nekumiswa basa kwaVaDube, asi mushure menguva diki, vanhu ava vazobva panzvimbo iyi apo mapurisa anodzivirira mhirizhonga ange asvika Asi muchiziviso chanyorwa naChamber Secretary, Amai Sikhangele Zhou, kumakanzura kusanganisira VaTinashe Kambarami, avo vakafanobata chigaro chameya pamwe nekuna ivo VaDube, VaMguni vati VaDube vanofanirwa kudzokera pabasa nekukasika kuitira kuti basa rekanzuru rifambe zvakanaka. VaKambarami, avo vamhangara kurwiswa kwavaitwa nevanhu vavanoti vatumwa naVaDube, vakange vanyora tsamba neChina kuna VaDube vachivati vambomira basa vachivapomera mhosva yekutadza kuita basa nemazvo kunyanya panyaya yekushaikwa kwemvura. Asi VaMguni, avo vari kunze kwenyika pari zvino, vati vanoda kuti panyatsonyorwa gwaro rinoratidza mhosva dziri kupomerwa VaDube pozoitwa ongororo izere. Taedza kunzwa zvizere kubva kuna Amai Zhou asi vanzi vanga vari mumusangano. Tabatawo gurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, asi vati vange vachitopindawo mumusangano wekuti vanzwe pamusoro pedambudziko remvura muBulawayo uyewo nyaya yekumbomiswa basa kwaVaDube. Mune imwewo nyaya vamwe vatapi venhau vapinda mumusangano wekuzeya kuzvichengetedza kwavanofanirwa kuita kana vachiita mabasa avo ekutapa nhau uyewo kuzeya nezvekuvandudzwa kwemitemo yakasiyana siyana ine chekuita nekutapanhau. Mumwe mutapiwenhau, Tanaka Mrehwa, audza Studio 7 kuti musangano aona musangano uyu wakakosha zvikuru. Mumwezve mutapi wenhau, Jeffry Muvundisi, ati musangano uyu wauya panguva yakanaka sezvo pane mashoko anogara achibuda nguva nenguva ekushungurudzwa kwevatapi venhau mubasa ravo. Mukuru wezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reMISA Zimbabwe, VaNyasha Nyakunu, vati chinangwa chemusangano uyu change chiri chekubatsira kuyeuchidza vatapi venhau kukosha kwakaita kuti vazvichengetedze uyewo kukurudzira vatapi venhau kuti vave pamberi pekuona kuti mitemo iri kuvandudza inovandudzwa nenzira inochengetedza kodzero dzeveruzhinji. Hurumende iri mushishi kuvandudza mitemo ine chekuita nekutapwa kwenhau kusanganisira mutemo weAccess to Information and Protection of Privacy Act. Musangano uyu wakarongwa neVeMedia Institute of Southern Africa, Zimbabwe Chapter. No media source currently available
title: Kupesana Kukuru Kwobuda muBulawayo

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kukurudzira vanhu kuti vasaite manguva ino yezororo sezvo chirwere cheCovid-19 chadzoka zvine mutsindo. Vanhu vari kukurudzirwawo kuti vaite zvose zviri kukurudzirwa nebazi rezvehutano munyika pamwe nereWorld Health Organization rinoona nezvehutano pasi rose. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 muguta reHarare nedzimwe nzvimbo inoratidza kuti kunyangwe munyika muri kutendererea mhando yeCovid-19 yeomicron iri kunzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano inotapuriranwa zviri nyore, vanhu vakawanda havasi kupfeka mamask uye kugeza maoko nekuita zvimwe zvinokurudzirwa izvi. Mufundisi Mazvarirashe Mabhufu vanotungamirira sangano rinonzi Wisdom Church International mumusha weBorrowdale vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu vakawanda havasi kuita zviri kukurudzirwa. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa Muzvare Aileen Musamba vanoti nzvimbo dzemafaro ndidzo dzimwe dzinoparadziranwa chirwere cheCovid 19 nokuti vanhu vanopfeka mamask vachipinda asi voabvisa vave mukati pakunwa doro uye vanenge vasina kutarangana pakugara. Muzvare Masamba vakurudzira kuti mafaro aya aitirwe panze kuitira kuti vanhu vafeme mweya wakachena sezvo denda iri ririkutapuriranwa munzvimbo dzakamanikidzana. Asi VaLeverage Masvondo vanogara kuGlenview vanoti varikuona shanduko huru muvanhu vavanodyidzana navo uye vaendera mberi vachiti dzidziso dzokuchenjedza vanhu maringe nezvedenda iri inofanira kuendera mberi. Nyanzvi yehutano Dr David Mukwekwezeke vanoti ichokwadi kuti vanhu varikutsvaga raramo asi zvinoda kuti munhu wese atevedzere zvose zvinochengetedza hupenyu hwavo. Kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti vanhu vanofanira kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid.19. Hurumende yange iine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kusvika mukupera kwemwedzi uno. Asi kusvika parizvino vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu chete ndivo vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwa.
title: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kuzvichengetedza Kubva Kuchirwere cheCovid-19 paZororo Rino

text: Nhasi tiri kutarisa nezvedambudziko remagetsi iro rinonzi rabata nyika, panguva iyo hurumende iri kukurudzira kuti vanhu vanyanyoshandisa magetsi ezuva, kana kuti solar energy. Vanhu vanokuwadzwa mukuputswa kwedzimba nemapurisa ekanzuru yeHarare mumusha weBudiriro neChitatu. Bato reMDC T rinopokana nemashoko ari kubuda ekuti dare repamusorosoro reConstitutional Court rakarasa nyaya yaro ine chekuita nesarudzo yarakanga rakwidza kudare iri. Muchirongwa cheLiveTalk Women’s Roundtable na 8:30 pm tiri kutarisa nezvedambudziko remagetsi nezvarinoreva kuvanhukadzi. Iyi ndiyo misoro yenhau dzedu dzanhasi...munotibata pa 909 AM, 4930, kana pa 12080, ne 15460 KiloHertzs pa ShortWave kana paFacebook page yedu yeVOAShona. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau, China 01 Gumiguru 2015

text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vanoti kunyange hazvo nyika yakatarisana nematambudziko, veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuramba vakabatana vachichengetedza runyararo rwuri munyika senzira yekuremekedza mushakabvu, VaJoshua Nkomo. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevanhu paMaphisa Growth Point kuMatabeleland South neChina, Amai Mugabe vati veruzhinji vanofanirwa kukoshesa rusununguko rwavainarwo pamwe nekubatana nerunyararo zviri munyika. Vati kuita izvi kunoita kuti mweya wevaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, mushakabvu Joshua Nkomo, uzorore murugare. VaNkomo, avo vaitungamira bato reZAPU, vakanyorerana chibvumirano chemutanidzwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, muna 1987 izvo zvakaita kuti bato reZAPU ribatane nereZanu PF. Amai Mugabe vati nekuda kwekuoma kwakaita zvinhu munyika vanoziva kuti veruzhinji vari kunetseka pakuedza kuraramisa mhuri dzavo. Asi vati izvi hazvifanirwe kuita kuti vanhu vakoshiwe nhoroondo yenyika yeZimbabwe. Amai Mugabe, avo vakambobuda munhau nenyaya yavo yekushora varwi vehondo yerusununguko pane mimwe misangano yavo yavakaita munguva yapfuura, vati vanhu vanofanirwa kuremekedza varwi vehondo yerususnunguko, kusanganisira vamwe vakuru vakuru veZanu PF vakaendawo kuhondo, vanosanganisira mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, mushakabvu VaNkomo pachavo, pamwe nevamwe vakaita saana VaSimon Khaya Moyo naVaKembo Mohadi, avo vanove vamwe vevakuru-vakuru vange varipowo pamusangano uyu. Amai Mugabe vashora mutungamiri webato reMDC-T, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vachivati havazi mutungamiri ane hany'a nevanhu sezvo vakakurudzira kuti Zimbabwe itemerwe zvirango nenyika dzekumadokero. Vashorawo mamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira ega ayo vati anoshandisa nyaya yekupa chikafu kune vamwe vanhu vanoshaya chikafu senzira yekuti vasatsigira VaMugabe nebato ravo reZanu PF. Asi ivo Amai Mugabe pachavo vapa chikafu kuvanhu chinosanganisira matani mazana maviri echibage, matani zana nemakumi maviri emupunga. Vatiwo pane matani chiuru ehupfu achapiwa vanhu pasi pechirongwa cheGMB. Amai Mugabe vatorawo nguva yavo vachitaurira vanhu nezvechirongwa cheZIMASSET vachiti chichabatsira kuti nyika ibude mumadhaka mairi. Vataurawo pamusoro pekudyidzana kweZimbabwe neChina vachiti kushanya kwemutungamiri weChina, VaXi Jinping, kuchaunza budiriro munyika. Kubvira pavakatanga kuita misangano yekusangana neveruzhinji gore rapera, Amai Mugabe vanositora mukana wekutukirira vamwe vakauru vakuru vemuZanu PF vavanoti vari kukuchidzira kupatsanuka kuri mubato iri. Asi pamusangano wekuMaphisa Amai Mugabe varumbidza vatsigiri vebato iri mudunhu reMatebeland South vachiti vakabatana uye vakayambirawo vechidiki kuti vasaite zvemhirizhonga.
title: Amai Mugabe Vorumbidza Muchakabvu Joshua Nkomo paMusangano Wavaita kuMaphisa

text: Vamwe vagari vekuNyamakate mudunhu reMashonaland West vave kuomerwa nehupenyu zvekushaya chekudya zvave kuita kuti vanhongerere chibage chakasaririra muminda yevarungu kuti vararame. Izvi zviri kuitika kunyangwe hazvo hurumende iri kuti chirongwa checommand agriculture chakabudirira uye nyika ine maguta. Arthur Chigoriwa anotipa nyaya inotevera. Vagari ava vanoti havana chavakakohwa gore rino nekuda kwemvura yakawandisa ikanyudza zvirimwa zvavo uye vanotiwo vainge vasina fotereza yakakwana. Vazhinji vevagari ava vave kurarama nekunhonga chibage muminda yevarungu vakasara kuti vararame pamwe nekutengesa kuti vawane mari yekutenga zvekudya zvakaita semunyu, tsvigiri, mafuta, sipo nezvimwe. VaTatenda Karengesha vanobva kwaMambo Chundu mumwe weavo vari kurarama nezvekunhonga. Vanoti chimwe chibage chavanonhonga vanozoenda kunochitengesa kuti vawane raramo. VaKarengesha vanoti pachibage chavanonhongerera vanopiwa chidimu chepakati chezvavanenge vawana. Amai Clarisa Jokwani avo vainge vakabereka mwana mucheche kumusana apo vainhongerera chibage mumunda waVaJames Stanford papurazi reOmega vanoti vakazadza masanga maviri vanopihwa saga rimwe chete semuripo. Mutyairi waVaStanford, VaLisbon Jimu avo vainge vari kumunda netirakita vakamirira kuzotakura chikamu chemurungu pakupera kwezuva vanoti vainge vakarima mahekiteya anodarika zana echibage. VaJimu vanoti vari kuyamurwa nevagari vemumaruzevha akavapoteredza kunhongerera chibage icho chinodonha pavanenge vachikohwa nemuchina weHarvest. Vagari ava vanoti havanhongerere chibage muminda yevarimi vechitema sezvo pasina chinosara. Apo vagari vemumaguta vari kuchema kuti hupenyu huri kuramba huchioma zuva nezuva zviri kuratidza kuti munyika yose hapana kuri nyore kurarama. Mumiriri webazi reUnited Nations reWorld Food Programme, WFP, munyika VaEddie Rowe vanoti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwechete mumaruwa vanoda ruyamuro rwezvekudya gore rino zvikuru sei pakati pemwedzi waGumiguru kusvika muna Kurume gore rinouya. Nyaya yekuti vamwe vari kurarama zvakaoma iri kuuya panguva iyo hurumende iri kuti gore rino nyika yakakohwa pakuru pasi pechirongwa checommand agriculture. No media source currently available
title: Nhamo Yopfunya Chisero kuNyamakate Zvopa Kuti Vanhu Vararame Zvehwakumukwaku

text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa nezuro vakaita musangano mukuru kuTshovani kuChiredzi uko kwakapindwa nezviuru nzviuru zvevanhu. Vakati vacharamba vachirwisa kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzakachena.  VaChamisa vakati vachakoka vekunze kuti vaone kuti sarudzo dzafambiswa zvakanaka. Vakatiwo havasi kuzopinda musarudzo kana vasina kuona gwaro revavhoti. VaChamisa vakatiwo ikozvino kwave kuda kuti vechidiki vanotemwa dzinobva ropa vatungamire. VaChamisa vakatendawo muchakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai nekukura gwara iri vave kutevera parizvino. Vakatiwo sarudzo dzinofanira kuitwa zvakanaka dzemaprimary. Kwange kuine kuchema chema kwakanyanya muChiredzi kuti sarudzo dzemaprimary hadzina kuitwa zvakanaka munzvimbo iyi. Vakatiwo vatungamiri vose venyika vanofanira kuti vadzidzire mitauro yakawanda kana yezvimumu nematsi. VaChamisa vakatiwo nyaya yehuori ndiyo yauraya nyika. Vakafadzawo vanhu apo vakadaidza vamwe ana ambuya kuti vauye kuzokwazisa vanhu. VaChamisa vakadaidzawo mumwe murume akadzingwa basa sajerigadhi mushure mekunge anzi ainge avakoka kuChiredzi. Vachitaurawo nezvegwaro revavhoti, sachigaro weZimbabwe Election Support Network VaAndrew Makoni vakati zvakakosha kuti vanhu vawane gwaro revavhoti. Asi munyori anoona nezvemutemo mubato reZanu-PF VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana vanoti veMDC Alliance vanoda kutora basa reZEC. Zimbabwe iri kuita sarudzop mwedzi unouya musi wa 30. Kunyangwe vanopikisa nemamwe masangano ekunze ari kuongorora sarudzo vari kuti pane zvakawanda zvinoda kuitwa kusanganisa kubuda pachena nezvegwaro revavhoti, veZimbabwe Electoral Commission vanoti vachaona kuti paitwa sarudzo dzakachena. Nyika dzakabudirira kusanganisa America nedzimwe dziri mugungano reEuropean Union dzinoti dzichatanga kudyidzana neZimbabwe ndokunge yaita sarudzo dzakachena. No media source currently available
title: VaChamisa Vanoti Havasi Kuzopinda Musarudzo Dzisina Kuchena

text: Komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yazivisa kuti yawedzera nzvimbo dzekuvhotera dzichashandiswa pasarudzo dzemwedzi uno. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare nhasi, sachigaro weZEC, Amai Priscilla Chigumba vati danho ravatora iri nderekuyedza kuti mitsetse isareba musi wekuvhota, uye vaita izvi mumatunhu ane vanhu vakawanda vakanyoresa kuvhota sezvo dzimwe nzvimbo dziine vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvhishanu vakanyoresa kuvhota. Amai Chigumba vati vakaita izvi vachitevera mutemo wesarudzo uyo uchangobva mukuvandudzwa, uyo unovapa masimba ekuisa dzimwe nzvimbo dzekuvhotera. Asi danho iri ratsoropodzwa nemutungamiri weEconomic Justice in Zimbabwe, Muzvare Margaret Mutsamvi, avo vati zvaitwa neZEC izvi zvichaita kuti vanhu vazhinji vagotadza kuvhota musi wa30 Chikunguru pachaitwa sarudzo. Asi Amai Chigumba vati hapana chinotadzisa vanhu kuti vavhote sezvo nzvimbo dzavaisa itsva idzi dzichange dziri parutivi pedzagara dzakanyoreswa nevanhu kuti ndipo pavachavhotera. Vaenderera mberi vachiti sekomisheni vakatotsvaga vanhu vose vachaita basa rekuvhotesa musi wesarudzo. Nzvimbo dzekuvhotera dzakaziviswa neZEC dzinosvika zviuru gumi nemazana mapfumbamwe ane makumi masere neshanu mumawadhi chiuru nemazana mapofumbamwe ane makumi mashanu nemashanu. Zvichakadai, Amai Chigumba varamba kuti komisheni yavo ndiyo yakapa bato reZanu PF nhamba dzevanhu dzariri kushandisa kufonera vanhu richitsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo. Izvi zvinotevera kunyunyuta kuri kuita vanhu vakawanda vari kuti vari kufonerwa neZanu PF panguva iyo ZEC yakaramba kuburitsa gwaro rine mifananidzo yevanhu. Amai Chigumba vatiwo havasi kuzoburitsa gwaro revavhoti rine mifananidzo yevanhu vakanyoresa kuvhota vachiti gwaro rine mifananidzo yevanhu rinogona kupinda mumaoko asiriwo rikazoshandiswa zvisirizvo. No media source currently available
title: ZEC Inowedzera Nzvimbo dzeKuvhotera

text: Vaimbove vashandi vemughodhi weghoridhe we Sabi Gold Mine muZvishavane vanosvika makumi mana vari kunzi vabude mudzimba dzekambani iyi dzavari kugara. Vanhu ava vanzi vanofanirwa kuita izvi musi wa 31 Zvita usati wapfuura. Vamwe vari kuziva zviri kuitika vanoti vari kunzi vabude mudzimba idzi ndevaye vashandi vakasiya kambani iyi payakambovhara vachienda kunoshandira mamwe makambani asi vachigara hazvo padzimba dzeSabi Mine vachiti vanoda kutanga vapihwa mari dzavo. Magweta ekambani iyi, veMutendi, Mudisi and Shumba, vabvuma kuti ichokwadi kuti ndivo vari kumirira Sabi Gold Mine, asi gweta riri panyaya iyi, ranga risiri kubatika sezvo range risiri pabasa. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomiririra vashandi vemumigodhi, reNational Mine Workers Union of Zimbabwe, VaNdodana Sithole, vati nyaya iyi yasvitswa kusangano ravo uye vari kumhanyamhanya kuti vanzwisise zviri kuitika kuitira kuti kuti vaone kuti sangano ravo ringabatsira sei. Mumwe wevashandi vari kudzingwa mudzimba asi aramba kudomwa nezita audza Studio7 kuti vamwe vashandi vakatoshaya kare vasati vapihwa mari dzavo, uye pane chirikadzi dzisina kokuenda kana dzikadzingwa mudzimba dzavari kugara. Tsvakiridzo yaitwa neStudio7 inoratidza kuti kambani yeSabi Gold Mine yakatanga kushanda muna 1890, uye ikatanga kutengesa goridhe muna 1909. Kambani yehurumende yeZimbabwe Mining Development Corporation, ZMDC, ndiyo yakazova muridzi weSabi Gold Mine, kuburikidza nekambani yayo yeKimberworth Investments. Hurumende yakatora mugodhi uyu muna 1984, uye panguva yayaishanda nemazvo, Sabi Gold Mine inonzi yaikwanisa kuchera goridhe rakacheneswa rinorema makirogiramu makumi mashanu pamwedzi wega wega. Kambani iyi yaivawo nevashandi vanosvika mazana mana nemakumi mashanu. Asi muna 2012, gwaro repagore reZMDC rinoratidza kuti Sabi Mine yakatengesa goridhe rine huremu honosvika zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe emakirogiramu, ikawana mari inoita iyo mamiriyoni mapfumbamwe nemazana mapfumbamwe ezviuru zvemadhora. Asi huremu nemari yakawanikwa zvaive pasi pezvakawanikwa muna 2011. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuwana magwaro epagore rega rega eZMDC kubva muna 2013 kusvika muna 2017. Zvichitevera kuoma kwezvinhu mumashandiro ekambani iyi, Sabi Mine yakanga yotadza kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo, pamwe nekubhadhara mihoro yevashandi vayo. Izvi zvakaita kuti ivharwe pasi pemutongo wematare, VaWesley Sibanda, vakanzi vave mukuru anoona kushanda kwekambani iyi vakamirira matare edzimhosva. Muna 2014 ZMDC yakaita chibvumirano chekushanda pamwe chete nekambani yeChandiwana Mining Corporation, iyo ine vanhu vanhu vanosvika zviuru zvishanu vakaisa mari dzavo mukambani iyi. Hapana kujeka kuti vanhu ava ndivanani kunyange hazvo zvichinzi vanosanganisira vari kunze kwenyika nevari munyika. Kambani yeChandiwana inonzi yakaisa mari inoita mamiriyoni makumi maviri nematanhatu emadhora kuitira kuti Sabi Mine itange zvakare kushanda. VaSibanda vakaudza vatori venhau nguva pfupi yapfuura kuti Sabi Mine yakanga yava kutobhadhara zvikwereti zvayo uye vachiti kuti vapedze kubhadhara zvikwereti izvi, panoda makore akati wandeyi. Vakatiwo Sabi Mine yakanga yobhadharawo mari yemihoro yevashandi vayo iyo yakanga yokundikana isati yasvharwa, iyo vanoti yakanga yosvika kumamiriyoni matatu emadhora. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata VaSibanda kuti tinzwe pamire nyaya iyi, kusanganisirawo vashandi vari kunzi vabude mudzimba dzekambani iyi. Asi vari kuziva zviri kuitika vanoti pane vashandi vachisiri vashandi veSabi Mine vari kuti vari kuda kutanga vabhadharwa mari dzavo dzose neSabi vasati vabva mudzimba idzi. No media source currently available
title: Sabi Gold Mine Yodzinga Vamwe Vanhu Mudzimba Dzayo

text: Madzimai echidiki mubato re MDC Alliance mudunhu reHarare West anoti ari kusangana nematambudziko apo ari kupinda muvanhu achivakurudzira kuti vanyorese kuvhota musarudzo dzichaitwa muna 2023. Munyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muboka revechidiki mu MDC Alliance mudunhu reHarare West, Muzvare Portia Makone, vanoti havasi kutambirwa zvakanaka mudunhu iri apo vanenge vachikurudzira vanhu kunyoresa kuvhota kuitira kuti vazokwanisa kuvhota muna 2023. Muzvare Makone vanoti dambudziko ravari kusangana naro ndere kuti vanhu vakawanda havazive kuti vane kodzero yokuti vavhotere munhu wavanoda. Muzvare Makone vanotiwo semaonero avo dzidziso yekodzero yekuvhota inofanirwa kutanga kuitwa kuzvikoro, kuitira kuti munhu akure achiziva nezvekodzero dzake dzekuvhota. Imwe nhengo yeMDC Alliance mudunhu iri, Muzvare Precious Dinha, vanoti dambudziko rekusaziva zvinoreva kodzero dzemunhu riri kuonekwawo zvikuru kumaruwa uko vanhu vanokwezva nechikafu kuti vavhotere mamwe mapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Muzvare Dinha vanoti nguva zvinhji chikafu ichi, icho chinoshandiswa sechombo muhondo yekutsvaga rutsigiro, chinenge chabva kumasangano anobatsira nechikafu pasi rose, akaita seWorld Food Program, uye chinenge chichifanirwa kupihwa munhu wese zvisineyi kuti abuda mumba maani. Muzvare Dinha vanoti vari kumaruwa, pamwe nevari mumaguta havafanirwe kuvhotera mapato anoshandisa nyaya yechikafu, asi kuti munhu ngaavhotere munhu waanotsigira kuburikidza neruzivo rwake rwekuti ari kuvhotera munhu akaita seyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti vanhu vakawanda munyika havawanzoda havo kubuda pachena kana nguva yesarudzo isati yasvika zvokuti zvose zviri kuchemwa chemwa nemadzimai echidiki muMDC Alliance, hazvisi zvinhu zvitsva. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru nwezvirongwa musangano reElectoral Resources Centre, Va VaSolomon Bobosibunu,vanoti muongororo dzavanoita dzakatarisana nesarudzo, dzinoratidza kuti nyaya dzekuvhota dzinobatanidzwa nemhirizhonga dzakamboitika kumashure nokudaro vanhu vazhinji havade kubuda pachena kuti vanotsigira bato ripi. VaBobosibunu vanoti vanhu vanotya kuzeya pachena maringe nezvematongerwo enyika sezvo vachitya kuzovhiringirwa hupenyu hwavo, nehwemhuri dzavo sezvinogara zvichiitika panguva dzesarudzo. VaBobosibunu vanoti munhu wese munyika ane kodzero dzokutanga bato rake rezvematongerwo enyika uye nekodzero dzekusarudza mutungamiri waanoda, zvinova zvinhu zvakachengetedzwa mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mutauriri weZanuPF, VaMike Bimha, vaudza Studio 7 kuti MDC Alliance yave kungotaura zvisina maturo nokuti rutsigirwo rwayaimbowana mumadhorobha mazhinji rwadzikira zvakanyanya maringe nekugunung’una nezvemakanzuru anotungamiririrwa nenhengo dzayo, dzisisiri kuita basa rekugadzira migwagwa, kusaraswa kwemarara uye nemvura isiri kufamba mudzimba dzavo izvo zvaita kuti vanhu vachere matsime padzimba dzavo mumaguta. VaBimha vati MDCA ngaiuyenehumbowo hunoratidza kuti chokwadi ZanuPF iri kushandisa chikafu kuti izovhoterwa muna 2023. Vatiwo ZanuPF iri kushanda munzvimbo dzakawanda zvikuru kumaruwa uko kwairi kuvandudza hupenyu hwevagari veko, izvo zvinoita kuti ivhoterwe munguva yesarudzo.
title: MDC Alliance Yopinda Muhurongwa hweKukurudzira Veruzhinji Kunyoresa Kuvhota

text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeChina, VaXi Jinping, vapedza rwendo rwavo rwemazuva maviri muZimbabwe nhasi, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachiti rwendo urwu rwasimbaradza hushamwari pakati penyika mbiri dzi zvikuru sei munyaya dzehupfumi. Mapato anopikisa achitungamirwa neMDC-T onyorerana chibvumirano chekukurudzira hurumende kuti ivandudze mitemo yesarudzo. Musangano weInternational Conference on Aids and Sexually Transmitted Diseases unoenderera mberi pachizeyiwa nzira dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheHIV/AIDS. Munhau dzemitambo, tichakupai nezvesarudzo yemutungamiri weZIFA. Muchirongwa cheLiveTalk na 8:30pm tiri kutarisa kushanya kwemutungamiri weChina kuZimbabwe VaXi Jinping. Iyi ndiyo misoro yenhau dzedu dzanhasi...munotibata pa 909 am, 4930, kana pa 13860, ne 15460 Kilohertzs pa Shortwave kana paFacebook page yedu yevoa Shona. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yenhau dzanhasi…Chitatu, Zvita, 02, 2015.

text: No media source currently available Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti havasi kunyatsofara nehuwandu hwevanhu vanyoresa kuvhota kusvika pari zvino. Amai Makarau vanoti chirongwa chitsva cheBiometric Voter Registration, kana kuti BVR, muchikamu chavo chekutanga chanyoresa vanhu zvikamu gumi nemumwe kubva muzana, asi vange vachida kuti vanga vanyoresa zvikamu makumi maviri nezvishanu kubva muzana. Amai Makarau vanoti ZEC inoti iri kuda kuti inyorese vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni manomwe panopera chirongwa ichi gore rinouya. Asi vanopikisa nemasangano akazvimirira oga vanoti havaone ZEC ichisvika pahuwandu uhu sezvo isina kugadzirira.
title: Amai Makarau Vobvuma Kuti BVR Ine Zvipingaidzo

text: Mutungamiri we South Africa, Va Cyril Ramaphosa, vasvika muZimbabwe neMugovera kuzoita hurukuro nemumwe wavo, mutungamiri weZimbabwe, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Vasati vaenda kuZimbabwe, VaRamaphosa, avo vanova sachigaro weSADC, vasanganawo nemutungamiri we Mozambique muMaputo, VaFilipe Nyusi, vakakurukura nyaya dzine chekuita nekudyidzana kwenyika mbiri idzi. Musangano waVa Ramaphosa naVa Mnangagwa wakanangana nekusimbaradza hukama hwe Zimbabwe ne South Africa, uho hwakatanga munguva iyo nyika mbiri idzi dzairwira kuzvitonga kuzere. Mutauriri waVaRamaphosa, VaKhusela Diko, vati Zimbabwe neSouth Africa dzine nhoroondo yakareba, uhwo hwakatanga nyika mbiri idzi dzisati dzave nekuzvitonga. VaRamaphosa naVaMnangagwa vakurukura mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika dzavo, pamwe nezviri kuitika kuchamhembe kweAfrica pamwe nepasi rose zvinobata nyika dzavo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure mekuita hurukuro naVaMnangagwa, VaRamaphosa vati rwendo rwavo rwanga rwuri rwekuuya kuzoona mumwe wavo. Vatiwo vakurukura pamusoro pezvinhu zvakakoshera Zimbabwe neSouth Africa munyaya dzehupfumi uye nzira dzekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika mbiri idzi.
title: VaRamaphosa Vanosangana naVaMnangagwa muHarare

text: Mutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice David Mangota, vaudza kanzuru yeguta reHarare pamwe nemapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police, ZRP, kuti vasabvise vanhu vari kutengesera zvinhu mukati meguta reHarare kusvika nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare iri nesangano reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VISET, yanzwikwa. Gweta riri kumirara sangano reVISET, Advocate Tonderai Bhatasara, vanoti izvi zvave kureva kuti kanzuru kana mapurisa havafanirwi kukanganisa mashandiro evanotengesera mumigwagwa ava kusvika nyaya yavo yanzwikwa mudare iri neChipiri svondo rinouya. Advocate Bhatasara vanoti dare rapa mutongo uyu rakamirira mamwe mapepa anzi anofanirwa kuti asvitswe kudare iri. "Zvazvinoreva ndezvekuti iye zvino izvi hapana munhu anofanirwa kuti abviswe. Zvinoreva kuti dare rinenge ratarisawo richiona ma rights evanhu richi compare nezvinonzi zviri kuda kuti zvi achivhiwe," Advocate Bhatasara vanodaro. Sangano reVISET rakakwira kudare repamusoro iri zvichitevera danho rakanga ratorwa nekanzuru rekupa vanotengesera mumigwagwa mazuva maviri ekuti vabude mukati meguta senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere che typhoid, icho chakabata mimwe misha yeguta iri. Asi vanotengesa zvinhu ava, zvikuru zvekudya zvakaita semichero, vari kuramba kuti vane chekuita nekupararira kwezvirwere vachipomera mhosva kuhurumende kuti ndiyo iri kukundikana kufambisa mabasa. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rinombomisa Kudzingwa kweVanotengesera Mukati meGuta reHarare

text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Auxillia Mnangagwa, vakurudzira misha inochengeta nherera kuti idzidzise uye kuendesa vana ava muzvikoro zvinovadzidzisa mabasa emaoko vachiri vadiki. Amai Mnangagwa vanoti vana ava vanosungirwa kufundiswa mabasa aya sezvo achizovabatsira mune ramangwana ravo. Amai Mnangagwa vataura mashoko aya pakutambidzwa kwezvekudya uye zvimwe zvibatsiriso kumisha gumi neina inochengeta nherera mudunhu reManicaland. Amai Mnangagwa vati vana vakadzidziswa mabasa emaoko vachiri vadiki, havazoshupike kana vazoyaruka nekushaya mabasa sezvo vachizokwanisa kuzvishandira voga. “Ndangariro dzangu dzange dziri dzekuti vana ava vaendeswe kumaVocational Training Centres vachiri vadiki nokuti zvinoitika pavana ava kana vauya kuno kumaChildren's Homes anodzikira paandangariro dzake. Saka tinenge tichida kuti vana ava vawanirwe zvekuita vachiri vadiki kudai,” vadaro Amai Mnangagwa Vatiwo kana vana vakawanirwa mukana wekuita mabasa emaoko havazoyauri kana vabva zera sezvo vanenge vaine pekutangira. “Vana ava vanofanirwa kuiswa mumagurupu zvichienderano nemaskills avo kuti vaite,” vadaro Amai Mnangagwa. “Vana ivava kana vakawana zvekuita sekukoma koma, kana kusona, kana kufuraya mafetikuku, nemabanzi vanozowana chinovabatsira pamberi apo. Nekuti hatifanirwi kuti mwna wese angochovherwa mutown nekuti hamuna chinobudamo futi zvakare.” Misha inochengeta vana iyi yawana zvekudya zvinokosha zviuru nezviuru zvemadhora zvinosanganisira mafuta, mupunga, machira zvekutambisa kumisha gumi neina yemudunhu reManicaland. Amai Cecilia Mabvumbe vemusha weFairview Children's Home paOld Mutare Mission vati vafara nerubatsiro rwavapihwa vachiti musha wavo wanga wava parumananzombe. Vati ivo vari kufara zvakanyanyisa nekuti vange vakanganikwa uye hapana aiziva zvinetswa zvavo. Sister Dorothy Mtemararo veBonda Mission Children's Home vatiwo vafara nerubatsiro rwavawana vakati zvikuru vanoda kutanga maprojects pamusha wavo kuti vakwanise kuzvimiririra. “Tiri kufaririsisa nekuti tine ‘a good mother, who is caring’, Mwari avakomborere,” Sister Mtemararo vadaro. “Vana vanofanirwa kukurira pama facility akaita seepamba chaipo kwete zvema dormitory style sezviriko izvi. Isuwo tinenge tichida kuti tiite ma projects zvakanyanya, seehuku, nguruve, mombe paine mvura,” vadaro Sister Mtemararo. Mukuru wemusha weChitenderano kwaRusape, VaDaniel Samuriwo, vanoti vafarawo nezvavagoverwa, vachiti vaitirwa zvakanaka nekusimudzirwa kwavaitwa naAmai vavarangarirawo panguva yekuoma kwezvinhu. Gurukota rinomirira dunhu reManicaland, Amai Monica Mtsvangwa, vapembedza Amai Mnangagwa nekushanda kwavo panguva yezororo reKirisimasi negore idzva vachishanyira varwere muzvipatara munyika yose. No media source currently available
title: Amai Mnangagwa Vokurudzira Nherera Kudzidziswa Mabasa eMaoko

text: Vagari vazhinji mudunhu reMasvingo vanoti vari kunetsekana zvikuru kuti vawane magwaro akaita seekuzvarwa, zvitupa pamwe nemapasipoti. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wakarongwa neZimbabwe Human Rights Commission. Vagari vazhinji mudunhu reMasvingo vanoti vari kunetsekana zvikuru kuti vawane magwaro akaita seekuzvarwa, zvitupa pamwe nemapasipoti. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wakarongwa neZimbabwe Human Rights Commission Vachitaura pamusangano wekunzwa matambudziko anosangana neveruzhinji pakutorwa kwemagwaro aya, vazhinji vati vana vavo vari kutadza kuenda kuzvikoro nekushaikwa kwemagwaro anodiwa kumaruwa. Sadunhu Nyamutake, VaMaxwell Chaminuka, vati vagari vekumaruwa vari kukundikana kutora magwaro ekuberekwa kwevana vavo nenyaya yekuoma kwehupenyu. Mumwe mugari, VaDonald Mugwagwa, vatiwo vari kutadza kutora gwaro rekuberekwa remwana wavo nekuti vakasiyana nemudzimaai wavo uyo wavasingazivi kuti aripi nekuti mutemo hautendedzi kuti mwana atoreswe magwaro aya pasina amai vake. Ambuya Sibongile Masukume vekuMwenezi vati vari kutadza kutorera muzukuru wavo gwaro rekuberekwa kuti aende kuchikoro uyo vakasiirwa nevabereki vake vakaenda ku South Africa uko vakarovera ikoko. Vamwe vagari vachema chema kuti hofisi yekunotorwa zvitupa haisi kuvabata zvakanaka uye inoita chioko muhomwe kuti vanhu vawane magwaro avanenge vachida nechimbi chimbi. Amai Esther Nyambiya, vesangano re Masvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, vapa humbowo vakamirira vagari. Vati mapasipoti haachatoreki zvichinzi hurumende haina mari yekuagadzira. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, VaElasto Mugwadi, vati vatambira zviri kunetsa vanhu, izvo vati zviri kutyora kodzero dzavo dzekuwana magwaro. VaMugwadi vati vari kuita ongororo iyi kuti vaone matambudziko ari kusangana nevanhu mukodzero dzavo dzekuwana magwaro aya sezviri mumitemo yenyika. Vachipawo humbowo kukomisheni, mukuru webasa muhofisi inopa vanhu magwaro mudunhu reMasvingo, Amai Stembeni Chitsa, vati vari kuzama nepavanogona napo kuti vanhu vawane magwaro nyore. VaMugwadi vati vachanyora gwaro richapihwa hurumende kuti igadzirise matambudziko ari kusangana neveruzhinji sezvinodiwa nembumbiro remitemo yenyika. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vakawanda Vonetseka Kuwana Magwaro Anokosha

text: Varimi vakawanda vanoti kuwandisa kwemvura iri kunaya munyika yose kuchaderedza goho ravo mwaka uno sezvo vave kuda fotireza yakawanda yavasingakwanise kutenga nekuda kwekudhura. Varimi ava vanoti pamusoro pekukukurwa kwefotireza yavanenge vaisa, mvura iyi iri kuvatadzisa kusakurawo. Vanoti kunyange murimi akaisa mishonga yekuuraya sora haushande nekuda kwemvura yawandisa. Mumwe murimi wekuMutorashanga, VaAntony Zunzanyika, vanoti mvura iri kuvatadzisa kuisa fotireza zvekuti chibage chavo chatsukuruka. VaZunzanyika vanoti rimwe dambudziko rave kukonzerwa nekuwanda kwemvura kuwanda kwesora muminda iro rinodyawo fotireza shoma inenge yaiswa nemurimi. Mumwe murimi wefodya kuMhangura, VaInnocent Gwenya, vanoti mvura yakawanda iri kukonzera kuti fodya yavo iyite makonye sezvo vari kuti vakafirita, mvura yobva yanaya mushonga usati washanda. Sachigaro werimwe sangano revarimi reZimbabwe Intergrated Commercial Farmers Union, Amai Mayiwepi Jiti, vanoti mvura iri kunaya kamwe chete munguva pfupi zviri kukonzera kukukurwa kwevhu muminda. Amai Jiti vanoti mvura ikawandisa zvinoreva kuwedzera mafotireza zvichikonzera kukwira kwezvekurimisa. Amai Jiti vanoti kuwandawo kwemvura kunoita kuti fodya ikurumidze kuibva nguva imwechete zvinozoita kuti varimi vasina mipanda yakakura yekuomesa fodya yavo, varasikirwe nefodya yavo iri muminda. Nyanzvi dzinotiwo varimi vanofanirwa kubhadhara maishuwarenzi (insurance) kuitira kuti zvivabatsire kana vachinge vawirwa nedambudziko rinoparadza zvirimwa zvavo. Saga refotireza rinorema makirigiramu makumi mashanu rinotengwa nemadhora makumi matatu kusvika pamadhora makumi mana ekuAmerica. No media source currently available
title: Varimi Vochema Chema neMvura Yawandisa

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanonzi vakasaina kuti uve mutemo bhiri reZimbabwe Media Commssion (ZMC), iro rakanangana nekuvandudzwa kwemutemo weAccess to Information and Protection to Privacy Act, AIPPA. Izvi zvakaziviswa nemunyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana kuburikidza nemashoko avakaisa padandemutande reTwitter, avo vakati vari kufadzwa zvikuru nekuvepo kwemutemo weZimbabwe Media Commssion Act uyu. Asi mukuru wesangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa (MISA) Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vanoti kunyange hazvo bhiri iri rave mutemo, hauna zvinotarisirwa zvinobata kutongwa kwevatori venhau, izvo zvavanoti vanotarisira kuti zviri mune mubhiri risati rave mutemo re Media Practitioners Bill. Asi VaMoyo vanoti mutemo weZimbabwe Media Commission Act uyu wadzosa nhaurwa dzinoita nezvekuti vashandise mapurisa mukubata vanenge vachifungirwa kuti vari kuvhiiringidza kodzero dzekutapwa kwenhau. Ngatinzweyi hurukuro yavaita naJonga Kandemiiri weStudio7 No media source currently available
title: Vanomirira Kodzero dzeVatori veNhau Voshushikana neMutemo Mutsva Wakasainwa naVaMnangagwa

text: Bato reMDC Alliance rinoti richagadza mutungamiri waro, VaNelson Chamisa, semutungamiri wenyika nemusi weMugovera, 15 Gunyana 2018 kunhandare yeGwanzura muHarare apo bato reMDC-T richange richipembera kusvitsa kwaro makore gumi nemapfumbabwe raumbwa. Mutauriri waVaChamisa, Doctor Nkululeko Sibanda, vanoti hushe kana hutongi hunogadzwa nevanhu vemuZimbabwe vakavhota, kwete kugadzwa nedare redzimhosva kana kugadzwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC. Doctor Sibanda vanoramba mashoko ekuti bato ravo riri kutevedzera zvakaitwa nevanopikisa hurumende kuKenya, VaRaila Odinga, avo vakagadzwa hutungamiri hwenyika nevatsigiri vavo mushure mekukundwa musarudzo naVaUhuru Kenyatta muna 2017. VaChamisa vakakundwa musarudzo idzi nevaive vakamirira Zanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, asi vakaramba kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo idzi. Izvi zvakazoita kuti VaChamisa vaende kudare reConstitutional Court, iro rakarasa nyaya yavo zvakazoita kuti VaMnangagwa vagadzwe semutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance Yoti Ichagadza VaChamisa seMutungamiri weNyika

text: Kwaita mhirizhonga nekuridzwa kwepfuti pedyo nekiriniki yeChinengundu muChegutu apo vatsigiri venhengo dzebato reZanu PF dziri kukwikwidza musarudzo dzanga dzichitatsurana. Nhengo dzebato reZanu PF dziri kutsigira mumiriri weChegutu muparamende, VaDexter Nduna, dzarovana nevari kuvakwikwidza, VaKisto Jabangwe, pari kuvhoterwa sarudzo ye primary muChegutu Central. Vaona mhirizhonga ichiitika vanoti VaNduna pavaona kuti vave kukundwa musarudzo apo panga poverengwa mavhoti, vabuda panze kunotora hofori dzevarume avo vasvikorova vanhu vanga vachiitisa sarudzo. Zvinonzi dzimwe nhengo dzinotsigira VaJabangwe dzadzoserawo. Zvinonzi VaNduna pavaona kuti ivo nevanhu vavo vave kurohwa, vaburitsa pfuti ndokuridzira mudenga. Mapurisa azouya ndokusvikokanda zvombo zvehutsi hunokachidza vachiedza kuparadza kurwisana uku. VaNduna vabvuma kuti varidza pfuti mudenga vachiti vaita izvi vachidzivirira vanhu vanga vachida kurova vatsigiri vavo. Patataura navo, VaNduna vanga vasina kusungwa vakaudza Studio7 kuti vachiri kuverenga mavhoti. Zvichakadaro, sachigaro weZanu PF mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vakunda VaElvis Mareverwa musarudzo yemuZvimba West. Vaimbove gurukota rezveminda, VaDouglas Mombeshora, vakundwa naAmai Precious Chinhamo Masanga, asi VaMombeshora vari kuramba vachiti ndivo vakunda nemavhoti mashanu chete. Vari kuitisa sarudzo mudunhu iri vanoti havataure zvabuda musarudzo zvisati zvaendeswa kumusoro. Nhengo dzebato reZanu PF muChinhoyi dziri kufara nedanho rekuti sarudzo idzi dzidzokororwe sezvo dzisina kufambiswa nemazvo. VaClifford Khlupeko vanoti vanhu vari kukanganisa sarudzo dzebato reZanu PF inhengo dzechikwata cheG40 avo vavanoti vari kushandisa mari yakawanda. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kunhengo dzinonzi dzeG40. Sarudzo munzvimbo dzakaita seChinhoyi, Zvimba North neMakonde dzakanzi dzidzokororwe sezvo dzisina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Vanhu vakawanda mudunhu iri vari kutarisira kunzwa zvabuda musarudzo dzekuHurungwe West uko Amai Mary Koka-Mliswa vari kutashurana naVaKieth Guzah. No media source currently available
title: Pfuti Dzorira kuChegutu Musarudzo dzeZanu PF

text: Chikwata chenhumwa dzinobva kusangano reCommonwealth chiri muZimbabwe kuita hurukuro nokuwongorora mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika sechimwe chezvinhano zvina zvinofanirwa kuitwa kuti Zimbabwe igotambirwa kuti idzokere musangano iri. NeMuvhuro chikwata ichi, icho chinotungamirirwa naMuzvare Yvonne Apea Mensah, chakaita hurukuro negurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, Doctor Sibusiso Moyo. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaKindness Paradza veZanu PF, vanoti chikwata cheCommonwealth ichi chiri kuda kuona kana Zimbabwe ine chido chekudzoka muCommonwealth zvechokwadi here uye kana ichikudza mitemo yayo. VaParadza vanoti zvimwe zvinoda kuonekwa nechikwata ichi ndezvekuti Zimbabwe inoremekedza kodzero dzevanhu here uye kuti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa iri kugarisana zvakanaka here nemapato anoipikisa. No media source currently available
title: Nhumwa DzeCommonwealth Dzoita Musangano NeGurukota Rezvekudyidzana Nedzimwe Nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo

text: Mutungamiri wesangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti vari kufara zvikuru kuti hurongwa hwavo hwekuratidzira vachiburitsa homwe dzezvipfeko zvavo kunze hwavaita neChishanu, hwabudirira chose kunyange hazvo mapurisa avharisa mahofisi avo muHarare. VaMasaraure vanoti nhengo dzavo dzabatana nevamwe varairidzi vemamwe masangano evarairidzi mumatunhu akasiyanasiyana, avo vapindawo muchirongwa chekuburitsa homwe dzembatya panze senzira yekuratidza hurumende kuti vanhu munyika vari kushupika nekushaikwa kwemari munyika uye nemihoro mishoma yavari kupiwa. VaMasaraure vanotiwo sangano ravo rawana rutsigiro kubva kumasangano anosanganisira Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, Zimbabwe Yadzoka, uye Tajamuka. No media source currently available
title: Varairidzi Vanoratidzira kuMaruwa Vachiti Vari Kuomerwa neHupenyu

text: Vamwe vakuru vebato reMDC Alliance vasungwa muHarare pamuzinda webato iri vachida kupinda muMorgan Tsvangirai House, iyo yakatorwa neChina manheru neMDC inotungamirwa naMuzvare Khupe. Vasungwa ava vanosanganisira vatevedzeri vaviri vaVa Nelson Chamisa, VaTendai Biti na Amai Lynette Karenyi Kore. Vamwe vasungwa nemapurisa vanosanganisira VaDavid Chimhini, VaLovemore Chinoputsa, Muzvare Gladys Hlatywayo nevamwe. Vachitaura nevatori venhau vasati vasungwa, VaBiti vati vanga vauya kuzoti mapurisa vavabatsirwe kubudisa vanhu vakapinda pamuzinda wavo. VaBiti vatiwo hapana magwaro ekumatare avakawana anoratidza kuti nhengo dzekwaMuzvare Khupe dzinofanirwa kutora muzinda weMorgan Tsvangirai House. Asi munyori muMDC T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, avo vakatora muzinda uyu nezuro Manheru, vati Morgan Tsvangirai House ndeyavo sebato huye hapana chikonzero chekunotsvaka mapepa ekumatare edzimhosva kuti vashandise mahofisi avo. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzai Mahere, vati kusungwa kwaitwa nhengo dzavo kunovashamisa nekuti vanga vachiita zviri pamutemo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauririri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, kuti vasungwa ava vanga vatyora mutemo upi. VaNyathi vati vanga vari mumusangano, nokudaro havakwanisi kutaura neStudio7. Asi mapurisa asunga vatungamiriri ava vanga vachishevedzera kuti vari kuvasungira mhosva yekutyorwa mutemo une chekuita nekupararira kwechirwere cheCOVID-19. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Anosunga VaBiti neVamwe Vavo

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vakaudza vatori venhau muHarare nemusi weMuvhuro kuti vanamukoti vose vadzokera kumabasa mushure mekuratidzira. No media source currently available Vachitaura mumashoko akatumirwa kuStudio 7 nebazi rezvehutano, Dr Parirenyatwa vanoti vanamukoti vanosvika zviuru zvitanhatu ndivo vairamwa mabasa pane gumi nezviuru zvitanhatu vari kushanda muzvipatara zvehurumende. Vanotizve zvinhu zvose zvave kufamba zvakanaka muzvipatara. Asi ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 kuChinhoyi, zvabuda pachena kuti vanamukoti vadzokera kumabasa asi vachiratidza kuti havasi kushanda nemoyo wose semazuva ose. Kusashanda zvine chido zviri kusiya vakawanda vaine mubvunzo wekuti kudzoka kwavo kumabasa hakusi kungotya kudzingwa mabasa zvachose here nehurumende. Vanamukoti pachipatara chikuru chemuChinhoyi yaratidza kuti vana mukoti vanga vachitora nguva yakareba kurapa munhu mumwechete izvo zvanga zvichiita kuti varwere vashoma vapedze nguva yakawanda vari pamitsetse. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi VaFidelis Mupasiri vanoti zviri pachena kuti vanamukoti havasi kuita basa ravo nechido Ambuya Fadzai Rukodzi avo vane muzukuru akapihwa mubhedha vanoti vana mukoti havasi kuita zvinenge zvataurwa nanachiremba sezvo vasina kuperera pabasa ravo. VaMupasiri vanoti chimwe chiri kunetsa ndechekuti varwere vari kumanikidzwa kutenga mishonga kunze kwechipatara uko inodhura zvakanyanya. Asi Amai Sekai Nyamaropa vanoti vanamukoti vari muwadhi muno yamurwa madzimai vari kuda kusununguka vari kuita basa ravo nemazvo uye vakaperera. Vanamukoti avo vanga vachiramwa mabasa kwesvondo rose rapera vakadzokera kumabasa mushure mekunge hurumende kuburikidza nemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, General Constantino Chiwenga, yavizisa kuti yange yavadzinga basa. Asi vasati vatanga basa nemusi weMuvhuro vanamukoti vanzi vasaine magwaro ekuti vakabuda basa uye nemamwe ekuti vave kuda basa zvakare izvo vakawanda vanonzi vaita. Mukuru webazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West VaWensilus Nyamayaro vanoti vanamukoti vose vadzokera kubasa mushure mekusaina magwaro ose anga achidiwa kuti vasaine uye vakapihwa mukana wekupinza basa vamwe vanamukoti zana basa. Vari kuziva zviri kuitika pachipatara chemuChinhoyi vanoti vamwe vana mukoti vanofungidzirwa kuti ndivo vaikurudzira vamwe kuti varamwe mabasa vacharambirwa kuti vadzoke pabasa. Dr Parirenaytwa vanoti vanamukoti vanosvika zviuru zvitanhatu ndivo vairamwa mabasa pane gumi nezviuru zvitanhatu vari kushanda muzvipatara zvehurumende. Vanotizve zvinhu zvose zvave kufamba zvakanaka muzvipatara. No media source currently available
title: Dr Parirenyatwa Vanoti VanaMukoti Vose Vadzokera kuMabasa

text: Mumwe wevatevedzeri wevatungamiri venyika, VaKembo Mohadi, vari kutarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvezvicherwa pamwe nemhando dzemoto, vachibvunzwa nezvavanoziva nezvemari inoita mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu emadhora inonzi yakabva mukutengeswa kwemangoda, yakatsakatika. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende iyi, VaTemba Mliswa, vanoti komiti yavo ichange ichibvunza mibvunzo kuna VaMohadi pamwechete nemamwe makurukota pamusoro penyaya iyi. Vanotizve pari zvino vaunganidza humbowo hwakawanda uye kana vapedza kutaura naVaMohadi, vachagara pasi nekomiti yavo kuti vatenderane zuva rinofanirwa kushevedzwa vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe kuti vamirewo pamberi pekomiti iyi. VaMugabe ndivo vakasimudza nyaya yekutsakatika kwemari iyi muna 2016, izvo zvakashamisa vanhu vakawanda kuti mari ine huwandu hwakadaro ingangonzi yashaikwa. No media source currently available
title: VaMohadi Votarisirwa Kumiswa Pamberi peKomiti yeZvicherwa

text: Komiti yeZimbabwe Rhodes Selection Committee yakadoma Terrens Muradzikwa kuti apihwe bhezari rekuenda kuOxford. Makwikwi aya akapindwa nevechidiki vanobva muZimbabwe, South Africa, Britain, America nedzimwe nyika. Terrens uyo akakunda Zimbabwe yose pabvunzo dzeO level ne A level ari kudzidza paHarvad muAmerica pari zvino. Ainge aine 16 A's pabvunzo dzeO Level, uye 15 points paA Level. Imwe nhengo yomiti iyi, Muzvinafundo Arthur Mutambara vanoti vadzidzi vakapinda muchirongwa chegore rino vane njere dzakapinza. Terrens akadzidza kuMarist Brothers kuNyanga uye pari zvino ari kupeta zvidzidzo zvake zvehupfumi kana kuti economics paHarvard University. Chirongwa cheRhodes Scholarships chakaparurwa muna 1903 pasi pechido chaCecil John Rhodhes chekuti nhaka yake yaizogoverwa sei. Muzvinafundo Mutambara vanoti pakusarudza wekupa bhezari iri havangotarise zvidzidzo, asi kuti vanhu vanogonawo kutungamira uye zvemitambo. Vazhinji vakapinda muchirongwa ichi vakazoita vatungamiri kusanganisa vaive mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaBill Clinton naivo VaMutambara vakavawo mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wehurumende yemubatanidzwa. No media source currently available
title: Terrens Muradzikwa Osarudzwa Kuenda kuOxford neZimbabwe Rhodes Selections Committee

text: Dare repamusoro ratura mutongo wekuti kambani yeTelecel Zimbabwe imboramba ichishanda gakava rayo nehurumende richigadziriswa. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, Va Nicholas Mathonsi, vatura mutongo uyu zvichitevera chikumbiro chakaitwa neTelecel Zimbabwe. No media source currently available Va Mathonsi vati vachazopa zvikonzero zvavo zvizere muzuva ravasina kutara pavatura mutongo uyu mumahofisi avo. Telecel Zimbabwe yakasvitsa chikumbiro kudare repamusoro chekuti ibvumidzwe kushanda zvichitevera kukanzurwa kwakaitwa rezenesi nePost and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority of Zimbabwe kana kuti Potraz. Potraz iri kupomera Telecel mhosva yekusatevedza mutemo wenyika. Va Mathonsi vatiwo Potraz isave nechekuita nezvenyaya ye Telecel kudzamara Telecel yapedzerana negurukota rinowona nezvehumhizha mukufambiswa kwemashoko, Va Supa Mandiwanzira. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVa Mandiwanzira kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende zvichitevera mutongo uyu sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga isiri kudairwa. Mutauriri weTelecel Zimbabwe, Va Francis Chimanda, varamba kutaura nezvenyaya iyi neStudio 7 vachiti vatora danho sekambani kuti vasazeye nyaya iyi nevatori venhau. Zvichakai, mumwe mugari wemu Harare uye ari muzvinabhizimusi anoshandisa nhamba dzeTelecel Zimbabwe, Va Emmanuel Marara, vanoti vafara zvikuru nemutongo waturwa nedare uyu. VaMarara vashorawo hurumende nekuda kuvharisa kambani ye Telecel vachiti vanhu vazhinji vanogona kurasikirwa nemabasa izvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Mumwe anoshandisawo nharembozha yeTelecel, Va Martin Musevenzi, avo vanoita basa rekuhodha zvinhu vachitengesa, vanoti vanhu vazhinji vanga vave kuziva nhamba dzavo dzeTelecel zvekuti dai dare raramba kupa Telecel mvumo yekuti ienderere mberi nebasa, hupenyu hwaizovaomera zvikuru. Kambani ye Telecel Zimbabwe ndiyo kambani yechipiri munyika pakukura inoita zvembozhanhare, uye inoti ine vanhu mamiriyoni maviri nemazana mashanu ezviuru vanoshandisa mbozhanhare dzayo munyika. Kambani yeTelecel Zimbabwe ikambani yakaumbwa nekambani yekunze yeTelecel Globe pamwe neEmpowerment Corporation yavana muzvinabhizinesi vemuZimbabwe. Telecel Globe ine zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvemari muTelecel Zimbabwe, ukuwo Empowerment Corporation iine zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana. Telecel Globe iri pasi pekambani yeOrascom Telecom Company, iyo ine manhizinesi mu Africa, Europe, Asia, Middle East ne North America.
title: Vanoshandisa Telecel Zimbabwe Votura Befu

text: Sangano rinoongorora nyaya dzesarudzo rakazvimirira reZimbabwe Election Support Network, kana kuti ZESN, rinoti kune zvakawanda zvinoda kugadziriswa munyaya dzekunyoreswa kwevavhoti kusanganisira kuranga vari kutyisidzira vanhu nekukurudzira vechidiki kunyoresa kuvhota kuti chikamu chepiri chekunyoresa vavhoti chibudirire. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare, sangano reZESN rabudisa ongororo yavo yechikamu chekutanga chekunyoreswa kwevavhoti icho chakapera musi wa25 Gumiguru. Sachigaro wesangano iri, VaAndrew Makoni, vati huwandu hwevanhu vakadzoserwa kumba vasina kuuya nezvakakwana kuzonyoresa hunoratidza kuti pachiri kuda kuitwa dzidziso yakakura kune veruzhinji. VaMakoni vatiwo sangano reZESN riri kushungurudzwa zvikuru nekushomeka kwevanhu vakanyoresa muchikamu chekutanga kunyanya vechidiki. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muZESN, Amai Ellen Dingani, vatiwo sesangano vatangawo zvirongwa zvekudzidzisa veruzhinji nezvekunyoresa sezvo zvichiratidza kuti ruzivo rwushoma. Vatiwo vari kushanda nemasangano evakaremara sezvo vari vamwe vemapoka asiri kuwana dzidziso muchirongwa chekunyoresa ichi. Sangano iri rakurudzira komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission kuti muchikamu chepiri ichi vakoshesewo vanorarama nehurema nekuona kuti pane nzvimbo dzekunyoresa dzinosvikika zvirinyore. ZESN inotiwo nyaya yekutyisidzirwa kwevanhu ichiri kuenderera mberi vanhu kumaruwa kunyanya vachinyeperwa kuti vachaonekwa pavanenge vavhotera. ZESN yatiwo kana nhengo dzayo dziri kuongororora chirongwa chekunyoresa vavhoti dziri kutyisidzirwa kunzvimbo dzakaita seZvishavane, Mwenezi West neBulilima East. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvakakosha kuti masangano akazvimirira akaita seZESN ashande pamwe chete neZEC nevamwe vezvematongerwo enyika kugadzirisa zvimhingamupinyu zviri kusangana nevari kunyoresa kuvhota kuti zvigadziriswe. Chikamu chepiri chekunyoresa kuvhota chinopera musi wa 13 Mbudzi, uye ZEC ine zvikamu zvina zvekunyoresa kuvhota. No media source currently available
title: ZEC Inokuridzirwa Kudzidzisa Vanhu Zvakakwana

text: Mutungamiriri webato rinopikisa, rePeople's Democractic Party, VaTendai Biti, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakakanaka munyika munyaya dzematongerwo enyika pamwe nehupfumi zvekuti munyika munogona kuita kurwisana kunotyisa mukati menguva pfupi inotevera. Vachitaura pamusangano wainge wakarongwa nesangano reSouthern African Political Economy Series maererano nemafambiro achaita zvinhu kana mutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vachinge vaenda. Musangano uyu wakaitwa China manheru. VaBiti vakati kurwisana kuri kuitika mubato ririkutonga reZanu PF, kusamira zvakana kwehupfumi pamwe nekusawirirana mukati memapato anopikisa munyika ndizvo zvinoita kuti vafunge kuti munyika munogona kuita nyonga nyonga nekuurayana kwevanhu sezvaikaita kunyika yeRwanda muna 1994. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti kana VaMugabe vakabva pari zvino sezvo vakwegura panofanira kuumbwa hurumende yemubatanidzwa kwenguva pfupi inonzi National Transitional Authority. Transitional Authity iyi inonzi ndiyo inozoona kuti munyika maitwa sarudzo murunyararo. Nhengo yebodhi reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMehluli Dube vanoti vanobvumirana nemaonero aVaBiti uye hurongwa hwavo hweNational Transitional Authority hunofanira kupihwa mukana. Asi vanoti havaone izvi zvichitika pari zvino sezvo bato riri kutonga ririkuita sekuti hapana zviri kunetsa uye richiti rakasarudzwa nevanhu. VaPride Mukono vanotiwo pfungwa dzeNational Transitional Authority dzakanaka chose sezvo dzichipa nyika mukana wekugadzirisa zvinhu sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Muzvinafundo, Sabelo Gastheni Ndhlovu vekuUniversity of South Africa vakati maonero aVaBiti akanaka chose uye zvinofadza kuti pane vamwe vakaita saVaBiti vari kushanda kugadzirisa zvinhu munyika. Asi muzvinafundo Rudo Gaidzamwa vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe vanoti veruzhinji munyika havanachivimbo nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika uye ndosaka vave kuzara kudzisvondo uko vanopihwa tariro maererano nehupenyu hwavo. VaMugabe vatonga nyika kwemakore makumi matatu nemashanu uye hapana hwaro hwakajeka kwekuti zvinhu zvichafamba sei kana vakafa kana vakasiya chigaro. No media source currently available
title: VaBiti Voyambira Hondo muNyika Pakasaiswa Musoro Pamwe Chete

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nemagariro evanhu dzinoti nyaya dze Panama Papers munongedzo mukuru pazvinhu zvisiri kufamba zvakanaka munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nemagariro evanhu dzinoti nyaya dze Panama Papers munongedzo mukuru pazvinhu zvisiri kufamba zvakanaka munyika. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti mari dziri kuvigwa kunze kwenyika dziri kuita kuti zvinhu zviomere veruzhinji, vakapfuma vachiramba vachizvimba matumbu nekugarika. Mashoko aya anotevera kuburitswa kwemazita evanhu vemuZimbabwe vari Panama Papers vachipomerwa mhosva yekuburitsa mari munyika zvisiri pamutemo. Chipangamazano musangano re Trust Africa, Va Briggs Bomba, vanoti kunyange hazvo mazita evakuru vakuru muhurumende asiri mumagwaro e Panama Papers, vane chokwadi kuti pane vanhuwo zvavo vari kushandiswa nevakuru ava kuburikidza nekushandiswa kwemazita avo mukuviga mari idzi kunze kwenyika. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, Va Rueben Tendai Mbofana, vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kupinda mumigwagwa vachiratidzira kusafara nekuurayiwa kuri kuitwa nyika yavo. No media source currently available
title: Veruzhinji Vokurudzirwa Kusimudza Musoro Zvichitevera Zviri Kubuda muPanama Papers

text: Varairidzi vemunyika vazivisa neMuvhuro kuti vachange vachishanda zuva rimwe chete pasvondo sezvinoenderana nemihoro yavo, iyo vanoti iri pazvikamu makumi maviri nechimwe kubva muzana zvemihoro yavaifanirwa kunge vachiwana. Izvi zvabuda pamhemberero dzekucherechedza zuva revarairidzi pasi rose, reWorld Teachers’ Day, dzaitwa muHarare nemasangano mana evarairidzi, anoti reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe (ARTUZ), Progressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe (PTUZ, Zimbabwe Teachers’ Association (ZIMTA) neTeachers’ Union of Zimbabwe (TUZ). Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti masangano anomirira varairidzi aya atorawo mukana uyu kutaura zvaari kuita semasangano evarairidzi, uyewo zvaanotarisirawo kubva kuhurumende. Masangano aya anonzi atorawo mukana uyu kuyeuchidza hurumende kuti igadzirise zvichemo zvevarairidzi panyaya yemihoro nemashandiro avo, uye kusimbisa hondo yekurwisana nedenda reCovid-19 muzvikoro. Gurukota idzva redzidzo, Doctor Evelyn Ndlovu, vanonzi vange varipowo pachiitiko ichi, uye vanonzi vati chinangwa chavo ndechekudzosera chiremera chevarairidzi. Vanonzi vakurudzirawo varairidzi kuti vaende kumabasa mazuva ose vachiti hurumende iri kutarisa zvichemo zvavo. Zuva reWorld Teachers’ Day rakacherechedzwa pasi rose svondo rapera neChipiri musi wa 05 Gumiguru pasi pedingindira rinoti “Teachers at the Heart of Education Recovery,” iro rakanangana nekucherechedza kusaneta kwevarairidzi, zvikuru munguva ino yedenda reCovid-19. Hatina kukwanisa kubata Doctor Ndlovu kuti tinzwewo kubva kwavari segurukota redzidzo. Asi VaMasaraure vanoti varairidzi vatambira nemufaro chivimbiso chegurukota redzidzo chekuda kudzosera chiremera chavo, asi vachamirira kutanga vanona kana zvakazadziswa ivo vozoendawo kumabasa mazuva ose. No media source currently available
title: Varairidzi Vanocherechedza Zuva reVarairidzi Pasi Rose Vachiti Vachashanda Zuva Rimwe paSvondo

text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti dambudziko rechirwere cheCovid-19 rinopera chete kana munhu wese atora matanho ekuzvidzivira kubva kuchirwere ichi. Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo vanhu vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi vanofanirwa kutevedzera kurudziro kubva kubazi rezvehutano pamwe nesangano reWorld Health Organization zvokuona kuti vazvipatsanura kuhama neshamwari dzavo kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chasapararire. Mumwe mudzimai wekuMberengwa, Amai Ruramai Moyo, vanoti vakazvitsaudza mushure mekunge baba vavo vakanga vabva kuUnited Kingdom vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Sezvo vakanga vasangana nababa vavo pavairwara vasingazive kuti vaive nechirwere ichi, Amai Moyo vanoti vakatora matanho anokurudzirwa nenyanzvi dzehutano pavakaziva chakanga chaita kuti baba vavo vashaye. Senzira yekudzivirira chirwere ichi, Amai Moyo vanoti hapana munhu anobvumirwa kuvashanyira kumba kwavo kudzimara denda iri rapera hukasha hwaro. Amai Moyo vanoti panguva yavaive vakazvitsaudza, vaishanyirwa nevebazi rehutano vachiongororwa kaviri pazuva zvokuti havasati vatombobuda mumba kubva musi wa 3 Ndira. Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights, Dr Norman Matara, vanoti chikamu chikuru chevanhu vanobatwa neCovid 19, kana vakatevedza zvinokuudzirwa kuita nenyanzvi, uye kuzvitsaudza kuitira kuti vasatapurire hama neshamwari chirwere ichi. Dr Matara vanokurudzira vanogara mudzimba dzakamakidzana kuti anenge abatwa neCovid-19 aende kunogara kunzvimbo dzakatarwa nehurumende kuitira kuti asatapurire chirwere ichi kuvamwe vake. Vanoti murwere uyu anofanirwa kudzokera kumba kana chirwere ichi chapera mumuviri make. Dr Matara vanoti hama neshamwari dzinofanira kubata varwere veCovid-19 zvakanaka nokuti zviri kuonekwa kuti pane kusemwa kuri kuitika zvokuti vamwe vave kutorwara nepfungwa nenyaya yokusemwa kwavari kuitwa nevanhu vanofanira kunge vachivasimudzira nemashoko anonyaradza. Nyanzvi yehutano hwepfungwa Dr David Mukwekwezeka vanoti dambudziko guru riripo nderekuti vanhu havasi kuteerera yambiro dzavari kuudzwa nenyazvi dzehutano zvokuti ndizvo zviri kukonzera kuti denda iri rirambe richitenderera muvanhu. Studio 7 haina kunzwa kubva kumukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Prosper Chonzi, sezvo vasina kubatika panherembozha yavo, kana kupindura mibvunzo yatakavatumira. Asi kanzuru yeHarare ine hurongwa hwekuoongorora pamwe nekurapa pachena chirwere cheCovid-19 muzvipatara zvayo nemakiriniki makuru gumi nemaviri. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubazi rezvehutano parimire panyaya yedambudziko iri, asi vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori mubazi iri, VaRobert Mudyirandima, vakaudza vatori venhau svondo rapera kuti pane hurongwa hwekutsvaga mari yekubatsira mukutengwa kwenhomba yeCovid-19. Zimbabwe, iyo iri kutatarika munyaya dzemari, iri kushandawo neWorld Health Organization muchirongwa che COVAX icho chakanangana nekuwanira vanoshaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanosvika mamiriyoni matatu munyika. Chirongwa cheCOVAX chiri kufanirwa kutanga mwedzi uno. Kudzamara chirongwa cheCOVAX chatanga, vanhu vakawanda vakaita saAmai Ruramai Moyo vachagara vachityira mhuri nehama dzavo kuti dzinogona kubatwa nechirwere ichi sezvo nhomba yacho isati yava kuwaniswa veruzhinji muZimbabwe.
title: Nyanzvi Dzokurudzira Kusasarura Vari Kurwara neCovid-19

text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kuBulawayo hunenge huri kuramba huchiwedzera zvakanyanya mumazuva mashoma apfuura kunyangwe muHarare mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nacho zvinhu zvinenge zviri kuramba zvichiita nani. Nemusi weSvondo bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti pavanhu makumi matatu nevanomwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, makumi maviri vari kuBulawayo, vana kuHarare, mumwe chete kuMashonaland East uye vaviri kuMidlands. Vanhu vose ava havana nhoroondo yekubuda munyika. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vave zviuru zvisere nezana nemakumi mana nemanomwe kana kuti 8, 147. Munyika mune vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi matatu nevasere kana kuti 237 vari kurwara neCovid-19 parizvino. Pavanhu vari kurwara ava, muBulawayo ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vanosvika zana negumi nevatanhatu kana kuti 116. Harare inova ine vanhu vakawandisa vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga musi wa 20 Kurume, ine vanhu makumi maviri nevanomwe chete vari kurwara parizvino. Vanhu vapora kusvika parizvino zviuru zvinomwe nemazana matanhatu ane makumi manomwe nevasere kana kuti 7, 678. Izvi zvinotevera kupora kwevamawe vanhu vashanu nezuro. Hakuna munhu akafa nezuro zvichireva kuti vanhu vafa vachiri mazana maviri nemakumi matatu nemumwe kana kuti 231. Harare ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vakafa vanosvika zana nemakumi maviri nemumwe ichiteverwa neBulawayo ine vanhu makumi mana nevanomwe vakashaya. Masvingo ndiro dunhu rine vanhu vashoma vakashaya vanova vaviri chete.
title: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kubatwa neCovid-19 muBulawayo Hwowedzera Zvakanyanya

text: Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti danho reparamende rekunzwa zvinofunga veruzhinji pamusoro pekuparurwa kwemari yema bond notes kutambisa mari yenyika sezvo pfungwa dzavo dzisisashandiswe. Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti danho reparamende rekunzwa zvinofunga veruzhinji pamusoro pekuparurwa kwemari yema bond notes kutambisa mari yenyika sezvo pfungwa dzavo dzisisashandiswe. Vachitaura neChishanu muChinhoyi vazhinji vevataura vashoropodza nhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari nekusimudzirwa kwehupfumi dzanga dzichitsvaka mazano panyaya yekuparurwa kwemari yema bond notes vachiti hazvina zvazvichabatsira sezvo mari iyi yave kutoshandiswa zvichipesana nezvaida vanhu vakawanda. Mumwe wevataura pamusangano uyu, VaGivemore Chari, vanoti kufamba kuri kuita vamiriri veparamende kungoita kuti vazadze homwe dzavo nemari yavanowana sezvo mutemo wakatotarwa kare. VaChari vanoti vamiririri veparamende havasi kumiririra vanhu asi kuti vave kutotsigira vatongi vari kudzvanyirira veruzhinji nekuda kwetumari twavari kuwana mukufamba uku vachiti vari kunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaLawrence Mlambo, vanoti nhengo dzeparamende hapana zvadziri kuita asi vari kutsvaka mari yekushandisa pakisimusi sezvo gore rave kupera. Pamboita kukandidzana makobvu nematete pakati pevanhu vapinda musangano uyu apo vazhinji vanga vave kusveveredza avo vanga vachitsigira kushandiswa kwema bond notes. Amai Marther Munondo vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutendwa nekuunza mari yema bond notes sezvo mari yekuAmerica iri kunetsa kuwana uye isingakwanise kuwedzerwa nekugadzira imwe. Vagari vemuChinhoyi vatiwo midziyo yehurumende inenge yasakara sedzimotokari dzinofanirwa kutengeswa pajekerere kwete zvechihwande hwande izvo zvinozopa kuti vakuru vakuru vehurumende vawane midziyo yose. Musangano wanhasi wapindwa nevanhu vashoma vasingasvike makumi matatu. Komiti yeparamende iyi iri kufamba mumatumhu akasiyana siyana ichinzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pamusoro pema bond notes.
title: Komiti yeParamende Yoshorerwa maBond Notes kuChinhoyi

text: Kuramwa mabasa kwanga kwakarongwa nesangano reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, kwapera neChitatu sangano iri richiti hurongwa hwaro hwemazuva matatu hwakabudirira zvikuru. Vachitaura neStudio7 parunhare, mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vati hutungamiri hwesangano ravo huri kusangana neChina kuti huzeye zvakabuda mukuratidzira kwavo. VaMasaraure vati sangano ravo richabuda negwara rekutora mushure mekunzwa zvinobva kumativi mana enyika zvinenge zvichikurudzirwa nenhengo dzavo. VaMasaraure vati varairidzi vakawanda vanga vachikurudzira kuti kuramwa mabasa uku kuenderere mberi kudzamara hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Asi vati vacharamba vakamira nechisungo chavo chemazuva matatu, zvimwe zvinozoitwa zvinobva muvanhu. Kuramwa mabasa kwenhengo dzeARTUZ kwaitika panguva iyo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaparura chirongwa chenhaurirano pakati pevashandirwi, vashandi nehurumende, cheTripartite Negotiating Forum, kana kuti TNF. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vasainawo bhiri remutemo weTNF vamwe vachiti pane zvikamu zvakawedzerwa mumutemo weTNF zvinoita kuti kuratidzira kwevashandi kusaite nyore. Asi VaMasaraure vati chakakosha hausi mutemo unobata vashandi asi kuti bumbiro remitemo inobata vashandi. Vati ikodzero yemushandi wese kuratidzira kana asiri kugutsikana nezvinenge zvichiitwa nemushandiri. Nhengo dzeARTUZ dzakasungwa muna Kurume zvichitevera kuramwa mabasa nekuratidzira kwakarongwa neZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, muna Ndira. Vatungamiri veZCTU vakasungwawo zvichitevera chiitiko ichi. No media source currently available
title: Kuramwa Basa kweARTUZ Kwapera neChitatu

text: Bato reMDC Alliance rinoti vatsigiri veZanu-PF vachitsigirwa nemapurisa nemauto vari kuenderera mberi vachishungurudza nhengo dzebato ravo kuMasvingo uko mutungamiri webato iri VaNelson Chamisa vari kusangana nevanhu, masabhuku nevamwe. Motokari dzaVaChamisa dzinonzi dzakatemwa nemusi weMuvhuro uye kubva musi uyu wange vachiita hwakitsi nagonzo nevatsigiri veZanhu-PF nemapurisa vanonzi vari kuyedza kuvakanganisa kuita misangano yavo. Asi veZanu-PF vanoti MDC yanyangira yaona nekuti iri kuda kusvibisa zita renyika pachauya neMuvhuro nhumwa yeUnited Nations Doctor Douhan kuzoongorora matambudziko atarisana nenyika panyaya yezvirango. Gweta VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka, vanova nhengo yeZanu-PF vachimbomirirawo mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanoti chatove chigariro kuti pose panoitwa misangano yakakosha kunze, veMDC Alliance vanoyedza kuita zvinoita ekuti vanzi vari mukanwa mamupere. Meya weHarare akambomiswa basa vari nhengo yeMDC Alliance VaJacob Mafume vanoti vari kushamisika kuti sei mapurisa asiri kusunga vavanoti vatsigiri veZanu-PF vari kubuda pamavhidhiyo vachitaura pachena kuti vakaita mhirizhonga. No media source currently available
title: VeZanu-PF neMDC Alliance Votatsurana paNyaya yeMhirizhonga Yotanga Munyika

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro vakadoma vaive vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wemapurisa, VaGodwin Matanga kuti vave ndivo mubati wechigaro, kana kuti Police Commissioner General. Nhepfenyuro yeZimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation inoti VaMatanga vadomwa kuburikidza nechikamu chebumbiro remitemo yenyika, icho chinotsigira kuti pave nemukuru wemapurisa. VaMatanga vari kutora chigaro chaive nevakaenda pamudyandigere, VaAugustine Chihuri, avo vakasiya basa muna Zvita wegore rapera. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muColumbus, kudunhu reOhio, muAmerica, uye vaine ruzivo nemashandiro emapurisa, VaZvidzai Ruzvidzo, vanoti vanotambira chose kudomwa kwaVaMatanga. VaRuzvidzo vanoti VaMatanga vane ruzivo rwakakosha rwunodiwa neboka remapurisa rwavakaunganidza munguva yavaive vari mutevedzeri vaVaChihuri. Asi vanoti chikuru chinofanirwa kuitwa naVaMatanga, kurwisana nehuwori hunonzi huri mumapurisa, uye kudzosa chivimbo nechiremera zvemapurisa mune veruzhinji, avo vanga vasisaremekedzi mapurisa nekuda kwezvipomerwa izvi. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inodoma VaMatanga seMukuru weMapurisa

text: Bato riri kutonga reZanu PF rinoti nhengo dzaro dzeparamende hadzisi kuda kumhanyirira kuwana motokari dzekufamba nadzo sevadare veparamende nekuti kune zvinhu zvakawanda munyika zviri kuda mari nekugadziriswa nechimbichimbi. Mukokeri wenhengo dzeZanu PF muparamende, uye vari mumiriri weGutu South mudare reparamende, VaPupurai Togarepi, vanoti hurumende iri kuda kuisa maziso nezvikwanisiro kune dzimwe nyaya dziri kunetsa vana veZimbabwe, kwete kutanga nezvido zvavo sezvo ivo vari vashandi vevanhu. Vanoti kana zvinhu zvagadzikana, vachazoita hurongwa hwekuti vawane motokari dzekushandisa, asi pari zvino vanoti vanoda kumborwisana nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika ayo ava bvuma kuti zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo. VaTogarepi vanoti vari kunoita hurukuro nevamwe vavo veMDC vari mudare reparamende kuti vabatane mukumbomira kutsvaga motokari idzi, kunyange vachifanirwa kudziwana. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mukokeri wenhengo dzeMDC muparamende, uye vachimirira Chikanga-Dangamvura, VaProsper Mutseyami kuti tinzwe kuti nhengo dzavo dzinotambira here hurongwa hweZanu PF uhwu. Vamiriri veparamende vanonzi vari kuda zvikakarara zvemotokari. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeZanu PF Dzinoti Hadzisi Kutambira Motokari dzeParamende Pari Zvino

text: Sangano rinomirira kodzero dzevarairidzi vekumaruwa rinoti riri kuungana neChishanu kumahofisi egurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, richichema kwarinoti kuparara kwaita mihoro yavo. Sangano reAmalgmated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Artuz, rinoti richange rakapfeka mbatya nhema musi unotambira varairidzi mari dzavo mwedzi wega wega senzira yekuratidzisa kuchema kwaro rufu rwemihoro yevarairidzi. Munyori wemukuru wesangano iri, VaRobson Chere, vanoti vari kuenderera mberi nekuungana pamuzinda wegurukota rezvemari, izvo zvavachapota vachiita mwedzi wega wega. VaChere vanoti vachatanga kupfeka mbatya nhema nemusi weChishanu, uye vachaita izvi musi wavanotambira peyi yavo yepamwedzi mwedzi wega wega. Sangano iri rinoti haridi kupihwa mvumo nemapurisa yekuenda kumahofisi aVaNcube sezvo richibvumidzwa nemutemo kuita misangano pasina kuzivisa mapurisa. VaChere vanoti pane mutongo wedare wakatara kuti mapurisa asapindire mumisangano inenge yakarongwa nesangano ravo, nokudaro vanovimba kuti mapurisa achiri kuremekedza mutongo uyu. VaChere vanoti mihoro yevarairidzi yaparadzwa nekudhura kuri kuita zvinhu munyika pamwe nekupera simba kwedhora remunyika. VaChere vanoti murairidzi ari kutambira mari inoenzana nemadhora ekuAmerica makumi matatu pamwedzi, kunyange hazvo vaisitambira mazana mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica. No media source currently available
title: Artuz Youngana neChishanu kuHofisi yaVaMthuli Ncube Ichichema Kufa kweMihoro?

text: Mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nhasi vaudza Politburo yebato ravo kuti kuvandudzwa kwemitemo yesarudzo kuri kukurudzirwa hakuna maturo vachiti Zimbabwe yakaisa mubumbiro remitemo zvese zvinodiwa neSADC panyaya yesarudzo. Vachivhura musangano wePolitiburo, VaMnangagwa vati vanhu vari kuda shanduko panyaya dzesarudzo nehupfumi havasi kubuda pachena kuti shanduko yavanoda ndeipi. Vati Zimbabwe yaisa zvese zvinodiwa neSADC pasarudzo kana kuti SADC Electoral Guidelines mubumbiro rayo iro vati rimwe remabumbiro akanaka chose mudunhu rese. VaMnangagwa vati kune avo vari kushora hurumende nekusaita sarudzo dzemaBy-Election, vanofanira kuziva kuti Zimbabwe yakasiyana nedzimwe nyika dzisina kutemerwa zvirango zvehupfumi nekudaro yakamira kuita sarudzo senzira yekuchengetedza vanhu kubva kudenda reCovid-19. Asi vati sarudzo idzi dzave kuzoitwa muna Kurume gore rinouya uye vakurudzira nhengo dzebato ravo kuti dzishande zvakasimba kuitira kuti Zanu PF ikunde musarudzo dzegore rinouya nedza2023. Mapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira anoti mutemo wesarudzo unofanira kuvandudzwa kuitira kuti nyika ikwanise kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Mutungamiriri werimwe remapato anopikisa reNational Consititutional Assembly, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vaudza Studio 7 kuti manyepo ari kutaurwa naVaMnangagwa ekuti vari kuda shanduko pamutemo wesarudzo havasi kubuda pachena kuti vanoda shanduko ipi. VaMadhuku vati nyaya iyi iri kutotaurwa nezvayo kuPolitical Actors Dialogue uko bato raVaMnangagwa riri nhengo. Vati imwe shanduko inodiwa ndeyekuti mutungamiriri wenyika asave iye ega anodoma nhengo dzekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaWitness Dube, vatsinhirawo mashoko aVaMadhuku vachiti bato ravo rakatonyorera VaMnangagwa richavaudza nezveshanduko iri kudiwa.
