Vanoti zvakawanda zvinoda kuchinjwa kuti sarudzo dziitwe zvakajeka zvakaita sekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvivhote. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato guru runopkisa reMDC Alliance, VaGift Ostallos Siziba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMnangagwa vanozviziva kuti panodiwa shanduko pamutemo wesarudzo asi kuti havadi kuzvitambira nekuti vanozviziva kuti havahwine sarudzo kana mutemo uyu ukasandurwa. VaSiziba vati panodiwa kusandurwa zvakawanda zvakaita semaitiro emauto anopindira munyaya dzesarudzo. Vati Zimbabwe iri kusangana nematambudziko akawanda pari zvino nenyaya yekuti haina kuita sarudzo dzakajeka muna 2018 VaMnagangwa vakurudzirawo vese vasina kubaiwa nhomba kuti vabaiwe nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 vachiti nyika ine nhomba dzinokwanira vese vanoda kubayiwa. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Zimbabwe Yakavandudza Kare Mitemo yeSarudzo

text: Dunhu reMasvingo idunhu rine mukurumbira munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, uye idunhu rine vakuru vakuru munyaya dzematongerwo enyika vakawanda vane zvigaro zvepamusoro mumapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Panguva dzesarudzo dunhu iri rinozivikanwa richipisa kubva nyika ichiwana kuzvitonga, apo vanoita nezvematongerwe enyika vanonetsana kuti vapinde pazvigaro. Masvingo inozivikanwawo nekunetsana kwevanokwikwidzana, nedzimwe nguva kuchizoita mhirizhonga yakakura. Kubva pakawana nyika kuzvitonga, dunhu iri ragara richitorwa neZanu PF musarudzo, asi izvi zvakachinja muna 2008, apo MDC-T yakatora zvigaro zvigaro gumi nezvina musarudzo dzenhengo dzeparamende. Nyanzvi munezvematongerwe enyika, VaTakafira Zhou, vanoti Masvingo idunhu rine mutauro panyaya dzesarudzo kubva nyika ichisununguka, nenyaya dzemakakatanwa. “Ndingati history yema elections muMasvingo kubva 1980 kana mu liberation struggle, Masvingo yai supporta liberation struggle zvikuru, kubva 1980 muMasvingo makawhinwa ne Zanu PF zvikuru, Zanu PF yaihwina asi chiri clear ndechekuti ma politicians eMasvingo haana kubatana, division yagara iripo kubva 1980 vachitambiswa nhova nevanhu vekusoro uko mazezuru vana Mugabe, vachitungamiririwa nevanhu vasinganyatsoona , saka tikaona pakauya opposition yakauya wo asi haiana kunyatsoita a mark yakahwina kuna Bikita neMasvingo urban asi pa 2008 ndopaikiata mark ikatora ma seats akawanda.” Asi musarudzo dzakazotevera muna 2013, Zanu PF yakadzoka nesimba ikatora zvigaro zvose makumi maviri nezvitanhatu izvo zvakaita kuti MDC isare yakabata pasi. Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwe enyika vanoti kunyange hazvo Zanu PF iri iyo yakakunda pasarudzo dzakapfuura , mapato anopikisa ane mukana wekudzosa zvigaro izvi akapinda akabatana sezvo muZanu PF muine kunetsana . VaZhou vanoti kunyange hazvo MDCT yakakundwa muna 2013, gore rino ine chiedza chekukunda ikaita mubatanidzwa wakasimba sezvo Zanu PF yakapatsanuka sezvakabuda pasarudzo dzayo dzekusarudza vamiririri. “Zhou-MDC tirikuona yave ne resurgence, ikwanisa kubataana ne mawe mapato ma chances makuru muMasvingo nekuti vakuru vaifana khwina ku Zanu PF vakaruza, saka ikaita selection ye macandidates inemukana mukuru tichitarisa kuti Zanu PF yakapatsanurana.” Asi veZanu PF vanoti kunyange hazvo vainetsana mumba mavo pasarudzo dzebato ravo, vachabatana kana vave kusangana nemamwe mapato vokunda zvakare musarudzo dzegore rino. Nhengo yeZanu PF ichakwikwidza muMasvingo Urban, VaBernad Taguma Mazarire, vanoti vanotarisira kutsvaira zvigaro zvose zveparamende mudunhu rose reMasvingo sezvavakaita muna 2013. “Chokutanga ndoda kutenda President wedu Cde ED Mnangagwa nekuita kwavakaita ma primary elections edu, ini ndiri kuona tichitora ma seats ose muMasvingo toda kuti idozokere, ne new dispensation we are talking of creation of jobs, mukada kuona manifesto yatakabuda nayo toda ku unita vanhu, development, I will work hard to make sure kuti Masvingo ichaita one of the best cities in Zimbabwe.” Apowo mutauriri we veMDC-T inotungamirwa na VaNelson Chamisa muMasvingo, VaSimon Mupindu, vanoti rwendo runo masamba asiyana, uye vanotarisira kukunda Zanu PF zvine mutsindo. Mumwe muongorori wezvematongerwe enyika anotaura akazvimirira, VaMasimba Gonese , vanoti kunyange Masvingo yakakosha munhoroondo dzenyika, pasarudzo haina simba rekuchinja zvinobuda musarudzo kuti rimwe bato rikwanise kukunda. VaGonese vanoti dunhu iri rine mutauro wakawanda uye mapato makuru eZanu PF ne MDC-T achakweshana zvakasimba panguva iyo mapato aya aine vatungamiri vatsva. Musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika muna 2013, vanhu vemudunhu iri vanosvika 258,026 vakavhotera VaRobert Mugabe, ukuwo 180,552 vakavhotera VaMorgan Tsvangirai, ukuwo vanhu 13,433 vakavhotera VaWelshman Ncube. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoti zviri pachena kuti mutambo uri pakati paVaMnangagwa naVaChamisa, asi kuvhota kwakaitwa muna 2013 kana kuine chekuita nesarudzo dzegore rino, VaChamisa vakatarisana nemutoro mukuru kuti vakunde VaMnangagwa musarudzo yemutungamiri mudunhu reMasvingo. Asi vamwe vanoti nekupatsanuka kwaita Zanu PF, zvinhu zvinogona kunakira VaChamisa, kunyange hazvo bato ravo rakapatsanukawo, uye vamwe vasiri kufara nefambisirwo akaitwa sarudzo dzekutsvaka vachamirira bato iri musarudzo. No media source currently available
title: Mavhotero eDunhu reMasvingo Openengurwa

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvevechidiki, Amai Kirsty, Coventry-Seward vanoti hurumende ichadzora zvakare chirongwa cheNational Youth Service gore rinouya asi chichange chakasayina nechirongwa chakamiswa muna2007 icho chaitwa zvematongerwo enyika nekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Amai Coventry-Seward vati kunyangwe chirongwa ichi chichitora vechidiki kutanga pamakore gumi nemashanu kusvika pamakore makumi matatu nemashanu, vana vachatanga kuitiswa zvimwe zvidzidzo zveNational Youth Service kutanga paECD chaipo. Vati izvi ndizvo zvapa kuti vashande nemapazi akaita seredzidzo yepasi neredzidzo yepamusoro. Amai Coventry-Seward vange vachipa humbowo kukomiti yeparemende inoona nezvevechidiki nemitambo maererano nechirongwa cheNational Youth Service. Vatenda kuti chirongwa chekutanga chainge chisina kumira zvakanaka. Asi vati chirongwa chitsva ichi chichatanga gore rinoouya uye vane hurongwa hwekudzidzisa vechidiki zviuru gumi pagore. Zvidzidzo zvichange zvichiitwa kwemwedzi mitanhatu. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kunyange hazvo kupinda muchirongwa ichi kusingamanikidzwe, vachapinda muchironga ichi ndivo vachatanga kupihwa mukana wekupinda mabasa muhurumende nemakambani ayo, kupihwa nzvimbo mumakoreji pamwe nemayunivhesiti pamwe nekupihwa mikana yekutanga mabhizimisi. Vati pari zvino pane bhiri reNational Youth Service iro rine hwaro hwekuti chirongwa ichi chichafamba sei richaendeswa kuparamende kuti itenderere nenyika yese ichanzwa pfungwa dzevechidiki , Amai Coventry-Seward vaenderera mberi vachiti vechidiki vachange vachidziswa hunhu, bumbiro remutemo wenyika pamwe nekudzivirira huwori. Vati kunyange hazvo chirongwa ichi chichitora vechidiki kutanga pamakore gumi nemashanu kusvika pamakore makumi matatu nemashanu, vana vachatanga kuitiswa zvimwe zvidzidzo zveNational Youth Service kutanga paECD chaipo. Vati ndosaka vari kushanda nemapazi akaita seredzidzo yepasi neredzidzo yepamusoro. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa musangano reNational Association of Youth Organisations iro rakayonyorera kuparamende richida kuti chirongwa cheNational Youth Service chimbomira kutangwa kusvika zvainetsa muchirongwa chekutanga zvakagadziriswa, VaMacdonald Munyoro, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafara kuti Amai Coventry-Seward vari kugadzirisa zvimwe zvinhu zvavaida kuti zvigadziriswe. Asi vati havafari nekuti chinosarura pamikana yemabasa. Vatiwo havafari kuti chirongwa ichi ichichange chiitirwa munzvimbo dzaiitirwa chirongwa chekutanga. Vakafanobata chinzvimbo chemutauriri muchikama chevechidiki mubato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change, VaSteven Chuma vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti zvakanaka kunzwa pfungwa dzevechidiki pachirongwa ichi. Imwe nhengo muchikamu chevechidiki mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaPeter Mutangi, vati vanofara kuti hurumende yave kudzora chirongwa ichi. Chirongwa cheNational Youth Service chakamiswa muna 2007 mushure mekunge hurumende yashaya mari uyewo panguva iyi masangano akawanda kusanganisira United Nations, Amnesty International, Amani Trust nemamwe aicheema chema kuti vechidiki vaipinda muchirongwa ichi vaita zvematongerwo enyika uyewo vachityora kodzero dzevanhu.  Mune imwewo nyaya, Amai Coventry vati vanofara chose kuti mitambo yakawanda munyika iri kuita zvakanaka kusiya kwenhabvu iyo vati vari kugadzirisa. Vatiwo vakatokokaa imwe kamabani yakagadzira nhandare dzekuSouth Africa pakaitwa mitambo yeWorld Cup kuti iuye kuzoona kuti Zimbabwe ingagadzirisa nhandare dzayo sei. Asi imwe nenhengo yekomiti, iyi VaOmega Sibanda veZanu PF vanomirira Vhungu vati hurumende inofanira kutarisa zvinhu zviri kunetsa panyaya yenhabvu yozvigadzirisa vachiti vatambi, vatsigiri pamwe nemakambani anotsigira nhabvu vari kushushika zvikuru nekumiswa kwakatwa Zimbabwe neFIFA kuti isatambe nedzimwe nyika. Asi Amai Coventry-Seward vati vari kugadzirisa nyaya iyi uye mangwana vachatura kudare mashoko pamusoro pekuti nyaya yeZIFA yavepapi.
title: Hurumende Yoronga Kutanga Kudzidzisa Vana Vari kuECD nezveNational Youth Service

text: Vemuzinda weZimbabwe nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu muSouth Africa vari kuenderera mberi vachiita hurukuro nehurumende yenyika iyi kuyedza kuti iwedzere nguva yekuti zvizvarwa zvenyika zviri munyika iyi zvirambe zvichishanda pasi pemagwaro eZimbabwe Exemption Permit kana kuti ZEP. Mukuru wezvemutemo musangano reImmigration Advisory for Southern Africa Advocate Gabriel Shumba vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano ravo nevemuzinda weZimbabwe munyika iyi vari kuita nhaurirano muchinyararire kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvisanyanyoomeserwe. Vati nhaurirano idzi dziri kubudirira sezvo vakakwanisa kuti vamwe vemabhanga vasavhare mabhuku ezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe uye kuti vanhu vakwanise kugadzirisa mamwe magwaro varimuSouth Africa. Dare remakurukota muSouth Africa rakazivisa kuti harisi kuzowedzera nguva yekuti magwaro aya ashande richiti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakasungunuka kunyorera mamwe magwaro. Asi VaShumba vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvine magwaro eZEP zvakawanda hazvikwanise kuzadzikisa zvinodiwa kuti zviwane mamwe magwaro ekugara zviri pamutemo muSouth Africa. No media source currently available
title: Muzinda weZimbabwe naVaGabriel Shumba Voita Nhaurirano neSouth Africa nezveMagwaro eZEP

text: Hurumende inonzi yadzinga basa vana chiremba mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevashanu basa vari kuramwa mabasa pakusvika mukuvira kwezuva remusi weChitatu. Madhokotera aya ari kudzingwa basa zvichitevera kuwanikwa vaine mhosva yekutyora mitemo yebasa nekomiti inoranga vanokanganisa pamabasa. Sangano reHealth Service Board rinoti madhokotera aya arikudzingwa basa pachitevedzwa mitemo inobata vashandirwi nevashandi vavo. Sangano reCommunity Working Group on Health rinoti zvitunha zvave kuworera mumamochari emuzvipatara zvehurumende nekushaya vanachiremba vanovhiya kuti pabude chirwere chinenge chapa kuti murwere afe. Sachigharo wesangano reHealth Service Board, Dr. Paulinus Sikosana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti matare ekunzwa mhosva dziri kupomerwa vanachiremba ava kuzvipatara zvavo ari kuenderera mberi uye vakawanda vari kutarisirwa kudzingwa basa pamusoro pevadzingwa basa ava. Panyaya yekuti ndiyani achatora mabasa evari kudzingwa ava, Dr. Sikosana vati vainge vanyora tsamba kumunyori mubazi rezvehutano, Dr. Agnes Mahomva, kuti vaone kuti zvipatara zvingashande sei. Asi Dr. Mahomva vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo,apo taedza kunzwa divi ravo. Vanachiremba vakatanga kuramwa mabasa musi wa 3 Gunyana vachiti mari dzavari kutambiriswa hadzisi kuvakwanira. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti vamwe vanhu vave kungorwara nekufira kumba vamwe vachienda kuzvipatara zvinenge zvichiri kushanda zvakaita seKaranda Hospital kuMt Darwin. No media source currently available
title: Madhokotera Anodarika Mazana Mana Anodzingwa Basa, Mitumbi Ichiorera Mumamochari

text:
Vaive murume wamambokadzi weGreat Britan Queen Elizabeth, Prince
Philip avo vakafa svondo rakapera neChishanu varadzidzikwa nhasi
masikati kuBritain pachitevedzerwa mitemo yekudzivirira
chirwere cheCovid-19. Prince Philip, avo vakashaya vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe
nemapfumbamwe, varadzikwa pamuzinda weWindsor Castle pachiitiko change chiine vanhu vasingadarike makumi matatu senzira yekudzivirira
kutapuriranwa chirwere cheCovid-19. Danho rekutevedzera mitemo yekuungana pamariro kwaita imba yehumambo iyi kwarumbidzwa nevanhu nevakawanda. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry
Madzorera, vati hurumende yaratidza kuti inotevedzera mutemo uye inoenzanisa vanhu vose munyika.

Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vatiwo bato
rinorumbidza zvaitwa nemba yehumambo iyi zvekucherechedza mitemo yeWorld Health Organisation-WHO-zvekusawanda parufu.

VaMwonzora vati vanoshuwira kuti hukama hweZimbabwe neBritain
hudzoke pahwakange huri nguva yakare Zimbabwe isati yabuda
reCommonwealth pasi pehutungamiri hwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika ,uchakabvu, Va Robert Mugabe muna 2003. VaMwonzora vati Zimbabwe neBritain dzinogona kubatsirana
munyaya dzezvehupfumi, zvehutano pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika.

Mutauriri webato reZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vati tibate bazi
rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika sezvo bato ravo risina chekutaura nekuti
mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakaendesa mashoko enyaradzo kumhuri yehumambo pamwe nevanhu vekuBritaini.

Hatina kukwanisa kubata vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota
rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, Prof Amon Murwira, sezvo mbozhanhare
yavo yanga isinga davirwe. VaMnangagwa vakati Zimbabwe inochema nemhuri yaPrince Philip avo vakamboshanyira Zimbabwe mugore ra1991 apo vakaperekedza Queen Elizabetrh kumusangano weCommonwealth Heads of Government Meeting-CHOGM. Asi VaMnangagwa vakati pasi pehutungamiri hwavo vachaedza nepose pavanogona napo kuitira kuti Zimbabwe idyidzane nenyika dzose zvisinei kuti ndedze kumabvazuva here kana kuti dzekumavirira. Muchakabvu asiya mudzimai, Queen Elizabeth nevana vana vanoti Prince
Charles, Princess Anne, Prince Andrew naPrince Edward nevazukuru
vasere nevazukurubvi gumi. No media source currently available
title: Prince Philip Vanovigwa kuBritain Vazhinji Vachiona Hurongwa Uhu paMadandemutande

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reZimbabwe People First Amai Joyce Mujuru vari kutarisirwa kuita musangano kuSakubva Stadium, kwaMutare nemusi weMugovera. Asi musangano uyu wapa kuti makwikwi eManicaland Road to Fame wange uchida kuitwa unorongwa neDelta Beverages ne National Arts Council umbosendekwa parutivi. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reZimbabwe People First Amai Joyce Mujuru vari kutarisirwa kuenderera mberi nemisangano yavo kuSakubva Stadium nemusi weMugovera. Amai Mujuru vakatoita misangano kuBulawayo, muHarare nekuMasvingo. Mutauriri webato iri VaRugare Gumbo vanoti misangano iyi yakanangana negadziriro yecongress yebato ravo ichasarudza vatungamiri. Vatiwo vari kufara nematambirirwo avari kuitwa. Asi amai Mujuru vari kushorwawo zvakanyanya nevebato reZanu-PF vachitungamirwa nemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika Amai Grace Mugabe. Asi VaGumbo vati havashamisike nezviri kutaurwa nevanhu veZanu-PF Zvichakadaro, matambo weChibuku Road to Fame wange uchida kuitwa musi mumwe chete uyu wambomiswa nekuda kwemusangano uyu. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muNational Arts Council kwaMutare VaAlexander Tunzi vatenda kuti vamanikidzwa kumbosendeka parutivi makwikwi aya. “Makwikwi edu eChibuku Road to fame haachabudiriri nekuda kwekuti mapurisa atiti nemusi uyu kuchange kuine chiitiko cehezvematongerwo enyiki ukuwo isuwo vezvemitambo netsika tinezveduwo, “ vakadaro VaTunzi. Vaenderera mberi vachiti, “Saka mapurisa aya akatikurudzira kuti tisvage musi wekuita mutambo wedu nekuti tinenge tiri pedo napedo kuti Sakubva Stadium neChinyausunzi Beerhall.” VaTunzi vanoti mutambo uyo wave kuzoitwa kutanga kwemwedzi unotevera. “Takazotaurawo nevamwe vatinoshandidzana navo veDelta Beverages tikabvumirana kuti tave kuzoita mutambo uyu msi wa-6 August tingori nezvikwata zvedu Nine zvinoridza misambo yakasiyana-siyana. Nzvimbo yatichaitira hauna kushanduka asi musi ndiwo washandurwa chete.” Vaenderera mberi vachiti zvikwata zvichakwikwidza musi wa 6 Nyamavhuvhu izvi zvinoridza misambo yemimhanzi yakasiyana-siyana. “Tine vakomana veNice to Nice vanoridza musambo wechinyakare, vamwe vanoridza Passada, vamwe vanoridzawo musambo weSungura zvichingodaro,” vakadaro VaTunzi Makwikwi eChibuku Road to Fame aripo kusimudzira hunyanzvi muzvikwata zvevechidiki mumitambo yakasiyana-siyana munezvemagitare. Makwikwi enyika yose achange achizoitwa musi wa 24 Gunyana kuHarare. No media source currently available
title: Amai Mujuru Voita Musangano kwaMutare

text: Mukuru wevatongi vematare edzimhosva munyika, Justice Luke Malaba, nhasi vatoresa mhiko vatongi vapfumbamwe vatsva vedare repamusoro avo vakadomwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, zvichitevera bvunzo dzakaitwa neJudicial Service Commission muna Chikunguru. Vatoreswa mhiko yekutanga basa sevatongi vedare repamusoro ndaVaRogers Manyangadze, VaJoseph Chilembe, Amai Catherine Cate Bachi Muzawazi, VaBongani Ndhlovu, VaSamuel Deme, VaMunamato Mutevedzi, VaNever Katiyo, VaElijah Makomo naAmai Lucie-Anne Chipo Mungwari. Munyori wekomisheni inoona nezvevatongi vematare edzimhosva yeJudicial Service Commission, VaWalter Chikwanha, vati kudomwa kwevatongi vatsva ava kucharerutsa basa mudare reHigh Court. Pamajaji agadzwa nhasi mapfumbabwe, vaviri vavo chete madzimai. Tabvunza VaChikwanha kuti sei madzimai ange ari mashoma vakati pane matanho ari kutorwa kuti pave nevatongi vechidzimai vakawanda. Mumwe wevatongi vadomwa nhasi, Justice Samuel Deme, havaone uye VaChikwanha vati izvi zvinoenderana nedonzvo reJSC rekuti vanorarama nehurema havafaniri kushaiswa mukana. Vati Justice Deme vakakunda mubvunzo dzakaitwa pajekerere. Justice Deme vati kudomwa kwavo kuve mutongi wedare kuchasandura maonero anoita veruzhinji vanhu vakaremera. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira magweta reLaw Society of Zimbabwe, VaWellington Magaya, vati kuwedzerwa kwevatongi kwakanaka chose. Asi vati chakakosha kuti vatongi ava vashande vakazvimirira pasina kupindira kubva kuhurumende, masangano anoshanda akazvimirira, vemabhizimisi kana ani zvake. VaMagaya vatiwo huwori haudiwi zvachose mumatare edzimhosva. VaChikwanha vati kugadzwa kwevatongi vapfumbamwe nhasi kwasvitsa vatongi vedare reHigh Court pamakumi mana nevatatu uye gumi nevanomwe vari vakadzi. KuSupreme Court kune vatongi gumi nevaviri uye vashanu vari vakadzi. No media source currently available
title: Vatongi Vatsva veMatare ePamusoro Vapfumbamwe Vatoreswa Mhiko naVaMalaba

text: Sangano rinorwira kuchengetedzwa kwezvivanikwa munyika, reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, riri kuHwange uko riri kuita ongororo netsvakurudzo pamusoro pekucherwa kwezviwanikwa munharaunda iyi uye matambudziko ari kukonzerwa nekucherwa kwezviwanikwa uku, uye kuti zvii zviri kuitwa nemakambani aya kugadzirisa nharaunda dzavari kushandira. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti vari kushanda nevagari venharaunda iyi mukuita ongororo iyi. vanoti vari kuratidzwa dzimwe nzvimbo dzakasiiwa dziine mazimwena akangoshama nekudzika asina kuvharwa. Vanoti zvimwe zvezvinhu zviri kunyunyutwa nevagari kumbumurwa kwehuruva inosimudzwa nemarhorhi ari kutakura marasha anenge acherwa pasi sezvo kusisina muchina inofambisa marasha aya, izvo zvinonzi zvinogona kukanganisa hutano hwevagari pamwe nevashandi. VaMaguwu vanoti haisi kambani imwechete iri kuchera zviwanikwa munharaunda iyi, sezvo kuine makambani akawanda kwazvo anosanganisira emunyika neekunze kwenyika. Vanoti pari zvino havasati vave kutaura nevemakambani ari kuchera aya, sezvo vachiri mushishi kugadzira gwaro ravo rezvavari kuwana, ravari kuti "Environmental Audit", vachiti kana vapedza kugadzira gwaro iri ndiro ravachazofamba naro vachipa makambani kuti averenge ozopawo mhinduro dzawo. VaMaguwu vanoti vachasvitsawo gwaro iri kumapazi ehurumende akasiyanasiyana, anosanganisira rezvicherwa, revashandi nemabasa, rekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa pamwe nekuEnvironmental Management Agency, EMA kuti vaone kuti vangabatsirana seyi kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. No media source currently available
title: Sangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance Roita Ongororo yeKukanganiswa kweDunhu reHwange neMakambani Ari Kuchera Zvicherwa

text: Mapurisa anoti asunga vanhu vanodarika zana mumhirizhonga yaitika pakati pevanhu vanga vachivhara migwagwa pamwe nekupisa zvinhu nemapurisa munyika yose zvichitevera kuramwa kwaita vanhu mabasa. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Senoir Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba vaudza Studio 7 kuti mapurisa asunga vanhu makumi manomwe nevashanu, kuchitiwo muHarare vasunga vanhu gumi nevapfumbamwe. Amai Charamba vatiwo kuVictoria Falls mapurisa asunga vachena gumi nevashanu kusanganisira chimwe chizvarwa chekuBelgium. Sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti nhengo dzaro mumaguta akawanda emunyika dzaswera dziri mushishi kubatsira vanhu vasungwa nemapurisa ava, pamwe nevamwe vanga vari kumatare, avo vakasungwa mukuratidzira kwakaitika neMuvhuro muHarare. Mutauriri wesangano iri VaKumbirai Mafunda vanoti sangano ravo rawana mashoko ekuti vanhu vanodarika makumi mashanu vasungwa munyika yose mukuratidzira kwaitika uku. “Kunyange hazvo tichiri kuunganidza mashoko ari kubva kunhengo dzedu, zvatatambira kusvika pari zvino zvinoratidza kuti kune vanhu vanodarika makumi mashanu vasungwa. KuBulawayo kwasungwa vanhu vakawanda avo vari kubatsirwa nemagweta edu. “Kwese kana kuZvishavane, kwaMutare kuManicaland nekuChipinge uko. KuVictoria Falls magweta edu ari kubatsira vanhu vanosvika gumi nevatanhatu vasungwa ikoko,” Vamafunda vanodaro. Vanoti kuVictoria Falls vamwe vevasungwa vanosanganisira vashanyi, avo vanga vachifambawo zvavo vakabatinidzirwa. VaMafunda vanoti kune vamwe vatori venhau vasungwawo, kusanganisira vamwe vana vanga vambosungwa mushure mekutora mifananidzo yezvanga zvichiitika kuMufakose. Vatori venhau ava, avo vanga vaendeswa kukamba yemapurisa yeMarimba, vanonzi vamanikidzwa kudzima mifananidzo iyi vasati varegerwa vasina mhosva yavapomerwa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, vanhu zana nevana vamiswa pamberi pedare vachipomerwa mhosva yekurova mapurisa nekukonzera mhirizhonga mumisha inogara veruzhinji yeEpworth neMabvuku musi weMuvhuro uye vamwe vanga vakakuvara zvakaipisisa. Mune imwewo nyaya yanga iri mudare, mutungamiri webato reViva Zimbabwe rakaparurwa svondo rapera, VaAcie Lumumba, vamiswawo pamberi pedare vachipomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza mutungamiri wenyika vachishandisa mazwi atisingakwanise kutaura pamhepo. VaChikwekwe vatura mutongo wekuti VaLumumba vabhadhare mari yechibatiso inoita madhora mazana mana uye kuti vasiye magwaro avo ekufambisa kudare pamwe nekuti vazvipire kumapurisa neMuvhuro wega-wega. Zvichakadai, nyaya zhinji dzatadza kunzwikwa kumatare sezvo vashandi vemutare vazhinji vasina kuenda kumabasa zvichitevera kuramwa mabasa kwaitwa neveruzhinji munyika yose. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Anosunga Vanhu Vanodarika Zana Mukuratidzira Kwaitika muNyika Yose

text: Kanzuru yeChitungwiza yapa vagari vedhorobha iri vari kuita mabhizmusi zviri kunze kwemutemo mazuva matatu kuti vamire mabasa avo kana kuti vachapwanyirwa zvivakwa zvavo kana vakatadza kutevedzera danho iri. Asi danho ratorwa nekanzuru yeChitungwiza riri kushorwa zvikuru nevagari venzvimbo iyi. Gwaro raburitswa nevakafanobata chigaro chamabharani wekanzuru, Amai Evangelista Machona, rinoti vese vari kuita mabasa ekukanya nekutengesa zvidhinha, kugeza, kuchengeta nekutengesa motokari, vanogadzira midziyo yemudzimba pamwe nekutengesa mumigwagwa zvisiri pamutemo, vanofanira kumira mabasa avo mukati memaawa makumi manomwe nemaviri kana kuti vachapwanyirwa zvivakwa zvavo vakasatevedzera danho iri. Amai Machona vati kanzuru yavo ichashanda pamwechete nemapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police pamwe nebazi rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu pamwe nekuvandudzwa kwezvivakwa nemusi weChishanu svondo rino kuona kuti mutemo watevedzerwa zvizere. Vakurudzira vagari kuti vasazochema kana varasikirwa nehupenyu pamwe nemidziyo yavo kana vachinge vakaka nharo. Vatiwo kanzuru yavo haisi kuzoripa vacharasikirwa nemidziyo yavo kana vasina kutevedzera zvataurwa nekanzuru yavo. Asi mumwe mugari wemuChitungwiza uyo anorarama nekugaisa, VaMilton Mandere, vati havana kwavanokwanisa kuenda sezvo hurumende iri kutadza kuvapa mukana wekuti vawane mabasa. Mutungamiri wesangano reChitungwiza and Manyame Residents Association uye vari zvakare sachigaro weHarare Metropolitan Residents Forum, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vashora danho ratorwa nekanzuru yeChitungwiza iri vachiti danho iri ratorwa pasina kutariswa mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mune rimwe remasangano evagari vemuChutungwiza, re Chitungwiza Residents Trust, Muzvare Alice Kuvheya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachaendesa nyaya iyi kumatare edzimhosva. Meya weChitungwiza, VaLovemore Maiko,vati sekanzuru vari kuda kuti vose vane chekuita nenyaya iyi vagare pasi nekanzuru yavo kuitira kuti vabude nechinhu chimwe chete. Zvichakadai, bato reMDC Alliance rabuditsawo mashoko ekuti VaTafadzwa Muguti vanove Provincial Development Coordinator wedunhu reHarare ndivo vakaudza Amai Machona kuti zvivakwa zvekuChitungwiza zvisiri pamutemo zvipwanywe. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMuguti pamwe be gurukota rinoona nezvematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, kuti tinzwe pavamire panyaya iyi. Mukuru wesangano revanotengesa mumigwagwa, reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzai, vati vari kutaura nemagweta avo kuti vaone kuti votora matanho api. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva huwandu hwevanhu vachavhiringwa nehurongwa hwekanzuru yeChitungwiza kutanga nemusi weChishanu. Asi gweta rinoshanda neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaPaidamoyo Saurombe, vati zviri kuda kuitwa nekanzuru zvinopesana nezviri mubumbiro remitemo sezvo bumbiro iri richiti kuti zvivakwa zvipwanywe panofanirwa kunge paine mutongo unobva kudare redzimhosva. Kuputswa kwezvivakwa zviri kunze kwemitemo kwakamboitwa munyika yose muna 2005 pasi pechirongwa chaidaidzwa kuti "Operation Murambatsvina" icho chakanzi nenhumwa yeUnited Nations panguva iyi, Amai Anna Kajumulo Tibaijuka, chakasiya vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana manomwe vasina pekugara uye vasina zvekudya.
title: Kanzuru yeChitungwiza Yoronga Kuputsa Zvivakwa Zvisiri paMutemo

text: Dzimwe hama dzevanhu vakatsakatitswa panguva yeGukurahundi dziri kugunun’una kuti hurumende haisi kuita zvakakwana kuti nyaya iyi igadziriswe zvachose. Kugunun’una uku kwakabuda nezuro pakukumikidza kwechivakwa chine mazita evamwe vanhu gumi vakanyangariswa mugore ra1985 kumatenganyika ekuSilobela mudunhu reMidlands panguva yeGukurahundi semucherechedzo wekuvarangarira. Mumwe wevanhu vaivepo pachiitiko ichi ndiAmai Anna Ndebele avo vakasara vave shirikadzi mushure mekunge murume wavo VaKefas Ndebele vapambwa pamusha pavo husiku nevanhu vaive vakapakatira pfuti vasingaziikanwe kuti ndivanaani. Vachiratidza kushushikana zvikuru Amai Ndebele avo vave nemakore makumi manomwe nerimwe, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyangwe hazvo chiitiko ichi chave nemakore anopfuura makumi matatu chaitika, vanoramba vachirwadziwa zvikuru nekuti nanhasi havasati vaziva kuti chii chaizvo chakaitika kune murume wavo uye kuti akavigwa kupi. Muzvare Patricia Baleni avo vaivepowo pachiitiko ichi vana baba vavo vakapambwawo panguva imwe chete vanotiwo moyo wavo uchiri kurwadza nekuda kwenyaya iyi. Muzvare Baleni vanoti kunyange hazvo hurumende yave kutaura zvikuru nezvekugadziriswa kwenyaya yeGukurahundi, havawoni chakati tsvikiti chinobatika chiri kunyatsoitwa. Vanoti shuviro yavo ndeye kuti panyatsove nekubuda pachena pane zvakakitika uye kuti vanhu vakafirwa kana kutsakatikirwa nehama dzavo vabatsirwe nenzira dzakakodzera kuti moyo yavo nepfungwa dzavo zvigadzikane. VaDingilizwe Mkandla vane vabereki vakatsakatika panguva iyi ndemumwe mugari wekumatenganyika ekuSilobela ari kutungamira pakutsvaga chokwadi chezvakaitika. VaMkandla vanotiwo kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kutaura kuti inoda kuti nyaya iyi igadziriswe vanoshamisika nekuti vanoona sekuti kune vanhu vari kushanda kuti nyaya iyi isagadziriswa. VaMkandla vanotsinhirawo kuti chimwe chezvinhu zvakakosha chavanoda kuti chiitwe inyaya yekuti pave nekubuda pachena kuzere panyaya iyi. Taedza kunzwa kubva kugurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende panyaya iyi asi nharembozha yavo yange isingabatike. Hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa yave nenguva ichiti iri kuda kuti nyaya yeGukurahundi igadziriswe. Masvondo maviri adarika, mushure memusangano wakaitwa pakati paVaMnangagwa nemamwe madzishe muguta reBulawayo, munyori webazi rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vakaudza vatori venhau kuti hurumende yaive yave kutanga hurongwa hwekubatsira dzimwe mhuri dzevanhu vakauraiwa panguva yeGukurahundi. VaMangwana vakatsinhira kuti mutungamiri wenyika aitungamira pachirongwa ichi nekuda kwake pasina anomumanikidza nekuda kweshungu dzekuti nyaya iyi igadziriswe zvizere. Asi mukuru wesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica VaDewa Mavhinga vatsinhirawo maonero ekuti hapana zvinobatika zviri kuitwa nehurumende vachiti zvakakosha kuti hurumende itange yabudisa chokwadi chizere panyaya iyi.
title: Hama dzeVakatsakatika paGukurahundi Dzinoti Hurumende yaVaMnangagwa Iri Kuvimbisa Zvaisiri Kuita

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vakazivisa nemusi weChipiri kuti ongororo yakaitwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano inoratidza kuti vanhu vari kurwara neCovid-19 munyika vanosvika zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kana kuti 60% vane mhando yehutachiona hwekuSouth Africa kana kuti "SA variant" uyo uri kutemesa musoro vanachiremba pasi rose. Hapana humbowo hwakakwana hunoratidza kuti nhomba dzose dziakagadzirwa parizvino kusanganisira yeSinopharm yakapihwa Zimbabwe neChina dzinoshanda pamhando yehutachiona hwekuSouth Africa uhu. Hutachina hwekuSouth Africa uhu hwawanikwa munyika dzinodarika makumi maviri kusanganisira Botswana, Zambia, Ghana, Gambia, India, America, Britain, Austria, Norway ne Japan. Asi Zimbabwe ndiyo nyika yatanga kubuda pachena kuti mhando yekuSouth Africa iyi yabata vanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara. Sangano reWorld Health Organization rinoti pane dzimwe mhando mbiri dzawanikwaa dzechirwere cheCovid-19 dzinoti "UK variant" ne "Brazil variant." Asi pamhando dzose idzi, yekuSouth Africa ndiyo iri kuuraya nekutapurirwa vanhu vakawandisa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vaive mukuru wechipatara cheChitungwiza Hospital Dr Enoch Mayida vanoti pachiri kuda kutsvagwa humbo hwakasimba nezvenhomba yekuSouth Africa iyi. No media source currently available
title: Nhomba yekuChina Ingabatsire Here Kudzivirira Mhando yeCovid-19 yekuSouth Africa?

text: Zimbabwe neBotswana zvanyorerana zvibvumirano zvekudyidzana zvinomwe muguta reMaun pamusangano wapindwa nevatungamiri venyika mbiri idzi VaEmmerson Mnangagwa naVaMokgweetsi Masisi. VaMnangagwa vakasvika muBotswana nezuro vaine mamwe makurukota avo. Misangano yakadai yeBi-National Commission yakatangira muHarare gore rapera apo VaMasisi vakaendawo kuZimbabwe. Musangano uyu wakatanga nemusi weChipiri uchipindwa nemakurukota ehrumende dzenyika mbiri idzi. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanoti nyika mbiri idzi dziri kudyidzana munyaya dzedzidzo, kutepfenyurwa kwenhau, hutano, kudzivirirwa kwenyika, nyaya dzemitemo nezvimwe. No media source currently available Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC VaLuke Tamborinyoka vanoti zvibvumirano izvi kupedzera hoko padehwe retsindi. Vati vanhu vemuZimbabwe vari kuudzwa nezvezvibvumirano nenyika dzakaita seChina asi pasina chiri kubuda. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yonyorerana Zvibvurano neBotswana, Vanopikisa Vachiti Kutungana kweMbudzi

text: Nhengo dzeMDC Alliance dzinoti midziyo yadzo yadzinoshandisa kuti dziwane mari iri kupazwa nevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti inhengo dzeZanu PF. Imwe nhengo yevechidiki, VaBatanai Muvangwa, avo vari kushanda kutsvaka rutsigiro rwemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, nakanzura wewadhi 13 muChinhoyi, VaBlackmore Nyangaira, vanoti motokari yavo yaida kupiswa nevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti ndeveZanu PF. VaMuvengwa, avo vanogadzira nekutengesa bhutsu, vanoti vamwe vanhu ndivo vakazodzimura moto wainge uchipisa motokari yavo yainge iyine zvinhu zvavo. VaMuvengwa vanoti motokari yavo yakapiswa nenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika sezvo vainge vakaisa mifananidzo yaVaChamisa nenhengo yeMDC Alliance muChinhoyi, VaPeter Matarutse. VaMuvengwa vanoti mhirizhonga yave kuda kuitika inotyisa sezvo vanhu ava vachazoda kuparadza hupenyu hwavo. VaMuvengwa vanoti mapurisa ari kuedza kuita basa ravo nemazvo sezvo ari kuferefeta nyaya yekupisirwa zvinhu zvavo nekukurumidza kudarika zvavaiita nguva yakare. VaNyangaira vanoti zvakaitika hazvina kunaka sezvo vanhu vachifanirwa kutsvaka rutsigiro pasina mhirizhonga kana kuvhiringidzwa. Chiitiko ichi chinoitika mushure mekupambwa kwenhengo yeMDC Alliance, VaEdward Dzeka, kuChegutu neMuvhuro manheru nevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti masoja sezvo mumwe wavo ainge akapfeka nhumbi dzechiuto. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kukurudzira kuti munyika muve nerunyararo munguva yesarudzo, asi kurudziro iyi inenge isiri kutambirwa nemwoyo wese nevanhu vemubato ravo. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeMDC Alliance kuChinhoyi Dzinoti Dziri kuParadzirwa Midziyo

text: Mutambi wechikwata cheFC Platinum, Walter Musona, ari kunyemwerera akananga kubhanga mushure mekutora mukombe we2022 Castle Lager Soccer Star of the Year pamabiko akaitwa muHarare neChishanu manheru. Musona akatambidzwa mari inoita iyo zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti US$5000.00, mushure mekutora mukombe une chiremera chikuru munhabvu yemunyika weCastle Soccer Star of the Year wemwaka uno. Mari iyi imari yakawandisa zvikuru munyika muno pachitariswa mamiriro ehupfumi hwenyika. Muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaTinashe Museti vanoti Musona anokodzera nekutora mukombe weligi kwaakaita nechikwata chake. William Manhondo we Caps United akatendwa nemari inoita iyo zviuru zvitatu zvemadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$3000.00 mushure mekupedza ari pachinhanho chechipiri. VaMuseti vanoti ndipo paanofanira kuve ari nekuti hapana chaakabuda nacho chinobatika neCaps United kunze kwekurwira nzvimbo yavo mugungano iri. Frank Makarati weDynamos ndiye akatora chinhanho chechitatu ndokutambidzwa mari inoita iyo zviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$2500.00. Chiri kushamisa ndechekuti mutambi weHerentals, Tino Benza, ndiye akavhoterwa nechaunga kunzi ndiye mutambi akatamba zvinonwisa mvura mwaka uno. Asi pakasarudzwa ma Soccer Star, veruzhinji vaitonyunyuta kuti Benza aive asingakodzere pamberi paBlessing Majarira uyo vanotamba vese kuchikwata chimwechetecho. No media source currently available
title: Mutambi weFC Platinum, Walter Musona, Anosimudza Mukomwe weSoccer Star of The Year 2022

text: Sangano reZimbabwe Election Support Network kana kuti ZESN raburitsa ongororo inoratidza kuti bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF riri kushandisa midziyo yehurumende mukutsvaga rutsigiro. Ongororo iyi yakaitwa nevaongorori veZESN vari mumatunhu ose enyika mazana maviri negumi muri kuitwa sarudzo dzevamiriri vedare reparamende. Sachigaro weZESN, VaAndrew Makoni vati hurumende iri kushandisa zvikopo kopo nedzimotokari dzehurumende. Vatiwo dzimwe nguva hurumende iri kutanga yapa vanhu mombe pozoitwa musangano weZanu-PF padivi. Izvi vati hazvibvumidzwe pamutemo. No media source currently available Asi munyori anoona nezvemitemo muZanu-PF VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana vanoti Zanu-PF iri kuzodzwa mapurisa enguve yaisina kudya. No media source currently available Vati mubumbiro remutemo, mutungamiri wenyika anoramba ari pabasa kusvika panopera sarudzo nekudaro anokwanisa kushandisa midziyo yehurumende.
title: ZESN Yopomera Zanu-PF Mhosva Yekushandisa Midziyo yeHurumende Mukutsvaga Rutsigiro

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatsoropodzawo vari kuita zvehuori munyika pakuvigwa kwevaita gamba renyika, VaStanley Nleya, pamarinda anovigwa magamba enyika paHeroes Acre. Vachitaura vari pamarinmda anovigirwa magamba muHarare, VaMnangagwa vatiwo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinofanira kushinga apo nyika yakatarisana nematambudziko akawanda pari zvino. VaMnangagwa vakurudzirawo runyararo nekubatana munyika vachiti izvi ndizvo zvinoita nyika ibudirire vakati hupfumi hwenyika huchasimukira chete kana vanhu vakashanda nesimba. VaMnangagwa varemekedza VaNleya semunhu ane nhoroondo inodadisa kubva munguva yehondo vari kudivi reZipra. VaMnangagwa vati VaNleya, avo vaive mumwe vevakuru kuZipra, vakadzidzisawo mamwe magamba akaita semukuru wemauto, VaPillip Sibanda. VaNleya, avo vakarwa muhondo yerusunguko vari mumwe wevatungamiri kana kuti makomanda ekudivi reZipra, vakashaikira kuBulawayo svondo rapera mushure mekurwara nechirwere chemwoyo. Vasiya vana vatatu nevazukuru vaviri. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoviga VaNleya kuHeroes Acre Vachishoropodza Vanoita Huori

text: Munyori anoona nezvekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhurume nevanhukadzi uye kugara kwakanaka musangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, mudunhu reMasvingo, Amai Sheila Chirisamhuru, vasungwa nemapurisa kuMasvingo kwakare. Izvi zvinotevera kuratidzira kwaitwa nevarairidzi mudunhu iri vachiti vanoda kuti hurumende ivape mihoro yavo nemari yekuAmerica. Gweta riri kumirira Amai Chirisamhuru, VaMartin Mureri vekambani yemagweta yeMatutu and Mureri Legal Practitioners, vanoti Amai Chirisamhuru vave kupomerwa mosva yetyora mutemo weMOPA nekuungana vasina mvumo yemapurisa mushure mekumbenge vapomerwa mhosva yekuita zvemhirizhonga. VaMureri vanoti Amai Chirisamhuru vambochengetedzwa pakamba yemapurisa yeChikato vasati vaiswa mumaoko ematikitivha edivi reLaw and Order uko vacharara usiku hwanhasi paine tarisiro yekuti vamiswe pamberi pedare neChipiri. Varairidzi vanodarika zana nemakumi mashanu varatidzira pamahofisi edzidzo muMasvingo vachiti vanoda kuti hurumende ivape mihoro yavo nemari yekuAmerica inoita madhora mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri pamwedzi. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Hurumende yakawedzera vashandi vayo mari dzemihoro svondo rapera asi iri kurambwa nemasangano ose anomirira vashandi vachiti havana kutanga vagarwa navo pasi. Asi gurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavhima vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende yagara iri kuronga kusangana nevashandi vayo kuti vazeye nyaya dzemihoro mwedzi uno. Munyori wesangano reARTUZ, VaRobson Chere vanoti neMuvhuro nhengo dzavo chete ndidzo dzakaratidzira, asi vanotarisira rutsigiro kubva kune mamwe masangano pamwe nevashandi vari kuda kuti mihoro yavo igadziriswe. VaChere vanoti vacharamba vachiratidzira nyika yose kusvika hurumende yavabhadhara mihoro yavo nemadhora ekuAmerica ayo vanoti anokwanisa kutenga. Varairidzi ava vanoti vari kuda kuti mihoro yavo ive mumadhora ekuAmerica anoita mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri pamwedzi. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeARTUZ Dzinoratidzira kuMasvingo, Imwechete Ichisungwa

text: Vari kutungamira chikwata cheEuropena Union chiri kuongorora sarudzo dzichaitwa musi wa 30 Chikunguru, VaAlmar Brok, vanoti kuita sarudzo dzakachena kunobatsira Zimbabwe pachirongwa chayo chekugdzirisa hukama hwayo nedzimwe nyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nehupfumi. Vachitaura nevatori nevanhau muHarare neChishanu, VaBrok vati zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe iite sarudzo dzakachena vachiti izvi zvinorerutsa chirongwa chayo chekuda kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika mushure mekunge hukama hwayo nenyika zhinji dzepasi rose hwadzikira pasi pehutongo hwaVaRobert Mugabe. Vati nekuda kwaizvozvo, zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, iite basa rayo sezvainotarisirwa kuita uyewo kuti basa iri riitwe pachena kuitira kuti vese vari musarudzo vagutsikane nemafambisirwo esarudzo. Vati sezvo Zimbabwe ichizivikanwa nekuita sarudzo dzine mutauro, pari zvino pane vamwe vane chivimbo nemafambiro ari kuita zvinhu kunyange hazvo pachine zvinhu zvakawanda zvichiri kuda kugadziriswa. VaBrok, avo vakasangana nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, sachigaro weZec, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vatori venhau, mapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, vati mumisangano yavo mabuda zvichemo zvakati kuti uye shuviro yavo ndeyekuti dai zvichemo izvi zvagadziriswa kuitira kuti sarudzo dzisaite mutauro. Vatiwo vakanzwa zvakataurwa nemauto kuti acharemekedza bumbiro remitemo yenyika pasarudzo, asi vakati Zec haifanirwe kuita zvinhu zvinoita kuti vanhu vafungire kuti sarudzo dziri kubirwa zvakaita sekushandisa mauto pasarudzo. Chikwata cheEU chinotiwo hachina kufara nezvachakaona pachakadeedzwa nevamwe kunoona kudhindwa kwemapepa ekuvhotera kuFidelity Printers svondo rapfuura. EU yatiwo chingave chinhu chakanaka chose kana zvinhu zvese zvikaitwa pachena. Mutevedzeri wemukuru wechikwat ichi, VaMark Stevens, vati mafambisirwo esarudzo anosiyana siyana uye kune dzimwe nyika kudhindwa kwemapepa ekuvhotera kunoitwa pachena vese vanokwikiwdza vachiona. Asi vatiwo kune dzimwe nyika vanoita zvinhu muchihwande sezviri kuitwa muZimbabwe. Aka ndekekutanga mukati memakore gumi nematanhatu hurumende yeZimbabwe ichichoka Europen Union kuzoongorora sarudzo. Hurumende yaVaMnangagwa, iyo yakatora matomu zvichitevera kudzingwa basa kwaVaMugabe muna Mbudzi gore rapfuura nemauto, yakakoka nyika pamwe nemasangano ekunze akawanda kuti azoongorore sarudzo sezvo ichiti sarudzo idzi dzichaitwa pachena. Zvichakadai, vakasanobata chinzvimbo chemumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, Amai Jennifer Savage, nezuro vakati America inoda kuvanduza hukama hwayo neZimbabwe zvisinei kuti ibato ripi rinenge rakunda musarudzo. Mumashoko avo pakupemberera zuva rekuwana kuzvitonga kwenyika yavo, Amai Savage vakati America inotarisira kuti sarudzo dzinge dzakachena uye vave kutoona mberi zvirango zvehupfumi zvabviswa pave nekudyidzana kwakasimba pakati penyika mbiri idzi. America yakatemera vamwe vakuru vakuru muZanu PF vainoti ndivo vaibira sarudzo, kutyora kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nekuita zvese zvaitadzisa nyika kuve nehutongi hwejekerere. No media source currently available
title: European Union Inoti Zvichemo Ngazvigadziriswe Sarudzo Dzisati Dzaitwa

text: Kunyange hazvo mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kuramba vachivimbisa pasi rose kuti munyika muchaitwa sarudzo dzakachena, mhirizhonga yezvematongerwe enyika iri kuramba ichikwira munyika, zvichitevera kurohwa zvakaipisisa nemusoja kweimwe nhengo yeMDC-T kwaChivi neChina manheru. Imwe nhengo ye MDC-T, VaLuckmore Mandiva, wemuraini rekwa Murandu, vanonzi vakarohwa vakakuvara zvakaipisisa nemumwe muuto pazvitoro zveZvamapere mu Ward 10 kwaChivi. Zvinonzi musoja uyu akarova VaMandiva achivati havafanirwe kutsigira MDC. Muninína wa VaMandiva, VaPeter Mandiva, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mukoma wavo akakuvara zvisingaiti uye rimwe ziso rake harisi kutoona kunyange akandorapwa kuchipatara che Chivi district hospital . Vati vakaenda nemukoma wavo kuchipatara uko kwavakandosona uye vakadzoka navo kumba mushure mekurapwa. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC-T muMasvingo, VaSimon Mupindu, vashoropodza Zanu PF vachiti mashoko avo ekuti vachashandisa mauto abuda pachena kunyange mukuru wavo achivimbisa runyararo. Nyanzvi munezve matongerwe enyika, VaTakavafira Zhou, vanoti sarudzo dzegore rino dzatotanga mhirizhonga uye VaMnangagwa vari kunyepera vekunze kwenyika vachivanyengedza kuti vauye kuzoita mabhizimusi munyika vachiti zvinhu zvanaka muZimbabwe. "Handioni kuchiita free and fair elections nekuti Zanu PF ino indiketa kutena left iyo ichetena right, tozviziva kuti vanhu ve Zanu vanoda kurova vanhu. VaRugeje vakataura kuti vacharova vanhu," vadaro VaZhou. Studio7 yatadza kubata mutauriri wemauto munyika, Lieutenant Colonel Aphios Makotore, kuti vatipe divi ravo nenzve nyaya iyi. NeChina, mutungamiri weNational People's Party, Amai Joice Mujuru, vakatiwo vakarwiswa nevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti ndeveZanu PF, kuChitubu, muGlen Norah A. Vatsigiri vaAmai Mujuru vakakuvadzwawo pachiitiko ichi. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo yeMDC Inorohwa Zvakaipisisa neMusoja kuMasvingo

text: Gurukota rezve mari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube pamwe nemunyori webazi ravo VaGeorge Guvamatanga, avo vari muAmerica kwesvondo rino rese, vanga vachitarisirwa kusangana nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica mangwanani eMugovera pamuzinda weZimbabwe uri muWashington D.C., asi musangano uyu unonzi wazokanzurwa. Kunyange hazvo pasina kupiwa zvikonzero zvaita kuti musangano uyu ukanzurwe, vane ruzivo nezvenyaya iyi vanoti muzinda weZimbabwe watya kuratidzira kunonzi kwanga kwakarongwa nenhengo dzebato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change kuti kungavhiringidza musangano uyu. Zvinonzi zvimwe chizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakaita saVaInnocent Mawire zvanga zvabva kune mamwe matunhu zvichida kuzonzwa mamiriro akaita zvinhu kumusha munyaya dzekutanga mabhizimusi nekudyara mari kumusha. No media source currently available Takundikana kubata mumiriri weZimbabwe muAmerica VaTadious Tafirenyika Chifamba kuti tinzwe kuti sei musangano uyu wamiswa. Sachigaro veZanu PF mudunhu reWashington D.C, Maryland neVirginia, VaFrenk Guni vanoti semaziviro avari kuita musangano uyu wamiswa nekuti vemapato anopikisa, zvikuru vebato reCCC, vanga vakaronga kuzokanganisa musangano uyu vachiratidzira. Asi vaGuni vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoda kuhazvo kusangana naVamthuli Ncube zvinokwanisa kuita izvi masikati eMugovera, apo vana veZimbabwe vachaungana kuUrbana, muMaryland kumhemberero dzekuzvitonga kuzere kwenyika dzichaitwa nevana veZimbabwe vari muAmerica, sezvo gurukota iri richange ririkowo. Asi sachigaro webato reCCC mudunhu reWashington D.C., Maryland neVirginia, Muzvare Tafadzwa Matinenga vanoti vatoshamisikawo vachisvika pamuzinda weZimbabwe pakavharwa, uye pasina zvikonzero zvapiwa kuti sei musangano uyu usina kuzoenderera mberi. Muzvare Matinenga vanoti manyepo kuti nhengo dzebato ravo dzanga dzichida kukanganisa musangano uyu dzichiratidzira vachiti bato ravo ranga risina hurongwa hwakadaro, asi kuti vanga vachingodawo kupinda mumusangano uyu sezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvese. No media source currently available No media source currently available
title: Muzinda weZimbabwe muAmerica Unokanzura Musangano Pakati peZvizvarwa zveZimbabwe neGurukota rezveMari VaMthuli Ncube

text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti mapato anopikisa anofanirwa kuedza nepaanogona napo kuona kuti sarudzo dzegore rino hadzibirirwi kusanganisira kuona kunodhindirwa mapepa ekuvhota, kubviswa kwemauto kumaruwa pamwe nekusununguka kwesangano rinoona nezvesarudzo. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti kuchema kwemapato anopikisa nguva dzese dzinoitwa sarudzo kuti vabirirwa kuri kuita kuti vamwe veruzhinji vashaye hany’a nekuvhota. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisai Ruhanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mapato anopikisa kunyanya bato reMDC T iro ravati ndiro rinonyanyotsigirwa munyika, riedze kuvhara mukana wekubirwa pasarudzo dzegore rino. VaRuhanya vakurudzira kuti mapato aya anofanirwa kuwirirana neZimbabwe Electoral Commission kuchadhindirwa mapepa ekuvhota pamwe nekuona zvinenge zvichiitwa kumamisha kunyanya nevemauto. VaRuhanya vati mapato anopikisa anofanirwa kuonawo kuti gwaro revavhoti rinobudiswa nguva ichiripo kuti riongororwe zvakakwana pamwe nekuona kuti pane vanhu vakakwana vanoongorora sarudzo vakamirira mapato. Imwe nyanzvi munezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEarnest Mudzengi, vanotiwo vemapato anopikisa vanofanirwa kurwisa kusununguka kweZEC pamwe nekuona kuti kufambiswa kwemashoko zvakasununguka kwavapo munyika. Kubva mugore ra 2000 mapato anopikisa anga achingochema nenyaya imwe yekubirwa musarudzo izvo nyanzvi idzi dzinoti zvinofanirwa kupera. Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kuvimbisa sarudzo dzejekerere asi vemapato anopikisa vanoti hapana zvati zvaitwa kuratidza kuti kuchaitwa sarudzo dzakasununguka. No media source currently available
title: VeMapato Anopikisa Vokurudzirwa Kudzivirira Kubiridzirwa kweSarudzo

text: Mumiriri weBritain muZimbabwe, Amai Catriona Laing vakati vakanzwa kukurudzirwa nevimbiso yavakapiwa negurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, yekuti vakazvipira kutevera bumbiro remitemo, uye kuti vanhu vasambunyikidzwe pamwewo nekuti mutemo uteverwe. Amai Laing vakataura mashoko aya paTwitter neChipiri mushure mekusangana naVaZiyambi pavakanovakorokotedza nekudomwa kwavo kuve gurukota rezvemutemo. Amai Laing vanoti VaZiyambi vakavavimbisa kuti chinhu chiri pamusoro pehurongwa hwavo inyaya yekuda kuona kuti munyika mune runyararo uye kuti sarudzo dzichaitwa dzinge dzakachena, dzinotambirika. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Citizens Initiative, VaPromise Sande vanoti vanoona sekunge mashoko emumiriri weBritain aya akanaka chose sezvo achiisa pachena zvivimbiso zviri kupiwa neZimbabwe kuti pasi rose rione kana zvichizodziswa. VaSande vanoti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa yavimbisa zvinhu zvakawanda kwazvo kubva payakatora masimba, saka inofanirwa kupenengurwa kuti paonekwe kuti kungotaura chete here kana kuti iri kuzadzisa nezviito. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwawo nezvakataurwa naAmai Laing, zvekuti vakatarisa zvikuru zviri kuitika muZimbabwe kuti vaone kuchawira tsvimbo nedohwe. No media source currently available
title: Mumiriri weBritain muZimbabwe Anoti Vari Kutevera Zviri Kuitika muZimbabwe

text: Masangano anobatsira nechikafu munyika anoti Oxfam, Save the Children neCare International akurudzira nyika dzakabudirira, masangano anopa rubatsiro nehurumende dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica kuti vabatane mukutsvaga mari yekutengera vanhu zvekudya. Masangano anobatsira nechikafu munyika anoti Oxfam, Save the Children neCare International akurudzira nyika dzakabudirira, masangano anopa rubatsiro nehurumende dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica kuti vabatane mukutsvaga mari yekutengera vanhu vemudunhu iri zvokudya nechimbichimbi sezvo vanhu vakawanda vatarisana nenzara isina mukare akamboona. Masangano matatu aya aburitsa mashoko kuvatori venhau achiti hurumende hadzingofanire kubatsira nechikafu chete, asi zvikwanisiro zvimwe zvakaita semadiridzo uye madhamu sezvo mamiriro ekunze oramba achichinja. Masangano aya ari kuyambirawo kuti vana vadiki vari parumananzombe nenyaya yekushaya chikafu. Nzara iyi yakonzerwa nekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura kwemwaka miviri yakatevedzana. Vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu vanonzi vakatarisana nenzara mudunhu iri pari zvino. Asi Mutevedzeri wemukuru weOxfam muZimbabwe, VaKevin Ndemera, vanoti huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira kusvika pamamiriyoni makumi mashanu. Masangano matatu aya anoti ari kufara kuti SADC yatara dambudziko sechinhu chakakomba kana kuti Declaration of Regional Disaster zvichabatsira mukutsvaga mari. MuZimbabwe pari zvino vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana vakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaya chikafu. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Mamiriyoni Makumi Mashanu Vanonzi Vanogona Kuziya neNzara muSADC

text: Vamwe vanoti vatori venhau vanofanirwa kuita basa ravo nemazvo vasina mativi avanorerekera kuitira kuti veruzhinji vazive chokwadi chinenge chichiitika munyika. Vazhinji vataura neStudio7 vanoti vatori venhau, kunyanya vanoshandira mapepa nhau nenhepfenyuro dzehurumende, vanofanirwa kuburitsa nhau vasina kwavakarerekera. Mutori wenhau wemuChinhoyi, Dennis Kagonye, anoti zvakakosha kuti vatori venhau vasave nedivi ravanorerekera. Kagonye anotiwo vezvematongerwo enyika havafanirwe kurambidza vamwe vatori venhau kuita basa ravo. Mumwe mutori wenhau, Nhau Mangirazi, anoti vezvematongerwo enyika havadi vatori venhau vanonyora zvehuori zvavanoita uye vamwe vane rusarura pakati pevatori venhau vanoshandira hurumende nevemakambani akazvimirira panguva ino yesarudzo. Mangirazi anoti anotadza kuenda kunzvimbo dziri kure sezvo makambani enhau asina zvekufambisa zvakakwana. Kagonye anoti vatori venhau vasiri kufara nemari dzemihoro vanofanirwa kutsvaga rimwe basa pane kuita zvechioko muhomwe vari pabasa ravo. Nyanzvi munyaya yezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaRashweat Mukundu, vanotiwo vatori venhau havafanirwe kuita zvehuori. VaMukundu vanoti mapepanhau nenhepfenyuro dzehurumende havafanirwe kutora mativi vachitsigira divi rehurumende vachishoropodza nhengo nemapato anopikisa. VaMukundu vanoti vatori venhau vanofanirwa kuburitsa zviri kushuvirwa nevanhu vakawanda munyika kuitira kuti avo vari kukwikwidaza musarudzo vazive zviri kudiwa nevanhu. VaMukundu vanoti vatori venhau vanofanirwawo kuenda kunoshandira vari kumaruwa, kwete kungotora nhau mumaguta makuru chete. Mukuru weMISA Zimbabwe, VaThabani Moyo, vanoti chikuru chakakosha ndechekuti vatori venhau vazive kuti hapana nhau inokosha kudarika hupenyu. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vanoti zvakakosha kuti masangano anomirira vatori venhau akaita seMISA neZimbabwe Union of Journalists, ayeuchidze vatori venhau mashandiro akanaka vachitevedzera zvinodiwa uye zvinodzivirira kuzviisa panjodzi. No media source currently available
title: Vatori veNhau Vokurudzirwa Kusatora Mativi Mukuita Basa Ravo

text: Vashandi vehurumende voita musangano nehurumende pamusoro pemari dzavo dzemihoro, mabhonasi, pamwe nedzimwe mari itsva dzavava kubatirwa mwedzi wega wega…. Vagari vekuChitungwiza nemasangano akazvimirira voshora zvakadzama muitiro wemapurisa nezuro wakasiya vanhu vakawanda vakuvara vachiti mapurisa anofanirwa kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu dzakachengetedzwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika…. Vagere kunze kwenyika votaura pamusoro pemaomero akaita zvinhu muZimbabwe….. Paramende yobuda nemurawo mutsva unosungira vatori venhau vanoshanda vari muparamende kuti vaferefetwe nevasori vasati vapihwa mvumo yekushandira muparamende. Muchirongwa cheLiveTalk na 8:30pm tiri kutarisa mhirizhonga pamwe nekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kwakaitika kuChitungwiza apo mapurisa akashandisa chisimba pavatyairi vemakombi vairamwa mabasa murunyararo. Iyi ndiyo misoro yenhau dzedu dzanhasi...munotibata pa 909 am, 4930, kana pa 12080, ne 15460 Kilohertzs pa Shortwave kana paFacebook page yedu yevoa Shona. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau – Chitatu, Ndira 6, 2016

text: No media source currently available Aretha Franklin, muimbi wemuAmerica anozivikanwa nemamiriyoni evateveri vake pasi rose saQueen of Soul, ashaya ave nemakore makumi manomwe namatanhatu. Franklin ashaya neChina kumusha kwake mudunhu reDetroit, uko anga ari kuchengetwa muchipatara zvichitevera hondo ndefu negomarara. Mushure mekuberekwa musi wa 25 Kurume 1942 ku Memphis, kuTennessee, Franklin akazokurira kuDetroit, uko baba vake, VaC.I. Franklin vaive muparidzi aive nemukurumbira. Chipo chake chakatanga kuonekwa achiri muduku apo airidza piano pamwe nekuimba nziyo dzechitendero munguva yaiparidza baba vake. Franklin akazopinda mumusambo we Pop ne Jazz ave nemakore gumi nemasere achishanda nekambani yekutsikisa mhanzi ye Columbia Records. Asi kuzobudirira kwake kwakazouya muna 1967 ave kushanda nekambani yemumhanzi ye Atlantic Records. Akazosimukira kuita mukurumbira munyika gore iroro nenziyo dzakasiyanasiyana, dzinosanganisira “Chain of Fools,” “A natural woman,” neyakaita mukurumbira mukuru, “Respect,” iyo yakave mumhanzi wake wekutanga kuita nhamba 1 pa Billboard Hot 100. Chimbo ichi chakanyorwa nemuimbi ainyora nziyo, Otis Redding, uyo akashaya mugore rachaburitswa, muna 1967. Asi Franklin akashandura chimbo ichi kuchiita chimbo chenyika chevatema nevanhukadzi mushure mekunyora zvakare mamwe emashoko nekuisa mimwe mitsara yaiperetera zita rechimbo ichi rekuti “r-e-s-p-e-c-t, tsvakai zvazvinoreva kwandiri.” Akanyorawo zvakare madambarefu akaita mukurumbira akaita sa “Amazing Grace” na “Young, Gifted and Black.” Franklin akaita dambudziko nehuremu hwemuviri wake pamwe nedambudziko rehutano hwake, asi kunyange hazvo mukuchembera kwake, izwi rake rakaramba richitapira. Muna 2009 akaimba pakugadzwa kekutanga kwaVaBarack Obama semutungamiri wenyika, akatandadza vanhu nekambo kaakateedzera kanozni “My Country tis of thee.” Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muWashington DC, Amai Wandana Maluwa, vanoti kushaya kwemuimbi kwavarwadza sezvo aimirira madzimai epasi rose uye vaiimba nzimbo dzekurwisa rusarura. Amai Maluwa vanoti rwufu urwu rwasiya gomba risingakwanise kuvharwa uye rwarwadzisa vazhinji pasi rose.
title: Muimbi Ane Mukurumbira Pasi Rose, Aretha Franklin, Ashaya

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kushora danho ratorwa negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, rekupemha mari yekubatsira mukurwisa chirwere cheKorera, dzichiti hurumende inofanirwa kukoshesha nyaya dzehutano. Vachipindura paTwitter yaVaNcube, mumiriri weKuwadzana East muparamende, Va Charlton Hwende ve MDC, vati zvaitwa naVa Ncube hazvina maturo kana hurumende yakakwanisa kutumira ndege kuti itakure mudzimai wevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, kuti vaende kurufu rwaamai vavo asi ichishaya mari yekubatsira varwere vekorera. Asi mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorgre Charamba, vakaramba nezuro kuti hurumende yakashandisa mari yayo kubhadhara ndege yakatakura amai mugabe vachiti vakabatsirwa ne vemabhizinezi kuita izvi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemari nehupfumi, uye vachidzidzisa ku Devry University, Ku Ohio, VaElliot Masocha vanoti hurumende yakanonoka kuronga nezvekorera. VaMasocha vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugara ichingori ne homwe inomirira nguva dzakadai kwete kuzoda kumhanya mhanya dambudziko ravapo. Vanoti mari zhinji dzinoshandiswa pane zvimwe zvinhu dzinofanirwa kudai dzichichengeterwa kushanda kunyaya dzehutano nekuti hutano hwakakosha kudarika kutengera vakuru vakuru dzimota dzinodhura nezvimwe zvisingabatsiri veruzhinji. No media source currently available
title: Kupemha Mari kwaVaMthuli Ncube Kwokonzera Mutauro

text: Mukuru webhanga guru renyika reZimbabwe Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya vanoti vari kufadzwa nekubudirira kuri kuita zvirongwa zvavo zvekudzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika. Bhanga guru rinoti kuburikidza nemitemo yakasimba yemafambisirwo emari yariri kudzika, kukwira kwehuwandu hwemapeni egoridhe ari kutengwa uye kubatwa mhandamatsimba kwemusika mutema nemitemo yaro, zvinhu zvashanduka munyaya dzehupfumi. Mugwaro rayakaburitsa neMuvhuro, R-B-Z inoti komiti yayo inoona nezvemitemo inobata mafambisirwo emari, yeMonetary Policy Committee, iyo yakasangana neChishanu chadarika, yakaona zvakare kuti inflation yepamwedzi yakadzikira. Inflation inonzi yakadzika kubva pazvikamu makumi maviri nezvishanu nezviga zvitanhatu kubva muzana, 25.6 percent, mumwedzi waChikunguru kuenda pazvikamu gumi nezviviri nezviga zvina kubva muzana, 12.4 percent, muna Nyamavhuvhu. Asi nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinowirirana nezvakawanikwa nekomiti iyi here? Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vanowirirana nemuono wekomiti yezvemafambisirwo emari iyi vachiti zvinhu zvagadzikana. Asi Doctor Chitambara vanoti kunyange hazvo paine kugadzikana kwakonzerwa nemitemo yakadzikwa nebhanga guru renyika inosanganisira kutengeswa kwemapeni egoridhe izvo zvakaita kuti mari dzakawanda dzaitenderera mumisika yakasiyanasiyana dzitsvairwe, zvakakosha kuti pave nemitemo yakasimba inodzikwawo nehurumende inotsigira matanho eReserve Bank of Zimbabwe ose aya. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti havawirirane nemaonero ekomiti yeR-B-Z aya, vachiti zvavari kutsanangura zvinenge ngano yemubhuku, zvisiri izvo zviri kuitika muvanhu. VaNgwenya vanoti vana veZimbabwe vari munyika havaneyi netsananguro dzese dziri kupiwa neR-B-Z idzi, asi chikuru chavanoda kuona chete kuti mari iri mumaoko avo yakwanisa kuvawanisa zvavanoda here kana vapinda muzvitoro. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, Muzvare Chenaimoyo Mutambasere ine maonero ayowo anosiyana nebhanga guru reR-B-Z, vachiti havaoni zvirongwa izvi zvichienderera mberi nekudzikamisa hupfumi, zvikuru chirongwa chemapeni egoridhe, nekuti ari kutenegswa nemari yemunyika zvakanyanya. Panyaya yekudzikira kwe inflation, VaNgwenya vanoti hapana chati chadzika sezvo mutengo wezvinhu zvinotengwa zvakanyanya nevarombo zvakaita seupfu nechingwa isina kushanduka. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinotiwo zvinonetsa kuona kana matanho ari kudzikwa nebhanga guru aya ari kushanda mativi ose, nekuti kunyange hazvo musika mutema wadzikamiswa, mutengo wedhora reku America pamusika weR-B-Z, uri kuramba uchikwira zvekuda kutobata mutengo uri pamusika mutema. Pari nhasi dhora rekuAmerica rinonzi riri kutengwa nemadhora ari pakati pemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu emunyika kusvika pamadhora mazana manomwe enyika pamusika mutema zvichienderana nehuwandu hwemari iri kutengwa. Kutanga neChipiri dhora rekuAmerica rave kutengwa nemadhora emunyika mazana mashanu nemakumi mana nemanomwe. No media source currently available
title: RBZ Yoti Zvirongwa Zvekudzikamisa Hupfumi Zviri Kubudirira, asi Dzimwe Nyanzvi dzHupfumi Dzichiti Pachiri Papfupi Kuti Michero Ioneke

text: Ukraine nemadzisahwira ayo vari kushoropodza zvakasimba kurwiswa kwenzvimbo inokwirirwa zvitima muUkraine neChishanu, vachipomera Russia mhosva yekuuraya vanhu. Vakuru-vakuru vekambani yezvitima iri pasi pehurumende yeUkraine vakati vanhu makumi mashanu nevaviri, 52, vakaurayiwa, kusanganisira vana vashanu, uye vamwe makumi masere nevanomwe vakakuvadzwa pachiteshi chiri muguta riri kumabvazuva kwe Ukraine reKramatorsk chaishandiswa kuburitsa vanhuwo zvavo vari kutiza hondo kuvaendesa kusina njodzi. Mutungamiri weUkraine, VaVolodymyr Zeleskyy vakati chiitiko ichi chakaitwa maune kuuraya vanhuwo zvavo, vachiti zvakaratidza kuti mauto eRussia haana chivindi chekumisidzana nemauto eUkraine kuhondo, saka ave kuparadza vanhuwo zvavo. Vakati Ukraine ichaita zvose kuona kuti ndiani akaita chipi panguva ipi kusvika vave kuziva zvese zvakaitika nevakazvikonzeresa.
title: Ukraine neMadzisahwira Ayo Voshoropodza Kurwiswa kweChiteshi cheZvitima neRussia

text:
Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, ZLHR, rakwidza nyaya mudare repamusoro richikumbira kuti risendeke parutivi danho rehurumende rekuchinja mazita emimwe migwagwa muBulawayo. ZLHR yakwidza mudare chikumbiro chekuti Statutory Instrument yekuchinja mazita emimwe migwagwa muBulawayo iyo yakashandiswa nehurumende mazuva mashoma apfuura isendekwe parutivi. ZLHR iri kushanda basa iri yakamirira sangano re Bulawayo Progressive Residents Association, kana kuti BPRA.

Mutauriri weZLHR, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vari ichokwadi kuti vari kumirira sangano reBPRA.

Sachigaro wesangano reBPRA, VaAmbrose Sibindi, vati havafare nedanho rakatorwa nehurumende vachiti havawone rine musoro uye hurumende yakangotora danho iri isina kunzwa pfungwa dzeveruzhinji panyaya iyi. Hurumende yakatora danho rekuti mazita emigwagwa yakasiyana siyana
mune mamwe maguta munyika kusanganisira Bulawayo, Gweru, Harare
neMasvingo achinjwe.

Taedza kunzwa kubva kugurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, asi nharembozha yavo yange isingabatike zvinove zvimwe chete zvange zvichiitika pataedza kubata mutevedzeri wavo Amai Marian Chombo.

Asi meya veguta reGweru VaJosiah Makombe avo vanovewo mukuru wesangano reUrban Councils Association of Zimbabwe vati mutemo weUrban Councils Act unopa masimba kumakanzuru emaguta nemadhorobha kuti ape mazita kumigwagwa.

Dzimwe nyanzvi munezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti zviri kuitwa
nehurumende kupedzera hoko padehwe reshindi sezvo pane zvakawanda
zvakakosha zvinoda kugadziriswa munyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye
pakuti makanzuru anyatsoita mabasa aanotarisirwa kuita nemazvo. Mukuru wesangano reZLHR mudunhu reMatabeleland, Amai Nosimilo Chanaiwa, vatiwo magweta avo ari kuwira nechimwe chikumbiro chevamwe vagari vekuLuveve zvichitevera kufa uye kurwara kwevamwe vanhu munzvimbo iyi nekuda kwechirwere chemanyoka icho chinofungidzirwa kuti chakabva mukunwa mvura yakasviba. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yokwidzwa kuMatare Zvichitevera Kuchinjwa kweMazita eMigwagwa muBulawayo

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vasatevedzera kana kuteerera mashoko ari kunyorwa kana kutaurwa pamadandemutande akasiyana siyana akaita seFacebook, Whatsapp nemamwe arikuzivisa vanhu nezvemishonga iyo inonzi inokwanisa kurapa kana kudzivirira chirwere checoronavirus icho chauraya zviuru nezviuri zvevanhu pasi rose. No media source currently available  Muzvare Lorna Mandizha vanogara kuTynwald North kuWestgate vanoti vakatombogadzira mushonga wemandimu akasanganiswa nesoda kana kuti sodium bicarbornate pachirungu, vakatopa mhuri yavo kuti inwe mushonga iwoyu. Muzvare Mandizha vanoti vakaudzwa nezvemushonga uyu nasahwira wavo uyo akabva auya nemandimu acho uye vakaverenga zvavaiva vatumirwa pambozhanhare kuti vadzidze mabikirwo emushonga wacho, asi vakatozoziva kuti mushonga uyu unogona kuuraya mhuri yose. Mumwe mudzimai Amai Tee Chigodora vanoti vakapotsa vagadzirawo mushonga iwoyu asi havazive kuti chii chakavadzora sezvo varikugara vachingotya kubatira chirwere checoronavirus icho chinonzi hachina mushonga unochirapa.  Mutauriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association kana kuti ZHDA Dr Tapiwa Mungofa vanoti zvirwere zvinorapwa kunaana chiremba vakadzidzira basa racho kwete zviri kutaurwa nevanhu pamadandemutande. Dr Mungofa vanoti mushonga wese unezvaunotokanganisa muviri wemunhu nokudaro vanhu vakangoteerera zvese zvese zvangotaurwa vanokwanisa kurasikirwa nehupenyu. Vakapa muenzaniso wemumwe munhu akanwa mushonga unorapa malaria unonzi chloroquine angonzwa kuti unorapa coronavirus akabva atoshaya. Dr Mungofa vakayambirawo vagari vekumaruwa nezvechirwere ichi vakavakukurudzira kuti vasaita nzendo dzekuenda kumadhorobha, kushanyira hama munharaunda dzavo uye nekuenda kunobata maoko kurufu nokuti chirwere ichi chinopararira zvakanyanya panenge pakaungana vanhu. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga vatsinhira mashoko aya vachiti vanhu ngavadzikise mikana yokubatira hosha iyi nekugara kumba uye vachigeza maoko nesipo nuva dzose uye kuti varegedze kubata kumeso, maziso uye nekutonongora mhino dzavo. Dr Chiripanyanga vanoti mate anobuda mukanwa kana munhu achitaura kana kukosora ndiwo anotakura chirwere che corona virus nokudaro vanokurudzira vanhu kuti vasamira kana kugarisana padhuze kana vachitaura. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr Obadiah Moyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo.
title: VanaChiremba Voyambira Vanhu Kuti Vanogona Kufa neMishonga yeNhema Inonzi Inorapa Coronavirus

text: Vamwe vashandi vehurumende vatotanga kare kuramba kutambira zvikamu zvemari zvinonzi nehurumende inokwanisa kuwedzera nazvo mihoro yevashandi vayo. Masangano evarairidzi ari pasi pemubatanidzwa weFederation of Zimbabwe Educators Union, FOZEU, asangana muHarare akaramba zviri kuda kupiwa nehurumende izvi, achiti anoda kuti vapiwe zvikamu zana kubva muzana, kana kuti murairidzi ari pasi otambira mari inoenderana nePoverty Datum Line, iyo vararaidzi vanoti iri pamadhora mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri pamwedzi. Hurumende neMuvhuro yakazivisa kuti yakwidza zvikamu zvainokwanisa nazvo kubhadhara vashandi vayo kubva pazvikamu gumi kubva muzana, izvo zvakarambwa kare nevashandi, kuenda pazvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano ari muFOZEU, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Msaraure, vanoti havasi kuzopedza nguva vachipembedza zvinhu zvisina maturo zvakaita sezvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana. Mashoko aVaMasaraure aya anotsinhirwawo nemutungamiri we Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, VaTakavafira Zhou, avo vanoti zvinorwadza kuti hurumende iri kukwanisa kuwedzera mari dzekumihoro kune vamwe vashandi vayo vakaita savanachiremba navanamukoti panguva, asi ichiomera kubhadhara varairidzi. Hurumende inonzi yakatobhadhara kare vanachiremba navanamukoti mari dzemabhonasi egore rapera, uye vanamukoti vanonzi vakapiwa dzimwe mari dzavo dzemisaridzirwa dzavakanga vasina kupiwa mumakore adarika. Varairidzi vanonzi vari kutarisirwawo kuwana mabhonasi avo egore rapera svondo rinouya. Panyaya yekuti kune mamwe masangano evashandi vehurumende anonzi ari kutambira zvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana izvi, VaMasaraure vanoti vanozviziva kuti hurumende ine masangano evashandi ainoshanda nawo kuitira kukanganisa mafambiro enhaurirano dzemihoro yevashandi vehurumende. Vanoti havaoni svondo rino richipera nhengo dzavo dzisati dzaratidzira dzichinyunyuta nekunonoka kwehurumende kunzwa zvichemo zvavo, vachiti kana nhaurirano dzakasaburitsa chimuko varairidzi vacharamwa mabasa. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti idanho rakanaka chose kuti hurumende iwedzere vashandi vayo mihoro, asi vanoti nemamiriro akaita zvinhu mune zveupfumi, havaoni hurumende ichizokwanisa kuenderera mberi ichiwana mari dzekutambirisa vashandi vayo. VaChitambara vanoti igaroziva kuti nguva yesarudzo yose mari dzinoshandiswa nehurumende dzinokwira zvikuru nekuda kwekuti inenge ichibhadhara zvinhu zvainenge isina kugadzirira asi nekuda kwekuti inenge ichitsvaga mavhoti, inpedzisira yazviisa paisingakwanisi kuzobuda. VaChitambara vanoti nekuda kwekuti nyika haisi kukwanisa kuwana mari yekunze, zvichanetsa kuti hurumende iwane mari dzekuzoramba ichibhadhara vashandi vayo paine nguva. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi dzeZveupfumi Dzinoti Hurumende Haina Mari Dzairi Kuvimbisa Vashandi Vayo

text: Bato guru rinopikisa reMDC rinoti hurumende iyo yakazivisa kuti yave kuda kupa vanhu zvikwanisiro zvekutimisa zvakaita sembeu nemafetireza zvinosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemasere emadhoa haifanire kuita zvematongerwo enyika muhurongwa uhu. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvekurima VaDavis Marapira ndivo vakazivisa nezvechirongwa ichi. Vanoti varimi vanosvika zviuru mazana matatu ndivo vachabatsirwa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMarapira kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi mutauriri weMDC VaObert Gutu vanoti vane humbowo hwakasimba hwekuti pose panoitwa hurongwa uhu panoitwa zvematongerwo enyika. VaGutu vanoti zvirongwa zvakadai ndezvehurumende kwete zvematongerwo enyika. MuZimbabwe magara muchiiita mutauro panyaya dzekupa vanhu mbeu uye chikafu vakawanda kubva kumapatro anopikisa vachiti Zanu-PF inoyima vemapato anopikisa. Asi bato reZanu-PF rinoti rinobatsira munhu wose risingatarise kuti wabuda mumba maani.
title: MDC Inoti Zanu-PF Ngaimire Kuita zveMatongerwo eNyika neMbeu

text: Vatsigiri vebato reMovement for Democratic Change, vemachechi, pamwe nemasangano akazvimiririra, vaungana neChishanu kumahofisi eMDC muHarare vachinamatira mutungamiri webato iri, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, avo vane chirwere chegomarara. Mutauriri weMDC Activists Veterans Association, iyo yaronga munamato uyu, VaChanza Chavengwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti vakaronga munamato uyu mushure mekuona kudzimbikana kwemutungamiriri webato ravo. Kunyange hazvo kwanga kwofamba mashoko ekuti hutano hwaVaTsvangirai huri kudzikira, munin’ina wavo, VaMannasah Tsvangirai, vati mashoko aya ndeemanyepo. VaMannasah Tsvangirai, avo vaudza Studio7 kuti vakabva kuSouth Africa svondo rino, vati hutano hwemukoma wavo huri kuita zviri nani chose. Vawedzerawo vakati kurangarirwa kwemukoma wavo nevanhu vakasiyana siyana kuti vakunde chirwere chegomarara ichi, kunovanyevenutsa semhuri. Mumwe wevafundisi vauya kuzobatana nevamwe, Doctor Douglas Mambure, vatiwo vane chivimbo chekuti kuna Mwari hakuna chirwere chisingarapiki. VaMambure vati vane tarisiro yekuti VaTsvangirai vazokwikwidza sarudzo dzegore rino vapora pamwe nekuti hukuru hwaMwari huonekwe kuburikidza nekupora kwavo. Amai Thandiwe Chinozvina vabva kumusha weZengeza vatiwo vasimudzwa kuti vauye kumunamato neshuwiro yekuti VaTsvangirai vaitirwe nyasha naMwari. Mukomana wechidiki anga ari pamusangano uyu, VaMunyaradzi Mwale, vashora zvikuru mashoko enhema avati ari kushambadzwa pamadandemutande ekuti VaTsvangirai vakashaya. VaTsvangirai vari kuitirwa minamato kumatunhu akasiyana-siyana munyika, uye ndivo vakadomwa kuti vakwikwidze pachigaro chemutungamiri wenyika vakamirira mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance. No media source currently available
title: VaTsvangirai Vanonamatirwa muHarare neVatsigiri Vavo

text: Rimwe bhanga rine mukurumbira pasi rose, reHSBC, rakaita mazimari akawandisa richishandisa nzira dzinotyora mitemo yenyika dzepasi rose, Studio7 inozviburitsa pachena. Izvi zviri mumagwaro ari mumaoko meStudio7, ayo akapihwa sangano revatori venhau, re International Consortium of Investigative Journalists, ICIJ, kuburikidza nemagwaro arakapihwawo nebepanhau reLe Monde rekuFrance kuitira kuti pave nemushandira pamwe mukuona huori hunotyisa hwakaitwa nebanga iri munyika mazana maviri nenhatu. Magwaro aya anoratidza zvakare kuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe pamwe nemakambani zvinosvika zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nesere, zvakaisa mari mubhanga iri, kana kuti zvaive nemari inoita iyo $272 million mubhanga iri muna 2006/7 chete. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemari dzinoti mari iyi inoratidza kuti yakaiswa mubhanga iri kuSwitzerland nenzira isina kutsarukana zvekuti nyika zvinji dzakawirwa nedambudziko rinenge reZimbabwe dzakarasikirwa nemitero inofanirwa kubhadharwa nezvizvarwa zvenyika idzi. Panyika mazana maviri nenhatu dzinonzi dzakavhiringirwa mirawu yemitero neHSBC, pane mari inosvika mabhiriyoni zana nemazana matatu emamiriyoni emadhora. Vemu Zimbabwe vane mazita ari mugwaro iri vanosanganisira vaimbova seneta weZanu PF, Va Aguy Clement Georgias, mukuru weTrinity Engineering; vaive mukuru wemauto emuchadenga, muchakabvu Air Marshal Josiah Tungamirayi; mutambi wekiriketi, Stuart David Robertson, munazvinabhizinesi, Va Frederick Mutanda, pamwe nevarimi vachena vakawanda vakaita semhuri yekwaDorward uye mhuri yekwaPatel. Va Georgias, avo vaiva neakaundi yakavharwa kuHSBC, vakaiswa pazvirango zvekufamba neEuropean Union muna 2007 apo vakaitwa mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekusimudzirwa kwehupfumi. Zvirango izvi zvakazobviswa muna 2011, asi vakazoendesa European Union kumatare vachiti kudzingwa kwavakaitwa muna 2007 kubva kuBritain nepamusana pezvirango kwakavavhiringira zvinhu zvavaiita zvinokosha mamiriyoni matanhatu emu euro, asi dare reEU general court rakarasa nyaya iyi. VaGeorgias havana kudavira nhare dzavo kuti titaure nezvemari dzavakamboisa muHSBC panguva iyo hupfumi hwenyika hwainge hwagwadama zvakanyanyisa, inflation ichiita chamurambamhuru. VaMutanda havanawo kudavira nhare dzavo. Magwaro ane Studio7 anoratidzawo kuti bhanga reHSBC raifurira vanhu kutyora mitemo kuitira kuti vasabhadhare mitero, izvo zvinonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzemari, zvakapa kuti Zimbabwe nedzimwe nyika dzirasikirwe zvikuru nemari. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinonzi chakasangana nevashandi vebhanga iri kuCape Town pakarongwa nzira dzekuburitsa mari inoita mazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora kuitira kuti mari iyi ishandiswe mukutsigira mwanakomana wemuridzi weakaundi kuva neCredit Card rine chiremera. Mwanakomana uyu aizonofambisa mabasa ekutenga nekutengeswa kwedzimba muCalifornia muAmerica. Mazita evanhu ava nevamwe vose vakadomwa mumagwaro eICIJ, achaburitswa neMuvuro paStudio7. Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari, uye vari nyanzvi munyaya dzekufambiswa kwemari nemakambani, VaTendai Biti, vanoti zviri pachena kuti mari yeZimbabwe inosvika mazana matatu emamiriyoni kana yainge yakachengetwa mumabhanga aya, vakayiendesa vanhu havana kuzviita nenzira dzinotambira pasi rose mukufambiswa kwenyaya dzemari pakati penyika dzikasiyana siyana. VaBiti vatiwo izvi zvakaitwa bhanga renyika risina ruzivo, nokudaro zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakaburitsa mari iyi munyika, zvaityora mitemo yenyika. Vaimbove gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaGideon Gono, havana kuwanikwa kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo vaive mukuru webhanga iri panguva iyi. Asi imwe nhengo yeZanu PF yakashanda mubazi rezvemari kwenguva yakareba, inoti zviri kuburitswa nemagwaro aya zvinoratidza kuti kuparara kwedhora remunyika hakuna kukonzerwa chete nekudhinda mari kunonzi kwaiitwa naVaGono, asi kuti vanhu vakaburitsa mari yakawanda zvakadai iyi, vakaitawo kuti nyika igwadame. Mukuru uyu, uyo anoti anozviziva kuti pane mari inodarika mabhiriyoni mana emadhora iri mumabhanga ekuSwitzerland, anoti yasvika nguva yekuti paongororwe kuti ndivanani vane mari dzakaiswa munzvimbo dzakaita se Seychelles, Singapore, China, Dubai, South Africa, idzo dzisiri kubatsira nyika iri kutambura panguva ino. VaBiti vanoti ichokwadi kuti mari yeZimbabwe yakazadzwa mumabhanga akawanda pasi rose nokudaro ngapaitwe ongororo yekuona kuti ndivanani ava vari kubatsira kuti nyika iparare zvakadai munyaya dzehupfumi. Richipindura mibvunzo yekunenerwa kutyora mitemo, bhanga reHSBC rinobvuma kuti ravandudza muitiro waro basa, uye rakabvisa vanhu nemakambani anosvika zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana vaionekwa kuti havasi kutevedzera mitemo yekufambiswa kwemari. Banga iri, iro rine muzinda mukuru muLondon, pamwe nemahofisi munyika makumi manomwe pasi rose, rakaripiswa nekomiti yedare re Senate muAmerica muna 2012 mari inosvika mabhiriyoni maviri emadhora mushure mekunge rawanikwa richisiya vanotengesa zvinodhaka vachifambisa mari dzavo mumabhanga emuAmerica. Magwaro ari mumaoko eStudio7 anoratidza zvakare kuti bhanga iri raitambira mari kubva kuvanhu vanozivikanwa kuti vanodyidzana nevarwisi vechikwata che al-Qaida nevamwe vanoita zvakapfurikidza mwero. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, havana kubatika kuti vatipe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vasingadaire nhare mbozha yavo. Mangwana Studio7 iri kuburitsa mazita evanhu pamwe nemari dzavo dziri mubhanga reHSBC kuitira kuti veruzhinji vanzwisise kukura pamwe nekushata kwakaita nyaya iyi. Ray Choto inhengo yesangano reInternational Consortium of Investigative Journalists, uye ari kushanda nedzimwe nhengo dzeICIJ mukuburitsa huori hwaiitwa pakati pebhanga reHSBC nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. "http://projects.icij.org/swiss-leaks/" id="icij-swiss-leaks" style="height: 740px; width: 100%; max-width: 920px; margin: 0 auto"></iframe>
title: Shoroma muZimbabwe Dzoviga Mari Dzadzo Mubhanga reHSBC kuSwitzerland

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kusimuka nhasi vakananga kuZambia uko nyika iyi iri kupemberera kuwana kuzvitonga kuzere nemusi weChitatu. Mashoko ekuti VaMnangagwa vari kuenda kuZambia ari padandemutande reTwitter rebazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Bazi iri rinoti vari kuenda kumhemberero dzechimakumi mashanu nemana Zambia yawana kuzvitonga kuzere. Zambia yakawana kuzvitonga kuzere musi wa24 Gumiguru 1964. Nyika iyi yakabatsirawo Zimbabwe munguva yehondo yerusununguko zvakapa kuti nyika mbiri idzi dzive nehukama hwakasimba. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi nematongerwo enyika dzinoti sezvo mhembererero dziriko mangwana, VaMnangagwa vaifanirawo kusimuka musi uyu kana kutoregera sezvo nyika isina mari yekunze inodiwa panzendo dzakadai uye vanhu vari kunetsekana nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wavo VaGeorge Charamba kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachiita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro paCzech University of Life Sciences kuPrague VaWelcome Zimuto vanoti hukama hweZimbabwe neZambia hune nhoroondo yakareba kunyangwe hazvo panguva ino zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka muZimbabwe vachiti havaone rwendo urwu rwuchibatsira nyika. No media source currently available
