title: VaMngagagwa Votarisirwa Kuenda kuZambia Nhasi Kunopemberera Zuva reKuwana Kuzvitonga Kuzere kweNyika Iyi

text: Mapurisa emuSouth Africa anonzi asunga zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zvinodarika mazana mashanu uye kuvharisa zvitoro nemabhizimusi evabvakure ava muguta reJohannesburg. Izvi zvinotevera kupazwa kwezvitoro zvezvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika nemusi weChipiri manheru nezvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa. Svondo rapera, mapurisa akarwisana nezvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika muSouth Africa mushure mekunge mapurisa apinda muzvitoro zvevabvakure ava achitora nechisimba zvinhu zvaitengeswa nevanhu ava zvaaiti zvigadzirwa zvine mazita ekunyepera. Sachigaro veAfrica Diaspora Forum, Doctor Vusumuzi Sibanda, vanoti sangano ravo richiri kuedza kuti ritaure nemapurisa panyaya iyi. Vanoti kushungurudzwa kuri kuitwa zvizvarwa zvekunze muSouth Africa kunoomesera zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, izvo zviri kutiza matambudziko ekumusha zvichinopindawo mumatambudziko ekusungwa nekuparadzirwa midziyo yazvo. Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Asi vachinyora padandemutande reTwitter, mutungamiri wedunhu reGauteng, VaDavid Makhura, vazivisa kuti vavhara mukati meguta reJohannesburg vachitsvaga vanopara dzimhosva. VaMakhura vatiwo zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zvinodarika mazana matanhatu zvisina magwaro ekugara muSouth Africa zvatorwa nemapurisa uko zviri kuongororwa kana zvisina dzimhosva. Vatiwo pfuti dzakasiyanasiyana nemabara akawanda pamwe nezvigadzirwa zvisiri zvechokwadi zvawanikwawo muzvivakwa zvakasiyanasiyana zvapindwa nemapurisa. Asi Doctor Sibanda vanoti zviri kuitwa nemapurisa kutyora kodzero dzevanhu sezvo ari kusecha muzvitoro zvevanhu varidzi vasipo, uye kushungurudza vanhu kunyange pasina humbowo hwekuti ndivo vari kupara dzimhosva munyika iyi. Vanoti vane hurongwa hwekusvitsa magwaro enyunyuto kuhurumende pamwe nesangano reUnited Nations, uye musi wa 21 mwedzi uno sesangano vari kupinda mumigwagwa vachiratidzira vachinyunyuta nemabatirwo avanoti ari kuitwa vekune dzimwe nyika muSouth Africa.  No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa muSouth Africa Anosunga Zvizvarwa zveKune Dzimwe Nyika

text: Mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba, vanoti mhuri zhinji dzeChilonga ku Chiredzi hadzisi kuzobviswa mumisha yadzo, vachiti mhuri shomanana ndidzo dzichatamiswa uye dzichatsvakirwa pekugara. Mugwaro ravanyora rikabudiswa neZimLive.com, VaCharamba vati mumazuva mashoma ari kutevera, hurumende ichazivisa zvairi kuzoita nenyaya iyi, pamwe chete nekuzivisa mitemo mitsva, kana kuti Statutory Instruments, yavanoti iri kugadziriswa. Hurumende yakazivisa zviri pamutemo mwedzi wapera kuti vagari vanodarika zviuru gumi nezviviri, vari munzvimbo ye Chilonga, vabve munzvimbo iyi, kuitira kuti kambani yeDendiary ishandise minda iyi semafuro emombe dzayo dzemukaka. Matare edzimhosva akambomisa hurumende kuti isabvisa vanhu ava mumisha yavo. Sangano reHuman Rights Watch rinoti ratora nyaya yevanhu veChilonga iyi rikaiisa pamusoro penyaya dzairi kufambira. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti sangano ravo rakanyorera kumutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe chete negurukota rinoona nezvamatunhu, VaJuly Moyo, pamusoro penyaya iyi. Vati sangano ravo riri kushanda nemamwe masangano mukuona kuti vanhu veChilonga havabviswi pamisha yavo zvisiri pamutemo. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvematunhu, Amai Marian Chombo, vati tivabate nhasi, Chipiri, pamusoro penyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Human Rights Watch Yobataira Kuti Vagari vekuChilonga Kuti Vasabviswa Munzvimbo Yavo

text: Masangano anomirira vashandi vehurumende gumi nemashanu asangana muHarare neChishanu pamusangano wechimbichimbi akasunga kuti vashandi vaenderere mberi nehurongwa hwekuramwa mabasa neMuvhuro unouya, kunyange hazvo paita kushanduka zvishoma kubva pane zvavakanga vambowirirana pakutanga. Nhengo yeApex Council uye vari munyori weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, VaRaymond Majongwe, vanoti masangano ose awirirana kuti vashandi vanoenda kumabasa kwavo neMuvhuro asi vasingashandi, vachimirira kunzwa zvichabuda mumusangano uchaitwawo neMuvhuro wakare pakati pevamiriri vehurumende nevamiriri vevashandi. Vashandi vehurumende vakanga vambozivisa kuti vachaungana muHarare mangwanani eMuvhuro vasati vapinda mumigwagwa vachiratidzira, asi hurongwa uhwu hunonzi hwazosendekwa mushure mekunge masangano eTajamuka neNational Vendors Union Zimbabwe azivisa kuti aizopindirawo mukuratidzira uku. Izvi zvinonzi hazvina kutambirwa zvakanaka nemamwe masangano evashandi vehurumende, ayo anonzi akanga oti ave kubuda muhurongwa hwekuratidzira uhwu. Vashandi vehurumende vari kuda kuramwa mabasa vachinyunyuta nekunonoka kwehurumende kuvapa mabhonasi avo egore rapera. Zvichakadaro, musangano waitwa neChishanu pakati pevamiriri vehurumende nevamiriri vavanachiremba navanamukoti unonzi vapatsanura vashandi, mushure mekunge vanachiremba varamba kutambira zvauya nehurumende kumusangano uyu, ukuwo vanamukoti vachigamuchira nemaoko maviri. Vane ruzivo nezvemusangano uyu vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende yanga yati yowedzera vanachiremba nemadhora makumi manomwe nemashanu pamwedzi pamari dze on-call alloawance pamusoro pemadhora mazana maviri nemakumi masere ane madhora masere, asi vanachiremba vanonzi varamba mari. Hurumende inonzi yawedzerawo vanamukoti mari nemadhora gumi nemashanu pamwedzi, iyo inonzi yabva yangotambirwa nevamiriri venhengo idzi, izvo zvave kureva kuti vanamukoti vave kudzokera kumabasa vanachiremba vachienderera mberi nekuramwa mabasa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi revamiriri vesangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association,. Vanachiremba vari kuda kuti mari dzekubatsirika idzi dzisvike pamadhora mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri pamwedzi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi regurukota rezvehutano, VaDavid Parirenyatwa. No media source currently available
title: Zvinhu Zvoramba Zvakaomera Vashandi veHurumende

text: Svondo rino muchirongwa chedu ‘Hupenyu Hwedu’, tiri kutarisa nezvemabasa akanaka ari kuitwa nesangano reFrontline Zimbabwe, iro riri kubatsira vari pamberi mukurwisana pamwe nekudzvirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 kuguta reHarare. Imwe nhengo yeSangano iri, Muzvare Chipo Mashingaidze, vanoti sangano ravo riri kubatsira vanamukoti, vanachiremba, mapurisa, mauto pamwe nevashandi vekanzuru vari kushanda mumabasa akasiyanasiyana ane chekuita nekudzivirira chirwere charura pasi rose ichi kuburikidza nekuvatsvagira zvikwanisiro zvekupfeka vachiita mabasa avo ekurwisana neCovid-19. Muzvare Mashingaidze vanoti vari kuunganidzawo rubatsiro rwakasiyanasiyana rwunosanganisira mvura yekunwa pamwe nezvekudya. Vanoti sesangano, vari kubatsirawo zvakare vakwegura, vakaremara nevana vadiki vari kutungamira dzimhuri, uye vanoti kusvika pari zvino vabatsira mhuri dziri mumisha yeMbare neEpworth. Muzvare Mashingaidze vanoti sesangano vanotenda zvikuru vose vari kubatsira nenzira dzakasiyanasiyana kuti basa ravo rirambe richienderera mberi. Vanoti sangano ravo rakatangwa nevagari vakangozvipirawo kuti vabatsire mushure mekuona zviri kuitwa nevari kuzvipira kushanda vachidzivirira vana veZimbabwe kuti vasabatwa nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available
title: Sangano reFrontline ZW Rotungamira Mberi Mukubatsira Vari Kuzvipira Kurwisana neCovid-19

text: Dare repamusoro nhasi ranzwa chikumbiro chemudzimai wemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstanitno Chiwenga, Muzvare Marry Mubaiwa, chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo pamhosva dzavari kupomerwa dzekuda kuuraya murume wavo, kubuditsa mazakwatira emari yekunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo pamwe nekufojera mapepa emuchato. Mutongi wedare, VaPisirai Kwenda, vati vachatura mutongo wavo muzuva ravasina kutara vachiti vachaedza napose pavanogona napo kuti vakurumidze kutura mutongo wavo spakatariswa zvasvitswa kudare nhasi. Mashoko aya atsnhirwa nerimwe gweta raAmai Marry Mubayiwa VaTaona Nyamakura Vachisvisvitsa chikumbiro chekuti Muzvare Mubaiwa, vatongwe vachibva kumba panyaya yekunzi vaida kuuraya VaChiwenga vari muhurwere kuSouth Africa muna Chikumi, VaNyamakura vati mapepa evachuchusi ekupomera Muzvare Mubaiwa mhosva haana humbowo hwakati tsvikiti hwaari kuburitsa. VaNyamakura vati pakatariswa zviri mumapepa aya, mukana wekuti Muzvare Mubaiwa vagobatwa nemhosva pachatongwa nyaya iyi mushoma zvikuru. Vati hapana humbowo hwakataurwa nehurumende hunoratidza zvinonzi musungwa akaita aine chinangwa chekuuraya VaChiwenga. Gweta iri raburitsawo mudare mifananidzo yekukuvara kwakaita Muzvare Mubaiwa pakaputika bhambo kuWhite City Stadium pamusangano wakaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nevatsigiri vavo vakati hazvikodzere kuti Muzvare Mubaiwa varambe vari mujeri sezvo hutano hwavo husingaite kuti varambe vari muhusungwa. Izvi zvatsigirwawo netsamba kana kuti affidavit radhokotera akaongorora Muzvare Mubaiwa vari muhusungwa iro rakasvitswa kudare nemagweta avo. VaNyamakura vati nekukuvara kwavakaita, Muzvare Mubaiwa havanganzi vakakwanisa kusimudza munhu mukuru ane muviri unenge waVaChiwenga. Asi mumwe wevachuchisi eenyaya iyi, VaLovert Masuku, vati hurumende ine humbowo hwakanyanya hunoratidza kuti musungwa akapara mhosva uye anogona kutiza ozotadza kutongwa. VaMasuku vati hurumende haisi kuda kutaura zvakawanda panyaya yehumbowo hwainahwo hwavati hunosungirira musungwa vachiti kuita izvi kunogona kukonzera kuti musungwa asamiriire kutongwa kwemhosva yake. Vaenderera mberi vachiti Muzvare Mubaiwa munhu ane pfuma kuSouth Africa kwaanogona kutizira uye izvi zvinogona kuita zvakare kuti vasamirire kutongwa kwenyaya dzavo kana vakapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. Asi VaNyamakura vati hurumende yeZimbabwe neye South Africa dzakanyorerana chibvumirano chekuti munhu anenge achidiwa mumatare neimwe yenyika mbiri idzi nyika ine munhu anenge achidiwa kudare mune imwe inosungirwa kuunza munhu iyeye kunyika yaanenge achifanira kunotongwa, kana kuti extradition treaty, vachiti chikonzero chehurumende ichi hachisi chikonzero chakati tsvikiti. Vachitsigirawo chikumbiro ichi, rimwe remagweta aMuzvare Mubaiwa, Advocate Sylvester Hashiti, varamba mashoko erimwe remagweta ehurumende panyaya iyi, Amai Sharon Fero, ekuti Muzvare Mubaiwa vanogona kuvhiringidza vakafakazi pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekubuditsa mari yekunze kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo pamwe nekufojera mapepa ekuti vachatiswe nemurume wavo uye ainge ari muchipatara. Amai Fero vatiwo Muzvare Mubaiwa vanogona kusamirira kutongwa kwemhosva dzavari kupomerwa pakatariswa kureba kwemutongo yavakatarisana nayo kana vakabatwa nemhosva. VaHashiti vati hazvikwanisike kuti Muzvare Mubaiwa vavhingiridzane nevafakazi vane nyembe dzinotyisa vakafana naVaChiwenga avo vaimbova mukuru wemauto uye vavati vakakwanisa kunzvenga bhambu kuBulawayo kana, mukuru wevatongi vematare epamusoro munyika VaGeorge Chiweshe, munyori muJudicial Services Commission, VaWalter Chikwanha pamwe nemukuru wemamejasitiriti munyika VaMunamato Mutevedzi. Vatiwo bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinochengetedzawo musungwa pamhosva dzaari kupomerwa. Baba VaMuzvare Mubaiwa, VaKenny Mubaiwa vapawo mapepa emba yavo yekuHatfield kudare senzira yekuratidza kuti mwana wavo achazomirira kutongwa kwemhosva dzaari kupomerwa. No media source currently available
title: Amai Marry Mubaiwa Voramba Vari muHusungwa

text: Vamwe vatsigiri veMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, vari kuratidza kushushikana pamusoro penyaya yekuve nemubatanidzwa nemamwe mapato anopikisa. Vanoziva nezviri kuitika mubato iri vanoti vamwe vatsigiri vebato iri vakaudza mutungamiri wavo kuti havazi kufara nenyaya yekuti MDC-T iite mubatanidzwa nemamwe mapato, zvikuru kana zvichireva kuti vamwe vemamwe mapato aya vachazopiwa zvigaro zvepamusoro. VaTsvangirai, avo vakatanga misangano yavo yekunzwa zvinofungwa nevatsigiri vavo panyaya iyi nemusi weChishanu kuBeitbridge, vakazoita mimwe misangano miviri nemusi weMugovera nanezuro kuGwanda, vakabvuma kuStudio7 kuti nyaya yemubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa iri kutaurwa nezvayo zvakasimba. Asi vakati vanhu vakawanda vari kunzwisisa kukosha kwakaita kuti mapato anopikisa abatane, vakatiwo vane chivimbo chekuti vachakwanisa kutaurirana kusvika vanzwisisana panyaya iyi nevemamwe mapato anopikisa. VaTsvangirai vakatiwo vanhu vakawanda vari kushushikana nenyaya yekuti vechidiki vabve zera vakawanda munyika havade kuwanzovhota vakatiwo zvakakosha kuti vechidiki vose ava vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota musarudzo dzinotarisirwa kuitwa gore rinouya, vachiti kuvhota ndiyo chete nzira inoita kuti vechidiki vakwanise kubatsira kugadzirisa matambuzdiko ari munyika. Mautauriri weboka revechidki muMDC –T kuMatabeleland South, VaDennis Moyo, vakati zvakakosha kuti bato ravo riwane nzira dzekubatsira pamwe chete nekukurudzira vechidiki kuti vanyorese kuvhota. Sachigaro weboka revechidiki mubato reMDC-T, VaHappymore Chidziva, vakatsinhira kukosha kwakaita kuti vechidki vavhote, vakaudzawo Studio7 kuti boka ravo rakatanga chirongwa chekukurudzira vechidiki munyika kuti vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. VaTsvangirai vakatiwo zvimwe zvezvinhu zvakakosha zvataurwa nevanhu vakawanda kusvika pari zvino ipfungwa yekuti nyaya yeGukurahundi inofanirwa kugadziriswa, uye kutsutsumwa kweveruzhinji pamusoro pekusaririra kwakaita nzvimbo dzakawanda dzekumaruwa munyaya dzebudiriro. VaTsvangirai vakati bato ravo rinokoshesa kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzakachena. Vakati bato ravo, richishanda nemamwe mapato, riri kuenderera mberi richikurudzira kugadziriswa kwezvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana - kusanganisira mitemo-zvine chekuita nesarudzo, vachiti vane chivimbo chekuti veboka reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, vachagadzirisa zvose izvi sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzisati dzaitwa. VaTsvangirai vari kuenderera mberi nehurongwa hwavo hwekusangana nevanhu vakasiyana-siyana munyika uye svondo rino vanotarisirwa kuenda kuLupane Hwange neBinga vozoenda kudunhu reMidlands. No media source currently available
title: Vatsigiri veMDC-T Vopesana paNyaya yeMubatanidzwa weMapato

text: Mapurisa anonzi asunga vanhu gumi nevaviri vari kuratidzira vachigara pamwe nekurara muAfrica Unity Square kusanganisirawo vamwe vanga vachitengesa zvinhu vanga vari pedyo nenzvimbo iyi panguva iyi. Vasungwa ava vanga vachiri mumaoko emapurisa pataburitsa nyaya ino, uye vanga vasati varovererwa nemhosva. Chiitiko ichi chinotevera kusungwa kwevamwe varume vashanu vanoti Doctor Patson Dzamara, munin’ina waVaItai Dzamara, VaBrian Kasunzuma, VaPride Mukono, VaMakomborero Haruzivishe pamwe nemumwe murume anonzi Oliver. Varume vashanu ava vanonzi vari kupomerwa mhosva yekubira mamwe madzimai maviri anonzi akapfuura nemunzvimbo iyi usiku uhwu vachibvunza nzira yekuenda kwamurehwa. “Izvi zvaitika pakati peusiku chaipo. Pauya madzimai maviri echipurisa anga akapfeka nhumbi dzavo vaine zvimabhegi vachiti vari kutsvaga kunokwirirwa mabhazi ekuenda kwaMurehwa. Saka varaitdzwa kuna Fourth uko asi ivo vabva vaenda nerimwe divi,” nhengo yeOccupy Africa Unity Square Movement, VaCharles Nyoni vanodaro. Vanoti pashure madzimai aya azosangana nevarume vaviri vachibva vambotaura vose, mushure madzimai aya azotanga kumhanya achiti ave kubirwa.  “Ndipo pavabva vatanga kutiza vachiuya nekwatanga tiri, mapurisa angobuda muheji achibva angosvikobata Doctor Dzamara nevamwe vavo,” VaNyoni vanorondedzera. Vanoti varume vashanu ava vari kutarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare neChishanu mangwanani. Nhengo dzemasangano anosanganisira reZimbabwe Activists Alliance, Occupy Africa Unity Square Movement pamwe neZimbabwe Women in Politics Alliance dzakabatana nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe dziri kuratidzira kwemazuva gumi nematanhatu kunyunyuta kwadzo nekwadzinoti kutadza kutonga kwaVaMugabe. Chiitiko ichi chabatanawo nekusvitsa mwedzi gumi nemishanu mushure mekupambwa nekutsakatika kwaVaItai Dzamara, avo vairatidzirawo vari muAfrica Unity Square. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, hurongwa hwekuratidzira uhwu hwunonzi hwave kukanganiswa nekurwira hutungamiri kwave kuitika pakati pemasangano aya. Mumwe wevakatanga kuratidzira uku, Muzvare Lynnette Mudehwe veZimbabwe Activists Alliance vatenda kuti mune kusawirirana uye vanga vambomira kuenda kuAfrica Unity Square nekuda kwekusawirirana uku. “Pane vanhu vatakakoka kuti vauye tibatane navo ndivo vave kutinetsa nekuda kutiburitsa muchirongwa chatakatanga isu veZimabwe Actvists Alliance. Hazvifanirwe kuneg zvichiitika kudaro nekuti tinofanirwa kunge tichishanda pamwechete,” Muzvare Mudehwe vanodaro. Asi VaNyoni vanopomera Muzvare Mudehwe mhosva yekushanda nemasanganoe enhau ehurumende, vachiti kubva pavakashanyirwa nevatori venhau veZBC zvinhu havzina kuzombogadzikana. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Anosunga Varwiri veKodzero Vari Kuratidzira muAfrica Unity Square

text: Kunyange hazvo dare reHigh Court rakapa mutongo nemusi weMuvhuro wekuti hurumende iburitse mashoko akakwana pamusoro penzvimbo dzinoongorora Covid-19 pamwe nekurapwa kwevannhu vane denda iri, hurumende inoti mutongo uyu wauya apo hurumende yave kutoita izvi nechakare. Asi izvi zviri kupikiswa nenyanzvi munyaya dzehutano, vatori venhau neveruzhinji. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vaudza Studio7 kuti maonero ebazi ravo ndeekuti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vawane mashoko pamusoro peCovid-19 kuitira kuti vakwanise kuzvidzivirira pamwe nekudzivirira vamwe kubva kudenda iri. Zvimwe zvinodiwa nemutongo wedare kuti hurumende izivise veruzhinji kuti mhando yehutachiwana hweCovid-19 uhwo hune hukasha hwakabva kuSouth Africa hwave munyika here uye kuti vari kuitei nezvahwo. VaMangwana vati havagoni kuita izvi pari zvino. Mumashoko avo kudare mukuru anoona nezvekurapwa kwezvirwere mubazi rehutano, Dr Maxwell Hove, vakati bazi ravo rinoburitsa mashoko akakwana pamusoro peCovid-19 uye vanoshandisa mapenhau, nhepfenyuro nemadandemutande akasiyana kuita izvi. Vanotiwo manyepo kuti huwandu hwevanhu vari kuongororwa nekufa huri kuburitswa nehurumende ndehwemanyepo vachiti vanotaura izvi havazive zvinodiwa pakurwisana nedenda iri. Zvichakadai, zvisinei nemashoka aVaMangwana naDr Hove, veruzhinji vanoti havana ruzivo rwakakwana pamusoro penzvimbo dziri kuongororwa Covid-19. Mumwe mugari wepaMupandawana kwa Gutu, VaLast Mafuratidze, vati vazhinji vari murima pamusoro pudenda iri. VaMusekiwa Bhanire vekwaMtoko vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vachiziva kuti kune Covid-19 uye yakatombouraya vanhu munzvimbo iyi, havana ruzivo rwenzvimbo dziri kuitwa ongororo yedenda iri. Vatori venhau vanotiwo havawani mashoko avanoda nguva dzose pamusoro peCovid-19 kubva kuhurumende. Mupepeti webepanhau reHealth Times, VaMichael Gwarisa, vati mutongo weHigh Courtt wakakosha chose vachiti kana hurumende ikautevedza zvichabatsira vakawanda. Vatiwo vakuru vakuru mubazi rezvehutano nehofisi yemutungamiriri wenyika anoona nezveCovid-19 havaburitsi mashoko kunyange kuvatori vanhau. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa zvakare munyori anoona nezvehutano mubato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati ichokwadi kuti hurumende haisi kuburitsa mashoko akakwana pamusoro pekuongororwa kwedenda iri pamwe nevanhu vanenge vafa. Vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vari kurwaraeneCovid-19 vari kubirwa mari dzakawanda nekuda kwekuti hurumende haisi kubuda pachana pamusoro pekuti vanhu vane denda iri vanorapwa kuti uye sei. Dr Madzorera vatenda MISA-Zimbabwe nekuenda kudare vachiti vanovimba kuti izvi zvichaita kuti hurumende ibude pachena pamusoro peCovid-19. Dare repamusoro rakatura mutongo uyu mushure mekunge Media Institute of Southern Africa-Zimbabwe, yasvitsa chikumbiro chekuti bazi rezvehutano, bazi nebazi rekuburitswa kwemashoko anofanira kuburitsa mashoko akazara pamusoro pekuongororwa kwehCovid-19, kurapwa kwevanhu vane chirwere ichi pamwe nematanho ari kutwa kudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana uhwu. Muchikumbiro chayo, MISA-Zimbabwe yaidawo kuti mapazi aya azivise huwandu hwevanhu vane denda iri mumatunhu ese munyika, pamwe nehuhwandu hwevanhu vari kupinda munyika uye kuti vane Covid-19 here kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available
title: Dare rePamusoro Rinokomekedza Hurumende Kuzivisa Zvakazara Pamusoro peCovid-19

text: Murairidzi wechikwata chenhabvu chemaWarriors Sunday Chidzambwa adzoka kumusha kuzochema baba vake vakashaya nezuro achisiya vatevedzeri vake, Rahman Gumbo naLloyd Mutasa vachirairidza kumakwikwi eCosafa kuSouth Africa. Mutungamiri weZIFA VaFelton Kamambo vanoti sangano ravo raona zvakakodzera kuti murairidzi wechikwata chemaWarriors Mhofu ambopihwa mukana wekuchema baba vake avo vakashaya mushure mekurwara kwenguva yakareba. Chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors chiri kupinda munhandare yeMoses Mabhidha Stadium neChitatu kusangana neZambia muma semi fainari. Zimbabwe yakapinda mumasemi finals mushure mekurova Comoros 2-0, Zambia ichisvikawo muma semi fainari umu mushure mekurova Malawi nemapenareti. Mune mumwe mutambo wemasemi finals, Lesotho iri kutamba neBotswana musi mumwe chetewo. Zimbabwe irikuda kutora mukombe uyu kechinomwe uyezve kwemakore matatu akateverana. No media source currently available
title: Rahman Gumbo naLloyd Mutasa Votungamira Zimbabwe kuCosafa

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kukurudzira vanhu kuti vangwarire chikafu chavanodya sezvo kudzimwa dzimwa kwemagetsi kwave kupa kuti chimwe chikafu chiwore zvinova njodzi kuvanhu kana kuti food poisoning. Dambudziko iri rawedzerawo dambudziko rekushomeka kwemvura yakachena zvikuru mumaguta sezvo michina inochenesa mvura iri kudzimwawo. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga vanoti vanhu vakawanda vave kurwara nezvirwere zvemudumbu zviri kukonzerwa nekudya chikafu chinenge chave kuipa nekuda kwekusachengetedzwa zvakanaka sezvo mafiriji akawanda asiri kushanda zvakanaka nekudzimwa kwemagetsi. Vatiwo miriwo inodyiwa iri mimbishi nemichero yese zvayo ngaigezwe nemvura yakachena kudzivirira chirwere chemanyoka. Nyanzvi yehutano inoshanda iri pasi pekanzuru yeHarare VaJohn Manyara vakurudzirawo zvakare kuti vanhu vamhan'are kumahofisi avo kana varwariswa nemudumbu neckuda kwechikafu cavanenge vatenga. VaManyara vakurudzira vanhu kuti vasatenge chikafu panzvimbo dzisina kushambidzika. Vanomirira sangano reChitungwiza Residents Trust Muzvare Diana Kucheya vanoti vakatombonetsana nevamwe vanotengesa nyama muchitoro vatengeserwa nyama yakaora. Muzvare Kuvheya vanoti vakambonyorera kambani yemagetsi yeZESA tsamba kuti ivape nguva dzinotarisirwa kuuya nekuenda kwemagetsi asi hapana chakabuda. Ko munhu anoziva sei kuti adya chikafu chinenge chisina kuna ? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti kazhinji anonzwa kuda kurutsa, kurutsa, kuita manyoka anenge mvura, kunzwa mudumbu kana kudziya muviri. Izvi zvinokwanisa kuitika kwapera maawa mashoma munhu achanopedza kudya chikafu ichi. Vanhu vanokurudzirwa kuenda kunoona chiremba kana vakaramba vachirutsa, kuita tsvina ine ropa, kuita manyoka kwemazuva matatu kana kurwadziwa mudumbu zvakanyanyisa. Sangano reWorld Health Organisation rinoti vanhu zviuru mazana matanhatu, 600 000, kana kuti munhu mumwechete kubva mugumi, vanorwara nemudumbu mushure mokunge vadya chikafu chisina kuanaka. Sangano reWHO rinoti vanhu zviuru mazana mana nemakumi maviri, 420 000 vanofa pagore nematenda emudumbu aya. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Voyambirwa Kuti Vangwarire Kudya Chikafu Chakaora Sezvo Dambudziko reMagetsi Rawedzera

text: Sangano reZimbabwe Election Support Network, ZESN, rinoti pachine rwendo rwurefu panyaya yekugadzirisa mitemo yesarudzo. ZESN yakaongorora sarudzo yakaitwa kuWedza North neChishanu. VaDavid Musabayana veZanu-PF ndivo vakakunda musarudzo iyi mushure mekuwana mavhoti zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemakumi maviri. VaChikukwa Mudzingwa veNCA vakaita mavhoti zana nemakumi manomwe nesere, VaTichaona Makara veTransform Zimbabwe vakawana mavhoti zana nemakumi mana. VaPrecious Manimanzi veFreedom Front vakawana mavhoti makumi masere nemasere. Mutauriri weZanu-PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vanoti vari kufara kuti vakakunda zvine mutsindo. Chigaro ichi chakasara chisina mumiriri mushure mekushaya kwaVaSimon Musanhu veZanu-PF. ZESN Inoti kunyangwe hazvo sarudzo dzakaitwa murunyararo musi wekuvhota, pane mashoko ekuti vanhu vaiunganidzwa kuti vanovhota muzvikwata uye vachiudzwa pekuvhotera. Mugwaro rayo ZESN inoti vanhu vaishandisa tumapepa twekuvhotesa zvakakonzera mutauro musarudzo dzemuna 2013. Vanhu vane chitsama vainziwo vaizviti havakwanise kuvhota vachiuya nevaivabatsira. Mapato anopikisa makuru akaita seMDC-T ari kuramba kupinda musarudzo achiti mitemo yesarudzo inofanira kuvandudzwa zvizere. Asi zviri kubuda zvinoratidza kuti hapana zvizhinji zvachinja. Hatina kukwanisa kubata sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, amai Rita Makarau, kuti tinwe divi ravo. ZEC yakatiwo mamwe mapato madiki akapinda musarudzo idzi akatadza kuendesa vaongorori vesarudzo panzvimbo dzose dzaivhoterwa. Mutauriri webato reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, iro rakakwikwidza musarudzo idzi, VaMaddock Chivasa, vanoti ichokwadi kuti vanhu vaimanikidzwa kunovhotera Zanu-PF kuWedza North. No media source currently available
title: ZESN: Zvakawanda Zvinoda Kugadziriswa paNyaya yeSarudzo

text: Sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, riri kushora zvikuru danho rehurumende rekuda kuvandudza mutemo une chekuita nevashandi vari mubazi rezvehutano. Hurumende iri kuronga kuvandudza mutemo weHealth Services Act, izvo zvinonzi zvichaita kuti vashandi vose vezvehutano muzvipatara nemakirinika ehurumende varambidzwe kuramwa mabasa kwemazuva matatu akatevedzana. Muchiziviso chakaburitswa neChishanu chapfuura, hurumende yakati kana mutemo uyu wakabudirira kuvandudzwa, vashandi vezvehutano vanenge votarisirwa kutanga vazivisa nezvehurongwa hwekuda kuramwa mabasa mazuva maviri vasati vatora matanho, uye vachifanirwa kuramwa mabasa mazuva matatu mukati memasvondo maviri oga oga. Vamiriri vevashandi vanenge vawanikwa vaine mhosva yekuronga kana kukurudzira vamwe kuti varamwe mabasa vanonzi vachakandwa mujeri kwemakore matatu. Hurumende inoti iri kutora danho iri kugadzirisa zvinhu muboka rezvehutano, iro inoti ranga richikanganiswa mashandiro nekuramwa mabasa kwevashandi kusiri pamutemo. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi asi vachitaura nebepanhau reHerald, mumwe mukuru mubazi rezvehutano Dr. Maxwell Hove vakati mutemo uyu ukavandudzwa vashandi mubazi iri havabvumidzwe kuratidzira kanodarika mazuva matatu mumavhiki maviri. Asi munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti hazvisi zvitsva zvekuti hurumende inovandudza mitemo ichityora kodzero dzevashandi. VaMoyo vanoti sevanhu vanomirira vashandi, inyaya yavari kutorwisana nayo kuburikidza nekurwira kuti mutemo wezvevashandi, kana kuti Labour Act, uvandudzwe. Asi vanoti kuboka rezvehutano kwagara kuine gakava riripo kwemakore, izvo zvaita kuti hurumende ide kuisa mutemo wakadai wekuomesera vashandi vanenge vachiramwa mabasa. VaMoyo vanotiwo vashandi vose vanofanirwa kungobatwa nemutemo waakaenzana, kwete kuti hurumende iise vamwe mumapoka ainoti akakosha kudarika mamwe. No media source currently available
title: ZCTU Yoshora Hurongwa hweHurumende Hwekuda Kuvandudza Mutemo weHealth Services Act

text: Nyaya yekusungwa nekutongwa kwevanhu vatatu vachipomerwa mhosva yekushambadza manyepo yapesanisa maonero evanhu vakawanda munyika, vamwe vachiti hurumende iri kushandisa mutemo wakaraswa nedare repamurosorosoro reConstitutional Court muna 2014 kumbunyikidza kodzero dzevanoonekwa sevanoipikisa. Asi vamwe ndivo varii kuti kunyange hazvo dare rakati mutemo uyu uraswe, wakadzoswa zvakare mubumbiro remitemo idzva rakanyorwa muna 2013. Mumiriri weZengeza West muparamende, uye vari mutewedzeri wasachigaro veMDC Alliance, VaJob Sikhala, mutauriri weMDC Alliance Muzvare Fadzai Mahere vanove zvakare gweta, pamwe nemutori wenhau Hopewell Chin’ono, vakasungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekushambadza manyepo mushure mekufambisa vhidhiyo yevamwe amai vane mwana ainzi akarohwa nemupurisa akafa. Asi mapurisa akazobuda achiti mwana uyu haana kufa uye haana kurohwa nemupurisa uyu, uyo anonzi akarova girazi reimwe motokari yaitakura vanhu manzvimbo isingabvumidzwi. Gweta uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa mavhinga, vanoti hurumende iri kushungurudza vatatu ava sezvo dare reConstitutional Court rakati muna 2014 chikamu 31 (a)(iii) chemutemo weCriminal Law Codification Reform Act chaityora chikamu 24(5) chebumbiro remitemo raimboshandiswa kare muZimbabwe. Izvi zvaitevera kusungwa kwevatori venhau vaviri, Constantine Chimakure naVincent Kahiya vachipomerwa mhosva yekuburitsa nyaya yakanzi nehurumende yaive yemanyepo. Asi rimwe gweta uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, Doctor Simba Mavaza vanoti vanhu vari kuti mutemo uyu wakabviswa havana ruzivo rwakakwana kuti mutemo unorambidza kushambadzwa kwemanyepo uripo, hauna kumbobviswa. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi dzeMutemo Dzozeya Mutemo Uri Kushandiswa Kutonga VaSikhala, Chin'ono naMuzvare Mahere

text: Mhuri yeZimbabwe inogara muSouth Africa inoita zvemabhizimisi akasiyanasiyana neMugovera yakawaniswa mukana wekushambadza pamwe nekutengesa zvigadzirwa zvekumusha kuburikidza nemukana wemusika wekutengeserana wakaparurwa nesangano rezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, reProudly 263. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwemusika wekutengeserana uyu, mukuru wesangano iri, VaStan Makwara, vakati chinangwa chavo ndechekuda kusimudzira nekusimbaradza mhuri yeZimbabwe iri mune zvemabhizimisi achiri kusimukira. VaMakwara vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurongwa hwakadai hucharamba huchiitwa gore negore kusvikira paita budiriro inoonekera kunyika yeZimbabwe pamwe nemhuri yayo. Muzvare Sharon Ngwenya, avo vanobva kuBulawayo, ndemumwe weavo vaive pamusika wekutengeserana uyu vaine chinangwa chekuda kusimudzirawo bhizimusi ravo. Mumwe weavo vaivewo pamusika wekutengeserana uyu ndiAmai Chenai Mutsekwa, vanotungamirira kambani inogadzira zvakasiyanasiyana vachishandisa twumiti twunowanikwa pama ice cream. Mukuru wekambani yeMM Chemical Investments, Amai Gorejena, kana kuti Simangaliso Tsuro, vanoti vakatangisa kambani yavo yekugadzira mishonga nekuda kuratidza mamwe madzimai kuti izvi hazviitwe nevanhurume chete. Muzvare Sibongile Hwena, ndechimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chaivepowo pamusika wekutengeserana uyu, chichishambadza zvinoshandiswa pakubikisa, izvo zvinogadzirwa nekambani yavo. Vanoendererawo mberi vachiti kunyange hazvo vave nechavo chavanoti chekubata, vakatarisana nezvimhingamipinyi zvakasiyanasiyana mubhizimusi ravo. VaJabulani Zvinavashe, avo vanosona mbatya dzine nhoroondo yeZimbabwe uyewo nedzimwe nyika dziri muAfrica, ndemumwewo zvakare akawana mukana wekushambadza zvigadzirwa zvake pamusika wekutengeserana uyu. Kambani inoitawo zvekugadzira mishonga, nekuvaka, inotungamirirwa na VaBrighton Songore ndeimwe yakange iri kuratidzira mabasa ayo pamusika wekutengeserana uyu. Vashandi vepamuzinda weZimbabwe muSouth Aafrica vakati mumiriri weZimbabwe pamuzinda uyu, VaDavid Hamadziripi, ndivo vaifanira kunge vachiparura musika wekutengeserana uyu, asi havana kuzokwanisa kuvepo nekuda kwekubatikana. No media source currently available
title: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe muSouth Africa Zvinowaniswa Mukana weKushambadza Zvigadzirwa

text: Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato reZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vari kuyambira vari kuti mubato ravo maita makakatanwa nenyaya yehutungamiri kuti vari kuyedza rwizi nemakumbo. VaMugwadi vaudza Studio 7 kuti mashoko ari kutaurwa nevaive masachigaro ebato ravo kubazi revechidiki VaJim Kunaka nevave mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reFront for Economic Emancipation in Zimbabwe VaGodfrey Tsenengamu ekuti mutungamiri webato iri nenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanofanira kusiya basa imhosva inogona kuonekwa seyekuda kupidigura hurumende kana kuti “treason”. No media source currently available Asi VaKunaka vaudza Studio 7 kuti havangapindure zvataurwa navaMugwadi nekuti vaita mutete. Vati vanoda mutauriri webato VaChris Mutsvangwa nevamwe vakuru VaMugwadi vachivhiya havo mbudzi . VaTsenengamu vati havachunduke kutyisidzirwa naVaMugwadi No media source currently available Vachitaura nevatori venhau, VaKunaka vakati VaMnangagwa vanofanira kusiira chigaro mutevedzeri wavo VaConstantino Chiwenga sechitsidzo chavanonzi vakaita kuti vachatonga kwemakore mashanu chete pakapidigurwa hurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemauto muna 2017. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vanoti mubato reZanu-PF hamuna kugadzikana nenyaya yehutungamiri vamwe vachinzi vari kutsigira VaMnangagwa vamwe vachitsigira VaChiwenga. Kusagadzikana munyaya dzezvehupfumi ndiko kunonzi kuri kupa kuti vamwe mubato reZanu-PF varare vakasvinura vachityira kukundwa musarudzo dza2023 nebato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change. Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reMass Public Opinion Institute (MPOI) inoratidza kuti sarudzo dzikaitwa nhasi, mutungamiri weCCC VaNelson Chamisa vanokunda VaMnangagwa musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika. VaChamisa vanonzi vane rutsigiro rwevanhu zvikamu makumi matatu nematatu kubva muzana kana kuti 33%, VaMnangagwa vane zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana kana kuti 30%.
title: Zanu-PF Yoramba Kuti VaMnangagwa naVaChiwenga Ava Makara Asionane

text: Mutauriri weMDC VaObert Gutu vanoti bato rinonzwisisa zvichemo zvevana veZimbabwe vakaratidzira kuBeitbridge nemusi weChishanu. Mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau, VaGutu vati hurumende yakaresva apo yakarambidza varombo kuti vapinze zvinhu munyika zviri kuvararamisa. Vati Zanu-PF yakundikana kuwanira vanhu mabasa nenyaya yehuori hunotyisa uye nekutadza kutonga. VaGutu vati mamiriyoni evanhu muZimbabwe ave kurarama nekutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa uye kuda kuvarambidza kutadza kunzwisisa matambudziko avakatarisana nawo. Kuratidzira kwakaitwa nemusi weChishanu kuBeitbridge kwakasiya imba inochengeterwa zvinhu neZIMRA yatsva uye bhodha rakambovharwa kwemaawa akawanda. Asi neMugovera range rave kushanda asi zvinhu zvichiratidza kuti hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Zvichakadaro, vanoona nezvehupfumi mubato iri VaTapiwa Mashakada vakurudzira hurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe kuti ibude pachena kuti haina mari yekudzorera zvikwereti zvemabhanga makuru anokweretesa mari akaita seInternational Monetary Fund neWorld Bank. Vachitaura pamusangano wavakaita nevatori venhau muHarare svondo rino vanoona nezvehupfumi mubato iri VaTapiwa Mashakada vakati nyika yazogwadama uye kuda kuparurwa kwemari yemabond notes pamwe nekusapa vanhu mari dzavo dziri mumabhanga hazvigadzise nyika iyo yoenda kumawere. VaMashakada vanoti bhanga reIMF rinenge richingoda mari yaro uye haritarise kutambura kunenge kuchiitwa munyika kusvika nyika yazvibudira pachena kuti haina mari inonzi pachirungu Highly Indebted Poor Country (HIPC). Zimbabwe ine chikwereti chinosvika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora VaMashaka vanotiwo hurumende inofanirwawo kubvisa mutemo wekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema kuti iwane mari dzinobva kunze kwenyika. VaTakanayi Mureyi vanoona nezvekusimudzirwa kwemakambani nekutengeserana kubato reMDC vashoropodzawo hurumende yaVaMugabe nemutemo wavakaisa kumisa zvinhu zvinotengwa kunze kwenyika zvizhinji zvacho zvichibva kunyika yeSouth Africa. Zvimwe zvezvinhu zvakuda rezinesi kupinza munyika zvinosanganisira mubhedha, beans, mukaka wekuisa mutea, mvura, dovi, maheu, mafuta ekuzora akadai secamphor nezvimwewo. Asi vaAndrew Tsiga mumwe muzvinabhizimusi muHarare varumbidza hurumende mukutora matanho ekurambidza zvinobva kunze vakati zvinogona kubatsira kuti makambani asimukire. Asi vaTsiga vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti itange yaongorora mamiriro akaita makambani munyika nekuti angabatsirwa sei vasati vatanga kurambidza zvinobva kunze kwenyika. Gurukota rezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vari kumhanya-mhanya kuda kubhadhara chikwereti chenyika asi zvipatara hazvina mishonga uye hurumende yave kuomerwa zvakanyanya. No media source currently available
title: MDC Inoti Hurumende yaVaMugabe Inofanira Kubvuma Kuti Yakundikana

text: Sangano reInternational Monetary Fund, IMF, rinoti dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica dziri kuratidza kuti hupfumi hwadzo huri kukwirira zvikuru asi ichiyambira zvakare kuti zvikwereti zvenyika idzi zviri kunyanyawo kukwira, izvo zvichakonzera matambudziko. IMF yadoma nyika nhanhatu dzinoti Chad, Eritrea, Mozambique, Congo Republic, South Sudan neZimbabwe, senyika dzakatarisana nematambudziko munyaya dzezvehupfumi nekuda kwekukwereta mari zhinji. Mashoko aya anouya panguva iyo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kushanya kuQatar, uko vanonzi vakanyorerana zvibvumirano zvizhinji nehurumende pamwe nevemabhizumisi veko. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti Zimbabwe inofanira kuchenjerera zvainosaina nekuti zvingazonetsa nyika mazuva ari kuuya. Imwe yenyanzvi idzi, Professor Elliot Masocha, avo vanodzidzisa zvehupfumi paDevry University kuOhio muAmerica, vanoti Zimbabwe haigoni kubudirira nemari yekukwereta uye inofanira kuita zvekusarudza zvinhu zvine basa zvinoita kuti nyika ibudirire, kwete kukwereta mari dzisingaoneke kuti dzashandiswa papi. No media source currently available
title: IMF Yodoma Zimbabwe Seimwe yeNyika dzemuAfrica Dzinotyirwa Kuti dzichatambudzwa neZvikwereti

text: Kurwisana pakati peRussia neUkraine kuri kuenderera mberi Russia ichiti mauto eUkraine mazana mapfumbamwe ange asara chirwisa panzvimbo yeAzovstal steel plant akanda zvombo pasi. Asi Ukraine inoti mauto mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu ndivo vakanda zvombo pasi. Izvi zvave kureva kuti Russia yakwanisa kutora dunhu reMariupol. Vanhu zviuru makumi maviri vanonzi vakafa mudunhu iri. Zvichakadaro, vamiriri veFinland neSweden vaendesa magwaro ekuti nyika idzi dzave kuda kuve nhengo dzegungano reNATO rine nyika dzekuEurope dzakawanda pamwe neAmerica. Izvi zviri kuitika kunyangwe Russia yambenge yayambira nyika idzi kuti kuita izvi kuzvisikira moto muziso. Hondo yekurwiswa kweRussia ne Ukraine yapa kuti zvinhu zvitadze kugadzikana munyika dzakawanda kusanganisira muZimbabwe iyo yagara ichitatarika munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Nyanzvi inowona nezve nyaya dzematongerwo enyika nezvemabhizimusi Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha vanodzidzisa paDevry University kuOhio muno muAmerica vanoti nyika dzizhinji dziri kuwuwira munyaya dzekushaikwa kwegorosi nezvimwewo pamusoro pehondo iyi. No media source currently available
title: Russia Yotora Guta Rose reMariupol muUkraine

text: Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, vanoti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatambira chikumbiro chavo chekuti vambopa mavhiki maviri mabhanga evemabhizimisi vanonzi vakaburitsa mari zvisiri pamutemo nguva yekuti vagadzirise mapepa avo. Nguva yekudzoswa kwemari iyi yange yapera musi wa 28 Kukadzi asi zvanzi zvizopetwa musi wa 16 Kurume mazita evanenge vasina kunge vaunza mari ozoburitswa pachena musi wa 19 Kukadzi. Zvinonzi pane nyaya dzekuburitsa mari zvisiri pamutemo dzinosvika churu nezana nemakumi matanhatu nematanhatu dziri kuzivikanwa dzine mari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu. RBZ inoti kusvika pari zvino ine nyaya zana neshanu dzine mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu emadhora dzapera kuongororwa mari ichidzorwa. Mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau nemusi weChishanu, VaMnangagwa vakatenda kuti vainge vapa Doctor Mangudya nguva yavakumbira yekukwenenzvera mapepa. Doctor John Mangudya vanoti vari kufara zvikuru nehuwandu hwevanhu vadzora mari kusvika parizvino. No media source currently available Asi vanotungamira bato rinopikisa rePepople's Democratic Party uye vaimbova gurukota rezvemari, VaTendai Biti, vanoti zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvinonetsa pamutemo sezvo zviri kuitwa zvichityora bumbiro remutemo. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoronga Kufumura veMabhizimisi Vakaburitsa Mari Kunze Zvisiri paMutemo

text: Bazi rehurumende rinoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko muEgypt razivisa kuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaHosni Mubarak, vashaya nhasi. Vange vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nerimwe. VaMubarak vakatungamira nyika iyi kwemakore makumi matatu kubva muna 1981 kusvikira vabviswa pachigaro muna 2011 mushure mekunge vanhu varatidzira zvakasimba kwemazuva gumi nemasere. VaMubarak vakatanga vari mumauto emuchadenga vasati vatungamira mauto aya vachizoita mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika. Vakazoitwa mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaAnwar Sadat muna 1975. Vakazotanga kutungamira nyika muna 1981 mushure mekunge vanopfurikidza mwero vechi Islamist vauraya VaSadat. Muna 2012 VaMubarak vakatongwa ndokutongerwa kugara mujeri kwehupenyu hwavo hwose mushure mekubatwa nemhosva yekuponda vanhu vairatidzira. asi vakazonzi nedare repamusoro havana mhosva. Muna 2015 vakabatwazve neimwe mhosva yehuori vakanzi vagare mujeri kwemakore matatu asi vakazosunungurwa muna 2017. VaMubarak vaidyidzanawo zvakanyanya nevaive mutungamiri weZimbabwe, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vaiwanzoenda neku Egypt munzendo dzavo kumisangano yeUnited Nations ku New York. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vashoma vachachema VaMubarak nekuti kutonga kwavo kwakange kusiri kwe jekerere uye vakange vachiomesera vanhu zvikuru. Doctor Runhanya vati zvizhinji zvaiitwa naVaMubarak kuvanhu vavo ndizvo zvaiitwavo naVaMugabe muZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: Vaimbove Mutungamiri we Egypt, VaHosni Mubarak Vanoshaya

text: Vadzidzi vabva kuzvikoro zvepamusoro soro zvakasiyana-siyana vachitsigira bato re MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai vaungana neChishanu muHarare vachiparura chirongwa chekuti vadzidzi vakurudzirane kunonyoresa kunovhota pamwe nekuvhota musarudzo dza2018. Chirongwa chaparurwa ichi chinonzi Hashtag Mudzidzivhota, Sifundivota muNdebele, uye Studentvote muChirungu. Mumwe mudzidzi anodzidza kuChinhoyi University of Technology, Muzvare Netsai Marova, anoti chinagwa chavo ndechekuunganidzana sevechidiki kuti vakurudzirane kunonyoresa kunovhota. Chirongwa ichi chakarongwa pasi peboka rinomiririra vadzidzi rinonzi Students Council. Munyori muboka iri, Muzvare Memory Chitambo, vati chirongwa chavo charongwa nevanotsigira MDC T, vaine chinangwa chekukurudzira vadzidzi vese kuti vanovhota. Muzvare Chitambo vati vadzidzi vanodawo kuisa pachigaro hurumende inonzwisisa zvido zvavo. Mumwe mudzidzi, VaStephen Sarkozy Chuma, vatiwo magwaro mazhinji anoratidza kuti vechidiki vashoma shoma vakavhota musarudzo dza2013. VaChuma vati izvi zvinosuwisa nekuti vechidiki ndivo vakawanda munyika uye ndivo vakatarisana nematambudziko ekuondomoka kwehupfumi. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko murimwe sangano rinomiririra vadzidzi reZimbabwe National Students Union, VaZivai Mhetu, vatikunyange hazvo sesangano vasina bato ravakarerekera, vanokurudzira vavhoti kunovhota. Mukuru wevechidiki muMDC T-Youth Assembly, VaHappymore Chidziva, vaudzawo vechidiki ava kuti vakasataura musarudzo dza2018 vanenge vaparara. VaChidziva vatiwo semutungamiriri wechidiki vanofara kana vechidiki vachironga zvekukurudzirana kunovhota musarudzo. Mapato ezvematongerwo enyika ari kuita zvirongwa zvakasiyana-siyana zvekuedza kukwezva vechidiki kuti vavhote musarudzo dzegore rinouya. No media source currently available
title: #Mudzidzivhota Inoparurwa neVadzidzi muHarare

text: Muimbi ane mukurumbira munyika, Bob “Headmaster” Nyabinde, anoti haachaona zvichitevera kurwara kwenguva yakareba nechirwere cheshuga, asi asingazive kuti aive nechirwere ichi. Nyabinde, uyo akamboshanda semukuru wechimwe chikoro kuKwekwe, anoti vanhu vanofanirwa kupota vachiongororwa hutano hwavo nguva dzose, sezvo zvimwe zvirwere zvichizoonekwa zvakomba kana munhu asingaongororwe hutano hwake. Nyabinde anoti akamboyambirwa nemumwe chiremba aiva amuona achinwa zvinwiwa zvinotapira, asi haana kuzviteerera nguva iyoyo nokuti pfungwa dzake dzaiva dzakatarisana nekuridza mumanzi chete. Nyabinde anoti akazoenda kunoongororwa nenyanzvi dzehutano mushure mokunge atadza kuimba kuLeopard Rock Motel, mudunhu reManicaland zvikaonekwa kuti maziso ake aiva atokuvara zvokusarapika. Nyabinde anoti kunyange hazvo ave bofu, haana kuregedza kuimba, kunyangwe hazvo pari zvino asiri kuimba nepamusana pachirwere cheCovid 19 icho chakatekeshera pasi rose. Mumwe murume akasangana nedambudziko raNyabinde VaSendiso Ndlovu, avo vanoshanda nesangano reSayWhat, vanoti vakaitawo bofu mugore 2008 vaine makore makumi mmaviri nemanomwe mushure mokunge vapedza dzidzo yepamusoro soro paUniversity of Zimbabwe. VaNdlovu vanoti vakaona nyanzvi inorapa maziso, Dr Solomon Guramatunhu, avo vakavaudza kuti maziso avo aisazoona nokuti aiva akuvara nechirwere cheshuga zvokuti vave kufamba nemubatsiri. Vachitaura pamusangano weZimbabwe National Practictioners Association, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvirwere zvemaziso, Amai Susan Shonhiwa, vakakurudzira vanorapa kuti vakurumidze kuudza varapwi vavo kuti vaende kuzvipatara kune nyanzvi zvirwere izvi zvisati zvakomba. Sangano reDiabetic Association of Zimbabwe rinoti nepamusana pekuti vanhu vakawanda havaongororwi chirwere cheshuga, ndizvo zvakwidzawo matenda emoyo, hupofu, nekugurwa kwemakumbo. Ongororo yakaitwa nebazi rezvehutano inoratidza kuti munhu mumwe chete kubva muvanhu gumi munyika, ane chirwere cheshuga. Mutevedzeri wemukuru anoona nazvematenda asingatapuriranwe mubazi rehutano, Dr Justice Mudavanhu, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekupinda munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana ichichenjedza veruzhinji maererano nezvechirwere cheshuga nokuti zvakaonekwa kuti vanhu vanonyanya kurwara nedenda reCovid 19 vanhu vane matenda eshuga nezvirwere zvemoyo.
title: Muimbi Bob Nyabinde Anoti Ave Bofu neKuda kweChirwere cheShuga

text: Mune chiitiko chaita kuti nyika yose izevezane, mumwe murume wekuChisuko kuHonde Valley mudunhu reManicaland, Morris Muchena, akapedza mwedzi gumi nemitanhatu achizviti munhukadzi mushure mekunge aroorwa naAndrew Chafa wemubhuku rekwaMadzinga, kwakare kuHonde Valley akatopembererwa usiku hwese. Morris akanga achizivikanwa nevekwaakanga aroorwa sa 'Emily Muswere' achizviti aibva kwaMurehwa. Asika, vakuru vakati “rine manyanga hariputirwi.” Izvi ndizvo zvakazoitika kunaMorris sezvo chokwadi chakazoguma chabuda avarairwa. Sabhuku Madzinga, VaWebster Mhuru, vemumusha mainge maroorwa Morris, vanoti murume uyu akazofumurwa mushure memutambo wenhabvu yemakumbo wakatambwa pakati pemadzimai emubhuku ravo nemadzimai ekuChisuko. Mushure mekunge Morris ashaina achiratidza zvidovado zvake munhandare zvakanwisa veruzhinji mvura, mumwe mudzimai wekuChisuko anonzi ndiye akazowurura gure achitonhodza vekwaMadzinga vakanga vovhaira nekuve nemutambi airova nhabvu yepamusoro achiti 'Emily' aive munhurume waakatodzidza naye achinzi Morris. Sabhuku Madzinga vanoti shoko iri rakazosvika kumusha kwaMorris izvo zvakazoita kuti hanzvadzi yaMorris iende kubhuku kwavo kunozvionera oga shura raainzwa rekuti ndikwo kwainge kwogara munhu wavaitsvaga kwemakore maviri ose asi vasingazivi kuti aive muberere mavo. Pakutanga Morris anonzi akamboramba kuti akanga asingazivi hanzvadzi yake iyi, asi akazobvuma mushure mekunge akonwa nenyaya. Achiedza kupukunyura, Morris anonzi akazoti akanga achitevera chitendero che Satanism izvo zvaiita kuti ange achiita semunhukadzi. Panguva iyi murume wa’Emily’, Andrew, anonzi aive kuHarare uko akazoziviswawo nezvenyaya iyi. Andrew anonzi akaratidzwa kukatyamadzwawo nazvo achibva angoti muchato ngaupere, vachibva vaita aziva kwake aziva kwake. Asi sezvo nyaya iyi yakanga yasvitswa kare munzeve dzavanamugaradzakasungwa, vaviri ava vanonzi naSabhuku Madzinga vakabva vangotorwa nemapurisa, uko vanonzi vachiri kubvunzurudzwa uye vanogona kupomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehungochani. Ukuwo, Sabhuku Madzinga vanoti vaviri ava kana vadzoka kubva kumapurisa zvisineyi kuti vawanikwa vaine mhosva here kana kuti kwete, vanovadawo kudare ravo sezvo vakaita chisionekwi mudzi webhwe nekukanganisa dunhu ravo kwavakaita. Vanoti vachatoita chivanhu chekuchenura dunhu ravo kubva kuchipini chakaitwa nevaviri ava. Mutemo weZimbabwe haubvumidze chingochani, izvo zvinogona kuita kuti Morris naAndrew vatongwe. No media source currently available
title: Murume wekuChisuko, kuHonde Valley, Anopedza Mwedzi Gumi neMitanhatu Achizviti Munhukadzi Mushure meKuroorwa

text: Mushure mekupedza nguva yakareba pachinakurirwa nyoka mhenyu nenyaya yekuita musangano unounza pamwe chete vashandi, vashandirwi nehurumende weTripartite Negotiating Forum, musangano uyu wave kutarisirwa kuitwa vhiki rinouya nemusi wa 5 Kukadzi. Munyori mukuru wesangano reZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti musangano wange wakamirirwa wave kuzoitwa mushure mekupera kwegadziriro yange ichiitwa. Mukuru weEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe Industries, Doctor Israel Murefu, vatenderana naVaMoyo nezvezuva iri. VaMoyo vanoti vashandi vanoda kuti vasambunyikidzirwe kodzero dzavo panenge poitwa nhaurirano idzi. Kudivi revashandi, VaMurefu vanoti vari kuda kuti nyaya yemari igadziriswe sezvo dhora remunyika riri kuramba richishaya simba. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti zvakakosha kutaura nyaya yemari iyi muTNF. Gurukota rezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vanoti vari kuda kuti paparurwe hofisi inenge yakamirira TNF. Vanoti vakatoisa chikumbiro kuti vabatsirwe nemari neInternational Labor Organization. VaMavima, VaMurefu naVaMoyo pari zvino vari kuVictoria Falls kumusangano uri kukokerwa neInternational Labour Organization. Gore rapera mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakaisa runyoro rwavo pachibvumirano cheTNF kuti uve mutemo nechinangwa chekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawere. No media source currently available
title: Musangano weTNF Wotanga Svondo Rinouya

text: Huwandu hwevanhu vashaya mutsaona dzemumigwagwa kubva pazororo reIndependence nemusi weChina, pamwechete neChishanu cheGood Friday kusvika neEaster Sunday hwasvika pagumi nevanomwe. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assitant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vanoti vanhu vatanhatu vakafa nemusi weChina, kuchitiwo vamwe gumi vakashaya nemusi weChishanu pakatanga zororo reEaster. Assistant Commissioner Nyathi vanoti tsaona idzi dzinosanganisirawo dzevanhu vaitsikwa vatyairi vachibva vatiza panzvimbo. Vanotiwo tsaona idzi dzinoratidza kuti vatyairi vainge vasina kuisa pfungwa dzavo pane zvavaiitia, zvekufamba mumugwagwa. Assistant Commisioner Nyathi vanoti nguva imwecheteyo gore rapera vanhu makumi maviri nemumwe vakashaya, zvichiratidza kuti gore rino tsaona idzi dzakakadzikira nevanhu vana. Vanoti kuderera kwetsaona uku kuri kubatsirwawo nekuwanda kwemapurisa ari mumigwagwa, pamwe nedzidziso dzavari kupa kuvatyairi nevafambi vachishanda pamwe nemamwe mapoka anoti reTraffic Safety Council, VID pamwe nevashandi vebazi rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Anoti Vanhu Vafa muTsaona dzemuMigwagwa Vsvika paGumi neVanomwe

text: Zvikoro zvakavhurwa neMuvhuro vamwe vabereki vachiti vari kutadza kubhadhara mari dzechikoro zvimwe zvikoro zvichipfudzira mberi zuva rekuvhurwa kwechikoro. Vabereki vazhinji vanoti vatadza kubhadhara mari dzechikoro sezvo nguva yavakapihwa kugadzirira kuvhurwa kwezvikoro iri shoma zvikuru. Mumwe mubereki, Amai Marcia Murombedzi vati havana kana pekutangira zvaita kuti mwana wavo atadze kuenda kuchikoro. Mumwe mubereki, Amai Nancy Muronda, vati kunyange hazvo mwana wavo aenda kuchikoro, havasi kufara kuti kuchikoro chacho hachina kugadzirira zvakakwana kuti vana vasabatwe nechirwere cheCovid19. Amai Vimbai Mushangwe mmwewo mubereki ane mwana anodzidza pane chimwe chikoro chiri kuMarondera vati dai vakuru vezvikoro vambomira kudzinga vana muzvikoro pamusana pemari dzechikoro. VaWilbert Gondongwe avo vane mwana asiri kunyora bvunzo uyo akatarisirwawo kutanga chikoro nevamwe svondo rinouya sekutarwa kwazvakaitwa nehurumende vatiwo dai hurumende yavapawo mukana wekuti vatsvage mari dzechikoro vana vachidzidza zvavo. VaMalvin Chambati vanotiwo vaswera vachitsvaga ma yunifomu evana vavo asi mari yavo yanga isiri kukwana. Kunyange hazvo vabereki vachiti vakapihwa nguva shoma, gurukota redzidzo VaCain Mathema vakaudza nhepfenyuro yeZBC svondo rapera kuti nguva yavakapa vabereki yakawandisa zvikuru sezvo vachiti hurumende yakataura pakavharwa zvikoro muna Chikumi kuti vabereki vagare vakagadzirira kuvhurwa kwezvikoro. Zvichakadaro, vamwe vadzidzisi vanonzi vanga vasiri muzvikoro sezvo vachiti havana mari dzinovakwanira. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano rinomirira vadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti varairidzi vaenda kuzvikoro vashomananana sezvo vasina mari dzinokwana kuti vabhadhararire vavo. VaZhou vatiwo varairidzi vakawanda havasati vabaiwa nhomba dzeCovid 19 zvinopinza vadzidzisi nevana vechikoro panjodzi kana vari muzvikoro. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe VaObert Masaraure vati nheno dzavo dzatanga nekuratidzira mamiriro akaita zvinhu muzvikoro. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMathema pamwe negurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo VaMathema vanga vachiti vakabatikana ukuwo vanga vachidaira nhare muhofisi maVaChiwenga vanga vachitiwo vanga vasiri muhofisi. Zviimwe zvikoro zvatumira vabereki matsamba panharembozha dzavo dzichivazivisa kuti zviri kutarisira vana kuti vange vave muzvikoro izvi panopera zuva mangwana kuitira kuti vana vazotanga kudzidza neChitatu zvichimbopawo vabereki nguva yekunyatsogarira vana vavo zvakakwana.
title: Zvikoro Zvovhurwa Paine Kunyunyuta kweVamwe Vabereki neVarairidzi

text: Sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights riri kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirisa nechimbichimbi dambudziko riri kukonzera kushaikwa kwemishonga muzvipatara nezvitoro zvemishonga zvemunyika. Mutauriri wesangano iri Doctor Fortune Nyamande, avo vari kuita zvidzidzo zvepamusorosoro paUmea University kuSweden, vanoti kushaikwa kwemishonga munyika kwave kuita kuti vezvitoro zvinotengesa mishonga pamwe nezvimwe zvipatara vakwidze mitengo. Doctor Nyamande vanoti zvimwe zvipatara pamwe nezvitoro zvemishonga vave kuramba kutambira varwere vanenge vachida kushandisa makadhi kana kuti medical aid cards. Vanoti hurumende ndiyo chete inokwanisa kugadzirisa dambudziko iri, iro rinonzi riri kukonzerwa nekushaikwa kwemari yekunze, uye vari kukurdzirawo kuti zvinhu zvodzokere pekare paya pekuti makambani emunyika akaita seCaps, Varichem nemamwe, vagadzire ivo mishonga pane kutenga kunze. Vanotengesa mishonga vanonzi vari kuti havasi kuwana mari yekunze inovakwanira kuti vakwanise kupinza mishonga iyi munyika. Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa divi rehurumende kanawo RBZ panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kugadzirisa Dambudziko reKushaikwa kweMishonga Munyika

text: Mutongi wedare repamusoro muBulawayo, Justice Francis Bere, varasa chikumbiro chechimbi-chimbi chebato reMDC -T inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa chekuti Muzvare Thokozani Khupe nevamwe vavo vasashandise zita rebato reMDC- T. VaBere vati chikumbiro chechikwata cheMDC T yaVaChamisa hachingawonekwe sechechimbi-chimbi sezvo paine makakatanwa pakati pechikwata ichi nechinotungamirwa naMuzvare Khupe ekuti ndechipi chikwata chaicho pakati pezviviri izvi chine kodzero yekunzi ndicho MDC-T yechokwadi. Dare ratiwo chikwata chaVaChamisa chakakwidza nyaya iyi mudare chibvise mari yekabhadhara magweta nechikwata chaMuzvare Khupe icho chaipikisa nyaya iyi. Gweta raMuzvare Khupe, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vati vafara nemutongo wedare nekuti zvagara zviri pachena kuti pari zvino pazvikwata zviviri zveMDC T hapana chine kodzero yekuudza chimwe zvekuita. VaMadhuku vati zvaturwa mudare zvinosimbisa nyaya yavakakwidza kudare reConstitutional Court yekupikisa kudzingwa kwaMuzvare Khupe kubva mudare reparamende vachiti MDC-T yaVaChamisa yange isina kodzero yekuita zvayakaita. MDC-T inotungamirwa naVaChamisa yaive yakwira kudare mushure mekunge Muzvare Khupe vanyora tsamba kuZimbabwe Electoral Commission vachiti ndivo mutungamiri chaiye weMDC-T. Gweta reMDC T inotungamirwa naVaChamisa, VaLucas Nkomo, vati havana kufadzwa nemutongo waturwa naJustice Bere vakati vachaona kuti vokwira kudare reSupreme Court kana kuti kwete mushure mekuona mutongo waturwa naVaBere zvizere. VaNkomo vati sezvo sarudzo dzave pedyo, kuti zvikwata zviviri zveMDC T izvi zvirambe zvichishandisa zita rimwe chete kunogona kuvhiringidza vamwe vatsigiri pakuziva kuti bato ravo chairo nderipi. VaJameson Timba avo vanove nhengo yenational council yechikwata cheMDC T Chamisa vati vachatura kubato ravo zvabuda mudare uye vachaziva kuti votora gwara ripi mushure mekunge national council yebato iri yagara pasi mangwana ichizeya nyaya iyi. Muzvare Khupe, avo vanoti ndivo vane kodzero yekutungamira MDC-T mushure mekufa kwaVaMorgan Tsvangirai, vakadomwa kuve mutungamiri wechikwata chavo cheMDC T pakongiresi yechimbi-chimbi yakaitwa nemusi weMugovera. MDC-T izita raishandiswa munguva yesarudzo neMDC panguva iyo yaitungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai vasati vafa. Izvi zvakaitirwa kuti vatsigiri vaVaTsvangirai vazive pekuvhotera zvichitevera kupatsanuka kwebato iri muna 2005. Musarudzo dza 2008 ne 2013,VaWelshman Ncube nebato ravo vakakwikwidza vachishandisa zita rekuti MDC, ukuwo VaTsvangirai vakashandisa zita rekuti MDC-T, asi zita chairo rebato riri MDC.
title: Dare Rinorasa Chikumbiro chaVaChamisa Chekuti Muzvare Khupe Vasashandise Zita reMDC-T

text: Vachitaura pamhemberero dzeWorld Press Freedom Day dzarongwa nesangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa-Zimbabwe vati havakwanisi kutaura kuti mitemo mitsva yekuvandudza mutemo weAccess to Information and Protection of Privacy Act uchavandudzwa rinhi. Asi vati vane chivimbo chekuti zvinogona kuitwa mukupera kwegore sezvo hurumende iri kuda kuti mitemo yose ienderane nebumbiro guru remutemo. Rimwe gweta VaChris Mhike vanotiwo zvinosuwisa kuti vatori venhau vari kupemberera zuva rekuburitswa kwenhau (World Press Freedom Day) pasina Broadcasting Authority of Zimbabwe inofanirwa kupa marezinesi ekutepfenyura . Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa-Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo,vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti apo iri kushandura mitemo itevedzerewo mitemo nezvibvumirano zvinoitwa nemamwe masangano akaita seUnited Nations. VaMoyo vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kubvumidza vemabhizimusi vekunze kuti vawane zvikamu zvinodarika makumi maviri kubva muzana mumakambani anoita zvekutepfenyura. VaMoyo vakurudzirawo vatori venhau kuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo. World Press Freedom Day inocherechedzwa musi wa3 Chivabvu gore rega rega sekutarwa kwazvakaitwa nesangano reUnited Nations. MISA yapemberera zuva iri pasi pedingindira rinotarisa zvingaitwe kubatsira hutongo hwejekeerere mudunhu rekuchamhembe kweAfrica nemunyika dzose dzevatema kana kuti Regional and Continental Instruments Key to Democratic Media Reforms. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yovimbisa Kuvandudza Mitemo yeKuburitswa kweMashoko Gore Rino

text: Zvichitevera kusarudzwa kwevatungamiri vatsva vanofambisa zvinhu mumubatanidzwa wemasangano ose eMedia Institute of Southern Africa (MISA), kana kuti MISA Regional Governing Council, vakasarudzwa kuve sachigaro wekanzuru iyi, VaGolden Maunganidze, vanoti ivo nechikwata chavo chevatungamiri vatsva vakatotanga kuvandudza mashandiro anoita sangano iri. VaMaunganidze vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kuvandudza mafambisirwo anoitwa kutapwa kwenhau nemafambisirwo anoitwa mashoko munharaunda yekuchamhembe kwe Africa. Vanoti ivo nechikwata chevatungamiri vatsva vesangano iri vakamirira kunzwa kubva kumutungamiri weEswatini, VaMswati, pamusoro pevatori venhau vemunyika iyi vakamanikidzwa kupotera kuSouth Africa mushure mekupomerwa mhosva yekunyora zvinoshora VaMswati. VaMaunganidze vanoti vanofara kuti Angola iri kuratidza chishuvo chekudzoka musangano iri, izvo vanoti vari kukurudzira nesimba. VaMaunganidze vanoti zvinangwa zvesangano reMISA ikozvino zvasiyana nezvinangwa zvaidiwa nevakuru vesangano iri vakabva pazvigaro svondo rapera. VaMaunganidze vanoti vanoda kushanda, kukurudzira uye kuona kuti vatori venhau vanoshanda vakazvimirira vakachengetedzwa uye vanowana rubatsiro rwakakwana. No media source currently available
title: Sachigaro Mutsva weMISA, VaGolden Maunganidze, Vanoti Sangano Ravo Riri Kuvandudza Mashandiro Aro

text: Vamwe varimi varatidzira neChitatu pamuzinda webato riri kutonga re Zanu PF vachiti havasi kufara nemafambisirwo akaitwa mari dzavo pamwe nembeu nevamwe vakuru-vakuru vari mubato iri vachiti vanoda kuti mutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, vatore matanho panyaya iyi. No media source currently available Varimi ava, avo vanga vachidarika mazana maviri, vaungana pamuzinda we Zanu PF muHarare mangwanani panguva iyo komiti huru yebato iri yePolitburo yanga iri mumusangano vachiti havasi kufara nekushayiswa kwavakaitwa mbeu nefetereza nevakuru-vakuru vekambani ye Lasch Investments vachishanda pamwe chete neYouth League yebato iri. Vanga vachitungamira varatidziri ava, Va Agrippa Luwanja, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kufara nekutadza kwavari kuita kurima nepamusana pekushaya zvekushandisa mukurima zvakafanana nembeu nefetereza. Va Luwanja vanoti chiri kuvanetsa ndechekuti hapana ari kutora matanho kunyange hazvo nyaya iyi yakasvika munzeve dzevamwe vakuru mubato iri. Mumwe wevaratidziri ava, Amai Regina Mazivanhanga, vanotiwo chiri kunyanyovarwadza ndechekuti vamwe vakuru vakuru veZanu PF vari kushandisa zita remusangano kubira vanhu vari kutotamburawo zvavo. Amai Mazivanhanga vati chibage chavo chave kutsvukuruka nepamusana pekushaiwa fetereza uye vanoti zvave pachena kuti munyika mungangoita nzara yakakura zvikuru gore rino sezvo varimi vanodarika zviuru zvisere nemazana maviri vasina kukwanisa kuwana mbeu pamwe nefetereza paine nguva. Mumwe wevarimi ava, Va Jaison Chirinda, avo vati vanobva kudunhu re Mashonaland Central, vati vakarasikirwa nemari yakawanda zvikuru vanyeperwa nevanhu ve Lasch Investments kuti vachazopihwa mbeu. Vanotiwo tsvangiridzo yavo yakaburitsa pachena kuti gurukota rezvekurima, Va Joseph Made, pamwe negurukota rezvematunhu, Va Ignatious Chombo, ndevamwe vakashanda nekambani ye Lasch Investments mukusafambisa zvakanaka mari dzevarimi mumatunhu ese enyika. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raVa Made panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira mbozhanhare yavo uye Va Chombo vati vanga vari mumusangano. Varatidziri ava havana kuzokwanisa kutaura naVa Mugabe avo vanga vari mumusangano wePolitburo.
title: Varimi Voratidzira Vachiti Vanoda Mbeu neFotereza

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vazivisa kuti sarudzo dzekutsiva nhengo dzeparamende dzakafa pamwe nedzakadzingwa muparamende dzichaitwa musi waKurume 26. VaMnangagwa vazivisa zviri pamutemo kuitwa kwesarudzo idzi uye vatara musi wa Ndira 26 sezuva richagara dare rinotambira mazita evanhu vachakwikwidza. Kuziviswa kwezuva resarudzo kwabva kwasimudzawo zvakare makakatanwa ari mumapato maviri ari muMDC eMDC Alliance neMDC-T. Mutauriri weMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora, VaWitness Dube,vati vachashandisa zita rekuti MDC Alliance pachaitwa sarudzo idzi vachiti ndivo varidzi vezita iri. Asi mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere, vati vachazivisa vatsigiri vavo nenguva isipi kuti vachashandisa zita ripi musarudzo vachiti chakakosha pari zvino inyaya yekuti veruzhinji vanyorese kuvhota nehuwandu hwavo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo uye vari mutungamiri weNational Constitutional Assembly, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vati vanoda kupinda musarudzo dzema by elections idzi vanofanirwa kunge vanyoresa mazita avo mukati memazuva maviri kubva zuva rinenge raziviswa nezvekuitwa sarudzo idzi. Mushandi mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo rakagadzirira zvakakwana kupinda musarudzo idzi. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Elections Support Network, VaAndrew Makoni, vati sarudzo idzi hadzina zvadzichabatsira sezvo vachasarudzwa musi Kurume 26 vachingove negore rimwe chete kusvika pachaitwa sarudzo dzemuna 2023. VaMakoni vati dai mari ichashandiswa pasarudzo idzi yapihwa Zimbabwe Electoral Commission kuitira kuti isimbaradze hurongwa hwekunyoresa vanhu vanoda kuvhota muna 2023. VaMakoni vatiwo VaMnangagwa vanga vachifanira kumbomira kuzivisa zuva resarudzo idzi kudzamara nyaya dzakakwidzwa nevamwe vakadzingwa muparamende dzapera kutongwa mumatare edzimhosva. Sarudzo idzi, idzo dzichaitwa mumatunhu makumi maviri nemasere, dzakambomiswa nehurumende ichiti yaityira kuti dzihwamupengo reCovid 19 rinogona kunyanyopararira munyika kana sarudzo idzi dzikaitwa izvo zvakaita kuti mutemo unoti sarudzo dzechipiri dzinofanira kuitwa mukati memazuva makumi mapfumbamwe kana kwaziviswa zviri pamutemo kuti chigaro hachisisina munhu, umbosendekwa parutivi. Muchiziviso chavo, VaMnangagwa havana chavataura nezvesarudzo dzemakanzura mumatunhu akawanda munyika dzinofanirwa kuitwa zvichitevera kufa pamwe nekudzingwa kwakaitwa mamwe makanzura neMDC-T. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inotara Zuva Richaitwa Sarudzo dzeBy Elections

text:
Gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reMashonaland West VaWebster Shamu vanonzi vakarambidzwa kuti vakwikwidze musarudzo dzemaprimary dzenhengo redare reparamende vachinzi vasiire vechidiki ivo voenda kusenate. Izvi zviri kuuya apo pave kuita bata murefu bata mupfupi mubato reZanu-PF pakunetsenerana nyaya yezvigaro zvekukwikwidza kuve makanzura kana kupinda mudare reparamende neSenate. Dzimwe nhengo dzebato reZanu PF mudunhu reMashonaland West dziri kushoropodza kubviswa kuri kuitwa mazita evamwe vari kuda
kukwikwidza musarudzo dzemaprimary dzebato iri.  Nhengo dzebato iri idzo dzakaungana nemusi weMugovera muChinhoyi apo paisarudzwa vachakwikwidza sevamiriri veparamende nemakanzuru dzinoti zvinhu zvainge zvisingafambiswe zvakanaka sezvo dzimwe nhengo dzaibvisirwa maCV adzo nezvikonzera zvisinga nzwisisike. VaWebster Shamu vakanzi vasiire chigaro mumwe wevechidiki, ivo vakanzi vamiririre kuSenate izvo zvaonekwa nevakawanda sekupa mukuru wevechidiki VaVengai Musengi mukana wakakura kuti akunde mumaprimary ayo ari kuitwa mwedzi unouya. Vamwe vakarambidzwa kukwikwidza vanoti chinonyanya kurwadza panyaya yekusarudza vanokwikwidza ndechekuti vari kuda kukwikwidza ndivo vari kubvuma kana kuramba maCV evari kuda kuvakwikwidza. Imwe nhengo yaida kukwikwidza ari murwi werusununguko uyo isina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti hurongwa hwekusarudza vanofanirwa kupinda musarudzo yekumirira bato reZanu PF iri kuitwa zvinechitsotsi mukati. Nhengo iyi inoti dzimwe nhengo dzebato kubva kune rimwe dunhu ndidzo dzaifanirwa kunge dzakaita basa rekutarisa maCV’s kuti vaone vanokodzera kukwikwidza kwete dzimwewo nhengo dziri kuda kukwikwidza zvigaro zvimwechete. Imwewo nhengo yanga ichida kukwikwidza yakarambidzwa, VaPanashe Jimu
vekuKadoma vanoti nhengo dzose dzinoda kukwikwidza dzinofanirwa
kubvumidzwa nekuti ndiro jekerere racho. VaJimu vanoti havasi kufarira kudzoserwa kwevakura kuti vakwikwidze musarudzo sezvo zvisingaenderani nehurongwa hutsva hwemafungiro echidiki ari kuratidzwa kune mamwe mapato akaita seMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. Kusafambiswa kwekusarudzo dzevachakwikwidza mumaprimary kunonzi neimwe nhengo yebato iri kuchaita kuti vakawanda vasavhotere nhengo dzeZanu PF idzi asi mutungamiri wenyika chete. Sachigaro weZanu PF mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaZiyambi Ziyambi vanoti hapana munhu wavakarambidza kukwikwidza sezvo riri basa rebazi guru reNational Directorate. VaZiyambi vanoti sedunhu vaingoongorora kuti tsamba dzekuda kumiririra bato dzainge dzichiienderana nezvinodikanwa here uye nekunyora vachinyeurira bazi guru pamusoro pevanhu vainge vanyorera kukwikwidza musarudzo dzemaprimary. Vanoona nezvemitemo muZanu-PF VaPaul Mangwana vakamboudza Studio 7 kuti vakuru vebato chete ndivo vanobvuma kutambira kana kuramba maCV aya. Zvichakadaro kuGoromonzi kuMashonaland East, gurukota rezvevashandi Amai Petronella Kagonye uye VaEnergy Mutodi vanonzi vakazoita chitsoka ndibereke mushure mekunge voda kurohwa nevanhu vachipomerwa mhosva yekutorawo maCV evaida kukwikwidza mudunhu iri. No media source currently available
title: MuZanu PF Moita Bata Murefu Bata Mupfupi NeNyaya yeZvigaro

text: Motokari dzinoshandiswa nemapurisa kudzivirira mhirizhonga kuburikidza nekumwaya mvura inovava muvanhu dzaswera dzichifirifita nzvimbo dzemuMbare senzira yekuuraya hutachiwana hweCoronavirus. Vanhu vashomanana vange vari pamusika weMbare nenzvimbo dzakatenderedza musika uyu vamhanya vachitiza apo vaona motokari dzemaWater Canons dzeZimbabwe Republic Police, ZRP, vachifunga kuti dzange dzauya kuzovapfapfaidza mvura inovava asi izvi handizvo zvazoitika. Asi motokari idzi dzange dzichishandiswa nekanzuru yeHarare neZRP kudira mushonga wekudzivirira kupararira chirwere cheCoronavirus pamusika uyu nenzvimbo dzakatenderedza. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo motokari idzi dzichizivikanwa nekuita rimwe basa, kanzuru yavo yaita mushandirapamwe neZRP kuitira kuti motokari idzi dzishandiswe kurwisa kupararira kweCoronavirus iyo yapararira pasi rose. Vati vacharamba vachishanda neZRP kudzamara vakunda chirwere cheCoronavirus. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vati Zimbabwe Republic Police yabatana nekanzuru yeHarare nechinangwa chekuchengetedza hutano hweveruzhinji zvikuru sei panguva ino apo nyika yakatarisana nedambudzik rechirwere cheCoronavirus. Mumwe mugari wemumusha weMbare, Amai Margret Tangwena, vati vafara chose nezvaitika vachiti hutano ndiwo hwakakosha. Vati zvakaitwa zvekumbovhara musika kuti ucheneswe zvinhu zvakakosha sezvo vachizoshandira pakachena. Mumwe mugari wemuMbare, VaFarai Jera, vati vafara nechirongwa chekanzuru yeHarare neZRP. Zvichakadai VaChideme vazivisa kuti kanzuru yatanga kugadzira zvibhorani zvakafa muguta mushure mekunge yawana rubatsiro rwezvekushandisa kubva kuUNICEF. Vatiwo vatanga kuendesa mvura kunzvimbo dzisina mvura muguta senzira yekuona kuti munhu wese awana mvura yekushandisa kugeza sezvo zviri izvo zvinokurudzirwa kuitwa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus. Pane vanhu vapfumbamwe vabatwa neCoronavirus munyika uye munhu mumwe chete Zorora Makamba, akashaya mwedzi wapera. Pane vanhu mazana matatu negumi nevatanhatu vakaongororwa chirwere ichi, uye mazana matatu nevanomwe vakawanikwa vasina chirwere cheCoronavirus. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Opfapfaidza Mushonga Nzvimbo Dzakakomberedza Mbare Musika

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ndovanonzi nevanhu vakawanda ndivo musimboti webato riri kutonga reZanu-PF. Izvi zvinopa vamwe kuti VaMugabe kana vasisispo bato iri rinenge rave mamvemve. Asi chii chinopa kuti VaMugabe vave munhu anoremekedzwa kudaro mubato reZanu-PF. Ako kambo kanonzi nyatsoterera unzwe kutonga kakaimbwa neMbere Chimurenga Choir kachitsigira mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Asi nzimbo dzekukudza VaMugabe hadzina kutanga ikozvino. Kana munguva yehondo izvi zvaiitwa sekuremekedza VaMugabe Zvisinei kuti vakwegura nhengo dzebato dzinoti kuti Zanu PF irambe iri zvairi yakabatana yakasimba ndiVaMugabe. Mudzimai waVaMugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe vanoti kana zvichibvira VaMugabe vangatotakurwa mubhara asi vachiramba vari panyanga. Murongi wemisangano muZanu PF VaSaviour Kasukuwere vanoti VaMugabe ndivo zitateguru, mudzimu wemusangano. Izvi zvinotsigirwa negurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reMashonaland Central VaMarin Dinha vanoti VaMugabe ndivo mudzimu wenyika sezvo vakamiririra nekusunungura vanhu vatema munyika. Mumiririri weparamende muChegutu VaDexter Nduna vanoti vaMugabe havasi gamba remuZimbabwe chete asi igamba reAfrica nepasi pose. VaNduna vanoti chinhu chichaita kuti zita raVaMugabe rirambe richitaurwa pasi rose inyaya yavakaita yekupa ivhu kuvanhu vatema munyika. Sachigaro wemadzishe munyika VaFortune Charumbira vanoti VaMugabe ndimambo mukuru uyo anozivikanwa nekuda runyararo munyika make. VaCharumbira vanoti VaMugabe vanobatanidza vanhu vose munyika kwete zvedzimwe nyika dzine hondo yemarudzi. Kuremekedzwa kuri kuitwa VaMugabe uko vamwe vanoti kutyiwa kunoonekwa zvakanyanya muZanu Pf sezvo pasina anobuda pachena kuti anodawo kutonga nyika ino. Mumwe wevatevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaPhekezela Mphoko vanoti havatomboroti vachitonga. Aya ndiwo mashoko aigawo taurwawo namuchakabvu Simon Muzenda. VaMphoko vanoti havashuwire kutonga chero VaMugabe vari vapenyu. Asi VaDinha vanoti gamba harife vachiti bato reZanu PF rinoenderera mberi kunyange VaMugabe vasisipo sezvo dzidziso yavo ichamutsa mumwe mumiririri akaita saivo. VaKasukuwere vanoti VaMugabe vacharamba vachidiwa nevanhu sezvo vakaita semukaka uneruomba zvisinei kuti vaita zvakaipa sei nekuti zvavakaitira nyika ino zvikuru. VaMugabe vanodiwa zvakanyanya mubato mavo zvekuti dzimwe nhengo dzave kuto vanamata vachiti ingirosi yakatumirwa kuvanhu vemunyika naMwari. Mumiririri weHighfield West muparamende VaPsychology Maziwisa vanotungamira mukuimbwa kwerwiyo “GABRIEL” pamusangano wakaitwa nebato ravo kuNorton svondo rapera. Vamwe vakaita saVaWebster Shamu ndovanoti VaMugabe icremora, VaMugabe vanorumbidzwawo zvakanyanya nezvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika zvichiti ndiye mutungamiri chete mudunhu reAfrica yose akakwanisa kupa vanhu vake ivhu rakarwirwa munyika dzakawanda. Vamwe munyika vanoti chiitiko chekupa vanhu minda ndizvo zvakaita kuti munyika muve nekushayikwa kwezvekudya. As VaMugabe vanoti zvirango zvehupfumi zvavakatemerwa nenyika dzekumawirira ndizvo zviri kukanganisa hupfumi munyika. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeZanu-PF Dzotaura Kuti Sei VaMugabe Vari Musimboti weBato Ravo

text: Mutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti nyaya yekuti vashandi vemuzvipatara vashoma vari kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 iri kukonzerwa nekuti hurumende haisi kuvapa dzidziso yakakwana. Muchikamu chekutanga chekubaya vashandi ava nhomba, vanhu zviuru makumi matatu nepfumbamwe zvinemazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 35, 550 ndivo vainge vabayiwa nhomba kusvika musi weChipiri panhomba inokwana kubaya vanhu zviuru zana kana kuti 100 000 yakatanga kupinga munyika kubva kuChina. Zimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rihts uye vakuru mubazi rezvehutano muMashonaland West vanoti vari kushushikana nekushomeka kwevashandi vemuzvipatara vabayiwa nhomba kusvika parizvino. Nyaya yekuti vamwe vari kutenderera mashoko anonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano manyepo ari kupa kuti vakawanda vatyewo kubayiwa nhomba ichinzi inogona kuzokonzera matambudziko pahutano hwavo. VaDongo vati vakazvipira kushanda nehurumende kukurudzira vakoti kuti vabayiwe nhomba. No media source currently available Bazi rezvehutano riri kuramba mashoko ekuti harisi kupa dzidziso yakakwana richiti chinangwa charo ndechekubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi zvichiteverawo kupinda munyika kweimwe nhomba zviuru mazana mana nemusi weChipiri kubva kuChina. Asi gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vainge vamboti nhomba ichapinda munyika kutanga kwemwedzi uno kubva kuChina inosvika zviruu mazana matanhatu kana kuti 600, 000. Vamwe mubazi rezvehutano vanoti mari dzekudzidzisa vanhu nezveCovid-19 hadzisi kushandiswa zvakanaka vachipa semuenzaniso kusungwa kwemukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa mubazi rezvehutano Dr Portia Manangazira. Dr Manangazira vakasungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yehuori pamari yakabva ku Africa Centre for Disease Control yekudzidzisa vamwe vashandi vezvehutano mumatunhu nezveCovid-19. Asi mutauriri mubazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vanoti hurumende iri kuita zvirongwa zvekudzidzisa vanhu nezveCovid-19 zvakakwana. No media source currently available
title: Vakoti Vanoti Kushaya Ruzivo Kwopa Kuti Vashandi veMuzvipatara Vatye Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19

text: Mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti bato ravo rinotambira nemufaro masangano kana vanhuwo zvavo vanoita mabasa anobatsira veruzhinji, kana chete masangano aya, kana vanhu ava, vachiremekedza pamwe nekucherechedza hutungamiri hwebato iri pamwe nebumbiro rebato. Mashoko aya anotevera danho rinonzi rakatorwa nerimwe sangano renhengo dzebato reMDC T, rinozviti MDC Veteran Activists Association, iro rakaparura chirongwa chekubatsira nhengo dzebato dzakaparadzirwa misha nemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika. NeMugovera sangano iri rakaparura hurongwa uhwu kuburikidza nekupa imba kune mumwe mudzimai, Amai Regina Ndlovu, avo vakaparadzirwa imba yavo kunze kweguta reBulawayo nevanofungidzirwa kuti inhengo dzeZanu PF mugore ra2002. Nhengo dzeMDC dzakawanda munyika yose dzakaparadzirwa misha pamwe nemidziyo munguva yemhirizhonga asi dzichikundikana kuwanirwa rubatsiro. VaGutu vanoti bato ravo rine chido chekubatsira asi dambudziko guru nderekuti zvinhu zvakaomera vanhu vose kusanganisirawo mapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Sachigaro webato reMDC T mudunhu reBulawayo, VaGift Banda, vanoti vanotambira nemufaro mukuru basa riri kuitwa nesangano reMDC Veteran Activists Association asi havana kufadzwa nekusakokwa kwavo kuchiitiko ichi ivo vari hutungamiri hwebato mudunhu reBulawayo. Asi mutauriri wesangano reMDC Veteran Activists Association, VaSwithern Chirowodza, vanoti manyepo kuti havana kukoka bato ravo kuchiitiko ichi sezvo vakanga vakoka mutungamiri webato ravo, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, asi vakazoudzwa kwasara zuva rimwe nemumwe mutungamiri webato ravo kuti VaTsvangirai vakanga vasisakwanisi kuvepo sezvo sangano iri richinzi hariremekedzi humwe hutungamiri hwebato. VaChirowodza vanoti sangano ravo rinounganidza mari kubva kunhengo dzebato dzinoda kubatsira, zvisineyi nebato. Sangano iri rakavaka imba ine mipanda miviri, uye rinoti rine hurongwa hwekuvaka dzimwe dzimba mumatunhu ose gumi enyika kana rikawana rubatsiro. Vamwe muMDC-T vanoti havacherechedzi sangano rinozviti MDC Veterans Activists Association nokuti zvarinoita, kunyange hazvo zvakanaka, hazvisi mubumbiro rebato. No media source currently available No media source currently available
title: MDC T Inoti Inotambira Vose Vanobatsira Vakawirwa neMatambudziko

text: Makore matatu mushure mekunge Motlanthe Commission yaita kurudziro yekuti mhuri dzevakaurayiwa kana kukuvadzwa nemasoja mumhirizhonga yakaitika musi wa1 Nyamavhuvhu 2018, dziripwe, mhuri idzi dzinoti hadzisati dzaripwa uye dzinoti hadzisati dzaziva kuti ndiyani chaiye akauraya kana kukuvadza hama dzavo. Gweta reZimbabwe Human Rights NDO Forum riri kumirira vamwe vakapfurwa musi uyu, VaDzikamai Chimhanga naVaAndy Manyeruke, VaWilbert Mandinde, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vaviri ava havasati varipwa asi hurumende iri kutopikisa mutongo wedare repamusoro wekuti ivaripe. Muzvare Allison Charles, hanzvadzi yemushakabvu, Garvin Charles Dean, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chavati vawana uye mwanasikana akasiyiwa nemushakabvu ave muForm 2 anoda rubatsiro rwemari yechikoro nezvimwe. Muzvare Charles vati mhuri yavo inoda kuripwa pamwe nekuziva kuti ndiyani akauraya hama yavo kuitira kuti vakwanise kuzorora pamweya yavo. Mumiriri weimwe mhuri ine munhu akapfurwa akafa musi uyu uyo aramba kudomwa nezita, audzawo Studio 7 kuti hapana chavati vawana uye havachina tariro yekuripwa. Asi munyori mubazi rezvemutemo zvakare vaive munyori weMotlanthe Commission, Amai Virginia Mabiza, vaudza Studio 7 parunharare, kuti pane vamwe vanhu vakatoripwa vachiti bazi reSocial Wefare rave kutobhadhara mari yechikoro yedzimwe mhuri dzakapinda mutsekwende pabongozozo ra1 Nyamavhuvhu. Zvimwe zvakanzi zviitwe neMotlanthe Commission ndezvekuti mapurisa nemauto aite basa rawo achitevedza bumbiro remitemo. Amai Mabiza vati bazi ravo riri kuita zvirongwa zvakawanda zvekudzidzisa mapurisa nemauto nezvebumbiro remitemo. Izvizvi zvatsinhira nemutungamiri webato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly, zvakare vaive nhengo yeMotlanthe Commission, VaLovemore Madhuku asi vakati havasi kufara kuti masoja akauraya vanhu havasati vasungwa.
