Mukuru weZimbabwe Peace Project, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange Motlanthe Commission yakati mapurisa nemauto anofanira kutevedza bumbiro remitemo pabasa rawo, izvi hazvisi kuitika sezvo mapurisa nemauto ari kuramba achishunguradza vanhu panguva ino yedenda reCovid-19. Mutauriri weNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission, VaObert Gutu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti komisheni yavo iri kuedza napose painogona napo kugadzirisa zvinhu munyika kuti pave nekuregererana uye kuti vanhu vagare murunyararo. VaGutu pane nyaya dzakawanda dzinodarika chiuru dzavari kuferefeta nechinangwa chekupodza marwadzo, kuregerena pamwe nekuti vakatadzirwa varipwe kuti munyika muve nerunyararo. Tabvunza mutauriri weMDC Alliance Advocate Fadzayi Mahere kuti vachapinda musarudzo dza2023 here kana hurumende ikatadza kutevedza Motlanthe Commision vakati izvozvo hazvivatadzisi kupinda musarudzo. Mhirizhonga Nyamavhuvhu 20218 yakaitika mushure mekunge vatsigiri vebato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance neveruzhinji vapinda mumigwagwa vachiratidzira kunonoka kuburitswa kwezvainge zvabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Mushure memhirizhonga iyi, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakaumba komiti yaitungamirwa nevaimbove mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaKaglema Motlanthe kuti vaongorore kuti chii chakakonzera bongozozo pamwe nekupa pfungwa dzavo kuti chii chingaitwe kuti izvi zvisaitike zvakare.
title: VaKgalema Motlanthe Vogeza Maoko saPirato paGwaro Ravo raVaKanzi Vaite naVaMnangagwa

text: Gurukuota redunhu reMasvingo, VaJosiah Hungwe, varamba kupindura mibvunzo yevatori venhanu pavabvunzwa kuti seyi bato ravo riri kumanikidza vanhu kuti varatidze ma serial numbers anoratidza kuti vanyoresa. VaHungwe, avo vadaidza vatori venhau kumahofisi avo vachida kuvaudza nezvezvirongwa zvehurumende zvekusimudzira dunhu reMasvingo, varamba kupindura mibvunzo ine chekuta nezvekutyisidzirwa kwevanhu neZanu PF vachiti vange vachida kutaura nezvebudiriro mudunhu chete. VaHungwe varatidzwawo kutsamwiswa nemibvunzo yavabvunzwa neStudio7 mushure mekubvunzwa kuti vanotarisira sei kuti vemabhizimusi ekunze vauye munyika iri bato ravo richipomerwa nyaya dzekutyora kodzero dzevanhu, uye kushandisa mauto kuti rikunde. "Unyore, hatidi kuhwa izvozvo, tinoda kuhwa progress chete asi vanhu vose vakanzi huyai na President muzoita zvamunoda kuita zvebusiness, saka izvozvo musatora zvinhu zvekubhawa muchiuyisa kuno uku, this is a civilized press conference," vadaro VaHungwe. VaHungwe varamba zvakare kupindura vatori venhau mimwe mibvunzo vachiti vanoda kutaura zvine pundutso nebudiriro kunyange vamwe vazama kutaura kuti budiriro inodyidzana nezvenoitikika munezve matongerwe enyika. Vachitaura zvavadaidzira vatori venhau, VaHungwe vati mamwe makambani ekunyika yeChina avakoshiwa mazita, ari kuuya kuzovaka dhorobha idzva richavaguru mudunhu reMasvingo pedyo nedhamu reTokwe Mukosi uko kunonzi kuchauya vashanyi vekunze kwenyika. "The Chinese have come with plan to build a town, vakatoendako zuro kundoona kuti tingarivaka sei, zvazvinoreva makamboendako, kubva pa dhamu kusvika kuNgundu dzinenge dziri dzimba chete, kuchavakwa ma golf course, hospitals , schools zvose , this is a big project ende kune vamwe vari kuti tiri kuuya ikoko tinoda kuzoita zvakati kuzoita ma airports we suggested two places this air strips and Buffalo range, anenge ari ma international airports, hatichaendi kuHarare , hamuchationiko," vadaro VaHungwe. Asi nyanzvi mune zvematongerwe enyika dzinoti VaHungwe nevamwe vavo muZanu PF vave nemakore vachingovimbisa budiriro asi pasina chinobuda kunyanya pazvirongwa zvinoitwa nemakambani ekuChina. Nyanzi idzi dzinoti VaHungwe pamwe nehurumende yeZanu PF vakaita makore makumi matatu nemanomwe vari muhurunde yaVaRobert Mugabe, avo vakabviswa panyanga gore rapera, vachingoita vimbiso dzakadai pasina chinobuda. NeChipiri, vaimbova gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaGideon Gono, avo vakaitwa sachigaro webhodhi reSpecial Economic Zones Authority, vakaudza paramende kuti bhodhi ravo pamwe nekambani yakaumbwa gore rapera iyi, hava mahofisi ekushandira uye havazivi kuti vari pasi pebazi ripi. Vakatiwo hapana kana mari yavari kuwana kubva kuhurumende, kunyange hazvo bhodhi ravo richifanirwa kunge richikwezva vemabhizinesi vekunnze vanoda kutanga mabhizinesi munyika. Nyika zhinji dzekumadokero dziri kuvimbisa kuzopinda munyika kuita mabhizimusi kana hurumende iripo yaita sarudzo dzakachena dzisina mutauro, asi mhirizhonga pamwe nekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevano vhota zviri kuwanda munyika. No media source currently available
title: VaHungwe Vanoramba Kupindura Mibvunzo yeVatori veNhau

text:
Rimwe remasangano anomirira vashandi vehurumende reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions rinoti hurongwa hwaro hwekuramwa mabasa kwemazuva maviri kubva mangwana hwave pachinhanho chepamusoro ukuwo mamwe masangano anomirira will vamwe vashandi vakaita sevadzidzisi nevemuzvipatara achiti achitsigirawo hurongwa hwekuramwa mabasa uhwu.

Murongi wemisangano musangano reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, VaCharles Chinosengwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vagadzirira zvakakwana kuti varamwe mabasa kwemazuva maviri kubva mangwana.

VaChinosengwa vatiwo hutano hwevashandi huri panjodzi sezvo hurumende isiri kubhadhara mari dzavo dzekuti varapwe.

Mamwe masangano anomirira vamwe vashandi vehurumende akaita seevadzidzisi pamwe nevashandi vemuzvipatara anotiwo achabatana nesangano reZipcostu mangwana apo vashandi vehurumende vachange vari kudzimba dzavo vasiri kuenda kubasa.

Mutevedzeri wemunyori musangano rinomirira vadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaMunyaradzi Masiyiwa, vati yasvika nguva zvino yekuti masangano anomirira vashandi vehurumende aite chirwirangwe kuitira kuti vashandi vawane mari dzemihoro dzinokwana zvavanenge vachida mukurarama.

VaChinosengwa vati nhaurirano nehurumende pasi peNational Joint Negotiating Councik hadzina chadziri kuburitsa sezvo vachiti vashandi vari kutarisirwa pasi.

Asi gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, VaPaul Mavhima, vanoti vashandi vanofanira kuita nhaurirano pasi pegungano reNJNC kuti nhuna dzavo dzigadziriswe.

Mutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vati mapurisa achange achichengetedza runyararo mangwana ne musi weChina vachiti vanhu vose vanoita zvekuratidzira vanofanira kuita izvi vachitevedzera mitemo yenyika.

Zipcostu inoti kuratidzira kwakasimba kuchaitwa muna Gunyana kana hurumende ikaenderera mberi yakaisa zvitanda munzeve iingagadzirise nhuna dzavo. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veHurumende Voramwa Mabasa Kutanga Mangwana Chitatu

text: Sangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dzemuAfrica reAfrican Union gore rapera rakatara nhasi sezuva rekuti nyika dzose dziri mugungano iri dzicherechedza hurongwa hwekurwisa huori kana kuti Anti-Corruption Day. Nyaya yehoori muAfrica inonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi ndiyo yapa kuti pasave nebudiriro. Ongoro yakaitwa neAfrican Union muna 2002 yakaratidza kuti Africa inorasikirwa nemari inosvika mabhiriyoni zana nemakumi mashanu gore rega rega. Sangano rinoona nezvehuori reTransparency International rinoti panyika dzinoonekwa sedzine huori hwakanyanya pasi rino, Somali neSouth Sudan ndidzo dziri pamusoro soro. Asi panyika dzinobata zvakanaka nyaya dzehuori, New Zealand neDenmark ndidzo dziri nani. MuZimbabwe masangano akazvimirira oga ari kutarisirwa kuita zvirongwa zvakasiyana siyana. Vanoona nezve kufambiswa kwemabasa muTransparency International Zimbabwe VaTashinga Zamba vanoti vachaita zvirongwa zvakasiyana siyana kucherechedza zuva iri kusanganisa kuenda kumisha yevazhinji nekuitaura padzinhepfenyuro. No media source currently available
title: African Union Yocherechedza Zuva Rekurwisa Huori Nhasi

text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri we ZANU PF, Va Constantino Chiwenga, vasangana nevatsigiri vebato ravo ku Hopley, ku Harare South pamwe nekuEpworth muhurongwa hwekutsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo dzegore rino. VaChiwenga vaperekedzwa nevakuru vebato mumatunhu emuHarare ne Epworth. VaChiwenga, avo vanova zvakare mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, vakurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti vaite sarudzo murunyararo sezvavakaita pavakabvisa Va Robert Mugabe panyanga muna Mbudzi gore rakapera. No media source currently available Va Chiwenga vati vakasarudzwa kupinda muhurumende bato ravo richagadzirisa maguta ayo vati akaurayiwa ne MDC-T iyo ine makanzura akawanda ari kutonga maguta munyika. Vatiwo mapato anopikisa anokanganisa basa remakanzuru izvo zvarambwa nevanoongorora nezvematongerwo enyika. No media source currently available Nyanzvi mune zvematonerwo enyika, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vati mharidzo yaVa Chiwenga ndiyo mharidzo yaingoparidzwawo naVaRobert Mugabe nokudaro hapana chitsva chavari kuvimbisa vanhu kunze kwezvavagara vachingotaura nguva dzose musarudzo. Vatiwo izvi ndizvo zvinotuma vanhu kuti vafarire zvinotaurwa ne MDC Alliance nekuti vanotaura nyaya itsva kuvanhu. No media source currently available
title: VaChiwenga Voita Misangano muHarare South neEpworth.

text: Mibatanidzwa yemasangano akazvimirira yemuZimbabwe neBotswana iri kukurudzira sangano renyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica, reSouthern African Development Community, SADC, kuti ripindire mukutsvaga nzira dzekugadzirisa matambudziko ari muZimbabwe. Mugwaro raburitswa nemubatanidzwa wemasangano makumi matatu emunyika anosanganisira reZimbabwe Human Rights Association, Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, Amnesty International-Zimbabwe, masangano aya anoti ari kushushikana zvikuru nekudzikira kuri kuita zvinhu muZimbabwe munyaya dzezveupfumi, pamwe nechisimba chiri kushandiswa nehurumende mukupindura vanhu vari kuratidza kunyunyuta kwavo, sezvakaonekwa mumasvondo mashoma adarika. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo nemubatanidzwa wemasangano ekuBotswana weBotswana Civil Society Solidarity Coalition for Zimbabwe, BOCISCOZ, uyo waburitsawo gwaro rekushushikana kwenhengo dzemasangano aya nechisimba chiri kushandiswa nehurumende mukubata kwayo nyaya dzekuratidzira kwevanhu. Mubatanidzwa wekuBotswana uyu, uyo unosanganisirawo masangano anoti reBotswana Council of Churches, Botswana Council of NGOs, DITSHWANELO-Botswana Centre for Human Rights neMISA-Botswana Chapter, unoti huwandu hwekuratidzira muZimbabwe huri kukwira zvichikonzerwa nekuwedzera kwekuoma kwezvinhu munyaya dzeupfumi. Masangano aya anoti izvi zviri kuwedzerwa nemutemo wakadzikwa nehurumende wekurambidza kupinzwa munyika kwezvinhu zvinobva kunze, izvo zvasiya vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu vanga vachirarama nekutengesa zvinhu izvi vasisina mabasa. Magwaro emibatanidzwa miviri iyi ari kukurudzira hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti iremekedze kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nemutemo wenyika. BOCISCOZ iri kukurudzirawo zvakare hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti iremekedze mitongo yematare edzimhosva, ishandure mitemo inokonzera kusagadzikana munyika, ibvise mutemo unorambidza kupinzwa kwezvinhu uyo inoti unotyora chibvumirano chekutengeserana kwenyika dzemuSADC. Mubatanidzwa uyu uri kukurudzirawo mutungamiri weBotswana Va Ian Khama kuti vatore matanho sasachigaro weSADC. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemukuru weZimbabwe Human Rights Associationa, VaOkay Machisa, avo vanoti semasangano emuZimbabwe vari kuda kuti nyaya yeZimbabwe idzoserwe panhaurwa dzeSADC paichaita musangano wayo mwedzi unouya. No media source currently available
title: Masangano Akazvimirira muNyika nekuBotswana Okurudzira SADC Kuti Ipindire muNyaya yeZimbabwe

text: Zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwakaitwa hutachiwana hwe coronavirus muAmerica pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kwezvimwe zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi, zvikoro zvakawanda mumatunhu ose zvakakasika kutora matanho ekuvhara kuitira kudzivirira vana vechikoro kubva kuchirwere ichi. Vamwe vana nevadzidzisi vakazopedza kotoro yetatu vave kudzidza vari kudzimba vachishandisa madandemutande. Mukupera kwemwedzi wapera waNyamavhuvhu, zvikoro zvakavhurwa zvakare kutanga kotoro yekutanga yegore idzva rezvidzidzo, zvikoro zvizhinji zvichiita zvakare zvidzidzo zvepamadandemutande, kunyange hazvo mune mamwe matunhu vana nevadzidzisi vakanzi vadzokere kuchikoro. Asi matunhu akawanda, anosanganisira D.C., Maryland, Virginia neWest Virginia, akatovhura kotoro achishandisa madandemutande, kunyange hazvo kuine mamwe matunhu ari kuti vana vadzokere kuzvivakwa zvezvikoro zvavo. VaMasiya vanoti hurongwa hwekushandisa madandemutande hunoda dzidziso yakasimba inofanirwa kutanga yapiwa kuvarairidzi yakaita sekuziva kushandisa Google Classroom, vasati vasangana nevana vechikoro. Vanotiwo vadzidzisi nevana vechikoro vose vanofanirwa kunge vaine zvikwanisiro zvakakodzera zvakaita semakombiyuta nemasaisai kuitira kuti vakwanise kudzidza vachishandisa madandemutande. VaMasiya vanotiwo hurongwa hwekudzidza pachishandiswa madandemutande hunogona kubatsira zvikuru kuZimbabwe, asi hurumende inofanirwa kuisa mari mukuwaniswa kwemasaisai kana kuti hotspots, muzvikoro zvose zvemunyika. No media source currently available
title: Zvikoro Zvinovhurwa Mune Mamwe Matunhu muAmerica Zvidzidzo Zviri paDandemutande

text: Sangano reZimbabwe National Family Planning Council kana kuti ZNFPC rinoti madzimai mazhinji munyika ari kubata pamuviri zvisina kurongwa nenyaya yekushaya zivo. VeZNFPC vanoti nekuda kweizvi madzimai anosvika chikamu chiri pakati pegumi kusvika gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana vanoshaya panguva yekuzvara kana kurasikirwa nerusvava pakuzvara. Mashoko aya akataurwa nesangano iri kuvatori venhau kwaMutare nemusi weChitatu. Mukuru weZimbabwe National Family Planning Council mudunhu reManicaland VaDyson Masvingise vanoti chikamu chinosvika makumi mana chepamuviri panobatwa nemadzimai chinenge chisina kurongwa. “Statistics dzinonotaura dzoga, tiri kuti 40% dzenhumbu ndinenge dzisiri kutarisirwa nekuti nhumbu idzi dzingange dzisipo asi nekuda kwekuti pane nyaya yeinonzi unmet need iripo tinongoramba tichiwana nhumbu idzi dzichibata kuvanasikana vasina kuwanikwa uye nekumadzimai akawanikwa. Izvi zvinokwanisa kupera chete kana the unmet need iyi yagadziriswa uye nyaya yemacontraceptives iyi yaiswa at their disposal.” VaMasvingise vanotsanangura zvinoreva unmet need. “Unmet need tinoreva kuti mudzimai akatoroorwa iye pachake anotokwanisa kuita mwana asi apa haana atori kuwana chiri kumudzivisa kuti agone kushandisa family planning method saka iyoyo tinopedzisira tava kuiti i-unmet need. Anoda kushandisa family planning method asi pane chiri kumudzivisa, dzingava tsika angave magariro.” Mukuru weZNFPC anoti kushanda pamwe chete nevatori venhau kunobatsira kuti shoko ravo kana dzidziso yavo ipararire nenyika yose kuti matambudziko akatarisana nemadzimai aya apedzwe nechimbichimbi kunyanya mugore ra2020. “Saka tiri kuti isisu kana maMedia Houses akakwanisa kuembresa mastatistics vokwanisa kuwana information yakakwana vanokwanisa kuspredha information iyi kumacommunities kumalevels ekuti kumadzimai akaroorwa uye nekumadzimai asina kuroorwa, kuvasikana ukuwo vakomana vobva vazivawo kuti equally they are responsible.” Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZNFPC mudunhu reManicaland VaDaniel Maromo vanoti huwandu hwemadzimai nevasikana vari kuita pamuviri pasina kurongeka pavasingadi kuri kuwedzera zvikuru kumaruwa nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. “Nyaya iripo ndeyekuti izvi zvakamira zvakadai nenyaya yemareligious and traditional backgrounds uko vasingabvumirani nenzira itsva dzekuronga mhuri. Vamwe havana ruzivo nezvenzira idzi saka seZNFPC tiri kuedza kuita reach out kunharaunda dzisina zivo nezvenzira dzeFamily planning itsva dziriko idzi.” VaMaromo vanoti zvimwe zviri kupa nyaya iyi irambe ichivatemesa musoro sesangano rinoshanda riripasi pebazi rezvehutano nekurerwa zvakanaka kwevana inyaya yekuti zvimwe zvipatara zviri kure nekunogara vanhu. “Tsika nemagariro imwezve nyaya iri kupa kuti tive nedambudziko iri renhumbu dzisina kugadzirirwa.” VaMaromo vanoti mamwe madzimai anoshanyira mahofisi avo muchivande vachitoda kubatsirwa pamusoro penzira dzekuronga mhuri. “Tinotozviziva kuti pane mamwe madzimai anenge achitoda kushandisa nzira dzefamily planning asi vachidziviswa, from experience seZNFPC tine madzimai anotouya kwatiri kana vauya muno mutown kunyanya vechipositori, vanotonzvenga murume vototi ndibayeyi dhepo vamwe vachitora mapiritsi avanozomwira kumagadheni avo. Vanenge vachida asi situation yekumba kwange inenge ichimurambidza.” Vatiwo chinonyanyonetsa pane dzimwe nguva inyaya yekuti varume ndivo vanongosarura pavanodira kuita bonde izvo vanoti ndiyo imwe nzira inozoita kuti madzimai abate pamuviri pasina kurongeka. “Varume vazhinji traditionally tisu tinovamba nyaya dzebonde pamwe mudzimai anenge asiri prepared for it, nyaya yekuita call the shots all the time kuvanhurume ndizvo zvinopa nyaya yemaunwanted pregnancies saka tiri kuti varume should play their role and engage madzimai avo uye kuti vave responsible kwete kungoita pose paadira pasina involvement yemadzimai.” VaMasvingise vanoti nzira kwadzo dzefamily planning dzikatevedzerwa nemazvo muZimbabwe panokwanisa kuchengetedzwa mari inosvika mamiriyoni gumi nerimwe chete kubva parinahasi kusvika mugore ra2020, sezvo imwe mari inoshandiswa pakunosungunuka nhumbu dzisina kurongwa ichikwanisa kushandiswa zvimwe. Vanoti kushandiswa kwenzira dzekuronga mhuri kunzvimbo dzakawanda zvakare kunopa kuti madzimai asarasikirwe nehupenyu pakusungunuka. Amai Sofia Nezandonyi vachitaura vakamirira chiremba mukuru wedunhu reManicaland Dr Matron Mafaune vakurudzira vatori venhau kuti varambe vachidyidzana nevekubazi ravo mukushambadzira mashoko ezvehutano kuitira kudzivirira njodzi kunyanya kumadzimai akazvitakura. Musangano uyu wakapindwa nevatori venhau vane chitsama vabva kumasanganoa akasiyan-siyana nevamwe vanoshanda vakazvimirira voga. No media source currently available
title: Madzimai Akawanda Onetseka Kuronga Mhuri

text: VaLeo Mugabe muzukuru wevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vari kunetsana nevashandi vari papurazi ravo reNangadza pedyo neMhangura kuMashaonaland West. Vashandi vanosvika makumi masere nevashanu vanoti havasi kupihwa mari dzavo dzemihoro kubva gore rapera. Vashandi ava vanoti vanofanira kutambira madhora maviri emaRTGS pazuva asi VaMugabe vari kuti havachavape mari sezvo vakavapa nzvimbo yekurima fodya yavo. Pamutemo wevashandi vemumapurazi vanofanirwa kushandira madhora mashanu emaRTGS dollar pazuva. Mumwe mushandi VaJeremiah Muchongwe vanoti VaMugabe vanechikwereti chavo chinodarika mazana mashanu emadhora vachiti vakada kutaura nezvemari dzavo vanobva vadzingwa papurazi. Mumwe mushandi VaFelix Chisuvi vanoti vakarimira VaMugabe vachishandisa mafuta emotokari anosvika zviuru zviviri asi havasati vabhadharwawo. Asi VaMugabe vanobvuma kuti vakapa vashandi vavo nzvimbo yekurima fodya sezvo mari dzemihoro dzavanovapa dziri shoma zvikuru vachiti vashandi vavo vari kufara. Panyaya yaVaChisuvi, VaMugabe vanoti vainge vasingazive kuti vakashandisa mafuta avo kurima mumunda mavo. VaMugabe vanoti vakawirirana ndokunyorerana pasi nevamwe vashandi vakaita saVaChisuvi kuti vaizovabhadhara pashoma nepashoma. Vanotiwo vakabvumirana kuti VaChisvuvi vaizopihwa nzvimbo yekurima zvirimwa zvavo senzira yekuripa kuvarimira kwavakavaitira netirakita. Chimwe chinhu chiri kurwadza vashandi dzecheuti vari kubhadhariswa mari dzekugara papurazi pamwe nekushandisa madhirihora aVaMugabe kupisa fodya yavo vachiti vanofanirwa kushandisa pachena sezvo VaMugabe vawana zviripo. VaMugabe avo vakambotungamirira boka reZimbabwe Football Association (ZIFA) vari kunetsanawo nevamwe vagari vaviri vakapihwa magwaro enzvimbo mupurazi ravo. Nyaya iyi haisati yapera kutongwa mudare reCivil court muChinhoyi. Studio 7 yabatawo vanomirira sangano revashandi vemumapurizi reGeneral Agriculture and Plantation Workers' Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti GAPWUZ muMashonaland West Amai Anna Matambanadzo avo vati vashandi vanofanira kumhan’ara nyaya dzakadai kusangano ravo. Asi vati nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi, vakawanda havasisiri nhengo dzesangano ravo nekuti havakwanise kubhadhara mari shoma inodiwa. No media source currently available
title: VaLeo Mugabe Vokundikana Kubhadhara Vashandi Papurazi

text: Russia yazivisa nhasi kuti kusvika parizvino hapasati paita chibvumirano chekumisa hondo yairi kurwisa Ukraine. Nhaurirano dzekuyedza kuunza runyararo muUkraine dziri kuitirwa muTurkey. Ukraine inonzi yakauya nezvinhu zvainoda kuti zvigadziriswe pakatanga nhaurirano idzi nezuro zvinosanganisira kuti ukraine isarerekere divi pakudyidzana neRussia neNATO. Kuyangwe Ukraine yange Ichida kupinda mugungano reNATO, Russia yange ichiti izvi zvinokonzera kusagadzikana munyika mayo. Vakuru muhurumende yeUkraine vanotiwo Russia iri kuenderera mberi nekurwisa guta guru renyika iyi reKyiv uye reChernihiv kunyangwe nezuro pakatanga nhaurirano yakati yainge yotanga kubvisa mauto ayo mumaguta aya. Asi mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wehurumende yeUkraine Amai Iryana Vereshchuk vanoti vawirirana kuvhura nzira dzekuti vanoda kuenda muhupoteri vakwanise kuita izvi pasina kurwiswa. United Nations inoti vanhu mamiriyoni mana vatiza muUkraine vachienda muhupoteri kune dzimwe nyika. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika Doctor Gadziro Gwekwerere vanoti Russia yaisafanira kutanga hondo iyi nekugti yave kukonzeresa kusagadzikana pasi rose munyaya dzezvehupfumi. No media source currently available
title: Russia Yotyora Chivimbiso Chayo Chekumbomira Kurwisa Mamwe Maguta emuUkraine

text: Vaimbove musori mukuru mudunhu reHarare, zvakare vari mumwe wevakarwira rusununguko rwenyika muhondo yeChimurenga, Va Peter Munetsi, avo vanonzi vakapondwa apo mauto aibvisa pachigaro vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, varangarirwa neMugovera panyaradzo yaitwa kumba kwavo kuGreendale. Vanhu vaungana vanga vasina kusununguka kutaura kuti chii chakaitika pakufa kwaVaMunetsi, avo vanonzi vakafa musi wa15 Mbudzi, mushure mekurohwa zvakaipisisisa nemauto, sezvo vaifungidzirwa kuti vaikanganisa mauto munguva yeOperation Restore Legacy. Panyaradzo iyi pange pakaoma uye pachirema, hama dzemushakabvu, kanawo mudzimai wake, Amai Rose Munetsi, vange vasingabvumidzwe kutaura nevatori venhau nevanhu vange vasingazivikanwi kuti ndivanani Vange vakadomwa kuti vape humbowo pamusoro pehupenyu hwaVaMunetsi vange vachitya kutaura, uye vakwanisa kutaura, vataura kwemineti imwe chete. Vamwe vatadza kutaura zvachose, izvo zvaratidza kuti zvinhu zvanga zvisina kumira zvakanaka. Amai Munetsi vaudza vanhu vapinda kuti murume wake aive nerudo. Vamwewo vataura panyaradzo iyi vati zvakaitika zvakaoma uye zvakarema kuti vataure zvakaitikika pachena. Vachinyora mubepanhau repadandemutande, vaimbove gurukota muhurumende yaVaMugabe, uye vari muzukuru waVaMugabe, VaPatrick Zhuwawo, vati VaMunetsi havaifanirwa kufa mafiro avakaita. Vati VaMunetsi vakaurayiwa nevanhu vakabvuta masimba ehurumende yaVaMugabe. Vachinyorawo pa twitter nguva pfupi yapfuura, vaive gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro, VaJonathan Moyo, vakatiwo VaMunetsi vakaurayiwa nemauto. Vasori vakawanda vanga vari panyaradzo iyi varamba kutaura nevatori venhau. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remukuru wevasori, Ambassador Isaac Moyo, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira foni yavo. Studio7 hainawo kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri wemauto, Colonel Overson Mugwisi, sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. VaMunetsi vanonzi vakavigwa kunzvimbo inovigwa magamba edunhu reHarare kuWarren Park uye zvinonzi mauto akapa mhuri yavo zana remakirogiramu enyama parufu rwavo. Zvinonzi panguva yaimanikidzwa VaMugabe kusiya basa pasi pechirongwa che Operation Restore Legacy, vasori nemapurisa akawanda vanonzi vakashungurudzwa nemauto sezvo pakanga paita zvikwata zviviri zvaipikisana. Kusawirirana panyaya yekubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro kunonzi kwakaitikawo kuvakuru vaive muhutungamiri hweZimbabwe Defence Forces, izvo zvakaita kuti vaive mukuru wemapurisa, VaAugustine Chihuri, vaendeswe pamudyandigere zvichitevera kugadzwa kwaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available
title: Musori Akafa Munguva Yakapidigurwa VaMugabe Anorangarirwa Vanhu Vachitya Kutaura

text: Vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vari kuAddis Ababa, Ethiopia kumusangano wechimakumu matatu netatu uri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rakanangana nekumisa hondo dzemuAfrica kuburikidza nekunyaradza pfuti kana kuti “silencing the guns”. Musangano wepagore wakatanga nezuro uyu uri kutarisirwa kupetwa nhasi. Mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa ndivo vakatora chigaro chekuva sachigaro weAfrican Union. Vamwe vanyarikani vari kumusangano uyu vanosanganisira munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaAntonio Guterres uye mutungamiri wehurumende yeCanada VaJustin Trudeau. Zvichakadaro, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakaisa ruoko rwavo pachibvumirano chekuti vapote vachiongororwa nevamwe vatungamiri panyaya yematongero avo kana kuti African Peer Review Mechanism chakaparurwa muna 2003. Izvi zvinoitwa pasina kusungirwa neAU. VaMnangagwa vati kuisa ruoko rwavo munongedzo wekuti vakazvipira kuvandudza nyaya yehutongo hwejekere. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vaTamuka Chirimambowa vanoti kuna VaMnangagwa muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi. No media source currently available
title: Vatungamiri vemuAfrica Vopeta Musangano kuEthiopia Vachivimbisa Kumisa Hondo

text: Komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo, yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yakapa kambani yekuChina, yeLaxton Group Limited, basa rekuwanisa nyika michina yekushandisa mukunyoresa kuvhota musarudzo, yeBiometric Voter Registration kits. Asi izvi zviri kushorwa zvikuru nemapato anopikisa pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo, avo vanoti kudyidzana kweChina neZimbabwe kunogona kunge kuine chekuita nedanho iri. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaObert Gutu, vanoti zvakaitwa neZEC zviri kunze kwemutemo sezvo mapato akawanda ezvematongerwo enyika akanga akomekedza kuti michina iyi itengwe kubva kukambani yekuGermany yeDemalog Identification Systems mushure mekuedzwa kwemichina yemakambani maviri aya. VaGutu vanoti vanoona sekuti ZEC yakatevera hushamwari hwebato reZanu PF nebato reCommunist Party of China pakupa basa iri kuLaxton. Mashoko aVaGutu aya atsinhirwawo nemutauriri webato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, VaKurauone Chihwayi, avo vati veruzhinji vari kutadza kunzwisisa kuti hunyanzvi hwekambani yekuChina iyi here hwaita kuti ipiwe basa iri kana kuti hurongwa hwehurumende yeZanu PF hwekudyidzana nenyika dzekumabvazuva, hwe ‘Look East Policy’. VaChihwayi vanoti chimwe chave kuita kuti vanhu varase chivimbo neZEC inyaya yekudyidzana kwekomisheni iyi nehofisi yemutungamiri wenyika mukuita basa rine chekuita nesarudzo. Asi ZEC inonzi yakazivisa kuti yakasarudza Laxton pamberi peDemalog nekuda kwemutengo wayo wakaderera. Laxton Group Limited inonzi yakachaja mari inoita US$3,9 million zvichienzaniswa neUS$5.5 million yakanga yakachajwa neDemalog Identification Systems. Asi VaGutu vanoti kunyange hazvo vari kunyunyuta nekushoropodza ZEC, vari kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe kuti vabude nehuwandu hwavo kuenda kunonyoresa kuitira kuti vagozovhota nehuwandu hwavo musarudzo dza 2018. No media source currently available
title: Mapato Anopikisa Oshora ZEC Nekupa Kwayo Laxton Basa Rekuwanisa Nyika Michina yeBVR

text: Mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Miners Federation Muzvare Henrietta Rushwaya vanzi nedare ramejastiriti havana mhosva panyaya yavange vachipomerwa yekuda kupa vasori panhandare eendege yeRobert Mugabe International Airport muHarare mari yechikomuhomwe. Izvi zvakatevera kusungwa kwavainge vaitwa muna 2020 mushure mekuwanikwa vaine goridhe remari inosvika zviuru mazana matatu zvemadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$300 000 uye vakanzi vaida kupa musori uyu mari yechiokomuhomwe inosvika zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica kana ktui US$5000. Mutongi VaLearnmore mapiye vati vachuchusi vehurumende havana kunyatsopa dare huchapupu hunosungirira Muzvare Rushwaya Muzvare Rushwaya vachiri mumatare nemhosva yavari kupomewa yekuda kubuda nemakirogiramu matanhatu egoridhe zvisiri pamutemo. Havana kupindura mubvunzio watavatumira paWhatsApp tichida kunzwa nezvekuchenurwa kwavaitwa nedare. Asi vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, mukuru wesangano reCentre for natural Resource Governance VaFarai Maguwu vaudza Studio 7 kuti izvi hazvina kuvashamisa uye zvinotoodza moyo yemapurisa nevamwe vanenge vachishanda kuti nyika isarasikirwe nemari kuburikidza nenyaya dzehouri. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Rushwaya Vochenurwa neDare paNyaya yeKuda Kupa Musori Chiokomuhomwe

text: Mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police nekanzuru akapinda mumahofisi ekambani yenhau ye263 Chat nechisimba neChina akakanda hutsi hunokachidza, vatori venhau vakakuva pavaibuda nepamahwindo vachitiza. Izvi zvakaitika mushure mekunge mumwe mutori wenhau we263 Chat, Lovejoy Mutongwizo, atora mifananidzo yemapurisa aya achirwisana nevanotengesera mumigwagwa pakati pemigwagwa Jason Moyo naFirst Street. Mapurisa aona kuti ari kutorwa mifananidzo, akabva atanga kumudzingirira. Mutongwizo akabva achinhanya achienda kumahofi avo ari paBatanai Gardens. Mapurisa akamutevera kumahofisi aya vakamurova ari muhofisi ndokubva vazokanda hutsi hunokachidza. Mapurisa aya anonzi akatora foni yemumwe mutapi wenhau we263 Chat, Costa Nkomo, pamwe nechikwama chake chakange chiine mari vachibva vaenda mushure mekukanda huchi hunokachidza. Mumwe mutori wenhau, Precious Zhuwau, anoti akakuvara apo akabuda nepahwindo ave kukachidzwa nehutsi. Mukuru wekambani ye263 Chat, VaNigel Mugamu, vaudza Studio7 kuti havana kufara nezvaitwa nemapurisa zvekuvadza vashandi vavo vari pabasa. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano reZimbabwe National Editors Forum, VaNjabulo Ncube, vashora zvakaitwa nemapurisa vachiti vanhu vese vanorwisa vatapi venhau vane zvavanenge vachida kuvanza. Vatiwo nenyaya yekuti vanhu vakawanda vave kushandisa madandemutande, mapurisa ave kushungurudza vatori venhau nekuti haadi kuti zvakashata zvaanoita zviburitswe pamadandemutande akasiyana. Kukandwa kwakaitwa hutsi hunokachidza kwakanganisa mabhizimisi akawanda uye zvinonzi sangano remudzimai wemutungamiriri we nyika, Amai Auxillia, reAngel of Hope Foundation, iro rakange richida kuita musangano waro muThe Xenus iyo iri pamupanda mumwe ne263 Chat, rakatadza kuenderera mberi nemusangano waro sezvo vanhu vakange vave kukachidzwa nehutsi wemapurisa. Zvichetevera kumhan’arwa kwenyaya iyi nevatori venhau, mapurisa ekuHarare Central akaenda kunobvurudza vamwe vashandi ve283 Chat uyewo akanotora teargas canister radonhera muhofisi ye263 Chat. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commission Paul Nyathi vakati vari kuferefeta zvakaitika. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kukanzuru yeHarare sezvo mbozhanhare yemutauriri wekanzuru, VaMichael Chideme, yange isiri kuita. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Anorova Mutori weNhau we 263 Chat

text: Meya veHarare vakamiswa basa, VaJacob Mafume, vabhadhara zviuru makumi mana zvemadhora emuno semari yechibatiso kuti vatongwe vachibva kubva kumba panyaya dzehuwori dzavari kupomerwa. Dare repamusoro rapa VaMafume mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso zvichitevera chikumbiro chakasvitswa kudare iri muna Zvita gore rapfuura mushure mekunyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nedare ramajisititiri muHarare. VaMafume vakasungwa vachinzi vainge vapindira pakuferefetwa kwenyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuti vakapa nzvimbo dzekuvakira dzimba kuhanzvadzi yavo, Muzvare Rotina Mafume, pamwe nemumwe mushandi wekumahosifi avo, Muzvare Rutendo Muvuti, ivo vasingakodzeri. Gweta raVaMafume, VaTonderai Bhatasara, vati vatambira nemufaro mutongo wedare. VaBhatasara vazivisawo kuti hutano hwaVaMafume hwave nane mushure mekuonekwa nanachiremba svondo rapfuura vasinganzwe zvakanaka. Mune imwewo nyaya, mumiriri weZengeza West muNational Assembly, uye vari mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC Alliance, VaJob Sikhala, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekunyora manyepo padandemutande ravo reFacebook, vanyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba. Pamutongo wavo, mutongi, VaNgoni Nduna, vati VaSikhala vanogona kupara dzimwe mhosva dzakaita seyavari kupomerwa kana vakatongwa vachibva kumba. Rimwe remagweta avo, VaJeremiah Bamu, vati vave kukwira kudare repamusoro nechikumbiro chaVaSikhala chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba. VaBamu vati VaSikhala vachadzoka zvakare kudare musi wa18 Kukadzi. Mune imwewo nyaya, mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva imwe naVaSikhala, vacharamba vari mutirongo kusvika nemusi weMuvhuro svondo rinouya apo dare remajisitireti richapa mutongo waro pachikumbiuro chavo chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba panyaya yavari kupomerwa. Mune imwewo nyaya mumatare mekare, mutongi wedare repamusoro Justice Benjami Chikowero, vaisa parutivi mutongo wavo pachikumbiro chevaimbi, Anorld Kamudyariwa anozivikanwa nerekuti Fantan, Tafadzwa Kadzimwe, anozivikanwa nerekuti Levels naTinashe Chanachimwe kana kuti Damma avo vari kupikisa mutongo wakapihwa nedare ramijisitireti mushure mekubata nemhosva yekutyora mutemo wekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Vatatu ava vaksita gugangano remumhanzi kuMatapi kuMbare musi wa31 Zvita vakatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemwedzi mitanhatu mushure mekubvuma mhosva yavo. Vatatu ava vari kupikisa mutongo uyu. No media source currently available
title: VaMafume Vabvisiswa ZW$40,000 seMari yeChibatiso

text: Sangano rinobatsira vechidiki, reSafe Haven Trust, ravhura nzvimbo yekutanga muChitungwiza inobatsira nekudzidzisa vechidiki mabasa akasiyana siyana. Mumwe wevakuru vakavamba sangano iri, VaItai Edson Mudyiwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu zvasvika pakaipa munyika sezvo vechidiki vazhinji vari kushandisa zvinodhaka, izvo vanoti zviri kunyanya kukonzerwa nekushaikwa kwe mabasa uye ne dambudziko rekushaya mari. VaMudyiwa vati zvimwe zviri kuitwa neSave Haven Trust kukurudzira hutano hwepfungwa mune vechidiki uye kuvabatsira mukurwisana nedenda rezvinodhaka, vachiti zvinodhaka idenda rakafanana nezvimwe zvirwere zvakaita seshuga naizvozvo rinofanirwa kurwiswa zvakadzama kuti vana ava vaite hupenyu hwavo hwakanaka. VaMudyiwa vati muzinda wavaita mu Chitungwiza uyu, hauna kunangana nevechidiki vemuChitungwiza chete, vachiti vana vose vanobva kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana vanofanirwa kuwana rubatsiro rwavanopa. Tabata VaMudyiwa kuti vatiudze zhizhinji. No media source currently available
title: Sangano reSafe Haven Trust Rave neMuzinda muChitungwiza

text: Mhuri dzakawanda kunyamakate mudunhu remashonaland west dzave kurarama nekutengesa uswa hwekupfiririsa dzimba. Vakawanda vanoti vakafunga danho rekutengesa huswa mushure mekunge vaona kuti vari kuvaka dzimba vakawanda mazuva ano vave kufarira kushandisa huswa mukupfirira. Izvi zvinonzi zviri kuitwa kazhinji munzvimbo dzekutandarira nekushanya dzakaita semalodge nemachalets. VaMaynard Hozheri mumwe weavo vari kurarama nekutengesa uswa. Vanoti vakatora danho iri sezvo vari pedyo nenzvimbo dzinopisa dzeKariba, Chirundu pamwe negachekache. VaHozheri vanoti bhizinisi rekutengesa uswa riri kuvararamisa ivo nemhuri yavo uye vanowana mari zvichienderana nekuwanda kwehuswa hwavanenge vacheka. Vanoenderera mberi vachiti vanowana mari inosvika chiuru chemadhora kana vanhu vachitenga zvakanaka zvikuru sei nguva yekupisa yatiri. Mumwe mugari wepaNovember village kuNyamakate VaClaudius Makina avo vakapiwa munda wekurima vanoti vakafunga zvekutengesa uswa nekuda kwekuti hapana chavaiwana pakurima sezvo zvirimwa zvavo zvichidyiwa nemhuka. VaMakina vanoti vari kurarama zviri nani kuburikidza nekutengesa uswa. VaMakina vanoti vanowana madhora mazana mana pamwedzi. Nyamakate yakaganhurana nenzvimbo inochengeterwa mhuka yeKariba Game Reserve. Amai Joana Pfumbidzayi vanoti vave nemakore matatu vachitengesa uswa asi vanoti zvinoda kushanda zvakasimba. Amai Pfumbidzai vanoti vavekukwanisa kutenga zvekurimisa pamwe nezvekudya kuburikidza nekutengesa uswa. Asi vanotengesa uswa ava vanoti kunyange hazvo vachimbotengerwa nevanhu vanobva kune dzimwe nyika dzakaita sezambia, bhizinisi rekutengesa uswa rine nguva zvikuru munguva yechirimo uye rinombononoka kufamba sezvavanenge vakatarisira. Vagari vekuNyamakate vanotengesa uswa vanoti vane tariro yekushambadzira bhizinisi ravo kunzvimbo dzakawanda munyika kusanganisira kuvanhu vari kuvaka sezvo veruzhinji vave kufarira kupfirira dzimba dzavo nehuswa. Hongu hupfumi hwenyika hauna kumira zvakanaka asi vanhu vekuNyamakate vanoti havasi kuzogarira maoko vachinonga svosve nemuromo. No media source currently available
title: Vagari veKuNyamakate Vorarama neKutengesa Huswa

text: Apo nyika yakatarisana nedambudziko remvura kunzvimbo dzakawanda nekuda kwekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura, vagari vekumaruwa eshurugwi vanoti kuuya kwechirwere cheCoronavirus munyika kwowedzera matambudziko avo sezvo votya kubatirira hutachiona uhwu pazvibhorani zvavanoshandisa vakawanda. Ongororo yakaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti matsime mazhinji munzvimbo iyi akapwa mvura izvo zvoita kuti mhuri zhinji dziraramire pazvibhorani zvishoma zviri mudunhu iri. Asi vagari vakawanda venzvimbo iyi vanoti izvi zvave kuisa hutano hwavo panjodzi sezvo hutachiona hwecoronavirus uhwu huchigona kutapukira kuvanhu kuburikidza nekushandisa zvibhorani izvi zvavanenge vachibata vakawanda. Muzvare Patricia Zhou vanogara muWard 11 kuShurugwai South vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyangwe hazvo vari kuedza nepavanogona napo kuzvidzivirira kuchirwere cheCOVID-19 kuburikidza nekugara pamba pavo vati vanotyira kuti vanogona kubatirira hutachiona hwechirwere ichi pavanoenda kuchibhorani. Izvi zvatsigirwawo naMuzvare Tatenda Mavedzenge avo vati vanhu vese vemubhuku ravo vanochera mvura pachibhorani chimwechete sezvo zvimwe zvese zvakapwa. Muzvare Mavedzenge vanoti vangafare vakawana dzidziso yekuti zvii zvavangaite kuzvichengetedza Mumwe mugari wemudunhu iri VaFarai Gara vatiwo zvingavanakire vakawaniswa mishonga yekuchenesa maoko kuti vanhu vashandise vasati vabata zvibhorani iyo vati haiko kuzvitoro zvemudunhu ravo. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa vari nhengo yeMDC Dr Henry Madzorera vati kurudziro yavo ndeyekuti vagari vekumaruwa ava vagare vachisuka mubato wechibhorani nemaoko nesipo kana mishonga inouraya hutachiona kune vanokwanisa kuiona Asi mumwewo mugari wenzvimbo iyi, Amai Amber Mhuri vati nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu munyika, kuwanikwa kwemishonga inouraya hutachiona iyi kunogona kunetsa. VaMadzorera vapawo yambiro kuvanhu vekumaruwa ava kuti kana pane anenge achifungidzira kuti angangodaro akabatira hutachiona asaenda zvachose kunzvimbo dzinocherwa mvura sezvo zvichigona kuisa hutano hwevazhinji panjodzi. Vakurudzirawo kuti vari kumaruwa vapanane majana ekunochera mvura kuitira kudzivirira kuungana pazvibhorani izvi. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri vaudza Studio 7 kuti titaure ne mukuru wezvehutano mudunhu reMidlands, Dr Simon Nyadundu nezvematanho avari kutora mudunhu ravo kuona kuti vanhu vachengetedzeka pazvibhorani. Asi Dr Nyadundu vanga vasingadairi nharembozha yavo kusvika taenda pamhepo.
title: Vamwe VekuShurugwi Votya Kutapurirwa Coronavirus paZvibhorani

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muNew York zviri kutarisirwa kusangana muguta iri apo pachaitwa mabiko nemitambo yakasiyana siyana zvekucherechedza tsika nemagariro nyika yechizvarwa. Gungano iri richaitwa neMugovera unotevera musi wa 6 Nyamavhuvhu. Mumwe wavari kuronga gungano iri mufundisi Chaka Ngwenya vanoti zvakakosha kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvisangane zvichimbozeya mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. Zuva iri riri kuzivikanwa nekuti “Family Day” sezvo richange richibatanidza mhuri dzeZimbabwe dziri muguta iri nedzimwe dzinobva kune mamwe matunhu muAmerica. VaNgwenya vanoti chakakosha pachiitiko ichi ndecheku yananisa zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. "Shuwiro yedu ndeyekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviwane mukana wekuyanana pasina nhau yekuti uri kubva mumba maani, unopinda chechi ipi kana kuti unotsigira bata ripi," VaNgwenya vaudza Studio 7. VaNgwenya vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti kana chirongwa ichi chikabudirira muguta ravo chinokwanisa kuzoitwawo kune dzimwe nzvimbo. "Tirikutarisira kuti vechidiki kunyanya vana vakazvarwa muno vadzidzewo nezvekumusha kwedu nyanya dzetsika nemagariro edu."  No media source currently available
title: Zvizvarwa ZveZimbabwe Zviri MuNew York Zvoronga Machikichori

text: Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaJob Sikhala, vanoti havashamiswe nemutongo wavakapihwa nemusi weChishanu nemutongi wedare repamusoro kuMasvingo, VaGarainesu Mawadze, nokuti hapana mhosva yavakanga vapara. Va Sikhala, avo vanova mumiriri we Zengeza West mudare re National Assembly, vanoti hazvaigona kuti vawanikwe vaine mhosva zvichitevera mashoko avo ekuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachabviswa pachigaro gore ra 2023 risati rasvika. VaSikhala vakasungwa muna Chikunguru gore rapera mushure mekunge vataura pamusangano wavakaita kuMasvingo vachiti VaMnangagwa vachabviswa pachigaro sarudzo dzinotevera dzisati dzaitwa. Mushure mekuburitswa kwenyaya yezvavakataura murimwe bepanhau, VaSikhala vakadaidzwa nemapurisa musi 8 Chikunguru vachibvunzurudzwa nezvemashoko avakataura. Vakabva vasungwa vachipomerwa zviri pamutemo mhosva yekuda kubvisa mutungamiri wenyika zvisiri pamutemo, VaSikhala vakabvisiswa zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora emunyika semari yechibatiso kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo. Vakanziwo nyaya yavo yaizotongerwa kuMasvingo sezvo kuri iko kwakaparirwa mhosva yacho. Vachipa mutongo wavo nemusi weChishanu, VaMawadze vakati hapana mhosva yakaparwa naVaSikhala kuburikidzwa nemashoko avanonzi vakataura pamusangano wavakaita gore rapera kuMasvingo kwakare. Nepamusana pekuti vaipota vachienda kuMasvingo pose paipinda nyaya iyi mumatare, VaSikhala vanoti vakarasikirwa nemari yakawanda zvikuru, sezvo vaitadziswa kuita basa ravo segweta nepamusana penguva yavapedzera panyaya yavanga vakatarisana nayo No media source currently available
title: VaSikhala Votaura Pamusoro peMutongo weDare

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemagariro evanhu Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti vadzikisa huwandu hwevanhu vari kuda kupihwa zvekudya nehurumende pamwe nemasangano akazvimirira oga sezvo nyika yakakohwa pakuru gore rapera. Mashoko aya ari kuuya hawo kunyangwe hazvo vamwe vari kuti chirwefre cheCovid-19 chapa kuti vanhu vakawanda, zvikuru vari mumaguta vanonge svosve nemuromo. Bhanga reWorld Bank muongororo yarakaita rakati vanhu vanoda kusvika zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana muZimbabwe vanoda rubatsiro rwezvekudya. Asi VaMavima vanoti ongororo yakaitwa nehurumende nemasangano anopa rubatsiro inoratidza kuti huwanmdu hwevanoda rubatsiro hwaderera zvikuru. Asi vanoti vanoshaisisa, nhererera, vanorwara zvekutadza kuzviitira mabasa nevakaremara vachapihwa rubatsiro kutanga mwedzi uno waGumiguru. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yodzikisa Huwandu Hwevanoda Kupihwa Chikafu Kunyangwe Vamwe Vari Kuti Vakaomerwa

text:
Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti mhirizhonga iri kuitika muSouth Africa ichavhiringa zvakanyanya hupfumi hweZimbabwe sezvo nyika iyi ichitenga zvinhu zvakawanda kubva kuSouth Africa, uye zvimwe zvinhu zvainotenga kudzimwe nyika zvichipfuura nemuSouth Africa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti zviri kuitika muSouth Africa zvichaita kuti zvinhu zviome muZimbabwe kana hurumende yemuSouth Africa ikatadza kupedza mhirizhonga iyi nekukurumidza. Mukuru weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries,Muzvare Sekai Kuvarika, vanoti mhirizhonga iri kuitika muSouth Africa inovhiringidza mashandiro emaindasitiri emuZimbabwe sezvo maindasitiri aya achishandisa zvinobva kunze kwenyika zvichipfuura nemuSouth Africa, zvimwe zvichgadzirwa munyika iyi. Mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu,
vanoti mhirizhonga iri muSouth Africa inokanganisa mamiriro ezvehupfumi
munyika dzose dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica sezvo iri iyo ine hupfumi
hwakasimba mudunhu iri. VaMutashu vanoti pane kutengeserana kukuru pakati peZimbabwe neSouth Africa vachitiwo Zimbabwe inowana zvinhu zvakasiyana siyana kusanganisira chikafu, zvinosvika zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana. VaMutashu vayambira kuti vanhu havafanirwe kuita nhangemutange kutenga chikafu chakawanda.

Mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro munyaya dzebudiriro, VaFelix Chari, vanoti kunyange hazvo pasina mafigiri angavepo pari zvino anoratidza kuti mhirizhonga iri kuSouth Africa yakanganisa zvakadii mamiriro ezvehupfumi munyika iyi, zviri pachena kuti zvinhu zvichakanganisika zvikuru sezvo mamwe maindasitiri akatoparadzwa kare nemhirizhonga iri kuitika iyi .

Chipangamazano musangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti zviri
kuitika izvi zvinofanirwa kuita kuti Zimbabwe isambaradze mashandisiro ainoita Mozambique neTanzania mukpinza munyika zvinhu zvainotenga kunze. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri wekambani yehurumende yeZimTrade, iyo inoona nezvekudyidzana kweZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika, VaDanai Majaha, sezvo vakundikana kuzadzisa vimbiso yavo yekutipa
mamiriro akaita kudyidzana pakati peZimbabwe neSouth Africa pataenda pamhepo.

Asi sangano reUnited Nations rinoona nezvekutengeserana pasi rose, re Comtrade, rinoti South Africa yakatengesa gore apera zvinhu zvayo kuZimbabwe zvinoita mabhiriyoni maviri nemazana maviri nemakumi matatu emamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti 2.23 billion US dollars. Ukuwo Zimbabwe inonzi yakatengeserawo South Africa gore rapera zvinhu zvinokosha bhiriyoni rimwe chete nemazana manomwe nemakumi matatu emamiriyoni emadhora, kana kuti 1.73 billion US dollars. Zvinhu zvinotengwa zvakanyanya neZimbabwe kuSouth Africa zvinosanganisira mishina, nuclear reactors, mafuta, dzimotokari, chikafu mapurasitiki, simbi, zvigadzirwa zvinoshandisa magetsi, sipo nemakenduru nezvimwe. Zimbabwe inotengeserawo South Africa zvinhu zvinosanganisira fodya, matombo anokosha, kotoni, matehwe emhuka nemichero. Sangano reWorld Bank rinoti South Africa ndiyo nyika iri pamusoro pakutengeserana neZimbabwe ichiteverwa neSingapore, China iri yechitatu. Izvi zvinoratidza kuti South Africa ikahetsura, Zimbabwe inohetsurawo. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzoyambira Kuoma kweZvinhu muZimbabwe Kana Mhirizhonga Ikasapera muSouth Africa

text: VeZimbabwe Electoral Commission (ZEC) svondo rinouya vachatanga chirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu vese vakasarira pakaita chirongwa cheBiometric Voter Registration Blitz icho chakapera mwedzi wapfuura. Kunyange hazvo vakuru veZEC pamuzinda wekomisheni iyi muHarare vange vasiri kudaira mafoni avo, mukuru anoona nezvesarudzo mukomisheni iyi mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaAustine Ndhlovu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti chirongwa ichi chiri kuitwa chichitevedza nzvimbo dzine vanhu vakazopihwa zvitupa pachena nemahofisi emabharani mukuru wehurumende Registrar-General chirongwa cheBlitz chadarika. VaNdhlovu vatiwo chirongwa ichi chiri kuitwa kugadzirisa zvichemo zvevaye vane vabereki vanobva kunze kwenyika avo vainge vasingabvumidzwe kuvhota. Vanoti zvichitevera mutongo wedare repamusoro, vanhu ava vave kuzonyoreswa pasi pechirongwa cheMOP-UP icho chiri kutanga svondo rinouya. Muna Mbudzi gore rapera dare repamusoro rakati vanhu ava kana kuti ma aliens, vanokwanisa kuvhota kana vakaburitsa humbowo hunoratidza kuti vabereki vavo vanobva kunyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotambira chirongwa ichi nemufaro sezvo chichipa mukana kune vaya vakashaya mukana wekunyoresa pazvirongwa zvapfuura. VaMadhuku vanoti vanhu havafaniri kutambisa mikana yakadai sezvo ichivapa mukana wekuti vagozokwanisa kusarudza vatungamiriri vavanoda musarudzo. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare VaMalvin Mukudu vatiwo zvakanaka kuti nguva yekunyoresa kuvhota iwedzerwe kuti vese vanokodzera kuvhota vaende kunonyorea. Vanoona nezvesarudzo mubato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, VaRichard Chimbiri, vakurudzira vese vasina kunyoresa kuvhota kuti vashandise mukana wavari kupihwa neZEC uyu. Mukuru muboka revechidiki muMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai mudunhu reHarare, VaDenford Ngadziore, vati apa ZEC yaterera zvichemo zvavo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata veZanu PF kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya iyi. VaNdhlovu vati kunze kweMOP-UP vanhu vanokwanisa kuramba vachinonyoresa kuvhota kunyange pari zvino kumahofisi avo ari mumatunhu ese munyika. VeZEC vari kugadzira gwaro revavhoti idzva reBiometric Voter Registration, BVR, iro richashandiswa musarudzo dzegore rinouya uye izvi zvinotevera kubviswa kwebasa iri kubva kumahofisi ekwa Registrar-General. No media source currently available
title: Chirongwa cheKunyoresa Kuvhota Nyika Yose Chotanga Zvakare Svondo Rinouya

text: Hurumende inonzi ine hurongwa hwekuda kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvikwanise kuvhota zviri munyika dzazvigere. Izvi zvakaziviswa negurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, avo vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti hurongwa hwekuona kuti dzimwe nyika dziri kuzvifambisa sei huri kutanga gore rinouya. VaZiyambi vakati hurumende ichaumba komisheni ichaita tsvakurudzo iyi, iyo vanotarisira kuti inenge yapera panosvika mwedzi wa Chikumi 2020. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaKindness Paradza, vanoti hurongwa uhwu hwakanangana nemashoko emutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ekuti munyika munofanirwa kuvandudzwa mitemo kuti ifambirane nebumbiro renyika. VaParadza vanoti izvi zvichazadzisawo kurudziro yemasangano akaongorora sarudzo gore rapera pamwe nekomisheni yevaimbove mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaKgalema Motlanthe, yeMotlanthe Commission, yekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri Kunze kwenyika zvibvumidzwe kuvhota zviri kwazvigere. Hurumende yaimboramba kuti vari Kunze vavhote vari kwavari ichiti yakanga isina mari yekuzadzisa hurongwa uhwu. Pari zvino vanobvumidzwa kuvhota vari kunze ndevanoshanda kumizinda yenyika nevamwe vanenge vari pamabasa ehurumende. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoronga Kuti Vari Kunze Vakwanise Kuzovhota muSarudzo

text: Vechidiki veMDCT vakaratidzira muHarare nemusi weChitatu vachiti havasi kufara nemashandiro arikuita komisheni inowona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC. Vechidiki veMDC vanga vachidarika mazana matatu varatidzira kubva pamuzinda webato ravo paHarvest House vakananga kumahofisi ekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission vachiti havasi kufara nemafambisiro ari kuita komisheni iyi basa. Varatidziri ava vanga vakatakura zvinyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana zvanga zvichitsoropodza ZEC. Pavasimuka pamuzinda webato ravo, mutungamiri weboka revechidiki muMDCT, VaHappymore Chidziva, vaudza varatidziri ava kuti ZEC inofanira kuvandudzwa sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzisati dzaitwa kuitira kuti sarudzo idzi dzigoitwa zviri pachena. VaChidziva vatiwo mitemo yose inobata sarudzo inofanira kuvandudzwa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Vasina kumbofamba chinhambwe chakareba, varatidziri ava vatanga kumhanyiswa nemapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo ayo avadira mvura inovava pamwe nekuvamwaya hutsi hunokachidza. Vamwe veruzhinji vangasinei nekuratidzira uku vadirwa mvura inovava nehutsi hunokachidza uhwu. Varatidziri ava vapisawo ma kadhibhokisi mune imwe migwagwa iri pakati pedhorobha. Mumwe wevaratidziri ava, VaEnock Mkudu, vati vaswera vachiita hwakiti negonzo nemapurisa. Mumwe wechidiki anga achiratidzirawo, Va Shakespeare Mukoyi, vati komisheni yeZEC yakazara vasori nevari muchiuto vachiti izvi zvinokanganisa chimiro chesangano iri. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano reCentre for Disability and Development, VaMasimba Kuchera, vati mapurisa emuZimbabwe anofanira kudzidziswa kutevedzera bumbiro remitemo sezvo vachiti kuratidzira kwaitika nhasi kwanga kusina kukanganisa runyararo. Mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanotiwo bato ravo richaratidzira munyika yose munguva pfupi iri kutevera vachiti pane zvinhu zvakawanda zvinobata sarudzo zvinofanira kushandurwa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa zvakafanana nemitemo inobata mafambisirwo esarudzo, kupindira kwevari muchiuto munyaya dzesarudzo nezvimwe zvakadaro. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Omwaya Hutsi Hunokatyidza Kune veChidiki veMDC-T Vange Vachiratidzira muHarare

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vabatana nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica pamwe nepasi rose mukuchema vanhu vashaya mutsaona yendege muEthiopia. VaMnangagwa vaburitsa mashoko avo paTwitter vachinyaradza mhuri dzose dzarasikirwa mutsaona iyi vachiti vanopa pfungwa nesimba kuvakoma nehanzvadzi nevose vabatwa netsaona iyi. Vanhu zana nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe vafa mutsaona yekudonha kwendege yeEthiopian Airways yerudzi rweBoeing 737, iyo yanga ichienda kuNairobi, guta guru reKenya mangwanani. Nhepfenyuro yehurumende yeEthiopia yati ndege iyi, iyo yadonhera pedyo neguta reBishoftu muEthiopia makare, yanga yakatakura zvizvarwa zvenyika dzingangosvika makumi matatu nenhatu. Vafi vanosanganisira makumi matatu nevaviri vekuKenya, vasere vekuCanada, vanomwe vekuEthiopia, vasere vanove zvizvarwa zveAmerica, vasere vekuItaly, vasere vekuChina, vanomwe vekuBritain, vanomwe vekuFrance, vatanhatu vekuEgypt, vashanu vekuNetherlands, vana vekuIndia, nevamwe vana vekuSlovakia. Vamwe vatatu ndevekuAustria, vatatu vekuSweden, vatatu vekuRussia, vaviri vekuMorocco, vaviri vekuSpain, vaviri vekuPoland, nevamwe vaviri vekuIsrael. Nyika dzinoti Belgium, Indonesia, Somalia, Norway, Serbia, Togo, Mozambique, Rwanda, Sudan, Uganda neYemen dzarasikirwawo nezvizvarwa chimwe-chimwe. Mukati mevanhu ava manga mune vamwe vana vanga vari vashandi vesangano reUnited Nations. Ndege iyi, iyo inonzi yanga ichiri itsva, uye ichityairwa nenyanzvi, inonzi yarasana masaisai nenhandare huru yendege yeBole International Airport maminitsi matanhatu yasimuka nenguva dza 8:38 mangwanani enguva dzeku Ethiopia.
title: Mutungamiri weNyika VaMnangagwa Vanobatana neVamwe Mukuchema Tsaona Yawira Ethiopia

text: Mapato anopikisa emunyika anoti achakasimba sezvaaive akaita hurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, isati yapidigurwa nemauto, izvo zvakazosimudza VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kukwira kuve mutungamiri wenyika. Mutauriri webato reNational Constitutional Assembly, VaMadock Chivasa, vanoti chavatarisana nacho pari zvino inyaya yekugadzirira sarudzo dziri kuitwa munyika gore rinouya, idzo bato ravo richakwikwidza, kubva kumutungamiri wenyika kusvika kumakanzura. Asi vanoti zvinhu zvavagara vachichema nazvo zvakaita sebumbiro remitemo vachagara vachirwisana nazvo. Ukuwo mutauriri weMDC inotungamirirwa naMuzvinafundo Welshman Ncube, VaKurauone Chihwayi, vanotiwo kwese kumubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance nebato ravo reMDC havasi kurara vachizvishambadza senzira yekugadzirira sarudzo dzegore rinouya. VaChihwayi vanotiwo havaoni paine dambudziko guru panyaya yebumbiro remitemo sezvo rakaumbwa nevana veZimbabwe, kunyange hazvo vari kurwisa kuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo ivandudzwe. Asi vamwe vanoti vanoona sekunge mapato anopikisa apera marasha kubva pakauya hurumende yaVaMnangagwa, izvo zvave kuita kuti vafunge kuti Zanu PF inogona kunge isisina vanoipikisa vakasimba. No media source currently available
title: Mapato Anopikisa Anoti Achakasimba Kukwikwidzana neZanu PF

text: Mutungamiri weAmerica VaJoe Biden vanoti America yakagadzirira kutumira mauto kunobatsira Taiwan ikakwiswa neChina. VaBiden vakataura mashoko aya murwendo rwavo kunyika dzekuAsia uko vari kuyedza kunosimbaradza hukama nadzo. China inoti Taiwan idunhu rayo uye yakagadzirira kuri tora kana nehondo chaiyo. Mukupindura mashoko aVaBiden aya, bazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muChina rati hapana munhu anofanira kutarisira China pasi panyaya yekuzvidzivirira. VaBiden vatiwo mutungamiri weRussia VaVladimir Putin vanofanira kurangwa zvakasimba nedanho ravo rekuda kupamba Ukraine
title: VaBiden Voyambira China Kuti Vanogona Kutumira Mauto Kubatsira Taiwan

text: Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti Zec, inoti ichatorera matanho akaomarara vanhu vose vachawanikwa vachityora mitemo yesarudzo munguva yekutsvaga rutsigiro rwesarudzo dzichaitwa muna Kurume. Vachitaura nezuro pakupera kunyoreswa kwemazita eavanhu vachakwikwidza musarudzo dzema by-elections muChinhoyi, mukuru weZec mudunhu reMakonde, VaShepherd Kawocha, vakati yasvika nguva yekuti komisheni yavo iratidze kuti inoranga vose vasingatevedzeri mitemo yesarudzo. VaKawocha vakati Zec icharanga nekuburitsa musarudzo kana kubhadharisa mari yefaindi vose vachatyora mitemo yesarudzo pavanenge vachitsvaga rutsigiro. VaKawocha vakakurudzira avo vari kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi kuti vatsvage rutsigiro murunyararo. Vakatiwo vanoshuwira kuti nerimwe zuva vachaona vemapato akasiyana vachitsvaga rutsigiro vari pamwe chete pasina kurwisana sezvinoitika kune dzimwe nyika. Zvichakadaro, bato reMDC Alliance rakatadza kuisa vanhu vachakwikwidza mumawadhi mana pama wadhi matanhatu ari kukwikwidzwa muChinhoyi. Nhengo yeMDC Alliance iyo yakakwanisa kuisa mapepa ekukwikwidza muwadhi 2, VaWillie Nyambe, vanoti dzimwe nhengo dzavo dzakatadza kunyoresa nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyana. VaNyambe vanoti vamwe vakanga vaisa mapepa avo vakazoabvisa nekuti vakanga vakwezwa kubato raVaNelson Chamisa reCitizens Coalition for Change vamwe vachiti vave nezvakawanda zvekuita. VaNyambe vanoti pane nhengo dziri kuita setsukukuviri dzichiita sedziri kubato ravo asi dzichienda nerweseri kubato reCCC. Asi imwe yenhengo idzi, VaClemence Dhumba, vabvuma kuti vakaenda kubato reCCC mumazuva mashoma apfuura sezvo vagara vachinzi mutengesi nekuti vaitaura nenhengo idzi. MDC Alliance yakatadzawo kuisa nhengo dzinokwikwidza munzvimbo dzinoti Harare, Masvingo, Manicaland, Mashonaland Central, Matebeleland North neMatebeleland South. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaWitness Dube, kuti sei munzvimbo idzi bato ravo rakatadza kuisa nhengo dzinokwikwidza sezvo mbozhanhare yavo yanga isingadavirwe. Bato reZanu PF rinoti rakachinja munhu ari kurimirira muwadhi 2 richiti Muzvare Ruth Chikukwa, avo vainge vasarudzwa pama primary ebato iri, vainge vaine nyaya dzakawanda dziri kumatare edzimhosva ndokubva ravatsiva naVaMike Yasini, avo vakakundwa musarudzo naMuzvare Chikukwa. No media source currently available
title: Zec Inoti Icharanga Vose Vanotyora Mitemo yeSarudzo

text: Vatungamiri vatatu vesangano rinomirira vadzidzi re Zimbabwe National Students Union kana kuti ZINASU muMasvingo nemusi weChishanu vakarambidzwa kusvika pachikoro chavo chepamusoro che Great Zimbabwe University vachipomerwa mhosva yekuronga kuratidzira pamberi pemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avo vakapa zvitupa vadzidzi vanopfuura zviuru zviviri vakabudirira muzvidzo zvavo. VaEphraim Mutombeni, sachigaro we Zinasu muMasvingo pamwe naVaChamunorwa Dzingirai na VaTatenda Mahova vaudza Sudio 7 kuti vakavingwa ne vasori vehurumende vakatyisidzirwa vachinzi vanoitwa kafiramberi nekunyangariswa vakanzi kvasasvike kuuniversity kwagirajuweta vamwe nekuti vainzi vakaronga kuratidzira pamberi paVaMugabe vachivabvunza kuti mabasa haasi kuwanikwa zvavapedza zvidzidzo. Vasori vanonzi vaiti havangaregi mutungamiriri wenyika achinyadziswa sezvaakamboitwa nevamwe vatungamiriri ve Zinasu kuUniversity ye Zimbabwe ku Harare masvondo mashoma apfuura. VaMutombeni vakapedza zvdzidzo zveIndustrial Relations, vati varwadziwa zvikuru vachitadza kuenda kunopemberera kupedza kwavo zvidzidzo nenyaya iyi. “Zvinosuwisa zvikuru kuti tapedza makore mana tichidzidza asi kwakauya vasori kwatiri vachiti vari kuziva zvatiri kuda kuudza mukuru wenyika kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka uye kuti vatipe mabasa asi tanzi tikaita izvi pedu papera.” VaDzingirai vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nenyaya iyi uye vari kugara mukutya sezvo vasori vakavaudza kuti vari kuvateverera pose pavanofamba kusvika gungano iri rapera. “Zvinotirwadza kuti takatyikridzirwa zvikuru nevasori kuti tisatombosvika painoitrwa girajuwesheni nekuti vakati vanogona kutinyangarisa.” Vadzidzi vakawanda vari kunyunyuta kuti vari kupedza nguva yakawanda vachidzidza asi vozoshya mabasa. Vazhinji vanoti vave kurarama nekutengesa zvinhu mumugwagwa. VaMuhavo vanoti vari kurwadziwa moyo nekuti vabereki vavo vatadza kuona vachipeta zvidzidzo zvavo nekupihwa chitambi. “ Zvinhu zvinorwadzo zvachose nekuti tinogona kuzonyimwa magwaro atakadzidza nenyaya iyi apa vabereki vedu vainetseka kutibhadharia mari vanga vakatarisira kuti purururidzira vachipembera asi izvi zvaramba nekuti takutotyira hupenyu hwedu sezvo takanzi tikangotsika tsoka dzedu kuchikoro uku tapera.” Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko paGreat Zimbabwe University VaAnderson Chipatiso varamba kutaura ne Studio 7 nezvenyaya iyi. Vadzidzi vapinda pachikoro ichi vanga vachigirajuweta vakapinda tsekwende yekusechwa zvakasimba nemapurisa pamwe nevasori pagedhe vachitariswa kuti havana zvinyorwa here zvekuratidzira. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevasaro kana mapurisa nezvenyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Vasori Vorambidza Nhengo dzeZINASU Kupinda paGungano reKupedza Zvidzidzo paGreat Zimbabwe University

text: Hurumende inoti yave kuferefeta huwori hunonzi huri kuitwa nemakanzura ebato reCitizens’ Coalition for Change mukanzuru yeguta reHarare pakutengeserana nzvimbo dzekuvakira dzimba pamwe nemabhizimusi. Izvi zvinotevera nyaya yaburitswa nebepanhau reThe Herald yekuti makanzura aya ari kutengeserana nzvimbo dzekuvakira nemari iri pasi kwazvo zvekusvika kumadhora makumi matanhatu panzvimbo yekuvakira imba, kuchitiwo nzvimbo dzekuvakira mabhizimusi dzichinzi dziri kutengeswa nemari inosvika kumadhora ekuAmerica zviuru zvitanhatu chete. Bepanhau iri rinoti vamwe vevanenge vatenga nzvimbo idzi nemari dziri pasi kudai vari kuzodzitengesa nemari dzinodarika madhora emuAmerica zviuru zana, kana kuti US$100,000.00, dzinove mari dziri pamusororo zvakanyanya. Munyori anoona nezvedunhu reHarare, VaTafadzwa Muguti vanoti sedunhu reHarare vanga vari kutambura nekuti vaone kuti zviri kufamba seinenyaya yenzvimbo dzekuvakira, vachiti madafanha mazhinji atengeswa muHarare. VaMuguti vanoti ongororo yavakaita inoratidza kuti vanhu vanenge vatengeserwa ava vanenge vaine magwaro anobva kukanzuru yeHarare asi vasina mapepa anobva kuEnvironmental Management Authority, kana kuti EMA, izvo zvinoratidza kuti panenge pasina kutevedzerwa gwara rinofanirwa kuteverwa. "Isu sehurumende we are going to do ma investigations edu, toongorora kuti land iri kutengeswa sei? Kana tichinge taongorora tinovimbisa veruzhinji kuti ma councillors nema officials ari involved mukati me corruption iyi vachasungwa. VaMuguti vatiwo hurumende yakapindira pakugoverwa kwenzvimbo dzekutengesera dzemusika weMupedzanhao mushure mekunge yaona kuti zvakanga zvave kupindirwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika uye zvaiitwa nehuwori. Vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kutarisira kuvhurwa kwemusika uyu munguva pfupi inotevera. No media source currently available Asi mumwe wemakanzura adomwa nemazita munyaya yaburitswa nebepanhau reThe Herald vari kanzura veWard 16 muHarare, VaDenford Ngadziore vebato reCCC, vanoti aya manyepo akanangana nekuda kuti vagari vamukire kanzuru yavo. VaNgadziore vanoti Kanzuru yeHarare inoshandisa mitemo inonzi "Policy of Any Nature" iyo inopa kuvagari. Vanoti mutemo unopiwa kuvagari uyu ndiwo zvakare unoshanda pamakanzura pamwe nevakuru mukanzuru, nekudaro hapana tsvete yavanopiwa. "Zvakare pane inonzi ministerial directive yakapiwa ne Ministry of Local Government inogavhena kuti kanzura anowana sei residential, anowana sei industrial. So proccess iyoyo ndiyo inoshandiswa," vanodaro VaNgadziore. Vanoti vazhinji vavo vari kupiwa mukana wekushandisa nzvimbo idzi vachibhadhara mari kukanzuru pamwe dzi kwemakore mashanu kana kuti lease, uye hakuna anobvumidzwa kutengesa sitendi inenge iri pasi pechibvumirano ichi. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoronga Kuferefeta Huwori Hunonzi neHerald Huri Kuitwa neMakanzura eCCC muGuta reHarare, Uho Makanzura aya Anoti Manyepo

text: Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe iri kuita misangano yechimbi chimbi nevemabhizimisi kuyedza kudzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika hwananga zvakare kumawere zvichitevera kushaya simba kworamba kuchiita dhora remunyika zvokonzera kusagadzikana sezvo mitengo yezvinhu iri kuramba ichikwira uku mihoro yevashandi isiri kuwedzerwa. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau mushure mekupera kwemusangano nevemabhizimisi nemusi weChishanu, gavhuna weRBZ VaJohn Mangudya vakati nhaurirano dzinofanira kuenderera mberi asi vakati bazi rebhanga ravo rekuferefeta huori kana kuti reFinancial Intelligence Unit richaranga vose vari kutengesa mari pamukoto uye kudhurisa zvinhu zvisina kukodzera. VaMangudya vakavimbisawo kupa vemabhizimisi mari dzavanenge vatenga pamusika weRBZ Foreign Currency Auction nechimbi chimbi kuti vatange mabasa ekugadzira zvinhu uye kutsvaga nzira dzekusimbaradza dhora remunyika iro roramba richishaya simba. Mumwe akapinda mumusangano uyu mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers VaDenford Mutashu. vanotiwo vari kunetsekana nekukwira zvakanyanya kwemutengo wechingwa nezvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana. Asi mumashoko kuvatori venhau, sachigaro weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe VaTafadzwa Musarara vakati mari yainge yakwira mutengo pamusika weRBZ Foreign Currency Auction uye kushaikwa kwemagetsi kuri kupa kuti vanobika vashandise dhiziri rinodhura. Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kumushandi. Vachipawo pfungwa dzavo Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vati zviri kuitwa neRBZ kumhanyirira kunorima nebadza risina mupini. Vaimbotungamira sangano remabhizimisi reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries VaCallisto Jokonya vati dhora remunyika rinosimba chete kana zvinhu zvakawanda zvagadzirwa nekukwenenzverwa munyika. Kunyangwe zvinhu zviri kuratidza kusagadzikana, gurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube vanoti vanotarisira kuti hupfumi huchakwira gore rino nezvikamu zvishanu nechidimbu kubva muzana kana kuti 5,5% uye mitengo yezvinhu ichiderera. World Bank inotiwo inotarisira kuti hupfumi hweZimbabwe hukwire nezvikamu zvina nezviga zvitatu kubva muzana kana kuti 4, 3% gore rino ndokunge paita goho rakanaka nekusimbaradza nyaya dzezvehupfumi.
title: RBZ Yotsvaga Nzira dzeKusimbaradza Dhora reMunyika Iro Roramba Richishaya Simba Zvokwidza Mitengo

text: Dare rehurumende yeAmerica mudunhu reMinnesota neChipiri rakapomera zviri pamutemo vanhu makumi mana nevanomwe mhosva yekubira hurumende mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu emadhora, kana kuti $250 million, vachishandisa mukana wedenda reCovid-19, muhumbavha hunonzi ndihwo hwakakurisisa. Magwaro akaburitswa kune veruzhinji ari kupomera vanhu ava mhosva dzakawanda dzinosanganisira zvibvumirano zvekubira hurumende, kuba mari vachishandisa madandemutande, kufambisa mari yekuba zvisiri pamutemo uye kuita zvechiokomuhomwe. Vachuchisi vanoti vanhu ava vakaumba makambani aiti ari kupa chikafu kuzviuru zvevana vanobva kumhuri dzinotambira mari shoma mudunhu re Minnesota rose, ozodzoserwa mari pasi pechirongwa chehurumende. Asi vachuchisi vakati chikafu chishoma shoma chete ndicho chakagoverwa, uye vanhu ava vakazvitengera zvikakarara zvemotokari, midziyo nezvishongo. Gore rino bazi rezvemitemo muAmerica rinonzi rakatara kuti kutongwa kwevakaba mari dzine chekuita nedenda reCovid-19 kuve nyaya iri pamusoro. VaCharles Muchineripi Mutama, vanove chizvarwa cheZimbabwe vari zvakare mutungamiri webato rePatriotic Zimbabweans Party, vanoti huwori huri kwese asi zvinozosiyana ndezvekuti muAmerica mune mitemo inoshanda mukurwisana nehuwori. No media source currently available
title: Dare reHurumende yeAmerica Rinopomera Vanhu Vanodarika Makumi Mana Mhosva yeKuba Mamiriyoni eMadhora Vachishandisa Denda reCovid-19

text: Vatsigiri veZanu-PF vari kupomerwa mhosva yekudzinga pamusha mhuri yenhengo yeCitizens Coalition for Change Muzvare Moreblessing Ali avo vakawanikwa vakapondwa kuNyatsime, Chitungwiza nemusi weMugovera. Mutumbi wavo wakawanika wakakandwa mugomba wakachekwa nepakati uye wakaendeswa kuchipatara cheChitungwiza. Vakapedzisira kuonekwa musi wa 24 mwedzi wapera manheri vaina Pius Jamba vanonzi inhengo yebato reZanu-PF. Gweta remhuri yaMuzvare Moreblessing Ali vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wasachigaro webato reCCC VaJob Sikhala vaudza Studio 7 kuti hama dzavo dzabuda nechisungo chekuti havaradzikwe kusvika mhondi yakavauraya yasungwa. No media source currently available Parufu rwavo papambwa madzimai makumi maviri ebato reCCC vazowanikwa vakakandwa musango mushure mekurohwa zvakaipisisa. Sezvo tichitema tisina divi ratinorerekera, tabatwo mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi avo varamba kuti vatsigiri vebato ravo vari kuita mhirizhonga. Vatiwo parufu hapangadzingwe vatsigiri veZanu-PF. No media source currently available Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vaudza Studio 7 kuti mapurisa ari kuenderera mberi nekutsvaga anofungidzirwa kuti akaponda Muzvare Moreblessing. Panyaya yemhirizhonga vati vanoongorora kana pamhan’arwa nyaya. No media source currently available
title: Mhuri yaMuzvare Moreblessing Ali Inoti Havavigwe Kusvika Mhondi Yakavauraya Yasungwa

text: Mumwe chiremba ari muno muAmerica uye vari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Doctor Simbiso Ranga, vanoti zvakakosha zvikuru kuti veruzihinji vazvipire kuwana nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19, sezvo iri iyo chete nzira inokwanisa kuburitsa vanhu kubva mumatambudziko akonzerwa nedenda iri pasi rose. Izvi zvinotevera kubaiwa nhomba yekutanga yemushonga we Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 kwavakaitwa ivo Doctor Ranga neMuvhuro wapera, uye vanotarisira kubaiwa imwe nhomba yepiri musi wa14 kana 15 Ndira gore rinouya. America yakatanga kushandisa nhomba iyi kubva musi wa 11 Zvita, uye yakatanga kupiwa kuvashandi vari muboka rezvehutano pamwe nevamwe vari kushanda mukurwisana nechirwere ichi. Asi kune vamwe vanhu vanonzi vari kutaura mashoko akaipa pamusoro penhomba iyi, izvo zvinonzi zvave kuita kuti vamwe vanhu, zvikuru vekuAfrica, vatye kubaiwa mushonga uyu. Asi Doctor Ranga vanoti mushonga uyu inhomba inongoshanda sedzimwe nhomba dzose mukudzivirira zvirwere, uye haina njodzi sezviri kutaurwa nevanhu vari kuipikisa. No media source currently available
title: Veruzhinji Vokurudzirwa Kuti Vasatya Kubaiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Kana Vawana Mukana

text: Hurumende kuburikidza nebazi rezvemaindustry nekutengeserana, sangano Hurumende kuburikidza nebazi rezvemaindasitiri nekutengeserana, sangano reZimbabwe Evidence Informed Policy Network kana kuti ZEIPNET uye sangano reZIMTRADE, inoti zvekudya zvinofanirwa kutengeswa kunze kwenyika kuitira kuti nyika iwane mari. Hurumende kuburikidza nebazi rezvemaindasitiri nekutengeserana, sangano reZimbabwe Evidence Informed Policy Network kana kuti ZEIPNET uye sangano reZIMTRADE, inoti zvekudya zvinofanirwa kutengeswa kunze kwenyika kuitira kuti nyika iwane mari. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano wakakosha muHarare neChipiri wekuyedza kuumba hwaro hwekukurudzira kutengeswa kunze kwezvidyiwa nemichero zvinowanikwa munyika kana kuti indigenous foods. Chirongwa ichi chakanangana zvikuru nemadzimai. Mukuru wesangano reZEIPNET, VaRonald Munatsi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vaona zvakakosha kuita musangano uyu kuitira kuti varovanise misoro vachitsvaga nzira dzekuona kuti vangatengese sei zvinhu izvi kunze. Ko zvii zvikafu zvinenge zvichitengeswa? Amai Pamela Muzenda veZIMTRADE vanoti michero inenge mawuyu, chakata, mazhanje, masawu nezvimwe zvine misika kunze kwenyika. Zimbabwe kazhinji inotengesa zvinhu zvakaita sefodya nezvicherwa zvakaita segoridhe nemangoda. Izvi zviri kukonzerwa nemisika yekunze isina kumira zvakanaka. Ko zvidyiwa zvechinyakare zvingabatsire here munyaya dzekuwedzera zvinotegeswa kunze? Amai Muzenda vanowedzera kuti pachine zvakawanda zvinoda kuitwa kuti nyika izokwanise kutenga zvidyiwa zvechinyakare kunze. VaMunatsi vanoti semaonero avo pane mukana wakakura zvikuru ndokusaka varonga musangano wa Asi dzimwe nyanzvi dzezvehupfumi dzakaita Doctor Prosper Chitamba dzinoti iri idanho rakanaka chose asi pane zvimhingamupinyi zvinogona kuwanikwa. Vachitura bhajeti ravo regore rinouya, gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakati gore rinouya vari kutarisira kutengesa zvinhu zvinopfura mabhiriyoni matatu nezviuru zvina zvemadhora asi ichitenga zvinhu zvinosvika mabhiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru mazana matatu zvemadhora. Izvi ndizvo zvinonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi zviri kupa kuti nyika itatarike zvakanyanya munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Hurumende kazhinji inoti chinopa kuti itadze kutengesa zvinhu kunze inyaya dzezvirango zvainoti yakatemerwa nenyika dzakabudiira dzakaita seAmerica nenyika dziri mumubatanidzwa weEuropean Union. Asi vanopikisa nenyanzvi munya dzezvehupfumi vanoti kutadza kutonga kwehurumende yeZanu-PF ndiko kwapa kuti nyika iite seyakageza negoka munyama. No media source currently available
title: Zvidyiwa Zvokurudzirwa Kutengeswa Kunze kweNyika

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa, reLabor, Economists and Afrikan Democrats, Muzvare Linda Masarira, vanoti havasi kufara nekudzikiswa kwakaitwa nguva yekuchengetedzwa kwevanhu vanenge vapinda munyika apo vanenge vachiongororwa kana vaine hutachiwana hweCovid -19 here kana kuti kwete. Hurumende yakazivisa svondo rino kuti yakanga yaderedza mazuva anoiswa vanhu mu quarantine kubva pamazuva gumi nemana kusvika pamuzuva manomwe. Asi Muzvare Masarira vanoti kuita kwakadai kuchapa kuti munyika muite dambudziko guru reCoronavirus sezvo vanhu vacharegedzwa vachipinda munyika ivo vatori nechirwere cheCovid-19 asi chisati chabuda. Hurongwa hwekuchinja mazuva anoiswa vanhu vanenge vachibva kunze kwenyika mu quarantine, hwakaziviswa negurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo. Asi Muzvare Masarira vanoti danho rakatorwa iri rinotyora kurudziro yesangano reWorld Health Organization. No media source currently available Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaMoyo sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Doctor Energy Mutodi, vanoti hapana zvakaipa zvakaitwa nehurumende. VaMutodi vanoti Zimbabwe ichange ichitevera mitemo yese inokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organization apo inenge ichitambira vanhu vanopinda munyika munguva iyo nyika yakavharwa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, icho chabata vanhu makumi matatu nemumwe chete, uye kuuraya vanhu vana muZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Masarira Voshushikana Zvichitevera Kudzikiswa kweMazuva eQuarantine

text: Mutevedzeri wemumiriri wenyika yeAmerica muZimbabwe VaThomas Hastings vanoti gurukota rinoona nezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube havana kuzivisa nyika mari chaiyo yakapihwa Zimbabwe nenyika yavo apo vaitura hurongwa hwebhajeti regore rinouya. VaHastings vakataura mashoko aya ku Zaka nezuro apo vakashanyira chipatara cheNdanga Hospital icho chakabatsirwa nemari pachirongwa chekuchecheudza vanhurume senzira yekuvadzivirira kuti vasatapurirwe nyore chirwere cheHIV/AIDS. Mari iyi iri pasi pehomwe yemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump inonzi United States President's Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief kana kuti PERPFAR. Mumiriri weAmerica anoti mari yakabudiswa naVaNcube mubhajeti ravo haisiriyo uye haina kukwana. Vakati mubhajeti regore ra2020, VaNcube, vakati nyika ye America mugore ra2019 yakabatsira ne mari inosvika mamirioni mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu asi ivo vakapa mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana makumi matatu nemakumi matatu. Vanoti imwe mari yakabatsira panjodzi redutumupenge reCyclone Idai uye havazivi kuti sei hurumende yakadzikisa huwandu hwemari yenyika yavo. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangawana vaudza Studio 7 kuti itaure naVaNcube mbune nezvenyaya iyi. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vaNcube kuti tinzwe divi ravo, asi America yave nyika yechipiri kuramba kutambira zvavakatura. Hurumende yeChina yakaratidzawo kusafara nemari yavakanzi vakabatsira nayo Zimbabwe. Mushure mekuita musangano nemuzinda weChina muZimbabwe, VaNcube vakatenda kuti vainge vakanganisa. Tatumirawo mibvunzo paWhatsApp ku mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana asi vange vasati vapindura. Kunyangwe tatadza kutaura negurukota rezve mari VaNcube kuti tinzwe divi ravo, Nyika ye Amereka yakaratidza kusafara nekusabuda kwe chokwadi pahuwandu hwakabva kunyika yavo rwe rubatsiro pabhajeti. Zvichakadaro muzinda weAmerica uri kushanda pamwe ne sangano rana chiremba vedzisvondo re Zimbabwe Association of Church Related Hospital(ZACRCH), kuita chirongwa ichi muZaka icho chakatangwa mugore ra2013. Vachitaura pakushanya kwaVahastings, vagari pamwechete nevashandi mubazi rezvehutano vanoti chirongwa ichi chiri kubatsira zvikuru kudzivirira kutapurwa kwe chirerwe che HIV ne Aids ne zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana. VaHastinga vanoti America yakashandisa mari inosvika mamirioni zana nemakumi maviri muchirongwa ichi mugore ra 2019 chete. Vakatiwo nyika yavo icharamba ichishanda ne Zimbabwe mukuriwsa chirwere che HIV ne AIDS munyika kusvika chirwere ichi chakundwa. Vanoona nezve kufambiswa kwebasa muZARCH , Dr Joseph Hove, vakati chirongwa ichi chiri kubatsira zvikuru mukudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere che HIV and AIDS uye chakatambirwa zvakanyanya nevanhurume mudunhu reZaka. Mumwe mugari wemuraini rekwa Chipezeze, VaLloyd Bvekete, avo vakachecheudzwawo vanoti chirongwa ichi chakakosha kwete kuvarume chete mukurwisa HIV ne AIDS asi kuvanhukadzi zvekare sezvo chichi dzivirirawo zvimwe zvirwere zvepabonde pamwe negomarara. Izvi zvakatsinhirwa naVaLeo Kufa, vanova mukoti wehurumende pachipatara cheNdanga vachiti chirongwa ichi chabetsera mudunhu ravo mukudzivira HIV ne AIDS. Mukuru webasa pachipatara che Ndanga, Dr Morgan Muzondo, vakatenda zvikuru rubatsiro rwakapuwa nechirongwa che PEPFAR chemuzinda weAmerica vachiti chiri kubatsira zvikuru bazi rezvehutano mukurwisa chirwere ichi. Chirongwa ichi chiri kuitwa kune mamwe matunhu muMasvingo kusanganisira kuChiredzi ne Mwenezi uye hurumende ye America inoti icharamba ichitsigra Zimbabwe nezvikwanisiro. No media source currently available
title: America Inoti Mari Yayakapa Zimbabwe Yakawanda Kudarika Yakataurwa naVaMthuli Ncube muBhajeti

text: Vaimbova gurukota rezvemukati menyika uye vari munyori mukuru muZanu PF, VaObert Mpofu, nemusi weChipiri vakaudza komisheni iri kuongorora mhirizhonga yakaitika musi wa 1 Nyamavhuvhu muHarare kuti mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vakabvuma kuti vakange vakundwa musarudzo. Asi MDC inoti zviri kutaurwa naVaMpofu izvi hazvina musoro. Vachipa humbowo hwavo kukomisheni iyi iyo iri kutungamirwa nevakambova mutungamiri weSouth Africa kwechinguvana, VaKgalema Motlanthe, VaMpofu vati vakafonera VaChamisa musi wakaitika mhirizhonga iyi vachida kuti vamise vatsigiri vavo kuratidzira kwavaiita kudzamara zvainge zvabuda musarudzo zvaziviswa. VaMpofu vati munhaurirano yavo naVaChamisa, vakabvuma kuti vainge vakundwa musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Asi VaChamisa vakaudza komisheni iyi nemusi weMuvhuro kuti ivo sebato havana munhu wavakatuma kuti aratidzire musi uyu uye vakange vasingazive kuti kuratidzira uku kwakarongwa nani vachiti kana vachida kuratidzira vanotaura zviri pachena uye vanozviita zvine mutsindo. VaMpofu vati vane humbowo hwekutsikisa kwavakaita zvavaitaura naVaChamisa musi uyu parunhare kana kuti recording iyo yavapa kukomisheni iyi. Asi mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume vati zvataurwa naVaMpofu izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro sezvo vachiti VaChamisa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo idzi kunyange hazvo komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission yakazivisa kuti VaEmmerson Mnangagwa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika izvo zvakatsinhirwa nedare repamusoro-soro reConstitutional Court. VaMpofu vakarambawo kuti bato ravo rine chekuita nemhirizhonga yakaitika iyi iyo yakasiya vanhu vatanhatu vafa vachiti havana chekuita mhirizhonga sezvo vachiti bato ravo rine rutsigirwo rwakakura munyika yese. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti vanofungidzira kuti pane vanhu vane hunyanzvi hwepfuti kana kuti ma snipers vakanga vakatsvagwa neMDC musi wakaratidzirwa uyu kuti vapfure vanhu.
