Vachibvunzurudzwa nenhengo dzekomisheni iyi kuti sei vachifunga kudaro, VaMpofu vati muziviro wavo semunhu akaenda kuhondo ndewekuti hapana magorira anopfura masoja asi vanhuwo zvavo kuti asunungure nyika. Vatiwo pavaiva gurukota rezve mukati menyika panguva iyi vakaita zvose zvinodiwa pamutemo kukumbira masoja kuti abatsire mapurisa musi uyu sezvo mapurisa anga ari muHarare aive mashoma kuti akwanise kuchengetedza runyararo. Zvichakadai, mumwe wevapa hufakazi nhasi mutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, Muzvare Linda Masarira avo vati vechidiki veMDC Alliance vakaendeswa kuLivingstone kuZambia nekuCape Town kuSouth Africa kwavainodzidziswa kuti vadzivirire mavhoti ebato avo nenzira dzose dzavaikwanisa dzavasina kunyatsodedemura kukomisheni iyi. Vatiwo musi wakaratidzirwa uyu vakaona nhengo dzeMDC Alliance dzavaiziva dzaisanganisira VaJabulani Mutunzi vanove kanzura mukanzuru yeHarare vachitungamira kuratidzira uku. Izvi zvinouya apo VaChamisa vachiti nhengo dzebato ravo dzakanga dzisiri mumigwagwa dzichiratidzira musi uyu. VaChamisa vakatora nguva yavakapihwa nekomisheni iyi kuzivisa kuti vacharatidzira sebato kwesweramangwa musi weChina. Asi VaMafume vati zvaturwa naMuzvare Masarira ndezvemanyepo. Vamwe wevapawo hufakazi ndiVaPure Simango vanove mutyairi wemakombi avo vaudza komisheni iyi kuti vakazoona vakuvara pagumbo rekuruboshwe mushure mekupfurwa nevavanofungidzira kuti masoja musi uyu asi vakazorapwa zvavo. Hurumende inoti pakafa vanhu vatanhatu pamhirizhonga musi uyu asi masangano anoshanda akazvimirira anoti vanhu vakapfurwa vakafa vanodarika gumi sezvo vamwe vevanhu ava vakafira munzira vachienda kuzvipatara. Sangano ravana chiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights rinoti pane vanhu vazhinji vasina kumhan’ara zvakaitika kwavari sezvo richiti vanhu ava vaityirawo kuzoshungurudzwa nemapurisa.
title: VaObert Mpofu naMuzvare Linda Masarira Vopomera MDC Mhosva yeKukonzera Mhirizhonga Kukomisheni yaVaMothlante

text: VaPromise Mkwananzi vesangano revechidiki reTajamuka/Sesijikile vasvitsa mapepa kudare repamusorosoro reConstitutional Court vachida kuti dare iri ripe mutongo wekuti pane humbowo huzere hwekuti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe havachakodzera kuramba vachitonga nyika, nekudaro vanofanirwa kusiya chigaro. Vakwirirwa kudare panyaya iyi naVaMkwananzi mutungamiri wenyika pamwe negurukota rezvemitemo. VaMkwananzi vanoti mapepa avo avasvitsa kudare ane zvinhu gumi nezvishanu zvavari kuda kuti zvitariswe, asi chikuru pane zvose chiri chekuti VaMugabe vanofanirwa kusiya basa izvozvi nekukundikana kwavo kutonga pachitariswa zvikamu zvebumbiro remitemo, Section 50 neSection 89. Zvimwe zvavanoti zviri mumapepa avo inyaya yekuti VaMugabe vakwegura zvekuti kufambisa kwavo basa kwakanganisika, uyewo mashoko avanotaura pamusoro pevana veZimbabwe, ayo anonzi anokurudzira kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvemutemo pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika inoti zviri kuitwa naVaMkwananzi hazvina nematuro ose, ichiti haisi nyaya yakakodzera kuiswa kumatare. Nyanzvi iyi inoti izvi zvinokwaniswa chete kuitwa kuburikidza nedare reparamende, kana kuti kana mutungamiri wenyika arwara, kana kushaya. No media source currently available
title: VeTajamuka/Sesijikile Vokwira kuConstitutional Court Vachida Kuti VaMugabe Vasiye Chigaro

text: Mutungamiriri webato reZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kufara zvikuru nezvisungo zvaitwa neboka revechidiki vebato ravo, reYouth League, zvinosanganisira chekuti ndivo vachamirira bato iri musarudzo dzemutungamiriri wenyika gore rinouya pamwe nekuti hurumende inofanira kudzika mutemo wePatriotic Act uyo unonzi uchashandiswa kuranga vanotengesa, kushoropodza kana kukurudzira kuti nyika itemerwe zvirango zvehupfumi. Zvimwe zvisungo zvabuda pamusangano weboka revechidiki weYouth League wechinomwe wapetwa muHarare nhasi ndezvekuti hurumende imutsiridze chirongwa cheNational Youth Service Training pamwe nekuti mayunivhesiti nemakoregi munyika asungirwe kuti wese anoda kudzidza muzvikoro izvi atange aita zvidzidzo zve National Youth Service. Chimwe chisungo ndechekutiwo vese vanopinzwa basa muhurumende kana makambani ayo vanofanira kunge vaitawo zvidzidzo izvi. VaMnangagwa vati vafara zvikuru nezvisungo izvi uye vati vanozvitsigira. Vakurudzira vechidiki kuti vavatsvagire rutsigiro nebato pamwe nekuona kuti vanhu vanyoresa kuvhota kuti ivo neZanu PF vakunde zvine mutsindo musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Vakorokotedza vechidiki vakakunda musarudzo dzakaitwa nezuro vachiti vanofanira kushandira musangano. VaMnangagwa vati vechidiki ava ndivo maziso nenzeve dzemusangano uyewo vanofanira kubatsira musangano muzvirongwa zvawo zvese. Vatiwo zvirango zvehupfumi zvakatemerwa nyika mushure mekunge zvakumbirwa nevemapato anopikisa avasina kudomwa zvinofanira kubviswa sezvo zviri kukanganisa hupfumi wenyika. Vatiwo bato ravo rinovimba nekukoshesa vechidiki ndosanga riri kuvapa zvigaro mudare remakurukota, paramende pamwe nemakambani ehurumende. Musangano uyu wemazuva maviri wapera nhasi mumiriri weGutu West mudare reNational Assembly, VaJohn Paradza, vachisarudzwa vakasarudzwa kuve mutevedzeri wemunyori muchikamu chevechiki mubato iri. VaMmangagwa pachavo ndivo vachadoma munyori wechidiki anenge achivamirira muPolitiburo. Vakafanobata chinzvimbo chemutauriri muchikamu chevechidiki mubato reCitizens’ Coalition for Change, VaStephen Sarkozy Chuma, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chakashata kuti vechidiki vaite zvidzidzo zveNational Youth Service Training vachiti izvi zvingava zvinhu zvakanaka dai chirongwa ichi chaiitwa pasina zvematongerwo enyika. Vatiwo pane zvakashata zvakawanda zvaiitika apo chirongwa ichi chakazomiswa uye ndosaka vasingatsigire chisungo chaitwa pamusangano wevechidiki veZanu PF chekuti chirongwa ichi chimutsiridzwe. Vaimbove munyori musangano revadzidzi vemuzvikoro zvepamusorosoro reZimbabwe National Students Union, VaMakomborero Haruzivishe, vanoti havabvumirane nenyaya yekumanikidzira vechidiki vese kuti vaende kuNational Youth Service. Kunyange hazvo vechidiki vabuda nechisungo cheNational Youth Service ichi, dare remakurukota rakatoitawo chisungo chekudzora chirongwa ichi uye pave kutogadzirwa mutemo wekutangisa chirongwa ichi weNational Youth Service Act. Chirongwa cheNational Youth Service, icho chaizivikanwa sekuti Border Gezi, chakatangwa muna 2000 namushakabvu VaBorder Gezi, avo vaiva gurukota revechidiki uye vechidki vakapinda muchirongwa ichi vadzidzisirwa kuMt Darwin. Chirongwa ichi chakamiswa mushure mekushorwa sezvo vechidiki vainge vapinda muchirongwa ichi vainge vave kushandiswa neZanu PF vachipomerwa mhosva dzekuponda vanhu nekutyora dzimwe kodzero dzevanhu. Vechiki ava, avo vainziwo maGreen Bomber nekuda kweruvara rwembatya dzavaipfeka, vaitambiriswa mari nehurumende pasina basa ravaiita muhurumende uye vazhinji vavo vakazodzingwa panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa iyo yaisanganisira Zanu PF nezvikwata zviviri zveMDC. No media source currently available
title: Musangano weVechidiki veZanu PF Unopetwa Uchisunga Kuti Mutungamiri weBato, VaMnangagwa, vave Ivo vachamirira Bato muSarudzo dza2023

text:
Vamwe vagari vemuMasvingo nemusi weMvhuro vakaramba kutambira bhiri rekusora kana kuti Cyber Security and Data Protection, vachiti hurumende inogona kushandisa mutemo uyu kumbunyikidza vanopikisa pamwe nevatori venhau munyika uye kutyora kodzero dzavo dzekutaura vakasunungukua pamasai sai.

Vachitaura pamusangano waitwa paMucheke Hall, vamwe vagari vemuMasvingo, vati zvimwe zvikamu zvebhiri iri zvinogona kushandiswa kushungurdzwa vanhu vane pfungwa dzinopikisana nevanotonga izvo zvinoita kuti vanhu vasakwanise kutaura nhuna dzavo munyika pajekerere. VaJeffrson Chitando, vanoti, bhiri iri richashandiswa kupenengura magwaro ne mashoko akavanzika evanhu uye harina chikamu chinodzivirira avo vanenge vafumura vakuru vakuru panyaya dzehuori. Vamwewo vati bhiri iri rinogona kuzoshandiswa kusunga vezve matongerwe enyika pamwe nemasangano akazvimirira ayo anoongorora zviri kuitika munyika sezvo rine chikamu chekuti vanofambisa nhema pamasai sai vasungwe.

Sachigaro wesangano revatori venhau reMISA Zimbabwe, VaGolden Maunganidze, vatiwo bhiri iri rinogona kushandiswa kumbunyikidza kodzero dzevatori venhau uye kuti vasaite basa ravo vakasununguka. Asi vamwe vatsigira bhiri iri vachiti rakanaka chaizvo nekuti vamwe vanhu munyika vari kushandisa madandemutande akaita seWhatsApp neTwitter zvisirizvo vachishoropodza hurumende pamwe nekuzvidza vamwe. Vamwewo vanotiwo madandemutande ari kushandiswa kufumura zvakavanzika zvevanhu kunyanya nyaya dzerudo nekudaro nhubu dzinofanira kurangwa nekusungwa. VaGashiya Mundondo, nhengo yeZanu PF, vanoti vanotsigira bhiri iri nekuti vazhinji vari kushandisa madandemutande akaita seWhatsapp, Twitter neFacebook kushoropodza hurumende. Amai Precious Chinhamo Masango, nhengo yeparamende kuMangura, vange vachitungamirira chikwata cheParamende chebiri iri, vati basa ravo rafamba zvakana sezvo vagari vange vane ruzivo rezviri mubhiri. Muneimwewo nyaya, mukuru wesangano reMasvingo Centre for Research and Development(MACRAD), VaEpharaim Mtombeni, vapuwa mukana wekubhara mari yechibatiso inosvika chiuru chemadhora ema RTGS, kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaNeville Wamambo, vati VaMtombeni vazvipire kumapurisa kamwe pamwedzi uye vagare pamba pavo. Gweta raVaMtombeni, VaMartin Mureri, vanoti VaMtombeni vakasungwa svondo rapfuura vachipomerwa mhosva yekutuka mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmerson Mangagwa, vachinzi vakavapomera mhosva yekuti ndivo vari kupa kuti vanhu vatambure munyika. Asi VaMtombeni vari kuramba mhosva iyi. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vagari vekuMasvingo Voramba Kutambira Bhiri reKusora

text: Vaimbova mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe Ambassador Charles Ray vanoti Zimbabwe inokwanisa kubuda mumadhaka mairi ikaremekedza kodzero dzevanhu nekuitawo sarudzo dzakachena. VaRay vaive mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, kubva mugore ra 2009 kusvika muna 2012. Ambassador Ray vanoti hupenyu hwavakararama muZimbabwe panguva yakavavhurawo maziso pane zvakawanda, "Vanhu vemuZimbabwe vakadzidza, inyika ine zvicherwa zvakawanda, uye zvivakwa zvizhinji." Vanoendereramberi vachitiwo, "Zvivakwa izvi zvinoda kuchengetedzwa. Handina kufarira kuti zvinhu hazvina hazvo kunyaya kushanduka munguva yandakagara mu Zimbabwe asi ndichine ndangariro dzenzvimbo dzakaita seVictoria Falls, Great Zimbabwe, nemhuka dzesangao dzakawanda .Izvi zvose zvinoda kuratidzwa dzimwe nyika dzisingazivi." VaRay avo vaive muZimbabwe munguva iyo nyika yaitongwa naVaRobert Mugabe vanoti nyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu yaivashungurudza zvikuru. Kunyangwe hazvo hurumende yaipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu, Varay vanoti vaive nedzimwe shamwari dzine chitsama muhurumende iyi. Tabvunzawo kuti vakambogarawo pasi here semumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, nehutungamiririr hwehurumende dzeAmerica neZimbabwe vachiedzawo kuona kuti vangabatsire sei munyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe neAmerica kuti zvirerutswe kana kuti zvisakanganise hupenyu hwevanhuwo zvavo vasiri muhutungamiriri hwezvematongerwo enyika? VaRay vapindura vachiti, ''Hakuna kutemerwa vanhuwo zvavo zvirango zvehupfumi , asi hurumende nevanhu vangangosvika mazana maviri vaive muhutungamiriri hwenyika." Vanotizve, "Zvirongwa zvaimiswa ndezve kupa mari kuhurumende yeZimbabwe ichibva kuAmerica iri nzira yekuedza kuonesa vakuru venyika yeZimbabwe kuti vachinje maitiro." Panyaya yesarudzo dzemunyika, VaRay vatiwo ishuviro yavo kuti dzive dzakachena . Vatiwo pavakaenda kuZimbabwe kwanga kuchangobva kugadzwa hurumende yemubatanidzwa yeZANU PF, MDC ne MDC-T kunyangwe hazvo MDC-T yaive yakunda musarudzo dza 2008. Tavabunnza kuti mubatanuidzwa uyu wanga wakanakira nyika ye Zimbabwe here panguva iyi? Vanoti, "Hurumende yemubatanidzwa ingadai yakaita basa rakawanda uye rakakura asi izvi hazvina kugoneka nekunetsana kwemapato eMDC-T neZANU PF. Bato re MDC-T rakaita zvakanaka kubvuma kupinda mumubatanidzwa kuitira hupenyu hwevanhu hwage hwava munjodzi huite zvakanaka. Vakafungawo nezveramangwana revatsigiri vavo." Mutungamiri weMDC-T VaMorgan Tsvangirai vanonzi nevakawanda vainge vakuda VaMugabe musarudzo dza2008. Asi hurumende inoti vakatadza kusvika mavhoti aidiwa zvakapa kuti sarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dziitwe kechipiri. Asi sarudzo idzi hadzina kuzoitwa sezvo VaTsvangirai vanoti vatsigiri vavo vainge voitwa kafiramberi nevatsigiri veZanu-PF. Panyaya yekuumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaRay vati havana zvakawanda zvavakabatsira nazvo sezvo vainge vachangopinda muhofisi., "Sekuziva kwangu , hakuna mumiririri weAmerica akapinda munhaurirano idzi nekuti kwaitove nemapoka aivabatsira akaitsa saana SADC, AU ne nyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neBritain dzine hukama neZimbabwe hwaienda kure." Ambassador Ray vanotiwo vanoshuvira nyika yeZimbabwe zvakanaka mune remangwana. Vachangewo vachitaura semufakazi nemusi weChitatu kudare reHouse Committee on Foreign Affairs muWashington DC pachange pachikurukurwa ne zvemamiriro akai zvinhu muZimbabwe kubva VaMugabe zvavasiya basa. No media source currently available
title: Vaimbova Mumiriri weAmerica VaRay Votaura nezveNguva Yavaigara muZimbabwe

text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neMugovera kuti hapana munhu akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vachiri chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu negumi kana kuti 1, 510. Vanhu gumi vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru makumi matatu nematanhatu zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri ana kuti 36, 662. Vanhu vasere vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvichireva kuti vanhu vapora kubva zvatanga chirwere ichi kupararira vave zviuru makumi matatu nemana zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 34, 257. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kana kuti 895. Pavanhu vachiri kurwara, vanhu makumi mashanu nemumwe ndivo vari muzvipatara. Kusvika parizvino, bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu zviuru makumi mana nemaviri zvine mazana maviri negumi kana kuti 42, 210 ndivo vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. Zvichakadaro, kunyangwe zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka pasi rose nenyaya yechirwere cheCovid-19 zvikuru kune vanoshanda muzvipatara, vakoti muZimbabwe vari kuti hurumende haina zvairi kuita kuti ivawedzerewo mari dzavanotambira. Hatina kukwanisa kuti tinzwe kubva kumutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga vanovezve gurukota rezvehutano sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Asi vakambovimbisa kuti vane chido chekuti vashandi ava vawedzerwe mari. Mutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti vari kushushikana nenyaya yekusawedzerwa mari vachiti zviri kupa kuti vashande vachigunun'una. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mana kana kuti 4 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vadarika zviiru zana nepfumbamwe kana kuti 110, 000. Vapora muAfrica vadarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 3, 6 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwave kuda kusvika zana remamiriyoni rine makumi maviri nematatu kana kuti 123, 9 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mana nechimwe kana kuti kuti 541, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe ane zviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 29, 7 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 2,7 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe ane zviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 69,6 million.
title: Hakuna Munhu Akafa neCovid-19 neMugovera Ukuwo Vakoti Vachinyunyuta neMari dzeMihoro

text:
Vanhu vakawanda vari kuwana zvekudya kuburikidza neWorld Food
Program (WHO) mumadhorobha vanoti mari yavari kupihwa haichakwane
kutenga chikafu chemhuri dzavo sezvo mitengo yacho iri kukwira
zvakanyanya. Mumwe wevanhu vave kutadza kutenga zvose zvinodikanwa zvekudya kuti
mhuri yavo ine vanhu vashanu irarame kwemwedzi wose ndiVaLloyd Mbirimi vekuAlaska. VaMbirimi vanoti pavakatanga kupihwa mari gore rapera yaikwana asi
nekuda kwekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu vave kutenga zvinhu zvishoma
zvichienzaniswa negore rapera sezvo mari isina kuwedzerwa. VaMbirimi vanoti nekuda kwekukwira kuri kuita mitengo yezvekudya vave
kutenga muzvitoro zvinotengesa nemitengo yakaderera zvakaita seMetro Peech neN.Richards sezvo zvitoro zvakaitaseOK, TM nezvimwe zvidiki zvave kudhura zvakanyanya.

Izvi zvinotsigirwa naAmai Grace Mutsokote avo vanoti chimwe chinoita
kuti vanotenga kuzvitoro zvikuru mutengo wemari yekuAmerica yakakwira
kudarika zvitoro zvidiki.

Dambudziko revanhu vari kupihwa zvekudya neWFP rinonzi ratekeshera
nyika yose sezvo vamwe vekuMasvingo vachiti vari kusangana
nedambudziko rimwe chete rekudhura kwezvinhu. Amai Nyadzisai Chaitezvi, avo vanogara mumusha weveruzhinji weMucheke kuMasvingo, vanotiwo vave kuita mitsetse yakakura muzvitoro zvikuru sezvo vachipihwa mazuva maviri kuti vatenge zvekudya.

Vanhu vakasatenga zvekudya mumazuva avanenge vataurirwa panoiswa
chiziviso mumbozhanhare kuti mari yavo yave mukadhi haazokwanise
kutenga rimwe zuva. Mukuru wezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muWFP muZimbabwe, VaNiels Balzer, vati vari kuona kukwira kuri kuita mitengo yezhinhu munyika yose. Asi vati vakawedzera mari zvinoreva kuti vachadzikisa huwandu hwevanhu vari kupihwa ruyamuro rwezvekudya. Asi VaBalzer vavimbisa kuti vachakwidza mari dzinopihwa vanhu mumwedzi waChikumi. VaBalzer vatiwo vari kupa vanhu mazuva matatu kusvika pamazuva mashanu kuti vatenge chikafu pamazuva akasiyana siyana senzira yekuti
vasaungane sezvinodiwa kuderedza mikana yekutapurirana chirwere
cheCovid-19. WFP iri kupa madhora gumi nemaviri ekuAmerica pamunhu kumhuri dzinenge dzakaonekwa kuti hadzichagona kuzviriritira mumadhorobha. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi uye vachishanda neLabor and Economic Development Researh Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti mari iri kubatsirwa vanhu neWFP, haisi yekuti vanhu vagare sembozha, sezvo iri yekuti vanhu vawane chikafu chete. Pakatanga chirongwa ichi, WFP yaipa vanhu vanosvika mazana mananemakumi mashanu ezviuru, 450 000. Asi mugwaro rayo rakabuda mwedzi uno, WFP inoti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana vave kuda rubatsro rwechikafu mumadhorobha.
title: WFP Yoronga Kuwedzera Mari yeChikafu Inopihwa Mhuri neSangano Iri

text: Makurukota ehurumende yeSouth Africa pamwe nemapurisa vaita musangano nevagari vemumusha weDiepsloot, muJohannesburg, South Africa zvichitevera kufa kwechizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaElvis Nyathi, avo vakapondwa nezvizvarwa zveSouth Africa svondo rino, izvo zviri kupomera zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika mhosva dzakasiyanasiyana munzvimbo iyi. Mumusangano uyu, uyo unonzi wanga uine hukasha kubva kumapoka maviri ezvizvarwa zveSouth Africa nezvekunze kwenyika, zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa zvinonzi zvakurudzira kuti zvizvarwa zvese zvekune dzimwe nyika, zvikuru vekuZimbabwe, vabude mumusha uyu zvichiti vari kupara mhosva dzakasiyanasiyana dzinosanganisira dzekuponda. Makurukota anonzi apinda mumusangano uyu anosanganisira gurukota rezvemapurisa mu south Africa, VaBheki Cele, gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muSouth Africa VaAaron Motsoaledi, pamwe nemutungamiri wedunhu re Gauteng VaDavid Makhura. VaNyathi vanonzi vakafa vachiita zvekutemwa nematombo vasati vapiswa nemoto nemusi weChitatu. Zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa zvinonzi zvakatanga kuratidzira zvichiti hazvisi kufara kuti mapurisa enyika iyi haasi kusunga vekunze vanonzi vari kutyora mutemo munyika iyi. Izvi zvinotevera kupondwa kwevanhu vasere vakapfurwa nepfuti mazuva adarika nematsotsi.
title: Makurukota emuSouth Africa Anosangana neVagari vemuDiepsloot Pamusoro peKurwiswa kweZvizvarwa zveKune Dzimwe Nyika

text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica vadonald trump nhasi vadoma mutongi wedare repamusoro soro mutsva VaBrett Kavanaugh kuti vatsive chigaro chakasiiwa naJustice Anthony Kennedy avo vakaenda pamudyandigere. Izvi zvave kureva kuti VaKavanaugh vave kuenda kudare reSenate kuti rivhote kuti votora chigaro ichi here. Bato rinopikisa remaDemocrats rinoti harisi kuvavhotera asi rine nhengo shoma zvekuti rinoda kuti vamwe vaviri kubva kumaRepublicans vavhote navo. America ine vatongi vapfumbamwe kudare repamusoro soro reSupreme Court.
title: VaTrump Vanodoma Mutongi weDare rePamusoro Soro muAmerica

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvematunhu VaSaviour Kasukuwere nemusi weChipiri vakati vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru weguta reHarare Amai Josephine Ncube vange vamiswa basa nameya weguta reHarare VaBernard Manyenyeni vadzoke pabasa. Amai Ncube vakamiswa basa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuzvitambirisa mari yakawanda uku guta richitatarika. Asi VaKasukuwere vati amai Ncube vakazoenda kumatare kanzuru inorasikirwa nemari. VaManyenyeni vanoti vanga vadaidzwa kumusangano uyu naVaKasukuwere asi vange vakabatikana. Vagari vemuHarare vanoti nyaya yekunetsana kwakanyanya pakati pameya naVaKssukuwere iri kupa kuti zvinhu zvirambe zvichinetsa munyika. No media source currently available
title: VaKasukuwere Vodzora Vakuru veKanzuru Vange Vamiswa Basa naVaManyenyeni

text: Imwe imba yehurumende yeZimbabwe kuCape Town yatengeswa nhasi nemari inosvika marands mamiriyoni mazana matu kuti nyika ibhadhare chikwereti kuvamwe varime vakatorerwa minda kubva muna 2000 pasina kupihwa muripo. Rimwewo bhanga rekugermany rinonzi Group KFW Bank Gruppe range rabatanawo navanasapurazi ava richiti Zimbabwe yakatadza kubhadhara chikwereti. Asi mumirir weZimbabwe kuSouth Africa VaIsaac Moyo vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vachadzokera kumatare sezvo vachiti Zimbabwe yainge yabhadhara imwe mari yechikwereti ichi. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu richishanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti zvaitwa kuZimbabwe zvinonyadzisa uye hazvipe chimiro chakanaka. Hurumende yeZimbabwe yakatenda kuti ichabhadhara vachena ava asi ikozvino haina mari. Nyaya iyi yakatanga mugore ra2008 mushure mekunge varimi vachena vanosvika makumi masere vaendesa nyaya yavo kudare reSADC Tribunal vachichema nerekuti vainge vatorerwa minda pachishandisa nyaya yerusarura ganda. Asi hurumende yeZimbabwe inoti minda yakatorwa kugadzirisa nyaya yekubvutwa kwainge kwaitwa minda nechisimba nevachena nyika isati yawana kuzvitonga kuzere. No media source currently available
title: Imba yeHurumende yeZimbabwe Yotengeswa kuSouth Africa neNyaya yeZvikwereti

text: Mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vazivisa neChipiri kuti matunhu eHeadlands neHurungwe West haasisina vamiriri mudare reNational Assembly zvichitevera kudzingwa mubato reZanu PF kwakaitwa vaimirira nzvimbo idzi vanoti VaDidymus Mutasa naVaTemba Mliswa. VaMudenda vati vakatambira tsamba musi wa19 Kukadzi kubva kumunyori wezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muZanu PF yaivazivisa kuti vaviri ava vange vasisamirire zvido zveZanu PF mudare iri. Vati danho ravatora rinoenderana nezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo iri rinoti, munhu anorega kuve nhengo yedare iri kana achinge arega kana kumiswa kuve nhengo yebato raaimirira apo akasarudzwa kuve nhengo yedare iri. Vati kunyange hazvo VaMutasa vakanyorera kuparamende vachiti kudzingwa kwavo muZanu PF kwainge kuri kunze kwemutemo, izvi handizvo zvingavamise kudzinga vaviri ava mudare. Vati chinodiwa chete pasi pemutemo kuti bato rivazivise sezvakitwa neZanu PF uye vati paramende ichanyorera kumutungamiri wenyika pamwe neveZimbabwe Electoral Commission ichavaturira kuti matunhu eHeadlands neHurungwe West haasisina vamiriri kuitira kuti kuzoitwa sarudzo. VaMliswa vaudza Studio7 kuti havana chekutaura pari zvino uye hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMutasa kuti tinzwe divi ravo pane zvaitika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemutemo zvakare vari mudzidzisi pachikoro cheUniversity of Zimbabwe, VaLovemore Madhuku, avo vanotungamira bato reNational Constitutional Assembly, vanoti VaMutasa naVaMliswa vane zviviri zvavanokwanisa kuita. Vati zviviri izvi kutambira zvaitwa nedare kana kuzvipikisa. VaMadhuku vanoti vaviri ava vane mukana wekubudirira panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: VaMutasa, VaMliswa Vanodzingwa Muparamende

text: Veruzhinji vanofamba nemotokari maMutare vange vasina kujaira izvi saka vanoti danho iri richazunza homwe dzavo idzo dzakaboka kare nemamiriro akaita nyaya dzehupfumi munyika. Ukuwo vakuru vekanzuru yeguta iri vanoti zvavari kuita izvi zvichabatsira kuti vakwanise kupedza zvikwereti zvavainazvo kuvashandi nevamwe vanovaitira mabasa uye kuti muguta munge muchishambidzika. VaPeter Mamvura mugari wemuguta iri vanoti danho ratorwa nekanzuru iri harina nematuro ose. “Zvinofanirwa kunge zvichiitika kuti zvemapre-paid izvi zvinge zviripo chete kuedza kuisa order muguta nekuti motokari dzinge dzakarongeka mukumira kwadzo kwete kuti riitwe sedanho rekutsvaga mari sezviri kuitwa nekanzuru iyi. Mari inokwanisa kutsvaga nedzimwe nzira kwete zviri kuitwa izvi kuti pose pose pave kunzi tibhadhare mari kumisa motokari.” Mumwe mugari wemaMutare mumusha weWestlea VaLuke Rowa vanoti kanzuru yaifanirwa kusiya dzimwe nzvimbo dzekuti motokari dzipakiwe pachena kuitira vaye vanenge vasiri kuda kutora nguva refu vari panzvimbo. “Sekuona kwangu kanzuru haifaniri kuti nzvimbo dzose dzinge dzichibhadharwa kumisa motokari sezvavave kuita izvi, at least paifanirwa kunge paine pamwe patinopakawo mota for free imomo muguta macho.” Vanodaro VaRowa. VaJacob Mhaka vanobvumirana naVaRowa, “Taifanirwa kusiyirwawo padiki pokuti tinge tichimisawo motokari dzedu nekuti zvavepo izvi zvonetsa.” VaThomas Zongoroti vanogara kuFlorida muno maMutare, uye vanoita basa rekutengesa zvakasiyana-siyana vanoti vave kutoita zvekupaka motokari musango kana mumasendiraini. “Mazuva ano zvave kutonetsa kuti timise motokari muTown nekuti mapurisa ekanzuru ari kutishungurudza. Mukaona mafaindi acho e$30 haisi mari yekutamba nayo apa vanhu mazuva ano hatina kana cent , inobvepi mari yacho panguva ino?” vanobvunza VaZongoroti Muzvare Jacquiline Tsepho anebhizinesi rezvinotengesa zvinodhaka muguta reMutare anoti kuita uku kuchamukanganisira bhizinesi rake rebhawa uye nerebhuchari. “Aaah we are not happy at all, coz you see kana munhu achida kutenga chinhu chedollar mushop then odzoka aclampiwa saka zvinorevei haa, hazviiti.” Anodaro muzvare Tsepho. VaDavid Mutambirwa vesanganoi revagari vemugura reMutare reMutare Residents and Ratepayers Association vanoti zviri kuitwa nekanzuru zvinosuwisa kwazvo uye vanoti vatoronga kuti vazosangane nemakanzura pamwechete nameya uye munyori weguta kuti vavape zvichemo zvavo. Meya weguta reMutare VaTatenda Nhamarare vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kutsvaga chouviri; saka nyaya yemapre-paid parking zones imwe yenzira yekuita izvi kuitira kuti vapedze zvikwereti zvine guta iri zvimwe zviri muvanhu, makambani uye nekumapazi ehurumende. “Sekanzuru takatora danho iri senzira yekuti tiwane mari yekugadzirisa nzira dzedu sezvo muchiziva kuti imwe yatakapiwa neZinara iri shoma mukuitira kuti migwagwa yedu inge yakanaka pamwechete nekuita odha muguta racho.” VaNhamarare vanodaro. Meya Nhamarare vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kuwana madhora ari pakati pezviuru gumi nezvishanu kusvika pazviuru makumi maviri pamwedzi woga woga kubva kumitero yekupaka motokari muguta. No media source currently available
title: Vagari vekwaMutare Vochema Chema neMari dzeKupaka Motokari

text: Mukuru wemauto emuAmerica, General Mark Milley vanoti mauto emuRussia zviuru zana kana kuti 100 000 vafa kana kuti vaurayiwa muhondo neUkraine. Vatiwo Ukraine inogona kunge yarasikirwa nehuwandu humwe chete hwemauto. Nhepfenyuro yeReuters inoti haisati yanzwa divi reRussia panyaya iyi. VaMilley vakataura mashoko aya kuNew York vakakurudzira runyarari kuti vanhu vasarambe vachifa. Nezuro Russia yakati nekutya kuti mauto ayo anoparadzwa neUkraine muguta raKherson yainge yodududza kubuda muguta iri. General Milley vanoti vanhu vari pakati pemamiriyoni gumi nemashanu nemamiriyoni makumi matatu kana kuti 15 kusvika 30 million vamanikidzwa kupinda muhupoteri uye zvizvarwa zveUkraine zvisiri mauto zviuru makumu mana zvafa muhondo iyi.
title: America Inoti Mauto eRussia Zviuru Zana (100,000) Afa Kana Kukuvara muHondo neUkraine

text: Hurumende yazivisa kuti yapa muzinda weZimbabwe uri muSouth Africa mvumo yakakosha kana kuti special waiver, yekufambisa mabasa ekudzoswa kumusha kwemitumbi yezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinenge zvashaikira munyika iyi munguva ino yeCovid-19. Mashoko aburitswa nemunyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, padandemutande reTwitter anoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinenge zvisina magwaro ekufambisa zvinenge zvashaya zvave kukwanisawo kudzoswa kumusha zvisina dambudziko. VaMangwana vakati izvi zvave kukwanisa kuitika kana hama dzemufi dzakangokwanisa chete kuwana gwaro re affidavit rinobva kuna sabhuku wavokana sadunhu vekwazvinobva, kana affidavit inobva kuhama dzemufi. Hurongwa uhwu husati hwavepo, magwaro ekutakura mutumbi anonzi aitotumirwa kuZimbabwe kuti agadziriswe, izvo zvinonzi zvaitora nguva vanhu vakamirira. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri muSouth Africa, zvikuru zviya zvinenge zvisina magwaro akakwana zvanga zvichishaira munyika iyi, zvinonzi zvanga zvichitarisana nedambudziko gukutu kuti mitumbi yazvo ikwanise kuendeswa kumusha kunoradzikwa zvine ruremekedzo. Sachigaro verimwe remasangano anobatsira vana veZimbabwe muSouth Africa, reGlobal Zimbabwe Forum, VaSolomon Sox Chikowero, vanoti sesangano vanotambira nemufaro hurongwa uhwu sezvo huchaderedza nguva ichatorwa nevehukama vachifambira mapepa ekuti vakwanise kutakura mutumbi kuenda nawo kumusha. VaChikowero vanoti zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri muSouth Africa zvisina mapepa zvinopedzisira zvave kushandisa magwaro enhema anenge asina mazita avo chaiwo, izvo zvinozonetsa kana vanhu ava vakazenge vashaya. Asi vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kubatsirawo pakutakurwa kwemitumbi kuendeswa kumusha, sezvo dzimwe mhuri dziri kutatarika kuunganidza mari dzinenge dzichidiwa kuti zvibudirire. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inopa Muzinda weZimbabwe kuSouth Africa Mvumo Yekufambisa Mapepa eVanofira Munyika Iyi

text: Sangano reJudicial Service Commission. JSC, rinoti riri kuvandudza mashandiro ematare ese munyika izvo zvicharerutsira vakaremara pamwe neveruzhinji munyika. Mumashoko avo pakucherechedza makore gumi nerimwe, komisheni iyi yava kushanda yakazvimirira kubva kubazi rezvemutemo, munyori weJSC, VaWalter Chikwana, vati chimwe chezvinangwa zvavo gore rino kuona kurerutsira vakaremara pakuenda kumatare pamwe nekuverenga magwaro emutemo. VaChikwana vati gore rino chete vane hurongwa hwekugadzirisa zvivakwa pamatare ese munyika kuti vaya vanofamba nemaWheelchair vakwanise kupinda mumatare. Vatiwo mitemo yakaita seMaintanance Act, Children’s Act nemimwe ichaiswa muzvinyorwa zveBraiile kuti vakwanise kushandisa mumatare. VaChikwana vatiwo vachagdzira gwaro rekubatsira vanoshandisa mitauro yemaoko uye vati vashandi vese vemumatare vachidziswa pamusoro pemutauro uyu. VaMasimba Kuchera avo vanoshanda nesangano reCentre fo Disability and Development vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotambira hurongwa hweJSC vakati vanovimba kuti huchabudirira. Gweta zvakare vari nhengo yesangano reLawyers with Disability Association, VaAbraham Mateta, vati zviri kurongwa zvakanaka chose asi zvakakosha kuti vanoshanda mumatare kusanganisira vatongi, vanyori nevaturikiri vanzwisise nyaya dzine chekuita nekuremara. Pava nechirongwa chinonzi Intergrated Electronic Case Management System chiri kutungamirwa nemutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Joseph Mafusire. Justice Mafusire vaudza Studio7 kuti izvi zvicharerutsira vanhu nekuti hapachashandiswa mapepa akawanda sezviri kuitika pari zvino. Justice Mafusire vati vanotarisira kuti kusvika muna Ndira gore rinouuya matare epamusoro eConstitutional Court neSupreme Court anenge ave kushandisa nzira iyi. No media source currently available
title: Matare Ovandudzwa Kuitira Kurerutsira Vakaremara

text: Rimwe sangano rakazvimkiirira rinorwira kodzero dzemadzimai nevanasikana reZimbabwe Women Against Corruption Trust (ZWACT) rinoti vanhukadzi nevasikana ndivo vari kunyanya kutambudzwa nenyaya dzehuori dziri kuitika munyika. ZWACT inoti hurumende inofanirwa kupindira uye kubatsira mukuona kuti vanhukadzi vakwanisa kumhan`ara nyaya dzehuori vasingazikanwi kuti hurumende igoongorora nekusunga vanhu vanoita izvi. Mukuru weZimbabwe Women Against Corruption Trust, Muzvare Sandra Matendere, vanoti mabasa anoitwa nevanhukadzi ndiwo anoita kuti vasangane nezvehuori kudarika vanhurume, vachiti madzimai anobvisiswa mari yechiwokomuhomwe kuzvipatara, kuzvikoro kwavanonotsvakira vana nzvimbo yechikoro, kwavanonotsvaka mvura yekushandisa mudzimba, kumahofisi ehurumende kwavanotora magwaro ekuzvarwa kwevana nedzimwe nzvimbo. Muzvare Matendere vanoti madzimai anotya kutaura pamusoro pemari dzavanobvisiswa idzi nekuti vanenge vachida kubatsirwa uye vachitya kuti vakamhang`ara vanozozvikanda mukanwa mamupere. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa diri regurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKzembe Kazembe asi vanogara vachiikurudzira vanhu kuti vanhu vamhan`are nyaya dzehuwori kumapurisa. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Women Against Corruption Trust Inoti Vanhukadzi Vaona Nhamo Nekubhadhariswa yeChiwokomuhomwe

text: Komiti inoona nezvekurongwa kwemisangano mubato rinopikisa reMDC-T, yeNational Organising Committee, yasangana pamuzinda webato iri muHarare neChipiri mangwanani kuti ironge nezvegadziriro yesarudzo, idzo dziri kutarisirwa gore rino. Mutauriri webato, VaObert Gutu, vanoti zvikuru zvakurukurwa mumusangano uyu ndezvekuti vachamirira bato musarudzo vachasarudzwa sei, uye kuti ndavanaani vanenge vachizovhotawo. VaGutu vanoti kunyange bato ravo riri mumubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance, chibvumirano chekuumba mubatanidzwa uyu hachirambidzi mapato kuita gadziriro dzawo akazvimirira. Asi VaGutu vanoti munzvimbo dzinenge dziine kuwirirana kwenhengo kuti dzinoda kumirirwa nani musarudzo, bato ravo harisi kuzoita sarudzo dzekutsvaga vachamirira bato kana kuti primary election. VaGutu vanotiwo imwe nyaya huru yakurukurwa mumusangano uyu ndeye hurongwa hwemisangano ichaitwa nebato ravo munyika yose inenge yakanangana nekutsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo. No media source currently available
title: Bato reMDC-T Rotanga Hurongwa hweKugadzirira Sarudzo

text: Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira varairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, vasungwa nemapurisa neChishanu vachipomerwa mhosva yekuve nechekuita nekuratidzira kwakaitwa nenhengo dzavo kuMasvingo nemusi weMuvhuro dzichida kuti hurumende idzipe mihoro yadzo nemari yekuAmerica. Munyori mukuru wesangano reARTUZ, VaRobson Chere vanoti VaMasaraure vashevedzwa mangwanani nemapurisa edivi reLaw and Order muHarare vachinzi vanoda kubvunzurudzwa nezvekuratidzira uku, asi pavasvika pakamba yeHarare Central Police Station vawana vakamirirwa nemapurisa ekuMasvingo, ayo abva angovatora ndokuenda navo. VaChere, avo vambobvunzurudzwawo nemapurisa panyaya yekupambwa kavakamboitwa gore rapera, vanoti vaudzwa negweta raVaMasaraure kuti vacharara muchitokisi vachitarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare Mugovera kwakare kuMasvingo. Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Nhengo dzeARTUZ dzakaratidzira dzichida kuti dzipiwe mihoro yadzo nemari yekuAmerica inoita mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri emadhora pamwedzi. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, Vanosungwa neMapurisa

text: Vamwe vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kukurudzira kuti zvikoro zvivhurwe sezvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kurwara nekufa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwaderera. Mumwe wevanhu ava, Muzvare Rudo Magwanyata, avo vanoshanda nesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanasikana, Shamwariyemwanasikana, vati kuvharwa kwezvikoro kuri kupa mukana wekuti vanasikana vaite zvepabonde nekubata pamuviri Muzvare Magwanyafa vawedzerawo vachiti kuvharwa kwezvikoro uku kuri kuwedzerawo kusarira shure kwevana vanobva kumhuri dzinoshaya avo vasiri kukwanisa kuita zvidzidzo zvepamadandemutande. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzebudiriro yevana, Amai Chinga Govhati, vatiwo kunyange hazvo zvakakosha kudzivirira denda reCovid-19, hurumende inofanirwawo kuzadzisa kodzero dzevana dzekuwana dzidzo. Amai Govhati vakurudzirawo kuti muzvikoro muiswe zvekushandisa zvakakwana zvinoita kuti zvikoro zvikwanise kurwisa denda reCovid-19. Munyori mukuru musangano rinomirira vadzidzisi vekumaruwa re Almagamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaRobson Chere, vatiwo mushure memakore maviri denda iri ravako, vanga vaine tarisiro yekuti hurumende inge yagadzirisa nyaya yezvikwanisiro muzvikoro pamwe nenyaya yemihoro yavadzidzi. Mutungamiri wesangano reMedical and Dental Private Practitioners of Zimbabwe Association, Dr Johannes Marisa, vatiwo chirwere ichi chadzikira zvekuti zvikoro zvinogona kuvhurwa. Mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vati havakwanisi kutaura nezvenyaya iyi sezvo sebazi vachitevedzera zvinenge zvataurwa nemutungamiriri wenyika. Asi mukuru anoona nezveCovid-19 munyika, Doctor Agnes Mahomva, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvikoro zvichavhurwa chete kana hurumende yagutsikana kuti vadzidzi nevarairidzi havazopindi mudambudziko rechirwere cheCovid-19. Hurumende yakawedzera nemasvondo maviri kuvharwa kwenyika, izvo zvakaita kuti zvikoro zvisavhurwe. No media source currently available
title: Vabereki Vokurudzira Kuvhurwa kweZvikoro

text: Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti havasi kufara nedanho riri kutorwa nebazi rekwaRegistrar General rekuramba kubhadhara nemakadhi kana vanhu vachida kutora magwaro avo kumahofisi aya. Vagari ava vanoti vashandi vekumahofisi anotorwa magwaro ekufambisa, zvitupa pamwe nemagwaro ekuberekwa, vari kuramba kuti munhu abhadhare achishandisa kadhi risiri rake kana rehama yake. Vashandi vekumahofisi anotorwa magwaro ekufambisa ava vari kuti kana munhu asina mari haafanirwe kushandise kadhi remumwe munhu waasina zita rechipiri rakafanana naye. Danho iri rashorwa nevagari vakawanda vachiti zvinoshamisa kuti hurumende, iyo iri kukurudzira kuti vanhu vashandise makandi, ndiyozve yotuma vashandi vayo kuti varambe kubhadharisa nemakadhi. Mumwe wevarambirwa kushandisa kadhi apo vanga vachida kubhadharira mwana wehanzvadzi yavo, ndiVaGladman Ndemera. VaNdemera vanoti vanoona kuramba kubhadhara nekadhi sedanho revashandi vehurumende rekuda kuti ivo vozoshandisa makadhi avo kutora mari inenge yabhadharwa nevanhu. Mumwe mugari wekuKanyaga, kuMakonde, Amai Rudo Kamudyariwa, vanoti vashamisika apo varambirwa kushandisa kadhi remurume wavo kutoresa munin’ina wavo gwaro rekufambisa. VaNdemera vanoti kushandisa kadhi remumwe munhu kubhadhara hazvina basa sezvo mari ichienda kumwe chete. VaNdemera vanoti mabazi ehurumende anofanirwa kutorwa semuenzaniso uye vanopiwa mari nebhangi guru renyika kana paine zvavanenge vachida kutenga kunze kwenyika. Mukuru pamahofisi ekwaRegistrar General muChinhoyi, VaKelvin Maturi, vabvuma kuti havasi kubvumira kuti vanhu vashandisirane makadhi pakubhadhara senzira yekuderedza chitsotsi chiri kuitika pahofisi pavo nekuda kwekushayikwa kwemari munyika. VaMaturi vabvumawo kuti vanonyatsoongorora kuti vanhu vari kuda kushandisirana kadhi ndeve hukama here kana kuti kwete. Asi pavabvunzwa kuti mutemo wehurumende here kana kuti vari kutevedzera zvinyorwa zvebazi ravo VaMaturi vadzambadzamba vachiti havazive sezvo vari kutevedzera zvavakanzi vaite nevakuru vavo kuHarare. Gwaro rekufambisa rinobhadharwa madhora makumi mashanu nemadhora matatu uye munhu ave kumiririra mavhiki matanhatu kuti ribude. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna Registrar-General, VaTobaiwa Mudede, panyaya iyi. Vanhu vari kutadza kuwana mari dzavo kumabhangi sezvo mabhangi ari kuti haana mari yekupa vanhu munyika. Vakawanda vari kurara mumitsetse yemabhangi asi nguva dzakawanda vari kungoshaya mari. Mabhangi akawanda ave kupa vanhu madhora makumi maviri emadhora kuvanhu vashoma vasingadarike makumi mashanu pazuva. Nekuda kwedambudziko rekushayikwa kwemari munyika hurumende iri kukurudzira kuti vanhu vashandise makadhi kubhadhara zvinhu zvavanenge vatenga kana zvavanenge vaitirwa. No media source currently available
title: Vanoda Kutora Magwaro Avo kwaRegistrar General Vonetsekana

text: Hurumende yeZimbabwe haikwanise kushandisa chibvumirano chayo che Extradition Treaty icho yakanyorerana ne America muna 1997. Hurumende yeZimbabwe haikwanise kushandisa chibvumirano chayo che Extradition Treaty icho yakanyorerana ne America muna 1997. Richipa mutongo waro panyaya yakakwidzwa kudare iri nemagweta ari kumirira Andrew Tashanduka Bere, uyo akasungwa nemapurisa kuChiredzi nechinangwa chekuti adzoserwe ku America uko akatiza mushure mekuwanikwa aine mhosva yekuba mari yemitero inodarika mamiriyoni manomwe emadhora, mutongi wedare iri, Va David Mangota, neChitatu vakati hapana mutemo weparamende unotsigira chibvumirano chiripo pakati pe America neZimbabwe, nokudaro musungwa haaendeswe kuAmerica. Izvi zvinoreva kuti Bere anofanirwa kubviswa muhusungwa. America yanga ichadawo zvakare kuti vamwe vari kupomerwa mhosva pamwe chete naBere, Julius Marimbire na Chris Marimbire, vasungwe uye kudzoserwa kuAmerica uko vakapara mhosva asi iizvi hazvigoneki kuti zviitwe sezvo hurumende yeZimbabwe isina simba rekuita izvi. Vana mazvikokota vezvemutemo vanotiwo kunofanirwa kuti kuitwe chisungo nedare reparamende chinoita kuti chibvumirano ichi chiitwe mutemo. Vachitsanangura mashandiro anoita chibvumirano ichi, gweta rine mukurumbira munyika, VaTendai Biti, vati hurumende yakatadza basa nekusaunza chibvumirano ichi pamberi pedare reparamende kuitira kuti chizoitwa mutemo. Vatiwo kune zvimwe zvibvumirano nedzimwe nyika dzisiri America zviri kushanda sezvazvinofanira kuti zviite. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rinoti Zimbabwe Haikwanisi Kudzosera Vasungwa kuAmerica

text: Vebato reMDC Alliance neZanu-PF vave kuudzana meno amire panyaya yekudzoswa kwoitwa nehurumende chirongwa cheNational Youth Service pamberi pesarudzo dza2023. Chirongwa chekutanga cheNational Youth Service chakaparurwa paimbova pakamba yemauto ye2 Brigade kuMt Darwin muna 2001. Kunyangwe hurumende yaiti yaida kudzidzisa vechidiki kuti vade nyika yavo, vechidiki ava vaidzidziswa zvechiuto nevaive varwi vehondo yerusununguko, mapurisa uye mauto. Bazi rezvevechidiki raitungamirwa nevaive gurukota rezvevechidiki mushakabvu Border Gezi rakatenda kuti raidzidzisa vechidiki zvechiuto kuitira kuti vakwanise kudzivirira nyika kana vodiwa. Mamwe masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anoti vechidiki ava vaibata chibharo uye kuita mhirizhonga vachitsigira bato reZanu-PF. Asi hurumende inoti vaizorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya sezvo vamwe vacho vave kuita mabasa epamusoro muhurumende. Mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu-PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti chinangwa chechirongwa cheNational Youth Service ndechekuti vechidiki vade nyika yavo. Mutauriri wevechidiki muMDC Alliance Youth Assembly, VaStephen Chuma, vanoti zviri kuitwa neZanu-PF zvakanangana nekuda kuita mhirizhonga pamberi pesarudzo dza2023. No media source currently available
title: Nyaya yeYouth Service Younza Kusawirirana Pakati peZanu-PF neMDC Allianc

text: Mutungamiri weEquatorial Guinea VaTheodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo vakapinda muHarare nemusi weChina mukushanya kwemazuva maviri. Vakabva vananga kuState House kunoita nhaurirano nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa paState House. Nekune rumwe makurukota ehurumende auya naVaMbasogo arikuita musangano nemakurukota ehurumende yemuno. VaMbasogo vari kufamba negurukota rinoona nezvinoitika kunze kwenyika, gurukota rezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika,gurukota rezvekutengeserana nedzimwe nyika pamwe nevamwe vakuru-vakuru muhurumende yavo. Mupepeti webenhau reThe Observer, VaBarnabas Thondlana, vati Zimbabwe ingangowana chouviri kubva pakushanya kwaVaMbasogo sezvo kunyika kwavo kune mafuta. Kushanya kwaVaMbasogo kunouyawo panguva iyo nyika yakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemafuta edzimotokari. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano reRevolutionary Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaTjenesani Ntungagwa vati hapana zvakawanda zvekunyanyoyarisira kubva kuhurumende yaVaMbasogo munyaya dzezvehupfumi sezvo vachiti ruzhinji rwevanhu rwuri kunhonga svosve nemuromo kuEquatorial Guinea. VaMbasogo vakatarisirwa kusangana nevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe mangwana. VaMbasogo avo vari kufamba nechikwata chevanhu makumi matanhatu nevana vakatarisirwa kudzokera kunyika kwavo mangwana kana vapedza misangano yavavinga. No media source currently available
title: Mutungmiri weNyika yeEquatorial Guinea VaNguema Mbasogo Voita Musangano naVaMnangagwa

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakurudzira kuti munyika muve nerunyararo pazuva ranhasi rekucherechedza makore makumi matatu nemashanu panyoreranwa chibvumirano chekubatana kana kuti Unity Accord pakati peZanu nePF Zapu. Mapurisa emuBulawayo nhasi amisa kurangarirwa kwevanhu vakafa munguva yeGukurahundi kwange kwarongwa nerimwe sangano senzira yekucherechedza zuva reUnity Day akasunga vamwe vanhu. Mutungamiri wenyika yeUkraine VaVolodymyr Zelenskyy votenda America nerubatsifro muhondo neRussia iyo iri kuyambira kuti zvichatopa kuti hondo ienderere mberi. Muchirongwa cheWomen’s RoundTable, tiri kutaura nyaya yeZuva rekubatana kana kuti Unity Day tichizeya kuti munyika mune runyararo here rungapa kuti madzimai ashande akasungunuka pasina kumbunyikidzwa munyayadzezvematongerwo enyika kunyanya. Kana muchida kupinda muchirongwa ichi, kanawo kutumira mashoko kuStudio7, shandisai WhatsApp nhamba dzinoti 001 202 465 0318. Vanoda kutererera Studio7, tibateyi na7pm pamasaisai anoti 909 am 4930; 13860, 15460 Kilohertz paShort Wave mazuva ose
title: Misoro yeNhau dzaNhasi, China, Zvita 22. 2022

text: Kunyange hazvo paine ongororo yeAfrobarometer inoratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda munyika vanoda kuti mapato anopikisa aite mushandirapamwe sarudzo dzemuna 2018 dzisati dzaitwa, izvi zvinenge zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. Mamwe mapato gumi nemana anopikisa akanyorerana chibvumirano chekuumba mubatanidzwa sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzisati dzaitwa. Chibvumiramo ichi chakanyoreranwa kuSouth Africa svondo rapera uye gungano iri pari zvino rinonzi Mass Opposition Movement kana kuti MOM. Mapato aya anosanganisira rePeople's Democratic Party, PDP, Renewal Democrats of Zimbabwe, RDZ, Zapu nemamwe. Asi mumubatanidzwa uyu hamuna mamwe mapato makuru anopikisa akaita seMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, MDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, National People's Party, NPP, iyo iri kufanotungamirwa naAmai Joice Mujuru uye Transform Zimbabwe inotungamirwa naVaJacob Ngarivhume. VaTsvangirai nevamwe vavo vakanyorerana zvibvumirano zvekudawo kuumba mumwe mubatanidzwa kana kuti maMemorandum of Understanding. Nyaya yekutadza kushandirapamwe iyi iri kushorwa nevakawanda munyika kusanganisira nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaPromise Sande, avo vanoti nyaya yekuda zvigaro yauraya nyika. Vanhu vari kuodzwawo moyo nenyaya yekuti kune vari kuyedza kubatana ava pane kukandirana makobvu nematete zvinopa kuti mibatanidzwa yacho ibve yaita zinyeke nyeke. Semuenzaniso, veMDC-T neveNPP vatotanga kunetsana nenyaya yehutungamiri. VaTsvangirai vanoti vakazvipira kuti mubatanidzwa uyu ubudirire. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwawo nemutevedzeri waAmai Joyce Mujuru, VaSamuel Sipepa Nkomo, avo vanoti pakaitwa mubatanidzwa, Amai Mujuru ndivo vanofanira kutungamira asi vachiti nhaurirano dziri kuenderera mberi. Mutauriri webato reRDZ, VaPishai Muchauraya, vanotenda kuti kana kumubatanidzwa wavo zvinogona kunetsa kuti ndiyani anotungamira asi vakazvipira kutsvaga kana munhu wekunze asina bato raanomiririra. Vanotungamira bato rePDP, VaTendai Biti, vanotiwo chimwe chiri kunetsa pakuyedza kuumba mubatanidzwa wevanopikisa inyaya yekuti hapachina nguva yakakwana yekuita nhaurirano sezvo ndima iripo yakakurisa. Mashoko aVaBiti ari kutsinhirwawo nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira Media Center, VaEarnest Mudzengi. Asi sachigaro webato reZanu-PF kuBritain, VaNick Mangawana, vanoti mapato anopikisa ari kutambisa nguva uye haakwanise kukunda bato reZanu-PF musarudzo. VaMudzengi vanotiwo pane zvimwe zvakakosha zvinoda kuitwa nevanopikisa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa nekudaro nguva yekuswera vachiita zvedambe hapana. Sangano ravanachipangamazano reInstitute for Security Studies, ISS, rinoti kuti mapato anopikisa akunde musarudzo anofanira kuti aumbe mubatanidzwa. Izvi ndizvo zvakaitika muNigeria, Kenya neGambia. Chipangamazano muISS, VaSimon Allison, vanoti muZimbabwe nyaya yekusave nekuvimbikana kwevanopikisa ndiyo yapa kuti kuumba mubatanidzwa kunetse. No media source currently available
title: Kuumba Mubatanidzwa weMapato Anopikisa Kwonetsa

text: Vaimbova munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaKofi Annan vari kutungamira chikwata chavanasorojena kana kuti The Elders kunoongorora nyaya yesarudzo muZimbabwe kubva musi weChina kusvika Mugovera. Vamwe vari mukanzuru iyi vari kuenda kuZimbabwe vanosanganisa Amai Mary Robinson avo vaimbova mutungamiri weIreland uye vaimbotungamira komisheni yeUnited Nations inoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu kana kuti UN High Commissioner for Human Rights uye VaLakhdar Brahimi vaive gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muAlgeria vari munyarikanani muUnited Nations. VaAnnan nechikwata chavo vari kutarisirwa kusangana nevemapato ezvematongerwo enyika, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission uye masangano akazvimirira. Muna 2008 chikwata chavanasorojena ichi chaisanganisira vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJimmy Carter, VaAnnan nemudzimai waVaMandela, Amai Graca Machel chakarambidzwa kupinda muZimbabwe nevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira Media Centre VaEarnest Mudzengi vanoti rwendo rwaVaAnnan urwu rwakakosha zvikuru kuZimbabwe iyo yakatariswa nenyika dzepasi rose kuti ionekwe kuti yatora gwara idzva here kubva zvabviswa vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe pachigaro nemauto gore rapera. No media source currently available
title: VaKofi Annan Vonanga kuZimbabwe Kunoona nezveSarudzo

text: Vakambove gurukota rezveupfumi munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari mutungamiri webato rinopikisa, VaTendai Biti vanoti mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nezveupfumi asvika pachidanho chakaipa uye nyika inogona kupinda mukusagadzikana chero nguva. Vanoti hurumende yemubatanidzwa chete ndiyo inogona kubatsira Zimbabwe kubva mumatope mayiri uye kudzivirira kutorwa kwemasimba ekutonga nechisimba. Nhengo yeZanu PF uye vari mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekurima vachiona nezvezvipfuwo, VaPaddy Zhanda vanoramba mashoko ekuti vakapa mvumo kuvanhu vakapinda nekuvaka zvisiri pamutemo papurazi ravo reCaledonia riri pedyo neHarare. Kunetsana kworamba kuchiendera mberi mubato reZanu PF. Nhasi murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu akapambwa VaItai Dzamara vasvitsa mwedzi minomwe vatsakatika. Iyi ndiyo mimwe yemisoro yedu yenhau dzedu dzanhasi. Musakanganwa chirongwa chedu cheLiveTalk na8:30pm apo tichatarisa nezve remangwana renyika VaMugabe vabva pachigaro. Munotibata pa 909 am, kana pa 12080, ne15460 Kilohertz pa Shortwave kana paFacebook peji redu reVOAShona. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau, Chishanu, Gumiguru 09 2015

text:
Bato reZAPU rinoti kuitwa kwegungano revaimbi rekukurudzira kubviswa kwezvirango kana kuti anti-sanctions gala pamwe nekucherechedzwa kwezuva reAnti-Sanctions Day kurasa mari uye mucherechedzo wekutadza kwehurumende kuziva zvinhu zvakakoshera nyika. Vachipa pfungwa dzavo pamusoro penyaya iyi, mutauriri webato reZAPU VaIphithule Maphosa vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuitwa kwe anti-sanctions gala uye kucherechedzwa kwezuva reAnti-sanctions Day kupedzera hoko padehwe reshindi. 

Vati chokwadi chaicho ndechekuti Zimbabwe haisi pasi pezvirango asi kuti vakuru vakuru vashoma vebato riri kutonga reZanu PF ndivo vari pasi pezvirango. 

VaMaphosa vatiwo chinhu chinoshamisa kuti nyika dzemubatanidzwa weSouthern Africa Development Community, SADC, dzakabatirira panyaya iyi dzichitsigira nyaya yekurwiswa kwezvirango, asi hapana pavakambosimudza muromo pakumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika kusanganisira kuuraiwa kwevanhu nekuda kwezvematongero enyika. Vachitaura padandemutande ravo reTwitter mutauriri webato reNational Patriotic Front VaJealousy Mawarire vati havawone kubviswa kwezvirango kuchizobatsira kuti bato riri kutonga reZanu PF risiye muitiro waro wavati ndewekutonga nedemo richityora kodzero dzevanhu uye kuita zvehuwori. Asi nhengo yeboka reCentral Committee yebato reZanu PF uye vakambove mumiriri weMpopoma mudare reparamende VaJoseph Tshuma vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vose munyika kusanganisira vemapato anopikisa vatsigire kurudziro yekubviswa kwezvirango vachiti zviri kukanganisa mamiriro ehupfumi hwenyika, izvo zviri kuzoita kuti veruzhinji munyika vatambure. Mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro zvehutongi hwejekerere nebudiriro vari muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika, VaVincent Chakunda, vanotsigira maonero ekuti zvirango zviri kukanganisa hupfumi hwenyika vachishorawo maonero ekuti sezvo zvirango izvi zvakatemerwa vakuru vakuru vebato reZanu PF chete hazvina zvazvinokanganisa. Vati vakuru vakuru ava vane nzira dzekunzvenga nadzo zvirango izvi uye veruzhinji ndivo vanoona nhamo nekuda kwezvirango izvi. Asi VaChakunda vati zvinhu zvakakoshawo zvikuru kuti hurumende igadzirise zvairi kutadza zvinove zvakaita kuti nyika itemerwe zvirango. Chirongwa cheAnti-sanctions gala chiri kuitwa mangwana muBulawayo asi chichaitirwa padandemutande senzira yekutevedzera zvinodiwa pakudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hwecoronavirus hunokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19. Kubva gore rapera, SADC yakatara musi wa 25 Gumiguru sezuva rekushoropodza zvirango zvinonzi nehurumende neZanu PF zvakatemerwa nyika. Hurumende iri kukurudzira vanhu vese, kusanganisira vemapato anopikisa, kuti vabatane mukushoropodza zvirango izvi, asi bato reMDC Alliance rakatobuda pachena kuti harisi kuzove nechekuita nehurongwa uhwu. No media source currently available   ​
title: ZAPU Yoshoropodza Mutambo weKuunganidza Vaimbi Vachikurudzira Kubviswa kweZvirango, weAnti-Sanctions Gala

text: Mapoka evanhu akawanda ari kushamisika nemashoko emutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avanonzi vakaudza gurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu uye vachiona nezvematongerwo enyika mubato reZanu PF, VaSavior Kasukuwere, pamusoro pehuwori hunonzi huri kuitwa mukupiwa kwemasitendi anofanirwa kunge achiwaniswa vechidiki veZanu PF. VaMugabe vanonzi vakashamisawo kana ivo VaKasukuwere nekuvabvunza nezvenyaya iyi, vachiti mashoko ari kupinda munzeve dzavo anoratidza kuti VaKasukuwere vakapa vanhu vasineyi nechekuita nevechidiki, vakaita samuporofita Walter Magaya, Amai Sarah Mahoka, kusanganisira nemunin’ina waivo VaKasukuwere, VaTongai Kasukuwere. Vemapato anopikisa vagara vari kuchema nehuwori hwavanonoti huri kuitika mukugoverwa kwemasitendi ekuvakira dzimba aya kune vechidiki veZanu PF chete, chitiko chavanoona sekutenga vechidiki ava kuitira sarudzo dza2018 dzave kuberere. Zanu PF yakatanga chirongwa chekupa vechidiki vayo nzvimbo dzekuvakira dzimba kumaguta anoti Bulawayo, Mutare, Chinhoyi neHarare. Munyori mukuru mubato reMDC T VaDouglas Mwonzora vanoti ndiyo nyaya yavagara vachitaura yekuti Zanu- PF inoita zvehuwori kubva. "Zvinofanirwa kuzivikanwa ndezvekuti VaMugabe vane police, vane CIO, vanowana information saka kutobvunza kwavakaita ikoko zvinoratidza kuti vane information. Isu tinonyatsoziva kuti VaKasukuwere vari kutora land iri kumacheto kweHarare vachipa vanhu veZanu PF," VaMwonzora vanodaro. Asi mumiriri wePelandaba/Mpopoma mudare reparamende uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaJoseph Tshuma vanoti mutungamiri wenyika VaMugabe vane kodzero yekubvunza gurukota ravo chero nyaya yavanoda kunzwisisa. "Nekuona kwangu, hapana chinhu chiri outside this world chaitwa na president kubvunza minister kuti ko nyaya yema stands iri kufamba sei because after all minister ndivo vane hofisi iyoyo inobata nenyaya yema stands acho," VaTshuma vanodaro. Vanoti nemaziviro avo zvikuru muguta reBulawayo, masitendi aya ari kupiwa munhu wese zvisineyi nekuti unotsigira bato ripi rezvematongerwo enyika. Vamwe vanonzi nebepanhau reHerald vakawana masitendi aya nenzira dzisina kutsarukana vanosanganisira munyori wevechidiki muZanu PF VaKudzai Chipanga pamwe nemumiriri weHarare East mudare reparamende VaTerrence Mukupe . No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Vopomera VaKasukuwere Mhosva yeKutengesa Masitendi

text: Kunetsana muZanu-PF kuri kuramba kuchienderera mberi kunyange hazvo bato iri rakambozivisa kuti panopera kongiresi yaro yakaitwa muna Zvita gore rapera zviri kunetsa zvinenge zvagadziriswa. Nyaya younza bopoto mubato inyaya yekuti poitwa sei nenhengo dzedare reparamende dzinonzi dzaitsigira vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru. Kudzingwa kwevanhu ava pabumbiro remitemo kunoreva kuti kunenge kuchifanira kuitwa sarudzo itsva. Kunyange hazvo vanoona nezvematongerwo enyika mubato iri, VaSavior Kasukuwere, vari kuti hakuna vanhu vanofanira kudzingwa, izvi hazvisi kumisa nyaya yekuti mamwe matunhu arambe akatsika madziro kuti nhengo dzeparamende idzi dzidzingwe. Ngengo idzi dzinosanganganira VaDidymus Mutasa, VaNicholas Goche, Amai Olivia Muchena, VaEnock Porusingazi nevamwe vadzingwe. Dzimwe nhengo dzebato kumatunhu akaita seMashonaland East, Midlands, Masvingo, Manicaland ndidzo dziri kunyanya kuita mutauro. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri webato iri, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, avo vange vasiri kudavira nharembozha yavo. Asi vamwe vanhu kuChipinge South vanonzi vakatomboratidzira vachiti havasi kuda VaPorusingazi kuti varambe vachivamirira sezvo vakamiswa kuva nhengo yebato kwemakore mashanu vachinzi vaitsigira Amai Mujuru uye kukonzera kusawirirana mubato. No media source currently available Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaMaxwell Saungweme, avo vachangopeta zvidzidzo zvepamusoro paStellebosch University kuSouth Africa vanoti Zanu-PF yave kutyira kuti ikaita sarudzo inogona kudyiwa nevanoipikisa. No media source currently available
title: Mutauro Woramba Kupera muZanu-PF

text: Vanhu vanozviitira mabasa emaoko vanoti vari kufara kuti vave kubvumidzwa kutanga kushanda mumadhorobha akasiyana siyana asi vanotiwo mari dzavari kunzi vabhadhare dziri kupa kuti vakawanda vavo vagare havo mudzimba. Hurumende yange yambomisa kushanda kwevanhu ava musi wa 30 Kurume nechinangwa chekuyedza kurwisa kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus icho charura pasi rose. Mukuru wesangano reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation kana VISET VaSamuel Wadzai vanoti pane mimwe misika vari kunzi vabhadhare madhora mashanu ekuAmerica pazuva. Munyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Associations VaWisborne Malaya vanotenderana nemaonero aya vachiti vari kunzi vavhenekwe hutachiona hwecoronavirus vasati vatanga mabasa asi vachishandisa mari dzavo. Vachitaura pamusangano negurukota rezvemabhizimisi madiki neari pakati nepakati muChinhoyi svondo rapera Amai Sithembiso Nyoni, imwe nhengo yeZanu PF Amai Hilda Gweshe vakati sezvo vanga vasingashande zvinhu zvavaomera zvakanyanya uye vave kutorwrwa midziyo nevanokweretesa mari. Ongororo yakaitwa neIMF inoratidza kuti Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chechipiri pasi rose kubva kuBolivia kuva nevanhu vakawandisa vari kuzviitira mabasa emaoko. Izvi zvinotevera kugumurwa kwevanhu vakawanda mabasa mumakambani. Asi kuuya kwakaita chirwere cheCovid-19 kwapa kuti zvinhu zviomere vanozviitira mabasa emaoko ava. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Dr Prosper Chitambara vanoti mabasa anoitwa nevanhu ava akakosha zvikuru mukusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paDurban University of Techonology Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti hurumende inofanira kubatsira vanozvitira mabasa emaoko ava sezvinoitwa kune dzimwe nyika kusimudzira mabasa avo. Sangano reCentre for International Enterprise rinoti pavanhu vari kuzviitira mabasa emaoko apa, madzimai ndiwo akawandisa achsvika zvikamu makumi matanhatu nemanomwe kubva muzana. No media source currently available   ​
title: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Vanoti Vari Kuomeserwa Kuti Vatangazve Mabasa

text: Vanotengesa mumigwagwa muHarare vanoti havasi kuzobva munzvimbo dzavanotengesera kunyange hazvo nguva yakatarwa nehurumende yekuti vange vabva iri kupera pakati pehusiku. Vanhu ava vanoti nzvimbo dzakatarwa nekanzuru hadzisi kuvakwanira vese. Vari kutiwo dzimwe dzacho dziri kunze kweguta uko vanoti kure nevanovatengera. No media source currently available Kanzuru yeHarare inonziwo iri kukurudzira vanhu kuti vange vachinyoresa kuti vakwanise kupiwa nzvimbo dzekutengesera zviri pamutemo. Studio7 yakundikana kubata meya weguta reHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, kuti tinzwe danho richatorwa nekanzuru yavo. Asi kanzuru yeHarare yakazivisa kuti ichashandisa mapurisa ayo pamwe neve Zimbabwe Republic Police mukubvisa vanhu ava. Mukuru werimwe sangano revanotengesera mumigwagwa, re National Vendors Union Zimbabwe, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti kunyange kanzuru ikashandisa chisimba sezvavakavimbiswa, vachafira pamabasa pavo, sezvo vari kurarama nekutengesa.
title: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Vanoti Havasi Kuzobva Mumigwagwa

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vambosendeka zvakare zororo ravo neChipiri apo vabuda munyika vakananga kuMozambique kunopemberera kugadzwa kwemutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaFilipe Nyusi, avo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. VaMnangagwa ndemumwe wevatungamiri vedzimwe nyika gumi nembiri vari kutarisirwa kunge vari muMaputo kumabiko aya, ayo ari kuitwa nemusi weChitatu. VaNyusi vari kugadzwa semutungamiri weMozambique kechipiri zvichitevera kukunda kwavakaita musarudzo dzakaitwa munyika iyi gore rapera. Aka kave kechitatu VaMnangagwa, avo vari pazororo remasvondo matatu, vachimbosiya zororo ravo vachienda kunoita basa remutungamiri wenyika kunyange hazvo mumwe wevatewedzeri vavo, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vari ivo vakafanobata matomu. Svondo rapera VaMnangagwa vakadimura zvakare zororo ravo vachinosangana nenhengo dzekomiti yavanachipangamazano vavo yePresidential Advisory Council. NeMuvhuro svondo rino, mutungamiri wenyika vakabva zvakare pazororo ravo vachinosangana negurukota rekuChina rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaWang Yi, avo vakanga vari munyika kwemazuva matatu. Asi gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vanoti VaMnangagwa vagara vachizivikanwa kuti munhu anoda kushandira vana veZimbabwe, nekudaro havaoni kukosha kwezororo kana paine basa rekuita. Panyaya yekuti VaMnangagwa vari kusiya zororo ipo paina VaChiwenga vakafanobata matomu, Amai Mutsvangwa vanoti zvakakosha zvikuru kuti semumwe wevatungamiri venyika dziri muSADC vange vari pamabiko aya sezvo Zimbabwe iine hukama hwakasimba nenyika dzemudunhu reSADC. VaMnangagwa ndivo sachigaro vebandiko rinoona nezvekugadzikana kwezvinhu kana kuti Organ on Politics, Defense and Security musangano reSADC pari zvino. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoenda kuMhemberero dzeKugadzwa kweMutungamiri weMozambique

text: Muzvare Marry Mubaiwa vaimbova mudzimai wemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga vanonzi vakadimburwa ruoko mushure mekunge matare aramba kuvapa gwaro ravo rekufambisa kana kuti passport kuti vaende kunorapwa kunze kwenyika. Matare akaramba kuvapa mukana wekuenda kunorapwa kunze achiti mhosva yavaipomerwa yekuda kuita murume wavo kafiramberi yaive yakakomba zvekuti vaizogona kutiza. Asi vamwe vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nekuti hurumende yave kunyaya kupindira munyaya dzematare. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi asi vanowanzoramba kuti hurumende inoudza vatongi zvekuita. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaKennedy Masiye vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakaitwa nematare zvinowodza moyo nekuti anofanira kutarisawo hutano hwemunhu asati amunyima mukana wekunorapwa kunze kwenyika. Gweta raMuzvare Mubayiwa, Amai Beatric Mtetwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti mhuri yaMuzvare Mubayiwa yati parizvino haisi kuda kutaura nevatori venhau. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Marry Mubaiwa Vodimurwa Ruoko Mushure Mekunge Matare Aramba Kuti Vanorapwa Kunze

text: Vanofungidzirwa kuti vasori vanonzi vapinda zvine chisimba pamba pari kuchemerwa nhengo yecitizens coalition for change yakapondwa kuKwekwe nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF VaMboneni Ncube ndokudzinga dzimwe hama nenhengo dzebato iri vachiti ndivo vave kutungamira rufu urwu. Hanzvadzi yemufi, Muzvare Judith Ncube vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane varume vauya nemotokari dzemhando yeIsuzu nhatu vakavhara gedhi repamaba apa ndokudzinga vanhu vose vachiti ndivo vave kutungamira hurongwa hwose hweparufu apa. No media source currently available Vamwe vakoti pachipatara cheKwekwe General Hospital vanotiwo pane vanhu vakauya nezuro kuchipatara vachida mutumbi wemufi vachiti vaishanda naye asi vakoti vakaramba kuti vatore mapepa ekuviga mufi. Asi zvinonziwo vamwe vehama havana kufara nefiro yehama yavo zvekuti naivo vari kuti havasikuda vezvematingerwo enyika parufu urwu. VaNcube vakafa nemusi wesvondo vanonzi vasiya mudzimai Muzvare Loyce Charuma. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumukuru wevasori VaIsaac Moyo sezvo nhare yekuhofisi kwavo yange isiri kudairwa. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vange vakabatikane uye vange vasingakwanise kutaura. Mutumbi waVaMoyo unonzi uchiri wakamirira kuvhenekwa kana kuti postmortem kuchipatara cheKwekwe General Hospital.
title: Vasori Vanonzi Vorambambidza Hama neCCC Kuchema Nhengo Yebato Iri Yakapondwa kuKwekwe

text: Apo nyika iri mushishi rekugadzirira kudzivirira kuti chirwere cheCoronavirus chisapinde munyika, zvimwe zvipatara zvinoti zvave kutora matanho ekuchengetedza varwere, vashandi pamwe nevashanyi kuitira kuti vasabatwe nechirwere ichi. Mutauriri weParirenyatwa Group of Hospital, VaLinos Dhire, vanoti kunyange hazvo chirwere cheCoronavirus chisati chapinda munyika, vave kutotora matanho pachipatara chavo ekuchengetedza vashandi nevarwere kuitira kuti vagare vakazvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere ichi. VaDhire vati chipatara ichi chichange choshandisa magedhi maviri chete ekupinda pachipatara apa kuitira kuti vakwanise kunge vachiongorora vese vanopinda pachipatara apa kusanganisira kutora temperature dzavo. VaDhire vatiwo vava kubvumidza vashanyi vaviri chete pamurwere mumwechete. Vatiwo vanhu vaviri chete ndivo vave kubvumidzwa kuperekedza murwere anenge aciuya kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kuwana zviri kuitwa nechimwe chipatara chikuru chiri muHarare, cheSally Mugabe, sezvo vatange tanzi titaure navo, Dr Chris Pasi, vanga vachiti vari mumusangano wekuzeya matanho avachatora pakudzivirira chirwere ichi. Mamwewo mahofisi mudhorobha reHarare atangawo kushandisa mishonga yekuchenesa maoko pavanhu vanopinda mumahofisi aya, kana vanoshandisa mahofisi aya senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronovirus. Kunyange hazvo muiZimbabwe musati mabatwa munhu ane Coronavirus, vaimbove gurukota rezveutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaHenry Madzorera veMDC, vanoti zvakakosha kuti nyika iedze nepainogona napo kudzivirira kupinda kwechirwere ichi munyika. VaMadzorera vakurudzirawo kuti hurumende iongorore zvakadzama vanhu vese vanobva kunyika dzine chirwere cheCoronavirus vanenge vachipinda munyika. Vachiparura gwaro rekuti nyika yotora matanho api ekugadzirira kudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid 19 nhasi muHarare, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati ibasa remunhu wese munyika kudzivirira chirwere ichi. VaMnangagwa vati nyika inofanirwa kudzivirira nepese painogona napo chirwere ichi sezvo munyika muine vanhu vakawanda vane hutano husina kumira zvakanaka izvo zvinovaisa panjodzi huru kuchirwere ichi. Chirwere cheCoronavirus chakatanga kuChina muna Zvita gore rapera, uye chapararira munyika dzakawanda pasi rose. Chirwere ichi chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvipfumbamwe pasi rose, uye vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi maviri ezviuru vabatwa nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available
title: Zvipatara Zvogadzirira Kudzivirira Coronavirus

text: Nyanzvi inoongorora zviri kuitika munyika yakazvimirira, Va Tendai Ruben Mbofana, vanoti mhunhu wese wemu Zimbabwe anofanirwa kurangarira VaDzamara, sezvo vari chizvarwa chenyika. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti zvinhu zvinofadza kuti mamwe mapato ezvematongerwo enyika akakwanisa kubatana neChitatu nemhuri yekwaDzamara mukucherechedza VaIta Dzamara, avo vakasvitsa gore zvichitevera kupambwa kwavo vachibva vatsakatika gore rapera. Mapato akapinda muhurongwa uhu anosanganisira MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, pamwe nebato rinotungamirwa naAmai Barbara Nyagomo, reProgressive Democrats of Zimbabwe. Bato reZanu PF harina kutumira nhumwa kumusangano uyu, kusanganisirawo bato idzva reZimbabwe People First, iro rinotungamirwa naAmai Joice Mujuru. Kusaonekwa kwemapato ezvematongerwo enyika pahurongwa hwekucherechedza VaDzamara kwasiya vanhu vakawanda vachibvunza mibvunzo yakawanda. Dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti kubatana pahurongwa hwakadai hakuna kushata, asi hazvifanirwe kuonekwa semhosva yaparwa nemapato akakundikana kutsigira mhuri yekwadzamara. Nyanzvi inoongorora zviri kuitika munyika yakazvimirira, Va Tendai Ruben Mbofana, vanoti mhunhu wese wemu Zimbabwe anofanirwa kurangarira VaDzamara, sezvo vari chizvarwa chenyika. Ukuwo imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, uye vari sachigaro ve Zanu PF ku Britain, Va Nick Mangwana, vanoti kunyange hazvo vachiwirirana naVaMbofana, havatambiri vari kushora Zanu PF kuti seyi yakatadza kuva pachiitiko ichi. VaMangwana vanoti Zanu PF haina kukokwa, izvo zvakapa kuti isavepo pahurongwa uhu. VaDzamara vakatsakatika musi 9 Kurume gore rapera mushure mekupambwa nevarume vasiri kuzivikanwa kuti ndivanani apo vaigerwa pedyo nekumba kwavo kuGlen View7. VaDzamara vanozovikanwa nekusiya basa ravo rekutora nhau vachiti vava kupinda munyaya dzekurwira kodzero dzevanhu kudzamara mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiya basa. VaDzamara nechikwata chavo che Occupy Africa Unity Square, vairatidzira vari mupaka yeAfrica Unity Square vachikurudzira kuti VaMugabe vasiye basa sezvo vari kutadza kutonga. Murwiri wekodzero uyu aigara akarohwa nemapurisa kunyange hazvo kuratidzira kwake nevamwe vake kwaive kwekugara mupaka iyi muchinyararire. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Voshora Kusapinda kweZanu PF Muhurongwa hweKurangarira VaItai Dzamara

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vanoti vari kuda kuti nhaurirano pakati pehurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi pasi pegungano reTripartite Negotiating Forum, TNF, dziitwe mwedzi uno kunyange hazvo vashandi vari kuti hurumende haisi kuratidza kuzvipira. Nyaya yekumbokurudzira vanhu kuti vagare mudzimba kana kuti lockdown yakonzerawo kuti zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi zvisamire zvakanaka iri kupa vakawanda munyika kuti vakurudzire kuitwa misangano yeTNF kuti paitwe mubatirapamwe chuma chemuzukuru kuti nyika ibude mukanwa mamupere. Asi ropa rakaipa pakati pemasangano ari muTNF riri kupa kuti gungano iri rive bhasikiti raTizirai rekuti uku riri kurukwa uku riri kurudunhurwa. VaMavima vanoti havo vakazvipira kuita musangano weTNF mwedzi uno usati vapera. Vatiwo vanoda kuti misangano yeTNF iitwe kana pagore pane kaviri kari mubumbiro remitemo vachiti chinangwa ndechekuda kusimbisa gungano iri. Asi munyori mukuru musangano revashadi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vati havasati vasumwa nezvekuti musangano ungangoitwa mwedzi usati waoera. Vatiwo vashandi vari kuda kuti nyaya dzemihoro dzizeyiwe sezvo zvinhu zvave kudhura zvakanyanya. Mutungamiri wesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, Dr Israel Murefu, vanoti musangani uyu wakatononoka kutanga uye vanoda kuzeya nyaya dzenhomba yeCovid-19 kuti vangatengere sei vashandi vavo nhomba. TNF yakava mutemo muna 2019 asi zvinhu gore rapera zvainge zvisina kumira zvakanaka sezvo vashandi nevashandirwi vaipomera hurumende mhosva yekuita zano ndega pane kuita nhaurirano kugadzirisa matambudziko munyaya dzezvemabasa nehupfumi. Asi hurumende inoti ine chido chekuti gungano iri rishande sezvakatarwa pamutemo. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuita Musangano weTNF Sezvo Hupfumi Husisina Kumira Zvakanaka

text: Musangano mukuru wekupedzisa chirongwa cheMandela Washington Fellowship Presidential Summit wakatanga muWashington DC nemusi weMuvhuro. Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaBarack Obama vachange vachitaura nemusi weChitatu apo chirongwa ichi chinenge chosvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo. Vakataura pakutanga kwemusangano uyu vanosanganisira Senator Chris Koons avo vakatenda zvikuru vechidiki ava nemabasa avanoita kusimudzira nyika dzazo. VaKoons vakaremekedzawo mukuru wekambani yeEconet Zimbabwe VaStrive Masiyiwa vachiti munhu wavanoshanda naye panyaya dzekubatsira vechidiki muAfrica zvikuru munyaya dzedzidzo. Mumwe wevechidiki kubva kuZimbabwe VaGolden Maunganidze, avo vanova muridzi webepanhau reTell Zimbabwe ndemumwe ataurawo pamusangano uyu. VaMaunganidze vati vakatanga bepanhau ravo iri nechinangwa chekusimudzira vanhu vemunharaunda yavo. Vakurudzirawo vechidiki ava kuti vapabatane vaite mushandirapamwe panyaya dzebudiriro zvisinei nekuti vanobva kunyika iri muAfrica. Mumwewo ari kumusangano uyu, ndiVaTiara Gendi avo vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanofara zvikuru nekuva muchirongwa ichi. Pagungano iri pari kutaurwawo nyaya yekuzvipira kwevana veZimbabwe pakurwira kodzero dzavo zvikuru sei vachiteedzera Hash Tag This Flag Campaign. Musangano mukuru wekupedzisa chirongwa cheMandela Washington Fellowship Presidential Summit wakatanga muWashington DC nemusi weMuvhuro. Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaBarack Obama vachange vachitaura nemusi weChitatu apo chirongwa ichi chinenge chosvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo. Vakataura pakutanga kwemusangano uyu vanosanganisira senanator Chris Koons avo vakatenda zvikuru vechidiki ava nemabasa avanoita kusimudzira nyika dzazo. Mumwe wevechidiki kubva kuZimbabwe VaGolden Maunganidze, avo vanova muridzi webepanhau reTell Zimbabwe ndemumwe ataurawo pamusangano uyu. VaMaunganidze vati vakatanga bepanhau ravo iri nechinangwa chekusimudzira vanhu vemunharaunda yavo. Vakurudzirawo vechidiki ava kuti vapabatane vaite mushandirapamwe panyaya dzebudiriro zvisinei nekuti vanobva kunyika iri muAfrica. Pagungano iri pari kutaurwawo nyaya yekuzvipira kwevana veZimbabwe pakurwira kodzero dzavo zvikuru sei vachitsigira gungano reHash Tag This Flag Campaign. No media source currently available
title: Musangano weMandela Washington Fellowship Wotanga muWashington DC

text:
Vana chiremba vari kukurudzira vanhurume nevanhukadzi kuti vaende kuzvipatara kunoongororwa nyaya yekushaya kwavo havi yekusangana pabonde, zvinova zvinonzi ndezvimwe zvezvinhu zviri kuparadza michato yakawanda muZimbabwe. Muhurukuro yatakaita na Doctor Josephat Chiripanyanga avo vanoshanda paChinhoyi Mall Medical Centre pamwe nemutevedzeri wasachigaro we Zimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, ZADHR, Doctor Fungisai Mazhandu, zvakabuda pachena kuti vanhukadzi nevanhurume vanotadza kubudirana pachena mearenano nenyaya idzi izvo zvinozokonzera mhirizhonga mumhuri.

Doctor Chiripanyanda vanoti pavhiki roga roga vanosangana nevanhu vaviri kana vatatu vane dambidziko irori.

Dr Chiripanyanga vanoenderera mberi vachitsanangura zvimwe zvezvinhu zvinokonzera kuti mukadzi kana murume ashaye han’ya nemumwe wake.

Chiremba ava vanoti vose vane dambudziko iri vanofanirwa kudya chikafu chaidyiwa kare nemichero yakawanda uye nenyama isina mafuta akawanda kuti zvisimbise misana yavo.

Dr Chiripanyanga vanoti kana zvose izvo zvavanokurudzira zvakaramba vanobatsira munhu anenge aine dambudziko rakadai nemishonga inobatsira kuti misana musana usimbe akwanise kushanda zvakanaka.

Mashoko aya anotsinhirwawo naDoctor Mazhandu avo vanoti nyaya iyi idambudziko guru rinokonzera kuti vamwe vanhu vapedzesere vaita gumbo mumba gumbo panze.

Vanoti zvimwe zvezvinhu zvinokonzera kuti mukadzi nemurume vashaye havi nebonde inyaya yekushushikana mupfungwa kana kuti stress pachirungu, izvo vanoti zvinokwanisa kuparadza michato.

Doctor Mazhandu vanotiwo vanhu havafanire kunyara kutaura nyaya iyi nokuti zvinhu zvinotowanika muvanhu vakawanda chaizvo.

Doctor Chiripanyanga vanokurudzira kuti vakadzi nevarume vane dambuziko iri kuti vaite mabasa anomhanyisa miviri yavo kana kuti exercise kaviri kana katatu pasvondo yega yega izvo zvinoita kuti tsinga dzinofamba neropa dzivhurike kunhengo dzavo.

Mutsvagurudzo yakaitwa muZimbabwe, zvakaonekwa kuti varume vasere kubva mugumi vanosangana nedambudziko rekusashanda zvakanaka kwenhengo dzavo asi havadi kubuda pachena. Vazhinji vane dambudziko iri vanokwanisa kupomera nyaya dzekuroiwa asi chokwadi chiripo chiri chekuti zvirwere zveshuga ne BP ndizvo zvimwe zvinoita kuti mumwe ashaye havi yekusangana nemumwe wake pabonde. Zvirwere zvemwoyo nepfari ndezvimwewo zvirwere zvinoita kuti munhu ashaye shungu yekusangana pabonde nemumwe wake zvekuti chikamu chevanhu makumi mashanu kubva muzana pasi rose vanonzi vanotombosangana nedambudziko iri vozowana rubatsiro kuzvipatara.
title: Varume Vanonetseka neNyaya yeBonde Vokurudzirwa Kunorapwa

text: Vanhu vange vaungana muHwange Stadium vakamirira kunzwa mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachitaura varwadziwa zvikuru mushure mekunge vaudzwa kuti VaMnangagwa havachauyi. Vamwe vevanhu ava vasvika munhandare iyi nenguva dzekuma 7 mangwanani vachitarisira kuona nekunzwa kubva kumutungamiri webato ravo reZanu PF. VaMnangagwa vange vasvika mudhorobha reHwange nechikopokop nguva dzekuma 11 mangwanani vakaparura kuvandudzwa kweHwange Thermal Power Station muHwange mekare. Studio7 nevamwe vatori venhau vemapepanhau nenhepfenyuro dzakasiyana siyana varambidzwa kuve pachiitiko ichi zvichinzi kwange kuchidiwa vakakokwa chete. Chikopokopo chaVaMnangagwa chazoenekwa chichipfuura nechekumaodzanyemba kwakadziva kumadokero kwenhandare. Sachigaro weZanu PF kuMatabeleland North, VaRichard Moyo, vaudza vanhu kuti VaMnangagwa havachakwanisi kuuya kumusangano sezvange zvakarongwai. Hapana chikonzero chapiwa naVaMoyo kuti sei VaMnangagwa vasina kuuya pamusangano wavange vachitarisirwa. Mumwe mutsigiri wechidiki weZanu PF angozvidoma nezita rekuti Justice ati arwadziwa zvikuru sezvo ange akatarisira kuona VaMnangagwa mbune kekutanga muhupenyu hwake. Mumwewo murume uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati anoona chiri chinhu chisina kunaka uye chinoratidza kuzvidza vanhu kuti mhomho yevanhu iswere yakamisirwa pasina. Asi vamwe vanoti kutadza kuuya kwaVaMnangagwa pamusangano wanhasi kunogona kuve nechekuita nekutyira hupenyu hwavo mushure mekuputika kwebhambu kwakaitika munhandare yeWhite City muBulawayo pakupera kwesvondo. Munhandare yeHwange mange mune masoja ane pfuti pamwe nemapurisa ane imbwa idzo dzange dzichishandiswa kusecha vanhu vachipinda munhandare. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanotadza Kuenda kuMusangano Wavo kuHwange

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvave kupindawo munhaurirano dzemapato anopikisa ari kuronga kuumba mubatanidzwa pamberi pesarudzo dza2018 senzira yekubvisa nayo bato reZanu PF pachigaro. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvave kupindawo munhaurirano dzemapato anopikisa ari kuronga kuumba mubatanidzwa pamberi pesarudzo dza2018 senzira yekubvisa nayo bato reZanu PF pachigaro.
