Vamwe vanoti mapato anopikisa ari kunonoka kubuda nechisungo sezvo nguva yesarudzo iri kuramba ichiswedera. Vamwewo ndivo vari kugununguna nekuramba mapato anopikisa matsva ari kuumbwa munyika, vachiti iyi inzira yevatungamiri vemapato aya yekuti vapinde nayo mumubatanidzwa uyu kuitira kuti vagozodya. Vamwewo ndivo vari kuti mapato ane vatsigiri vakawanda sebato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai anofanirwa kupinda akazvimirira sezvakaitwa nebato reZanu PF muna 1980, apo rakaramba kubatana nebato reZapu asi rakabudirira. Mapato anopikisa muZimbabwe ari kusangana kuti abude nechisungo chekuumba mubatanidzwa uchazokwikwidzana neZanu PF, asi panenge pane kusawirirana mumapato ose aya sezvo pave nenhaurirano dzinokwana nhatu dzekuedza kuumba mubatanidzwa. Pane mibatanidzwa yemapato anopikisa inoti weNERA, uyo une mapato anoda kusvika makumi maviri, weCODE, neweNational Transitional Authority. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muOhio muAmerica, VaGilbert Kanyongo, vanoti vanotambira hurongwa hwekuti pave nemubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa uhwu. VaKanyongo, avo vakarerekera kuMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti izvi zvakakosha nekuti mapato aya anenge otaura nezwi rimwechete. "Chinangwa chekutanga kuZimbabwe ndechekuda kuona kuti Mugabe (mutungamiri wenyika) abva pachigaro. Saka Mugabe haangabve pachigaro uyu achitaura nekuku, uyu ari kutaurawo nekoko, uyu ari kuitaurawo nekoko. Saka nekuona kwangu vanhu maZimbabweans, vese vari kuZimbabwe nesuwo tiri kuno tinofanirwa kubatana, totarura nezwi rimwe chete," VaKanyongo vanodaro. Vanoti iyi ndiyo chete nzira inogona kubvisa hutongi hwehurumende yaVaMugabe. Mutauriri webato reRenewal Democrats of Zimbabwe, VaPishai Muchauraya, vaudzawo Studio7 kuti hurongwa hwekuumba mushandira pamwe huri kufambira mberi uye hwave kutambirwa nemapato akawanda anopikisa. Bato reRenewal Democrats of Zimbabwe riri mumubatanidzwa weCODE. No media source currently available
title: Vari Kunze kweNyika Votaura Pamusoro peMubatanidzwa weMapato Anopikisa

text: Mukuru wematare, Va Godfrey Chidyausiku, nemusi weChina vakaramba kutambira chikumbiro chemumwe mubereki VaMathew Sogolani chekuti zvikoro zvimbomira kutoresa vana mhiko kana kuti National Pledge kusvika nyaya yavakakwidza kudare repamusoro reHigh Court itange ranzwikwa. Mukuru wematare, VaGodfrey Chidyausiku, nemusi weChina vakaramba kutambira chikumbiro chemumwe mubereki, VaMathew Sogolani, chekuti zvikoro zvimbomira kutoresa vana mhiko kana kuti National Pledge kusvika nyaya yavakakwidza kudare repamusoro reHigh Court itange ranzwikwa. VaSogolani vange vachimiririrwa nemagweta eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights VaDavid Hofisi. Vakakwidza nyaya yavo yekutanga kudare repamusoro musi wa 15 Kubvumbi. Nekuda kwekuti zvikoro zviri kuvhurwa musi wa 3 Chivabvu, VaSologani vakadzokera zvekare kudare reConstitutional Court nemusi weChipiri vachiti vana vambomira kunzi vatore mhiko iyi kusvika nyaya iyi yanzwikwa. Asi VaChidyausiku havana kutambira chikumbiro ichi vachiti vana vanokwanisa kutora mhiko nyaya iyi iri mumatare. VaHofisi vati vazotenderana nevanyori vedare kuti nyaya iyi inzwikwe muna Chikumi. Mhiko iyi inotorwa nevana vachiti vanozvininipisa kuna Mwari, mureza wenyika uye kutenda magamba ehondo yeChimurenga. Asi vabereki vakawanda munyika nevarairidzi vari kuramba kutambira mhiko iyi. VaSologani avo vane vana vatatu vanoti mhiko iyi inotyora kodzero dzavo semuKristu anopinda chechi yeApostolic Faith Mission. Vakaendeswa kudare naVaSologani igurukota rezvedzidzo, VaLazerus Dokora, vadzidzisi vakuru paMashambanhaka Secondary nepaChizungu Secondary uye gweta guru rehurumende. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rinoti Vana veChikoro Vanofanira Kutora Mhiko Vakamirira Mutongo Waro

text: Vashandi vehurumende vakanyora tsamba kuhurumende neChishanu chapfuura vachida kuti ivazivise kuti vachawana mihoro yavo yemwedzi waZvita riini, uye kuti hurumende imire papi panyaya dzemari yebhonasi. Vashandi vehurumende vakanyora tsamba kuhurumende neChishanu chapfuura vachida kuti ivazivise kuti vachawana mihoro yavo yemwedzi waZvita riini, uye kuti hurumende imire papi panyaya dzemari yebhonasi. Sachigaro wesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti vakakurudzirawo hurumende kuti ikoshese kuvapa mari dzavo mwedzi uno kuitira kuti vakwanisewo kupinda muzororo reKisimusi vaine chekubata. "Takanyorera hurumende tichibvunza kuti mari yedu yaDecember tinoiwana riini, uyezve bonus ra2016 tinoriwana riini. Asi mutsamba imomo takabva tanyorawo kuti chishuwiro chedu uye ndozvinhu zvinofanirwa kuitwa kuti vashandi vawane mihoro yavo Christmas isati yasvika," vanodaro Amai Alexander. Nekuda kwekushaya mari, hurumende iri kutatarika kutambirisa vashandi vayo mihoro yavo mukati memwedzi wavanofanirwa kutambira mari, izvo zvave kuita kuti vazowana mari idzi mumwedzi unotevera. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakanga vazivisawo kuti gore rino hurumende haikwanise kupa vashandi vayo mari dzekuvatenda kana kuti mabhonasi, sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzeupfumi. Asi mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakazozivisa kuti vashandi vaizowana mari, zvisineyi nekuti ichabvepi. VaMugabe vakapa mutoro wekutsvaga mari iyi kumakurokota avo maviri, VaChinamasa naAmai Priscah Mupfumira, vanove gurukota rezvevashandi nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veHurumende Vomirira Kunzwa Mazuva eMihoro Yavo yaZvita Pamwe neBhonasi

text: Dare redzimhosva rinoudza mapurisa kuti asarambidze vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors’ Association, Dr. Peter Magombeyi, kuti vaendfe kunorapwa kuSouth Africa zvichitevera kutochwa kwavanonzi vakaitwa nevanhu vakavapamba musi waGunyana 14. America inopa Zimbabwe imwe mari inoita mamiriyoni makumi mana nemaviri emadhora ekuAmerica. Mari iyi ichashandiswa mukutengera vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete chikafu kutanga mwedzi unoya kusvika muna Chivabvu 2020. Vagari vekumaruwa ekuGwanda mudunhu reMatabeleland South vanoudza Studio7 kuti hapana mabasa ebudiriro anoonekera ari kuitwa nehurumende, uye budiriro shoma iri kuitwa mudunhu iri iri kuitwa nemasangano akazvimirira. Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, votaura kumusangano weUnited Nations General Assembly uri kuitirwa muNew York. Hutungamiri weMDC hunoita musangano nemakanzura eguta reHarare huchitsvaga nzira dzekugadzirisa dambudziko remvura muguta iri. Muchirongwa cheThe Connection paLiveTalk na8pm tiri kutarisa zvingaitwe nevechidiki mukusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika kuitira kuti vechidiki vasabude munyika dzavo vachinotsvaga mafuro manyoro kune dzimwe nyika uko vanonosangana nemhirizhonga dzinobata vabvakure chete munyika dzavanenge vari. Kana muchida kupinda muchirongwa ichi, kanawo kutumira mashoko kuStudio7, shandisai WhatsApp nhamba dzinoti 001 202 465 0318… Vanoda kutererera Studio7, tibateyi na7pm pamasaisai anoti 909 am 4930; 6040, ne 15460 Kilohertz paShortwave mazuva ose. Munokwanisawo kunzwa Studio7 na6 am - Muvhuro kusvika Chishanu, pamasaisai anoti 909 am, 4930, 7270, ne 9885 Short Wave.
title: Misoro yeNhau dzaNhasi, Chipiri, Gunyana 24, 2019

text: Mamwe mapato anopikisa nemasangano anorwira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa ari kushora zvikuru hurumende yeSouth Africa nekudzika mutemo unonzi unoomesera vari muhupoteri. Vamwe vavo vanoti vari kuronga kuupikisa kumatare. Mutemo uyu unoti wose apotera munyika iyi haachatenderwi kuita zvematongerwo enyika zvakanangana nekwaakatiza. Gurukota rinoona nezvemukati menyika yeSouth Africa VaAron Motsoaledi vanoti vose vachatyora mutemo uyu, uyo wakadzikwa kubva kutanga kwegore rino vachaiswa mutirongo kana kudzingwa munyika sezvo kuita kwakadai kuchikanganisa kugadzikana kwenyika yavo. Vachitaura nezve kusimbaradzwa kwemutemo uyu VaMotsoaledi vanoti vose vachatsvaga hupoteri muSouth Africa vanofanira kuvewo netsamba yekufamba kwavo inonzi Transit Visa inobva kunyika yavanenge vapfuura nayo ichitaura kuti vari kunotsvaga hupoteri muSouth Africa. Tsamba iyi ndiyo yavachazoburitsa kana vasvika pamigano ipi zvayo yekupinda, muSouth Africa. Asi sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum VaGabriel Shumba vanoti zvaitwa neSouth Africa kutyora mutemo naizvozvo pane mukana wekuti nyaya iyi ikwidzwe kumatare edzimhosva. VaShumba vaenderera mberi vachiti danho ratorwa iri harifambirane nemutemo uri mubumbiro renyika yeSouth Africa kana zvakadzikwa nesangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dzepasi rose reUnited Nations. VaShumba vanoti kushandiswa kwechisimba kune vasina magwaro muSouth Africa kutyorwa kwemutemo. Mutauriri wesangano rinopikisa hurumende, reMovement for Democratic Change, mudunhu reJohannesburg muSouth Africa VaInnocent Nsingo vanoti, danho ratorwa nehurumende yeSouth AFRICA rinorwadza. VaNsingo vanoti MDC nemamwe mapato anopikisa hurumende vachabatana mukuita hurukuro nehurumende ye South Africa inotungamiririrwa nebato reANC. Munyori mukuru werimwewo sangano rinopikisa hurumende reUnited Democracy Movement, VaAndrew Nyathi vanoti zvaitwa neSouth Africa kutadza kufunga kana kuona zvinhu nemazvo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kune nhengo dzesangano reANC dzakachengetwa muZimbabwe dzisina kumboona matambudziko akafanana neayo arikuonekwa nemhuri yeZimbabwe muSA. Kusimbaradza mutemo uyu, mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa vakabva vatiwo mumwe mutemo wevapoteri wakadzikwa muna 2008 we Refugees Ammendment Act utange kunyatsoshandiswa. Vapoteri vanonzi havatenderwi kuenda kumizinda yenyika yavo iri muSouth Africa kunotsvaga rubatsiro kana kuti kuvhota musarudzo dzemunyika dzavo. Mumiririri wemuzinda weZimbabwe muSouth Africa VaDavid Hamadziripi vaudza Studio 7 kuti havakwanise kupa mafungiro avo sezvo vasati vaverenga zvawedzerwa mumutemo wevapoteri kana kuti Refugees Act uyu. Danho ratorwa neSouth Africa iri rinoteveravo mhirizhonga yakaitika muguta reCape Town gore rapera apo mhuri dzekune dzimwe nyika dzakange dzichiratidzira pamahofisi ebazi reUnited nations rinoona nezvevapoteri reUnited Nations High Commissioner for Refugees kana kuti UNHCR, nekwadzaiti kusabatwa kwadzo zvakanaka nezvizvarwa zveSouth Africa. Vairatidzira pamahofisi aya vaida kuti bazi reUnited Nations iri rivaendese kune dzimwe nyika uko vaive netarisiro yekuzobatwa zvine chiremera. Kune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinofungidzirwa kuti zvinosvika kana kupfuura mamiriyoni matatu, zvinogara muSA nekuda kwenyaya dzezvematongerwe enyika pamwe nemamiriro ehupfumi asina kumira zvakanaka. No media source currently available
title: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvogunun'una neMutemo Mutsva weVapoteri Wadzikwa neSouth Africa.

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change VaMorgan Tsvangirai vanoti hurumende haifanire kumanikidza vanhu kuti vangotambira mari yemabond notes iyo vanhu vakawanda vari kuramba kuitambira. Vachitaura neStudio 7, VaTsvangirai vakati mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vanogona kushandisa masimba avo kudzika mitemo yekuti Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe iparure mabond notes asi hazvibatsire kana pasina munhu ari kuzvifarira. VaTsvangirai vanoti Zimbabwe ingadai yakangotambira kushandisa rand yekuSouth Africa sezvo nyika iyi iri iyo inotengeserana neZimbabwe kudarika dzimwe nyika dzose. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinotiwo mapato anopikisa anofanira kutungamira vanhu vasiri kuda mari yemabond notes. Asi VaTsvangirai vanoti chitsvambe chiri kumunhu wese kuti amire semusambangwena. No media source currently available
title: VaTsvangirai Votaura nezvemaBond Notes

text: Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti danho rakatorwa nebato idzva rezvematongerwo enyika reCitizens’ Coalition for Change rekuenda kumhemberero dzekuzvitonga kuzere dzakaitwa neMuvhuro svondo rino kuBulawayo chinhu chakanaka chose sezvo chichiratidza kuti bato rinopikisa iri rinokoshesa rusungunguko rwakauyiswa nekudeurwa kweropa. Nhengo dzebato iri dzakabatana nevamwe vana veZimbabwe mumatunhu ose emunyika pakuungana vachicherechedza kusvitsa makore makumi mana nemaviri nyika yawana kuzvitonga. Iyi ishanduko huru kwazvo kubva kune zvaiitwa nenhengo idzi dzichiri pasi pebato reMDC Alliance, iro rakanga risingaendi kumhembero idzi richiti rusununguko harwuna zvarwuchareva nekuda kwekwaraiti kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu nebato riri kutonga reZanu PF. Munyori anoona nezvekutongwa kwematunhu mubato reCCC, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti hapana munhu ane nharo nerusununguko, asi chavane nharo nacho kuparadzwa kwavanoti kuri kuitwa nyika nebato riri kutonga reZanu PF, iyo vanoti iri kuita kuzvambarara parusununguko rwevanhu. VaMafume vanoti nekuda kwekusatonga zvakanaka kweZanu PF, vana veZimbabwe vave kubuda munyika vachinopondwa kunze sezvakaitika kune chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chakapondwa kuSouth Africa, VaElvis Nyathi. Asi mumwe mushandi weZanu PF vachiongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti vanotenda kuti bato idvza iri riri kucherechedza kuti kune rusununguko, asi vanoti kuenda kwenhengo dzeCCC kumhemberero hakuna zvakunoshandura. VaChirumhanzu vanoti kunyange hazvo bato iri rave nerimwe zita idzva rekuti Citizens' Coalition for Change, vana veZibabwe havazofi vakariregerera nekwavanoti kukoka zvirango kwavanoti rakaita richiri kunzi MDC.
title: Vebato reCCC Vopembedzwa neKubatana neVamwe paZuva reKuzvitonga Kuzere, Ukuwo Zanu PF Ichiti Bato iri Ndiro Rakakoka Zvirango

text: America nenyika dzemuCommonweatlh dziri kucherechedza zuva revaimbove varwiri verusununguko pamwe nevese vachiri kushanda muchiuto munyika idzi. MuAmerica mune zvirongwa zvakasiyana siyana zvichange zvichiitwa senzira yekucherechedza zuva iri kusanganisira kushanya kumarinda evaimbova varwiri verusungunuko. Zuva iri rakafanana neremagamba muZimbabwe, asi mutsauko uripo ndewekuti hapana zvematongerwo enyika zvinoswa pahurongwa uhu muAmerica sezvinoitwa muZimbabwe. Vaimbi vanosanganisira Bruce Springsteen, Rihanna, Jennifer Hudson, Carrie Underwood nevamwe vane mukurumbira vachaimba muWashington DC vachifadza veruzhinji vanodarika mazana masere ezviuru vachabva kumativi mana enyika iyi. Zuva remagamba muAmerica rakatanga kucherechedzwa muna 1919 richinzi Armistice Day zvichitevera chibvumirano chakaitwa musi wa11 Mbudzi 1918 chekupedza hondo yekutanga pasi rose, World War One. Nyika dzakanyorerana chibvumirano ichi muguta reVersailles mu France iGermany, Britain, France ne America. Armistice Day rakava zuva rezororo zviri pamutemo muAmerica muna 1938, rikazochinjwa kuva Veterans Day muna 1954. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Amai Diana Chageza, avo vane murume wavo ari muchiuto mu America, vanoti vari kufara nekuremekedzwa kuri kuitwa mauto ose emuAmerica. Amai Chageza vanoti kunyange hazvo murume wavo ari kubasa ku Afghanistan, ivo nevana vawana mukana wekutaura naye uye kuitawo zvimwe zvirongwa zvekucherechedza mabasa emauto vari mukamba ye Fort Braag yavanogara ku North Carolina mu America. No media source currently available
title: America Inorangarira Zuva reMagamba Ayo

text: Mutungamiri wesangano reShamwari yeMwanasikana, rinochengetedza kodzero dzemadzimai nevanasikana, Amai Erkenia Chifamba, vanoti vari kushungurudzwa zvikuru nehuwandu hwevana vari kushungurudzwa zvepabonde uye kumitiswa kwevanasikana vasati vabva zera nehama. Vanoti imwe yenyaya idzi ndeyemwanasikana ane makore mapfumbamwe (9), uyo anonzi akabatwa chibharo nevamwe vakomana vaviri kuBindura, Nyaya iyi yakabuda mumapepanhau, uye mapurisa anoti akatosunga vakomana vaviri vakabata mwana uyu chibharo nekumupa pamuviri. Amai Chifamba vanoti vari kushungurudzwa zvakare neimwe nyaya yemwanasikana wekuBulawayo ane makore mapfumbamwe zvakare akasununguka mwanasikana mushure mekubhinywa nehama. Vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kusunga nekupa mitongo yakaomarara kune vose avo vanenge vabatwa vachiita izvi. Mune imwe nyaya, mumwe musikana ane makore masere anonzi akaudza dare kuMacheke kuti akabhinywa nababa vake, hanzvadzi yake, hama pamwe nemuvakidzani wake. Musikana uyu anonzi akaudza amai vake nezvedambudziko rake asi amai vake havana kumubatsira. Dare rekuMacheke rakanzwawo kuti amai vemusikana uyu vakambunyikadzawo mwanakomana wavo ane makore gumi nerimwe chete. Mukomana uyu ihanzvadzi yemusikana waakabhinya pamwe chete nababa vake, muvakidzani pamwe nemumwe wehukama. Mapurisa anoti akasunga vose vakapara mhosva idzi, panguva iyo masangano anomirira kodzero dzevanhu achiti ari kushungurudzwa zvikuru kuti vanasikana vasati vabva zera vari kumanikidzwa kuita zvepabonde, mune dzimwe nguva vachibata pamuviri. Pane mumwe mwanasikana ane makore gumi nemanomwe akafa mushure mekusununguka mapatya. Amai Chifamba vanoti nyaya dzese idzi dziri kuvashungurudza. No media source currently available
title: Kumbunyikidzwa kweVanasikana Vasati Vabva Zera Koshorwa neVemasangano Anoshanda neVanasikana

text: Apo zvizvarwa zvemuAmerica zviri kuenda kusarudzo dzepakati petemu, kana kuti mid-term, dzekusarudza dzimwe nhengo dzematare eparamende neseneti, idzo dziriko neChipiri svondo rinouya, mapato ari kukwikwidzana anoti riri kutonga reDemocratic Party nerinopikisa reRepublican Party ari mushishi kutsvaga rutsigiro. Mapato aya ave kubatsirwa nevaimbove vatungamiri venyika iyi vanoti, VaBarack Obama veDemocratic Party naVaDonald Trump veRepublican Party kuti vakwezve vavhoti vachishandisa hunyanzvi neruzivo rwavo. Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti nyaya hombe ichanyanyotungamidzwa nevachavhota ndeyemamiriro ehupfumi hwenyika, sezvo sarudzo idzi dzauya panguva iyo zvinhu zvichinzi zvakanyanya kukwira mutengo. Zvimwe zvinonzi zvinogona kutungamidzwa nevachavhota inyaya yekubviswa kwepamuviri, kupinda kwevanhu munyika, mamiriro ekunze, pamwe nehondo yekuUkraine. Matunhu anonzi ane makwikwi akasimba pakati pemapato maviri aya ndeanoti Arizona, Georgia, Michigan, Wisconsin, Nevada nePennsylvania.
title: Apo Sarudzo dzeMid-Term muAmerica Dzaswedera, Mapato eDemocratic neRepublican Oshandisa Vaive Vatungamiri veNyika muKukwezva Vavhoti.

text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutaururi wedare reparamende, VaReuben Marumahoko, nemusi weChina vakazivisa dare kuti vakange vatambira chikumbiro chakapihwa dare iri neMDC- T inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa chekuti Muzvare Thokozani Khupe avo vari kuzvitiwo ndiwo mutungamiri webato iri, vamiswe kuva nhengo yebato iri. Asi Muzvare Khupe vanoti vashamiswa zvikuru nemaitiro aya nekuti vainge vaendesa tsamba kuna mabharani mukuru wedare, kana kuti Clerk of Parliament, VaKennedy Chokuda, vachivazivisa kuti vambomira kuzeya nyaya dzeMDC kusvika dzagadziriswa kumatare. Zvickwata zviviri izvi zviri kurwira masimba pamwe nekodzero dzekushandisa zita rekuti MDC-T. VaNelson Chamisa vanoti ndivo mutungamiri webato iri zvichitevera kusarudzwa kwavo nedare reNational Council. Ukuwo Muzvare Khupe vanoti ndivo chaivo vakafanobata chinzvimbo chekumutungamiri webato zvichitevera kushaya kwaVaMorgan Tsvangirai mushure mekurwara nechirwere chegomarara. No media source currently available Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaChokuda sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari pazororo nekudaro havana zvekutaura pari zvino. Pasi pebumbiro remutemo chikamu chechimakumi maviri nepfumbamwe kana kuti Section 129 (1) bato rinokwanisa kuti nhengo yaro idzingwe muparamende kana ichinge isisiri nhengo yebato racho. Semuenzaniso, Zanu-PF yakadzinga nhengo dzedare reseneti dzinosvika makumi maviri dzainzi inhengo dzechikwata cheG40. Rimwe gweta rinombomirira Amai Khupe, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vati Muzvare Khupe vanokwanisa kukwikwidza nyaya iyi kumatare. Nyaya yekuti VaChamisa vanokwanisa here kana kuti kwete kudzinga Doctor Khupe iri kutemesa magweta musoro zvichiunza kusawirirana panyaya iyi. Vamwe vanoti dare reparamende rakurumidza kumedza kutsenga richada asi vamwe vachiti kana hurumende yakatombopa chikwata chaVaChamisa mari inopihwa mapato ezvematongerwo enyika uyu mucherechedzo wekuti ndivo vari panyanga. Asi vamwe vanoti chakaita hurumende kutumira chete mari kukero yebato iri mumaoko ehurumende izvi zvakapa kuti mari itumirwe kuHarvest House. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa na Doctor Khupe, VaObert Gutu, vanoti dare reparamende rakakurumidza kumedza kutsenga sezvo nyaya iyi ichiri kumatare. Asi gweta uye vari mukokeri weMDC-T mudare reparamende, VaInnocent Gonese, vanoti Muzvare Khupe vakadzingwa mubato zviri pamutemo. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Thokozani Khupe Vanodzingwa muNational Assembly?

text: Dare reNational Assembly ratanga neChipiri kuzeya bhajeti regore rinouya asi izvi zvanonoka kutanga sezvo bato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai range richiti gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakatyora bumbiro remutemo apo vakatura bhajeti iri. MDC-T inoti VaChinamasa havana kupa mari kuhurumende dzematunhu pamwe nemakomisheni sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. No media source currently available Vanokokera nhengo dzeMDC-T mudare iri, VaInnocent Gonese, vaudza dare iri kuti bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinosungira kuti zvikamu zvishanu kubva muzana zvebhajeti rese zvinofanira kupihwa kuhurumende dzematunhu, asi VaChinamasa havana kuita izvi mubhajeti ravo ra2016. Vatiwo bumbiro rinosungira kuti makomisheni ese anoumbwa pasi paro apihwe mari dzawo pabhajeti iri asi izvi hazvina kuitwa zvakare sezvo mari dzemakomisheni aya akaita seresarudzo dzakapihwa pasi pebazi rezvemitemo. VaGonese vatiwo VaChinamasa vanofanira kukumbira mvumo yedare pakushandisa kwavakaita mari zvakapfurikidza pabhajeti regore rino rakatambirwa neparamende. Vati nekuda kweizvi paramende inofanira kumbomira kuzeya bhajeti iri kudzamara VaChinamasa vagadzirisa izvi. Mutauriri wedare iri, VaJacob Mudenda, vaudza dare kuti vanobvumirana nemaonere aVaGonese. Asi VaChinamasa vati pari zvino havakwanisi kupa mari kuhurumende dzematunhu nekuti hapana mutemo unovabvumidza kana kuvapa gwara rekuti vanozviita sei. Vati paramende inofanira kuumba mutemo wekushanda kwehurumende dzematunhu uye kana izvi zvikange zvaitika vanodzipa mari yadzinofanira kupihwa pabhajeti renyika yese. Asi VaGonese vati haisi mhosva yenhengo dzeparamende kuti hurumende haisati yaumba mutemo wehurumende dzematunhu vachiti izvi zvinofanira kuitwa nedare remakurukota pamwe nemutungamiriri wenyika. Kunyange hazvo nhengo dzedare iri dzichikwanisa kuumba mimwe mitemo, bumbiro haridzibvumire kuumba mitemo ine chekuita nekushandiswa kwemari. VaChinamasa vabvuma kukumbira mvumo kudare kuti rivaregerere nekushandisa mari zvange zvisiri mubhajeti gore rino vachiti izvi zvakakonzerwa nesarudzo dzema by-elections dzange dzakawanda zvisina kutarisirwa. Vati ma by-elections aya akaitwa zvichitevera kudzingwa kwenhengo dzinodarika makumi matatu dzeMDC T mudare iri. Zvichakadai, dare iri razotanga kuzeya bhajeti remabhiriyoni mana emadhora regore rinouya, uye dare iri rinotarisirwa kupasisa bhajeti iri svondo rino. Paramende yatombimisa mitemo yese yemashandiro eparamende nechingawa chekuti nhengo dzedare iri dzipasise bhajeti regore rinouya.
title: MDC-T Yomanikidza VaChinamasa Kukumbira Ruregerero kuParamende

text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaongororwe pamwe nekurapwa chirwere chemalaria icho chiri kuramba chichiuraya vanhu munyika. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vati kusvika parizvino vanhu zana nemakumi mashanu nemumwe vafa nechirwere cheMalaria gore rino chete. VaMujiri vati ongororo yavo yezvirwere yakaratidza kuti pavhiki ra17 kusvika 23 Gumiguru vanhu churu chimwechete nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vazhinji vari vekuMashonaland East kwozotevera Mashonaland Central province. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu vana vakafa panguva imwechete iyi nechirwere vaviri vari vemuHarare. Vachitaura neStudio 7 mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Doctor Prosper Chonzi vatiwo kunyangwe muHarare manga musina dambudziko rechirwere ichi ravemo. Dr Chonzi vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vaongororwe chirwere ichi vakaita zviratidzo zvekuti vabatwa nacho. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti zvikamu zvinodarika gumi nezviviri kubva muzana zvevari kubatwa nechirwere chemalaria munyika vana vari pasi pemakore mashanu.VaChonzi vati vana ava vanowanzobatwa nemalaria sezvo vachinyanyotambira panze uye vasingagoni kukurumidza kutaura kana vachidzimbikana nemuviri. Dr Chonzi vatiwo kuzvipatara zvekanzuru kuongororwa malaria kunoitwa pachena uyewo mishonga yechirwere ichi inopiwa pachena. Nyanzvi munezvehutano uye vaimbova gurukora rezvehutano Doctor Henry Madzorera vati chirwere chemalaria chirwere chinorapika. VaMadzorera vati hurumende inofanirwa kupfapfaidza mishonga munogona kuberekera humhutu kudzivirira ndufu dzechirwere ichi Dr Madzorera vatiwo veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuzvidzivirira kuchirwere ichi kuburikidza nekuzvivhara muviri kana vachinge vari panze husiku uyewo kushandisa zvinodzinga humhutu kana vari mudzimba dzavanorara. VaMujiri vatiwo hurumende yakatotanga chirongwa chekupfapfaidza dzimba kumatunhu makumi maviri nemashanu uye vari kutarisira kubatsira vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere kana kuti 2.8 million. Bazi rezvehutano ririkukurudzira kuti avo vanopihwa mambure ekudzivirira humhutu vanofanirwa kuashandisa sezvinotarisirwa vachiti vamwe vanoguma voshandisa mamwe mabasa vachizviisa panjodzi yekubata malaria. Ko munhu anoziva sei kuti abatwa nechirwere ichi? Nyanzvi dzinoti anotanga kupisa muviri, kurutsa, kutemwa nemusoro, kuneta. Manyoka nekungorwadziwa nemuviri. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Zana neMakumi Mashanu neMumwe (151) Vafa neChirwere cheMalaria Chopararira muNyika

text: Bazi reUnited Nations World Tourism Organization raburitsa gwaro riri kuratidza kuti Zimbabwe iri kuita zvinotarisirwa chaizvo munyaya dzekukwezva vashanyi. Gwaro iri rinzonzi 2015 Visa Openess Report, uye rinotarisa zvaitwa mumakore manomwe apfuura. Panyika zana nemakumi mashanu neina, Zimbabwe iri pachinhanho chechimakumi maviri nepfumbamwe. Izvi zvinonzi zvinobatsira mukuumbiridza hupfumi uho hwaenda kumawere. Chitsuva cheNiue mugugwa rePacific ndicho chinonzi chiri pamusoro. Mozambique neDjibout dziriwo pazvidanho zvepamusoro soro. Asi vamwe vari kuyambira kuti kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kuchapa kuti kukwezva vekunze kunetse. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaWashington Mehlomakhulu, avo vanoshanda nesangano reResource Exploitation Watch, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende igadzirise zvivakwa zvakaita senhandare dzinomhara ndege uye kuzvishambadza zvakasimba. No media source currently available
title: UN Inoti Zimbabwe Yoita Zviri Nani Munyaya dzeKukwezva Vashanyi

text: Imwe nhengo yesangano rinomiririra vanotengesa mumigwagwa reNational Vendors Union Zimbabwe kana kuti NAVUZ iri muchipatara muguta reHarare mushure mekupambwa uye kuitwa kafiramberi nevanhu vaanofungidzirwa kuti vasori. VaKudakwashe Kambakunje vakapambirwa mudhorobha reHarare vari pamusika pavo nevarume vanodarika gumi. Vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakavapamba ava vakaridza pfuti kutyisidzira vamwe vaitengesa pamusika vaive vauya kuzobatsira kuti vasatorwa zvechisimba mushure mekunge varidza mhere yerubatsiro. Vatiwo vakavapambi ava vakazovasiya mushure mekuvaita kafairamberi vachifunga kuti vainge vafa. VaKambakunje vakakururwa zvipfeko zvese zvavaive vakapfeka vakatorerwa chitupa chavo nenharembozha nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori. Pamusoro pekurohwa nekuiswa magetsi VaKambakunje vakabaiwawo jekiseni ravasingazivi kuti nderei. Vamwe vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vari nhengo yeTajamuka VaSilvanos Mudzvova vakapambwa mazuva apfuura vakabayiwa jekiseni iri. Amai vaVaKambakunje, Mary Kuzanga avo vachema zvikuru vachitaura neStudio 7 vati samai vekubereka varwadzikana zvikuru vachiona mwana wavo akakuvadzwa pamwe nekubayiwa jekiseni ravasingazivi kuti nderei. VaTichaona Chifamba imwe nhengo yeNAVUZ varara husiku hwese vachitsvaka VaKambakunje avo vavazowana mumapurazi ari munzira inoenda kuMazowe vaudza Studio 7 kuti vawana VaKambakunje vakarohwa zvakaipisisa. Sachigaro weNAVUZ, VaStandrick Zvorwadza vashoropodza zvikuru hurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe iyo varikupomera mhosva yekupamba vanopikisa. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti varikushungurudzwa zvikuru nekutorwa kwevanhu nechisimba. Bumbiro remutemo wenyika rinochengetedza vanhu kubva mukumbunyikidzwa zvechisimba nekutochwa asi vanorwira kodzero vanoti kunyangwe bumbiro richichengetedza vanhu, hupenyu hwavo huri parumananzombe nekuti mutemo mukuru wenyika uyu hausi kutevedzwa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba kana gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaChristopher Mushowe. No media source currently available
title: Imwe Nhengo yeNAVUZ Yopambwa neKuitwa Kafiramberi muHarare neVanofungidzirwa Kuti Vasori

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kusangana nevamwe vatungamiriri venyika dzemuSADC kuMaputo, Mozambique uko vari kuronga kuti mauto eSADC, angapindire sei mukubatsira Mozambique pahondo yayo nevanopfurikidza mwero kudunhu reCabo Delgado munyika iyi. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kusangana nevamwe vatungamiriri venyika dzemuSADC kuMaputo, Mozambique uko vari kuronga kuti mauto eSADC, angapindire sei mukubatsira Mozambique pahondo yayo nevanopfurikidza mwero kudunhu reCabo Delgado munyika iyi. Vamwe vari kupinda mumusangano uyu, ndiVaCyril Ramaphosa vekuSouth Africa, VaFillipe Nyusi vekuMozambique pamwe naVaMogkweetsi Masisi vekuBotswana. Musangano uyu uri kuzeya zvakabuda mutsvakurudzo yechikwata chavakatumwa kuCaba Delgado zvichitevera musangano wavakaita kuMozambique kwekare mwedzi wapfuura. Vanotarisirwavo kubuda nechisungo chekutumira mauto kunobatsira eMozambique kuCabo Delagado. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuti zvii zvabuda mumusangano wanhasi sezvo tisina kukwanisa kubata hofisi yebazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika. Asi mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitwa nevatungamiri veSADC zvakanaka chose vachiti nyaya yerunyararo nebudiriro iri kudzorerwa kumashure nemhirizhonga iri kuCabo Delgado. Vati kunze kwekuendesa mauto kudunhu iri, panodiwawo rubatsiro rwechikafu nezvimwe sezvo vanhu vakasiya misha yavo nekuda kwemhirizhonga iri munzvimbo iyi. Vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu vakaurawa nekuda kwekurwisana uye mazana manomwe ezviuru vakasiya misha yavo nekuda kwekusangadzikana kuri mudunhu iri. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paGreat Zimbabwe University, VaJoel Muusha, vati musangano weSADC Double Troika, wakakosha pakugadzirisa dambudzikko ranetsa kuCabo Delgado, iro vati rinogona kupararira nedunhu rese reSADC. Vatiwo vanotarisira kuti musangano wanhasi uchatarisawo nyaya dzakaita sekuti ndivanani vakabereka vanopfurikidza mwero ava uye kuti vanodyidzana nani mudunhu reSADC. Kunze kwenyika dzeSADC, Portugal, United States, France neRwanda dzakatotumirawo mauto kuti anobatsira Mozambique. No media source currently available
title: SADC Troika Yozeya Hondo Iri muMozambique

text: Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nekukanzurwa kwakaitwa musangano wechimbi chimbi wevatungamiri venyika dziri mu SADC Troika, uyo waifanirwa kuitwa nemusi weChina, asi ukakundikana sezvo vatungamiri vaviri vari muSADC Troika, Va Mokqweetsi Masisi vekuBotswana, naVa Cyril Ramaphosa vekuSouth Africa, vakakundikana kuenda mumusangano uyu. VaMasisi, avo vanova sachigaro weSADC Troika, vanonzi vakazvipatsanura zvichitevera kubatwa ne Covid-19 kwechipangamazano chavo, ukuwo VaRamaphosa vachinzi vakakundikana sezvo vaifanirwa kumira pamberi pekomisheni ye Zondo Commission of Inquiry. Vatungamiri vaifanirwa kusangana mumusangano we SADC Troika wekukurukura hondo iri mu Cabo Delgado mu Mozambique, ndiVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, mutungamiri we Mozambique uye vari sachigaro weSADC, Va Filipe Nyusi, naVaRamaphosa, avo vari kutarisirwa kutora higaro chasachigaro weSADC Troika muna Nyamavhuvhu. SADC inoti musangano uyu wakakanzurwa sezvo VaMasisi naVa Ramaphosa vakakundikana kunge vari pamusangano uyu. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vari mukuru we Human Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti chokwadi chiripo ndechekuti VaNyusi havasi kuzvipira panyaya yekuti SADC itumire mauto ayo ku Mozambique. Mashoko aVaMavhinga atsigirwawo nezvaburitswa nebepanhau repaindaneti, re NewsHawks. VaMavhinga vanoti zvakaitwa zvekukanzura musangano wakakosha kudai zvinosiya vanhu vemudunhu reCabo Delgado vachifunga kuti havakosheswi. VaMavhinga vanoti SADC yaikwanisa kuitira musangano wayo padandemutande ichibuda nechisungo chakasimba chekuona kuti vanhu vemuCabo Delgado vawana rubatsiro. Sangano reUnited Nations rinoti vanhu vanodarika mazana manomwe ezviuru vakatiza misha yavo mudunhu iri, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru zviviri nemazana matanhatu vanonzi nesangano reArmed Conflict Location and Event Data, vafa muhondo iri kuitika muMozambique. Masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anoti mauto emuMozambique anonzi ari kushungurudza vanhu vari mudunhu iri vanofungidzirwa kuti vanenge vaine ruzivo rwekune vakapfurikidza mwero vari kurwisa muCabo Delgado. No media source currently available
title: Vanorwra Kodzero dzeVanhu Voshushikana neKukanzurwa kweMusangano weSADC Troika kuMozambique

text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwasvika pamazana matatu nemakumi maviri vakawanda vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi vachibva kuSouth Africa vari munzvimbo dziri kuchengeterwa vanhu kana kuti ma quarantine centers. Asi huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira zvekare nhasi pachaburitswa zvabuda muongororo dzekuvheneka vane chirwere ichi. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave makumi mana nevapfumbamwe uye vafa vachiri vana. Nzvimbo dzema quarantine zones pari zvino dzine vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe uye dzawirwa nedambudziko rekuti vamwe vave kutiza. Mukuru anoona nezvekurwisa kuparira kwehutachiona hwe coronavirus munyika, Dr Agness Mahomva, vakati vachasimbaradza kuchengetwa kwenzvimbo idzi uye vari kutiza vave kuburitswa mazita avo mudzinhepfenyuro vosungwa vakabatwa. Vakawanda vari mune dzimwe nzvimbo idzi vari kutaura neStudio 7 vanoti dzakazarisa uye dzine tsvina ukuwo chikafu nemvura zvichinetsa. Vamwe vari kugarisawo munzvimbo idzi kwemazuva anodarika mavhiki matatu akatarwa nekuda kwekuti hakuna zvekuvheneka vanhu kana kuti matest kits ekuona kuti havana chirwere ichi here. Kunyange hazvo dare repamusoro rakati nzvimbo idzi dzigadziriswe, vanachiremba vanoti hapana chaitwa kusvika pari zvino zvekuti vari kufungidzira kuti vanhu vari kutotapurirana zvirwere munzvimbo idzi. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa zvinhu kunzvimbo dziri kuchengeterwa vanhu kuti matambudziko ari kusangana nevanhu aya apere. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 200,000 vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vashaya vadarika zviuru zvishanu nemazana mashanu kana kuti 5,500. Vapora vanodarika zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe, kana kuti 91,000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni manomwe nemazana mana ezviuru kana kuti 7,4 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika mamiriyoni maviri, vanhu vafa munyika iyi vachidarika zviuru zana negumi nezviviri kana kuti 112, 000 Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zviuru mazana mana kana kuti 400,000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mana ezviuru, kana kuti 3, 4 million.
title: Vari Kubva kuSouth Africa Vakawanda Vobatwa neCoronavirus

text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden nhasi vakukurudzira vanhu kuti vasaregedze ruvengo rwemarudzi rwuchipinda muhana mavo uye kuti dare reCongress ridzike mitemo yekuti zvisave nyore kutenga pfuti. VaBiden vataura mashoko aya kuBuffalo, New York uko kune mumwe muchena ane makore gumi nemasere Payton Gendron auraya nepfuti vanhu vatema gumi ndokukuvadza vamwe vatatu. Matikitivha eFBI ari kutora mhosva iyi semhosva yemarudzi.
title: VaBiden Vonetsekana neKupfurwa kweVanhu muAmerica

text: Vakuru vakati chikomo 'chiremera chevari kure, vari pedyo vanotamba nacho'. Dudziro yechirevo ichi inenge yave kubuda sechokwadi pamubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weMDC Alliance, uyo uri kuonekwa nevamwe vari kunze senzira chete yekubvisa nayo hutongi hweZanu PF. Asi izvi zvinonzi handizvo zviri kuonekwa nevamwe vari mumapato akapinda mumubatanidzwa uyu, avo vanonzi vari kubuda pachena vachishoropodza mubatanidzwa uyu. Mazuva mashoma adarika, dzimwe nhengo dzePDP dzakabuda pachena dzichinyunyuta nemafambisirwo anonzi ari kuitwa nhaurirano dzemubatanidzwa uyu, zvikuru panyaya yekugovana zvigaro. Komiti huru yebato iri inonzi iri kutarisirwa kusangano nemusi weChishanu kuti izeye nekupeta nyaya inonzi yave kuda kutsemura musangano uyu nepakati. Dzimwe nhengo muMDC-T dzinonzi dziri kurambawo kuti paumbwe mubatanidzwa nemamwe mapato, dzichiti pamato aya haana chaanounza kunze kwekutokohwa paasina kurima. Izvi zvinonzi zviri kuitikawo kuMDC inotungamirirwa naMuzvinafundo Welshman Ncube, uko dzimwe nhengo, zvikuru dziri muhutungamiri, dziri kunzi dziri kukanda zvipanera muvhiri remubatanidzwa uyu dzichiramba kubatana nebato raVaTsvangirai. Mapato anoti MDC-T, MDC, PDP, Transform Zimbabwe, Zimbabwe People First, Christian Democratic Party neZanu Ndonga akabatana kuumba MDC Alliance, asi zvinozi kusvika pari nhasi mamwe mapato haasati aisa runyoro rwavo pachibvumirano chekuumba mubatanidzwa sezvo dzimwe nhengo dzawo dziri kuramba. Asi mutauriri weMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNcube, VaKurauone Chihwayi, avo vataura vakamirira bato ravo, vanoti zvakaitwa nebato ravo zvekupinda mumubatanidzwa uyu ndizvo zvakabva muvanhu vavanomirira. "Zvakanzi zvakangonaka kuti muite mubatapamwe, mubatirane pamwechete mukwanise kubvisa varipo ava. Asi mumaziso tinogona kunge tichiona zvakasiyana. Isu mumaziso edu takaona kuti chinhu chakanaka uye tiri kudavira kumashoko evana veZimbabwe kuti tiise pfungwa pamwechete tigorwisa hurumende yeZanu PF yadai kutitambudza," VaChihwayi vanodaro. Vanoti mubatanidzwa uyu ndicho chete chinhu chinokwanisa kuti Zanu PF ibve pachigaro. Vanotiwo vane dambudziko nevamwe vanhu vanongoda kusvoropodza chinhu chose chose, asi vasingape pfungwa dzinovaka. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakarerekera kubato reZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu vanoti havaoni mubatanidzwa uyu uchikwanisa kubvisa Zanu PF pachigaro, kana kubudirira, vachiti mbeva zhinji hadzina mashe. "Hazvigone kuti vabudirire. Chekutanga, pamapato avo ose manomwe iwayo, zvazvinoreva ndezvekuti hapana rinonzi bato pama party avo manomwe iwayo nekuti wakaona vanhu vanomwe voungana vachida kukutsira munhu mumwechete, izvo zvinongoreva kuti haa, vari kuita havo matope," VaChirumhanzu vanodaro. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeMamwe Mapato ari muMDC Alliance Dzoshoropodza Mubatanidzwa

text: Vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vebato reDemocratic Party, vari kukwikwidzana nemutungamiri wenyika, VaDonald Trump musarudzo dzichaitwa musi wa3 Mbudzi, vari kukwikwidza kechitatu musarudzo yekuenda kuWhite House, asi rwendo rwuno vari mumiriri weDemocratic Party kekutanga musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica. Kana vakakunda, uye vakagadzwa muna Ndira anotevera, VaBiden vanoita mutungamiri weAmerica wechimakumi mana nematanhatu. Apa vanenge vava nemakore makumi manomwe nemasere ekuberekwa, mutungamiri wekutanga ane makore akadai, vachidarika VaTrump avo vane makore makumi manomwe nemana. VaBiden vagara vachitaura mumwedzi yose yavange vari kutsvaga rutsigiro kuti vari kutsvaga kupedza hutongi hwaVaTrump. "Tiri kurwira hunhu hweAmerica," VaBiden vanodaro padandemutande ravo rekutsvaga rutsigiro. "Iyi inguva yekuyeuka kuti tiri vanaani. Tiri vanhu vemuAmerica: Takasimba, uye hatiori moyo, asi tizere neremangwana rakanaka. Ino inguva yekubata munhu wese zvine chiremera. Inguva yekuva nevashandi vanoshandira budiiriro yenyika yose. Inguva yekurwisa kusashandiswa zviri pamwero kwemasimba uko tiri kuona. Inguva yekutarisisa zvakadzama pamwe nekutondera kuti zviuya mberi." VaBiden vanoshoropodza VaTrump vachiti mutungamiri asina kukodzera munyika ine hutongo hwakasununguka, vachiti "Inguva yehutungamiriri hwunoremekedzwa pasi rose uye hutungamiriri hunokudzwa muno muAmerica." Panguva iyo pasi rose riri kutatarika nepamusana pedambudziko reCoronavirus, kutsvaga rutsigiro kwaVaBiden mumazuva ekutanga muna Chikunguru, kwanga kusina kufanana nedzimwe sarudzo dzemutungamiri weAmerica mumakore ano. VaBiden vanga vachitsvaga rutsigiro vari pamba pavo mudunhu ravo reDelaware, dzimwe nguva vachimbopinda muguta guru redunhu reDelaware, reWilmington, pamwe neguta riri pedyo, rePhiladelphia mudunhu rePennsylvania, vachitaura pamwe nekuzeya gwara ravo vari muzvikwata zvidiki zvevanhu VaBiden vakaita musangano mumwe chete chete nevatori venhau mukati memwedzi mitatu sezvo vange vasingade kuita magungano makuru ekutsvaga rutsigiro nekutya kubata kana kubatsira kupararira kwe coronavirus kana vanhu vakawanda vakaungana kuzonzwa vachitaura. Budiriro neNhoroondo yaVaBiden: Mushure mekupedza zvidzidzo paUniversity of Delaware neSyracuse Law School, VaBiden, avo vaive nemakore makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe, vakave mugore ra 1972 mumwe wevechidiki kusarudzwa kuve nhengo yedare reSeneti muAmerica. Asi masvondo mashoma vasarudzwa, vakasangana nenjodzi huru. Mudzimai waVaBiden Neilia nemwanasikana wavo aive negore rimwe aberekwa, Naomi, vakafa mutsaona yemotokari panguva yekutanga kweKisimusi. VaBiden vakambofunga kusiya chigaro chavo muSeneti kuitira kuti vachengete vamwe vana vavo vaviri, vose vari vanakomana, asi vakatanga kushandisa chitima zuva nezuva kuenda kubasa kuWashington. Chitima ichi chaitora maminitsi makumi mapfumbamwe kuenda nekudzoka, izvo vakaramba vachiita kwematemo matanhatu vari mudare reSeneti. Makore akawanda mushure mekufa kwemukadzi wavo wekutanga, VaBiden vakasangana uye vakazoroora muzvare Jill Jacobs Tracy, uyo aida kuve mudzidzisi, uye aine mwanasikana wake akaberekwa muna 1981. VaBiden vambokwikwidza musarudzo yekutsvaga anomirira bato reDemocratic Party musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica muna1987 na2007, asi havana kubudirira. Mushure mekunge VaBiden vabuda musarudzo yekutsvaga achamirira bato ravo muna 2007, vaivewo mukwikwidzi, VaBarack Obama vakazokumbira VaBiden kuti vave mutevedzeri wavo. Vaviri ava vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica dmuna 2008, uye vaviri ava vakasarudzwa zvakare muna 2012, izvo zvakapa kuti VaBiden vashande semutevedzeri waVaObama kwemakore masere. Gwara Rinobata Zviri Kunze kweAmerica: Vari mudare reSeneti, VaBiden vaive nhengo yekomiti yakakosha yeSeneti inoona nezvekudyidzana vakashanda kaviri sasachigaro wayo. Vari mukomiti iyi, VaBiden vakapikisa hondo yePersian Gulf War muna 1991, asi vakavhotera kuti America ipinde zvichisimba muIraq muna 2003. Vakatsigira kupindira kwemauto emuAmerica pamwe neeNATO muBosnia muna 1994. Vachiri kushanda semutevedzeri waVaObama, VaBiden vakabatsira kuumba gwara reAmerica pane zvaiitika muIraq, kusanganisira kubviswa kwemauto emuAmerica muna 2011. Vakatsigirawo kupindira kwakaita mauto eNATO muLibya muna 2011. VaBiden vakabata mamwe mabasa akakosha mumakore avo vari muSeneti, kunyanya mukugadzira mabhiri ekurwisa kuparwa kwemhosva, kusanganisira kubhanwa kushandiswa kwezvombo mudzimba kwemakore gumi kusvika 2004 asi mutemo uyu hausati wavandudzwa. Vakatsigira mitemo inoomesera vanopara mhosva dzakaipa, danho ravakati chinjeyi muhurongwa hwavo hwekukwikwidza sarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika gore rino. Iye zvino vanoti "vanhu vakawandisa vari mumajeri muAmerica - uye vazhinji vavo vanhu vatema nevanhu vane ganda rebhurauni." VaBiden vanoti vanoti vatora mutemo unochengetedza madzimai kuti asashungurudzwe weViolence Against Women Act semutemo wakakosha zvikuru wavakabatsira kuti uvepo uyo vanoti vakabatsira matare maviri emuAmerica kuti udzikwe. Asi vanoshorwa nemashoko avakataura paiferefetwa nhengo yebato reRepublican Party, uye vari munhu mutema, VaClarence Thomas, avo vainge vadomwa nevaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge H. W. Bush, kuti vave nhengo yedare Supreme Court mugore ra1991. Vamwe mubato raVaBiden havana kufara nedanho ravakatora, uye nanhasi inyaya inogara yakasimudza mutauro pachitariswa nhoroondo yaVaBiden. Amai Anita Hill, gweta uye vaishanda naVaThomas, akavapomera mhosva yekuvashungurudza munyaya dzepabonde uye vakapawo huchapupu hwekuva pomera mhosva iyi asi ivo VaThomas vachiiramba. Asi VaBiden, avo vaive sachigaro wekomiti yeSeneti inoona nezvematare nemitemo, havana kubvumidza zvimwe zvapupu zvekutsigira nyaya Hill. Masangano anorwira kodzero dzemadzimai nevarwiri vekodzero vakatsoropodza kubatwa kwakaitwa nyaya iyi naVaBiden. Mushure mezvo Seneti yakabvumira kudomwa kwaVaThomas kuva muting wedare reSuoreme Court uye vachiri mudare iri. Muna Kubvumbi 2019,VaBiden vakafonera Hill vachikumbira ruregerero nemafambisiro avakaita nyaya yake, asi Hill haana anoti ari kugara asina kugutsikana nezvakaitika. Zvinangwa: Kubudirira kwehutungamiri hwaVaBiden kungangotevedzera makore masere ehutongi hwaVaObama muWhite House, vaine hurongwa negwara rekusimudzira nyaya dzebudiriro pamusoro pemarudzi nezvido zvevanhukadzi muAmerica pamwe nezviga zvepasi rose. Kunyange hazvo VaTrump vakaburitsa America kubva muzvibvumirano zvekutengeserana, zvibvumirano zvezvombo zve nuclear pamwe nekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze izvo VaBiden vanoti hazvina zvido zveAmerica zvakaitwa naVaTrump, VaBiden vari kutarisirwa kudzosera chimiro cheAmerica pasi rose apmwe nekuona kuti nyika iyi yatanga kutaudzana nedzimwe nyika zvine chiremera. MuAmerica, VaBiden kwemakore mazhinji apfuura yane nemukurumbira wkushanda nevamwe zvakanaka kunyange vachibva kuRepublicans Party. Asi panguva iyo vange vachirwira kusarudzwa neDemocratic Party, VaBiden vakadududza pavakanzi vaive munhu asina kusimba zvakadzama panyaya dzekuti munhu wese ave nemafungiro ake uye asambunyikidze vamwe vachiti muna pachiitiko muna Kurume, "Ndine nhoroondo isina anoikunda pavanhu vose vari kukwikwidza." VaBiden vakasimbisa nhoroondo yehutongi hwaVaObama, kusanganisira kuwedzera rubatsiro munyaya dzehutano, kutsigira mutemo unobvumidza kuti ngochani dziroorane, uye kutsigira hurumende kuti ibatsire nemari makambani emotokari emuAmerica ainge avhiringwa nekuparara kwehupfumi hwenyika. VaBiden vanoti VaTrump vasiya hondo yekurwisa dambudziko re coronavirus, vachitiwo "vachamisa kuita dambe rezvematongerwo enyika nekutaura manyepo izvo zvakonzera rusarura nekuita chadzimira mumafungiro evanhu." Va Biden vanoti vachaona kuti "zvisungo zvinobata hutano hweveruzhinji zvichaitwa nenyanzvi dzezvehutano kwete nevezvematongerwo enyika." Kunyange hazvo kupopota nekubuda furo rehasha padandemutande reTwitter agara ari maitiro aVaTrump kubva pavakapinda muWhite House, kukanganwa nekurasa mukanwa kwaVaBiden kuri kupa VaTrump mukana wekushora VaBiden vachiti munhu asisina pfungwa dzakati tsvikiti nepamusara pekukwegura kwake. Masvondo mashoma apfuura, VaBiden vakati vari kupinda musarudzo yeSeneti, pane kuti vari kupinda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, vakatiwo vanhu zana nemakumi maviri emamiriyoni vafa neCovid-19 pane kuti zana nemakumi maviri ezviuru. “Kana dai ndakambotaura zvinhu zvakapusa kudai, masangano enhau anonyepa angadai akauya kwandiri achindishoropdza zvakanyanya. Izvi zvinodarika kukanganisa kuri pamwero,” VaTrump vakanyora paTwitter. Asi VaBiden, pavakabvunzwa kana pfungwa dzavo dzichiri kushanda zvakanaka, vakati, "Tarisa, zvose zvaunofanirwa kuita kungonditarisa uye handife ndakamirira kuenzanisa kugona kwangu kwekuziva nekugona kwemurume wandiri kukwikwidzana naye." Vaviri ava vari kutarisirwa kusangana vachikakavadzana pasi pechirongwa chekuedzana ruzivo muhurongwa hutatu huchaitwa muna Gunyana naGumiguru.
title: Nhoroondo yaVaJoe Biden

text: Bato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change riri kuchema chema nekudomwa kwaVaUtoile Silaigwana semukuru anoona nezvesarudzo musangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC. MDC inoti VaSilaigwana munhu akaendeswa kunoshandira kuZEC panguva iyo vaive nhengo yeZimbabwe National Army apo vaiona nezvesarudzo munyika kuti vave mukuru wezvesarudzo kana kuti chief elections officer. VaSilaigwana avo vainge vakafanobata chigaro ichi vakazodomwa kuchitora musi wa 1 Chikunguru. Bato reMDC rinoti VaSilaigwana vaive vaive mukomisheni yeZEC isina kuburitsa zvainge zvabuda musarudzo muna 2008 kwemavhiki mashanu zvakashorwa zvikuru neSADC neAfrican Union. Asi mukuvadoma, sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscila Chigumba vanoti vane ruzivo uye nhoroondo yekubata nyaya dzesarudzo. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaGadzira Chirumanzu vanoti vanhu veMDC havadi kukundwa. Vanoona nezvesarudzo mubato reMDC VaJacob Mafume vanoti VaSilaigwana vane nhoroondo yekubira sarudzo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaSilaigwana kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. No media source currently available
title: MDC Yoshora Kudomwa kwaVaSilaigwana Kuti Vave Mukuru weSarudzo muZEC

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kushanda zviri pamutemo muBotswana zvakawandisa kudarika zvirwara zvedzimwe nyika zviri munyika iyi. Gwaro rakaparurwa neStatistics Botswana rinoratidza kuti zvikamu makumi mashanu nechimwe nechidimbu zvevanhu ava zvizvarwa zvekuZimbabwe. Vanhu vemuZimbabwe vakapihwa mvumo yekushanda munyika iyi vanosvika zviuru zviviri nemazana masere ane makumi matanhatu nevaviri, kubva pazviuru zvishanu nemakumi matanhatu nemumwe chete vasiri zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. Asi gwaro iri rinoratidza kuti huwandu hwevanhu vasiri zvizvarwa zveBotswana vane mvumo yekushanda munyika iyi hwaderera nezvikamu zvitatu nechimwe kubva muzana. Kuderera uku kunotevera mutemo wakadzikwa neBotswana gore rakapera senzira yekuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vekune dzimwe nyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabasa nevashandi, uye vachidzidzisa pa Botswana Accountancy College, VaNorman Mushayabasa, vanoti kugona basa kwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, izvo zviri kutiza munyika nepamusana pemamiriro ezvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi, ndiko kunoita kuti huwandu hwavo huve pamusoro. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaBusani Vuma-Moyo, vanoti vari muBotswana nokuda kwenzara yanga yapfunya chisero kumusha kwavo kuLupane nokuda kwekushaikwa kwemabasa. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaTarisai Mudazvevamwe, vanotiwo mamiriro ehupfumi muBotswana, nekuva muwakidzani weZimbabwe, ndiko kunoita kuti zvizvarwa zweZimbabwe zvipinde munyika iyi. Kunyange hazvo vanhu vemuZimbabwe vari vanhu vakadzidza, VaDzidzai Bere, vanoti vamwe vanhu vekuZimbabwe vari muBotswana umo vari kuita mabasa akaita sekufudza mombe. Botswana inyika ine vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni maviri nemazana matatu ezviuru. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Inonzi Ndiyo Ine Zvizvarwa Zvakawanda Zvinoshanda Zviri paMutemo muBotswana

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari kutarisirwa kuenda kuGhana svondo rinouya kubva musi wa18 kusvika 22 uko vachapihwa chiremerera chepamusoro chekurwisa hupambefpumi kana kuti Millennium Life Time Achievement. Chiremera ichi vari kuchipihwa nemutungamiri wenyika yeGhana VaJohn Mahama. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaMike Bimha vaudza Studio 7 kuti ichokwadi kuti VaMugabe vari kupihwa chiremera ichi asi vakati titaure naAmbassador Jonathan Wutaunashe avo vanzi vange vari mumusangano. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachishanda nesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition VaJoy Mabenge vanoti ruremekedzo rwakadai rwunoratidza kuti vamwe vekunze havasi kunzwisisa zviri kuitika muZimbabwe umo vakawanda vari kuratidzira vachiti havasi kufara nematongero aVaMugabe. Hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawere uye vakawanda vanoti zviri kukonzerwa naVaMugabe avo vasiri kusunga vanoita zvehouri uye mitemo yavo yopa kuti vakawanda varambe kudyidzana neZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Voshora Ghana neKupa VaMugabe Chiremera Zimbabwe Iri Mukanwa Mamupere

text: Vamwe vatsigiri veMDC Alliance nevemamwe mapato anopikisa varatidzira muBulawayo vachitsutsumwa nekusajeka kwepostal voting. Kunyange hazvo vange vari vashoma vanhu ava vaimba vachitamba kwenguva yakareba vari pedyo negedhi guru rinopindwa naro pamuzinda wemapurisa paRoss Camp Provincial Headquarters muBulawayo. Vamwe vevanhu ava vazhinji vavo vange vari vatsigiri veMDC Alliance, vange vadzingwa nemapurisa mukamba iyi umo mavange vachida kuwona kuvhota kwemapurisa nenzira yepostal voting. Nyaya yekuvhota kwemapurisa nenzira iyi kuri kukonzera mutauro mushure mekubuda kwemashoko anopikisana pakati pevakuru vakuru vemapurisa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC. VaSidingani Dube avo vari kukwikwidza kuve mumiriri weMakokoba pasi pebato reZapu, vati kusajeka kwenyaya iyi kunoita kuti vanhu vave nezvikonzero zvekufungiddzira kuti pane chitsotsi chiri kuitwa neZec. Muzvare Sibusisiwe Adams vanove munyori weMDC-T yaChamisa mudunhu reBulawayo vatsinhirawo izvi vachiti kunyange hazvo postal voting iri mumitemo yenyika, mafambisirwo airi kuitwa haafadzi. Zvichakadaro masangano akazvimirira ega muBulawayo ayo ari kushanda pasi pemubatanidzwa unonzi Election Support Room aita musangano nevatapi venhau muBualwayo achishora mabatirwo akaitwa nyaya yepostal voting neZec. Imwe nhengo yemubatanidzwa uyu, Reverend Useni Sibanda, vati ZEC yagara isina chimiro chakanaka mumaziso evanhu vakati zvakakosha kuti igadzirise nyaya iyi. Vati sangano ravo richasangana neZec uye riri kutaurirarana nemagweta aro kuti rinzwe kuti nderipi danho ringatorwa pamusoro penyaya iyi. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru weZimbabwe Election Support Network, Amai Ellen Kandororo-Dingani, vaudza Studio7 kuti hapafanirwe kuve nekumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu, pakuvhota. Zec iri kuti hapana chakaipa nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa postal voting ichiti pasi pemutemo wenyika Zec haisungirwe kuvepo panoitwa zvepostal voting zvinove zvimwe chetewo nevaongorori vesarudzo kana vanenge vakamirira mapato akasiyana siyana. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Voratidzira muBulawayo Vachiti Zec Ngaibude Pachena

text: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaBevan Makaka, avo vari muguta reDallas mudunhu reTexas muno muAmerica, vanoti vanowana mufaro mukuru kubva mukubatsira vanoshaya nevanotambura. VaMakaka, avo vanove nyanzvi mune zvemabhizimusi vachishandira kambani yeDeloitte uye vakamboshandirawo bhanga reJP Morgan, vanoti vakatanga zvekubhindauka vachiri kuchikoro chepamusorosoro. VaMakaka nemudzimai wavo Amai Megan Makaka, avo vane vana vaviri navo, vane sangano ravo rinobatsira vanoshaya reBEVAN AND MEGAN FOUNDATION, iro rinobatsira mune zvakasiyanasiyana kusanganisira kuendesa vana kuchikoro pamwe nekubatsira vakwegura. Vane kambani zvakare inonzi Xcelerate Enterprises, iyo ine mapoka emabhizimusi akasiyanasiyana anosanganisira rekudzidzisa zvemakombiyuta, rezvehupfumi uye rekutakurwa kwezvinhu zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira mafuta edzimotokari munyika dzakasiyanasiyana kusanganisira Zimbabwe, Mozambique, South Africa neZambia. Pamusoro pezvo, VaMakaka vanobatsirawo kuburikidza nekambani yavo iyi vaimbi vakasiyanasiyana vachivaendesa kunoridza nekutandadza vanhu kunze kwenyika kunyika dzakaita seAmerica. Vanoti vakadzidza chipo chekupa nekubatsira vanoshaya kubva kuvabereki vavo, avo vavanoti vakanga vasingangotarisa vana vavo chete,asi kuti vaibatsirawo vanhu vakawanda. No media source currently available
title: VaBevan Makaka Vanoti Kubatsira Vanoshaya Kunovapa Mufaro Mukuru

text: Dzimwe nhengo dzeparamende dziri muMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa dzakakundwa musarudzo dzekutsvaga vachamirira bato iri musarudzo dzeparamende dzinoti hadzisi kufara nemafambisirwo akaitwa sarudzo dzichiti dzave kuda kuti sarudzo idzi dzidzokororwe. Dzime Nhengo dzeparamende dzeMDCT dzakakundwa musarudzo dzema primary mukupera kwesvondo dzinoti sarudzo idzi hadzina kufamba zvakanaka. Nhengo idzi dzinoti sarudzo idzi dzakaitwa paine zvibingamupinyi zvakasiyana-siyana uye dzinoti dzakwidza nyaya iyi kukomiti iri kuona nezvesarudzo mubato iri. Mumwe wenhengo idzi, VaFani Munengami, avo vanomirira Glen View North muparamende vanoti vakwidza zvichemo zvavo ku Elections Directorate mushure mekukundwa kwavanonzi vakaitwa naVaKennedy Diner. Vamwe vakakundwa musarudzo idzi ndiVaJames Maridadi vanomirira Mabvuku/Tafara, VaGift Chimanikire vanomirira Southerton uye VaElias Mudzuri, vanove mutevedzeri waVaChamisa, vanonzi vave kunokwikwidza musarudzo dzeseneti mushure mekuramba kukwikwidza kwavanonzi vakaita paitsvagwa achamirira bato ravo musarudzo dzeparamende kuWarren Park. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMaridadi, VaChimanikire pamwe naVaMudzuri sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzanga dzisingadairwe. Asi VaMudzuri vaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti havasi kufara nezviri kuitika mubato ravo vachiti vanoda kuti zvavakatara sebato zvitevedzerwe zviitwe. VaMudzuri vanotiwo semukuru-mukuru mumusangano wavo havafanirwe kuti vakwikwidzwe nevanhu vasingatombozikanwe mumusangano. Mumwe wevakakundwa musarudzo idzi ndiVaSimon Chidhakwa vanomirira Zengeza West muparamende avo vakakundwa naVaJob Sikhala. SaVaMunengami, VaChidhakwa vanotiwo sarudzo idzi hadzina kufamba zvakanaka. VaChidhakwa vanoti sarudzo dzema primary dzakaitwa idzi dzinonyadzisa uye vanoti vatokwidza nyaya iyi kune vakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro webato ravo VaMorgan Komichi. Zvinonziwo sarudzo dzekutsvaga achamirira bato iri kuMbare hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Mumwe wevaikwikwikwidza musarudzo idzi, VaPaul Gorekore vanove kanzura mukanzuru yeHarare vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti mumwe wavaikwikwidzana naye, VaStarman Chamisa, vanova munin’ina wemutungamiri webato ravo, vakatuta vanhu kuenda kuHarvest House kwavakanoitira sarudzo ivo vakasara vari kuMbare vakamirira kuti sarudzo dziitwe. VaGorekore vati havatambire kukunda kwakaita VaStarman Chamisa vachiti ivo vari kuzvitora sekuti hapana sarudzo dzakaitwa. Zvichakadai, mutauriri weMDC-T, Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo, vati titaure naVaKomichi nenzvenyaya. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaKomichi pamwe nemunyori mukuru mubato iri VaDouglas Mwonzora kuti tinzwe pamire bato ravo sezvo vanga vachinzi vari mumusangano wekuzeya nyaya iyi. Asi bato iri razivisa kuti VaKomichi nechipiri vari kutarisirwa kuita musangano nevatori venhau pamuzinda webato weMorgan Tsvangirai House muHarare. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeParamende dzeMDC-T yaVaChamisa Dzakakundwa muSarudzo Dzonyunyuta

text: Sangano reEuropean Union razivisa neMuvhuro kuti rambosendeka parutivi zvirango zvarakatemera vamwe vakuru-vakuru muhurumende vatatu pamwe nemudzimai vevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Sangano iri rawedzerawo negore rimwe chete zvirango zvarakatemera kambani yehurumende yeZimbabwe Defense Industries zvichitevera kuurayiwa kunonzi kwakaitwa vanhu nemasoja mukuratidzira kwakaitika munyika muna 2018. Gwaro raburitswa neEU rinoti vana vambosendekerwa zvirango parutivi vanoti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, gurukota rezvekurima VaPerrance Shiri, mukuru wemauto VaPhillip Valerio Sibanda, pamwe naAmai Grace Mugabe. Vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vabviswa zvachose pazvirango izvi zvichitevera kushaya kwavakaita gore rapera. European Union yati zvirango zvayakatemera VaChiwenga, VaShiri, VaSibanda pamwe naAmai Mugabe zvekufamba pamwe nemabhizimusi avo zvicharamba zvakaiswa, kunyange hazvo zvambosendekwa pari zvino. Gwaro reEU iri rinoti sangano iri rabudawo nechisungo chekuti Zimbabwe Defense Industries irambe iri pazvirango kwerimwe gore zvichitevera kusafereretwa kwekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kunonzi kwakaitwa nevari muchiuto. Komisheni yaiongorora mhirizhonga yakaitika muZimbabwe muna Nyamavhuvhu 2018 yaitungamirwa nevakambove mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaKgalema Motlanthe, yakakurudzira hurumende kuti iferefete kupfurwa kwakaitwa vanhu nemasoja zvakasiya vanhu vatanhatu vafa pakaratidzirwa neveruzhinji munyika. Gwaro raburitswa neEU iri rinoti zvirango zvawedzererwa Zimbabwe Defense Industries hazvikanganise hupfumi hwenyika yeZimbabwe, kusimwa kwemari munyika pamwe nekutengeserana pakati peZimbabwe neEU. Rati zvirango izvi zvaramba zviripo kukambani yeZDI senzira yekukurudzira kuti munyika mutevedzerwe mutemo pamwe nekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vati vanotambira danho ratorwa neEU iri. VaKhumalo vati danho ratorwa neEU iri rinotobatsira kuti kodzero dzevanhu munyika dzicheredzwe. Zvichakadai, mutewedzeri wemutauriri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vati zviri kuhurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangwagwa kuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe zvachose. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende padanho ratorwa neEU nhasi iri. Asi mutewedzeri wavo, VaEnergy Mutodi, vati vafara zvikuru sehurumende kuti VaChiwenga nevamwe vavo vambosendekerwa zvirango zvavo, vakati zvirango zvose zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe zvinofanirwa kubviswa. VaMutodi vati hurumende iri kutora matanho kune vanhu vari muchiuto vari kufungidzirwa kuti vakakonzeresa kufa kwevanhu muna Nyamavhuvhu 2018. Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vaburitsawo mashoko ekuti hurumende inotambira danho ratorwa neEU iri vachiti izvi zvinoratidza kucherechedzwa kwekuvandudza zvinhu munyika kwavanoti kuri kuitwa nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa. VaMoyo vati zvirango zvese zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe zviri kukanganisa kuvandudza kwavari kuita zvinhu munyika vachiti zvinofanira kubviswa zvose nekukasika zvikurusei panguva iyo nyika yakatarisana nenzara inotyisa. VaMoyo vati hurumende yeZimbabwe icharamba ichiita nhaurirano neEU vachiti mumwe musangano wekuedza kugadzirisa hukama pakati peZimbabwe neEU uchaitwa muna Chikumi, uye musangano uyu wakatarisirwa kuitirwa kuBrussels zvichitevera mumwe musangano wakadai wakaitwa muHarare mukupera kwegore rapera. EU yakurudzira Zimbabwe kuti ivandudze hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika nekukasika kuitira kuti izvi zvigobatsira ruzhinji rweZimbabwe. Sangano iri rakurudzirawo hurumende kuti iferefete zvakabuda mugwaro rakaburitswa nekomisheni yaVaMotlanthe nekukasika pasina kuramba hurumende ichitora nguva yayo mukuita izvi kuitira kuti vanonzi vakatyora kodzero dzevanhu vatongwe. EU yakurudzirawo kuti paitwe nhaurirano dzisingasiye vamwe vanhu panze kuitira kuti Zimbabwe igadzirise matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Kurudziro yaitwa neEU iyi inouyawo apo VaMnangagwa vari kuramba kuita nhaurirano naVaChamisa ivo VaMnangagwa vachiti nhaurirano idzi dzinofanira kuitwa pasi pechirongwa chavari kudaidza kuti Political Actors Dialogue kana kuti Polad. Nekune rumwe rutivi, VaChamisa vanotiwo havapinde munhaurirano dzePolad dzavanoti idambe, vachiti vanoda nhaurirano dzinotungamirwa nemunhu anove mutungamiri weimwe nyika kana akambotungamira imwe nyika.
title: European Union Inombosendeka Parutivi Zvirango Zvayakatemera VaChiwenga neVamwe muHurumende

text: Bato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC Alliance rinoti harisi kufara nemashoko emutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ekuti hapana zvinoda kuvandudzwa pamberi pesarudzo dzema by-elections pamwe nesarudzo dzakatarisirwa muna 2023.  VaMnangagwa vakataura mashoko aya pamusangano wePolitburo yebato ravo muHarare neChitatu asi MDC Alliance inoti mashoko aya anoratidza kuti Zanu PF haina kuzvipira kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Muaturiri weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane zvakawanda zvinobata nyaya dzesarudzo zvinoda kugadziriswa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa vachiti vanoda kuti sarudzo dziitwe munyika pasina anenge achigunun’una.  VaMnangagwa vanoti vari kutarisira kuti bato ravo richakunda zvine mutsindo musarudzo dzemuna 2023 pamwe nesarudzo dzechipiri dzema by-elections dzavakati dzichaitwa muna Kurume gore rinouya zvichitevera kufa nekudzingwa kwakaitwa nhengo dzeMDC Alliance muparamende pamwe nemumakanzuru akawanda munyika neMDCT inotungamirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora. Asi Muzvare Mahere vati zviri kutaurwa naVaMnangagwa ndezvemugotsi matsuro sezvo bato ravo rine rutsigiro munyika yose.Vati hurumende yaVaMnangagwa iri kukundikana kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika zvichapa kuti veruzhinji vasavhotere bato iri. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaRashweat Mukundu, vanoti hapana musiyano pakati pehurumende yemushakbvu VaRobert Mugabe nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa pamabatirwo enyanya dzesarudzo. VaMukundu vatiwo iyo komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, pachezvayo inotoda kuvandudzwa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa kuitira kuti pasave negakava rine chekuita nesarudzo sezvinowanzoitika pose panoitwa sarudzo munyika. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nasachigaro weZEC, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi Amai Chigumba vakamboudza Studio 7 nguva yapfuura kuti basa rekuvandudza mashandiro eZEC rinoitwa nedare reparamende kwete nekomisheni yavo. Sarudzo dzose dzakaitwa kubva pakavambwa bato reMDC muna 1999, kusanganisira sarudzo dzekupedzisira dzakitwa muna 2018 dzinonzi nebato iri dzakabirirwa nebato reZanu PF uye dziri kungoitwa bato iri richingochemachema nguva dzose kuti pane zvinofanira kugadziriswa asi Zanu PF ichiramba yakaisa zvimiti munzeve. Asi bato reZanu PF rinoti rinokunda zviri pachena musarudzo nguva dzose. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance Inoti Pane Zvakawanda Zvinofanirwa Kuvandudzwa Sarudzo Dzisati Dzaitwa

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa, nemusi weChina vakatura hurongwa hwemashandisirwo akaitwa mari nehurumende kusvika pakati pegore vakaburitsa pachena kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. VaChinamasa vakati zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe nezvinomwe kubva muzana zvemari yese yakawanikwa nehurumende kubva muna Ndira kusvika muna Chikumi zvakashandiswa kubhadhara vashandi vehurumende uye zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka zvekuti hurumende inofanira kutora matanho ekuderedza huwandu hwemari iyi. VaChinamasa vakazivisawo kuti panguva imwe cheteyo, mari yaitarisirwa kuwanikwa nehurumende yakadzikira kubva pa $1.87 billion kusvika pa$1.69 billion. Vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo vave kutarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchakura ne1.2 percent kwete 2.7 percent yavange vakatarisira. Asi mumiriri weMusikavanhu Consituency VaProsper Mutseyami vebato reMDC-T vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaChinamasa havana kunyatsobuditsa pachena kuti vachagadzirisa sei nyaya yehupfumi hwenyika. Mukuyedza kuvandudza hupfumi, VaChinamasa vatiwo hurumende iri kutora matanho akasiyana siyana munyaya dzemabasa ekurima uye nyaya yezvezvicherwa. Vati vemabhimizisi vanofanira kuziva kuti mutemo wekudzivirira kupinda kwezvinhu munyika weStatutory Instrument 64 wakadzikwa gore rino hausi kuzoramba uripo nekudaro vanofanira kugadzirisa mabhizimisi avo usati wabviswa. Vatiwo chikuru chinodiwa kuti hupfumi husimuke inyaya yekuti makambani emunyika atange kugadzira zvinhu. VaChinamasa vati nyika iri kuramba ichitenga zvinhu zvizhinji kubva kunze ichirasikirwa nemari yakawanda. VaChinamasa vatiwo mangoda haana kuunza mari sezvange zvakatarisirwa uye pakacherwa makarati anoda kusvika miriyoni asi ivo vange vakatarisira makarati mamiriyoni matanhatu. Vatiwo kambani yemarasha yeHwange haisi kufamba zvakanaka uye iri kuita zvinhu zvisinei nayo zvakaita sekuve nezvipatara, dzimba nezvimwe. Vati nekuda kwaizvozvo vave kuronga kuti kambani iyi ipe dzimba dzese kubazi rezvematunhu uye kuendesa zvipatara kubazi rezvehutano kuti isare ichiita basa rekuchera marasha chete. Asi munyori anoona nezvehupfumi muMDC-T, VaTapiwa Mashakada vati izvi zvinogona kupa kuti mamwe makambani aregedze kuvakira vashandi vawo dzimba vachityira kuti dzinozotorwa nehurumende. VaChinamasa vazivisa kuti nyika iri kutora matanho akasiyana siyana kusimudzira mabasa ekurima mumaruwa nemumapurazi mumwaka unotevera. Vanoti pari zvino kunyange hazvo nyika yakatarisana nenzara hapana achafa nenzara sezvo paine chibage chinokwana mwedzi misere. Vati chibage ichi chakatengwa nehurumende, makambani pamwe nemasangano akazvimirira nenyika dzakabudurira. VaChinamasa vatiwo havasi kufara nenyaya yekuti mabhanga ekune dzimwe nyika zvikuru sei ekuAmerica nekuEurope ave kuramba kushanda nemabhanga emuno izvo zvave kukanganisa mabasa ehupfumi munyika. Vatiwo nyika icharamba ichishandisa mari yekunze kusvika hupfumi hwanaka uye vati vane hurongwa hwekukurudzira vanhu kuti vashandisewo maRands, MaPula, Australian Dollar nedzimwe mari pane kushandisa mari yekuAmerica chete. Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, Dr John Mangudya vaudza Studio 7 kuti matanho atorwa naVaChinamasa akanaka chose munyaya dzekusimudzira hupfumi. VaMangudya vatiwo vanhu vanofanira kutsigira hurongwa hwekushandisa mari dzakawanda kwete kushandisa madhora ekuAmerica chete. Nhengo dzeparamende dzichazeya gwaro raVaChinamasa muna Gumiguru apo dare reNational Assembly richatanga kugara zvakare. Zvichakadaro, paramende ichatanga kunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pamusoro pebhajeti regore rinoouya svondo rinouuya. Komiti iyi ichatenderera nenyika yese ichinzinzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pamusoro pebhajeti. No media source currently available
title: VaChinamasa Voparura Chirongwa cheMamiriro eHupfumi Vachibuditsa paChena Kuti Zvinhu Hazvina Kumira Zvakanaka

text: Muzvare Lynda Masarira avo vakasunungurwa kubva kujeri reChikurubi nemusi weChipiri vanoti vachaenderera mberi vachiratidzira kunyangwe vaishungurudzwa vari mujeri. Muzvare Masarira vakasungwa vachiratidzira kusafara kwavo nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika vakagara mujeri kwemazuva makumi masere. Vanoti vakashungurudzika nekusiya mhuri yavo yevana vashanu muduku wacho ane makore matatu. Asi vanoti kushungurudzwa kwavo hakusi kuvaodza moyo."In ndicharamba ndichiratidzira nekuti zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichioma munyika uye vanhu vanoramba vachityisidzirwa asi ini handichatyi uye ndicharamba ndichiratidzira kusvika zvinhu zvasanduka," Muzvare Masarira vaudza Studio 7. Vaenderera mberi vachiti apo vakange vari muhusungwa vakagariswa pavo vega kunzvimbo yaive nevarume senzira yekuvashungurudza nekuvatyisidzira sezvo vange vavhunza kuti seyi chikafu chevasungwa change charaswa nevaivachengetedza. "Vana mbuya vaiti chengetedza vakarasa chikafu changu nechemamwe madzimai izvo zvakaita kuti tivhunze kuti seyi vange vari kutyora kodzero dzedu nekurasa zvekudya zvedu," Muzvare Masarira vaudza Studio 7. Muzvare Musarira vanoti mararamiro anoita vanhu vari mumajeri vanofanirwa kuwongororwa sezvo zvinhu zvakadayi sechikafu zviri kupihwa vanoshanda munzvimbo idzi kuti vape vasungwa zvisiri kusvika. Studio 7 yayedza kunzwa kubva kuChikurubi asi nhare dzavo dzange dzisingadairwe. "Chikafu nezvekubikisa zvinopihwa vanoshanda pajeri kuti vape vasungwa hachisvike kuvanhu ava uye taiwona vana ambuya vachitakura kuenda nacho kudzimba dzavo izvo zvairwadza vasungwa vese," Muzvare Masarira vaenderera mberi. Muzvare Masarira vanomirira sangano re Zimbabwe Women In Politics Alliance nemamwewo. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Lynda Masarira Votaura Pamusoro peKusungwa neKuregererwa Kwavo

text: Dhora remuZimbabwe riri kuramba richishaya simba zvinotyisa richienzaniswa nerekuAmerica kunyangwe hazvo makambani akawanda anoda mari yekunze akavhara kana kuti ari kushanda pazvikamu zvishoma izvo zvopa kuti kurudziro yehurumende yekuti mitengo yezvinhu ideredzwe kusvika payaiva musi wa25 Kurume ive zviroto. Hurumende inoti yakatara kuti dhora rekuAmerica ritengwe nemadhora makumi maviri nemashau emunyika asi pamukoto panotenga vakawanda dhora rekuAmerica rave kutengwa nemari inodarika madhora makumi mana nemasere emunyika. Hurongwa hwehuruumende hwekuti vemabhizimisi vaderedze mitengo hwabva hwaita zozorizozo mutsindo wejongwe unonzwikwa neari paduri sezvo kwangove kurova bembera pasina chinobuda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti zvingatove nyore ngamera kupinda muburi retsingano pane kuti mitengo idzike. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvemaindustry Doctor Sekai Nzenza vanoti hongu dhora riri kudonha asi hurumende haina kuita fungira mumoyo rwendo rwembwa panyaya iyi sezvo yakagara pasi nevemabhizimisi vakabuda nechisungo chimwe chete. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers VaDenford Mutashu avo vanoti havo vazviona kuti na’i kwadzo ndedzemucheche dzomukuru dzinoreva kudya vachiti vamwe vemabhizimisi munyika vajaira kuona veruzhinji vachinonga svosve nemuromo. Mutungamiri wesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe kana kuti EMCOZ Dr Israel Murefu vanoti ivo havana havo kukokwa panhaurirano idzi. Asi vanoti kunyangwe havo vasinei nemuchato wedhongi nebere, zvinhu zvakaoma kudzikisa mitengo parizvino. Vakawanda munyika vanoti vave kutadza kudya sezvo voita sekunge mombe dzakaiswa zvikandira pamuromo kuti dzisadye zvirimwa. Kubva zvanzi vanhu vagare mudzimba, mitengo yabva yakwira kurudziro yehurumende kukava kurava mbudzi nedzisipo kurava nedzavamatowo. Muzvitoro zvinhu zvakazara asi kune vakanda, kugara kwachura mumvura handi kunwa. Vataura neStudio 7 vanoti idambudziko rehope kurota kwawakarambwa. Uye zvave kuitwa nehurumende ishungu dzemutana waswera padare kuramba mhandire seane meno. NeMuvhuro, Delta Corporation yakawedzera mutengo wedoro nezvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana. Mune zvimwe zvitoro makirogiramu maviri eshuga ave kutengeswa nezana remadhora kubva pamadhora matanhatu nemanomwe. Makirogiramu maviri emupunga ainge achiita madhora makumi matanhatu ave kuita zana remadhora nemakumi mana. Marita maviri emafuta ekubikisa ave kutengwa nazana remadhora nemasendi makumi masere mune zvimwe zvitoro. Vakawanda munyika vataura neStudio 7 vati havo zuva igore rinodoka rava marevo mavi namavuya, sezvo dima richishura chayedza. Vanoti kupera kwechirwere checoronavirus kuchapa kuti vawanewo chekubata sezvo vanenge vodzokera kumabasa nekuti kuda kutarisira kuti mitengo ichadzika kuchengetesa bere chitunha.  No media source currently available
title: Dhora reZimbabwe Roramba Richishaya Simba Uku Mitengo Ichiwedzerwa Zvakanyanya

text: Musangano weTripartite Negotiating Forum, TNF, wemazuva matatu wanga uchiitwa muHarare wapera pachinzi hapana kuwiriranwa panyaya yekuti gungano iri rotara here mari dzinofanirwa kutambirwa nemushandi wepasi kana kuti dzotarwa nemakambani achiwirirana nemasangano anomirira vashandi. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti nyaya yanetsa ndeyekuti votangira pamarii inoita kuti mushandi wepasi akwanisewo kufema mbichana, kunyange hazvo isingagone kumuraramisa. VaMoyo vanoti nekuda kwekupesana uku, vazowirirana kuti hurumende ivaudzewo kuti iyo iri kuzviona sei, nekudaro vamirira kunzwa kubva kuhurumende. Vanotiwo sesangano rinomirira vashandi, kana vapedza kupira vashandi zvabuda mumusangano uyu, uye vatorawo pfungwa dzine vashandi panyaya iyi, vanogona kusoshevedzerawo musangano weT-N-F kuti vaende mberi. Musangano weT-N-F uyu ndewekutanga kubva pagadzirwa mitemo inoita kuti boka iri rishande zviri pamutemo muna Chikumi wegore rapera. ZCTU inoti kwemakore makumi maviri adarika musangano uyu wanga uchiitwa zviri kunze kwemutemo. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata vamiriri vehurumende pamwe nevevashandirwi vari muT-N-F kuti tinzwewo mativi avo. No media source currently available
title: Musangano weTNF Unotadza Kuburitsa Chimuko paNyaya yeMihoro

text: Dare reHiigh Court rabvuma chikumbiro cheMDC Alliance chekuti iite musangano wayo mapurisa muKwekwe asinganetswe kana kurambidzwa nemapurisa. Mutongi wedare reHigh Court, Justice Nokuthula Moyo, vati MDC Alliance inokwanisa kuenderera mberi nemusangano wayo pazuva rainoda mushure mekuzivisa mapurisa sezvakafanira uyewo kuti musangano uyu unofanirwa kuitirwa panzvimbo ine zvimbuzi. VeMDC Alliance vaive vaita chikumbiro chechimbi-chimbi kudare reHigh Court musi weChishanu chapera mushure mekunge mapurisa arambidza kuti musangano wayaida kuita paMbizo 4 Shopping Centre muKwekwe nemusi weSvondo. Justice Moyo vati nekubvumirana kwemapoka maviri munyaya iyi, zviri pachena kuti chikonzero chikuru chaive chaita kuti mapurisa arambidze musangano uyu kwaive kutyira kuti musangano wakadaro waigona kuwedzera kupararira kwechirwere cheTyphoid. Vati MDC Alliance inogona kuitira musangano wayo munhandare yeMbizo Stadium. Rimwe remagweta ange akamirira MDC Alliance, VaTonderai Chitere, vatsinhira parunhare zvaturwa nedare vakati vakamirira kuwana magwaro emutongo uyu kuti vazosvitsa kuMDC Alliance. Mune imwewo nyaya, mumwe wevanhu vaviri vaive vakamirira MDC Alliance mukukwikwidza kuve mumiriri weBulawayo South, VaFrancis Mangwendeza, vakwira kudare reElectoral Court vachipikisa kusarudzwa kwaVaRaj Modi veZanu PF. Gweta raVaMangwendeza, VaMatshobana Ncube, vaudza Studio7 kuti VaMangwendeza vari kutsutsumwa pamusoro pekuti pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna Chikunguru, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission yakaburitsa gwaro raive nemazita evanhu vainzi vakati havachakwikwidze musarudzo. Zita raVaMangwendeza raivewo pagwaro iri zvisinei kuti vaive vasina kutaurira ZEC kuti havachakwikwidza. VaNcube vati vamirira kunzwa kudare kuti nyaya yavo ichanzwikwa riinhi. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezve matongerwo enyika dzinoti kupikisa zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo kupedza nguva. No media source currently available
title: Dare Rinoti MDC Alliance Ngaiitire Musangano Wayo kuMbizo Stadium, Kwekwe

text: Zimbabwe inobatana nedzimwe nyika mukucherechedza zuva rekodzero dzevanhu pasi rose re International Human Rights Day nhasi..... Kanzuru yeguta reHarare inoenderera mberi nekuputsa zvivakawa zvainoti zvakavakwa zviri kunze kwemutemo mumusha weveruzhinji weBudiriro....... Mapishapisha emubato reZanu PF anoenderera mberi zvichitevera kudzingwa kwaVaSylvester Nguni nevamwe mubato iri pamwe nekumbomiswa kuve nhengo kwevamwe..... Muchirongwa chedu cheWomen's RoundTable na8:30pm nhasi, tiri kutarisa nezvekusvika kumagumo kwechirongwa chemazuva gumi nematanhatu ekushoropodza mhirizhonga yemudzimba, kana kuti 16 Days of Activism Against Gender Based Violence pamwe nezvinoreva zuva reInternational Human Rights Day kumadzimai emuZimbabwe...... Iyi ndiyo misoro yenhau dzedu dzanhasi...munotibata pa 909 am, 4930, kana pa 13860 ne 15460 kilohertzs pa shortwave kana paFacebook page yedu yeVOAShona. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau, China Zvita 10, 2015

text: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika dziri kukurudzira mapato anopikisa kuti asamirire kupiwa nehurumende mikana yekuzvishambadza pamaterevhizheni, maredhiyo pamwe nemapepanhau zvehurumende, sezvo mikana iyi ichigona kushaikwa zvachose idzo sarudzo dzaswedera kudai. Imwe yenyanzvi idzi, uye vari gweta, VaTapiwa Kapurura, vanoti vanopikisa ava vanofanirwa kushandisa mikana iripo kare, inove yemadandemutande kana kuti social media, akaita seFacebook, Whattsap, neTwitter, pamwe nedzimwe nzira dzinoita kuti vasvitse mashoko avo kune veruzhinji. VaKapurura vanoti nguva yave kupera kuti mapato anopikisa amirire kuti hurumende ivape mikana wekushandisa nhepfenyuro pamwe nemapepanhau zvehurumende, sezvinodiwa nebumbiro renyika.
title: Vemapato Anopikisa Vokurudzirwa Kushandisa Mikana Iripo Kuzvishambadza

text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende, reApex Council, razivisa hurumende kuti nhengo dzaro dzicharamwa mabasa panopera mazuva gumi nemana kutanga nezuro sezvo vasina mari dzekushandisa kumabasa. Mutsamba yakasvitswa kuboka republic Service Commission nezChipiri, sangano iri rinoti hurumende haina zvairi kuitawo mukugadzirisa dambudziko rakatarisana nevashandi vayo rekushaikwa kwemari iri. Apex Council inotiwo kunyange hazvo pakaitwa misangano yakawanda pakati pevamiriri vevasandi nehurumende, hapana chakabuda chinobatsira vashandi. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo varairidzi vakazivisawo kuti vacharamwa mabasa nekuda kwekushaiwa chekufambisa.
