Vanachiremba vachiri pakuramwawo mabasa vachida kuti hurumende ivawedzere mari dzemihoro, uye kuvatambirisa mari yekuAmerica. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Citizens Initiative, VaPromise sande, vanoti vanoona sekunge danho ratorwa nevashandi vehurumende iri rakanaka, vachiti izvi zvinoita kuti hurumende isiyane netsika yekukohwa paisina kurima. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rePublic Service Commission panyaya iyi. asi vane ruzivo nezvenyaya iyi vanoti boka iri ratambira tsamba iyi. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veHurumende Vanozivisa Kuti Vacharamwa Mabasa Panopera Mazuva Gumi neMana

text:
Vanhu vakawanda vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nekufa kwakaita vanhu mutsaona yakaitika nezuro mudunhu reMasvingo panguva iyo vanhu vari kurambidzwa kufamba munguva dzemanheru. Vanhu makumi maviri ava vakafa mutsaona yakaitika pedo nenzvimbo neMhandamabwe kwaChivi, nezuro zuva rodoka. Mumwe mugari wekwa Madamombe kwaChivi, Amai Chenai Maguyo, vati zvinorwadza kuti vanhu vakawanda kudai vakafa varu mumugwagwa asi paine mitemo yakadzikwa inorambidza motokari kufamba nzendo refu.

Izvi zvatsigirwa naAmai Netsai Mashanda, avo vati mapurisa kunyange
pasina nyaya dzemutemo yelockdown, vakatadza basa nekuti vakabvumidza motokari yakange yakatakura vanhu vakapfurikidza kupfuura paroad block, izvo zvinoita kuti vanhu vakawamda vafe kana paitika njodzi mumugwagwa.

Mutauriri wemapurisa munyika, Assistant Comissioner, Paul Nyati, vati
vari kuferefeta pose panotariswa mota nema road block pakapfuurwa
nemota idzi mumugwagwa weMasvingo-Zvishavane nezuro kuti vawane kuti chii chakaitika vozotora matanho akasimba.

Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC-Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vati
vanochema nemhuri dzakarasikirwa panjodzi iyi asi vanopomera mapurisa
mhosva yekuita huori vachityorawo mitemo yeLockodown munyika.

Mutauriri wesangano rinoona nevekufamba kwakanaka mumigwagwa reTraffic Safety Council of Zimbabwe, VaTatenda Chinoda, vati vatyairi
vanofanira kutevedzera mitemo yekuchegetedza hupenyu hwevanhu
mumigwagwa. Zimbabwe iri pasi pemitemo yeLockdown inorambidza vanhu kufamba kana nguva dzinobvumidzwa kufamba dzadarika izvo zviri kupa vakawanda kuti vapomere mapurisa mhosva yekutadza kuchengetedza mitemo yenyika. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Okurudzirwa Kuita Basa neMazvo Munguva yeLockdown

text: Dare redzimhosva kwaMutoko rapa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kumadzimai manomwe akasungwa nemusi weChina mushure mekunge apinda mukuratidzira kunonzi nemapurisa kwaive kunze kwemutemo, kwakanga kwakarongwa nesangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ. Gweta riri kumirira vanomwe ava, Amai Ntokozo Dube-Tachiona, vekuZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, vanoti madzimai aya abvisiswa mari yechibatiso inoita zana remadhora pamunhu, uye vanotarisirwa kudzoka zvakare kudare musi wa7 Kurume 2020. Vakasungwa ava vanoti Amai Precious Kanyuchi, Amau Snath Kadoro, Amai Ruth Kurebwaseka, Amai Previous Chari, Amai Nomatter Chiripanyanga, Amai Peace Chari pamwe naAmai Memory Kasaira. Amai Dube-Tachiona vanoti mapurisa ambosungawo zvakare nhengo ina dzeARTUZ, dzinoti munyori wesangano iri, VaRobosn Chere, VaTakemore Mhlanga, VaTryvine Musokeri pamwe naVaWellington Gweshe, asi vana ava vazoregwa pasina mhosva yavapomerwa, mapurisa achiti anozovadana kana paine zvaanoda. Asi mapurisa anonzi ave kutsvaga mutungamiri wesangano reARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, avo vanonzi ndivo vakaronga musangano uyu. Zvichakadaro, mapurisa emuHarare anonzi akasungawo VaMakomborero Haruzivishe pamwe naVaAllan Moyo zvichitevera kuratidzira kwakaitwa nevechidiki veMDC muguta iri manheru emusi weChitatu. Vaviri ava vanonzi vari kutarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare neMugovera vachipopmerwa mhosva yekuratidzira zviri kunze kwemutemo. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, Assitant Commissioner Paul Nyathi kuti tinzwe zvizhinji pamusoro penyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Madzimai Akasungwa kwaMutoko Mushure meKuratidzira kweARTUZ Anobvisiswa Mari yeChibatiso

text: Vanoona nezvekurongwa kwemisangano muZanu PF, Va Savior Kasukuwere, vaita nhendeshure pachikumbiro chebato ravo mu Manicaland chekuti vaimbova munyori anowona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato iri, Va Didymas Mutasa, vadzingwe mumusangano. No media source currently available Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamuzinda webato ravo pa Zanu PF Headquarters muHarare, Va Kasukuwere varamba mashoko avakataura kwa Mutare neMuvhuro ekuti Va Mutasa havasi kuzondzingwa mubato zvichitevera kuramba kwavari kuita kucherechedza kongiresi yakaitwa muna Zvita. VaKasukuwere vati bato ravo harisi kuzomira munzira yepurovhinzi yavo yeku Manicaland kana ichida kuti Va Mutasa vadzingwe. Zvichakadai, Va Kasukuwere vati nhengo dzeparamende dziri kufungidzirwa kutsigira vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, hadzisi kuzodzingwawo muparamende vachiti hapana mhosva dziri pachena dzadziri kupomerwa. Vati hapana humbowo hunokodzera kuti nhengo idzi dzidzingwe muparamende pamwe nemubato uye vati musangano wavo wakabatana zvikuru zvekuti vakatogadzirira kupinda musarudzo dzemuna 2018. VaKasukuwere vatorawo mukana uyu kuzivisa kuti vagadzirira zvakakwana sebato kupinda musarudzo dzechipiri dzekutsvaga vamiriri ve Mt Darwin West pamwe neku Chirumanzu-Zibagwe. VaKasukuwere vazivisawo kuti mudzimai wemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangangwa, ndivo vachamirira bato musarudzo idzi ku Chirumanzu-Zibagwe. Izvi zvinotevera kudomwa kwakaitwa Va Mnangagwa kuve mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika pamwe nekubviswa kwakaitwa Amai Mujuru pachigaro avo vaimbova mumiriri we Mt Darwin muparamende. Sarudzo dzekutsvaga vamiriri veChirumanzu-Zibagwe pamwe ne Mt Darwin West dzakatarisirwa kuitwa musi wa 27 Kurume. Asi MDC Renewal Team inoti ingangoenda kumatare sezvo ichiti mutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, havana kutevedzera mutemo pakubuda nezuva iri. Nekune rumwe rutivi, MDC-T inoti haisi kuzokwikwidza musarudzo idzi ichiti hapana kuvandudzwa kwemitemo inobata mafambisirwo esarudzo zvinozoita kuti sarudzo idzi dziitwe zviri pachena.
title: VaKasukuwere Voita Nhendeshure paNyaya yaVaMutasa

text: Svondo rinouya, gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vachange vari muAmerica kuzoita misangano yezvamabhizimisi uye kuitawo hurukuro dzezvekudyidzana kweAmerica neZimbabwe. VaChinamasa vari kuperekedzwa nagavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, pamwe negurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo. Vatatu ava vari pavanhu vakatemerwa zvirango neAmerica, asi rwendo rwuno vakapihwa mavhiza ekupinda muAmerica. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvamatongero enyika dzinoti kubvumidzwa kwavo kuzoita misangano iyi chiratidzo chekuti America inoda kupa hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa mukana wekugadzirisa zvinhu zvakange zvakanganisika apo Zimbabwe yaitongwa naVaRobert Mugabe. Imwe yenyanzvi idzi uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDehwa Mavhinga, vanoti vatatu ava vanofanirwa kuziva zvavanofambira nekuti vapiwa mukana wekuratidza kuti vane chido chekugadzirisa zvinhu. No media source currently available
title: Makurukota Akatemerwa Zvirango naVaTrump Anopiwa Mavhiza Okupinda muAmerica

text: Mapurisa emuThaiiland anoti pane mumwe munhu ange aine pfuti auraya vanhu vanosvika makumi matatu nevasere kusanganisira vanavadiki makumi maviri nevatatu. Vana ava vange vari pachikoro kana kuti childcare centre. Munhu uyu anonzi azoenda kumba akauraya mudzimai wake nemawana asati azviurayawo. Murume uyu ange aine banga anonzi aimbova mupurisa akadzingwa basa gore rapera nekushandisa zvinodhaka
title: Vanhu Makumi Matatu neVasere Vourayiwa kuThailand neMumwe Aive Mupurisa

text: Mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi vaudza musangano weZimbabwe-Botswana Bi-National Commission, uyo uchangopera muguta reVictoria Falls, kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakafanira kupinda munyika iyi nyore kuzoita zvemabhizinesi. VaMasisi vataura mashoko aya nhasi vachivhara musangano weZimbabwe-Botswana Bi-National Commission wechitatu uyo wakatanga neMuvhuro svondo rino. Kutaridza kuti Zimbabwe neBotswana ishamwari dzemandorokwati, VaMasisi vavimbisa kuti nyika yavo ichaenderera mberi ichibatsira Zimbabwe kuti ibve mumadhaka mairi vachiti kutsva kwendebvu varume vanodzimurana. Vaenderera mberi vachiti chinorwadza mwana weZimbabwe chinorwadzawo vagari veBotswana nokuti nyika mbiri idzi dzakabvira kare dzichidyidzana kubva munguva yehondo. Vachitaura pakuvharwa kwemusngano mumwe chetewo, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vatenda Botswana nekuramba yakamira semusambangwena mukukurudzira kubviswa kwezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende nemamwe makambani. Vachitaura pamusangano wechimakumi manomwe nenhanhatu weUnited Nations General Assembly muNew York gore rakapera, VaMasisi vakati zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende nemamwe makambani zvakafanira kubviswa. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe International Cross Border Traders Association, VaDennis Juru vati mashoko aVaMasisi anofadza kwazvo nokuti vanotenga nekutengesa vanogara vachioneswa moto pamabhodha. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muguta reFrancistown muBotswana, VaThomas Musengwa vaudza Studio7 kuti kusashungurudzwa kwevanhu pamabhodha kuchaita kuti vanhu vasashandise nzira dzemusango. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemabhizinesi uye vari mudzidzisi wezvemabhizinesi paBotswana Accountancy College, VaTarisai Musemwa vati zviri kutaurwa izvi zvikazadzikiswa, kutenga nekutengeserana pakati penyika mbiri idzi kuchakura zvakapetwa. Zvichakadaro, Zimbabwe neBotswana dzapeta musangano uyu nekusainirana zvibvumirano gumi pamusoro pezvimwe makumi maviri zvadzakanyorerana pamusangano vakaitwa muna2020. Zvimwe zvezvibvumirano zvaisainiranwa izvi zvinosanganisira kuchengetedzwa kwevana, kushandidzana mune zvekushanya, kurima nekupfuya, kuwandudza budiriro yevechidiki nezvimwe zvakadaro. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa naVaMasisi Vanopeta Musangano weBi-National Commission Vachinyorerana Zvimwe Zvibvumirano

text: Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi mudunhu reMashonaland West vakabatana nenhengo dzeMDC-T inotungamirirwa navaMorgan Tsvangirai mukuratidzira kwakaitika nemuMugovera. Vamwe vemabhizinisi nevanotengesera mumigwagwa vakambomira basa ravo apo vakapinda mukuratidzira uko kwakashamisa vakawanda MuChinhoyi, muchiitiko chinonzi nevamwe chisati chamboitika kwenguva yakareba. Asi veruzhinji vakashinga vakabatana nenhengo dzeMDC-T mukuratidzira vachiti zvinhu zvaoma munyika nekuda kwekusafambiswa zvakanaka kwenyaya dzehupfumi nehurumende inotungamirwa naVaRobert Mugabe. Kunyange kuratidzira uku kwakambange kwarambidzwa nemapurisa vachiti havana mapurisa akakwana, mutongi wedare muChinhoyi VaTakawira Mugabe vakapa mutongo neChishanu wekuti kuratidzira kuenderere mberi sezvo iri kodzero yevanhu kuratidzira munyika. Amai Concillia Chinanzvavana avo vakambopambwa nenhengo dzevasvori muna2008 vakashungurudzwa pamwe nemurume wavo nevamwe kwemazuva makumi mashanu nemashanu vakapindawo mukuratidzira uku. Mai Chinanzvavana vanoti munyika munenzara yapfunya chisero nekuda kwekubiwa kwemari nezviwanikwa nevakuru muhurumende. "Vana veZimbabwe kwenguva yakareba vanga vakanyarara, asi mukunyarara kwavo hazvirevi kuti vanga vasingarwadziwe. Vana veZimbabwe vari kurwadziwa," Mai Chinanzvavana vanodaro. Mumwe wechidiki akati anoda kudanwa nezita rekuti Obey, anoti VaRobert Mugabe vanofanirwa kusiya basa nekuti vakundikana kutungamirira nyika kuti ibve munzara. Obey anoti VaMugabe vatadza kupa mabasa anosvika 2.2 miriyoni avakavimbisa pavaitsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo dzemuna 2013. Obey anoti kushungurudzwa kwevanopikisa VaMugabe pamwe nehuwori hwatekeshera munyika ndizvo zvapa kuti varatidzire. Madzimai akawanda akaratidzira vachirova mapoto ainge asina chinhu vachiti mucherechedzo wekuti hapana chekubika mudzimba dzavo. Amai Angeline Mapondera vanogara mumusha weveruzhinji weChitambo. Amai Mapondera vanoti havana chekubikira vana vavo kumba. Mumwe wechidiki Lawrence Ginja uyo akapindira mukuratidzira anoti nhamo yekushaya mabasa ndiyo yamutuma kubatana nevamwe mukuratidzira uku. Ginja anoti VaMugabe vanofanirwa kuvapa mabasa sezvavakavimbisa. Zvimwe zvezvinhu zvakapa kuti vanhu varatidzire zvinonzi zvinosanganisira kusawana mari dzemihoro dzevashandi vehurumende, huwori hwatekeshera munyika, kuunzwa kwemari yema bond notes pamwe nekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeMDC T, Vagari vemuChinhoyi Vanobatana muKuratidzira

text: Mapurisa akange akapakata zvombo nezuro akapinda zvechisimba mumba meumwezve mutori wenhau, Mduduzi Mathuthu, vachimutsvaka. Masvondo maviri apfuura, mapurisa akapinda nechisimba vakasunga mutori wenhau, Hopewell Chin’ono, uyo ari muhusungwa nanhasi wese. Pakasvika mapurisa pamba paMathuthu vakawana asipo asi vakasecha imba yake ndokubva vatora hanzvadzi yaMathuthu vakaenda nayo kumahofisi avo, asi vakazomusunungura. Pataenda pamhepo, Mathuthu ange achakavanda mapurisa. Sachigaro wesangano rinomirira vatori venhau, reMedia Institute of Zimbabwe, VaGolden Maunganidze, vashora zvakaitwa nemapurisa, vakakurudzira hurumende kuti isatora vatori venhau sevavengi asi sevanhu vanoita basa rakakosha, kwete mu Zimbabwe mega asi pasi pose. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Anopinda Zvechisimba Mumba Memutori weNhau Mduduzi Mathuthu

text: Dare repamusoro, reHigh Court, nezuro rakapa mutongo wekuti bato reMDCA Alliance, rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, harina kodzero yekuti ripihwe mari inopihwa mapato anenge akwikwidza musarudzo akavhoterwa nevanhu vanodarika zvikamu zvishanu kubva muzana, kana kuti 5%. Mari iyi inenge iri mubhajeti menyika uye inopihwa mapato kuburikidza nemutemo wePolitical Finance Act. Kunyangwe zvayo MDC Alliance yakakwikwidza musarudzo dza2018, dare iri rinoti MDC Alliance harisi bato asi ringori mubatanidzwa wemapato nekudaro mari inofanira kuenda kuMDC-T. Dare iri rinoti nyaya yakadai yakatombotongwa kare pakapihwa mutongo wakafanana neiwoyu. Nyaya iyi yakakwidzwa kudare gore rapera neMDC Alliance uye vakaendeswa kumatare igurukota rezvemutemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, pamwe negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vachinzi vainge vapa MDC-T mari iyo yakakundwa musarudzo. Matare aya ari kushorwa nenyika dzakaita seAmerica neEuropean Union achinzi ari kushandiswa nehurumende kuparadza bato rinopikisa. Asi mutauriri weZanu-PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vanoramba mashoko aya vachiti MDC iri kurwisana pachayo. Nhengo yeMDC Alliance, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti havasi kutambira mutongo uyu uye bato ravo richaupikisa. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance Yopikisa Mutongo Unoti Haikodzeri Kupihwa Mari neHurumende?

text: Kupindira kweRussia munyaya dzesarudzo dzemu America kwasimudza mutauro zvakare zvichitevera kubuda kwemashoko ekuti nyika iyi iri kuda kuti mumwe wevari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzekutsvaga achamirira bato reDemocratic Party musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, VaBernie Sanders, vakunde musarudzo idzi. Humbowo hunonzi hune vasori vemuAmerica hunoratidzawo kuti Russia iri kutsigirawo mutungamiri wenyika, VaDonald Trump. Nyaya yeRussia yekupindira musarudzo yemutungamiri yakaitika zvakare apo VaTrump vaikwikwidzana naAmai Hillary Clinton veDemocratic Party. Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC North America Province, VaZvidzai Ruzvidzo, vanoti chinhu chinenge chakashata kuti imwe nyika ipindire musarudzo yeimwe nyika. VaSanders vakaburitsa mashoko ekushora zviri kuitwa neRussia vachiti nyika iyi haifanirwe kupindira musarudzo dzemuAmerica vachiti havawirirane nazvo. Pari zvino VaSanders ndivo vari kutungamira musarudzo dzemuDemocratic Party. No media source currently available
title: Russia Yopindira Zvakare Sarudzo Dziri Kuitwa muAmerica?

text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, vari zvakare gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Guvheya Chiwenga, vawedzera nemasvondo maviri mutemo unorambidza kufamba famba kwevanhu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda reCovid-19, kana kuti lockdown. Gwaro raburitswa nebazi rezvehutano kuvatori venhau rinoti zvikoro zvichapiwa svondo rimwe chete mushure mekupera kwemasvondo maviri awedzerwa nawo lockdown aya kuitira kupa mukana wekugadzirira nekuisa zvikwanisiro muzvikoro zvisati zvavhurwa, zvichienderana nekuti denda reCovid-19 rinenge rakamira sei. Gwaro iri rinotiwo varairidzi nevadzidzi vanosungirwa kupfeka mamasiki nguva dzose pavanenge vari muchikoro. Vadzidzisi vose pamwe nevana vechikoro vari kukurudzirwawo kuti vabaiwe nhomba dzekudzivirira Covid-19, uye zvikwata zvemumatunhu zvinoona nezvehutano zviri kukurudzirwa kunge zvichiita ongororo muzvikoro kuona kana mutemo uri kutewedzerwa. Veruzhinji vari kukurudzirwawo kuti vagare vakapfeka mamasiki, kugeza maoko nesipo nguva dzose, uye kusaenda munzvimbo dzakaungana vanhu, zvikuru kana vasina kupfeka mamasiki kana kuti vachidya kana kunwa zvinwiwa. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neChina kuti vanhu vanomwe (7) vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose, uye vamwe vanhu mazana matanhatu ane makumi mashanu nemumwe (651) vakabatwa vaine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zvishanu zvine mazana maviri ane makumi maviri nevaviri (5,222), ukuwo vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kubva zvachatanga vava zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nezvishanu, zvine makumi masere nevana (225,084). Kusvika pakupera kwezuva neChina, vanhu vakanga vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 vakanga vave mamiriyoni mana ane zviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezviviri, zvine mazana manomwe ane makumi matanhatu ane nevasere (4,192,768). Vanhu vakanga vabayiwa nhomba dzose mbiri vave mamiriyoni matatu ane zviuru mazana maviri ane gumi nezvitanhatu, zvine mazana maviri ane makumi mashanu nevasere (3,216,258); ukuwo, vabaiwa nhomba yechitatu vave zviuru makumi maviri nechimwe, zvine mazana mashanu ane makumi matanhatu nevashanu (21,565). Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira neChishanu manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayawana muongororo dzaitwa. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.
title: Vakafanobata Chigaro cheMutungamiri weNyika, VaChiwenga, Vanowedzera Covid-19 Lockdown neMasvondo Maviri

text: Vari kutungamira mubatanidzwa wePeople Rainbow Coalition, vari zvakare vari mukuru weNational People’s Party, Amai Joice Mujuru, vanoti rusunguko chairwo rwenyika runouya chete kuburikidza nesarudzo dzejekerere. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau neChina masikati muHarare, Amai Mujuru varamba kutaura zvavanofunga pamusoro pezvakaitwa nemauto. Asi vati veruzhinji vari kutarisira kuti pamhedzisiro yezviri kuitika munyika, munhu achatungamirira anofanirwa kupihwa masimba kubudikidza nekuiswa pachigaro neveruzhinji. Amai Mujuru vati zvizvarwa zvese zveZimbabwe zvinofanirwa kupihwa mukana wekunonyoresa kuvhota pasina kushungurudzwa kana kubvunzwa mibvunzo yenhando sezviri kuitika. Amai Mujuru vakurudzirawo kubatana kwemapato ese, vedzisvondo, vashandi, vadzidzi neveruzhinji kuitira kuti kuitwe hurukuro yekuti Zimbabwe yofambira mberi sei. Amai Mujuru vaudzawo vatori venhau kuti kubva mauto zvaatanga kutonga munyika neChipiri, havana ruzivo kuti chii chiri kuitika. No media source currently available  Kunyange hazvo kuri kutaurwa kuti kungangoita hurumende yemubatanidzwa ingangosanganisira ivo vati hapana akambotaura navo nezvenyaya iyi.
title: Amai Mujuru Vokurudzira Hurumende Inosarudzwa neVanhu

text: Zvimwe zvitoro zvanga zvakavhara nemusi weMuvhuro muChinhoyi, mashonalamnd west unyange hazvo vamwe vagari vakawanda vanga vachihodha zvinhu zvavanoshandisa mazuva ose zvakaita seshuga, mafuta ekubikisa, sipo yekugezesa neyekuwachisa. Zvitoro zvanga zvakavhara zvinosanganisira zvitoro zvikuru zveMetro Peach, Farm Shop, Exide Batteries neGain pamwe nezvimwe zvitoro zvinotengesa mishonga. Zvitoro zvanga zvakavhura zvanga zvichitengesa zvinhu nemari iri pamusoro zvakanyanya. VaFungai Muzeza vanogara mumusha unogara veruzhinji weChikonohono vanoti vemuzvitoro vave kumbomira kutengesa sezvo mitengo iri kuramba ichikwira zuva rega rega izvo zvinoita kuti mari yavanenge vatengesa ishaye basa. VaMuzeza vanoti vemuzvitoro vave kuchinja mitengo pazuva. Vanotiwo hurumende inofanirwa kubvisa mari yebhondi kuti mitengo igadzikane. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naVaLeonard Mhango avo vanoti vari kuvhara zvitoro vari kuda kukwidza mitengo. VaMhango vanoti vemuzvitoro vari kubirira vanhu nekukwidza mitengo zvakanyanya. VaLucky Munangatire vanoti vari kuvhara zvitoro vari kuzvipa mukana wekukwidza mitengo uye vari kuhodha havana chivimbo chekuti zvinhu zvichawanikwa muzvitoro munguva pfupi iri kutevera here. Zvimwe zvitoro zvinotengesa mishonga zvanga zvakavharwawo munzvimbo dzakaita seChegutu, Banket neMasvingo. Mumwe mugari wekuMasvingo uye vari sachigaro weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou avo vatadza kutengera Amai vavo mushonga vanoti chitoro chinotengesa mishonga chavharwa vachiti havachatambire mari yemabhondi. Zvimwe zvitoro zvinotengesa zvinhu zvekuvakisa zvakaita sesimende zvave kuda kubhadharwa nemari yekuAmerica kuchengetedza kukosha kwemari yavo. Mafuta ekubikisa ayo anoita madhora matatu nemashereni manomwe anga ave kutengeswa nemadhora masere.
title: Zvitoro Zvovharwa muChinhoyi neDzimwe Nzvimbo Apo Hupfumi Hwonanga kuMawere

text: Gwaro rakaburitswa neZimbabwe Vulnerability Assessment Committee, (ZIMVAC) richiti ongororo yayakaita inoratidza kuti hurumende yakawedzera rutsigiro rwainopa kumapoka anotambura kubva pakatanga denda reCovid-19 gore rapera, raunza mutauro, vamwe vachiti harinyatsoratidzi mamiriro akaita zvinhu mumaruwa munyaya dzechikafu. Mumwe wevanhu ava mutewedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlyatwayo, avo vanoti rubatsiro rwushoma rwacho rwuri kupiwa nehurumende irworwo rwuri kugoverwa pachishandiswa zvematongerwo enyika, izvo zvinozosiya dzimwe mhuri dzinenge dzichinzi hadzitsigiri bato riri kutonga reZanu PF kunze. Asi vanotsigira gwaro reZIMVAC iri vanoti zviri pachena kuti hurumende yakawedzera rubatsiro kune vanotambura mumaruwa sezvo kwave nevanhu vashoma vari kuda rubatsiro, uye zviri pachena kuti vanhu vari kubatsirwa nehurumende. Mumwe wacho vari vechidiki veZanu PF, VaAlex gakanje, vanoti zvakare manyepo ekuti vanhu vari kugoverwa rubatsiro urwu vachitariswa kuti vabuda mumba maani mune zvematongerwo enyika. VaGakanje vanoti chimwe chisiri kuonekwa neveMMDC Alliance ndechekuti Zanu PF ibato rine vatsigiri vakawanda kumaruwa izvo zvinozoita kuti chikafu kana zvose zvinenge zvichigoverwa zviite sezviri kuenda kuvanhu vebato rimwe chete. Asi VaHlyatwayo vanoti dambudziko rave munyika nderekuti hapachina mutsauko pakati pebato reZanu PF nehurumende, izvo zviri kuita kuti nhengo dzebato iri dzipindire muzvirongwa zvisiri zvadzo. Ukuwo, VaGakanje vanoti zvose zvinogoverwa zvinoitwa nehutungamiri hwenharaunda, vangava makanzura kana masabhuku, asi nekuda kwektui vanhu ava vanenge vari vatsigiri veZanu PF zvinobva zvangoonekwa sekunge Zanu PF yapindira. ZIMVAC inoti kubva pakawedzerwa nehurumende rubatsiro rwayo kune vanoshaya kumaruwa, zvikamu makumi mashanu nezvina kubva muzana zvemhuri dzinoshaya zvave kuwana rubatsiro rwezvekudya. No media source currently available
title: Vematongerwo eNyika Vopesana Maonero paNyaya yeKugoverwa kweChikafu kuMaruwa

text: Vamwe vagari vemudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti vari kunetseka kuwana marezinesi ekuchera zvicherwa uye pane huori hwakawanda huri kuitika munyaya dzemarezinesi. Mumwe wevatauri pamusangano waitwa muChinhoyi uyo wakarongwa neVoice of America pamwe neMedia Center, VaCliford Kupheko, vati pane vashandi vebazi rezvicherwa vanoita huori mukupa marezinesi. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemumwe mutauri, Muzvare Chiedza Chipangura, avo vanoti pamusoro puhuori mitemo haisi kutevedzerwa mubazi iri, izvo zviri kudzinga vanoda kusima mari dzavo munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvicherwa vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaGeorge Mugani, vanoti pamutemo rezenesi rinofanirwa kuwanikwa mukati memwedzi mitatu asi nekuda kwemakakatanwa kuti mugodhi ndewani zviri kunonotsa kupihwa kwemarezinesi. Panyaya yekusavharwa kwemakomba munzvimbo dzinenge dzakambocherwa zvicherwa mumiriri weEnviromental Management Agency (EMA), VaMunyaradzi Nhariswa, vati vanochera zvicherwa havasi kutevedzera zvavanenge vati vachaita mugwaro ravo reEnviromental Impact Assessment (EIA). VaNhariswa vati bazi ravo riri kuita dzidziso kuvacheri vezvicherwa uye nekusunga avo vanotyora mutemo wekuchengetedza nharaunda. Muzvare Chiedza vati vanhu vakawanda vari kufa zvikuru vana nekuwira mumakomba anosiyiwa asina kuvharwa nevanenge vachichera zvicherwa. Vanhu vapinda musangano wanhasi vanosvika makumi mana vawirirana kuti hurumende inofanirwa kuumba homwe yakuti kana makambani anochera zvicherwa asiya makomba, bazi reEMA rigokwanisa kuavhara kuti vanhu vasarasikirwe nehupenyu hwavo kana hwezvipfuwo. No media source currently available
title: Studio7 Inoita Hurukuro neVagari kuChinhoyi

text: Sachigaro wesangano revaimbove varwiri verusununguko, reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association, uye vari chipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika, Va Chris Mutsvangwa, vanosarudzwa semunhu achamirira Zanu PF musarudzo yenhengo yeNational Assembly ichaitwa mu Norton. Izvi zvaburitswa neMugovera mushure memusangano we Provincial Coordinating Committee yeZanu PF kuMashonaland West. Vachitaura mushure mekudomwa, VaMutsvangwa vati havana kumanikidza kuti vavanga vachifanirwa kukwikwidzana navo, Langton Mutendereki, kuti vasapinde musarudzo yanga ichifanirwa kudzokororwa. Vati VaMutendereki vazvibudira vega musarudzo yemuNorton. Pari zvino nzvimbo iyi iri kumirirwa nenhengo yakazvimirira, VaTemba Mliswa, avo vakadzingwa mubato reZanu PF panguva iyo VaRobert Mugabe vaive mutungamiri waro. Asi vamwe vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti VaMutendereki vakahwanda pari zvino, sezvo vari kuchityira hupenyu hwavo, zvichitevera kutyisidzirwa kwavanonzi vakaitwa mushure mekukunda VaMutsvangwa. Studio7 yaedza kufonera VaMutendereki kuti tinzwe divi ravo, asi nharembozha yavo yanga isiri kudavirwa. Komiti yepamusoro soro yeZanu PF yakabuda nechisungo chekuti sarudzo dzekutsvaga vachamirira bato iri musarudzo dzichaitwa munyika yose dzidzokororwe mumatunhu gumi. Asi nhengo dzakawanda dzebato iri dziri kuda kuti sarudzo dzidzokororwe mumatunhu akawanda munyika sezvo dzisina kuitwa zvakanaka izvo zvakaona dzimwe nhengo dzichisungwa mushure mekuridza pfuti pazere vanhu.
title: VaMutsvangwa Vomirira Zanu PF muSarudzo Ichaitwa muNorton?

text: Hurumende inonzi iri kuda kuvandudza mutemo wakanangana nekudomwa kwevanhu vanozokwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika kuburikidza nekukwidza huwandu hwevanhu vanofanirwa kumudoma.  Bepanhau reThe Sunday Mail rinoti gurukota rezvemutemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi vakati kana mutemo uyu wakavandudzwa uchabatsira kubvisa vanhu vari kukwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika vachiita zvavo zvedambe asi vasina anovatsigira.  Mutemo uyu unonzi unoda kuti vanozopinda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika vatange vadomwa nevanhu vanosvika chiuru kubva mumatunhu gumi emunyika, uye kuti mari dzavanobhadhara kuti vakwikwidze dzikwidzwe kubva pachiuru chemadhora.  Asi mutungamiri werimwe remapato anopikisa, reDemocratic Party, Doctor Urayayi Zembe, vanoti hurongwa hwakadai hahufanirwe kunge huchibva kuhurumende, asi kuti hubve kuvanhu sezvo vari ivo vanosarudza mutungamiri wenyika.  Doctor Zembe vanotiwo ikodzero yemwana weZimbabwe wese yekuti akwikwidze musarudzo ipi zvayo yaanoda, sezvo achipiwa masimba aya nebumbiro remitemo.  Vanotiwo sebato rinopikisa, vacharamba vachipikisa mitemo inombunyikidza kana kudzvinyirira vanhu.  Musarudzo yegore rapera, vanhu makumi maviri nevatatu vakakwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, kakave kekutanga munhoroondo yesarudzo dzemunyika kuti vanhu vakawanda kudaro vanokwikwidza musarudzo imwechete. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoshoropodzwa Nekuda kuVandudza Mutemo weSarudzo yeMutungamiri weNyika

text: Archbishop Desmond Tutu vaizivikanwa pasi rose nekurwisa hutongi hwerusaruraganda kana kuti apartheied vashaya muSouth Africa nhasi. Vange vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe ekuberekwa. Nhepfenuro yeSABC inoti mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCryril Ramaphosa vatumira mashoko enyaradzo kumhuri yaVaTutu vachiti nyika yarasikirwa nerimwe gamba guru munyaya dzekurwira rusungunuko. Vati Achbishop Tutu vakaratidza pachena kuburikidza nehupenhu hwavo kuti kutenda kusina zviito hakuna zvakunobatsira. Vanochengetedza nhoroondo yemutungamiri mutsva weSouth Africa mushakabvu Nelson Mandela, veMandela Foundation vatiwo nyikayeSouth Africa nepasi rose yarasikirwa nemunhu ainge akazvipira mukurwira kodzero dzevanhu. VaTutu vaive mutendi muMethodist Church vakaberekwana kuKlerksdorp kumawirira kweJohannesburg muna 1931. Vamwe vatumira mashoko enyaradzo vanosanganira vaive mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaBarack Obama uye mambokadzi Elizabeth vekuBritain. VaTutu vakamboshanda semudzidzisi muJohnanesburg. Archbishop Tutu vakazosiya basa reurairidzi vachiti havaida kupa vana dzidzo yerusaruranganda vachibva vaenda kunodzidzira zvekuita mufundisi kuking’s College kuBritain muna 1962. Vakazodzoka muSouth Africa muna 1966 vachidzidzisa zvechitendero kuEastern Cape uye apa ndipo pavakatanga kubuda pachena vachishora hutongo hwerusarura ganda. Muna 1975 vakava mutema wekutanga kuve mumwe wevatungamiri ve kereke muJohannesburg kana kuti Anglican Dean. Muna 1980, semunyori mukuru wesangano reSouth African Council of Churches vakatungamira chikwata chevakaenda kunotaura nemutungamiri wehurumende yeSouth Africa panguva iyi VaPW Botha kuti varegedze kuramba vachitungamira hurumende ine rusaruraganda. VaTutu vaka[inhwa mubayiro werunyararo kana kuti Nobel Peace prize muna 1984. Archbishop Tutu vakatsigira kuti South Africa itemerwe zvirango nekuda kwehutongo hwerusarura uhu. Muna 1994 vakadomwa nevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaNelson Mandela kuti vave sachigaro wekomiti yekuregererana mushure mekupera kwehurumende yerusaruranganda kana kuti Truth and Reconciliaon Commission. VaTutu vakabva vamira zvekuva mufundisi vachiita basa rekomisheni iyi asi vakaenderea mberi nenyaya dzekurwira kodzero dzevanhu. Vakabatwa nechirwere chegomarara muna 1997. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Council of Churches Reverend Doctor Kenneth Mtata vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaTutu vaineg vakazvipira kurwira kodzero dzevanhu muSouth Africa nepasi rose. No media source currently available
title: Archbishop Desmond Tutu Vochemwa seGamba Pasi Rose

text: Bato reZanu PF rinoti chikwata chebato riri kutonga kuSouth Africa reAfrican National Congress, kana kuti ANC, hachisi kuzoonana nemapato anopikisa sezvo richiti munyika hamuna matambudziko arimo. Chikwata cheANC ichi chasvika muZimbabwe manheru eChipiri nendege ye. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weZanu PF, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vaburitsa gwaro vachiti chikwata cheANC chakatumwa nemutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, icho chiri kutungamirwa nemunyori mukuru muANC, VaAce Magashule, hachisi kuzoona mapato anopikisa. VaChinamasa vati chikwata cheANC ichi chichaonana nehutungamiri hweZanu PF chete huchange huchitungamirwa nemunyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muZanu PF, VaObert Mpofu. Vati musangano uyu uchashandiswa senzira yekusimbaradza hukama huripo pakati pemapato maviri aya. Vatiwo chikwata ichi hachina mumwe wachichasangana naye parwendo rwacho vachiti Zimbabwe haina dambudziko rayakatarisana naro. VaChinamasa vati chikwata cheANC ichi chiri kuuya munyika apo paine mashoko emanyepo ekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika. VaChinamasa vati bato ravo richashandisa mukana uyu kutaura mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, vati zviri pachena semhanza kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika vakati zvinoshamisa kuti Zanu PF yatora danho rekuvharidzira mamiriro ezvinhu munyika. MDC Alliance inoti yakazvipira kusangana navose vanokwanisa kuti matambudziko ari munyika agadziriswe kusanganisira chikwata cheANC ichi. Mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti ruzhinji rwuri kunhonga svosve nemuromo munyika vakati zvave kuda kuti vanhu vese vabatane mukugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika vachiti Zanu PF haikwanise kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika iri yoga. Asi mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vati bato ravo ndiro chete richasangana neANC nokuti munyika hamuna matambudziko ari kutaurwa nevanopikisa hurumende yeZanu PF. Vati kana ANC ikazoda hayo kutaura nevanopikisa imwe nguva zvinenge zviri kwairi, asi rwendo rwuno kuchaitwa musangano pakati pemapato maviri aya akarwira rusununguko rweZimbabwe neSouth Africa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabee Institute of Strategic Thinking, VaEric Tinashe Muzamhindo, vati hazvisi mumaoko eZanu PF kuti itaure kuti chikwata cheANC ichi chichataura nani asi kuti VaRamaphosa vanove vakadoma chikwata ichi kuti chiuye kuZimbabwe. Zvichakadai, mashoko aburitwa naVaMagashule anoti chikwata chavo chichange chine vanhu vatanhatu vanoti ivo VaMagashule, Muzvare Lindiwe Zulu, VaGwede Mentashe, VaTony Yengeni, VaEnoch Godongwana pamwe naAmai Nosiviwe Nqakula. VaMagashule vati vari kuuya kuzoita nhaurirano neZanu PF asi havana chavataura nezvekusangana nevemapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano akazvimirira. Mashoko eZanu PF neANC aya anouya apo dzimwe nhumwa dzaVaRamaphosa dzaitungamirirwa naVaSydney Mufamadi dzakatadza kusangana nemapato anopikisa mwedzi wapera mushure mekusangana nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. No media source currently available
title: Zanu PF Yorambidza ANC Kuona Mamwe Mapato muZimbabwe

text: Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvezvicherwa yaita musangano wechimbi chimbi wekuzeya nyaya yekuurayiwa kuri kuitwa vanhu pamwe nekubirwa goridhe nemakoronyera anozivikanwa nerekuti “Mashurugwi” ikabuda nechisungo chekuti ichafamba nenyika yese ichiongorora nyaya iyi. Vachitaura mushure memusangano uyu, sachigaro wekomiti iyi zvakare vachimirira Shurugwi South, VaEdmond Mkaratigwa, vati komiti yavo iri kushushikana zvikiru nekupondwa kuri kuitwa vanhu uye inoda kuziva kuti chii chiri kukonzera izvi. Vatiwo vanoda kuona kuti dambudziko iri ringagadziriswe sei. VaMkaratigwa vati dambudziko iri rave kukanganisa mabasa ekucherwa kwegoridhe izvo zvave kuvhiringa hupfumi wenyika. VaMkaratigwa vaenderera mberi vachiti havangaregi dambudziko iri richienderera mberi nekudaro ongororo yavo ichasanganisira vese vane chekuita nenyaya iyi vakaita semapurisa nebazi rinoona nezvezvicherwa. Vati komiti yavo ichaita ongororo iyi nekomiti inoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwemukati menyika uye separamende vanoda kudzika mitemo inoita kuti vanhu vaite basa ravo vakasununguka. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti danho ratorwa nekomiti iyi ranonoka sezvo vanhu vachida zvinhu zvinopedza kutambura kwavo nechimbi chimbi. Vatiwo vanoshushikana kuti ongororo dzakadai dzinoramba dzichiitwa asi ivo vanhu neparamende vachiziva zvinoda kuitwa. VaKuchera vati paramende haina simba rekusandura kana kugadzirisa zvinhu. Komiti yeparamende iyi yaita musangano wayo mushure mekunge imwe nenhengo yeparamende, VaDexter Nduna, vanomirira Zanu PF muChegutu West, vamiswa mudare nezuro nevamwe vavo vanosanganisira mumwe mukuru wemapurisa, vachipomerwa mhosva yekuchera goridhe zviri kunze kwemutemo paine imwe nzvimbo kuChegutu. VaNduna, sachigaro wevechidiki muZanu PF kuMashonaland West, VaVengai Musengi pamwe nemukuru wemapurisa muChegutu, Superintendent Wonder Chisikwa, nevamwe vakamiswa pamberi pedare muChegutu nezuro vachipomerwa mhosva yekuchera goridhe zvisina mvumo. VaNduna naVaChisikwa vachadzoka mudare musi wa21 mwedzi uno uye vamwe vavo vachadzoka kudare musi wa24 Ndira. Vanoongorora nyaya dzematongerwo enyika uye vari mukuru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vaudza Studio7 kuti kusungwa kwevamwe vakuru vakuru muZanu PF nenyaya dzegoridhe idanho rakanaka chose. Doctor Ruhanya vati nyaya dzekuurayiwa kwevanhu nemabhemba munzvimbo dzinocherwa goridhe dzinokwanisa kupedzwa chete nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Kusvika pari zvino pane vanhu vakawanda vaurayiwa kana kukuvadzwa pamwe nekubirwa goridhe ravo munzvimbo zhinji munyika kusanganisira Mvuma, Chegutu, Kadoma, Shurugwi, Kwekwe neJumbo Mine kuMazowe. Mapurisa akatosungawo vanhu vakawanda nenyaya iyi uye ari kukurudzira vanhu kuti vasiyane nenyaya yemhirizhonga munzvimbo dzinocherwa goridhe. No media source currently available
title: Paramende Yoronga Kuferefeta Kuurayiwa kweVanhu Munzvimbo Dziri Kucherwa Goridhe

text: Mutungamiri we MDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti bato ravo rakagadzirira kushanda sehurumende itsva kana nguva yacho yakwana. Vachinyora padandemutande ravo re Twitter nezuro, . VaChamisa vakaramba vakatsika madziro vachiti ndivo vakasarudzwa neruzhinji rwevanhu, kunyange hazvo dare reConstitutional Court rakati sarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakakundwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa ve Zanu PF. Vanoti hurongwa hwebato ravo kubva mumusangano wehutungamiri hwebato ravo, hwe National Standing Committee, hwavakaita nemusi weSvondo, vave kumira sebato rimwechete nevose vakanga vari mumubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance. VaChamisa vanoti chisungo ichi chakanangana nekuvaka gwara rekuti bato ravo ritungamire zvine mutsindo nenzira inocherechedza zvido zvevatsigiri vavo. Vakatiwo vanoda kuita sungawirirano nehutungamiri hwese hwebato ravo vachiunza pfungwa itsva nemaonero matsva pasi pedonzvo rehutungamiriri hwakajeka ravari kuti hash tag smart leadership. Ichi chirongwa chavakaparura chinotaura mashandiro avachaita sebato radzokera pamavambo eMDC. Mutauririri wemutungamiri webato re MDC, Doctor Nkululeko Sibanda vanoti VaChamisa vakakoka vose vaive mu MDC yakare uye havana wavari kusiya panze. Vatiwo MDC inotungamirirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe kana ichidawo kudzoka kune vamwe yakasusunguka kuita izvi. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri we MDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti bato ravo rakagadzirira kushanda sehurumende itsva kana nguva yacho yakwana.

text: Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoshora zvikuru hurumende zvichitevera kusungwa nezuro nemapurisa akange akapakata zvombo kwe mutungamiri webato rinopikisa, reTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, nemutori wenhau, Hopewell Chin’ono. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti zvinogumbura zvikuru kuona kuti hurumende haina basa nekodzero dzevanhu. VaMavhinga vanoti vanhu vazhinji munyika, kusanganisira vana mukoti na vanachiremba, vave kutya kutaura zvinhu zvinovanetsa pamabasa avo, izvo zvinokonzera kuti Mabasa asaitwa zvakanaka. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, havana kudaira runhare rwavo pataedza kuvabata kuti tinzwe divi ravo. VaMavhinga vanoti kusungwa nekushungurudzwa kuri kuitwa vanhu kuri kusvibisa zita renyika. No media source currently available Nyanzvi inoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaJoey mabenge, vanotsinhira mashoko ataurwa naVaMavhinga, vachiti zviri kuitwa nehurumende handizvo zvanga zvakatarisirwa mu’New Dispensation’ yakavimbiswa pavatora hutungamiri. VaMabenge vati hurumende ine zvinhu zvizhinji zvayakatarisana nazvo zvinoda kugadziriswa, naizvozvo haingapedzi nguva ichiteerera makuhwa anotauriranwa nevanhu paWhattsApp. Vati zvaive zvirinani deno hurumende yaitandanisana nekusunga mbavha dzakabira Zimbabwe mari, idzo vanoti dziri kungobudiswa pachena zuva nezuva. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inoshorwa Mukuramba Kwayo Ichisunga Vanhu Zvenhando

text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, neChitatu vakasaina bhiri rekuvandudza kwemabasa ekutapwa kwenhau nekuburitswa kwemashoko, reFreedom of Information Bill kuti uve mutemo. Mutemo weFreedom of Information Act uyu ndemimwe yemitemo iri kudzikwa nehurumende kushandura mutemo weAccess to Information and Protection of Privacy Act kana kuti AIPPA, uyo unonzi nevamwe vaimbunyikidza maburitsirwo emashoko nenhau, uye mashandiro evatori venhau. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vakati mutemo uyu munongedzo mukuru wekuti nyika yakazvipira kuvandudza mitemo yekutorwa kwenhau munyika. Vakati mutemo weAIPPA wainge waunza kunyunyuta kwakanyanya munyika. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvekufambiswa kwemashoko dzinoti kunyange hazvo mutemo mutsva uyu wakati siyaneyi nemutemo waivepo weAIPPA, une zvakawanda zvinofanirwa kuvandudzwa kuti ufambirane neshanduko iri kutarisirwa mukufambiswa kwemashoko pari zvino. Mukuru wesangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa-Zimbabwe, kana kuti MISA-Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vanoti kunyange hazvo hurumende yaita danho rekutanga rekugadzirisa mafambisirwo emashoko, muteo mutsva uyu waifanirwa kukwenenzverwa kuti ubvise chimiro cheAIPPA zvachose. No media source currently available
title: MISA-Zimbabwe Inoti Mutemo Mutsva weFreedom of Information Act Wakanaka Asi Wakasara neZvimwe Zvaive muAIPPA

text: Masangano evarairidzi ari kushoropodza danho rinonzi rakatorwa neZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, ZACC, rekuferefeta zvikoro pamwe nevamwe varairidzi vanonzi vari kudzidzisa vana munguva dziri kunze kwezvidzidzo vachivabhadharisa mari, kana kuti extra lessons. ZACC yakaudza bepanhau resunday Mail neSvondo kuti kune zvimwe zvikoro zviri kuregerera tsika yekudzidziswa kwevana vachimanikidzwa kubhadhara mari, uyewo kuti kune vamwe varairidzi vari kushanda nezvikoro kuita izvi. Svondo rapera ZACC inonzi yakashanyira zvimwe zvezvikoro zviri kupomerwa mhosva yekuita izvi muHarare kuti ione kana mashandiro avo ari kuwirirana nezvinodiwa nemutemo. Asi mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarairidzi rezimbabwe Teachers Association, ZIMTA, varichard Gundani vanoti kunyange hazvo sangano ravo risingakurudzire kuti varairidzi vaitise zvidzidzo izvi munguva dzavo, nyaya yemihoro isingavakwanire ndiyo iri kukonzera kuti varairidzi vaite basa iri. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revariridzi, reProgessive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti kunyange havo sesangano vasingatsigiri kuti varairidzi vaitise zvidzidzo kunze kwenguva dzavo vachibhadharisa mari, ZACC haifanirwe kutambisa mari ichiswera ichitevera nyaya dzekuti varairidzi vaisa dhora muhomwe. No media source currently available No media source currently available
title: Masanganio eVarairidzi Oshoropodza Danho reZACC Rekuferefeta Vari Kuitisa Zvidzidzo Vachibhadharisa Mari

text: Masangano anoongorora mafambisirwo esarudzo munyika pamwe nemamwe masangano ezvematongerwo enyika ari kukurudzira kuti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, ifambirane nenguva ishandisewo michina yechizvinozvino mukunyoreswa kwevanhu, kana kuti biometric voters’ roll, sezvave kuitwawo nedzimwe nyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica. Izvi zvinotevera kuziviswa kwakaitwa nemusi weChitatu neZEC kuti yatanga kunyoresa vanhu vanoda kuvhota munyika yose segadziriro yayo yesarudzo dza2018. Komisheni iyi inotiwo haisi kuzotanga gwaro revavhoti idzva, asi kuti ichagadzirisa riripo rakagadzirwa nehofisi yaRegistrar General. Masangano eZimbabwe Election Support Network, neElection Resource Center Zimbabwe aburitsawo magwaro eongororo yesarudzo dze by-election dzakaitwa kuChirumhanzu-Zibagwe nekuMt. Darwin West. ZESN inoti inoshushikana nehuwandu hwevanhu vakashandisa marusiti ekunyoresa kuve muvhoti, voter slips, pamwe nehuwandu hwevanhu vakabatsirwa kuvhota. Masangano aya apawo kurudziro yekuti hurumende ikasike kubatanidza mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo sezviri mubumbiro idzva, nezvimwe zvakawanda zvaanoti zvinobatsira ZEC mukubata kwayo basa resarudzo. Masangano aya anoti kunyange hazvo paive nezvimwe zvingadai zvisina kufamba zvakanaka musarudzo idzi, anocherechedzawo zvakagonekwa neZEC zvakaita sekuvhura nzvimbo dzekuvhotera panguva yakatarwa. Mukuru weElection Resource Centre Zimbabwe, VaTawanda Chimhini, vanoti vanotendawo kuti pane zvimwe zvati shandukeyi panyaya dzekubatwa kwesarudzo neZEC, zvakafanana nekukwanisa kwayo kutanga kunyoresa vanhu kuti vazokwanisa kuvhota. VaChimhini vanoti izvi zvinhu zvakatadza kuitwa musarudzo dza2013 pamwe nemamwe ma by-election akaitwa muna 2014, zvinove zvinhu zvavainyunyuta nazvo zvikuru. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaMorris Ngwenya, vanotiwo vanotenda mapato ose ezvematongerwo enyika nekukwanisa kuita sarudzo murunyararo, kunyange hazvo paine nyaya dzekutyisidzirwa kwevanhu, izvo vanoti zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa nevezvematongerwo enyika pachavo. Panyaya yekuti ZEC iri kukundikana kuita sarudzo dzinogutsa uye kuchenesa gwaro revavhoti kana kuita sedzimwe nyika dzave kushandisa muchina mitsva, VaNgwenya vanoti hachisi chinhu chakavandika kumunhu wese kuti hurumende haina mari yekupa ZEC kuti iite zvose izvi. No media source currently available
title: ZEC Yokurudzirwa Kushandisa Michina Mitsva Painonyoresa Vanoda kuVhota

text: Mudzimai wemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, uyo wavari kunetsana naye mumatare edzimhosva, Muzvare Marry Mubaiwa, vasvitsa chikumbiro kudare repamusoro chekuti mutongo wakaturwa nedare ramejasitiriti wekuti vagare mujeri kwemazuva gumi vachiongororwa hutano hwavo usendekwe parutivi. Mumapepa ari pamberi pedare, Muzvare Mubaiwa vati havasi kunzwa zvakanaka zvekuti hazvigone kuti varambe vari muhusungwa. Muzvare Mubaiwa vati hapana chikonzero chekuti vaongororwe hutano hwavo patsva nevamwe anachiremba vehurumende sezvo vakamboongororwa kare nana chiremba vatatu vehurumende kunyange hazvo anachiremba ava vakaona zvakasiyana panyaya yekuti vanokwanisa kumira pamberi pedare vachitongwa here kana kuti kwete. Nekuda kwekurwara kwavari kuita, Muzvare Mubaiwa vanoti kugariswa mujeri kunotyora kodzero dzavo dzekurapwa nanachiremba vavanoda. Asi chikumbiro chavo chatadza kunzwikwa nhasi sezvo gweta ranga rakamirira hurumemende panyaya iyi, Amai Sharon Fero, vaudza dare kuti havana kugadzirira zvakakwana kuti vapikise chikumbiro chaMuzvare Mubaiwa chekuti mutongo wakaturwa nemutongi wedare ramejasitiriti, VaLanzini Ncube, wekuti vagare mujeri kwemazuva gumi vachiongororwa hutano hwavo nevamwe anachiremba usendekwe parutivi. Amai Fero vatiwo havasati vawava gwaro remafambiro akaita nyaya iyi mudare ramejasitiriti, kana kuti record of proceedings, kuti vanyatsoziva kuti nyaya iyi yakafamba sei mudare iri. Gweta raMuzvare Mubaiwa, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vaudza mutongi wedare repamusoro ari kunzwa chikumbiro ichi, Amai Sylvia Chirawu Mugomba, kuti vawana gwaro iri asi mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti akatura mutongo uyu haasati asaina gwaro iri vachiti hurumende iri kutsvagiridza nzira dzekuti chikumbiro chaMuzvare Mubaiwa chinonoke kunzwikwa uku nguva ichifamba. Nokudaro, Amai Chirawu Mugomba vatura mutongo wekuti bazi revachuchisi rione kuti magwaro emafambiro akaita nyaya kudare ramejasitiriti asvitswa kudare repamusoro mangwana uye kuti hurumende yapa mhinduro yayo kuchikumbiro ichi nemusi weSvondo. Zvatuarwa naAmai Chirawu Mugomba zvatsinhirwa naAmai Mtetwa. Muzvare Mubaiwa vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuda kuuraya murume wavo uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri VaConstantino Chiwenga pavaive mune chimwe chipatara chekuSouth Africa, kufojera mapepa emuchato, kuburitsa mari kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo pamwe nekurova musikana aishanda kumba kwavo, vanoti havakwanise kumira pamberi pedare kuti vatongwe nenyaya idzi izvo zvakatsinhirwa neumwe chiremba wehurumende uyo akati Muzvare Mubaiwa vari kukurumidza kukanganwa. Chiremba uyu akatiwo Muzvare Mubaiwa vari kuratidza kushungurudzika zvakanyanya zvichikonzerwa nekunyimwa kwavari kuitwa vana vavo naVaChiwenga.
title: Muzvare Marry Mubaiwa Vopikisa Kugariswa Mujeri Kwavakaitwa

text: Vanhu vasiri kuzivikanwa kuti ndivanani varova zvakaipisisa vatori venhau pamwe nemutungamiri weZinasu, VaTakudzwa Ngadziore, pavanga vachiita musangano nevatori venhau pedyo nemahofisi ekambani yeImpala Car Rental. Kambani iyi ndiyo ine motokari inonzi yakashandiswa mukupambwa kwemumwe mudzidzi kuBulawayo, VaTawanda Muchehiwa, muna Chikunguru. Mutapi wenhau weStudio7, Godwin Mangudya, apwanyirwa muchina wake wekutapisa manzwi, mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira achitora nhau dzemifananidzo, James Jemwa, atorerwawo camera yake nevanhu ava. Vamwe vatori venhau varohwa vanoti Thomas Madhuku wekambani ye263chat, Bernard Mpofu, Munashe Chokodza nevamwe. Zvinonziwo vamwe vatori venhau vatorerwawo nharembodza dzavo. Gweta riri kumirira vatori venhau ava, VaChris Mhike, vanoti Jemwa akuvara zvakaipisa uye vamhan’ara nyaya yekurohwa kwevatori venhau iyi kumapurisa. Mutungamiri wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevatapi venhau, reMisa Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vashora zvaitika kuvatori venhau izvi. VaNgadziore vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti vapambwawo muchiitiko ichi vakasiya vazvindikitwa uye vati kambani yeImpala inofanira kubuda pachena kuti ndiyani akabhadhara kuti ashandise mota yakashandiswa mukupambwa kwakaitwa Muchehiwa. VaNgadziore vanonzi vasungwa ndokuchengetedzwa nemapurisa. Mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, vati mapurisa ari kuferefeta nyaya yekurohwa kwaitwa vatori venhau ava. No media source currently available
title: Vatori veNhau Vanorohwa neKuputsirwa Mishina Yavo Vachiita Basa Ravo

text: Bato reZanu PF nemusi weChipiri rakaita chipata pata kupasisa bhiri rezvekusandura mitemo yekutongwa kwematunhu kana kuti, Local Government Laws Amendment Bill, zvisinei nekuti bato rinopikipisa reMDC range richiti mutemo wekupasisa bhiri iri hauna kutevedzerrwa. Asikunyange hazvo nhengo dzeMDC dzatora awa nechidimbu dzichiedza kutsangura izvi, mutauriri wedare iri, VaJacob Mudenda vati matanho anodiwa ese akatevedzwa. Idzo inhengo dzeMDC dzichiratidza kusafara nedanho ratorwa nemutauriri weparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, rekuti gurukota rezvematunhu VaSavior Kasukuwere vaenderere mberi nebhiri iri zvisinei nezvange zvataurwa nevanokokera nhengo dzeMDC mudare iri, VaInnocent Gonese, kuti matanho ese anodiwa ange asina kutevedzwa zvikuru sei pakazeyiwa dare nekomiti yeParliamentary Legal Committee iyo inongorora kuti mabhiri ese haapokani nemutemo wenyika. VaGonese vanoti ivo naMuzvare Jessie Majome senhengo dzePLC havana kupihwa mukana wekupa pfungwa dzavo pabhiri iri. Vanoti dzimwe nhengo dzePLC dzinoti VaFortune Chasi, VaZiyambi Ziyambi naVaJonathan Samkange vese kubva kuZanu PF vakaita musangano vega pasina nhengo dzeMDC. Asi VaMudenda vati musangano uyu wakaitwa zviri pamutemo uye hapana mutemo unoti nhengo dzese dzePLC dzinofanira kuvepo panoitwa misangano. Asi VaGonese vati mutongo waVaMudenda waitwa mushure mekunge vanyeberwa nenhengo dzePLC kubva kuZanu PF pamwe nevashandi veparamende uye unotyora bumbiro remutemo. Muzvare maMajome vatsinhirawo kuti manyepo kuti vakabvumirana nenhengo dzeZanu PF dziri muPLC kuti vati bhiri reLocal Government Laws Amendment harityori bumbiro remutemo. Asi zvinesinei nezvataurwa nenhengo dzeMDC VaMudenda vati nhaurirano pabhiri iri dzienderere mberi. Asi Izvi hazvina kushamisa nekuti kunyange hazvo nhaurirano pabhiri iri dzange dzisati dzatanga mutugamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vange vatokoka nhengo dzeSeneti idzo dziri pazororo kuti dzidzoke kubasa nemusi weChina apo dzinotarisirwa kupasisa bhiri iri. Vagari vemuHarare vakaita saAmai Locadia Patsika, vanoti havana kufara nezvaitika muparamende. VaClaris Madhuku vePlatform For Youth Development ndemumwe weavo wevasina kufara nemafambisirwa ari kuitwa kunyorwa kwe bhiri iri. Vachipapfungwa dzavo pamutongo wapihwa naVaMudenda imwe nhengo yeMDC VaNelson Chamisa vati VaMudenda vazviomesera uye mutongo wavo unogona kupikiswa mumatare edzimhosva. No media source currently available
title: MDC Inoti Zanu-PF Yotyora Mutemo neKupasisa Bhiri Rekutongwa kweMatunhu zveChimbi Chimbi

text: Vakuru vakati pafa munhu hapashaike muroyi. Izvi ndizvo zvave kuitika mubato guru rinopikisa munyika, reMDC rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, zvichitevera kudzingwa muparamende kwenhengo ina dzebato iri dzichinzi hadzichatevera zvido zvebatore MDC-T inotungamirirwa naMuzvare Thokozane Khupe. Vakadzingwa muparamende neChipiri vanoti; mumiriri weKuwadzana, VaChalton Hwende, mumiriri weDangamvura-Chikanga, VaProsper Mutseyami, mumiriri weBulawayo, Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo pamwe naseneta Lillian Timveos. Nemusi weChina mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC yaVaChamisa, VaJob Sikhala, vazivisa vatori venhau kuti nhengo dzavo dzose dzave kumbomira kuenda kuparamende senzira yekuratidza kunyunyuta kwavo nezvakaitwa neparamende izvi. Kunyange hazvo VaSikhala vakati nhengo dzavo dzambomira kuenda kuparamende, pari zvino paramende yakavharwa uye inotarisirirwa kuvhurwa musi waChivabvu 19. Danho rakatorwa neparamende iri rekudzinga nhengo dzeMDC ina idzi rinotevera mutongo wakapiwa nedare repamusorosoro reSupreme Court, wekuti bato reMDC ridzokere pane zvaraive mugore ra2014, izvo zvinoreva kuti hakuna bato reMDC Alliance, rinove rine nhengo dziri kudzingwa muparamende. Sachigaro vebato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaChamisa mudunhu reNorth America, VaTawanda Dzvokora, vanoti matambudziko ose ari kuitika mubato ravo aya ari kuratidza kuti ruoko rweZanu PF rwuri kushanda mukuedza kuparadza bato ravo. VaDzvokora vanoti izvi zvinoonekwa kuburikidza nekuvhurwa kwedare reSupreme Court uye kuvhurwa kweparamende kuti idzinge nhengo dzavo kunyange hazvo vanhu vairambidzwa kufambafamba pachityirwa kuparadzirwa kweCoronavirus inokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19. Asi sachigaro veZanu PF mudunhure North America, VaRegis Charumbira, vanoti MDC haifanirwe kuvazora mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya, vachiti bato rinopikisa iri rinofanirwa kuzvikanga nemafuta aro. VaCharumbira vanoti zviri pachena kuti bato reMDC harina kurongeka uye haridi kutevedzera bumbiro remitemo yenyika, kunyange hazvo raive rimwe remapato akanyora bumbiro iri muna 2013. No media source currently available
title: Makakatanwa Pakati paVaChamisa naMuzvare Khupe Okonzera Mutauro Munyika

text: Bato rinopikisa reCitizens’ Coalition for Change rinotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, rinoti ranyimwa mvumo nemapurisa yekuti riite misangano yaro miviri yekupemberera kupera kwegore panzvimbo yemabhizimusi yeBudiriro 5 muHarare nepaHuruyadzo mumusha weSt. Mary’s kuChitungwiza. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutauriri weCCC, VaGift Ostalos Siziba, vanoti tsamba dzavakanyorerwa nevakuru vemapurisa ematunhu eHarare South neChitungwiza, hadzina kuvapa zvikonzero zvekuti sei mapurisa avarambidza kuita misangano miviri iyi. Asi VaSiziba vanoti vanoziva kuti hurumende inotya kuti vasangane nevatsigiri vavo, zvikuru nyika yatarisana nesarudzo kudai, uye vanoti vakwira kudare reHigh Court vachipikisa matanho emapurisa aya. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vakuru vemapurisa mumatunhu maviri aya vanoti Chief Superintendent Majojo vekuHarare South pamwe naChief Superintendent Muguti vekuChitungwiza kuti tinzwe zvikonzero zvaita kuti vanyime bato iri mvumo. Asi mutauriri wemapurisa munyika yose, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vasati vanzwa nezvenyaya idzi, vachiti inyaya dzinobatwa nematunhu anenge achiitirwa misangano iyi. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Anorambidza CCC Kuita Misangano yeKupera kweGore kuBudiriro neSt. Mary's, Bato iri Richiti Harina Kupiwa Zvikonzero

text: Bato rinofungidzirwa kuti rinotsigirwa naVaRobert Mugabe, re National Patriotic Front, NPF, rinoti richasunga mbira dzakoto Zanu PF pamwe nemutungamiri wayo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, musarudzo dzichaitwa gore rino. Vachitaura pamusangano wavo wekutanga wehutungamiriri hwedunhu reMasvingo paCharles Austin Theater neChishanu, vakuru veNPF vati VaMangagwa nevamwe vavo vachakundwa muzvigaro zvavachakwikwidza munyika. Mukokeri wemisangano muNPF, VaJeepy Jaboon, vaudza vatungamiri vabva kumatunhu manomwe edunhu reMasvingo kuti bato ravo rine rutsigiro rwakawanda kusanganisira nhengo dzeparamende nemakanzura achiri muZanu PF. “Tiri kushanda navo ma MP vane maCV avo akakunda muZanu PF ndevedu tine hurongwa navo, handitauri zvakawanda ma CIO aripano, tine makunzura imomo tinoziva patinoda kudira Jecha, regai maMP iwayo akanzi apinde ne Junta apinde tondosanga muballot,” vadaro VaJaboon. Mutauriri we NPF, VaJelous Mawarire, vati VaMnangagwa havana chavanowana muMasvingo vachiti bato ravo ndimo marakasimbisisa. “Vanoti Mnangagwa muKaranga ndovasingazivi haasi ,muZambian, Kuno ndokwatinoda kuratidza kuti Mnangagwa haanongi kana chunhu, kuno ndokwatakasimbira,” vadaro VaMnangagwa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raVaMnangagwa panyaya iyi. Mutevedzeri wemukokeri wemisangano weNPF munyika, VaJimmy Kunaka, vati hurumende yaVaMnangagwa haisi pamutemo nekuti yakapinda nekubvuta simba ichishandisa mauto nekudaro vanhu vachaibvisa vachishandisa vhoti. “Vakaita zvakanaka ndovakatidzidzisa, handiti makore ose tange tisingazivi kuti ku state house kunosvikika ivo vakati handei tinobvisa VaMugabe kustate house, saka isuwo tiri kuti nezuva ravachadeedzera election handei tinovabvisa ku state house nevhoti nekuti vakapinda zvenharo , we are ready to defend this country,” vadaro VaKunaka. VaJaboon vati sezvo vave mubato rinopikisa, hutungamiriri hwavo huchapinda muvanhu vachivabvunza kuti vopinda mumubatanidzwa here nemamwe mapato anopikisa. Vakurudzira vanhu kuti vasatye kushungurudzwa nevatsigiri vaVaMnangagwa avo vari kushandisa mauto senzira yekunyaradza vanopikisa. NPF yati yave mubishi rekugadzadzirira kongiresi zvichitevera kuumbwa kwayo. No media source currently available
title: National Patriotic Front Inoti Ichakunda Zanu PF Musarudzo

text: Vari kutungamira hurongwa hwekunamatira murwiri wekodzero akapambwa akatsakatika, VaItai Dzamara, vanoti vave kurongwa kukwira kumatare edzimhosva mushure mekunge mapurisa akapakata zvombo avarambidza kuita munamato munhandare yeMandava kuZvishavane neMugovera. Mumwe wevari kuronga minamato iyi, Bishop Ancelimo Magaya, vanoti vanotarisira kuti neChipiri magweta avo anenge apedza gadziriro yawo yekuti vaende kumatare edzimhosva. NeMugovera mapurisa kuZvishavane anonzi akatadzisa munamato wekuti vanhu vanamatire VaDzamara achiti munamato uyu wakanga wave kutungamirwa nebato reMDC T, kunyange hazvo mapurisa aya akambenge aziviswa achibvuma kuti munamato uyu uenderere mberi. Pasi pebumbiro remitemo yenyika, mapurisa haana masimba ekurambidza vanhu kuungana asi chete kuti vanofanirwa kungoziviswa. VaDzamara vave nemwedzi mishanu vapambwa mumusha weGlen View muHarare nevanhu vasingazivikanwe. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mhuri yekwaDzamara yasvitsa gwaro renyunyuto kana kuti petition kumutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nekumutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, ichichema nerekuti hurumende haisi kuita zvakakwana mukutsvaga murwiri wekodzero uyu. Mudzimai waVaDzamara, Amai Shefra Dzamara nemunin’ina wavo, Doctor Patson Dzamara, ndivo vaendesa gwaro iri kumahofisi aVaMugabe kuMunhumutapa nekuparamende. Doctor Dzamara vanoti vanoda kuti VaMugabe vapindire semutungamiri wenyika pakutsvagwa kwemukoma wavo. Vanoti kunyange hazvo VaDzamara vaikurudzira kuti mutungamiri wenyika asiye chigaro, zvakakoshawo zvakare kuti kodzero dzavo sechizvarwa cheZimbabwe dziremekedzwe, sezviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. Zvichakadaro, mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, uye vari gurukota rezvemitemo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanonzi vakaudza musangano webato ravo reZanu PF kuti mapurisa pamwe nevasori vari mushishi kutsvaga VaDzamara. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vakakumbirawo kuti maporofita pamwe nevedzichechi vanokwanisa kubatsira mukuwanikwa kwaVaDzamara vabatsire sezvo munhu wese ari kushushikana nezvakaitika kwavari. No media source currently available
title: Mhuri yekwaDzamara Yotarisa Kuna VaMugabe Mukutsvagwa kwaVaItai Dzamara

text: Vanhu vanorarama nehurema vanotsutsumwira hurumende yeZanu PF nemutungamiriri wayo VaRobert Mugabe nenyaya yekuondonga hupfumi hwenyika zvaita kuti hupenyu hwavo huome kupfuura vamwe vanorarama vasina hurema. Vachitaura pamusangano waitwa nesangano ravo reDisabled Amalgamated Community Trust kana kuti DACT, vanorarama nehurema ava vati mamiriro ehupfumi hwenyika ari kuita kuti vanonge svosve nemuromo kupfuura vamwe vanhu munyika. Mutungamiriri weDACT, VaHenry Chivhanga vati nekudaro izvi zvaita kuti varonge kuratidzira mudhorobha reMasavingo mangwana senzira yekusvitsa zvinyunyuto zvavo kuhurumende. “Isu mangwana zvirokwazvo tichafamba muno muMasvingo kubva paCroco Motors kusvika pa Civic Center. Mukatarisa mamiriro akaita upfumi hwenyika tinoti zvazvinodai kumuti munyoro kuzoti kune wakaoma. Isu vakaremara tiri kurwadziwa chaizvo.” Vakaremara ava vanoti hupenyu huri kuvarwadza zvakasimba panguva iyo hurumende isiri kuvacheuka kuti ivabatsire, sezvo ruzhinji rwavo rwusingakwanisi kuita mabasa ekuzviraramisa. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weDACT, VaSimeon Mapengo vati mapurisa akatovapa mvumo yekuratidzira, uye vanotarisira kuti vanorarama nehurema vakawanda vachabatana navo mukuratidzira kwavo. “Ratidziro yedu takaikumbira svondo rapfuura iyo tikazobvumidza musi weChipiri, saka tinotarisira vanhu vakawanda kuti vauuye.” Imwe nhengo ye DACT yataura pamusangano apa VaCover Mugwadhi, vapomera hurumende mhosva yekusarudza vanhu vakaremara vachisiiwa muzvirongwa zvekupundutsa hupenyu hwevanhu, zveupfumi hwenyika, uye vati hurumende haikoshesi kodzero dzevakaremara, avo vanosiiwa vachitakatika nenhamo munyika. “Mukatarisa empowerment yose kubva ku ma youth hapana kana chavakaitira vanhu vakaremara. Hapana chavanganongedza kuti icho ndochatakaitira vakaremara. Hurumende yedu ndoshasha yekumbunyikidza kodzero dzevanhu vakaremara.” Vanhu ava vanoti vari kuona chitsvuku mumaruzevha umo mavari kushaiwa chikafu, sezvo gore rino vanhu vari kutamba chamutavanhava nenzara zvichitevera kusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura. Vakaremara vatiwo havasi kucheukwa nemusangano weZanu PF apo unogovera vanhu chikafu cherubatsiro rwunopiwa vari putambura. VaChivhanga vaenderera mberi vachiti hurumende haineyi nekodzero pamwe nezvichemo zvevakaremara avo vanosvika mamirioni maviri munyika. “Mukatarisa iye zvino tine ma war vets 34 000 vana vavo vanobhadharirwa chikoro uye vakapuwa ministry isu vakaremara hatina asi tinosvika 2 million, ndozavtinoda kuti zvizikanwe. Mukatarisa Mai Mahofa hofisi yavo yakazoiswa pasi nekuti vakatadza kukwira mstepisi kuenda kudenga. Ndozvimwe zvinhu zvinotonetsa sevakaremara.” Vakaremara ava vati vachasvitsa gwaro renyunyuto kugurukota redunhu reMasvingo, Amai Shuvai Mahofa pamahofisi avo paBurombo. Kuratidzira kwevakaremara uku kunouya panguva iyo masangano akazvimirira, mapato ezvematongerwo enyika anopikisa, pamwe nevamwe vanhu vari kuratidzira mumigwagwa yemunyika vachitsutsumwa nehutongi hwaVaMugabe nebato ravo reZanu PF, vachi kurudzira kuti vachibva pachigaro. No media source currently available
title: Vanorarama neHurema kuMasvingo Voronga Kuratidzira

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaJuly Moyo vanoti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekurerutsa matambudziko ari kusangana nemakanzuru ose munyika ekushaya mari yekushandisa mukuita mabasa awo uye kutambirisa vashandi zvichitevera kugara mudzimba kwevazhinji avo vave kushaya mari yekubvisa mitero. Hurumende yakatiwo vanoroja vambomira kubhadhara mari dzekuroja parizvino kana vakaomerwa vozobvisa zvishoma nezvishoma. Vachitaura neStudio 7 vari parunhare, VaMoyo vati pane hurongwa huri kugadzirwa nehurumende hwekuwawanira mari maguta ose nemakanzuru madiki kuti abatsirikane. Mashoko aVaMoyo anotevera kuchema-chema kwemakanzuru emunyika achiti ave kukundikana kuita mabasa uye kupa vashandi vavo mari dzemihoro. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Local Government Association VaGuy Mutasa vaudza Studio 7 i kuti vakatarisana nematambudziko akati kuti. VaMutasa vanoti makanzuru ose munyika ari kuremerwa nekuti awane zvikwanisiro zvinodiwa zvakaita semishonga nezvipfeko zvinodzivirira kutapurirana coronavirus. Meya weguta reMutare VaBlessing Tandi vanotiwo kanzuru yavo haina mari sezvo zvichitaridza kuti vagari vange vasina fungidziro yekuti vachanzi vagare mudzimba. VaTandi vanoti kanzuru yavo mwedzi wapfuura yakatokwanisa kubhadhara chidimbu chemari inotambirwa nevashandi vavo sezvo vari kuwanawo mari inosvika zvikamu gumi kubva muzana kuvagari semitero. VaTandi vanoti kanzuru yavo inosungirwa kunge ichiwana mari inoita mamiriyoni masere emadhora mwedzi wega wega kubva kuvagari ukuwo vashandi vavo vose vachida mari inosvikawo miriyoni imwechete nezviuru mazana masere emadhora pamuhoro ($1,8million) pamwedzi. Meya weMasvingo VaCollin Maboke vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru yavo kuburikidza nesangano reUrban Councils Association of Zimbabwe rinova mubatanidzwa wemakanzuru ose munyika vakakumbira rubatsiro nekuti vave kutatarika. Zimbabwe ine makanzuru anosvika makumi maviri nemasere; matanhatu ari emaguta makuru, gumi ari emaguta madoko, mamwe masere ari etumadhorobha kuchizoti mana ari aya anonzi maLocal Boards. Zvichakadaro, vanhu vakawanda maMutare vari kutambira kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vazvivhare muromo nemhuno kana kuti kupfeka mamask pose pavanosangana neveruzhinji. Izvi zviri kuitwa muzvitoro uye kumisika. Mapurisa ekanzuru ari kumusika kuona kuti vanhu vatevera mutemo. Zvimwe zvitoro zviri kugezawo vanhu maoko nemushonga kana kuti hand sanitizer kuyedza kudzivirira kupararira kwecoronavirus. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoronga Kubatsira Makanzuru Ayo Otadza Kuita Mabasa neNyaya yeCoronavirus

text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, uye vari munyori wesangano remadzimai reWomen’s League, Amai Grace Mugabe, vakatyamadza vanhu neChina apo vakurudzira murume wavo, VaRobert Mugabe, kuti vadome munhu achatora chigaro chavo sezvinoitwa kune dzimwe nyika. Amai Mugabe vataura mashoko aya pamusangano wemadzimai weNational Assembly waitirwa pamuzinda webato iri muHarare. Amai Mugabe vati hapana chakaipa kuti VaMugabe vadome achavatsiva vachiti izvi zvinobatsira kuti vanhu vemubato vatsigire munhu wacho kwete kuramba vachinetsana. Bumbiro remitemo reZanu-PF pari zvino rinoti mutungamiri webato anosarudzwa pakongiresi inoitwa kwapera makore mashanu. Mushure mekunge asarudzwa, iye anozodoma vatevedzeri vake vaviri sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo yeZanu PF. Kongiresi yeZanu PF yekupedzisira yakaitwa muna 2014 uye inotevera ichaitwa muna 2019. Mutungamiri webato akafa zvinoreva kuti panoitwa kongiresi yechimbi chimbi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti dzinoshamiswa nemashoko aAmai Mugabe sezvo bato reZanu-PF rakatoita chisungo chekuti VaMugabe, avo vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nematatu ekuberekwa, ndivo vachatungamira bato iri musarudzo dzegore rinouya. VaMugabe vagara vachiramba kuti ivo mbune vane chekuita nekuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chavo. Nedzimwe nguva vanoti pavanhu vari mubato ravo hapana angakwanise kutora chigaro ichi. Gurukota rinoona nezvevakarwa hondo, VaTsinga Dube, vakataura mashoko ekuti VaMugabe vanofanira kudoma achavatsiva asi vakazodaidzwa kuhofisi kwaVaMugabe vakaudzwa kuti vainge vave kupinda nemwenje mudziva. Mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvemitemo muZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vanoti bumbiro remitemo reZanu-PF rajeka panyaya yemunhu anotsiva mutungamiri wenyika. VaMangwana vati sarudzo dzemutungamiri dzinoitwa kwapera makore mashanu. "Pakaitika njodzi kana kuti mutungamiri webato akasiya basa, panoitwa kongiresi yechimbi chimbi kwoitwa sarudzo mukati memwedzi mitatu," vadaro VaMangwana. Asi mutauriri webato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaObert Gutu, vanoti Zanu-PF haina hutongo hwejekerere uye zvinoda VaMugabe ndivo vane shoko rekupedzisira panyaya yekuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chavo. No media source currently available
title: Amai Mugabe Vokonzera Mutauro Nekuti VaMugabe Vadome Achatora Chigaro Chavo

text: Vana chiremba vanoti havasi kufara nedanho rakatorwa nehurumende rekuendesa mberi mazuva avo ekutambira mihoro, izvo zvoita kuti varonge kusangana nemusi weChishanu svondo rino kuti varovane masoro pagwara rekutora vachienda mberi. Mutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr. Fortune Nyamande vanoti hurumende yakatora danho iri isina kugara navo pasi sezvakawiriranwa. Dr. Nyamande vanoti hurongwa hwekuti vashandi vari muboka rezvehutano ndivo vanopedzisira nguva yose kuwana mihoro hunovadzikisa pasi zvikuru. Zvichakadaro, rimwe sangano revarairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe rinoti harioni nhengo dzaro dzichikwanisa kuramba dzichienda kubasa kutanga svondo rinouya, sezvo dzisisina mari dzekufambisa. Mutungamiri wesangano iri VaTakavafira Zhou vaudza Studio 7 kuti mari dzakatambirwa nevarairidzi mwedzi wapera dzinokwanisa kungovararamisa kusvika panopera svondo rino chete. Hurumende iri kutatarika kuwana mari dzekutambirisa vashandi vayo, izvo zvakaita kuti ikundikane kubhadhara mihoro yaChikumi paine nguva. Mauto ndiwo achatanga kuwana mari musi wa 27 Chikumi, voteverwa nemapurisa musi wa 30 Chikumi. Varairidzi vanotarisirwa kuzowana mari dzavo musi wa 7 Chikunguru, kwozoti vanachiremba nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vose vozotambiriswa musi wa 14 chikunguru. Vave pamudyandigere vanozotarisirwawo kuwana mari dzavo musi wa19 Chikunguru. No media source currently available
title: VanaChiremba Votsutsumwa neKushandurwa kweMazuva Avo eKuwana Mihoro

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nemusi weChitatu vakasimuka munyika vakananga kuSingapore uko vanonzi vari kuenda kunoona vanachiremba vavo. Mutauriri waVaMugabe, VaGeorge Charamba, vanoti rwendo urwu rwakagara rwarongwa kare uye VaMugabe vanotarisirwa kudzoka svondo rinouya. Asi izvi hazvisi kumisa vanhu kutaura sechave chigariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga pose panobuda vamugabe munyika. VaMugabe vari kuenda kunorapwa kunze uku munyika vanachiremba navanamukoti vari mukuramwa mabasa uye vamwe vashandi vehurumende vazivisa kuti vave kupinda mukuramwa mabasa kutanga neMuvhuro. Hurumende inoti haina mari asi nenzendo dzaVaMugabe kunze dzinonzi dzinodya mari yakawanda. Munyika mune matambudziko emafashamu emvura asiya vakawanda vasina pekugara. Mubato reZanu-PF hamunawo kugadzikana sezvo nemakore aVaMugabe pane kunetsana panyaya yekuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chavo. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vakarerekera havo kubato reZanu-PF, VaGadzira Chirumuanzu, vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti VaMugabe vaende kunorapwa uye hapana chinokanganisika munyika nekuti vane vatevedzeri vavo. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vachishanda neHuman Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti VaMugabe vanofanira kuenda pamudyandigere nekuti havachakwanise kuita basa nemazvo nenyaya yekukwegura. No media source currently available
title: Kunorapwa kuSingapore kwaVaMugabe Kwokonzera Mutauro

text: Madzimai emudhorobha reMasvingo akurudzira hurumende kuti ibvise mari inobhadharwa nevanhukadzi vakazvitakura kuitira kuti vakwanise kusunungukira muzvipatara. Madzimai ava vari kuti havasi kukwanisa kubhadhara mari iyi izvo zviri kukonzera kuti vazhinji vavo vasunungukire mudzimba. Madzimai akawanda audza nhengo dzeparamende dzekomiti inoona nezve mari nehupfimi kuMasvingo pamusangano wekugadzirira bhajeti regore rinouya kuti hurumende inofanira kubvisa mari iyi iyo iri kubhadhariswa nebazi rezveutano nekuchengetedzwa kwevanana. Vanhukadzi vatiwo zvipatara zviri kubhadharisa madzimai akazvitakura mari yakawandisa iyo yavasingakwanisi kuwana nenyaya yekuoma kwehupenyu zvichi konzerwa nehupfumi hwenyika hwawondomoka. Mumwe mudzimai wemuMasvingo, Amai Tsitsi Muwonda vati zvipatara zvino bhadharisa mari yakawandisa izvo zviri kuita kuti vasunungukire mudzimba. “Tirikuti vanhu ve paramende vauya vanoudza hurumende kuti hatikwanisi kubhadhara mari iyi nokudaro tinoda kuti ibviswe tizokwanisawo kusunungukira muzvipatara zvakanaka,” vadaro Ami Muwonda. Madzimai aya ati zvipatara zvinobhadharisa mari inotangira pamakumi matanhatu emadhora kusvika pamakumi masere, inova mari yakawandisa. Mamwe madzimai atiwo nekuda kwekuoma kwaita upfumi hwenyika, madzimai mazhinji havaendi kumabasa pamwechete nevarume vavo izvo zviri kuita kuti vasawane mari yekubhadhara mari dzekuzvipatara. Vaenderera mberi vachiti nokudaro ruzhinji rwevakadzi runotosunungukira kudzimba vachitya kuenda kuchipatara. Amai Janet Gumbo vati nenyaya iyi madzimai akazvitakura ane hutachiona hweHIV/AIDS ave kutapurira vana vavo nenyaya dzekusasunungikira muzvipatara. “Kuti nyika inzi ine vanhu tinofanira kuzvarana tiwande asi nenyaya yemari iyi hatichabari uye vane utachiwana vototapurira vana vavo sezvo vasingakwanisi kuenda kuzvipatara nekudhurirwa,” Amai Gumbo vadaro. No media source currently available
title: Madzimai ekuMasvingo Okurudzira Hurumende Kubvisa Mari dzeMateneti

text: Vachangobva kusarudzwa zvine mutauro kuve mutungamiri mutsva weMDCT, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vadoma nhengo itsva dzekomiti yepamusoro mubato ravo kusanganisira Muzvare Thokozani Khupe nevese vavakakunda musarudzo Yekongiresi yechimbichimbi yakaitwa neSvondo. VaMwonzora vazivisa kuti Muzvare Khupe vacharamba vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiriwebato wekutanga sezvo vakasarudzwa pakongiresi yemuna 2014. Vazivisawo kuti VaElias Mudzuri ndivo vachange vari mutevedzeri wavo wechipiri vachiti kana ivo VaMwonzora vasipo, Muzvare Khupe ndivo vanofanobata matomhu emutungamiri webato. Vati izvi zvinotevera mutongi wedare repamusoro uyo wakati kudomwa kwakaitwa VaNelson Chamisa naVaMudzuri kuti vave vatevedzeri vaVaMorgan Tsvangirai kuti vave vatevedzeri vaivo VaTsvangirai vachiri vapenyu, kwaive kusiri pamutemo webato iri. VaMwonzora vati vaona zvakakodzera kuti vatore danho iri vachiti vanoziva kukosha kwaVaMudzuri vakatarisa mabatiro avanoita basa kubva VaTsvangirai vachiri vapenyu kusvika pari zvino kunyange hazvo VaMudzuri, Muzvare Khupe naVaMorgan Komichi vakavakunda pakongiresi neSvondo iyo inonzi nevatatu ava haina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Mamwe magweta atataura nawo ati kudomwa kwaVaMudzuri semutevedzeri waVaMwonzora wechipiri kuri kunze kwebumbiro remitemo sezvo mubumbiro iri mune chinzvimbo chimwe chete chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato. Vamwe vati bumbiro reMDC rakavandudzwa kakawanda saka hazvisi kunyatsozivikanwa kuti zvaitwa izvi zviri pamutemo here kana kuti kwete kunyange hazvo dare reSupreme Court rakati zvakaitwa naVaTsvangirai vachiri vapenyu zvaive kunze kwemutemo. Asi VaMwonzora vati zvavaita izvi vachazvisvitsa kukomiti ye national council kuti vapihwe mvumo yekuenderera mberi nekudoma VaMudzuri semumwe wevatevedzeri vavo. Vatiwo Muzvare Khupe vagara vari munhu akasarudzwa nekongiresi kuve mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato saka nokudaro pana Muzvare Khupe hapana dambudziko. VaMwonzora, avo vanga vakatarisirwa kusangana naVaKomichi mukupera kwezuva ranhasi, vati vati chasara ndechekuti Muzvare Khupe, VaMudzuri naVaKomichi vataure pavamire nenyaya yezvigaro izvi. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevatatu ava kunyange hazvo VaMudzuri vakaudza Studio 7 neMuvhuro kuti vanofanira kugara pasi sevatungamiri vebato kuti vazeye mafambisirwo akaitwa kongiresi yavo. Zvichitevera kusarudzwa kwavakaitwa neSvondo, VaMwonzora vaudza vatori venhau pamuzinda webato ravo paMorgan Tsvangirai House kuti vakazvipira kuita nhaurirano nemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, Zanu PF nemamwe mapato panyaya dzinobata mararamiro everuzhinji munyika. Panyaya yekupinda munhaurirano dzePolitical Actors Dialogue, kana kuti Polad, idzo dziri kutungamirwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, VaMwonzora vati vachapihwa gwara nekomiti yebato ravo yeNational Council sezvo nyaya iyi isina kuzokwanisa kutaurika pakongiresi yebato ravo kuburikidza nekusanzwisisana kwakange kwavepo nevavaikwikwidzana navo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weZanu PF, VaPatrick Chinamasa, sezvo vanga vachiti vakabatikana nemusangano wekomiti yebato ravo yeCentral Committee ukuwo nharembozha yemukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, yanga isiri kupinda. Asi VaMugwadi vakamboudza Studio 7 kuti vese vanoda zvenhaurirano vanofanira kuuya kuPolad. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sebato havana nguva yekutaurirana neMDCT yaVaMwonzora. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mutungamiri wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vati chinhu chinonakira mapoka eMDC aya kuti ataurirane asi izvi zvinogona kunetsa sezvo mapoka ese aya arikuda masimba. Zvichakadai, gweta reMDCT iro ranga richimirira nyaya dzaMuzvare Khupe kumatare, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vati VaMwonzora vacharamba vari mutungamiri webato kudzamara izvi zvikashandurwa nematare ndokunge pane akwidza nyaya iyi kumatare. Mashoko aVaMadhuku aya anotevera kukumbirwa kwavakaitwa nehutungamiri hweMDCT kuti vaongorore segweta mafambisirwo akaitwa kongiresi yebato iri. Rimwe gweta zvekare avo vakambove mutevedzeri waMuzvare Khupe, VaObert Gutu, vaudza Studio 7 vari kuAmerica kuti pasi pebumbiro reMDCT kana pachiitwa sarudzo mumwe anenge achikwikwidza haana simba rekudzivisa zvimwe zvinhu kuti zviitwe kunze kwebhodhi rinenge richitungamira sarudzo. VaMwonzora vati chitima hachisi kuzomirira asipo vachiti patove nevamwe vavasina kudoma nemazuva vari kuMDC Alliance vatoratidza kuti vari kuda kudzoka kubato ravo kuti vashande pamwe chete. No media source currently available
title: VaMwonzora Vanozivisa Veruzhinji Nhengo dzeNational Standing Committee Yavo

text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum raburitsa gwaro rinoratidza kuti vanhu chiuru nemazana masere nevatatu vakatyorerwa kodzero dzavo nevanofungidzirwa kuti mauto, mapurisa nevechidiki veZanu-PF kubva musi wa15 Ndira kusvika musi wa 5 Kukadzi. Gwaro reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum rakanzi, “On the Days of Darkness in Zimbabwe”. Sangano iri rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vakaurayiwa wasvika pagumi nevanomwe. Pavanhu vakaurayiwa apa pane madzimai maviri uye vanhu gumi nemumwe ndevemuHarare, mumwe chete kuBulawayo, Marondera, vaviri kuChitungwiza uye mumwe chete kwaMutare nekuKadoma. Sangano iri rinoti rakwanisa kutaura nevanhu gumi nevasere vakabatwa chibharo vachiti zvakaitwa nemauto. Rinotiwo vanhu makumi masere nemumwe vakapfurwa nepfuti. Mumwe mukuru wemauto VaDouglas Nyikayaramba nezuro vakazivisa kuti mauto apedza basa ravo uye ave kugadzirira kudzokera kumakamba avo kana mapurisa ati haachadi rubatsiro rwavo. Vakatiwo mauto akapanduka ndiwo akaba pfuti ndokuuraya vanhu. Asi vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro.
title: Zimbabwe Human Rights Forum Inori Vanhu Gumi neVanomwe Vakaurayiwa neMauto

text: Vamwe varwere muBulawayo vange vachitadza kurapwa pazvipatara zvikuru zviviri zvehurumende zviri muguta iri apo kuramwa basa kwaana chiremba kwapinda muzuva rechina neChipiri. Pasvika Studio7 pachipatara cheMpilo panguva dzemasikati, vamwe varwere vange vachidzoserwa kumba zvichinzi kwange kuchingorapwa avo vanenge vachinyanya kurwara vakaita semadzimai ane pamuviri vanenge vaita dambudziko pakuzvara. Mumwe mugari uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Dlamini audza Studio7 kuti ange auya kuchipatara nasekuru vake vari kuzvimba makumbo vakaudzwa kuti vadzokere kumba sezvo vange vasingakwanise kuonekwa naana chiremba. Taedza kunzwa mamiriro ezvinhu kubva kumukuru wechipatara ichi, VaLeonard Mabande, asi vati titaure nevakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wemadhokotera, Dr Xolani Ndlovu, avo vati vange vasingakwanise kutaura nesu sezvo vange vane basa rakawanda rekuita. Pachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals bandiko rechipatara ichi rinorapa vanhu vanorwara vachibva kumba kana kuti Outpatients Department range rakavharwa uye chiziviso chakapiwa nemukuru waana chiremba pachipatara ichi, Dr Narcisaus Dzvanga, chinoratidzawo kuti chipatara ichi chiri kungotambira chete vanhu vanenge vachinzi vari kurwarisisa.
