Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Mthabisi Bhebhe, vati vana chiremba vari kuenderera mberi nekuramwa mabasa munyika mose zvisinei nekurudziro yehurumende yekuti vadzokere pamabasa vachiti havasati vanzwa kubva kuhurumende. Dr Ndlovu vati kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu muzvipatara kusanganisira kushaikwa kwemishonga nezvimwe zvikwanisiro ndicho chikonzero chikuru chiri kuita kuti varamwe mabasa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehumende sezvo tatadza kubata gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo. Asi mutevedzeri waDr Moyo, Dr John Mangwiro, vaudza Studio7 parunhere kuti vange vasingakwanise kutaura nezve nyaya iyi sezvo vari kunze kwenyika ukuwo munyori webazi iri, Dr Gerald Gwinji, vange vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. Mumiriri weBulawayo Metropolitan Province pasi pechikamu cheproportional representation, Amai Dorcas Sibanda, vaudza Studio 7 vati nyaya yekuramwa mabasa kwaana chiremba yave nenguva ichiitika vachiti zvinorwadza kuti hupenyu hweveruzhinji hunoiswa panjodzi nezvinhu zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa nehurumende. Vana chiremba vanoshandira hurumende vakatanga kuramwa mabasa nemusi weMugovera uye muzvipatara zvikuru zvehurumende muri kushanda vana chiremba vanenge vachibva vava nemakore akawanda vari pabasa vanoshanda savanna chipangamazano, kana kuti consultant physicians. No media source currently available
title: Varwere Votambura Zvichitevera Kuramwa Mabasa kwaVana Chiremba

text: Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzekutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS kubva kuna amai kuenda kumwana mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Angela Mushavi, vanoti pari zvino nyika iri mushishi rekuyedza kuderedza huwandu hwevana vari kuwana hutachiwana kubva kumadzimai avo kubva pazvikamu zvonomwe kubva muzana kusvika pazvikamu zvishanu kubva muzana. Doctor Mushavi mumwe wevanhu vakanga vari pamusangano mukuru we 2016 International Aids Conference wakapera kuDurban, kuSouth Africa neChishanu chapfuura. Doctor Mushavi vanoti pari zvino nyika iri kufambisa gwara rayo zvakanaka kuitira kuti ikwanise kupindawo pasi pechirongwa cheWorld Health Organisation, icho chinopa chitambi chekuti zvinhu zviri kufamba zvakanaka here. Chitambi ichi chinowanikwa chete kana nyika yakwanisa kuderedza kutapurirwana kwehutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS kubva kuna amai kuenda kumwana, sezvakaita nyika dzakadayi seCuba. "Shuviro yedu ndeye kuti madzimai ese anenga azvitakura aende kunovhenekwa hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS pachine nguva kuitira kuti vaiswe pamishonga yekuti vadzivirire kutapurira vana vavo nekuchengetedzawo hutano hwavo," Doctor Mushavi vaudza Studio 7. "Tino kurudzira kuti madzimai vauye navanababa pavanouya kunovhenekwa sezvo zvakakosha kuti chirwere ichi chirwiswe nemhuri yese," Doctor Mushavi vaenderera mberi. Vanoti musangano uyu wakasunga kuti vanhu vatange kunwa mishonga nechimbichimbi kana vawanikwa vaine hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS kwete, kumirira kuti munhu tanga arwara, kana kuti CD4 count yake itange yadzikira. "Pasi rose rakasunga kuti vanhu vaiswe pachirongwa nechimbi chimbi kana vachinge vaziva kuti vane hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS kuitira kuti vawane rubatsiro nguva ichiripo, kwete kuzomirira kuti munhu arware," Doctor Mushavi vanodaro. Vanoti hurumende nemasangano akazvimirira munyika vari kushanda zvakasimba kuti vechidiki vasawanikwe vachibatira hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS kuitira kuti pange paine vechidiki vasina hutachiwana munguva inotevera. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yosimbisa Zvirongwa zveKurwisa Kutapuriranwa kweHutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS Kuvana Vacheche

text: Imwe mhuri yemuZimbabwe yaigara kuWestern Cape muSouth Africa iri kutsvaga rubatsiro rwekunoviga hama dzavo ina kumusha kuSanyati mushure mekunge dzapisirwa mumba nemunhu anofungidzirwa kuti chizvarwa chekuSouth Africa. Mhuri iyi yaigara panhamba 2219 Sanqoba Street Chris Hani Mbekweni kuWestern Cape uye munhu akavamisa anofungidzirwa kuti mumwe muvakidzani wavo ari chizvarwa chekuSouth Africa. Vanonzi vakambonetsana naye kare uye mapurisa ari kuferefeta nyaya iyi. Vanofungidzirwa kuti vakapisirwa mumba vanoti VaMaxwell Mazungunye, mudzimai wavo Amai Margaret Vare nevana vaviri Miriam naTadiwanashe. Vamwe vana vatatu vakapona vari muchipatara chePaarl Hospital intensive Care Unit neRed Cross Hospital muCape town sezvo vakakuvara zvakaipisisa. Mutauriri wemumhuri Muzvare Patience Moyo vanoti kana paine vari kuda kubatsira vanokwanisa kufona panhamba dzinoti 27 730 478 196, 27 842 528 000, vane mari vanokwanisa kuendesa kuNedbank Code 103310 paAccount number inoti 1031995978 No media source currently available
title: Hama dzeMhuri yeVanhu Vana Yakapisirwa neKufira Mumba kuSouth South Africa Yotsvaga Rubatsiro Kuti Vavigwe

text: achipindura mibvunzo iyi kubva kunhengo dzeNational Assembly muHarare, VaMnangagwa vati hapana anomanikidzwa kushandisa mari iyi. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaudza nhengo dzeparamende muHarare, kuti vanhu vasingade mari ichangobva kuparurwa yema Bond Notes vakasununguka kushandisa mari yavanoda, uye vati hapana chinotyisa pamari iyi sezvo iri kushandiswa zviri pamutemo. Vachipindura mibvunzo iyi kubva kunhengo dzeNational Assembly muHarare, VaMnangagwa vati hapana anomanikidzwa kushandisa mari iyi. Vatiwo veruzhinji havafaniri kutya kuti bhanga guru renyika richadhinda ma Bond Notes anodarika mamiriyoni mazana maviri akabvumiranwa nebhanga iri neAfrica Export and Import Bank (Afrexim Bank) vachiti mari iyi iri kudhindwa kune imwe nyika yekunze zvichiongororwa neveAfrexim Bank. Vati chero bhanga guru rikada kudhinda mari iyi inodarika mamiriyoni mazana maviri izvi hazvikwanise kuitika nekuti hazvisi muchibvumirano chayakaita nenyika iyi neAfrexim Bank. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaJames Johwa, vati hapana anoziva chibvumirano chebhanga guru renyika neAfrexim Bank uye ndosaka paine kutyira kuti pane zvinogona kuitwa. Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vakaita saVa Succeed Mapfumo vati havazi kuziva kuti VaMnangagwa vanorevei kana vachiti hapana munhu anomanikidzwa kushandisa mari itsva iyi. VaMapfumo vanoti mabhanga ave kutomakidza vanhu kutora maBond Notes kunyange vasingade kana vachida. Mumwe muzvina bhizimisi asina kuda kudomwa nezita audza Studio 7 kuti vari kumanikidzwa kutambira mari iyi vasingade uye vari kutambira mari yi sezvo vachitya kutorerwa marezenisi avo. Nhengo dzeparamende dzabvunzawo VaMnangagwa kuti sei chibvumirano chemari yechikwereti chakashandiswa pachirongwa chemaBond Notes chisina kuunzwa kudare iri uye VaMnangagwa vapindura vachiti mukuru weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe anobvumirwa pasi pemutemo webhanga iri kukwereta mari kana kupinda muzvibvumirano nemamwe mabhanga zvekusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika zvakaita sechirongwa chema Bond Notes. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vatendawo veruzhinji nevemabhizimisi nekutambira mari yakaunzwa nehurumende uyewo vakurudzira avo vasiri kuda kuti vaitambire vachiti ndomari iripo pari zvino.
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Hapana Anomanikidzwa Kushandisa Bond Notes

text: Magweta ari kumirira mutungamiri webato reLabour, Economists and African Democrats, LEAD, Muzvare Linda Masarira, neChitatu akakwira kudare reHigh Court achida kuti dare rimanikidze Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, kuti iburitse nekukasika gwaro revavhoti richashandiswa musarudzo idzi. Muzvare Masarira, avo vari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzekutsvaga mumiriri weHarare Central mudare reparamende dziri kuitwa neMugovera, vari kudawo zvakare kuziva kuti mapepa ekuvhotesa achapiwa dunhu ravari kukwikwidza vari mangani. Nyaya iyi inonzi ichanzwikwa neChishanu nenguva dza 11:30 mangwanani, uye ichange iri pamberi pemutongi Justice Munamato Mutevedzi. Sachigaro veZEC, Amai Priscillah Chigumba vaudza studio 7 kuti nyaya dzakadai dzinotaurwa nemukuru wekomisheni yavo VaUtoile Silaigwana, avo tatumira mubvunzo asi vange vasati vapindura pataenda pamhepo. Muzvare Masarira vanoti chikuru chakaita kuti vaende kudare ndechekuti zita ravo rakanga risiri kuwanikwa kunyange mugwaro revavhoti ra 2018, vachiti ravakazopiwa gore rino rakanga risina zita ravo zvakare, uye ravakazopiwa mushure mekudzokera zvakare kuZEC rakanga rakaita zvekunyorerwa gore nepenzura asi rakadhindwa kuti raive ra 2020. Muzvare Masarira vanoti gwaro revavhoti ravakazopiwa raiguma pavanhu vakanyoresa kuvhota kusvika musi wa 08 Ndira asi iro gwaro revavhoti rakazovharwa musi wa 28 Ndira. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weLEAD, Muzvare Masarira Voenda kuDare reHigh Court Kuti Rimanikidze ZEC Kuburitsa Gwaro reVavhoti Richashiswa neMugovera

text: Hurumende inoti huwandu hwevanhu vakashaya padambudziko redutumupengo reCyclone Idai hwasvika pamazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevasere, uye hunotarisirwa kuramba huchikwira sezvo vamwe vanhu vakatsakatika vari kuwanikwa vakafa. Vachitaura nevatori venhu mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota, gurukota rezvemadhorobha nematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vati mabasa ekutsvaga vakashaikwa mushure mekunge misha yavo yakukurwa kana kuputswa nedutumupengo iri ari kuenderera mberi uye nyika yave kubatsirwa neimbwa dzakabva kuSouth Africa. VaMoyo havana kuda kutaura huwandu hwevanhu vasiri kuwanikwa uye vati hurumende haigoni kutora vanhu ava sevakafa kudzamara yawana pane mitumbi yavo. Vatiwo hurumende iri kuedza napose painogona kubatsira vanhu vese vakawirwa nedambudziko iri. Vati hurumende yakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwezvikopo kopo zvekutakura rubatsiro kuenda kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzisati dzave kusvikika nemugwagwa. Vatiwo pane nzvimbo makumi matatu neshanu dziri pazvikoro pane zvipatara pari kupihwa vanhu rubatsiro asi dzimwe nzvimbo idzi hadzisati dzave kusvikika nemigwagwa. Vati kunyange hazvo vanhu vemuZimbabwe nemasangano epasi rese ange ari kupa rubatsiro, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachaparura chirongwa chekutsvaga rubatsiro zviri pamutemo. Asi vati havasati vave kuziva kuti panodiwa rubatsiro runokosha mari yakawanda zvakadii zvakadii. Vati panodiwa rubatsiro runosanganisira kugadzira migwagwa, mvura, kuvaka zvikoro, dzimba, magetsi nezvimwe. Vatiwo pane vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi mashanu vanoda rubatsiro rwekuti pfungwa dzavo dzigatsikane mushure mekuvhiringwa neCyclone Idai. Kusvika pari zvino hurumende yashandisa zana remamiryoni emadhora kubatsira vakawirwa neCyclone Idai uye makambani, vanhu, nemasangano emuno, nenyika dzekunze, vakabvisawo rubatsiro runokosha mamiryoni akawanda emadhora. Vatiwo hurumende iri kuedza zvese zvainokwanisa kuitira kuti rubatsiro rusvike kwarunofanira kuendeswa. Zimbabwe yakarohwa nedutumupengo reCyclone Idai iro rakatanga musi wa 14 Kurume, uye rakavhiringawo Mozambique neMalawi. Vachitaurawo pamusangano uyu, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati dare ramukurukota rashora zviri kuitwa nevamwe vemabhizimisi zvekukwidza mitengo yezvinhu zuva zuva. Vati dare raita chisungo chekuti mabhizimisi anofanira kukwidza mutengo achitarisa huremu hwemari kwete kutarisa mutengo wemari pamukoto. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakasiyanisa hudzamu hwemadhora ekuAmerica pamwe nemaRTGS dollars ikavhura musika wekutengeswa kwemari yekunze mumabhanga, madhora ekuAmerica haasi kuwanikwa mumabhanga uye ari kuramba achiwanikwa pamukoto izvo zviri kukwidza mitengo yezvinhu. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inoti Huwandu hweVanhu Vakafa Huri Kuramba Huchikwira

text: Nhepfenyuro dzeBBC, Aljazeera uye vanonyora nhau padandemutande veReuters vanoti mauto ari kutsigira mukuru wemauto General Constantino Chiwenga atora nhepfenyuro yeZBC muHarare. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwemukati menyika VaObert Mpofu vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chavati vanzwa kusvika parizvino nezvenyaya iyi. Asi kuratidza kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka, mizinda yeAmerica neBritain muHarare yazivisa kuti inenge yakavhara mangwana sezvo zvinhu zvisina kugadzikana muZimbabwe. Zvinonzi izvi zvatevera kuputika katatu kwaitika muguta reHarare manheru emusi weChitatu asi pasina anoziva kuti chii chaputika. Mutauriri wemauto Lieutenant Colonel Alphonso Makotore vaudza Studio 7 kuti itumire tsambambozha sezvo vasingakwanise kupindura mibvunzo pambozhanhare. Hatina kukwanisa kuzobata gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaSimon Khaya Moyo asi vambenge vati General Chiwenga vange vatyora bumbiro remutemo nekupandukira hurumende yakasarudzwa nevanhu. Hapanawo ari kuziva kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemhuri yavo vari kupi. Mutauriri waVaMugabe, VaGeorge Charamba vati vange vakarara. Zvinhu munyika zvakatanga kuita manyama amire nerongo neMuvhuro mushure mekunge General Chiwenga vati vaizogona kupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika sezvo vainge vasiri kufara nekudzingwa kuri kuitwa varwiri vehondo yerusununguko mubato reZanu-PF.
title: Dzimwe Nhepfenyuro Dzinoti Mauto Atora ZBC, Asi Makurukota eHurumende Anoti Haana Ruzivo Nazvo

text: Vakasarudzwa kuve mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica Amai Kamala Harris vari kutarisirwa kutorwswa mhiko nemusi wechitatu nemutongi wedare repamusoro soro reSupreme Court Amai Sonia Sotomayor. Amai Harris ndivo mudzimai uye mutema wekutanga kuva mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika uye Amai Sotomayor vari mudzimai wekutanga wechiLatina kuve mutongi wedare repamusoro soro iri. Amai Harris vanonzi ndivo vakadoma Amai Sotomayor kuti vavatorese mhiko. Vari kutarisirwa kushandisa mabhaibheri maviri pakutora mhiko rimwe racho rakashandiswa namushakabvu uye vaive mutongi wedare repamusoro soro iri vari mutema wekutanga VaThurgood Marshall. Amai Harris saVaMarshall, vakadzidza pachikoro cheHoward University. Aka ndekechipiri Amai Sotomayor vachitoresa mhiko mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika sezvo vakambotoresa zvakare VaJoe Biden muna 2013 apo vaive mutevedzeri waVaBarack Obama. VaBiden semutungamiri wenyika vanotoreswa mhiko nemunyori mukuru wedare reSupreme Court VaJohn Roberts.
title: Amai Kamala Harris Votoreswa Mhiko naAmai Sonia Sotomayor

text: Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi VaTerrence Mukupe avo vari kushorwa zvakanyanya nevakawanda munyika vanyora tsamba kuvatori venhau vachiyedza kuzvichenura panyaya dzakawanda dzavari kupomerwa dzapa kuti vamwe vati mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vavadzinge basa. Panyaya yekutanga yavanoonekwa pavhidhiyo vachiti mauto haasi kuzoregedza VaChamisa vachitonga vakakunda musarudzo, VaMukupe vanoti vanhu vari kureva nepasipo zvikuru vanopikisa. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaSimon Khaya Moyo vakatoburitsa mashoko vachishora zvikuru mashoko VaMukupe aya vachiti haamirire zvido zvehurumende nebato ravo reZanu-PF. Pakutuka kwavanonzi vakaita VaBiti pamhepo vachiti vainge vanwa here mapiritsi echirwere chemukondombera, VaMukupe vanoti vainge vadenwa naVaBiti asi vachiti havaifanira kutaura zvavakataura. Vatiwo vanokumbira ruregerero. Panyaya yavanonzi vaida kurova mutori wenhau Blessed Mhlanga vari pamhepo zvekare, VaMukupe vati vainge vadenwa asi vakati vari kukumbira ruregerero nekubuda muchirongwa chisati chapera. Havana kutaura nezveimwe mhosva yavari kupomerwa yekutora nechisimba mbozhanhare yemudzimai waVaMhlanga uyo aiedza kutora vhidhiyo apo vanonzi vainge voda kurova murume wavo.
title: VaMukupe Vopa Divi Ravo paNyaya Dzavari Kupomerwa

text: Kutanga mwedzi uno, nhandare yendege yeLouisville International Airport, kuKentucky, ichange yave kudaidzwa kuti Louisville Muhammad Ali International Airport. Meya veguta iri, VaGreg Fischer, vanoti Muhammad Ali aive munhu wevanhu pasi pose asi guta rake raive rimwe chete, reLouisville. Muhammad Ali, uyo aitya zvikuru kufamba nendege, akashaya musi wa 3 Chikumi 2016. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinofarira mitambo yakasiyana siyana, VaTafadzwa Munjanja, vanogara kuOklahoma, vanoti zvinofadza kuona munhu achirangarirwa nekukudzwa zvakadai nekuti akaita zvinhu zvakanaka muhupenyu hwake. No media source currently available
title: Guta reLouisville muAmerica Rinopa Nhandare Yaro yeNdege Zita raMuhammad Ali

text: Mutungamiri webato reMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vapeta misangano yavo munyika mudunhu reMashonaland West paine mibvunzo yekuti vangapinde here musarudzo dzegore rinouya pasina kuvandudzwa kwemitemo yesarudzo. Kunyange hazvo vanhu vakawanda vasina dambudziko nekuita mubatira pamwe chuma chemuzukuru pasarudzo dzegore rinouya, vakawanda mubato iri vanoti VaTsvangirai ndivo vanofanirwa kutungamira mubatanidzwa uyu nemamwe mapato. Asi nyaya yatsviriridza ndeyekuti zvine hungwaru here kupinda musarudzo dzinobirwa pasina hurongwa hwekuchengetedza mavhoti evanhu sezvakamboitika musarudzo dzemuna 2008. VaTakesure Musiiwa vanoti danho rakatorwa naVaTsvangirai rekufamba nyika yose vachinzwa mafungiro akawanda, rakanaka asi vanoti zviri kubuda zvinhu zvimwe chete sezvo vanhu vari kuunganidzwa nenhengo dzavo. VaMusiiwa, avo vakapinda musangano wana chipangamazano wemuChinhoyi neSvondo, vanoti nyaya yekuti bato reMDC-T riri kuramba kupinda musarudzo dze By-Elections, sei rave kuona kupinda musarudzo dzegore rinouya sedanho rine hungwaru. VaMusiiwa vanoti hapana chashanduka uye chinoshanduka panyaya dzesarudzo muZimbabwe. VaTsvangirai varamba kutaura nevatori venhau vachiti vanofanirwa kutanga vatura zvavakawana kubva kuvanhu kumakurukota avo pamwe neNational Council. Asi mutauriri waVaTsvangirai, VaLuke Tambarinyoka, vanoti vachaita hondo chaiyo neZanu PF kuti ivandudze mitemo yesarudzo. VaTamborinyoka vanoti hondo yavo iri kutanga musiwa 22 Kurume apo vacharatidzira pamusoro pekuti mitemo yesarudzo ivandudzwe. VaTamborinyoka vati manyepo ekuti vanhu vaipinda misangano yaVaTsvangirai vaikokerwa nenhengo dzavo asi vati waikokerwa nebazi ravo rinoona nezveruzhinji (Public Relations). VaTamborinyoka vati VaTsvangirai vachatura zvakabva muvanhu kuhutungamiri hwebato kuitira kuti vabude negwara. No media source currently available
title: VaTsvangirai Vanopeta Misangano Yavo muMashonaland West

text: Ongororo ichangobva mukuitwa nerimwe sangano rinoongorora sarudzo reElection Resource Centre, ERC, inoratidza kuti huwandu hwevanhu vari kunyoresa kuvhota munyika huri kudzikira nekuti hapana dzidziso pamusoro pekukosha kwakaita kuvhota. Vachiparura muHarare neChina zvakabuda muongorora yavakaita pasurodza dzema By-Election dzese dzakaitwa muna 2019, vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa muERC, VaSolomon Bobosibunu, vati ongororo yavakaita inoratidza kuti huwandu hwevanhu vari kunyoresa kuvhota huri kudzikira kana zvichienzaniswa nevanhu vakanyorea kuvhota muna 2018. Vati kunyoresa kuvhota kunoitwa nguva yese zvisinei kuti kunze sarudzo here kana kuti kwete, asi vanhu havasi kuita izvi. Vati mumatunhu eMtoko neMarondera makanyoresa vanhu makumi maviri chete, mumatunhu eChegutu neSanyati makanyoresa vanhu gumi chete uye kuGoromomonzi hapana kana munhu mumwe chete akanyoresa kuvhota gore rese. VaBobosibunu vati izvi zvinoreva kuti komisheni yesarudzo, yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, masangano anoshanda akazvimirira pamwe nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika haasi kushanda nemazvo kupa vanhu dzidziso munyaya yesarudzo. Vati ZEC, mapato ezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira anokurudzira vanhu kuvhota chete panguva yesarudzo. Vati huwandu hwevanhu vanovhota hugona kukwira zvakanyaya kana izvi zvikaitwa nguva yese. Vatiwo imwe nyaya isina kujeka inyaya yekutarwa kwemiganhu yeConstituency nemaWard ekuvhotera uye zvakakosha kuti izvi zviitwe pajekerere kuitira kuti zvisazokanganisa veruzhinji musarudzo dzinotevera. Imwe nhengo yeNational Executive yebato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance, uye vaimbove munyori anoona nezvesarudzo mubato iri, VaJacob Mafume vaudza Studio7 kuti ZEC inofanira kufambirana nenguva nekushandisa michina yechizvino zvino kuitira kuti vanhu vakwanise kunyoresa vari kudzimba dzavo. VaMafume ndivo meya weHarare pari zvino. Asi mukuru wekufambiswa kwesarudzo muZEC, VaUtoile Silaigwana, vati pari zvino mutemo wesarudzo unosungira kuti munhu aende kumahofisi avo kuti andonyoresa sezvo munhu achifanira kutorwa mifananidzo nemaFinger Prints. Vati nekuda kwaizvozvo vanhu havakwanisi kunyoresa kuvhota vari kumba kana kumahofisi avo. Pasi pemitemo yenyika,kana yaye nguva yesarudzo, ZEC inovhura nzvimbo dzakawanda dzekunyoresa kuvhota muzvikoro nemahofisi ehurumende munzvimbo dzakawanda munyika yese. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZanu PF panyaya iyi. Asi munyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa mubazi revechidiki mubato iri, VaMabuto Moyo, vati bato ravo rinogara richikurudzira nhengo dzaro kunyorese kuvhota zvikurusei vechidiki. Ongororo yeERC inoratidzawo kuti vanhu vekumaruwa vakawanda vanonyoresa kuvhota kudarika vanhu vemumadhorobha. No media source currently available
title: Election Resource Centre Inoti Vanhu Vashoma Zvikuru Ndivo Vanyoresa Kuvhota muNyika

text: Sangano reApex Council rinoti masangano evashandi vehurumende achiri mushishi yekunzwa pfungwa dzevashandi pamusoro pehurongwa hwehurumende hwekuda kufanopa mushandi mumwe nemumwe zana remadhora semari yekufambisa kusvika vashandi vatambira mihoro yavo. Izvi zvinotevera kukundikana kubuda nechisungo kwemapoka maviri aya pamusangano wakaitwa neMuvhuro muHarare, izvo zvakaita kuti masangano evashandi ose ari gumi nematatu adzokere kunhego dzawo kunonzwa kuti dzinotambira here kana kuramba chikumbiro chehurumende chekuti dzifanopiwa zana remadhora. Sachigaro weApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander vanoti vane hurongwa hwekusangana nevashandi vose vehurumende neMugovera kuti vanzwewo pfungwa dzavo pamusoro penyaya dzemihoro idzi. "Nhengo dzemasangano edu ndidzo dzichatipa gwara. Izvozvi taronga kuti tiite musangano navo neMugovera, tivape mukana wekuti vataure pfungwa dzavo," Amai Alexander vanodaro. Mamwe masangano evashandi vehurumende akaita sereRural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe akatozivisa kare kuti nhengo dzawo hadzisi kuzotambira zana remadhora riri kuda kupiwa nehurumende iri. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veHurumende Vozeya Kuti Votambira Here Mari dzeKufambisa Vasati Vawava Mihoro Yavo

text: Bato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rinoti zvakaitwa negurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaSavior Kasukuwere, zvekumbomisa makanzura eChitungwiza basa, zviri kunze kwemutemo. Mutauriri webato rinopikisa iri, VaObert Gutu, vanoti VaKasukuwere vakamhanyira kumedza kutsenga vachada, vasina kutanga vapa makanzura aya mikana yekuti vazvichenure kana kuzvisunga nenyaya sezvinodiwa nemitemo inobata makanzuru. Bato iri rinoti chikonzero chaicho chakaita kuti VaKasukuwere vamise makanzura aya basa hachisi chekuti pane humbowo hwuzere hwekuti vakaita zvehuwori, asi kuti vari kuda kunyaradza vanhu vari mukanzuru iyi avo vavanofunga kuti vari kune rimwe divi muhondo dzavakatarisana nadzo mubato ravo reZanu PF. VaKasukuwere neChina vakamisa basa makanzura ose eChitungwiza, kusanganisira nameya, VaPhilip Mutoti, vakaisa komisheni ine vanhu vatatu ichitungamirwa naVaMadzudzo Pawadyira, kuti imbofambisa basa. VaMutoti vakatenda kuti vakanga vamiswa basa vachipomerwa mhosva yekusafambisa zvakanaka mari dzekanzuru, vachiti vakapiwa svondo rimwe chete rekupa divi ravo pamhosva yavari kupomerwa iyi. VaMutoti vanoti kanzuru yavo yakashandisa mari yekubhadhara vashandi vayo avo vakanga vava nemwedzi yakawanda vasingatambiriswe. Vanoti vakatora danho rekuzivisa VaKasukuwere vakashandisa mari iyi mushure mekunge vaudzwa kuti VaKasukuwere vainge vazvibvumidza. Asi vanoti vakazishamiswa vonzwa kuti VaKasukuwere vainge vasina kusumwa sezvinodiwa nemitemo yemakanzuru. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata VaKasukuwere kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: MDC-T Inoti VaKasukuwere Vakatyora Mutemo Apo Vakambomisa Makanzuru eChitungwiza

text: Masangano evarairidzi anoti reProgressive Teachers Union (PTUZ) nere Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe anoti ari kuronga kuramwa mabasa mushure mekunge bazi rezvehupfumi razivisa kuti vamwe vashandi vehurumende havasi kuzotambiriswa mari mwedzi uno. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvehupfumi Dr Willard Manungo vakatumira tsamba kuyvashandi vose vehurumende vachizivisa nezvekuchinjwa kwemazuva avo ekutambiriswa mari dzemihoro. Mutsamba iyi Dr Manungo vakati varairidzi, vari pamudyandigere nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vaizotambiriswa muna Chikunguru. Varairidzi vachitambiriswa musi wa 7 Chikunguru, vari pamudyandigere vachitambiriswa musi wa 19 Chikunguru. Mauto anonzi achatambiriswa musi wa 27 Chikumi uye maparisa achitambira musi wa 30 Chikumi. Hatina kukwanisa kubata Dr Manungo sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Bazi reZimbabwe Revenue Authority kana kuti Zimra riri kukundikana kuwana mari yakawanda kubva kumitero sezvo makambani akawanda apera kuvharwa. Izvi zvapa kuti hurumende ikundikana kuunganidza mari yekubhadhara vashandi. Mutungamiri wePTUZ Dr Takavafira Zhou vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachakurudzira varairidzi vamire kuenda kunodzidzisa mukupera kwemwedzi kana mari yavo yebhazi yapera. Rimwe sangano revarairidzi reRural Teachers Union ratiwo musi wa 30 Chikumi vachaenda kumahofi egurukota rezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vachikurudzira kuti ngavasiye basa nekuti vakundikana mabasa. Sangano iri rati hurumende iripo yakundikana basa. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yokundikana Kubhadhara Vashandi Avo Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa

text: Svondo rino muchironga chedu chatinotarisa zviri kuitwa nevana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika, tine hurukuro naVaTakawira Kapikinyu, vanobva kwaMutoko mudunhu reMashonaland East. VaKapikinyu, avo vari mudunhu reMaryland muAmerica, vanoshanda kune rimwe sangano rinobatsira varombo pasi rose vachishandira vari muWashington D.C. .Vakadzidza muzvikoro zvakasiyanasiyana kusanganisira pachikoro chepamusorosoro chemuZimbabwe, che University of Zimbabwe, uko vakaita dhigirii ravo rekutanga vakazoita zvakare rimwe repamusoro reMasters’. Vakazouya kuno kuAmerica vachishanda nerimwe sangano, vachizoenderera mberi nedzidzo yavo zvakare. Pari zvino VaKapikinyu vari kushandawo zvakare nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvinobatsira vari kumusha zviri pasi pesangano reCitizens' Initiative, uye ivo pachavo vanobatsirawo vanhu vakasiyanasiyana vachivabhadharira mari dzechikoro. VaKapikinyu vanoti chishuwo chavo chikuru ndechekuona zvinhu zvichigadzirisika kumusha mune zvematongerwo enyika pamwe nezvehupfumi, uye kuona vana veZimbabwe vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika akasiyanasiyana vachiwirirana nekushanda pamwe. No media source currently available
title: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri Kunze, VaTakawira Kapikinyu, Voshuvira Kuti Zvinhu Zvinake kuMusha

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwemukati menyika, VaObert Mpofu, vatenda kuti vachapa vashandi veZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, mvumo yekuti vatorese mhiko kuvanhu vanenge vachida kunyoresa kuvhota svondo rino. VaMpofu vaudza Studio 7 kuti izvi zvichaitwa kuburikidza neGovernment Gazette. Izvi zvinotevera chikumbiro chakaitwa nasachigaro weZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, mushure mekunge vanhu vakawanda vachema chema kuti pavanoenda kunonyoresa kuvhota panenge pasina vanhu vanovatoresa mhiko. Amai Makarau vati pachikamu chekutanga vakanyoresa vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana maviri. Vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti vachakwanisa kunyoresa vanhu mamiriyoni manomwe panopera chirongwa ichi. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veZEC Votarisira Kupihwa Mvumo yeKutoresa Vanhu Mhiko

text: Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti danho rakatorwa nemutungamiri weMDC Alliance rekuvandudza hutungamiri hwebato iri pamberi pesarudzo dza2023 chinhu chakanaka chose uye zvinoratidza kuti bato iri hharisati rapera kunyange hazvo riri kuedza kumbuchikidzwa neZanu PF. Izvi zvinotevera danho raVaChamisa svondo rapera neChishanu revakavandudza hutungamiri hwemakomiti epamusoro mubato ravo eNational Standing pamwe neNational Executive. Vamwe vanonzi vakapinzwa muNational Standing Committee vanosanganisira VaLast Maengahama, avo vakadomwa semunyori anoona nezvegwara remusangano kana kuti Policy and Research, vachitevedzerwa naAmai Jesman Tofa. VaMaengahama vakaita makore akawanda vari muhusungwa vachipoerwa mhosva yekuuraya mupurisa, VaPetros Mutedza, asi vakazochenurwa nematare edzimhosva. VaDaniel Molokele vanonzi vakadomwa kuve mutevedzeri wemubati wehomwe, kuchitiwo VaOstalos Siziba vachidomwa kuve mumwe wevatevedzeri vemunyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, chigaro chaive naVaClifford Hlatywayo. VaHlatywayo vanonzi vakapiwa bazi idzva rinoona nezvezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika, kana kuti Diaspora Affairs and Operations. Vamwe vakapinda muNational Executive Committee yeMDC Alliance vanosanganisira VaPromise Mkwananzi, VaLlewellin Sibanda, VaJames Gumbi, naVaCaston Matewu. Mutauriri waVasChamisa, Doctor Nkululeko Sibanda vati vanga vasati vave kukwanisa kutaura nezvenyaya iyi sezvo hurongwa hwekuvandudza hutungamiri uhwu huchiri kuenderera mberi husati hwapetwa. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaRerjoice Ngwenya, vanoti zvakaitwa naVaChamisa chinhu chakakosha zvikuru kuvandudza bato ravo pamberi pesarudzo sezvo izvi zvichisimbisa bato ravo pamberi pesarudzo dza2023. VaNgwenya vanoti chakanaka chakaitwa naVaChamisa kusanganisa vechidiki nevechikuru vanehunyanzvi mukufambiswa kwemabasa mubato iri. Panyaya yekuumbwa kwebazi reDiaspora Affairs and Operations, VaNgwenya vanoti MDC Alliance inofanirwa kuchiratidza musiyano neZanu PF nekubatsira vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika nekuzadzisa zvichemo zvavo zvakaita sekuvhota zviri munyika dzazvigere kuburikidza nekuenda kumasangano akaita seUnited Nations, African Union neSADC. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaChamisa,Vanovandudza Hutungamiri hwePamusoro muBato Ravo

text: Dare repamusorosoro, reConstitutional Court, rinobvisa chikamu cheSection 121 chemutemo weCriminal Procedure and Evidence Act icho chaipa vachuchisi masimba ekunyima vanhu mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. Pope Francis votaura kuzviuru zvevanhu pamuzinda weWhite House muAmerica. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vosvika muNew York kumusangano weUnited Nations. Mutevedzeri wameya weguta reHarare, VaThomas Muzuva vanoshaya. Muchirongwa cheLiveTalk na 8:30 pm. Tiri kutarisa nezvemutongo weConsitutional Court wekubvisa chikamu 121 chemutemo weCriminal Procedure and Evidence Act. Iyi ndiyo mimwe yemisoro yenhau dzanhasi…… Musakanganwa kuti munokwanisa kutibata pa 909 AM, 4930, kana pa 12080, ne15460 Kilohertz Shortwave kana paFacebook peji yeVOA Shona. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau, Chitatu 23 Gunyana, 2015

text: No media source currently available Mumwe wevatungamiri vekambani yeChjaa Enterprise, Muzvare Celia Rukato, vanoti vari kufara nekupfekwa kwakaitwa scarf yakagadzirwa nekambani yavo, nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, apo vange vari kumusangano weDavos. Muzvare Rukato vanoti vari kuwana bhizinesi rakawanda kubva kune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. VaMnangangwa vakapfeka scarf iyi pose pavaibuda vari kuDavos izvo zvakaita kuti vanhu vakawanda vataure zvakasiyana siyana pamusoro payo zvikuru pamadandemutande. Vamwe vaiti VaMnangagwa vakaratidza rudo rwavo rwenyika uye vakaratidza rutsigiro rwavo vemabhizinesi madiki. Asi vamwe vaishora vachiti zvanga zvirinani dayi vakozopfeka scarf iyi pane imwe nguva sezvo pasi rose range rakatarisa zvaibuda kubva kumusangano uyu. Muzvare Rukato vanoti kambani yavo inoita mamwe mabasa ekugadzira machira anocherechedza nyika yeZimbabwe. "Takafara chaizvo kuwona VaMnangagwa vakapfeka scarf yedu sezvo izvi zvaita kuti bhizinesi redu ribudirire. Parizvino vanhu vazhinji varikufona vachida kutenga mascarf edu," Muzvare Rukato vaudza Studio 7. Muzvare Rukato vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti vagadzirise scarf yavo zvichitevera kurudziro yavari kuwana kubva kune veruzhinji. Muzvare Rukato vanoti pavakaendese zvinhu zvavanogadzira kumahofisi anowona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, havana kuziva kuti zvichabudirira kuti mutungamiri wenyika apfeke scarf yavo. Muzvare Rukato vanoti chidzidzo chavakawana pane zvakaitika ndezvekuti vanhu vanofanirwa kushinga kunyange zvinhu zvikawoma nekuti remangwana harizivikanwe kuti rinenge rakamira seyi. Muzvare Rukato vanoti kushinga kwavo nekuzvininipisa kwave kubhadhara pari zvino kuburikidza nevanhu vari kuuya kuzotenga zvavanogadzira.
title: Sikhavha Yakapfekwa naVaMnangagwa kuDavos Yopa Pundutso kuMugadziri Wayo

text: Sangano reNational Transitional Justice Working Group rinoti harisi kufara nemashoko ehurumende ekuti haisi kuzosunga vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuuraya nekukuvadza vanhu kuMidlands nekuMatabeleland munguva yeGukurahundi. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko egurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi kumusangano wekomiti yenyika dzepasi rose yeUnited Nations inoona nezvekubviswa kwerusaruganda kana UN Committee on the Elimination of Racial Discrimination uri kuitirwa kuGeneva kuSwitzerland. Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weNational Transitional Justice Working Group, VaDzikamai Bere, vaudza vatori venhau muHarare nhasi kuti mashoko aVaZiyambi anotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinopa simba rekugadzirisa nyaya dzemakakatanwa anenge ari munyika kukomisheni inoona nezvekupodzwa kwemaronda yeNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission. Vachitaura kumusangano weUnited Nation uyu, VaZiyambi vakati hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa haisi kuzosunga vanhu vari kupomerwa mhosva dzekuuraya kana kukuvadza vanhu munguva yeGukurahundi nokuti vanhu ava vakanga vakaregererwa kare munguva yehutongi hwamushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe. VaZiyambi vakati vanhu vakapara mhosva munguva yeGukurahundi vakaregererwa mushure mekunge mapato ezvematongerwo anoti Zanu PF neZapu anyorerana chibvumirano chekubatana cheUnity Accord icho chakasainiranwa muna 1987. VaMugabe vakozivisa kuti vakapara mhosva munguva yeGukurahundi vakanga vavaregerera kubudikidza nemuetemo weClemency Order Number 1 of 1990 wakadzikwa naivo VaMugabe. Mashoko aVaZiyambi kumusangano weUN uyu ashorwawo nesangano reIbetshu likaZulu. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano iri, VaMbuso Fuzwayo, vaudza Studio 7 vari kuBulawayo kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaMnangagwa vanofanira kutsiura VaZiyambi pamusoro pemashoko avo aya. Bato reZapu, varwi vehonndo veZIPRA nemamwe masangano akashora zvikuru VaZiyambi uye kumusangano uyu, vakuru veUnited Nations vakati kusapodzwa kwemaronda eGurukurahundi kuri kupa kuti kuyanyana kunetse munyika. Mutungamiri wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reAmnesty International Zimbabwe, Amai Lucia Masuka Zanhi, vakurudzira hurumende kuti ipe komisheni yeNPRC mukana wekuita basa rayo yakasununguka. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rasachigaro weNPRC, Justice Selo Nare, sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Zvichakadai, VaBere vati hama dzevakafa pamwe neavo vakakuvara munguva yeGukurahundi vanofanira kuti varipwe senzira yekugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaRashweat Mukundu, vati mashoko aVaZiyambi anotyora bumbiro remitemo. Gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vati vanga vabatikana kuti vataure nesu nezvenyaya iyi uye gurukota rinoona nezvinoitika mukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Ongororo yakaitwa neCatholic Commission for Justice and Peace yakaburitsa pachena kuti vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri vakafa munguva yeGukurahundi uye vamwe vakawanda vakakuvadzwa.
title: Vakawanda Voshora VaZiyambi neMashoko Avo kuGeneva nezveGukurahundi

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neChitatu vakadoma chikwata chevanhu makumi maviri nevatanhatu chichashanda sezvipangamazano zvavo, kana kuti 'Presidential Advisory Council'. Asi vamwe vanhu vakadomwa vanoti vange vasati vaudzwa zviri pamutemo, uye vamwe vakaita semunyori mukuru weZimbabwe Council of Churches, Doctor Kenneth Mtata, vanoti vakadomwa havo asi pari zvino havaone zvakakodzera kuti vaite basa iri nekuti vakawandirwa nemamwe mabasa. Munyori mukuru mudare remakurukota Doctor Misheck Sibanda vakazivisa vatori venhau kuti VaMnangagwa vainge vadoma vanhu vanotevera kuti kupinda mukanzuru iyi: Amai Divine Ndhlukula, Muridzi weZimbabwe Independent neNewsday VaTrevor Ncube, nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri weAfrican Development Bank VaThomas Zondo Sakala. VaSibusiso Moyo, VaJoe Mtizwa, VaLewis Maxwell Musasike, Dr. Nobert Mugwagwa, Dr. Godfrey Sikipa, VaRemigius Makumbe, VaSimbarashe Mangwengwende, Dr Lindiwe Sibanda, VaAenias Chuma, VaEdwin Manikai, VaSam Malaba, Muzvinafundo Kuzvinetsa Nzvimbo, Amai Natalie Jabangwe, Amai Janah Ncube, Dr Shingi Munyeza, VaSimon Hammond, VaRichard Wilde, VaKudakwashe Tagwirei, Muzvinafundo Robson Mafoti, VaMfaro Moyo, VaElisa Ravengai naVaHerbert Nkala ndevamwe vari muchikwata ichi. No media source currently available Muzvinabhizimisi vari nhengo yeZanu-PF VaGilbert Muponda vanoramba maonero evanwe ekuti VaMnangagwa vakazadza chikwata ichi neshamwari dzavo dzinosanganisira VaTagwirei nevamwe, vachiti zvakaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika ndizvo chaizvo sezvo vakatora vanhu vane hunyanzvi hwakasiyanasiyana. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachiita zvidzidzo zvepamusorosoro paUniversity of Johannesburg muSouth Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya vanoti nyika kaina dambudziko rezvipangamazano kwete, asi kuti ine dambudziko rehutongi. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weNyika VaMnangagwa Vanodoma Chikwata chaVanachipangamazano

text: Mapurisa neMuvhuro akasunga mutauriri webato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance Muzvare Fadzai Mahere richivapomera mhosva yekuda kukurudzira vanhu kuita mhirizhonga inova mhosva iri kupomerwa mutevedzeri wasachigaro webato iri VaJob Sikhala uye mutori wenhau Hopwell Chin’ono vachinzi vakagovera vhidhiyo yaiti pane mupurisa akarova mwana nemboma akafa iri kunzi nemapurisa handi yechokwadi. Sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights raburitsa mashoko paTwitter richiti Muzvare Mahere vakachengetwa pakamba yeHarare Central uye vapomerwa mhosva yekutyora chikamu chemutemo uri kunzi wakatyorwa naChin’ono naVaSikhala. Asi magweta anoti mhosva yakadai yakatombonzi nedare inotyora bumbiro remitemo. VaSikhala naVaChin’ono vakamiswa pamberi pedare neMuvhuro. Dare ramejasitiriti rakanzwa chikumbiro chekuti nyaya Chin’ono yekuburitsa manyepo iraswe ukuwo rimwe gweta rake uye Va Sikhala, vamiswawo pamberi pedare vachipomerwa mhosva imwe cheteyo. Vachisvitsa chikumbiro ichi kudare, rimwe remagweta aChin’ono, VaHarrison Nkomo, vaudza dare kuti chikamu chemutemo chiri kushandiswa nehurumende kupomera Chin’ono mhosva chakanzi nedare repamusorosoro munyika reConstitutional Court hachizi pamutemo saka nokudaro Chin’ono haafanire kutombomiswa pamberi pedare. Asi muchuchisi panyaya iyi, Amai Nancy Chandakaona, vaudza dare kuti kunyange hazvo dare repamusorosoro rakarasa chikamu 31 chemutemo we Criminal Law Codification and Reforms Act muna 2014 richiti hachina kunangana nebumbiro remutemo raivepo bumbiro idzva risati ratambirwa neveruzhinji muna 2013, kodzero dzekuti munhu ataure zvaanoda dzine padzinogumira pasi pemitemo iripo parizvino. Mutongi wedare, VaLanzini Ncube, vambenge vati vachatura mutongo panyaya iyi neMuvhuro masikati asi vazoti magweta aChin’ono aenderere mberi neChipiri nekupa zvimwe zvikonzero zvekuti sei Chin’ono achiti nyaya yaari kupomerwa inofanira kuraswa. VaNcube vaturawo mutongo wekuti Chin’ono apihwe magumbeze anodziya pamwe nemvura inopisa ari kujeri uko kwaari kugara pake ega senzira yekutevedzera zvakatarwa nesangano reWorld Health Organization kuti munhu anenge asangana nemunhu ane chirwere cheCovid 19 anofanira kkuzvibvisa kubva kuruzhinji sezvo achiti anogona kunge akabatira chirwere cheCovid 19 mushure mekusangana nevanhu vane chirwere ichi kuSouth Africa. VaNkomo vatenda kuti izvi ndizvo zvaitika mudare. Zvichakadaro, VaSikhala, vamiswawo pamberi pedare vachipomerwa mhosva yakafanana neiri kupomerwa Chin’ono pamwe nekunzi vakakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vapandukire hurumende kuburikidza nemashoko avanonzi vakanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter. Gweta ravo, VaJeremiah Bhamu vasvitsa zvichemo kudare kuti VaSikhala vakagariswa mutirongo makambogariswa Chin’ono pakamba yemapurisa kunyange hazvo Chin’ono akaudza mapurisa kuti akange asangana nevanhu vaviri kuSouth Africa vakazowanikwa vaine chirwere cheCovid 19. VaBamu vati izvi zvakaita kuti pave nemukana wekuti VaSikhala vabatire chirwere cheCovid 19 sezvo mutirongo umu musina kumwaiwa mushonga kubva pakabuda Chin’ono uyo anoti haasati aongororwa nanachiremba kuti ane chirwere cheCovid 19 here kana kuti kwete. VaBamu vaudzawo dare kuti VaSikhala vari kushungurudzwa nehurumende nekuti nderimwe remagweta ari kumirira Chin’ono sezvo vakaenda kukamba yemapurisa pakasungwa Chin’ono vakabvunza mapurisa kuti akange achivatsvaga here kana kuti kwete mushure mekunge vanzwa runyerekupe rwekuti mapurisa aivatsvaga. VaBamu vati mapurisa akati akanga asiri kutsvaga VaSikhala asi vakazoshamisika VaSikhala vave kusungwa neMugovera vachibuda mudare nenyaya yaChin’ono.  Asi mutongi wedare, VaNgoni Nduna, vati nyaya iyi idzoke kudare mangwana sezvo nguva yanga yapera. VaBamu vatenda kuti izvi ndizvo zvataurwa nemutongi. VaSikhala pachavo vaudza Studio 7 vasati vapinda mudare kusungwa kwavo kunoratidza kuti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa yakazvipira kusunga vose vanoipikisa. Chin’ono naVaSikhala vakasungwa mushure mekunyora pamadandemutande avo eTwitter vachitsoropodza kurohwa kunonzi kwakaitwa mumwe mwana ane mwedzi mipfumbamwe nemboma nemumwe mupurisa akafa zvichitevera vhidhiyo yaitenderera paindaneti. Asi mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, vazoburitsa mashoko svondo rapera vachiti mwana uyu haana kufa kana kukuvara zvakazoita kuti mapurisa asunge Chin’ono naVaSikhala achiti vaburitsa zvinhu zvisiri zvechokwadi. No media source currently available
title: Mutauriri weMDC Alliance Muzvare Fadzai Mahere Osungwa neMhosva Imwe Chete Yakapomerwa VaSikhala naChin'ono

text: Vaimbova senator muAmerica VaOrrin G. Hatch, vakava nhengo yebato remaRepublicans yakava mudare reSenate kwenguva yakarebesa kudarika vamwe vose vashaya. VaHatch vaimirira dunhu reUtah uye vange vave nemakore makumi masere nemasere. Vakaenda pamudyandigere muna 2019 chigaro chavo chichibva chatorwa nevakambokwikwidza sarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaMitt Romney avo vakakundwa navaBarack Obama muna 2012. VaHatch vaizivikanwa nekushandawo nebato remaDemocrats kudzika mitemo yakawand. Vaiimbawo nziyo dzechitendero mukereke yavo yeThe Church of Jesus Crist of Latter Day Saints. Vasiya mudzimai nevana vatanhatu. (AP)
title: Vaimbova Senator muAmerica VaHatch Vashaya

text: Vanhu vakawanda vari kumaruwa vanoti vari kutadza kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 sezvo vari kure nenzvimbo dziri kubayirwa vanhu nhomba. Mugari wekuShurugwi kuModlands, VaGreyham Gavi, vati vari kunetsekana kuwana nhomba yepirikuchipatara chiri pedyo navo cheZvamawande. Kuchipatara cheTongogara chiri kuShurugwi zvakare vamwe vanga vaendako vatiwo vashayawo nhomba yepiri yeSinovac. Mumwe mugari wekoShurugwi, VaCleopas Bhunu, vatiwokumboshaikwa kwenhomba dzeCovid-19 kunoodza moyo sezvo vanhu vanenge vafamba mitunhu mirefu kuenda kuzvipatara. VaBhunu vatiwo dai hurumende yakwanisa kuisa vanhu vanofamba vachibaya vanhu mumisha yevanhu vachiti kwavanogara kune vanhu vakawanda vasingakwanisi kufamba kuenda kuzvipatara nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vari mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti zvinenge zvakanaka kana hurumenfe ikapinza vanhu mumisha vachibaya vagarI nhomba yeCovid-19. Vaimboveve gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, VaHenry Madzorera, vatiwo kana hurumende ikakwanisa kuswededza vanobaya kumisha inogara veruzhinji kusanganisira kumaruwa, zvinogona kubatsira mukuwedzera huwandu hwevanobayiwa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvehutano nenzvenyaya iri kukurudzirwa iyi sezvo tatadza kubata mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, VaJohn Mangwiro, pamwe nemutauriri webazi iri, VaDonald Mujiri. Asi hurumende inotiine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Hurumende inotiwo kubva nhasi kusvika neMugovera ichange ichitambira nhomba yeSinopharm ine huwandu hwakasiyana siyana asi yese pamwe chete iri miriyoni nechidimbu. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti Covid-19 yakauraya vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu, uye vanhu mazana mana nemakumi mashanu nevaviri vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nechimwe nemazana mana makumi mapfumbamwenevasere (121 498), uye vafa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zvinanezana nemakumi masere nemumwe, (4 181). Vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika yese vave pamamiriyoni mavirinezvuru zana zvine makumi mapfumbamwe nezvitatunemazana matatu nemakumi mananevatanhatu(2 193346). Vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave miriyoni nezvuru mazana matatunemakumi mana nezvisere nemazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nevana(1 348 374). No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kupinda Muvanhu Ichivabaya Nhomba yeCovid-19

text: Mutumbi wevaive mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaGeorge Herbert Walker Bush uri kurara mudare reparamende reAmerica kana kuti Capitol Hill muWashington DC kuti vanhu vauye kuzoonekana navo. VaBush, vane mwana akambotungamirawo America anonzi zvekare George Bush. Mufi akatungamira America kubva muna 1989 kusvika 1993. Vakamboitawo mutevedzeri waVaRonald Reagan vakatungamira America kubva muna 1981 kusvika muna 1989. Kubva muna 1990 kusvika 1991 VaBush vakatungamira hondo yekutanga neIraq kana kuti First Gulf War apo vakarwisa nyika iyi mushure mekupamba kwayainge yaita nyika yeKuwait. VaBush vakashaya nemusi weChishanu mushure mekurwara kwenguva yakareba uye vacharadzikwa kuTexas. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muno muAmerica VaTaka Kapikinyu vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane zvizhinji zvingadzidzwe neZimbabwe mukurangarira vatungamiri venyika vanenge vashaika vachiti zvinhu zvemuAmerica zvakarongeka uye zvinosiya nhoroondo yakasimba. No media source currently available
title: Mutumbi waVaGeorge H.W Bush Wosvika muWashington DC

text: Panguva ino gore rapfuura, mauto eZimbabwe Defence Forces akatanga kupinda mumigwagwa achibvisa vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pachigaro uye akatsigirwa nevanhu vakawanda kubva kumapato akawanda ezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nemamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira. Zvinhu zvainge zvakaita manyama amire nerongo muhurumende nemubato riri kutonga reZanu PF umo vanhu vainge vave kudzingwa basa zuva nezuva. Vanhu vakaita semutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vainge vadzingwa basa semumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika vakanopotera kuSouth Africa. Vakawanda vainge vadzingwa mubato iri uye VaMugabe nemudzimai wavo Amai Grace Mugabe vanonzi nevamwe mubato iri vainge voita madiro aJojina mubato nemuhurumende. Izvi zvakazoita kuti mauto apindire achiti aida kugadzirisa zvinhu mubato nemunyika. Veruzhinji vakatsigira danho iri vakapinda mumigwagwa sezvo vainge vaneta nehutongo hwaVaMugabe. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vanoti pakapimba mauto mumigwagwa vakambotadza kuziva kuti chii chaiitika asi vakazofara apo vakaziva kuti chaive chirongwa chekubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro. Vanoti havasi kufara nezvavakuitika pari zvino sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichioma munyika. Amai Winnie Dongo vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo VaMugabe vakabviswa pachigaro nechisimba, vakazvifarira nekuti vaiona sekuti zvaita kuti vagare zvakanaka. Muzvare Melanie Moyo vaudza Studio 7 kuti mufaro wakaita muna Mbudzi gore rapfuura munyika nekuda kwekuoma kwaita hupenyu. Vanoti semaonero avo, hapana chashanduka uye vave kutotya mauto zvichitevera kupfuura kwaikaita vanhu muHarare musi wa1 Nyamavhuvhu. Asi VaHilary Shumba vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nemauto muna Mbudzi gore rapfuura vanhu vasungunuka zvakanyanya munyika. Vatiwo nyika yakaita sarudzo dzakachena ikakoka vekunze izvo zvange zvisingaitwe nehurumemende yaVaMugabe. VaShumba vati zviri pachena kuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa iri kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nekugadziridza hukama hwayo nedzimwe nyika. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaBekezela Gumbo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanonzwisisa kuti sei vanhu vasiri kufara nekuti pamwe zvimwe zvakavimbiswa zvisina kuitwa. VaGumbo vati zviri pachena kuti matambudziko akaita sekushaikwa kwemari pamwe nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu akatowedzera pasi hurumende iripo. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vopa Pfungwa Dzavo Papera Gore Mauto Abvisa VaMugabe Pachigaro

text: Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaDewa Mavhinga varadzikwa kumusha kwavo kwaHwirisha kuChivhu nemusi weSvondo. VaMavhinga vakashaya musi wa 4 Zvita kuSouth Africa uye vange vave nemakore makumi mana nemaviri. Vamwe vainge vari pakuvigwa kwaVaMavhinga vanosanganisira mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa uye mutungamiri werimwe bato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku. Vakuru vemasangano akazvimirira akawanda nevamwe vanhu vakange vari pakuradzikwa kwaVaMavhinga. Mushakabvu ainge ari mutungamiri wesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica uye asiya mudzimai Amai Fiona Mavhinga, nevana vana. VaMavhinga vakadzidzira zvemutemo paUniversity of Zimbabwe. Mushakabvu aizivikanwa nekubatsira varombo kunyanya vanenge vatyorerwa kodzero dzavo. Vaitaura vasingaite zvekuruma vachifuridzira. VaMavhinga vaigarawo vachitaura zvakanyanya panhepfenyuro ino yeStudio 7. ​
title: VaDewa Mavhinga Voradzikwa kuChivhu

text: Zvinhu zvinonzi hazvichina kumira zvakanaka muvashandi vehurumende zvichitevera kusawedzerwa kwemari dzemihoro yavo nehurumende, sezvavaitarisira kuti ichaita mwedzi uno. Mauto, mapurisa, majerigadhi pamwe nevarairidzi vakawana magwaro emihoro yavo yemwedzi uno vanonzi havasi kufara zvachose nekusawedzerwa kwemihoro yavo kuti ifambirane nekumwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. Mumwe mushandi wehurumende atya kudomwa zita rake, anoti mari yaanosara nayo pamwe yakatodzikira zvakanyanya mwedzi uno zvichitevera kukwidzwa kwakaitwa mari yaanobatirwa nekambani yeNyaradzo yekuti iye nemhuri yake vagozochengetedzwa zvakanaka kana vachinge vazoshaya. Mushandi uyu anoti mwedzi uno akasara aine 285.00 RTGS dollars mushure mekubviswa kwemitero nezvimwe zvaanobatirwa zvinosanganisira zvikwereti. Asi paazoenda kubhanga kwake kuti atore mari yake, azowana yave 270.00 RTGS dollars mushure mekunge bhanga ratorawo mitero yaro. Anoti chave kuraramisa vashandi vehurumende vakawanda kutengesa chero chavawana chinotengeseka. No media source currently available Munyori werimwe sangano revarairidzi, reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, VaRaymond Majongwe, vanoti varairidzi vakatsamwa chose nekusawana mari yavakanga vavimbiswa negurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Sekai Nzenza. Asi gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakabudawo munhau vachiti hurumende yakanga isina hurongwa hwekuwedzera vashandi vayo mari mwedzi uno. Ukuwo VaMajongwe vanoti havaoni nhengo dzavo dzichibudirira kuenda kumabasa svondo rinouya nekuti dzinenge dzisisakwanise kuwana mari dzekufambisa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata Amai Nzenza kanawo Muzvinafundo Ncube kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende panyaya iyi.
title: Vashandi veHurumende Votsamwiswa neKusawedzerwa Mihoro Mwedzi Uno

text:
Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kusandura maitiro ayo munyaya dzehupfumi uyewo inofanira kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo ku International Monetary Fund neWorld Bank. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kusandura maitiro ayo munyaya dzehupfumi uyewo inofanira kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo ku International Monetary Fund, IMF neWorld Bank. Vatiwo Zimbabwe inoda rubatsiro rwemari kubva kumasangano ayo kuti ikwanise kusimudzira hupfumi hwayo. Vachitaura pamusangano wekuongorora remangwana renyika munyaya dzehupfumi wange wakarongwa nesangano reIMF pamwe nebazi ravo muHarare, VaChinamasa vati tarisiro yavo ndeyekuti hupfumi hwenyika hukure nezvikamu zviri pakti pezvetanhatu negumi kubva muzana mukati memakore gumi inotevera.

Asi kuti izvi zviitike, VaChinamasa vati Zimbabwe inofanira kusandura mitemo yayo munyaya dzemabhizimisi nehupfumi.

Vati izvi zvakaoma uye zvinoda kushinga sezvo paine kukavadzana pakati pemakurukota ehurumende, vemabhizimisi pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo. Asi vati kuti nyika ifambire mberi vanhu vese vanofanira kukurudzira shanduko iyi munyaya dzehupfumi.

VaChinamasa vati kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe yakabudirira pane zvese zvaidiwa neIMF pasi pechikamu cheStaff Monitored Program, inofanira kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kuitira kuti ikwanise kuwana rumwe rutsigiro rwemari.

Asi vatiwo nyika haifaniri kungotarisira rubatsiro kubva kunze asi kuti inofanirawo kuvanduza mashandiro emabhizimisi pamwe nemimtemo inokanganisa mashandiro emabhizimisi munyika. 

Vanoti nyika yakatanga kuita izvi vakati semuenzaniso hurumende iri kugadzirisa mitemo kuti varimi vakwanise kutora zvikwereti kumabhanga pamwe nekugadzirisa nyaya dzekucherwa kwengoda nechinangwa chekuona kuti mari yese inobva muzvicherwa yabatsira nyika.

Mumashoko avo ekucherechedza makore makumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri ekuzvarwa, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakati nyika yakarasikirwa nemabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu emadhora zvicheitevera kubiwa kwemangoda akacherwa kwaMarange kuManicaland.

Mukuru webhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mangudya, vati nyika iri parwendo rwekubudirira uyewo inofanira kutengesa zvinhu zvakawanda pamwe nekusandura mashandiro anoita mabanga ayo pamwe nekuvandudza mabasa ekurima.

Vari kutungamira chikwat cheIMF chiri kushanya munyika, VaDomenico Fanissa, vatiwo Zimbabwe ine mukana mukuru wekusimudzira hupfumi hwayo uye inofanira kutanga kusandura mitemo yayo pari zvino kuti ikwanise kuwana rutsigiro kubva kumasangano akaita seIMF, World Bank neAfrican Development Bank nedzimwe nyika.

Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaTakunda Mugaga, vati mashoko abuda mumusangano waitwa akanaka chose asi chitsvambe chiri kuhurumende kuti idzike mitemo yakajeka pamwe nekurwisa huwori kuti hupfumi husimukire.

Vatiwo kushanda kuri kuita IMF nehurumende pari zvino kwakanaka chose uye kuchabatsira nyika zvikuru.

Asi muzvinabhizimisi, VaKumbirai Katsande, vatiwo kunyange hazvo mashoko aVa Chinamasa naVaMangudya akanaka chose, makurukota ehurumende anofanira kutaura nezwi rimwe uye kana paine kupokana vanofanira kutaurira muchihwande kwete kupoptedzana pachena.

Sachigaro wesangano reCrisis Coalition in Zimbabwe avo vapindwao mumusangano wanhasi, Amai Sally Dura, vatiwo gurukota rezvemari rabuda pachena kuti zvinoda mubatira pamwe kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika uye vati itariro yavo kuti vese vane chekuita nenyaya iyi vachashanda pamwe chete.

Zvichakadai, zvichitevera kubudirira pachirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program, bhodhi reIMF richagara musi wa 2 Kubvumbi kuti rizeye nyaya yekuti robatsira Zimbabwe here kana kuti kwete.

VaChinamasa vanoti kana IMF ikaramba kubatsira Zimbabwe hupfumi hwenyika hunogona kuenda kumawere kudarika zvahuri pari zvino.

Asi VaKatsande vati tariro yavo ndeyekuti zvinhu zvichafamba zvakanaka.

Zimbabwe ine chikwereti chemadhora bhiriyoni nemamiriyoni mazana masere uye kuIMF, WB neADB nechikwereti chemabhiriyoni masere kunyika dzakasiyana siyana uye kana igadzirisa nyaya dzayo neIMF inogona kutanga kukweteswa mari zvekari kunyange isati yabhadhara zvikwereti zvedzimwe nyika. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yovimbisa Kuvandudza Zvinhu Kuitira Kuti Ikwezve IMF ne World Bank

text: Mumiriri weTanzania muZimbabwe, Professor Emmanuel Mbena, vanoti nyika yavo yarasikirwa zvikuru nekushaya kwemutungamiriri wenyika yavo, VaJohn Magufuli. Asi paita muonero wakasiyana muZimbabwe vamwe vachiti mushakabvu ange ave kudzvinyirira vanhu asi vamwe vachiti vange vari mutungamiri aive negwara rakanaka pakusimudzira hupfumi wenyika yake Nekurwisa huwori. VaMbena, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMagufuli, avo vange vave nemakore makumi matanhatu nerimwe ekuzvarwa, vakashaya nezuro mushure mekurwara nemoyo, munhu aida nyika yake uye achitungamira mabasa ebudiriro zvekuti Tanzania yarasikrwa zvikuru nekushaya kwavo. Vati nhasi vawana mashoko enyaradzo kubva kubazi reZimbabwe rinoona nekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, vakuru vakuru vehurumende, vamiriri vedzimwe nyika muZimbabwe nemasangano akasiyana. Vatiwo mangwana vachavhura gwaro rekuti vanhu vanobata maoko kana kuti Book of Condolences pamuzinda weTanzania muHarare asi vati vanhu vanofanira kuenda vari vashoma pachitevedza zviga zveWorld Health Organisation nebazi rehutano muZimbabwe zvekudzvirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yeTanzania yakazivisa kuti VaMagufuli vakashaya nechirwere chemoyo, vanhu vakawandavanofungidzirwa kuti vakafa neCovid-19. VaMbena vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange VaMagufuli vaenda, havaoni hurumende yeTanzania ichatsauka pane zvavaiita nekuti matanho ese avaitora vaimaita nevamwe vavo muhurumende. Mumashoko avo padandemutande ravo reTwitter, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati vanochema nemhuri yeTanzania neAfrica nekushaya kwaVaMagufuli. Mushandi mukuru mubazi rinoona nezvekuritswa kwemashoko mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Muguti, vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti Zimbabwe yarasikirwa zvikuru sezvo Zanu PF nebato riri kutonga kuTanzania reChamachamapinduzi zviine hukana kwakadzama. Vati Tanzania yakabatsira Zimbabwe zvikuru panguva yehondo, uye hondo yapera, saka kushaya kwaVaMangufuli kwavasuwisa zvikuru. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weMDC-T, VaWitness Dube, vatiwo bato ravo rinochema neTanzania nekuvarangarira panyaya dzekurwisa huwori. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaIsrael Nyandoro, vati mufi ange riri gamba zvikuru sei pamabatiro avakaita nyaya dzeCovid-19. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, vashora mufi nemabatiro avakaita denda reCovid-19. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItayi Rusike, vati uchave mucherechedzo kuti vezvematongerwo enyika, dzisvondo, nemasangano akasiyana kuti vanofanirwa kuterera nyanzvi dzehutano panyaya dzine chekuita nezvehutano. Vanongorora nyaya dzematongerwa enyika vakazvimirira, Dr Wellington Gadzikwa, vati VaMagufuli vakatanga zvakanaka chose asi vazoshaya varashika pagwara revaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika iyi wekutanga nyika yawana rusunguko, VaMwalimi Julius Nyerere. Hurumende yekuTanzania yatara masvondo maviri ekuchema VaMagufuli uye mutevedzeri wavo, Amai Samia Suluhu Hassan, vanotarisirwa kugadzwa kuti vatore chinzvimbo chaVaMagufulki kusvika pasarudzo dzinotevera muna 2025. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Inorangarira Kushaya VaJohn Magufuli vekuTanzania

text: Apo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo dza2023, sechave chigariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga, vanhu vakawanda vave kuvamba mapato matsva ezvematongerwo enyika anopikisa. Ko izvi zvinorevei chaizvo? Svondo rapera vaimbova nhengo yeZanu-PF VaGodfrey Tsenengau vakaparura bato ravo idzva rinonzi Front For Economic Emancipation (FEEZ). VaTsenengamu vakaudza Studio7 pachirongwa cheLiveTalk kuti vanhu vachashamisika nerwutsigiro rwavachawana musarudzo dza2023 sezvo pane vamwe veruzhinji vasiri kufadzwa nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa zvinhu mumapato makuru eMDC Alliance neZanu PF. "Vazhinji vari kunditarisira pasi asi ndine hwaro hwekutsvaga rutsigiro rwune mutsindo sezvo ndakadzidza kubva kubato reZanu PF iro randanga ndiri nhengo kwenguva ndefu ndisati ndadzingwa mushure mekutaura kuti ndange ndisisa fare nemafambisiro ange ave kuitwa zvinhu nemutungamiri mutsva VaEmmerson Mnangagwa," VaTsenengamu vakaudza Studio7. Vanoti vane ruzivo rwepamusoro uye vane hwaro yekutsvetsva vatsigiri vebato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance zvekare. Muna Gunyana kwakaumbwa rimwe bato rinonzi Freedom of Rights Under Sovereign (Forus) rinotungamirwa naAmai Manyara Irene Muyenziwa. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaEarnest Mudzengi vanova mukuru weMedia Centre vanoti kuwanda kwemapato anopikisa kunogona kupatsanura mavhoti pasarudzo dza2023. No media source currently available Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwop enyika VaRejoice Ngwenya vanotungamira sangano re Coalition For Market and Liberal Solutions vanotsinhira pfungwa dzava Mudzengi vachiri kubatana kunopa mukana vanopikisa kuti vakunde. No media source currently available
title: Mapato Anopikisa Onyuka Nyika Yatarisana neSarudzo dza2023

text: Muimbi ane mukurumbira zvikuru, Thomas Mukanya Mapfumo, ari kutarisirwa kupinda munyika neChitatu achibva kuOregon, Portland, muAmerica uko ari kugara. Mapfumo ari kutarisirwawo kurova mabira emusambo wake weChimurenga munyika yose achitsigirwa nevaimbi vachiri kusimukira vakawanda kusanganisa Gary Tight naJeys Marabini. Mutauriri waMapfumo, VaBlessing Vava vaudza Studio 7 kuti Mukanya ari kutanga aenda kumusha kwake kuGuruve asati aenda kunogadzirira bira rake rekutanga kuGweru nemusi weChishanu. Mabira aya ari kuitwa pasi pekukurudzira runyararo kana kuti Peace Tour. Mapfumo ari kutarisirwawo kueda kunoridza kuBulawayo, Beitbridge, Masvingo, Mutare, Kadoma, Kariba ne Victoria Falls. Mushure mekupedza makore ari muhupoteri muAmerica, Mapfumo akambodzoka muHarare muna Kubvumbi gore rapera akaridza kuCity Sports Centre umo makapinda zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu. No media source currently available
title: Thomas Mapfumo Otarisirwa muZimbabwe Nhasi

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vasvika kuDRC kumusangano wechimakumi mana nemaviri kana kuti 42nd Ordinary Summit of the Southern African Development Community. Vatungamiri venyika gumi nenhanhatu vari kutarisirwa kumusangano uyu. Musangano uyu uri kutanga mangwana paPalais du Peuple kana kuti Parliament Building. Nyika dzinenge dziripo dzinoti Angola, Botswana, Comoros, Democratic Republic of Congo, eSwatini, Lesotho, Madagascar, Malawi, Mauritius, Mozambique, Namibia, Seychelles, South Africa, United Republic of Tanzania, Zambia ne Zimbabwe. Vamwe vakuru kubva kuAfrican Union nemamwe matunhu vari kutarisirwawo kupinda mumusangano uyu. Mutungamiri weDRC VaFélix Tshisekedi Tshilombo vari kutarisirwa kutora chigaro chekuva sachigaro weSADC kubva kuna VaLazarus Chakwera vekuMalawi. Dingindira remusangano uyu rakananga nekusimudzira hupfumi muSADC kuburikidza nemaindustry, zvirimwa uye kukwenenzvera zvicherwa zvisati zvatengeswa kunze.
title: VaMnangagwa Vosvika kuDRC kuMusangano weSADC

text: Vashandi vehurumende vari kudya marasha zvichitevera mashoko akaturwa negurukota rezvehupfumi, VaPatrick Chinamsa nemusi weChina pavaitura hurongwa hwavo hwemashandisirwo emari yehurumende hwepakati pegore, ekuti vashandi vehurumende havasi kuwana mabhonasi kwemakore maviri kutanga gore rino. VaChinamasa vakatiwo hurumende ichabata mitero pamari dzekubatsirikana, pamusoro pekugumura vashandi vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri mabasa senzira yekuchengetedza mari yavanoti iri kungoeredzwa nemihoro yevashandi vehurumende. VaChinamasa vakati zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe nezvitanhatu kubva muzana zvemari iri kuwanikwa nehurumende pari zvino zviri kuperera kumihoro yevashandi vayo, izvo zviri kuzoisiya isina mari yezvirongwa zvebudiriro.  Asi mashoko aya atambirwa nevashandi vakabata makano, vachiti hurumende inenge yazvisikira moto muziso kana yakatora matanho aya. Sangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, re Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe ratoburitsa gwaro rekukurudzira kuti VaChinamasa vasiye basa pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vasiye mabasa sezvo vakundikana kutungamira nyika. Sangano iri rinoti kana hurumende yakaenderera mberi nehurongwa hwayo uhwu, richarega kuenda kumhemberero dzezuva revarairidzi dzinoitwa munaGumiguru, senzira yekuratidza kunyunyuta kwaro. Sachigaro weApex Council Amai Cecilia Alexander vaudzawo sangano renhau reReuters kuti havasi kuzotambira hurongwa uhwu. Mutungamiri wePTUZ Doctor Takavafira Zhou vanotiwo zviri kurongwa nehurumende izvi hazvisi kuzotambirwa nevashandi sezvo isina kumbonzwawo pfungwa dzavo. "Hurumende yamutsa hondo nevashandi, yave ku attacker vashandi saka naizvozvo kana vashandi vakaona hurumende ya declare hondo kwavari vanozvidzivirira," Doctot Zhou vanodaro. Doctor Zhou vanoti hurumende ine nzira dzakawanda kwazvo dzekuderedza nadzo mari yainoshandisa, dzakaita sekudimura huwandu hwemakurukota pamwe nekubvisa mari dzekubatsirika dzinopiwa vakuru vakuru vemuhurumende. "Hurumende kana isina mari, sei ine maseneta asina zvaari kuita? sei iine ma ministers akawandisa, kana ma vice president akawandisa?" Doctor Zhou vanobvunza. Vanoti vari kusangana pasi peApex Council neMuvhuro kuti vazeye nezvenyaya iyi, vobuda nechisungo chimwechete vachitaura nezwi rimwechete. No media source currently available Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi Doctor Prosper Chitambara vesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, vanoti VaChinamasa vakaronga zvakanaka zvekuderedza mari yainoshandisa, asi vanoti panofanirwa kunge paine nhaurirano pakati pehurumende nemasangano anomirira vashandi. "Zvakataurwa (naVaChinamasa) zvizhinji zvakati nakeyi. Of course zvinenge zvichida kuti pave ne dialogue nema union especially panyaya dzekuderedzwa kwema pecks kwakuitwa kuma allowance nezvimwe zvakadaro," Doctor Chitambara vanodaro. Vanotiwo dare remakurukota renyika rakakurisa kwazvo, zvekuti panofanirwa kutorwa matanho ekuona kuti huwandu uhwu hwaderedzwa. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veHurumende Votsamwiswa neMashoko aVaChinamasa

text: Dare ramejasitiriti ratongera neChitatu ma DJ matatu kugara mujeri kwemwedzi mitanhatu mushure mekubata kwaravaita vaine mhosva yekuunganidza vanhu pavakaridza mimhanzi vakamirira kusvika kwegoredzva muHarare. Vasungwa ava, avo vanoti Arnold Kamudyariwa uyo anozivikanwa nezita rekuti DJ Fantan, muridzi wekambani inotsikisa mimhanzi yeChillspot Records, Tafadzwa Kadzimwe, uyo anozikanwa nezita remadunhurirwa rekuti Levels pamwe naTinashe Chanachimwe, uyo anozivikanwa zvikuru mune zvemimhanzi nezita rekuti Dhama, vawanikwa vaine mhosva yekutyora mirawu yeCovid 19 pamwe nemutemo wePublic Health Act. Pakutongwa kwenyaya iyi, vatatu ava vakabvuma mhosva yavaipomerwa vachiti vakanga vakaronga vanhu vavairidzira kuti vasadarike makumi mashanu sezvinotaurwa nemirawu yeCovid 19, asi vanhu vakazenge vave kungouya vachiona vachiridza mimhanzi. Mutongi wedare, Amai Vongai Muchuchuti Guwuriro, vati vatatu ava vagare mujeri kwemwedzi mitanhatu mushure mekusendeka parutivi mimwe mwedzi mitanhatu. Vati vaona zvakakodzera kuti vasungwa ava vagare mujeri sezvo vati kuvati vabhadhriswe faindi kana kushandira mahara kwechinguva kunozivikanwa nekuti community service kuchidzikisira mhosva yavakapara. Vati chirwere cheCovid 19 chiri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda pasi rose, nokudaro anotyora mitemo inobata chirwere ichi anofanorwa kurangwa zvakasimba. Mutongi wedare ati zvakaitwa nevasungwa ava zvakapinza veruzhinji munjodzi yekubatira chirwere cheCovid 19. Rimwe remagweta evasungwa ava, VaTafadzwa Hungwe, vatenda kuti izvi ndizvo zvaturwa nedare asi vati havana kufara nemutongo uyu. VaHungwe vatiwo vachakwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro vachiti kunyange hazvo mukuru wevatongi munyika akati nyaya dzichange dzichinzwikwa nematare munguva ino yekuvharwa kwenyika nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid 19 dziri nyaya dzinenge dziri dzinokodzera kunzwikwa zvechimbichimbi pamwe nedze avo vanenge vachida kutongwa vachibva kudzimba dzavo, vachatora matanho ekuti nyaya iyi inzwikwe. Veruzhinji vanga vauya kuzonzwa nyaya iyi varambidzwa kupinda mumatare senzira yekutevedzera zvakatarwa nehurumende kuti vanhu vasaungane senzira yekuedza kuderedza mukana wekutapuriranwa kwechirwere cheCovid 19. No media source currently available
title: DJ Fantan, Levels naDhama Vopika Mujeri kweMwedzi Mitanhatu

text: Vamwe vashandi vekambani yeBoustead Beef Zimbabwe iyo yakanyorerana chibvumirano neCold Storage Company chekuyedza kumutsa kambani iyi vanoti havasi kuziva kuti remangwana ravo rakamira sei sezvo vose vakambomiswa basa. Asi vakuru vekambani iyi vari kuti vari kuita izvi kuti vambogadzirise zvinhu sezvo kambani iyi yange yave nemakore isiri kushanda zvakanaka. Kambani iyi ine zvibayiro zvina uye kare yainge iine vashandi churu chimwe chete nemazana mashanu vakabayirwa chitupa nevamwe vainge vasina mazana manomwe. Asi ikozvino kwasara vanodarika zana chete. Mumwe mushandi ari muHarare VaSimon Zhanda vanoti vashandi vari kunonga svosve nemuromo sezvo vari kutambiriswa mari shoma shoma zvikuru. No media source currently available Chipangamazano chekambani yeBoustead Beef Zimbabwe, VaReginald Shoko vanoti kambani yavo inoda nguva sezvo CSC yange yave nemakore isiri kushanda. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi veCSC Votyira Mabasa Avo Kukambani Itsva yeBoustead Beef

text: Chikwata chemaWarriors chirikupinda munhandare nekukurumidza pane zvanga zvakarongwa kurwira nzvimbo ye 2021 Africa Cup of Nations zvichitevera shanduko yemazuva ekutamba yaitwa neveConfederation of African Football. Gwaro rabuditswa neveCaf rinoti Zimbabwe yave kuzotamba mitambo yayo miviri neAlgeria musi wa 23 na 30 Kurume kwete 30 Nyamavhvhu na 8 Gunyana izvo zvaive zvambotarwa. Izvi zvauya mushure mekunge veCaf ava vashandurawo mazuva achatambwa mafainari eAfcon 2021 kubva muna Chikumi kudzoka muna Ndira wegore rinouya nemhaka yemamiriro anofungidzirwa kuti anenge akaita kunze muCameroon. VeCaf vanoti muna Chikumi kunenge kuchipisa zvinotyisa muCameroon izvo vanoti zvinogona kukanganisa makundano ezvikwata makumi maviri nezvina aya. Pari zvino, Algeria ndiyo iri kutungamira gungano rezvikwata zvina rine Zimbabwe iine mapoinzi natanhatu, mapoinzi maviri pamusoro pemaWarriors. Kunyange hazvo maDesert Foxes aya asati adyiwa uyezve ari iwo ane mukombe weAfrica uyu muzvinabhizimisi VaObert Masvotore vanoti Algeria unokwanisa kupunzirwa pasi apo ichashanya muZimbabwe. Botswana ine pondi imwechete, asi Zambia haina kana poindi kubva mumitambo miviri. Zvikwata zviviri kubva mugungano iri ndizvo zvinobudirira kuenda kumafainari. MaWarriors achatamba neBotswana muGaborone muna Chikumi, vachizopedzisa mitambo yavo vari pamusha neZambia musi wa 8 Gunyana. Asi Zimbabwe haisati yave nemurairidzi wechikwata chemaWarriors panguva iyo mazuva emitambo ari kuswedera. VeZifa Technical Commiitee vakasangana mukupera kwesvondo kuongorora matsamba evari kuda basa asi havana kuzivisa kuti wavasarudza ndiani. Asi ruzhinji muZimbabwe kusanganisira VaProsper Mushayi vanoti ino haisi nguva yekushandura shandura zvinhu vachiti ivo Joey Antipas uyo aive panyanga pamitambo miviri yemakundano aya ndiye anofanira kupihwa basa iri. Zimbabwe yabudirira kanokwana kana kuenda kumafainari emakundano mumakore anoti 2004, 2006, 2017, na2019 vachishandisa varairidzi vemuno. Aimbove mubati wepembe muPremier Soccer League VaSam Hamandawana vanoti vachitarisa makandirwo ari kuitwa zvibodzwa naTino Kadewere anotambira Le Havre kuFrance uyyo ari kudiwa nezvikwata zvakawanda muEurope nekuBrazil, nematambiro ari kuita Khama Billiart uyo akakuvara hake parizvino pamwe nekuti Knowledhe Musona uyo akabva kuAnderletch achienda kuAS Eupen achibva amwisa mumutambo wake wekutanga nechikwata ichi. Mushure mekumbomiswa kweNational Sports Stadium neRufaro Stadium neveCaf zvichinzi hadzikodzere kutambirwa nhabvu yepamusoro-soro, maWarriors angangoshandisa Barbourfields Stadium mumitambo yavo yepamusha. Zvichakadaro, chikwata chenyika chemutambo wekiriketi chemaChevrons chatanga mutambo wacho wekutanga wemaTests neSri Lanka zvinodakadza mushure mekukanda maranzi zana nemakumi masere nemapfumbamwe (189) varasikirwa nevatambi vaviri chete. Kevin Kasuza ndiye akashura muHarare Sports Clun mare pamberi pechaunga nezuro nekukanda maranzi makumi matanhatu nematatu (63) mumutambo wake wekutanga wemaTests. Chimwe chakafadzawo veruzhinji ndechevatambi vechidiki varikupihwa mukana avo vanosanganisirawo Prince Masvaure naAinsley Ndlovu pamusoro paKasuza. Uyu mutambo weZimbabwe wekutanga wemaTests kwapera gone nemwedzi mina. Mutambo uyu uyo wakazomiswa nezuro manheru nemhaka yemagetsi wasimudzira zvekare nhasi sezvo urikuenderera mberi kusvika musi weChina apo urikusvika kumagumo.
title: CAF Inoti MaWarriors neZvimwe Zvikwata Vakurumidze Kutamba Mitambo yeAfrica Nations Cup

text: Amai Clinton pamwe nemamwe masangano anopa rubatsiro ari pasi peUnited Nations vakashora mutungamiri wenyika vaVaRobert Mugabe nekushoropodza kwavakaita tsika yechingochani apo vakataura pamusangano weUnited Nations. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaClifford Mashiri avo vakamboshanda kumuzinda weZimbabwe kuEthiopia vari kuyambira hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti irege kukokera mhepo yakasenga mamera mutswanda nekutukirira vari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzekumirira maDemocrats muAmerica, amai Hillary Clinton. Amai Clinton pamwe nemamwe masangano anopa rubatsiro ari pasi peUnited Nations vakashora mutungamiri wenyika vaVaRobert Mugabe nekushoropodza kwavakaita tsika yechingochani apo vakataura pamusangano weUnited Nations. Asi mai Clinton vakatosvorana neZimbabwe apo vakati Zimbabwe ine vamwe vari kuita zvechingochani vari mutirongo. Kunetsana nekukandirana makobvu nematete uku kuri kuuya apo Zimbabwe iri kukumbira mari yekutenga mapiritsi emaARV kubatsira vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS kusangano reClinton Foundation. Asi mutauriri waVaMugabe, VaGeorge Charamba vakati hakuna kana mumwe chete zvake ari mujeri. Mukuru wesangano rengochani munyika reGALZ VaChesterfield Samba vatiwo hapana nhengo dzavo dziri muhudungwa. No media source currently available   Nhengo yePolitburo yeZanu-PF VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana vanoti mashoko aamai Clinton haana nematuro ose. No media source currently available  Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika uye vakamboshanda kumuzinda weZimbabwe kuEthiopia VaClifford Mashiri vanoti Zimbabwe infanira kutaura nevamiririri veAmerica munyika kana kuAmerica kwacho kwete kukwira pachitsuvi ichitukirira pedzozve yonokumbira mari. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yonetsana naAmai Hillary Clinton paNyaya yeNgochani

text: Komisheni inoona nezvekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhukadzi nevanhurume yeZimbabwe Gender Commission, inoti yakamira kuferefeta nyaya yaipomerwa VaWalter Magaya veProphetic Healing and Deliverance Ministries, yekuita tanga wandida kumadzimai emusvondo mavo mushure mekunga VaMagaya vapikisa ongororo iyi kudare reHigh Court. Godwin Mugwaro rekomisheni iyi rakaturwa kuparamende, komisheni iyi inoti yainge yatotanga kuongorora VaMagaya mushure mekunge paita zvichemo zvekuti VaMagaya vaisabata nenzira yakanaka madzimai emusvondo mavo nevamwe vaienda kusvondo kwavo kunonamatirwa. Zvichitevera zvichemo izvi, masangano anomirira madzimai munyika achishanda pasi peWomens’ Coalition akakurudzira Gender Commission nemapurisa kuti vaongorore nyaya iyi izvo zvakazoita kuti kimosheni iyi itange ongororo yayo sezvainosungirwa kuita pasi pemutemo weZimbabwe Gender Commission Act. Gender Commission inoti haina kuzopedza ongororo sezvo VaMagaya vakapikisa danho iri kuHigh Court uko isati yanzwikwa. Nyaya yaVaMagaya ndeimwe yenyaya makumi matanhatu dzakaongororwa nekomisheni iyi gore rapera. Komisheni iyi inoti nyaya dzekushungurudzwa kwemadzimai kana kuti Sexual Harassment ndidzo dzainge dzakawanda, koitawo nyaya dzemhirizhonga mudzimba, kutyorwa kwekodzero dzemadzimai nedzimwe. Makambani akaferefetwa nenyaya dzeSexual harassment anosanganisira Department of Immigration, National Railways of Zimbabwe, Intertoll Zimbabwe neCasadella Buscuits Private Limited. Sachigaro weWomen’s Coalition Muzvare Evernice Munando vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kushushikana zvikuru kuti nyaya dze sexual harassment dziri kuramba dzichikwira munyika. Vanotiwo panofanira kudzikwa mitemo inoranga vanopara mhosva iyi vachiti pari zvino mitemo nematare edzimhosva zvinorerutsira vanopara mhosva iyi. Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemadzimai , Amai Chido Madiwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti komiti yavo inoshushikani zvikuru nekuwanda kuri kuita nyaya dze sexual harassment vachiti vazhinji vanoshungurudzwa havaman’ari. Amai Madiwa vanotsangura kuti ongororo yavakaita yakaratidza kuti kunyange hazvo paine mutemo weDomestic Violence Act panotodiwa mumwe mutemo wekurwisa sexual harassment. Gender Commission inoti kunyange hazvo dzimwe dzenyaya makumi matanhatu dzakamhan’ara dzakapera, dzimwe dzakaendeswa kumatare edzimhosva uye dzimwe kumapurisa. Asi inotiwo yakasangana nedambudziko rekuti vamwe vaipomerwa mhosva vairamba kupindura mibvunzo kana kutadza kuenda kumisangano. No media source currently available
title: Gender Commission Inoti Yakamira Kuferefeta Prophet Magaya Mushure Mekunge Vaenda kuDare

text: Mutungamiri weMDC VaMorgan Tsvangirai vanonzi vakaita musangano nemusi weMuvhuro nasachigaro webato ravo VaLovemore Moyo mushure mekuburitswa kwemashoko akasiyana panyaya yekuti sei vatungamiri vebato vakatadza kunoviga mumiriri weNkulumane mudare reparamende VaThamsanqa Mahlangu nemusi weMugovera. Mutauriri weMDC VaObert Gutu vakaburitsa mashoko kuvatori venhau vachiti vatungamiri vebato vainge vatadza kunoviga VaMahlangu nenyaya yekunetsana kwemhuri yemushakabvu. VaGutu vaudza Studio 7 kuti paikandiranwa makobvu nematete zvakapa kuti Standing Committee yebato ravo iite musangano muhotera yeHoliday Inn yaigara VaTsvangirai kuBulawayo vakatenderana kuti zvainge zvisingaite kuti vaenda kumarinda pamwe nehutungamiri hwebato ravo. Asi VaMoyo vakaburitsa mashoko anopikisana naVaGutu vachiti zvainge zviri zvinhu zvinoshoresa zvikuru zvekuti vainge vakundikana kunoviga VaMahlangu. Pavatungamiri vose, mumiriri weKuwadzana East VaNelson Chamisa ndivo chete vakakwanisa keunda kumarinda. Bato reMDC rinonzi raitazve kunetsana kwakanyanya kunyangwe bato iri riri kupumha vatori venhau huroyi richiti ndivo vari kunyora manyepo. Asi VaGutu vanoti havo vatungamiri vebato vachazoenda vose kunyaradzo yaVaMahlangu. No media source currently available
title: VaTsvangirai Voita Hurukuro naVaMoyo neNyaya yeBongozozo paKuvigwa kwaVaMahlangu

text: Bato rinopikisa reNational Patriotic Front kana kuti NPF rakurudzira mutungamiri wenyikaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti vasiye chigaro richiti zviri pachena kuti vakundikana kutungamira nyika. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, mutauriri webato iri VaJelousy Mawarire vati vari kurwadziwa zvikuru nemashoko ekuti pane vanhu vaurayiwa mukururatidzira kuChitungwiza. Vanhu vange vachiratidzira kutiu havasi kufara nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezve hupfumi. VaMawarire vati kuratidzira uku handi munongedzo wekuti pane vave kupfurikidza mwero munyika asi zvinoratidza kuti hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawere. Vati nenyaya yekusagadzikana kwezvinhu munyika, VaMnangagwa nevamwe vavo vanofanira kuenda pamudyandigere vosiyira vana veZimbabwe kuti vazvitungamire kunyukura nyika mumadhaka mairi. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri weZanu-PF VaSimon Khaya Moyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi.
title: NPF Inoti VaMnangagwa Ngavasiye Chigaro

text: Nekuona dambudziko rinosanganikwa naro nevanenge vashaikirwa nehama kana shamwari kunze kwenyika, zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica zvakabatana neNyaradzo Funeral Home mukushambadza chirongwa chekambani iyi cheSahwira International Plan, icho chinonzi chinobatsira vari kunze kwenyika panguva dzekushaikirwa. Chimwe chezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muchirongwa ichi, VaEsau Mavindidze, vanoti ivo nevamwe vavo vatanhatu vakabatana vakaumba kambani yeMKI, iyo yakazobatanawo neNyaradzo Funeral Home mukutengesa chirongwa ichi. VaMavindize, avo vari mudunhu reNorth Carolina muAmerica, vanoti chikuru chakavasunda kuti vatore matanho aya ndechekuona kutambura kunoita vanenge vasara vachiedza kuunganidza mari yekuchengeta hama yavo zvine chiremera. "Sekuziva kwamunoita, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvapararira pasi rose, saka panga pasina an organized funeral policyyakaita seyatangwa iyi yeSIP, Sahwira International Plan.
