Saka iplan inobva kuNyaradzo as their international division ino cover maZimbabweans ari mu diaspora, VaMavindidze vanodaro. VaMavindidze vanoti vanoona kazhinji mumwe akashaika ari kunze kwenyika hama neshamwari dzinoumba homwe yeGo-Fund-Me yekuedza kuunganidza mari yekuviga munhu uyu kana kuendesa mutumbi wake kumusha, danho ravanoti rinorwadza vasara. "For us it's a community service also nokuti sekutaura kwandamboita, togara tichingoona hama dzedu dzashaika tinoita maGo-Fund-Me. Tikaona kuti aah, apa tika teamer up nekambani ine good reputation seNyaradzo panyaya dzokuviga vanhu noku repatriator I think tinenge taita zvine musoro," vadaro VaMavindidze. Chirongwa ichi chinonzi chinopa mukana kumhuri ina baba naamai nevana vari pasi pemakore makumi maviri nematatu, uye vabereki pamwe nehama dziri munyika yavagere kana vari kumusha kuitira kuti vachengetedzwe zvine chiremera. Zvinonzi kana anenge apinda muchirongwa cheSahwira International Plan ichi ari oga asina mudzimai kana murume, anokwanisawo kunyoresa vana vake vane makore ari pasi pemakumi maviri nematatu kana hama dzake dzinosanganisira vabereki nemadzitezvara, uye dzimwe hama dziri munyika yaagere kana kumusha. Zvichienderana nekuti munhu asarudza homwe ipi yechirongwa ichi, kana ashaika kana kushaikirwa, anokwanisawo kubatsirwa nekutakurwa kwemufi kuenda kumusha, kutengwa kwechikafu, bhokisi, kuwaniswa kwebhazi rekutakura hama, nezvimwe zvakawanda zvinosanganisira matiketi maviri endege ehama dzinenge dzichizoperekedza mufi. VaMavindidze vanoti munhu anenge apinda muchirongwa ichi haazoremerwi zvakanyanya sezvo achizotarisirwa kunge achibhadhara mari shoma shoma kwazvo pamwedzi. No media source currently available
title: Vari Kunze kweNyika Voumba Kambani Inoshanda neNyaradzo Funeral Home

text: Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights riri kushora mapurisa nekusunga vana vechikoro vatanhatu vachivapomera mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga muBulawayo. Vana ava vakasungwa paBurombo Flats nemusi we Mugovera uye vakamiswa pamberi pedare neMuvhuro vakabviswa muhusungwa vachiendeswa mumaoko evabereki vavo. Vachuchusi vehurumende vanoti vana ava vainge varatidzira musi weChitatu uye vakavhara migwagwa nevamwe vanhu mazana mashanu uye vakanoba zvinhu muchitoro cheMzilikazi Supermarket. Vatanhatu ava vanoti Brighton Bvirindi ane makore gumi nemana wekuLobengula Primary School, Thabo Mhlanga, ane makore gumi nemanomwe wekuMzilikazi High School, Welcome Nkomo ane makore gumi nemashanu weku Sobukazi High School, Billy Chivhunge ane makore gumi nematanhatu wekuSobukazi High School, Blessing Phiri ane makore gumi nematanhatu wekuMzilikazi High School uye Bernard Mpofu ane makore gumi nemashan u wekuSobukazi High School. Vatanhatu ava vari kumiririrwa nemagweta eZLHR anoti VaLizwe Jamela naVaJonathan Tsvangirai. Amai Patience Moyo avo vanoshanda neJustice for Children Trust vatiwo pasi pemitemo yenyika vasati vabva zera vanenge vasungwa vanofanirwa kuchengetedzwa mumaoko evabereki vavo. Dare rakabvumawo kuti vamwe vanhu vakasungwa mushure memhirizhonga vabhadhare mari yechibatiso ukuwo mapurisa achinzi ari kuramba achisunga vanhu pamusoro pemhirizhonga iyi. VaTanaka Muganyi rimwe remagweta ari kumiririra vamwe vanhu makumi masere nevashanu vakasungwa mumhirizhonga yesvondo rapera vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu ava vanzi vabhare mari yechibatiso inosvika madhora makumi masere pamunhu wega wega. Kune vamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri vakamiswa pamberi pedare nemusi weMugovera vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita mhirizhonga. Pavanhu ava painge pane vasati vabva zera gumi nevashanu. Vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti vanhu vachiri kuramba vachisungwa vachiunzwa kumatare muBulawayo pamusoro pekuratidzira kwevhiki rapera iyi. Mune imwewo nyaya, muteveedzeri wemutungamiri webato reMDC-T Muzvare Thokozani Khupe vanoti madzimai ebato ravo achatanga kuratidzira kusafara kwavo nekutambura kweveruzhinji munyika pasi pechirongwa chinonzi “Rovai mapoto.” Muzvare Khupe vaudza Studio 7 parunhareuta reBulawayo kozoitwazve muguta guru reHarare muvhiki rinotevera. Muzvare Khupe varamba maonero ekuti bato ravo rave kuda kuedza kuwana mbiri nekudawo kupindira mukuratidzira vachiti bato ravo ndiro rakatanga nyaya yekuratidzira. Varambawo mashoko ehurumende ekuti pane vekunze vari kupesvedzera vanhu munyika kuti varatidzire. Vanhu munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika vakagara kudzimba pakati pesvondo rapfuura vamwe vakaratidzira mumigwagwa vachiti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Vamwe vari kutungamira hurongwa uhu vanoti vacharatidzira zvekare svondo rino risati rapera kana hurumende ikasabuda nezvakati tsvikiti zvinogadzirisa kutambura kuri kuita veruzhinji.
title: Magweta Oshora Mapurisa neKusunga Vana Vadiki kuBulawayo

text:
Mutungamiriri wenyika vari mutungamiri webato reZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, 
vavhura musangano wevechidiki webato ravo, vachivakurudzira kuti vabatsire hurumende kutsvaga nhunzvatunzwa idzo vati dziri kuvhiringa hupfumi hwenyika nekuchinja mari yekunze pamusika mutema. VaMnangagwa ndivo vange vari munyarikani pamusangano wevechidiki webato ravo uyo uchasarudza vatungamiriri weYouth League watanga muHarare nhasi. 

VaMnangagwa nemakurukota avo vagara vachiti matambudziko atarisana nehupfumi akaita sekukwira zvakanyanya kwemitengo yezvinhu uye kushaya simba kwedhora ari kukonzerwa nevemabhizimisi vari kuda kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. VaMnangagwa vati. Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change VaTendai Biti avo vaimbova gurukota rezvemari vanoti kutadza kutungamira nyika ndiko kwakanda nyika mukanwa mamupere. 

Zanu PF Youth League yakatoita chisungo chekuti VaMnangagwa vave chete mumiriri webato reZanu PF musarudzo dzemutungamiriri wenyika muna 2023 uye chisungo ichi chichasimbaradzwa pamusangano wanhasi. 

Musangano uyu unotarisirwa kuita sarudzo dzevanyori vezvikamu nevatevedzeri vavo pamwe nekuarudzawo mutevedzeri wemunyori wechikamu chevechidiki. Asi VaMnangagwa ndivo vanodoma munyori wevechidiki uyo anovamirira muPolitburo. 

VaMnangagwa vatiwo bato ravo riri kugadzirira vechidiki kuti vatore zvigaro zvekutonga mumusangano nemunyika vachiti ndosaka vese vechidiki vari kusiya zvigaro muYouth League vave kupihwa zvigaro muCentral Committee yebato iri. 

Vatiwo vachashaya zvigaro pamusangano wanhasi vachapihwa zvinzvimbo muCentral Committee vasina kukwikiwdza kana kuti maEX-officio members.

Vatiwo apo vechidiki vachaita sarudzo dzavo, havasi kuda vanhu vanobira kana kushandisa mari vachiti bumbiro remutemo webato rinofanira kuremekedzwa. 

VaMnangagwa vatiwo apo vakashandisa pfuti kusungungura Zimbabwe vari vadiki, vechidiki vemazuvano, vanofanira kushandisa njere nemichina yechizvizvino kutsvagira Zanu PF rutsigiro pamwe nekuona kuti vanhu vavhotera bato iri zvine mutsindo musarudzo dzegore rinouuya. 

Vati Zanu PF ichaita kuti vechidiki vabudirire mumabasa avo. Vatendawo masangano evechidiki akaita seZimbabwe Congress of Students Unions, Young Women for Economic Development neMan BelieveED awo anotsigira bato ravo vachiti vechidiki vanofanira kusiyana nenyaya dzekushandiswa kuratidzira vachipisa midziyo yevanhu asi kuti vanofanira kutsvaga mari nekupinda muzvirongwa zvevechidiki izvo vari kupihwa nehurumende yavo.
title: VaMnangagwa Vokuridzira “Youth League” Kuti Ivabatsira Kutsvaga Vari Kutengesa Mari Pamukoto.

text: Veruzhinji vanoti havasi kufara nemashandiro ari kuita mapato ose anopikisa munyika pakatariswa kuoma kuri kuramba kuchiita hupfumi hwenyika. Veruzhinji vanoti havasi kufara nemashandiro ari kuita mapato ose anopikisa munyika pakatariswa kuoma kuri kuramba kuchiita hupfumi hwenyika. Vanhu vazhinji munyika vanoti havasisina tarisiro kubva kumapato anopikisa hurumende yeZanu PF kunyange hazvo pasina chiri kufamba muhurumende zvikuru sei panyaya dzehupfumi. Mumwe wevanhu ava, ndiMuzvare Winnet Chipaga, avo vanogara mumusha weWarren Park muno muHarare. No media source currently available Muzvare Chipaga vanoti chinonyanyovarwadza kunyarara kwakaita mapato aya zvikuru MDC inotungamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai iyo yavanoti yanga yakatarisirwa neveruzhinji kuti itore masimba kubva kuZanu PF. Zvataurwa naMuzvare Chipaga zvatsinhirwa naAmai Grace Chakazamba vanogara mumusha weMabelreign. Amai Chakazamba vanoti chiri kurwadza ndechekuti mapato anopikisa ese akangoti tuzu izvo zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyika zvikurusei panyaya dzekushayikwa kwemabasa. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaJames Jemwa, vanotiwo MDC inotungamirirwa naVaTsvangirai iri kuswera ichipedzera matombo kuzvidhiidhii inzo njiva dzichauya. VaJemwa vanoti kunze kwekuti vari mubato iri vabatane, vakuru-vakuru mubato iri vari kupedzera masimba mukurwisana kunze kwekuti vatarisane nematambudziko akatarisana nenyika. VaPhibion Charumbira, avo vanogara kuMbare vatsinhirawo zvataurwa naVa Jemwa vachiti hapana chinofamba kana mapato anopikisa akasabatana kuti aite chirwirangwe pasarudzo dzemuna 2018. Vati izvi zvinonyanyodaro nepamusana pekuti MDC yapatsanuka kakawanda kubva payakavambwa muna 1999 zvokuti haisisina kusimba kuti ingamisidzane neZanu PF musarudzo dzinotevera. Asi mutauriri weMDCT, Va Obert Gutu, varamba mashoko ekuti mune kurwisana mubato ravo zvichitevera musangano wekongiresi yebato iri uyo wakasarudza hutungamiri hutsva. Va Jemwa vanoti tarisiro yavo yave kubato rePeople First iro risati raparurwa zviri pamutemo rinonzi rinotungamirwa nevaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru. Va Jemwa vanoti People First inofanira kutarisa zviri kutadzwa nemamwe mapato anopikisa akaita seMDC, Zapu, People Democratic Party nemamwe kana ichizoita mutsindo. Zvichakadai, vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, Va Sydney Chisi, avo vaimbove mutungamiri wesangano re Yidez, vaudza Studio 7 kuti MDC inofanira kudzokera kuvanhu kuitira kuti inzwe kuti veruzhinji vari kuda chii kana yakamira pachokwadi panyaya dzekurwira zvido zveveruzhinji. Kugunun’una kuri kuita veruzhinji nekutadza kukunda musarudzo dzose dzapfuura kwava kupa veruzhinji kuti vafunge kuti mapato ose anopikisa atsingire munhu mumwechete pasarudzo dzemuna 2018. Va Gutu vanoti nhaurirano dzekuumba mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa dzave pachinhanho chakakura kwazvo zvekuti veruzhinji vanofanira kugara vakateya nzeve. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumamwe mapato madiki ezvematongerwo enyika kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Kudzamara mapato anopikisa atanga kusimudza musoro panyaya dzezviri kunetsa munyika, veruzhinji vacharamba vachiita sevanhu vakamira pachiteshi vakamirira bhazi rafira panzira.
title: Mapato Anopikisa Obvunzwa Kuti Aripi Achisiya Zanu PF Ichitamburisa Veruzhinji

text: Muzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe wabvisa mari inoita mamirioni maviri nemazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora kuti ishandiswe mukubatsira vanhu vanoita zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nezvitatu vakavhiringwa nedutumupengo re Cyclone Idai kumatunhu eChipinge neChimanimani. Zvimwe zvabatsirwa nazvo zvinosanganisira zviuru zviviri zvematani emapfunde, mafuta ekubikisa nezvimwe zvekudya zvinovaka muviri. Mumiririri we America muZimbabwe, VaBrian Nichols, vati America inomira nevanhu veZimbabwe panguva yakaoma iyi. Mari nezvekudya izvi zvatambidzwa kusangano rinobatsira vanhu nezvekudya, reWorld Food Program. Zvichakadaro, rimwe remasangano arikubatsira mumatunhu akawirwa nenjodzi, reAngels Foundation, rinoti basa rekubatsira vanhu riri kuenderera mberi kunyangwe hazvo pane zvizhinji zvinodiwa. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaEdmore Munyoro, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu varambe vachiedza kubatsira uye tisakanganwa kuti vanhu vazhinji vanoda rubatsiro rwekutanga patsva sezvo zvese zvavakange vainazvo vasisina. No media source currently available
title: America Inopa Mari, Chikafu kuVanhu Vakavhiringwa neDutumupengo reCyclone Idai kuManicaland

text: Meya weguta reBindura VaBrian Kembo vanoti zvaive nani kuti vanhu vakadhirikirwa nemugodhi paRan Mine pedyo nedhorobha iri vavigwe havo ipapo nekuti hapachina kana tarisiro yekuburitsa mutumbi kana mumwe chete zvawo. Asi vati izvi zvinonetsawo nekuti hapana ari kuziva kuti mumugodhi umu mune vanhu vangani. Vanhu vanonzi vari pakati pemakumi matatu nemakumi mana ava vakadhirikirwa nemugodhi musi wa25 Mbudzi. Vari kutungamira basa Engineer Michael Munodawafa vanoti basa rakamira nekuti mugodhi wakadhirikira zvekuti unogona kuva njodzi kune vari kuyedza kununura. Basa rekuyedza kufukunura vanhu ava ramiswa nemvura uye kusagadzikana kwevhu repamugodhi uyu. Munwe imweo nyaya, vamwe vanhu vatanhatu vaichera gorighe kuMatshetshe kuEsgodini vakadhirikirwawo nemugodhi uye basa rekuvafukunura rakamira zvakapa kuti imwe hama yavo ikwidze kumatare mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemamwe makurukota avo vachiti havasi kuvasuma kuti chii chichaitwa mune remangwana pakufukunura hama dzavo. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kufira mumigodhi vachichera goridhe sezvo munyika musina mabasa. No media source currently available
title: Nekushaya Tariro Vamwe Voti Mughodhi WeRan Mine Uitwe Havo Guva reVanhu Vakadhirikirwa

text: Kutongwa kwemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica, VaDonald Turmp, panyaya mbiri dzavari kupomerwa dzekushandisa hofisi yavo zvisizvo pamwe nekuzvidza paramende, kwatanga mudare reseneti. Dare iri rine nhengo zana, makumi mashanu nenhatu dziri dzebato riri kutonga reRepublican Party, makumi mana neshanu dziri dzebato rinopikisa reDemocratic Party kuchitiwo nhengo mbiri dzakazvimirira. Nhengo dzose dzedare iri dzose dzinofanirwa kunge dziri mudare iri. Mutongi mukuru wematare muAmerica, Chief Justice John Roberts, ndivo vari kutungamira dare iri sasachigaro waro, vachibatsirwa nemaseneta aya, ayo anenge achishandawo sevatongi. Mutauriri wedare reseneti, VaMitch McConnell, vebato reRepublican Party rinovewo zvakare bato raVaTrump, vakazivisa nezvemitemo ichatevedzwa mukutongwa kwenyaya idzi. Dare iri rinotarisirwa kutora nguva sezvo pachitarisirwa kuti mativi ose ari maviri aine nguva yakareba inosvika maawa makumi maviri nemana ekupa humbowo hwawo, izvo zvinonzi zvinogona kuita kuti nyaya idzi dzitongwe pakati peusiku. Asi veruzhinji vari kushoropodza danho rinonzi rakatorwa nebato reRepublican Party rekuti nyaya idzi dzitongwe vanhu varara. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paMalone University iri kuOhio muAmerica, Doctor Moses Rumano, vanoti vanoona kunge hurongwa hwekuendesa VaTrump kudare uhwu hwakanaka sezvo zvichiratidza kuti hapana ari pamusoro pemutemo muAmerica. Doctor Rumano vanoti izvi zvinofanirwawo kunge zvichiitwa nenyika dzakaita seZimbabwe neAfrica yose zvekuti hapana anofanirwa kunge ari pamusoro pemutemo. "Zimbabwe neAfrica ine zvizhinji zvainodzidza pane zviri kuitika izvi. dai zvakadaro pasi rese zvinotiitira zvakanaka kuti hapanaba mutungamiri ari pamusoro pemutemo wenyika, mutemo wenyika ndiwo uri pamusoro pemutemo wenyika. Mutemo wenyika ndiwo uri pamusoro, ndounofanirwa kushandiswa kutungamira nyika dzese," Doctor Rumano vanodaro. No media source currently available
title: Dare reSeneti muAmerica Rotanga Kutonga Mutungamiri weNyika, VaDonald Trump

text: Hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kupomerwa mhosva yekusamisa kushungurudzwa kwevanhu, kunyange hazvo paine humbowo hwekuti vanhu vari kushungurudzwa. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika inoti zviri kuitika munyika zvekupambwa pamwe nekushungurudzwa kwevanhu, uye kusungwa kwevashandi, vemasangano akazvimirira pamwe nevemapato anopikisa zviri kuitika munyika pari zvino, hazvina kusiyana nezvaiitika munguva yehutongi hwaVaRobert Mugabe kanawo vaive mutungamiri weRhodesia, VaIan Douglas Smith. Doctor Pedzisai Ruhanya, avo vari kuita zvidzidzo zvepamusorosoro paUniversity of Johannesburg muSouth Africa, vanoti zviitiko izvi zvinoratidza kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, havana kukunda musarudzo dzakaitwa gore rapera. Doctor Ruhanya vanoti kusagadzikana kwehutungamiri hwavo ndiko kuri kupa kuti VaMnangagwa varambidze vanhu kuungana vachitya dzokororo yezvakaitika muna Mbudzi 2017, apo VaMugabe vakabviswa pachigaro. VaRuhanya vanoti vatungamiri vemuZimbabwe vachazopepuka chete kana pakaita mumwe wavo anosungwa achimiswa kumatare anotongwa mhosva dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu, akaita sekuHague, kuNetherlands. Munguva yehutongo hwaVaMugabe, vanhu vakawanda vaisungwa, kushungurudzwa pamwe nekutsakatika, veruzhinji vachipomera mapurisa, mauto pamwe nevasori mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu vachitumwa nehurumende. Zvimwe chetezvo zvinonzi zvaiitikawo munguva yehutongo hwevadzvanyiriri muRhodesia, apo vanhu vaipambwa vachitsakatiswa, kusungwa pamwe nekushungurudzwa nehurumende. No media source currently available
title: Kuenderera Mberi kweKutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu Kwoshoropodzwa

text: Dare remakurukota ehurumende rakabvumirana kuumba mutemo wekomishini yakazvimirira inotambira zvichemo zvevanhu pamusoro pemabatirwo avo nemasoja, mapurisa, vasori nemamwe mapazi ane chekuita nezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wemakurukota neChipiri masikati, gurukota rezvekubusiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati bhiri mutemo weZimbabwe Independent Complaints Commission, richapa vanhu mukana wekumhangarira masoja, mapurisa, vasori nevamwe uye nemapazi ane chekuita nekuchengetedzwa kwenyika, kana richinge rava mutemo Amai Mutsvangwa vakati komishini iyi ichaongorora zvichemo zvevanhu pamusoro pemapurisa, masoja, vasori nevamwe vanoshanda mumapazi ekudzivirirwa kwenyika. Gweta rinoshandira kuCanada, VaSilas Chekera, vanoti sekuona kwavo, chinangwa chebhiri iri chinhu chakanaka zvikuru sezvo pagara paine kunyunyuta kwevanhu pamusoro pezvinoitwa nemapurisa, masoja nevasori. VaChekera vanoti vanovimba kuti komishini iyi, kana yave kushanda, icharegerwa ichiita basa rayo nemazvo, kwete kuzomanikidzwa kuita basa rayo yakarerekera kuhurumende, sezvavanoti zviri kuitwa nemamwe makomishini aripo. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inoda Kuumba Komisheni Inonzwa Zvichemo zveVanhu

text:
Hurumende yavimbisa zvakare kuti ichaferefeta nyaya dzose dziri kupomerwa mamwe makambani ezvizvarwa zvekuChina zviri kupomerwa mhosva dzekutyora kodzero dzevashandi. Izvi zviri kuuya hazvo apo muzinda weChina muZimbabwe uri kupomerwawo mhosva yekutyisidzira bepanhau reThe Standard rakanyora dzimwe nyaya dzine chekuite nezvimwe zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaKindness Paradza vanoti hurumende iri kuferefeta makambani ose anonzi ari kutyora kodzero dzevashandi semashoko ezvegurukota rezvevashandi muparamende neChitatu. VaParadza vaenderera mberi vachiti makambani ekunze anobvumirwa kudyara mari munyika vachitevedzera mutemo. Izvi zviri kuuya paita ropa rakaipa pakati pebepanhau reThe Standard nemuzinda weChina muZimbabwe. Muzinda weChina uri kupomerwa mhosva yekutyisidzira vatori venhau veThe Standard vakanyora nyaya dzaipomera zvimwe zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi mhosva dzekutyora kodzero dzevashandi. Bepanhau iri rakanyorawo nyaya richipomera zvizvarwa zvekuChina mhosva yekusvibisa nharaunda, kuba zvicherwa, kutyora kodzero dzevashandi uye kuita zvehuori. Mutevedzeri wemupepeti wenhau mukuru weThe Standard, VaTangai Chipangura vanoti havasi kuzobvuma kutyisidzirwa kuti vasanyore nyaya dzakadai. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vakapa mukana wekupindura makambani aipomerwa mhosva aya asi akaramba kupa divi ravo. Asi mutauriri wemuzinda weChina muZimbabwe akanyora padandemutande reTwitter achipomera bepanhu iri mhosva yekunyora nyaya dzekunyepa. Mutauriri uyu asina kudomwa nezita akatiwo The Standard iri kunyora manyepo ari kushambadzirwa nemasangano akazvimirira anowana rutsigiro kubva kunyika yeAmerica akaita seInformation for Development Trust-IDT-ane chinangwa chekukanganisa hushamwari hwenyika yeChina neZimbabwe. Muzinda weChina wakavimbisa kutorera vatori venhau ava matanho akaomarara asi avasina kutaura kuti ndeapi.

Asi VaChipangura vanotiwo nyaya dzavakanyora dzine humbowo hwakakwana.

VaChipangura vanoti makambani aya akasungunuka kuuya nehumbowo hunopikisa zvavakanyora kana kuenda kunomhan’ara kusangano reVoluntary Media
Council of Zimbabwe kuti rivayananise. Vatiwo kuvhundutsira vatori venhau hazvigadzirise nyaya dziri kupomerwa makambani aya.

Mutauriri uyu akaenderera mberi achiti kusvibiswa kwaanoti kuri kuitwa China uku inzira yekuti vanodyara mari vasauye kuZimbabwe uye kuti Zimbabwe itadze kurwisa zvirango zvehupfumi zvayakatemerwa nenyika dzekumavirira.

Mushandi mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko pamuzinda weAmerica munyika VaSizani Weza vanobvuma kuti vakaona chinyorwa chakaburitswa ichi asi vanoti hachitaure chokwadi maererano nerutsigiro rwavanopa kumapepa nhau akazvimirira. Vanoti kutorwa kwenhau zvakasununguka zvine hunyanzvi ndiwo musimboti wehutongi hwejekerere. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaRashweat Mukundu vanoti mashoko emuzinda weChina anotoratidza simba guru rine nyika yeChina pamusoro pehurumende nekusatevedzera mutemo uripo kare unogona kutorwa neuyo asina kufara nezvinenge zvanyorwa.

Izvi zvinotsigirwa nasachigaro werimwe boka revatori venhau reMedia
Institute of Southern Africa-MISA-VaGolden Maunganidze.

Apo muzinda weChina uri kuramba mashoko ekuti mamwe makambani ezvizvarwa zvayo ari kushungurudza vashandi, chimwe chizvarwa chekuChina chakarova mushandi, VaBaldwin Nyevere vepaMuriel Mine mudunhu reMashonaland West avo vakanorapwa pakiriniki yepamugodhi uyu svondo rapera.

VaNyevere avo vanoti vakanomhan’ara kumapurisa eZimbabwe Republic
Police pamugodhi apa asi kusvika parizvino hapana zvati zvaitwa.

Mukuru webasa paMuriel Mine pane zvimwe zvizvarwa zvekuChina
VaLewis Munyoro vati havakwanise kutaura nezvenyaya iyi.

Vanoziva zviri kuitika paMuriel Mine vanoti chizvarwa chekuChina ichi
chakangomiswa basa kwemazuva gumi chete asi mutemo wepabasa uchiti mushandi anorova mumwe mushandi anodzingwa basa.

Mukuru weCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu,
vanoti zviri kutaurwa nemuzinda weChina manyepo.

VaMaguwu vaenderera mberi vachiti svondo rapera chairo vakaenda
kumugodhi weBikita Minerals apo vashandi vanosvika makumi masere vari kungoshanda vasina chibvumirano kana kuti contract uye vachitambiriswa mari shoma zvichienzaniswa neyavanofanirwa kupihwa pamutemo.

Panyaya yekuti chizvarwa chekuChina chakarova mumwe mushandi chichasungwa here mutauriri wemapurisa mudunhu reMashonaland West Amai Margret Chitove varamba kutaura vachiti titaure nemutauriri wemapurisa munyika Asstistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, avo vanga vasingadaviri mbozhanhare yavo. Asi masangano evashandi akaita seZCTU neZFTU ari kukurudzirawo hurumende kuti iferefete nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevashandi. Izvi zviri kukurudzirwawo nemagweta anoona nezvenharaunda eZimbabwe Environmetal Lawyers Association. Sangano reChamber of Chinese Enterprises in Zimbabwe richinyora padandemutande reTwitter rinoti kunyangwe dzimwe nhengo dzaro dziri kupomerwa mhosva dzekutyora kodzero dzevashandi, haasi makambani ose ekuChina ari kuita izvi. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inovimbisa Zvakare Kuferefeta Nyaya Dzose Dziri Kupomerwa Mamwe Makambani eZvizvarwa zvekuChina

text: Paramende inoti iri kushushikana zvikuru kuti kambani yehurumende inoona zvekutengeswa kwezvicherwa yeMinerals Marketing Corporation of Zimbabwe (MMCZ) iri kushandiswa nehurumende mukuita zvehuwori uye mashandiro ainoita pakutengesa zvicherwa zvakaita semangoda ndizvo zviri kuita kumangoda ekwaMarange atengwe nemutengo uri pasi. Vakuru veMMCZ vakamiswa neChishanu pamberi pekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvezvicherwa chibvunzurudzwa pamamusoro pematengeserwa aitwa mangoda ekwaMarange. Vakuru ava vakatadza kupindura mibvunzo yakawanda zvikurusei sei wekuti kambani yavo yakatengesai sei mangoda ekambani yaVaLovemore Kurotwi mushure mekunge kambani yavo, Canadile Miners, yatorerwa rezenesi rekuchera mangoda. Sachigaro vekomiti iyi, VaTemba Mliswa, vakati MMCZ inoita inoshandiswa nemakurukota ehurumende kuita zvechitsotsi uye izvi ndizvo zvimwe zvinota kuti makambani makuru emangoda asade kutenga mangoda kubva kukambani iyi. Asi vakasanobata chinzvimbo chemukuru wekambani iyi, VaMasimba Chandavengerwa, vakaudza komiti iyi kuti MMCZ inotengesa mangoda ayo zviri pachena. Vakati ivo ndivo vane mvumo yekutengesa mangoda ese munyika uye havana ruzivo rwekuti pane mangoda ari kutengeswa zviri kunzwe kwemutemo. Panyaya yakataurwa nevaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, yekuti nyika yakarasikirwa nemangoda anokosha mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu emadhora, VaChandavengerwa vakati havana ruzivo nazvo. Vakati kubvira muna 2010 kusvika gore rapfuura, kambani yavo yakatengesa mangoda anokosha mabhiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana zvemadhora chete ($2.4b). VaChandavengerwa vakatiwo vanhu vanofanira kuvapa mukana wekuti mangoda enyika anogadzirwa kuBotswana vachiti ivo havana ruzivo rwekuita izvi. Asi nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzakati kana izvi zvikaitika zvinoreva kuti MMCZ inofanira kuvharwa nekuti nekuti inenge isisina basa. Zvichakadai, mukuru wekambani yekuRussia ye DTZ OZGEO, VaVictor Kusyla, vakaudza komiti iyi kuti vaka katyamadzwa chose apo hurumende yakavabvutira kambani yavo muna 2016. Vakati sevanhu vakaunza mari munyika havana kufara nedanho iri uye vakatokwidza nyaya iyi kuhurumende yenyika yavo iyo yakazotaura nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Vakatiwo chimwe chisiri kuvafadza ndechekuti kambani yehurumende yakatora mugodhi wavo wemangoda wekuChimanimani, yeZimbabwe Consolidated Diamond Company, haisati yavabhadhara michina yayakatora pamwe nezvikwereti zvaive nekambani yavo sekuvimbisa kwavainge vaita. Vakati pane vanhu vakawanda kuRussia vari kubvunza nezvekutanga mabhizimisi muZimbabwe asi vari kutya kuti makambani avo anogona kuzotorwa nehurumende. No media source currently available
title: Paramende Yoramba Ibvunza Zvakaitika kuMangonda ekwaMarange

text: Magweta emukuru weZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, Dr Musa Kika, anoti ari kuronga kupikisa mutongo wakapihwa nedare repamusoro nezuro wekuti mukuru wevatongi, Chief Justice Malaba, havana kuzvidza dare apo vakadzokera kudare mushure memumwe mutongo wedare iri wakati vaende pamudyandigere. Rimwe remagweta ari kumirira VaKika, VaWilbert Mandinde, vaudza Studio7 kuti havana kugutsikana nemutongo wanezuro nekudaro vachiri kuuongorora kuti voupikisa here kana kuti kwete. Asi vati vaisa chikumbiro kudare chekuti mutongo wakaendesa VaMalaba pamudyandigere wemusi wa15 urambe uchishanda kudzamara dare reSupreme Court ranzwa chikumbiro chaVaMalaba chekuti mutongo uyu uyu uiswe parutivi. Nyaya yaVaMalaba yatsviriridza munyika uye pane nyaya dzakawanda kumatare dzekuti vasiye basa nedzimwe dziri kupikisa mutemo wakashandiswa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuwedzera nguva yavo pabasa weeConstitutional Amendment Number 2 Act. Gweta rinorwira kodzera dzevanhu VaMarufu Mandevera vaudza Studio 7 VaMalaba vachagara vari mutare pachinhambo chekuti vagare vachitonga nyaya. Mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvave pachena kuti gakava pamusoro paVaMalaba harisiriri rezvemutemo asi kuti rave rezvematongerwo enyika. Asi nezuro gurukota rezvemutemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vakuadza Studio 7 kuti mutongo wanezuro unoratidza kuti matare anoshanda akazvimirira. Mwedzi wapfuura, VaKika nevamwe vanosanganisira magweta echidiki vakaenda kudare reHigh Court nechikumbiro chekuti VaMalaba nevatongi vese vematare eConstitutional Court neSupreme Court vasawedzerwe nguva pabasa kana vachinge vasvika makore makumi manomwe. Vatongi vatatu vedare iri vachitungamirwa naJustice Happias Zhou vakabvumirana naVaKika nevamwe vavo izvo zvakaendese VaMalaba pamudyandigere kunyange hazvo VaMnangawa vainge vawedzera nguva yaVaMalaba pabasa nemamwe makore mashanu vachishandisa Constitutional Amendment Number 2 Act. Asi VaMalaba vakapikisa mutongo uyu kuSupreme Court ndokubva vadzoka kubasa. Izvi ndizvo zvakaita kuti VaKika vadzokere kudare zvakare vahiti VaMalaba vasungwe nemhosva yekuzvidza dare. Asi dare reHigh Court rakati hapana mhosva yakaparwa naVaMalaba richiti kuenda kwakaita VaMalaba kudare reSupreme Court vachipikisa mutongo wa Chivabvu 15 kwakabva kwaisa parutivi mutongo waJustice Zhou nevamwe vavo. No media source currently available
title: Magweta aVaKika Anoti Haasi Kugutsikana neMutongo Wakachenura VaMalaba neMusi weChina

text: Kunyange hazvo nemusi weMuvhuro mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakarerutsa mitemo yekuti vemabhizimisi vaite basa, zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi hazvina kumira zvakanaka vamwe vachiti hurumende haina hurongwa hwakajeka kwekubatsira varombo munguva dzakaoma. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti kuvhurwa kwemabhizimisi hakureve kupera kwenhamo. Kunyange hazvo gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vakati vari kutarisira kuti hupfumi hukure nezvikamu zvinodarika zvinomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 7,4%, sangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce razivisa kuti hupfumi huchatodududza kumashure huchienda kusvika paminus 6 kana kudarika mugore rino. Sachigaro weCEO Africa Roundtable, VaOswell Binha, vatenda kuti kumushandi zvinhu zvakaita mhidigari nekuti Zimbabwe haina kuisa homwe parutivi yekubatsira vanhu kana zvinhu zvaoma. Munyori mukuru musangano reZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti mushandi ari kutsenga mhandire nemavende sezvo mamwe makambani ari kuramba kubhadhara vashandi achiti hapana basa riri kuitwa. Mutungamiri wesangano revashandi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, kana kuti Emcoz, Doctor Israel Murefu, vatambira danho rekuvhurwa kwemabhizimisi vachitiwo zvinhu zvange zvaomera vemabhizimisi. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemunyori mukuru werimwezve sangano revanozviitira mabasa emaoko, reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Association, VaWisbon Malaya, avo vati vange voponderwa musaga sekitsi nekuti zvekudya zvange zvoshaika vari mudzimba. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti zvinhu zvange zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachitiwo kusabatsira vanhu sezviri kuitwa kuSouth Africa neAmerica kuri kupa kuti vashandi muZimbabwe vanonge svosve nemuromo. Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi nemagariro evanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vanoti hurumende iri kubatsira vanhu kuburikidza nemasangano akaita seWorld Food Program, WFP, nePlan International kubatsira vanoshupika. WFP iro kupemha mari inosvika mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu emamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti US$250 million yekubatsira vanhu vemuZimbabwe nechikafu. Hurumende iri kurudzira vanhu kuti vanyorese nebazi rezvemagariro evanhu uye inoti yakabatsira mhuri dzinodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nezvitanhatu, kana 276 000. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzinoti Kumbovharwa kweNyika Koburitsa Pachena Kuti Zimbabwe Haina Hurongwa heKubatsira Varombo

text: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vasaina gwaro rinodzika mirairo yavanoda kuti itevedzerwe nemakambani e’social media’, anosanganisira Twitter, Facebook, Google nemamwe. Izvi zvinotevera kusafara kwa VaTrump mushure mezvimwe zvavakaisa paTwitter pavo zvakanzi ndezvemanyepo, zvikakonzera kuti Twitter itaurire vanhu vanoverenga zvinyorwa zvaVaTrump kwavanofanirwa kuenda kunoona chokwadi chemashoko aya. Nyanzvi mune zvemitemo dzinoti VaTrump havana simba rekuvhara kambani, zvikuru sei dzinoita basa rekufambisa mashoko. Vanodzidzisa Public Relations paTexas State University, kuSan Marcos, mudunhu re Texas, Muzvinafundo Prisca Ngondo vanoti VaTrump vari kupomera makambani e’social media’ mhosva dzavari kupara ivo pa’social media’ yacho. No media source currently available
title: VaDonald Trump Vanosaina Gwaro reMirairo Yemashandiro e'Social Media'

text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti Zimbabwe yatangidza gore dzva ra2021 ichirwisana nezvinhu zvisina maturo, ichisiya zvinhu zvine basa zvinobatsira vanhu. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti pachinhambo chekuwedzera simba rekurwisana ne ‘coronavirus’, hurumende yapinda mugoredzva isina zvinangwa zvinobatsira vanhu. VaNgwenya vanoti nyika haiendereri mberi kana hurumende ichingoita basa rekutandanisana nekusunga vatori venhau, vemapato anokwikwidza pamwe chete nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, vachiti hurumende inofanira kutora vanhu semadzisahwira mukusimudzira nyika kwete kupedza nguva ichisunga vanhu nekukurudzira kuumbwa kwemapato anopikisa enhema vanhu vachida rubatsiro. No media source currently available Asi vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubato riri kutonga, reZanu-PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti Covid-19 haimisi kusungwa kwevanhu vanotyora mitemo. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende inoshorwa Kuti Haina Zvinangwa Zvingabatsira Vanhu Muna 2021

text: Bato reZanu PF rinoti richadoma vatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato pamwe nenyika kumusangano mukuru wekongiresi uri kuitwa mwedzi uno. Mutauriri weZanu PF, Ambassador Simon Khaya-Moyo vaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa ndivo vane shoko rekupedzisira pakudomwa kwevatevedzeri vavo. Asi nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika uye vachitungamira sangano revarairidzi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti vanoona sekunge musangano mukuru uyu uchadoma vanhu vane nhoroondo yechiuto sevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika. Doctor Zhou vanoti kana bato iri rakatevedzera nhoroondo yemubatanidzwa wepamto eZanu PF nePF Zapu, vanoona pachisarudzwa mumwe mutevedzeri anobva kuPF Zapu pakati paVaDumis Dabengwa, VaKembo Mohadi kana VaAmbrose Mutinhiri. Vanoti kunyange hazvo vaDabengwa vakabuda muZanu PF, vanogona kudzorwa naVaMnangagwa senzira yekusimbisa hukama pakati pevaive varwi vehondo yerusunguko vanobva kumapato maviri aya. Asi Doctor Zhou vanotiwo kana bato iri rakada kudzokera kuzvisungo zva2014, panogona kudomwa munhkadzi semumwe wevatevedzeri, kunyange hazvo pasina vane nhoroondo yakakura yeChimurenga kubva kuPF Zapu vasara mubato iri. Vatungamiri vachasharwa ava vachange vachitsiva VaMnangagwa, avo vakanga vadzingwa mubato reZanu PF, pamwechete naVaPhelekezela Mphoko, avo vakabviswa pachigaro nehurumende itsva yaVaMnangagwa. No media source currently available
title: Zanu PF Yotarisirwa Kudoma Vatevedzeri veMutungamiri weBato neNyika kuKongiresi

text: Mutevedzeri wameya veBulawayo, VaTinashe Kambarami, vanoti vakapambwa neMugovera usiku pamba pavo kuBulawayo vakashungurudzwa kwazvo nevarume vanodarika gumi vaive vakazvivhara kumeso, uye vakapakata zvombo zvehondo. VaKambarami, avo vati vari mune chimwe chipatara muBulawayo makare, vanoti vakashungurudzwa kuburikidza nekurohwa muviri wese pamwe nepasi petsoka, uye vakavagera mhotsa dzavo vachishandisa chibedu chebhodhoro. Vanoti varume ava, avo vavanofungidzira kuti vasori, vaivabvunzurudzawo pamusoro pehurongwa hwebato ravo reMDC hwekuda kuratidzira muBulawayo. VaKambarami vanotiwo havasati vakwanisa kunomhan’gara nyaya iyi kumapurisa sezvo vachiri mune chimwe chipatara muBulawayo makare. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kuona kuti VaKambarami vakakuwara zvakadii. No media source currently available
title: Mutevedzeri waMeya weBulawayo, VaKambarami, Vanoitwa Kafira Mberi

text:
Dare repamusoro muBulawayo rati richazivisa mutongo waro pachikumbiro chechimbi chimbi chakaitwa nemumwe mudzidzi chekuti dare iri rirambidze varairidzi kuramwa mabasa. Mutongi wedare reHigh Court, Justice Nokuthula Moyo, vati vachapa mutongo wavo pazuva ravasina kutara pachikumbiro chechimbi chimbi chakaitwa nemumwe mudzidzi atisingagone kudoma nezita sezvo asati abve zera, uyo ari kumiririrwa nambuya vake (Amai Senzeni Nyathi) chekuti dare reHigh Court rirambidze varairidzi kuramwa mabasa. Chikumbiro ichi chinodoma masangano anomirira varairidzi mashanu
anosanganisira Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Educators Union of Zimbabwe, pamwe neProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe. Chinodomawo Public Service Commission nemakurukota ezvedzidzo yepasi, mari, uye mabasa nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu. Magweta ari kumirira mativi maviri munyaya iyi apiwa mukana wekutsigira maonero avo Justice Moyo vakati vachazopa mutongo wavo. Rimwe remagweta ari kumirira masangano aya, VaNoble Chinhanhu, zvimwe zvezvazeiwa mudare ndezvekuti chikumbiro ichi chakakodzera kuonekwa sechechimbi chimbi here uyewo kuti Amai Nyathi vakakodzera here pamutemo kuti vave vanokwidza chikumbiro chakadai kumatare. Gweta riri kumirira vakakwidza chikumbiro ichi kudare, VaBrighton Ndove,
vati maonero evavari kumiririra ndeekuti kuramba mabasa kwevarairidzi kunokanganisa vadzidzi munyika saka dare rinofanirwa kutora danho rinoita kuti vadzidzi vasarasikirwa nedzidzo. Mutungamiri weEducators Union of Zimbabwe, Muzvare Tafadzwa Munodawafa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti varairidzi havazi kuramwa mabasa asi kuti vari kutadza kuenda kumabasa nekuda kwekuti mari dzemihoro dzavari kuwana hadzivakwanire.

Pave nenguva yakareba varairidzi vachinetsana nehurumende vachiti
vanoda kuwana muhoro wemadhora ekuAmerica mazana mashanu nemakumi mana pamwedzi inove mari yavaiwana hurumende isati yachinja huremu hwemari yemuno. Asi hurumende inoti haikwanise kupa varairidzi mari yakawanda kudai.
title: Dare Rinoti Richapa Mutongo Waro Munguva Inotevera paChikumbiro cheMumwe Mudzidzi

text: Shoroma uye vari muridzi wekambani yenharembozha yeEconet Wireless VaStrive Masiiwa nemudzimai wavo Amai Tsitsi Masiiwa vati vaumba homwe yemari inosvika mamiriyoni zana yemadhora emuZimbabwe kubatsira vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa. Izvi zviri kuitwa kuburikidza nesangano ravo rinonzi Higher Life Foundation inobatsira muzvinhu zvakasiyana siyana kusanganisira dzidzo muAfrica nedzimwe nyika. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMasiiwa panharembozha yavo. Asi sachigaro weHealth Service Board Dr Paulinus Sikosana vaudza Studio 7 kuti itaure negurukota rezvehutano Dr Obadiah Moyo avo vanzi nevanoshanda muhofisi mavo vange vari mudare reparamende. Asi veHigher Life Foundation ava vanot Havana kunge vasuma hurumende nezvedanho iri.
title: VaMasiiwa Voumba Homwe yeKubatsira Vanachiremba Vari Kuramwa Mabasa

text: Bazi reAfrican Union Commission rinoona nezvematongerwo enyika reAfrican Union Commission Department of Political Affairs ratumira zvipangamazano munyaya dzesarudzo kuZimbabwe apo nyika yoita gadziriro yesarudzo dzemusi wa 30 mwedzi unouya. Chikwata ichi chakatanga kushanda musi wa 15 mwedzi uno uye chinonzi chichange chiri munyika kusvika musi wa 8 mwedzi unouya chichibatsira Zimbabwe Electoral Commission. Izvi zvinotevera chikumbiro cheZEC chekuti ibatsirwe mukugadzirira sarudzo. Asi nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika VaFarai Maguwu vanoti rubatsiro urwu rwakanga rwanonoka sezvo AU yaifanirwa kutumira vabatsiri ava kubva pakatanga ZEC kushandisa michina yeBVR. No media source currently available
title: African Union Commission Inotumira Zvipangamazano zveSarudzo kuZimbabwe

text: Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti kukwidzwa kwemutengo wekushandisa nharembozha pamwe nemasaisai kana kuti data bundles nekambani yenharembozha, yeEconet Wireless, kuchakanganisa zvakawanda. Doctor Chitambara vanoti nekuda kweCovid-19 vashandi vakawanda vave kushandira kudzimba, izvo zvinoita kuti vashandise masaisai, uyewo zvikoro zvizhinji zvave kuitisa zvidzidzo zvepadandemutande nekuda kwekuvharwa kwezvikoro. Asi kambani yeEconet Wireless, yakaburitsa mashoko kuvatori venhau anoti yakamanikidzwa kutora danho iri nekuda kwekukwira kwemutengo wekuti irambewo ichishanda. Mumashoko ayo, Econet Wireless inoti mutengo wemagetsi nedhiziri ndezvimwe zvakaimanikidza kutora matanho aya. Econet Wireless yakakwidza mitengo yayo nezvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana kutanga neChitatu izvo zvinonzi nenyanzvi mune zvehupfumi zvichakanganisa mashandiro emabhizimusi pamwe nedzidzo yevana vechikoro, avo vari kudzidza vachishandisa dandemutande munguva ino yeCovid-19. Semuenzaniso, mutengo wekushandisa nharembozha kwemaminitsi maviri wakakwira kubva pamadhora emunyika masere nemasendi makumi mana kuenda pamadhora gumi. Econet Wireless yakakwidzawo mutengo webhanduru rine 20 Megabyte (MB) rekushandisa pazuva kubva pamadhora makumi maviri kuenda pamadhora makumi maviri nemashanu emari yekunyika. Vanotenga bhanduru rekushandisa mwedzi wese re eight gigabyte (GB) wakakwirawo kubva pamadhora chiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu (ZW$1 560.00) kuenda pamadhora zviuru zviviri nemakumi matatu (ZW$2 030.00). Masaisai eWiFi emwedzi wese kana kuti Private WiFi ine 50GB akakwirawo kubva paZW$4 800.00 kuenda paZW$6 240.00. Mabhanduru annoshandiswa nevanoita zvidzidzo zvepadandemutande, kana kuti 10GB e-Learning bundle, anokwana mwedzi wese vave kutarisirwa kuburitsa ZW$2 240.00 kubva pa ZW$1 720.00. Doctor Chitambara vanoti kukwira kwemitengo yemasaisai pamwe nenharembozha uku kuchakonzerawo kukwira kwemitengo yezvimwe zvinhu zvakawanda, sezvo makambani achishandisawo masaisai mumabasa awo mazhinji. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi dzezveHupfumi Dzoyambira Kuti Kukwira kweMitengo yeMasaisai Kuchakanganisa Zvakawanda

text: Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, Ambassador Bruce Wharton, vaparura chirongwa chekuvaka muZimbabwe muzinda mutsva wenyika yavo vachiti chirongwa ichi chinoratidza kuti nyika yavo yakazvipira kuramba ichidyidzana neZimbabwe. No media source currently available Vachitaura panzvimbo ichavakwa muzinda uyu pedyo nenzvimbo yemabhizimisi yeWestgate Mall, VaWharton vati kuvakwa kwemuzinda uyu kuchatora makore matatu uye kuchapawo mabasa akawanda kuvanhu vemuZimbabwe pamwewo nekuwanisa mabhizisimisi emuno mari. Vati muzinda uyu uchadya mari inodarika mazana maviri emamiriyoni emadhora kuuvaka, uye uchasimbisawo kudyidzana kweZimbabwe neAmerica. VaWharton vatendawo hurumende yeZimbabwe nekuona kuti zvese zvinodiwa pakuvaka muzinda uyu zvatevedzwa. Vati izvi zvange zviri kutitika kubva muna 2001 apo nyika yavo yakatenga nzvimbo iyi muna 2001. Pari zvino muzinda weAmerica pamwe nemapazi awo akaita se Public Affairs, Center for Diseases Control nemamwe ari kushandira munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana muguta umo ari kushandisa dzimba dzaari kubhadhara vanhu nemakambani akasiyana. Muzinda mutsva uyo uchatanga kuvakwa mukati memwedzi mishoma iri kutevera. Uchange uine mahofisi emumiriri weAmerica, pamwe nemapazai awo pamwe nenzvimbo dzekutambira mitambo yakasiyana siya. Meya veHarare, VaBenard Manyenyeni, avo vange vari pachirongwa ichi vatiwo zviri kuitwa neAmerica zvakanaka chose sezvo zvichisimudzira guta. Asi pane vamwewo vari kuchema chema kuti muzinda uyu uri kuvakwa kure neguta zvichaita kuti avo vanenge vachida mavhisa ekuAmerica pamwe nezvimwe zvinopihwa kana kuitwa nemuzinda uya vanetseke nekufamba kuenda kumuzinda uyu. Mumwe weavanhu ava ndaVa Simon Takawira avo vanotiwo zvaitwa neAmerica zvakanaka sezvo zvichiwanisa vanhu mabasa. Chikamu cheBureau of Overseas Buildings Operations mubazi rezvekudyidzana kweAmerica nedzimwe nyika, ndicho chichatungamira basa rekuvaka muzinda uyu chichibatsirwa nemakambani akawanda emuno neekuAmerica. America yakavhura muzinda wayo muna 1980 pakawana Zimbabwe kuzvitonga.
title: VaWharton Voparura Nzvimbo Ichavakirwa Muzinda Mutsva weAmerica muHarare

text: Chirongwa chekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 chapinda muzuva rechina vari kutungamira chirongwa ichi kwaMutare vachiti hapana matambudziko avari kusangana nawo kunyange hazvo vanhu vari kuzvipira kubayiwa nhomba iyi vari vashoma. Mumwe wevakoti vari kutungamirira chirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid 19, Amai Otillia Mukuchira, vanoti hurongwa hwavo huri kufamba zvakanaka kwazvo sezvo vanhu vari kuuya nehuwandu. Amai Mukuchira, avo vanoshanda pachipatara chikuru cheVictoria Chitepo, vanoti kubva nemusi weMuvhuro havasati vasangana nematambudziko mubasa ravari kuita. "Kubva patakatanga hapana chatati tasangana nacho asi kungoti vanhu vari kuda kunzwisisa sezvo vari kubvunza kuti nhayi vaccine iri rakamira seyi isu tobva tatsanangurawo kuti zvamuri kunzwa pa social media hazvisiri izvo tovaudza kuti rinofamba so-so-so vanhu vobva vanzwisisa asi vanhu vari kuda kutanga vambonofunga mushure mekunge vatsanangirwa kuti zvakamira seyi," vadaro Amai Mukuchira. Amai Mukuchira vati sezvo chirongwa ichi chakanyanya kunangana nevashandi vekubazi rezvehutano, vanhu vari kubaiwa nhomba iyi muzvipatara zvose zviri muguta uye nekunze. "Sezvo chirongwa ichi chiri chema health workers ndivo taka-ageta tiri kuitira pano paMutare provincial hospital, paSakubva district, nekumaClinics and kwese kunoshandira vehealth ndiko kuri kuwanikwa chirongwa ichi," vadaro Amai Mukuchira. Mumwe wevabaiwa nhomba yeCovid 19 ndi Muzvare Nyasha Ndikudze, avo vati vakatanga vachitya kudzimara vazoshinga pavakaona vamwe vavo vabachibayiwa nhomba iyi zvisina dambudziko. "At first ndaitya kusvikira mamwe mafriends angu azobaiwa kubva zvichitanga ndobva ndazongoshingawo kubaiwa, saka I think it is wise kuti munhu abaiwe sezvo pasina kana harm uye zvichizobatsira pamberi apo," vadaro Muzvare Ndikudze. Meya weMutare, VaBlessing Tandi, vati kanzuru yavo iri kutsigira chirongwa ichi nekupa zvivakwa zvayo kuti zvishandiswe muchirongwa ichi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kutaura nachiremba mukuru wedunhu reManicaland, Dr Simon Nyadundu, kuti inzwe huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba mudunhu rose reManicaland. Dunhu iri rakapihwa mishonga yeSinopharm zviuru makumi maviri nezvisere, kana kuti 28000, iyo yakatoendeswa kumatunhu madiki gumi emuManicaland. Kunyange hazvo Amai Mukuchira vachiti vanhu vari kuuya kuzobayiwa nhomba vakawanda, bazi rezvehutano rinoti rakabaya vanhu zviuru zviviri nemakumi manomwe nevana nezuro, kana kuti 2074 munyika yose, izvo zvakasvitsa nezuro huwandu uhu pavanhu zviuru zvinomwe nemazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevaviri, kana kuti 7872. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vabaiwa kusvika pari zvino mudunhu guru rega rega, vanosvika mazana manomwe nemakumi masere, hunova huwandu hushoma pakatariswa kuti Zimbabwe ine matunhu madiki makumi matanhatu nemaviri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano uye vaimbve gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti kushomeka kwevashandi vemubazi rezvehutano vari kubayiwa nhomba iyi kunoreva kuti vanhu vakawanda havasi kuvimba nemushonga uyu. Apo chirongwa chekubaya vanhu chiri kuenderera mberi, vanhu vasere vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro munyika yose, uye vamwe vanhu makumi mashanu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare kusanganisira vatatu vemudunhu reManicaland, iro rave nevanhu zviuru zvitatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe, 3689 vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga gore rapera. Dunhu iri rava nevanhu zana nemakumi masere nevasere vafa neCovid-19. Zimbabwe yave nevanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu vaurayiwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 munyika yose vava zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu, 35960. No media source currently available
title: Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Kunopinda Muzuva reChina Zvichinzi Chiri Kufamba Zvakanaka kuManicalnd

text:
Hurumende inoti yave kushushikana zvikuru nehuwandu hwevanhu vave
kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kumaruwa.

Izvi zvinotevera kukwira kuri kuita vanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi mumatunhu masere anobata vanhu vanogara kumaruwa. Matunhu aya anoti Mashonaland West, Mashonaland Central, Mashonaland East, Manicaland, Midlands, Masvingo, Matabeleland North neMatabeleland South ave nevanhu zviuru zvesere nezana nemakumi masere vabatwa nechirwere ichi, kana kuti 8,180. Matunhu aya ane vanhu zana nemakumi mashanu nemumwe chete, kana kuti 151 vafa nechirwere ichi, kubva pavanhu mazana mana nemakumi matatu nemumwe chete vafa munyika yose, vazhinji vavo, mazana maviri nemakumi masere, vanhu vanhu vakafira muBulawayo neHarare. Matunhu ekumaruwa ane vanhu vakawanisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi anoti Masvingo, Mashonaland West neMatabeleland North. Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reHurungwe kuMashonaland West, Dr Frankson Masiye, vanoti vave kuwana vanhu vakawanda vari kurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 kubva kunzvimbo dzekumamisha idzo dzaisave nevanhu vanorwara nechirwere ichi pachakatanga.

Dr Masiya vanoti ongororo yakaitwa inoratidza kuti vanhu vari kumamisha havapfeke mamasiki nguva dzose uye havana basa nekugara vari kure nekure sezvin kurudzirwa nevezvehutano.

Dr Masiye vanoti vari kukurudzira vanhu kuti vagare kudzimba kunyange
vari kumamisha sezvo pachisina nzvimbo inonzi haina chirwere cheCovid-19. Dunhu reMashonaland West rine vanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nevavashanu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanhu mnakumi maviri vafa nechirwere ichi zvichitevera kufa kwevanhu vatatu nezuro mudunhu iri.

Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMasvingo, Dr Amadeus Shamu
vabvuma kuti pane kuwanda kwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere
cheCovid-19 asi vati pari zvino havana manhamba acho sezvo
vachiapihwa ari edunhu rose. Asi bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neChitatu manheru kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi muMasvingo hwanga hwava pavanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nevaviri zvichitevera kubatwa kwevanhu makumi mashanu nechirwere ichi musi uyu, uye dunhu iri rave nevanhu gumi nevasere vafa nechirwere ichi.

Mumwe chiremba wemudunhu reMashonaland Central uyo asina kuda kuzivikanwa nezita sezvo anga asati apihwa bvumo yekutaura nevatori venhau, anoti huwandu huri kuwanda asi zvakaoma kupatsanura vari kugara kumaruwa nevemudhorobha sezvo vose vanorwara vari kumamisha vachiendeswa kuzvipatara zvemumadhorobha kana varwarisa. Dunhu reMashonaland Central rava nevanhu mazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevasere vabatwa neCovid-19, zvichitevera kubatwa kwevanhu makumi matatu nevatanhatu nezuro. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano
muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti kubatwa kwevanhu kumaruwa hakushamise sezvo vanhu vakawanda vakafamba kubva kumadhorobha nekunze kwenyika.

Dr Madzorera vanoti kuvharwa kwakaitwa nyika kwemazuva makumi matatu hakuyamure zvakanyanya kana vanhu vakasaongororwa.

Zimbabwe yave nevanhu zviuru gumi nezvinomwe nemazana masere nevana, kana kuti 17, 804 vabatwa nechirwere ichi, zvichitevera kubatwa nemusi weChitatu kwevanhu mazana matanhatu negumi, kana kuti 610. Vanhu vapora munyika yose vava zviuru zvinomwe nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu nevatanhatu, kana kuti 11, 966 zvichitevera kupora kwevanhu zana nemakumi mashanu nevatatu nezuro wakare. No media source currently available
title: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chotemesa Nyika Musoro Kusanganisira Vagere kuMaruwa

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro vakaudza vanhu vainge vakaungana kumarinda eHeroes Acre muHarare kuti venyika dzekunze havafanire kuudza Zimbabwe zvekuita panyaya yehutongo hwejekerere. VaMnangagwa vaitaura pazuva rekurangarira magamba enyika. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti nyika idzi hadzinawo kubatsira Zimbabwe kurwa hondo yerusungunuko. Mutungamiri wenyika akatiwo Zimbabwe inyika inoda runyararo isinganetsane nedzimwe nyika. Vakatiwo ivhu harisi kuzofa rakadzoserwa kuvachena sezvo vakati iyi inhaka yevana veZimbabwe. Mutungamiri wenyika akatiwo vamwe vakarwa hondo yerusungunuko vasina kuradzikwa kumarinda eHeroes Acre vakaita saVaNdabaningi Sithole naVaJames Chikerema vanofanira kuremekedzwa semagamba enyika kunyangwe vakazotsaudzira sezvinotaurwa nevamwe vatungamiri vebato reZanu-PF. Asi vazhinji vasina kupihwa ruremekedzo rwekuva magamba vanhu vaiti nyika yananga kumawere pasi pehutungamiri hweZanu-PF. Vachipawo pfungwa dzavo nezvezuva remagamba, mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku vati zuva iri harifanire kutorwa serebato reZanu-PF asi kuti renyika. Vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition mubatanidzwa wemasangano akazvimirira oga VaObert Masaraure vati zvakarwirwa zvakawanda hazvichatevdedzerwe nekudaro pave kuda kuti nyika idzoserwe mugwara. Crisis in Zimbabwe iri kuchema chemawo nemitemo inonzi nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu inotyora kodzero dzvevanhu. Asi hurumende inoti mitemo iyi yakakodzera kudzivirira nyika kune vekunze vanoda kupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika.
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoti veKunze Havangadzidzise Zimbabwe nezveHutongo Hwejekerere

text: Ongororo ichangobva mukuitwa nesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, ZDI, inoratidza kuti veruzhinji munyika vanoona masoja nevashandi vemubazi rezvedzidzo sevasina huwori hwakanyanya kana zvichienzaniswa nevashandi vemumapazi akaita seVehicle Inspection Department, VID, Registrar General’s Office neZimbabwe Republic Police. Zvakabuda muongororo yakaitwa muna Mbudzi zvinoratidza kuti zvikamu zvinodarika makumi mashanu nezvishanu kubva muzana zvinoti huwori hushoma muchiuto nemubazi rezvedzidzo. Mukuru weZDI, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vanoti zvikamu makumi matanhtau nezviviri zvevakabvurudzwa zvinoti mapazi ose ehurumende ane huwori asi huori uhu huri nani mupapazi maviri aya. VaRuhanya vanoti vanhu havana ruzivo rwezvinoitika muchiuto uye vanotya kuongorora mashandiro emasoja. Vanotiwo tsvakurdzo yavo yakaburitsa pachena kuti mapazi ese ehurumende, kusanganisira mapurisa, ave kutya mauto zvekuti mapurisa akawanda ave kutya kuita zvehuwori zvichetvera Operation Restore Legacy iyo yakabvisa vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pachigaro gore rapfuura. Asi vanoti tsvakiridzo yavo yaburitsa kuti vekumahofisi anopa zvitamba zvekuchaira dzimotokari nemapasipoti havana matyira uye vari kuenderera mberi nehuwori. Pavanhu vese mazana mashanu nevanomwe vakabvunzurudzwa mutsvakiridzo iyi, makumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu vakati hapana chasanduka muVID. Kumahofisi anopa mapasipoti nebazi rezvehutano ndimo munonziwo mune huwori uye hamuitwe basa nemazvo. Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaaTabani Moyo, vati vanobvumirana nezvakabuda mutsvakiridzo yeZDI vachiti ichokwadi kuti hautori chitamba chekuchaira motokari kana usina kubvisa chioko muhomwe. VaRuhanya vanoti vakawanda vavakabvnzurudza vakabudawo pachena kuti vanoona sekuti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa haina zvairi kuita murwisa huwori. Zvikamu makumi mashani nezvinomwe kubva muzana zvakati vazhinji vese vari muhurumende iripo vakabatsirika zvikuru muhuwori hwaitika panguva yaVaMugabe uye havakwanisi kupedza huwori. Ingororo iyi yakaitwa muznzvimbo dzinoti Lupane, Gwanda, Thsolotsho, Bulawayo, Umguza, Masvingo, Harare, Kwekwe, Kadoma, Chitungwiza nedzimwe nzvimbo. No media source currently available
title: Ongororo yeZDI Inoratidza Kuti Huori Hwakanyanya kuVID neMapurisa

text: Mutevedzeri wameya weChitungwiza VaJabulani Mtunzi, avo vanonzi vakapambwa vari pamba pavo neSvondo usiku vanonzi negweta ravo VaJob Sikhala vazowanikwa vakavharirwa pakamba yemapurisa epaMakoni kuChitungwiza kwekare. VaMtunzi, avo vanove kanzura weWard 15 kuChitungwiza uye vari vebato reMDC, vanonzi vakatorwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori kana kuti vechiuto. VaSikhala, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMtunzi vanofanirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare neChipiri, sezvo mutemo uchisungira mapurisa kumisa musungwa wese pamberi pedare mukati mema awa makumi mana nemasere kana kumusunungura. VaMtunzi ndemumwe wevanhu vazhinji vanonzi vari kuramba vachibvutwa mudzimba dzavo pakati pehusiku izvo zvave kukonzera kutya kukuru muvanhu, zvikuru vebato rinopikisa. VaSikhala vanoti hurumende haichatevedzeri mitemo yenyika, izvo zvave kuita kuti mauto nemapurisa vaite madiro aJojina mukutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Mutevedzeri waMeya weChitungwiza, VaMtunzi, Vopomerwa Mhosva yeKukonzera Mhirizhonga

text: Matambudziko ari kusangana nevarwere muzvipata zvose zvehurumende nekuda kwekusaenda kubasa kwavanachiremba, ari kutarisirwa kuramba achienderera mberi sezvo vanachiremba ava nesangano reHealth Service Board, kana kuti HSB, vasiri kuwirirana. Vana chiremba vakatanga kusaenda kubasa musi wa 3 Gunyana vachiti vanoda kuwedzerwa mari dzavanotambira, kuitira kuti vakwanise kuenda kubasa sezvo mari dzavari kupihwa semihoro, dzisiri kuvakwanira. HSB inoti yadaidza vanachiremba kuti vauye kumatare kuzvipatara zvavanoshandira kuitira kuti vatongwe pamhosva dzavari kupomerwa dzekutadza kuenda kubasa. Asi vanachiremba vanoti havana kana mari yekuenda kumatare acho izvo zvosiya varwere vari panyanga dzamushore. Sachigaro weHSB, Dr Paulinus Sikosana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vanachiremba ava vakasauya, nyaya dzavari kupomerwa dzichatongwa ivo vasipo. Dr Sikosana vati vakuru vemuzvipatara ndivo vachange vachitonga vanachiremba vasiri kuenda kumabasa. No media source currently available Vatiwo kunyange hazvo vanachiremba vari kuramba kupinda mumisangano yavo pasi pesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reHealth Apex Council, nhaurirano dziri kuenderera mberi.Vati vari kumboyedza kuwedzera vanachiremba mari asi hazvisi kubatsira. Vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru wesangano rinomirira vanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Tawanda Zvakada, vanoti hurumende kana ichida kuvadzinga ngaivadzinge nekuti vagara havasi kutambiriswa mari yemihoro. No media source currently available
title: Madhokotera Oramba Kunotongwa Achiti Akagadzirira Kana Kudzingwa Basa

text: Madzimai ebato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change aratidzira muBulawayo nhasi achirova mapoto nemigoti kuratidza kunyunyuta kwanvo nematongero emutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Kuratidzira uku kwange kuchitungamirwa nemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato reMDC-T Muzvare Thokozani Khupe. Mapurisa ayo ainge achida kumbodzivisa kuratidzira uku achiti munyika hamuna kugadzikana ange akazara mumigagwa yeBulawayo nhasi. Amai Khupe vati vasunga kuti kutanga mangwana nenguva dza 8 mangwanani madzimai anofanira kubuda panze orova mapoto nemigoti kwemaminetsi mashanu kutaridza kunyunyuta kwavo. Zvichakadaro kuratidzira kwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kuri kuenderera mberi kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa, Britain, Canada, Australia neAmerica. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuti zvaneta nehutongo hwaVaMugabe zvichivati vari kuita zvehuori uye kutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Nezuro mapurisa muHarare akasunga VaStern Zvorwadza sachigaro vesangano reVendors Union Zimbabwe mushure mekunge varatidzira paTown House vachinyunyuta nehuori hwavanoti huri kuitwa nemapurisa ekanzuru. Kunyangwe hazvo vanhu vakawanda vari kuratidzira, vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato reZanu-PF VaIgnatious Chombo vakati VaMugabe havana kwavari kuenda uye vari kuratidzira vari kufurirwa nevanhu vekunze. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi nekutonga nedemo ndizvo zvopa kuti vana veZimbabwe varatidzire.
title: Madzimai Oratidzira neMapoto kuBulawayo

text: Nhumwa dzemutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, dzapinda munyika neMuvhuro masikati dzakasvikosangana nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa asi dzakakundikana kusangana nevemapato anopikisa murwendo rwadzo rwekuedza kunzwisisa nezvematambudziko anonzi ari muZimbabwe, uye kuti angagadziriswa sei. Vapinda munyika ndaAmai Baleka Mbete, avo vakambove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika pamwe nekumbove mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaSydney Mufamadi, avo vakambove gurukota rezvevasori, VaNgoako Ramatlhodi, avo vakambove mutungamiri wedunhu reLimpopo pamwe naAmbassador Ndumiso Ntshinge. Dzisati dzapinda munyika, nhumwa idzi dzinonzi dzakanga dzaronga kuzosanganawo zvakare nevanopikisa vanosanganisira bato reMDC Alliance rinotungamirirwa naVanelson Chamisa pamwe neMDC-T inotungamirirwa nevakafanobata chigaro, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe. Asi mushure mekusangana naVaMnangwagwa, chikwata chenhumwa ichi chinonzi chabva chadzokera kumusha kwacho. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance Muzvare Fadzai mahere vazivisa kuburikidza negwaro ravanyora kuti bato ravo raswera rakagarira kusangana nenhumwa idzi mushure mekunge vaziviswa zviri pamutemo kuti vaifanirwa kuzosangana. Vati chikwata chavo chaswera chakamirira musangano uyu, asi chazoshamisika kuudzwa kuti nhumwa idzi dzave kudzokera kuSouth Africa kunotanga dzapira VaRamaphosa zvadzakurukura naVaMnangagwa. Muzvare Mahere vati sebato vanongofungira chete kuti kukundikana kwechikwata ichi kusangana navo kwakonzerwa nezviri kudiwa nechikwata chiri kumirira Zanu PF. Vati hurumende yeZimbabwe haina zvainokwanisa kuita kugadzirisa matambudziko ari munyika, uye ivo vacharamba vachisunda VaMnangagwa kuti vapinde munhaurirano dzinoburitsa chimuko nekugadzirisa matambudziko ari munyika. Mutauriri webato reMDC-T, VaKhalipani Phugeni vaburitsawo gwaro vachiti bato ravo rakafonerwa neMugovera nemumiriri weSouth Africa muZimbabwe, VaPhakama Mbete, vachivazivisa kuti nhumwa idzi dzaizoda kusangana nemutungamiri webato ravo Muzvare Khupe pamwe nebato ravo kuti vazeye matambudziko anonzi ari munyika aya. Asi VaPhugeni vati bato ravo razofonerwa zvakare neMuvhuro naVaMbete vachivazivisa kuti chikwata ichi chakanga chisisakwanise kusangana navo, nekudaro musangano uyu wakanga waendeswa mberi. Vanoti sebato vatambira chiitiko ichi uye vachataramba vaine tarisiro yekuti VaRamaphosa naVaMnangagwa vachagadzirisa matambudziko ari kunetsa muZimbabwe. Chikuru chakaita kuti VaRamaphosa vatume nhumwa dzavo kuZimbabwe inyaya yekutyorwa kunonzi kuri kuitwa kodzero dzevanhu nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa, izvo zvinonzi zvaita kuti nhengo zhinji dzebato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance pamwe nevemasangano akazvomirira nevamwe vatori venhau vatize misha yavo. Kusungwawo kwemutori wenhau ane mukurumbira Hopewell Chin’ono pamwe nemutungamiri webato rinopikisa retransform Zimbabwe, VaJocb Ngarivhume pamwe nekupambwa uye kuitwa kafiramberi kwevanoonekwa sevari kupikisa hurumende kunonzi kuri kuramba kuchienderera mberi munyika, ndezvimwe zvoita kuti hurumende ishoropodzwe nevakawanda. Asi hurumende pamwe nebato reZanu PF vagara vachiti munyika hamuna dambudziko riri kutaurwa nezvaro iri, asi kuti pane vari kuda kusvibisa zita renyika vachishanda nedzimwe nyika dzekumwairira. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachitunga bato reDemocratic Party, Doctor Urayayi Zembe vanoti zvaitwa nehurumende yeSouth Africa zvekutumira nhumwa changa chiri chinhu chakanaka chinofanirwa kuitwa nemuvakidzani ane hany'a kana akanzwa pamusha pemumwe wake paita zhowezhowe. No media source currently available Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti nhumwa idzi hadzina kupinda munyika nekuti pane kodzero dzevanhu dziri kutyorwa, asi kuti pane manyepo atekeshera pamadandemutande ekuti hurumende iri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu avanga vachida kunzwisisa kuti zviri kumbofamba sei. No media source currently available
title: Nhumwa dzaVaRamaphosa Dzasangana naVaMnangagwa Dzinodzokera Dzisina Kusangana neVanopikisa

text: Vanamukoti muzvipatara zvehurumende mumatunhu akawanda emunyika vanonzi vapinda mukuramwa mabasa kutanga neChipiri vachinyunyuta nekusabhadharwa kwavo mari dzavo dzemabhonasi egore rapera. Munyori mukuru wesangano rinomirira vanamukoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vanoti zvimwe zvaita kuti vanamukoti vapinde mukuramwa mabasa kusatariswa kwezvichemo zvavo, izvo vanoti zvave nemakore maviri vazvisvitsa kuhurumende. Kuramwa mabasa kwavanamukoti uku kunouya panguva iyo vanachiremba vari pakuramwawo mabasa, uko kwapinda muzuva regumi nena. Vamwe vashandi vehurumende vanosanganisira varairidzi, vakazivisawo kutanga kwesvondo rino kuti vacharatidzira nemusi weMuvhuro unouya, vachinyunyuta nekusabhadharwa mabhonasi avo. Chimwe chinonzi chiri kutsamwisa vashandi vehurumende zvikuru kuramba hurumende ichiendesa mberi musangano unofanirwa kuitwa pakati pevamiriri vayo nevamiriri vevashandi wekuzeya nezvenyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Vanamukoti veHurumende Vanokanda Mapadza Pasi

text: Mamwe masangano evashandi vehurumende ari pasi peApex Council anosvika gumi nemaviri anosanganisira PTUZ, TUZ nePublic Serice Association, anonzi asangana muHarare akasunga kuti haasi kuzoenda kumusangano wadaidzirwa nebazi rezvevashandi nemabasa wekuzeya nezvekunonoka kwevashandi kuwana mihoro yavo mwedzi uno. Musangano uyu unonzi wanga uchipindwawo nevekuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, vebazi rezvemari pamwe neveku Civil Service Commission. Munyori mukuru wesangano revarairidzi, rePTUZ, VaRaymond Majongwe vanoti masangano apinda mumusangano weApex Council uyu awirirana kuti haana kushevedzwa negwara kwaro kumusangano wehurumende uyu. "Tati isu hatiende kumusangano uyu nekuti taita zvekudaidzwa nefoni sevafudzi vemombe, kana marombe anonzi uyai kuno mudye, kwaita chikafu chemahara," VaMajongwe vanodaro. Vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuziva kuti Apex Council isangano rakazvimirirawo roga, rakakosha, uyewo rinove nhengo yenhaurwa dzenyaya dzevashandi, saka vanofanirwa kuremekedzwa. VaMajongwe vanoti musangano wavaita uyu wasungawo kuti vashandi vehurumende vachatora matanho kana vasina kuwana mari dzavo dzemihoro panopera mwedzi uno. "Hatisi kubvuma kuti ma salary edu ganzi hakuna mari isu takaseenza, nekuti takadzimara tabvuma ipapo vana vedu kana vazukuru vedu vachazototiseka rimwe gore kuti heano mafuza, madununu aiseenzera nyika asingabhadharwe." Hurumende yakazivisa neChishanu chapfuura kuti nekuda kwekunetsa kwemari yakanga ichi zoendesa mberi mazuva ekutambirwa kwemari nevashandi vayo. Vechiuto vakanzi vachatambira mari dzavo musi wa 27 Chikumi, vachiteverwa nemapurisa musi wa 30 Chikumi. Varairidzi vanonzi vachazotambira musi wa 7 Chikunguru, vachiteverwa nevari mubazi rezvehutano pamwe nevamwe vashandi vose musi wa 14 Chikunguru, kuchizopedzisira vari pamudyandigere musi wa 19 Chikunguru. Sangano reZimta harina kupinda musangano weApex Council uyu, uye mukuru weZimta, VaSifiso Ndlovu vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vasina ruzivo nezvemusangano uyu. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa, Amai Prisca Mupfumira kuti tinzwe mafambiro aita musangano webazi ravo usina kupindwa nevashandi uyu. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi Vehurumende Vanoramba Kupinda muMusangano weKuzeya Nyaya yeMihoro

text: Komiti yepamusoro yeMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa yaita musangano wayo wekupedzisira gore rino ichiongorora zvakaitaika musarudzo ikabuda nezvisungo zvakawanda zvinosanganira kusimbaradza nyaya yekuti paitwe nhaurirano nehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa pamwe nekuratidzira kwakasimba munyika yose gore rinouya. Vachitaura neStudio7 mushure memusangano uyu uyo waitirwa pamuzinda webato iri paMorgan Tsvangirai, mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume, vati vagara kuti vaongorore nyaya dzesarudzo dzakaitwa munyika gore rino uye kuti vodii sebato kubva panotanga gore. VaMafume vati vabuda nechisungo chekusimbaradza nyaya yekuti paitwe nhaurirano nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa vachiti Zanu PF haina kukunda zviri pachena musarudzo dzemuna Chikunguru. Asi vachitaura kumusangano webato ravo wepagore, mutungamiri weZanu PF, uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati bato ravo harisi kuzoita nhaurirano neMDC yaVaChamisa kuitira kuti paumbwe hurumende yemubatanidzwa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe kuti bato ravo rinoda here kuita hurukuro neMDC. VaMafume vatiwo vabvumirana kuti paite kuratidzira kwakasimba munyika yose gore rinouya. Vatiwo chimwe chavabvumirana sehutungamiri hwebato ravo ndechekuti vabude negwaro ravari kudaidza kuti Reload rakanangana nekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. Panyaya yekusawirirana kwehutungamiri mubato ravo, VaMafume varamba kuti vazeya nyaya yemumwe wevatedzeri vaVaChamisa, VaElias Mudzuri, avo vanonzi havasi kupinda misangano iri kudaidzirwa naVaChamisa. VaMudzuri, avo vakazivisa kuti vachada kukwikwidza chigaro chemutungamri weMDC pakongiresi yebato iri yakatarisirwa gore rinouya, havana kuuya zvakare kumusangano wanhasi. Vane ruzivo nezvaitika mumusangano uyu vanoti vanoti nyaya iyi yazeyewa mumusangano wanhasi vamwe vachida kuti vadzingwe asi vamwe vachiti havafanire kudzingwa mubato nepamusana pekuti vari kuda kukwikwidza chigaro china VaChamisa pari zvino. Asi VaMafume vatsika madziro vachiti nyaya iyi haina kuzeyewa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMudzuri kuti tinzwe kuti sei vasina kupinda mumusangano wanhasi. Zvinonzi muMDC mune kurwisana kuri kukonzerwa nenyaya yehutungamiri huri kufanira kunosarudzwa kukongiresi yebato iri gore rinouya. Zvinzonziwo kongiresi iyi yave kutarisirwa kuitwa muna Gumiguru wegore rinouya. Kunyange hazvo mubato iri muine kunetsana, bumbiro rebato iri rinoti zvigaro zvose zvinofanirwa kukwikwidza pakongiresi. No media source currently available
title: MDC Inoti Nhaurirano neHurumende Dzakakosha

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanonzi vasimuka mangwanani anhasi vakananga kuDubai, uko kune musangano weGlobal Business Forum Africa uyo uri kutanga mangwana. Musangano wemazuva maviri uyu unonzi unounza pamwe chete vedzihurumende dzemuAfrica neUnited Arab Emirates nevemabhizimusi vakasiyanasiyana mukutsvaga nzira dzekushanda pamwechete mune zveupfumi nekutengeserana. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti VaMnangagwa vaperekedzwa nechikwata chinosanganisira vakuru-vakuru vezvemabhizimusi vakawanda nevamwe vakuru muhurumende. Uyu musangano weGlobal Business Forum Africa wechishanu unonzi wakarongwa neDubai Chamber of Commerce and Industry, uye dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica dzinonzi dzakazivisa kuti dzichatumira makurukota adzo kumusangano uyu. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda sa programmes director musangano re Zimbabwe Network for Social Justice, VaTendai Reuben Mbofana, vanoti kunyange hazvo musangano uyu wakakosha, zvaive zvakakodzera kuti uitirwe muAfrica, sezvo chinangwa chiri chekukwezva vemabhizimusi kuti vapinde muAfrica. "Hapana chakaipa hacho kana pane mutungamiri wenyika, kana nevamwewo vemabhizimusi, vanenge vachida kushambadza nyika, vanenge vachida kushambadza Africa vanoda kuti mabhizimusi avhre munyika muno, avhure muAfrica kuti nyika dzedu dzibudirire. "Asi chinozondipedza simba ndechekuti tinenge takukwira ndege ndichienda kunyika dzakaita saanaDubai tichiti tiri kuenda ikoko kunoita Global Business Froum tichiongorora nezveAfrica, asi tichiitira musangano wacho kuDubai. Ipapo ndipo pandinopera simba rese kuti aah! aah! Zvakufamba sei apa?" VaMbofana vanodaro. Vanoti izvi hazvisi zvinhu zvinofanirwa kusimudza mukuru wenyika achiti ave kunokwezva vemabhizimusi vekunze kuti vazotanga mabhizimusi munyika, asi kuti panofanirwa kutanga patumwa vepasi vanononyengetedza vemabhizimusi ava, mutungamiri wenyika ozongosaina zvibvumirano zvinenge zvaumbwa. VaMbofana vanotiwo kunyange hazvo pari kuitwa misangano yakawanda yekukwezva vemabhizimusi muAfrica, hapana zvikuru zvinobatika zvati zvaonekwa zvakabuda kubva mumisangano yakadai. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa, Vanonanga kuDubai kuMusangano weGlobal Business Forum Africa

text: Mapurisa nevasori vanonzi vakamisa kuratidzira nekuendeswa kwemagwaro enyunyuto kudare repamusoro redzimhosva rekuBulawayo kwakanga kwakarongwa nemamwe masangano emudunhu reMatabeleland anorwira kodzero dzevanhu nemusi weChitatu. Masangano aya ari kuda kuti hurumende iongorore nyaya yekuurayiwa kwevanhu vanonzi nevamwe vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri munguva yeGukurahundi mumakore ekuma 1980. Kuratidzira uku kuri kuuya panguva iyo mumwe ishe wekuFilabusi VaVezi Madunha vakanyorera mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nebazi reUnited Nations tsamba dzekukumbira kuti nyaya yeGukurahundi igadziriswe. VaMnangagwa vakamboudza nhepfenyuro yeCNN yekuAmerica muna Gunyana kuti vakazvipira kugadzirisa nyaya iyi vachitambira zvabuda kubva kukomisheni yeNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri waVaMnangagwa VaGeorge Charamba kana mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi nezvenyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzange dzisiri kudairwa. Mukuru wesangano re Post-Independence Survivors Trust, VaFelix Mafa Sibanda vanoti nguva yareba nyaya yeGukurahundi isina kugadziriswa. Vanoti vanhu vakawirwa nemhirizhonga iyi nevakarasikirwa nehama dzavo vachine misodzi pamatama saka zvakakosha kuti nyaya iyi igarirwe pasi veruzhinji vagone kugadzikana mupfungwa. No media source currently available
title: Vasori neMapurisa Vomisa Kuratidzira neNyaya yeGukurahundi

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vashora vanhu vanoita zvekutenga nekutengesa mari pamukoto vachiti vari kuita izvi vari kuda kuparadza hupfumi wenyika. Vatiwo hurumendde yavo iri kutora matanho ekugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika. Vachipa mashoko avo pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika, kana kuti State of the Nation Address, pamwe nekuvhura chikamu chechipiri cheparamende yechipfumbamwe, VaMnangagwa vati vanoziva kuti vanhu vari kutambudzika kuwana mari izvo zvave kupa nhubu mukana wekutengesa mari nemutengo uri pamusoro soro. Vati hurumende yave kuwana mari yakawanda kudarika yayange ichitarisira uye ine zvirongwa zvakwanda zvairi kuita zvekuvandudza hupfumi. Semuenzaniso, VaMnangagwa vati hurumende yakaisa parutivi bhirioni nemazana masere ezviuru zvemadhora semari yekutsigira kurimwa kwechibage, soya beans pamwe nedonje. VaMnangagwa vatiwo kunyange hazvo vari kufara kuti paramende yakatovandudza mimwe mitemo kuitira kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika, havasi kufara nekuti izvi zviri kutora nguva yakareba. Vatiwo kusashandiswa zvakanaka kwemari yehurumende kunogaro taurwa naAuditor General hakufanirwe kuramba kuchienderera mberi vachiti yave nguva yekuita zvinhu zvakajeka uye zviri pamwero. Vatiwo hurumende yavo icharamba ichirwisa nekutsigira masangano ese anorwisa huwori munyika. VaMnangagwa vati vanozviziva kuti zvinhu zvakaomera vanhu vakawanda munyika asi vakati zvichatora nguya yakareba kugadzirisa zvinhu uye zvinoda kuti vanhu vashande pamwe chete. Mabhiri anotarisirwa kuzeiya neparamende iyi anosanganisira Mines and Minirals Amendment Bill; Cyber Crime and Cyber Security Bill, Prisons and Correctional Services Bill, Medical Aid Societies Bill nemamwe. VaMnangagwa vatiwo mabhiri eZimbabwe Media Commission Protection of Information pamwe neBroadcasting Services Act Amendment Bill anofanira kupasiswa nechimbichimbi. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, Dr Davison Gomo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mashoko aVaMnangagwa anoratidza kuti vanoziva zvinonetsa vanhu uye zvasara kuhurumende neparamende kuti zvigadziriswe. Mukuru weSouthern Africa Parliamenatry Support Trust, VaJohn Makamure, vaudza Studio 7 kuti chakakosha kuona kuti zvaparurwa nhasi zvinobatsira veruzhinji here. Nhengo yeMDC inotungamirirwa naMuzvare Tokhozani Khupe, Amai Priscillar Misiharambwi Mushonga, vati havabvumirani naVaMnangagwa kuti paramende haisi kufambisa basa nemazvo vachiti makurukota avo ndivo asiri kuita basa nemazvo. Gurukota rezvemitemo neparamende, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vatiparamende ichaedza pese painogona napo kuona kuti mabhiri anenge aunzwa kuparamende apasiswa. Kunyange hazvo VaMnangagwa vataura mabhiri avanotarisira kuti azeiwe neparameende, haasi mabhiri ese aya anounzwa kana kupasa muparamende. Muchikamu chekutanga cheparamende yechipfumbwamwe pakapasiswa mabhiri mapfumbamwe chete asi ipo paitarisirwa kupasiswa mabhiri makumi maviri nemapfumbabwe. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vari Kushushikana neKutyorwa kweMitemo yeNyika

text:
Vagari vemudunhu reMasvingo vanoti havana kunyatsofara zvakanaka rwendo rwuno vachipemberera kutanga kwegore idzva nepamusana pekuti hurumende yakavhara nzvimbo dzekutandarira pamwe nenzvimbo dzinoungana vanhu vachinamatira kusvika kwegore idzva. Mumwe mugari wemumusha wekwaMucheke, VaJohanes Chihwani, vati vakapemberera gore idzva vakasungikana sezvo vaidzingwa nemapurisa munzvimbo dzavaitandarira. Vemakereke vanoti mutemo wakaiswa nehurumende wakavatadzisa kuti vapemberere kupinda mugore ra2022 nenhengo dzechbechi dzavo vachiita pungwe semakore mazhinji vachishumira nekutenda mwari nechipo chehupenyu. Pastor Cover Mugwadi, vekereke yeChrist Life Church, vati kunyange havo vakarambidzwa kuita pungwe, vakaungana kwenguva pfupi nevamwe vekereke yavo vakapemberera vachinamatira kusvika kwegore dzva.

Mumwe mugari, VaBilliat Mweni, vati vakapemberera vgore idzva vari
pamabasa vachisevenzera mhuri dzavo.

VaGurad Nhunha, vemumusha wekwaMakonese, vati kunyange vakatadza kuungana vazopemberera zuva iri nemhuri yavo vachidya zvinonaka nekushanyira dzimwe nzvimbo dzazovhurwa nhasi masikati.

Vamwi vehwahwa munzvimbo dzakwanda vaswera vachiita hwakiti na gonzo nemapuririsa ayo anga asingadi kuti vanhu vaungane mumabhawa.

VaTalent Chivange vati vakazvipa chisungo chekushanda zvine simba gore rino kuitira kuti vasimudzire hupenyu hwavo uye vanotairisira kuti
hupfumi hwenyika huchange hwakanaka. Amai Chiedza Shereni vatiwo vakafara nekupinda mugore dzva uye vakaudzawa kukereke kuti gore rino ndere kushandisa maoko nekudaro vaita chisungo chekushanda zvakasimba. Vakawanda vataura neStudio7 vati vanoshuvira kuti denda reCovid-19 richapera gore rino kuitira kuti hupenyu hwavo, uhwo hwanga huchikanganiswa nedenda iri, huite zvakanaka. No media source currently available
title: Gore ra2022 Rinosvika Vakawanda Vachirangarira Matambudziko a2021

text:
Vamwe vanhu vanorarama nekutenga nekutengesa zvinhu munyika dziri muSADC vanoti vanoda kuti hurumende dzenyika idzi dzive nemitemo yakajeka inoita kuti vakwanise kuita mabasa avo zvakanaka.

Ichi ndechimwe chezvisungo zvakakosha zvakabuda pamusangano wevanorarama nekutenga nekutengesa zvinhu vemunyika dzeSADC wakapera muBulawayo neChitatu manheru.

Vanhu vaive pamusangano uyu, vakawanda vavo vanove vanhu vanorarama nekutenga nekutengesa vemunyika dzeSADC dzinosanganisira Zimbabwe, Lesotho, Malawi, Mozambique neZambia, vakabvumirana kuti vanosangana nematambudziko akafanana mukuita basa ravo munyika dzakasiyana-siyana dzeSADC, kusanganisira kushungurudzwa pamiganhu yenyika, kana kurohwa nemapurisa uye vamwe vanhukadzi vachibatwawo chibharo.

Vakabvumiranawo kuti kwemakore maviri anotevera, vemasangano anomirira vanoita basa iri vanofanirwa kushanda nevemuzinda weSADC kuBotswana kuti sangano iri rive nemitemo inoita kuti vawonekwe sevanhu vanoita basa rinobatsira kusimudzira hupfumi hwemunyika idzi.

Mugari wemuBulawayo anorarama nekutenga nekutengesa zvinhu, Amai Agnes Mumba, vanoti vakawana mukana wekupangana mazano nevamwe vanoita basa seravo.

Mumwewo mugari wemuBulawayo aivepowo pamusangano uyu, uyo akangozvidoma nezita rekuti Romeo, akati anorarama nekutenga nekutengesa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira zvimwe zvinodiwa pakugadzira motokari pamwe nembatya. Romeo anotsinhirawo kuti vanhu vanoita basa iri vanosangana nematambudziko akawanda achiti zvakakosha kuti vataure nezwi rimwe chete.

Mumiriri weBuhera Central mudare reparamende, VaRonald Muderedzwa, vanoti basa rekutenga nekutengesa zvinhu rakakosha sezvo riri kuraramisa vanhu kunyanya muZimbabwe vachitiwo vamiriri vedare reparamende vachaita zvose zvavanogona kubatsira vanoita basa iri.

Sangano reUN Women rinoti basa rekutenga nekutengesa zvinhu muSADC rinonyanya kuitwa nemadzimai uye zvinotenga nekutengeswa izvi zvakakosha mari inopfuura mabhiriyoni gumi nemanomwe emadhora pagore rega rega. Sangano iri rinotiwo basa iri riri zvikamu zviri pakati pemakumi matatu nemakumi mana kubva muzana zvekutengesarana kose kunoitwa munyika dzeSADC.

Musangano wevanoita basa rekutenga nekutengesa uyu wakaitwa kwemazuva maviri nerubatsiro rwakabva kusangano reOpen Society Initiative of Southern Africa richishanda pamwe nesangano reBulawayo Vendors and Traders’ Association. No media source currently available
title: Vanorarama neKutenga neKutengesa Zvinhu muSADC Voita Chirwirangwe

text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change VaMorgan Tsvangirai vari kutarisirwa kupinda munyika mukupera kwesvondo kuti vazotange basa. Bato reMDC-T rinoti VaTsvangirai vakabuda muchipatara nemusi weSvondo kunyangwe hazvo vachiri kuSouth Africa kwavange vachirapwa.
