Munyori mukuru webato iri VaDouglas Mwonzora vakaudza Studio 7 kuti VaTsvangirai vave kugadzirira kudzoka. “Tinofara kuti tizivise vatsigiri vedu veMDC-T, Zimbabwe yese neshamwari dzedu kuti president vedu vanaya uye vagadzirira kudzoka kubasa mukupera kwesvondo." VaTsvangirai vaimbenge vachitarisirwa kubatana nevatsigiri vavo nemusi weMugovera kuti vange vachitungamira kuratidzira muBulawayo. Asi havana kukwanisa kuuya. No media source currently available VaMwonzora vakamboudzawo Studio 7 kuti VaTsvangirai vakaenda kunorapwa kunze sekurudziro yavana chiremba vavo vemuZimbabwe.
title: VaTsvangirai Votarisirwa Kudzoka Munyika Kupera kweVhiki Rino

text: America yasvitsa neChina gore rimwe chete kubva zvakaitika mhirizhonga inotyisa padare reCongress muWashington DC vatsigiri vevaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaDonald Trump, vachiramba kutambira zvainge zvabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika zvichitevera kukunda kwakaita VaJoe Biden vebato remaDemocrats. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti chiitiko ichi chakasiyana America isisina chiremera pasi rose panyaya dzekugamuchidzana masimba murunyararo uye hutongo hwejekerere. Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden nemutevedzeri wavo, Amai Kamala Harris, vange vari mudare reparamende reUS Capitol muWashington DC vachishora zvikuru zvakaitika musi wa 6 Ndira Izvi. VaBiden vati zvakaitika zvakadzosera kumashure hutongo hwejechetere. Amai Harris vatiwo zvakaitika musi uyu zvinoratidza kuti hutongo hwejekerere hunofanira kubatwa sezai sezvo huchigona kupwa sedova. VaTrump vainge vambovimbisa kupawo divi ravo kumba kwavo kuMar-a-Lago, Florida, asi havana kuzoita izvi asi vachiri kungoramba havo kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo. Dunhu rakanetsawo rairamba kutambirwa naVaTrump zvakabuda musarudzo dzaro ndere Pennsylvania uko kwakaberekerwa VaBiden. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara mudunhu iri, VaNicholas Mada, avo vanoona nezvekurongwa kwemisangano mubato reMDC Alliance muno muAmerica, vati vari kufara kuti zvaida kuitwa naVaTrump zvekuti sarudzo dzemudunhu iri dzisatambirwe, zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida. Vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato reZanu-PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti zvakaitika muAmerica zvinonyadzisa uye nyika iyi haifanire kuda kuzviita muzivi wezvose panyaya yehutongi hwejekerere. Asi vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vari mukuru wesangano reZImrights, VaDzikamai Bere, vanoti zvakaitika muAmerica zvakaratidzawo chimwe chinhu chikuru chekuti mutungamiri wenyika haasi pamusoro pemutemo. Vanhu vatanhatu kusanganisira mumwe mupurisa vakafa nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana mumhirizhonga iyi. Vamwe vanhu vanosvika mazana manomwe vakaendeswa kumatare mushure mekunge vabatwa nematikitivha eFBI ayo ari kuferefeta nyaya iyi. Muchuchusi mukuru wehurumende yeAmerica, VaMerrick Garland, vanoti vari kuzoita zvose zvavanokwanisa kuti vose vane chekuita nemhirizhonga iyi vamiswa pamberi pematare edzimhosva. Dare reHouse of Representatives rakaumbawo komiti ine nhengo kubva kumapato ose ari mudare iri kuti iferefetewo zvakaitika kusanganisira zvakaitwa naVaTrump pamwe nezvavasina kuita zvavaitarisirwa kuita semutungamiri wenyika panguva iyi. Vane ruzivo nezvenhoroondo yeAmerica vanoti mhirizhonga yakaitwa nevatsigiri vaVaTrump yakapedzisira kuonekwa makore mazana maviri nemasere adarika apo musi wa 24 Chikumi 1814 munguva yehondo pakati peBritain neAmerica, mauto eBritain akapinda muWashington DC ndokupisa dare reUS Capitol uye muzinda wemutungamiri wenyika nezvimwe zvivakwa. No media source currently available
title: VaBiden Voshora VaTrump neKukonzera Kusagadzikana muAmerica neKuramba Kutambira Zvakabuda Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weAmerica

text: Mutihwini ane mukurumbira munyika Kirsty Coventry neChipiri manheru akatora menduru yegoridhe kumakwikwi e11th All Africa Games ari kuitirwa Congo-Brazzaville.  Coventry ange achikwikwidza mumakwikwi e100 meters backstroke uye akakunda nenguva inoita 1’01. 1. Coventry akambotorawo goridhe kuma 2004 ne 2008 Olympic Games.
title: Kirsty Coventry Otora Menduru yeGoridhe kuMakwikwi eAll Africa Games

text: Vanhu makumi maviri nevatatu vari kutyirwa kuti vanogona kunge vakafa mumigodhi miviri kuBattlefields, Kadoma nemusi weChipiri mushure mekunge yapinda mafashamu emvura apo dhamu remunzvimbo iyi rakaputika nekuda kwemvura yainge yanaisa munharaunda iyi. Varidzi vemigodhi iyi iRioZim pamugodhi weCricket mine uye mumwe unonzi ndewaVaBaxter. Vanoona nezvemabasa mudunhu reMashonaland Amai Cecilia Chityo vakatenda kuti vari kutyira kuti vanhu ava vainge vafira mumugodhi uyu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaWelcome Zimuto vari kuita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro kuPrague, Czech Republic avo vakamboita ongororo yemamiriro ezvinhu munharaunda iyi vanoti hurumende haina mitemo yakajeka pakuchengetedza vanokorokoza kana kuchera zvicherwa.
title: Vanhu Vanodarika Makumi Maviri Votyirwa Kuti Vakafira Mumugoghi Kadoma

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, neChina vakange vari sachigaro wedare remakurukota semazuva ose pamusangano wakaitirwa kumahofisi avo eMunhumutapa muHarare panguva iyo vakawanda vanga vachitarisira kuti vanogona kutadza kuenda kubasa. VaMugabe vakakanganisa kutsika panhandare yendege neChitatu zvakapa kuti vagwadame pasi mushure mekutaura nevatsigiri vavo paHarare International Airport. Mutauriri waVaMugabe,VaGeorge Charamba, vakaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti VaMugabe neChina vakange vachitozvifambira uye VaMugabe mbune vati vari kunzwa zvakanaka. Kunyange VaMugabe vari kuti vari nani, munyika hamuna kutenderana kuti vanokwanisa here kuramba vachitungamira nyika ivo vari kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe nerimwe musi wa 21 Kukadzi. VaMugabe ndivo mutungamiri anyanya kukwegura munyika dzose dzepasi rino. Asi vanhu vane kodzero here yekutaura nezvehutano hwemutungamiri wenyika? Munyika zhinji dzine hutongo hwejekerere vanhu vanotaura nezvazvo. Pasi pebumbiro remitemo reZimbabwe muchikamu chechi makumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe, mutungamiri wenyika kana hutano hwake husisina kumira zvakanaka, asisakwanise kubata basa anopfanira kusiya chigaro. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF uye vaimbova mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaBright Matonga, vanoti VaMugabe vachiri vakasimba uye vakakunda musarudzo nekudaro vanhu vanofanira kuvasiya vachitonga. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika uye vaimboshanda kumuzinda weZimbabwe kuEthiopia, VaClifford Mashiri, vanoti VaMugabe vakwegura uye vanofanira kuenda pamudyandigere. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Vobvunza Kuti VaMugabe Voramba Vachitonga Here?

text: Zviuru nezviuru zvevatsigiri vebato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC zvaratidzira muguta reBulawayo nhasi zvichitsutsumwa nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. Asi mutungamiri webato iri VaMorgan Tsvangirai vange vachitarisirwa kuti vanogona kungosvika havana kuzokwanisa kuuya. VaTsvangirai avo vange vasinganzwe zvakanaka vange vachirapwa kuSouth Africa. Mutevedzeri waVaTsvangirai amai Thokozani Khupe nemunyori mukuru webato VaDouglas Mwonzora ndivo vange vachitungamira kuratidzira uku. Kuratidzira uku kwatanga nenguva dza 9 mangwanani paBulawayo City Hall. VaMwonzora vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanofunga kuti vanhu vauya vanodarika chuuru zana. Vanhu vauya pakuratidzira uku vange vakatakura zvinyorwa zvakanzi ‘Missing; US$15 billion, $15 billion = $1000 00 per person Ne 15 bhidza maproblems atsakatika disappear!” Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ndivo vanenge vakazvisikira mot muziso apo vakatenda voga kuti mari inosvika madhora mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu yainge yabiwa kwaChiyadzwa kunocherwa mangoda. Vanhu vange vachitsutsumwawo nenyaya yekushaya mabasa, hurombo uye kutyorwa kwekozdero dzevanhu. VaTsvangirai vakazivisa kuti kuratidzira uku kuchazoitwa mumatunhu ose enyika kuratidza kwebato iri kusafarira mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. Kuratidzira kweMDC-T kunoteverawo kuratidzira kwayakaita muHarare mwezdi wapera uye kuratidzira kwakaitwa nebato riri kutonga reZanu-PF richiti riri kutsigira mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaMugabe vakasimuka munyika nemusi weChishanu vakanga kuPapua New Guinea kumusangano weAfrican, Carribbean and Pacific Group States. Asi vatungamiri venyika dzakawanda vakatumira nhumwa dzavo chete zvichireva kuti VaMugabe ndivo voga mutungamiri wenyika yekunze akaenda kumusangano uyu uchakurukura nyaya dzehumhizha munyaya dzekurima. Mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vashora VaMugabe zvikuru vachiti gore rino chete vashandisa mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi masere nenzendo dzavo dzekunze. Vati pavatungamiri venyika dzepasi rino VaMugabe ndivo vane mhenduru yekusagara pasi sedzvatsvatsva. Kuratidzira kweMDC-T kwainge kwamborambidzwa nemapurisa achiti bato iri raizogona kuita mhirizhonga asi izvi zvakarambwa nedare repamusoro. VaMwonzora vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti vave kuronga kunoratidzira muguta reMutare musi wa 11 Chikumi vasati vaendazve kuMasvingo. No media source currently available
title: Zviuru neZviuru Zvevatsigiri veMDC-T Zvoratidzira Muguta reBulawayo

text: Mutauriri weZanu-PF mudunhu reMasvingo, VaRonald Ndava, vanoti sachigaro wedunhu iri, VaEzra Chadzamira, avo vanonzi vakambomiswa basa nenyaya yekuita zverusarura rwemarudzi nekukonzera kusagadzikana mubato, vachiri pabasa nekuti havana kusumwa zviri pamutemo. Asi vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa ezvematongerwo enyika muZanu-PF, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, vakaudza bepanhau reChronicle neMugovera kuti vainge vatumira tsamba idzi kare. Nyaya iyi inonzi iri kuratidza bata murefu bata mupfupi mubato pakati pevanonzi vanotsigira mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vechikwata chinonzi Team Lacoste, nevamwe vari kuchikwata chinonzi Generation 40 chinotsigirana naVaKasukuwere. Vamwe vanofungidzirwa kuti ndeveTeam Lacoste vakamiswa basa vanosanganisirawo VaMayor Justice Wadyajena kuMidlands, vanoona nezvematongerwo enyika kubazi revechidiki kuMasvingo, VaBrian Munyoro, uye mutevedzeri wasachigawo wedunhu reMidlands, VaGoodwill Shiri. VaChadzamira vati titaure nemutauriri wedunhu reMasvingo, VaNdava avo vaudza eStudio 7 kuti nyaya iyi vakatoionawo pamadandemutande. No media source currently available
title: Masvingo Inoti VaChadzamira Vachiri paBasa

text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu gumi nemumwe (11) vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvakasiya vafa nechirwere ichi vave chiuru nemazana manomwe nemakumi matatu nevatanhatu, kana kuti 1 736. Mutungamiriri wenyika yeSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, nezuro manheru vakazivisa kuti kutanga nhasi nyika yavo yapinda muchikamu chechina chekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19, kana kuti lockdown Level 4, kwemazuva gumi nemana ari kutevera, senzira yekuderedza kutekeshera kwedenda reCovid 19. Boka reZimbabwe National Statistics Agency, Zimstat, rinoti mitengo yezvinhu yakaramba ichikwira mumwedzi uno panguva iyo mihoro yevazhinji isiri kuchinja. Masangano akazvimirira munyika ari kushoropodza bato reZanu PF nekuapomera kwarinonzi rakaita mhosva yekupindira mune zvematongerwe enyika richiti mazhinji emasangano aya achamiswa kushanda munyika. Masangano aya anoti idzi inzira dzebato rinotonga iri dzekuda kumbunyikidza kodzero dzawo uye kuavharira kuti asaite basa rawo rekuva ziso revanhu nekurwira kodzero dzeveruzhinji. Kuenderera mberi kwedenda reCovid 19 kwopinza vanorarama nehusope munguva yakaoma sezvo dambudziko iri riri kuvashaisa chekudya pamwe nemafuta avanozora kudzivirira gomarara reganda. Vadzidzisi vanoshandira muBotswana vari zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe vanoti vari kufara zvikuru nedanho rakatorwa nehurumende yenyika iyi rekuronga kunge yabaya vadzidzisi vose mukupera kwemwedzi waChikunguru Muchirongwa cheLiveTalk na8pm tiri kutarisa dambudziko reCovid-19 pamwe nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. Kana muchida kupinda muchirongwa ichi, kanawo kutumira mashoko kuStudio7, shandisai WhatsApp nhamba dzinoti 001 202 465 0318. Vanoda kutererera Studio7, tibateyi na7pm pamasaisai anoti 909 am 4930; 13860, ne 15460 Kilohertz paShort Wave mazuva ose. Munokwanisawo kunzwa Studio7 na6 am - Muvhuro kusvika Chishanu, pamasaisai anoti 909 am, 6175, 7255 Short Wave.
title: Misoro yeNhau dzaNhasi, Muvhuro Chikumi 28, 2021

text: Komisheni inoona nezverunyararo munyika yeNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission (NPRC) inoti iri kuongorora zviri kukonzera gakava reminda kuChisumbanje mudunhu reManicaland. Mutauriri weNPRC, VaObert Gutu, vanoti nhengo dzekomisheni yavo dzatova nemasvondo anosvika maviri dzichiongorora nyaya yekubviswa kwevanhu kuChisumbanje nevemabhizimusi makuru izvo zviri kukonzera mvongamupopoto munzvimbo idzi. Kunzvimbo yeChisumbanje vagari vekuChinyamukwakwa vari kunetsana nekambani yeGreenFuel iyo iri kuvatorera minda nepavagere ichiti inoda kurima nzimbe. Kambani iyi yakapihwa mvumo iyi nehurumende. VaGutu vati kana komisheni yavo yaongorora nekuunganidza zvese zvainenge yawana, ichazivisa zvainokurudzira sekomisheni kuitira kuti kusawirirana uku kugadziriswe. Mumwe mugari wekuChinyamukwakwa, VaJerry Moyana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti komishini yeNPRC yakasvika kunzvimbo yavo ikataura nevagari ichivabvunzurudzwa zviri kukonzera gakava pakati pevagari nekambani iri kurima nzimba munzvimbo iyi. VaMoyana vatiwo komishini iyi yakavavimbisa kuti ichadzoka zvakare kuzovazivisa zvainenge vayawana huye zvavanenge vachikurudzira kuti zviitwe senzira yekugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Mutauriri weGreen Fuel, Muzvare Merit Rumema, vati vanga vasingakwanisi kutaura nesu sezvo vanga vakabatikana nemusangano wavanga vari kupinda. Gakava reminda pakati pevagari nekambani yeGreen Fuel rava nemakore richinetsa zvekuti Zimbabwe Humjan Rights Commission yakamboedzawo kugadzirisa dambudziko iri muna 2018 asi ikakundikana. Kunetsana uku kwakatanga muna 2008 apo hurumende yakapa mvumo kambani yeGreen Fuel kuti irime nzimbe muminda iri muChisumbanje. Mune imwewo nyaya, sangano rakazvimirira rinoona nezverunyararo, reNational Transitional Justice Working Group, kana kuti NTJWG, rinoti ranyorera NPRC kuti iferefete kuti ndiyani akaba dombo rekurangarira vafi rakaiswa kuSilobela kupera kwaNyamavhuvhu rikawanikwa risiko musi wa1 Gunyana. Murongi wemabasa muNTJWG, VaFortune Kuhudzehwe, vanoti aka hakasi kekutanga izvi zvichiitika. VaGutu vaudza Studio7 kuti komiti yavo haisati yatambira tsamba iyi, uye ikatambira tsamba iyi ichaongorora zvainenge yaudzwa. Dombo iri raiva raiswa zvinyorwa senzira yekurangarira vanhu gumi nevaviri vakapambwa vakatsakatika muna Ndira 1985 panguva yeGukurahundi. No media source currently available
title: NPRC Yoferefeta Gakava Riri kuChisumbanje

text:
Dare redzimhosva rekwaMutare nhasi raramba zvakare kupa mukana
wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kumurume akasungirwa mhosva yekuitisa
pamuviri mwanasikana aive nemakore gumi nemashanu, Anna Machaya, uyo akashaya panguva iyo aisununguka mwana wake kwaMafararikwa mudunhu reManicaland. Asi gweta riri kumirira murume uyu uyo anozivikanwa saVaHatirarami Momberume kana kuti VaEvans Momberume, VaBrian Majamanda vaisa chikumbiro chavo chekuti musungwa atongwe achibva kumba kwake kudare icho chichanzwikwa svondo rinouya kana mutongi Amai Lynne Mungwari vavepo. VaMomberume, avo vane makore makumi maviri nematanhatu
ekuberekwa, inhengo yekereke yemapositori ekwaJohanne Marange. VaMomberume vari kupomerwa mhosva yekubata chibharo pamwe nekukonzeresa kufa kwaAnna Machaya. Anna, uyo akawadzirwa nevabereki vake kuna VaMomberume, akafa mwedzi miviri yapfuura apo aisununguka pamuviri panonzi akaitiswa naVaMomberume. Masvondo maviri apfuura gweta raVaMomberume, VaBrian Majamanda havana kuda kupikisa dare kunyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kwavo; asi nhasi vati vakaisa chichemo chekuti VaMbomberume vatongwe vachibva kumba musi wa30 Nyamavhuvhu icho chichapinda mudare. Mutongi wedare, VaLangton Mukwengi ,vati chichemo ichi chinonzwikwa
chete nemutongi wenyaya iyi Amai Mungwari kana vavepo. VaMomberume vakarambirwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso mushure mekunge muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, VaTirivanhu Mutyasira, vapikisa vachiti
musungwa haakodzeri kuti apihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kuti
atongwe achibva kumba sezvo akatarisana nemhosva hombe, zvinopa mukana wekuti anokwanisa kutiza kana kukanganisa humbowo nevafakazi. Gweta ravo VaMajamanda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti chikumbiro chekubvisa mari
yechibatiso kudare chave kutarisirwa kuzeyiwa. "Nhasi panyaya yaVaMomberume tadzokera kudare sezvo takange takanzi
tiuye for routine remand saka aitwa further remanded to 17 September
2021, saka regional court iri kuita nyaya iyi. "isu takaisa bailapplication musi wa30 August saka maprosecutors akaitawo respond nezuro saka tangomirira kunzwa kwavari kuti vachatii nekuti hearing
yaida kuitwa nhasi yaregwa nekuti trial magistrate haapo saka
zvanzipamwe next week avepo we go ahead ne-hearing yacho." VaMajamanda vati vachakamirira zvakare kunzwa zvichabuda muongororo
dzakaitwa dzekuda kuburitsa pachena kana mwana akaberekwa uyu ari
waVaMomberume zvechokwadi.

"Maresults aHatirarami Momberume even the little baby so far hatisati
tave nemaresults, ekuti zvakamira seyi kuti vakaoneyi asi in due
course tichange toziva kuti zvakamira seyi." Gweta iri rinoti senguva dzose chikumbiro chavo chekubvisa mari
yechibatiso chikaraswa nedare repasi vanenge vokwidza nyaya iyi kudare
repamusoro reHigh Court, makare muno maMutare. Mudare nhasi mange musina vanhu vakanyanya kuwanda zvichienzaniswa
nemusi wekutanga wakapinda nyaya yaVaMomberume maSvondo maviri
apfuura.
title: Dare Rinoendesa Mberi Zvakare Nyaya yeMurume Ari Kupomerwa Mhosva yeKuroora Mwana Mudiki

text: Hurumende iri kuyambira varairidzi vasiri kuenda kumabasa pamwe neavo vari kuitisa vana zvidzidzo munguva dzisiri dzebasa vachibhadharisa mari, kana kuti private lessons, kuti vachanyimwa mihoro yavo kana kudzingwa mabasa. Gurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi VaCain Mathema vaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti bazi ravo rave kuzoshandisa mutemo wekuti kunobhadharwa chete varairidzi vari kuenda kumabasa vachinoshanda, vachiti vasiri kuenda kubasa kana kuti vari kuenda kubasa asi vasinganoshanda havabhadharwi kutanga izvozvi. VaMathema vatiwo vakumbira vakuru vezvikoro kuti vanyore mazita evarairidzi vasiri kushanda bazi ravo rozotumira mazita aya kuPublic Service Commission kuitira kuti vasiri kuenda kumabasa vasabhadharwa. Panyaya yevarairidzi vanonzi vari kuitisa zvidzidzo munguva dziri kunze kwebasa vachibhadharisa mari, hurumende yati pane vamwe varairidzi vari kunzi havachaiti mabasa avo vachingomirira kudzidzisa vana vachibhadharisa, danho rainoti haribvumidzwi uye iri kuita ongororo yekutsvaga vari kutyora mutemo ava. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata VaMathema kuti tinzwe zvizhinji. Asi danho rehurumende iri riri kuuya panguva iyo vashandi vehurumende vese vakatozivisa kuti havachakwanise kuenda kumabasa mazuva ose nekuda kwekushaya mari dzekufambisa. Vashandi vehurumende vari kuti vari kuda kuti mihoro yavo idzokere pamari dzavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018, dzinoita madhora mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri emari yekuAmerica. Asi hurumende inoti iri kugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi vayo kuburikidza nemisangano iri kuitwa pakti pevamiriri vehurumende nevamiriri vevashandi. Munyori mukuru werimwe sangano revarairidzi, re Progressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, VaRaymond Majongwe, vanoti danho ratorwa nehurumende iri rinotyisa uye rinoratidza kuti hurumende haidi vashandi vayo. Asi VaMajongwe vanoti hapana charinoshandura sezvo vashandi vasina mari dzekufambisa. Panyaya yekuti vasiri kuenda kumabasa vacharangwa, VaMajongwe vanoti havaoni hurumende ichikwanisa kutora matanho nekuti mushandi wayo wese haasi kuenda kubasa, zvinoreva kuti inotoda nguva ndefu kuti ipedze kuranga vashandi vese, avo vavanoti vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri. Vanotiwo sangano ravo richarwira varairidzi kuti vashashungurudzwa. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoyambira Varairidzi Vasiri Kuenda kuMabasa Kuti Havasi Kuzobhadharwa

text: Vanorarama nekutengesera mumigwagwa yemukati meguta reHarare pamwe nenhengo dzesangano reTajamuka/Sesijikile vanonzi vabatana mukurwisana nemapurisa ekanzuru pamwe neZimbabwe Republic Police ayo anonzi ari kuvabvisa nechisimba munzvimbo dzavanotengesera. Izvi zvinonzi zvaitikawo kudhorobha reNorton, uko kunonzi vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava varamba kubviswa pavanotengesera paKatanga. Mutauriri wesangano reTajamuka/Sesijikile, VaMakomborero Haruzivishe, vanoti vamwe vevanotengesera mumigwagwa inhengo dzesangano ravo dziri kuoneswa nhamo nemapurisa nguva dzose. VaHaruzivishe vanoti kusvika panguva yataenda pamhepo vanga vachiri pamapurisa kuti vaedze kuona kuti vanhu vangani vasungwa muchiitiko ichi, asi vanoti vanga vachiziva nezvemunhu mumwechete. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vati vanga vasati vanzwa zvizere nezvechiitiko ichi sezvo vanga vasiri muguta masikati. Asi hurumende, kuburikidza nebazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, yaburitsa mashoko paTwitter ichiti kune vachidiki vakawanda vanga vachitema mapurisa nematombo zvaita kuti vasungwe. Hurumende yatiwo ine humbowo hwemavhidhiyo anoratidza vechidiki ava vachitema mapurisa, uhwo huchashandiswa mudare redzimhosva pakuroverera vakasungwa ava nemhosva. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa neTajamuka Vanorwisana neMapurisa muHarare

text: Dare reNomination Court ravhurazve kutambira mapepa enzvimbo nhanhatu dzedare reNational Assembly uko kwaive kwambonzi hakuitwe sarudzo dzema by-elections. Dare reNomination Court ratambira mazita evanhu vachakwikwidza mumatunhu matanhatu akambenge anzi nedare repamusoro haasi kuitwa sarudzo. Matunhu aya anoti; Harare East ,uko kwaiva naVaTendai Biti, Kambuzuma kwaiva naVaWillias Madzimure, Mbizo kwaiva naVaSettlement Chikwinya, Nkulumane kwaive naVaKucaca Phulu, Pumula kwaive naVaSichelisile Mahlangu nekuMutasa South kwaive naVaRegai Tsunga. Vachitaura mushure mekuisa mapepa avo, VaMadzimure, avo vaisa mapepa pasi pebato idzva reCitizens Coalition for Change vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kutarisira kukunda zvine mutsindo kuKambuzuma vachiti vanhu vekunzvimbo iyi vanoziva ivo huye vanoterera zvichemo zvevanhu. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weCitizens Coalition for Change, VaGift Ostallos Siziba, vati nhengo dzavo dzese dziri nhanhatu dzakwanisa kuisa mapepa adzo. VaFungai Chiposi avo vaisawo mapepa avo vachida kumiririra Kambuzuma pasi pebato reMDC Alliance vati vari kutarisawo kukunda zvine mutsindo vachiti bato ravo ndiro bato guru rinopikisa. Zanu PF ichange ichimirirwawo naVaOscar Nyamukonoro kuKambuzuma, avo vati vari kutarisirawo kukunda. VaNyamukonoro vati musha weKambuzuma wange waparara vachiti vatungamiriri vange variko kubva kumapato anopikisa vaikonewa basa. Mutauriri weUnited Zimbabwe Alliance, VaTatenda Ishemukuru Ndlovu, vatiwo bato ravo raisa mapepa aVa Garikai Mlambo avo vachakwikwidza kuHarare East. Vamwe vaisa mapepa avo kukwikwidza Harare East ndiVa Biti, Amai Mavis Gumbo vachange vachimirira Zanu PF, Muzvare Precious Nyaradzo Musarurwa veLabour Economists and African Democrats naVaChristopher Lovemore Mbanga ve MDC Alliance. Zimbabwe Electoral Commission yati munhu mumwe chete kuHarare East nemumwe chete kuKambuzuma varambirwa mapepa avo Sachigaro weZimbabwe Election Support Network huye vari gweta, VaAndrew Makoni, vati kupa mitongo yakasiyana siyana kwakaitwa nedare reHigh Court p kunopa kuti vanhu varase tariro nematare. Kudunhu reMidlands vanhu vashanu ndivo vabudirira kuisa mapepa avo ekuzokwikwidza musarudzo dzema-by elections VaMakoni vatiwo nguva yapiwa vanhu kuti vagadzirire mapepa avo yanga iri shoma zvakanyanya. Kune dzimwe nzvimbo dziri kuitwa maby-elections muna Kurume, uye nomination court yakatambira mazita evanhu ava musi was 26 Ndira. No media source currently available
title: VaBiti neVamwe Vavo Vanonyoresa Kuitira Kuti Vavhote Muna Kurume

text: Vamwe vechidki vanoti bhajeti yakaturwa negukurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, yakanaka zvikuru kana kuchitariswa zvakanangana nevechidki. Asi vamwewo vanoti havagutsikane vachitiwo hurumende ine tsika yekutaura zvinhu zvaisingaite. Mumwe wevechidiki uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Ropa anove mudzidzi ati akafara nematanho akataurwa naVaChinamasa ekuedza kuderedza mari inoshandiswa nehurumende kusanganisira kumiswa kwema youth officers basa. Ropa ati akafadzwawo nenyaya yekuti VaChinamasa vakabuda pachena vachitaura kukosha kwezvikoro zvinodzidzisa mabasa emaoko - kana kuti vocational colleges- sezvo vechidiki vakawanda vasina mabasa. Asi anoti anoshushikana nekusabuda pachena kwaVaChinamasa panyaya yerutsigiro runopiwa vadzidzi vekuzvikoro zvepamusoro. Mumwewo wechidiki, Muzvare Musa Sibanda, vati vanotambirawo hurongwa hwakaturwa naVaChinamasa nemufaro asi vati hururmende inofanirwa kuve nehurongwa hwakajeka hwekubatsira vechidiki vanoda kuita zvemabhizmisi kuti vawane rubatsiro urwu kuchitariswa kuti munhu abuda mumba maani. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Organisation for Youth in Politics, VaNkosilathi Moyo, vanoti nyaya yekudzingwa kwema youth officer inyaya yakanaka zvikuru sezvo veruzhinji vaigara vachitsutsumwa kuti vanhu ava vaive vasina basa ravanoita kunze kwekushandiswa mune zvematongerwo enyika. Vati vanovimba kuti hurongwa hwaVaChinamasa haungogumire pakutaura chete. Mutauriri webato reZAPU variwo mumwe wevechidiki, VaIphithule Maphosa, vatsinhirawo zvimwe chete vachiti hurumende inofanirwa kuenderera mberi nekubvisa vamwe vanhu vanohora mari vachinzi vashandi vehurumende asi ivo pasina basa ravanenge vachiita, kana kuti ghost workers. Mutauriri weboka revechidki mubato reMDC T, VaBrian Dube, vati maonero avo ndeekuti kubviswa kwema youth officers kune chekuita nemakakatanwa ari mubato reZanu PF vachitiwo hurumende yeZanu PF inofanirwa kudzidza kuita zvinhu zvakakoshera veruzhinji, kwete zvekuti iyo ikwanise kuramba iri muhutongi.\n\nVaDube vashorawo nyaya yekuti mauto nemapurisa ndemamwe emapazi akanzi achapiwa mari yakawanda kudarika mamwe vachiti havawone chikonzero chekuita izvi sezvo nyika iri murunyararo. Muhurongwa hwavakatura neChina, VaChinamasa vakakoshesa kuti hurumende haifanirwe kushandisa mari yakawanda vakataurawo kuti nzendo dzekubuda kunze kwenyika dzinoitwa nevakuru vakuru vehurumende dzichave shoma sezvo hupfumi hwenyika kusina kumira zvakanaka. No media source currently available
title: Vechidiki Votambira Bhajet Zvakasiyana

text: Dhora reRTGS radzikira huremu zvekare kechipiri kubva zvakatarwa huremu uyu nagavhuna weRBZ Doctor John Mangudya apo vakaparura hurongwa hwekufambswa kwemari. VaMangudya vainge vati dhora iri ritengeswe ne 2.5 (1:2.5) padhora rekuAmerica mumabhanga asi nemusi weChina range rakwira kusvika pa2.7. Pamukoto dhora rekuAmerica riri kutengeswa ne 3.6 kusvika ku3.8. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi VaTendai Biti vanoti izvi hazvifashamise uye vayambira kuti zvinhu zvakasagadziriswa munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dhora richaramba richishaya simba. No media source currently available Asi muzvinabhizmisi vari nhengo yeZanu-PF VaGilbert Muponda vanoti zvchatora nguva kuti RTGS rinyatsogadzikane asi vati hurumende iri mugwara. No media source currently available
title: Dhora reRTGS Rodzika Huremu muMabhanga Richikwira Kusvika pa2.7

text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi vemumabhanga, reZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, (ZIBAWU), rinoti nhengo dzaro dziri kuronga kuratidzira musi wa 13 mwedzi unouya dzichinyunyuta nemabatirwo ari kuitwa vashandi nebhanga reEcobank Zimbabwe. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru weZIBAWU, VaShepherd Ngandu, vanoti sangano ravo rasvika pakutora danho iri nekuona kuti bhanga re Ecobank Zimbabwe harisi kuda kubaira vashandi varo vakawanda zvitupa, izvo zviri kuita kuti varambe vachishanda sema contract kana kuti casual. VaNgandu vanoti zvakare bhanga iri riri kuramba kuti vashandi vaumbe makomiti anovamirira kanawo kuti vapinde muzvirongwa zvinoitwa nesangano rinomirira vashandi vekumabhanga. VaNgandu vanoti vakatozivisawo mapurisa nezuro kuti vachange vachiratidzira murunyararo, kunyange hazvo vasingasungirwe kuzivisa mapurisa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reEcobank panyaya iyi sezvo nhare dzavo dzanga dzisingadairwi. No media source currently available
title: Ecobank Yokonzera Mutauro Zvopa Kuti Vashandi Varatidzire

text: Paita ropa rakaipa pakati pameya weHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, nevakafanobata chigaro chemunyori weguta, Amai Josephine Ncube, panyaya yezvikwereti zvine vagari, hurumende uye makambani akazvimirira kukanzuru. VaManyenyeni vanonzi vakambomisa nyaya yekutengeswa kwemidziyo yevagari vane zvikwereti kukanzuru nekambani inonzi Wellcash Debt Collectors. Asi Amai Ncube vanoti hapana kudududza panyaya iyi. Kanzuru inoti vagari, mapazi ehurumende nemakambani vane zvikwereti zvinodarika mamiriyoni mazana matanhatu. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwa nemutauriri weguta reHarare City Council VaMichael Chideme. Sachigaro wesangano revagari reCombined Harare Resident’s Association, VaSimbarashe Moyo, vaimbenge vatambira mashoko ameya nemufaro vachiti vagari vakaomerwa sezvo munyika musina mabasa. VaMoyo vanoti kunyangwe midziyo yevagari iri kutengeswa hakuna zviri kubatsira nekuti mari iri kuwanikwa kumaauction haina chairi kubatsira. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, VaCallisto Jokonya, vatiwo kune vemakambani zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kuhurumende kuti sei isiriwo kubhadhara zvikwereti kukanzuru sezvo nharembozha yegurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, yange isiri kudairwa. Asi pangaitwe sei kugadzirisa dambudziko iri kuti makambani asavharwe uye kuti vagari vasatengeserwe midziyo? VaChideme vanoti chido chavo ndechekuti paitwe nhaurirano nevane zvikwereti. VaMoyo vanoti vagari vanodawo kuti vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara pashoma pashoma. VaJokonya vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vanhu vose munyika vagare pasi kuita muonera pamwe chuma chemuzukuru. Muna 2013 hurumende yakambokanganwira vanhu vose zvikwereti kukanzuru nezvemagetsi kukambani yeZESA. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaJoy Mabenge vanoti vanoona hurumende ichikanganwira vanhu zvikwereti. Asi VaMabenge vatiwo zvakakosha kuti mari inenge yabhadharwa yemitero ishandiswe zvakanaka kwete kuti mamaneja ekanzuru anenge achidya norivha asi basa risiri kuitwa. Nyaya yekuti muhomwe mekanzuru inhava izere mhepo yapawo kuti kanzuru itadze kubhadhara zvikwereti kuZIMRA, National Social Security Authority uye kuHarare Municipal Medical Aid Society. Vanhu vakawanda munyika havana mabasa zvapa kuti kune vakawanda zvabva zvaita kuti pashaye chembwa tenzi vararira mutakura. No media source currently available
title: Kutengeswa kweMidziyo yeVagari Kwokonzera Mutauro muHarare

text: Apo nyika iri kupemberera mazuva emagamba nemauto, vakawanda muChinhoyi vanoti hapana chekupemberera sezvo vanhu vakawanda vasiri kufara nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi, pamwe nekutyorwa kwekodzero dzavo nemauto. No media source currently available Mumwe mugari wemumusha unogara veruzhinji weGadzema, VaGoodwill Zhanda, vanoti hapana chekupemberera zuva remagamba ivo vane nzara. VaZhanda vanoti havana kuenda kunopemberera zuva remauto sezvo vanga vachitengesa mbatya kuti vararamise mhuri yavo. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaClemence Mhaka, vanoti kurwisana kuri kuitika mubato reZanu PF vachipumhana uroyi kunoita kuti veruzhinji vafunge kuti hapana munhu anganzi igamba rechokwadi. Asi mumwe mugari wekwaZvimba, kunova kumusha kwemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, VaCuthbert Chirau, avo vanga vari kupemberera zuva remauto, vanoti zuva remagamba rinofanirwa kucherechedzwa. VaChirau vanoti izvi zvakakosha kuchizvarwa chemangwana kuti vazive kuti nyika yakamborwirwa sei. Chimwe chizvarwa chemuChinhoyi, VaAdrian Tsoto, avo vanga vari pabasa vanoti kukosha kwezuva remagamba nemauto hakuchakosheswe zvakanyanya nekuda kwekutambudzika kuri kuita veruzhinji. VaTsoto vanoti dai nyaya dzehupfumi dzagadziriswa kuitira kuti vanhu vaende kuzororo vaine mufaro pamwe nezvekudya. Vachitaura nhasi pachikoro cheNemakonde muChinhoyi, gurukota redunhu reMashonaland West, VaFaber Chidarikire, vachitura mashoko emutungamiri wenyika, vati vanorumbidza mauto enyika kunyange paine vamwe vanhu vari kuda kuti vatambira pfungwa yekushandura hurumende. Zimbabwe yakacherechedza Heroes Day nezuro, uye nhasi ranga riri zuva rekucherechedza mabasa emauto. Vanhu vashoma muChinhoyi vacherechedza hurongwa uhu sezvo vanhu vanga vakawanda vanga vari vana vechikoro. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoti vanhu vakawanda havasi kupa mauto chiremera nepamusana pekuti mauto emuZimbabwe anoshandiswa neZanu PF mukushungurudza vanopikisa hurumende pamwe nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu.
title: Vakawanda Vanoti Hapana Chekucherechedza paZuva reMauto

text: Maguta akawanda munyika atambira kurudziro yekuti vanhu vasaende kubasa vachinyuta nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. Asi zvinonzi vanhu vakawanda vasungwa nemapurisa uye zvimwe zvinhu zvikapiswa. Gurukota rinoona nezvehumhizha mukufambiswa kwemashoko VaSupa Mandiwanzira voramba kuti hurumende ndiyo yambodzima madandemutande akaita sewhatsapp mangwanani. Mutungamiri webato reMDC-T VaMorgan Tsvangirai vanoti zvakakosha kuti munyika muitwe nhaurirano sezvo zvinhu zvaenda kumawere. VaAcie Lumumba vopihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekuti vakatuka mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Muchirongwa cheLivetalk na8.30 pm tiri kutarisa nyaya yekuratidzira kwaitwa munyika yose nhasi. Kana muchida kupinda muchirongwa ichi, kanawo kutumira mashoko kustudio7, shandisai whatsapp panhamba dzinoti + 1 202 465 0318. Vanoda kuteerera Studio 7, tibateyi na 7 pm pamasaisai anoti 909 am ne 4930 Kilohertz pa Short Wave. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau, Chitatu Chikunguru 06, 2016

text: Vamwe vakaputsirwa dzimba kuBuduriro pasi pemushandirapamwe unonzi Tembwe Housing Cooperative vanyora tsamba kumutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga kuti vavabatsira sezvo vari kuti mukanzuru maita huori. Mumwe akaputsirwa imba VaEddison Zibwowa vanoti havasati havo vawana mhinduro kubva kuna VaChiwenga. Vanotiwo vakanyora tsamba kusangano rinorwisa huori reZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission makore maviri adarika asi harina kutumira vanhu kuzoferefeta nyaya iyi. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wesangano iri VaJohn Makamure kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi vachitaura nevatori venhau, gurukota rezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo vakati hapana kudzokera kumashure pakupwanya dzimba dzakavakwa zviri kunze kwemutemo panongopera mvura kunaya kusanganirisa vedzimba dzeTembwe dzekuBudiriro idzi. No media source currently available
title: Vakaputsirwa Dzimba kuBudiriro Vokumbira VaConstantino Chiwenga Kuti Vavabatsire

text:
Sarudzo dzekutsvaga mutungamiri wenyika, nenhengo dzeparamende pamwe
nemakanzura idzo dzinofanirwa kuitwa pamwechete gore rinouya, 2018, dzinotarisirwa kuitwa mazuva ari pakati pekupera kwemwedzi waChikunguru kusvika pakati pemwedzi waNyamavhuvhu zvichienderana nebumbiro remitemo idzva. Izvi zvinopesana nemashoko emutevedzeri wasachigaro weZimbabwe Election Commission (ZEC) ekuti sarudzo dzinoitwa pakati pemwedzi waChikumi naNyamavhuvhu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemitemoGweta Muzvinafundo VaLovemore Madhuku vanoti
kana hupenyu hweparamende hukasadimburirwa panzira sezvinotarisirwa sarudzo dzinofanirwa kuitwa mukati memwedzi wekupedzisira hupenyu hweparamende iripo husati hwapera. Hupenyu hweparamende iripo hunoguma pakati pehusiku hwemusiwa 22
Nyamavhuvhu nokudaro mazuva makumi matatu ekupedzisira anotanga musiwa
24 Chikunguru.
Izvi zvinoreva kuti sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzinoitwa pakati pemazuva
ekubva musiwa 24 Chikunguru kusvika musi wa22 Nyamavhuvhu.

Muzvinafundo Madhuku vanotiwo sarudzo idzi dzinogona kuitwawo nguva
ipi zvayo kana hupenyu hweparamende iripo hwagurirwa panzira
nezvikonzero zvakasiyana zviri mubumbiro remitemo. Kana hupenyu hwehurumende hwagurirwa panzira zvinofanira kutora mwedzi
mitatu kuti sarudzo dziitwe. Hupenyu hweparamende hunogona kugurirwa panzira nemukuru wenyika
nekuda kwezvinhu zvitatu zvinoti kana dzimba dzeparamende dzose
yepamusoro nepazasi dzakazvimiririra dzapasisa chisungo chakuti
dzisavepo, uyezve kana paramende yaramba kupasisa bhajeti renyika
pasina zvikonzero zvakati tsvikiti pamwe nekunge paramende yawirirana
kuti haichina chivimbo nehurumende, vote of no confidence. Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weZEC VaEmmanuel Magade vakataurira vatori venhau kuti sarudzo hadzisi kuitwa nekukurumidza sezviri kufunga vamwe vanhu. Mashoko aya akatsinhirwawo naAmai Rita Makaru vanova sachigaro weZEC vakati vanotevera bumbiro pakutara zuva resarudzo. Vaimbove sachigaro weZimRights uye vari gweta VaKucaca Phulu
vanowirirana nemaonero amuzvinafundo Madhuku. VaPhulu vanoti nyika ingangoenda kusarudzo nekukurumidza chete kana
hupenyu hweparamende iripo hwagumisirwa panzira. VaPhulu vanoti izvi
hazvinetse kuitika sezvo bato reZanu PF riine nhengo dzakawanda mudare. Sangano reVeritas rinotsigira maonero emagweta pamutemo vachiti kunyange
mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari ivo vanemasimba ekudoma zuva
richaitwa sarudzo, VaMugabe havagone kutara rimwe zuva ravanoda
riri kunze kwemazuva ari pakati pa24 Chikunguru na21 Nyamavhuvhu gore
rinouya. Kunyange hazvo sarudzo dzegore ra2013 dzakaitwa musi wa31 Chikunguru,
hupenyu hwehurumende hwakatanga musi wa22 Nyamavhuvhu zuva rakagadzwa
VaMugabe semutungamiri wenyika. Mumwe wevaimbove sachigaro weboka rakatungamirira kunyorwa kwebumbiro
remitemo uye vari munyori mukuru wabato reMDC-T inotungamirirwa
naVaMorgan Tsvangirai , VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti vakatara mazuva
esarudzo mubumbiro remitemo kudzivirira mutungamiri wenyika kuti
asatare zuva resarudzo paanodira. Mutevedzeri wemunyori wezvemutemo mubato reZanu-PF VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana vanoti mutemo wakajeka. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika Dr Pedzisayi Ruhanya vanoti VaMugabe
vachashevedzera zuva resarudzo zviri pamutemo vachishandisa nzira dzakatarwa mubumbiro. VaRuhanya vanoti vanoona VaMugabe vachikurumidza kuti sarudzo dziitwe
nekuda kwekuti vave mutana. Chimwe chinhu chichaita kuti sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzinakidze
ndechekuti vanenge vachikwikwidza kutungamira nyika vanofanirwa kudoma
vatevedzeri vavo vaviri vasati vaenda kusarudzo. Vaviri ava vanenge vachivabatsira kutsvaka rutsigiro, uye ndivo vanozodomwa
kuve vatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika kana sarudzo dzapera. Mutemo unosungira kuti mutungamiri wenyika awirirane zuva resarudzo
reZEC. Mutemo unotiwo panofanirwa kuva nemazuva asiri pasi pemakumi mana
nemana kana anodarika makumi masere nemana pakati penguva inotaurwa
zuva resarudzo nemusi unoitwa sarudzo dzacho. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzozeya nezveZuva reSarudzo dza2018

text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti vanhu makumi matatu nevasere vakawanikwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga pazviuru makumi matatu nezvisere negumi nevasere, kana kuti 38 018. Hapana munhu akafa izvo zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa huchiri pachiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nevashanu, kana kuti 1 555. Bazi iri rakatiwo vanhu zviuru gumi nezviviri nemazana mana ane makumi mana, 12 440, vakabaiwawo nhomba yavo yekutanga zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevabaiwa nhomba yekutanga pazviuru mazana matatu nezvisere zvine makumi manomwe nemumwe, kana kuti 308 071. Vamwe zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana matatu ane makumi matanhatu nevatatu, kana kuti 6 363, vakabaiwa nhomba yepiri nezuro wakare izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba iyi pazviuru makumi mana nezvitatu zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nevasere, kana kuti 43 728. Hurumende ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kuitira kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano vari zvakare munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr. Henry Madzorera, vanoti kudzikira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubaiwa nhomba yepiri kunobva pakuti vanhu vakabaiwawo nhomba yekutanga pakatanga chirongwa ichi vaivewo vashoma sezvo nguva iyi kwaibaiwa vashandi vari pamberi mukurwisana neCovid-19 chete. Asi vanoti nekuda kwekuti veruzhinji vave kuona kuti hapana ari kufa kuburikidza nenhomba iyi, uyewo kuti vatungamiri vakabaiwawo nhomba, veruzhinji vave kuita chivimbo nayo. Dr. Madzorera vanokurudzira kuti dai hurumende yabvumidzawo vemasejari, makiriniki pamwe nezvipatara zvakazvimirira kuti vabayewo nhomba iyi kuitira kuti nyika ikwanise kusvika pamamiriyoni gumi airi kutarisira kubaya. Panyaya yevanhu vashoma vari kubatwa pamwe nekufa neCovid-19, Dr. Madzorera vanoti vanongoda kutanga nekutenda Mwari kuti denda iri harisi kubata pamwe nekuuraya vanhu vakawanda, asi vanoti zvakakosha kuti dzidziso irambe ichipiwa kuvanhu kuitira kuti huwandu uhwu hurambe huri pasi. No media source currently available
title: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kubaiwa Nhomba Yekutanga Hunokwira Zvakare

text: Vamwe vatsigiri vebato reMDC Alliance rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa vachigara muBotswana vave kuita mudemhe mudemhe senzira yekubatsira dzimwe shirikadzi dzakatizira kuZimbabwe nenyaya yemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika. Dzimwe shirikadzi idzi dzinoti Botswana yakaramba kudzipa hupoteri sezvakaitwa vamwe vari pakamba yeDukwi Refugee Camp. Mumwe weshirikadzi idzi dzinosvika gumi neshanu dzakapoteri munyika iyi ndiAmai Cathrine Chandaengerwa avo vanorarama nekuita mabhindauko akasiyana siyana mudhorobha reGaborone muBotswana. Vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vanotoona zviri nani kugara vakahwanda munyika iyi nokuti muZimbabwe makaberekera ingwe. Amai Chandaengerwa, avo vanoti vakapisirwa imba nevafungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZANU PF pakati pehusiku, vaenderera mberi vachiti kusamira zvakanaka kwezve matongerwo enyika nehupfumi ndiko kuri kuita kuti varambire muBotswana kunyangwe zvinhu zvooma munyika iyi nokuda kwechirwere cheCOVID-19. Imwe shirikadzi iyo isina kuda kudomwa nezita ichiti inotya kuitwa murondatsimba nevasori kubva kuZimabbwe vaudza Studio 7 kuti kugara muBotswana kuri nani pane kudzokera kumusha nokuda kwechirongwa chekupihwa chikafu nevamwe vavo vane pavanobata bata. Sachigaro webato reMDC-Alliance muBotswana iyo iri pasi peSouth Africa Province, VaJohn Pamire vanoti vatsigiri vebato ravo vakatangisa hurongwa uhu mushure mekuona kuti rwuzhinji rweshirikadzi idzi rwakanga rwononga svosve nemuromo munyika yevatorwa. VaPamire vaudza Studio7 kuti shirikadzi idzi dzinopihwa hupfu, matemba, mupunga, mafuta ekubikisa, sipo dzekuwachisa nekugezesa nezvimwe zvinodiwa pakurarama kwemunhu mwedzi wega wega. Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZANU PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vanoti ZANU PF haina ropa mumaoko ayo uye mashoko anotaurwa nevatsigiri veMDC ndeekuda kusvibisa bata ravo. Kunyangwe hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kuti haityore kodzero dzevanhu, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri muhupoteri munyika dzakaita seBotswana neSouth Africa vamwe nenyaya yezvehupfumi vamwe zvematongerwo enyika. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeMDC Alliance Dzobatsira Shirikadzi Dziri muHupoteri kuBotswana

text: Sachigaro weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe kana kuti GMAZ VaTafadzwa Musarara vanoti mutengo wechingwa ucharamba uchikwira zvakanyanya kana hondo pakati peUkraine neRussia ikaramba ichienderera mberi. Russia neUkraine ndidzo dzinorima gorosi rinosvika zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana rinotengeswa pasi rose. VaMusarara vaudza Studio 7 kuti nekuda kwehondo iyi, nyika mbiri idzi dzamira kutengesa gorosi range richitariswa munyika uye mutengo wegorosi wabva wakwira kubva pamadhora mazana mana nemakumi matanhatu nemashanu kana kuti US$475 kusvika pamadhora mazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nemashanu kana kuti US$685. No media source currently available Mutengo wefurawa inogadziriswa chingwa wakwirawo nezvikamu gumi kubva muzana. Izvi zvave kupawo kuti mutengo wechingwa ukwirewo. Chingwa chakawedzerwa mutengo svondo rapera uye rofu rimwe riri kutengwa nemadhora ari pakari pemazana maviri nemakumi mashanu ZWD250 kusvika kumazana matatau ZWD300 emari yemunyika. No media source currently available
title: Mutengo weChingwa Wotarisirwa Kuramba Uchikwira neNyaya yeKurwiswa kweUkraine neRussia.

text: Mutungamiri weZanu PF, uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, vadoma vaimbove mukuru wemauto, VaConstantino Guvheya Chiwenga, semumwe wevatevedzeri wavo mubato re Zanu PF. Mumwe adomwa kuva mutevedzeri waVaMnangagwa, ndiVa Kembo Mohadi, avo vapinda panyanga vakamirira vanhu vaive nhengo dze PF Zapu pasati paitwa mubatanidzwa weZanu PF ne PF Zapu muna 1987. VaChiwenga vakaendeswa pamudyandigere nemusi weMuvhuro, VaMnangagwa vachiti vange vakamirira kuvaendesa kunoita rimwe basa. Kudomwa kwaVa Chiwenga naVaMohadi sevatevedzeri waVa Mnangagwa, kwava kureva kuti VaChiwenga naVaMohadi vachange vave vatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika muhurumende. Vakawanda vanoona kudomwa kwaVaChiwenga senzira yatorwa naVaMnangagwa yekutenda VaChiwenga pabasa guru ravakaita rekutungamira mauto kuti abvise vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pachigaro. VaChiwenga nevamwe vavo muchiuto ndivo vakaita kuti VaMnangagwa vakwanise kudzokera munyika mushure mekunge vambopotera kuSouth Africa zvichitevera kudzingwa kwavo muhurumende naVaMugabe. Kudomwa kwaVaChiwenga naVaMohadi kwaziviswa nemunyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaGeorge Charamba, avo vanotaura zvakare vakamirira VaMnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika. Izvi zvashamisa vanhu vakawanda sezvo VaCharamba vasiri mutauriri weZanu PF. Mashoko aya anga achifanirwa kuziviswa naVaSimon Khaya Moyo, vanova mutauriri weZanu PF. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaKhaya Moyo.
title: VaChiwenga naVaMohadi Vanoitwa Vatevedzeri vaVaMnangagwa muZanu PF

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe nezvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa zvave kugara zvakabatira ura mumaoko zvichitevera kurwiswa kwevekunze mumusha weMamelodi uri muPretoria neChipiri usiku. Kurwiswa uku kunotevera kuparadzwa kwemabhizimusi, dzimotokari pamwe nedzimba dzezvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika kwakatanga mumusha weRosettenville uri muJohannesburg masvondo maviri adarika. Mukuru werimwe sangano rinobatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri munyika iyi reZimbabwe exiles Forum, Advocate Gabriel Shumba, vanoti kurwiswa kwevanhu muJohannesburg kwakanyanya kunangana nezvizvarwa zvekuNigeria zvaipomerwa mhosva yekutengesa zvinodhaka pamwe nechipfambi. Asi vanoti kurwiswa kwakaitika kuMamelodi kwakanga kwakanangana nechero munhu asiri chizvarwa cheSouth Africa. Zvitoro zvezvizvarwa zvekuEthiopia, Somalia neNigeria ndizvo zvinonzi zviri kunyanya kuparadzwa, zvinhu zvichibiwa. Vagari vemuPretoria vanonzi vari kuronga kufora neChishanu vachiratidzira vachiramba vanhu vekune dzimwe nyika. Asi zvinonzi mapurisa anyima mvumo vanhu ava kuti varatidzire, kunyange hazvo vari kunzi vati vachangoratidzira zvakadaro. Mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaJacob Zuma, vakakurudzira zvizvarwa zvenyika yavo kuti zvigarisane nevabvakure ava murunyararo. Zvinonziwo hurumende yeNigeria iri kuronga kukwidza nyaya iyi kusangano reUnited Nations ichinyunyuta nekushungurudzwa kuri kuitwa zvizvarwa zvayo. No media source currently available
title: Vabvakure Vooneswa Chitsvuku muSouth Africa

text: Kereke yeAnglican Church mudunhu reManicaland yaita chibvumirano nekambani yeEconet, yeCassava, icho chichasimudzira magariro evanhu munzvimbo dzinoshandira chechi iyi mudunhu iri. Vachitaura mushure mekusaina chibvumirano ichi, bhishopu veAnglican Church muManicaland, VaErick Ruwona, vati vanotarisira kuti kuumbwa kwembani yechechi yavo yeHoly Trinity Enterprises kuchavandudza mararamiro evagari vemudzinharaunda nekuvawanira mabasa akasiyana siyana ekutengesa zvinhu zveCassava zvinosanganisira Ecosure, Moovar, Maisha, Vaya, neEcoFarmer. Vati izvi zvichaitika munharaunda dzakasiyana siyana mudunhu reManicaland dzinosanganisira Chipinge, Nyanga, Chimanimani, Mutasa, Makoni, Mutare, uye neWedza kuMashonaland East. Bhishopu Ruwona vati mushandira pamwe wavapo uyu uchabatsira vanhu munyaya dzehutano pamwe nekurwisa hurombo muvanhu vekumaruwa. Vachitaurawo mushure mekusaina chibvumirano ichi, mumwe mukuru wekuEcosure, VaGodwin Mashiri, vati vanotarisira kuti hukama hwavepo uhu huchasimudzira magariro evakawanda, kunyanya kumaruwa, uko vati kune hurombo hwakanyanyisa. VaMashiri vati vanotarisira zvakare kuti chirongwa chavo chichawanisa vagari mabasa uye kushandisa minda nenzira dzinowanisa vagari cheuviri. Vicar General weAnglican Church, VaAbel Waziweyi, vati vafara zvikuru nedanho ratorwa nekereke yavo rekuedza kusimudzira vanhu mumharaunda dzinowanikwa machechi nezvipatara zvechechi yavo.  Vapinda pachiitiko chanhasi vanosanganisira vakuru vezvikoro zvechechi iyi zviri mudunhu reManicaland, vakuru vemachechi mudunhu iri, pamwe nevamwe vane zvigaro zvepamusoro zveDiocese yeAnglican Church of the Province of Central Africa. No media source currently available
title: Kereke yeAnglican Yoita Chibvumirano neCassava Chinobatsira Vagari kuManicaland

text: Mutungamiri weNational Constitutional Assembly, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, avo vari mugungano rePolitical Actors Dialoge kana kuti POLAD, vari kushora zvikuru hurumende nedanho rekuda kuvandudza bumbiro remitemo vachiti izvi zvinofanira kutanga zvabva kuvanhu. VaMadhuku vanoti bumbiro remitemo harifanirwe kuchinjwa nehurumende inenge ichitonga sezvo zvichiratidza pachena kuti hurumende iyi inenge yava kuda kuita zvido zvayo pabumbiro rakabva muvanhu. No media source currently available Asi gurukota rinoona nezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vanoti hapana chakaipa pane zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvekuvandudza zvikamu zvine chekuita nekudomwa kwevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, kuwedzerwa kwemakore evatongi vanenge vasvika makore ekuenda pamudyandigere, uye kuda kuvandudzwa kudomwa kwevachuchusi vakuru vehurumende. No media source currently available Vanopikisa hurumende vanoti zviri kuda kuitwa izvi zvakanangana nekuda kupa masimba akawanda kumutungamiri wenyika.
title: Muzvinafundo Madhuku Voshora Kuvandudzwa kweBumbiro reMitemo

text: Gavhuna veReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, vataurira bepanhau reFinancial Gazette kuti Zimbabwe iri kunetseka kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo. Muna Gunyana gore rapera, zvikwereti zveZimbabwe izvi zvaiita mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe emamirioni emadhora asi pari zvino zvikwereti zvenyika zvinopfuura mazana matanhatu emamiriyoni emadhora. Zvichakadaro, VaMangudya vataura izvi apo bhanga repasi rose, reWorld Bank raburitsa mashoko ekuyambira Zimbabwe kuti ivandudze mitemo yainoshandisa munyaya dzezvemari, richiti kana Zimbabwe ikasavandudza mitemo iyi, zvinhu munyaya dzezvemari zvinogona kukanganisika zvakaipisisa gore rino risati rapera. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi uye vachishanda neLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti pari zvino hurumende iri kushandisa mari yakawanda kugadzirira sarudzo uye kuhoresa vashandi vayo, naizvozvo mitemo mizhinji haigone kuvandudzwa iye zvino asi mushure mesarudzo. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Inoti Irikunetseka Kubhadhara Zvikwereti Zvayo

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzesarudzo dzinoti hapana mutemo unopa Zimbabwe Electoral Commission kuramba kutambira mapato maviri ane zita rimwe chete kuti akwikwidze musarudzo kunyange hazvo zvichivhiringa vanhu vanovhota Mashoko aya anotevera danho rakatorwa neMDC-T, iro rakanyorera Zimbabwe Electoral Commission richiti ndiro richange richishandisa zita rekuti MDC Alliance musarudzo dzichaitwa munyika. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Election Support Network, VaAndrew Makoni, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pasi pemutemo weElectoral Act zvinogoneka kuti mapato maviri akwikwidze sarudzo achishandisa zita rimwe chete asi achishangisa mifananidzo yakasiyana. Asi VaMakoni, avo vanova nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo, vanoti kushandisa zita rimwe chete kunogona kuvhiringa vavhoti. VaMakoni vatiwo sangano ravo rinokatyamadzwa kuti MDC inotungamirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora, iyo yakaita kuti dzimwe nhengo dzidzingwe mudare reNational Assembly pamwe nemumakanzuru akasiyana siyana vachipomerwa mhosva yekuzviti nhengo dzeMDC Alliance, yava kudzokera zvakare kusarudzo ichishandisa zita rimwe chete. VaMakoni vatiwo vanokurudzira kuti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission inyorese mapato nemazita awo kuitira kudzivirira dambudziko rakadai. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaOstallos Siziba, varamba kutaura nezvenyaya yezita iyi vachiti titaure nemutauriri webato ravo, Muzvare Fadzai Mahere, avo vanga vasingadairi nharembozha yavo patanga tichivafonera. Vachitaura pamusangano wavakaita nevatori venhau nezuro muHarare, VaMwonzora vakati ndivo varidzi vezita rekuti MDC Alliance, uye ndiro zita ravachashandisa musarudzo. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika nesarudzo, VaSydicks Muradzikwa, vatiwo vanoona sekuti pari kuitwa shayisano pamapato maviri aya senzira yekuvhiringa vavhoti. Vachibvunzwa kuti vachanyoresa here mapato aya ari maviri nezita rimwe chete, mutauriri weZEC, Amai Leticia Kazembe, vaudza Studio7 kuti vange vari pamusangano kuVictoria Falls vakati titumire mibvunzo yedu iyo vati vachapindura kana vawana mukana wekuita izvi. Asi pataenda pamhepo, vanga vasati vatipa mhinduro yavo. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzinoti Mapato Akasiyana Anogona Kushandisa Zita Rakafanana Musarudzo

text: Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvedenda reCovid-19 inoti zvikoro zvepamusoro munyika zviri kubatsira zvikuru pakurwisana neCovid-19 nekugadzira mbatya dzekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri kana Personal Protective Clothing, PPEs, masanitaiza nezvimwe. Izvi zvinoitika apo hurumende iri kupona nerubatsiro runobva kune dzimwe nyika nemasangano anopa rubatsiro kutenga zvinhu izvi. Mutevedzeri wasachigaro wekomiti iyi, Muzvinafundo Amon Murwira, vanoti zvikoro izvi zviri kushanda zvakaomarara kubatsira vana veZimbabwe. Mwedzi wapera, zvikoro izvi zvakaendesa kukambani yehurumende inoona nezvemushonga yeNatpharm mamasiki miriyoni imwe nemazana mana ezviuru nemarita ema sanitizer anodarika mazana mapfumbamwe ezviuru. Zvimwe zviri kugadzirwa nemayunivhesiti zvinosanganisira shangu nedzimwe mbatya dzekushandisa muzvipatara. Vatiwo Harare Institute of Technology yave pedyo nekupedza kugadzira muchina wekubatsira varwere kufema kana kuti Ventilator pachirungu. Zvikoro zvepamusoro zviri kugadzirra maPPEs zvinosanganisira, University of Zimbabwe, National University of Science and Technology, Chinhoyi University of Technology, Great Zimbabwe University pamwe neBindura University of Science. Svondo rino Bindura University of Science Education yakazivisa kuti yakawana mari inodarika mamimiriyoni makumi matatu emadhora emuno nekugadzira nekutengesa maPPEs. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vanoti zviri kuitwa nemayunivhesiti zvakanaka chose asi vachiti mari inowanikwa kubva mukugadzira maPPEs nezvimwe ishandiswe mukusimudzira mabasa ekuongorora nekubatsira kutsvaga mushonga unorapa PPEs. VaDhliwayo vanoti mayunivhesiti ndiwo anofanira kutungamira mabasa ekuongorora denda reCovid-19. Mukuru anoona nezvemishonga mubazi rezvehutano, VaNewman Madzikwa, vakaudza paramende svondo rapfuura kuti vainge vasara nemaPPEs anokwana mwedzi chete uye vainge vachitarisira kuwana mamwe kubva kuGlobal Fund svondo rino. Vakati kubatwa zvakanyanya kwakaitwa vanhu neCovid-19 pamwe nekurega kuramwa mabasa kwaitwa nevakoti muna Zvita gore rapera ndiko kwaita kuti maPPEs ashandiswe zvakanyanya muzvipatara. Kunyange hazvo denda reCovid-19 rakatanga gore rapfuura, Zimbabwe haina kuisa parutivi mari yekurwisa denda iri mubhajeti rayo regore rino, uye pari zvino iri kupona nerubatsiro runobva kumasangano anobatsira pamwe nedzimwe nyika. Global Fund yakatopa Zimbabwe mamiriyoni makumi mana nemapfumbamwe emadhora ekuAmerica ekurwisa Covid-19 uye China svondo rino yakapa Zimbabwe mishonga yenhomba mazana maviri ezviuru yekudzivirira Covid-19. Zimbabwe inoti ine mamiriyoni zana emadhora ekuAmerica ekurwisa Covid-19 asi machiremba nevakoti vari kuchema kuti havana zvikwanisiro zvakakwana muzvipatara. No media source currently available
title: Zvikoro zvePamusorosoro Zvorumbidzwa neBasa Guru reKugadzira Zvikwanisiro zveChirwere cheCovid-19

text: Chimwe chizvarwa che Zimbabwe chiri muSouth Africa chakakuwadza zvakaipisisa mwedzi wapera mushure mekurwiswa nevanofungidzirwa kuti zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi zviri kunyunyuta kuti zviri kutorerwa mabasa nevekunze, chakabuda muchipatara nemusi weMuvhuro. VaNoah Chiunda, avo vanotyaira marhorhi makuru kana kuti magonyeti, vakakandirwa bhambu reputuru mugonyeti ravaityaira musi wa 15 Ndira gore rino pavakasvika pamugodhi wemarasha we Impunzi uri ku Mpumalanga muSouth Africa makare uye vanoti vave kunzwa zviri nani kunyange hazvo vasati vanyatsopora. VaChiunda vanoti vakatsva makumbo, maoko nemaoko ose pamwe nekumeso, uko kwavanoti hakuna zvako kunyanya kukuwara. Aka hakasi kekutanga kuti chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinotyaira magonyeti chirwiswe nemoto muSouth Africa. Muna 2019, VaRonias Tavengwa vakakandirwa zvakare bhambu repeturu nemoto ku Isipingo, pedyo neDurban vakapiswa zvakaipisisa izvo zvakazoita kuti varasikirwe nehupenyu muna 2020. Zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa zviri kurwisa vatyairi pamwe nevamwe vashandi vanobva kunze kwenyika iyi zvichiti zviri kuvatorera mabasa avo. Izvi zvapindirwawo nevamwe vezvematongerwo enyika, kusanganisira mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reEconomic Freedom Fighters, VaJulius Malema, avo vakatombopinda muzvitoro zvinotengesa zvekudya zvinoshandirwa nevekunze kwenyika iyi vachida kuona huwandu hwevekunze vanoshanda munzvimbo idzi kana zvichienzaniswa nevemunyika iyi. No media source currently available
title: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chakakandirwa Bhabu rePeturu muSouth Africa Muna Ndira Chinobuda muChipatara

text: Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, Doctor Wangu Mazodze, vanoti zviri pachena kuti mutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, vari kushandiswa semutungamiri wenyika nemauto, ayo anoda kuratidza pasi rose kuti muZimbabwe mune hurumende inotungamirwa nevanhu vasiri mauto. VaMazodze vanoti mauto agara achitonga muZimbabwe, uye hazvishamise mune remangwana vanhu vonzwa kuti mukuru wemauto, Va Constantino Chiwenga, ndivo vava panyanga. "VaMnangagwa takavapihwa nemauto, saka zvizhinji totoda kuzvinzwa nemauto, asi takangoona zvedu kuti vakagadzira inonzi military cabinet not takaona vana General Sibusiso avo vakange vachititsanangurira nezvekuenda kwaVaMugabe ndovatava kuona vari pa foreign affairs and international... tiri kuona apo, VaPerence Shiri vachiendesa pa agriculture," Va Mazodze vanodaro. VaMazodze vanoti vanhu vechiuto ava vakafanana pamaitiro avo, nokudaro havatarisiri kuona shanduko inobva kuhurumende yaVaMnangagwa. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanonzi Vakaiswa paRumananzombe neMauto

text: Gungano guru repagore rinounganidza zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika nezvinobva kuZimbabwe, reZim Expo, riri kutarisirwa kutanga neChishanu chino richipera neMuvhuro unouya muguta reDallas mudunhu reTexas muAmerica, paine mitambo nezviratidzwa zvakasiyanasiyana. Gungano iri riri kunanganawo nezororo rezuva revashandi muAmerica, reLabour Day, iro riri kucherechedzwa musi weMuvhuro, 06 Gunyana. Sachigaro vebhodhi reZim Expo, Doctor Tonderai Tela, vanoti gore rino gungano ravo rakati siyaneyi nemamwe makore sezvo vakabatana pamwechete nemubatanidzwa wemakereke ezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika, weChristian Fellowship International, uyo unenge uchiitawo zvirongwa zvawo panguva imwecheteyo navo kwakare kuDallas. Doctor Tela vanoti zvimwe zvavainazvo gore rino mukana wekuti vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vakwanise kuzvinzwira pamwe nekubvunza mibvunzo pamusoro pehurongwa hwehurumende hwekuumba mutemo unobata zvizvarwz zvenyika zviri kunze, kana Diaspora Policy, sezvo pachange paine vashandi vehurumende vakamirira nyaya iyoyo. Vanoti vakakokawo vaimbi vekuZimbabwe vane mukurumbira vane chitsama vanosanganisira Baba Mechanic Manyeruke, Sandra Ndebele, Jah Signal, Tocky Vibes, Mercy Mutsvene nevamwe, avo vachange vachitandadza vanhu neMugovera neSvondo. Gore rapera gungano reZim Expoharina kuitwa nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19, asi gore rino Doctor Tela vanoti vari kuita vachitevera mitemo yose yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri. Asi vanoti gore rino hakuna mitambo yenhabvu iyo inosive chimwe chezvinhu zvinofadza vanenge vaungana paZim Expo makore ose, vachiti vakashaya nhandare dzakange dzakasununguka. No media source currently available
title: Zim Expo yeGore Rino Yotarisirwa Kutanga kuDallas, Texas, neChishanu

text: Sangano rinomiririra vanhukadzi nekurwira kodzero dzavo, re Women’s Academy for Leadership and Political Excellence (WALPE) rinoti raendesa zvichemo zvaro kunhengo dzeparamende richiti rinoda kuona bumbiro remutemo richishandiswa zvakanaka uye zvesarudzo zvichipindudzwa nenzira inoita kuti vechidzimai vapiwe mukana wekukwanisavo kuti vaite zvematongerwo enyika pasina rusarura. Mukuru wesangano iri, Muzvare Sitabile Dewa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvimwe zvavanoda zviri mugwaro ravasvitsa kuparamende zvinosanganisa kugadziriswa nekukurumidza kwebumbiro remutemo kuti rishande pamwe chete nemitemo yemunyika, zvikuru sei munyaya dzesarudzo, vachiti sangano ravo rinoda kuti paramende idzike mutemo wekuti vanhukadzi vapiwe zvigaro zvakaenzana nezvevanhurume, kuita 50/50, kwete zve’proportional representation’ zviri kushandiswa ikozvino. No media source currently available
title: Vechidzimai Vanoti ‘Proportional Representation’ Ibviswe

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemusi weChipiri vakapinda mumusangano weSADC Double Troika kuGaborone, Botswana kuti vazeye nyaya yekunetsana kuri muLesotho. VaMugabe avo vanzi vange vachiratidza kunge vasiri kunyatsonzwa zvakanaka vanonzi vatambirwa nemufaro nevanhu vemunyika iyi. Mutungamiri weBotswana VaIan Khama ndivo sachigaro weSADC parizvino. Nyika dziri muDouble Troika iBotswana, Zimbabwe, Swaziland, Mozambique, South Africa neTanzania. Vatungamiri venyika vanosanganisa Mambo Mswati vekuSwaziland vanova mutevedzeri wasachigaro weTroika, mutungamiri wehurumende yeTanzania VaKassim Majaliwa, mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa, uye mutungamiri wehurumende yeLesotho VaPakalitha Mosisisili. VaRamaphosa ndivo mutongi gava weSADC pagakava riri muLesotho. Pamusangano uyu, SADC Troika inonzi yakaumba komiti yevanhu vasere vanonzi vachabatsira Lesotho mukuzadzikisa zvinhu zvakanzi zviitwe neSADC Commission of Enquiry. Parizvino Lesotho iri kutongwa nehurumende yemubatanidzwa. Vamwe vesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu veZimbabwe Vigil vari kuBritain vainge vanyora tsamba yenyunyuto kuna VaKhama vachiti vanofanira kuzeya nyaya yeZimbabwe pamusangano vanoti havana kushamiswa nedanho reTroika rekusazeya nya iyi. Vati SADC ine nhoroondo yekuregera VaMugabe vachiita madiro aJojina. Asi zvinonzi nyaya iyi haina kupinda mudariro. VaFungai Mabhunu veZimbabwe Vigil vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti VaKhama vachapindura tsamba yavo kunyangwe nyaya iyi isina kuzeyiwa kuSADC. No media source currently available
title: SADC Yozeya Nyaya yeLesotho Ichisiya Zimbabwe

text: Hurumende inoti hurongwa hwekupa masimba kumatunhu kana kuti devolution, hwatotangwa uye ibasa rairi kuda kuti riitwe nechimbichimbi. Gurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu VaJuly Moyo, vakati chirongwa ichi chiri kuitirwa kuti matunhu agone kuzvimiririra mune zvimwe zvinhu zvakafanana nezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nezveupfumi. VaMoyo vaitaura mashoko aya nezuro vari kwa mutare pamusangano wekudzidzisa makanzura nezvehurongwa hwekuendesa masimba kumatunhu. Nyaya yekupihwa kwemasimba kumatunhu inyaya yaisimbiswa zvikuru nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmerson Mnangagwa mumazuva avaitsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo dzapfuura. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMoyo kuti tinzwe zvizhinji nezvenyaya iyi. Asi mumwe kanzura akapinda mumusangano uyu kwaMutare, achimiririra wadhi 5 muMutare Central, VaSimon Mapuvire vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMoyo vakasimbisa nyaya yekuti hurumende inosungirwa kupa zvikamu zvishanu kubva muzana zvemari inobuda mubhajeti regore kuti ibatsire makanzuru. VaMapuvire vanoti nhaurirano dziri pamusoro pekuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu hadzisi itsva sezvo dzava nemakore dzichingotaurwa pasina chinozoitwa seri kwemashoko. Vanotiwo havaoni mashoko ehurumende achizadziswa nechimbi chimbi nekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nedzehupfumi. No media source currently available
title: Vagari vekuManicaland Vanoti Vanonokerwa neHurongwa hweKuendesa Masimba kuMatunhu

text: Mukuru wesangano remagweta, reLaw Society of Zimbabwe, VaMisheck Hogwe, vanoti sangano ravo riri kushushikana zvikuru nemabasa emakambani nevanhu vanotevera zvikwereti zvisina mvumo kana kuti Debt Collectors. VaHogwe vanoti vave kukwidza nyaya iyi kumatare kuitira kuti vese vari kuita izvi vamiswe kuita izvi sezvo vari kushungurudza vanhu. VaHogwe vanoti pasi pemutemo, magweta chete ndiwo anobvumidzwa kutevera zvikwereti. VaHogwe vaudza Studio 7 kuti magweta munyika anozviziva kuti pave nevanhu vakawanda nemakambani ari kushungurudza vanhu, kuvatyityidzira pamwe nekuvatorera midziyo yavo nekuda kwezvikwereti zvinenge zvisina kubhadharwa. Vati kuita kwakadai hakusi pamutemo. Vati basa rekutevera zvikwereti rinobvumidzwa kuitwa chete nemagweta uye kunyange ari magweta anoita izvi, hapana munhu anotererwa mudziyo wake pasina mutongo unenge wapihwa nedare redzimhosva. Kunyange hazvo makambani anotevera zvikwereti awanda munyika uye ari kushandiswa nevakawanda, kusanganisira makamabi ehurumende, makanzuru nevamabhizimisi, VaHogwe vati hapana mutemo unopa makambani aya mvumo yezvaari kuita. VaHogwe vayambira veruzhinji kuti vamhang'are kumapurisa kana vakavingwa nevanotevera zvikwereti vanenge vasiri magweta.\n\nVati vachakwidza nyaya iyi kudare reHigh Court senzira yekuchengetdza veruzhinji. Vati sangano ravo range riri kutsigira mumwe mugari wemuHarare uyo akakwidza nyaya iyi kudare asi vati vave kuita izvi vega mushure mekunge mugari uyu avasina kudoma nezita arega kuenderera mberi nenyaya yake. Vagari vakawanda muHarare vange vari kunyunyuata nenyaya yema Debt Collector mushure mekunge kanzuru yeHarare yatsvaga kambani yeWellCash Debt Colletors kuti itevere zvikweret zviri muvagari. Kanzuru yakazomira kushanda nekambani iyi mushure mekunge nyaya iyi yakwidzwa kumatare edzimhosva. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevebazi rezvemutemo kuti tinzwe kuti sei vari kurega ma Debt Collectors achiita basa zvisiri pamutemo. Mune imwewo nyaya, VaHogwe vati sangano ravo riri kuongorora magweta gumi nemashanu ayo ari kupomerwa mhosva dzakasiyana siyana uye achabviswa pagwaro remagweta kana achinge awanikwa aine mhosva. Kunyange hazvo magweta achinyoresa kudare repamusoro reHigh Court , veLaw Society of Zimbabwe ndivo vanopa marezenesi ekuita basa kumagweta uyewo ndivo vanoranga kana magweta achinge atyora mutemo webasa kana kupara dzimwe mhosva. Munyika mune magweta zviuru zvitatu uye chikamu chepakati nepakati ndivo vane marezenisi ekuita basa reugweta mumatare kozotiwo chimwe chekamu ndechiya chemagweta ari kushanda mumasangano akazvimirira, makambani kana muhurumende. No media source currently available
title: Makambani Anotevera Zvikwereti Oyambirwa Kutevedza Mitemo

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti vachayedza napose pavanogona kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvivhote musarudzo dzinotevera. VaMnangagwa vakataura mashoko aya pamusangano wavakaita neSvondo masikati nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kumucheto wemusangano weUnited Nations General Assembly muNew York. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, VaMnangagwa vakati musarudzo dzapfuura vaida chose kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvivhote asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida sezvo painge paine zvimhingamupinyi zvavati vanofunga kuti zvichagadziriswa mumakore mashanu anotevera. VaMnangagwa vakatiwo Zimbabwe yakatemerwa zvirango neAmerica, Britain nenyika dzemuEU nekuda kwekuti yainge yatora minda. Mutungamiri wenyika akavimbisawo kuti hurumende yake itsva icharwisa huwori uye kuwedzera hupfumi hwenyika. Asi nyika dzakatemera Zimbabwe zvirango idzi dzinoti izvi zvakaitwa nenyaya yehurumende yekutonga nedemo. VaMnangagwa vati havo vane chivimbo chekuti hurumende yavo ichasimbaradza hukama hwayo nenyika yeAmerica. Vakati vakaita misangano nevamwe vedare reCongress neSenate avo vave kunzwisisa kuti hurumende yavo iri kuyedza napose painogona kuunza hutongo hwejekerere. Vachitaura pakapera musangano uyu, Muzvare Shingi Mangwiro vakati vakafara zvikuru nemafambiro akaita musangano uyu. Sachigaro weZanu-PF muAmerica, Doctor Frank Guni, vakatiwo vanhu vainge vakasungunuka kutaura zvavanoshuvira. Vamwe vange vari pamusangano uyu ndiVaDen Moyo vanova sachigaro wedunhu reAmerica muMDC T inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe VaMnangagwa vakapinda musangano uyu vaine gurukota ravo rezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube uye gavhuna weRBZ Dr John Mangudya. Mutungamiri wenyika ari kutarisirwa kutaura pamberi pedare reUnited Nations kekutanga nemusi weChitatu. Kumucheto wemusangano uyu vari kuita misangano nevamwe vakuru muhurumende yeAmerica uye vatungamiri vedzimwe nyika.
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vari Kutarisisa Chikumbiro Chekuti Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvivhote Zviri Kunze kweNyika

text: Vesangano re This Constitution Our Constitution Campaign vaendesa matsamba enyunyuto kumahofisi evesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC muBulawayo nekune mamwe maguta munyika vachinyunyuta pamusoro pemitemo yakasiyana-siyana ine chekuita nekunyoresa kwevanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Mutauriri weThis Constitution, Our Constitution Campaign VaAlfred Dzirutwe vaudza Studio 7 kuti vamiriri vesangano ravo munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika kusanganisira muBulawayo vaendesa magwaro enyunyuto, kana kuti petition vachipa zvichemo zvavo kumahofisi eboka reZimbabwe Electoral Commission. VaDzirutwe vati zvimwe zvezvavari kunyunyuta inyaya yekuti vanhu vari kunzi vaunze magwaro anoratidza pavanogara kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota vachiti mutemo uyu unoita kuti vanhu vakawanda, kunyanya vechidiki vasakwanisa kunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. VaNoble Mhlanga vanove mumiriri we This Constitution, Our Constitution Campaign kuGwanda vati vakwanisa kuendesa gwaro ravo renyunyuto kumahofisi eZEC mudhorobha iri rikatambirwa izvo zvinova zvaitwao naamai Langelihle Mpofu vanove mumiriri wesangano rimwe chete muguta reBulawayo. Mukuru wesangano re This Constitution, Our Constitution Campaign, Muzvare Abigail Mupambi vati vapa veZEC kusvika musi wa20 wemwedzi uno kuti ivape mhinduro pamusoro pezvichemo zvavo. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kune veZEC panyaya iyi. Kuendeswa kwegwaro renyunyuto nesangano re This Constitution, Our Constitution Campaign kuri kuitika apo vechidiki vebato reMDC T vari kuti vachada kuratidzira pamahaofisi eZEC muHarare nemuBulawayo vachichema chemawo pamusorowo pemitemo yeZEC. VaBrian Dube avo vanove mutauriri wevechidiki mubato reMDC T, uye variwo gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, vanoti hazvina maturo kuti veZEC vasimbirire pakuti vanoda kuti vanhu vave nemagwaro anoratidza kuti vanogara kupi kuti vagokwanisa kunyoresa sevavhoti. VaButler Tambo vanove mutevedzeri wesangano reCentre for Public Engagement vachishanda nechikwata chemubatanidzwa we Platform for Leveraging Elections, Democracy and Governance kana kuti PLEDGE, vanoti hapana chavanoona chakaipa pakuti veZEC vati vanoda magwaro anoratidza kuti munhu anogara kupi. Vamwe veruzhinji vari kuchema chema kuti veZEC havazi kugadzirira nekukasika nyaya yekunyoresa vanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota vachiti boka iri rinogona kuzotadza kuita izvi nenzira yakanaka sezvo kwasara nguva shoma kuti sarudzo dzegore rinouya dziitwe. No media source currently available
title: Vanorwira Kodzero dzeVavhoti Vonyunyuta kuZEC Pamusoro peMitemo yeSarudzo

text:
Zvakabuda mubvunzo dzeOrdinary Level dzakanyorwa gore rapera zvakabuda neMuvhuro bazi rezvekunyorwa kwebvunzo reZimbabwe School Examination Council (Zimsec)richiti kubudirira kwevana mubvunzo kwakadzikira nezvikamu zvitanhatu kubva muzana kana kuti 6.8%. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau kuburikidza nedandemutande reTwitter, saschigaro weZimsec Muzvinafundo Eddie Mwenje vati huwandu hwevana vakanyora bvunzo hwakadzikira nezvikamu gumi nechimwechete kubva muzana. Bazi rinoona nezvebvunzo iri rinoti kusabudirira mubvunzo kwevamwe vana kwakakonzerwa nekusadzidza zvakakwana gore rapera sezvo vanhu vaikurudzirwa kugara mudzimba zvikoro zvakavharwa pachityirwa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.
Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro.

VaNdoro vanoti bazi ravo rakaisa hurongwa hwekuti vana vawedzere nguva yekudzidza gore rino senzira yekuti vapedze zvidzidzo zvose vasati vanyora bvunzo dzavo kupera kwegore rino.

Panyaya yekuderera kwehuwandu hwevana vari kunyora bvunzo sezvabuda mugwaro reZimsec, VaNdoro vanoti vakaisa vashandi vebazi ravo mumatunhu madiki kuti vataure nevana vasiri kuenda kuchikoro vachiva kurudzira kuti vaenderere mberi nedzidzo. Asi mumwe mubereki VaBeckam Chigiya vanoti hurumende haifanirwe kuhwanda nemunwe vachiti inofanirwa kupa zvikoro zvikwanisiro kuti vadzidzi nevadzidzisi vazvidzivirire kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19. Mumwe murairidzi wemuChinhoyi VaRosten Mutapa vanoti havashamiswe nekusabudirira pabvunzo kwevana sezvo vana vasina kuwana nguva yakakwana yekudzidza nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye vadzidzisi vanga vari mukuramwa mabasa nekuda kwemari shoma yavanotambira.

Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarairidzi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union kana kuti ARTUZ VaObert Musaraure vanoti pane matambudziko akawanda mubazi rezvedzidzo anoda kugadziriswa. Munyori mukuru mune rimwe bazi rinomirira varairidzi reZimbabwe Teacher’s Association kana kuti ZIMTA-VaGoodwill Taderera vanoti vamwe vana havana kunyora bvunzo sezvo vanga varoorwa. Vakuru vezvikoro vanoziviswa kuti vanogona kutora zvakabuda mubvunzo kumahofisi eZimsec mumatunhu avo uye vanoda anogona kuona zvabuda mubvunzo padandemutande kubva nguva dzegumi manheru eMuvhuro kwemazuva mashanu anotevera. Dandemutande iri rinoti www.zimsec.co.zw. No media source currently available
title: Zimsec Inoti Vana veChikoro Vave Kukwanisa Kutora Zvakabuda Mubvunzo DzeO Level

text: Vamwe vagari vekumaruwa eSibhula kuGwanda North vari kutadza kuita mabasa avo emazuva ose kusanganisira kutadza kuenda kuchigayo, kuzvitoro, kumakiriniki pamwe nekuzvikoro sezvo vari munzvimbo dzakakomberedzwa nenzizi mbiri dzakazara. Bhiriji rinoita kuti vanhu ava vakwanise kuyambuka vachienda kune zvitoro, zvikoro kana zvipatara rakaparadzwa nemvura. Inguva dzekuma 4 masikati uye Muzvare Mercymore Ncube vagere paruware rwuri mumahombekombe ari kumadokero kwerwizi Hovi. Chiso chavo chinoratidza kuti vane zvinhu zviri kuvanetsa.\n\nMuzvare Ncube vanogara kuMasakeni kumaruwa ekuSibhula kuGwanda North. Nzvimbo iyi iri makiromita makumi mana kuchamhembe kwakadziva kumadokero kwedhorobha reGwanda. Studio 7 yakawana Muzvare Ncube vakamirira kuwana vanhu vaizovabatsira kuendesa pasuro yechikafu kune mumwe mwana wavo pamwe nevanin’ina vavo vatatu vanogara kumhiri kwerwizi Hovi uko kunoziikanwa kuchinzi kuEsihlengeni izvo zvinoreva chitsuwa. Muzvare Ncube, avo vane mwana ari kuyamwa, vakati bhiriji reparwizi Hovi rakadhirika saka vanhu vakawanda havazi kukwanisa kuyambuka rwizi urwu vachienda kana kubva kuEsihlengeni uko kunogara ambuya vavo. VaWellington Ncube avo vane makore makumi matatu nemasere ekuberekwa ndemumwe mugari wekuEsihlengeni. VaNcube vanoti nekuda kwekuti vanogara pakati perwizi Hovi nerumwe rwizi Maleme vagari vakawanda vemunzvimbo umu havachakwanisi kurarama hupenyu hwavo hwemazuva ose kusanganisira kuenda kuchigayo kana kuenda kuzvitoro. Vanotiwo vamwe vana vakawanda vanogara kumadokero kwerwizi Hovi havachakwanisi kuuya kuchikoro paSibhula Primary neSecondary izvo zviri kuEsihlengeni. Svondo rapfuura, vanhu vekuEsihlengeni vakauya vakasiirwa chikafu nendege dzeAirforce of Zimbabwe uye rubatsiro urwu rwakauya pasi pesangano reCiviil Pretection Unit. VaNcube vanotenda kuti izvi zvakambobatsira vagari. Asi vanochemachemawo nenyaya yekuti kunzvimbo yavanogara hakuchasvike mabhazi kana makombi. Vanorwara vanotadza kuenda kukiriniki nekuda kwedambudziko rekushikwa kwebhiriji iri. VaNkosilathi Khumalo vanogara kuMasakeni asi minda yavo yavanorima iri kuEsihlengeni. VaKhumalo, avo vane makore makumi matatu nemanomwe ekuzvarwa, vanotsinhirawo nyaya yekukosha kwakaita kuti bhiriji rivakwe uye vanoti vanorwadziwa nenyaya yekuti havana budiriro yakanyanya yavakawona munzvimbo mavo kwemakore akwanda apfuura. VaKhumalo vakaudza Studio7 kuti mumiriri weparamende weGwanda North, VaMadodana Sibanda, vakaudza vagari kuti vanoziva nezvematambudziko ari munzvimbo iyi nekuda kwekushaikwa kwebhiriji asi vakati havana zvakawanda zvavanokwanisa kuita pari zvino sezvo hurumedne isina mari. Studio 7 haina kukwanisakunzwa kubva kuna VaSibanda panyaya iyi. Nzvimbo yeSibhula ndeimwe yenzvimbo dzakawanda munyika dzakatarisana nemambudziko akadai mushure mekunaya kwemvura yakawandagore rino. Mvura iyi yauraya vanhu vanosvika mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu, uye kuparadza misha inodarika zviuru zviviri. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Votadza KufambaZvichitevera Kuparadzwa kweMabhiriji neMvura

text: Mamwe masangano evarairidzi anoti vatsigiri veZanu-PF vave kumanikidza nhengo dzavo kubhadhara mari yemusangano wekongiresi yechimbi chimbi yebato iri ichaitwa muHarare muna Zvita. Mutungamiri wesangano reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti sangano ravo riri kutambira zvinyunyuto zvakawanda kubva mumatunhu ose enyika, zvikuru kumaruwa pamusoro penyaya iyi. Rimwe sangano revarairidzi, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe rinotiwo nhengo dzaro, zvikuru kuMudzi mudunhu reMashonaland East, dziri kumanikidzwa kubvisa mari iri pakati pemadhora maviri nemadhora mashanu ichinzi ndeye kubatsira kuitwa kwemusangano weZanu PF uyu. Asi mutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya-Moyo, vanonzi vakaramba kuti vari kupemha mari ava inhengo dzebato ravo, vakakurudzira vari kukumbirwa mari kuti vazivise bato ravo. Bato iri rinonzi rinoda kuunganidza mari inoita mamiriyoni masere emadhora kuitira kuti rikwanise kuita musangano wechimbichimbi uyu, uyo unotarisirwa kuitwa kubva musi wa 12 kusvika musi wa 17 Zvita gore rino. No media source currently available
title: Zanu PF Yomanikidza Varairidzi Kubhadhara Mari yeKongiresi?

text: Hurumende yeZimbabwe inoti inotambira nemufaro danho reEuropean Union rekubvisa mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga, Amai Grace Mugabe nemukuru wemauto VaValaerio Sibanda pane vange vakatemerwa zvirango negungano iri vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Asi mumashoko kuvatori venhau, EU yati Zimbabwe Defense Industries icharamba iri pazvirango sezvo mauto ari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Kunyangwe paine vabviswa ava, EU yati hapana chachinja muZimbabwe uye icharamba takaisa ziso rayo munyika ichikurudzira nhaurirano kupedza matambudzuko akatarisana nenyika. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaKindness Paradza vati vafara nedanho reEU vachiti vanovimba kuti America neBritain dzichaitawo zvimwe chetezvo. Asi vakurudzirawo kuti zvirango zvasara zviri paZDI zvibviswe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira Media Centre, VaEarnest Mudzengi vanoti panyaya dzezvirango, Zimbabwe iri kuhwanda nemunwe sezvo chakanganisa hupfumi iri nyaya yekutadza kutungamira.
title: Hurumende Yotambira Kubviswa kwaVaChiwenga naAmai Mugabe Pazvirango

text: Kunyange hazvo rubatsiro rwakaita sechikafu, nembatya rwuri kunzi rwuri kuunganidzwa kubatsira vakawirwa nedambudziko re Cylcone Idai kuManicaland, vakawanda vanonzi vari kuti havasati vawana rubatsiro urwu.
