Mumiriri weManicaland muparamende pasi pehurongwa hwe proportional representation, Amai Lynette Karenyi veMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa vanoti vari kutambira nyunyuto dzakawanda kubva kuvagari vemunzvimbo dziri kuda rubatsiro, avo vari kuti havasati vawana rubatsiro urwu, zvikuru vekuDzingire nekwaMutyadziya. Vanoti bato reZanu PF riri kushandisa zvematongerwo enyika mukugoverwa kwerubatsiro urwu, izvo zvavanoti zviri kuita kuti nhengo dzebato ravo dzishaiwe chikafu. Amai Karenyi vanoti vane humbowo hwekuti chikafu chiri kusvitswa panzvimbo inochengeterwa chikafu yeSilver Stream, asi hachisi kuzoburutswa kubva mumarhorhi anenge auya nacho, ayo vanoti ari kuzoendeswa kusina anoziva. Amai Karenyi vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuona kuti yatora matanho akasimba kuitira kuti vanhu vose vawanoswe chikafu. No media source currently available Asi bato reZanu PF ragara riri kuramba zvipomerwa zvekuti nhengo dzaro dziri kushandisa zvematongerwo enyika mukugoverwa kwechikafu chakanangana nevakawirwa nedambudziko. Svondo rapera mumiriri weChipinge South muparamende vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaEnock Porusingazi, vakaramba mashoko mashoko aya, vachiti bato ravo ndiro rakatotangira mamwe mapato ose kupinda munzvimbo dzakawirwa netsaona kunopa rubatsiro. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Vanonzi Havasati Vawana Rubatsiro rweCyclone Idai kuManicaland

text: Gweta rinoona nezvemitemo mumabasa VaRogers Matsikidze vanoti hurumende inofanira kuita hurukuro kunze kwematare nemakambani ange achichera mangoda kwaMarange vachishandisa mutongi gava kana kuti “Alternative Dispute Resolution”. Gweta rinoona nezvemitemo mumabasa, VaRogers Matsikidze, vanoti hurumende inofanira kuita hurukuro kunze kwematare nemakambani ange achichera mangoda kwaMarange vachishandisa mutongi gava kana kuti “Alternative Dispute Resolution”. Izvi vati zvinobatsira nyika kuti irambe iine chimiro chakanaka kune vekunze vanenge vachida kutanga mabhizimisi munyika uye kumakambani aya vachiti mune remangwana vachadawo kuita mabhizimisi munyika. Gurukota rinoona nezvicherwa, VaWalter Chidhakwa, vakati makambani ose ari kuchera mangoda ange abva kwaChiyadzwa mukati memwedzi mitatu vachiti vainge varamba kubatana vouya pasi pekambani yehurumende. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakatiwo makambani aya ainge awana mari inopfuura mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu asi humende yakawana mabhiriyoni maviri kubva zvaakatanga kushanda. Makambani aya akabva akwira kumatare achiti hurumende iri kutyora bumbiro remitemo nekuvatorera marezinesi. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vanoti nekutatarika kuri kuta Zimbabwe kuwana mari, nehurumende yezimbabwe yaisaita zvehuori zvaibatsira nyika. Vange vachichera mangoda vanosanganisa mapurisa, mauto, makambani ekuChina uye Dubai. No media source currently available
title: Rimwe Gweta Rinoti Hurumende neMakambani ekwaMarange Ngavataurirane Kwete Kuenda kuMatare

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change, MDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti kusatevedzera gwara rezvehupfumi rakajeka kuri kuitwa neZanu-PF, pamwe nekurwira chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kuri kupa kuti hupfumi hwenyika huende kumawere. Mashoko aya anouya apo sangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries raburitsa mashoko ekuti kugadzirwa kwezvinhu mumakambani kwaderera nezvikamu makumi matatu nemana kubva muzana gore rino kubva pazvikamu makumi matatu nematanhatu kubva muzana. Mutungamiri weMDC anoti makurukota muhurumende yaVaMugabe ari kuratidzwa kuti vanhu vapererwa nekudaro vave kuswera vachikandirana makobvu nematete. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vari kupota vachishorwa zvakanyanya nemamwe makurukota akaita saVaPatick Zhuwawo, gurukota rezvekuendeswa kwehupfumi kuvatema uye VaChris Mutsvangwa, gurukota rinoona nezvevakarwa hondo yerusununguko. VaChinamasa vari kushorwa nenyaya yekuti vanonzi vari kunyanya kuzemberana nemabhanga anokweretesa mari eIMF neWorld Bank. VaTsvangirai vanotiwo nyaya yekuti VaMugabe vakwegura yave kupa kuti nhengo dzebato ravo dziswere dzakabatirana makano. Vanoti kunetsana uku kwave kutyisa vanhu vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi munyika sezvo hurumende yoita bhasikiti raTizirai rekuti uku riri kurukwa uku riri kurudunhurwa. VaTsvangirai, avo vakamboita mutungamiri wehurumende munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, vanoti vari kufamba mumatunhu akasiyana siyana munyika asi zvavari kuona zviri kuratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda vari kudya nhoko dzezvironda. Vanoti vanhu vakawanda havana chekudya uye vechidiki vakawanda havana mabasa. Mutungamiri weMDC anotiwo bato rake rakagadzirira kushanda nevamwe vanopikisa kuitira kuti munyika muite shanduko. Vanoti vakasunungukawo kushanda naAmai Joice Mujuru vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika asi zvinoti netsei pari zvino sezvo vasiri kubuda pachena kuti vave kupinda munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. No media source currently available
title: VaTsvangirai Vanoti Hurumende Yave Bhasikiti raTizirai

text: Dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari iri kuwanikwa kumabhanga emunyika rinonzi rave kukanganisawo makambani akawanda, sezvo achida mari zuva nezuva kuti akwanise kufambisa mabasa awo. Vamwe vevari kukanganiswa nedambudziko iri ikambani yemagweta yeGutu & Chikowero Attorneys, iyo ine vashandi vanodarika makumi maviri. Mumwe wevakuru vekambani iyi, VaObert Gutu, vanove zvakare mutauriri weMDC T, vanoti dambudziko rekuti mabhanga akadzikisa mari dzinokwanisa kutorwa pazuva rave kuvapinza padambudziko sezvo vachine vamwe vashandi vanoda kutambiriswa mihoro yavo iri keshi. "Ini semushandirwi Jonga, dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari riri kuti shungurudza zvekuti kana kuti tichi runner business racho semagweta kudai zvaa kuti shungurudza," VaGutu vanodaro. Vanoti kubva pakaziviswa nezvekuunzwa kwema bond notes munyika, vanhu vanenge vave kutogara vari mumitsetse yemabhanga vachida kutora mari dzavo. "Nyaya yekubhadhara vashandi, iroro ratove dambudziko guru ratiinaro nekuti kune vamwe vasina maa, atingangoti muChirungu, ma bank accounts. Saka vanhu ivavo vanenge vachida mihoro yavo iri cash." Zvinonzi muHarare mitsetse yekutora mari kumabhanga akawanda yanga yakareba zvikuru. No media source currently available
title: Kunetsa kweMari Munyika Kwokanganisa Makambani Akawanda

text: Nhengo dze MDC inotungamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai dzakakuvadzwa mumhirizhonga yakaitika kuChitungwiza nemusi weSvondo, dzakundikana kumira pamberi pedare sezvo dzakakuvadzwa zvakanyanyisa. Zvichitevera chikumbiro chaiswa mudare nemagweta enhengo idzi, dare rati VaDelma Amos Kaliyati nevamwe vavo vaviri vazodzoke kudare kana vachinge vapora. VaKaliyati vachiri muchipatara umo vari kurapwa, asi vamwe vavo vaviri vakaburitswa muchipatara neMuvhuro. Mutauriri we MDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti havazi kufara kuti nhengo dzebato ravo dzakarwiswa ndidzo dzave kuiswa muhusungwa. Vanoti bato ravo harirwisi vanhu uye vanokuridzira vechidiki veZanu-PF kuti varegere zvekurwisa vanhu asi kushanda nesimba kuti vanhu vakawanda vakwanise kunyoresa kuti vagozovhota. No media source currently available
title: MDC-T Yorwadzikana Zvichitevera Kukuwadzwa kweNhengo Dzayo kuChitungwiza

text: Munyika hamuna kuwirirana panyaya yemabasa akabatwa nevaive mutongi mukuru wematare kana kuti Chief Justice, VaGodfrey Chidyausiku, avo vakashaya nemusi weChitatu kuchipatara chemuSouth Africa. Mumashoko avo ekuonekana nevanoita zvemitemo apo vainge voenda pamudyandigere, VaChidyausiku vakati chakanyanya kuvafadza inyaya yekuti vakapa mitongo yakapa kuti zvive nyore kuti ivhu rienda kuvatema pakatanga hondo yeminda muna 2000. Vakati havana chavanodemba pakuti mimwe mitongo yavakapa yakanzi kutyora bumbiro remutemo nedare reSADC Tribunal iro rakazoputswa mushure mekunge Zimbabwe yati hayaifara nemashandiro aro. Pane zvinhu zvavanoti zvakavaodza moyo inyaya yekuti munyika makaita bopoto guru pakuti aivatsiva aizosarudzwa sei. Vamwe vaiti Judiciary Services Commission, JSC, haifanire kuva nechekuita nekudomwa kwevatongi sezvo zvichifanira kungoitwa nemutungamiri wenyika chete. Asi VaChidyausiku vaida kuti bumbiro risavandudzwe richipa JSC mukana wekuti ibatsire mutungamiri wenyika kusarudzo vatongi. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti afa anaka asi pane mimwe mitongo yakaitwa naVaChidyausiku yavasina kuwirirana nayo sezvo vainge voita sevanotema vaine divi ravakarerekera. Gweta vari nhengo yePolitburo yeZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vanoti semaonero avo VaChidyausiku igamba chairo nemabasa avakabata.
title: Murufu VaChidyausiku Vokonzera Kusawirirana

text: Hurumende, kuburikidza nebazi rezvekurima, yadzika mutemo unorambidza kutengeswa kwechibage kune mimwe misika isiri Grain Marketing Board, GMB. Mutemo weStatutory Instrument 145 unorambidzawo kutengeswa kwechibage kuGMB nemumwe munhu asiri murimi, uye unopa masimba kuGMB ekuramba kutambira chibage chinenge chichitengeswa nemunhu asiri murimi. Zvimwe zviri kusungwa nemutemo uyu kufambiswa kwechibage chinopfuura matsaga mashanu ane huremu hwemakirogiramu makumi mashanu patsaga roga roga, kubva mune rimwe dunhu kuenda kune rimwe dunhu pasina mvumo. Mapurisa ari kupiwawo masimba ekupinda mudzimba vachisecha kana vakafungidzira kuti munhu ari kuchengeta chibage zviri kunze kwemutemo. Vamwe vanoti mutemo uyu hauna kunaka sezvo uchipa masimba ose kuG-M-B. Asi mutungamiri werimwe sangano rinomirira varimi, uye vari sachigaro vesangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano evarimi, reFederation of Farmers’ Unions, VaWonder Chabikwa, vanoti sevarimi, vanotambira nemufaro mutemo uyu, sezvo uchichengetedza varimi kubva kumakoronyera. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inodzika Mutemo Unorambidza Kutengeswa kweChibage Kunze kweGMB

text: Vamwe vakawanda vemudhorobha reMasvingo vari kuramba kutambira bhajeti regore rinouya rakaparurwa nekanzuru yavo ichiti inoda kukwidza mari yemitero nezvikamu zvinosvika mazana masere kubva muzana. Kanzuru yeMasvingo yapeta neChipiri misangano yekunzwa pfungwa dzevagari pamusoro pebhajeti regore rinouya iro iri kuda kukwikwidza kusvika pamadhora anodarika mamiriyoni mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nematatu emadhora, kana kuti 723 million RTGs. Asi mumwe mugari wemumusha weMucheke, Amai Sungano Zvarebwanashe, vati zvikamu zvakakwidzwa zvemitero yemvura, nekutakura marara nezvimwewo zvakawandisa nekudaro veruzhinji havakwanisi kubhadhara mari idzi. Mumwe mugari wemumusha wekwaMajanhe, VaAlfred Gumbo,vati vane zvikwereti zvemvura sezvo vari kukundikana kubhadra gore rino nekuti vakakanganiswa mabasa avo nedenda re Covid-19 uye kuoma kwehufumi hwenyika. Kanzuru inoti inoda kukwidza mitero nezvikamu izvi nekuti mari yemunyika iri kugara ichipera simba nekudaro vari kuitira kuti vasare vane mari inozokwana kuita mabasa avo, sekutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura inomwiwa muguta nezvimwe zvakawanda. Vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori weguta reMasvingo, VaEdward Mukaratirwa,vati kanzuru ichakwidza mitero iyi muzvidimbu kuitira kuti vagari vasaomerwe. VaMukatirwa vati kanzuru ichatanga nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana muna Ndira gore rinouya, yozokiwdza nezvikamu zana nemakumi mashanu kubva muzana panopera mwedzi mitatu yoga yoga kusvika gore rapera. Vagari pari zvino vari kubhadhara mitero inosvika mazana mashanu emadhora pamwedzi imba yoga yoga. Asi muna Ndira vanenge vobhadhara mari inodarikazviuru zviviri zvemadhora ema RTGS, uye panozopera gore vanenge aobhara mari inosvika zviuru zvisere zvemadhora eRTGS pamwedzi. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano rimomirira vagari reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, Muzvare Rumbidzai Magurupira, vati mari iri mubhajeti yakawandisa zvokuti vagari vachapedzisira vaita zvikwereti zvavanotadza kubhadhara, nekudaro zviri nani kuti kanzuru idzikise zvikamu izvi. Muzvare Magurupira vati sangano ravo ranga richipindamumisangano yose yaiitwa yekutora pfungwa dzevanhu nekudaro kanzuru inofanira kukoshesa zvakabva muvanhu yodzikisa zvikamu izvi kuitira kuti vanhu vakwanise kubhadhara mitero zvakanaka. No media source currently available
title: Vagari Vakawanda kuMasvingo Voramba Kutambira Bhajeti reGuta Ravo

text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaPhelekhela Mphoko nemusi weChina vakakwidza kuparamende bhiri rekuumbwa kwekomisheni yerunyararo nekupodza maronda kana kuti pamwe nekomisheni yeNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission apo vemasangano anoshandw akazvimirira varikupokana kuti chirongwa chekupodza marwadzo nekuregererana chichafamba sei. VaMphoko avo vanovezve gurukota rinoona nezverunyararo nekuregererana vachazotsanangura bhiri iri apo richaverengwa kechipiri mudare. Asi vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira vanoti komisheni iyi yanonoka kuumbwa uye mashandiro ayo anofanira kujekeswa. Vachitaura pamusangano waingen wakarongwa neNational Transitional Justice Working Group muHarare; vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wechikoro chesvondo yeRoma cheArrupe College Baba Lawrence Daka vanoti komisheni iyi inofanira kuita basa rayo zvakajeka uye dai zvaibvira basa rekomisheni raifanira kuitwa nevedzisvondo. Vanotiwo kuti chirongwa chekuregererana chibudirire vese vari kupomerwa mhosva dzekuponda vanhu nekupara mhosva vanofanira kuregerwa kuti vanotsotaura chokwadi chezvakaitika. Asi vamwe vakaita samai Netty Musanhu vekuMusasa Project vakati vanhu kunyanya vakadzi vakabhinywa zvakanyanya zvekuti zvakaoma kuti vareregerere vanhu vasina kutongwa kana kukandwa mujeri. Mashoko aya akatsigirwa nenhengo yeparamende , Amai Concelia Chinanzvavana, avo vakashungurudzwawo zvakanyanya. Reverend Motsi vesangano reGrace To Heal vanoti komisheni iyi inofanira kuita basa rayo zvakajeka paine ngiva yakatarwa kuti yoshanda sei? Vanhu vazhinji munyika vane mavanga nemarwadzo avakapihwa kubva nguva yehondo, gukurahundi pamwe nesarudzo Dzekuma2000. Hurumende inoti yave kuda kupodza nekupedza marwadzo aya nekomisheni iyi. Asi VaRashid Mahiya veHeal Zimbabwe Trust vanoti vanhu havana chivimbo nehurumende. Dare reparamende rinotarisirwa kupasa bhiri iri nechichimbi. No media source currently available
title: VaMphoko Voendesa Bhiri reKuregererana kuDare reParamende

text: Nyika yacherechedza zuva remagamba reDefence Forces Day nemusi weChipiri, mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vachirumbidza mabasa ari kubatwa nemauto munyika pamwe nekunze kwenyika. Vachitaura kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium muHarare, VaMugabe, avo vangotaura kwemaminitsi gumi chete, vanonzi varumbidza mauto nekuchengetedza nzvimbo dzinokosha dzemunyika, kubatsira mukuchengetedzwa kwemiganhu yenyika pamwe nekubvisa zvimbambaira zvakasara munguva yehondo yeChimurenga. VaMugabe vanonzi vatendawo mauto nekusimudza mureza wenyika kumasangano akaita seUnited Nations uko vanonobatsira munyika dzakasiyanasiyana. Zuva iri rinouya panguva iyo vakuru vemauto vari kunzi vari kutyisidzira vanoratidzira pamwe nevanoshandisa dandemutande nenharembozha mukushambadza nezveshanduko mune zvematongerwo enyika. Vagari vemuHarare vaenda kumhemberero idzi vanonziwo vati dzanga dzisinganakidzi zvichienzaniswa nemamwe makore apfuura. Vanotengesawo zvitonhodzamwoyo vanonziwo vachemachema kuti bhizimusi ranga rakaderera. Nyanzvi mune zvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika Doctor Martin Rupiya, vanove associate professor, Institute of African Renaisance Studies paUniversity of South Africa vanoti mashoko aVaMugabe anga achingotsinhira chete agara achitaurwa nemasangano nenyika dzakawanda pamusoro pemauto enyika. “Aiwa, isu maonero acho pamashoko ataurwa nemutungamiri wenyika vari kutopembedza mashoko ari kupembedzwawo nevamwe vakawanda vakati kuti. African Union inofara nemasoja edu kana aching aenda kuma peacekeeping mission, SADC naiyo inofarawo, saka masoja edu kana mabataniro aakaita zvinodadisa,” Vanodaro Doctor Rupiya. Vanoti kugadzikana kwenyika pari zvino kuri mumaoko emauto. Vachitaurawo pamusoro pekushandiswa kwemadandemutande kana kuti social media, Doctor Rupiya vanoti chekutanga kana paine chinhu chiri kunetsa vanhu ngavagare pasi vataurirane. Asi vanotiwo social media iyoyo pane painoseenzeswa painosvika kuti kuda inogona kupfuuridza mwero. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Vanopembedza Mabasa ari Kuitwa neMauto eNyika

text: Imwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi VaLuxon Zembe vanoti kana bhanga guru renyika rakaenderera mberi nekuparura mari yema bond note mwedzi unouya, nguva yasara yekuti vanhu vadzidziswe nezvemari iyi iduku kwazvo. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko agavhuna weResrve Bank of Zimbabwe Doctor John Mangudya neSvondo ekuti ma bond note achatanga kushanda mwedzi unouya, uye vanhu vachatanga kudzidziswa pamusoro pemari itsva iyi kubva musi wa 31 Gumiguru. VaZembe vanoti pane basa rakawanda rinofanirwa kuitwa nebhanga guru rakafanana nekuisa chivimbo muvanhu chekuti vatambire mari itsva iyi. Vachitaura pamabiko akaitwa muHarare nekereke ye St. Luke iri muGreenedale, Doctor Mangudya vanonzi vakazivisia kuti bhanga ravo richapinza munyika ma bond note anokosha mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemashanu emadhora ekuAmerica, uye achange ari muzvikamu zvemadhora maviri nemadhora mashanu akabatana. Asi ma bond note aya akatarisana nedambudziko gukutu rekuti haasi kutambirwa nevanhu vakawanda, kusanganisirawo vemabhizimusi. Sangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries rakatozivisa kuti nhengo dzaro dziri kuramba mari itsva iyi, uye riri kukurudzira kuti hurumende isimbise kushandiswa kwe Rand rekuSouth Africa pane kutungamidza mari yekuAmerica. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata Doctor Mangudya kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi dzeUpfumi Dzotyira Kuti RBZ Iri Kunonoka kuDzidzisa Vanhu Nezvema Bond Note

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti kuumba mubatanidzwa naAmai Joyce Mujuru, avo vari kufanotungamira bato reNational People’s Party, kunenge kwakundikana. Mashoko aVaTsvangirai anouya panguva iyo Amai Mujuru vari kufamba vachiudza vanhu kuti vakagadzirira kupinda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika gore rinouya vachikwikwidzana naVaRobert Mugabe veZanu PF. Kunyange hazvo VaTsvangirai varatidza kushaya tarisiro yakasimba pamubatanidzwa naAmai Mujuru, Tsvangirai vanoti vane chido chekuti vabatanewo nevamwe vavakamboshanda navo muMDC isati yapatsanuka, VaWelshman Ncube, avo vari kutungamira chimwe chikwata cheMDC, pamwe naVaTendai Biti, avo vari kutungamira bato rePeople's Democratic Party. VaTsvangirai vakapatsanurana naVaNcube muna Gumiguru 2005, vakapatsanurana zvakare naVaBiti makore mashoma mushure mekupera kwehurumende yemubatanidzwa. Asi VaNcube naVaTsvangirai vakanyorerana chibvumirano chekushanda pamwe chete izvo vakawanda vaoti idanho rakanaka rinoita kuti MDC ikunde Zanu PF. VaNcube vakabuda pachena pachirongwa cheBBC-HardTalk kuti mubatanidzwa wemapato unofanirwa kuona kuti munhu ane mukana wekukunda VaMugabe musarudzo ndiyani, izvo vakawanda vanoti VaNcube vaitotsigira VaTsvangirai kuti vatungamire mubatanidzwa uyu. Asi VaNcube pachavo havana kuda kudoma zita remunhu wavanofunga kuti ndiyani achatungamira mubatanidzwa uyu kana ukabudirira. MuZimbabwe munofungidzirwa kuti mune mapato anodarika makumi matanhatu anopikisa uye vamwe vanoti kana pasina kubata kwemapato akati simbei zvichanetsa kukunda bato reZanu-PF musarudzo dza2018. VaTsvangirai vanoti havasati vataura nevari kudawo kukwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, VaNkosana Moyo, avo vari kutungamira bato idzva rinonzi Alliance for the People's Agenda. No media source currently available
title: VaTsvangirai Vanoburitsa Pachena Kusawirirana Kuripo naAmai Mujuru

text: Bato reMDC-T rinotungamirirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, rinoti harina kuda kukwikwidza musarudzo ye by-election ichaitwa mudunhu reGlen View South, sezvo kuchakwikwidza vaVincent Tsvangirai vakamirira MDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti bato ravo raive nenhengo dzakawanda dzaida kukwikwidza musarudzo iyi, asi pavakanzwa kuti mwana vevaive mutungamiri weMDC, mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai achakwikwidzawo musarudzo iyi, sehutungamiri vakasarudza kusakwikwidza senzira yekuremekedza nayo VaTsvangirai. VaGutu vanoti vakatarisisa zvakadzama vakaona kuti mumhuri yekwaTsvangirai maitika zvinhu zvinosiririsa zvakawanda mukati memakore angakwana maviri adarika. Vanoti kushaya kwevaive mumiriri weGlen View South, Amai Vimbai Tsvangirai-Vava mushure metsaona yemotokari, kushaya kwasekuru vavo VaTafadzwa Mhundwa mutsaona yemotokari, kushaya kwaMbuya Mhundwa mazuva mashoma adarika, nezvimwe zvakawanda, ndizvo zvakaita kuti vape mukana wekunyaradzwa kuna VaVincent Tsvangirai. VaGutu vanoramba mashoko ekuti bato ravo rakabuda musarudzo iyi nekutya kunyadziswa radyiwa zvine mutsindo nemamwe mapato ari kukwikwidza akaita seZanu PF neMDC yaVaChamisa. VaVincent Tsvangirai ndemumwe wevanhu vapfumbamwe vakabudirira kusvitsa mazita avo kudare reNomination Court neChishanu chapfuura vachizivisa kuti vaizokwikwidza musarudzo musarudzo iyi. Vamwe vane mazita akatambirwa nedare iri ndaVaOffard Machuwe veZanu PF, VaKasema Maxwell vakazvimirira, Amai Ellah Zisani veUANC, VaPhillip Chamunorwa Ndengu vakazvimirira, VaParlington Pikele veUANC, Amai Rosemary Nyamayedenga veFrezim Congress, VaCrispen Rateiwa veZAPU, pamwe naVaEdwin Million vebato reLEAD. Sarudzo yekuGlen View South inotarisirwa kuitwa musi wa 07 Gunyana, zuva rimwechete richaitwawo sarudzo yekutsvaga mumiriri weMangwe zvichitevera kushaya kwaVaObedingwa Mguni veZanu-PF muna Chikumi. No media source currently available
title: MDC-T Inorega kuKwikwidza kuGlen View South Senzira yeKuremekedza VaTsvangirai

text: Makurukota ehurumende akawanda nhasi atadza kuuuya mumusangano wekuronga bhajeti ra2023 izvo zvatsamiswa nhengo dzeparamende idzo dzati vanofanira kurangwa. Mutauriri weNationaL Assembly, Advocate Jacob Mudenda, vati vachakwidza nyaya iyi kumutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaConstantine Chiwenga. Pange paine makurukota mashanu chete patanga musangano uyu wemazuva mashanu uye mumiriri weNorton avo vakazvimirira, VaTemba Mliswa, vati hazvina zvazvinobatsira kuenderera mberi nemusangano kana makurukota ehurumende asingakoshesi kurongwa kwebhajeti. VaMliswa vatsigirwa nemumiriri weHwange VaDaniel Molokele veCitizens Coalition for Change. Senata Douglas Mwonzora, vanotungamira bato Movement for Democratic Change, varatidzawo kusafara vachitiwo kunyange makurukota aya achisungirwa kuzopindura mibvunzo kuNational Assembly neSeneti haauye. VaChiwenga vari kunzi vatarise nyaya yanhasi ndevamwe vasingaendewo kuparamende kunopindura mibvunzo segurukota rezvehutano. Vati nyaya iyi yave kuda kuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pachavo vaigaidzirise. Nezuro chaiko VaChiwenga vakavimbisa muparamende kuona kuti makurukota ese ehurumende anoenda kuparamende kuno pindura mubvunzo nemusi weChitatu neChina chega chega. Makurukota ange apinda mumusangano wanhasi ndiVaMthuli Ncube vezvemari, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaFelix Mhona vezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaDaniel Gwarwe vezvedzimba pamwe naAmai Evelyn Ndhlovu vedzidzo yepasi. Zvichakadi, VaNcube vaudza musangano wanhasi kuti vanotarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchakura nezvikamu zvishanu kubva muzana gore rinouuya, Asi vati izvi zvinogona kushanduka nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwaita zvinhu pasi rese izvo zviri kukonzerwa nehondo yeRussia neUkraine. Vatiwo hurumende inotarisira kuunganidza 1.7 trillion yemadhora emunyika asi ichitarisira kushandisa 1.9 trillion. Zvichakadai, nhengo dzeparamende dzakawanda dzinoti bhajeti regore rinouuya rinofara kuona kuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe vawana chouviri kubva pazviwanikwa zvemuno kwete kungokoka makambani ekunze kuzosima mari muno vemuno vasina chavanowana. Vamwe vanemuonero uyu ndiVaMliswa. VaSupa Mandiwanzira veZanu-PF vatsigirawo Mliswa vachiti kunze kwekukoka makambani ekunze, hurumende inofanira kuisa parutivi mari yekutsigira zvizvarwa zvemuno kuti zvitangewo mabhizimisi. Dzimwe nhengo dzeparamende dzatiwo bhajeti regore rinouuya rinofanira kuve nenhwaro hwekusimudzira mabhizimisi madiki pamwe nekucherwa nekutengeswa kwegoridhe. Dzati goridhe rinowanika munzvimbo zhinji munyika uye mabhanga ese munyika anofanira kupihwa mvumo yekutenga goridhe iri achiriendesa kuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. VaNcube vati vachazeya zvataurwa nenhengo dzeparamende kuti vaone kuti vozvipinzwa mubhajeti ravo regore rinoouya here. No media source currently available
title: VaChiwenga Vanonzi Havaende kuDare reParamende Vonzi Vaferefete Makurukota Asiri Kuendawo

text: Vatsigiri veZanu PF pamwe nedzimwe nyanzvi dzezvematongerwo enyika vari kutambira nenzira dzakasiyana siyana zviri kuvimbiswa neZanu PF kana ikakunda musarudzo. Chipangamazano chinoshanda neUniversity of Pretoria kuSouth Afroca, VaTinashe Mawere, vanoti kunyange hazvo dingindira regwaro reZanu PF richitaura nenyaya dzekubatana, kurwisa huwori pamwe nekuita kuti nyika ibudirire, vanowona uku kuri kungotaura chete nekuti mumaitiro avo vakuru vakuru vebato iri havaite zvinhu zvinounza kubatana munyika. Mutauriri webato reZAPU, VaIphithule Maphosa, vanoti zvinovimbiswa neZanu PF manatsamukanwa chete chembere kurota ichiyamwa mukaka vachiti bato iri rave nemakore anoda kusvika makumi mana richitungamira nyika pasina zvinounza pundutso kuvanhu zvaraita. Vanotiwo hakuna kubatana kwechokwadi kana budiriro ingaitike munyika kana nyaya dzakadai seGukurahundi dzisina kugadziriswa. Mutapi wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira ega, Thelma Chikwanha, anoti zvinhu zviri kuvimbiswa neZanu PF, zvinhu zvakanaka zvakanaka chose. Asi anoti anoshushikana nekusaburitswa zvakajeka kwenyaya yekusimudzirwa kwevechidiki nemadzimai achiti kunyange hazvo gwaro iri richitaura nezvekukosha kwekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhurume nevanhukadzi, Zanu PF haina zvinobatika zvairi kuita pakuti vanhukadzi vapinde muzvinzvimbo zvehutungamiri mune zvematonegrwo enyika. Anotiwo gwaro iri harina zvakajeka pamusoro pezvehupfumI, kunyanya kwakatariswa nyaya yeInformation Communication Technology. Chikwanha anotiwo kunyange hazvo gwaro iri richitaura nezvekurwisa huwori, haawone bato reZanu PF richirevesa panyaya iyi. Mukuru wesangano reAffirmative Action Group mudunhu reMatabeleland, VaReginald Shoko, vanotsigirawo nyaya yekuti gwaro reZanu PF rinobata zvinhu zvakakosha zviri pamoyo yeveruzhinji. Asi vanoti nyaya huru iri pakuti bato iri richakwanisa here kuita zvariri kuvimbisa vachitiwo sezvo rave nemutungamiri mutsva, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe zvinhu zvichashanduka. Manifesto yeZanu PF yakaparurwa naVaMnangagwa nemusi weChishanu muHarare. No media source currently available
title: Zviri Kuvimbiswa neZanu PF Kana Yakakunda Zvotambirwa Zvakasiyanasiyana

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro vakabatana nevamwe vatungamiri vemapato anopikisa emunyika mukuparura zviri pamutemo chirongwa chekubaiwa kwenhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuVictoria Falls, uko mutungamiri wenyika nevamwe vatungamiri pamwe nevakuru muhurumende vakabaiwawo nhomba iyi. Mutungamiri webato reMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, pamwe mutungamiri webato reLabour, Economists and African Democrats, Muzvare Linda Masarira ndevamwe vevatungamiri vanopikisa vakave pachiitiko ichi. VaMwonzora vakanga vabva mukubaiwa nhomba yavo yepiri kuchipatara cheWilkins muHarare nezuro mangwanani. Asi kushaikwa kwemutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa pachiitiko ichi kwakaita kuti vamwe vafunge kuti chirongwa ichi chave kutorwa mune zvematongerwo enyika, vachiti kusavepo kwavo mucherechedzo wekuti havadi kusangana naVaMnangagwa. Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari kuti sezvo VaChamisa vaine vateveri vakawanda munyika, nhengo dzavo dzakawanda dzinogona kusazopedzisira dzabaiwa nhomba yeSinopharm iyi kusvikira ivo VaChamisa mbune vabuda pachena vachibaiwa nhomba iyi, uyewo kuitambira vachikurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti kuti dzibaiwewo. Asi mutauriri waVaChamisa, Doctor Nkululeko Sibanda, vanoti vanoshamiswa nevanhu vari kuti mutungamiri wavo ari kuisa zvematongerwo enyika muchirongwa chekudzivirira Covid-19 ichi, vachiti VaChamisa ndivo munhu wekutanga kukurudzira hurumende kuti iparure chirongwa chinobatsira veruzhinji kurwisana nedenda iri. Vanoti Zanu PF neMDC-T, iyo vanoti yave chipoka cheZanu PF, ndiwo mapato ari kutoshandisa denda reCovid-19 mune zvematongerwo enyika sezvo vaiita misangano yavo yakasiyanasiyana vachiparadzira chirwere asi veMDC Alliance vachisungwa. Doctor Sibanda vanotiwo VaChamisa vachabaiwa zvavo nhomba pavanoona zvakakodzera sezvo nyaya dzehtano hwemunhu dzichinangana nemwene wehupenyu, uye kana vakabaiwa zviri kwavari kuzivisa vana veZimbabwe, asi chavanoziva ndechekuti kana VasChamisa vakabaiwa nhomba iyi vana veZimbabwe vose vari kuzengurira vachamhanyidzana vachinobaiwawo. Ukuwo, mutauriri waVaMwonzora, VaLloyd Damba, vanotiwo VaMwonzora ndivo mutungamiri webato rinopikisa ari kushambadzira zvakasimba kunaka kwenhomba kumhuri yeZimbabwe, vachiti bato ravo riri kuona kuti vanhu vave kuisa zvematongerwo enyika kana vachiona mashoko ari kuiswa pamadandemutande zvichitevera kuendawo kwaVaMwonzora kuVictoria Falls. VaDamba vanoti mutungamiri wavo VaMwonzora vasiyana netsika yekungopikisa chose chaitwa nehurumende, vachiti maitiro avo matsva ekutaudzana nehurumende ndiyo nzira yekutsvaga nayo nhaurirano dzichagadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Vanoti bato ravo pamwe nemutungamiri wavo vacharamba vachikurudzira vana veZimbabwe kuti vatore nhomba iyi, zvisineyi nekuti yakawanikwa naVaMnangagwa. No media source currently available
title: Mapato eMDC Alliance neMDC-T Onakurirana Nyoka Mhenyu Pamusoro peChirongwa cheNhomba yeCovid-19

text: Nhengo dzeMDC dzinosvika gumi nenomwe dzichamiswa pamberi pedare nemusi weChipiri dzichipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga kuHarare South nemusi weSvondo apo vatsigiri veMDC vakarwiswana nemapurisa. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba, vanoti nhengo dzeMDC idzi dzaida kuita musangano pasina mvumo yemapurisa. Svondo rapera, munzvimbo imwe cheteyo maikaitawo kurwisana pakati penhengo dzeMDC-T nedzeZanu-PF. Nyaya yemhirizhonga iyi yapa kuti munyori mukuru weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanyore tsvamba kuZimbabwe Human Rights Commission kuitira kuti iferefete nyaya yemhirizhonga yodzika midzi munyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Mumisangano yange ichiitwawo nemutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, nhengo dzeZanu-PF dzange dzichiyedzawo kuvhiringidza misangano iyi. Asi bato iri rinoti hapana kana nhengo yeZanu-PF yakasungwa. Mutauriri weMDC, VaObert Gutu, vanoti zviri pachena kuti mapurisa ari kushunguridza nhengo dzebato ravo. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo dzeMDC-T Dzomiswa Mudare reDzimhosva neChipiri

text: Vamwe vatsigiri vemutambo wenhabvu vakaramba kupinda munhandare pamitambo yemaQuarter Fainari emakwikwi eChibuku Super Cup vachichema chema kuti mari yekupinda munhandare yainge yakawandisa. Vanhu vashoma shoma ndivo vaive munhandare kuona zvikwata zvine mukurumbira kusanganisira Dynanos neFC Platinum zvinowanzoteverwa nevanhu vakawanda. Vanonyora nezvenhabvu VaTawanda Tafirenyika vanoti munhandare yeBaobab kuNgezi kwaitambirwa mitambo maive musina vanhu kudarika zvavaitarisa. Mukuru weZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association VaKoseph Mutawu vanoti varikufara kuti vatsigiri venhabvu vakateerera kurudziro yavo yekuti vasaende kudzinhandare kusvika mari yepagedhe yadzikiswa. Zvikwata zvabudirra kuenda kumasemi finals emakundano ay zvinoti Dynamos, Cranbourne Bullets, FC Platinum neNgezi. Dynamos haisati yakundwa kana matambo mumwe chete mumakundano aya. Zvichakadaro, mitambo yenhabvu yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League irikutanga svondo rino sekutaura kwevePremier Soccer League. FC Platinum ndiyo ine mukombe weligi uyu. No media source currently available
title: Vatsigiri veNhabvu Voramba Kubhadhara Kuona Mitambo Vachiti Iri Kudhura

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weMuvhuro vakabatana nevatungamiri vedzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica muTanzania kuchema mutungamiri wenyika iyi VaJohn Pombe Magufuli. Vamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vari kurufu urwu vanosanganisira VaUhuru Kenyatta vekuKenya, VaCyril Ramaphosa-South Africa, VaFélix Tshisekedi -Dr Congo mutungamiri weMozambique, VaFilipe Nyusi, VaLazarus Chakwera -Malawi’s, VaEdgar Chagwa Lungu Zambian uye mutungamiri wehurumende yerwanda VaEdouard Ngirente. Vatungamiri ava vange vari muJamhuri Stadium mudunhu reDodoma maungana zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, VaMnangagwa vati VaMagufuli vaive mutungamiri aida nyika yake vevatema muAfrica uye aishanda kusimudzira vanhu vemunyika yake munayaya dzezvehupfumi. Vati Zimbabwe yarasikirwa nasahwira mukuru. Vanhu vakawanda muTanzania vari kuchema VaMagufuli zvikuru nekurwisa kwavakaita huori uye kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika yavo kunyangwe vamwe vachiti vainge vachimbunyikidza kodzero dzevanopikisa. Gweta vari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muTanzania VaVictor Chigumbu vanoti vanhu vakawanda vari kuchema VaMagufuli nekuti vakaunza budiriro munyika yavo pamwe nekurwisa huori. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vobatana neVamwe Vatungamiri vemuAfrica Kuchema VaMagufuli

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vakati Zimbabwe yainge yanyorerana chibvumirano neChina chekuchinjana mari kuitira kuti kutengeserana kwenyika mbiri idzi kuve nyore. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti izvi zvinoshanda here kana kuti kupedzera hoko padehwe retsindi? VaNcube vakataura mashoko aya kumucheto wemusangano pakati pemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, negurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kuChina, VaWang Yi. VaNcube vakati chibvumirano ichi chichabatsira zvakanyanya munyaya dzekutengeserana. Vachitaura nevatori venhau, VaNcube vakati chirongwa ichi chichabatsira zvikuru mukusimbaradza nyaya dzekutengeserana pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Vakatiwo zvazvinoreva ndezvekuti kana munhu achida kutenga zvinhu kuChina, anokwanisa kuwana mari yake zviri nyore uye vemabhizimisi vekuChina vanokwanisawo kupinza nekubuditsa mari dzavo zviri nyore. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti hazvishande sezvo mari yeZimbabwe isina huremu. Vati vanoona sekuti vanhu vanenge vachida kuchengeta mari yekuChina. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vanoti chibvumirano ichi chinobatsira vekuChina chete kwete kune vamwe vekune dzimwe dzakaita seSouth Africa dzinodyidzana neZimbabwe kunyanya. Mukuru weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaChris Mugaga, vatiwo kushanda kwechibvumnirano ichi kunoti netsei nekuti Zimbabwe iri kutatarika munyaya dzezvehupfumi. China yakanyorerana zvibvumirano zvakadai nenyika dzakaita seSouth Africa, Nigeria uye Japan. Dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti China iri kuyedza napose painogona napo kuitira kuti mari yayo yerenminbi itambirwe pasi rose sezvinoitwa dhora reAmerica. Nigeria imwe yenyika dzemuAfrica dzinoti dziiri kuda kushandisawo mari yekuChina senzira yekusimbisa mari yayo yeNaira. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yonyorerana Chibvumirano cheMari neChina

text: Zvinhu zvinonzi hazvichina kumira zvakanaka muvashandi vehurumende zvichitevera kusabudirira kwemusangano wekuzeya mihoro pakati pevashandi nehurumende, uyo wanga wakatarisirwa kuti ndiwo uchagadzirisa gakava remihoro. Mumwe wevane ruzivo nezvatora nzvimbo asina kuda kudomwa nezita, audza Studio 7 kuti vashandi vangotambira shoko rekuti musangano wasendekwa parutivi pasina zvikonzero zvakati tsvikiti, uye hurumende haina kuzivisa kuti musangano uyu uchaizotwa riini. Vashandi vehurumende vanonzi vanga vakatarisira zvikuru kumusangano uyu, mushure mekunge svondo rapera varamba kutambira madhora makumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe akanga anzi nehurumende ichawedzera nawo mushandi wega wega. Chimwe chinonzi chiri kurwadza vashandi ava inyaya yekuti hurumende yakangowedzera mihoro yemauto nemadhora mazana mana pasina kana hurukuro, asi vamwe vashandi voita zvekugwadama nemabvi nemagokora vachikumbira kuti mihoro yavo iwedzerwe. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi.
title: Hurumende Inotadza Kusangana neVashandi Vayo Kuti Vazeye Mihoro

text: Mumwe mugari wekuRuwa pedyo neHarare VaSaul Sakudya avo vakabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus apo vakabva kuDubai vanoti vari kunzwa zviri nani parizvino pamwe nemudzimai wavo nevana vavo vaviri avo vakabva vabatwawo nechirwere ichi. VaSakudya vanoti vari kubatsirwa navanachiremba avo vanouya kumba kwavo zuva rega rega. Asi vanoti mumhuri yavo ine vanhu vapfumbamwe vamwe vashanu havana kubatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanoti chirwere ichi chinopa kuti munhu arukutike muviri uye atadze kana kutomuka nekuda kwekushaya simba. Vanoti vainzwa kurwadza pahuro, musana uye pachipfuva. MuZimbabwe vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave gumi nevana uye vatatu vakatoshaya. Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nekuda kwechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose huri kuramba huchikwirawo. Mumashoko atumirwa kuStudio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kusangano rinoongorora nyaya dzezvirwere muAfrica reAfrica Centres for Disease Control prevention rinoti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAfrica vave kudarika zviuru zvinomwe nemakumi mana nemasere. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica ichiteverwa neEgypt neAlgeria. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora nyaya dzechirwere checornavirus pasi rose inoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose hwadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe. Vanhu vafavadarika churu zana. America ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose. MuZimbabwe sepasi rose vanhu vari kukurudzirwa kugara mudzimba.
title: VaSakudya vekuRuwa Votaura nezveKubatwa Kwavo neMhuri Yavo neCoronavrius

text: Misika yefodya yavhurwa neChitatu zvinhu zvisingafambe sezvanga zvakatarisirwa. Varimi vazhinji varatidza kusafara nekutadza kushanda kwaita michina yechizvino zvino yekutenga nayo fodya izvo zvazoita kuti fodya itengwe pachishandiswa zvagara zvichiitwa makore ose. Kunyange hazvo nzira yekutenga fodya itsva yakaedzwa kwenguva yakareba pachigadzirirwa kuvhurwa kwemisika, michina yacho yaramba kushanda zvakanaka. Asi veTobaccco Marketing Board vati izvi zviri kugadziriswa uye neChina chaicho vanotarisira kuti michina iye inenge yave kushanda zvakanaka. Izvi zvazokonzera kuti fodya itengwe pachishandiswa nzira yakashandiswa gore rapfuuura.Mutauriiri weTIMB, VaIsheunesu Moyo, vati dambudiko iri riri kugadziriswa. Gurukota rezvekurima, VaJoseph Made, vatiwo vanotarisira kuti dambudziko iri richagadziriswa uye izvi zvinoitika pese panoshandiswa michina. Mutengo wefodya wepamusoro wange uripa madhora mana nesendi manhatu pakirogramu. VaMade vati vanotarisira kuti mutengo wefodya uchakwira sezvo fodya iri kutengeswa pari zvino iri yepasi. Fodya inotarisirwa kuunza munyika mari inodarika mamiriyoni mazana masere emadhora gore rino. Zvichakadai, varimi vakawanda nhasi vabva pamisika yefodya vasina mufaro sezvo vange vasingagutsikane nemafambisirwo ange achiitwa zvinhu pamusika. VaNorman Andrea avo vanorima vari kuMacheke vati tarisiro yavo ndeyekuti dai TIMB yaramba ichishandisa nzira yakare yekutenga nayo fodya. VaRice Chibva vekuKaroi vaudza Studio 7 kuti tarisiro yavo ndeyekuti dai mutengo wefodya watangira pamadhora matanhatu pakirogramu rega rega. Asi VaBernard Mudapakati vati vanofara chose nemutengo wefodya wange uripo nhasi. Pataenda pamhepo veTIMB vange vasati vatiudza kuti fodya yatengwa nhasi yakawanda zvakadii kumisika mitatu yeBoka, TSF nePremier. Sachigaro weTIMB, Amai Monica Chinamasa, vati varimi vefodya vari kuramba vachiwanda munyika uye izvi zvinofadza chose. Varimi vakanyoresa kuTIMB gore rino vanodarika zviuru makumi masere nezviviri nemazana mashanu. Mari yefodya inotarisirwa kurerutsa dambudziko remari munyika. No media source currently available
title: Fodya Inotanga Kutengeswa Nyika Ichitarisira Kuwana Mari Yakawanda

text: Mukuru weMedia Centre VaEarnest Mudzengi vakambotorwa nemapurisa edivi rematikitivha epaHarare Central Police Station nemusi weChina uko vanoti vanga vachibvunzurudzwa pamusoro penyaya yakaburitswa nedandemutande reZimbabwe Sentinel, iro rinoburitswa nesangano ravo. VaMudzengi, avo vanga vakamirirwa negweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaGift Mtisi, vanoti nyaya iyi ine chekuita nekuda kubhombwa kweGushungo Dairy. “Mutori wenhau akanga achishandira paMedia Centre akanyora pamusoro pemashoko akataurwa nemutungamiri webato reZimbabwe People Front VaOwen Kuchata ekuti bato ravo richamanikidza mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabekuti vasiye chigaro kuburikidza nekuratidzira kwakasimba,” VaMudzengi vanodaro. Vanoti mapurisa anga achinyanyoda kunzwa nezvenyaya iyi, uyewo nemashandiro anoita Media Centre, uye atorawo mashoko avataura pamusoro penyaya iyi achiti havasi kusungwa kwete, asi kuti vari kuvatora semufakazi. VaMudzengi vanotiwo havaone sekunge mapurisa avatyorera kodzero dzavo sezvo semwana weZimbabwe vachisungirwawo kushanda nemapurisa panenge pakakodzera. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Obvunzurudza Mukuru weMedia Centre Nezve kuBhombwa kweGushungo Dairy

text: Kunyange hazvo zvakaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nechikwata chavo zvekukoka vekunze kuti vazosima mari dzavo muZimbabwe, pamwe nekugadzirisa hushamwari hweZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika kumusangano weWorld Economic Forum kuDavos, zviri kuyemurwa nemapato anopikisa nemasangano akazvimirira, vakawanda vanoti vanoda kuona VaMnangagwa vachigadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika. Asi mapato aya anoti VaMnangagwa vanofanirwa kugadzirisa zvinhu, mitemo yemabhizimisi pamwe neyesarudzo muZimbabwe nekukasika, kwete kungotaura chete. Mumwe wevatevedzeri vebato guru rinopikisa munyika, reMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti kuvaka mazambuko nekuyanana nedzimwe nyika kwakanaka chose. Asi VaChamisa vatiwo zvakakosha kuti VaMnangagwa vayananisane nevamwe vari mukati menyika nemubato ravo, uye kuti zvioneke munyika kuti vari kuunza runyararo. VaChamisa vatiwo nyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu pamwe nemutemo wesarudzo dzinofanira kugadziriswa nekukasika. Mutauriri webato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, VaKurauone Chihwai, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvakanaka chose kuti VaMnangagwa vagadzirise hushamwari hweZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika. Asi vati VaMnangagwa havafaniri kuperera mukutaura chete, asi kuti vaonekwe vachigadzirisa nyaya dzemhirizhonga munyika, kugadzirisa gakava riri kukonzerwa nenyaya yeGukurahundi. Vatsinhirawo kuti kunyange hazvo VaMnangagwa vari kuvimbisa kuita sarudzo dzakachena, havawoni sezvichaitika sezvo vanhu vave kutoshungurudzwa nebato ravo reZanu PF. Mukuru wePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vanoti zviri kuitwa naVaMnangagwa zvakanaka chose, asi vati chinhu chikuru chichaita kuti zvinhu zvinake munyika handikutaura, asi kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Vari kuda kukwikwidza vakazvimirira muHarare Central, Muzvare, Linda Masarira, vanoti zviri kutaurwa nehurumende zvakasiyana chose nezviri kuitika munyika. Vazhinji vatataura navo varatidza kusafara nenyaya yekuti mutungamiri wenyika haana kubuda pachena kana kukumbira ruregerero panyaya yeGukurahundi. Vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri vakafa munguva yekusagdzikana kwakaitika mumatunhu eMatabeleland neMidlands mumakore ekuma 1980s. VaMnangagwa, avo vanga vari kuDavos, vari kuenda kumusangano weAfrican Union uko vachaenderera mberi neshoko ravo rekuti Zimbabwe yazvipira kushanda nenyika dzepasi rese. No media source currently available
title: Vakawanda Vanoda Kuti VaMnangagwa Vasimbise Zviito Pane Kutaura

text: Mamwe magaraji anotengesa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari muChinhoyi ave kuramba kutengesa mafuta neEcoCash neOneWallet kana swipe vachiti vanoda mabhondi chete. Zvichitevera kukwidzwa kwakaitwa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari nemusi weMugovera nzvimbo dzakawanda dzave kuatengesa nemabond notes chete. Kutenga mafuta nemabhondi kwave kuremera vakawanda sezvo vavekumanikidzwa kutenga mari iyi pamusika mutema apo iri kutengeswa nezvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana. Bazi reZimbabwe Energy Regulatory Authority kana kuti ZERA rakakwidzwa dhiziri kubva pamadhora manomwe nemakumi maviri nemasenzi maviri kusvika pamadhora mapfumbamwe nesendi rimwe chete parita ukuwo peturu yakakwidzwa kubva pamadhora manomwe nemakumi mashanu nemasenzi mashanu kusvika pamadhora mapfumbamwe nemasenzi matanhatu parita. Mumwe mutyairi VaTapiwa Chikondowa vanoti vedzimotokari vakawanda havasi kubvumirwa kuSwiper kana kushandisa Ecocash zvave kuvatuma kunotenga mabhondi pamukoto. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemumwe mutyairi VaKillford Khupheko vanoti kutenga mari pamukoti zvave kuita kuti vadhurirwe nemafuta zvakanyanya. VaKhupheko vanoti izvi zviri kuratidza kuti huori hwatekeshera munyaya dzemafuta rkufambisa dzimotokari munyika. Mumwe mukuru wepagaraji reEngine asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo asingabvumirwe kutaura nevatori venhau anobvuma kuti dzimwe nguva vanotambira mabhondi chete kana michina yekuSwiper isingashande sezvave kuitika nguva dzakawanda nekuda kwekunetsa kwemagetsi munyika. Gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto VaFortune Chasi vanoti kusatengeswa kwemafuta edzimotokari neSwipe kana Ecocash kunoongororwa nebazi reZERA . VaChasi vanoti mafuta edzimotokari haasi kuzokwidzwa nekukasika sezvo hurumende iri kuda kuti mafuta awanikwe munyika kwete kuramba vachikwidza mutengo wemafuta asi iwo asingawanikwe. Hatina kunzwa divi reZERA panyaya iyi sezvo mbozhanhare dzavo dzanga dzidsingadavirwe. Mune imwewo nyaya zvitoro zvinotengesa zvekudya zvakaita seOK neTM muChinhoyi hazvichape vatengi mari kana vatenga zvinhu zvakawanda kana kuti cash back sezvavaimboita vachiti vave kuda kushandisa mari iyi kutenga dhiziri rekushandisa mumajenareta sezvo magaraji vave kuda mabhondi chete.
title: Vamwe VeMagaraji Voramba Mari dzeEcoCash neOneWallet

text: Dare repamusoro harisati ratara zuva rekuti nyaya iri kupomerwa vaive mutongi mukuru wematare edzimhosva, VaLuke Malaba, yekuzvidza dare itange kunzwikwa. Kana izvi zvaitwa vakaendeswa kumatare vanokwanisa kupa mhinduro yavo. Nemusi weChipiri mukuru weZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, Doctor Musa Kika, vakatura mapepa kudare iri vachiti VaMalaba vanofanira kuendeswa kuChikurubi nekutorerwa mamwe matanho kana vakaramba vachienda kubasa mushure mekunge dare repamusoro rapa mutongo wekuvamanikidza kuenda pamudyandigere. VaKika vanoti VaMalaba vanogona kukanganisa vamwe vatongi vari kudare vanogna kutonga nyaya dzavari kupomerwa. Asi munyori weJudicial Service Commision, JSC, VaWalter Chikwanha, vaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti VaMalaba pavakangopikisa mutongo wedare repamusoro wakabva wambosendekwa parutivi. Dare repamusoro rakapa mutongo wekuti VaMalaba vamanikidzwe kusiya basa sezvo rakati kuvandudzwa kwebumbiro remitemo kuti varambe vari pabasa kusvika pamakore makumi manomwe nemashanu kwaityora bumbiro remutemo. VaMalaba vaifanira kusiya basa vave nemakore makumi manomwe. VaKika nevesangano reYoung Lawyers Association of Zimbabwe vanoti kuvandudzwa kwebumbiro remitemo hakufanire kuti VaMalaba vawane chouviri pazviri uye kana izvi zvichida kuitwa panofanira kuvhotwa kana kuti kuitwa referendamu. Vamwe vakaendeswa kumatare naVaMalaba igurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vainge vakafanobata chigaro chemutongi mukuru wematare Amai Elizabeth Gwaunza uye JSC. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaZiyambi kana VaChikwana sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzange dzisiri kudairwa. Asi gweta rinombomirira mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka, vanoti VaMalaba vanokwanisa kuenda kubasa vasingatonge nyaya asi kuita mamwe mabasa emuhofisi kana kupedzisa mimwe mitongo yavakaita kare. No media source currently available Asi gweta vari mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimrights VaDzikamai Bere vanoti zviri pachena kuti VaMalaba vakazvidza dare uye maitiro avo ave kusvibisa chimiro chematare. No media source currently available  .
title: Vakawanda Vomirira Kunzwa Mutongo paNyaya yaVaMalaba

text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions (ZCTU), rinoti hurukuro dzarakaita nemapazi aro dzakabuda nechisungo chekuti paitwe kuratidzira pamwe chete nekumbomira kuenda kumabasa kana hurumende ikatadza kugadzirisa nyaya yemihoro yevanhu. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pakatenderanwa kupa hurumende nevamabhizimisi nguva yekugadzirisa nyaya dzemihoro nekumira kwakaita zvehupfumi munyika pasati paitwa kuratidzira. VaMoyo havana kukwanisa kutiudza kuti kuratidzira uku kungaitwa rini uye kuti vanopa hurumende nguva yakadini kuti igadzirise zvinhu munyika. No media source currently available
title: ZCTU Inoti Yagadzirira Kuratidzira

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change VaNelson Chamisa vanoti vave kuenda kuUnited Nations kuti ibatsire mukuita sarudzo dzemuZimbabwe nekuti parizvino nyika yave nzvimbo iri kuparwa mhosva. Pamutemo weUnited Nations kuti sangano iri ripindire musarudzo panofanira kutangwa patenderanwa kugungano reUnited Nation’s General Assembly kana kuti kuSecurity Council. VaChamisa vanoti munyika maberekera ingwe uye sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzinonetsa kutambirika zvinhu zvikaramba zvakamira sezvazvakaita. Vati vatsigiri vavo vari kuitwa kafiramberi ukuwo sarudzo dzichibirirwa madzishe nemasabhuku achishandiswa kutyisidzira vanhu.  No media source currently available Asi vachipindura, munyori munyaya dzezvemutemo mubato reZanu-PF VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana vati Zimbabwe haingaitirwe sarudzo neUnited Nations nekuti haina hondo. Vati kana vanopikisa vaine zvichemo vanofanira kuenda kumatare. No media source currently available
title: "UN Ngaiuye Kuzotungamira Sarudzo Tisati Tapera Rumwe Rumwe"- VaChamisa

text: Izvi zvinotevera mashoko echenjedzo apiwa neboka rezvemamiriro ekunze reMeteorological Services Department ekuti mvura inogona kukonzera mafashamu icharamba ichinaya munyika yose kubva musi wa 14 Zvita kusvika musi wa 22 Zvita. Sangano reZimbabwe Red Cross Society rinoti rakagadzirira kubatsira vanhu vanenge vawirwa nedambudziko remafashamu munyika. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko echenjedzo apiwa neboka rezvemamiriro ekunze reMeteorological Services Department ekuti mvura inogona kukonzera mafashamu icharamba ichinaya munyika yose kubva musi wa 14 Zvita kusvika musi wa 22 Zvita. Boka iri rinoti raona zvakakodzera kuti richenjedze vanhu pamusoro pemafashamu, zvikuru mumatunhu ari kumabvazuva kwenyika nedzimwe nzvimbo dzagara dzichisangana nematambudziko aya. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reZimbabwe Red Cross Society, kana kuti director of operations, VaKarikoga Kutadzaushe, vanoti sangano ravo rinoshanda neboka reCivil Protection Unit mukubatsira vanenge vawirwa nematambudziko. Vanoti sangano ravo rinobatsira nezvinhu zvakaita sematende kune vanenge varasikirwa nedzimba dzavo, pamwe nezvimwewo zvinodiwa munguva yematambudziko akadai. Muguta reHwange, mudunhu reMatabeleland North, mazana evagari anonzi ari kubatsirwa kubva munzvimbo iyi zvichitevera mafashamu anonzi aparadza zvivakwa nekukanganisa magariro evanhu. No media source currently available
title: Nyika Yoyambira Pamusoro peMafashamu

text: Sangano rePlatform for Youth and Community Development rinoti raparura zvirongwa zvekubatsira vanhu vari kumaruwa ekuChipinge, Manicaland kuti vanzwisise nezvechirwere pamwe nenhomba yeCovid-19. Kunyangwe hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nekubatwa nechirwere ichi huri kuramba huchidzikira, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti chirwere ichi chinogona kudzoka zvine hukasha. Mukuru wePlatform for Youth and Community Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vamwe vari kumaruwa havanawo chivimbo nenhomba yeCovid-19 uye zvekuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakabayiwa nhomba iyi hazvina zvazvinonyanya kubatsira. VaMadhuku vanoti munharaunda yavo zvingatoshanda kana kurudziro yekubayiwa nhomba ikabva kumadzishe, masabhuku, varairidzi nevamwe vanoremekedza mumamisha nekuti vanhu vane chivimbo navo. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakaparura chirongwa chechipiri chekubaya vanhu nhomba zviri pamutemo kuVictoria Falls nemusi weChitatu vachibva vabayiwawo nhomba iyi. Hurumende inoti inoda kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba. Asi vanachiremba vari kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba kusvika parizvino huchiri hwakaderera vachiti panoda dzidziso yakasimba kuti hurumende ikwanise kuzadzikisa chido chayo. No media source currently available
title: Vari kuMamisha kuChipinge Voyambirwa Kudzoka neHukasha kweCovid-19

text: Mapurisa ne vamwe vanofungidzirwa kuti vasori pamwechete ne vatsigiri vebato reZanu PF vanonzi vakafamba nemusi weChipiri nemusi weChitatu mudzimba ne muzvitoro vachivamanikidza kuti vavhure zvitoro zvavo kuti vasaratidzire. Vanhu vakawanda muMasvingo vati nyaya yekutyisidzirwa iyi yapa kuti vasateerere chirongwa chekuramwa mabasa kana kuti Hash Tag ShutZimbabwe. Vana muzvina bhizimusi vataura ne studio 7 vati mapurisa atenderera ne dzimotokari dzawo achivavhundutsira izvi zvaita kuti vafonere vashandi vavo vanga vagara kudzimba kuti vauye kubasa. Mumwe muzvina Bhizimusi ati anoda kuzivikanwa nekuti mukoma Godha ane chitoro mumusha weMucheke ati iye ashanyirwa runyanhiriri pamba pake. “Isu tamuka tisina pfungwa dzekuita basa asi tavingwa mapurisa ne vamwe vanga vachiitia semauto vakatiti tivhure mabhizimusi edu uye tidedze vashandi vauye kubasa. Vangavachiti zve stay away zvinofana kukona asi isu tangatichidawo kuti tiratidzire nekuti nyika ikanaka ma bhizimusi edu anonakwo” Umwewo muzvinabhizimusi anoita mabasa ekuveza midziyo, aramba kudomwa nezita rake nekutyira hupenyu hwake ati kumanikidziwa kwaitwa vanhu kuti vaende kumabasa hakuna kumufadza. “Sevanhu vanoita mubati wemaooko zvaitwa izvi hazvina kuti fadza sezvo tangatichida kuratidzira sezvatakaita svondo rapfuura ne chinangwa chekuti zvichemo zvedu zvinzwikwe uye tigadzirise nyika inake kuitira mabhizimusi edu.” Mumwewo mushandi we chitoro chikuru pakati pe dhorobha reMasvingo, Tsitsi Guyo ati iye akatyamara achifonerwa nemukuru webasa kuti auye kubasa akarega basa raizopera. “ Tauya kubasa nhaisi tauya nekuti tafonerwa nemukuru webasa kunnguva dzekuma 8 takatozavata tichinzi tiuye kubasa tikasauya basa rinopera, zvinonzi iye anga avingwawo ne mapurisa akamuti adedze vashandi vose basa riitwe.” Hurumende inonzi yatumira mapurisa aya kuti kuratidzira kwemusi weChitatu kusabudirire sezvakaitika svondo rapera. Mutungamiriri we sangano rinomirira kodzero dzevanhu re Masvingo Human Rights Trust, VaMasimba Gonese vashoropodza zvaitwa ne hurumende zvekutumira mapurisa izvi. “Tinotenda kuti tawana mashoko ne mareports kubva kunzvimbo dzakasiyana-siya kuti vashandi vehurumend e avsori pamwe ne vatsigiri vemusangano unotonga vakafamba kubva nezuro kusvika nhasi mangwani vachimanikidza vanhu kuti vasateerere mashok e stay away vauye kumabasa” VaGonese vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Izvi tinoti kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu nekuti bumbiro remutemo robvunidza vanhu kuratidziro kane vane chavanotsutsumwira.” Kutumirwa kwemapurisa uku kunotevera mashoko egurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwemukati menyika VaIgnatious Chombo nezuro ekuti kuratidzira hakusi pamutemo uye mapurisa anenge akazara mumigwagwa. Mudhorobha reMasvingo nedzimwe nzvimbo dzedunhu iri mwaswera makazara mapurisa anga akabata mboma ne zvombo zvehondo. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa, Mauto neVaSori Vomanikidza Vanhu Kuenda kuMabasa kuMasvingo

text: Mutungamiri we MDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vashora zvikuru kupambwa neMuvhuro kwemurwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaItai Dzamara. VaTsvangirai vati vakatambira runhare neMuvhuro kubva kumudzimai waVaDzamara, Amai Sheffra Dzamara, achivaziviswa nezvekupambwa kwemurwiri wekodzero dzevanhu uyu. Vati ivo nebato ravo vari kushushikana zvikuru nekupambwa uku, vakati VaDzamara vakapa mashoko erutsigiro pakaita MDC musangano wayo neMugovera. VaTsvangirai vati mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nehurumende yavo ndivo vanoziva kwavakaisa VaDzamara. Vatiwo VaMugabe, avo vanova sachigaro we African Union ne SADC, havafanirwe kuramba vari mutungamiri wenyika inopamba zvizvarwa zvayo. VaTsvangirai, avo vanga vachifanirwa kucherechedza zuva rekuberekwa kwavo neChipiri, vati havana kuisa mari parutivi yekupemberera zuva rekuberekwa kwavo. Mashoko aya anenge anga akanangana naVaMugabe avo vakaita bhavhadhe rakadya mari yakawanda uku nyika ichidya nhoko dzezvironda. Asi VaTsvangirai vati vatora mukana uyu kushoropodza hurumende nekwavanoti kupamba kwayakaita VaDzamara, vanova mutungamiri wesangano re Occupy Africa Unity Square. Mutungamiri weMDC atorawo mukana wekuyeuchidza veruzhinji kupambwa nekupondwa kwakaitwa magamba eMDC akaita samuchakabvu Tonderai Ndira, Tichaona Chiminya na Beta Chokururama nevamwe. VaTsvangirai vaudza veruzhinji kuti nyika yose inofanirwa kubatana nebato ravo mukumanikdza hurumende kuti ibude pachena panyaya ya VaDzamara. Zvichakadaro, mutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mapurisa asumwa nezvekupambwa kwaVaDzamara uye atanga kuferefeta nyaya iyi. Mumiriri weEuropean Union-muZimbabwe, VaPhillipe Van Damme, vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti vari kushushikana zvikuru nekushaikwa kwaVaDzamara. VaVan Damme vati havo vari kuBelgium pari zvino asi vati hofisi yavo muZimbabwe iri kuenderera mberi ichiferefeta nyaya iyi. EU yakatanga kudyidzana neZimbabwe gore rino kunyange hazvo vamwe vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vange vachichema chema kuti EU yakakurumidza kumedza kutsenga ichada panyaya yekudyidzana neZimbabwe. Vanhu ava vanoti nyaya yekodzero dzevanhu uye kusaremekedzwa kwebumbiro remitemo kuri kuenderera mberi muZimbabwe nokudaro EU haifanirwe kudyidzana naVaMugabe. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dezevanhu remuamerica, reRobert F. Kennedy Centre for Human Rights, Amai Kerry Kennedy, vashorawo zvakanyanya kupambwa kwaVaDzamara. Amai Kennedy vati zviri kuitwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe zvinhu zvinoshoresa. Vatiwo VaMugabe, sachigaro weAfrican Union vanofanira kuita zvinhu zvinoyemurwa nevamwe kwete kutoenda pamberi nekutyora kodzero dzevanhu Sangano iri ratiwo mapurisa emuZimbawe nevasori vane nhoroondo yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Mudzimai waVaDzamara, Amai Sheffra Dzamara, vanoti vari kuda kuti murume wavo adzoke kumba ari mupenyu. No media source currently available VaDzamara vakapambwa mumba inogerwa vanhu muHarare ndokuendwa navo vari mumotokari yemhando rwe Isuzu. Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti rakwirawo kudare repamusoro reHigh Court richiti mapazi ehurumende ane chekuita nekuchengetedzwa kwenyika anofanira kutaura kuti VaDzamara varipi kana vari ivo vakavapamba. No media source currently available
title: VaTsvangirai Voshora Kupambwa kwaVaDzamara

text: Vamwe vanhu vashanyira mapako eChinhoyi nhasi vakurudzira Zimparks kuti ivape munhu ane ruzivo nezvenzvimbo iyi kana kuti Tour Guide pamadhora gumi nemashanu avanenge vabhadhara kuti vapinde panzvimbo iyi. Asi Zimparks inoti vanenge vachida nyanzvi vanobhadhara imwe mari pamusoro. Vanhu vashoma vashanyira mapako aya nhasi zvichienzaniswa nenguva imwe cheteyo gore rapera. Mapako eChinhoyi ayo anozivikanwawo nezita rekuti Chirorodziva anonzi aishandiswa kukandwa vanhu vanenge vatadzira Mambo Nyamakwere. Mambo Nyamakwere vanonzi vakazorwiswa vakakundwa naMambo Chinhoyi vane zita rakazotumidzwa guta reChinhoyi. Mambo Chinhoyi vaishandisa mapako eChinhoyi kuhwanda varwi vechiNdevere kare kare kuma 1890 Asi nhoroondo yakadai yanzi naMuzvare Monalisa Kapisa havaizive sezvo vasina kupihwa munhu anovatsanangurira kana kuti Tour Guide. Muzvare Monalisa vanotiwo matombo avanotsika vachipinda nekubuda mumapako haachisina kusimba uye mamwe avekutsvedza izvo zvinokonzera kuti vanhu vatyoke kana kuminyuka makumbo. Mumwe mushanyi, VaShadreck Muchemeyi vanoti kushaya munhu anovatsanangurira nezvenhoroondo yemapako zvinoita kuti vana vavanenge vauya navo vatadze kuziva nhoroondo yemapako kana vave kudzidza nezveChinhoyi Caves. Asi mumwe mushandi weZimParks uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo asingabvumirwe kutaura nevatori venhau anoti ZimParks haingapinze basa munhu anoshanda pahorodhe chete sezvo kuchiuya vanhu vashoma pane dzimwe nguva. Izvi zvapesana nezvataurwa nemukuru weZimParks muChinhoyi Muzvare Mamdy Chemhere avo vanoti maTour Guides aripo asi vanobhadharwa. Muzvare Chemhere vanoti vachagadzirisa matombo ave kukuvadzisa vashanyi. Patababvudza kuti Tour Guide anobhadharwa marii Muzvare Chemhere vatsenga mukanwa. Asi mutauriri weZimparks VaTinashe Farawo vatsinhira kuti munhu anopa vanhu ruzivo rwakadai aripo. Vanhu vakuru vanga vachibhadhara madhora gumi nemashanu kupinda kunoona mapako, avo vanenge vachida kufara vachigocha nyama nekunwa hwahwa nezvinwiwa vanga vachibhadhara madhora zana emari yemunyika zvisinei kuti mabhondi here kana kana kuti iswipe kana Ecocash. Kuona shumba dziri muwaya vanhu vanobhadhara madhora makumi maviri emunyika. Vana vane makore matanhatu kusvika pamakore gumi nemaviri vanobhadhara chidimu chemari inobhadharwa nevanhu vakuru. Vashanyi vanobva kunze kwenyika vanobhadhara nemari yekuAmerica inoita madhora gumi kupinda mumapako, madhora mapfumbamwe kufara vanhu vachigocha nyama nekunwa uye madhora zana kupinda mumvura dzemapako kana kuti Diving. Mapako emuChinhoyi imwe yenzvimbo dzinosanganisira Kariba Dam, Matopos nemapopoma eVic Falls dzinoshanyirwa zvikuru sei nguva ino yezororo nevashanyi vekunedzimwe nyika nevemuno munyika. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Voshanyira Mapako eChinhoyi paZororo reGoredzva

text: Nhengo dzemapato mana dzakwanisa kunyoresa zviri pamutemo kuitira kuti dzikwikwidze musaradzo ye by election yekutsvaga mumiririri weZaka East muparamende. Vane magwaro atambirwa nedare reNomination Court ndiVaDereck Charamba veMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa; VaClemence Chiduwa ve Zanu PF; VaLazarus Mubango veFree Zim Congress, pamwe naVa Clemence Chavarika veNational Constitutional Assemby, NCA. Mukuru wekufambiswa kwebasa muZimbabwe Election Commission mudunhu reMasvingo, VaZex Pudurai, vati kunyoreswa kwevachakwikwidza ava kwaitwa zvakanaka pasina zvanetsa. VaCharamba veMDC vaudza vatori venhau kuti vanotarisira kukunda musarudzo iyi kunyange hazvo bato ravo rakambokundwa musaraudzo iyi gore rapera. VaChiduwa veZanu PF vatiwo vanotarisira kutora chigaro ichi nekuti chakagara chiri kubato ravo ravati rinodiwa nevanhu. Vange vakamiriria nhengo ye NCA, VaNyasha Zhou, vatiwo havatarisiri kukunda musarudzo iyi kunyange vari kukukwidza nekuti Zanu PF yave nemakore ichikunda munzvimbo iyi. Chigaro cheZaka East chakasara chisisna munhu mushure mekushaya kwevaimirira nzvimbo iyi muparamende, VaCaston Gumbandwa, muna Chikumi. Mune imwewo nyaya, mhuri dzinosvika gumi neina kuMashava dzave nemazuva maviri dzichigara pamhene mushure mekudzingwa mudzimba dze Gaths Mine dzavaigara nedare redzimhosva reko vachinzi dzimba dzavo dzakatengwa nechikoro chipamusoro soro che Great Zimbabwe Universtity. Vagari vemumusha weChemberi vaive vashandi vemumugodhi uyu, uye wakavharwa kare. Vanoti vari panguva yakaoma apo vana vavo vari kuvata panze sezvo vasina kwekuenda. Mumwe wevagari vataura neStudio 7, VaEdmore Munyanyi, vati vave kutyira hupenyu hwemhuri dzavo sezvo vari kurara panze uye vakatarisana nenhamo yekushaya chikafu. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reGreat Zimbabwe University panyaya yevanhu vakabviswa mudzimba dzavanga vachigara.  No media source currently available
title: Mapato Onyoresa Kukwikwidza Sarudzo yeMumiriri weZaka East

text: Vechidiki kubva kumapato ezvamatongerwo enyika anosanganisira Zanu PF Citizens Coalition for Change neMDC-T vasangana nhasi muHarare vachigadzira hwaro hwekuti sarudzo dzegore rinouya dziitwe murunyararo. Pamusangano wanhasi uyo warongwa nesangano re4 H Zimbabwe, vechidiki vati havachada kushandiswa kuita mhirizhonga. Pamboita kukandirana makobvu nematete pakati penhengo dzeZanu PF neCCC patanga musangano uyu asi zvinhu zvazogadzikana musangano ukapera zvakanaka. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri wevechidiki kana kuti Youth Assembly mubato reCCC VaStephen Chuma vati kugara vanhu vachitaurirana kunopa kuti mhirizhonga iderere. Vechidiki kubva kumapato ese vapinda mumusangano uyu vashora mhirizhonga vachiti yasvika nguva yekuti vasiyane nenyaya yekushandiswa kurwisana dzimwe nguva vachideura ropa. Imwe nhengo yeZanu PF mudunhu reHarare, VaLameck Chimanyiwa, vati vafara chose nemusangano wanhasi uye vati tariro yavo ndeyekuti misangano yakadai irambe ichiitwa. Vachitaurawo vakamirira bato ravo reMDC-T inotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora, mumiriri weGlen View South muNational Assembly , VaVincent Tsvangirai, vati vechidiki havachadi zvemhirizhonga uye vanofanira kuramba vachisangana vachipanana mazano uyewo vavewo kuda zvinzvimbo zvehutungamiriri. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, VaJasper Mangwana vange vari pamusangano uyu vatiwo vanhu vakawanda havana chido chekuvhota munyika nekuda kwekuti mapato ezvematongerwo enyika anogaronyora manyepo pamadandemutande kuti ZEC inobira sarudzo. Vati komisheni yavo inotevedzera mutemo uye vanenge vaine zvichemo vanofanira kutaura neZEC kana kuenda kumatare anoona nezvesaqrudzo kana kuti Electoral Court. Asi VaTsvangirai vati havabvumirane naVaMangwana vachiti ZEC inofanira kuita basa rayo zvakajeka kuti vanhu vavimbe nayo. Vati nyaya yakaitika kuChegutu yekuti VaGift Konjana veMDC Alliance vakakunda musarudzo dza2018 asi ZEC ikati VaDexter Nduna veZamu-PF ndivo vakakunda ndiyo imwe yenyaya dzinoita kuti vanhu vashaye hanya nekuvhota. Mukuru wesangano re4H Zimbabwe iro raronga musangano wanhasi, VaJohn Muchenge, vatiwo kunyange hazvo pamboita kupopotedzana zvinhu zvazofamba zvakanaka. Sangano re4H Zimbabwe rinouya nezvirongwa zvaro kuzowedzera basa ririkuitwa nemamwe masangano mukurudzira runyararo nekubata munyika akaita seHeal Zimbabwe Trust pamwe neNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission. Mhirizhonga inowanda nguva dzesarudzo uye echidiki ndivo vanonzi vanowanika kakawanda vachiita kana kushandiswa pamhirizhonga iyi. Pamberi pesarudzo dzemaby-elections muKurume, nhengo yeCCC mushakabvu Mboneni Ncube vakapondwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF. Nyaya iyi ichiri kumatare edzimhosva. No media source currently available
title: VeChidiki veZanu-PF, CCC neMDC-T Voti Havachadi Kushandiswa Kudeura Ropa

text: Gweta rinomirira VaThabani Mpofu, VaTapiwa Makanza, vanotarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare redzimhosva muHarare vachipomerwa mhosva yekukanganisa kufambiswa kwemitemo. VaMakanza ndivo gweta rinomirira VaMpofu, avo vanozivikanwa sagweta raVaNelson Chamisa, munyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuti vakashandisa zita remunhu wenhema mumagwaro avakaendesa kumatare edzimhosva munyaya yekukwikwidza kudomwa kwemuchuchusi mukuru, VaKumbirai Hodzi. Gweta raVaMakanza, VaPaidamoyo Saurombe, vanoshanda neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMakanza vakavharirwa kuMorris Depot asi vanotarisirwa kumiswa mberi kwedare redzimhosva neMuvhuro. VaSaurombe vati magweta ave kusungirwa nyaya dzisina maturo, vachiti vave kutyira kuti zviri kuitika kumagweta zvichakanganisa kodzero dzevanhu vanenge vachimiswa mberi kwematare edzimhosva. No media source currently available
title: Gweta, VaTapiwa Makanza, Vomiswa Mudare reDzimhosva

text: Amai Hillary Clinton vapinda munhoroondo yeAmerica vachiva mudzimai wekutanga kusarudzwa kutungamira bato guru musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika. Amai Clinton vakatambira zviri pamutemo kusarudzwa uku mudunhu rePhiladelphia nemusi weChina manheru. Amai Clinton vari kukukwidza musarudzo dzemuna Mbudzi idzi neshoroma iri kumirira bato remaRepublcans VaDonald Trump. Amai Clinton vakashora VaTrump vachiti havana gwara rakajeka rekuti vakakunda vanoita sei kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nehupfumi. Vakati chido chavo ndechekuumba hupfumi hwakasimba Sarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica dziri kuitwa muna Mbudzi kusarudza achava mutungamiri wechimakumi mana kutungamira nyika . VaTrump avo vanozivikanwa nenyaya dzemitambo mumaterevhizheni vane makore makumi manomwe ekuberekwa uye havasati vambosarudzwa pachigaro chine chekuita nenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Asi Amai Clinton, mudzimai wevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaBill Clinton uye vakasarudzwa kuva Senator weNew York vakazoitawo munyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika mudare remakurukota raVaBarack Obama. Vaviri ava vari kutarisirwa kuita gakava mukupera kwaGunyana. MuZimbabwe pari zvino mune madzimai matatu ari kutungamira mapato ezvematongerwo enyika anoti Amai Joyce Mujuru veZimbabwe People First, Amai Marcellina Chikasha vanotungamira bato reAfrican Democratic Party naAmai Barbra Nyagomo veProgressive Democrats of Zimbabwe.
title: Amai Clinton Vopinda muNhoroondo yeAmerica muNyaya dzezveMatongerwo eNyika

text: Hofisi yemuchuchisi mukuru wehurumende nemusi weChitatu yakundikana kuchuchisa vatungamiri vesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association vange vachipomerwa mhosva yekunyomba mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Vashanu vange vachichuchiswa vanosanganisa munyori mukuru wesangano iri VaVictor Matemadanda uye mutauriri waro VaDouglas Mahiya. Magweta evakarwa hondo aya ange achitiwo vakafanobata chigaro chemuchuchusi mukuru wehurumende VaRay Goba havana kusarudzwa zvakanaka nekuti vakambosungwa nemhosva yekutyaira vakadhakwa kuNamibia uye kuda kuvhiringidza kuferefetwa kwenyaya iyi muna2002. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaGoba kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi gweta revarwiri verusununguko ava VaHarrison Nkomo vaudza Studio 7 kuti dare raramba chikumbiro chevachuchusi chekukumbira imwezve nguva yekuti vagadzirise mapepa avo. No media source currently available Mune imwe nyaya, sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti rakabatsira VaNevson Mpofu vange vatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore gumi nematatu kuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nyaya yavo ichizeyiwa zvekare. Dare ramejastiriti kuBulawayo rainge ravabata nemhosva yekutapurira musikana wavo chirwere cheHIV maune. Gweta reZLHR VaLizwe Jamela vanoti humbowo hwakashandiswa mudare kusungirira VaMpofu hwainge husina kumira zvakanaka. Mutongi wedare ramejastiriti kuBulawayo Amai Sibongile Marondedze vakawana VaMpofu vaine mhosva yekutyora mutemo weCriminal Law (Codificationa and Reform) Act chikamu 9:23. VaJamela vakati mutongo uyu wainge wakanyanyisa uye VaMpofu vakanzi vabvise mari yechibatiso nyaya yavo ichizeyiwa zvekare.
title: Muchuchusi weHurumende Okundikana Kuchuchisa Vakuru veVakarwa Hondo

text: Dare reparamende nemusi weChina rakapasisa kuvandudzwa kwebhiri rinosunga mashandiro emasangano akazvimirira, rePrivate Voluntary Organisations (PVO) Amendment Bill. Kupasiswa nedare repasi uku kwave kureva kuti bhiri iri ave kuenda kudare reseneti, uye kana rakatambirwa zvakare kudare reseneti, rinozoenda kumutungamiri wenyika uyo anozorisaina kuti uchive mutemo. Vemasangano akazvimirira pamwe nevamwe vemapato anopikisa vanonzi vanga vachiramba kuti bhiri iri rive mutemo vachiti rakanangana nekupa hurumende masimba akawanda pamusoro pemashandiro emasangano akazvimirira munyika, zvinogona kuita kuti vamwe vagume vakandwa mumajeri. Asi bepanhau reHurumende rinoti bhiri rePrivate Voluntary Organisation Amendment Bill rinonzi rakanangana nekumisa kufambiswa kwedzimari dzinoshandiswa mukuita mabasa echitororo, uye kufambiswa kwemari kusiri pamutemo nemamwe masangano akazvimirira. Gurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vanonzi vakaudza izvi kudare repamende mwedzi yadarika iyo vachiti izvi vakazviziviswa nesangano remushandirapamwe wedzihurumende dzakasiyanasiyana, reFinancial Action Taskforce, iro rinonzi rinobuda nemitemo inodzivirira kufambiswa kwemari dzinobatsira matororo.
title: Dare reParamende Rinopasisa Bhiri Rinonzi neVamwe Rakanangana neKudzvinyirira veMasangano Akazvimirira, rePVO Amendment Bill

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vatoresa mhiko nhengo dzemakurukota ehurumende dzavakadoma nemusi weMuvhuro apo vakavandudza dare remakurukota. Mumwe akatora mhiko igurukota idzva rinoona nezvemari, VaIgnatius Chombo, avo vaive gurukota rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwemukati menyika. Asi kubazi rezvemari kwavaenda, VaChombo vari kusvikopinda mukanwa mamupere sezvo mamiriro ezvehupfumi asina kumira zvakanaka pari zvino. Ko VaChombo avo vakaita zvidzidzo zvakanangana nedzidzo vangakwanise here kumutsiridza hupfumi? Nhengo yeZanu-PF inomiririra Harare East mudare reparamende, VaTerrence Mukupe, vanoti VaChombo vanoda kupihwa nguva kwete kuponderwa musaga. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Free State kuSouth Africa, VaCalvin Mdzingiri, vanoti kuti bazi iri rishande zvinoda kuti hurumende idhonzere divi rimwe chete. Ko vamwe vaimbovawo makurukota ezvemari vanoona sei kudomwa kwaVaChombo uku? Doctor Simba Makoni vanoti hapana chazvinobatsira nekuti hurumende haina kuzvipira kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Vaimbovawo gurukota rezvehupfumi muhurumende yemubatanidzwa uye vari mutungamiri webato rinopikisa rePeople’es Democratic Party, VaTendai Biti, vanoti hapana chiri kuchinja. VaBiti vati havo VaChinamasa vanenge vainge vachikundikana. VaChombo vari kubva vatambirwa nebhajeti yavo yekutanga inofanira kuparurwa mwedzi unouya. Izvi vari kuita kunyangwe hazvo VaChinamasa vainge vave pedyo nekupeta hurongwa hwavo hwebhajeti regore rinouya. Pakatanga kukwira mitengo yezvinhu mazuva apera, VaMugabe vakati pane mamwe makurukota avo ari kuita hwaJudas Iscarioti vachiyedza kupidigura vanhu vavo nekurega mitengo ichiita chamurambamhuru. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti ivo ndivo vari kuita kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo nemitemo yavo. No media source currently available
title: Kudomwa kwaVaChombo Kuti Vagadzirise Hupfumi Kunobudirira Here?

text: Mushure mekuona kuoma kwakanga kwoita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvakasunga twutundu zvakananga kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana kunotsvaga mafuro manyoro pamwe nerugare munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Mumwe wezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakananga kunze kwenyika,ndaVaAlick Sandikonda Sakara, avo vari mu Lilongwe, muguta guru re Malawi uko vakavhura chitoro chavo chinotengesa zvekuvakisa dzimba. VaSakara vakaberekerwa kuKaroi mudunhu reMashonaland West vakazodzidza kwakare kuKaroi neChinhoyi. Asi nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu munyika, vakazowana mukana wekubuda munyika muna 2005 vachinotsvagawo mafuro manyoro kuMalawi. Vanoti zvinhu zvakambotanga zvakavaomera semunhu akanga asiri kwake, asi vakazogadzikana vakakwanisa kuzovhura chitoro chavo icho vanoti chave kuvapawo mari yekuti vakwanisewo kubatsira vamwe. VaSakara vanoti iye zvino vave kukwanisawo kubhadharira mari dzechikoro vana vanoshaya vekunharaunda yavo yeKaroi kwavanobva, kubatsirawo zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muMalawi, uye kusimudzira mhuri yavo yavagere nayo ikoko. VaSakara vanotiwo kuMalawi havasi kusangana nematambudziko seari kusanganikwa nawo nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri munyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neZambia, vachiti vakagarisana zvakanaka chose nezvizvarwa zveMalawi. Vanoti vanokurudzira zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika kuti zvibatsire nzvimbo dzazvinobva kuitirawo kusimudzirana nekupana mikana nevanoshaya. No media source currently available
title: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaSakara, Voriritira Mhuri Vari kuMalawi

text: Mumwe murume wekwa Juru Growth Point mudunhu reGoromonzi North, VaMoenda Mbera, vakasungwa neChipiri vachipomerwa mhosva yekutuka mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachishandisa nemashoko anonzi anonyadzisa. VaMbera, avo vane makore makumi matatu nemashanu ekuberekwa, vanowe zvakare kanzura weWard 9 uye vari nhengo yeMDC T, vanga vachifanirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare ramejasitiriti kwaMurehwa neChitatu. Asi gweta riri kumirira VaMbera, VaKennedy Masiye, veZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, vanoti muchuchisi anonzi ati haakwanise kuenderera mberi nenyaya iyi asina gwaro rekuchuchisa kana kuti certificate of prosecution. Izvi zvinonzi zvazoita kuti dare ripe VaMbera masamanisi ekuti vadzoke kudare musi wa 26 Mbudzi. VaMasiye vanoti VaMbera vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora chikamu chemutemo weCriminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo yeMDC-T kuGoromonzi Inosungirwa Kutuka VaMugabe

text: Mamwe maseneta maviri ekuAmerica akange ari kuZimbabwe mavhiki mashoma adarika, anoti VaJeff Flake, vekuArizona, naVaCory Booker, vekuNew Jersey, vakasimudza nyaya yeZimbabwe apo paibvunzurudzwa VaMike Pompeo nedare reSenate vasati vatora mhiko yekuva munyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muAmerica, kana kuti Secretary of State. Dare reSenate rakaita hurukuro idzi muWashington DC mudare reCapital Hill. VaFlake vakati America inofanira kutumira mumiriri kuZimbabwe nechimbi chimbi mushure mekunge Ambassador Harry Thomas Junior vasiya basa, vachiti Zimbabwe ine sarudzo dzakakosha gore rino VaPompeo vakavimbisa kuita izvi vachishanda nemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump. VaBooker vakati America inofanira kusimbaradza kudyidzana neZimbabwe, sezvo vekuChina vakawanda vave kupinda muZimbabwe. Vakatiwo vanhu vemuZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika vari kuona sekunge America iri kuvaregerera. America yakatemera vanwe vakuru veZimbabwe zvirango uye inoti zvinobviswa kana chete vakaita sarudzo dzakachena, uye kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, vachishanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa mavhinga, vanoti zvakakosha kwazvo kuti America inge iine mumiriri muZimbabwe, zvikuru mukumutsiridza hukama hwenyika mbiri idzi, pamwewo nesarudzo dziri kutarisirwa muZimbabwe, kuitira kuti America igozvionera yoga pamhino sefodya. No media source currently available
title: MaSeneta ekuAmerica Okurudzira Kuti Kukasike Kudomwa Mumiriri Anoenda kuZimbabwe

text: Mamwe madzimai ekuMakuti mudunhu reMashonaland West ari kurarama zvakaoma nekutengesa huswa hwekupfirira dzimba, bhizinisi ravanoti rave kuvawanisa mari shoma zvichienzaniswa nenguva yakare. Madzimai aya, anosanaganisira vechidiki nevakuru, anoti bhizinisi rekutengesa huswa rinorwadza sezvo vachifamba mitunhu yakareba kunotsvaka huswa uhu. Vanoti kunyange hazvo vachiwana huswa uhu pachena, vanobhadhara mari yekuti hutakurwe kuti huuye pavanotengesera pedyo nemugwagwa unobva kuHarare uchienda kuChirundu apo hunowonekwa nevanhu vakawanda. Ambuya Chenai Mazi, avo vave nemakore gumi nemashanu vachitengesa huswa, vanoti huswa hauchabhadhare senguva yakare apo vakatanga. Vanoti vanhu vakawanda vakatenga mombe nekuendesa vana kuzvikoro nemari yekutengesa huswa. Vakapamhidzazve vachiti parizvino vave kufa nenyota makumbo ari mumvura sezvo vaine huswa hwakawanda asi pasina ari kuuya kuzohutenga. Ambuya Mazi vanoseka vanhu vanoenda kwavari vachida kutenga huswa nechikwereti vachiti havana kumbozviita mukutengesa kwavo kwese. Umwe wemadzimai aya, Amai Sinodia Mveremu, vanoti mazuva ano huswa hauchabhadhara nokuti hwave kutengwa nemutengo wakaderera sezvo vanhu vasina mari munyika. Asi mumwe mudzimai wechidiki, Amai Senzeni Mavata avo vakatanga kutengesa huswa makore ano, vanoti ane ganda ane nyama hazvienzane neasina nokudaro vachashingirira kunyange vachiwana mari shoma. Madzimai anotengesa huswa aya anoti munguva yakare vanhu vaibva kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika vachiuya kuzotenga huswa hwekupfirira dzimba dzavo zvikuru sei vagari vemumarukishena epakati nepakati anogara vanowana pamwe nenzvimbo dzekutandarira. Vanotizve zvinhu zvichiri zvakanaka munyika zvizvarwa zvekuZambia zvaiuya munyika kuzotenga huswa nemari yakawanda sezvo vaitenga vari muzvimapoka. Kunyange hazvo bhizinisi rekutengesa huswa riri kuramba richioma zuva nezuva madzimai aya anoti havana zvimwe zvekuita zvinovawanisa mari nokudaro vacharamba vakashinga vachitengesa huswa. No media source currently available
title: Madzimai Anorarama nekuTengesa Huswa kuMakuti Anoti Zvinhu Zviri Kuvaomera Zvakanyanya
