text: Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi vehurumende, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, vanoti nhaurirano dzichiri kuenderera mberi pakati pehurumende nevashandi vayo panyaya yemari yemabhonasi egore rapera kunyange hazvo vamwe vashandi vatanga kuramwa mabasa vamwe vachiti vachatangawo kuratidzira svondo rinouya. Amai Mupfumira vanoti hurumende iri kunzwawo pfungwa dzevamwe vashandi vasiri kumirirwa nemasangano evashandi kuti vogadzirisa sei nyaya yemabhonasi. Hurumende iri kutatarika kubhadhara vashandi vayo sezvo iri kuti hupfumi hwenyika hauna kumira zvakanaka. Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vaimbenge varamba kupa vashandi vebhonasi asi mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakati vashandi vapihwe mari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti hurumende iri kurasikirwawo nemari yakawanda ichibhadhara vashandi vasina zvavari kunyatsoita kana kuti ma“ghost workers.” Vazhinji vevashandi ava ndevechidiki vebato reZanu-PF vanoshanda mumatunhu kana kuti mayouth officers. Amai Mupfumira varamba kuti pane vashandi vehurumende vari kubhadharwa vasina zvavari kuita vachiti vakatopedza ongororo yenyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inoti Ichiri Kuda Kuita Nhaurirano neVashandi

text: Nemusi weChishau vanhu vemuBulawayo vakaita musangano wekuzeya nyaya yeGukurahundi iyo yakaitika kubva muna 1982 kusvika panyoreranwa chibvumirano chekubatana kweZanu-PF nePF Zapu muna 1987. Zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvakafa kuMidlands neMatabelaland munguva iyi. Vane hama dzakaurayiwa munguva iyi zvikuru nevanofungidzirwa kuti mauto eFifth Bridage vanoti nyaya iyi inofanira kugadziriswa vopihwa muripo kana zvichibvira. VaDumiso Dabengwa, vanove mutungamiri webato reZAPU uye vari mumwe wevatungamiri vabato iri vakashungurudzwa zvikuru panguva iyi, vakati Gukurahundi yakatangwa nehurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe nechinangwa chekuda kuti munyika musave nebato raipikisa. VaDabengwa vakati mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Dabengwa ndemumwe wevanhu vanonyatsoziva zvose zvakaitika panguva yeGukurahundi vakati zvakakosha kuti hurumende igadzirise nyaya iyi zvachose. Muzvinafundo Martin Rupiya avo vakataurawo pamusangano uyu vakatiwo zvakakosha kuti nyaya yeGukurahundi itaurwe nezvayo vakapa muenzaniso wedzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica dzakadai seTogo neEthiopia uko vakati kuri kuitwa nhaurirano dzekuedza kuunza runyararo mushure mekusawirirana kwakamboitika munyika idzi. VaRupiya vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoona kusainwa kwemutemo weNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission Act kuchibatsira zvikuru kuti nyaya iyi igadziriswe. Vamwe vanhu vaive pamusangano uyu vakati kunyange hazvo mutemo weNPRC Act wavepo, vanotyira kuti hurumende yeZanu PF inogona kusave nehany’a nekugadzirisa nyaya yeGukurahundi sezvange zvichingoitika kwemakore ose apfuura. Asi VaRupiya vakati vanhu vanofanirwa kupa hurumende yaVaMnangagwa mukana. Reverend Motsi veZimbabwe Christian Alliance vachishandawo nesangano reNational Transitional Justice Working Group vakatiwo havangakwanise kutaura kuti hurumende ichakwanisa here kana kuti kwete kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Asi vakati vanotambira kuvepo kwemutemo weNPRC sedanho rakakosha. Musangano uyu wakapindwa nevanhu vakawanda zvikuru kusanganisira vamwe vakabatwa nenyaya yeGukurahundi, varwiri vekodzero dzevanhu pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo. Pakamboitika mhirizhonga pamusangano uyu kwenguva kadiki mushure mekunge mumwe musikana wechidiki uyo akangozviti MaSibanda akataura mashoko ekuti vanhu havafanirwe kukoshesa kuuraiwa kwevanhu panguva yeGukurahundi chete pasingataurwe kuuraiwa kwakaitwa vanhu nehurumende yevaChena panguva yehondo muRhodesia. Mhirizhonga iyi yakazopera musangano ukaenderera mberi mushure mekunge musikana uyu abudiswa mumusangano uyu. VaConte Mhlanga avo vane mukurumbira mukugadzira mitambo yedrama netelevision vakaudza musangano uyu kuti misangano yakadai haina zvainonyanyobatsira kana ichiitwa pakati pevanhu chete pasina vehurumende vanenge vachinzwa zvichemo zvevanhu. Asi gweta VaAlec Muchadehama vakaudza Studio 7 kuti misangano yakadai yakakosha uye inofanirwa kuitwa munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika kuitira kuti vanhu vanyatsonzwisisa nyaya yeGukurahundi. VaMuchadehama vakatiwo vanhu havafanirwe kushushikana kuti chii chingaitwa kana hurumende ikasada kugadzirisa nyaya yeGukurahundi vachiti bumbiro remutemo wenyika rinopa vanhu kodzero dzinoita kuti vakwanise kuudza hurumende zvavanoda kuti zviitwe panyaya dzakakosha seiyi. Musangano wanezuro wakarongwa nesangano reSouthern Africa Political Economy Series, SAPES, pamwe neWomen’s Institute for Leadership Development kana kuti WILD. Mumwe musangano wakadai wakaitwa mazuva mashoma apfuura muHarare uye veSAPES vanoti vane chinangwa chekuita mimwe misangano yakadai senzira yekukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise nyaya yeGukurahundi. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kune mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaKembo Mohadi avo vakanzi vaone nezvenyaya iyi muhurumende. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzokurudzira Kukurukurwa kweNyaya dzeGukurahundi

text: Zimbabwe Energy Regulatory Authority, ZERA, yazivisa kuti kutangidza nhasi Muvhuro, mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotikari unchapamhidzirwa zvekare. Mitengo mitsva iyi icha siyanasiyana zvichienderana nedhorobha kunenge kwatengwa mafuta aya. Harare neMutare ndidzo dzichange dziine peturu nedhiziri zvakachipa kupfuura kumwe kwese, peturu ichiita $10.01, dhiziri richiita $10.32. Ukuvo, Victoria Falls ndiyo ichave nepeturu nedhiziri zvinodhura kupfuura mamwe maguta ese, sezvo kutangidza nhasi peturu ichange ichiita $10.56, dhiziri richiita $10.85. Imwe mitengo yaziviswa neZERA yakamira yakadai: Bulawayo: Peturu $10.39, Dhiziri: 10.69 Gweru, Masvingo neKaroi: Peturu $10.21, Dhiziri: $10.51 Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti vanhu varikuramba vachiomeserwa asi mihoro yavo isingakwidzwi naizvozvo vave kutya kuti zvichazosvitsa vanhu pakurwisana nehurumende. Vanodzidzisa zvemabhisimisi paDevry University, Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanoti zvichatora nguva refu kuti zvinhu zvigadziriswe sezvo parizvino hurumende iri kutadza kugadzirisa zvinhu munyika uye hairatidzi kuti ineruzivo rwekubudisa nyika mumatambudziko airi. No media source currently available
title: Dzimwe Nyanzvi Munezvehupfumi Dzinoti Zvichatora Nguva Kuti Zimbabwe Igadzikane

text: Dare ramejasitiriti remuHarare ratura mutongo wekuti Amai Beatrice Mtetwa vasamirire mutori wenhau, Hopewell Chin’ono, panyaya yaari kupomerwa yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga mukati. Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti, VaNgoni Nduna, vatura mutongo wekuti Amai Mtetwa vamire kumirira Chin’ono vachiti mashoko avanonzi vakanyora padandemutande reFacebook, mashoko akazvidza dare. Dare rinoti Amai Mtetwa vakanyora paFacebook papeji rakanzi “Beatrice Mtetwa and the Rule of Law” kuti Chin’ono musungwa wezvematongerwo enyika ndosaka akaunzwa kudare akaiswa ngetani dzemumakumbo. Asi Amai Mtetwa vakaramba mhosva yavaipomerwa mudare vachiti peji iri rakagadzirwa naLorie Conway uyo akashanda naChin’ono mukugadzirwa kwefirimu raitaura nezvebasa ravo segweta vachiti havasi paFacebook uye peji iri nderaConway izvo zvakatsinhirwa naChin’ono mu hufakazi hwake pakanzwikwa nyaya iyi svondo rapera. VaNduna vati mashoko aya akaita kuti pasi rose richemecheme nemabatirwo ari kuitwa Chin’ono. VaNduna vatiwo kunyange hazvo Amai Mtetwa vachiti peji iri harisi ravo, Amai Mtetwa segweta hombe vaifanira kukonzeresa kuti mashoko akanyorwa papeji iri abviswe sezvo peji iri rine zita ravo. Mumutongo wavo, VaNduna vashorawo Amai Mtetwa nekuvanyorera tsamba yavakapawo muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, VaWhisper Mabhaudhi, yavati haina kuvafadza vachiti vaitaura kusafara kwavo nemafambisirwo aiitwa nyaya yaChin’ono mudare. VaNduna vati havatarisiri hunhu hwakadai kubva kugweta rine mukurumbira saAmai Mtetwa. VaNduna vakurudzirawo hofisi yemuchuchisi mukuru munyika, VaKumbirai Hodzi, kuti vatore matanho ekuona kuti Amai Mtetwa vamiswa pamberi pematare vachipomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza dare. VaNduna vakurudzirawo sangano rinonyoresa magweta reLaw Society of Zimbabwe kuti ritore matanho ekuranga Amai Mtetwa. Amai Mtetwa vati havasi kushamiswa nemutongo waturwa nedare uyu. Amai Mtetwa vati vacharamba vachiita basa ravo rehugweta zvisinei nemutongo waturwa nedare. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko musangano reLaw Society of Zimbabwe, VaRichard Chidza, vaudza Studio7 kuti havana mashoko akawanda ekutaura pari zvino sezvo vakamirira kutanga vaona mutongo waturwa nedare. Asi rimwe gweta uye vari nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemitemo, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku,vashora mutongo waVaNduna vakati pane mukana wakakura kwazvo wekuti mutongo uyu usendekwe parutivi nedare repamusoro. Zvichakadai, Advocate Taona Nyamakura ndivo vave kumirira Chin’ono mushure memutongo waturwa nedare uyu. Mushure memutongo uyu, Chin’ono abva atanga kupa hufakazi hwemamiriro akaita zvinhu kumajeri mudare muine magweta nemutongi chete zvichitevera mutongo waVaNduna wekuti Chin’ono ape humbowo hwake veruzhinji nevatori venhau vasingabvumidzwe mudare. Chin’ono akatarisirwa kuenderera nekupa hufakazi uhwu mangwana pachikumbiro chekuti apihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso achiti pane zvashanduka kubva paakambonyimwa mukana uyu nedare. Chin’ono ari kupomerwa mhosva yekunzi akakurudzira veruzhinji kuti varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga mukati musi wa31 Chikunguru kubudzikidza nemashoko aanonzi akanyora padandemutande rake reTwitter achitsigira kuratidzira kwakange kwashevedzerwa neboka riri kuzvidaidza kuti July 31st Movement iro riri kutingamirirwa naVaJacob Ngarivhume avo vari kupomerwawo mhosva yakafanana neyaChin’ono. VaNgarivhume vakatarisirwa kudzoka mudare neChishanu apo pakatarisirwa kuturwa mutongo pachikumbiro chavo chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba vachitiwo pane zvashanduka kubva pavakambonyimwa mukana uyu. No media source currently available
title: Amai Mtetwa Vorambidzwa neDare Kumirira Chin'ono

text: Mutungamiriri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vadomwa nekongiresi yebato ravo kuti varambe vari panyanga kwemamwe makore mashanu anotevera vadzora vatevedzeri vavo, VaConstantino Chiwenga naVaKembo Mohadi pamwe nasachigaro webato iri Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri. VaMnangagwa vadomawo nhengo dzePolitiburo shomanana vachiti vachadoma dzimwe nhengo dzePolitiburo kana vachinge vapedza kuvandudza (restructuring) mapazi edare iri izvo zvavati vari kuita pari zvino. Vadomwa ndiVaObert Mpofu, VaMike Bimha, VaLovemore Matuke, naVaPatrick Chinamasa. Vese ava vadzorwa pazvinzvimbo zvavange vainazvo muPolitiburo yakare. Amai Marble Chinomona vadomwawo kuti vamirire madzimai muPolitiburo, VaDouglas Mahiya vakadomwawo kuti vamirire vakarwa hondo muPolitiburo. Amai Muchinguri Kashiri vatenda VaMnangagwa nekuvasarudza kuti varambe vari pazvigaro zvavo mumusangano. VaMnangagwa vagadzawo nhengo itsva dzeCentral Committee dzakakunda musarudzo dzakaitwa masvondo maviri apfuura. Vadomawo dzimwe nhengo gumi dzeCentral Committee pamusoro pedzavagadza sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remutemo weZanu PF. Vadomwa vanosanganisira, VaWilson Kumbula vakabva kuZanu Ndonga, VaPaul Mangwana pamwe naAmai Angeline Tongogara. VaMnangagwa vadomawo dzimwe nhengo dzedare idzva rebato iri ravanasorojena, kana kuti Council of Elders. Dare iri rinofanira kunge riine vanhu gumi asi VaMnangagwa vambodoma vatatu chete vakati vachadoma vamwe munguva inotevera. Vatatu ava ndiVaJosiah Hungwe, Amai Angeline Masuku naAmbassdor Aaron Maboyi Ncube. Mutungamiri weZanu PF vatendawo kudomwa kwavaitwa kuti varambe vachitungamiriri bato vakati vachaenderera mberi nekuvandudza bato pamwe nekusimudzira hupenyu hwevanhu munyika. Vatiwo vatungamiriri vatsva vebato vanofanira kushanda zvakasimba kuti bato rikunde musarudzo. Vati vakatotenga zvese zvinoda kushandiswa pasarudzo dzegore rinouya uye vachange vachiparura Manifesto yavo munguva pfupi inotevera. Sachigaro weZanu PF kuUnited Kingdom, VaXavier Zavare, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kongiresi yapera zvakanaka uye vanofara kuti bato ravakuvacherechedzawo mubumbiro nezvirongwa zvaro. Vaive mutauriri weZanu PF, VaChris Mutsvangwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti kongiresi yafamba zvakanaka chose vakaramba mashoko ange ave kutenderera pamadandemutande ekuti dunhu reMashonaland Central range rabuda mukongiresi nhasi senzira yekuratidza kunyunyuta kwaro nemafambiro aita musangano. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weCitizens Coalition for Change, VaGift Ostallos Siziba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hutungamirri hwabuda kungogoresi yeZanu hunoratidza kuti CCC inokunda kana sarudzo dzikaitwa zvakajeka nekuti bato ravo rine vatungamiriri vechidiki. Zvichakadai kongiresi yapera nhasi asi vanhu vachatandadzwa nhasi manheru pamutambo wemimanzi uchaitirwa kunhandare yeGlamis Arena. Mumwe nemumwe wevanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu nemazana mashanu vachapihwa 10 kgs dzembeu yechibage pamwe nerofu rechingwa, pavanenge vave kudzokera kumisha yavo neSvondo. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Voramba Vachitungamira Zanu PF Mushure meKudomwa neKongiresi, Uye Vanodzora Vatevedzeri Vavo Vose Pamwe naSachigaro

text: Muaturiri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vanoti vatungamiri mune zvematongerwo enyika vanofanirwa kuve vanhu vanozvininipisa vachiyewuka kuti masimba avo ehutungamiri anobva kuvanhu. VaMudenda vataura mashoko aya muBulawayo apo vanhu vanga vachionekana nemutumbi wemufi, Va Naison Ndlovu, avo vakaitwa gamba renyika. Vanhu vane chitsama vaungana nahsi muBulawayo pamunamato wekuwonekana nemutumbi waVaNdlovu avo vakapiwa ruremekedzo rwegamba renyika. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, VaMudenda vati kushaya kwaVa Ndlovu kunorwadza nekuda kwekuti kunze kwemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, VaNdlovu ndiye munhu mukuru ange asara mubato reZanu PF ane nhoroondo yakareba mukurwira rusununguko rwenyika. VaMudenda vasetsa vanhu pavati apo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo dzegore rinouya, vatungamiri vakawanda vachange vave mubishi kumhanyidzana kun’anga kuti varambe vari pazvigaro zvavari. VaMudenda vati VaNdlovu vaive mutungamiri akanaka aizvininipisa nguva dzose achiyeuka kuti hutungamiri hunobva kuvanhu, vakatiwo zvakakosha kuti vatungamiri vose vagare vachirangarira izvi. Vanhu vakawanda vataura pachiitiko ichi varumbidza VaNdlovu semunhu aive nerudo uye aitsvaga nguva dzose kubatsira nekusimudzira veruzhinji.\n\nMwana waVaNdlovu, Dr Eva Agossu, avo vanove chiremba vati baba vavo, avo vakange vave nemakore akawanda vabatwa nechirwere chegomarara, vakange vave kurwadziwa zvikuru mumazuva avo ekupedzisira asi izvi hazvina kuvatadzisa kuramba vachiita mabasa avo ezvematongerwo enyika. Vatiwo vakatomboedza kutaurira baba vavo kuti vachizorora asi vakaramba nekuti vaive munhu aive akazvipira nguva dzose kuve mutungamiri anobatsira veruzhinji nguva dzose. Nhengo yeCentral Committee, VaRichard Ndlovu, variwo sahwira wemufi, vati hazvivashamise kuti VaNdlovu vakapihwa ruremekedzo rwegamba renyika vakatiwo vanorwadziwa zvikuru nemashoko akabuda mune rimwe bepanhau ekuti VaNdlovu vaive mutengesi nekuti vakaramba kumutsurudza bato reZapu. Gurukota redunhu reBulawayo, Aamai Sandi Moyo, vati VaNdlovu vaive munhu aida kubatanidza vanhu vose zvisinei nemarudzi avo vakatiwo iyi ndiyo dzidziso huru inofanirwa kuchengetedzwa nevanhu mukurangarira VaNdlovu. VaNdlovu, avo vange vachasvitsa makore makumi masere nematanhatu muna Gumiguru, vakashaya nemusi weMuvhuro muBulawayo. Vachavigwa kumakuva eNational Heroes’ Acre neMugovera muHarare. No media source currently available
title: VaNaison Ndlovu Voradzikwa kuHeroes Acre neMugovera

text: Mapurisa anoti ave kuferefeta kambani yeFidelity Printers and Refineries zvichitevera kusungwa kwakaitwa mutungamiri weZimbabwe Miners’ Federation akambomiswa basa, Muzvare Henrietta Rushwaya, panhandare yendege muHarare svondo rapera vaine goridhe rakagezwa rairema makirogiramu matanhatu. Mupurisa ari kufeya nyaya iyi, Detective Chief Inspector Michael Chibaya, vaudza dare pakunzwikwa kwechikumbiro chaMuzvare Rushwaya nevamwe vavo vana chekuti vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuti goridhe rakagezwa rinowanikwa kukambani yeFidelity Printers and Refineries chete saka semapurisa vari kuda kuziva kuti goridhe iri rakazopedzisira rave mumaoko aMuzvare Rushwaya sei ivo vasina rezeresi rekuti vaburitse goridhe kunze kwenyika. Gweta raMuzvare Rushwaya, VaTapson Dzvetero, vachibvunzurudza VaChibaya, vati bhegi rakawanikwa riina Muzvare Rushwaya riine goridhe harisi iro ravaifanira kutakura vachiti vakaisirwa bhegi risiri iro mumotokari yakavatakura kubva kumba kwavo kuenda kunhandare yendege vachiti mabhegi aya akafanana. VaDzvetero vati Muzvare Rushwaya vari kushungurudzwa zvine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika sezvo VaChibaya vabvuma kuti bazi reLaw and Order ravanoshandira richibata nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. VaDzvetero vati zvinoshamisa kuti nyaya iyi haizi kuferefetwa nemapurisa anoona nezvehuori pamwe nezvicherwa. Asi VaChibaya vati vanoudzwa zvekuita kubva kumuzinda wemapurisa. VaDzvetero vatiwo zita remudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Auxillia Mnangagwa, rave kupinzwa munyaya yaMuzvare Rushwaya kuti nyaya yavari kupomerwa iwonekwe seine zvematongerwo enyika mukati. Asi VaChibaya vati zvose zvakanyorwa mumapepa ehurumende vanenge vawana humbohwo kubva kuvanhu vavanenge vavapa humbowo vachiti pane mapurisa akasungwa mushure mekunge achinja mapepa aifanira kuendeswa kudare panyaya iyi zvavati zvaizoita kuti vasungwa ava vaonekwe sevanhu vasina mhosva kwete kuti vari kupinza zvematongerwo enyika. VaChibaya havana kunyatsotsanangura kuti sei zita raAmai Mnangagwa riri kupinzwa munyaya asi vati mashoko ekutanga akataurwa naMuzvare Rushwaya vachisungwa ndeekuti goridhe raive raVaAli Mohamad. VaChibaya vati havangabvume kuti goridhe iri raiva raMuzvare Rushwaya kunyange hazvo vakanga vasina kuona mapepa ekupomera Muzvare Rushwaya mhosva akaunzwa kudare pavakazotora nyaya iyi kuti vaiferefete kubva kune mumwe mupurisa akange achiferefeta nyaya iyi VaBruno Chiketo. Nyaya iyi yakatarisirwa kuenderera mberi mangwana apo VaChibaya vakatarisirwa kuenderera mberi vachibvunzurudzwa nemagweta kuti sei vari kupikisa kuti vasungwa ava vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Anoti Ari Kuferefeta Kambani yeFidelity Printers

text: Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, Doctor Ricky Mukonza, avo vanodzidzisa zvematongerwo enyika, vanoti mashoko ataurwa nevaive Gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro, Muzvinafundo Jonathan Moyo, avo vakatiza munyika, panhepfenyuro yeBBC ekuti vari kutya kudzoka munyika pari zvino, anogona kunge ari echokwadi. Doctor Mukonza vanoti VaMoyo vanoziva kuti vanogona kumbunyikidzwa pamwe nekusungwa nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa, kwete nekuti vane mhaka yavakapara, asi kuti vari kuchikwata cheG40, chinova chaipikisana nechikwata chaitsigra mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, cheLacoste. Vanotiwo vanhu vasatange vashora zviri kutaurwa naVaMoyo nekuti haisi nyore murume mukuru kungotaura, vachiti panopfumbuka chiutsi pose pane moto, vachiti pada vanenge vaine zvimwe zvavanoziva kana kuona semunhu agara mune zvematongerwo enyika kwenguva yakati rebeyi vachiona zvakawanda. Muzvinafundo Moyo vaudza BBC kuti vakabuda munyika zviri pamutemo sezvo vakabatsirwa nehurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe, asi vachiti vaiziva kuti hupenyu hwavo hwakanga huri munjodzi nemauto akaparadza imba yavo. Doctor Mukonza vanokurudzira veruzhinji kuti vanyatsoongorora mashoko aVaMoyo nekuti zvakaitika kuti hurumende iripo igopinda panyanga zvinonetsa kunyatsotsanangura pamutemo sezvo VaMugabe vachinzi vakanyora gwaro rekusiya basa vakamiririrwa nemauto. Mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba vabudawo vachishoropodza mashoko ataurwa naMuzvinafundo Moyo vachiti VaMoyo havana kodzero yekutaura vakamiririra zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe nekuti vari kutsvaga kumutsa mheremhere chete semunhu akatotizawo munyika uye asisiri muhurumende iri kutonga. VaMoyo vati vana veZimbabwe vari kunetsekana nekuda kuziva kuti chii chakaitika kuna VaMugabe, uye vati VaMugabe vakanyadziswa kwazvo pavakabviswa pachigaro. Vatiwo vana veZimbabwe vanoda kuona nyika ichidzokera mukuremekedza bumbiro remitemo uye vachaona izvi zvichiitika. VaCharamba vatiwo kutsvaga kweashaya kupinda pese-pese pasina chinobuda nekuti hurumende yakatochinja uye hapana achiri kunetseka nekuti VaMugabe varipi sezvataurwa naVaMoyo zvekuti vana veZimbabwe vari kushushikana nekuda kuziva kuti VaMugabe varipi. No media source currently available
title: Muzvinafundo Jonathan Moyo Vanoti Vari Kutya Kudzoka Kumusha

text: NeChitatu ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika rwunonzi rwakashamiswa kunzwa gurukota rezvemukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe, vachitaura kuvatori venhau, vakakomberedzwa nevakuru vemauto nemapurisa, vachiti manyepo kuti pane hurongwa hwekuda kupidigurwa kwehurumende nechisimba. VaKazembe vakapomera chikwata chenhengo dzeZanu PF cheG40 vakadoma nezita VaSavior Kasukuwere, vanopikisa hurumende vakadomawo VaJob Sikhala veMDC Alliance, vemizinda yekunze pamwe nevamwe vemakereke sevanhu vari kufambisa mashoko avanoti enhema aya. Asi vakawanda vari kubvunzana kuti mashoko aya akabuda riinhi uye papi? Tisakanganwa kuti vakuru vakati kutya chati kwatara hunge uine katurike. Izvi zvingadai zviri izvo here zviri kuitika muhurumende pachitariswa kuti iyo yakapindawo mumasimba kuburikidza nekubvutwa kwemasimba kubva kune vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pachibatsirwa nemauto? Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vari mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti mashoko akaburitswa naVaKazembe aya anogona kunge ari mucherechedzo wekuti zvinhu hazvina kugadzikana munyika, vachiti hurumende inogona kunge iri kutora matanho ekuda kuvhara zvinhu zvisati zvanyanya kushata. Vamwe vanoti izvi hazvisi zvinhu zvitsva kuitika muhurumende yeZanu PF zvekutaura nezvekuda kupidigurwa kwehurumende nechisimba, vachiti kunyange munguva yaVaMugabe vanhu vakawanda vaisungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kuvabvisa nechisimba. Asi VaMaguwu vanoti hapana chiutsi chisina moto, vachiti zvakaitwa nehurumende kuvhunduka chati kwatara. Vakurudzirawo kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vazadzise chivimbiso chavo pavakapinda panyanga chekuda kuparadza huwori, vachiti vanofanirwa kutdaro nekuti huwori ndihwo huri kuuraya nyika. Ukuwo, vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti zvakaitwa nehurumende zviri pamwero sezvo vanhu vaizogona kusazogadzikana kuburikidza neguhwa raibuda irori, nekudaro zvakanga zvakakosha kuti VaKazembe vatsigise hana dzevanhu. Doctor Mavaza vanoti VaSikhala munhu agara achizivikanwa kuti anongotaura zvaafunga, uye vakambotaura kaviri kose kuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa inofanirwa kubviswa gore risati rapera. Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti sei vari kufambisa mashoko enhema aya vasiri kubvunzurudzwa nemapurisa, Doctor Mavaza vanoti mapurisa ari kuferefeta nyaya iyi, uye kana VaSikhala vakawanikwa vaine mhosva vanosungwa vomiswa pamberi pematare. No media source currently available
title: Danho reHurumende Rekuti Mashoko eKuda Kupidigurwa kweHurumende Manyepo Osimudza Mibvunzo Yakawanda

text: Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission Amai Rita Makarau vanoti mimwe michina yekunyoresa vanhu kuti vakwanise kuvhota ye biometric voter registration kana kuti BVR yasvika munyika kubva kukambani Laxton Group of Companies. Amai Makarau vanoti kutanga neMuvhuro vanenge vatanga hurongwa hwekudzidzisa vanhu vachazonodzidzisawo vamwe vanhu mumatunhu ose enyika. Panopera hurongwa uhu, panobva patanga humwe hurongwa hwekunyoresa vanhu kuti vanyorese kuvhota. Amai Makarau vati michina yapinda munyika parizvino inosvika mazana mana uye vari kutarisira michina zviuru zviviri nemazana matanhatu kuti vakwanise kutanga hurongwa hwekunyoresa vanhu vangangosvika mamiriyoni manomwe. Vatiwo vanokwanisa kupedza hurongwa uhu gore risati rapera. Vachitaura nezvekuraswa nematare kwesarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika yeKenya, Amai Makarau vati zvakakosha kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzakachena kuti pasave nekunetsana. Zimbabwe iri kutarisirwa kuita sarudzo gore rinouya. No media source currently available
title: ZEC Inoti Mimwe Michina yeKunyoresa VaVhoti yeBVR Yapinda muNyika

text: Bato reZanu-PF ndiro rakakunda musarudzo dzakaitwa kuMutoko North, Mashonaland East nemusi weMugovera. Asi sachigaro weZimbabwe Election Support Network kana kuti ZESN VaAndrew Makoni vanoti havasi kufara nezvaiitwa nemadzishe munzvimbo iyi zvekupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye nyaya yekushandiswa kwechikafu munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika idzi. ZESN yainge iine vaongorori vesarudzo munzvimbo iyi kwenguva yakareba. VaRambisayi Nyabote veZanu-PF vakaita mavhoti zviuru gumi nechimwe chete nezana nemakumi mana nerimwe, VaBoniface Mushore veMMDC Alliance vakaita mavhoti chiuru chimwe chete nemazana matatu nemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe. VaEdson Mugoma veNCA vakaita mavhoti makumi napfumbamwe nemana. Sarudzo idzi dzakaitwa kutsiva amai Marble Chinomona veZanu-PF avo vakasarudzwa kuita mutungamiri weSenate.
title: Zanu-PF Yokunda Musarudzo dzeKwaMutoko Asi ZESN Ichishora Mamwe Madzishe

text: Muzvinafundo Eddie Mwenje sachigaro webhodhi reZimbabwe School Examinations Council kana kuti ZIMSEC mumashoko kuvatori venhau vazivisa kuti vadzidzi kutanga nemusi weChitau vanokwanisa kuona nekutora zvakabuda mubvunzo dzeO level. Mukuru weSchool Development Association, sangano rinoona nezvebudiriro muzvikoro VaBanny Manokore vanoti vafara mekubuda kwebvunzo idzi nekutiwo vana vakati wandei vakapasa kudarika vegore rapera. No media source currently available
title: ZIMSEC Yozivisa nezveKubuda kweBvunzo dzeO' Level

text: Dzimwe nhengo dzakambomiswa basa kwemakore mashanu nekomiti yepamusoro yeZanu PF dzinoti hadzisi kutomboziva kuti mhosva dzadziri kupomerwa ndedzeyi. Nhengo yeCentral Committee ye Zanu PF, Va Enock Porusingazi, vanoti havasi kuziva chikonzero chavakamisirwa basa ne Politburo yebato iri sezvo vachiti havana kana kumbomiswa pamberi pekomiti yekuvaferefeta kana kunzwa nyaya yavo. Va Porusingazi vanoti kana mhosva yavari kupomerwa havasi kutomboziva. Mutungamiri wesangano revaimbova varwiri muhondo yerusunguko, Va Jabulani Sibanda, avo vakadzingwa mumusangano we Zanu PF zvachose, vanotiwo havatoziviwo kuti vakadzingirwa chii. Kunyange hazvo pane fungidziro yekuti vese vakambomiswa basa nePolitburo vanosanganisira vanga vari mutauriri webato iri, Va Rugare Gumbo, vachifungidzirwa kuti inhengo dzechikwata cheZanu PF chiri kutsigira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, Va Porusingazi vanoti havasi munyaya dzezvipoka zvipoka zvinonzi zviri mu Zanu PF zviri kurwira kutora masimba kana Va Mugabe vachinge vabva pachigaro. Va Porusingazi vatiwo havazive kuti sei vari kutsigira Amai Mujuru vasiri kuda kubuda pachena. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaGumbo kuti tinzwe divi ravo Zvichakadai, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachiona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano re Zimbabwe Association of Community Radio Stations, Va Kudzai Kwangwari, vanoti kushungurudzwa kuri kuitwa vari kufungidzirwa kuti vari kutsigira Amai Mujuru pamberi pekongiresi yakatarisirwa kuitwa mwedzi unouya zvatove nani kuti Amai Mujuru vachisiya Va Mugabe vatonge zvavo vari vega vachiti hapana chikonzero chekuti paendwe kusarudzo dzekongiresi izvo zvichabuda mukongiresi yacho zvave kutozivikanwa. Asi mutsigiri weZanu PF, Va Goodson Nguni, vanoti kumbomiswa basa kwaVa Gumbo nevamwe vavo pamwe nekudzingwa mumusangano kwakaitwa Va Sibanda hakunei nekusawirirana pamwe nemakakatanwa emasimba ari mu Zanu PF. Va Kwangwari vanoti kuratidzira kwanga kuchiitwa nenhengo dze Zanu PF munzvimbo dzakawanda munyika, pamwe nekudzingwa kwaVa Sibanda kunoratidza kuti vanhu ava vari kushungurudzirwa kuti chipoka chiri kutsigira gurukota rezvemitemo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, chive nemasimba akawanda pamberi pekongiresi yebato iri muna Zvita. Va Kwangwari vanoti zviri kuitika mu Zanu PF izvi zvinoratidza kuti bato iri harikoshese hutongi hwejekerere. Mune imwewo nyaya, mutauriri wedare reparamende, Va Jacob Mudenda, varamba kutambira chikumbiro che MDC-T chekuti nhengo dzeparamende dzakaenda ku MD-C Renewal Team nevaimbova munyori webato iri, Va Tendai Biti, ndibviswe mudare reparamende. Tsamba yanyorerwa munyori mukuru we MDC-T, Va Douglas Mwonzora, naVa Mudenda iyo iri mumawoko eStudio 7 inoti nyaya yekuti MDCT chaiyo-chaiyo ndeipi ichiri mumatare edzimhosva nokudaro havakwanise kuti vabvise nhengo idzi muparamende nyaya iyi isati yapera. No media source currently available
title: VaPorusingazi naVaSibanda Vanoti Havazive Chavadzingirwa neZanu PF

text: Mumiriri weMutasa Central mudare reparamende vari nhengo yeMDC Alliance, VaTrevor Saruwaka, vanoti vapora kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19 icho chakauraya ambuya vavo mwedzi wapera. Ambuya waVaSaruwaka vange vave nemakore zana nematatu. VaSaruwaka vanoti vamwe vanhu vakange vovasarura vasingadi kusvika pedyo navo pavakazivisa nyika kuti vainge vorwara. Asi vanoti vakazoenda kunovhenekwa zvakare pakirinika iri kudare reparamende vakaonekwa kuti vainge vapora. Vanoti nyaya yekuti vainge vabayiwa nhomba muna Kurume yakavabatsira zvikuru nekuti havana kuzonyanya kurwara sezvinoita vamwe vanozoguma vave muchipatara. VaSaruwaka vakurudzira vanhu vose munyika kuti vabaywe nhomba sezvo zvichizobatsira nekuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chiri kutora hupenyu hwevanhu vakawanda. Vati vanhu havafanire kuteerera zvinotaurwa nevamwe vakuru vemakereke nevamwe pamadandemutande zvekuti varambe kutambira nhomba vachiti vanhu vanofarira kuteerera zvinobva kubazi rezvehutano navanachiremba vavo. No media source currently available
title: VaTrevor Saruwaka Votaura Kusarurwa Kwavakaitwa Vachirwara neCovid-19

text: Nyanzvi muzvirwere zvepfungwa, Doctor Sthembile Mahlatini, vanoti havasi kufara nezvavari kuona muZimbabwe maererano nekurapwa kwezvirwere zvepfungwa. Doctor Mahlatini, avo vanoshandira kuOrlando, kuFlorida, vanoti Zimbabwe yaifanira kunge yakaisa zvirwere zvepfungwa pamusoro pezvinhu zvizhinji zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa asi haina kukwanisa kuita izvi pamusoro pekushaikwa kwemari zvino pave nedambudziko guru. Hurumende inoti vanhu vanoita mirioni muZimbabwe vane zvirwere zvepfungwa, ichitizve irikuedza kuti vanhu ava vabatsirwe asi pane dambudziko rekuti vazhinji havasi kutsvaka rubatsiro. Hurumende yaVaMnangagwa irikurumbidzwa pamusoro pekuedza kwayo kubatsira nekudzidzisa vanhu pamusoro pezvirwere zvepfungwa, zvikuru sei kumaruwa. Dr Mahlatini vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanirwa kushanda nesimba uye nekukurumidza panyaya iyi nekuti varwere ava vanosarurwa uye havabatwi zvakanaka. Vati mhuri nehama dzevarwere ava dzinofanirwa kuwana rubatsiro sezvo zvisiri nyore kuchengeta munhu anorwara nepfungwa. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inokurudzirwa Kurwisa Nesimba Zvirwere Zvepfungwa

text:
Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vafananidza mapato anopikisa semasangano ematororo uye vati hupfumi hwenyika huri kutadza kusimuka nepamusana pevari munyika pamwe nekunze vari kudhonzera zvinhu kumashure.

Vachitura mashoko avo kunyika pahurongwa hweState of the Nation Address, VaMnangagwa vafananidza mapato anopikisa semagandanga anoita zvakapfurikidza mwero vachiti vemapato anopikisa aya vari kudzosera budiriro yenyika kumashure.

VaMnangagwa vatiwo pane vamwe vanhu vari munyika pmwe nevekunze vavasina kudoma nemazita vavati vari kutadzisa zvinhu kufamba zvakanaka munyika.

Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatswayo, vashora mashoko aVaMnangagwa aya vachiti ivo nebato ravo reZanu PF ndivo vanozivikanwa nekuponda nhengo dzeMDC Alliance.

Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reDemocratic Party, VaUrayayi Zembe, vatiwo kunze kwekushora vemapato anopikisa, VaMnangagwa vaifanira kugadzirisa zvinhu zvakatadzwa nevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, muchakabvu Robert Mugabe, avo vakabviswa pachigaro muna 2017 kuitira vagadzirise zvinhu munyika.

Mutungamiri wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development in Zimbabwe, VaClaris Madhuku, vatiwo chinodiwa munyika kugadzirisa nyaya dzehuori kwete kuti VaMnangagwa vaswere vachipomera mhosva vemapato anopikisa pamwe nevemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira.

Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzevematongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru weMedia Center, VaEarnest Mudzengi, vati chinodikanwa kugadzirisa nyaya dzehupfumi hwenyika kubudikidza nekuona kuti vakapihwa mapurazi vaashandisa vachiti vekunze havanei nekutadza kuri kuita hurumende kufambisa zvinhu munyika

VaMnangagwa vakurudzira vanhu munyika kuti vabatane mukurwisa vavengi pamwe nevanhu vanoita mabasa erima vachivhiringa budiriro muZimbabwe. VaMnangagwa vati vanopikisa, zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe, kushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze, uye dambudziko reCovid-19, ndizvo zvinhu zviri pamberi mukuvhiringa budiriro munyaya dzehupfumi muZimbabwe. Vatiwo hurumende yavo iri mubishi kuvandudza mitemo kuitira kuti munyika muve nehutongi hwejekerere. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti VaMnangagwa varatidza kuti havana kurongeka pamashoko avo avataura paState of the Nation Address. Pavakapinda panyanga muna Zvita 2017 mushure mekubviswa kwakaitwa VaMugabe pachigaro nemauto, VaMnangagwa vakavimbisa kuvaka Zimbabwe itsva yakasiyana neyaive pasi pehutongi hwaVaMugabe. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti VaMnangagwa vakundikana zvikuru kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika, uye nyaya yehuori yatekeshera muhurumende yavo. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Matororo Ari Kutadzisa Budiriro muZimbabwe

text: Bato remMDC-T rinoti rambomisa basa vakafanobata chigaro chameya weHarare VaChris Mbanga basa. VaMbanga vari kupomerwa mhosva yekusatererera zvisungo zvebato zvikuru panyaya yemunyori wekanzuru kana kuti Town Clerk VaJames Mushore. VaMbanga vari kunzi varikuterera zviri kuyaurwa negurukota rezvematunhu VaSaviour Kasukuwere zvekuti vadzingwe basa. Mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMbanga vambomiswa basa. “Ichokwadi National Standing Committee yebato redu yakasanga ikatenderana kuti VaMbanga vambomiswa basa.” VaMowonzora vati munyori mukuru webato iri VaDouglas Mwonzora ndivo vange vachifanira kupa VaMbanga tsamba iyi. VaGutu vatendawo kuti VaMbanga vange vasiri kuterera zvavanoudzwa nevakuru vebati. No media source currently available Asi VaMbanga vaudza Studio 7 kuti havana kunge vapihwa tsamba iyi. “Pauri kutaura neni apa nditori kupinda muFull council meeting. Nechigaro chaniinacho, VaMwonzora semunyori mukuru webato ndivo vanofanira kundipa tsamba iyi. Havana kundipa.” VaMbanga varamba kubuda pachena kuti vachatambira tsamba iyi here kana kuti vachaenda kumatare. No media source currently available
title: Vakafanobata Chigaro Chameya weHarare VaMbanga Vanoti Havana Tsamba Yekumiswa Basa Yavapihwa neMDC-T

text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika VaKembo Mohadi nemusi weSvondo vakadzokorora kuti mauto nemapurisa achashanda kuona kuti vanhu vatevedzera kurudziro yemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga neMugovera yekuti vagare mudzimba kwemazuva makumi matatu uye kupfeka zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19. Vachitaura kumahofisi avo eMunhumutapa VaMohadi vakashora vanhu nekusatevedzera kurudziro dzenyanzvi munyaay dzezvehutano pakudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau neMugovera, VaChiwenga vakati kutanga nemusi weSvondo vanhu vanofanira kunge vave mudzimba na6 manheru vozobuda na6 mangwanani. Vemabhizimisi anonzi haana kukosha vari kutarisirwa kuti vavhare nemusi weChipiri. Vanhu vanenge vasisabvumidzwe kuenda kune mamwe maguta kutanga neChipiri. Vashanyi vari kunzi vapinde munyika netsamba inoratidza kuti vavhenekwa Covid-19 mukati memazuva maviri. Mabhizimisi anonzi ave kufanira kuvhurwa kubva na8 mangwanani kusvika na 3 masikati. Vanhu havachabvumidzwe kuita michato, kuenda kuchechi, uye nzvimbo dzakaita sedzekudyira nekutenga doro dzanzi dzimbovharwa kunze kwekumahotera. Vanhu vanokwanisa kuenda kurufu vanofanira kuve makumi matatu chete kwete zana sekare. Kunyangwe zvazvo vamwe vakuru muhurumende vari kuti kuzvipatara kwazarisa uye hakuna michina yekubatsira varwere kufema, VaMoadi vati hurumende yakagadzirira zvakakwana. Panyaya yekuti vanhu vanenge vachirarame sei, VaMohadi vavimbisa kubatsira sezvakamboitwa kare asi vakawanda vanoti hapana chavakabatsirwa nacho. Vachinyorawo padandemutande ravo reTwitter, mutungamiri weMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa vati zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvichasiya vanhu vakawanda vachiyaura nenzara nekuti hazvina kuitwa patauriranwa nenyanazvi uye vanhu. Vati zviri nani kuti hurumendeivhare nzvimbo chete dzine dambudziko rakakurisa uye vashora kuvharwa kwemabhodha vachiti ndiko kunobva raramo yevakawanda. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe VaJacob Ngarivhume vati hurumende haisi kubatsira varombo sezviri kuitwa nedzimwe nyika. Mutungamiri weInternational Cross Border Traders Association VaDennis Juru vanoti kuvharwa kwemabhoda kwave kupa kuti vanone svosve nemuromo uye vachayedza kuti vataurirana nehurumende. No media source currently available Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemukuru wesangano reVendors Initiative for Social Transformation kana kuti VISET VaSamuel Wadzai avo vanoti kana pasina rubatsiro kubva kuhurumende vanhu vachanetseka zvakanyanya. No media source currently available
title: VaMohadi Voti Mauto neMapurisa Aone Kuti Munhu Wose Agara Mumba VaChamisa Vachiti Hazvina Kurongeka

text: Mapato madiki matatu anopikisa asangana muHarare akabuda nechisungo chekutanga kutaudzana nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nemutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa, VaNelson Chamisa, kuitira kuti paitwe nhaurirano munyika. Mapato anopikisa matatu anoti rePeople’s Democratic Party, PDP, reCoalition of Democrats, Code pamwe neMDC inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, aita musangano muHarare nhasi akabvumirana kutanga kutaudzana naVaMnangagwa naVaChamisa kuitira kuti nhaurirano dzevemapato ezvematongerwo enyika, vedzisvondo pamwe nevemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, dziitwe munyika. Muzvare Khupe vaudza vatori venhau mushure memusangano uyu kuti nhaurirano idzi dzakanangana nekuyambutsa veruzhinji munyika pamatambudziko avari kutarisana nawo. Muzvare Khupe vatiwo mapato avo ari matatu ari kushushikana zvikuru nenyaya dzekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika pamwe nenyaya dzekusachengetedzeka kwakaita veruzhinji zvichitevera kusungwa kuri kuitwa vanhu vanonzi vakaratidzira munyika masvondo maviri adarika pamwe nekurohwa nekubatwa chibharo kunonzi kwakaitwa madzimai akawanda nevanhu vanonzi vainge vakapfeka mbatya dzechiuto. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemutungamiri weCode, VaTrust Chikohora, avo vati vachakumbirawo boka reNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission, kana kuti NPRC, kuti rivabatsire kuti nhaurirano idzi dziitwe. Asi mutungamiri wePDP, Amai Lucia Matibenga, vati hazvidi mutongi gava kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvigare pasi zvichizeya matambudziko akatarisana nenyika nechinangwa chekutsvaga nzira dzokuti zvose zvakaminama munyika, izvo zvinosanganisira hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nekusawirirana munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, zvigadziriswe. Amai Matibenga vati chinodikanwa kuzvipira kwevemapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari gweta rinoshanda nesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu kuchamhembe kweAfrica reHuman Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga, vati nhaurirano idzi dzinenge dzisina maturo kana dzichiitwa veruzhinji vachishungurudzwa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri weZanu PF, VaSiomn Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe kuti bato ravo rinotambira seyi zvarongwa nemapato ayo. Asi VaMnangagwa pachavo vakataura svondo rapera kuti munyika munofanira kuitwa nhaurirano izvo zvagara zvichikurudzirwa naVaChamisa asi hapana danho rati ratorwa nemutungamiri wenyika kunze kwekutaura kwavakaita kunyange hazvo VaChamisa vakavanyorera rushanu nezvenyaya iyi pasina mhinduro. VaChamisa vanogara vakataura kuti munyika munofanira kuitwa nhaurirano zvichitevera kusafamba zvakanaka kwakaita sarudzo dzegore rapera idzo dzinonzi neMDC yaVaChamisa dzakabirirwa zvemhando yepamusoro-soro. Asi Zanu PF inoti yakakunda zvine mutsindo musarudzo idzi, izvo zvakatambirwawo nedare reConstitutional Court. VaChamisa vakakumbira nezuro masangano akaita seSouthern African Development Community, neAfrican Union kuti apindire munyaya yeZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: Mapato Madiki Oronga Kuita Nhaurirano neZanu PF neMDC yaVaChamisa

text: Vaimbova mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi, vadzingwa basa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Munyori muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, Doctor Misheck Sibanda, vakazivisa kuti mutungamiri wenyika vadzinga basa VaMutodi. Svondo rapera, gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vakabuda panhepfenyuro yeZBC vachiti mashoko akange ataurwa naVaMutodi akange asingamiriri kana kuratidza pfungwa dzehurumende yeZimbabwe. VaMutodi vakange vashora mutungamiri weTanzania, VaJohn Magufuli, pamusoro pemabatiro ari kuita nyika iyi chirwere cheCovid-19. Mushure memashoko aVaMoyo, VaMutodi vakabva vashora gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, pamwe chete nemurume wavo, VaChris Mutsvangwa, vachivapomera mhosva yekushandisa nhepfenyuro yeZBC nenzira isina kunaka. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti VaMutodi vakadenha mago pavakazvidza VaMoyo naVaMutsvangwa. No media source currently available
title: VaEnergy Mutodi Vanodzingwa Basa Muhurumende yaVaMnangagwa

text: Bato reZAPU neChipiri manheru rakaparura gwaro rezvarinovimbisa kuita kana rikasarudzwa kutungamira nyika. Vachitaura pakuparura gwaro iri muBulawayo nezuro manheru, mutungamiri weZapu, VaDumiso Dabengwa, vakati kuti ndewekuti Zimbabwe ibudirire, inofanirwa kutevera hutongi hwejekerere. VaDabengwa vakati gwaro ravo, iro rinotanga nenhoroondo yenyika kusvika pari zvino, rinotarisawo mapoka akaisyana-siyana ehurumende richipa muono webato iri wekuti richange richitungamira sei kana rava hurumende. VaDabengwa vakati chimwe chezvinhu chinofanirwa kugadziriswa inyaya yekukura kwehurumende kunyanya kuwanda kwemakurukota. "Panyaya yematongerwo enyika, manifesto yedu inotarisa ichishora kuwanda kwemakurukota ehurumende uko kwatave nemakore mazhinji tinako munyika uyewo kuti vamwe vemakurukota aya anoshandisa mukana wekuve muhurumende nenzira isiri iyo vachimora hupfumi hwenyika zvisiri pamutemo. Manifesto yedu inotarisawo nyaya yematare edzimhosva uye tinoti kunyange hazvo vatongi vematare edzimhosva vachifanirwa kutonga vasina divi ravakarerekera, pane dzimwe nguva dzatinoona vachirerekera kune rimwe divi uye vachiratidza kuti vanomboudzwa zvekuita nevezvematongerwo enyika." Vakatiwo bato ravo rinokoshesa kusimudzira hupfumi nekukwezva vemabhizimusi kunze, uye kusimudzira nyaya yedzidzo pamwe neyehutano. Vakati zvose izvi zvichiitwa pachikosheswa kuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu. Vachipindura mubvunzo wezvakataurwa munguva pfupi yapfuura nevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kuti bato reZapu naivo VaDabengwa pachavo ndivo vakakonzeresa Gukurahundi, VaDabengwa vakati semunhu akwegura, VaMugabe vave kuita vachikoshiwa zvimwe zvinhu zvakakosha. VaDabengwa vakati humwe humbowo hwechokwadi chezvakaitika panguva iyi huri mumagwaro ekumatare edzimhosva, vakatiwo zvakakosha kuti nyaya yeGukurahundi igadziriswe zvachose nekutaurwa zvizere kuitira kuti munyika muve nekupora kwemaronda nekuregererana kwechokwadi. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZapu, Muzvare Barbara Nyagomo, vakatiwo ivo sevamwe vanhu vose, vanoda kuti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission ishande yakazvimirira rega. Muzvare Nyagomo vakatiwo bato ravo riri pakati pekuzvivhunura uye rinokoshesa kuti vechidiki vave nezvigaro zvehutungamiri. Vakati VaDabengwa vakatozivisa kuti vachasiya zvematongerwo enyika mumakore mashoma ari kutevera vachitiwo bato reZapu rakazvipira kupinda mumubatanidzwa nemamwe mapato. Muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika akazvimirira ega, uye vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Pretoria, VaTinashe Mawere, vanoti zvinotaurwa mumanifesto yeZapu zvinhu zvakakosha zvikuru asi vanoti ivo ndemumwe wevasingaone bato iri rine charingabuda nacho musarudzo. Mumwezve muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika, VaDidmus Dewa, vanobvumiranawo nemaonero ekuti bato reZapu harisisina mutsindo waraive nawo kare. VaDabengwa vakamutsurudza bato reZapu mushure mekukundwa neMDC musarudzo dzakaitwa muna 2000, izvo zvakaita kuti vasave nenzvimbo yavanomirira muparamende, ukuwo VaMugabe vakasavapa chigaro chegurukota risina nzvimbo yarinomirira. No media source currently available
title: ZAPU Inoparura Gwaro reHurongwa Hwayo Kana Rakasarudzwa Kutonga Nyika

text: Sangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, raparura nhasi zvidzidzo zvinoshandisa masaisai, zvepadandemutande, zvakanangana nekubatsira vana vari kutarisirwa kunyora bvunzo gore rino, dzeGrade 7, Ordinary Level neAdvanced Level. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti nhengo dzesangano ravo dzakazvipira kubatsira vana ava nezvidzidzo kuitira kuti vasasarira shure zvakanyanya munguva ino zvikoro zvakavharwa nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19. VaMasaraure vanoti varairidzi vakawanda havasi kukwanisa kuwana mari dzekutenga masaisai kuti vakwanise kupa zvidzidzo izvi, asi vashoma vakwanisa kutanga chirongwa ichi vakawanawo rubatsiro kuburikidza nevane tsiye nyoro vari kuvabatsira nemari. Vanoti chikumbiro chevarairidzi kuhurumende chekuti ipindire kuburikidza nekuwanisa varairidzi pamwe nevadzidzi masaisai pachena hachisati chapindurwa, izvo zvavanoti zviri kuitawo kuti vamwe vadzidzi, zvikuru vekumaruwa pamwe nevanoshaya, vakundikane kupinda muzvidzidzo izvi. VaMasaraure vanoti vachange vachiwanisa vana zvidzidzo zvose zvinouya pabvunzo dzavanozonyora mukupera kwegore, uye vana vanosvika mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri ndivo vakwanisa kupinda muzvidzidzo izvi pazuva ravo rekutanga. Mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi neyepamusoro, VaTaungana Ndoro, vanoti bazi ravo rinorumbidza chose danho ratorwa nesangano reARTUZ iri, uye vanokurudzirawo mamwe masangano kuti atorewo matanho akadaro. Panyaya yekuti hurumende haisati yapindira mukuti varairidzi pamwe nevana vechikoro vawane masaisai nezvimwe zvinodiwa mukudzidza pamadandemutande, VaNdoro vanotiwo bazi ravo riri mushishi kushanda nemadzisahwira aro kuti riwane zvikwanisiro zvose zvinodiwa pazvidzidzo zvepamadandemutande, sezvo remangwana redzidzo rananga kumadandemutande.​ No media source currently available No media source currently available
title: Sangano reARTUZ Rinoparura Zvidzidzo zvepaDandemutande kuVana Vari Kunyora Bvunzo Gore Rino

text: Hurumende inonzi haina kupa vashandi vayo mazuva avachawana mihoro yavo yemwedzi waChikunguru sezvanga zvakatarisirwa kumusangano waitwa pakati pesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reApex Council nevamiriri vehurumende. Sachigaro weApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander vanoti nyaya yemihoro yaChikunguru ndeimwe yenyaya dzanga dziri pahurongwa hwenhaurwa yemusangano uyu, asi hurumende yazovavimbisa kuti ichadzoka kwavari neChishanu ichizovapa mhinduro. Vanoti dzimwe nyaya dzanga dzakurukurwa dzinosanganisira yevamwe vashandi vehurumende vasati vawana mihoro yavo, kunyange hazvo varairidzi pamwe navanachiremba vakatambira mari dzavo dzaChikumi. “Sezvamunoziva, hurumende yakakwanisa kubhadhara varairidzi nevari mubazi rezvehutano, asi kune vamwe vashandi vehurumende pamwe nevari pamudyandigere vasati vapiwa pari dzavo. “Saka semasangano evashandi, tati dai maswededza mazuva ekuti vatambire kumangwana (Chipiri) kana kuswera mangwana (Chitatu) pane kuti vamirire musi wa14,” Mai Alexander vanodaro. Asi vanoti hurumende haina kuda kusvisungirira zvakare panyaya iyi. Vanotiwo imwe nyaya yakurukurwa ndeyekutyisidzirwa kunonzi kuri kuitwa vashandi vehurumende vakapinda mukuramwa mabasa, zvikuru sei varairidzi, avo vanonzi vari kunyorwa mazita pasi kana vakarovha mabasa mazuva ekuramwa mabasa. “Ndiyo nyaya yatatonyanya kubatabata nekuti isusu sevamiriri vevashandi tanga tati kana gavhumende yakatora position yekuti vanhu ivava vanofanirwa kuti vapanichwe isu hatichaenderera mberi nema negotiation,” vanodaro Amai Alexander. Asi vanoti hurumende yabva yangovaudza kuti aiwa, hurongwa ihwohwo hwekutevera vanhu ichi panicha haina. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inokundikana Kutara Mazuva eKutambirisa Vashandi Vayo Mihoro yaChikunguru

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, avo vari kuparura hurongwa hwekufambiswa kwemari yebhajeti hwepakati pegore kana kuti Mid-Year Fiscal Review nemusi weChina, vari kukurudzirwa kuti vatarisise nyaya yemagariro evanhu avhiringidzwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chadzoka zvine hukasha chichisiya vakawanda vasina chekubata. Gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakatozivisa vatori venhau kuti dare remakutukota rakatotambira hurongwa hwaVaNcube. Asi nekuda kwekuti nyika yatarisana nechirwere cheCovid-19, dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti dziri kutarisira kuti vawedzere mari yebhajeti kurwisa chirwere chiri kupararira zvinotyisa chichisiya vakawanda vachinonga svozve nemuromo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti zvakakosha kuti VaNcube vanyevenutse chirongwa chavo chekuti vanhu vasunge mabhande kana kuti fiscal policy chekuti hurumende iiendese mari shoma kuzvirongwa zvakaita sedzidzo, hutano nezvimwe kuti ideredze mari yainoshandisa. Muzvinafundo Mugano vanoti hupfumi hwati dzikamei nekudaro hurumende inofanira kusimudzira magariro evanhu vari kunzi neWorld Bank zvikamu makumi mana nezvipfumbamwe kubva muzana vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa. Mashoko ekuti vakawanda vari kunonga svosve nemuromo atsinhirwa nemukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Godfrey Kanyenze, vachiti kuipa kwezvinhu kwave kuwedzerwa nekushaikwa kwemabasa zvakonzerwa nekupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.. Mutungamiri wesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, Dr Israel Murefu, vati vari kutarisira kuti hurumende ivarerutsire pamitero yavanobhadhara Asi munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti hapana zvizhinji zvavari kutarisira kubva kuna VaNcube sezvo zvirongwa zavo zvisingasimudzire vashandi. Vapa semuenzaniso mari shoma dziri kutambiriswa vashandi uku zvinhu zvichidhura. Gore rapera, VaNcube, avo vanoti hupfumi huri kufamba zvakanaka sezvo vaine mari inodarika mabhiriyoni mapfumbamwe parutivi, vakaparura hurongwa hwemari yebhajeti inosvika mabhiriyoni mazana mana nemakumi maviri nerimwe emadhora emunyika, kana kuti $Z421 billion. Vakati vanotarisira kuti hupfumi huwedzere nezvikamu zvinodarika zvinomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 7,4% kunyange hazvo vanopikisa nedzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachiti zvinonetsa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 chovhiringidza mabhizimisi pasi rose. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata VaNcube sezvo vanzi vange vari mudare remakurukota. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuendesa Mari kuVanhu Vanonzi neWorld Bank Vari Kurara Vasina Kana Kudya

text: Veruzhinji munyika pamwe nevanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti maitiro emudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, anoratidza pachena kuti amai ava vave kuda chigaro chepamusoro soro munyika chekutungamira nyika sezviri kuitwa nemurume wavo. Vanoti zvaitwa naAmai Mugabe kubva pavakapinda munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika gore rapfuura, zvinoratidza pamire pfungwa dzavo uye zvinoratidza sekunge murume wavo, VaRobert Mugabe, ndivo vari kuvapa makomborero ekuita zvinhu pamadiro munyika. No media source currently available Kunyange hazvo vasiri muhurumende, Amai Mugabe vanoita sevave muhurumende uye makurukota ehurumende ave kutovatevera pese pavanenge vari. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaFredrick Tongai, vanoti vanoona sekuti VaMugabe vakura uye vave kugadzirira kuti mudzimai wavo achibata matomu. Asi bumbiro remitemo yenyika haribvumidze VaMugabe kupa munhu matomu, kusanganisira mudzimai wavo. Asi vamwewo vakaita sa Nenyasha Moyo wekuChitungwiza vanoti Amai Mugabe munhu asina hudzamu kana chiremerera chekuti vanganzi vangatungamira nyika. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Insitute, VaPedzisai Ruhanya, vanoti Amai Mugabe vaita mutete panyaya dzekutungamira nyika. Vanotiwo Amai Mugabe munhu asina chiremerera kana vachienzaniswa nevamwe vakambotungamira madzimai mubato iri vakaita saAmai Joice Mujuru, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri pamwe vaimbove mudzimai wemutungamiriri wenyika, mushakabvu Amai Sally Mugabe. Asi vachitaura pamusangano wekuongorora zviri kuitwa naAmai Mugabe kuti zvinomborevei wakarongwa neSouthern Africaan Political Economy Series, nhengo yeNational Assembly yeMDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, Amai Priscilla Misiharambwi Mushonga, vakati zviri pachena kuti Amai Mugabe vatove pachigaro chamambo uye ivo nemurumwe wavo ndivo chete vanoziva zviri kuitika. Amai Mushonga vakati VaMugabe havazikanwe marongero avo zvekuti kana vari mubato ravo chaivo havazivi zvavanoronga uye Amai Mugabe vanogona kutopinda pachigaro zvisinei nezviri kutaurwa nevanhu. Vanoongorora zvematomgerwo enyika vari mudzidzisi pachikoro cheGreat Zimbabwe University, VaJoel Mukusha, vanoti munhu wese muZimbabwe zvikuru sei avo vane zvigaro mumapato ematongerwo enyika vanogona kutora chigaro chekutungamira nyika. Vanoenderera mberi vachiti mabasa ari kuitwa nemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika akaita sekuchengeta nherera kuchikoro chavo kuMazowe ndezvimwe zvinoitawo kuti vaoenekwe semutungamiri akakanaka. Mazuva ano Amai Mugabe vari kufamba nenyika yose vachiita misangano pamwe nekugovera vanhu zvinhu zvekurimisa zvakaita sematirakita nembeu izvo zvakatengwa nehurumende nemari yechikwereti yakabva kuBrazil pasi pechirongwa cheAfrica Food Programme. Kunyange hazvo Amai Mugabe vachionekwa semunhu akabudirira munyaya dzekurima nekupfuya mombe dzemukaka, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nezvehupfumi dzinoti chokwadi chiripo ndechekuti amai ava nemurume wavo vakapamba mombe nemapurazi evachena pasina kana peni ravakabvisa. Mapurazi aya anosanganisira Gushungo Dairies, Iron Mask, Sigaru Farm, Gwebi Wood, Leverdale ne Bassiville ari kuMazowe, kotiwo Highfield, Cressydale, Tankatara, Clifford ne John O’Groat Farm kuNorton, Gwina Farm kuBanket, pamwe neGushongo Estates kuDarwandale. Amai Mugabe nemurume wavo vane mapurazi gumi nemana ane mahekita anodarika zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu, mapurazi ose aya akabvutirwa varimi vechichena.
title: Amai Grace Mugabe Havana Chiremera Chaiva naMuchakabvu Sally Mugabe?

text: Vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe vashaya mangwanani anhasi muchipatara che Gleneagles kuSingapore, uko vanga vachirapwa. VaMugabe, avo vanga vave nemakore makumi mapfuimbamwe nemashanu ekuberekwa, vakaenda kuSingapore muna Kubvumbi wegore rino kunorapwa chirwere chisina kutsanangurwa, kunyange hazvo vaimboenda vachinorapwa zvirwere zvakasiyanasiyana kunyika iyi. VaMugabe ndivo vakave mutungamiri wechitema wekutanga muna 1980 pakawana nyika kuzvitonga kubva kuvachena,kusvika vazobviswa pachigaro nemauto muna 2017. Vakatungamirawo hondo yeChimurenga vari kuMozambique kubva muna 1975, uko bato ravo reZanu rairwisana nehutongo hwevaive mutungamiri weRhodesia, VaIan Douglas Smith riri. Asi hutongo hwaVaMugabe hunonzi nevamwe hahuna kuzounza tarisiro yaive nevakawanda sezvo vachipomerwa mhosva yekutonga nedemo, izvo zvinonzi zvakaita kuti nyika iende kumawere. Hurumende yavo inopomerwa mhosva yekutungamira kubvutwa kweminda kubva kuvachena, kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu, pamwe nekutsakatitswa kwevaivapikisa kana kufungidzirwa kuti vaipikisana navo. Mumwe wevakashanda naVaMugabe kwenguva ndefu munguva yehondo, pamwe nekunge nyika yawana kuzvitonga kuzere, VaRugare Gumbo, ndemumwe wevanhu vanoti VaMugabe havana nhaka yakanaka yavasiira vana veZimbabwe kuburikidza nekutonga nedemo kwavaiita. Vanoti nhaka yasiiwa naVaMugabe inhaka yekurwisana kwevanhu. VaGumbo vanoti matongero aVaMugabe mushure mekunge nyika yawana kuzvitonga haana kusiyana nematongero avaiita munguva yehondo, sezvo vaishungurudza vavaifungira kuti vaipikisana navo mubato ravo reZanu nguvayo. VaGumbo vanoti ivo nevamwe vatungamiri vemauto eZanla vakasungwa kuMozambique naVaMugabe vakagariswa mugomba kusvika nyika yawana kuzvitonga. Vanotiwo mhosho huru yakaitwa naVaMugabe ndeyekurambira pachigaro pamwe nekusave nehurongwa hwekupa masimba kune vachiri kutemwa dzinobva ropa. Asi VaGumbo vanoti kunyange hazvo VaMugabe vakanga vari munhu akaipa, panyaya yekuwanisa vana veZimbabwe dzidzo pamwe nekupa minda kuvatema vanovatenda zvikuru. Hapana hurongwa hwati hwaziviswa hwekuti mutumbi waVaMugabe uchaendeswa kumusha riini, uye kuti vacharadzikwa kupi, sezvo vachinzi vakaramba kuvigwa kumarinda anovigwa magamba enyika, kuHeroes Acre. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vakashanda naVaMugabe Voti Havana Nhaka Yakanaka Yavasiira Nyika

text: Dare repamusoro riri kutarisirwa chero nguva kutanga kuzeya nyaya yekunetsana pakati pesangano reBroadcasting Authority of Zimbabwe, BAZ, nekambani yeKwese TV yaVaStrive Masiyiwa. Nyaya iyi yakakwidzwa nechimbi chimbi kudare negweta raVaMasiiwa, VaTawanda Nyambirai, vachiti bhodhi reBAZ rainge risisiri pamutemo sezvo nguva yaro yainge yapfuura. Izvi zvakatevera kunyimwa rezinesi kwekambani iyi neBAZ. Kwese TV yainge ichiyedza kubatana nekambani yeDr Dish mukutanga kutepfenyura pasatellite. Mumagwaro ayo kudare, Kwese TV inoti inogona kurasikirwa nemari inosvika mamiriyoni mana emadhora, uye vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana matanhatu vanogona kurasikirwa nemabasa. Nyaya yekunetsana kweKwese TV iyi iri kuuya kunyangwe hazvo kambani iyi iri kutepfenyura munyika gumi nenhatu muAfrica kusanganisira, Botswana, Zambia, Mozambique, Kenya, Swaziland neEthiopia. Pari zvino, hurumende iri kutatarika kuti iwane vekunze vanotanga mabhizimisi munyika uye yange ichiyedza nepose painogona kukwezva imwe shoroma yekuNigeria ine mari kudarika vamwe vose muAfrica, VaAliko Dangote. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nemakurukota avo, vanogara vari kunze vachikwezva vekunze kuti vauye kuzotanga mabhizimisi munyika. Asi chii chinopa kuti mwana weZimbabwe VaMasiyiwa vanetseke kutanga mabhizimisi? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vachishanda nesangano re Labor and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti iyi inyaya yekuti muporofita haana chiremera kune vekwake here sezvinotaurwa nebhaibheri. VaChitambara vati chinogona kuve chokwadi. Kunze kweZimbabwe VaMasiyiwa vane chiremera chikuru uye vaigara vachirumbidzwa nevaive mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica, VaBarack Obama. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nevaimbova gurukota rezvemari munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaTendai Biti, avo vanoti zvinhu zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vose vane mukana wekusimudzira Zimbabwe vanogara vakaoneswa nhamo nehurumende. Doctor Chitambara vatiwo zviri kuitwa izvi zvinozonetsa kuti hurumende ikwanise kukwezva vekunze sezvo zviri pachena kuti zvinhu hazvina kujeka. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Free State, VaCalvin Mdzingiri, vanoti zviri kuitwa munengedzo wekuti hurumende inoda kuramba iri iyo yoga inotepfenyura kuruzhinji. VaMdzingiri vatiwo zvinoshamisa kuti sei hurumende yakapa DSTV yekunze rezinesi nyika ichirasikirwa nemari asi yorambidza mwana wevhu. Kunyangwe hazvo vakawanda vari kuti VaMasiyiwa vapihwe rezinesi, vamwe vakaita semunyori mukuru we ZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti VaMasiyiwa vanofanirawo kubata vashandi vavo zvakanaka. Aka hakasi kekutanga VaMasiyiwa vachinetsana nehurumende. Muna 1995, VaMasiyiwa vakabudirira kuzopihwa rezinesi rekuvamba kambani yeEconet Wireless mushure mekumbonetsana zvekare nehurumende. Panguva iyi aive gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko vaive Amai Joice Mujuru, avo vakatuka muchakabvu Joshua Nkomo, avo vakanga vati VaMasiyiwa vapihwe rezenisi. Amai Mujuru vakazomanikidzwa kukumbira ruregerero kuna VaNkomo. Zimbabwe yave nemakore ichitatarika kuwana vekunze vanozotanga mabasa munyika zvapa kuti vanhu vanodarika makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana vashaye mabasa. Hurumennde inoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nenyaya yezvirango asi vamwe vanoti mitemo yehurumende yakaita seyekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema uye nyaya dzehuwori dziri kupa kuti vekunze vafunge kaviri vasati vauchika mari dzavo muZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: Kwese TV Yoita seMuporofita Anorambwa neVake

text: Vesangano reTajamuka/Sesijikile vanoti hurongwa hwekuti vanhu munyika yese varamwe mabasa nemusi weChitatu huri kuenderera mberi zvisinei nekutyisidzirwa kwevanhu nevanofungidzirwa kuti ndevechidiki veZanu-PF, zvikurusei muguta reHarare. VeTajamuka pamwe chete neve Hash Tag This Flag, vachitsigirwa nevemapato anopikisa, vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kugara kudzimba dzavo nemusi weChitatu senzira yekuratidza kunyunyuta nehutongi hweZanu-PF. VaStan zvorwadza vesangano reTajamuka vanoti vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kutambira hurongwa hwekuratidzira kunyangwe hurumende iri kutyisidzira vanhu. No media source currently available
title: VeTajamuka Vanoti Vanhu Vakawanda Vari Kutambira Kurudziro yeKuratidzira muNyika Yose

text: Kambani yemagetsi yeZimbabwe Electricity Transmission and Distribution Company, inoti hapana chakashanduka pahurongwa hwekudzimwadzimwa kwemagetsi kana kuti load shedding, uhwo inoti huri muzvikamu zviviri chete, kwete zvina sezvinonzi zviri kuburitswa nevamwe mumadandemutande. Izvi zvinotevera kuwedzerwa kuchema kunonzi kuri kuita vagari vachiti magetsi ave kuenda kwezuva rose pasina kana tarisiro yekuti zvinhu zvichanaka nekukasika. Mutauriri wekambani yeZESA, VaFullard Gwasira, vanoti dambudziko remagetsi riri kukonzerwa nekuderera kwakaita mvura mudhamu reKariba, izvo zvave kuita kuti vakwanise kugaya magetsi anoita mazana maviri ema megawatt, kubva pamagetsi anodarika chiuru chema megawatt avaisigaya. VaGwasira vanoti pari zvino vari kudzima magetsi kubva nenguva dza 5 mangwanani kusvika nenguva dza 10 usiku, zvichireva kuti kunenge kusina magetsi kwemaawa gumi nemanomwe pazuva. Asi vagari vanoti magetsi ave kudzimwa kwenguva ndefu kupfuura dzakaziviswa neZESA. Hurumende inonzi iri kuedzawo kutaurirana nemakambani ekunze anoitengesera magetsi akaita seEskom yekuSouth Africa neCahora Bassa yekuMozambique, asi zvinonzi kushaiwa mari yekuti ikwanise kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo ndiro dambudziko guru. Gurukota idzva rezvemhando dzemoto VaFortune Chasi, vanonzi vari kuita hurukuro nenyika mbiri idzi paine tarisiro yekuti Zimbabwe ingangowana rubatsiro rwekukwereteswa mamwe magetsi zvinhu zvakareruka munyika.
title: Kambani yeZESA Inoti Hapana Chakashanduka paHurongwa hweKudzimwa kweMagetsi

text: Zvimwe zvitoro zvakaita seChoppies zvatanga kutengesa zvinhu nemari yekuAmerica chete zvichiti vari kuzvitengesera zvinhu vari kuda mari iyi. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakadzika mutemo wechimbi chimbi vachiti mari yemunyika neyekuAmerica zvinogona kushandiswa zvose kusvika muna 2025. No media source currently available Asi kushaya simba kwedhora remunyika kuri kupa kuti vanhu vakawanda vade kushandisa mari yekuAmerica chete. Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers VaDenford Mutashu vaudza Studio 7 kuti sevezvitoro hapana zvavangaite kana vanohodhesa zvinhu vachiti vanoda mari yekuAmerica. No media source currently available Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi VaMasimba Kuchera vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvoitewa nevezvitoro zvichapa kuti varombo vanonge svosve nemuromo.
title: Vamwe veZvitoro Votengesa Zvinhu neMari yekuAmerica Chete

text: Mamwe magweta anoti kutadza kudoma vatevedzeri vavo pamwe nenhengo dzedare repamusoro rebato ravo re politburo pakongiresi yeZanu PF kwakaitwa nemutungamiri webato iri, VaRobert Mugabe, kunoratidza kuti VaMugabe havachakwanisa kutungamira bato iri nemitemo yaro pamwe nenyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemutemo vari mudzidzisi wemutemo paUniversty of Zimbabwe, uye vari mutungamiri webato reNational Constitutional Assembly, Professor Lovemore Madhuku, vanoti zvakaitwa naVaMugabe zvinoratidza kuti vakwegura uye havachakwanisa kutungamira bato ravo kana nyika nemazvo. Vachipeta kongiresi yavo, VaMugabe vakati vanoda nguva yekuongoorora mazita evanhu vapinda muCentral Committee umo vanofanira kudoma vatevedzeri vavo vaviri, sachigaro webato, pamwe nevanyori vemapazi akawanda mu politiburo yebato ravo. Asi VaMadhuku vanoti Mugabe vaiziva kuti musangano wekongiresi uchaitwa uye vangadai vakagara vadoma hutungamiri hwebato sezvo ivo nevamwe vavo vange vagara vaine hurongwa hwekudzinga mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato, Amai Joice Mujuru, mubato. VaMugabe nemudzimai wavo, Amai Grace Mugabe, ndivo chete nhengo dze politiburo dziripo pari zvino. VaMadhuku vanoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti VaMugabe vave kuita Zanu PF bato ravo nemhuri yavo. Panyaya remangwana raAmai Mujuru muhurumende, VaMadhuku vanoti VaMugabe vane masimba ekuvadzinga muhurumende. Asi VaMadhuku vanoti zvinenge zviine chiremera kuti Amai Mujuru vasiye vega basa pane kudzingwa. Rimwe gweta rinoshanda neZimbabwe Laywers for Human Rights, VaJeremiah Bhamu, vanotiwo zvakaitwa naVaMugabe hazvina kunaka sezvo nhengo dzebato ravo dzange dzakatarisira kuti musangano wekongiresi uchasarudza vatungamiriri vatsva vebato. Asi vakasanobata chinzvimbo chasachigaro weZanu PF muHarare, zvakare vari gweta, VaGoodwills Masimirembwa, vanotiwo hapana chakatadzwa naVaMugaba sezvo vakataura kuti vachadoma vatevedzeri vavo svondo rino. VaMasimirembwa vatsigirwa naVaSupa Mandiwanzira vanove mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko avo vanoti bumbiro rebato rinopa VaMugabe simba rekuita zvavanoda pakusarudza vatevedzeri vavo nenhengo dzepolitburo. Ishe Musarurwa vekuMashonaland East vanotiwo kupesana kuri kuitika muZanu PF hakuna kunaka uye mutungamiri wenyika anoda nguva yekuti adome vanhu vakarurama vekushanda navo. VaMugabe vakaudza nhengo dzebato ravo pakongiresi kuti vanoda nguva yekuzeya vasati vadoma vatevedzeri vavo uye vakati vachadoma vanhu ava svondo rino risati rapera. Politburo itsva yeZanu PF ine nhengo makumi matatu. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Votyora Bumbiro reZanu PF neKusadoma Hutungamiri paKongiresi?

text: Nhengo dzemubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance mudunhu reMashonaland West dzichibva kumakereke akasiyanasiyana neSvondo dzakanamatira mutungamiri weMDC VaMorgan Tsvangirai, dziine donzvo rekuti vapore nekukasika kuitira kuti vatungamire mubatanidzwa uyu musarudzo dzegore rino. Mumwe wevakapinda mumusangano wekunyengeterera VaTsvangirai ndaAmai Abgail Saini vebato reZimbabwe People First vachibva kuKaroi, avo vanopinda chechi yeZion. Amai Saini vanoti VaTsvangirai vane nhoroondo yekutungamira bato reMDC-T nekudaro vanonamatira kuti vavatungamire musarudzo dzegore rino. Amai Saini vanoti vari kunamatirawo sarudzo kuti dzive nerunyararo uye kuti VaTsvangirai vakunde. Mumwe wevakapinda musangano uyu muChinhoyi VaSlyvester Muzambili vanopinda kereke yeAnglican, avo vanoti vaona zvakakodzera kunamatira VaTsvangirai nekuti munhu akataura chokwadi kuti vane chirwere chegomarara remumatumbu. VaMuzambili vanoti vanamatirawo kuti mhirizhonga isaitike panguva yesarudzo, kunyange masoja achipindira musarudzo. VaMuzambili vanotti hapana chinokunda munamato. Imwe nhengo yeMDC-T yekuChegutu iyo inoti inoda kungonzi VaKomjana inoti VaTsvangirai ndivo vanofanirwa kutungamira bato musarudzo kunyange vachirwara nekuti vakawanda vanorwara asi vasingabude pachena sezvakaitwa naVaTsvangirai. Vapinda mumunamato uyu vashoropodzawo kurwira masimba kuri kuitika mubato reMDC-T, vachiti vari kurwira chigaro chaVaTsvangirai ndivo vari kunonotsa shanduko munyika. Musangano wekunamatira VaTsvangirai uyu wapindwawo nenhengo dzeMDC-T pamwe nevemachechi akawanda mudunhu rose reMashonaland West vasineyi nemubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance. No media source currently available
title: Vemachechi kuChinhoyi Vonamatira Mutungamiri weMDC VaMorgan Tsvangirai

text: MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inoti Heroes Day izuva rekurangarira magamba akarwira rusununguko rwemunhu wese. Bato iri rinoti apo nyika iri kucherechedza zuva remagamba, zvakakosha kuti nyika itarise kuti yaita zvakadii mukuzadzisa shuviro dzemagamba akafira rusununguko rwenyika. Mumashoko aro kuruzhinji rwevanhu, bato raVaChamisa rati zuva remagamba riri kucherechedzwa mushure memasvondo maviri nyika yaita sarudzo, idzo inoti hadzina kugutsa munhu wese, uye maitirwo akaitwa sarudzo idzi, munongedzo kumatongero eZanu PF mumakore makumi matatu nemasere apfuura. Mutauriri weMDC-T yaVaChamisa, Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo, vanoti vatora zuva iri kurangarirawo magamba avo akafa achirwira rusununguko kubva kuhutongi hwe Zanu PF. Vati vari kurangarira vanhu vakaita savachakabvu vanoti VaMorgan Tsvangirai nemudzimai wavo, Susan Tsvangirai, murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaItai Dzamara nevamwe vakafa vachirwira rusununguko rwemunhu wese muZimbabwe yakawana kuzvitonga muna 1980. Asi vati chiri kurwadza ndechekuti mushure mekukunda hondo yeChimurenga, vana veZimbabwe vari kuona nhamo muhurumende yevanhu vatema. Vatiwo vanonzwa kurwadzikana nevanhu vakapfurwa nemasoja vakafa nguva pfupi yapfuura. No media source currently available
title: MDC T Inorangarira Magamba Ayo Akafa Achirwira Rusununguko Kubva kuHutongi hweZanu PF

text: MaMighty Warriors arikuda $300 000 kuti vasimuke kuenda kunokwikwidza kumaAfrica Women’s Championships kuCameroon. Asi mari iyi haipo kana sendi zvaro kwasara mazuva gumi nemasere chete kuti makundabo aya atange. Izvi zvakataurwa nemusi weChipiri nasachigaro wekomiti iri kuunganidzira chikwata ichi mari Muzvare Lilian Mbayiwa avo vanoti mari iyi ndeyekubhadhara ndege, nepachanogara vatambi ava uyezve neyekuvatenda kana vachinge vakunda mumitambo. Muzvare Mbayiwa vanoti ivo vari kutanga kutsvaga mari iyi neChitatu manheru apo vari kuita mabiko mune imwe hotera muHarare apo vachatengesa pekugara pamwe nezvekudya. Asi Muzvare Mbayiwa vanoti kunyange zvakamira zvakadai maMighty Warriors ari kupinda mukamba neChitatu kutanga gadziriro yemakundano emuAfrica aya. MaMighty Warriors ayo aifanira kupinda mukamba kutanga kwemwedzi wapera vachiri kumba sezvo paive pasina mari. Chikwata ichi chiri munjodzi yekuenda kumaAfrica Women’s Championships chisina kutamba mitambo yehushamwari sezvavakaita apo vakaenda kuma Rio Olympic Games uko vakanozvambaradzwa neGermany, Australia, pamwe ne Canada. Zimbabwe iri mugungano rakaoma pamwechete neCameroon, South Africa, neEgypt. Zvikwata zviviri kubva mugungano iri ndizvo zvinoenderera mberi nemakwikwi. Makundano aya ari kuitwa kubva musi wa 19 Mbudzi kusvika musi wa 3 Zvita.
title: MaMighty Warriors Otatarika Kuwana mari yeKuendesa kuMakwikwi eAfrica Women’s Championships

text: Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Council of Churches, Reverend Doctor Kenneth Mtata, vari kushanya muWashington D.C., zvichitevera kukokwa kwavo nebazi reAmerica rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika. Reverend Mtata vanoti hurumende yeAmerica inoda kubatsira Zimbabwe zvikuru, naizvozvo inoda kuziva nekunzwisisa basa riri kuitwa nevemakereke munyika vakanangana nenhaurirano dzekuunza kugadzikana munyika, pamwe nemamwe mabasa. Munyika pari zvino mune nhaurirano dziri kuitwa, dzichikokerwa nevemakereke, uye nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, idzo dzakanangana nekugadzirisa gakava riripo mune zvematongerwo enyika pakati paVaMnangagwa nemutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa. No media source currently available
title: State Department Inokoka Munyori Mukuru weZimbabwe Council of Churches

text: Sangano revarairidzi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe PTUZ, rinoti rakwira kudare rezvebasa nevashandi (Labour Court) richipikisa danho rehurumende rekushevedza varairidzi vari pazororo kuti vadzoke kumabasa kuitira kuti vakwanise kuverengwa kechipiri. Munyori mukuru wePTUZ, VaRaymond Majongwe vanoti vatora danho iri sezvo hurumende ichangobva mukuverenga zvakare varairidzi, izvo zvoita kuti vafunge kuti pane zvimwe zvakahwanda zvavasiri kuratidzwa nehurumende. VaMajongwe vanoti sangano ravo rakamboendesa zvakare nyaya yakadai kumatare mugore ra 2012 dare rakawana hurumende iine mhosva. “Takave nenyaya yakafanana naiyoyi, yeKoronya and Mashonga vs State, saka uku kwave kudzokorora zvakare, zvinove zvinhu zvatinoti kwete kwazviri,” Vanodaro VaMajongwe. VaMajongwe vanotiwo sesangano vanoshushikana nemashoko anonzi akataurwa negurukota rezvemabasa nevashandi, Amai Priscah Mupfumira ekuti mari dzemabhonasi hachisi chipikirwa chekuti mushandi anotofanirwa chete kuiwana. VaMajongwe vanoti kutaura kwakadai kunopokana nemashoko emutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ekuti hurumende ichapa vashandi vayo mabhonasi. No media source currently available
title: PTUZ Yopikisa kuDare Danho reHurumende reKudzosa Kubasa Varairidzi Vari Pazororo

text: Zvinhu zvinonzi zvakaita manyama amire nerongo kuSouth Africa zvikuru muPretoria zvichitevera kurwisana kunotyisa pakati pezvizvarwa zveSouth Africa nezvekune dzimwe nyika dzakaita seZimbabwe, Somalia ne Nigeria. Zvimwe zvitoro zvezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinonzi zvaputswa nekubiwa. Mhirizhonga iyi yakamboitikawo kuJohannesburg mazuva mashoma apfuura. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wemapurisa muSouth Africa, VaKhomotso Phahlane, vaudza vatori venhau kuti kuratidzira kwange kwakarongwa nezvizvarwa zveSouth Africa kwazoguma kwaita mhirizhonga zvapa kuti mapurisa akande hutsi hunokatyidza nekuridza pfuti dzemabara erhabha. Vati vasunga vanhu vanodarika zana nemakumi matatu kubva neChina. Mapurisa ange ati kuratidzira uku kusaenderere mberi nekutyira mhirizhonga. Zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa zvange zvichida kufora zvichienda kuhofisi yebazi rezvekuchengetedzwa kwemukati menyika, kuMarabastad Refugee Centre yave kunzi Desmond Tutu Refugee Reception Centre, vaine bepa rezvinyunyuto. Vanhu vemuSouth Africa vanoti zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri kuvatorera mabasa, madzimai avo uye kutengesa zvinodhaka nekukurudzira mabasa ehupfambi. Asi vamwe vekunze ava vanoti zvose izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro. Zvinofungidzirwa kuti zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zvinosvika mamiriyoni mashanu zvinogara muSouth Africa umo mune vanhu mamiriyoni makumi mashanu. Hurumende yeNigeria yakanyora tsamba yenyunyuto kuSouth Africa ichiti mhirizhonga inofanira kumiswa. Asi hurumende yeZimbabwe haina chayati yataura. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum, Amai Diana Zimbudzana, vanoti vambotenderera muPretoria vachiona zvenge zvichiitika. No media source currently available
title: Vabvakure Vorwiswa Zvinotyisa muSouth Africa

text: Vechidiki vanomirira mapato ari muNational Electoral Reform Agenda (NERA) vanoti vachaenderera mberi nemusangano uri kurongwa muChinhoyi neMugovera. Musangano wakarongwa neMugovera uyu wakaziviswa kumapurisa asi kusvika pari zvino mapurisa haasati apindura. Mukuru wevechidiki muNERA, VaLawrence Tembedza, vanoti vachaenderera nemusangano wavo neMugovera zvisinei kuti mapurisa vachaita sei. VaTembedza vanoti kunonoka kupihwa mhinduro nemapurisa chitsotsi cheZanu PF chekushandisa mapurisa kuti vozoramba pasisina nguva yekuenda kumatare. VaTembedza vanoti vacharwisa ani nani achada kurambidza musangano wavo. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemumwe wevechidiki, Muzvari Abgail Tsoto, uyo anoti misangano yevechidiki iyi iri kugadzirira sarudzo idzo dzichashandura hupenyu hwavo. Muzvari Tsoto vanoti vachaita zvose zvavanokwanisa kuti musangano weMugovera uyu uyenderere mberi. Mutevedzeri wemirongi yemisangano muNERA, VaMoses Chibaya, veMDC-T vanotaura zvavo pachikuru vachiti vachaedza kutevedzera mutemo wenyika kuti vaite musangano wavo kunyange zvikatora kuenda kumatare edzimhosva. Asi VaChibaya vachitaura kunhengo dzevechidiki dzinodarika zana vanoti gore rinouya vachachengetedza mavhoti avo nepose pavanokwanisa. VaChibaya vanoti ruzhinji munyika harusi kuzobvuma kubirwa kwesarudzo nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, ndivo vanenge vari mukokwa anonyarikana pamusangano weMugovera. Vamwe vari kutarisirwa kutaura pamusangano uyu ndiAmai Joyce Mujuru, VaMangoma naVa Tendai Biti. Mutauriri wemapurisa mudunhu reMashonaland West, Inspector Clemence Mabgweazara, vanoti havana mashoko ekutaura panyaya iyi sezvo vasati vaudzwa zviri kuitika panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Vechidiki muNera Vanoti Pamberi neMusangano Wavo weMugovera

text: Vashandi vekambani yeZimbabwe Agricultural Socierty iyo inoronga zviratidzwa zvikuru zvekurima munyika, zveHarare Agricultural Show, vatanga kuratidzira pamuzinda wekambani iyi kuShowgrounds muHarare, vachitsutsumwa nekusapihwa bhonasi ravo regore rapera, kudimurirwa kwemari dzavo dzekubatsirikana, pamwe nekuwedzerwa kwenguva dzebasa. No media source currently available Vashandi ava vange vachidarika makumi mana vaungana pamuzinda wekambani iyi vachiimba nekunyomba vakuru vebasa vachiti vari kuita huwori pamwe nekuvadzvinyirira Sachigaro wevashandi, VaFiso Mbano, vanoti zvinorwardza kuti kambani yakangotora danho rekuvanyima bhonasi nekuderedza mari dzavo dzekubatsirikana vasina kana kumbotaura nevashandi. VaMbano vanotiwo kutanga mwedzi uno kambani yakamira kubhadharira vana vavo mari dzechikoro, uye vave kutenga chikafu icho vaimbopihwa pachena. Vanotiwo mari dzekubatsirikana mukubhadhara dzimba, kana kuti housing allowance, dzakadimburwa nepakati uye kambani yakavazivisa kuti vanogona kumiswa basa nguva ipi zvayo. Vati vakuru vekambani iyi vakavaudza kuti zvinhu zviri kunetsa munyika zvekuti kana hurumende iri kunetsekana kubhadhara vashandi vayo nekudaro kambani yavo yakaomerwawo nezvinhu. Asi vashandi ava vanoti havabvumirane nevakuru vakuru vekambani iyi kuti kambani iyi haina mari vachiti inowana mari nenzira dzakasiyasiyana siyana. Mumwe mushandi asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo achitya kuzodzingwa basa anoti pane mari yakawanda inopinda mukambani apo vaimbi, vedzisvondo, nevemakambani akasiyana siyana vanoshandisa nhandare nedzimba dzakawanda dzekambani iyi dziri paShowground muHarare. Anoti semuenzaniso kushandisa nhandare yeMain Arena kunopinza madhora zviuru zvipfumbamwe pazuva rimwe chete. VaMbano vanoti vacharamba vachiratidzira panguva dzahwani masikati zuva rega rega kudzamara zvichemo zvavo zvatambirwa. Vanotiwo izvi zvikaramba vachakwidza nyaya yavo kumutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Mutauriri wekambani iyi, Muzvare Heather Madombwe, varamba kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro penyaya iyi vachiti vakuru vakuru vekambani iyi pamwe nekomiti yevashandi vane nhaurirano dzavari kuita dzakanangana nekugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi ava. Kambani iyi ine vashandi makumi manomwe. Nyaya dzaita seidzi dziri kuwanda munyika sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichiipa munyaya dzehupfumi uye makambani akawanda ari kuderedza mari dzinotambirwa nevashandi kana kutotadza kuvabhadhara kwenguva yakareba. Svondo rapfuura vashandi vekambani yeCAPS Holdings vakavharira vakuru vekambani iyi mumahofisi avo kwemaawa akawanda vachida kubhadharwa mari dzavo dzemihoro idzo vasina kuwana kwemwedzi makumi maviri yapfuura.
title: Vashandi veZimbabwe Agricultural Show Voratidzira

text: Public Accounts Committee is worried by Sakunda Holdings’s failure to testify during Parliament’s enquiry into more than US$5 billion unauthorized expenditure in 2017 and 2018. MC - Komiti yeparamende inoongorora mashandisirwe emari yehurumende, yePublic Accounts Committee, nhasi yashora kuita kwekambani yeSakunda Holdings nekutadza kumira pamberi payo kuti ipindure mibvunzo pamusoro pekunonzi kusashandiswa zvisina mvumo kwemabhiriyoni mashanu emadhora muna 2017 and 2018 emari yeCommand Agriculture. Kambani yeSakunda Holding yakabhadharwa mari inodarika bhiriyoni remadhora pamakore maviri aya uye nhasi yange ichifanira kupa humbowo kukomiti yePublic Accounts iyo inotungamirirwa naVaTendai Biti kuti yakabhadharwa sei uye kuti mari iyi yakashandei.
