Asi vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa mukambani yeSakunda VaMberikwazvo Chitambo, vanyora tsamba kukomiti iyi vachiti, mukuru wekambani yavo anove zvekare chimwe chipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mngangagwa, VaKudakwashe Tagwirei, vanoda kuzopa humbowo pachavo asi vange vasingakwanise kuuya sezvo vange vari kunze kwenyika. VaChitambo vakumbira komiti iyi kuti inyore mubvunzo yainoda kubvunza VaTagwirei vachiti izvi zvichaita kuti pavanouya kuzosangana nekomiti iyi vasatore nguya yakareba. Asi VaBiti nekomiti yavo vashora kuita kwaVaChitambo, VaTagwirei nekambani yavo yeSakunda vachiti zvavaita izvi kusvora nekuzvidza paramende. VaBiti vanoti kana Sakunda iri kambani yemandorokwati inofanira kupa hombowo hunodiwa neparamende zvisinei nekuti VaTagwirei varipo here kana kuti kwete. Vati vave kutarisira kuti Sakunda iuye kuparamende kuzopa humbowo nemusi weChishanu zvisinei nekuti VaTagwirei varipo here kana kuti kwete. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaTagwirei vanozvidza paramende nekuti vanoshanda nevakuru vakuru muhurumende. Vaenderera mberi vachiti komiti yaVaBiti inofanira kuburitsa pachena huwori hwese hunonzi huri kuitwa kuti vanhu vazvionere kuti hurumende haisi kurwisa huwori sekutaura kwainogara ichiita. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Manyanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chinoshamisa pane zvinonzi zviri kuitwa naVaTagwirei vachiti ndosaka hupfumi hwenyika hwapara. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaTagwirei parunhare kuti tinzwe divi ravo pane zvavari kupomerwa izvi. VaBiti vazivisawo kuti nemusi weChishanu vachanzwawo kubva kumunyori webazi rezvemari,VaGeorge Guvamatanga, nevamwe vakuru vakuru mubazi iri. Zvichakadai VaBiti nekomiti yavo vazivisa kuti kambani yeFert, Seed Grain kana kuti FSG yave kuzopawo humbowo kukomiti yavo musi wa22 Mwedzi mushure mekunge komiti yatora danho rekuti kambani iyi isungwe nenyaya yekuzvidza paramende. FSG yakabhadharwa mari inodarika mazana matanhatu emamiriyoni emadhorwa muna 2017 na 2019 pasina mvumo yeparamende sezvinotarisirwa pamutemo pakushandiswa kwemari dzehurumerumende. Mamwe makambani achapa humbowo musi uyu anosanganisira, Pedstock neCroco Motors. Komiti iyi ichapedza ongororo yavo nekubvunzurudza kambani yeGrain Marketing Board musi wa25 mwedzi uno. Kwemwedzi mitatu yapfuura, komiti iyi iri kuongorora makambani akawanda zvichetevera gwaro rakaburitswa nemahofisi aAuditor General rinoratidza kuti mari inodarika mabhiriyoni mashanu emadhora yakashandiswa pasina mvumo yeparamende muna 2017 na2018. Komiti yakatobvunzurudza Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe, bazi rezvekurima nemamwe makambani akabhadharwa mari idzi nehurumende. Mari yese iyi yakashandiswa pazvirongwa zveCommand Agriculture nePresidential Input Scheme. Asi vachitaura nebepanhau reHerald, VaGuvamatanga vakati hurumende yainge yapa homwe yecommand agriculture mari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete chete kubva muna 2016. Vakara,ba kuti Sakunda yakapihwa mabhiriyoni matatu. Asi izvi handizvo zviri kubuda mukomiti yaVaBiti inoti mari dzakashandiswa dzakawanda uye pane mhute panyaya yekuti mari iyi yakashandiswa sei.
title: VaBiti Vanoti Komiti Yavo Haisi Kufara neZviri Kuitwa naVaKuda Tagwirei neSakunda

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari kushanya kuRussia uko vakaita musangano nemutungamiri wenyika iyi VaVladimir Putin uye vamwe vanoita zvemabhizimisi. VaMugabe vakakokwa naVaPutin sasachigaro weAfrican Union pamhemberero dzechimakumi manomwe Russia nedzimwe nyika dzakunda Nazi-Germany muhondo yeSecond World War. Asi mutauriri waVaMugabe VaGeorge Charamba vanoti VaMugabe vakabva vatora mukana uyu kuti vataure nevemabhizimisi vekuRussia vachivakurudzira kuti vauye kuzotanga mabhizimisi muZimbabwe. Vamwe vakaita hurukuro naVaMugabe ndevekambani yeGreat Dyke iyo iri kuchera platinum kuMashonaland West. Rwendo rwaVaMugabe rwakonzera mutauro wakanyanya vamwe vachiti nzendo dzavo dziri kungopedza mari vanhu vakawanda vachinonga svosve nemuromo. Asi vaimbova mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaBright Matonga vanoti hapana chakapa pane nzendo idzi sezvo Zimbabwe yagara ichishanda zvakanyanya nenyika yeRussia uye zviri kubatsira mukugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaClifford Mashiri vanoti VaMugabe havafanire kungofamba vachidzoka nenhava izere mhepo
title: Rwendo raVaMugabe kuRussia Rwokonzera Mutauro

text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vazivisa kuti hurumende yadzinga mabasa vana mukoti vose vari pakuramwa mabasa. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, uye vari mukuru wechimwe chikwata chevashandi vehurumende, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vari kupomera vashandi ava mhosva yekuramba kudzokera kumabasa kunyange hazvo hurumende yakaisa mari inodarika mamiriyoni gumi nemanomwe muhomwe yebazi rezvehutano kuti ibhadhariswe vana mukoti ava. Mugwaro ravaburitsa manheru ano, VaChiwenga vati hurumende yavo yakanga yabvuma kuzadzisa zvichemo zvavana mukoti ava, kunyange hazvo vashandi ava vasina kuona kukosha kwazvo kuitira kubatsira varwere vari mumaoko avo. Vati nekuda kwekusaona kukosha kwebasa ravo vanamukoti ava, hurumende yavo yave kutoona sekunge zvine chekuita nezve matongerwo enyika, zvisisineyi nemashandiro avanamukoti kana mararamiro avo. VaChiwenga vati nekuda kwekuti vadzinga vanamukoti vose ava, hurumende yaronga kuti Health Services Board ipinze mabasa vanamukoti vose vakapedza zvidzidzo zvavo asi vasiri kushanda, uye kudzosa pamabasa vose vanamukoti vakaenda pamudyandigere. Asi munyori mukuru wesangano ravana mukoti, reZimbabwe Nurses association, VaEnock Dongo, vanoti havasati vaudzwa nehurumende kuti vanamukoti vose vadzingwa mabasa, kunze kwekunzwa panhepfenyuro yeZBC. VaDongo vanoti vari kutarisira kusangana nehurumende neChitatu kuti vanzwisise nezvedanho rayo iri. Munyika munonzi mune vanamukoti vanodarika zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu vanga vachishanda vari muzvipatara zvehurumende, avo vanonzi vari pakuramwa mabasa pari zvino. Vanamukoti vakatanga kuramwa mabasa nemusi weMuvhuro vachida kuti vawedzerwe mari dzemihoro, uye kuti mashandiro avo agadziriswe. VaDongo vanoti havana chavakambowirirana nehurumende pane zvichemo zvavo zvose zvavakasvitsa kugurukota rezvehutano, Doctor David Parirenyatwa. Vanoti VaParirenyatwa vakaudza hurumende zvisizvo, izvo zvazoita kuti itore danhu rekuvadzinga basa iri. Studio haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raVaParirenyatwa panyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inodzinga Basa Vanamukoti Vari Kuramwa Mabasa

text: Mhuri yemushakabvu Lucy Duve, gweta rairwira kodzero dzevanhu nemusi weMuvhuro yakabatana nevamwe vanhu muguta reGweru ichifora mumugwagwa semucherechedzo wekuremekedza mufi pazuva rekupedzisira rekucherechedza mazuva gumi nematanhatu ekurwisa mhirizhonga yemudzimba kana kuti 16 Days of Activism Against Gender-Based Violence. Muzvare Duve vanonzi vakapondwa nemukomana wavo pakunopera kwemwedzi waMbudzi mushure mekunetsana. Vachitaura neStudio 7 pakufora kwaitwa nevemamwe masangano akasiyana-siyana muGweru, Amai Elizabeth Duve vanove amai vemushakabvu Lucy vakati vachiri kurwadziwa zvikuru nekufa kwakaita mwana wavo vachiti havana kumbofungidzira kuti hupenyu hwake hwaizoguma nenzira inorwadza kudaro.\n\nAmai Duve vakatiwo rufu rwemwanasikana wavo runofanirwa kuve dzidziso kune vanhukadzi vakawanda kuti vataure kana vachishungurudzwa murudo kana muwanano. VaOrpheus Marunga vanove babamunini vemufi vakati vari kurwadziwa nenyaya yekuti Tashinga Musonza uyo anonzi ndiye akarova Lucy kusvika afa haazi mujeri uye hapana zvavari kuziva semhuri pakuti achamiswa pamberi pedare riinhi. Musonza akasungwa mushure mekunzi ndiye aive auraya Lucy uyo waainzi aidanana naye, asi akaburitswa muhusungwa mushure memazuva matatatu sezvo zvainzi aive agarisa mumaoko emapusira kupfurikidza nguva inotenderwa pamutemo achinzi aizomiswa pamberi pedare kana mapurisa apedza kuferefeta nyaya iyi zvizere. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumapurisa kuti Musonza aripi pari zvino asi vamwe vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti ari mumaoako emauto ekubasa kwake kuThornhill Airbase uko anoshanda. VaDesderius Duve vanove hanzvadzi yemushakabvu vakatiwo havazi kufara nenyaya yekuti Musonza haasati amiswa pamberi pedare vachitiwo zvichavatorera nguva semhuri kuti kurwadziwa kwavari kuita kupore. Sachigaro weWomen’s Coalition of Zimbabwe mudunhu reMidlands Amai Alice Maqatha vati sesangano vari kuchema pamwe chete nemhuri yekwaDuve uye vachaedza nepose pavanogona napo kuti nyaya yekupondwa kwaMuzvare Duve itongwe sezvinokodzera. Musi weMuvhuro ndiwo wekupedzisira pamazuva ekucherechedza mazuva gumi nematanhatu ekudzivirira mhirizhonga inoitwa kuvanhukadzi nevanasikana kana kuti 16 Days of Activism Against Gender based Violence. No media source currently available
title: Mhuri yeGweta Rakapondwa kuGweru Inoti Inoda Kuti Nyaya Iyi Itongwe

text: Bato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rinoti riri kuita neMugovera misangano miviri yarinoti yakakosha zvikuru. Misangano iyi inonzi ndeyekutarisa pamwe nekutambira zvisungo zvakabuda pamusangano waro wekongiresi wakaitwa mukupera kwaGumiguru. Mutauriri webato iri, VaObert Gutu, vanoti bato ravo richatanga nemusangano weNational Council, iyo ichatarisa mafambiro akaita kongiresi, pamwe nekushara nhengo dzichapinda mu National Executive Committee. No media source currently available Nhengo dzeNational Council dzinobva muhutungamiri hwebato kubva mumatunhu madiki kusvika matunhu makuru pamwe nehutungamiri hwakasarudzwa pakongiresi. Mushure mekudomwa kwenhengo dze National Executive, komiti iyi inotarisirwa kubva yagarawo yodoma vanyori vemapazi akasiyanasiyana vanenge vachimirira bato iri. Musangano uyu ndewekutanga kubva pakaitwa kongiresi iyo yakaona VaTsvangirai vachidzoserwa pachigaro chavo. Vakadzoserwa zvakare pazvigaro vanosanganisira mutevedzeri webato, Muzvare Thokozane Khupe, sachigaro webato, VaLovemore Moyo nevamwe. Akaita rombo rakaipa pakongiresi iyi munyori wezvemisangano, VaNelson Chamisa, avo vakakundwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora pachigaro chemunyori mukuru. Vakaitawo mhanza yakanaka mutauriri mutsva webato, VaObert Gutu. Kongiresi iyi yakavandudzawo bumbiro rebato iro riri kupa mutungamiri webato masimba ekudoma munyori wezvesarudzo kuti ave nhengo ye National Standing Committee.
title: MDC-T Yoita neMugovera Misangano Miviri Yakakosha

text: Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, inoti inoona sekunge danho rakatorwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, rekupa basa rekuwanisa nyika michina inoona mazita anenge abuda ruviri pakunyoresa kuvhota kukambani ye Ipsidy Inc, yekuAmerica, rinogona kunonotsa hurongwa hwegadziriro yesarudzo. Izvi zvinotevera danho rakazotorwawo neimwe kambani yakapiwa kare basa rekuwanisa michina yekunyoresa kuvhota yeBVR, ye Laxton Group Limited yekuChina rekukwira kumatare edzimhosva ichipikisa hurongwa hweZEC hwekutsvaga imwe kambani iyo iripo. Doctor Dendere, avo vanodzidzisa zvematongerwo enyika pa Amherst College, mudunhu reMassachusetts muAmerica, vanoti danho rekutsvaga imwe kambani iri rinogona kutodhurira ZEC sezvo zvichizogona kudya mari yakawanda kuti kambani itsva iyi itange kushanda. Vanotiwo dzimwe nguva kutsvagwa kweimwe kambani uku kunogona kunge kuine chekuita nekushandukawo kwehutungamiri muhurumende, vachiti pada hurumende yaivepo ndiyo yaidyidzana nekambani yeLaxto Group, kana kushandisa hukama hwayo nenyika yeChina. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti ZEC svondo rapera yakapa tender yekuunza munyika michina inokwanisa kuona mazita evanhu vanenge vanyoresa ruviri iyi kukambani ye Ipsidy Inc iri kuNew York kuAmerica, ichiti yaiita izvi nechinangwa chekupeta chirongwa che BVR nenguva kwayo kuitira sarudzo dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa gore rino. No media source currently available
title: Kambani yekuAmerica Inowaniswa Basa reKupa Nyika Michina Ine Chekuita neSarudzo

text: Munyori anoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika muMDC Alliance, VaEmmanuel Chimwanda, vashaya. VaChimwanda, avo vaimbove assistant commissioner muZimbabwe Republic Police husiku hwemusi weChishanu. Ari kutaura akamirira mhuri yemufi, uye ari munin’ina wemufi, VaClifford Chimwanda vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaChimwanda vashaya mushure mekurwara kwenguva refu nechirwere cheitsvo. VaChimwanda vati varasikirwa zvikuru semhuri vachiti mukoma wavo ndiye anga achitungamira mhuri kunyange anga ave mune zvematongerwo enyika. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vati sebato vari kushushikana zvikuru nekufa kwaVaChimwanda. VaHlatywayo vati chanyanya kuvarwadza ndechekuti VaChimwanda, avo vanove mumwe wevakambove muchipurisa kubuda pachena kupikisa hurumende yeZanu PF, vashaya munyika musati mave nehutongi hwejekerere uhwo hwavairwira. VaChimwanda vakasiya basa muchipurisa vakapinda mune zvematongerwo enyika vakashanda zvikuru nevaimbova mutungamiri weMDC mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai. Vakazodomwa nemutungamiri weMDC Alliance kuve munyori anoona nezvekuchengetedzeka munyika. VaChimwanda, avo vakamboshanda mukomisheni inorwisana nehuori yeZimbabwe Anti Corruption, vanonyanyozivikanwa nekusunga kwavakaita vaimbove mutungamiri wesangano revakarwa hondo reZimbabwe National War Veterans Association, muchakabvu Chenjerai Hunzvi, avo vakanetsa nenyaya dzekukonzeresa mhirizhonga munguva yekutorwa kweminda kubva kuvachena nekurohwa nekuurayiwa kwakaitwa nhengo dzeMDC kuBikita muna 2000. Panguva iyi VaChimwanda vaive assistant commissioner muchipurisa vachishandira mudunhu reMasvingo. Mutauriri wemhuri yemushakabvu ati VaChimwanda vanonzi vakatarisirwa kuradzikwa kumusha kwavo kwaGutu nemusi weChina. Vanhu vakaungana panhamba 25 Open Way kuSoutherton muno muHarare. No media source currently available
title: MDC Alliance Inorasikirwa neGamba Munyaya dzeKuchengetedzwa kweNyika

text: Nezuro pasi rose rakabatana mukucherechedza zuva remwanasikana, kana kuti International Day of the Girl Child. Gore rino zuva iri rakanga rakanangana nekuwanisa mwanasikana hunyanzvi mune zvedzidzo, zvikuru munyaya dzehumhizha. Sangano reUnited Nations rinoyambira kuti vanasikana pasi rose vane mikana mishoma kudzidzo, humhizha, pamwe nemasaisai, izvo zviri kuita kuti vasarire shure zvichienzaniswa nevanakomana mukuwana ruzivo rwunoita kuti vagozokwanisa kuwana mabasa. Sangano iri rinotiwo vanasikana vezera rekuenda kuchikoro vanodarika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi matatu pasi rose havasi kuwana dzidzo nekuda kwekumanikidzwa kuroowa vachiri vadiki, hurombo, mabvamuhondo, uye kushaiwa zvikoro zvinokodzera. MuZimbabwe, mutungamiri wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanasikana pamwe nemadzimai, reStand Foundation, Muzvare Charlene Chekenya, vanoti vakacherechedza zuva iri kuburikidza nekuparurawo chirongwa chavo chinonzi “Purple Campaign”, icho chinokurudzira kuwaniswa mikana kwevanasikana kuburikidza nekutumbuka semaruva emuti wemuJacaranda. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yobatana neDzimwe Nyika Kucherechedza Zuva reMwanasikana

text: Sangano rakazvimirira rinoona nezverunyararo, reNational Transitional Justice Working Group, kana kuti NTJWG, rinoti komisheni inoona nezvekuregererana munyika, yeNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission, kana kuti NPRC, inofanira kuferefeta kuona kuti ndiyani akaputsa nekuba dombo rekurangarira vafi rakaiswa kuBhalagwe, Kezi, ku Matabeleland South, panzvimbo yakavigwa vamwe vanhu vakapondwa munguva yeGukurahundi kubva muna 1983 kusvika 1987. Mauto eFifth Brigade akadzidziswa hondo neNorth Korea ndiwo akapomerwa mhosva yekuponda vanhu ava.Musi wa25 Chivabvu vanhu vekuKezi nesangano reIbhetshu Likazulu, vakabatana naIshe Fuyane, vakaisa dombo rekurangarira vakapondwa ava asi dombo iri rafuma rabiwa. Vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi maviri vanofungidzirwa kuti vakafa muhondo munguva yeGukurahundi iyo vaive mutungamiri wehurumende, mushakabvu Robert Mugabe, vakati yaive nguva yekupenga. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vaive gurukota revasori munguva iyi, vakati nyaya iyi inofanira kuzeyiwa pachena asi vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti hapana zvinobatika zvavaita kupodza maronda evanhu vekuMatabeleland neMidlands. Hatina kukwanisa kubata sachigaro weNPRC, VaSelo Nare, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi tabata vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa nemitemo muNational Transitional Justice Working Group, VaWilbert Mandinde. No media source currently available
title: Dombo Rakaiswa paGukurahundi Memorial Center Rinobiwa

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti sangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC rinonzi rave kushanda zvekare nesangano reUnited Nations Development Program, UNDP, mukugadzirisa zvinhu zvine chekuita nesarudzo dzemuna 2018. Pamusangano wakashevedzerwa svondo rapera neZEC wekuti mapato ari munyika agare pasi achizeya hwaro hwunofanirwa kuitwa mukugadzirisa zvinhu kuitira kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzisina mutauro, sangano re UNDP muZimbabwe rakakokwawo neZEC kuti ripindewo mumusangano uyu. Asi bato re Zanu-PF harina kupinda mumusangano uyu. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mumiriri weUnited Nations muZimbabwe, VaBishow Parajuli, kana sachigaro weZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, kuti tinzwe mativi avo panyaya iyi. Vaviri ava havana kudaira runhare patavafonera. Kunyange hazvo tisina kuwana divi reUnited Nations, sangano iri riri kutsvaga munhu anoita basa rezvesarudzo muZimbabwe pari zvino. Asi hukama hweUnited Nations neZimbabwe hwuri zinyekenyeke. Muna 2000 United Nations yakaramba kuongorora sarudzo dzemunyika ichiti Zimbabwe yaisada kuti inyatsoita basa rainoita kune dzimwe nyika rekuongorora sarudzo pasina zvirehwa rehwa. Muna 2013 Zimbabwe yakakumbira United Nations mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nemashanu yekuita sarudzo nereferendamu asi nekunetsana mari iyi haiina kuuya. United Nations yakati yaida kutumira chikwata chainoona mashandisirwo emari iyi asi Zimbabwe yakati sangano iri rainge roda kupindira zvakanyanya munyaya dzeZimbabwe. Asi nyaya dzekuvandudza mitemo yesarudzo dziri kuramba dzichinetsa zvapa kuti mapato anopikisa aumbe mubatanidzwa weNational Electoral Reform Agenda kana kuti Nera. VaTsvangirai vanoti kana pasina kuwirirana panyaya yesarudzo, zvinonetsa kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. No media source currently available
title: United Nations Yoshanda neZEC paNyaya yeSarudzo

text: Bato reZanu-PF neChitatu rakaita kuita musangano wePolitiburo pamuzinda waro weZanu-PF Headquarters muHarare. Nhepfenuro yeZBC inoti mutungamiri webato, uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakati hapana nhengo yebato inofanira kuenda kumatare kana isiri kuwirirana nezvakaitwa nebato. VaMugabe vakataura mashoko aya mushure mekunge vaiona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato, VaDidymus Mutasa, nevamwe vati havasi kutambira zvakabuda kukongiresi yakaitwa muna Zvita. VaMutasa nevamwe vavo vari kuronga kuenda kumatare. Asi magweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anoti hapana chinomisa VaMutasa nevamwe vavo kuenda kumatare. Vamwe mubato reZanu-PF vanoti VaMutasa vanofanira kudzingwa mubato vachipomerwa mhosva yekushora vakuru vebato. Nyaya iyi yainge ichifanira kuzeyiwa asi zviri kunetsa nekuti imwe nhengo yekomiti iri kuongorora nyaya yavo, uye vari mutungamiri weWomens League, Amai Grace Mugabe, havasati vadzoka kuzororo mushure mekuoparetwa kunyika dzekumawirira. Munyori wevechidiki muZanu PF, VaPupurai Togarepi, vakaudzawo Politiburo kuti vachiri kuda rubatsiro rwekuti vakwanise kuitira VaMugabe bhavhudhe. Bhavhudhe raVaMugabe ririko musi wa 21 Kukadzi, uye mhemberero dzichaitirwa kuVictoria Falls. Vachitaura nezvehupfumi, vanoronga mabasa mubato, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, vakati vanhu vanofanira kubatana mubato kuitira kuti chirongwa cheZIMASSET chibudirire. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri weZanu-PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, avo vanzi vange vachiri mumusangano uyu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, uye vachitungamira sangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaPedzisayi Ruhanya, vanoti nyaya yekuti vanhu vanogara pasi kutaura nezvebhavhudhe mucherechedzo wekuti vanhu veZanu-PF havazivi kuti vogadzirisa sei hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Vanoti Vari Kupokana Navo muZanu PF Havafanire Kuenda kuMatare

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kutarirwa vhiki rino kuti vaende kuMozambique nekuZambia kuti vanokumbira nyika idzi kuti dzibatsire Zimbabwe nemagetsi. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vari kuyambira kuti uku kunogona kunge kuri kungopedza nguva sezvo nyika idzi dzakabuda pachena kuti dziri kuda mari pamberi sezvo kambani yemagetsi yemunyika yeZESA yave nemakore akawanda ichitatarika kubhadhara zvikwerei kunze. VaMnangagwa vazivisa nezvenzedo idzi mumashoko avanyora mubepanhau reSunday Mail sezvavanoita mavhiki ose. ZESA yakaita chibvumirano neZambia Electrcity Supply Corporation Limited kana kuti ZESCO asi ZESA inofanira kubhadhara madhora mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru mazana matatu pamwedzi kana kuti US$6,3 million. Gurukota rezvemahando dzemoto muZambia VaPeter Kapala vakaudza vatori venhau kuti magetsi avari kutengesera Zimbabwe neNamibia ari kubva pagwenya reKafue Gorge. ZESA inotiwo yakaita chibvumirano chekutenga magetsi anosvika 300 megawatts neHydro Cahora Bassa yekuMzambique. Sachigaro weZESA VaSydney Gata vakazivisa mutsamba kuvakuru vemakambani emigodhi kuti havachakwanise kuvawanisa magetsi sezvo Zkambani yavo iri kutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti kuSouth Africa, Zambia neMozambique. ZESA inoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni gumi nemanomwe kana kuti US$17 milllion pamwedzi kuti itenge magesti kunze. Vanhu nemakambani emunyika vanonzi vane chikwereti kuZESA chinosvika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nemaviri kana kuti US$62 million. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vonanga kuZambia neMozambique Kuno Kwereta Magetsi

text: Mamwe madzimai ane chirwere chegomarara anoti vakawana mukana wekurapwa chirwere ichi pachena kuMbuya Nehanda Hospital paParirenyatwa. Izvi zvinotevera michina nemishonga yakauya navana Chiremba vakabva kuChina. Amai Dorry Chinyadza Gangasha ndemumwe wemadzimai vange vachirapwa pachena. Amai Chinyadza Gangasha, avo vanogara kumusha weDzivarasekwa Extension, vanoti vanofara zvikuru sezvo ivo vagara vasina mari yekurapwa chirwere chegomarara rechibereko. Amai Mavis Chirara mumwe wevacharapwa vatendawo zvikuru vanobatsira hurumende mukuedza kurwisa chirwere chegomarara icho chinonzi munyika muno chiri kuuraya vanhu vanosvika chiuru chimwe nemazana mashanu pagore rega rega. Chiremba wepaParirenyatwa, Doctor Ndabaningi Simango, vanoti michina yavakawana kubva kuChina inoshandiswa kunyika dzakabudirira mukudzivirira chirwere chegomarara rechibereko kuti chisadzika midzi. Vanoti hurongwa uhu huchabatsira kubvisa hupenyu hwemadzimai munjodzi. VaSimango vanotiwo chipatara cheParirenyatwa change chiine michina mishoma huye vari kufadzwawo kuti mamwe madzimai ari kubatsirikana pasina muripo. Munyori musangano re Zimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Dr Evans Masitara, vanoti kunyange hazvo zvichifadzwa zvikuru kuti kune madzimai ari kuwana rubatsiro pachena, chinosuwisa inyaya yekuti izvi ndezve nguvashoma. VaMasitara vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iwanise vanhukadzi mikana yakawanda yekuongororwa gomarara kuburikidza nekuwedzera zvipatara zvinoongorora nekurapa chirwere ichi. Mumagwaro akabuditswa neZimbabwe Cancer Registry zvinoratidza kuti mugore ra2014 pavanhu zviuru mazana manomwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, vanhu zviuru zvina nemakumi matatu ane vanomwe vaive madzimai. Gomarara rechibereko ndiro raive pamusoro pemamwe magomara kubata madzimai. Zvipatara zvehurumende zvinovheneka pamwe nekurapa chirwere chegomarara munyika zviviri chete, Parirenyatwa Hospital iri muHarare, pamwe neMpilo Hospital ku Bulawayo. Vana chiremba vekuChina ava vari paMbuya Nehanda, Parirenyatwa kwemasvondo maviri vachibatsira madzimai kuongorora nekudzivirira chirwere chegomarara vakabatana nana chiremba vepachipatara ichi. No media source currently available
title: China Yobatsira Zimbabwe neMichina neMishonga yeKurapa Chirwere cheGomara

text: Bato reMDC-T rinotungamirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora rinoti riri kupa kusvika kupera kwemwedzi uno waGunyana kunhengo dzeparamende nemakanzuru dzichiri kubato reMDC Alliance rinotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa kuti dzinge dzabva kubato iri dzichienda kuMDC-T, kukundikana kwadzo dzinozodzingwa muzvigaro izvi. Vachitaura neStudio 7 neSvondo mushure memhemberero dzekucherechedza kusvitsa makore makumi maviri nemaviri bato reMDC raumbwa, sachigaro veMDC-T, VaMorgen Komichi, vakati bato ravo rave kuzotora matanho akakodzera ekudzinga vose vasiri kushanda naro. VaKomichi vanoti nhengo deparamende nemakanzura ava vakapinzwa muzvigaro izvi neMDC-T uye vari kuwana zvinhu kubva kuparamende kana kumakanzuru, izvo zvavari kuzoshandisa mukurwisana neMDC-T, kwete kusimudzira bato iri. Vanoti bato ravo rakatoisa nhme iri kutenderera nematunhu ose ichiudza makanzura, mameya pamwe nenhengo dzeparamende kuti vakomana nevasikana, nzira yatiri kufamba nayo sebato ndeiyi neiyi, vachiti vakatora danho iri nekuti vamwe vaiti havasi kuwapa gwara rekutevera. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vanoti mashoko aVaKomichi aya mashoko emunhu asina zvekutaura, akatsamwa, mashoko ekuti pfungwa dzinenge dzasvika pamuganhu. VaHlatywayo vanoti bato ravo harishamiswi nezviri kurongwa kuitwa neMDC-T izvi, vachiti ibato rinoziva kuti harina vanoritevera nekudaro rave kushandisa nzira dzeZanu PF dzekutyisidzira vanhu. Asi vanoti sebato revanhu havana nguva yekumanikidza vanhu kuti vavatsigire sezvo vachiziva kuti MDC-T neZanu PF vari pamubatanidzwa wekuda kuputsa MDC Alliance. No media source currently available No media source currently available
title: MDC-T Yoyambira Kuti Ichadzinga Nhengo dzeParamende dzeMDC Alliance muKupera kwaGunyana

text: Dzimwe nhengo dzesangano reWomen of Zimbabwe Arise, kana kuti Woza, dzambochengetedzwa nemapurisa mu Harare neChitatu mushure mekuratidzira kwadzaita paparemende dzichitsutsumwa nekunyombwa kwakaitwa vanhu verudzi rwechiKalanga nemutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe. Nhengo dzeWoza dzanga dzichidarika mazana mashanu dzaratidzira dzichitsoropodzwa kwakaitwa maKalanga naVa Mugabe. No media source currently available Varatidziri ava, avo vanga vakatakura mapepa ane zvinyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana zvichitsoropodza mashoko aVa Mugabe, vaimba kwemaminitsi mashomanana mapurisa ndokuuya kuzovazvindikita. Zvimwe zvezvinyorwa izvi zvanga zvakanzi "Hatidi kusarurana kwemarudzi mu Zimbabwe". Mumwe wevaratidziri ava, Amai Tambudzai Manangazira, vati havasi kufara nemashoko akataurwa naVa Mugabe mushure memusangano wevatungamiri venyika dziri kuchamhembe kwe Africa kana kuti SADC wakaitirwa mu Harare mukupera kwemwedzi wapera pavakatsoropodza vanhu verudzi rwechiKalanga. Va Mugabe vakati maKalanga ndiwo aikonzera kurwisana kwaiitika ku South Africa kwaidaidzwa kuti xenophobia uye vakati maKalanga aiva matsotsi asina kudzidza zvakakwana kuti vapinde mabasa. Amai Manangazira vati aya haasi mashoko anofanira kutaurwa nemutungamiri wenyika. Mumwe wevaratidziri ava, Muzvare Taurai Nyamanhindi, vati havatarisiri mashoko akadai kubva kuna Va Mugabe vanove mutungamiri weSADC pamwe ne African Union. Muzvare Nyamanhindi vati Va Mugabe munhu anofanirwa kubatanidza vanhu vese vari mu SADC pamwe nemu Africa yose sezvo vari munhu ane chigaro chinoremekedzwa zvikuru. Vati mashoko aVaMugabe anokurudzira kurwisana kwemarudzi pamwe ne xenophobia yakaita ku South Africa. Amai Manangazira vati ivo pamwe nevanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mu Woza, Amai Jenni Williams, vambochengetedzwa nemapurisa paparamende mushure mekunge vaita munamato wanga uchikurudzira Va Mugabe kuti vadzore mwoyo wavo panyaya yemaKalanga. Vatori venhau vana vambochengetwawo nemapurisa anochengetedza paparamende zvakare kwechinguva vachinzi vanga vasingabvumirwe kuita basa ravo pachiitiko ichi sezvo paramende iri nzvimbo inochengetedzwa. Asi vatori venhau ava vazoregedzwa zvavo vasina mhosva yavazopomerwa. Mushure mekurohwa nekutorerwa mapepa avanga vakatakura, varatidziri ava vazoungana zvakare vakanosiya gwaro renyunyuto kukomisheni inowona nezvekodzero dzevanhu kana kuti Human Rights Commission. Asvitsa gwaro iri kukomisheni iyi uye ari muKalanga, Muzvare Vigilant Lunga, vati hapana munhu akasarudza kuti avemu Shona, muNdebele kana muKalanga saka nokudaro marudzi ese anofanira kubatwa zvakaenzana. Muzvare Lunga vati vavimbiswa ne Human Rights Commission kuti vachasvitsa nhuna dzavo kugurukota rinowona nezvemitemo, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, vanove zvakare mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika. Zvisinei, vati vaudzwa nevekomisheni iyi Human Rights Commission haina simba rekuongorora kana kuferefeta mutungamiri wenyika. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVa Mnangagwa kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Gwaro rasvitswa neWoza kuparamende nekuHuman Rights Commission iri rinoti VaMugabe vanofanira kukumbira ruregerero kuruzhinji rweZimbabwe uye gwaro iri rinoti mashoko avo anogona kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika.
title: Mapurisa Anorova Nhengo dzeWoza muHarare

text: Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, Ambassador Harry Thomas Jnr, vanoti vanofara chose nezviri kuitwa vechidiki vakapinda muchirongwa cheYoung African Leadership Initiative kana kuti YALI kubvira pachakatanga muna 2014. Vatiwo vachakurudzira hurumende yenyika yavo kuti irambe ichitsigira chirongwa ichi. Vachitaura neStutio7 apo vaparura zviratidzwa zviri kuitwa nevechidiki vakapinda muchironga cheYALI kana kuti Mandela Washington Fellowship kubva muna 2014 apo chakatangwa, VaThomas vati YALI ndechimwe chezvirongwa zvinofadza chose pazvirongwa zvese zvinotsigirwa nehurmende yavo muZimbabwe. VaThomas vati kunyange hazvo paine tarisiro yekuti rutsigiro rwemari kunyika dzekunze rungangoderedzwa nehurmende yavo ivo vacharwa vamire kuti chirongwa cheYALI chienderere mberi. Vati zviratidzwa zveYALI EXPO zvinoratidza hunyanzvi hune vana veZimbabwe, zvichapera mangwana uye vachashandisa izvi sehumbowo wekusimbisa kuti hurumende yavo irambe ichitsigira chirongwa ichi. No media source currently available  Vakapinda muchirongwa ichi kubvira muna2014 vari kuratidza hunyanvzi hwavo pamwe nezvavari kuita mumasangano kana kugadzira mukambani avo zvichitevera hunyanzvi hwavakawana pachirongwa cheYALI. VaGolden Maunganidze avo vanodzidzisa zvidzidzo zvekutapa nhau paGreat Zimbabwe University zvakare vachidhinda bepanhau re TellZim kuMasvingo vanoti chirongwa ichi chakavabatsira zvikuru mubasa ravo rekutapa nhau nekufambisa mashoko. VaMaunganidze, avo vakapinda muchirongwa cha2016, vati basa ravo rabudirira zvikuru nekuda kweruzivo rwavakawana pachirongwa cheYALI. Vaive muchirongwa che 2015, VaTawanda Kembo, vati YALI yakavavhura pfungwa dzavo uye vakatotanga kambani yavo yeBitifinance iyo yave kubatsira vanhu kubhadhara mari kunze kwenyika vachishandisa mhando yemari inonzi maBiticoin. Muzvare Irene Chikumbo vanoshandira kambani yeUdugu. vanoti vakawana hunyanzvi munyanya dzemabhizimisi apo vakapinda pachirongwa ichi muna 2014, uye vabatsira vechidiki vanodarika mazana maviri mukutanga kana kusimudzira mabhizimisi avo. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaTerry Mutsvanga, avo vakapinda muchirongwa ichi gore rapfuura vatiwo pavakabva kuAmerica vave kugadzira mifananidzo inoratidza kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu nemakambani anochera zvicherwa munharaunda dzavo. Vechidiki vanodarika zana nemakumi masere vapinda pachirongwa ichi uye gore rino pane makumi matanhatu nemumwe vari kuenda kuAmerica pasi pechirongwa ichi munguva pfupi inotevera. Chirongwa ichi chakatangwa naVaBarrack Obama nechinangwa chekupa hunyanzvi munyaya dzehutungamiri nemabhizimisi kune vechidiki vekuAfrica.
title: Ambassador Thomas Vorumbidza Chirongwa cheYALI

text: Sangano reUnited Nations rinoona nezvechikafu pasi rose, reWorld Food Program, kana kuti WFP, rinoti veruzhinji vanogona kuziya nenzara munzvimbo dzakawanda munyika kana rikashaya mari rariri kuda kupa vanhu ava chikafu. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare, mutevedzeri wemukuru weWFP, kana kuti Assistant Executive Director, Muzvare Valerie Guarneri, avo vanga vachishanya munyika, vati vanhu vakawanda munyika vakatarisana nenzara yakakomba sezvo mvura isina kunaya zvakanaka mwaka uno, kubudikidza nekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze. Muzvare Guarneri vati sangano ravo riri kushoterwa nemari inodarika mamiriyoni zana emadhora ekuAmerica kuitira kuti rikwanise kupa chikafu vanhu vakatarisana nedambudziko renzara, zvikurusei kumaruwa. Muzvare Guarneri vati kunyange WFP iri kubatsira mhuri dzemudhorobha dziri kutambudzika nemari yekuti dzitenge chikafu, chave kunetsa ndechekuti kuti zvinhu zviri kukwira mitengo zuva nezuva zvave kuita kuti mari yavari kupa vanhu ava kuti vabatsirikane, isakwane kutenga zvakawanda. WFP iri kupa madhora ekuAmerica mapfumbamwe pamunhu mumadhorobha pavanhu vanenge vaonekwa kuti havakwanise kuzviraramisa. Mumiriri weWFP muZimbabwe, VaEddie Rowe, vati kana vemasangano anobatsira pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo vakakwanisa kuvapa mari yavari kuda, vanogona kusvitsa chikafu kuvanhu mamiriyoni mana nezviuru zana kusvika vanhu vakohwa. Vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni manomwe nemazana manomwe ezviuru vanoda rubatsiro rwechikafu muZimbabwe. Pavanhu vari kukwanisa kubatsirwa nechikafu neWFP munyika yose, panosera paine mamiriyoni matatu nemazana matanhatu ezviuru vanofanirwa kunge vachibatsirwa nechikafu nehurumende pamwe nemamwe masangano anobatsira asiri WFP. Gurukota rezvekurima, VaPerrance Shiri, vati sezvo mvura isiri kunaya zvakanaka zvinoita kuti nyika ive nenzara, varimi vanofanira kurima mbesa dzisingade mvura yakawanda kuitira kuti vagokwanisa kukohwa. Asi mumiriri weNorton muparamende, VaTemba Mliswa, vati hurumende inofanira kubhadhara varimi zvakafanira zvinoita kuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo kuitira kuti vanhu vasaziye nenzara. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekurima dzinoti Zimbabwe haisati yambotarisana nenzara yakaita seye rwendo rwuno, uye dzinotarisira kuti huwandu hwevanhu vachada rubatsiro gore rino huchakwira kudarika pahuri pari zvino sezvo vanhu vakawanda vachatadza kuita goho rakanaka. No media source currently available
title: WFP Yopemha Zvakare Mari Inodarika Mamiriyoni Zana eMadhora ekuAmerica

text: Kanzuru yeHarare yazivisa padandemutande rayo reTwitter kuti ichambomira kupa vanhu mvura kwemazuva maviri kutanga nezuro ichiti haina kukwanisa kuwana mumwe mushonga wekuchenesa mvura wealminum sulphate uye nechlorine gas. Kanzuru yati iri kuyedza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri nenguva yayatara. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mune rimwe sangano revagari reCombined Harare Residents Association kana kuti CHRA VaRuben Akili vaudza Studio 7 kuti nzvimbo zhinji muHarare hadzina mvura. Vatiwo vanhe vave kubhadhara mari kuti vawane mvura kubva kune vane zvibhorani. VaAkili vati nyaya yekusvibisa mvura inoyererera kuenda kuLake Chivero inopa kuti zvidhure kuchenesa. Vatiwo kanzuru inofanira kupihwa mari dzayo dzebudiriro yematunhu kana kuti devolution kwete kuti gurukota rezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo vave ivo vanoona kuti mari iyi yashanda sei. Izvi vati zvinozopa kuti kanzuru itadze kupa vanhu kodzero yekuwana mvura yakachena No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru yeHarare Yovhara Mvura neKushaya Mishonga yeKuichenesa

text: Gweta riri kumirira mhuri yekwaDzamara richishanda ne Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaShar`on Hofisi, vanoti mapurisa haana kunyatsojekesa zvikonzero zvaari kurambidzira mhuri iyi kuti ipinde mumigwagwa ichi cherechedza nguva yapedzwa naVaItai Dzamara vatsakatika. Mhuri yemurwiri wekodzero akapambwa akatsakatika gore rapera, VaItai Dzamara, yakwirira mapurisa kumatare zvichitevera danho remapurisa rekuti hurongwa hwemusi weChitatu hwekucherechedza kusvitsa gore kwaVaDzamara vapambwa, husaenderere mberi. Gweta riri kumirira mhuri yekwaDzamara richishanda ne Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaShar`on Hofisi, vanoti mapurisa haana kunyatsojekesa zvikonzero zvaari kurambidzira mhuri iyi kuti ipinde mumigwagwa ichi cherechedza nguva yapedzwa naVaItai Dzamara vatsakatika. VaHofisi vanoti mapurisa ari kungoti hurongwa uhu hunogona kuvhiringa kodzero dzevamwe vanhu, nekudaro haufanirwe kuitwa. Vanoti nyaya iyi yakwidzwa zvechimbichimbi nekudaro ichanzwikwa neChipiri masikati naJustice Clement Phiri. Mhuri yekwaDzamara mwedzi wapfuura yakanga yazivisa mapurisa nezvehurongwa hwekurangarira VaItai uhu kuburikidza netsamba yaitsanangura nezvehurongwa hwavo. Asi zvinonzi yakazoshamiswa kunzwa mukupera kwesvondo mapurisa oti havafanirwi kuenderera mberi sezvo zvaive mutsamba yavo zvakanga zvisingapindirane nemutemo wePOSA. “Pasi pebumbiro remitemo yenyika, mapurisa anongoziviswa chete, kwete kukumbirwa mvumo,” VaHofisi vanodaro. Vanoti nekuona kwavo dare richaita kuti mhuri iyi neshamwari dzayo dzinosanganisira vemachechi nevemapato evzematongerwo enyika vaenderere mberi zvisina kumbunyikidzwa nemapurisa. Asi vanoti kana zvakanga zvazoendawo nepamwe zvekuti dare rinotsigira mapurisa, mhuri yekwaDzamara inenge isina rimwe danho kunze kwekuungana pamba payo yoita munamato ipapo. No media source currently available
title: VekwaDzamara Vokwira Matare Sezvo Vakanyimwa Mvumo neMapurisa Yekufora

text: Masangano manomwe emudunhu reSADC ari kusangana kumucheto wemusangano we SADC Ordinary Summit wechimakumi nemana, akabuda nezuro negwaro rine zvaanoti kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe pamwe nezvaanoda kuti zviitwe mukugadzirisa matambudziko aya. Gwaro iri rakasvitswa kuhurumende yeZimbabwe, kusangano reSADC pamwewo nekusangano reAfrican Union. Masangano anoti re Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, reSouthern Africa Human Rights Defenders Network, reHuman Rights Institute of South Africa (South Africa), reCenter for Democracy and Development (Mozambique), re DITSHWANELO - Botswana Centre for Human Rights (Botswana), re Malawi Human Rights Defenders Coalition (Malawi) pamwe nere Chapter One Foundation (Zambia), akabatana ose mukunyora gwaro iri. Hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu, asi mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nebato reZanu PF vanoramba kuti munyika muri kutyorwa kodzero dzevanhu, vachiti mashoko evanhu vari kuda kusvibisa zita renyika. Mukuru weZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, Doctor Musa Kika, vanoti chakaita kuti vanyore gwaro iri ndechekuda kuburitsa pachena matambudziko avari kusangana nawo muZimbabwe pamusoro pekodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available
title: Masangano emuSADC Anosvitsa kuSADC Summit Gwaro reNyunyuto Pane Zviri Kuitwa neHurumende yaVaMnangagwa

text: Mufundisi wekereke yeWisdom Church International, VaMazvarirashe Mabugu, vanoti vakawana mukana wokutendeutsa mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Richard Tsvangirai, vasati vaenda kuSouth Africa kunorapwa chirwere chegomarara icho chakatora hupenyu hwavo. VaMabugu vanoti vakafonerwa naVaTsvangirai kuti vazoita navo zvidzidzo zveshoko raMwari kumba kwavo kuHighlands muHarare, vasati vaenda kuSouth Africa. VaMabugu vanoti VaTsvangirai vaiva nemoyo wakazaruka kushoko raMwari uye munhu akange akazvininipisa kuvanhu vose, uye kuti vanhu vabatane munyika. Mufundisi Mabugu vanoti VaTsvangirai munhu aida kuti munhu wese muZimbabwe ave nerusununguko. Mufundisi Mabugu vanoti VaTsvangirai vaiva munhu akashinga zvokuti pavakaenda kuSouth Africa kunorapwa, vaive nechokwadi chekuti vaizokwikwidza musarudzo uye vachikunda. Mutumbi waVaTsvangirai unonzi ucharadzikwa kumusha kwavo kuBuhera. No media source currently available
title: Mufundisi Mubugu Votaura Pamusoro peZvidzidzo zveBhaibheri Zvavaiita naVaTsvangirai

text: Vanachiremba vasangana nhasi pachipatara cheParirenyatwa muHarare vakatenderana kuenderera mberi nekuramwa mabasa kunyangwe hazvo dare reLabour Court rakavati vange vadzokera kumabasa nhasi. Musangano uyu waitwa mangwanani anhasi navanachiremba vachiti vange vachida kupangana mazano kuti votora gwara ripi. Mumwe chiremba, Dr Rumbidzai Jamba vati vachangomirira kuona danho richatorwa nehurumende asi vakati havatombotyi chero vakanzi mabasa apera Vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wesangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association kana kuti ZHDA, Doctor Masimba Dean Ndoro vati vanachiremba havana kukwanisa kuenda kubasa nekuda kwekuti havana mari. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nevakafanobata chigaro chemunyori wesangano reZHDA iri Doctor Tawanda Zvakada. Kunyangwe hazvo vanachiremba vazhinji pamusangano uyu vanga vachikurudzira hutungamiriri hwavo kuti husakwidze nyaya yavo kudare repamusoro vachiti havaoni matare achipa mumwe mutongo wakasiyana, Doctor Ndoro vati vachazeya nyaya iyi nemagweta avo vowona danho ravangatora. Kunosvikira varwerwe pachipatara cheParirenyatwa kwanga kuine vanhu vashoma avo vanga vachiti vave nenguva vakamirira vanachiremba. Mumwe mukoti ataura neStudio 7 asina kuda kudomwa nezita atiwo vana chiremba vari pabasa vashoma zvikuru. Vanachiremba vakatanga kuramwa mabasa musi wa 3 Gunyana vachiti havana zvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vaende kumabasa. Vamwe vanachiremba vakuru vaive vasara pamabasa vakakandawo mapadza pasi China chesvondo rapera vachinyunyutawo nenyaya dzemihoro pamwe nemamiriro akaita zvinhu muzvipatara. Parizvino vanachiremba vari muzvipatara vakabva kuzvipatara zvemauto nevamwe kabva kunyika dzakaita seCuba neSouth Korea vakauya munyika makore maviri apfuura. Health Services Board ndiyo yakakwidza nyaya iyi kuLabour Court ichida kuti vanachiremba vanzi vadzokere kumabasa. Studio 7 yatumira mibvunzo kuHealth Services Board kuti tinzwe zvichaitwa nekusawirirana kuripo asi tanga tisati tawana mhinduro pataenda kumhepo. Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi rezvehutano Dr Donald Mujiri vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachazotaura nevatori venhau vanyatsodorongodzakuti zvinhu zvange zvakamira sei muzvipatara zvose. No media source currently available
title: Gakava Pakati peHurumende naVanaChiremba Roramba Kupera Zvosiya Varwere Vari paMhene

text: Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvemukati menyika, VaAaron Nhepera vaburitsa mashoko anoyambira masangano ezvenhau pamwe neveruzhinji kuti vasaburitse manyepo pamusoro pehutano hwevakuru-vakuru vehurumende, vachiti kuita kwakadai kunokanganisa kugadzikana kwenyika. Mugwaro ravo, VaNhepera vati vari kunyanya kutsoropodza mashoko avanoti emanyepo ekuti vateveredzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga naVaKembo Mohadi vose vari kurwara neCovid-19, uye kuti VaChiwenga vakatomhanyiswa kuChina kunorapwa. Hurumende yakashoropodzawo vamwe vakuru vemakereke vanonzi vari kukurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti dzisabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19, iyo inonzi ichapinda munyika mumazuva mashoma anotevera. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti kusavepo kwemashoko anoburitswa nehurumende pamusoro pehutano hwevakuru vehurumende ndiko kunozokonzera kuti vatori venhau pamwe neveruzhini vanyore pamwe nekutaura nezvavanenge vachinzwa, izvo zvinozopikiswa nehurumende. VaNgwenya vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutaura kuti vakuru-vakuru ava varipi, kwete kungoburitsa mashoko ekuramba asina humbowo, vachiti kune dzimwe nyika hurumende inotooita misangano nevatori venhau vachizivisa veruzhinji mamiriro anenge akaita zvinhu. “Ukaona hurumende ichingovhunduka kana zvichinge zvangonzi eeh, mukuru wenyika adai, pane zvinenge zvisingabudi mushe. Hurumende ngaiite chido chekuburitsa mazwi, chekuburitsa mashoko,” vanodaro VaNgwenya. Mutauriri wemutungamiri wehurumende, VaGeorge Charamba, vakazivisa mazuva mashoma adarika kuti VaChiwenga vakanzi nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati VaChiwenga vambonozorora. Panyaya yevakuru vemakereke vari kukurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti dzisatora nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19, VaNgwenya vanoti zvakashata kuti vakuru ava vatsvage mbiri nekuudza vanhu mashoko asiriwo, kunze kwemamwe makereke emapositori agara anozivikanwa kuti haatore mishonga. Asi vanoti vakuru ava kunyange ivo vasingade mishonga iyi, vanofanirwa kukurudzira nhengo dzavo dzinoda zvadzo kuti dzibaiwe nhomba idzi. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoyambira Venhau neVeruzhinji Pamusoro peKuburitsa Mashoko eHutano hweVakuru muHurumende Ainoti Manyepo

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika nebudiriro musangano reEuropean Union VaNeven Mimica vakashanyira Zimbabwe nemusi weMuvhuro vakaita musangano nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemamwe makurukota avo. VaMimica vakasimbaradza nyaya yekuti kudyidzana pakati peZimbabwe neEU kuchasimbaradzwa chete kana Zimbabwe yaita sarudzo dzakachena gore rino. Vamwe vakapinda mumusangano uyu vanosanganisa mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika Retired General Constantino Chiwenga, vakamirira gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaSimon Khaya Moyo, uye chipangamazano chavamnangagwa VaChris Mutsvangwa. VaMimica ndiye munhu mukuru mukuru muEU kutanga kushanyira Zimbabwe kubva zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vehurumende zvirango muna 2002. Vatiwo pane chimwe chikwata kubva kuEU chichange chiri munyika munguva pfupi inotevera. VaMimica vanotiwo EU ichabatsira Zimbabwe munyaya dzezvehutano nebudiriro nemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemasere ekuAmerica. Nyanzvi munezvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paArmhest College ku Massachussets muAmerica, Doctor Chipo Dendere vanoti kudidzana kweZimbabwe neEU kwakakosha zvikuru. No media source currently available
title: Mukuru weEU VaMimica Voshanyira Zimbabwe Vachikurudzira Sarudzo Dzakachena

text: Gavhuna weRBZ Doctor John Mangudya nhasi vari kutarisirwa kuparura hurongwa negwara rekufambiswa kwemari kana kuti Monetary Policy Statement. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichioma munyika nekudaro VaMangudya nevamwe vari muhurumende vanofanira kuuya nenjere dzinenge dzamambo Soromoni kuti nyika ibude mukanwa mamupere mairi. Vamwe vakuru muRBZ vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMangudya vachabata nyaya dzakaita sekushomeka kwemari mumabhanga. Kubhadhara zvikwereti zvine Zimbabwe kumabhanga akaita seWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. Kudzorwa kwemari munyika nevamwe vemabhizimisi vainge vaiburitsa munyika nemukoto. Vanonzi vachabatawo nyaya dzezviwanikwa uye nzira dzekusimudzira maindustry nekudzikisa huwandu hwezvinhu zvinotengwa kunze.
title: VaMangudya Voparura Hurongwa Hwekushandiswa kweMari Nhasi

text: Vanachiremba vakuru vabatana navanachiremba vadiki mukuratidzira vachizivisa hurumende kuti havasi kuzoshanda kuzvipatara zvehurumende pamwe nekumasejari kwavo kusvika mumwe chiremba anonzi akapambwa neMugovera awanikwa. Doctor Peter Magombeyi, avo vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, vanonzi vakapedzisira kuonekwa neMugovera vasati vapambwa kubva pamba pavo kuBudiriro muHarare. Vana Chiremba varatidzira vachifamba kubva pachipatara cheParirenyatwa kusvika pedyo nemahofisi emutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa uko vamiriri vavo vazonosvitsa tsamba yenyunyuto mushure mekunge mapurisa arambidza mhomho yese yaana chiremba kuti isvike kumahofisi emutungamiriri wenyika. Vachitaura neStudio 7, mumwe chiremba anove nyanzvi muzvirwere zvevana, Doctor Bothwell Mbuvayesango, vanotsidza kuti hapana munhu wavari kuzorapa kana Doctor Magombeyi vasina kuwanikwa. Doctor Mbuvayesango vanoti izvi ndizvo zviri mutsamba yenyunyuto yanosiiwa kumahofisi emutungamiriri wenyika. Doctor Mbuvayesango vanotiwo zvinokatyamadza kuti munhu angatorwa zvinechisimba nekuda kwekungotaura kuti mari iri kutambirwa nanachiremba haisi kukwana. Mumwe zvekare chiremba mukuru, Doctor Felicity Gumbo vanoti vanga vari pakuratidzira apa senzira yekuratidza hurumende kuti vanachiremba vakuru vari kutsigira vanachiremba vadiki mune zvavari kunyunyuta nazvo, kusanganisira kutsakatika kwaDoctor Magombeyi pamwe nemari shoma dziri kutambirwa navanachiremba. No media source currently available Imwe nhengo zvakare yesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Tapiwa Mungofa, avo vanoshanda paHarare Central Hospital apo paishandawo Dr Magombeyi, vanoti vasiya tsamba yenyunyuto kumahofisi emutungamiriri wenyika uye vachange vachizoendesa tsamba yenyunyuto iyi kune mamwe mapazi ehurumende. Vanotiwo kana Doctor Magombeyi vasina kuwanikwa hapana basa richabatwa navanachiremba. Doctor Norman Matara veZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights vakurudzira hurumende yaVaMnangagwa kuti izadzikise zvainotaura zvekuti inoremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Vanoti hurumende ikasakurumidza kugadzirisa nyaya yekutsakatika kwaDoctor Magombeyi zvichaunza kusagadzikana munyika. Muzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe vazivisawo padandemutande reTwitter kuti kubva muna Ndira wegore rino vanhu vanosvika makumi mashanu vatorwa zvechisimba kubva mudzimba dzavo, uye hapana ati ambosungwa nenyaya idzi. Muzinda uyu wakakurudzira hurumende kuti itore matanho nekukasika. Gurukota rezvehutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo nezuro vakati bazi ravo riri kushungurudzikawo nekushaikwa kwemumwe mushandi waro uye vari kuita zvese zvavanogona kuti Doctor Magombeyi vawanikwe. Mugwaro rakabudiswawo nemapurisa, mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vakatiwo kushaikwa kwaDoctor Magombeyi kwakamhangarwa kumapurisa ekuBudiriro.
title: VanaChiremba Vanoratidzira Vachinyunyuta neKupambwa KwaDoctor Magombeyi

text: Hurumende inoti yakatyamadzwa nedanho rakatorwa nemutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump rekuwedzera zvirango zvakatemerwa nehurumende yeAmerica vamwe vakuru muhurumende nemubato reZanu PF uye makambani anodyidzana nehurumende. Vachinyora mugwaro ravaburitsa, gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vanoti havana zvavo kushamiswa nezvaitwa neAmerica izvi. Asi VaMoyo vanoti kunyange hazvo America yatora danho iri, haita kutangawo yatarisa divi rekuti Zimbabwe yasvika papi nematanho ayo ekuvandudza zvematongerwo enyika, zveupfumi pamwe nezvemitemo kubva hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa yapinda pachigaro muna 2017. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti zvagara zvinozivikanwa kuti America inoda kuzviita mukoma wenyika dzose pasi rose nekuti Zimbabwe yakatora minda yevachena ichipa kuvatema. VaChirumhanzu vanoti iyo America iri kuuraya vanhu mune dzimwe nyika mairi kurwa dzihondo dzayo asi hapana kana matanho airi kutorerwa ezvirango. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti havana kushamiswa nezvaitwa neAmerica izvi, sezvo hurumende yaVaMnangagwa isina kutevera zvivimbiso zvayo zvekuti ichagadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu. VaMavhinga vanoti hurumende yakambenge yatambira zvakabuda muongororo yakaitwa nekomisheni yevaive mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaKgalema Motlanthe, zvekuti mauto ane chekuita nekuurayiwa kwevanhu, asi iye zvino yave kuzviramba, unove munongedzo wekuti haina kumira pachokwadi. No media source currently available
title: Danho reAmerica reKuwedzera Zvirango neGore Roshoropodzwa neVamwe, Vamwe Vachiritambira

text: Matare atanga kunzwa nyaya dzenhengo dzeMDC-T uye vamwe vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vakasungwa gore rapera vachipomerwa mhosva dzine chekuita nekuratidzira kusafarira hurumende yemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nekusamira zvakanaka kwakaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Matare atanga kunzwa nyaya dzenhengo dzeMDC-T uye vamwe vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vakasungwa gore rapera vachipomerwa mhosva dzine chekuita nekuratidzira kusafarira hurumende yemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nekusamira zvakanaka kwakaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Vamwe vakasungwa inhengo dzedare reparamende dzinosanganisira VaFani Munengami naAmai Ronia Bunjira. Vamwe vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanosanganisira VaPromise Mkwananzi, VaStern Zvorwadza, mufundisi Phillip Mugadza nevamwe. Asi vamwe vakasungwa gore rapera vana vanoti Muzvare Lynette Mudewe veZimbabwe Activists Alliance, VaDirk Frey, VaAlvin Takavada naVaElvis Mugari vakaendesawo kumatare mukuru wemapurisa, vaaugustine chihuri, vachiti kusungwa kwavakaitwa gore rapera kwainge kusiri pamutemo. Vana ava vakasungwa vachiratidzira kuti mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, vabude muhotera yeRainbow Towers yavaigara vachiti vainge vasati vawana imba yakakodzerana nechimiro chavo. Vana ava vanoti vanoda mari inosvika zviuru gumi nezvinomwe zvemadhora. Nemusi weMuvhuro imwe nyaya yevanhu makumi manomwe nevana vakasungwa musi wa4 Chikunguru 2016 pakuratidzira kwakavharisa maguta akawanda kuchitungamirwa neve Hash Tag This Flag neveTajamuka hakuna kuzoenderera mberi mudare ramejastiriti sezvo vachuchusi vati vanoda nguva yekuunganidza humbowo. Gweta revanhu ava richishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaTrust Maanda, vanoti vachuchusi vakauya vasina kugadzirira musiwa 31 Ndira vachikumbira dare kuti riti vanhu ava havana mhosva. No media source currently available
title: Matare Otanga Kunzwa Nyaya dzeVakasungwa Mukuratidzira Gore Rapera

text: Mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaposa, vakumbira ruregerero kuvanhu vanga vari kuNational Sports Stadium pamusoro pemhirizhonga iri kuita kunyika kwavo vachiti vane hurombo nezvakaitika sezvo zvisingaenderane nezvinhu zvaidiwa nevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nevamwe vatungamiri vakaita saVaNelson Mandela. Vachitaura kuNational Sports Stadium mushure mekusveveredzwa nevanhu, VaRamaposa vati zvakaitika kunyika kwavo hazvina kunaka uye hazvisi zvinhu zvakarwirwa nevatungamiriri vakaita saVaMugabe. VaRamaphosa vati South Africa inyika isingavenge zvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica vachiti nyika idzi dzakabatsira South Africa apo yaive panguva yakaoma. Veruzhinji vazofarira mashoko aVaRamaphosa mushure mekunge vakumbira ruregerero nekuda kwemhirizhonga iri kuitika kuSouth Africa. VaCris Mutsvanga ndemumwe weavo vafara chose nekuda kwezvaitwa naVaRamaphosa. Munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanokudza zvikuru zvaitwa naVaRamaposa. VaRamaphosa, mumwe wevatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vanga vari kuNational Sports Stadium. Mutungamiri weKenya, VaUhuru Kenyatta, varumbidza VaMugabe nebasa guru ravakaita pakusungura Zimbabwe neAfrica. Vamwe vanga vari pahurongwa uhu vanosanganisira vaimbovc mutungamiri weGhana, VaJerry Rawlings, VaKenneth Kaunda vekuZambia, VaOluseguni Obassanjo vekuNigeria nevamwe. Mutumbi waVaMugabe unotarisirwa kuenda kumusha kwavo kwaZvimba mangwana uye ndivo gamba rezana nemakumi matatu neshanu richaradzikwa paNational Heroes Acre, asi zuva richaitwa izvi harisati razivikanwa. Pane magamba gumi nemaviri echidzimai akaradzikwa paHeroes Acre anosanganisira mukadzi waVaMugabe wekutanga, Amai Sally Heyfron Mugabe. Zvichakadai VaMangwana vati VaMugabe vachavigwa muguva repamusoro soro rinonzi Musoleum iro rave kugadzira nehurumende paHeroes Acre. VaMangwana vati madzishe nemhuri yaVaMugabe vakatotara guva raVaMugabe, uye mutumbi waVaMugabe uchazovigwa muguva iri kana rapera kugadzirwa. VaMangwana vati ijana remhuri kuchengeta mutumbi apo guva raVaMugabe rinenge richigadzirwa. VaMangwana vati hurumende ndiyo ichabhadhara zvese zvichaitwa pakugadzirisa guva raVaMugabe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekuchengeta zvitunha dzinoti zvinokosha madhora ekuAmerica makumi mashanu kana kudarika kuchengeta chitunha pazuva. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, Vanokumbira Ruregerero

text: Vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika Amai Joyce Mujuru voparura gwaro rine zvinangwa zvesangano ravo zvinonzi nevamwe munongedzo wekupinda munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Vana vechikoro vashoma ndivo vanonzi vadzokera kuchikoro pavhurwa zvikoro nhasi nekuda kwekuomerwa kwevabereki nehupenyu. Imwe shoroma yekunigeria VaAliko Dangote yotumira zvipangamazano zvayo kuZimbabwe kuzogadzirisa nyaya yekupihwa mapepa ekutanga mabhizimisi. Muchirongwa cheLivetalk cheThe Youth Connection na 8:30 pm tiri kutarisa nyaya yekuvhurwa kwezvikoro. Iyi ndiyo misoro yenhau dzedu dzanhasi...Munokwanisa kunzwa nhau dzedu dzanhasi nekutibata pa 909 am, 4930, kana pa 12080, ne 15460 kilohertzs pa shortwave kana pafacebook page yedu yeVoa Shona. No media source currently available
title: Misoro yeNhau Dzanhasi - Chipiri, Gunyana, 08, 2015

text: Mutungamiri webato rePeople’s Democratic Party, Va Tendai Biti, vanoti hurumende yeZanu PF inogona kubviswa chete kana mapato anopikisa akabatana kuitira kuti atorere bato riri kutonga masimba. Mutungamiri webato rePeople’s Democratic Party, Va Tendai Biti, vanoti hurumende yeZanu PF inogona kubviswa chete kana mapato anopikisa akabatana kuitira kuti atorere bato riri kutonga masimba. VaBiti vatiwo izvi zvinoita chete kana pachinge pagadziriswa mitemo yose inobata sarudzo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare, Va Biti vati vabvumirana sebato kuti vasimbaradze nyaya yekuti nhaurirano pakati pemapato anopikisa hurumende dzisimbaradzwe pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018. No media source currently available Kunyange hazvo Va Biti varamba kutaura zvakawanda nenyaya yenhaurirano idzi, vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika muchivande pakati pebato ravo, MDC-T, People First inonzi inotungamirirwa naAmai Mujuru iyo isati yaparurwa pamwe nemamwe mapato, vanoti pane chinangwa chekuda kuti mapato ose atsigire munhu mumwe chete achamisidzana naVa Mugabe musarudzo dzemuna 2018. Zvichakadai, VaBiti vati sebato vari kuda kuti mitemo yose inobata nyaya dzesarudzo ivandudzwe vachiti komisheni inowona nezvekufambiswa kwesarudzo ye Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, iri kunonoka pagadziriro yayo yesarudzo idzi. Va Biti vati sebato vachanyora mutemo wesarudzo wavanofunga kuti ndiwo unofanira kushandiswa munyika wozeyewa nevemapato anopikisa pamwe nevemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira. Vati ZEC inofanira kutotanga izvozvi kunyoresa vanhu vachavhota musarudzo dzemuna 2018 kana pachizoshandiswa zvigunwe kana biometric voting system musarudzo idzi. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo uye vari mutungamiri wesangano reCoalition Against Corruption, Va Terry Mutsvanga, vati havawone hurumende yeZanu PF ichivandudza mitemo inobata sarudzo pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018 pakatariswa makakatanwa ari muZanu PF pari zvino. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri weZanu PF, Va Simon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe mafungiro ebato ravo panyaya yekuvandudzwa kwemitemo inobata sarudzo iyi. Mapato makuru anopikisa akaita seMDC yaVa Morgan Tsvangirai, MDC yaVa Welshman Ncube, pamwe ne PDP anoti haasi kuzokwikwidza musarudzo idzi kana mitemo yose inobata sarudzo isati yaitwa. Va Biti vati vari kushikanawo zvikuru nekusamira zvakanaka kwakaita zvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi zvikurusei nyaya yenzara. Zvichakadai, Va Tsvangirai avo vanga vachifanira kuita musangano nevatori venhau pamuzinda webato ravo vakanzura musangano uyu vachinzi vaenda ku South Africa zvechimbi-chimbi. Asi hatisati taziva kuti vaenda kunoitei ku South Africa kwacho. Mutauriri wavo, Va Luke Tamborinyoka, vati pane zvamukira mumakumbo kunyange hazvo vasina kutaura kuti chii chaizvo. VaTsvangirai vanga vachifanirwa kutaura pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika, pamire bato ravo panyaya iyi, uye kuti nyika ingafambira mberi seyi
title: VaBiti Vokurudzira Mushandira Pamwe Kuitira Kubvisa Hurumende yeZanu PF

text: Masangano maviri ekunze nemusi weChina akaisa vaongorori vesarudzo munyika yose achiti zvakakosha kuongorora mafambisirwo achaitwa sarudzo dzemu Zimbabwe kubva panguva ino apo mapato ezvematongerwo enyika ari kutsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzemwedzi unouya. Vari kutungamira vaongorori vesarudzo ava vachibva kumasangano maviri ekunze anoti International Republican Institute neNational Democratic Institute, VaLarry Garber, vanoti masangano avo atumira vaongorori vesarudzo kumatunhu ose emunyika ayo achatanga basa kubva nhasi kusvikira sarudzo dzaitwa mwedzi unouya. VaGarber vanoti vaongororo vavo vesarudzo ndivanamazvikokota munyaya dzesarudzo vanobva muAfrica, Europe pamwe neNorth America. "Sarudzo hachisi chinhu chinoitwa musi wekuvhota chete. Zvakakosha kuti vaongorori vesarudzo vaongororewo kutsvaga kuoita mapato rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo pamwe nekuongorora gadziriro yesarudzo munyika yose." Zvichakadai, rimwe remapato anopikisa reMDCT inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa rinoti riri kutambira nemufaro kuuya kwevaongorori vesarudzo pachine nguva yekuti sarudzo dziitwe mwedzi unouya. Murongi wemisangano mubato iri, VaAmos Chibaya, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vaongorori vesarudzo vaonewo kutambudzika kwavari kuita kuti hwaro hwesarudzo dzakachena hugadziriswe nehurumende pamwe nekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaVivid Gwede, vanoti chinhu chakakosha chaitwa nemasangano maviri aya kukurumidza kutumira vaongorori vesarudzo. VaGwede vati zvasarira hurumende kuti ione kuti sarudzo dzemwedzi unouya dzive sarudzo dzinotambirika pasi rose kuitira kuti Zimbabwe igokwanisa kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika sezvo vachiti vaongorori vesarudzo ndivo vanotakura mashoko akanaka kana akaipa pamusoro pemafambisirwo anenge aitwa sarudzo. Zvichakadai, VaGarber vanoti vaongorori vavo vesarudzo vachaita basa ravo vasina divi ravakarekera sezvakatarwa pasi pemirawu yeUnited Nations inobata nyaya dzekuongororwa kwesarudzo. Vanotiwo zvakare vachatarisa kuti Zimbabwe ichange ichitevedzerawo zvakatarwa nemasangano akaita seAfrican Union pamwe nesangano renyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica reSADC panyaya yemafambisirwo achaitwa sarudzo vakavimbisa kuti zvose zvavachange vachiita mukuita basa ravo vachange vachitevedzera mitemo yemuZimbabwe. Kuiswa kwevaongorori vesarudzo vachagara munyika kwenguva refu kwaitwa nemasangano maviri aya kunotevera kushanya kwesvondo rimwe chete kwakaita vamiriri vemasangano aya pakutanga kwemwedzi uno avo vakaburitsa mashoko ekuti Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa zvinhu zvakawanda. Zvakanzi zvigadziriswe zvinosanganisira kubuda pachena panyaya yekudhindwa kwegwaro revavhoti kumapato ari kukwikwidza musarudzo, kuburitswa kwenhau dzisina divi radzakarerekera pamwe nekubvisa mauto anonzi nemapato anopikisa ari kuvhundutsira vagari vekumaruwa, kuitira kuti sarudzo dzegore rino dzive sarudzo dzakasununguka. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa varikugara vakavimbisa kuti sarudzo dzegore dzichange dziri sarudzo dziri pachena. No media source currently available
title: Masangano eKunze Anoisa Vaongorori Vesarudzo muNyika Yose

text: Masangano akazvimirira munyika ari kushoropodza bato reZanu PF nekuapomera kwarinonzi rakaita mhosva yekupindira mune zvematongerwe enyika richiti mazhinji emasangano aya achamiswa kushanda munyika. Masangano aya anoti idzi inzira dzebato rinotonga iri dzekuda kumbunyikidza kodzero dzawo uye kuavharira kuti asaite basa rawo rekuva ziso revanhu nekurwira kodzero dzeveruzhinji. Svondo rapera vakafanobata chigaro chemurongi wemisangano muZanu PF, Va Patrick Chinamasa, vakayambira masangano akazvimirira avakati ari kuita zvematongerwe enyika nechinangwa chekuda kupidigura hurumende kuti ari kuzvigokera moto muziso. Asi vamasangano aya vanoti bato riri kutonga iri riri kuvanyepera uye rinoda kuvadzivisa kushandira munyika kuititra kuti vasataure nezvekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu pamwe nezvehuori hwavanoti huri kuitwa nehurumende. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reCommunity Tolerence and Reconciliation Development(COTRAD), VaZivanai Muzorodzi, vanoti musangano unotonga pamwe nehurumende vari kuvapomera mhosva yenhema senzira yekuda kuvhara masangano anoridza pembe kana kwaitwa huwori nekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Mamwe masangano anoti ari kuita basa rekubatsira hurumende munyaya dzebudiriro sezvo vachiuya nezvikanisiro zvinobetsera hurumende painonetseka. Mutauriri wemubatanidzwa wemasangano akazvimirira weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMaervelous Khumalo, vashoropodza VaChinamasa nebato ravo vachiti vari kuvapomera mhosva nekuti sarudzo dzaswedera munyika nekudaro havadi kufumurwa pavari kuita zvakaipa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kunaVaChinamasa sezvo vange vasingadari nharembozha yavo. Asi mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vatsigira mashoko aVaChinamsa vachiti vemasangano akazvimirira oga vari kufambisa nhema nemanyepo vachishoropodza hurumende, uye vane chinangwa chekubvisa hurumende pachigaro. Mumwe anowongorora nezvematongerwo enyika akarerekera kuZanu PF, VaCharles Munganasa vatsigirawo vabato reZanu PF vachiti masangano ari kuita zvematongerwo enyika kuti apidigure hurumende ariko uye anofanira kuvharwa sezvo ari kutyora mutemo wenyika. Asi sachigaro wesangano rinomirira masangano akazvimiria, reNantional Association of Non-Governmental Organization (NANGO), Muzvare Ronika Mumbire, vati vachazama kuonesana nebato rinotonga iri pamwe nehurumende kuitira kuti vapedze kufungirana sezvo vachishanda nehurumende munyaya dzebudiriro pasina kupinda mune zvematongerwe enyika. Mashoko akayambirwa vemasangano akazvimirira aya akasvitswawo kunhepfenyuro ye Studio 7 naVaChinamasa vachiipomera mhosva imweyo. Asi Studio 7 yakaramba izvi ichiti inoita basa rayo isina kwayakarerekera. Gurukota rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakabudawo pachena kuti zvakataurwa naVaChinamasa hazvina kubva kuhurumende. No media source currently available
title: Masangano Akazvimirira Oshoropodza mashoko eZanu PF Ekuti Vari Kupindira Mune Zvematongerwo eNyika

text: Varume vashanu vanosanganisira nhengo dzesangano reOccupy Africa Unity Square, avo vakasungwa neChitatu muHarare vakamiswa pamberi pedare nemusi weChishanu vakapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. Varume ava, avo vanosanganisira VaPatson Dzamara vanove munin’ina waVaItai Dzamara avo vakapambwa nevanofungiudzirwa kuti vasori gore rapera, VaPride Mkono, VaMakomborero Haruzivshe, pamwe naVaTatenda Mombeyarara, vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuda kuba vachishandisa chisimba pamwe nekuvhiringidza mapurisa kuita basa rawo paaida kuvasunga. Varume ava vari muchikwata chevanhu vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vari kugara pamwe nekurara muAfrica Unity Square kwemazuva gumi nematanhatu vachiratidzira kusafara kwavo nemamiriro aita zvinhu munyika pamwe nekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Gweta revashanu ava, VaObey Shava vaudza Studio 7 kuti vasungwa ava vanzi nemutongi wedare VaVakai Chikwekwe vabhadhare chiuru chemadhora pamunhu wega-wega semari yechibatiso pamhosva mbiri dzavakatarisana nadzo. “Tanga tiri ku court nhasi maclients achitongwa nemhosva mbiri. Yekutanga inonzi robbery, imwe yacho inonzi obstruction of justice or defeating the course of justice kureva kuti vakavhiringidza mapurisa kuita basa ravo,” VaShava vadaro. Asi VaShava vati mari yanzi vasungwa ava vabhadhare nedare yakawandisa zvikuru. VaShava vati pane vamwe vanhu gumi vakasungwawo zvakare nemusi weChina vachiratidzira mu Africa Unity Square, uye vari kutarisirwa kuendeswa kumatare edzimhosva neMugovera.  Zvichakadai, munyori muboka revechidiki reMDCT, VaLovemore Chinoputsa vati bato ratorawo danho rekuti ribatane nevari kuratidzira muAfrica Unity Square vachiti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vave kufanira kusiya basa. Rimwe bato rapindawo mukuratidzira uku nderePeople’s Democratic Party rinotungamirwa naVaTendai Biti. Imwe nhengo yeboka revechidiki angoti anonzi Elvis atsinhirawo zvataurwa naVaChinoputsa achiti sePDP vachange vachi ratidzirawo vari muAfrica Unity Square kudzamara VaMugabe vabva pachigaro. VaObey Sithole avo vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Informal Sector Organization, vari muchikwata chevechidiki vari kuzvidaidza kuti Tajamuka, vakurudzirawo kuti veruzhinji vauye muAfrica Unity Square vabatane navo kuratidza kusafara kwavo nehurumende yaVaMugabe. VaSithole vati kusungwa kuri kuitwa vamwe vavo hakusi kuzofa kwakavadzorera shure mumafungiro nemaitiro avo. Kuratidzira uku kuri kuitwa siku nesikati kwemazuva gumi nematanhatu zvichi nangana nemusi wa 16 Chikumi, rinove zuva re Day of The African Child. No media source currently available
title: Doctor Dzamara neVamwe Vavo Vanobvisiswa Chiuru cheMadhora seMari yeChibatiso

text: Musarudzo dzemaby elections dzakaitwa nezuro, Zau-PF yakunda mumawadhi matatu pamashanu akaitwa kuBinga Ward 20, Mberengwa ward 5 Gweru 4, 5 ne18. Zimbabwe Electoral Commission inoti bato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change kana kuti CCC rikakunda mumaward maviri. CCC yakakunda kuGweru Ward 4 ne18 Zanu-PF ikakunda kuMberengwa, Binga Ward 20, Gweru Ward 5. Asi sangano rinoongorora sarudzo rakazvimirira reZimbabwe Elections Support Network rinoti kune vanhu vakawanda vaiti havagone kunyora, vamwe vachienda kunzvimbo irsiri iyo uye kwakaitika mhirizhonga kuBinga Ward 6, mumwe munhu akarohwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF akaendeswa kuchipatara. Aimiririra NCA anotiwo zvekushambadzira zvake zvakabvarurwa. Asi munzvimbo dzakawanda mainge muine runyararo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzevematongerwo enyika VaEarnest Mudzengi vaudza Studio 7 kuti sarudzo dzemuZimbabwe hadzisati dzanyatsosvika pachidanho chekuti dzingadzi dzakachena. Sarudzo idzi dzakaitwa mushure mekunge mutungamiri weMDC-T VaDouglas Mwonzora vadzinga mubato makanzura anofungidzirwa kuti ainge achidyidzana nebato reCCC.
title: Zanu-PF Yokunda MumaWard Matatu, CCC Maviri Musarudzo Dziri Kunze neVamwe Dzichiine Mutauro

text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika kusanganisirawo magweta nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vari kushora zvikuru munyori mubazi rinoona nezvemari, VaGeorge Guvamatanga avo vakapihwa zvipo zvakawanda nemumwe muzvinabhizimisi anova zvekare chipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika VaKudakwashe Tagwirei. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti zvipo izvi zvakafanana nechiokomuhomwe pachitariswa basa raVaGuvamatanga. VaTagwirei vanonzi vakapa VaGuvamatanga mari inoita zviuru makumi mashanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US $50, 000), pamusoro pendege yekuvaendesa kuUnited Kingdom kunoona mutambo wenhabvu. Izvi zvakaitika apo VaGuvamatanga vakanga vachipemberera zuva ravo rekkuberekwa. Nyanzvi mune zvemitemo, Advocate Thabani Mpofu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mubati wehomwe yehurumende haafanirwi kutambira mari inobva kumunhu ari kupomerwa mhosva dzehuori. VaTagwirei vakatemerwa zvirango nenyika yeAmerica vachipomerwa mhosva dzehuori. No media source currently available Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZANU-PF, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vati kana mutsigiri weZanu-PF akapara mhosva, hazvirevi kuti imhosva yeZanu-PF. Doctor Mavaza vati nyaya iyi inonyadzisa zvikuru, vachiti hurumende inofanirwa kuiongorora zvakadzama. No media source currently available VaGuvamatanga vanoti havo vagara vaine mari dzavo sezvo vakashanda kuBarclays Bank kwemakore akawanda.
title: VaKudakwashe Tagwirei Vokonzerazve Mutauro neZvipo Zvavo kuVakuru muHurumende

text: Sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, rinoti kunyange hazvo mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakadoma gurukota idzva rinoona nezvehutano, hurumende nemakanzuru vane basa guru rinofanirwa kuitwa kurwisa chirwere che cholera. Munyori mukuru wesangano iri, Dr Evans Masitara, vanoti zvirwere zviri kuramba zvichidzoka zvinogona kupedzwa naizvozvo hurumende inofanira kuisa nyaya yekuwanikwa kwemvura yakachena mberi kwezvinhu zvizhinji zvinofanirwa kuitwa. “Tirikuona zvirwere zvemanyoka zvakaita se cholera ne typhoid gore negore zvirikuramba zvichitora hupenyu hwevanhu,” Dr Masitara vakaudza Studio 7. “Isu vesangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu tinofunga kuti mugore rakaita sa2018, hatingarambi tichiwana vanhu vanorasikirwa nehupenyu nekuda kwezvirere zvinodzivirika.” Sangano iri rinoshora maitiro ehurumende nemakanzuru mukugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nevanhu richiti vanofanira kuisa hupenyu nehutano hwevanhu pamberi. Hurumende mubhajeti yagara ichipa bazi rezvehutano mari shoma zvikuru. No media source currently available
title: VanaChiremba Vanoshora Hurumende neKupararira kweCholera neTyphoid

text: Mufundisi vanotungamira sangano reHashtag This Flag, Pastor Evan Mawarire, vamiswa pamberi pedare neChina vachipomerwa mhosva yokuronga zvekupidigura hurumende pamwe nekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaite zvemhirizhonga mukuratidzira kwakaitwa svondo rino. Muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, Mirirai Shumba, vaudza dare kuti VaMawarire vakapara mhosva iyi musi wa13 mwedzi uno pmawechete nemutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi pavakabuditsa vhidhiyo yakaiswa paFacebook nepaWhatsapp pamwe Twitter vachikurudzira veruzhinji kuti vagare kudzimba dzavo kwemazuva matatu. Asi rimwe remagweta aVaMawarire, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vaudza dare kuti VaMawarire vanofanira kubuditswa muhusungwa izvozvi vacvhiti hapana chikonzero chekuvharira mujeri sezvo vati mapepa ari pamberi pedare haaratidzi kuti VaMawarire vane mhosva yavakapara. Amai Mtewta vati zvakataurwa naVaMawarire muvhidhiyo iyi zvekukurudzira kuti vanhu vagare kudzimba dzavo senzira yekunyunyuta nekutadza kuri kuita hurumende kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika hainganzi imhosva vachiti VaMawarire vane kodzero pasi pebumbiro remitemo yenyika yekutaura zvavanoda. Vatiwo kukurudzira kwakaita VaMawarire kuti hurumende ibvise ma bond notes hainganzi imhosva zvakare vachiti matare anogona kuswera mazuva ose achitonga munhu wese munyika sezvo zviri izvo zviri kudiwa nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. Muchuchisi ati hurumende ichapa mhinduro yayo neChishanu pane zvataurwa naAmai Mtetwa zvichireva kuti VaMawarire vacharara muhusungwa. VaMawaire vaudza Studio7 vasati vapinda mudare kuti zviri kuitwa nehurumende izvi kuvashungurudza kuri pachena. VaMawarire ndeumwe wevanhu vakawanda vamiswa pamberi pematare vari kupomerwa nyaya dzakasiyana-siyana dzine chekuita nekuratidzira kwakaitika munyika yose kubva neMuvhuro. Vagari vekuEpworth makumi matanhatu nemumwe vanzi nedare vadzoke neChishanu kudare kuzonzwa mutongo wavo pachikumbiro chekuti vatongwe vachibva kudzimba dzavo uye kutanga kwemhosva dzavari kupomerwa dzekuita mhirizhonga, kupisa dzimotokari pamwe nekupwanya kamba yemapurisa. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti mutungamiri weboka revechidiki mubato ravo, VaHappymore Chidziva, vanga vachimhanyiswa nevari kufungidzirwa kuti vasori mumsusha weWaterfalls. Studio7 haina kuziva kuti chii chazoitika kuna VaChidziva sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga isiri kupinda. Muaturiri wemapurisa, Senior Assitant Commissioner Charity Charamba, vanoti pane vanhu vanodarika mazana matanhatu vakasungwa munyika yose maererano nekuratidzira kwakaita munyika kubva musi weMuvhuro. Vanhu ava vanosanganisira murongi wemisangano muMDC, VaAmos Chibaya. Amai Charamba vati mapurisa achiri kutambira mashoko ekusungwa kwevamwe kubva kunzvimbo dzakasiyanasiyana munyika kuti agokwanisa kuzopa huwandu hwevanhu vasungwa hwakati tsvikiti. Mamwe mashoko atiri kutambira anoti sachigaro wevechidiki muZanu PF mupurovhinzi yeHarare, VaGodwin Gomwe, varohwa nemasoja mumusha weBudiriro muno muHarare mushure memhirizhonga yavanonzi vaita pane chimwe chitoro chiri muBudiriro makare. Zvinonzi VaGomwe vazoendeswa kumapurisa ekuBudiriro kwakare asi Amai Charamba vati vanga vasati vatambira mashoko aya. No media source currently available
title: Vachuchusi Vanoti VaMawarire Vaida Kupidigura Hurumende yaVaMnangagwa

text: America yave nemutungamiri wenyika mutsva zvichitevera kutoreswa mhiko kwaVaJoe Biden neChitatu masikati. Izvi zvinotevera kukunda kwavakaita vanga vari mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, musarudzo dzakaitwa muna Mbudzi gore rapera. VaBiden vakasimuka kubva kumba kwavo kudunhu reDelaware neChipiri vachiuuya kuWashington DC vachiti kusarudzwa kwavo kwapinda munhoroondo yenyika. VaBiden vatoreswa mhiko semutungamiri wechimakumi mana nematanhatu kana kuti 46th President. Vachange kvachitungamira nyika kwemakore mana anotevera. Asi kekutanga mumakore akawanda, hapana kunyatsotambidzanwa masimba sezvo VaTrump vari kuramba kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo. Munhoroondo yeAmerica yekugamuchidzana masimba, zvakagumisira kuitwa muna 1869 nevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaAndrew Johnson kuramba kuenda panotoreswa mhiko vainge vasarudzwa kutungamira nyika VaUlysses S. Grant. Pazvakaitika muna 1921 zvakakonzerwa nehurwere hwaVaWoodrow Wilson vakakundikana kuona VaWarren G. Harding vachitoreswa mhiko semutungamiri wenyika. Vachipa pfungwa dzavo pakusavapo kwaVaTrump, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaEsau Mavindidze, vati zviri kuitwa naVaTrump zvinongoratidza hunhu hwavo hwekusada kuita zvinotarisirwa kuvatungamiri venyika yeAmerica. Vanhu vashoma vaungana padare reparamende reCapitol Hill pakutoreswa mhiko kwaVaBiden sezvo pari kutyirwa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vakasarudzwa kuve mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Kamala Harris, vatoreswawo mhiko vachiva mudzimai wekutanga kuva nechigaro ichi. Kunyange VaTrump vanga vasiri pakugadzwa kwaVaBiden, mutevedzeri wavo, VaMike Pence, vanga varipo nedzimwe nhengo dzedare reparamende dzeRepublican Party. Vamwe vaimbova vatungamiri venyika yeAmerica vanoti VaGeorge Bush, VaBill Clinton, naVaBarack Obama, vanga varipo pakugadzwa kwaVaBiden. Muimbi ane mukurumbira, Lady Gaga, ndiye aimba national anthem uye vamwe vari kuimba ndiJennifer Lopez na Garth Brooks. Mushure mekutora mhiko, VaBiden vapa mashoko kunyika nezvavari kutarisira kuita semutungamiri. Mangwanani anhasi VaBiden nevakuru vebato ravo reDemocratic Party nerinopikisa reRepublican Party vaenda kukereke yeSt Johns Episcopal Church vasati vaenda kuCapitol Hill. Asi VaBiden vakatarisana nemutoro mukuru nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mana muAmerica. VaChitaura muWashintgon DC neChipiri manheru, VaBiden vakatenda kuti chirwere ichi chaunza kusuwa. VaTrump nezuro vakatura kunyika mashoko avo ekuoneka asi havana kudoma VaBiden nezita uye havana kutambira kuti ndivo vakakonzera mhirizhinga yakaitwa nevatsigiri paCapitol Hill iyo vari kunzi vakapesvedzera. VaTrump vakataurawo nezvavanoti vakakwanisa kuita mumakore mana avaitungamira zvinosanganisira kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika, kusimbisa miganhu yenyika, kuona kuti nhomba yeCovid-19 yagadzirwa nechimbi chimbi nezvimwe. VaTrump vasimuka mangwanani vakananga kuFlorida uko vanenge vave kunogara. Asi vasati vasimuka vaonekana nevatsigiri vavo paAndrews Airforce Base muMaryland vakavimbisa kuti vachadzoka. Vachipa pfungwa dzavo nezvemashoko aya, vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaPromise Sande, avo vari kuSouth Carolina muno muAmerica, vati VaTrump avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga paCapitol Hill vanogona kurambidzwa kuita zvematongerwo enyika. Vachishandisawo masimba avo ehutungamiri wenyika, VaTrump vakaregerera vanhu zana nemakumi mana nevatatu vanosanganisira chipangamazano chavo VaSteve Bannon, vaimbi Li Wayne naKodak Black asi havana kuzviregerera ivo nemhuri yavo sezvaifungidzirwa nevamwe. Munhoroondo yeAmerica panyaya dzekuona mafungiro evanhu pahutungamiri kana kuti mapolls, VaTrump ndivo chete mutungamiri asina kukwanisa kusvika pakufarirwa nevanhu vanodarika zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 50%. Mushure mekutora mhiko, VaBiden vari kutarisirwa kubvisa mimwe mitemo yakadzikwa naVaTrump vachishandisa masimba avo semutungamiri wenyika kusanganisira munyaya dzekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, mamiriro ekunze uye kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. No media source currently available
title: VaBiden Vanopinda paNyanga Zviri paMutemo

text: Vamwe vakuru vemabhizimisi vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti ivabatsire nemari sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 chiri kupa kuti vasashande nemazvo. Gore rapera mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa negurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakati hurumende yainge yaisa parutivi mari inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemasere kana kuti 18 billion yemunyika kubatsira vemaIndustry. Asi vakawanda vemaindustry vanoti havana kana kobiri ravakaona. Mutungamiri wesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe Industries Doctor Israel Murefu vati pari kudiwa mari sezvo zvigadzirwa zvaderera uye kuti vashandi vasarasikirwe nemabasa. Sachigaro weAfrica CEO Roundtable VaOswell Binha vatsinhirawo mashoko aya vachiti mari ine mutero uri pasi inodiwa kuti mabhizimisi akwanise kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika.
