Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paDurban University of Technology Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti vemabhizimis vemunyika havazokwanise kukwikwidza nevekunze kana vasina rubatsiro kubva kuhurumende. vati nyika dzakawanda pasi rino dziri kubatsira vemabhizimisi vadzo munguva ino yekurwisa denda reCovid-19. Asi gurukota rezvemaIndustry Doctor Sekai Nzenza vati ongororo yavakaita neConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries yakaratidza kuti maindustry akatosimukira munguva yeCovid-19 vachiti izvi zvakabatsirwawo nemimwe mitemo yehurumende. Kunyange hazvo gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vakati vari kutarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika hukure nezvikamu zvinodarika zvinomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 7,4%, sangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce razivisa kuti hupfumi huchatodududza kumashure huchienda pazvikamu zviri pasi pegumi kana kuti -10% mugore rino. No media source currently available
title: VeMabhizimisi Vokurudzira Hurumende Kuti Iumbe Homwe yeKuvabatsira Munguva yeCovid-19

text: Botswana nemusi weMuvhuro yakatumira chikwata chemasoja mazana maviri ane makumi mapfumbamwe nematanhatu ayo achange achishanda ari pasi pesangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica muMozambique reSouthern African Development Community (SADC) Mission. Mauto enyika gumi nenhatu dzemuAfrica ari kutarisirwa kuenda kudunhu reCabo Delgado, kunobatsira Mozambique kurwisa chikwata chinopfurikidza mwero cheAnsar-Al-Sunna icho chinodyidzana neIslamic State kana kuti ISIS. Vachitaura nemasoja aya panhandare yendege yeSir Seretse Khama International Airport vave kuda kusimuka kuenda kuMozambique mangwanani eMuvhuro, mutungamiriri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi vati vari kutumira mauto aya sasachigaro webazi rinoona nezverunyararo reSADC Organ on Politics, Defense and Security Cooperation nechinangwa chekuda kuunza kugadzikana mudunhu. VaMasisi vanotiwo zvikwanisiro zvose zvinodiwa kuti zvikwata zvemasoja zvichange zvichishandira muMozambique pasi peSADC Standby Force zvichabva kunhengo dzinoumba gungano iri. Mauto eBotswana aya ari kutarisirwa kunoshanda nemamwe chiuru chimwe chete ekuRwanda ayo akapinda muMozambique masvondo maviri apfuura. Rwanda haisi muSADC asi inoti ndisahwira mukuru weMozambique. Zimbabwe iyo isiri kunyatsobuda pachena nehurongwahwayo inonzi nebepanhau reNewshawks richiti yakatotumira mauto mashoma ane hunyanzvi hwepamusoro soro muna Kurume. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe VaNyasha Mugwagwa vaishanda kuPalma vakatourayiwa nevanopfurikidza mwero ava. Studio 7 haina kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri vati vange vakabatikana sezvo vange vari mumusangano ndookumbira kuti tivatumire mibvunzo iyo yavasina kukwanisa kupindura kusvika taenda pamhepo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekudzivirirwa kwenyika uye vari mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvehondo paUniversity of Botswana, VaDumezweni Ncube vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyika dzatumira mauto adzo kuMozambique kuitira kuti hondo iyi isarambe ichipararira mudunhu. Zvichakadaro, mutungamiriri weMozambique, VaFilipe Nyusi vakazivisa nemusi weSvondo kuti vanopfurikidza mwero mudunu reCabo Delgado vava kudududza. Asi vamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vanoti kuwanda kwemauto ari kuenda kunobatsira kuMozambique kungangoita kuti vanopfurikidza mwero ava vatange kurwisa dzimwe nyika dziri mudunhu reSADC. Gungano reSADC riri kutarisirwa kutumira mauto zviuru zvitatu kubva kunyika dzinosanganisira Zimbabwe, Botswana, Angola, Tanzania, South Africa nedzimwewo kunorwisana nevanopfurikidza mwero ava. Vanhu zviuru zvitatu vanonzi vafa muhondo iyi uye vamwe zviuru mazana masere 800, 000 kusanganisira vana vadiki vanonzi vamanikidzwa kuenda muhupoteri. No media source currently available
title: Botswana Yotumira Mauto kuMozambique Kunorwisa Vanopfurikidza Mwero

text: Pane kupesana kukuru pakati pemakambani anogadzira mafuta, vamwe vemaindasitiri uye hurumende pamusoro pezviri kuitika panyaya yemafuta zvichitevera chipatapa chakaitika mukupera kwesvondo apo veruzhinji vakatsvaira zvinhu zvaive muzvitoro pachityirwa kuti zvinhu zvichashaikwa munyika. Kupesana uku kwabuda pakati peConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, CZI,pamwe nesangano re Oil Expressers Association of Zimbabwe, masangano maviri aya achipa muonero wakasiyana. Mukuru wesangano revemaindasitiri, reCZI,VaSifelani Jabangwe, vati maindasitiri, zvikurusei anogadzira mafuta, ane mafuta akawanda uye mafuta akapera zvichitevera kuvhunduka kwakaita vanhu nekuda kwemashoko aibuda paSocial Media. Vatiwo vakatoshamiswa nekukwidza kwakaitwa mutengo uye vati vano gadzira zvinhu havana kukwidza mitengo. Asi sangano re Oil Expressers Association of Zimbabwe ratiwo ichokwadi kuti hapana mafuta anokwanira nyika nepamusana pekuti nhengo dzaro, idzo dzinoda mamiriyoni mashanu emadhora pasvondo kuitira kuti dzigadzire mafuta, dziri kuwana mamiriyoni maviri chete pasvondo izvo zviri kudzitadzisa kugadzira mafuta anokwanira nyika. Mutungamiriri werimwe sangano rinomirira vane zvitoro, reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vati nyaya yepamadandemutande ndiyo yakakonzeresa kuti vanhu vatenge zvinhu zvakawanda kudarika zvavanotenga mazuva ese. Vatiwo vanhu havafaniri kuterera zvese zvinobuda pamadandemutande uye vari kukonzeresa nyonga nyonga vanofanira kusungwa. Asi mumashoko aro kune veruzhinji, sangano reOil Expressers Association rati rinoda mari inoita makumi maviri emamiriyoni pamwedzi kuitira kuti rigadzire mafuta. Sangano iri rati pari zvino riri riri kukwanisa kugadzira mafuta anosvika zvikamu makumi mana nezvina kubva muzana, zvichirevera kuti pane zvikamu makumi mashanu nezvitanhatu kubva muzana zvemafuta zvisiri kugadzirwa. Sangano iri rati izvi zviri kukonzerwa nemari yekunze iyo isiri kuwanikwa nyore. Mutengo yezvinhu zvakaita semafuta yakakwira zvakapetwa kaviri kana kudarika kubvira musi weChishanu kusvika nezuro uye zvakatengwa zvikapera kunyange zvainge zvave kudhura zvakanyanya. Vati Mutashu vati vakaita musangano nemukuru webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, neMugovera pamwe neveCZI uye vavimbiswa kuti maindasitiri ari kutsigirwa nemari uye hapana chinofanira kushaikwa. Asi izvi zvinopesana nesangano re Oil Expressers Association of Zimbabwe iro rinoti dambudziko riripo rinogona kupera kana bhanga guru renyika rikawedzera mari inopihwa makambani anogadzira mafuta, sezvo pachidiwa mari yekunze mukutenga zvimwe zvinhu zvinodiwa mukugadzira mafuta. VaMangudya vakaburitsawo mashoko ekuti nyaya yekuti zvinhu zvichashaikwa ndeyemanyepo uye veruzhinji havafaniri kutetera mashoko akadai sezvo akanangana nekukonzera kuti zvinhu zvisagadzikane munyika. Asi mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaJonstone Phiri, vati vanotyira kuti zvinhu zvichashata sezvakamboitika muna 2008 saka vanofanira kugara vakagadzirira. Kunyange hazvo VaMutashu vati dambudziko range rakanyanya muHarare, mumadhorobha mazhinji munyika ange aine dambudziko rimwero. Amai Girlie Sibanda, avo vanogara kuGweru, vanoti muzvitoro hamuchina zvinhu zvese zvinodiwa zuva nezuva. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi uye vakamboshanda mubazi rezvemari, VaMasimba Manyanya, vati zvese zvave kuitika zvinoratidza kuti hupfumi hwenyika hauna kumira zvakanaka. Kanawo nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakaita semumiriri weHarare South muNational Assembly, VaShadreck Mashayamombe, havasi kufara nezviri kuitika uye neMugovera vakataura pamusangano wavakaita vachiti VaMangudya vanofanira kusiya basa. Asi vamwe vakaita semumiriri weNorton, VaTemba Mliswa, vanoti VaMangudya handivo dambudziko asi kuti ibato reZanu PF. Nhengo yekomiti yekomiti yaparamende inoona nezvehupfumi nebhajeti, zvakare vari munyori weanoona nezvehupfmui mubato guru rinokipisa reMDC-T, Doctor Tapiwa Mashakada, vati dambudziko guru riri munyika nderekushaikwa kwemari yekunze. VaMashakada vati nyanzvi dzakatomboedza kubatsira kumutsiridza hupfumi asi izvi zvakaramba uye chave kudiwa chete kushandura hurumende. No media source currently available
title: Masangano Opesana Pamusoro peHonzeri yeChipatapata kuZvitoro

text: Bato reCitizens Coalition for change riri kupomera Zanu-PF mhosva yekuita mhirizhonga kuMatobo kuMatabeleland South nhasi. Zvinonzi vanhu vakawanda kusanganisira nhengo yeparamende inomiririra Nkulumane VaUcaca Phulu veCCC vakuvara mumhirizhonga iyi. Vatsigiri veCCC vange vachitsvaga rutsigiro muWard 2 muchaitwa sarudzo dzemaby elections. Mamwe madzimai anonzi akumurwa hembe motokari dzikatemwa nematombo. Vamwe vanhu vanonzi havasi kuzivikanwa kuti vari kupi. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZanu-PF sezvo mutauriri webato iri VaChris Mutsvangwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vange vachangopinda munyika kubva kuMozambique vakati tibate mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaTafadzwa Mugwadi avo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. VaMugwadi vaudza Studio 7 kuti CCC ndiyo yaendesa vanhu vasiri vemunzvimbo iyi kunoita mhirizhonga kuMatobo. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weCCC VaOstallos Siziba varamba mashoko aya vachiti Zanu-PF ndiyo yatounza vanhu kubva kune mamwe matunhu kunoita mhirizhonga. Sarudzo idzi dziriko musi wa 22 Gumiguru. Vari kukwikwidzana ndiVaLiberty Nyirongo veZAPU, VaFrederick Siwela of Zanu-PF VaSindiso Ngwenya veCCC. No media source currently available
title: Zanu-PF Yopomerwa Mhosva yeKurova Vatsigiri veCCC kuMatobo

text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanonzi vakurudzira vanoita zvemigodhi kuti vatsvage nzira dzekuchera nadzo zvicherwa dzakarongeka dzisingakanganisi nharaunda dzavanenge vachishandira. Nhepfenyuro yeZBC inoti VaMnangagwa vataura mahoko aya kumusangano wemazuva matatu we2022 Chamber of Mines of Zimbabwe wepagore wapetwa kuVictoria Falls. asi mukuru wesangano rinorwira kuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa, reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti mashoko emutungamiri wenyika aya akanakana chose asi ivo semutungamiri vanofanirwa kutora matanho anobatika, anoita kuti zvavanenge vataura zvibatike. VaMaguwu vanoti zvakakoshawo zvikuru kuti vanochera zvicherwa vange vachionekwa kuti vasiya nzvimbo dzavanenge vashandira dzakagadziridzwa, vachiti izviri kukundikana kuitwa nekuda kwekuti vazihinji vari kuchera migodhi makorokoza asineyi nekutevera mitemo inosungira kuti nzvimbo dzichengetedzwe. No media source currently available
title: Musangano weZvemigodhi Unopetwa kuVictoria Falls Mutungamiri weNyika VaMnangagwa vachikurudzira Kucherwa kweZvicherwa Kwakarongeka

text:
Mutevedzeri wameya weguta reChegutu VaEdward Dzeka vanoti vakapambwa nevanofungidzira kuti masoja nevamwe vanhu vatatu apo vaibva kuKadoma vachienda kuChegutu nezuro manheru. VaDzeka vanoti vakakwira motokari yainge iine musoja avo vakavabvunza kuti sei vachitsigira bato raVaNelson Chamisa vakaratidza kuti havana kugutswa nemhinduro yavo

Vanoti vanhu ava vakaramba kuvaburutsa muChegutu vakatanga kuvarova nezvibhakera nemambama.

Vanotiwo mumwe weavanoti mauto aya akatanga kuvabata nhengo dzavo dzechirume.

Vanoti vakaitwa nhapwa kwemaawa maviri ndokusiiwa vakandwa mumugwagwa umo vakazonhongwa nemunhu ayipfuurawo zvake.

VaDzeka vanoti vaenda kunomhan’ara kumapurisa emuChegutu uye vakanorapwa kuchipatara

Mutauriri weMDC-T mudunhu reMashonaland West VaBlessing Mandava vashoropodza zvikuru chitiko ichi vachiti zvinoratidza kuti hurumende iripo ndeyechiuto uye chibvumirano chakanyorerwanwa pasi chekuve nesarudzo isina mhirizhonga hachishande. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kudivi remapurisa sezvo mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available
title: Mutevedzeri waMeya veChegutu Anoti Akapambwa neVaanofungidzira kuti Masoja

text: Hurumende yeSouth Africa yaparura chirongwa chitsva chekubatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kugara munyika iyi kuti zviwane magwaro anozvibvumidza kugara nekushanda zviri pamutemo. Gurukota rezvemukati meSouth Africa, Amai Hlengiwe Mkhize, vazivisa kuti chirongwa cheZimbabwe Special Permit, icho chaive nemakore matatu, chiri kupetwa musi wa21 Zvita gore rino, chichatsiviwa nechimwe chitsva chinonzi Zimbabwe Exemption Permit. Hurongwa hwekunyorera magwaro matsva aya hunonzi huri kutanga musi wa 15 Gunyana huchipera musi wa30 Mbudzi gore rino, uye magwaro aya anenge achitanga kushanda kutanga kwaNdira 2018 kwemakore mana anotevera. Mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau, Amai Mkhize vati zvirongwa zvekubatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe izvi zviri kubatsira zvikuru mukugadzikana kwemukati menyika, uye kufambiswa kwakanaka kwemabasa ekutarisa vauyi. Vatiwo zvinobatsira nyika yavo munyaya dzekuumba upfumi hwenyika sezvo zvichikwezva vanhu vekunze vane hunyanzvi, avo vanozodzidzisawo zvizvarwa zvenyika yavo. Vati vachakwanisa kutambirwa muchirongwa cheZimbabwe Exemption Permit ichi vanhu vanoda kusvika mazana maviri ezviuru vanga vaine magwaro eZPS chete, uye vanotarisirwa kubhadhara mari inoita chiuru chemarhanzi. Mukuru weZimbabwe Exiles Forum, Va Gabriel Shumba, vanoti vafara zvikuru nezvaitwa nehurumende yeSouth Africa. No media source currently available
title: South Africa Inowedzera Makore Mana Chirongwa cheZimbabwe Exemption Permit

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, inofanirwa kuita sarudzo dzakachena kuitira kuti veruzhinji vakoshese kuvhota panguva dzesarudzo. Mashoko aya akabuda pamusangano wekuzeya sarudzo wakaitirwa muHarare neChina. Vachitaura pamusangano wakarongwa nesangano rakazvimiririra reZimbabwe Election Support Network neChina, muzvinabhizimusi huye vari mufundisi, DoctorShingi Munyeza, vakati hurumende inofanirwa kusunungura vanhu kwete kuramba vari nhapwa dzehurumende kuitira kuti vanyatsovhotera vanhu vavanoda. VaMunyeza vakati vazhinji kunyanya kumamisha vanovhotera bato reZanu PF nekuda kwekuti vane zvavanowaniswa nehurumende pachena zvakaita sembeu, zvekudya, nezvimwewo vakati vane mafungiro ekuti vanhu vanozovhotera bato iri kuti vasazosarudzwe mumisha yavanogara vachisiiwa panowanikwa zvemahara izvi. VaMunyeza vakatiwo bato reMovement for Democratic Change rinofanirwa kubuda pachena kuti zvii zvichaitika nekurwara kwemutungamiri wavo, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, sezvo zvoita kuti vamwe vavhoti varase tariro yekunonyoresa kunovhota vachiti pane vari kutarisira kukwikwidza semutungamirir wenyika hapana wavanoona kuti angabudise Zimbabwe mumatope mairi Vari munezvematongerwo enyika, Amai Priscilla Misihairambwi Mushonga, vakati vane tarisiro yekuti vanhu vachavhota gore rinouya vakawanda vachifarira kuchinja kwakaita hurumende. Amai Misihairambwi Mushonga vakatiwo havasisina tarisiro yekuti mutemo ine chekuita nesarudzo ichavandudzwa sezviri kutarisirwa nemapato anopikisa. Amai Mushonga vakati chongodiwa pari zvino kuti vanhu vasarohwe pamwe nekuti vanhu vesevapiwe mukana wekunyoresa nekuzovhota. Gweta uye vari murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaBrian Kagoro, vakatiwo vane chivimbo chekuti vana veZimbabwe vakabatana nemazvo vanomisa vechiuto kuti vapindire munyaya dzesarudzo vachishandisa bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Sangano reZesn rinoti richange richiita misangano yekukurukura nyaya dzine chekuita nesarudzo kamwe chete pamwedzi kuitira kuti vanhu vakwanise kukurukura nezvesarudzo dziri kutarisirwa gore rino. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Youdzwa Kuita Sarudzo Dzisina Mutauro

text: Komisheni inopinza vatongi mabasa munyika yeJudicial Service Commission, inonzi nemusiweChina yakasvitsa kudare repamusorosoro reSupreme Court magwaro ayo ekupikisa mutongo wakaturwa nedare reHigh Court musi wa 15 mwedzi uno. Mutongo uyu waimisa kuwedzerwa kwenguva yekushanda kwemukuru wevatongi vematare, Chief Justice Luke Malaba, avo vakasvitsa makore makumi manomwe ekurekwa svondo mbiri dzapfuura. Danho ratorwa neJSC iri rinotevera kuburitswa kwegwaro rizere remutongo wakaturwa nevatongi vedare repamusoro vanoti Justice Happias Zhou, Justice Edith Mushore naJustice Jester Charewa, avo vakanzwa nyaya yekupikiswa kwenguva yekugara pabasa kwaVaMalaba.
title: Judicial Services Commission Inopikisa Mutongo weHigh Court paNyaya yaVaMalaba

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe zvave kukurudzira kuti kuumbwe kwechikwata chevanhu vanofanobata matomhu vachitungamirira nyika kusvika kwaitwa sarudzo kana kuti National Transitional Authority. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe izvi, izvo zvinozviti Platform for Concerned Citizens zvakaudza vatori venhau muHarare nemusi weChitatu kuti Zimbabwe yakatarisana nematambudziko makukutu uye akasagadziriswa nyika inogona kutodzika zvakanyanya kuenda kumawere pamwe nekuva nehondo. Zvizvarwa izvi zvinoti sarudzo kana hurumende yemubatanidzwa handizvo zvingagadzirise nyika. Vana veZimbabwe ava vanotiwo kunyangwe VaMugabe vakataura avachasiira matomu pari zvino, hazvigoni kugadzirisa nyika iyo ine hupfumi hwawondomoka, uye zvizvarwa zvakawanda zvisiri kugutsikana nehurumende yavo. Doctor Ibbo Mandaza inhengo yePlatform for Concerned Citizens. Vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, vedzisvondo, masangano akazvimirira pamwe nevemapato ezvematongerwo enyika vanofanirwa kugara pasi vosarudza vanhu vangabudise Zimbabwe mumatope mairi kusati kwaiitwa sarudzo. Imwe nhengo yePCC VaBriggs Bomba vatiwo vanhu vanofanira kufanobata matomu ava vanofanirwa kuve vasina bato ravakarerekera, vakati izvi zvinobatsira kuti kuitwe sarudzo dzejekerere dzisina bopoto izvo zvinozosimudzira nyika. Amai Tsitsi Dangarembwa vanova munyori ane mukurumbira munyika vaudza Studio 7 kuti National Transitional Authority inogona kugadzirisa matambudziko emunyika sezvo zviri pachena kuti vezvematongerwo enyika vakundikana. Mune imwewo nyaya vakapedza zvidzidzo zvepamusorosoro vasina mabasa vati vari kuzoratidzira musi wa3 Nyamavhuvhu kunyunyuta kwavo pamusana pekushaikwa kwemabasa pamwe nekuondomoka kwehupfumi. VaSamuel Meso avo vati vakadzidzira zve Industrial and Manufacturing Engineering, vati vanoda kuonana naVaMugabe kuti vavabatsire nemazano ekuti nyika ingagadziriswe sei. Vakurudzira mukuru wenyika kuti ateerere vanhu vari kuchema. Muzvare Michelle Mugoronji vakadzidzira Chemical and Process Systems Engineering uye vati kunyangwe zvavo vachiziva kuti hurumende yaVaMugabe inodashura vazhinji vanoratidzira, vati nhamo ndiyo yovosunda kuratidzira. VaHoward Madya, mumwe wavanamuzvinafundo vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakatotumira tsamba kuna VaMugabe kuti vazosangana nevasina mabasa ava kuitira kuti vanzwe zvichemo zvavo, vakati vaita zvetsamba nenyaya yekutya kushungurudzwa vasati varatidzira. Vasina mabasa ava vati vachange vachiratidzira pamwechete nevabereki vavo vakavaendesa kuchikoro vachitarisira kuzochengetwawo. Mapoka akasiyana siyana muZimbabwe ange achi ratidzira uye ruzhinji rwuri kutsutsumwa nehutongi hwehurumende yaVaMugabe. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vokurudzira Kuumbwa kweKomiti Inenge Yakafanobata Matomu muNyika

text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nekunyimwa rezinesi rekutepfenyura kwenhepfenyuro yeKWESE TV, iyo iri pasi pamuzvinabhizimusi ane mukurumbira munyika, VaStrive Masiyiwa. VaMasiyiwa, avo vanove zvakare muridzi wekambani yenharembozha yeEconet, vakanyimwa mvumo neBroadcasting Authority of Zimbabwe, BAZ, iyo isina kuburitsa zvikonzero zvekutora kwayo danho iri. Mugwaro ravaburitsa, munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo vanoti kurambidzwa kutepfenyura kweKWESE TV chiratidzo chiri pachena chekuti hurumende haidi kuti vana veZimbabwe vawane mukana wekunzwawo pamwe nekuona zvimwe zvakasiyana nezvinotepfenyurwa nenhepfenyuro dzehurumende dzakaita seZBC. KWESE TV yakapiwa marezinesi ekushandira munyika dzakawanda muAfrica, dzinodarika gumi dzinosanganisira Zambia, Botswana, South Africa, Rwanda, neKenya, asi ichi nyimwa kutepfenyura kumusha kwaVaMasiyiwa, kunove kuZimbabwe, VaMoyo vanoti zvinokatyamadza kuti BAZ haisi kutaura zvikonzero zviri kuita kuti inyime VaMasiyiwa rezinesi, vachiti asi vanofunga kuti zvine chekuita nekumbonyimwa zvakare kwavakaita rezinesi reEconet. "Makore makumi matatu nemanomwe nyika yawana kuzvitonga kuzere, hurumende inofanirwa kunge yasunungura masaisai ichibvumidzawo vamwe vakazvimirira kupindawo mudariro. Nguva yakwana yekuti vana veZimbabwe vachipiwa mikana yekusarudza zvavanoda kuona kana kunzwa sezvonitikawo kune dzimwe nyika," VaMoyo vanodaro. Ruzhinji rwenyika rwuri kuona sekunge hurumende yarasikirwa nemukana mukuru kwazvo wekuti vana veZimbabwe vaisiri kukwanisa kuwanira mabasa vapindewo pamabasa aizounzwa neKWESE TV. No media source currently available
title: Sangano reZCTU Roshushikana neKunyimwa Rezinesi Kwakaitwa KWESE TV

text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakumbira paramende kuti itambire hurongwa hwavo hwemashandisirwo emari yehurumende gore rinouya hwemabhiriyoni mana emadhora. VaChinamasa vati hupfumi hwenyika hunotarisirwa kukura nezvikamu zviviri nechidimbu kubva muzana. VaChinamasa vati vari kukumbira paramende kuti mari zhinji yehurumende, iyo inodarika zvikamu makumi masere kubva muzana zvebhajeti rese, idzikiswe. No media source currently available VaChinamasa vati hurumende yakatoita chisungo chekuona kuti mari iyi yaderera uye ichatora matanho akaita sekumisa vamwe vashandi basa pamwe nezvimwe izvo zvichaita kuti hurumende ikwanise kuderedza mari yemihoro nemamiriyoni gumi nemana nechidimbu mwedzi wega wega. Vati nekuda kwekuti mari yakawanda iri kuenda kumihoro, hurumende inosara isina mari yezvimwe zvirongwa. VaChinamasa vati vanoda kuti mapazi edzidzo maviri awane mari yakawanda kudarika mamwe ese. VaChinamasa vati hurumende inokoshesa dzidzo nekudaro vari kuda kupa mapazi aya mamiriyoni mazana masere emadhora. Bazi rinoona nezvemukati menyika, ndiro rimwe riri panzvimbo yechitatu uye ravari kuda kuti ripihwe 395 million dollars kozotiwo bazi rehutano ndiro rimwewo richapihwa mari yakawanda kudarika mamwe mapazi ese. Zvichakadai, VaChinamasa vati huwandu hwezvinhu zvinotengeswa nenyika kunze huchawedzera gore rinouya kusvika pa$3.7 billion. Asi vati hunenge huri pasi pezvinhu zvinopinzwa munyika izvo zvichange zviri pa$6.3billion. VaChinamasa vatiwo hurumende iri kutora matanho akawanda ekusimudzira hupfumi zvikuru sei nyaya dzekurima, nyaya dzekuzvicherwa zvegoridhe nemangoda nezvimwe. Vati hurumende iri kutsigira varimi vemumaruwa asi vakati varimi vemumapurazi vachawana rutsigiro kubva kumabhanga. Asi vati senzira yekutsigira kurimwa kwedonje, vati varimi vanofanirwa kupihwa zvekurimisa pachena kwemakore matatu anotevera. Vatiwo nyika nemasangano ekunze vari kubatsira nyika nemamiriyoni anodarika zana munyaya dzekurima pamwe nehutano. VaChinamasa vajekesawo nyaya yekambani yeZiscosteel vachiti hurumende ichatora zvikwereti zvekambani iyi uye ichamisa vashandi vese vekambani nekuvapa mihoro yemwedzi mitatu kuti ikwanise kutsvaga vekunze vangade kutenga kana kuita mubatanidzwa nekambani iyi. Izvi zvinoburitsa pachena kuti chibvumirano change chaitwa nehurumende nekambani yekuIndia yeEssar hachina kubudirira. VaChinamasa vatiwo apo hurumende iri kuedza kukwezva zvemabhizimisi vekunze, ichajekesa zvekare mutemo wekupa masimba ehupfumi kuvatema gore rino risati rapera. Paramende ichazeya bhajeti raVaChinamasa kuitira kuti iritambire kana kusaritambira sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika. Zvichakadaro, dzimwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi dzinoti bhajeti regore rinouya rakumbirwa negurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, kuparamende kuti itambire, harina zvikuru zvamboshanduka kubva kubhajeti regore rino, iro rakaona mari yakawandisa yaipinda muhomwe yehurumende ichienda kunobhadhara vashandi. Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo hadzitenderani naVaChinamasa pamashoko avo ekuti hupfumi hwenyika hunotarisirwa kukura nezvikamu zviviri nechidimbu kubva muzana. Imwe yenyanzvi idzi, VaProsper chitambara, avo vanoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe vanoti nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika vanoona hupfumi huchikura nechikamu chimwechete kubva muzana. Imwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi VaMasimba Kuchera vanotiwo hurongwa hwekuti hurumende itore chikwereti chekambani yedonje, yeCOTCO hahuna nemusoro wese sezvo izvi zvichiremedza vana veZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: VaChinamasa Vokurudzira Paramende Kutambira Bhajeti re$4B ra2016

text: Vanhu vasere vakaurayiwa vamwe gumi nevatatu vakakuvara mushure mekunge mumwe murume anofungidzirwa kuti anotsigira vanopfurikidza mwero veIslamic State, kana kuti ISIS, avadhuma nemotokari muguta reNew York. Anofungidzirwa kuti anopfurikidza mwero uyu, Sayfullo Saipov ane makore makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe ari mugari wemuAmerica akabva kunyika yeUzbekistan. Anonzi akatyaira motokari yake mumugwagwa unofamba nemabhasikoro. Pane vanhu vakashaya pane vashanyi vashanu kubva kuArgentina, mumwe wekuBelgium uye vaviri vemuAmerica. Saipov akazopfurwa mudumbu nemumwe mupurisa uye anonzi ari kupa humbowo kumapurisa pari zvino. Mapurisa anoti akawana tsamba mumotokari make iyo akanyora achiti anotsigira ISIS. Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump vati vanoda kuferefeta zvakasimba vanhu vanouya kuzogara muAmerica vachibva kune dzimwe nyika. Hapana anoziva kuti pane vakakuvara pane chizvarwa cheZimbabwe here sezvo mapurisa achiri kuferefeta nyaya iyi. No media source currently available
title: America Yoferefeta Kuurayiwa kweVanhu Vasere muNew York neAnopfurikidzwa Mwero Achitsigira ISIS

text:
Sangano rakazvimiririra richiongorora nyaya dzezvekutepenyurwa nekunyorwa kwenhau reMedia Monitors Zimbabwe kana kuti MMZ rinoti vatori venhau vari kukundikana kupa mukana wakaenzana kune mapato ari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino. MMZ inoti zvakakosha kuti vatori venhau vasatema vaine divi ravakarerekera mukuburitsa nhau. Mukuru wesangano iri VaEdson Madondo vanoti kutepfenyurwa nekunyorwa kwenhau hakusi kupa vemapato akasiyana siyana mukana wekuti vazvishambadze sezvinofanirwa kuitwa pasi pebumbiro remutemo wenyika. Vati nhepfenyuro dzehurumende dzinonyanya kurerekera kubato riri kutonga re ZANU PF, zvinosiya mapato anopikisa asina mufaro. Embed

text: Sangano reEuropean Union razivisa kuti richange richipa Zimbabwe mari inosvika mamiriyoni matatu nemazana mashanu ezviuru zveMayuro semari ichashandiswa mukubatsira vanhu vakatarisana nedambudziko redutumupengo reCyclone Idai. Britain inotiwo ichapa Zimbabwe, Mozambique neMalawi mari inosvika mamiriyoni matanhatu emapaunzi ichashandiswa kubatsira avo vakatarisana nedambudziko rakabva ku clyclone Idai. Vamwe vechidiki vari kubatana neveruzhinji mukuunganidza mbatya nechikafu chichaendeswa kune avo vakawirwa nedambudziko iri. VaKuda Musasiwa wekambani yeFresh In A Box, vanoti vari kushanda nevedzisvondo mukuunganidza zvinhu zvichapihwa vanhu kuChimanimani nedzimwe nzvimbo dzakavhiringwa neCyclone Idai. No media source currently available
title: European Union neBritain Vobvisa Mari yeKubatsira Zimbabwe paDambudziko reCyclone Idai

text: Masangano anomirira varairidzi akabatana mukunyora gwaro ravakaendesa ku mahofisi emutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nezuro. Gwaro iri rinotsanangura zvinhu zviri kutadzisa varairidzi kuita basa ravo, richiti varairidzi vanokumbira kuti mutungamiri wenyika apindire munyaya iyi sezvo makurukota avo nevamwe vakuru vemuhurumende vakatadza kubudisa kana chimwe zvacho muhurukuro dzese dzavakaita nevamiriri vevarairidzi. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano aya, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masararure, vaudza Studio 7 kuti masangano evarairidzi ose masere atora danho iri sezvo vachida kuti mutungamiri wenyika anzwe zviri kuvanetsa vagokwanisavo kuudza makurukota avo zvekuita sezvo zvichemo zvevarairidzi zviri zvechokwadi, vachiti varairidzi havasi pakuramwa mabasa asi vari kutadza kuenda kumabasa nekuti havana mari yekuita zvinhu zvavanofanirwa kuve vachiita. No media source currently available
title: Varairidzi Vanoda Kuti VaMnangagwa Pachavo Vapinde Muhurukuro Dze Zvichemo Zvavo

text: Zanu PF inoti iri kugadzirira sarudzo zvakasimba nekuvandudza mapazi epasi neSvondo munyika yose. Nhengo yekomiti yepamusoro yePolitiburo mudunhu reMashonaland West, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, vaudza musangano weProvincial Coordinating Committee, kuti mangwana nhengo dzose zvisinei nezvigaro zvavo zvepamusoro dzinofanirwa kuenda kumasero kwavo kuti kunoona kuti kuchine vanhu here. Amai Mupfumira vati vanofanirwa kuona kuti nhengo dzavo dzose dzakanyoresa kuvhota here uye kuti masero evanhu ari kuwirirana nepavakanzi vavhotere. Amai Mupfumira vati bato ravo riri kushushikana zvikuru nehuwandu hwevanhu vakanyoresa kuvhota mumaguta uhwo hwavanoti hwakanyanya nekudaro vanofanirwa kushanda nesimba kuti nhengo dzavo dzisati dzanyoresa kuvhota dzinyorese. Vachitaura pamusangano mumwechete chipanga mazano chemutungamiri wenyika, VaChristopher Mutsangwa, vati manyepo ekuti vakanoongorora sarudzo dzekuRussia nedonzvo rekubirira sarudzo dzegore rino munyika. Bato reZanu PF rakaburitsa mitemo ichatevedzerwa mukusarudza nhengo dzaro musarudzo dze primary elections, iyo vakawanda vari kuchema chema nayo. Izvi zviri kuitika mushure mekupatsanuka kwebato iri pakati pezvikwata zviviri zveG-40 ne Team Lacoste. Chikwata cheTeam Lacoste ndicho chiri panyaya zvichitevera kupindira kwakaita mauto ayo akabvisa VaRobert Mugabe pachigaro, izvo zvakaita kuti VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vaitwe mutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available
title: Huwandu hweVanhu Vakanyoresa Hwoitisa Zanu PF Mudumbu?

text: Mutumbi wevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ucharadzikwa pamusha pemufi kwaZvimba neMugovera. Mutumbi waVaMugabe unonzi uri kutarisirwa kuvigwa muchivanze pamusha pavo mubhuku rekwaKutama muno maZvimba. Studio 7 nevamwe vatori venhau vemamwe makambani varambidzwa kupinda mumusha waVaMugabe sezvo zvanga zvichinzi mhuri yemufi iri mumusangano usingadiwe vatorwa. Mumwe muvakidzani asina kuda kudomwa zita rake uyo anoti ambokwanisa kupinda pamusha paVaMugabe nhasi audza Studio7 kuti guva richavigwa VaMugabe riri kuvakwa pakati pechivanze pamusha pavo uye zvinonzi mhuri yemufi yakatora danho iri ichityira kuti mutumbi wemufi ungazobiwa ukashandiswa zvisirizvo nevanhu vezvematongerwo enyika vavasina kudoma nemazita Amai vatataura navo ava vati chikonzero ichi ndicho chiri kuita VaMugabe vasaradzikwe kumarinda akaradzikwa dzimwe hama dzavo kusanganisira amai vavo, Amai Bona Mugabe. Mumwe mugari, VaMadenyika Kutama, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafara kuti zvido zvemufi zvekuti azovigwa kumusha kwake zvakwanisa kutevedzerwa kunyange hazvo hurumende yanga ichida kuti VaMugabe vavigwe kumarinda anovigwa magamba enyika kuHeroes Acre. Sachigaro weZanu PF munhauranda yekwaKutama, VaTinos Manongovere, vati vari kufara zvikuru kuti VaMugabe vave kuzovigwa kumusha kwavo vachiti mufi akabviswa hugamba hwese pavakabviswa pahutongi naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachibatsirwa nemauto muna Mbudzi 2017. VaMugabe vakambenge vanzi vachavigwa kuHeroes Acre asi mhuri yavo yakazotora danho rekuti vavigwe kuno kwaZvimba izvo zvakatambirwa nehurumende ichiti inokoshesa zvido zvemhuri. Mumwe mugari webhuku rekwa Kutamba aramba kudomwa nezita ati vagari vemunzvimbo ino vazhinji havasi kuda kuti VaMnangagwa vange varipo pakuvigwa kwaVaMugabe. Vamwe vaane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mumhuri yemufi vanoti pane kukavadzana kuripo pakati pehama dzemufi nemudzimi wake, Amai Grace Mugabe, avo vanonzi havana kuudza vehukama panguva yairwara VaMugabe kuti hama yavo yainge yorwara. Zvinzonziwo madzishe akadzingwa kuBlue Roof mushure mekunge Amai Mugabe vawana runyerekupe rwekuti madzishe ainge apihwa mari nehurumende kuti avanyengetedze kuti VaMugabe varadzikwe kuHeroes Acre zvinonzi zvakazoita kuti madzishe aya adzingwe kuBlue Roof marimwezuro. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naAmai Mugabe sezvo vanga vari mumusangano nevemhuri. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naIshe Dununu Zvimba avo vane zita rekuberekwa rekuti Raphael Zvikaramba sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga isiri kupinda. Asi vane ruzivo nezviri pamusha paVaMugabe vanoti mufi acharadzikwa nemadzishe pachivanhu. Mashoko aburitswa nebepanhau reZimbabwe Morning Post anoti VaMnangagwa vachange vasipo pakubvigwa kwaVaMugabe vachinzi vachange vakamirirwa negurukota rinoona nezvinoitika mukati menyika VaCain Mathema pachavigwa VaMugabe. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Vovigwa neMugovera kwaZvimba

text: Meya veguta reHarare, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti kanzuru yavo yakaparura chirongwa cheutsanana muguta ravo kuburikidza nekuchenesa nzvimbo dzose dziri kuunganidzwa marara mukati meguta, izvo vanoti zvanga zvonyangadza chimiro cheguta guru renyika uye kukanganisa hutano hwevanhu. VaMafume vanoti vakataura nevakuru vezvekutakurwa kwemarara mukanzuru vakawirirana kuti marara ose akaita mirwi mukati meguta anofanirwa kukukurwa achinoraswa kwakakodzera kuitira kudzosa chimiro cheguta ravo. Vanoti vakatsvaga mafuta ekufambisa pamwe nekugadzirisa michina nedzimotokari zvekushandisa mukuita basa iri kuitira kuderedza kuchemachema kwevagari, avo vari kushoropodza kanzuru nekukundikana kutakura marara. Ngatinzweyi vamafume vachitsanangura. Panyaya yekuti kanzuru yavo iite mushandirapamwe nemakambani akazvimirira mukutakura marara muguta nekumisha inogara vanhu, VaMafume vanoti zvinhu zviri muhurongwa hwavo, asi pane mitemo inofanirwa kutanga yagadziriswa kuitira kuti vabvumidzwe kuita izvi. No media source currently available
title: Kanzuru yeHarare Inoparura Chiroongwa cheKuchenesa Guta neKurasa Marara Akaita Mirwi

text: Mutauriri weZIFA VaXolisani Gwesela vanoti zvinhu zviri kufamba zvakanaka mukamba mavo zvekuti vari kushamisika nevanhu vari kuti gadziriro dzechikwata chemaWarriors dzekuenda kumakwikwi eAfrica Nations Cup kuGabon hadzisi kufamba zvakanaka. Kunyangwe hazvo nyika dzakawanda dziri kuenda kumakwikwi aya dziri kutamba mitambo yekuedzana simba, Zimbabwe haisi kuita izvi nekuda kwekushaya mari. Vamwe vange vachitiwo vatambi havasi kufara nekubatwa kwavari kuitwa neZIFA. Asi VaGwesela vanoti zvinhu zviri kufamba zvakanaka uye Zimbabwe ichatamba neCameroon isati yaenda kumakwikwi aya. Zimbabwe iri muchikamu chinonzi nevakawanda ndicho chewafa wafa chine zvikwata zvine mukurumbira zvakaita seTunisia, Algeria neSenegal. Mitambo yeAFCON iri kutanga musi wa14 Ndira uye Zimbabwe ichatanga musi wa 15 Ndira neAlgeria. No media source currently available
title: ZIFA Inoti Gadziriro yemaWarriors Iri Kufamba Zvakanaka

text: Hurumende iri kuenderera mberi nekusunga vanhu vose vari kunzi vanenge vatuka kana kunyomba mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamadandemutande akaita se Facebook ne WhatsApp. Mumwe murume wekuNyanga mubhuku ramambo Hata Nyanga, VaErnest Matsapa, vakasungwa muna Ndira vachipomerwa mhosva yekunyomba VaMugabe pa WhatsApp apo vanonzi vakatumira mashoko pachikwata chinonzi Nyanga Free Range chavanova nhengo pa WhatsApp ekuti VaMugabe vakwegura. "100 years dziri kushupa kusvika akavavarira kuma ninety chakuti towards 100 unosvika wava chinhu chinonetsa kuchengeta. Nyakuchengeta unova ne patience dzokuchengeta anozopera simba ukazoita off duty. Zvino apa chicha pora chii nyama yese yaibva nokuchembera. Asi mwenya hatingazorasi mupenyu. Unosvika wava chunhu chinoshupa kuchengeta. Mumwe wakazobvunza asi Mwari wandikanganwa? ndava ipapo unenge usisina wezera rako achiripo uye ukada kutaura nyaya dzako unotaura dzaka expire. Vanhu vakazoenda kunoshopera kuti chabata munhu chii? VaMatsapa vari kuramba nyaya iyi. Vari kumiswa pamberi pedare ramejastiriti kuNyanga musi wa 29 Kubvumbi. Magweta eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights anoti vanhu vanodarika zana nemakumi mashanu vasungwa kubva muna 2010 vachipomerwa mhosva yekunyomba kana kutuka VaMugabe pasi pemutemo we Criminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act. Magweta anorwrira kodzero dzevanhu anoti mutemo uyu unotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Nyaya iyi iri kuzeyiwa nedare reConstitutional Court. Asi mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, varizve gurukota rezvemitemo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti mutemo uyu haufanire kubviswa nekuti vanhu vakangotenderwa kutuka mutungamiri wenyika zvinogona kukonzera mhirizhonga nekusagadzikana munyika. Amai Peggy Tavagadza vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vanoti havaone VaMatsapa vachibatwa nemhosva iyi. No media source currently available Magweta eZLHR anoti muna Kukadzi, mapurisa ekuBindura, Mashonaland Central akasunga VaEdson Chuwe, mukuru wechikoro paShamva Primary School naamai Edna Garwe naVaLeeman Pwanyiwa vanoshanda pachikoro ichi vakasungwa vachinzi vainge vanyomba VaMugabe. Vatatu ava vanonzi vakashandisa Facebook kuburitsa mifananidzo yekunyomba VaMugabe. Mapurisa anotiwo vatatu ava vakatumirazve mashoko paWhatsapp ekunyomba VaMugabe vachiti VaMugabe yasvika nguva yekuti vachienda pamudyandigere.
title: Mapurisa Oenderera Mberi neKusunga Vanonzi Vari Kunyomba VaMugabe paFacebook neWhatsApp

text: Nekuona kutambudzika kunogaroita vana veZimbabwe vanenge vawirwa nedambudziko remhirizhonga rezvematongerwo enyika, uye kukanganiswa nayo, zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvafunga kuumba homwe inobatsira vanhu ava. Homwe yeZimbabwe Victims of Violence Fund, ZVVF inonzi yakanangana nekubatsira vanhu vose zvisineyi nekuti vanotsigira bato ripi rezvematongerwo enyika uye kuti ndiyani akonzeresa mhirizhonga iyi. Sachigaro wehomwe iyi, VaJustin Matewu, avo vamambokwikwidza vakamirira bato reMDC T mudunhu reBuhera West, vanoti sangano ravo rine muzinda muBritain asi riine nhengo munyika dzakawanda idzo dzinenge dzichishanda nevamwe vari muZimbabwe. VaMatewu vanoti vari kumusha ava ndivo vanenge vachizoona pamwe nekukomekedza kusangano ravo vanhu vanokodzera kunge vachibatsirwa nesangano ravo. Vanoda kuziva nezvehomwe iyi vanoenda pa website inoti www.zvvf.org iyo ichiri kuumbiridzwa. Vanhu vanodarika zana rezviuru, vazhinji vari nhengo dze MDC, vakashurungudzwa zvakanyanya munguva yesarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakadzokorodzwa muna 2008, izvo zvakasiya vakawanda varemadzwa uye vamwe varasikirwa nehupenyu hwavo. Mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vakabuda nusarudzo iyi vachiti havapinde musarudzo ine ropa, izvo zvakasiya mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaRobert Mugabe, vari vega musarudzo iyi. VaMugabe vakagadzwa semutungamiri wenyika, asi izvi hazvina kutambirwa nenyika dzakawanda izvo zvakazoita kuti munyika muve nenhaurirano dzakazoita kuti paumbwe hurumende yemushandira pamwe muna 2009. No media source currently available
title: Homwe Inobatsira Vanovhiringwa neMhirizhonga Youmbwa Mhiri kweMakungwa

text: Rimwe remasangano evarairidzi, reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rinoti rarambidzwa nemapurisa kuratidzira kwaranga rakaronga nemusi weChina masikati. Kuratidzira uku kwanga kuri kwekucherechedza zuva rekodzero dzevashandi dzekuratidzira, reThe Global Day of Action, iro rinocherechedzwawo pasi rose. Zuva iri rinocherechedzwa nemasangano makuru akaita seEducation International, International Trade Union Conference pamwe nesangano reInternational Labour Organisation. Munyori mukuru wePTUZ, VaRaymond Majongwe, vanoti sangano ravo ranga rakaronga kufora richicherechedza zuva iri kubva nenguva dza 12 masikati kusvika na 2 masikati, richinosvitsa gwaro renyunyuto kumahofisi egurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa, Amai Priscah Mupfumira. Asi vanoti vashamisika vonzwa mapurisa ovadaidza achivaudza kuti havakwanise kuenderera mberi nekuratidzira uku, kunyange hazvo vakanga vazivisa mapurisa hurongwa hwavo hwekuratidzira. VaMajongwe vanoti sangano ravo richanyorera kuhurumende pamwe nemasangano evashandi makuru ose richiratidza kutsutsumwa kwaro nedanho ratorwa nemapurisa iri. Ukuwo, sangano reZimbabwe Teachers Association rinoti richacherechedza zuva reGlobal Day of Action iri nemusi weChishanu sezvo riine humwe hurongwa nemusi weChina. Mukuru weZimta, VaSifiso Ndlovu, vanoti vachacherechedza zuva iri murunyararo. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaGideon Shoko, kuti tinzwewo kana sangano ravo riine zvarakarongawo pazuva iri. Tatadzawo zvakare kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, Chief Superintendent Paul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe kuti seyi varambidza PTUZ kuratidzira sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga isingadairwi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo yenyika dzinoti mapurisa haana masimba ekurambidza kuratidzira, asi anogara achiita izvi nguva dzose sezvo asingaremekedzi mitemo yenyika. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Anorambidza PTUZ Kuratidzira neChina

text: Masangano akazvimirira muZimbabwe anoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadza komisheni inoona nezverunyararo nekuregererana munyika kuitira kuti igadzirise zvinhu zviri kunetsa munyika. National Peace and Reconciliation Commission iri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika rakatambirwa makore maviri apfuura. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamusangano waitwa neChipiri muHarare, masangano anoti reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, Zimbabwe Center for Community Development, Zimbabwe Civic Education Trust ne Heal Zimbabwe Trust, ati achakwidza nyaya iyi kumatare kana mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakaramba vakanyarara nenyaya yekugadzwa kwekomisheni iyi. Nhengo yeZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, VaShastry Njeru, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutevedzera zviri mubumbiro renyika nekuzadzikisa zviga zvirimo kusanganisira kugadza komisheni yerunyararo iyi. Mukuru weZimbabwe Civic Education Trust, Muzvare Gladys Hlatshwayo, vanoti havawirirane nepfungwa dzekuti kushaikwa kwemari ndiko kuri kutadzisa kutanga kushanda kwekomisheni iyi, vachiti uku kungoshaya hany’a kwevatungamiriri venyika… Mumwe anga ari pamusangano uyu, VaRashid Mahiya veHeal Zimbabwe Trust, vatiwo chiri kuwedzera mhirizhonga muZimbabwe inyaya yemapazi ehurumende anoda kuita zvematongerwo enyika uye asingaiti basa ravo nemazvo National Peace and Reconciliation Commission yakapiwa makore gumi chete mubumbiro remitemo yenyika kubva zvakatanga kushanda bumbiro iri mugore ra2013. Vemasangano akazvimirira vanoti pasina runyararo hakuna budiriro inoitika munyika.
title: Masangano Oronga Kukwidza Hurumende kuMatare Kana Ikasagadza Komisheni yeRunyararo

text: Bato reMDC neChishanu rakapeta musangano waro weNational Council muBulawayo richitsidza kuti harisi kuda zvehurumende yemubatanidzwa kunyangwe rakazvipira haro kuita nhaurirano dzekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Vachitaura nebepanhau reHerald, mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, vakati nhaurirano dzose dzinofanira kuitwa pasi pegungano rePolitical Actors Dialogue, POLAD, rine mapato madiki mazhinji akakwikwidza musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika. Asi mutauriri weMDC, VaFortune Daniel Molokele, vanoti zvePOLAD kutungana kwembudzi, uye bato ravo harisi kuzopinda muhurongwa uhu. Vaimbova mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaThabo Mbeki, avo vanga vari munyika svondo rino, vari kutarisirwa kudzoka munyika zvakare mwedzi unouya. VaMbeki ndivo vakaita muyananisi muna 2008 zvichitevera gakava raivepo pakati pevaive mutungamiri weZanu PF panguva iyi, muchakabvu Robert Mugabe, nemutungamiri weMDC panguva iyi, muchakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai. Nhaurirano idzi dzakaona hurumende yemubatanidzwa ichiumbwa pakati paVaMugabe, VaTsvangirai pamwe neVaArthur Mutambara vaive mutungamiri wechimwe chikwata cheMDC. No media source currently available
title: MDC Yotsika Madziro paNyaya yeHurumende yeMubatanidzwa

text: Kwasara mazuva maviri kuti mutungamiri mutsva we America, VaDonald Trump, vagadzwe muguta reWashington DC. Va Trump vari kutora basa riri kusiyiwa naVa Barack Obama avo vange vari pachigaro kwemakore masere. Nzira dzese dziri kutarisirwa kunge dzaka nanga kuWashington DC kumabiko emusi weChishanu kunyange hazvo kuri kutarisirwa kuti kuchange kune vachange vachiratidzira vachichema chema nezvakasiyana siyina kusanganisira kusafarira hurumende itsva yaVaTrump. NeMugovera kuri kutarisirwa kunge kune kuratidzira kwemadzimai vari kutarisirwa kubva kunharaunda dzakasiyana siyina vachiti havasi kufara nemabatirwo anotarisirwa kuitwa vanhukadzi pasi pehurumende yaVaTrump. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muAmerica, Amai Esther Togara, vanoti vane shuviro yekuti hurumende yaVaTrump ichakwanisa kuita mabasa anobatsira nyika dzemuAfrica neZimbabwe. Amai Togara vanoti vakafadzwa zvikuru nemabasa akaitwa nevari kusiya chigaro VaBarack Obama uye dayi vaikwanisa kuwana mukana wekutaura navo vaizovatenda nebasa ravakaita makore masere apfuura. "Chiri kufadza ndechekuti tiri kuwona mafambisirwo ehurumende yejechetere sezvo vanhu veAmerica vakasarudza VaDonald Trump uye VaObama vari kusiya basa pasina mhirizhonga sezvinombowanikwa mune dzimwe nyika uye isu tinofunga kuti nyika inga dzidze zvakawanda kubva kune zviri kuitika muAmerica," Amai Togara vaudza Studio 7. No media source currently available
title: Washington Yogadzirira Kugadzwa kwaVaTrump neChishanu

text: Rimwe sangano rinoongorora sarudzo, reElection Resource Center, kana ERC, rinoti riri shushukana zvikuru kuti hapana zvikuru zvati zvaitwa pakushandura mitemo inobata sarudzo munyika sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Vachiparura gwaro reongoorora yezvinhu zvakakakosha zvinoda kugadziriswa kuitira kuti nyika iite sarudzo dziri pamutemo sezvinodiwa nrbumbiro remitemo yenyika, mukuru weERC, VaTawanda Chimhini, vati kunyange hazvo bumbiro remitemo riine hwaro hwekuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakajeka, mutemo wesarudzo hausati wavandudzwa kuti uenderane nebumbiro iri. VaChimhini vati gwaro ravaparura nhasi rinotarisa zvinhu zvakanyanya kunyunyutwa nazvo neveruzhinji musarudzo dzapfuura uye rinotsanangurawo zvinofanira kugadziriswa kuti munyika muite sarudzo dzisina gakava. Vati sezvo mutungamiri wenyika vakataura kuti pachashandurwa mitemo yesarudzo apo vakavhura paramende nemusi weChipiri, vanoda kuti nhengo dzeparamende, nevese vane chekuita pakunyorwa kwemitemo, vatore pfungwa dziri mugwaro ravo pakuvandudza mitemo yesarudzo. VaChimhini vati zvimwe zvezvinhu zvinofanira kugadziriswa inyaya dzekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota, nyaya yekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvivhote, pamwe nemamiriro ekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo, yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission. VaChimhini vati vacharamba vachidzidzisawo veruzhinji, masangano akaita seSADC neAfrican Union kuti vautaure nevatungamiri vemuno kuti vagadzirise mitemo yesarudzo kuitira kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzisina mutauro. Mukuru werimwe bato rinopikisa reDemocratic Party, Doctor Wurayayi Zembe, vaudza Studio7 kuti gwaro raparurwa neERC rakakosha uye vanotarisira kuti vatungamiri neparamende vacharishandisa pakugadzirisa mitemo yesarudzo. Vati vanoona sekuti vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ndivo vatadzisa kuti mitemo isashandurwe uye zvinhu zvinogona kufamba rwendo runo. Asi mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana zvasanduka munyika kubvira pakabviswa VaMugabe vachiti hurumende VaMugabe yairamba kusandura mitemo yesarudzo yakafanana neyaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Vachivhura paramende nemusi wechipiri, VaMnangagwa vakati vakatoumba chikwata chedare remakurukota icho chichagadzirisa zvese zvakanzi zvigadziriswe nemasangano nenyika dzakaongorora sarudzo dzegore rapfuura. Zvimwe zvakanzi zvigadziriswe inyaya yekuti mapato ese awaniswe mukana wakafana kumapepanhau nenhepfenyuro dzehurumende, uye kuti vechiuto nemadzishe vasapindire musarudzo. Asi ERC inoti komiti yekugadzirisa mitemo yesarudzo inofanira kuvandudzwa kuitira kuti imiririre vanhu vese kusanganisira masangano anoshanda kazvimirira, vedzisvondo nevamwe. No media source currently available
title: ERC Yoshushikana neMitemo Inobata Sarudzo

text: Vashandi vemuZimbabwe vacherechedza zuva revashandi re Workers Day vachinyunyuta nemari dzavanotambiriswa pamwe nekusamira zvakanaka kwakaita zvinhu munyika. No media source currently available Vashandi ava vaungana neChishanu munhandare ye Gwanzura mu Harare nekune dzimwe nzvimbo mativi mana ese enyika vachicherechedza zuva iri. Vachitaura kuGwanzura mu Harare, mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi re Zimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, kana kuti ZCTU, Va George Nkiwane, vati sangano ravo harisi kufara nemari dziri kutambiriswa vashandi vazhinji munyika vachiti mihoro inopihwa vashandi yakafanana nemutero wembwa. Va Nkiwane vatiwo havasi kufara kuti vashandirwi vave kubvumidzwa kungodzinga vashandi zvisina mwero pasi pechirongwa chiri kudaidzwa kuti Labour Market Flexibility vachiti uku kudzosera nyika kunguva ye Economic Structural Adjustment Program. Va Nkiwane vashora danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekudzikisa huwandu hwevashandi vachiti hurumende inofanira kutanga yabvisa mazita evanhu vanotambiriswa mari nehurumende ivo vasingashandire hurumende, kana kuti ma ghost workers, isati yafunga zvekudzinga vashandi basa. Vachitaurawo pamhemberero idzi, vaimbova munyori mukuru mu ZCTU uye vari mutungamiri weMDC-T, Va Morgan Tsvangirai, vashora hurumende yaVa Robert Mugabe neZanu PF nekutadza kupa vanhu mabasa ayakavimbisa payaitsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzegore rapera. Vachitaurawo pamhemberero idzi, mutungamiri webato reMavambo Kusile Dawn, Va Simba Makoni, vakurudzirawo kuti mapato anopikisa hurumende yaVa Mugabe abatane ashande pamwe chete mukurwisana nematambudziko akatarisana nevashandi pamwe neruzhinji rweZimbabwe. Zvichakadai, VaTsvangirai vashora mhirizhonga iri kuitika ku South Africa uko kuri kudzingwa zvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika nezvizvarwa zvenyika iyi izvo zviri kugunun’una kuti zviri kupedzerwa mabasa nevekunze Va Tsvangirai vati dambudziko nderekuti hupfumi hwenyika mu Zimbabwe hauna kumira zvakanaka izvo zviri kukonzera kuti vanhu vazhinji vatize munyika vachinotsvaga mafuro manyoro kune dzimwe dzakaita se South Africa ne Botswana. Vanhu vazhinji vanga vari pamhemberero idzi vanga vakapfeka zvipfeko zvanga zvkanyorwa mashoko anotsoropodza nyaya yemhirizhonga iri kuitika ku South Africa iri kudaidzwa kuti xenophobia. Rimwe sangano revashandi re Zimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions kana kuti ZFTU raitawo mhembero dzekucherechedza zuva revashandi iri kunhandare ye Rufaro.
title: VaTsvangirai naVaMakoni Votaura Vachicherechedza Zuva reVashandi Pasi Rose

text: Muimbi ane mukurumbira Thomas Mukanya Mapfumo anoti akanyorera mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmersom Mnangagwa tsamba achivakumbira kuti ivo nehurumende yavo vashande nesimba kuona kuti yadzora chiremera chevana veZimbabwe kuburikidza nekumutsiridza hupfumi hwenyika. Mukanya, uyo akasiya anyora tsamba iyi asati asimuka kubva kumusha mwedzi wapera, anoti kutambura kwevanhu kwaakaona panguva yaakanga ari kumusha kunomurwadza chose, achiti Zimbabwe inyika yakanaka chose zvekuti anoda kuona vana vachatevera pamwe nevazukuru vachikura nekugara munyika yakagadzikana. Mapfumo anoti hugaro hwevanhu hwakanaka ndicho chinhu chakanyanyokosha munyika, uye anokurudzira vanhu kuti vasiyane nezvekurwisana vakamirira mapato ezvematongerwo enyika, asi kuti vatarise mukuvaka nyika. Ngatinzweyi hurukuro yaaita naJonga Kandemiiri weStudio 7. No media source currently available
title: Muimbi Thomas Mapfumo Otaura nezveTsamba Yaakanyorera VaMnangagwa

text: Hurumende neChipiri yakazivisa kuti yabvisa mutemo unorambidza kufamba kwevanhu pakati pemaguta nemadhorobha, uyo wakanga wadzikwa muna Kurume pakaparurwa chirongwa che national lockdown senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica vakaudza vatori venhau pamusangano wemakurukota kuti vemabhazi nemichovha vanenge vachida kuzotakura veruzhinji vanofanirwa kunyoresa nebazi rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu kuitira kuti vaonekwe kuti vari kutevera here mutemo wekutakurwa kwevanhu unoenderana nezvisungo zvaWorld Health Organisation W-H-O pamwe nemitemo ine chekuita neCovid-19. Izvi zvichaitawo kuti mahofisi eV-I-D avhurwewo, zvichapawo mukana vanenge vachida kutorawo marezinesi ekutyaira nezvimwe. Hurumende yakazivisawo nezvehurongwa hwekuda kuvhurawo mahofisi ekwamudzviti ayo akanga avharwawo nekuda kwechirwere ichi. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vari chiremba, Dr. Gilson Mandigo vanoti hurongwa hwekubvumidza kufamba zvakare kwevanhu mumaguta nemadhorobha hwakanaka chose, asi panofanirwa kutorwa matanho ekuona kuti mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere yateverwa zvakasimba sezvo vanhu vachizogona kumanikidzana mumabhazi nemunzvimbo dzinokwirirwa mabhazi aya. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inobvumidza Kufamba kweMabhazi muMaguta neMadhorobha.

text:
Ishe Beperere vekuMashonaland West, avo vakashaya nechirwere cheCovid-19 muHarare vari kutarisirwa kuvigwa mangwana (China) kuRaffingora. Mambo Beperere, avo vanonzi VaAlfred Tome, vakashaya svondo rapera mushure mekurwara kwemazuva maviri chete. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvematunhu, Amai Marian Chombo, vati Mamb Beperere vacharadzikwa mangwana papurazi ravo reChepstow kuRaffingora.

Amai Chombo vati kufa kwamambo Beperere kwakashamisa vanhu vakawanda mudunhu reZvimba sezvo pasina kuziviswa kwekurwara kwavo. Amai Chombo vati Mambo Beperere ndimambo aida kuti mudunhu mavo muve nerunyararo pamwe nebudiriro uye vachida zvikuru kuti vanhu vashandise minda yavakapihwa nehurumende.

Asi Mambo Beperere vanga vasingawirirane nemhuri yekwaMugabe sezvo
vaipomerwa mhosva yekuwirirana nemutongo waMambo Zvimba wekuti mutumbi waVaRobert Mugabe, ufukunyurwe kuitira kuti unovigwa zvakare kumarinda anovigirwa magamba kuHarare. Hama yaVaMugabe, VaDominic Matibiri, vati Mambo Beperere ndivo vaive mambo wavo nekudaro ndivo vaifanirwa kunge vakatonga nyaya yaipomerwa mudzimai waVaMugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe, yekuti vakaviga mufi nenzira isingabvumirwe mudunhu. VaMatibiri vati ivhu rave kurwa rega. Muzukuru waVaMugabe uye vari mutauriri wemhuri yekwaMugabe,
VaLeo Mugabe, vati vakashamiswa kuti nyaya yakaendesva kwaMambo
Zvimba vachiti Mambo Beperere ndivo vaifanirwa kutonga nyaya iyi asi
vati vaviri ava vaishanda pamwechete panyaya iyi. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vatatu vafa
nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zvina nemazana mana
negumi nezvipfumbamwe, 4,419.

Vamwe vanhu zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare izvo zvasvitsa vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kubva zvachatanga pavanhu zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nazvina nemazana manomwe ane makumi manomwe nevatatu, 124,773..

Kusvika pakupera kwezuva nezuva nezuro, vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 vanga vave mamiriyoni maviri ane zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nezviviri zvine mazana manomwe nevashanu, 2, 532,705. Vabayiwa nhomba dzose mbiri vave miriyoni imwechete ine
zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu nezvitanhatu nemazana
mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevasere, 1, 636,498. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuitira kuti chirwere ichii chisarambe chichipararira munyika. No media source currently available
title: Ishe Beperere Votarisirwa Kuvigwa kuRaffingora neChina

text: Rimwe sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu rinoti zvakakosha kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatore matanho ekuona kuti vashanda pamwe chete naVaNelson Chamisa neMDC Alliance yavo muhurumende. Mukuru wezvirongwa muZimbabwe Network for Social Justice, Va Tendai Reuben Mbofana, vanoti kunyange hazvo paine gakava riri kuda kuendeswa kumatare neMDC Alliance, zvakakosha kuti Zanu PF neMDC Alliance dzishande pamwe chete senzira yekupedza ruvengo rwuri munyika rwuri kukonzerwa nezvakabuda musarudzo. VaMbofana vanoti vanotambira zvikuru kurudziro yeZimbabwe Council of Churches, iyo yakakurudzira neChishanu chapfuura kuti VaMnangagwa vashande naVaChamisa muhurumende inenge yakamirira zvido zvevanhu vose muZimbabwe. VaMbofana vanotiwo kunyange VaChamisa vakanzi nematare ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, vanokurudzirwawo VaChamisa nenhengo dzavo kuti vatsigirewo hurongwa hwekuti mapato maviri aya ashande pamwe chete sezvo akaratidza kuti anotsigirwa nevanhu vakada kuenzana, zvisineyi kuti Zanu PF yakawana zvigaro zana nemakumi mana nezvishanu, ukuwo MDC Alliance ichiwana zvigaro zvemuparamende makumi matanhatu nezvitatu. Musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, VaMnangagwa vakawana mavhoti 2,460,463 - ukuwo VaChamisa vakawana mavhoti 2,147,436. No media source currently available
title: Masangano Anorwira Kodzero Okurudzira VaMnangagwa Kuti Vashande naVaChamisa

text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakwira kusvika pamakumi mana nemumwe kana kuti 41 zvichitevera kufa kwemumuwe munhu mumwe chete kuManicaland. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pazviuru zviviri nemazana masere ane makumi manomwe nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 2, 879. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevamwe vanhu makumi matanhatu nevaviri nechirwere ichi. Pavanhu ava, makumi mashanu nevaviri vakachitapurirwa munyika, vamwe gumi nevaviri vakabva nacho kuSouth Africa. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vasvika mazana masere nemakumi masere nevanomwe kana kuti 887. Kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCoronavirus munyika kuri kuuya apo vashandi vemuzvipatara, kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba, vari kuramwa mabasa. Vamwe vakoti nanavachiremba vari kubatwawo nechirwere ichi. Mutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbabawe Nurses Association, VaEnoch Dongo, vanoti vamwe vakoti vave kudzingwa mudzimba dzekuroja neridzi vedzimba idzi vari kutyira kutapurirwa chirwere ichi. Kuramwa mabasa uko kunonzi kwakapawo kuti vana vanomwe vazvarwe vakafa kuSally Mugabe Hospital muHarare sezvo kusina nyanzvi dziri kubatsora madzimai anenge akazvitakura aya. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana masere ane makumi masere nechimwe, kana kuti 871, 000 vabatwa neCovid-19 muAfrica yose. Vanhu vafa vadarika zviuru gumi nezvisere nemakumi manomwe nevashanu, kana kuti 18,575. Vapora vadarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nezvitatu, kana kuti 523, 000. Pasi rose, Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora nezvechirwere ichi munyika dzose inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu ane zviuru mazana masere, kana kuti 16,8 million, vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vafa pasi rose vadarikawo zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nezviviri, kana kuti 662, 000. America ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vafa vadarika zana nemakumi mashanu ezviuru, kana kuti 150,000.
title: Huwandu hweVanhu Vafa neCovid-19 Hwosvika paMakumi Mana neMumwe

text: Vagari vekuChinyamukwakwa kuChisumbanje, Chipinge, vanoti mapurisa ekuChisumbanje anga akapakatira zvombo anodarika makumi mashanu afumobata jongwe muromo achisecha mudzimba dzavo zvine chisimba. Mapurisa aya, ayo anonzi anga achishandisa marhorhi matatu ekambani ye Green Fuel mukuita basa iri, anga achiti ari kutsvaga midziyo yekambani yemafuta ye Green Fuel inosanganisira GPS, inonzi yakabiwa nevagari. Sangano rePlatform for Youth Development rinoti mapurisa aya apinda mumisha kubva na 3 mambakwedza eChishanu vakagara kwemaawa matatu vachisecha mudzimba dzevanhu. Sangano iri rinoti kupinda kwemapurisa mudzimba uku kwaonawo vamwe vachiwanikwa vasina kupfeka mbatya, izvo zvinonzi zvakonzera bowabowa zvikuru kumadzimai. Imwe nhengo yesangano iri, Muzvare Sally Nobuhle Mlambo, vanoti mapurisa aya azombosunga nengetani mugari wemunzvimbo iyi, VaMuchatiroto Mashava pamwe nemwanakomana wavo, Gondani, asi vakazosunungurwa. Hukama pakati pevagari nekambani ye Green Fuel hunonzi hwaderera zvakanyanya izvo zvinonzi zvave kuita kuti pagare pakabatiranwa matemo. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mapurisa ekuChisumbanje kanawo veGreen Fuel kuti tinzwe divi ravo. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Ombunyikidza Vagari kuChisumbanje?

text: Hurumende mwedzi uno yakawedzera mihoro inotambirwa nevashandi vayo, asi vamwe vari kutoona sekunge danho iri rave gokamunyama nekuda kwematambudziko anonzi arakonzera. Mitengo yezvinhu zvakawanda inonzi yabva yakwirawo, izvo zvinonzi nevamwe vashandi vehurumende zviri kumedza mihoro yavo yavachangobva kuwedzerwa nehurumende iyi. Zvinonzi zvakwidzwa mitengo zvinosanganisira nyama, upfu, shuga, mafuta ekubikisa nemafuta ekufambisa. Izvi zvinotsinhirwa nemunyori mukuru werimwe remasangano evashandi vehurumende, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, VaRaymond Majongwe, avo vanoti nhengo dzavo zhinji dzatambira mihoro yadzo nhasi dzashamiswa kwazvo kupinda muzvitoro dzichiwana zvinhu zvizhinji zvakwidzwa mitengo. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti ratove dambudziko nevezvitoro rekuti pose pangowedzerwa vashandi vehurumende mari dzemihoro vezvitoro vanobva vakwidza mitengo yezvinhu zvose. Vakawanda munyika vari kuchemawo nekutengeswa kwezvimwe zvinhu nemari yekunze asi ivo vashandi vemunyika vachitambira mihoro yavo nemari yemunyika. Semuenzaniso, kambani inotengesa mafuta edzimotokari yeZUVA Petroleum, nhasi yazivisa kuti yave kutengesa mafuta edhiziri nepeturu pamagaraji ayo masere emunyika nemari yekunze, danho rinoshoropodzwa zvikuru naVaMoyo veZCTU. VaMoyo vanoti zvakakosha zvikuru kuti hurumende itore matanho ekumisa chamurambamhuru chinonzi chave kuitwa nemitengo yezvinhu, pamwe nekuona kuti zvinhu zvose munyika zvatengeswa nemari yemunyika, inokwanisa kuwanikwa nevanhu vose, kwete kuita zvitoro zviviri, chevarombo nechevapfumi. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara vanoti vari kuonawo kukwira kuri kuita mitengo yezvinhu zuva nezuva, uye vanofunga kuti zviri kukonzerwa nekushaya simba kuri kuramba kuchiita mari yemunyika ichienzaniswa nemari yekunze. Doctor Chitambara vanoti matambudziko akatarisana nenyika ari kukonzerwa nekuti pave nenguva yakareba hupfumi hwenyika husiri kubatwa zvakanaka pamwe nekushaikwa kwechivimbo munyaya dzezvehupfumi nevanoda kusima mari dzavo munyika. Vanoti izvi hazvisi zvinhu zvingangomuka zvagadziriswa neusiku humwe. Asi gavhuna vebhanga guru renyika, Doctor John Mangudya, vakaudza nyika neMuvhuro pakuparura kwavo hurongwa hwekushandiswa kwemari, kana kuti Monetary Policy Statement, kuti vari kutora matanho ekugadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi kuitira kuti vanhu vave nechivimbo. Doctor Mangudya vakatiwo vari kurwisa kuona kuti inflation yadzika here gore rino, vachiti panopera gore rino inofanirwa kunge yadzika nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana. Asi vakawanda vanoti pachine nguva kuti zvinhu zvigadzirisike munyika pachitariswa kuti nyika inenge yave kutodzokera mukushandiswa kwedhora rekuAmerica, kana kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu pachishandiswa huremu hwedhora rekuAmerica. Kusvika izvi zvagadziriswa, zvinhu zvicharamba zvichinetsa mune zvehupfumi munyika. No media source currently available
title: Mitengo yeZvinhu Zvakawanda Inokwira Panguva Iyo Vashandi veHurumende Vawedzerwa Mihoro

text: Vange vari nhengo yekomiti yepamusoro muZapu, Va Lloyd Masirarambi nevamwe vanga vari kuMDC Renewal Team, vabatana neMDC inotungamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai zvichitevera kurudziro yaVa Tsvangirai yekuti mapato anopikisana ne Zanu PF ashande pamwe chete. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau mu Harare, Va Tsvangirai vazivisa kuti Va Masirarambi, avo vanga vari munyori anoona nezvehupfumi mubato reZapu, vaimbova meya wedhorobha reChegutu, Va Blessing Dhlakama, pamwe naVa Biggie Haurovi, avo vakanga vave kushanda vari ku MDC Renewal Team, vave nhengo dze MDC-T. Va Tsvangirai vakurudzira vamwe vasati vauya kubato ravo kuti vauye vaite mushandirapamwe vakanangana negadziriro dzesarudzo dzemuna 2018. Va Haurovi, avo vanga vari nhengo yepurovhinzi kuMasholand West mu MDC Renewal Team, iyoyakapatsanuka kubva mu MDC-T gore rapera, vatsinhira zvataurwa naVa Tsvangirai izvi. Va Masirirambi, avo vatakurana naAmai Laura Makuzva, avo vanga vari munyori anowona nezvevashandi mu Zapu kuenda ku MDCT, vati vawona zvakakodzera kuti vabatane naVa Tsvangirai vachiti MDC-T ndiro bato rega riri kutarisirwa neveruzhinji kuti rigadzirise zviri kunetsa munyika. Zvichakadai, mutevedzeri wemutungamiri we Zapu, Amai Emilia Mukaratirwa, vati havana chavanokwanisa kutaura nekuenda kwaita Va Masarirambi naAmai Makuzva ku MDCT vachiti havasati vatambira tsamba dzekuti Va Masarirambi naAmai Makuzva havasisiri nhengo dzebato ravo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri weMDC Renewal Team, Va Jacob Mafume, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Va Tsvangirai vari kurudzira kuti mapato anopikisa aite mushandirapamwe pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018. Mune imwewo nyaya, MDC-T yaburitsa mashoko ekuti makanzuru ndiwo anofanirwa kusiiwa achigadzirisa nyaya dzevanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa sezvo bumbiro idzva remitemo yenyika rave kupa masimba kumakanzura ekuti atonge zvisina kupindira kwakanyanya kwebazi rinowona nezvinoitika mumatunhu. MDC-T inoti haisi kuzotambira zviri kutaurwa nehurumende kuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava vabviswe sezvo kusiri kuda kwavo kutengesera mumigwagwa asi kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika. Mumwe wevanotengesera mumigwa yemu Harare, Va Herbert Zaranyika, vati havasi kuzobva mumigwagwa kana pasina hurongwa hwakati tsvikiti hunoita kuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vakwanise kuraramisawo mhuri dzavo kubudikidza nekutengesa vari munzvimbo dzakanaka. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kugurukota rinowona nezvematunhu, Va Ignatious Chombo, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha. Mune imwewo nyaya, kanzuru ye Harare yaburitsa mashoko ekuti vagari vemu Harare yose vachange vasina mvura kwemazuva maviri kubva musi weChishanu kusvikira musi weMugovera zvichitevera kugadzirwa kuchange kuchiitwa nzvimbo yekuchenesa mvura ye Morton Jaffray Water Works. Kanzuru inoti kugadzirwa kuchange kuchiitwa michina iyi kuchawedzera kubuda kwemvura mudzipombi pamwe nekuti vanhu vagare vaine mvura nguva nenguva sezvo michina iyi yave yekare
title: Dzimwe Nhengo dzeZapu ne MDC Renewal Dzobatana naVaTsvangirai

text: Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare VaMichael Chideme vanoti kanzuru yeHarare yakakokwa nehurumende kuti ipwanye dzimba dziri pedyo nenhandare yendege yeHarare International Airport. VaChideme vanoti kanzuru iri pasi pebazi rezvematunhu rehurumende uye ndiyo ine basa rekuona kuti hapana vanoita madiro aJojina vachingovaka dzimba pose pose muguta. Izvi zvinotevera mutauro wakanyanya munyika wekuti ndiyani akapa kuti dzimba idzi dziputswe. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakataura gore rapera kuti dzimba idzi dzaifanira kuputswa sezvo dzainge dzakavakwa panzvimbo isina kukodzera. Vamwe vange vachichema chema kuti kanzuru yeHarare ichitungamirwa neMDC-T ndiyo yainge yaita zano ndega ichiputsa dzimba dzevanhu. Vakawanda vari kuputsirwa dzimba idzi vatsigiri veZanu-PF avo vakapihwa pekuvakira nevatungamiri vebato ravo kunyangwe hazvo nzvimbo iyi isingafanire kuvakirwa dzimba sezvo ichinzi inogona kuzoshandiswa kana poda kuwedzerwa nhandare yendege. Pane dzimba dzinodarika chiuru chimwe chete dziri kupwanya panzvimbo iyi nekanzuru. No media source currently available
title: Ko Kanzuru Inodei paMuchato weDhongi neBere Pakuputsa Dzimba?

text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, avo vakange vashevedzera kuti munyika muratidzirwe svondo rapera, vanyimwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso nedare repamusoro pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga mukati. Vachitura mutongo wavo pachikumbiro chaVaNgarivhume chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo zvichitevera kunyimwa kwavakaitwa mukana uyu nedare ramejasitiriti, mutongi wedare repamusoro VaTawanda Chitapi, vati Ngarivhume havana kusvitsa zvikonzero zvinonwisa mvura zvinoita kuti vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. Zvaturwa nedare zvatsinhirwa negweta raVaNgarivhume, VaMoses Nkomo. VaNgarivhume vakanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter vachikurudzira mhirizhonga mukuratidzira kwavakange vashedzera kuti kuitwe munyika musi wa31 Chikunguru pasi peboka ravari kudaidza kuti July 31st Movement iro rinoti harisi kufara nehuori hwarinoti hwatekeshera muhurumende. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, vati kunyimwa kwaita VaNgarivhume mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso pamhosva yavari kupomerwa kunoratidza kuti Zimbabwe yave kutongwa pachigandanga. Zvichakadai, mutori wenhau Hopewell Chin’ono uyo akanyimwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso nedare repamusoro nemusi weChina dare richiti hapana zvaakasvitsa kudare zvinoratidza kuti mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti akakanganisa kutonga paakamunyika mukana wekutongwa achibva kumba kwame pamhosva yaari kupomerwa yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga, anga ari mudare ramejasitiriti zvakare neChishanu. Gweta rake, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vanga vachida kusvitsa chikumbiro kuna mejasitiriti VaNgoni Nduna chekuti apihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso sezvo vachiti pane zvashanduka kubva paakambonyimwa mukana uyu asi muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, VaWhisper Mabhaudhi, vati vanga vasina kuziviswa. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nerimwe gweta raChin’ono, VaGift Mtisi. Nyaya yaChin’ono yakayarisirwa kudzoka mudare ramejasitiriti neChitatu svondo rinouya mushure mezororo remagamba. Kusungwa kwaNgarivhume naChin’ono kwakonzera mutauro pasi rose zvaita kuti mutungamiri weSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa vatumire nhume kuZimbabwe kuzoona zviri kuitika munyika munyika. Masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu ari kupopota nekunze rumwe rutivi achiti hurumende yeZimbabwe yanyanya kutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Asi hurumende pamwe nebato reZanu PF vanoti hapana chakaipa chavari kuita. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaNgarivhume, Vanonyimwa Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso neDare Repamusoro

text: Vachitambira kusarudzwa kwavo zviri pamutemo nebato ravo re Democratic Party kuti vakwikwidze musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, Va Joe Biden vakaburitsa pachena kuti mutungamiri wenyika, Va Donald Trump, avo vavari kukwikwidzana navo muna Mbudzi, havana kubata zvakanaka chirwere che Covid-19. VaBiden vakatiwo vakasarudzwa semutungamiri wenyika, vachabvisa kutya kuri muvanhu uye kuona kuti America yabatana nepasi rose kuitira rakanaka repasi rose No media source currently available Kune rImwe rutivi, Va Trump vari kushandisa mazwi ekuti ndiyani anogona kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika pakati pavo naVaBiden. VaTrump vari kushorawo Va Biden vachiti havana kusimba, uye munhu ane pfungwa dzegwara rekumabvazuva, uyo anoda kukwidza mitero nekutengeserana zvinhu pamadiro nepasi rose nechinangwa chekuendesa mabasa kunze kwe America. \n\nNyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, Va Moses Rumano, vanoti vakafara zvikuru nezvakataurwa naVaBiden sezvo zvichizokwanisa kubatanidza America nepasi rose. "Ndakafadzwa nezvakataurwa naVaBiden pamusoro pezvirongwa zvavanazvo zvekubatanidza nyika nekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 uye nekumutsiridza hupfumi hwenyika. Ndine chivimbo chekuti VaBidden vachakwanisa kusimudzira kodzero dzemadzimai, vatema nevabvakure," Va Rumano vanodaro. No media source currently available
title: VaJoe Biden Vanotambira Kudomwa Kwavo Kuti Vamirire Democratic Party Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weAmerica.

text: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara kuGermany Muzvare Albie Matarutse vanoti vari kufadzwa nekuratidzira kwavakaita kumuzinda weVatican kuItaly uko vakashoropodza hwavanoti hutongi hwehudzvinyiriri hwemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Muzvare Mataruste vanoti vakashingiswa nekuratidzira kwakaita mufundisi vekukuKariba Pastor Patrick Mugadza avo vakaratidzira vari vega muHarare nekunyora tsamba kuchechi yeRoma kuti idzinge VaMugabe mukereke. Muzvare Matarutse vanoti zvanga zvisiri nyore kuti varatidzire sezvo izvi zvisingabvumirwe munzvimbo iyi asi vakapinda vakaviga hembe yakanyorwa yekushora VaMugabe iyo vakazoratidza vapinda mukati meVatican. "Kunyangwe zvangu ndakange ndichitya kuti ndichanzi handisi kuremekedza Papa Francis ndakawona kuti dambudziko remunyika medu iguru uye zviri kunemunhu wese kuti aite zvaanokwanisa kushandura zvinhu," Vanodaro muzvare Matarutse. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti, "Ndakasimuka ndikamira pachigaro ndika simudza zvinyorwa zvangu zvaive nemanzwi ekuti Papa vatsiure vaMugabe nehutsinye hwavo huru kudzosera nyika kumashure." Muzvare Matarutse vanoti vacharamba vachitsvaga dzimwe nzira dzekuratidzira kusafara kwavo nezviri kuitika munyika uye shuwiro yavo ndeyekuti nyaya dzakadayi seGukurahundi dzizeyewe munyika. Munguva yeGukurahundi kuma 1980 vanhu vakawanda vakaurayiwa kuMatabeleland neMidlands vachinzi vainge vapandukira hurumende yaVaMugabe. Muzvare Matarutse vanoti varikufara nemafambiro akaita kuratidzira kwavo sezvo nzvimbo inoyera yeVatican ichiendwa nevazhinji. No media source currently available
title: Chimwe Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Choratidzira KuVatican City Pamberi paPapa Francis Chichshora Hutongo HwavaMugabe

text: Vanhu vaviri vari kupomerwa mhosva ine chekuita nekuputiswa kwebhomba kwakaitika muWhite City stadium kuBulawayo svondo rapera, vamiswa pamberi pedare muBulawayo vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvegandanga pamwe nekuda kupidigura hurumende.  Vaviri ava, VaDouglas Musekiwa naVaJohn Zulu, vamiswa mudare vasina magweta anovamirira. Mutongi wedare ramejasitireti, VaGladmore Mushowe, vadzinga vanhu vose vanzi havana chekuita nenyaya iyi apo vaviri vamiswa pamberi pedare kuWest Commonage Magistartes Court. Mutongi wedare abvumirana nemuchuchisi kuti nekuda kwekukura kwemhosva iri kupomerwa vaviri ava, hazvaigona kuti inzwikwe nevanhu vose vose. Vasungwa ava, avo vanga vachiratidza kunge vasiri kuziva kodzero dzavo, havana kupikisa kuti nyaya yavo inzwikwe pasina veruzhinji vanoinzwa. Vatori venhau vamirira kubva mangwanani kusvika nguva dzekuma 4 manheru vachida kunzwa nyaya iyi asi nyaya iyi yange isina kunyatsojeka kuti iri kufambiswa seyi. Studio7 haina kuzokwanisa kunzwa kuti vaviri ava vataura kuti chii payanga yonzwikwa mukamera. Asi magwaro ari mumaoko eStudio7 anoratidza kuti mukuru wematikitivha muBulawayo akumbira dare kuti vaviri ava vachengetedzwe nemapurisa kubva musi wa Chikumi 30, kusvika musi wa Chikunguru 2. Magwaro aya anoratidza kuti mapurisa akumbira kuti awedzerwe nguva nedare kuitira kuti aenderere mberi nekuferefeta nyaya iyi ivo vakachengetedza vapari vemhosva. Hazvinawo kujeka kuti vaviri ava vakaiswa riini mumaoko emapurisa, sezvo mashoko atinawo achiti vaviri ava vakanga vasungwa nemauto zvichitevera kuputika kwebhambu rakasiya nepadiki rakuvadza mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Vakakuvara pachiitiko ichi vanosanganisira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, mudzimai wemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Mary Chiwenga, sachigaro weZanu PF, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri nevamwe vanhu vanodarika makumi mana. Vanhu vaviri, VaNelson Dube, avo vaive mukuru wevachengetedzi vaVaMohadi, pamwe naVaStanley, pamwe nemumwe wevachengtedzi waVaConstantino Chiwenga, Colour Sergeant Stanley Mugunzva, vakashaya mushure mekukuvadzwa zvichitevera kuputika kwechombo neMugovera wapfuura. No media source currently available
title: Vari Kupomerwa Mhosva yeKubhomba kuWhite City Stadium Vanomiswa Mudare

text: Mutongi wedare raMejastiriti muHarare VaTendai Mahwe nemusi weChishanu vakapa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kune vanhu gumi asi vakanyima mukana uyu kune vamwe makumi matanhatu nemasere. Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights kana kuti ZLHR rinoti vakasunungurwa vanosanganisa mutori wenhau James Jemwa avo vanzi vabhadhare mari inosvika madhora makumi mashanu mushure mekusungwa vachiratidzira muHarare svondo rapera. Mune imwe nyaya, mutongi wedare ramejastiriri kuMbare, VaStan Mambanje vakanyima mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kuna VaPride Mukono, VaMakomborero Haruzivishe naVaMehluli Dube. Zvichakadaro, sangano reZLHR rinoti dare iri harina kuzonwa nyaya yaMuzvare Linda Masarira avo vave nemavhiki akawanda vari mujeri. Dare rati rakawandirwa nenyaya uye nyaya iyi ichanzwikwa musi wa 6 Gunyana.
title: Mutori weNhau VaJames Jemwa Voburitswa muHusungwa, Asi Vakawanda vanoramba Vari muHusungwa

text: Mauto eZimbabwe National Army anonzi akaungana muChinhoyi pakamba yemapurisa yeChinhoyi Central Police Station, uye pajeri reMurehwa Prisons, paine fungidziro yekuti igadziriro yekuparadza kuratidzira kunonzi kwakarongwa nebato rinopikisa reMDC mumatunhu eMashonaland East neMashonaland West. Mauto anonziwo ave kuwanikwa pama road block ari kuiswa memapurisa mumigwagwa yemunyika. Bato reMDC rinonzi riri kuronga kuratidzira nyika yose richida kuti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa igadzirise zviri kunetsa munyika. Asi mapurisa anonzi akatorambidza kuratidzira kwakanga kwakarongwa neMDC kuChinhoyi nekuMagunje kuMashonaland West. Murongi wemisangano muMDC, VaAmos Chibaya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vacharatidzira vachitevera bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Studio7 yabata Mutauriri wemauto, Colonel Alphios Makotore, kuti tinzwe divi remauto panyaya iyi, asi vati tiite zvekuvatumira mibvunzo netsambambozha, vachiti vanozotipindura nemusi weChishanu sezvo vanga vari kuNyanga. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru wesangano reCenter for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti zvave kuitwa nehurumende zvekungoisa mauto pese pese zvinoratidza kuti pane zvairi kutya. No media source currently available  Ukuwo vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yevechidiki muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti manyepo kuti mauto aiswa mumatunhu ari kuda kuratidzirwa neMDC sezvo bato iri risina rutsigiro kumaruwa kwacho zvekuti hapana vanobuda kunoratidzira. No media source currently available
title: Mauto Anoiswa muMatunhu Ari Kuronga Kuratidzirwa neMDC

text: Vatenderi vechiMuslim pasi rese, kusanganisira muZimbabwe, vari kucherechedza mwedzi weRamadan vachitsanya, kunamata zvakasimba pamwe nekupa vanotambura. Ramadan mwedzi wakakosha zvikuru pachitendero cheIslam uye gore rino wakatanga musi wa2 Kubvumbi uchipera musi wa1 Chivabvu. Ramadan mwedzi wechipfumbamwe pakarenda remaMuslim uye mwedzi, uyo vatenderi vechiIslam vano tsanya, kunamata zvakasimba, kuregerera pamwe nekuwana makomborero kubva kumusiki. Panguva yeRamadan, vatenderi vechiIslam havadye kana kunwa chinhu kubva panobuda zuva kusvika parino vira kwemwedzi wese. Sheik Majidu Adini vanoti mwedzi weRamadan wakatanga kucherechedzwa apo pakadzika bhuku ravo rechitendero reQurun. Vanoti kunyange hazvo vachitsanya nekunamata dzimwe nguva, paRamadan vanoita izvi zvakanyanya. Vanotiwo kunze kweku namata nekutsanya nguva mwedzi weRamadan inguvawo yekuregererana. Vaenderera mberi vachiti, Ramadan ndiyo nguva apo mwari vanobviswa marwadzo kuvatadzi. Mutungamiriri weIslamic Supreme Council of Zimbabwe Sheik Ishmael Duwa vanoti Ramadan mwedzi wemakomborero akanyanya. Ramadan ndechimwe chezvinhu zvakakosha pachitendero cheIslam zvinosanganisira kutenda kunaMwari nekuti muporofita Muhammed aiva mutumwa waMwari,kunamata kashanu pazuva, pamwe nekupa chegumi kana kuti Zakat. Ramadan inocherechedzwa pasi rese nevatenderi vechiIslam asi vana vadiki, vanhu vanopenga, vanorwara kana vakwegura havacherechedzi mwedzi uyu. Sheik Duwa na Sheik Adini vati vanofara chose kuti Ramadan yegore riono inouuya apo vanhu vave kubvumidzwa kuungana. Vati kwasara mazuva matatu kuti Ramadan ipere vanoungana vachinamata pamwe munvimbo dzavo dzekunamatira kana kuti maMosque. Kunyange hazvo masangano echiIslam munyika achiti muZimbabwe mune vanhu miriyoni nemazana maviri vechitendero cheIslam, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvitendero dzinoti vanhu vechitendero ichi vanodarika zana rezviuru nechidimbu. Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo vechidiki vakawanda vave kuteera chitendero ichi nekuda kwemabhezari anovanopihwa kuonita zvidzidzo kune dzimwe nyika dzine chitendero ichi kuMiddle East. Gwaro reGlobal Religious Landscape rakaburitswa nePew Research Centre Forum on Religion and Public Life muna 2012 rinoti pasi rese vatenderi vechiIslam vanodarika bhiriyoni nezviuru mazana matanhatu.
title: Vatenderi veChiMuslim Vocherechedza Ramadan
