text: MDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai inoti inofara kuti yakazokokwa nasachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, Amai Rita Makarau kuti inotora gwaro revavhoti. Mutauriri webato iri, VaObert Gutu, vatsinhira kuti bato ravo rakakokwa kuti rinotora gwaro revavhoti rekuMt. Darwin West pamwe nerekuChirumhanzu-Zibagwe. VaGutu vanoti bato ravo rakanga rakumbira kuti ripiwe magwaro aya ari murudzi rwuviri, rwe“electronic” pamwe ne “hard copy.” Munyori mukuru weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vaudza Studio7 kuti vaenda kumahofisi aAmai Makarau vakakwanisa kubhadhara mari inoita madhora gumi nemashanu ekuti vakwanise kupiwa gwaro riri murudzi rwemapepa nemadhora gumi nemaviri ekuti vapiwe gwaro iri murudzi rwevhidhiyo. Asi VaGutu vanoti kana zvavo vazopiwa gwaro iri neZEC, hazvirevi kuti bato ravo rave kuzopinda musarudzo dze by-elections mumatunhu maviri aya, sezvo sarudzo idzi dzatosvika, uye bato ravo richida nguva yekumbotarisisa gwaro iri. MDC T yakaramba kupinda musarudzo dzipi zvadzo munyika kana zvakawanda zvinosanganisira nyaya yegwaro revavhoti nekuvandudzwa kwemitemo yesarudzo zvisati zvagadziriswa. No media source currently available
title: MDC-T: Kupihwa Gwaro reVavhoti Hazvirevi Kuti Topinda Musarudzo

text: Muganhu weZimbabwe neSouth Africa, weBeitbridge, uchamboramba wakavharwa mushure mekunge vakuru vezvehutano mudunhu reBeitbridge vazivisa kuti vanoda nguva yakakwana yekugadzirira kudzivirira Covid-19 vasati vavhura muganhu uyu. Mukuru wezvehutano mudunhu iri Doctor Lenos Samhere vakaudza bepanhau reHerald neChipiri kuti vanoda kutanga vaona kuti vanhu vakawanda vabaiwa nhomba muganhu uyu usati wavhurwa, uyewo kuti vanoda vamwe vashandi vezvehutano pamwe nezvikwanisiro kuitira kusimbisa chikwata chavainacho kare. Veruzhinji vanga vachitarisira kuti Zimbabwe ichakasika kuvhura muganhu uyu mushure mekunge South Africa yavhura divi rayo remuganhu uyu. Zimbabwe iri kutora matanho akasimba ekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi zvichitevera kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vakabatwa pamwe nekufa neCovid-19 munguva yezororo reKisimusi. Vanhu vakawanda vakapinda munyika vachibva kuSouth Africa, iyo inove nyika yakabatwa zvakanyanya neCovid-19 muAfrica yose. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rebazi rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe panyaya iyi. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paTswane University of Technology, Doctor Rcky Mukonza, avo vari muSouth Africa, vanoti danho rekuramba muganhu uyu wakavharwa idanho rakaomera hurumende sezvo yakatarisana nezvinhu zviviri zvakakosha, hutano hwevanhu kune rimwe divi, kuchitiwo hupfumi hwenyika kune rimwe divi. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzokurudzira Kuti Muganhu weBeitbridge Umbomira Kuvhurwa

text: Vamwe vashandi vehurumende vakaverenga vanhu munyika pasi pechirongwa cheCensus chaitungamirwa neZimStat, vari kuchemachema kuti havasati vabhadharawa mari dzavo dzebasa ravakaita mwedzi mitatu yapfuura, vachiti pavachazobhadharwa mari yemunyika inenge isisina simba. Vanotiwo vave kutyira kuti vanogona kutozoshaya mari iyi zvachose sezvo hurumende yakatobudisa zvakabuda muchirongwa ichi svondo rino. Vachitaura neStudio 7, vakaverenga vanhu paCensus ava vanoti kuburitswa kwakaitwa nehurumende zvavakashanda kuri kuvapa pfungwa yekuti chirongwa ichi chatopetwa nekudaro vanogona kuzotoshaisisa mari iyi zvachose. Vamwe vakaita semumwe ada kuzivikanwa nerekuti VaZizhou chete nekutyira basa rave muhurumende vati havachina chivimbo chekuti vachawana mari iyi. Vamwe vanoti vari kurwadziwa zvikuru kuti mitengo yezvinhu iri kuita chamurambamhuru muzvitoro apo mari yemunyika iri kudonha simba zuva nezuva vachiti pavachazobharwa vanogona kuzosara vasina chekubata. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemmwe aramba kudomwa nezita rake achityira basa rake\nati pavachapuwa mari iyi inenge isingasatengi zvine musoro. Hurumende kuburikidza nebazi reZimbabwe National Statics Agency kana kuti Zimstat yakange yakavimbisa vakaverenga vanhu ava kuvabhara mari inosvika zviuru zana negumi zvemadhora emunyika kana kuti ZWDL$110 000.00, iyo yaive nehuremu hwemadhora mazana maviri ekuAmerica pakupera kwakaita chirongwa ichi muna Chivabvu. Pamusoro pazvo, vaifanirwa kubhadharwa mari dzekudzidziswa basa dzaitangaira pazviuru makumi matanhatu nezvitanhu zvemadhora emunyika kana kuti ZWDL$66 000.00, kusvika pazviuru makumi masere zvemadhora emunyika, kana kuti ZWDL$80 000.00, idzo dzinonzi dzakabharwa vamwe asi vamwe nanhasi havasati vadziwana. Asi vanoti nekuda kwekudonha kwesimba remari yemunyika, mari iyi haichakwani zana remadhora ekuAmerica kana pachishandiswa mutengo wedhora rekuAmerica pamusika mutema wanhasi. Mumwe mushandi akaverenga vanhu uye ari munyori mubazi rezvekurongwa kwenhengo dzesangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, VaAndrew Munguri, vashoropodza hurumende vachiti yakashandisa vashandi mahara. Vamwe vaverengi vanoti chiri kuvarwadza ndechekuti bazi reZimstatt harisi kuvazivisa kuti zvakamira sei? Vamwe, kunyanya vakashandira kumaruwa, vanoti vanorwadziwa chaizvo nekuti vaifamba mitunhu yakareba kuti vapedze misha yakange yakatarwa pazuva nekudaro vakazowana mari yapera simba vanenge vakashandira mahara. Mumwe muverengi ada kuzivikanwa nerekuti Muzvare Mamoyo anoti kunze kwekufamba nzendo ndefu, vaibira nzizi dzakazara vachiisa hupenyu hwavo panyanga dzamushore. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mukuru webasa muZimstat, VaTaguma Muhonde, kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichiramba kupinda. Tatumirawo mibvunzo kune vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubazi ZimStat, Muzvare Mercy Chidemo, asi vati havakwanisi kutipa mhinduro dzizere nekuti vange vari mumusangano uye havasati vaziva kuti vashandi ava vachabhdhara rinhi. Asi mumashoko kuvatori venhu, Muzvare Chidemo, vakambovimbisa vakashanda paCensus ava kuti vaizobhdharwa pakupera kwemwedzi wapfuura muna Chikumi, asi izvi hazvina kuitika. Kuverengwa kwevanhu uku kwakaratidza kuti Zimbabwe yave nevanhu vanosvika 15,178,979 kubva pahuwandu hwakawanikwa muna 2012 hwevanhu 13,061,329. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vakashanda paCensus Vonyunyuta Kuti Havasati Vabhadharwa Mwedzi Mitatu Vaita Basa Iri

text: Ongororo yakaitwa muZimbabwe neAfrobarometer ichitungamirwa neMass Public Opinion Institute, kana kuti MPOI, inoratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kufarira hurongwa hwekuti vemapato anopikisa vaumbe mubatanidzwa wekukwikwidzana nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, musarudzo dzemuna 2018. Pavanhu vakabvunzwa, zvikamu makumi mana nezvishanu kubva muzana, vakati vanowirirana nepfungwa iyi, zvikamu makumi maviri nezvisere kubva muzana, vachiti havatenderane nepfungwa iyi, ukuwo zvikamu gumi nezvinomwe kubva muzana, vachiramba kutaura. Vanoda mubatanidzwa kunyanya, vatsigiri veMDC-T zvikuru muBulawayo neHarare. Asi ongororo iyi inoratidzawo kuti dai sarudzo dzakaitwa munguva yaibvunzwa vanhu, kubva musi wa 28 Ndira kusvika musi wa 10 Kukadzi 2017, zvikamu makumi matatu nezvisere kubva muzana, vaivhotera Zanu-PF, zvikamu gumi nezvitanhatu kubva muzana, vachivhotera MDC-T, uye zvikamu zvina kubva muzana, vachitsigira Zimbabwe People First. Asi chiri kukatyamadza nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika inyaya yekuti pane vanhu vakabvunzwa ava, zvikamu makumi maviri nezvina kubva muzana, vakaramba kupa pfungwa dzavo. Izvi ndizvo zvinonzi nevamwe munongedzo wekuti vanhu vanotya kutaura vakasungunuka. Vakatungamira ongororo iyi muZimbabwe vachishanda neMPOI, VaStephen Ndoma vanoti ongororo iyi yakaitwa mumatunhu gumi ose enyika. No media source currently available Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vari mukuru weMedia Center, VaEarnest Mudzengi, vanoti vanowirirana neongororo panyaya yekuti vakawanda munyika vanoda mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa. Asi vatiwo chikuru chinodiwa muZimbabwe isarudzo dzakachena. No media source currently available
title: Ongororo yeAfrobarometer Inoti Vakawanda Vanoda Mubatanidzwa weMapato Anopikisa

text:
Vanhu makumi maviri nevasere vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro, uye vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana matatu nemakumi matatu nemumwe chete, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Kutekeshera kuri kuramba kuchiita chirwere cheCovid 19 kwave kuita kuti zimwe zvirongwa zvakasiyana-siyana zvange zvichifanirwa kuitwa munyika,
zvimbosendekwa parutivi.

Mutauriri wekanzuru yeguta reGweru, Muzvare Vimbai Chingwaramuse, vati kanzuru yange yakatara zuva ranhasi sezuva richatanga kushanda nzvimbo yeKudzanayi Bus Terminus iyo yakavakwa patsva asi izvi zvambosendekwa parutivi nekuda kwekuvelo kwechirwere cheCovid-19.

Mukuru wezvekufambiswa kweamabasa mukambani yeBen Touch iyo yakavaka nzvimbo iyi, VaDavid Kudakwashe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vange vagadzirira kuti nzvimbo iyi itange kushanda sezvo vakapedza kuita basa rakawanda rakakosha pakuti nzvimbo iyi itange kushanda. Vati kumbosendekwa parutivi kwekuvhurwa kwenzvimbo iyi kuchavapa
mukana wekunyatsokwenenzvera zvose zvinoda kupedziswa.

VaKudakwashe vati chikamu chekutanga chenzvimbo yemusika cheKudzanayi Bus Terminus chinokwana vanhu mazana mashanu nevatatu vanotengesa uye chikamu chechipiri icho vati vachatanga kuvaka munguva pfupi iri kutevera chichange chichikwana vanhu mazana matatu.

Zvichakadaro, hurumende nezuro yakazivisawo nezvekumbosendekwa
parutivi kweZimbabwe International Trade Fair kana kuti ZITF. Gungano iri range richifanirwa kuitwa mwedzi uno asi rave kuzoitwa mwedzi unouya.

Mukuru mukuru weZITF, VaNicholas Ndebele, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti ichokwadi kuti gungano iri rambosendekwa parutivi nekuda kwekutekeshera kwechirwere cheCovid-19.

Mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro zvehupfumi vari muongorori
akazvimirira, VaFelix Chari, vanoti kuparira kweCovid-19 kwave kuvhiringidza zvekare zvehupfumi nemararamiro everuzhinji zuva nezuva sezvakaitika pachakatanga kuvepo.

VaVincent Chakunda avo vanodzidzisawo zvidzidzo zvepamusoro zvehupfumi nebudiriro vanoti pane kuti hurumende irambe ichitora matanho ekuvhara nyika senzira yekurwisa kupararira kweCovid-19, zvakakosha kuti pave nemafungiro matsva.

Vachitaura pazviitiko zvakasiyana mumazuva mashoma apfuura mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pamwe nemutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano Dr John Mangwiro vakati zvakakosha kuti vanhu munyika vabaiwe nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 vachiti vashandi
vehurumende kunyanya, vanogona kumanikidzwa kuti vabaiwe nhomba iyi.

Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti kunyange
hazvo zvakakosha kuti vanhu munyika vabaiwe nhomba, hazvizi pamutemo kumanikidza vanhu kuita izvi.

Zvakabudiswa nehurumende nezuro zvinoratidza kuti vanhu chiuru
nemazana matatu nemakumi matatu nemumwe vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid munyika mose.

Kusvika nezuro pane vanhu zviuru makumi mana nezvipfumbabwe
nemazana masere nemakumi matanhatu nevana, 49, 864, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika kusvika, uye vanhu chiuru nemazana manomwe nemakumi masere nevapfumbabwe kana kuti 1789 vafa munyika mose. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga vava zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nezvinomwe nezana nemakumi mashanu nemumwe, 777,151, uye vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vava zvuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nezvishanu nemazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe, 555,277. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matatnhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzivirira kuparararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available
title: Covid-19 Yoita Kuti Zvimwe Zvirongwa Zvimiswe Munyika

text: Politburo yeZanu-PF nemusi weChitatu yakaita musangano ikaumba komiti ichatungamirwa nemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika Retired General Constantino Chiwenga kuti iongororore kuti chii chiri kukonzera kuti mitengo yezvinhu irambe ichiita chamurambamhuru kukwira. Vachitaura pakapera musangano uyu, mutauriri weZanu-PF VaSimon Khaya Moyo vakaudza vatori venhau kuti pane vamwe vemabhizimisi vave kuda kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika nekudhurisa zvinhu. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi ichishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe Doctor Prosper Chitambara vanoti hurumende inofanira kuita mubatira pamwe nevamwe kuti igadzirise dambudziko iri. Vati hurumende inofanira kutaura nevemabhizimisi nevanopikisa nekuti iyo yega haingakwanise kugadzirisa zvinhu zviri kunetsa munyaya dzezvehupfumi. No media source currently available
title: General Chiwenga Votungamira Komiti Yekuongorora Kukwira kweMitengo

text: Munyori mukuru wedare reparamende VaKennedy Chokuda vanoti nhengo dzedare reparamende dzakasarudzwa musarudzo dziri kuzotoreswa mhiko mangwana. Nhengo idzi dzikange dzatoreswa mhiko zvinenge zvoreva kuti mutungamiti wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanenge vokwanisa kusarudza dare ravo remakurukota. Asi dzimwe nhengo dzeMDC Alliance dzinenge dzichatadza kutora mhiko nekuti dziri kusungwa kana kuda kusungwa nemapurisa dzichipomerwa mhosva dzakasiyana siyana. Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti mapurisa nezuro akaenderera mberi nekusunga vakuru uye nhengo dzesangano reMDC Alliance dzichipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga. Mapurisa akasunga VaHappymore Chidziva vakasarudzwa kumiririra Highfield West mudare reparamende uye vari mutungamiri weYouth Assembly yebato iri. Vamwe vakasungwa vanosanganisa VaChamunorwa Madya vanova mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru weMDC Youth Assembly uye VaMafaiti Mubaiwa vanoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwemuzinda webato iri weRichard Morgan Tsvangirai House. Mapurisa anoti akavasunga vatatu ava pasi pemutemo weCriminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act. Vakasungwa ava vari kutarisira kumiswa pamberi pematare nhasi. Vanonzi vaitaura mashoko ekupesvedzera mhirizhonga munyika. VaMubayiwa naVaMadya vari kupinda mudare muHarare nhasi. Vari kunzi vakaratidzira muHarare musi wa 1 Nyamavhuvhu apo mauto akazopfura vanhu vatanhatu. Asi VaChidziva avo vakaendeswa kuGweru nezuro kwavanonzi vakataura mashoko ekukukurudzira mhirizhonga muna Chikunguru pakutsvaga rutsigiro. Asi VaChidziva vari kuti vari kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights VaKumbirai Mafunda vanoti magweta avo ane nhengo dzakawanda dzeMDC Alliance dzavari kumiririra. No media source currently available
title: VaHappymore "Cde Bvondo" Chidziva Vosungwa Vamwe Vachitoreswa Mhiko neChitatu

text: Mhuri yeMDC-T mudunhu reMashonaland Central iri kuchema kushaya kwasachigaro webato iri mudunhu iri, VaJustine Chitate, avo vakashaya nemusi weSvondo. VaChitate vanonzi vakadonha vachibva vashaya mushure mekunge vachangopedza kutaura pagungano rekurangarira imwe nhengo yebato ravo yakashaya masvondo adarika. Mutauriri webato reMDC-T mudunhu reMashonaland Central, VaSaymore Mhene, vanoti mutumbi waVaChitate warara kumba kwavo kuWaterfalls usiku hweMuvhuro uye waendeswa kumusha kwavo mubhuku rekwaNzvere, kwaNy’ava kuBindura, uko vari kutarisira kuradzikwa neChitatu. VaMhene vanoti sebato varasikirwa zvikuru nekushaya kwaVaChitate, sezvo vanga vari baba, mukoma, mutungamiri uye chipangamazano kumunhu wese, kwete nhengo dzeMDC-T chete. VaChitate vanonzi vasiya mhuri yakakura ine vana vanodarika makumi maviri. No media source currently available
title: Mashonaland Central Inochema Kushaya kwaVaChitate veMDC-T

text: Paita kusimudzirana mapfumo mubato reZimbabwe People First (ZimPF) mudunhu reMashonaland West apo hutungamiri hwedunhu iri hwakambomisa sachigaro waro, Amai Marian Chombo, pamusangano wavakaita neMugovera vachivapomera mhosva yekutadza kubatanidza nhengo mudunhu uye kutonga nedemo zvisina pfungwa dzevamwe. Komiti iyi, iyo yakagara musangano wayo kuHarare, yakabvumirana kuti vakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro, Amai Chombo, vambomira kutungamira sezvo vatadza kutungamira zvakanaka bato iri mudunhu reMashonaland West. Musangano uyu, uyo wakapindwa nenhengo dzakabva kumatunhu gumi nemapfumbamwe pamatunhu makumi maviri nemaviri ari mudunhu rose, wakasunga chibvumirano chekuti Amai Chombo vambomira kufambisa basa mudunhu uye vasamiririre dunhu kukomiti yenyika. Vachitaura neStudio7, murongi wemisangano mubato iri, Muzvare Abgail Sauti, vati kubvira pakagadzwa Amai Chombo, vanga vachidzinga nhengo dzisingabvumirane navo vachiti vainge vatumwa nemutungamiri webato, Amai Joyce Mujuru. Muzvare Sauti vati bato reZimPF harife rakatonga sezvo vanhu vakawanda vaodzwa moyo nevanhu vasingagone kutungamira. Kusawirirana uku kwaitawo kuti dzimwe nhengo dzibude mubato iri dzichidzokera kuMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai. VaTendai Musonza, avo vaive mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru, vanyorera bato reMDC-T vachikumbira kudzokera kubato iri. VaMusonza vanoti vaneta nemahumbwe ari kuitwa kuZimPF. VaMusonza vanoti nyonga nyonga iri kuitika kuZimPF inoratidza kuti ZimPF chibande cheZanu PF. Studio7 haina kunzwa kuna Amai Chombo pavamire, kanawo kubata Amai Mujuru kuti tinzwe divi ravo, Asi mutauriri webato reZimPF, VaJealous Mawarire, vanoti Amai Chombo ndivo vachiri mutungamiri wedunhu reMashonaland West sezvo vakadzingwa zvisiri pamutemo. VaMawarire vanoti chekutanga ndechekuti musangano uyu wakaitirwa kuHarare asi uri wedunhu reMash West uye vanoti nhengo dzakapinda musangano uyu dzakaburitswa mubato pamwe nevamwe vatungamiriri vakaita saVa Rugare Gumbo, VaDydmus Mutasa, Amai Magret Dongo pamwe nevamwe. No media source currently available
title: Amai Marian Chombo Vokonzera Mutauro muZim PF Vachitsigirwa naAmai Mujuru?

text: No media source currently available
title: America Yopinda muSarudzo Dzepakati peTemu yeHurumende Vachitsvaga Vadare

text: Mitambo yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League yatsvuka ropa apo zvikwata zvine mukurumbira zvodamburana. Mutambo mukuru uriko ndeuyo uri kuBarbourfields kuBulawayo neSvondo pakati pechikwata chiri kutungamira makwikwi eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League cheChicken Inn, nechikwata chine mukombe uyu cheDynamos. Uyu ndiwo mutambo wakanyanyokoshesesa pazvikwata zviviri izvi panguva ino yemwaka yemitambo zvekuti kuchange kusingadanwe anonzwa musi uyu. Muongorori wezvemutambo wenhabvu VaMisheck Chisaga vanoti vari kuona mutambo uyu uchinakidza zvikuru. Chikwata cheChicken Inn chikakunda chinenge chave pedyo pedyo nekutora mukombe wakakosha uyu, asi kukundwa kwacho nekubudirira kweFC Platinum iyo iri kutamba neTsholotsho Pirates, kunopa kuti mabhiza akawanda apinde mumujahwo. Pari zvino, Chicken Inn iri kutungamira nemapoinzi makumi mana nemapfumbamwe ichi teverwa neFC Platinum iyo ine maponzi makumi mana nemana. Dynamos ine mapoinzi makumi mana nemaviri. Murairidzi weDynamos Tonderayi Ndiraya anoti panguva ino hapasi pekutambisa mapoinzi achiti chikwata chake chiri kuda kukunda mumitambo yese yasara kusanganisa weChicken Inn uyowu. Asi vaChisaga vanoti semaonero avo Dynamos haisi kumira mumutambo uyu mushure mekunge yarohwa 3-0 apo zvikwata izvi zvakasangana muHarare. FC Platinum iyo iri kukwikwidzawo zvine mutsindo iri kubandana neTsholotsho Pirates muWhite City Stadium neMugovera. Mushure mekubuda mumakwikwi eChibuku Super Cup murairidzi wechikwata ichi Norman Mapeza anoti rigi ndicho chave chinangwa chavo. Vachiona mairiro akaita zvinhu, VaChisaga vanofunga kuti Mapeza nechikwata chake ndivo vachatora mukombe mukuru uyu nezviuru zana zvemadhora izvo zvichapihwa vachakunda. Panguva imwecheteyo, varairidzi vatsva kuzvikwata zvavo Lloyd Chitembwe weCaps United naAmini Soma-Phiri wekuHighlanders vari kusanga muNational Sports Stadium neSvondo. Mumitambo miviri yatambwa Chitembwe achirairidza chikwata cheCaps United, atora mapoinzi mana zvekuti vatsigiri vake vatanga kuimba nekumupembedza mushure menguva refu vasati vaita izvi. Asi vachaimba zvekare here neBosso? Uyu ndiwo mubvunzo une vatsigiri vakawanda veCaps United, asi veBosso vachiti nhasi ndezveduwo. Mimwe mitambo irko ndeiyi, Chapungu v Buffaloes Flame Lilly v ZPC Kariba Harare City v Triangle Whawha v How Mine Dongo v Hwange Zvakamira zvakadai, gurukota idzva rezvemitambo VaMakhosini Hlongwane vatanga basa ravo vaine uturu mushure mekutuma veSport and Recreation Commission kuti vaongorore nyaya yekuti Zimbabwe yakatumira vatambi vaive vakakuvara kumakundano e2015 Africa Games ayo akaitirwa kuCongo. No media source currently available
title: Makwikwi eNhabvu Otsvuka Ropa apo Dynamos Yotatsurana neChicken Inn

text: Mumiriri weZengeza West mudare reparamende VaJob Sikhala, vakumbira nhasi kuti mutongi wenyaya yavari kupomerwa nemumiriri weChitungwiza North yekupesvedzera mhirizhonga asave nechekuyita nenyaya iyi. VaSikhala vari kupomerwa mhosvba iyi pamwe nemumiriri weChitungwiza North mudare reparamende VaGodfrey Sithole. Magweta aSikhala asvitsa chikumbiro ichi kudare nhasi achiti haana kufara nemashoko amejastiriti Muzvare Tafadzwa Miti pavainyima VaSikhala mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso pane imwe mhosva yavaipomerwa nezuro. Kunyangwe VaSikhala vasungwa kanaodarika makumi matanhatu nemana havana kumbobvira vabatwa nemhosva asi mejastiriti Miti mukupa mutongo wavo vakati VaSikhala inhinhi inoramba ichityora mutemo. Izvi zvakakatyamadza vanhu vainge vari mudare nezuro pamwe nemagweta aVaSikhala. Rimwe gweta raVaSikhala, VaJeremiah Bamu vaudza Studio 7 kuti nekuda kwemashoko aya, vaona zvakakodzera kuti mutongi uyu asanzwe nyaya iri kupomerwa VaSikhala naVaSithole. VaBamu vatiwo vachasvitsa chikumbiro chizere kudare chiri muhunyorwa vachipa zvikonzero zvizere panhuna dzaVaSikhala. Gweta rehurumende panyaya iyi, VaGeorge Manokore, vati ikodzero yemusungwa kuti nyaya yake itongwe zvake vakati vachazopawo dare mhinduro yavo iri muhunyorwa kana vawana zvinyorwa zvemagweta aVaSikhala. Gweta raVaSithole, VaOliver Marwa, vati havana dambudziko nechikumbiro chaVaSikhala vakati vachatevedzera zvese zvinenge zvaturwa nedare pachikumbiro chaVaSikhala. Mutongi wedare ati achatura mutongo wake musi wa Zvita 7 wekuti ogeza maoko ake panyaya iyi here kana kuti kwete mushure mekunge averenga zvinyorwa zvemagweta aVaSikhala pamwe nevachuchisi. VaBamu vati kana Muzvare Miti vakaramba kugeza maoko avo panyaya iyi vachakwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro. VaSikhala vari kutarisirwawo kudzoka kudare mangwana pavakatarisira kupihwa mutongo pachikumbiro chavo chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo pane imwe mhosva yavari kupomerwa vari vega yekunzi vakavhiringidza mafambisirwo enyaya mumatare zvichitevera kupambwa nekuzopondwa kwakaitwa nhengo yebato ravo reCitizens Coalition for Change, Muzvare Moreblessing Ali. Asi VaSikhala vari kuramba mhosva iyi vachiti vakazopomerwa mhosva iyi ivo vatosungwa kare uye hapana chavakwanisa kukanganisa mukusungwa kweinofungidzirwa kuti inhengo yeZanu PF, VaPius Jamba Mukandi, avo vakazosungwa vakabvuma mudare kuti ndivo vakapamba pamwe nekuponda Muzvare Ali. VaSikhala vave nemazuva zana nemakumi matanhatu vari muhusungwa zvichitevera kusungwa kwavakaitwa muna Chikumi mushure mekupambwa nekupondwa kwaMuzvare Ali nhengo yebato ravo reTripple C. Mhuri yemufi haisi kuzoviga mutumbi waMuzvare Ali kudzamara VaSikhala, avo vanove gweta remhuri iyi, vaburitswa muhusungwa. Mune imwewo nyaya yanga iri mumatare, imwe nhengo yeCCC inozivikanwa zvikuru nezita rekuti Madzibaba Veshanduko, VaGodfrey Karembera, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita musarinya nekuda kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika vachinzi vaifamba muHarare vachikurudzira vanhu kuti vavhotere VaNelson Chamisa veTripple C vanzi vagodzoka kudare muna Ndira gore rinouya. Dare rabvisawo zvaranga rasunga kuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso zvekuti vazvipire kumapurisa ekuGuruve kaviri pasvondo rega-rega kudzamara nyaya yavari kupomerwa yapera kunzwikwa mumatare. VaKarembera vati vafara zvikuru nekurerutsirwa kwavaitirwa nedare. CCC inoti nhengo dzayo idzi dziri kushungurudzwa zvine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika pasina mhosva yadzakapara. Asi bato reZanu PF rinoti harinei nemafambisirwo enyaya mumatare ukuwo hurumende ichiti munhu wese anomira nemhosva dzake mumatare zvisinei nekuti abuda mumba maani. No media source currently available
title: VaSikhala Vanoti Mejasitiriti Miti Vasatonge Nyaya Yavo Nekuti Havasi Mutongi Gava

text: Kanzuru yeguta reHarare inoti iri mushishi rekugadzirisa zvechimbi chimbi pombi dzinofambisa mvura inenge yanaya. Kanzuru inoti iri kuita izvi senzira yekudzivirira kuti mvura isarasikire kwese kwese sezvakaitika pakanaya mvura mazuva mashoma apfuura. Meya veHarare, Va Bernard Manyenyeni, vanoti vagari vemuguta iri vanofanirwa kusakanda marara mupombi dzinofamba nemvura sezvo pombi idzi dziri idzo dzinoita kuti dambudziko remafashamu emvura riderere. VaManyenyeni, avo vakasarudzwa netiketi reMDC-T kuva meya weHarare gore rapera, vanoti kanzuru iri kushanda nevemadzisvondo, masangano akazvimirira pamwe nevagari vemuHarare paine chinangwa chekukoshesa hutsanana uye kuti vanhu vasarasire marara munzvimbo dzisingakodzeri. Izvi zvikabudirira zvinoita kuti mapombi emvura afambise mvura zvakanaka kana yanaya sezvo anenge asingadzipwe nemarara. Dzimwe nzvimbo muguta reHarare neMuvhuro dzaisafambika nevedzimota sezvo mvura yainge yakawanda ichotoita sekune mafashamu. VaManyenyeni vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kugadzirira kubvisa dzimota dzavo munzvimbo dzinojenga mvura kana panaya mvura yakawandisa Asi vamwe vanoongorora mabasa ekanzuru vanoti dai kanzuru yagadzirisa dambudziko rekutakurwa kwemarara munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana sezvaimboitwa kare. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemvura nehutano dzinotiwo kana mvura ikanaya zvakasimba, inokukura marara ose ayo anozopedzisira avhara mapombi anofambisa mvura. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti mvura dzine tsvina dzikajengera, dzinokonzera zvirwere kuvanhu vanotsika mvura idzi. Kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvakambenge zvashata muHarare apo Zanu PF yaitonga yega isina bato rakasimba raiipikisa, zvinhu zvakamboita nani muna 2000 apo meya weHarare vakapinda netikiti reMDC, Engineer Elias Mudzuri, vakatora matanho ekugadzirisa migwagwa nekutakurwa kwemarara. Asi VaMudzuri havana kugara kwenguva yakareba vari meya weguta zvichitevera kubviswa kwavakaitwa pachigaro negurukota rezvematunhu, VaIgnatius Chombo, vachivapomera mhosva dzenhando. Izvi zvakaita kuti kanzuru yeHarare ishande iri pasi pekomisheni yakadomwa naVaChombo iyo yaitungamirwa naAmai Sekesai Makwavarara. No media source currently available
title: Harare Yokurudzira Vanhu Kusarasira Marara Mupombi dzeMvura

text: Sangano reUnited States Agency for International Development kana kuti USAID rinoti radzivirira rufu rwaigona kuitika kuvana vanodarika zviuru zvitatu kuManicaland zvichikonzerwa nekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika. USAID inoti kubva muna 2010 kusvika muna 2015 yakwanisa kubatsira vana vanodarika zviuru zvitatu zvaigona kushaya zvisati zvasvika pamakore mashanu. Amai Lucia Gumbo vanoshanda nesangano reUSAID iri vanoti zvirongwa zvavo zvakanangana nekubatsira vana amai vanoshaya muManicaland. Vanoti vanoshanda nebazi rezvehutano uye vanowanzoona vanenge vachida kubatsirwa apo vanenge vaenda kumakirinika. Zvinhu muZimbabwe hazvina kumira zvakanyaka zvichikonzerwa nekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura uye kusamira zvakanaka kwakaita hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available
title: USAID Yobatsira Vana Zviuru Zvitatu Vange Voziya neNzara kuManicaland

text: Munyori mukuru wesangano rinomirira vanoita zvekutengesa reZimbabwe Chamber Of The Informal Economy Associations VaWisdom Malaya, avo vari kushanya muno muAmerica vanoti vari kufadzwa neruzivo rwavari kuwana sezvo rwuchabatsira basa ravari kuita munyika. VaMalaya mumwe wezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvitatu zviri muAmerica pasi pechirongwa chiri kukokerwa nesangano reGlobal Labour University, apo vachange vari muno kwemavhiki maviri. Pasi pechirongwa ichi VaMalaya vachange vachizeya nedzimwe nyanzvi dzepasi rose pamusoro pematambudziko avari kusangana nawo munyika zvikuru kune vanotengesera mumigwagwa. Vanoti vachange vachiwana mukana wekunzwawo kubva kune vekune dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica kuti vari kubata seyi dambudziko rakadai. Nyanzvi idzi, idzo dziri kusangana muAmerica dzinosvika mazana matatu. VaMalaya vanoti shuwiro yavo ndeyekuti masangano anomirira vanoita zvekutengesa mumigwagwa seravo arambe achizeya nehurumende kuti vawane nzira dzekugadzirisa matambudziko ari kutarisana nevanotengesa mumigwagwa mumatunhu akawanda munyika. VaMalaya vachaenda kuchikoro chepamusoro chePennsylvania State University chiri kuPennsylvania muno muAmerica kwevhiki imwechete vasati vadzokera kuZimbabwe. Musangano mukuru uyu uri pasi pedingindira rekuti "Sharing the Gains – Containing Corporate Power", kureva kuti kushanda pamwe kuchengetedza masimba emakambani madiki kuti akwikwidze nemakambani makuru. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo yeZimbabwe Chamber of The Informal Economy Associations Yoshanya kuAmerica.

text: Zvikoro zvakavhurwa neMuvhuro kune vana vasiri kunyora bvunzo uye kune dzimwe nzvimbo zvinhu zvange zvakaita manyama amire nerongo sezvo vamwe vabereki vange voita chipatapata nhaka yemakonzo kutsvagira vana nzvimbo vamwe vototanga kudzidza. Mumwe mubereki ange achiyedza kutsvagira mwana wake nzvimbo yechikoro kwaMutare ndiVaTakunda Majeza avo vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya yelockdown ndiyo yakapa kuti vadye manonoko. Amai Jesca Tarasika mumwe mubereki ange achiri kutsvagira mwana nzvimbo vati vakuru vepachikoro chiri pedyo navo ndivo vakapa kuti vakundikana kunyoresa mwana wavo nenguva sezvo pavaienda vaiwana pasina ari kunyoresa vana. Vamwe vakaita saAmai Susan Muchenje vanorarama nekutengesa pamusika vanoti nyaya yekukundikana kuunganidza mari yechikoro nenguva yakapa kuti vanonoke kutsvagira mwana wavo nzvimbo yeForm One pachikoro cheSacred Heart Secondary. Amai Vivian Chitambo vanochema nerekuti vezvikoro vari kuramba kutambira mari yechikoro isina kukwana kunyangwe hazvo vabereki vakaremerwa nenyaya yelockdown. Zvichakadaro, mumwe mubereki ane mwana paChancellor Junior School muno maMutare, uye vaimbove meya weguta VaTatenda Nhamarare vanoti vanogutsikana nematanho ari kutorwa nezvikoro mukuedza kuchengetedza vana kubva kudenda reCovid 19. Svondo rapera mukuru anoona nezvedzidzo mudunhu reManicaland VaEdward Shumba vakaudza vatori venhau pakugamuchidzwa kwezvikwanisiro zvekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid 19 muzvikoro kuti vanofara nerubatsiro ruri kuramba richiuya kubva kubazi rezvedzidzo. Sachigaro wechimwe chikoro chichiri kutanga cheSacred Heart of Jesus Christ Secondary vaCasper Pound vanoti vasangana nedambudziko revana vawandisa asi vasina pekuti vana ava vawane pekudzidzira pakanaka. Kunyangwe hazvo zvikoro zvavhurwa nhasi pachikamu chepiri mukuru werimwe sangano rinomirira vadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ kudunhu reMashonaland West VaRosten Mutapa vanoti vana chete ndochete variko sezvo varairidzi vasiko kana kuti hapana chavari kudzidzisa. Mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara nemafambiro aita zvinhu muzikoro. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti kuBulawayo vamwe vabereki vari kunyunyata nekurambirwa nezvikoro kutambira mari inobhadharwa nemakadhi, vamwe nekudzorererwa vana nekusabvisa mari yakakwana. KuMashonaland West vamwe vabereki vafumobata jongwe muromo kuenda kuzvikoro kunoyedza kunyoresa vana. No media source currently available
title: Zvikoro Zvovhurwa Vamwe Vabereki Vasati Vawana Nzvimbo

text: Gweta guru renyika yeAmerica VaWilliam Barr neChipiri vakati hapana humbowo hwekuti sarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica dzakabirirwa sezviri kutaurwa nemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump. VaTrump avo vakakundwa musarudzo naVaJoe Biden vari kuenda kumatare vachipikisa zvakabuda musarudzo asi nyaya dzavo zhinji dziri kuraswa dzichinzi hadzina humbowo hwakakwana. VaJoe Biden avo vakakunda musarudzo iyi varikuenderera mberi vachidoma makurukota ehurumende yavo idzva apo vari kutarisirwa kugadzwa semutungamiri mutsva muna Ndira gore rinouya. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika Doctor Moses Rumano vanodzidzisa paFriends University kuWinchita, Kansas muno muAmerica vanoti vanetariso yekuti VaBiden vachagadzwa pasina mutauro uye vanoti mashoko egweta guru renyika yeAmerica anoratidza kuti nyika iyi ine hutongi hwejekerere "Zvino fadza kuti gweta guru renyika yeAmerica VaBarr avo vakagadzwa naVaTrump vanokwanisa kutaura zviri pachena kuti sarudzo hadzina kubirirwa izvo zvinoratidza kuti matare emunyika iyi haateedzere zvinodiwa nemutungamiri wenyika asi zviri pasi pemutemo," No media source currently available
title: Gweta Guru Renyika yeAmerica Rinoti Hapana Humbowo Hwekuti Sarudzo dzeMutungamiri Wenyika Iyi Dzakabirirwa

text: Vamwe vemabhizimisi vari kuchema chema kuti mari yemadhora ekunze inosvika zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana kana kuti 40% inotorwa neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, vopihwa mari yemunyika pane zvavanenge vatengesa kunze iri kukanganisa zvikuru maitiro ebasa nekuti kana vodawo kutenga mari yekunze pamusika weForeign Exhange Auction zvinenge zvonetsa. Muna Ndira, RBZ yakawedzera mari inobatirwa makambani anotengesa zvinhu kunze achipihwa mari yemunyika nemutengo wedhora uri pamutemo kubva pazvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana. Gavhuna weRBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, mumashoko kuvatri venhau pakavandudzwa mutemo uyu vakati Monetary Policy Committee yebhanga ravo yainge yasangana ikabuda nechisungo chekuwedzera mari inofanira kuendeswa kubhanga ravo senzira yekudzikamisa musika wemari weRBZ Foreign Exchange Market Sachigaro weAfrica CEO Roundtable, VaOswell Binha, vanoti mari iri kubatwa iyi yave kukanganisa mabhizimisi zvakanyanya. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemutungamiri wesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, Doctor Israel Murefu, vati vemabhizimisi vari kuchema chema nemari dzavari kubatirwa. Vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende igare pasi itaure nevemakambani ava vowirirana mari inokodzerwa kutengeswa kuRBZ nemutengo uri pasi. Vaimbova mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaCallisto Jokonya, vati mari iri kubatwa iyi yaunza kugadzikana munyaya dzezvehupfumi vakati zvinhu zvangokanganiswa nechirwere cheCovid-19 chopa kuti vemabhizimisi vaite mari shoma sezvo vasiri kutengesa zvinhu zvakawanda. No media source currently available
title: Mabhizimisi Anoti Mitemo yeMari yeKunze Yave Kudzikisira Mabasa Avo

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoshanda nekugara muBotswana zvine chivimbo chikuru chokuti kusimudzirwa kwehushamwari hwenyika mbiri idzi kuchagadzirisa zviri kunetsa vana veZimbabwe munyika iyi. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio7 mudhorobha reFrancistown, Botswana yaratidza kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara nekushanda munyika iyi zvinotarisira nechivimbo chikuru kuti kumutsidzirwa kwehushamwari hweZimbabwe neBotswana kuchagadzirisa zvinetswa zvavari kusangana nazvo. Nyika mbiri idzi dzakanyorerana chibvumirano chekuvandudza hushamwari hwadzo kubva mujoint commission kuti huve bi-national commission muchirongwa chichaita kuti vatungamiriri venyika mbiri idzi vasange gore negore vachizeya zvinetswa zvinosanganisira nyaya dzezvehupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika. Chiitiko ichi chakaitika nemugovera mudhorobha guru reWindhoek muNamibia uko kwangakwabatirwa musangano hwe Southern African Development Community (SADC) hwechimakumi matatu nerusere. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, vaita vafakazi mukusainirana uku. Vachitaura neStudio7, chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaRomeo Goveya, vati vanoshuwira kuti chibvumirano ichi chichabatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara nekushanda muBotswana munyaya dzemapepa. Kunze kwenyaya yemapepa, vamwe vari kuchema chema nenyaya dzezvipfuwo. Muzvare Moreblessing Garai vanoti mamwe anotorwa neBotswana muhurongwa hwayo hwekurwisa chirwere cheFoot-and-Mouth Disease akaipira vagari vekuPlumtree. Mombe dzevarimi veZimbabwe dzinorasikira muBotswana dzinopfurwa nemapurisa pamwe nevashandi vebazi rezvekurima venyika iyi. VaTom Sinyoro vanoti chirongwa ichi chingabatsira kwazvo mukugadzirisa nyaya dzekugara nekushanda kwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe muBotswana. Nyanzwi mune zvezvipfuyo, VaPrince Gurure, vati chibvumirano ichi chichabatsira zvikuru zvizvarwa zvenyika mbiri idzi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, dzidzo nemabasa. Kunze kweBotswana, Zimbabwe ine chibvumirano che bi-national commission neSouth Africa icho chayakasaina mugore ra2016. No media source currently available
title: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvotarisira Hukama Hutsva Huri Pakati peZimbabwe neBotswana

text: Mumwe wevatevedzerivemutungamiri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, Engineer Elias Mudzuri, vanoti sebato rinoremekedza mitemo nekodzero dzevanhu, vanotarisira kuti mutungamiri mutsva wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vachagadzirisa mitemo inombunyikidza kufambiswa kwesarudzo kwakanaka. Vachitaura vari kumucheto kwemhemberero dzekutoreswa mhiko kwaVaMnangagwa, VaMudzuri vati hurumende itsva inofanirwa kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu vese kuitira kuti munyika muite zvinhu zvinofambira mberi. VaMudzuri vanoti tarisiro yavo ndeyekuti VaMnangagwa vaone kuti mitemo isiri kuenderana nebumbiro remitemo yenyika yagadziriswa, dzinhepfenyuro nemapepanhau ehurumende zvoshandawo zvichiremekedza mapato ose pasina rusara. VaMudzuri, avo vakambova meya weHarare akaita mukurumbira asi vakazobviswa nehurumende yeZanu PF nenzira isina kutsarukana, vanoti VaMnangagwa vanofanirwa kuziva kuti vanhu vakaenda mumigwagwa vachivatsigira vakawanda vacho vakange vari vemasangano akazvimirira pamwe nevemapato anopikisa. VaMudzuri vanoti vari kutarisira kuti panoitwa sarudzo gore rinouya, hurumende yaVaMnangagwa inenge yagadzirisa pamwe nekuvandudza mitemo inobata nyaya dzesarudzo. No media source currently available
title: MDC-T Inoti VaMnangagwa Vanofanirwa Kuona Kuti Hurumende Yavo Yavandudza Mitemo yeSarudzo

text: Mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vatumira mashoko enyaradzo kumhuri, hama, shamwari nevagari veguta reJohannesburg, vachichema vaimbova meya weguta reJohannesburg, VaJolidee Matongo, avo vakafa mutsaona yemotikari nemusi weMugovera. Mumashoko avo enyaradzo, VaRamaphosa vati zvinorwadza kunzwisisa chiitiko ichi, zvikuru kana vakatarisa kushanda kwaiitwa naVaMatongo, uye kudyidzana kwavaiita naivo VaRamaphosa, nevagari vemuSoweto. VaMatongo, avo vana baba mubereki vakaberekerwa muZimbabwe, vange vave nemakore makumi mana nematanhatu.Vakashaya vachibva kuSoweto kunokurudzira vatsigiri vebato ravo, reAfrican National Congress, kuti vanonyoresa kuvhota. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, vachidzidzisa paTswane University of Technology, muPretoria, Muzvinafundo Ricky Mukonza, vanoti kunyange hazvo vamwe vanhu vachifungira kuti VaMatongo vakaurawa nevamwe vavo vezvematongerwo enyika, sekuvona kwavo, iyi itsaona isingaratidzi kuti pane chikiribidi chakaitwa. No media source currently available
title: VaRamaphosa Vanonyaradza Mhuri yaVaimbova Meya weJohannesburg, VaJolidee Matongo

text: Mhuri idzi dzinonzi dzave kutyirawo kuti dzimwe dzimba dzavo dzinogona kuwondomoka nekuda kwemamiriro adzaita mushure memvura iyi. Mhuri dzinodarika zviuru zviviri dzinogara papurazi reCabatsha kunze kweguta reBulawayo dzinonzi dzave kugara pamwe nekurara pamhene zvichitevera kuparadzwa kwedzimba dzadzo nedutu nemafashamu emvura neMugovera wapfuura. Mhuri idzi dzinonzi dzave kutyirawo kuti dzimwe dzimba dzavo dzinogona kuwondomoka nekuda kwemamiriro adzaita mushure memvura iyi. Sachigaro werimwe remasangano anomirira vagari reBulawayo Progressive Residents Association, VaEdias Shumba, vanoti sesangano vanonzwira vagari ava urombo zvikuru, sezvo vachikwanisa kuzobatwa nezvirwere zvinokonzerwa nekugara pamwe nekurara panze uye mvura yakasviba. Vanoti sesangano vari kuedzawo kuunganidza rubatsiro rwekupa mhuri idzi, asi vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kupindira kuti ibatsire. No media source currently available
title: Dutumupengo, Mafashamu, Zvoparadza Dzimba kuCabatsha kuBulawayo

text: Muzvinafundo Sam Moyo avo vaitungamira sangano reAfrican Institute for Agrarian Studies uye vaimbova chipangamazano chehurumende munyaya dzezvekurima vakashaya munjodzi yemumugwagwa kuNew Dehli, India nemusi weMugovera uko vainge vaenda kumusangano. Mutumbi waVaMoyo uri kutarisirwa kuuya kuZimbabwe nemusi weChitatu uye vari kutarisirwa kuradzikwa nemusi weMugovera. Muzvinafundo Moyo vakamboshanda paUniversity of Zimbabwe uye vakambova mukuru wesangano reSouthern African Regional Institute for Policy Studies (SAPES). Vakanyorawo mabhuku anosanganisa rinonzi 'Land and Agrarian Reform in Zimbabwe: Beyond White Settler Capitalism.' Vanotungamira sangano reSAPES Trust Dr. Ibbo Mandaza, avo vakashanda kwenguva yakareba namuzvinafundo Moyo, vanoti nyika yarasikirwa negamba chairo. Muzvinafundo Moyo vakadzidza kuSierra Leone, Canada nekuBritain uye vasiya vana vashanu vasikana. No media source currently available
title: Muzvinafundo Sam Moyo Vanoshaya Mutsaona yeMumugwagwa kuNew Dehli, India

text:
Vanhu vakawanda vanorangarira kubviswa nechisimba kwakaitwa vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe vamwe vanhu vakawanda vachiti zvinhu zvatonyanya kuoma munyika. Vamwe vakaita semumwe mugari wekwaRusape, VaFambayi Fambayi, vanoti zvinhu zvaive nani munguva yaVaMugabe sezvo VaMugabe vaitombomira mira kugadzirisa zvinhu izvo vanoti zviri kutadza kuitwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa.

VaArthur Changara, avo vakapedza zvidzidzo zvavo paMidlands State University, vanoti kudzidza kwavo kwakarwadza pasi pehutongi hwaVa Mnangagwa. VaChangara vanoti munguva yaVaMugabe vaikwanisa kurarama vachidya pachikoro asi pari zvino, vave kupihwa mari shoma nevabereki sezvo vabereki vavo vasisawane mari sezvavaimboita munguva yaVaMugabe.

Mukuru wesangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvainge zvakaoma munguva yaVaMugabe, varairidzi vaipihwa mari yavo iri yemadhora ekuAmerica izvo zviri kutadza kuitwa naVaMnangagwa. VaMasararure vanoti nguva yaVaMugabe vaipihwa mari yavo yebhonasi
yakakwana nemabhenefitsi ose izvo zvashanduka munguva ino yaVaMnangagwa vari panyanga.

VaMasaraure vanoti chimwe chinoita kuti vadzidzisi vaone kunge nguva
yaVaMugabe zvinhu zvanga zvarinani ndechekuti VaMugabe vaive
nekakuremekedza vadzidzisi nekuti vaitaurirana navo kwete zvehurumende yaVaMnangagwa.

Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatswayo,
vanotiwo huori nekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kwanyanya munguva
yaVaMnangagwa.

Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rebato reZanu PF sezvo mutauriri webato iri,
VaPatrick Chinamasa, avo vanga vambovimbisa kutaura nesu, vange
vasisadavire nharembozha yavo. Asi mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti zvinhu zvava nani pasi pehutungamiri hwaVaMnangagwa.

Vaimbove gurukota muhurumende yaVaMugabe, VaJonathan Moyo, avo vari muhupoteri, vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter vachitenda mudzimai waVaMugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe, kuti vakavanunura kuti vasaurayiwe nemasoja. Asi VaMoyo havana kutaura kuti vakanunurwa sei. VaMugabe, avo vakashaya gore rapera, vakamanikidzwa kusiya basa makore matatu apfuura mwedzi uno, izvo zvakaita kuti VaMnangagwa vapinde panyanga. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe, Makore Matatu VaMugabe Vabviswa Zvine Ganyabvu Mukati

text: Huwandu hwevana vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 pachikoro cheChinhoyi High kuMashonaland West hwakwira kusvika pamakumi mashanu nevasere. Mukuru webazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West Dr Gift Masoja vatenda kuti huhwandu uhu hwakwira zvakanyanaya. Izvi zviunoteveras kuvhenekwa kwevana vechikoro mushure mekunge mumwe mwana musikana abatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera svondo rapera. VaMasoja vati vana ava parizvino vari kuongororwa vari pachikoro nevashandi vebazi rezvehutano asi vanengev ave kuratidza kurwara vanoendeswa kunochengeterwa vari kurwarisa kana kuti Isolation\nCentre iri pakiriniki yekanzuru yeMuzari. Dr Masoja vati kubatwa kwevana ava nechirwere ichii hakusi kukanganisa bvunzo sezvo avo vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vari kunyora vari pakasiyana nevasina kubatwa chirwere. Vana vanodzidza\nvachibva kumba vari kunyora bvunzo vari vegawo. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemukuru webazi rezvedzidzo mudunhu reMashonalannd West VaGabriel Mhuma avo vanoti parizvino hapana mwana ave kurwara zvakanyanya. Munyori mukuru wesangano rinomirira vadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe-PTUZ-VaRaymond Majongwe vanoti dambudziko iri rakakonzerwa nehurumende yakataurirwa asi ikaisa zvimiti munzeve. Asi mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende yakagadzirira uye zvikoro zvinofanira kutevedzera kurudziro dzavari kupa vakabatana nebazi rezvehutano. Kubatwa kwevana ava nechirwere cheCovid-19 kunoteverawo kubatwa kwevana zana nemakumi maviri nevaviri pachikoro cheJohn Tallach Secondary mudunhu reMatebeleland North nevamwe vadzidzi vanomwe pachikoro chikuru cheChinhoyi University of Technology masvondo maviri apera. No media source currently available
title: Vana Makumi Mashanu neVasere (58) Vobatwa neChirwere cheCovid-19 paChinhoyi High

text: Bato reMDC-T riri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozane Khupe raendesa mberi kongiresi yaro kana kuti extra-ordinary congress yekushara hutungamiri hwebato kusvondo rekutanga kwaGunyana. Kongiresi iyi yanga ichifanirwa kuitwa muna Chikunguru, asi mutauriri webato iri VaKhalipani Phugeni vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuita kongiresi iyi mwedzi unouya kunoisa hupenyu hwevanhu munjodzi yechirwere cheCovid-19. VaPhugeni vanoti komiti mbiri dzepamusoro dzebato ravo dzinoti National Council, neStanding Committee, ndidzo dzakasvika padanho rekuendesa mberi musangano uyu mushure mekuona kuti musangano wekongiresi unopindwa nevanhu vakawandisa kudarika makumi mashanu ari kubvumidzwa kuungana pari zvino pasi pemutemo wekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Bato iri raifanirwa kuita musangano uyu mwedzi unouya sezvakatarwa nedare repamusorosoro reSupreme Court pagakava rekuti ndiyani anofanirwa kutungamira bato iri pakati paMuzvare Khupe naVanelson Chamisa, avo vane bato ravo reMDC Alliance. Asi VaPhugeni vanoti vachitevera mutongo wedare uyu, vane mukana wekusvika kutanga kwaGunyana kuti vange vaita musangano wekusarudza hutungamiri hutsva uyu. Studio 7 yawana mashoko ekuti musangano uyu wave kuzoitwa kubva musi wa 04 kusvika musi wa 06 Gunyana. VaPhugeni vanoti vachaita musangano uyu vachitevedzera mitemo yebazi rezvehutano mukudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19, uye vachange vachishandawo naro kuti vakwanise kuenderera mberi zvisingaise nhengo dzebato ravo munjodzi. Vanoti kuendeswa mberi kwemusangano uyu hakufanirwe kuonekwa sekunge Muzvare Khupe vari kuda kutenga nguva yekutiu vamboramba vari pachigaro, sezvo vasiri ivo vakaendesa musangano uyu mberi. No media source currently available
title: Bato reMDC-T Roendesa Mberi Kongiresi Yekushara Hutungamiri kuMwedzi waGunyana

text: Sangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, riri kuyeuchidza vanhu vese munyika kuti vapinde muhurongwa hwekuratidzira pamabasa avo nemusi weMuvhuro. Mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti zvakakosha kuti munhu wese, pese paari zvake, ambotora nguva yekuratidzira ari paanoshandira, senzira yekuudza hurumende kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika, izvo zviri kupa kuti vanhu vashupike. VaMutasa vanoti nhaurirano dzevashandi nevashandirwi, pasi pehurongwa hwe Tripartite Negotiating Forum, hazvina zvadziri kubatsira nazvo sezvo hurumende iri kuramba yakaisa zvipikiri munzeve. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende kuburikidza negurukota rezvevashandi, VaPaul Mavhima, sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. VaMutasa vanoti munhu wese ari munyika haasi kutambira mari inokodzera sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichioma munyika. Vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende igare pasi nevashandi yotaurirana navo murunyararo kwete kuvarova pamwe nekumbunyikidza kodzero dzavo. No media source currently available
title: ZCTU Yoyeuchidza Veruzhinji Kuratidzira neMuvhuro

text: Sangano rinoona nezvekuronga mhuri, reZimbabwe National Family Planning Council, riri kukurudzira vanhukadzi nevanhurume kuti vaite vana vachiri kutemwa dzinobva ropa nekuti vakada kuzosviita vati kurei zvinogona kunetsa. Kunyangwe vanhukadzi nevanhurume vose vachiita dambudziko iri, madzimai kazhinji anogumisira opihwa mhosva yekushaya mbero asi dzimwe nguva vari baba vanenge vakarasa demo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvembereko, VaDenis Mlambo avo vanoshanda kukiriniki yeSpilhaus iri pasi peZimbabwe National Family Planning Council, ZNFPC, vanoti kune zvikonzero zvakawanda zvinoita kuti munhukadzi kana munhurume asangane nedambudziko rembereko. Vanoti kune vamwe vanozvarwa vaine mbereko yakadzikira kana kuti vanenge vakura pazera zvokuti vanozota dambudziko pakuita vana. VaMlambo vataura kuti munhu akasaita mwana, nedzimwe nguva hazvireve kuti haazvare zvachose, asi kuti anenge aine dambudziko rembereko iro rinokwanisa kugadziriswa. Vakaenderera mberi vachitiwo chikafu chiri kudyiwa mazuva ano chiri kukonzera matambudziko embereko. Zvimwe zvirwere zvepabonde zvakaita segonorrhea kana kuti drop, nemahumunya, ayo anozivikanwa nezita rokuti mumps pachirungu zvinogona kukonzera kushaya mbereko kumadzimai kana kuti demo kuvarume. Mumwe mudzimai, Amai Susan Rwenyambi vekuNehanda Housing kuDzivaresekwa Extension vakatsinhira mashoko ataurwa naVaMlambo vachiti vakanetseka zvikuru kuita vana nenyaya yokuda kumboita zvedzidzo yepamusoro. Izvi vanoti zvakapa kuti vazode kuita vana vakura zvikanetsa. Asi vanoti vakazoita vana vaviri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzetsika dzepasichigare, Ambuya Prisca Chizano, vanoti chokwadi kuti kune vamwe vanhu vanokwanisa kunetseka nembereko, vakaendera mberi vachiti vazhinji vacho vanokwanisa kurapwa pachivanhu votozoita vana. Munyori anoona nezvedzidzo musangano reZimbabwe Traditional Healers Association kana kuti ZINATHA, Sekuru Prince Sibanda vatsinhirawo mashoko ataurwa naAmbuya Chizano vachiti kune mishonga yepasichigare yakasiyasina-siyana yekuuchika varume nevakadzi kuti vawane mbereko. Sangano reZNFPC rakaumbwa mugore 1985, riine chinangwa chokukurudzira nyaya dzekuronga mhuri chete asi kubva gore ra2011, rakazotangisawo kuongorora nezvenyaya dzembereko raona kuti dambudziko iri raiva ratekeshera mumhuri dzakawandisa. VaMlambo, vanova mukoti mukuru kuZNFPC, vataura kuti vanobatsira vanhu vanodarika chiuru chimwe chete pagore vanobva kumakiriniki esangano ravo. Asi vataura kuti kwava nenzira yokuuchika vane dambudziko rembereko inonzi pachirungu InVitro Fertilisation asi chirongwa ichi chinoshevedza mari yemadhora ekuAmerica anodarika zviuri zvitatu, zvokuti vazhinji havakwanise kubatsirika. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzopa Mazano paNyaya yeKunetseka neMbereko Kana Kurasa Demo

text: Mapurisa emuSouth Africa neSvondo akamanikidzwa kushandisa mabara asingauraye pamwe nehutsi hunokachidza mukuparadza zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi zvakanga zvatanga musindo muJohannesburg.  Izvi zvinotevera kukanganisa kwazvakanga zvaita musangano wakanga washevedzerwa nevaimbove mutungamiriri webato rinopikisa reInkatha Freedom Party, kana kuti IFP, VaMangosuthu Buthelezi, wekuedza kudzimura mhirizhonga iyi.  Mhirizhonga iyi inonzi yakasiyawo munhu mumwe chete afa uye vakawanda vakakuvara.  Zvinonzi vanhu vakatanga kuita ruzha apo VaButhelezi wakange votanga kutaura vachikurudzira kuti vanhu vamire kuponda vanhu, kupisa dzimba nemidziyo pamwe nezvitoro zvevekunze.  Vanhu vainge vauya pamusangano uyu, vanonzi vakanga vakatakura zvombo zvinokuvadza zvinosanganisira matemo, mapanga netsvimbo, izvo zvinonzi zvakazoshandiswa kupaza zvitoro pamwe nekutyisidzira vose vanobva kunze kwenyika.  Mapurisa anoti vanhu gumi nevatanhatu vakasungwa neSvondo mushure memhirizhonga iyi.  No media source currently available  Zvichakadaro, mhuri yeZimbabwe inopfuura mazana maviri inogara muSouth Africa inoti mhirizhonga iyi yave kuvagarisa senherera munyika umu nekuda kwekushungurudzwa pamwe nekupisirwa dzimba nemidziyo yawo.  Zvizvarwa izvi, izvo zvave kuchengetwa nemapurisa mumakamba, zviri kupomera muzinda weZimbabwe uri munyika iyi mhosva yekuvaregerera sezvo vasisina zvekudya, zvekupfeka, kana pekugara.  Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kugara pane imwe yemakamba aya inozi Tsoro, Muzvare Brenda Mverechena, vakaudza Studio 7 nezuro kuti vanhu vakawanda havachazive kuti voita sei.  Muzvare Mverechena vakakumbira veruzhinji pamwe nevemuzinda weZimbabwe kuti vavabatsire nezvipfeko, zvekudya, magumbeze, pekugara, mari yekudzokeresa kumusha uyewo nekuti vawane magwaro avo akatsva pakapiswa dzimba dzavo.  Muzvare Mverechena vakati mumiriri wenyika yeMalawi muSouth Africa akashanyira kamba iyi akavimbisa zvizvarwa zvenyika yake zvinosvika makumi mashanu, kuti hurumende yeMalawi ichazvibatsira kuti zvidzoke kumusha.  Chimwezve chizvarwa cheZimbabwe pane imwezve Kamba, Amai Thembelihle Mpofu, vakatsigirawo mashoko aya, vachiti hupenyu hwavari kurarama mumakamba aya, hunosiririsa.  Mumwewo mudzimai, uyo akaramba kudomwa nezita rake, akaudza Studio 7 kuti akatizirawo panzvimbo apa ashaya kwekuenda sezvo akange asingachazive kuti oita sei nehupenyu hwake.  Sangano rinomiririra vatyairi vemarori vekuZimbabwe muSouth Africa, reZimbabwe Truck Drivers Association, rakatumira nhengo dzaro kumakamba aya kuti dzinoongorora mamiriro ezvinhu, uyewo kuti dzione kuti sangano iri ringabatsirewo sei.  Mutauriri wenhumwa idzi, VaKevin Chikwengo, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti zvavakaona mumakamba aya zvinorwadza, naizvozvo hurumemnde dzeZimbabwe neSouth Africa dzinofanira kuona zvekuita nekukurumidza.  VaChikwengo vakati chinangwa chesangano ravo pari zvino ndechekuona kuti ringashande sei nezvizvarwa izvi kuitira kuti varerukirwe nemagariro avo.  Vakakurudzirawo hurumende, masangano akasiyana siyana pamwe nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara munyika iyi kuti vabatsire nepose pavanokwanisa kuti mhuri idzi dziraramewo hupenyu huri nani.  Kubva zvakatanga mhirizhonga iyi svondo rapera, kunofungidzirwa kuti kune vanhu vanodarika gumi vafa vanosanganisira zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa, asi pavanhu ava, hazvisati zvanyatsozivikanwa kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvingani.  Mukuru wemuzinda weZimbabwe muSouth Africa, VaDavid Hamadziripi, nezuro vakaramba mashoko ari kupomerwa muzinda wavo ekuti hurumende haina hanya nevanhu vari kutambura vachiti mutevedzeri wavo ari mubishi kushanyira nzvimbo yeKethlehong kuti azvionere pamhuno sefodya.  Vakaudza Studio 7 kuti muzinda wavo uchaita zvose zvinodiya pakuyamura mhuri yeZimbabwe iri mumakamba aya, kusanganisira vose vanoda kudzoka kumusha.  Vakatiwo hapana zvavati vaona kana kunzwa pamusoro pezviri kutenderera pamadandemutande maererano nevanhu vaviri vanonzi vakapondwa mambakwedza anezuro apo vainge vodzokera munzvimbo yeMandela kuti vanotora midziyo yavo.  Kunyange mapurisa achiti kune vanhu vashoma vakashaya mumhirizhonga iyi kubva zvayakatanga, vanhu vakawanda vekunze vanoti manyepo.  Kune vanhu vave kupfuura mazana vakasungwa panguva yemhirizhonga iyi vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita mhirizhonga, kupamba, kuba, kupisa kana kupaza zvitoro nemidziwo.
title: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvakatiza Mhirizhonga muSouth Africa Zvogara muMakamba eMapurisa

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvinoti kana zvagarika zvokanganwa kwazvakabva, zvotadza kudzorerawo kuvanhu vakazvisimudza, kuburikidza nekuita zvirongwa zvinobatsira matunhu. Zvimwe ndozvinonzi zvinopa zvikonzero zvekuti zvakasvibiswa mwoyo nekudyirwa kwazvo mari dzezvoringwa zvebudiriro dzazvinenge zvatumira kumusha nehama neshamwari. Asi izvi handizvo zviri kuitika kuzvizvarwa zviviri zveZimbabwe zviri muBritain zvinoti VaPeckson Kazingizi naVaCaston Mateu. Varume vaviri ava vanoti vari kumhanyisa zvirongwa zvakasiyana siyana zvinobatsira kumatunhu kwavakabva, kunyange hazvo pano nepapo vachimbosangana nematambudziko akasiyanasiyana. VaKazingizi vanoti vari kubatsira nharaunda yavo yeMashambanhaka neKatiyo mudunhu reUzumba, kuburikidza nekuisa magetsi mumakirinika, kubatsira vechidiki kuita zvirongwa zvekupfuya huku, pamwe nekubatsira vanhu vane dzimba dzakaputswa munguva yemhirizhonga ya2008 kuburikidza nekuvavakira dzimwe dzimba dzine mipanda miviri. VaKazingizi vanoti danho ravo iri harina kunanga nekuti vazopinda mune zvematongerwo enyika, asi chete kuti kubatsira vanhu vemunharaunda yavo. VaKazingizi ndivo vakamirira bato reMDC T musarudzo dzekutsvaga mumiriri weUzumba muparamende. Nekune rumwe rutivi, VaMateo vanotiwo vane boka revechidiki ravakaumba rinonzi Visionary Youth Project, iro riri kubatsira vechidiki vakawanda munyika kuita zvirongwa zvakasiyana siyana. VaMateo, avo vanotiwo Havasi kubatsira kuti vazopinda mune zvematongerwo enyika mune remangwana, vanotiwo vari kubatsira nekubhadharira vana vanoshupika mari dzechikoro. No media source currently available
title: Zvimwe Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvosimudzira Kwazvakabva

text: Hurumende yakazivisa zviri pamutemo nemusi weChipiri kuti yachinja mamwe mazwi ari mumutemo, kana kuti Statutory Instrument 50 yegore ra2021, pamusoro pesora rinorimwa munzvimbo yeChilonga kuChiredzi. Pange pakanyorwa kuti ‘panorimwa sora remombe’, pave kunzi ‘pachaitwa chirongwa chekurima zvinodiridzirwa’, kana kuti ‘irrigation’. Hurumende yakazivisa zviri pamutemo mwedzi wapera kuti vagari vanodarika zviuru gumi nezviviri, vari munzvimbo yeChilonga, vabve munzvimbo iyi, kuitira kuti kambani ye Dendiary ishandise minda iyi semafuro emombe dzayo dzemukaka. Dare redzimhosva rakambomisa hurumende kuti isabvisa vanhu ava mumisha yavo asi rinotarisirwa kupa mutongo waro nemusi weChishanu svondo rino. Kunyange hazvo mutemo uyu wachinjwa zvishoma, chinangwa chehurumende chekuti vamwe vagari vekuChilonga vabve mumisha yavo chasiiwa chakadaro. Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reHuman Rights Watch, iro rakazivisa kuti rapinda munyaya iyi richimirira vanhu vekuChilonga, rinoti kuchinjwa kwemazwi ari mugwaro iri hakuna zvakunobatsira vanhu vekuChilonga. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio7 kuti sangano ravo nemamwe masangano ari kuedza kubatsira vagari vekuChilonga, havasi kudzokera shure, vachiti mitemo yose inofanirwa kutevedzerwa, uye havaoni chikonzero chekuti vanhu vabviswe mumisha yavo. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoshandura Mashoko Anobata Mutemo Unobvisa Vagari vekuChilonga Mumisha Yavo

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakaparura mutemo wechimbi chimbi kana kuti Statutory Instrument 261 wekuti madzimai evanenge vamboita vatungamiri venyika kana kuti maFirst Ladies apihwe mari yemudyandigere. Parizvino, Zimbabwe ine madzimai maviri akadai, Amai Jannet Banana naAmai Grace Mugabe. Zvichapihwa madzim,ai aya zvinosanganisira motokari, vachengeti, vashandi vemuhofi nekumba, imba yekugara, motokari dzinosanganisira yemhando yeMercedes Benz E300 Series) pamakore mashanu oga oga, mari yendege yekushanda kunze, uye mitero yemba mvura nezvimwe. Vakawanda munyika vari kushora danho iri vachiti nyika haina mari uye vamwe vashandi vari pamudyandigere vari kunonga svosve nemuromo. Munyori mukuru weZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti hurumende haina mari yakawanda zvakadai uye hazvibatsire kupa vanowana uku vashandi vachifa nenzara. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Votura Mutemo weKupa Mari yeMudyandigere kuMadzimai eVaive Vatungamiri veNyika

text: Hurumende yatanga kupinza basa varairidzi zviuru zvitatu kutanga kotoro ino. Bazi redzidzo yepasi raburitsa mazita evarairidzi vakawana basa iri pamwe nezvikoro zvavanenge vachishandira mumatunhu ese munyika. Bazi iri rinoti varairidzi ava vanofanira kuenda kumahofisi ari mumatunhu avo kuti vandonyoresa kuti vatange basa. Mutauriri webazi iri, VaTaungana Ndoro, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotambira zvaitwa nehurumende izvi vachiti zvichavabatsira zvikuru panguva ino yeCovid-19. VaNdoro vati vachiri kuda varairidzi vakawanda muzvikoro vachiti vanovimba kuti hurumende icharamba ichipinza varairidzi basa kudzamara vasvika pahuwandu hwavanoda. Munyori musangano reZimbabwe National Union of School Heads, VaMunyaradzi Majoni vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvakanaka chose asi vakati varairidzi ava vari kupinzwa basa vashoma chose kana zvichienzaniswa nehuwandu hwevarairidzi vakasiya basa nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. Vati ongororo yakaitwa nesangano ravo yakaratidza kuti pane varairidzi zviuru makumi maviri nezvishanu vakasiya basa kubva muma Kurume gore rapfuura kusvika pari zvino. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kunyange hazvo kuwedzera huwandu hwevarairidzi muzvikoro kwakanaka chikuru chinodiwa kuti zvinhu zvifambe muzvikoro kupa varairidzi mihoro inovagutsa. VaMajoni vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvikoro sezvo varairidzi vasiri kufara nemihoro yavari kupihwa. Varairidzi munyika vanoti vanoda kutambiriswa mazana mashanu nemakumi mana emadhora ekuAmerica kuti vakwanise kurarama zvakanaka. Pari zvino Zimbabwe ine varairidzi vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi makumi mana nezvishanu, 145 000. No media source currently available
title: Varairidzi Zviuru Zvitatu Vanopinzwa Basa neHurumende

text: Mumiriri weUnited States muZimbabwe ave kusiya basa vachienda kunoshandira kunyika kwavo, VaBruce Wharton, vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu, pamwe nekuremekedza zvinobuda mumatare edzimhosva kuitira kuti America ibvise zvirango zvayakatemera vamwe vanhu vemuZimbabwe vakaita semutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nevamwe vamwe vavo. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatapi venhau neChina, VaWharton vati zvimwe zvinofanira kuitwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe, kuripa varimi vese vakatorerwa mapurazi apo paigariswa vanhu patsva makore anodarika gumi apfuura. Pari zvino pane vanhu zana nevatanhatu nemakambani makumi matanhatu nemashanu akatemerwa zvirango zvehupfumi nenyika yeAmerica. VaWharton vati mutemo wakashandiswa pazvirango izvi weZimbabwe Democracy and Economic Recovery Act kana kuti ZIDERA unotaura pachena zvinofanira kuitwa neZimbabwe kuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe. Vaenderera mberi vachiti mutemo uyu unopawo mutungamiriri weAmerica mukana wekubvisa zvirango izvi panguva ipi zvayo kana zvinhu zvichinge zvanaka muZimbabwe. Vatiwo kunze kwezvirango, mutemo uyu unopawo America simba rekubatsira Zimbabwe panyaya dzekugadzirisa zvikwereti zvayo vakati ndosaka nyika yavo yange iri kutsigira chirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program icho chiri kutungamirirwa neInternational Monetary Fund. VaWharton vatiwo America yakatsigirawo hurongwa hweZimbabwe hwekugadzirisa zvikwereti zvayo kumusangano weIMF wakaitwa kuPeru, Lima mwedzi wapfuura. Panyaya yehupfumi, VaWharton vati Zimbabwe inogona kusimudzira mabasa ekurima nehupfumi kana ikapa simba kuvarimi kuti vakwanise kukwereta mari kumabhanga kuti vaite basa ravo vachiti kana mabasa ekurima akasimukira maindasitiri anosimukawo. Pari zvino varimi havakwanisi kukwereta mari kumabhanga sezvo pasina chinoratidza kuti ndivo varidzi veminda. Asi vatiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumende idzike mitemo yakajeka inokwezva vemabhizimisi vekune vachiti mutemo wekupa hupfumi kuvatema hauna kujeka uye unoita kuti vemabhizimisi vasauye munyika. Kunze kwemitemo yakanaka, VaWharton vati runyararo nekugadzikana kwezvinhu munyaya dzematongerwo enyika kunodiwa kuti nyika ibudirire. Vati semaonero avo remangwana reZimbabwe rakanaka chose kana ikadzika mitemo yakanaka. VaWharton vari kusiya basa muZimbabwe vachienda kuWashington uko vari kunotora chinzvimbo chepamusoro uye vange vashanda muZimbabwe kwemakore matatu. Aka ndekechipiri vachishanda muZimbabwe sezvo vakamboshanda muno zvakare vachitungamira chikamu chemuzinda wenyika yavo unodyidzana neveruzhinji.
title: VaWharton Vanoti Zimbabwe Inofanirwa Kuripa Varimi Vayakatorera Mapurazi

text: Mapurisa anonzi akonzeresa kuvharwa kwemahofisi eMDC intongamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai zvichitevera kurwisana kwakakaita mapurisa nevechidiki vebato iri nezuro avo vairatidzira vachiti vanoda kuti murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, Va Itai Dzamara, vaburitswe muhupambwa. No media source currently available Mutauriri we MDCT, VaObert Gutu, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti mapurisa akazvindikita mutauriri waVa Morgan Tsvangirai, Va Luke Tamborinyoka, nevamwe vashandi vebato iri nezuro manheru mushure mekuvavharira kwemaawa akati kuti nezuro wakare. Izvi zvinotevera kurovana kwakaita mapurisa nevechidiki veMDC-T avo vakaratidzira paparamende vachiti vanoda kuti Va Dzamara vabuditswe muhupambwa. Va Gutu vatiwo vatadza kuvhura mahofisi avo zuva rose sezvo mapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo aswera akakomba muzinda webato ravo pa Harvest House uye vati mapurisa ati haasi kuzobva pa Harvest House kusvika vadzoserwa tsvimbo yavo yekurovesa vanhu pamwe nenguwani yekuzvidzivirira inonzi yakatorwa nevechidiki ve MDC-T pavakarwisana nemapurisa neChitatu. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, vati havasati vaziva zvaitika ku Harvest House nokudaro havakwanise kutaura nezvenyaya iyi. Zvichakadai, masangano anoshanda akazvimirira abuditsa mashoko ekuti achaenda kumasangano eSADC ne African Union achikurudzira kuti mutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, vabviswe sasachigaro wemasangano maviri aya kana Va Dzamara vasina kuburitswa muhupambwa nekukasika. Mutungamiri we Zimbabwe Peace Project, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko, avo vakambopambwa nevasori muna 2008, vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwaVa Dzamara. Zvichakadai, chikumbiro chakasvitswa kudare repamusoro nemagweta ari kumirira Va Dzamara chekuti Va Dzamara vabuditswe muhupambwa chakatarisirwa kunzwikwa mudare repamusoro re High Court neChishanu. Amai Charamba vati mapurisa haasati aziva kuti Va Dzamara varipi.
title: Mahofisi eMDC Ogara Akakombwa neMapurisa

text: Sangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dzekumawirira reEuropean Union iro rakatemera vamwe vakuru vehurumende zvirango richivapomera mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu rinoti richatanga kudyidzana neZimbabwe kana yaita sarudzo dzakachena uye ikaremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. EU mumashoko kuvatori venhau neMuvhuro yakati inotambira mashoko ari kubva kuvatungamiri venyika yeZimbabwe ekuti munyika muchaitwa sarudzo dzakachena. Mutungamiri wenyika vaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakati vaongorori vesarudzo veEU avo vange vave nemakore vachirambidzwa kupinda munyika nehurumende yenyika vakasungunuka kuita izvi gore rino. Asi EU inoti inotumira vaongorori kana zvimwe zviga zvairi kuda zvatambirwa nehurumende. Sangano iri rinotiwo rakagadzirira kugadzirisa mashandiro aro neZimbabwe ndokunge munyika mavandudzwa zvinhu. Asi sachigaro weZanu-PF kuBritain VaNick Mangwana vanoti zvaitwa neEU hazvina chazvinobatsira nyika yeZimbabwe sezvo vachiti sangano iri rinofanira kubvisa zvirango zvakatemerwa mamwe makurukota ehurumende. No media source currently available Asi mukuru weZimbabwe Election Support Network, Amai Rindai Chipfunde-Vava vanoti vanotambira mashoko ekukoka vaongorori vesarudzo vekunze. No media source currently available Asi vachiti havo vaongorori ava vanofanira kukurumidza kupinda munyika kwete kuuya kwasara mazuva mashoma kuti paitwe sarudzo dzacho.
title: EU Inoti Ichadyidzana Zvakasimba neZimbabwe Ndokunge Yaita Sarudzo Dzakachena

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kukurudzira vanhu kuti vapote vachienda kunana chiremba vavo kunovhenekwa kamwechete pagore kunyangwe vasiri kurwara kwete kuzoenda kuzvipatara zvirwere zvakomba zvimwe nguva zvisisarapike. Mukuru wesangano remubatanidzwa wemakambani emamedical aid anodarika makumi matatu munyika reAssociation of Healthcare Funders Association of Zimbabwe Amai Shylet Sanyanga vanoti kuongorororwa kamwechete pagore kana kuti annual check-up kwakakosha zvikuru panyaya dzezvehutano. Mumwe chiremba aramba kudomwa nezita atsinhirawo achiti nyaya yekusada kuenda kunovhenekwa kuzvipatara itsika isina kunaka inopa kuti vakawanda vazorasikirwe nehupenyu. Kunyangwe vamwe vaine makadhi emaInsurance ongororo dzakawanda dzinoratidza kuti havaende kunoongororwa naana chiremba sezvinokurudzirwa. Asi Amai Grace Ruredzo vanoti murume wavo anobhadhara mari kuFirst Mutual Medical Aid Society vanoti vari kupota havo vachienda kunorapwa denda remoyo. Asi vamwe munyika vakaita saAmai Emeldah Makumbe vari kuchema chema kuti mamwe makambani emamedical aid haasi kubhadhara mari dzinokwana kana voda kurapwa. Izvi zvave kupa kuti vamwe vanhu vatoregedze kubhadhara mari dzacho. Imwe myanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu vari kunyanya kusangana nedambudziko iri ndevaya vane zvirwere zvinoda mishonga mazuva ose zvakaita se High Blood Pressure, HIV/Aids, Diabetes nemagomarara akasiyana siyana. Dr Chiripanyanga vanoti izvi zvave kuvhiringidza hutano hwevanhu ava nokuti pese pavanoenda kunorapwa, vanotoburitsa imwe mari Izvo zvakonzera kuti vamwe vaende kunotenga mishonga kunze kwenyika zvokuti vamwe vana chiremba vari kurapa vanhu vazhinji nechikwereti vaine taririsiro yokuzobhadharwa nemakambani aya asi mari yacho inozouya kwapfuura gore isingachakwanisi kutenga kana kubhadhara vashandi vepamakiriniki avo. Bazi rezvehutano mari yariri kuwana kubva kubhajeti renyika haikwane kuti itenge mishonga yekupa varwere nezvimwe zvinodiwa zvinopa kuti hutano hwevanhu hupinde munjodzi. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kunovhenekwa Kamwe Chete paGore naChiremba

text: Mamwe masangano anomirira varairidzi anoti haasi kufara nedanho rehurumende rekumanikidza vadzidzisi kuti vadzokere kumabasa mukupera kwemusi weChipiri pasina nhaurirano dzekugadzirisa nhuna dzavo. Vadzidzisi ava vanoti vave kuzodzidizisa vana kamwechete pasvondo nekuti havana zvikwanisiro zvacho zvekuti vaite basa vakasununguka. Masangano evararidzi akaita seProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (PTUZ) neAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (ARTUZ) anoti haasi kufara nedanho rehurumende rekuti vakuru vezvikoro nevarairidzi avo vari kuti havasi kukwanisa kunge vari vari pabasa nekuti havana zvikwanisiro vange vadzokera pabasa muzuva ranhasi. Mutungamiri wePTUZ, VaTakavafira Zhou, vati chinodikanwa inhaurirano pakati pemasangano evarairidzi nehurumende dzakanangana nekugadzirisa nhuna dzavainadzo kwete kuvambunyikidza kuti vadzokere kumabasa ivo vakawomerwa nehupenyu. VaZhou vati bazi rePublic Service Commission ratumira nhume muzvikoro nhasi kunoongorora kuti ndevapi vadzidzisi vaenda kubasa nevasina. Vati vatora danho rekuti vadzidzisi vashande zuva rimwe chete pasvondo sezvo mari dzavari kutambiriswa nehurumende dzisiri kuvakwanira kuti vaende kubasa mazuva ose. Munyori mukuru wesangano rinomirira vakuru vezvikoro reZimabwe National Union of School Heads, VaMunyaradzi Majoni, vati (waiting for audio, may diss it if the audio comes late) Zvichakadai, mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vati vakatokwidza nyaya ili kumatare vachiti zviri kuda kuitwa nehurumende zvekudzinga varairidzi basa nekuti havana zvikwanisiro hazvisi pamurawu. Vatiwo havasi kufara kuti vamwe varairidzi varamwa kumaka mazamanishoni ema Form 4 neForm 6 mushure mekunge Zimsec yatadza kuvabhadhara mari dzema allowance. Tsvagiridzo yataita yaburitsa pachena kuti varairidzi vari kumaka mazamanishoni kuBulawayo, Gweru neMutare varamba kuenderera mberi nekumaka kudzamara vapihwa mari dzavakavimbiswa nesangano rinoona nezvekunyorwa kwebvunzo reZimbabwe Schools Examinations Council, ZIMSEC. Vamwe vevari kumaka mazamanishoni aya avo vasina kuda kubuda pamhepo vati Zimsec yakange yavavambisa kuti ichavabhadhara svondo rapera asi vaona zvakakodzera kuti vachirega kupedzisa kumaka bvunzo idzi sezvo vachiti veZimsec vari kungoramba vachiti pamunhondo pamusasa. Mutauriri weZimsec, Muzvare Nicky Dlamini, pamwe nemutauriri webazi redzidzo, VaTaungana Ndoro, vanga vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. pataenda pamhepo. Asi mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro vakati varairidzi vanenge vasina kuenda kubasa havasi kuzobhadharwa. Varairidzi vazhinji vanoti vari kuda kuti hurumende idzosere mari yavaitambira muna 2018 pamadhora mazana mashanu nemakumi mana emadhora ekuAmerica pamwedzi asi hurumende inoti homwe yayo yakabooka. Varairidzi vazhinji vanoti vari kuda kuti hurumende idzosere mari yavaitambira muna 2018 pamadhora mazana mashanu nemakumi mana emadhora ekuAmerica pamwedzi asi hurumende inoti homwe yayo yakabooka. No media source currently available
title: Varairidzi Voudza Hurumende Kuti Kuvatyisidzira Hakuna Zvakunobatsira

text: Muzvinambiri munyaya dzekuburitswa kwenhau munyika, Sandra Nyaira, aradzikwa zvine mutsindo nhasi hama neshamwari dzichirumbidza mabasa aakaita achiri mupenyu. Vehukama pamwe nevatori venhau vaungana pamarinda eWarren Hills muHarare vachiona kuradzikwa Nyaira.  Vataura pakuradzikwa kwake vakamirira amai vaNyaira, Amai Moreblessing Gombarume, vati varwadziwa zvikuru nekushaya kwemwana wavo. Sekuru vaNyaira, VaClayton Gombarume, vatsanangurawo muzukuru wavo semunhu aive nerudo kuvanhu vose. Vakamboshanda naNyaira achiri kutanga kuita zvekutapa nhau, Hama Saburi, ati Nyaira munhu aiziva basa rake zvokuti akatotanga kuwana mibayiro yekutora nhau achiri kudzidzira basa rekutora nhau. Imwe yeshamwari dzake uye ari mupepeti webenhau reThe Zimbabwe Independent, Faith Zaba, ati rufu ndimadzongonyodze akatsanangura Nyaira semunhu aive nehushingi achiti mufi aive gamba raikwikwidza zvine mutsindo mukutapwa kwenhau. Nyaira, uyo akafa nechirwere cheCovid 19, akatanga kushanda semutori wenhau kuCommunity Newspapers Group, ndokuzoenda kuZiana, mushure mezvo ndokuzoshandira The Daily News parakavambwa muna 1999 nemupepeti ane mukurumbira, VaGeoffrey Nyarota. Akakwidziridzwa kuDaily News kusvika pachinzvimbo chemupepeti wenyaya dzematongerwo enyika, uye akava munhukadzi wekutanga kuva nechinzvimbo ichi kuDaily News. Muna 2002, Nyaira akapihwa mubayiro weCourage in Journalism Award nesangano reInternational Women’s Media Foundation riri muWashington DC. Muna 2003 Nyaira akatanga kushanda semutori wenhau weStudio7 ari muLondon, uko aiita zvidzidzo zvake zvepamusoro soro. Akazoenda kunoshandira VOA Studio7 muWashington DC muna 2009  Nyaira, uyo azivikanwa nevamwe vake nerekuti VaChihera, ndiye akatanga chirongwa cheVOA Studio7 chinotarisa zvakadzama zvinosangana nevanhukadzi muhupenyu, cheWomen's Forum, pamwe nechenyaya dzehutano, izvo zvakaita kuti ave nhengo yeVOA Africa Health Network. Mushure mezvo, Nyaira akazoitwa mupepeti wenhau dzeStudio7 ndokuzosiya basa iri muna 2015 achienda kunoshandira United Nations ari muAddis Ababa kuEthiopia.  Nyaira, uyo akashaya nemusi weChipiri, Chikunguru 13, 2021, anga ava nemakore makumi mana nematanhatu, uye ari mushandi weUnited Nations. No media source currently available
title: Muzvinambiri Munyaya dzeNhau, Sandra Nyaira, Aradzikwa kuWarren Hills muHarare

text: Vafundisi vesangano reZimbabwe Pastors’ Fellowship neMuvhuro vapikisa mashoko emhuri yekwaDzamara ekuti vakakambira hurongwa hwemunamato wekunamatira murwiri wekodzero, VaItai Dzamara, avo vakasvitsa neSvondo mazuva zana vapambwa. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, Reverend Watson Furayi, vanoti sevafundisi vakakumbirwa kuti vafambise hurongwa hwekunamatira VaDzamara, uye kuzivisa mapurisa nezvehurongwa uhwu, uhwo hwaifanirwa kunge hwakaitwa kuZimbabwe Grounds mumusha weHighfield, muHarare. Reverend Furayi vanoti vatoshamiswa kuona mumapepa mashoko akaburitswa nemhuri yaVaDzamara achivatakata kuti ndivo vakakonzeresa kusendekwa kwemunamato uyu. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri wemhuri yekwaDzamara, Doctor Patson Dzamara, vanoti Reverend Furayi vakanga voita zano ndega pahurongwa uhwu. Doctor Dzamara vanoti Reverend Furayi vakaenda nerweseri vachinyora tsamba yekuti sangano ravo rakanga rave kusendeka munamato uyu sekunge ndivo vaitungamira hurongwa uhwu. Vanoti semhuri vacharonga zuva ravachaona rakakodzera kuti vaenderere mberi nemunamato uyu. No media source currently available Vamwe vane ruzivo nezvakaitika svondo rapera vanoti nhengo yeMDC T, VaJob Sikhala, mumwe wevanhu vakakonzerawo nyonganyonga muhurongwa uhwu mushure mekunge vafonera mapurisa vachida kunzwa nezvetsamba yakanga yanyorwa nevafundisi. Bato reMDC T rakange razivisawo mapurisa kuti ndiro riri kuita hurongwa hwekunamatira VaDzamara, izvo zvakapa kuti pave nemibvunzo pamusoro pehurongwa uhu. Mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu, vakabvuma svondo rapera kuti sebato, vakazokanzura chiziviso chakanga chaiswa kuitira kuti zvinhu zvifambe nyore. Asi VaSikhala vanoti bato ravo rakanga risineyi nehurongwa uhwu uye tsamba yarakanyorera kumapurisa yaive yekuzivisa nezvemusangano wezvematongerwo enyika, kwete wemunamato. Vanoti bato ravo mudunhu reHarare ndiro raida kutenda vanhu nekuteerera kurudziro yaro yekuti vasapinda musarudzo dze by-election dzichangobva kuitwa muHarare nemamwe matunhu emunyika. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Pastors' Fellowship Yopika Kuti Yakapiwa Mvumo yeKutungamira Munamato waVaDzamara

text: Komisheni inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari dzemudyandigere kana kuti Insurance and Pension Commission-IPEC, inoti kune mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemanomwe isati yatorwa nevanhu vakaenda pamudyandigere. Vachitaura nhasi muChinhoyi pamusangano waitwa nekomisheni iyi nevanochengeta mari inobhadharwa nevashandi yemudyandigere mukuru anoona nezvekudyidzana mukomisheni VaLlyod Gumbo vanoti vari kushushikana nekusatorwa kwemari yakawanda zvakadaro. VaGumbo vanoti mari iyi inofanirwa kubhadharwa kuvanhu vanosvika zviuru mazana mashanu. VaGumbo vakurudzira vose vakambobhadhara mari yemudyandigere asi vasina kuzoitora kuti vaende kwavaibhadhara mari kana kukambani dzavaishandira vanobvunza nekuti mari iyi hapana munhu anogona kuitora kunze kwemuridzi wayo chete. Mumwe mushandi apinda mumusangano wanhasi VaPrince Mpala vanoti mari dzemudyandigere dziri kupihwa vanhu ishoma zvichienzaniswa nemari yavanenge vabhadhara uye vanopihwa mari isisina huremu. VaMpala vanoti mari dzemudyandigere dzakabhadharwa iri mari yekuAmerica dzinofanirwa kubhadharwa dzichishaswa reti (rate) inenge ichishandiswa nguva iyoyo yeInterbank rate Gurukota rezvevashandi Amai Sekai Nzenza vakatenda kuti mari dziri kutambirwa nevashandi dzishoma uye vakati vanoda kuita hurukuro negurukota rezvemari muzvinmafundo Mthuli Ncube kuti mari idzi dziwedzerwe. Mumwe mukuru weKomisheni iyi VaJosphat Kakwere vanoti vashandi vanofanirwa kutaurira mhuri dzavo kuti vari kubhadhara mari yemudyandigere kwete kuvanza sezvinoita vakawanda. VaGumbo vanoti mari iyi ikagara makore mashanu iri muPension Fund isati yatorwa inozoendeswa muGuardian Fund uko inogara kwemakore makumi matatu yakamirira kutorwa nemuridzi wayo.
title: Vanhu Vakawanda Vorega Kunotora Mari Dzavo dzeMudyandigere

text: Bato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rinoti riri mushishi kunyora matsamba arichasvitsa kumasangano anoti SADC Troika, sachigaro weAfrican Union Commission pamwe nesangano reUnited Nations, richinyunyuta nezvarinoti zviri kukanganiswa nebato riri kutonga reZanu PF. Mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu vanoti zvavari kuzivisa masangano aya zvinosanganisira mashoko akataurwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe ekuti vanoda kuona mutongi achabata nyaya yakakwidzwa kumatare nevakadzingwa muZanu PF, VaDidymus Mutasa. VaGutu vanoti bato ravo rinoona mashoko aya seekutyisidzira vatongi vematare edzimhosva. Zvimwe zviri kunyunyutwa neMDC T inyaya yekunonoka kwehurumende yaVaMugabe kugadzirisa mitemo yenyika kuti ifambirane nebumbiro idzva uye mashoko anonzi akataurwa negurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamsa ekuti vachada kuti bumbiro remitemo rivandudzwe. VaGutu vanoti mamwe mashoko akataurwa nemutewedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachizivisa mukuru wemauto pamusangano wavo kuMidlands, VaConstantine Chiwenga pamusangano wavaiita, ekuti VaChiwenga ndivo vanoona nezvegwara remusangano weZanu PF kutyora bumbiro remitemo. MDC T inoti hayioni kuve sachigaro weSADC neAfrican Union kwaVaMugabe kuchitadzisa kuti nyaya yavo inzwikwe zvisina tsvete nemasangano aya, sezvo vatungamiri venyika dziri mumasangano aya vachitevera mitemo. No media source currently available
title: MDC T Yoendesa Zvinyunyuto Zvayo kuSADC, African Unions neUnited Nations
