text: Chikwata cheZimbabwe chemaWarriors chirikutarisira kukunda kunyange hazvo chasangana nematambudziko akawandisa munzira yemutambo wavo we 2019 Africa Cup of Nations neCongo Brazzaville neSvondo. Chikwata ichi nemusi weChina chakatadza kuita gadziriro yacho munhandare ichatambirwa mutambo uyu yeNational Sports Stadium mushure mekuvharirwa panze kwenhandare iyi nevaridzi vayo vebazi rezvematunhu zvichinzi veZifa havana kubhadhara mari yekushandisa nhandare iyi. Pamusoro pezvo, hapana chivimbo chekuti kaputeni wechikwata ichi Knowledge Musona achange ari munhandare neSvondo sezvo madhokotera emaWarriors achiri kurwisana nekuona kuti anaya pachiri nenguva kwasara mazuva maviri chete kuti mutambo utambwe. Izvi zvauya zvekare mushure mekunge mumwe mutambi wechikwata ichi anovimbwa naye Marvelous Nakamba asiri kutamba neCongo mushure mekukuvara achitambira chikwata chake cheClub Brugge kuBelgium. MaWarriors haasi kuziva zvekare kuti vachatambisa zvipfeko zvipi mushure mekunge zvipfeko zvavaive vavimbiswa kubva kuUmbro yekuUnited Kingdom zvisina kusvia sekuvimbiswa kwaive kwaitwa maWarriors nevatsigiri venhabvu avo vaidawo zvipfeko zvakafanana nevatambi vavo. Asi muraridzi wemaWarriors Sunday Chidzambwa haasi kutarisa zvese izvi achitaurira vatori venhau kuti vatambi vake vajaira zvinhu zvakadai zvekuti ari kuona maWarriors achisimudza chaunga nekukunda nesvondo. Mutori wenhau dzemitambo VaLeopold Munhende vanobvumirana naChidzambwa vachiti ivo maWarriors asangana nematambudziko akadai kakawanda zvvekuti havasi kuona zvichivatadzisa kukunda. MaWarriors ari kungoda poindi imwe chete kubva mumutambo uyu kuti vabudirire kuenda kumafainari eAfrica Cup of Nations ayo achaitirwa kuEgypt munaChikumi. Maneja wavo VaWellington Mpandare vane chivimbo chekuti maWarriors ari kutora kwete poindi imwechete asi mapoinzi ese matatu. Parizvino, Zimbabwe ndiyo iri pamusoro pegungano iri nemapoinzi manomwe, mapoinzi maviri pamusoro peCondo DR, uyezve mapoinzi matatu pamusoro peLiberia neCongo Brazzaville. Nevatambi vechikwata ichi vari kuona pasina chiri kuvanetsa mumutambo uyu sekutaura kwemubati wepagedhe George Chigova Vatambi vemaWarriors manheru anhasi vari kusangana nemukuru wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa mumabiko avari kuitirwa kuState House. Vanotevera mutambo uyu vari kutarisira kuti VaMnangagwa vachabuditsawo mari yekupa vatambi ava kuti vakunde mumutambo wakakosha uyu. Zimbabwe yese irikutarisira kuti maWarriors achavasiya vari mumafaro pachapera mutambo uyu nenguva dza 5 nesvondo. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yotamba neCongo Brazzaville Mumutambo weAFCON

text: Musangano wechitanhatu wemazuva mana wekutarisa budiriro pasingakanganiswi zviwanikwa muAfrica, we African Regional Forum on Sustainable Development, wakatanga neMuvhuro muVictoria Falls. Musangano uyu uri kupindwawo nemutewedzeri wemunyori mukuru weUnited Nations, Amai Amina Mohammed, avo vakapinda muZimbabwe neMugovera. Musangano uyu wakanangana nekutarisa budiriro iri kuitwa nenyika dzemuAfrica pasingaparadzwe kana kukanganiswa zviwanikwa. Musangano uyu, uyo unove wechitanhatu, uri kuitwa nesangano reEconomic Commission for Africa rakabatana neAfrican Union Commission, African Development Bank pamwe neUnited Nations. Gurukota rinoona nezvemabasa nevashandi, pamwe nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavhima, vanoti nyika dzose dzemu Africa, dzinoita makumi mashanu neina, dzine vamiriri pamusangano uyu. VaMavima vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe iri panguva yakaoma, iri mberi kwenyika zhinji mu Africa panyaya yekusimudzira zvinangwa zvebudiriro yerudzi urwu. Musangano uyu uchaparurwa zviri pamutemo nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yozvirova Dundundu kuMusangano Uri Kuitirwa kuVictoria Falls

text: Dare ramajisitireti muBulawayo rapa gwaro rekuti imwe nhengo yeMDC T inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, isungwe, kana kuti warrant of arrest, mushure mekunge yatadza kuuya kudare neChitatu. Dare ramajesitireti rapa gwaro rekuti VaKunashe Muchemwa vasungwe mushure mekunge vatadza kuuya kudare. VaMuchemwa ndivo vari kukwikwidza vakamirira MDC Alliance kuBulawayo South. Mushure mekutongwa kwenyaya iyi svondo rapera, VaMuchemwa ndemumwe wevanhu vana vakawanikwa vaine mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga zvichitevera kurwisana kwakaitika pamahofisi ebato reMDC-T muBulawayo muna Kurume. Vanhu gumi nevaviri vakasungwa mushure memhirizhonga iyi. Asi VaMuchemwa, nevamwe vavatu vanoti VaMalandu Ncube, VaFelix Mhaka, naVaEric Gono ndivo vakawanikwa vaine mhosva uye vange vachifamirwa kupiwa mutongo wavo nhasi. Mutongi wedare, Amai Sithembile Ncube, vati vange vagadzirira kupa mutongo wavo kuvana ava asi vati zvange zvisingachagone kuti vaite saizvozvo sezvo VaMuchemwa vange vasipo. Gweta VaPrince Butshe-Dube avo vari kumiririra vana ava vakumbira ruregerero kudare vachiti vange vachitaurirana naVaMuchemwa ngova dzose, asi vati havazive kuti sei vasina kuuya kudare. VaButshe-Dube vabvumirana nedare kuti mutongo wange uchifanirwa kuturwa nedare uzoturwa musi waChikunguru 23, asi vazvipirawo kuti mutongo uyu unogona kuturwa kana mangwana ndokunge VaMuchemwa vawanikwa. VaButshe-Dube vaudza vatapi venhau kuti zvavashamisa kuti sei VaMuchemwa vasina kuuya kudare sezvo vange vachitaurirana navo panguva yose yapfuura. VaMuchemwa nevamwe vavo vange vachitongwa vachibva kumba mushure mekubvisa mari yechibatiso. No media source currently available
title: VaKunashe Muchemwa Votsvagwa neMapurisa muBulawayo

text: Mutungamiriri webato rinopikisa reNational People’s Party, Amai Joice Mujuru, vanoti bato riri kutonga reZanu PF rauraya hupfumi hwenyika uye bato reMDC-T rawondonga makanzuru emaguta nemaruwa, vachiti vanhu havafaniri kuvhotera mapato maviri aya musarudzo dzegore rino. Vachitaura pamusangano webato ravo pamusangano waitwa muTafara muHarare East Constituency nhasi, Amai Mujuru vati kanzuru yeHarare yakundikana kuita basa, migwagwa yaparara, vanhu havana mvura uye hapana chinoratidza kuti vari kubhadhara mari yemvura kana yemitero. Vati makanzura ari muHarare East ndeweMDC-T uye mumiriri wenzvimbo iyi muNational Assembly, VaTerrence Mukupe, ndeveZanu PF uye zviri kuitika muHarare East zvinoreva kuti hutungamiriri mukanzuru nemuparamende huri kukundikana kuita basa nemazvo. Vatiwo vagari vemuHarare East ngavasiyane nemapato maviri aya musarudzo dzegore rino. Amai Mujuru vatiwo chimwe chikonzero chekusavhotera mapato maviri aya inyaya yekuti mapato aya anoita zvemhirizhonga. Vati bato ravo harifaririri mhirizhonga inoitwa nemamwe mapato, chikonzero chinoita kuti veruzhinji vafanire kuvhotera bato ravo. Amai Mujuru vakurudzira vanhu kuti vavhotere madzimai pazvinzvimbo zvese musarudzo vachiti izvi ndizvo zvingasimudzire nyika. Vachakwikwidza vakamirira NPP musaraudzo dzeNational Assembly muHarare East, VaItai Munyoro vati, zvakakosha kuti vanhu vavhotere vanhu vanogara munzvimbo dzavanogara kwete vauyi. Vechidiki vebato reNPP vataura pamusangano wanhasi vati vakazvipira kuvhotera Amai Mujuru musarudzo vachiti havana chivimbo nevatungamiriri vemamwe mapato anopikisa. Harare East dunhu rave nevanhu vakawanda vabuda pachena kuti vanoda kurimiririra uye vanosanganisira, mutungamiri wePDP, VaTendai Biti, avo vachimirira MDC Alliance, VaObert Gutu veMDC-T pamwe nenhengo yeparamende iripo, VaTerrence Mukupe veZanu PF. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weNPP, Amai Mujuru, Vanoshora Mapato eZanu PF neMDC-T

text: Murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu Dr. Patson Dzamara vanoti vari kufara nekuwana mhinduro kubva kubhanga repasi rose reWorld Bank, yekuti harisi kuzopinda munhaurirano neZimbabwe pamusoro pechikumbiro chayo chekuti ikwereteswe mari. Izvi zvinotevera gwaro renyunyuto kana kuti petition rakasvitswa kumahofisi makuru eWorld Bank muWashington D.C. naDr. Dzamara panguva iyo vakange vari muAmerica pakuratidzira kwakaitwa kumuzinda weUnited Nations uri muNew York nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe vhiki rapfuura. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakaratidzira zvichiti hazvisi kufadzwa nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa zvinhu nehurumende yaVaMugabe. Zvizvarwa izvi zvakange zvichi ratidzira panguva apo mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakange vari pamusangano weUnited Nations General Assembly pamwe nevamwe vatungamiri vepasi rose. "Tiri kufara kuti hurumende yaVaMugabe hasisiri kucharamba ichiita nhaurirano nesangano reWorld Bank dzekukwereteswa mari zvichitevera petition yatakaendesa ichimirira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. Tino ziva kuti gurukota rezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vange vari mushishi mekupemha mari kubva kuWorld Bank asi izvi zvavakuzomira,"Dr. Dzamara vaudza Studio 7. Dr Dzamara vanoti hurumende izere vanhu vakwegura avo vari kukwereta mari ichazotarisirwa kubhadharwa nevechidiki vasina kana dhonwe rimwe ravakadya. Dr Dzamara vanoti vakatumirwa zvinyorwa nezuro kubva kusangano iri zvaitaura kuti World Bank vakange ichizo remekedza chikumbiro chavo. "Tiri kuvimba kuti chiitiko ichi chicharatidza hurumende kuti vanhu vaneta nezvirikuitika munyika zvaita kuti vafunge kuenda kumasangano akadayi seWorld Bank tichinokumbira kuti vasarambe vachishanda nehurumende ine hudzvinyiriri sehweZimbabwe. "Vanhu vari kuramba vachimbunyikidzwa, kodzero dzavo dzichityorwa uye parizvino mukoma wangu Itai Dzamara hatizive kuti hurumende yakumuendesa kupi." Dr. Dzamara vaudza Studio 7 kuti chiitiko ichi chichabatsira kuti hurumende izive kuti vanhu havachada kuramba vachidzvinyirirwa. No media source currently available
title: Bhanga Repasi Rose reWorld Bank Rinoti Harisi Kuzoita Nhaurirano dzeMari neZimbabwe

text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr. Peter Magombeyi, vapedza rimwe zuva vari muchipatara vachiongororwa hutano hwavo. Sangano ravo rinoti richataura zvizere pamusoro pehutano hwavo kana ongororo dziri kuitwa dzapera. Mutevedzeri waDr. Mgombeyi musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr. Masimba Ndoro, vaudza Studio7 kuti ongororo iyi iri kuitwa nanachiremba, magweta avo, pamwe nemapurisa. Dr. Ndoro vati vakaona Dr. Magombeyi vakavaudza zvinotsigira zviri kuburitswa pamadandemutande akaita seTwitwer neWhatsApp zvichinzi vakatochwa vakaitwa kafira mberi. Asi vati vachakwanisa kutaura zvakawanda kana ongororo iri kuitwa yapera. Panyaya yekuti Dr. Magombeyi vakachengetedzwa nemapurisa kuchipatara, Dr. Ndoro vati panogona kunge paine chibvumirno chakaitwa nemhuri yavo nechipatara. Patasvika pachipatara china Dr. Magombeyi, taudzwa kuti havasi kuonekwa nemhunu wese wese asi kuti nemhuri nevamwe vakadomwa. Tatadza kuvaona nekuti hatisi vevamwe vanhu vari kubvimidzwa kuvaona. Gweta raDr. Magombeyi, VaJeremiah Bamu, vati vana chiremba vakavaudza kuti hutano hwaDr. Magombeyi hauite kuti vaonekwe nevanhu vakawanda. Pataenda pamhepo, magweta aDr. Magombeyi ange akatarisirwa kuburitsa gwaro rinotaura mamiriro akaita zvinhu pamusoro pehutano hwavo nezvimwe zviri kuitika panyaya iyi. Dr. Magombeyi vari kuongororwa nemachiremba akazvimirira pamwe nemachiremba ehurumende. VaMagombeyi vakapambwa nevanhu vasiri kuzivikanwa kuti ndivanani svondo rapoera nemusi weMugovera munguva dzehusiku, vakazowanikwa nemusi weChina manheru vari kuNyabira uko vanoti vakapepuka vari. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, mumashoko avo vasati vasimuka kuenda kumusangano weUnited Nations General Assembly, vakati kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kufara nekuti Dr. Magombeyi vakawanikwa, vanoshushikana nenyaya yekupambwa kwevanhu kwakanangana nekusvibisa hurumende yavo. No media source currently available
title: Dr. Peter Magombeyi Vachiri Kuongororwa Hutano Hwavo

text: Sarudzo dzekutsvaga vachatora zvigaro zvematunhu madiki kana kuti ma district mubato reZanu PF dzatanga neMuvhuro munyika yose panguva iyo mubato riri kutonga iri muchinzi mune kurwisana kukuru panyaya yekutungamira bato. Matunhu anonzi ane kudhonzerana kukuru anoti Masvingo, Mashonaland Central, Mashonaland East neManicaland. Srudzo idzi dzinonzi ndedzekuzadzisa zvigaro zvose zvemumatunhu madiki aya kana kuti ma district, kubva kuna sachigaro kusvika kumunyori. Kana sarudzo dzematunhu madiki idzi dzapera kuitwa, bato iri richapinda zvakare mune dzimwe sarudzo dzekutsvaga vachatora zvigaro zvematunhu makuru kana kuti ma province, pashure richizoita musangano waro wepagore kuBindura mudunhu reMashonaland Central muna Gumiguru gore rino. Politiburo yeZanu PF yasanganawo muHarare masikati kuti izeye zvimwe zvezvinhu zvinonzi zviri kuitika mubato iri pamwe nesarudzo idzi. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti sarudzo idzi, idzo dzichaitwa kwesvondo rose, dzatanga zvakanaka chose mumatunhu ose. Asi VaMugwadi vanoramba mashoko ekuti mubato ravo mune kusawirirana kunotyisa vachiti kukwikwidzana hakurevi kurwisana. Zvichakadaro, mumwe mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance VaFelix Magalela Mafa vanoti bato ravo riri kushamisika kuti Zanu PF iri kubvumidzwa kuita sarudzo nemisangano asi nhengo dzavo dzichisungwa dzichinzi dziri kutyora mitemo yecovid-19. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kugurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available
title: Sarudzo dzeZanu PF Dzinotanga Bato iri Richiramba Kuti Mune Makakatanwa

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe sechave chigariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga vakashora mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change VaMorgan Tsvangirai kumarinda eHeroes Acre muHarare nemusi weSvondo vachiviga gamba renyika Retired Brigadier-Genera Felix Muchemwa. Mukuru wemauto eZimbabwe Defence Forces, Commander General Constantine Chiwenga vakaudza vanhu vaichema muHarareneMugovera kuti Dr Muchemwa vakaisirwa muchetura muchikafu kuMozambique nevasori vekuSouth Africa vaitsigira RENAMO kuma 1980. Izvi vanoti zvakazopa kuti vaite chirwere chegomarara kusvika vashaya vari kuEgypt uku vange vachirapwa. VaMugabe vakataurawo nyaya yemuchetura iyi kumarinda eHeroes Acre pakuviga mufi. Asi VaMugabe vakabva vashorawo mutungamiri webato rinopikisa VaTsvangirai vachiti vainge vasina kuzvipira samuchakabvu Dr Muchemwa. “He taught us the lesson of sacrifice, yes real sacrifice kwete yekudududza munzira umu sezvakaita ana Tsvangirai, " vakadaro VaMugabe. Asi mutauriri waVaTsvangirai VaLuke Tamborinyoka vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMugabe vari kungotaura zvisina nematuro ose. "Murume uyu akura uye akungorotomoka. Hondo yakatizwa naVaTsvangirai ndeipi ivo vari ivo vari kutorwa chimurenga chekuti Zimbabwe ive nehutongo hwejekerere." VaTamborinyoka vakaudza Studio 7. Mutungamiri wenyika akashorawo vanachiremba vanoramwa mabasa achiti vanofanira kutevera nzira yaDr Muchemwa avo vaingoshanda kunyangwe zvinhu zvainge zvisina kumira zvakanaka kuMozambique munguva yehondo. Vakati vanachiremba vemunyika vanofanira kuona kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka nenyaya yezvirango zvavati zvakatemerwa nyika zviri kupa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hutatarike. Asi vanopikisa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vanoti chiri kupa kuti hupfumi hwenyika huende kumawere inyaya yehuwori nekutonga nedemo kwaivo VaMugabe. Dr Muchemwa vakambova gurukota rezvehutano uye vakava pana vanachiremba vatatu chete vakatanga kuenda kuhondo yeChimurenga.
title: VaMugabe Voviga Gamba reNyika Dr Muchemwa Vachishora VaTsvangirai naVanaChiremba

text: Veruzhinji vanoti havasi kufara nekushungurudzwa kwavari kuitwa nemapurisa pavanenge vachifamba vachitsvaga zvokudya kana mishonga kuzvipatara. Izvi zviri kuitika panguva iyo hurumende yaisawo masoja munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji munzvimbo dzakakwanda munyika. Zimbabwe yapinda muzuva rechitanhatu yakavharwa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus, icho chabata vanhu vapfumbamwe muZimbabwe, uye kuuraya munhu mumwe chete. Veruzhinji vakaita saAmai Tracy Nhondo vekuKadoma vati havasi kufara nemabatirwo avari kuitwa nemapurisa panguva yavanenge vabuda mudzimba kuitira kuti vanotsvaga zvokudya kana mishonga kuzvipatara. Amai Nhondo vati vakarohwa zvakaipisisa nemapurisa ainge ane shamhu vachibva kuchipatara nemuvakidzani wavo akanga avaperekedza. Hanzvadzi vavo, VaFarai Nhondo, avo vanove munyori pamwe vachitawo zvekugadzira mafirimu, vati havasi kufara kuti kodzero dzevanhu dziri kutyorwa zvisina tsarukano. Mumwe mugari wemumusha weMbare muHarare, Amai Shylet Java, vaudza Studio 7 kuti masoja ari kuonekwa achifamba famba munharaunda yavo asi ari kuvabata zvakanaka. Asi mashoko atatambira kubva kuMarondera nekuChitungwiza anoti masoja akarova vanhu vaizvifambira zvavo vachitsvaga pekutenga zvekudya. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vachishanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vakurudzira hurumende kuti ichengetedze kodzero dzevanhu panguva iyo hurumende yakavhara nyika yose senzira yekurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus, icho chauraya munhu mumwe chete muZimbabwe, vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi matanhatu pasi rose. Mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vatevedzere zvakataurwa nehurumende zvekuti vagare mudzimba uye vasangofamba-famba pasina zvavari kufambira zvakakosha. Vaudzawo Studio 7 parunhare kuti havasati vatambira mashoko emapurisa anonzi ari kurova vanhu zvisina tsarukano. Asi mutungamiri wesangano rePassengers Association, VaTafadzwa Goliathi, vatiwo veruzhinji vari kushungurudzwa nemapurisa kunyange vaine zvikonzero zvisvinu zvekubuda mudzimba. Vanorarama nekutengesa mumisika vanoti vaomerwa nehupenyu sezvo varimi vasiri kukwanisa kuuya nehuwandu hwavo nezvirimwa kumisika yezvirimwa yakaita seMbare Musika. Amai Nyasha Hodzi avo vanorarama nekutengesa muMbare makare vati varimi vashomanana vakwanisa kusvika nezvirimwa kumusika nhasi zvave kuita kuti zvinhu zvakaita semadomasi nemuriwo zvidhure. Mumwewo anorarama nekutengesa uyo ada kudaidzwa nezita rekuti Lynette ati kana varimi vakabvumidzwa kupfuura pamapurisa vakatakura zvirimwa zvavo, zvinoita kuti vakwanise kuraramisa mhuri dzavo. Pasvika Studio 7 pamusika weMbare panga pakavharwa pasina kana murimi mumwe chete zvake anga aine zvirimwa. Muturiri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti havakwanisi kutaura nezvekuti musika uyu uchavhurwa rinhi, vachiti titaure nehurumende. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro vakakurudzira mapurisa kuti asiye varimi vachipfuura panenge pakavharwa migwagwa kana kuti pama roadblocks vakatakura zvirimwa zvavo kuitira kuti vakwanise kunotengesa senzira yekuti veruzhinji vakwanise kuwana zvokudya. Zimbabwe yakavharwa kwemasvondo matatu senzira yekudzivirira chirwere cheCoronavirus, icho chabata vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru zana nemakumi matatu pasi rose, vapfumbamwe vari vemuZimbabwe, uye kuuraya vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi matanhatu pasi rose, Zimbabwe iine munhu mumwe chete, Zororo Makamba, uyo akashaya mwedzi wapera. No media source currently available
title: Veruzhinji Vanoti Vari Kushungurudzwa neMapurisa

text: Magweta ari kumiririra mutevedzeri wasachigaro wemusangano weMDC, VaJob Sikhala, aisa chikumbiro chekuti mhosva yavari kupomerwa yekuda kupidigura hurumende nechisimba iraswe achiti VaSikhala havana mhosva yavakapara, apo kutongwa kwenyaya iyi kwatanga nhasi mudare repamusoro reHigh Court muMasvingo. Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, avo vange vachitungamirira magweta aVaSikhala, vaisa chikumbiro ichi kune mutongi wedare VaGarainesu Mawadze, vachiti vachuchisi vakadoma mhosva isiriyo panyaya iyi yekuti vanoda kubvisa hurumende nechisimba ivo vakati vanoda kubvisa mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa gore ra2023 risati rasvika. Mai Mtetwa vati mhosva iyi haisiriyo nekuti kubvisa VaMnangagwa pachigaro hakusi kubvisa hurumende, sezvo VaMnangagwa vari voga vasiri hurumende. Munyori wezvemutemo muMDC uye vari gweta, VaInnocent Gonese, vati chikumbiro chaiswa chichapuwa mutongo nemutongi wedare musi wa 14 Kukadzi gore rino. Vachitaurawo padare apa rimwewo gweta, uye vari mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri weMDC, VaTendai Biti, vati kana mutongi akatenda chikumbiro chavo nyaya inenge yapera, asi chikarwambwa kutongwa kwenyaya kuno enderera mberi. VaBiti vati chikamu 22 che Criminal Law Codification Act, chakanzi VaSikhala vakatyora, chakashandiswa zvisizvo nekuti zvakataurwa naVaSikhala kuMandadzaka kuBikita gore rapera hazvienderani nemhosva yavari kupomerwa. Magweta anoti VaSikhala semunhu wezve matongerwo enyika ari nhengo yeparamende, anobvumirwa nemutemo kubvisa VaMangagwa pachigaro asi achitevedzera bumbiro remutemo. Asi vachuchisi vapikisa chikumbiro chemagweta aVaSikhala ichi achiti vaida kubvisa VaMnangagwa pachigaro nechisimba. Zvichakadaro vatsigiri veMDC vaswera vachiita hwakiti nagonzo nemapurisa ayo anga achivadzinga padare iri. Vatsigiri vakawanda ava vange vachiti vauya kudare kuzopa rutsigiro kune mutevedzeri wasachigaro wavo zvekuti vazadza imba inotongerwa mhosva zvekupfachukira. Mutauriri weMDC, VaDaniel Molokele, vashoropodza mapurisa aya, ayo anga akapakatira zvombo uye aine motokari inodira mvura ine wunye hunovava. Munyori anoona nezvegwara remusangano mubazi revechidiki muMDC, VaGodfrey Kurauone, vange vari mumwe vevamwe vadzingirirwa nemapurisa, vati mapurisa ari kutyora kodzero dzavo. Izvi zvatsinhidzirwa nemumwe wevechidiki Muzvare Alaika Taimu, avo vati vange vauya kuzotsigira mumwe wavo murunyararo. Mutauriri wemapurisa munyika yose, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyati, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havazivi nezvenyaya yekudzingwa kwevanhu padare nemapurisa iyi vachiti vatotanga kuinzwa nesu patavabvunza nezvayo. Mutongi wedare VaMawadze vati vanoda mazuva akawanda kuti vanzvere chikumbiro chaitwa naMai Mtetwa nevamwe vavo chekuti VaSikhala varasirwe nyaya yavo ichi, vachiti vanozopa mutongo wavo musi wa 14 Mwedzi uno. No media source currently available
title: Kutongwa kweMutevedzeri waSachigaro weMDC, VaJob Sikhala Kunotanga kuMasvingo

text: Kusaenda kubasa kwavanachiremba kwave kupararira kuzvipatara zvakawanda munyika sezvo pasina nhaurirano dziri kuitwa nehurumende kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Izvi zvasiya varwere vakawanda vachitambura nekushaya vanobatsira. Vamwe vataura neStudio7 vati vari kutora nguva yakawanda vakamirira kubatsirwa vamwe vachinzi vazodzoke kana zvinhu zvave nani. Vanachiremba vanoti vari kuda kuti mari dzavanotambiriswa dziiswe pachikero chimwe chete nemari yekuAmerica pakutengwa kwainoitwa mumabhanga pazuva zvichienzaniswa nemari yemaRTGS Dollars. Hurumende yakawedzera vashandi vayo vemuzvipatara mari inosvika zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana svondo rapera. Asi vashandi vakati vari kutambira asi vaine zvinyunyuto. Sachigaro wesangano rinoona nezvevashandi mubazi rezvehutano kana kuti Health Services Board, Dr Paulinus Sikhosana, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanonzwisisa zvichemo zvavanachiremba asi vaisafanira kuramwa mabasa sezvo vati vange vaendesa zvimwe zvichemo zvavo kubazi rezvemari. No media source currently available Asi mutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Peter Magombeyi, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara. Dr Magombeyi vanoti vari kuda kuti hurumende igadzirise zvichemo sezvo sezvo mitengo yezvinhu yakwira zvakanyanya, kusanganisira mari dzekufambisa kuenda kumabasa avo. Dr Magombeyi vanoti sangano ravo harisi kuramwa kuita basa asi kuti havana mari yekuti vakwanise kuenda kumabasa. No media source currently available
title: Vanachiremba Vopinda Muzuva Repiri Vasingaendi Kunoita Basa

text: Hurumende yaparura neChina /kushandiswa kwenhomba yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 zvichitevera kupihwa kwakaitwa Zimbabwe nhomba iyi nehurumende yeChina. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika uye vari gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, ndivo vaita munhu wekutanga kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 vachiteverwa nemutevedzeri wavo, VaJohn Mangwiro, pamwe nevamwe vakoti. Vachitaura pakuparura kwavaita kushandiswa kwenhomba yeSinopharm iyi, VaChiwenga vati vane chivimbo chekuti kupararira kwechirwere ichi kwave kuzopera kana munhu wese munyika akabaiwa nhomba iyi. Mukuru anoona nezvekurwisana nechirwere cheCovid-19 muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, Doctor Agnes Mahomva, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari mubishi kutsvaga dzimwe nhomba kuitira kuti vanhu vese munyika vabaiwe. Mumwe mukoti anoshanda pachipatara cheParirenyatwa uyo aramba kudomwa zita rake ati haasi kuzobaiwa nhomba yeSinopharm iyi achiti kushanda kwayo hakusati kwave kuvimbika. Mumwe mugari wemumusha weBelvedere, Amai Shungu Chikandamina, vatiwo kutambirika kwenhomba yeSinopharm iyi kuchanetsa kana hurumende isina kupa veruzhinji mashoko akakwana nezvenhomba iyi. Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Doctor Prosper Chonzi, vati vashandi vose vekanzuru yavo vachabaiwa nhomba iyi pasina rusarura uye vati vanamazvikokota vakaongorora nhomba iyi vakaona kuti inoshanda. VaChiwenga vati nhomba iyi yatotanga kuendeswa kumatunhu ose munyika zvichitevera kuparura kwavayiita vachiti vane tarisiro yekuti nharaunda dzose munyika dzichange dzave nenhomba iyi svondo rinouya. VaChiwenga vati nhomba iyi ichatanga kubaiwa vakoti, madhokotera, vanoona nezvehutano mumapazi anoona nezvekudzivirwa kwenyika vamwe vese vozotevera kumashure. Nhomba zviuru mazana maviri dziri kubaiwa vanhu idzi dzakapihwa Zimbabwe pachena nehurumende yeChina uye hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekutenga dzimwe nhomba kuitira kuti nhomba idzi dzikwanire munhu wese anenge achida kubaiwa nhomba iyi. VaMangwiro vakaudza dare reparamende nezuro kuti vanhu vachange vasingabaiwe nhomba iyi vana vari pasi pemakore nematanhatu, vanhu vane makore ari pamusoro pemakore makumi matanhatu, madzimai akazvitakura neari kuyamwisa, vanhu vane zvirwere zveshunga neavo vane HIV. Vanhu vasati vapihwa nhomba iyi, vanotanga vaongororwa ropa ravo kuti harina zvirwere, kana riine zvirwere havapihwe nhomba iyi. Zimbabwe yatanga chirongwa ichi panguva iyo chirwere cheCovid-19 chauraya vanhu vana nezuro, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa pachiuru nemazana mana negumi nevasere, kana kuti 1,418. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu nemazana mana nemakumi maviri nevatatu, kana kuti 35423, zvichitevera kubatwa kwevanhu zana nevasere nezuro wakare. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vava zviuru makumi matatu nechimwe nemazana matanhatu negumi nevashanu, kana kuti 31615. Vanhu vachii kurwara nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zviviri nemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe, kana kuti 2390. VaChiwenga vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vatambire chirongwa chekubaiwa kwenhomba iyi vachiti zvinoita kuti pachengetedzwe hupenyu hweveruzhinji sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kufa nechirwere cheCovid-19 pasi rose. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Inotanga Kubaya Vanhu Nhomba Yakabva kuChina

text: Gurukota rezvemabasa nevashandi Amai Priscah Mupfumira vanonzi vazivisa mazuva anofungidzirwa kuti hurumende ingangobhadhara vashandi vayo mihoro yaChikunguru. Vari muchiuto vanonzi vave kutarisirwa kuwana mihoro yavo musi wa 25 mwedzi uno, vachiteverwa nevezvehutano avo vanonzi vanotarisirwa kutambira mari dzavo musi wa27. Mapurisa, avo vanosimbotambira vachiverana nemauto, vanozowana mihoro yavo musi wa29 mwedzi uno pamwechete nevashandi vekumajeri. Vari muboka rezvedzidzo vave kutarisirwa kutambira musi wa 2 Nyamavhuvhu, unove mwedzi unouya, vachiteverwa nevashandi vehurumende vose musi wa 06 Nyamavhuvhu. Vari pamudyandigere vave kutarisirwa kuzotambira mihoro yavo musi wa12 Nyamavhuvhu. Sachigaro wesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander vanoti sevamiriri vevashandi, vakagara vachiti vashandi vanofanirwa kutambiriswa mari dzavo pamwedzi wavanenge vashandira. Asi vanoti apa vatambira nemufaro kuziviswa kwemazuva aya, nekushandurwa kwemazuva achatambira vanachiremba navanamukoti, vachiti hurumende yaona kukosha kweboka iroro zvekuti vashandi veko vakasike kuwana mihoro yavo. Amai Alexander vanoti ivo sevamiriri vevashandi, havana zvavanogona kupikisa kana kuita pamazuva aziviswa aya vasati vatanga vaipira kuvashandi nekunzwa pfungwa dzavo. “Isu tichagara neMuvhuro seApex Council kuti tinzwe zvinenge zvabva muvashandi, sezvo tapira mazuva aya kumasangano ano mirira vashandi kuti asvitse kunhengo dzawo,” Amai Alexander vanodaro. Hurumende iri kutatarika kuwana mari yekuti ibhadhara vashandi vayo mihoro, izvo zvaita kuti mumwe miviri yakatevedzana vashandi vazowana mihoro yavo mumwedzi unenge uchitevera wacho. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inozivisa Mazuva Ainofungidzira Kuti Ichabhadhara Vashandi Vayo Mihoro yaChikunguru

text: Hurumende yeZimbabwe inonzi yakasvitsa zviri pamutemo neChipiri, nyunyuto yayo pamusoro pemabatirwo anonzi akaitwa gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, nevanhu vaitaridzira kuLondon svondo rapera. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti hurumende yakashevedza mumiriri weBritain muZimbabwe ikamuzivisa nekusafara kwayo nekusachengetedzwa zvakasimba kwegurukota iri, izvo zvinonzi zvakapa mukana vanhu vairatidzira ava kuti vasvike pedyo naVaMoyo uye kuvadira mvura. Asi vamwe vevakaratidzira ava vakaudza Studio 7 kuti mumwe murume muchikwata chaVaMoyo ndiye akakonzeresa mhirizhonga iyi, mushure mekunge arova mumwe mudzimai airatidzira. VaPanyika Karimanzira vesangano reRestoration of Human Rights Zimbabwe, vanoti mhuri dzevamwe vevanhu vakaratidzira ava dziri kuZimbabwe dzave kutyisidzirwa nevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti ndevehurumende. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvagara zvichiratidzira pamizinda yenyika kana kumisangano inenge ichipindwa nevatungamiri venyika kana makurukota avo senzira yekuratidza kunyunyuta kwazvo nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa zvinhu kumusha. Mukupera kwesvondo rino, nhengo dzebato reMDC muno muAmerica dziri kutarisirwa kuratidzira muno muWashington D.C., vachinyunyuta nekusungwa kwavanoti kuri kuitwa vanhu kumusha nehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mu MDC mudunhu re America, VaTimothy Muringai, vanoti kuratidzira kuri kuitwa nevana veZimbabwe vari kunze kunobatsirawo kuti pasi rose rinzwe matambudziko akatarisana nevana veZimbabwe. VaMuringai vanoti mukupera kwesvondo nhengo dzavo dzicharatidzira muWashington D.C. nemuCanada dzichitsigira nhengo dzeMDC dzakasungwa kumusha, uye kubatana nevana veZimbabwe vari kushupika kumusha. No media source currently available Asi sachigaro webato reZanu PF mudunhu muAmerica, VaFrenk Guni, vanoti zviri kuitwa nevamwe vemapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano zvekuratidzira vachinyadzisa makurukota izvi hazvina hunhu. VaGuni vanoti kunyange hazvo iri kodzero yemunhu wese yekuratidzira, vanhu havafanirwe kutyorawo kodzero dzevamwe nezita rekuti kodzero. No media source currently available
title: Pova neMaonero Akasiyana paNyaya yeKuratidzira kweVari Kunze kweNyika

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kubuda munyika nhasi vachienda kunyika isina kudomwa nezita asi chikonzero chekuti sei vasina kuenda kumusangano kwavaitarisirwa nezuro kuHwange Colliery Stadium iri kuramba ichitemesa vanhu musoro. Vakuru mubato reZanu-PF nehurumende uye mapepanhau akaita seChronicle neHerald anowanzo rerekera kuZanu-Pf ari kunyorawo nyaya dziri kupesana. VaMnangagwa vainge vari kuHwange vachiparura gwenya remagetsi vachizotarisirwa kuenda kumusangano webato ravo sezvavari kuita mazuva ano. Asi vanhu vanonzi vakafambira dhongi rakaora sezvo VaMnangagwa vasina kuzoenda kunyangwe vamwe vainge vafumobata jongwe muromo. Vachitaura nebepanhau reHerald, mutauriri waVaMnangagwa VaGeorge Charamba vati mutungamiri wenyika ange asina musangano kuHwange Colliery Stadium sezvo vainge vaine misangano kuHarare. Asi vachitaurawo neHerald sachigaro weZanu-PF kuMatabeleland North VaRichard Moyo vakati vainge vakatarisira VaMnangagwa kunyangwe vazokundikana kuuuya nenyaya yebasa. Asi vamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vanoti VaMnangagwa vanogona kunge vasina kuenda nenyaya yekushomeka kwevanhu. Vamwe vanoti zvinogona kuve zviine chekuita nekuputika kwakaita chombo chinofungidzirwa kuti igirinedhi kuWhite City Stadium chakapotsa chauraya VaMnangagwa nevamwe vatungamiri venyika nebato vainge vari pamusangano uyu nemusi weMugovera. Vanhu vaviri vanochengetedza vatungamiri venyika vakashaya muchiitiko ichi uye vanhu vanosvika makumi mana nevapfumbamwe vakakuvara. Vamwe vacho vaviri vakaendeswa kuzvipatara zvemuHarare vachibviswa kuBulawayo.
title: Zanu-PF Yotaura Zvakasiyana paNyaya yeMusangano Wakatadzwa Kuendwa naVaMnangagwa kuHwange

text: Mutongi mukuru wematare edzimhosva, Chief Justice Luke Malaba, vaparura kushanda kwematare edzimhosva vachiti denda reCovid-19 rakavhiringa kushanda kwematare gore rapera izvo zvakaita kuti nyaya dzakawanda dzisanzikwa mumatare. Vati denda reCovid-19 rabudisa pachena kuti matare anofanira kushandisa michina yechizvino zvino. Vachitaura muHarare nhasi, VaMalaba vati gore rapfuura matare ange asingashande kwemwedzi mitatu nekuda kwekuvharwa kwainge kwakaitwa nyika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Vati panguva iyi pane nyaya shomanana dzainzikwa mumatare uye vanhu vakawanda vaitadza kuenda kumatare. Vati izvi zvakakanganisa zvikuru kushanda kwematare ese munyika izvo zvakaita kuti matare anzwe nyaya shoma pane dzaaifanira kutonga. Vati dare repamusoro soro rakapedza nyaya makumi maviri neina chete muna 2021 kana zvichienzaniswa nenyaya makumi mana nenhatu dzarakatonga muna 2020. Dare reSupreme Court rakatonga nyaya mazana matanhatu negumi nepfumbamwe (619) gore rapfuura kana zvichienzaniswa nenyaya mazana manomwe nemakumi masere nesere (788) dzayakanzwa muna 2020. VaMalaba vatiwo nyaya dzakamhan’arwa kuCriminal Court dzakadzikira muna 2021 kana zvichienzaniswa nedzakamhan’arwa muna 2020. Muna 2021 pane nyaya zviuru makumi manomwe nezvishanu nemazana maviri nemakumi mana neimwe (75 241) dzakakwidzwa kuCriminal Court kana zvichienzaniswa nenyaya zviuru makumi manomwe nezvinomwe nemakumi matatu neimwe (77 031) dzakamhan’arwa muna 2020. Vati izvi zvinobudia pachena kuti matare ave kufanira kushandisa michina yechizvino zvino kuti nyaya dzirambe dzichimhan’arwa nekutongwa kuyange kunyange nyika iavharwa senzira yekudzivirira Covid-19. Vati komisheni inoona nezvekushanda kwematare yeJudicial Services Commission, yatove nehurongwa hwekushandisa maICTS kuvandudza mashandiro ematare. Vati chirongwa ichi chichabatanidza padandemutande matare ese edzimhosva munyika uyewo chichabatanidza matare nemagweta, mapurisa, majeri, National Prosecuting Authority, Attorney General, Zimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission navose vane chekuita nematare. Vatiwo izvi zvicharerutsa nekuderedza huwori sezvo zvichirevera kuti zvinhu zvese zvinenge zvave kuitwa pajekerere. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano remagweta munyika, Amai Rumbidzai Matambo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotambira shanduko yave kuunzwa kumatare vachiti zvichaita kuti varambe vachishanda kunyange pakaita dambudziko rinoita kuti matare avharwe. Izvi zvatsingirwawo nerimwe gweta rekuBulawayo, VaBruce Masamvu, avo vati Zimbabwe yange yakasarira kumashure. Gweta zvakare vari mudzidzisi wemitemo paUniversity of Zimbabwe, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vatiwo kushandisa michina yechizvino zvino mumatare kucharerutsa basa kumagweta nevatongi. VaMalaba vatiwo zvinhu zvakaoma muna 2021 uye JSC yakarasikirwa nevashandi makumi masere nevasere uye gumi nevasere vari mamajisitireti. Vati vanhu ava vaichema nenyaya yemihoro iri pasi. Vati kushomeka kwemari ndirimwe dambudziko rakavakasangana naro muna 2021 uye hurumende inofanira kuvapa mari yakakwana kuitira kuti vasarambe vachipemha kuhurumende nemasangano anoshanda akavimirira. VaMalaba havana zvavatura pamusoro penyaya yavo yakamutsa mutauro mushure mekunge vawedzerwa nguva pabasa nemutungamiri wenyika zvichitevera kupaswa kweConstitutional Amendment Number 2. Asi VaMudhuku vati iyi inyaya yakakosha kuye vanoona sekuti VaMalaba dai vataura nyaya iyi nhasi. Mukuru weHuman Rights NGO Forum, Dr Musa Kikavaudza Studio 7 kuti havana kushamiswa nezvaitwa naVaMalaba zvekusataura pamusoro penyaya yavo vachiti izvi hazvivape chimiro chakanaka. Zvichakadai matare eHigh Court avhurwa zviri pamutemo kuBulawayo, Mutare neChinhoyi. Mutevdzeri waVaMalaba, Amai Elizabeth Gwaunza ndivo vavhura kuBulawayo, Justice Rita Makarau vavhura kwaMutare. Vachitaura kuChinhoyi, mukuru wevatongi vedare reHigh Court, Justice Mary Zimba-Dube, vati dare repamusoro muChinhoyi richanzwa nyaya dzinosvika makumi matanhatu nenhatu kusanganisira nyaya dzekuponda gumi nepfumbamwe. Justice Dube vati mutongi achanzwa nyaya idzi achapa mutongo wakaringana sezvo pave nevanhu vasiri kukoshesa hupenyu hwevamwe vanhu. Dare reHigh Court riri kutanga kushanda kuChinhoyi gore rino pasi pechirongwa chekuti dare iri ringe riri mumatungu ese munyika. Justice Malaba vati JSC yakatodoma mutongi achange achishandira kuChinhoyi. No media source currently available
title: Mutongi Mukuru weMatare Anoparura Kutanga Kutongwa kweMhosva Gore Rino

text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kupinda musangano wechitanhatu weEuropean Union-Africa Union Summit, uyo uri kutanga neChishanu uye hurumende inoti vachashandisa musangano uyu kuvandudza chirongwa chavo chekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika. Vachinyora padandemutande ravo mushure mekusvika kuBrussels uko kune muzinda weEU, mutauriri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba, vati mushure memusangano uyu, VaMnangagwa vachasangana nevakuru vakuru veEU. Vati kunyange hazvo EU yakabvisa zvimwe zvirango zvaiyainge yatemera Zimbabwe, pachine dzimwe nyika shoma musangano iri dziri kuramba kuti zvirango zvibviswe zvese. Muzvinabhizimisi uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Mponda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kukokwa kweZimbabwe kumusangano uyu kunoratidza kuti nyika dzekuEurope dziri kutambira hutongo hwaVaMnangagwa. Vati misangano yakadai inopa mikana yekuti mabhizimisi emuno akwanise kunotengesera kumisika yeEU pasina zvinonetsa. Vatiwo vanotarisira kuti mabhanga ekuEurope achatanga kutsigira makambani emuZimbabwe nemari yezvikwereti. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, vachishanda nesangano reLabour, Economic, Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vati Zimbabwe yange yave nenguva isingapinde mumisangano yakadai uye zvakakosha kuti VaMnangagwa vapinde mumusangano uyu. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, uye vakambove nhengpo yeparamende inoona nezvehupfumi, VaSimon Hove, vari nhengo yeMDC T, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kukokwa kwaVaMnangagwa kumusangano uyu hakurevi kushanduka kwezvinhu munyika asi kuti kunoratidza kuti EU yave kuda kudyidzana neZimbabwe. Izvi zvatsigirwa nevanorwia kodzero dzevanhu. VaTendai Ruben Mbofana, avo vaudza Studio 7 kuti America yakarega zvirango zviripo nekuti hapana chashanduka muZimbabwe. Vati vanoona Europe iri kurerutsa zvinhu senzira yekupa VaMnangagwa mukana wekuti vaunze hutongi hwejekere kuitira kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika pachena. Vatiwo chikuru chavaona chashanduka muZimbabwe chitsiidzo chakaitwa nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa chekubhadhara varungu vakatorerwa minda yavo. Sachigaro wemubanidzwa wemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira eCrisis In Zimbabwe Coalition, VaPeter Mutasa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya dzehupfumi dzinofanira kukurukwa pachisanganiswa kodzero dzevanhu. Dr Kanyenze vatiwo kunyange hazvo EU yave kutaura neZimbabwe ine zvimwe zviga zvayakatara zvainoda kuona zvichiitwa kuti zvisvike pahaukama hwainoda neZimbabwe zvakaita sekuita sarudzo dzisina mhirizhonga. Vakasanobata chinzvimbo chemutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reCitizens Coalition for Change, VaGift Ostallos Siziba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMnangagwa vanofanira kutanga vagadzirisa matambudziko ari munyika, vasati vabuda kunogadzirisa hushamwari dzavo nedzimwe nyika. EU yakatanga kutemera vakuru vakuru muZimbabwe zvirango muna 2002 ukuwo America ikavatemerawo zvirango izvi kutanga muna 2003. Musangano wemangwana uchabata nyaya dzakawanda dzekusimbaradza hukama pakati penyika dzemuAfrica neEuropean Union munyaya dzekurima, hutano, dzidzo, runyararo, kushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze pamwe nekutsigirwa kwemakambani akazvimirira nekuvandudzwa kwehupfumi.
title: VaMnangagwa Vari KuBelgium Kumusangano weEU-AFrica Summit Uko Voyedza Kutaura neVakavatemera Zvirango

text: Mapato ane nhengo dziri mudare reparamende ange achisangana kuHoliday Inn, kuBulawayo nemusi weMugovera nanezuro kuyedza kuumba hwaro hwekuita nhaurirano. Musangano uyu wainge uchida kugadzirira nhaurirano huru pakati pevatungamiri vemapato aya vanosanganisa mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, mutungamiri weMDC VaNelson Chamisa uye mutungamiri weMDC-T Doctor Thokozane Khupe. NPF iyo ine nhengo imwe chete mudare reparamendse yainge irimowo muhurukuro idzi. Munyori wezvemutemo mubato reZanu-PF VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vange vachitungamira Zanu-PF munhaurirano idzi uye vanoti dzakakosha mukupa kuti vana veZimbabwe vaite muonera pamwe chuma chemuzukuru pakugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. No media source currently available Mashoko aya akatsinhirwawo naSenator weMDC inotungamirwa naVaChamisa VaGideon Shoko avo vakati zvizhinji zvichazoitwa nevatungamiri vemapato kana ivo vakura nzira. No media source currently available Nyika dzakawanda pasi rino dziri kukurudzira mapato ezvematongerwo enyika muZimbabwe kuti aite nhaurirano sezvo zvinhu munyika zvaramba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo.
title: Nhengo dzeParamende dzeZanu-PF, MDC neMamwe Mapato Dzotanga Nhaurirano

text: Sangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition rinoti riri kubatana nemhuri yese yeZimbabwe mukupemberera neChitatu zuva rekuwana rusununguko. Sangano iri rinoti chirongwa chemhemberero chinofanirwa kuitwa pasina rusarura, sezvo zuva rekuwana kuzvitonga riri remunhu wese zvisinei nekuti ndewebato ripi. Mukuru weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaThulani mswalento, vanoti vanoda kusimbisa mashoko ekuti mukupembererwa kwezuva rerusungunuko ngakusava nekupesana kune chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Vati panogoverwa rubatsiro rwezvekudya, kana mbeu dzinopihwa varimi pachena, kana rumwe rubatsiro, ngapasatariswe kuti wabuda mumba maani. Va Mswalento vatiwo madzishe, mauto nevose vanoshandira hurumende kuti vasapinze zvematongerwo enyika mubasa ravo, vachitora mativi zvichienderana nekuti vanotsigira bato ripi. Vati izvi zvinotevera kubuda kwemashoko anoratidza kuti pane kunongedzerwa kwevamwe mukushandisa chisimba chebato riri kutonga reZANU PF mukusarura vamwe pane zviitko zvenyika zvakasiyana siyana. Vatiwo makore apfuura vanhu vaimanikidzwa kuenda kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana kunodya mabiko ekupemberera zuva rekuwana kuzvitonga vachida, vasingadi. Izvi vati zvinobata kunyanya vagari vekumaruwa uye vashandi vanozviitira mabasa emaoko mumaguta. Vati hurumende yaEmmerson VaMnangagwa inofanirwa kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu zvinozoitawo kuti paonekwe musiyano nezvaiitwa nehurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe. No media source currently available
title: Crisis In Zimbabwe Coalition Yopemberera Zuva reKuzvitonga

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica zvinoti zviri kufara nemashoko ekuoneka akaitwa nemutungamiri weAmerica, VaBarack Obama, mushure mekutonga nyika iyi kwemakore masere. ​VaObama vakataura vari kuChicago uko vakatangira zvematongerwo enyika. Vakati ivo vari kutarisira kupa masimba kumutungamiri mutsva weAmerica, Va Donald Trump, mumazuva gumi anotevera zvinoratidza kuti America inoremekedza hutongo hwejechetere. VaObama vakatora masimba makore masere apfura semutungamiri wechitema wekutanga kutonga America. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Va Kudzai Tsondai, avo vanogara muNew York, vanoti mashoko aVa Obama akavabata zvikuru uye Zimbabwe inokwanisa kudzidza kukosha kwehutongo hwejechetere kubva kuAmerica. "VaObama vakaratidza kuti zvakakosha kuti bumbiro remutemo riremekedzwe uye kuti kana munhu pedza hutongo hwake asiyire vamwe chigaro sezvichange zvichiitwa svondo rino uya apo vaDonald Trump vachatora masimba. Tinofara kuti zvirikuitika izvi zvirikuitwa murunyararo pasina mhirizhonga sezvatinowona zvichiitikia kunedzimwe nyika," VaTsondai vaudza Studio 7. No media source currently available
title: Mashoko aVa Barack Obama Obata Vakawanda

text: Mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaKembo Mohadi vakaudza vatori venhau muHarare nezuro kuti hurumende ichatorera marezinesi makambani ose ari kuti anoda mari yekuAmerica kana achitengesa zvinhu. VaMohadi vakataura mashoko aya kumahofisi avo eMunhumutapa. Zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika zviri kuramba zvichiita manyama amire nerongo zvopa kuti vakawanda vaomerwe nehupenyu mari ichishaikwa uye mitengo yezvinhu ichiramba ichiita chamuramba mhuru. Kunyangwe hazvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka, hurumende inoti zvinokwanisa kugadzirisa matambudziko aya ikambopihwa nguva kunyangwe pachave nemarwadzo. Munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNdabaningu Nick Mangwana vaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti kushomeka kwezvinhu kuri kukonzerwa nenyaya yekuti vanhu vari kungotya kuti zvingazoshomeka nekudaro vari kutenga zvakawandisa zvopa kuti zvinhu zvishomeke. Gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vanotiwo vachaderedza huwandu hwevashandi vehurumende senzira yekugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Mamwe makambani atanga kumbovhara nenyaya yekuti anoti ari kumanikidzwa kutengesa zvinhu nemabond notes nemaRTGs kana kuti makadhi ekumabhanga zvichinzi akaenzana nedhora rekuAmerica. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute Doctor Prosper Chitambara vanoti mari yemabond neRTG's iri kuramba ichishaya simba zvichienzaniswa nedhora rekuAmerica zvekutopetwa kanodarika kaviri. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemukuru wekambani yePeakford Management ine mabhizimisi munyika dzakawanda dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica VaAlbert Mandizvidza Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Steve Hanke vanoti mitero yekubatira vanhu masendi maviri padhora roga roga iri kuda kudzikwa naVaNcube munongedzo wekuti hurumende yakundikana sezvo izvi zvichatonyanya kukonzera matambudziko nekusagadzikana mune vemabhizimisi. Mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers VaDenford Mutashu vanotenderanawo nemaonero aya. Asi vaimbove mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries Amai Marah Hativagone vanoti zvinogona kushanda. Panyaya yekuderedza huwandu hwevashandi vehurumende Doctor Chitambara vanoti panoda kunyatsodzamiswa pfungwa sezvo vamwe vashandi vakaita savanamukoti navanachiremba vari vashoma, asi mauto nemapurisa akawandisa. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzebudiriro vachiongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaMaxwell Saungweme vanoti zvinogona kushanda kana zvikaitwa nemazvo kunyangwe uri mutoro chaiwo. VaMandizvidza vanoti zvinonetsa kukwezva vemabhizimisi ekunze munyika nekuti mitemo yeZimbabwe haina kujeka. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakatiwo hurumende yavo iri kuyedza zvose zvainogona kugadzirisa hupfumi. Asi mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC VaNeson Chamisa vanoti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi nekuti zvinhu zviri kutonyanya kuoma. Zvinhu zviri kushaikwa muzvitoro zvinosanganisa chingwa, mafuta ekubikisa nekufambisa dzimotokari, shuga nezvimwe. Vemakombi vave kuwedzerawo mari yemichovha vachiti mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari ari kudhura. No media source currently available
title: VaKembo Mohadi Voyambira Kutorera Marezinesi veMabhizimisi Vari Kuda Mari yekuAmerica

text: Vange vari mumiriri weGlen View muparamende Amai Vimbayi Tsvangirai-Java, avo vakashaya neMuvhuro, varadzikwa kumarinda eGlen Forest muHarare. Zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvaungana panhandare ye City Sports Centre muHarare zvichionekana nemufi mutumbi wake usati wanoradzikwa kumarinda eGlen Forest, kunze kweguta reHarare. Vachitaura kuCity Sports Centre, mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vati kuparara pamwe nekutetepa kwemigwagwa ndiko kwakakonzera tsaona yakazoita kuti Amai Java varasikirwe nehupenyu. Ataura akamirira mhuri yekwaMhundwa kunove kwakaberekwa amai VaAmai Java, mushakabvu Amai Susan Tsvangirai, VaIsaac Mhundwa, vati varwadziswa semhuri nekushayika kwaAmai Java kuburikidza netsaona yemumugwagwa inove yakauraya sekuru VaAmai Java, VaTafadzwa Mhundwa. VaMhundwa vati chiri kunyanyovaradzwa ndechekuti VaTafadzwa Mhundwa, Amai Tsvangirai pamwe naAmai Java vose vakaenda kwamupfiganebwe zvichikonzerwa netsaona dzemumigwagwa. VaMhundwa vakurudzira mapato eMDC neZanu PF kuti agare pasi atsvage nzira dzekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJoel Biggie Matiza, kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi VaMatiza vakabuda panhepfenyuro yeZBC svondo rapera vachiti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekugadzirisa migwagwa mikuru mizhinji yemunyika. VaChamisa vati matambudziko akatarisana nenyika anopera chete kana mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakabvuma kugara patafura kuti vazeye nhaurwa dzese dziri kunetsa munyika. Zvichakadai, mutauriri weparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, avo vanga varipowo parufu urwu, vatiwo paramende iri kushushikana zvikuru nekushayika kwakaita Amai Java vachiti munhu aiita basa reparamende nemazvo. VaChamisa vatorawo mukana uyu kuti vaudze mutungamiri weMDCT, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, kuti vanofanirawo kugara pasi voona kuti kusawirirana kuri pakati pavo kungagadziriswa sei. Ataura akamirira mhuri yekwaTsvangirai uye vari munin’ina wevaimbova mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaManase Tsvangirai, vati kunyange hazvo vabatwa panyama nhete semhuri, kufa murawu waMwari. Amai Java vange vabva kusarudzwa semunyori mukuru muboka remadzimai muMDC pakongiresi yakaitwa kuGweru mwedzi wapera. Vakaita tsaona vachangobuda muKwekwe vachibva kuBulawayo kumusangano wekugadzirira kongiresi iyi mutsaona yakauraya sekuru vavo VaTafadzwa Mhundwa nakanzura wekuGlen View, VaPaul Rukanda. No media source currently available
title: Amai Tsvangirai-Java Vanoradzikwa kuMarinda eGlen Forest muHarare

text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi mubazi rezvekurima, reZimbabwe Agricultural Professionals and Technical Association (ZAPTA), rinoti hurumende yakazoita musangano naro uye zvichemo zvavo zvikatambirwa. Kwechinguva, ZAPTA, yange ichiedza kuti hurumende igadzirise zvichemo zvevashandi zvinosanganisa kuvabhadhara mari dzekubatsirikana panguva yekurwisana necoronavirus, kubatsira vadhomeni vari kure nemahofisi eCMED nemari yekuti vawane midhudhudhu yebasa uye kuti hurumende itarisise nekugadzirisa mashandiro ari kuita vanhu mubazi iri, nezvimwe. Tatadza kubata munyori mubazi rezvekurima, VaJohn Basera, sezvo nharembozha yavo isina kudavirwa. Munyori mukuru we ZAPTA VaZivaishe Zhou vanoti hurumende yakabvuma kubhadhara vashandi mari dzavaida uye ikavimbisa kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo zvese. No media source currently available
title: Vashandi Mubazi reZvekurima Vanoti Hurumende Yavimbisa Kugadzirisa Zvichemo Zvavo

text: VaNick Zemura, vanove chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muMaryland kuAmerica, vanoti munhu wakashingirira muhupenyu unokwanisa kuona zvizhinji zvezvaunoshuvira uchiri mudiki zvichibudirira Kune vakawanda, zvishuvo zvavo zvehupenyu zvavanokura nazvo zvinonetsa kuzozvibata zvave muchero. Asi kuna VaNick Zemura, vanove chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muMaryland kuAmerica, munhu wakashingirira muhupenyu unokwanisa kuona zvizhinji zvezvaunoshuvira uchiri mudiki zvichibudirira. VaZemura vave mumwe wenyanzvi munyaya dzekubikwa kwemafirimu nemitambo yepaterevhizheni, chipo chavanoti vakakura nacho. VaZemura, avo vakaberekerwa kwaMukarakate kwaMurehwa, vakadzidza paGumbanjera Primary vasati vaenda paMurehwa Mission pavakaenderera mberi nemitambo yemadhirama. Vakazoenda paSeke Teachers’ College pavakanodzidzira zvehurairidzi panguva imwe cheteyo vachirodza hunyanzvi hwavo munyaya dzemitambo idzi. Vakazosunga twavo vakananga kuAmerica makore gumi nemashanu apfuura kwavakasvikoshanda zvakare semudzidzisi. Asi havana kurasa chido chavo chezvemafirimu, izvo zvakaita kuti vaende kuLos Angeles kwavakanodzidzira zvekubika mafirimu pamwe nekuita mitambo. Vakazobatana nemunin’ina wavo, VaMike Zemura, avo vari kuCanada vakaumba kambani yavo Mirazvo Production iyo yakanyoreswa zviri pamutemo muZimbabwe. Kusvika pari nhasi, VaZemura vanoti vabika mafirimu nemitambo zvinodarika makumi maviri, uye vashandawo nenyanzvi dzinosanganisira dzekuZimbabwe, Nigeria, Ghana pamwe neAmerica. “Kumusha ndashanda nenyanzvi dzakaita saAmai Jesesi Mungoshi, Mukoma Elijah Madzikatire nevamwe,” Vanodaro VaZemura. Elijah Madzikatire, mwana wenyanzvi mune zvemitambo, mushakabvu Safirio Madzikatire. Amai Jesesi Mungoshi mudzimai wemunyori ane mukurumbira munyika Charles Mungoshi. VaZemura vanoti vakatanga kushanda naMai Mungoshi pafirimu rakaitwa pamusoro pebhuku raCharles Mungoshi, ‘Makunun’unu Maodza Mwoyo’. Rimwe remabasa avo, ifirimu idzva rakabikirwa munharaunda yeMurehwa rinonzi ‘Mwana waMwari’, iro vari kushambadza. No media source currently available VaZemura vanoti kune vana veZimbabwe vanoda kuita zvemitambo nemafirimu asi vasina mari, shandai nesimba zvinhu zvnonaka chete rimwe zuva. Vanokurudzirawo kuti hurumende ibatsire vezvemitambo, kunyange hazvo vachiti ivo pachavo havasati vasangana nematambudziko mukuita kwavo basa kumusha. No media source currently available
title: VaNick Zemura Voshandisa Mafirimu Avo Kuraira Vana veZimbabwe

text: Sangano rinomiririra vana chiremba vanoshanda muzvipatara zvehurumende, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, ZHDA, rinoti rava kuita hurukuro nehofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, sezvo pane vanhu vanga vachiendesa mashoko emanyepo kumutungamiri wenyika pamusoro pezvichemo zvavo. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, Dr Elias Muzoremba, vaudzawo Studio7 kuti sangano ravo harinei nezvematongerwo enyika uye harisi kushanda nemamwe masangano sezvange zvichitaurwa nevamwe vanhu vanoda kukanganisa mashandiro avo. Dr Muzoremba vanoti vana chiremba vakamirira kunzwa kubva kuna VaMnangagwa sezvo vakasvitsa zvichemo zvavo kwavari mushure mekuona kuti zvichemo zvavo zvange zvisingasvitswi kumutungamiri wenyika. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, kuti tinzwe pamire VaMnangagwa panyaya iyi. Asi VaCharamba vaudza pepanhau reThe Herald kuti VaMnangagwa vagurira zororo ravo panzira kuitira kuti vagadzirise zviri kunetsa munyaya dzehutano izvo zviri kukonzerwa nekuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba ava. Vatiwo VaMnangagwa vakatarisirwa kutora matanho akaomarara uye vachange vachishanda pamwe chete nemutevedzeri wavo, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika. Vana chiremba vari kuramwa mabasa vanga vachiita nhaurirano neHealth Services Board, pamwe negurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, asi hapana chine pundutso chati chabuda. Hurumende yanga ichiburitsa mashoko ekuti nhaurirano idzi dzanga dzichibudirira zvikuru, uye pane dzimwe nguva yakamboti vana chiremba vainge vadzokera kumabasa mushure mekunge vawirirana nehurumende. Asi ichi chakanga chisiri chokwadi sezvo kuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba kuri kuenderera mberi vana chiremba ava vachiti vanoda kuti zvichemo zvavo zvitange zvagadziriswa. Vana chiremba vari kuda kuti vatambiriswe mari dzavo nemari yekuAmerica; muzvipatara muve nemishonga inokwanira varwere; uye kuti vana chiremba ava vapihwe mukana wekutenga motokari dzekufambisa kuenda kumabasa avo. Pari zvino vana chiremba vari kutambira mazana matatu nemakumi maviri ane madhora mapfumbamwe pamwedzi, asi mari iyi vachiipihwa ari maRTGS. Vana chiremba vava nemazuva makumi matatu nemaviri vachiramwa mabasa, uye vana chiremba vakuru vakakandawo mapadza neChitatu vachiti zvinhu zvava kuvaremera muzvipatara sezvo vagara vachishanda pamwe chete navana chiremba vadiki vari kuramwa mabasa. Dare remakurukota rakadoma VaChiwenga kuti vatungamire mukugadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dziri kuziva zviri kuitika dzinoti pane kuti vayananise gakava riripo, VaChiwenga vari kushandisa pfungwa dzechiuto munhaurirano idzi, izvo zvisiri kutambirwa zvakanaka nevashanda mumapazi ane chekuita nezvehutano, sezvo kuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba, kwava kuvhiringawo mashandiro avo. No media source currently available
title: Vana Chiremba Vanoti Vari Kutaurirana neHofisi yaVaMnangagwa

text: Hurumende yeZimbabwe nesangano renyika dzepasi rese reUnited Nations zvanyorerana chibvumirano neChishanu chichaita kuti sangano iri ripe rubatsiro rwemari yebudiriro inosvika bhiriyoni rimwe chete nemazana matanhatu emamiriyoni emadhora kuZimbabwe kwemakore mashanu anotevera. No media source currently available Izvi zvichaitwa pasi pechirongwa che Zimbabwe United Nations Development Assistance Framework kana kuti ZUNDAF. Munyori muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika nedare remakurukota, VaMisheck Sibanda, ndivo vasaina vakamirira hurumende kozotiwo mumiriri we UN muZimbabwe, VaBishow Parajuli, vasaina vakamirira sangano ravo. VaSibanda vati zvaitika nhasi zvakanaka chose sezvo mari iyi ichange yave kubatwa nehurumende. Vati izvi zvasiyana nemakore ehurumende yemubatanidzwa apo mari yerubatsiro yaibatwa nemasangano iwawo achibhadhara ega masangano nemakambani aiita mabasa ebudiriro. Mari iyi ichabatsira munyaya dzegutsaruzhinji kupa vanhu chikafu, kubatsira muhutano, kusanganisira HIV/AIDS, kuderedza hurombo pamwe nekuenzanisa mikana pakati pevanhuvarume nevanhukadzi. VaParajuli vati rubatsiro urwu runoratidza kuti sangano ravo rine chido chekubatsira Zimbabwe kuti ibudirire uye vati mari iyi yakaunganidzwa zvisinei kuti zvinhu zvakaoma pasi rese. Kunyange hazvo veruzhinji vafarira zvaitika nhasi, vamwe vakaita saVaRyan Ndibatei, vaudza Studio 7 kuti UN inofanira kuburitsa maziso kuti mari isashandiswe zvisina maturo nehurumende. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaJames Johwa, vati kuendesa mari yerubatsiro kuhurumende kunoreva kut UN yave kuvimba nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Vatiwo panofanirwa kuva nehwaro hwekuti mari iyi ishandiswe zvine mwero. Mwedzi wapfuura hurumende yakaita musangano nemasangano anopa rubatsiro akaita seUN nechinangwa chekuumba komiti yekuona kuti mari yerubatsiro yoshandiswa nenzira kwayo
title: UN Yobatsira Zimbabwe ne$1.6 Billion Ichasimudzira Zvirongwa Zvakawanda

text: Rimwe remasangno anomirira vashandi munyika re Zimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions kana ZFTU nhasi rapa varidzi vemakambani mazuta matatu kuti vadzosere pabasa vashandi vavakadzinga zvichitevera mutongo wedare reSupreme Court uyo unoti vashandirwi vanogona kungoita madiro aJojina pakudzinga vashandi basa. No media source currently available Munyori mukuru musangano re ZFTU , Va Kennias Shamuyarira, vati sangano ravo harisi kufara kuti huwandu hwevanhu vari kudzingwa mabasa zvichitevera mutongo we Supreme Court uyu, huri kuramba huchikura. Va Shamuyarira vati varidzi vemakambani aya vanofanira kudzosera vashandi pamabasa mazuva matatu asati apera vachiti vemakambani aya vakaregedza kudzosera vashandi vavakadzinga pamabasa vachatora matanho akakura kwazvo. Zvinonzi kune vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvipfumbamwe vadzingwa mabasa mumakambani akasiyana-siyana kubva pakaturwa mutongo uyu ne Supreme Court. Amai Vimbai Chinyama avo vanoshanda nerimwe remasangano anomorira vashandi re Zimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions vanoti vashandi vazhinji havachazivi kuti ramangwana ravo rakamira sei pakatariswa mutongo we Supreme Court uyu. Amai Chinyama vakurudzira mutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, kuti vashandise masimba avanawo pasi pebumbiro remitemo yenyika kuti vamise kudzingwa kuri kuitwa vashandi vazhinji. Mutongo wakaturwa ne Supreme Court uyu, uyo unoti mushandirwi anogona kudzinga mushandi mushure mekumupa mwedzi mitatu yekumuzivisa kuti ave kumiswa basa. Mutongo uyu uri kupikiswa mumatare uye nyaya iyi yakatarisirwa kunzwikwa neChishanu. Mune imwewo nyaya, vatungamiri vesangano rinomirira vanotengesa mumigwagwa re National Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, Va Samuel Wadzai pamwe naVa Sten Zvorwadza nevamwe vanotengesera mumigwagwa vavakasungwa navo, vapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekuita mhirizhonga nemapurisa ekanzuru ye Harare. Mutongi wedare, Va Hapias Zhou, vati mumwe nemumwe abhadhare madhora makumi mashanu semari yechibatiso uye kuti vose vane mapasipoti vaasiye kudare uye kuti vasungwa vese ava vazvipire kumapurisa kamwe chete mumasvondo maviri oga oga kudzamara nyaya yavo yapera kunzwikwa mumatare.
title: ZFTU Yoyambira Makambani Kuti Adzosere paMabasa Vashandi Vakadzingwa Basa

text:
Pane vanhu vakawanda vasungwa pamwe nekurohwa muHarare muzuva ranga rakarongwa kuratidzirwa neboka riri kuzvidaidza kuti July 31st Movement ukuwo vanga vari mudzimba vachiti varohwa nemapurisa nemauto.

Mapurisa nemauto anga akapakatira zvombo afuma akavhara nzira dzose dzinopinda pakati pekuguta dzinobva mumisha yose inogara veruzhinji uye vamwe vavo vanga vazere muguta. Nekuda kweizvi, vanhu vazhinji vanga vachida kupinda mudhorobha vanoti vatadza kupinda mudhorobha zvaita kuti pakati pedhorobha paswere pakazara mauto nemapurisa chete uye zvitoro zvose zvange zvakavharwa.

Mapurisa asunga vanhu vakawanda munzvimbo dzakasiya-siyana dzinogara veruzhinji uye vamwe vasungwa vanosanganisira mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Advocate Fadzai Mahere, nemunyori wemabhuku ane mukurumbira, Tsitsi Dangarembwa, mushure mekuedza kuda kuratidzira.

Vamwe vasungwa mumiriri weHarare West muparamende, Muzvare Joanna Mamombe, Muzvare Cecelia Chimbiri, naMuzvare Netsai Marova avo vanoti vakambopambwa muna Chivabvu. Vatatu ava vasungwa pamwe negweta ravo, VaObey Shava, apo vanga vachienda kukamba yemapurisa vachida kunozivisa mapurisa kuti vari kutevedzera zvakatarwa nedare kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kudzimba dzavo.

Mutauriri weboka revechidiki muMDC Alliance, VaStephen Chuma, vashora kusungwa kwaitwa vanhu ava uye vati zvaitwa nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa izvi ndizvo zvavanga vakatarisira.

Mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, vati havasati vave nehuwandu hwevanhu vasungwa muHarare pamwe nemunyika yose vachiti vachiri kubatanidza mashoko ari kubva kukamba dzemapurisa dzakasiyana-siyana.

Vamwewo vanogara mumisha yakaita seGlen Norah neHighfields vakaita saVaTadiwa Mandudzo, avo vane makore gumi nemasere, vanoti vapindirwa mudzimba dzavo nemasoja vakazvindikitwa.

Tete vaVaMandudzo, Amai Nyaradzai Mandudzo, vati vave kutya chirwere cheCovid-19 nehupenyu hwavo panguva imwechete sezvo vachiti havasisina kuchengetedzeka munyika yechipikirwa.

Mumwewo asina kuda kudomwa nezita anogara muCherima mumusha weHighfields anoti vaswera vachiita hwekiti negonzo nemapurisa nemasoja vachitsvaga chingavararamisa.

Mumwe wevanga vari pamberi pehurongwa hwekuratidzira kwanga kuchida kuitwa nhasi uye vari mutungamiri weboka reTajamuka, VaPromise Mkwananzi, vati vacharamba vakavesera hurumende moto kudzamara nyaya yehuori hwavanoti huri munyika yagadziriswa.

Hurumende yaVaMnangagwa yakagara yabuda pachena kuti yakanga isiri kuzobvumira kuti kuratidzira kuenderere mberi ichiti izvi zvaizopinza hupenyu hweveruzhinji panjodzi sezvo paine chirwere cheCovid-19 chiri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda munyika, kusanganisira mumwe wemauto akabatsira mukubviswa kwaVaRobert Mugabe pachigaro muna 2017, VaPerence Shiri, avo vavigwa nwChishanu kuHeroes Acre. No media source currently available
title: Mauto neMapurisa Anorova Pamwe neKusungwa Vanhu Vakawanda muHarare

text: Dare repamusoro rapa mudzimai wemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, uyo wavari kurambana naye, Muzvare Marry Mubaiwa, mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso pamhosva yavari kupoperwa yekurova mushandi wavo. Vachisvitsa chikumbiro chekuti Muzvare Mubaiwa vatongwe vachibva kumba pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekunzi vakarova mushandi wavo anoita basa rekuchengeta vana vavo, gweta raMuzvare Mubaiwa, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vati mutongo wedare ramejasitiriti wekunyima Muzvare Mubaiwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso pamhosva yavari kupomerwa, unofanira kusendekwa parutivi. Amai Mtetwa vati hapana humbowo hwakasvitswa kudare hunoratidza kuti Muzvare Mubaiwa munhu anogara achipara mhosva dzakadai zvakazopa mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti avati vanogara vachipara mhosva dzakadai. Asi gweta ranga rakamirira hurumende panyaya iyi, VaMichael Reza, vati Muzvare Mubaiwa munhu ari kupomerwa zvakare mhosva yekuda kuuraya VaChiwenga pavairwara vari muchipatara chekuSouth Africa gore rapera saka nokudaro vati kurova kwavanoti vakaita mushandi wavo, Muzvare Delight Munyoro, kunoratidza kuti munhu anoda zvemhirizhonga. Amai Mtetwa vati hazvaikwanisika kuti Muzvare Mubaiwa varove Muzvare Munyoro mbama sezviri kutaurwa nehurumende sezvo vakakuvara maoko kubudikidza nekuputika kwakaita bhambu kuWhite City Stadium pamusangano waiitwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nevatsigiri vavo muna 2018. Zvataurwa naVaReza zvapikiswa naAmai Mtetwa avo vati hapana humbowo hwekuti Muzvare Mubaiwa vakapara mhosva yekuda kuuraya murume wavo sezvo nyaya iyi isati yatongwa vakabatwa nemhosva. Mutongi wedare, Amai Erica Ndewere, vatura mutongo wekuti mutongo wedare ramejasitiriti uyu usendekwe parutivi vachiti Muzvare Mubaiwa havanganzi vagare mujeri sezvo vasina kubatwa nemhosva yekuuraya murume wavo iyo yavakatopihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. Amai Ndewere vati Muzvare Mubaiwa vabhadhare madhora chiuru nemazana mashanu ari maRTGS semari yechibatiso uye kuti vazvipire kumapurisa epaBorrowdale kamwechete pamavhiki maviri uri musi weChishanu, kuti vagare pa64 Folly Johns Crescent ku GlenLorne uye kuti vasavhiringidzane nevafakazi panyaya iyi. Mutungamiri weTajamuka, VaPromise Mkhwananzi, vati mutongo wakanaka waturwa nedare asi vanoti havasi kufara nemabatirwo ari kuitwa Muzvare Mubaiwa naVaChiwenga. Mumwe murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu uye vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Activists Alliance, Muzvare Lynette Mudehwe, vati kunetsana kuri kuita VaChiwenga naMuzvare Mubaiwa hakufanire kushungurudza vana. Mapepa ari pamberi pedare anoti Muzvare Mubaiwa vakarova Muzvare Munyoro musi wa28 Ndira pachikoro cheHellenics muHarare pavaida kutora vana vavo asi Muzvare Munyoro vakarambira navo. Izvi zvakaitika mushure mekunge dare repamusoro rainge rapa Muzvare Mubaiwa mvumo yekugara nevana vavo zvichitevera kurambana kwavari kuita naVaChiwenga izvo zvakazokonzera kuti VaChiwenga vapikise mutongo uyu kudare reSupreme Court. Mune imwewo nyaya yanga iri mumatare, muzvinabizhimusi ane mukurumbira, VaGenius Kadungure, avo vanozivakanwa nezita rekunzi “Ginimbi”, vanyimwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekunzi vakapinza munyika motokari yavo yemhando yepamusorosoro gore rapera zvechikiribidi mushure mekudzikisa mutengo wemotokari iyi. Mapepa ari pamberi pedare anoratidza kuti VaKadungure vakadzisikisa kukosha kwemotokari yavo pavakasvika pamuganhu wenyika kuBeitbridge kubva pamamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana zvemaRands kusvika pamiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe. Vachuchisi venyaya iyi vanoti VaKadungure havana kutaura mari yechokwadi pavakapinza motokari yavo yemhando yeBentley yavakatenga kuSouth Africa. Hurumende inoti VaKadungure vakabhara mari inoita zviuru makumi masere nechimwechete zvemadhora ekuAmerica kuti motokari yavo ipinde munyika zvakaita kuti hurumende irasikirwe nemari inodarika zviuru makumi mashanu nezvisere zvemadhora ekuAmerica. VaKadungure vanzi vadzoke kudare musi wa 20 Kukadzi uye gweta raVaKadungure, VaJonathan Samukane, vati vachakwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Mubaiwa Vanopihwa Mukana Wekuti Vatongwe Vachibva Kumba

text: Mutungamiriri webato reMovement for Democratic Change, VaMorgan Tsvangirai nhasi vambomisa basa nhengo shanu dzebato iri zvichitevera mhirizhonga yakaitika neSvondo kumahofisi ebato iri muBulawayo. Vamwe vevambomiswa kuita mabasa ane chekuita nemusangano we MDC-T vanosanganisira mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato iri, Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo pamwe nemutevedzeri wemubati wehomwe VaCharlton Hwende, pamwe nevechidiki vatatu. Vaviri ava inhengo dzeStanding Committee yebato iri. Studio 7 yataura nemutauriri webato reMDC-T, VaObert Gutu avo vati ichokwadi kuti kune nhengo shanu dzambomiswa kuita mabasa emusangano. Vati kumiswa basa kwevashanu uku kwaitirwa kuti kuferefetwa kwenyaya yemhirizhonga iyi kufambire mberi zvisina dambudziko. VaGutu vati kuferefetwa kuri kuitwa nyaya yemhirizhonga iyi kunoratidza pachena kuti bato reMDC-T haridi zvemhirizhonga. Pane vambomiswa basa ava Studio 7 yakwanisa kubata Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya iyi. Muzvare Khumalo vati mashoko ekumiswa basa kwavo havasati vaanzwa kubva kubato ravo. Vachibvunzurudzwa neStudio 7 kuti vane chekuita here nemhirizhonga yakaita kuBulawayo, Muzvare Khumalo varamba vakati ivo havawirirani nemhirizhonga. Pavakaita musangano nevatori venhau neMuvhuro muHarare, VaTsvangirai vakavimbisa kuti vachaferefeta nyaya yemhirizhonga iyi pamwe nekuranga vese vachabatwa nemhosva. Mushure memhirizhonga iyi VaHwende vakanyora padandemutande reFacebook vachipesvedzera mhirizhonga iyi asi vakazokumbira ruregerero pamusoro pezvavaive vanyora. Vanonzi vakarohwa kuBulawayo vanosanganisira mumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaTsvangirai, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe pamwe nasachigaro webato iri VaLovemore Moyo. Vatungamiriri ava vaive vasipo pakaparurwa mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weMDC Alliance neMugovera, izvo veruzhinji vari kufungidzira kuti ndizvo zvavakaroverwa. No media source currently available
title: VaTsvangirai Vanombomisa Dzimwe Nhengo Basa Zvichitevera Mhirizhonga muBato Ravo

text: Kunyange hazvo nyika yacherechedza chibvumirano chekubatana chakanyoreranwa pakati peZanu PF nePF Zapu musi wa22 Zvita mugore ra1987, veruzhinji vacherechedza zororo iri nenzira dzakasiyana-siyana. Vamwe vevanoita mabasa emaoko vaenderera mberi nemabasa avo zvisinei nezororo iri. VaTaurai Zvirimumwoyo vati nyaya yekutsvaka chauviri ndiyo yapa kuti vaite kubasa ravo semazuva ose. Kunyange hazvo vauya kubasa, VaZvirimumwoyo vati zuva reUnity Day vanorikoshesa zvikuru sezvo richivayeuchidza kubatana kwemarudzi pamwe nekuve mucherechedzo werunyararo munyika. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaEdwin Mwase, vatsigirawo mashoko aya vachiti nekuda kwekuti vanodya zvavanokohwa chete, vanga vasingagoni kugara kumba sezvo vachitsvaka mari. VaMwase vati zviri nyore kune vari pamabsa chaiwo kuti vaende kuzororo nekuti vanozongowana mari yavo. VaMwase vatiwo zuva iri harina zvarinoreva kwavari sezvo kubatana kunotaurwa vasingakuoni Chipangamazano chemutungamiriri wenyika, VaChristopher Mutsvangwa, vati zuva reUnity Day rakakosha zvikuru. VaMutsvangwa vati zvakaitika munyika pakubvisa hurumende yaVaMugabe zvinoratidza kubatana kukuru vakati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti kubatana uku kuenderere mberi. VaMutsvangwa vatiwo kubatana kwevana veZimbabwe kunounza budiriro. Chibvumirano cheUnity Day chakakwanisa kupedza kusagadzikana kwakanga kwapinda munyika kubva panguva yekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere. Chibvumirano ichi chakaita kuti pave nehurumende yemushandira pamwe pakati pebato reZanu PF yaVaRobert Mugabe nePF Zapu yaitungamirwa nevakazove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, mushakabvu Doctor Joshua Nkomo. Asi chibvumirano ichi hachisisina kunyatsosimba sezvo dzimwe nhengo dzeZapu dzakadai saVaDumiso Dabengwa dzakabuda mubato reZanu PF. Vamwewo vatiwo kukosha kwezuva iri kuchaonekwawo pachasarudzwa vatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa sezvo mumwe wavo achifanirwa kubva kuPF Zapu Hapana kuunganwa kwaitwa zviri pamutemo kucherechedza zuva iri muHarare. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru wesangano ravanachipangamazano, reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisai Ruhanya, vanoti chibvumirano cherunyararo chakaitwa muna 1987 pakati pe PF Zapu neZanu PF hachina zvachinoreva kana nyaya yeGukurahundi isina kugadziriswa zvachose. Doctor Ruhanya vanoti maronda akakonzerwa nehurumende yaiva pasi paVaRobert Mugabe, mukuedza kwayo kugadzirisa dambudziko rakanga rapinda mumatunhu eMatabeleland neMidlands anofanirwa kutanga apodzwa, kwozotaurwa nezvekubatana kana runyararo. Chimwe chavanoti chinofanirwa kupedzwa inyaya yekuti munhu anozivikanwa nedunhu raanobva, kwete nekuti chizvarwa cheZimbabwe. No media source currently available
title: Zororo reUnity Day Rinopfuura seMamwe Mazuva Pasina Zvakawanda Zvaitwa Munyika

text: Mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police anoti kusvika pari zvino, vanhu makumi matatu nevaviri vafa, vamwe vanosvika zana nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu vakakuvara mutsaona dzemumigwagwa munyika yose pazororo rino reEaster. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri wemapurisa, Chief Superintendant Paul Nyathi, vanoti tsaona zhinji dziri kukonzerwa nevatyairi vanenge vachimhanyisa motokari dzavo, nevamwe vanenge vachida kupindira dzimwe motokari dzinenge dziri mberi kwavo. Vanoti gore rino vane zvikwata zvakawanda zviri kushanda nesangano re traffic safety, pamwe nebazi rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu vachiyambira veruzhinji kuti vazvibate kana vari mumigwagwa, kuitira kuti vasapinda mutsaona. Gore rapera panguva ino, vanhu vanosvika gumi nevasere vakafa, makumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri vakakuvara mutsaona dzemumigwagwa. No media source currently available
title: Mapurisa Anoti Vanhu Vafa paZororo reEaster muTsaona Gore Rino Vakawanda Kudarika Goere Rapera

text: Hurumende inonzi yakoka masangano ose anomirira varairidzi kumusangano wechimbichimbi uchaitwa masikati, uyo unonzi uchapindwawo negurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi, VaCain Mathema. Musangano uyu unouya panguva iyo masangano eZimbabwe Teachers’ Union neProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe anga anyorera tsamba kuhurumende achinyunyuta nehurongwa hwekuda kuvhura zvikoro kuti vana vari kuda kunyora bvunzo dzavo dzepakati pegore vakwanise kunyora bvunzo dzavo. PTUZ yakanyora tsamba nemuvhuro ichidawo kuita musangano naVaMathema, uyewo ichiratidza kunyunyuta kwayo nehurongwa hwekuda kuvhura zvikoro ipo pasina dziviriro yakakwana yekupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 muzvikoro, izvo zvinonzi nemasangano maviri aya zviri kushandiswawo senzvimbo dzekuchengetera vanhu vanenge vabva kunze kwenyika. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Inodaidzira Musangano weChimbichimbi neVarairidzi

text: Masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu ari kukurudzira sangano reUnited Nations nemamwe masangano kuti apindire mudambudziko reZimbabwe zvichitevera kupambwa nekutochwa kwakaitwa madzimai matatu ebato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. Madzimai matatu eMDC aya anoti akasungwa nemapurisa mushure mekuratidzira kuWarren Park, ndokubva aiswa mumaoko evanhu vakazoatocha ndokusiya akandwa panzvimbo yeMuchapondwa kuBindura. Mumiriri weHarare West muNational Assembly, Muzvare Joanna Mamombe, mutevedzeri wasachigaro wevechidiki; Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri, pamwe nemutevedzeri wemurongi wemisangano yevechidiki, Muzvare Netsai Marova, vakaudza hama dzavo neChishanu kuti vakabatwa chibharo mushure mekupambwa kuWarren Park, ndokubva vazosiyiwa vakandwa panzvimbo yemabhizimisi yeMuchapondwa kuBindura. Vatatu ava vari kurapwa pachipatara cheParktown Hospital muHarare. Baba vaMuzvare Chimbiri, VaHenry Chimbiri, vanoti vari kurwadzikanazvikuru nezvakaitwa nehurumende. VaChimbiri vakurudzira sangano reUnited Nations kuti ripindire muZimbabwe sezvo mapurisa ari kutadza kuchengetedza mitemo yenyika. No media source currently available Gweta riri kumirira vatatu ava, VaJeremiah Bamu, vanoti vari kuda kuti vatatu ava vatange vaita zvakanaka kuitira kuti vataure navo matanho ekutora. VaBamu, avo vashanyira madzimai aya, vati Havana kukwanisa kutaura navo sezvo vanga vakotsiriswa nemushonga unoderedza marwadzo. No media source currently available Nhengo yedare reCongress muAmerica, Amai Karen Bass, avo vanova sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezveAfrica, vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nekushungurudzwa kwemadzimai matatu aya. Amai Bass vari kukurudzira hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti iferefete kumbunyikidzwa kwakaitwa madzimai matatu aya. Ukuwo sangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica rinoti sangano reUnited Nations nemamwe masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anofanirwa kuona kuti Zimbabwe yatorerwa matanho zvichitevera kutochwa kwakaitwa madzimai aya. Mukuru wesangano iri kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti zviri kuitika muZimbabwe zvinoratidza kuti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa haina musiyano nehurumende yevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. No media source currently available Munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vati vari kushushikana nemashoko ekuti vatatu ava vakapambwa. Vatiwo mapurisa emuHarare ari kuda kubvunzurudza vatatu ava sezvo vakatyora mutemo weNational Lockdown apo vakaratudzira kuWarren Park. Vati nyaya iyi iri kuongororwa uye kana paine vakapara mhosva, vacharangwa sezvinodiwa nemutemo. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assitant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vati mapurisa ari kuongorora kuti chii chakaitika kubva musi wa13 Chivabvu kusvika misi weChishanu maererano nemafambiro evatatu ava kubvira pavakaratidzira kuWarren Park. Vati mapurisa anoda kuziva kuti vatatu ava nevamwe vavo vakafamba sei uye kuti vatatu ava vazowanikwa kunzvimbo yemabhizimisi yeMuchapondwa kuBindura sei. VaNyathi vati vane ruzivo nezvenyaya iyi vanofanira kuenda nehumbowo kuchiteshi chemapurisa chiripedyo navo. Zvichakadai, VaNyathi vati mapurisa ari kushishikana zvikuru nekushandiswa kwemadandemutande kunyomba vashandi vehurumende vakati kuita izvi imhosva inosungisa.
title: Masangano ePasi Rose Okurudzirwa Kupindira Pane Zviri Kuitika muZimbabwe

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti zvakataurwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, pa State of The Nation Address zvinhu zvinofadza vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi hwenyika. Mumwe wenyanzvi idzi, VaPersistance Gwanyanya, avo vanoshanda ne Percycon Global Fund Managers, vanoti zvakataurwa pamusoro pemakambani ehurumende, kana kuti ma ‘parastatals’ zvekuti anofanira kunyatsoongororwa, zvinhu zvine musoro sezvo makambani aya asiri kushanda nemazvo, izvo zvinokonzera kuti hupfumi hwenyika husamire zvakanaka. VaGwanyanya vanotiwo hurumende inofanira kudzikisa mari yainokwereta uye yainoshandisa pazvinhu zvakaita sekubhadhara vashandi uye inofanira kubvisa mitemo iri kuvhiringidza avo vanoda kuisa mari yavo mumabhizimisi muZimbabwe. “Kune vanhuwo vakawanda wanda varikupiwa mabasa nehurumende; hurumende inofanira kuita zvinhu zvinemusoro kuti mari yainoshandisa idzike. Zvinhu zvakakoshera nyika izvozvo,” VaGwanyanya vaudza Studio7. VaGwanyanya vatiwo hurumende inofanira kukurumidza kugadzirisa dambudziko remari iyo isiri kuwanikawa munyika. No media source currently available
title: Makambani eHurumende Anonzi Ari Kuvhiringa Hupfumi hweNyika

text: Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rashora zvikuru kutyorwa kuri kuitwa kodzero dzevanhu munyika uye kupambwa nekuitwa kafiramberi kwevanhu vainge vachida kuratidzira muHarare nemusi weChishanu. Magweta aya ati mubatanidzwa wenyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica unofanira kutumira nhumwa kunoongorora nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe. ZLHR inoti mumwe wevakapambwa akaitwa kafiramberi ndiVaPatson Dzamara, munin’ina waVaItai Dzamara avo vakapambwa gore rapera uye vasiri kuzivikanwa kuti vari kupi. VaDzamara vanonzi vakavharwa maziso nevanhu vainge vakapakatira pfuti vamwe vaine hanzu dzechipurisa vachibva vatanga kurohwa. Dr Dzamara vanoti vanhu ava vaivaudza kuti, “Hauna kudzidza pane zvatakaita kumukoma wako manje nguva yekudzidza yakwana.” Varume ava vanonzi vaitaura pambozhanhare nemunhu wavaiti “Boss”. Vanoti vanofunga kuti varume ava vaida kuvasunga netambo vovakanda mudhamu reLake Chivero. ZLHR inoti iri kushushikana zvikuru nenyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Sangano iri rati zvinoshamisa kuti hurumende ichangobva kumusangano weUnited Nations weHuman Rights Council Universal Periodic Review Process kuGeneva ichivimbisa kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu asi yatotanga nyaya yekupamba vanhu. ZLHR yati vari kupamba nekuita vanhu kafiramberi vanofanira kuziva kuti izvi hazvichashande makore ano. Sangano iri ratiwo hurumende inofanira kuziva kuti nyaya yekupambwa kwevanhu kutyora mutemo uye inofanira kuongorora nyaya idzi.
title: ZLHR Inoti SADC Ngaingorore Kutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu muZimbabwe
