text: Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, inoti mutungamiri weZanu-PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiriri wenyika. Zec inoti VaMnangagwa vakakunda mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, nemavhoti akakwana zvekuti hapana sarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika inodzokororwa. Asi pane kusagutsikana kukuru mune vakawanda nekwavanoti kubatwa kwakaitwa sarudzo idzi nezvakabuda madziri neZec. Vakange vapinda munyika kuzoongorora sarudzo idzi vachibva kune dzimwe nyika havasi kuwirirana pamaonero avanoita sarudzo idzi. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru wesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDehwa Mavhinga, vanoti vakagara vataura kuti pane zvizhinji zvaifanira kugadziriswa sarudzo idzi dzisati dzaitwa. “Zviri pachena kuti zvataitaura zvakabudawo muongororo dzakaitwa nevamwe vakabva kune dzimwe nyika avo vakati pane matambudziko akati wandeyi mukati memaitirwo esarudzo muZimbabwe, zvinosanganisira kuti vatapi venhau vanoshandira masangano ehurumende akaita seZBC neHerald havana kumira pachokwadi. Vakarerekera zviri pachena kubato reZanu-PF,” VaMavhinga vanodaro VaMavhinga vanoti imwe nyaya yaifanirwa kutariswa ndeyemadzishe anoregwa achiita zvematongero enyika uye vachityityidzira vanhu nekuvamanikidza kuvhotera vanhu vavasingadi. No media source currently available
title: Dzimwe Nyanzvi dzeMatongerwo eNyika Dzoshora Mafambisirwo Akaitwa Sarudzo

text: Vadzidzisi vakawanda havana kuteerera kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vadzokere kumabasa vachiti vanoda kutanga vapihwa zvavakavinmbiswa nehurumende. Mumwe mudzidzisi wemuChinhoyi asina kuenda kubasa VaRosten Mtapwa vanoti havaende kubasa nekuda kwekurudziro asi nekupihwa mari inovakwanira. VaMtapwa vanoti kunyangwe vanga vachida kuenda kubasa zvanga zvisinga kwanisike nekuda kwekuti vakambomiswa sezvo vainge vasingaenda kubasa kubva zvavhurwa zvikoro vachinzi vasakanganise kuferefetwa kwenyaya yavari kupomerwa nekusasvika pazvikoro zvavanodzidzisa. Izvi zvatsigirwa ndmutungamiri werimwe sangano rino miririra vadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbawe -PTUZ-VaTakavafira Zhou vanoti havana kumbobvira vati nhengo dzavo dzidzokere kuzvikoro. VaZhou vanoti zvikoro zvinongovhurwa chete kana vadzidzisi vakapihwa mari dzinovakwanira danho ratsigirwawo nevaimbove gurukota rezvedzidzo muhurumende yemubatanidzwa VaDavid Coltart vebato rinopikisa reCirtizens Coalition for Change. VaColtart vanoti chinhu chinosuwisa ndechekuti vana vechikoro vave nemakore maviri vasinga dzidze zvakanaka vakakurudzira kuti hurumende pamwe nevadzidzisi vakoshese remangwana revana. Asi mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi VaTaungana Ndoro vanoti vadzidzisi vakawanda vadzokera kubasa uye vana vatanga rugwaro rweForm One zvakanaka. VaNdoro vanoti havana huwandu huzere hwevadzidzisi vakambomiswa basa vachiti vachaziva kana vapa vadzidzisi vose vasiri kuenda kubasa magwaro ekuti paongororwe kuti sei vasiri kuenda kubasa. Zvichakadaro vatungamiri vevashandi kusanganisira vamiriri vevadzidzisi vakapinda mumusangano nemutumgamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kumuzinda weState House muHarare kuti vazeye matambudziko avo. Mumwe akapinda musangano uyu mutauriri werimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi reZimbabwe Teachers Association-ZIMTA-VaGoodwill Taderera avo vakati vachataura kana vabuda mumusangano asi vanga vasati vapedza musangano patakaenda pamhepo.
title: Yangove Njake Njake Muzvikoro Vana Vachidzoserwa Kumba

text: Zvichitevera mutongo wakapiwa neChipiri nedare repamusorosoro, re Supreme Court, wekuti VaNelson Chamisa havasi mutungamiri ari pamutemo webato reMDC-T, vamwe vanotevera zvematongerwo enyika muZimbabwe vanoti havaoni mutongo uyu uchichinja zvinhu zvakawanda. Gweta rinoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaSilas Chekera, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanoona sekuti zvakabuda mudare repamusorosoro izvi zvichatoita kuti vanhu vanyanye kumira naVaChamisa, vachitizve havaoni sekuti mashandiro emapato aya kunze kwenyika achachinja. No media source currently available Asi sachigaro weMDC USA, dunhu rebato rinotungamirirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaDen Moyo, vanoti chokwadi chakagara chiri pachena zvekuti zvange zvisingamboda dare redzimhosva nekuti Muzvare Khupe vakatsigirwa nebumbiro remitemo yebato iri. VaMoyo vati musuwo wakavhurwa kune avo vanoda kudzoka kubato iri kuzoita basa nevamwe. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sachigaro weMDC North America, dunhu rebato rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaTawanda Dzvokora, vati hapana chinochinjwa mubato ravo sezvo pasina chine basa chakabuda mumutongo uyu. VaDzvokora vanoti hurumende inongoda kukonzera mhirizhonga muMDC Alliance pachinhambo chekurwisana nechirwere cheCoronavirus icho vanoti chapinza gumbo munyika. VaDzvokora vanoti zvinokatyamadza kuti mushure mekuzivisa vanhu kuti matare edzimhosva achambomira kunzwa nyaya mumatare adzo kunze kweidzo dzinoda kunzwikwa zvechimbichimbi, dare repamusorosoro iri, rakaona sezvinokodzera kunzwa nyaya iyi sekuti inyaya inofanirwa kukurumidza kunzwikwa. No media source currently available
title: MDC yaVaChamisa Yopesana neMDC yaMuzvare Khupe muAmerica

text: Nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare neMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai ichipikisa matarirwo akaitwa nguva yekunyoresa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, yatadza kusimuka mudare sezvo magweta aVaMugabe ati haana kunge akagadzirira kuti nyaya iyi inzwikwe. Nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare nemunyori mukuru muMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, yekuti kunyoreswa kwevavhoti kumbomiswa nepamusana pokuti komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo ye Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, haina kugadzirira zvakakwana yatadza kuzeyiwa mudare repamusoro sezvo magweta anga akamirira VaMugabe ati haana kugadzirira zvakakwana. Rimwe remagweta aya, VaTawanda Kanengoni, vati vanoshanda kuhofisi kwaVaMugabe vakatambidzwa mapepa emhosva nemagweta aVaMwonzora, haana kunyora mazita avo pamapepa aya saka vati vanoda nguva yekuti vambonyatsoongorora mapepa aya. Mapepa akasvitswa kudare naVaMwonzora anoti ZEC haina michina yakakwana kuti itange kunyoresa vanhu sevavhoti vachiti kunyoreswa kwevanhu sevavhoti kwatanga nhasi kuchaita kuti vanhu vazhinji vatadze kunyoresa sevavhoti. Gweta raVaMwonzora, VaEric Matinenga, vaudza mutongi wedare, VaDavison Moses Foroma, kuti magweta aVaMugabe anofanira kuunza mhinduro yaVaMugabe nechimbichimbi sezvo ZEC yatotanga kunyoresa vanhu sevavhoti. VaMwonzora vaudza vatori venhau kuti havasi kufara nekutamba nenguva kuri kuitwa naVaMugabe avo vavati vaifanira kutanga vaona kuti ZEC yagadzirira zvakakwana here kuti itange kunyoresa vanhu sevavhoti vasati vatara mazuva achanyoreswa vanhu sezvinodiwa nemutemo. Zvichakadai, VaMwonzora vati mamwe mapato anopokisa anoti MDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, Zapu, Transform Zimbabwe, pamwe neZimbabwe People First, vati vachabatana neMDC-T munyaya iyi kumatare vachida kuti chirongwa ichi chimbosendekwa parutivi kusvika ZEC yarongeka. Mutongi wedare ati nyaya iyi idzoke kudare neChina uye vakurudzira magweta aVaMugabe kuti auye akagadzirira zvakakwana kuti nyaya iyi inzwikwe. Zvichakadai, VaMwonzora vati ZEC iri kushandisa vechidiki vaiva muchirongwa cheBorder Gezi mukunyoreswa kwevanhu sevavhoti zvavati zvichaita kuti veruzhinji vakashungurudzwa zvine chekuita nematongerwo enyika vasasununguke pakunyoresa kuvhota pamwe nepakuvhota kwacho. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nasachigaro weZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Mune imwewo nyaya yanga iri mumatare, kutongwa kwenyaya yavarume vana vanonzi vaida kupidigura hurumende yaVaMugabe kwatanga mudare repamusoro nhasi. VaOwen Kuchata nevamwe vavo vatatu avo vaiva muchiuto vanoti VaSilas Pfupa, Borman Ngwenya, naVaSolomon Makumbe, vanonzi vakaedza kubhomba kupurazi raVaMugabe rinochengetwa mombe dzemukaka reGushungo Dairies riri kuMazowe nechinangwa chekupidigura hurumende yaVaMugabe. Asi magweta evasungwa ava atsika madziro kuti VaKuchata vamiswe pamberi pedare vachitongwa nenyaya iyi sezvo vakatotongwa kare vakabatwa nemhosva mushure mekunge vabvuma mhosva mudare ramejasitiriti yekuti vaida kubhomba kupurazi raVaMugabe. Mutongi wedare ati, VaTawanda Chitapi, vati nyaya iyi idzoke kudare musi wa29 Gunyana mushure mekunge magweta evasungwa ava akumbira kuunza kudare mapepa anoratidza kuti VaKuchata vakatongwa kare. VaKuchata vacharamba vari mujeri sezvo vari kupika pamhosva yavakabvuma asi vamwe vavo vanga vari kunze vapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso vachishandisa mari yavakambobhadhara kare. Mutemo unoti munhu akatarisa nemhosva yakadai anofanira kunge ari mujeri kana nyaya iyi yave kutongwa asi mutongi wedare, VaTawanda Chitapi, vabvuma kuti vatatu ava varambe vakamirira kutongwa vachibva kudzimba dzavo. Munyaya iyi, hurumende inoti iri kuda kuuunza vatori venhau vaviri vanoti Mlondolozi Ndlovu pamwe naMalvern Mkudu uye mutungamiri weMedia Centre, VaEarnest Mudzengi, kuti vazopa huchapupu mudare panyaya iyi sezvo vachinzi ndivo vakaita kuti nyaya iyi ibude mumapepa mushure mekunge yanyorwa naMlondolozi Ndlovu pakaitwa musangano naVaKuchata nevatori venhau paMedia Center. No media source currently available
title: Kupikisa Matarirwo eNguva yeBVR Kwonzwikwa neChina

text: Nyaya yemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika inonzi nevakawanda vanopikisa pamwe nevemasangano akazvimirira inogona kukanganisa mafambisirwo esarudzo dzegore rinouya. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ekuti bato riri kutonga reZanu PF rakashandisa mhirizhonga mukutsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo dzema by-election dzakaitwa kuBinga nekuGweru. Vebato rinopikisa reCitizens' Coalition for Change vanoti nhengo dzavo dzakarohwa zvakaipisisa uye kushungurudzwa pamberi pesarudzo idzi nevebato riri kutonga reZanu PF, iro rakakunda musarudzo dzakazoitwa kuWard 20. Vamwewo vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti bato riri kutonga reZanu PF riri kupinda mumatunhu aimboonekwa seakabatwa nebato reCCC akaita seBinga yacho neGweru, uko Zanu PF yakakwanisa kuwana zvakare zvigaro zviviri. Musarudzo dzema by-election dzakaitwa mumatunhu maviri aya, Zanu PF yakakwanisa kutora zvigaro zvitatu pazvigaro zvishanu zvakakwikwidzwa. Tingati here zvinhu zvave kushanduka mune zvematongerwo enyika, kana kuti vanhu vari kuvhotera Zanu PF munzvimbo dzaimbove pasi pevanopikisa kuburikidza nekutyisidzirwa? Sachigaro veZanu PF mudunhu reNorth America, VaRegis Charumbira Vusango, vanoti vanhu vasvinura nekuti vari kuona zvirongwa zvebudiriro zviri kuitwa nehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa mumatunhu avo, izvo zvave kuita kuti vavhotere Zanu PF. VaCharumbira Vusango vanoti zvirongwa zviri kuparurwa nemutungamiri wenyika zvakasiyanasiyana zviri kuonekwa nevanhu vose saka nekudaro hapana angada kuzosara achiri mumwena vamwe vachibudirira. Asi nhengo yeCCC, VaTim Muringai, vari kuOhio muAmerica, vanoti hapana asingazive kuti kukunda kweZanu PF kuBinga kwakauya mushure mekushungurudzwa kwevanhu. Vanoti Zanu PF iri kutenga mavhoti kuburikidza nezvirongwa zvainoti zvemutungamiri wenyika ichishandisa mari yemitero yeveruzhinji. VaMuringai vanoti kana zvinhu zvakasagadziriswa nekukasika mhirizhonga ichaenderera mberi kupinda musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Asi VaCharumbira Vusango vanoti havaoni kuchiita mhirizhonga gore rinouya vachiti mutungamiri wenyika vakatotaura kare kuti havadi mhirizhonga. Asi VaMuringai vanoti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi, vachiti VaMnangagwa ndivo mukuru wemapurisa nemauto munyika, asi vari kukonzera mhirizhonga havana zvavari kuitwa nekuti vari kuvadzivirira. No media source currently available
title: Vanopikisa Votyira Kuti Sarudzo dzeGore Rinouya Dzichaita Mhirizhonga, Asi veZanu PF Vachiti VaMnangagwa Vakati Vanoda Runyararo

text: Vamwe vagari vekumaruwa mudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti kunyange hazvo vari kuedza kutevedzera zviri kukurudzirwa senzira yekuderedza kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus, vanoti nzara ndiyo yave kuvaburitsa mudzimba dzavo. Dambudziko rekushaya chekudya nemhuri dzavo, chimwe chezvinhu zviri kuita kuti hurongwa hwekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo husabudirire zvakanaka munzvimbo dzakawanda kuno kuMashonaland West. Mumwe mugari wepaBhutsu pedyo neChinhoyi akatarisana nedambudziko iri, VaSimon Katsvere, vanoti vari kutevedza mutemo wekugara mumba, asi nyaya yenzara ndiyo yava kuvaburitsa panze vachinotsvaga zvekudya izvo vanoti zvinovapa mukana wekubata chirwere ichi sezvo vachisangana nevanhu vakawanda apo vanenge vachitsvaga chikafu. Mumwewo mugari vepaBhutsu pakare, VaKizito Mugabe, vanoti vari kutevedzera zvakakurudzirwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo, asi havasi kunyatsoita izvi nemazvo. Ambuya Anna Tembo, avo vaipona nekutenga nekutengesa zvinhu muvanhu, vanoti pavakanzwa nezveCoronavirus, vaifungidzira kuti nyaya yechirwere ichi ichakurumidza kupfuura. Ambuya Tembo vanoti zvave kuvaomera sezvo vasina mari yekutenga sauti, mafuta nekugaisa nekuti hapana zvavari kuita zvinovawanisa mari munguva ino apo vanhu vakawanda vari kugara vari mudzimba dzavo vachitya kubata chirwere ichi. Mumwe mugari wepaWitches Farm pedyo neBanket, Amai Emilda Kanyoka, vanoti panguva yakaita seino, hurumende inofanirwa kunge iine hurongwa hwekupinda muvanhu ichivapa chikafu nekuti vanhu vakawanda havana chikafu mudzimba dzavo. Asi mumwe samusha, VaJames Mano, avo vanogara vari vasere pamba pavo, vanoti vakatora matanho ekuti vasagare vakawanda mumba yekubikira sezvavayisiyita chirwere cheCoronavirus chisati chagogodza pamusuwo wenyika. VaMisheck Ziyera, avo vanogara paShanguru pedyo neChinhoyi, vanoti kurudziro yekusaungana inopesana zvikuru netsika nemagariro epachivanhu izvo zviri kuita kuti vamwe vatadze kusiyana netsika dzavo senzira yekuti vasapane chirwere ichi. VaZiyera vanoti chinhu chakaoma kudzinga hama neshamwari nevavakidzani kana vachinge vauya pamba pako. Vachitaura kutanga kwesvondo rino muChinhoyi, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati hapana munhu anofa nenzara sezvo rubatsiro rwechikafu rwuchawedzerwa munguva ino yekuvharwa kwenyika. Asi vanhu vakaita saAmai Kanyoka vanoti hapana rubatsiro rwavari kuwana munguva yeLockdown ino. Vagari vemumadhorobhavari kuchemawo kuti vanoda ruyamuro rwechikafu sezvo vasina kwavanowana mari yekutenga zvekudya. Izvi zviri kusiya vanhu vakawanda vachida ruyamuro rwechikafu kudarika apo nyika isati yavharwa kwemasvondo matatu. Sangano reWorld Food Program rinoti vanhu vanosvika mamiroyoni masere vanoda rubatsiro rwechikafu muZimbabwe kusvika nyika yawana goho rakanaka gore rino. Zimbabwe yapinda muzuva rechitanhatu yakavharwa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus, icho chabata vanhu vapfumbamwe, mumwe wacho, Zororo Makamba, akashaya muHarare mwedzi wapera. Pasi rose vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru zana nemakumi matatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi matanhatu vafa neCoronavirus, iyo yakatanga kuChina gore rapera. No media source currently available
title: Nzara Yoita Kuti Vanhu Vasagare Mudzimba Dzavo Munguva yeLockdown

text: Sangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rinoti rinoda kusangana nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vavataurire zvichemo zvavo. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwemahofisi esangano ravo matsva muBulawayo nemusi weMugovera, mutungamiri wePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vakati vadzidzisi vanoda kanzuru yavanamazvikokota munyaya dzedzidzo inomiririra vadzidzisi asi isiri pasi pehurumende. VaZhou vakagunun'una kuti bazi rezvedzidzo rinoda kupindira mukuumbwa kwekanzuru iyi izvo vati hazvina zvazvinobatsira. No media source currently available
title: Vadzidzisi Vokumbira Hurukuro neMutungamiri weNyika

text: Hurumende nhasi yaburitsa mazita evanhu vachapihwa ruremekedzo nemibayiro yehushingi mukuita basa rakakanaka. Izvi zvichaitwa musi weHeroes Day. Aka ndekekutanga kuti hurumende ipe rukudzo nemibayiro kuvanhu vasiri muchiuto. Mazita aburitswa mugwaro rehurumende anosanganisira evanhu vakafa nevapenyu. Vacharemekedzwa musi uyu vanosanganisira mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Auxilia Mnangagwa, gurukota rezvemitambo, Doctor Kirsty Coventry naArchibishop Ezekiel Guti, avo vachapihwa ruremekedzo rweOrder of the Star of Zimbabwe Gold. Vana muzvinafundo vanosanganisira vashakabvu VaWalter Kamba vaive mukuru weUniversvity of Zimbabwe, naVaPhineas Makhurane vaive mukuru weNational University of Science and Technology namushakabvu Primrose Kurasha vaive mukuru weZimbabwe Open University, Professor Hope Sadza and Professor Christopher Chetsanga, avo vachapihwa ruremekedzo rweOrder of the Star of Zimbabwe Silver. Vanyori vemabhuku nemitambo vanosanganisira mushakabvu Charles Mungoshi, Pathisa Nyathi naDavid Guy namushakabvu Stephen Chifunyise vachapiwa mubairo weCommendation Award. Mutori wenhau weZimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation, Rueben Barwe, aive mutori wenhau weZBC akashaya, Judith Makwanya nemumwe mutori wenhau ari kuAmerica, Tawanda Kanhema, vachapihwa ruremekedzo rweOrder of the Great Zimbabwe Diamond. Munyori mubazi rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, VaMark Grey Marongwe, pamwe nevaimbove mabharani mukuru wehurumende kana kuti Registrar General, VaTobaiwa Mudede, ndevamwe vevachapihwa rumemekedzo rwePublic Service Long Service. Vachawana mubairo rweJairos Jiri Award vanosanganisira zvikoro zvepamusoro zvakaita seUniversity of Zimbabwe, Great Ziumbabwe University, Harare Institute of Technology, Africa University nezvimwe. Vamwe vachapihwa rukudzo vanosanganisiraSekuru Kaguvi, Mbuya Nehanda, Madzishe Chingaira Makoni naMapondera, Mkwati, Queen Lozikeyi Khumalo nevamwe. Vanoongorora nyaya dzematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda neMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvarongwa nehurumende kuremekedza zvizvarwa zvayo zvipenyu nezvakafa zvakanaka chose. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vatiwo vanofara chose nekupiwa ruremekedzo kwaitwa vanyori vemabhuku nemitambo. Asi vati havafari nevamwe vari pagwaro raburitswa nehurumende. Mutungamiri weDemocractic Party, Dr Wurayayi Zembe, vati zvakanaka chose kuti hurumende ipe vanhu menduru asi kuti panofanira kutaurwa mabasa akaitwa nemunhu azoita kuti aremekedzwwe. VaMudzengi vatiwo pane vamwe vanokodzera kupihwa mibayiro iyi vasina kudomwa mugwaro rehurumende nhasi. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth and Community Development, VaClaris Madhuku, avo vati mutungamiri wenyika anofanira kuva nekomiti yanachipangamazano inomubatsira kutsvaga vanhu vekuremekedza nekupa mibayiro kuitira kuti pasave nekuchema chema munyika sezvinoitika panopihwa vanhu ruremekedzo rwemagamba ehondo. Vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende iremekedze zvizvarwa zvayo zvinenge zvaratidza hushingi kana kuita mabasa anoyemurwa munyika uye izvi zvinofanirwa kuitwa pachena. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Yoremekedza Vanhu Vakawanda Musi weHeroes Day

text: Hurumende yaita musangano wechimbi chimbi nemapazi ayo anosanganisa mauto, mapurisa uye masangano anopa rubatsiro kuti vaite gadziriro yedutumupengo idayi iro rauraya vanhu vanodarika zana nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu kunyika dzakaota seMalawi, Mozambique neSouth Africa. Dutu mupengo iri rine zita reChishona rekuti Idai sezvo Zimbabwe iri iyo yakasarudza zita iri pamusangano wenyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica. Matunhu akawanda munyika kusanganisa Masvingo, Midlands, Mashonaland Central neBinga ari kutarisirwa kurohwa zvakasimba nedutumupengo iri. Kunyangwe hazvo Zimbabwe iri kuti yagadzirira zvakasimba, zvinhu zvinogona kunetsa mukufambiswa kwemashoko sezvo magetsi ari kungodzimwa dzimwa. Mukuru kubazi rezvemamiriro ekunze kana kuti Met Department, VaTich Zinyemba vanoti mvura yakawandisa yatotanga kunaya. Mukuru weCivil Protection Unit kana kuti CPU inobatsira vanenge vawirwa nematambudziko akafanana nemafashamu VaNathan Nkomo vanoti bazi ravo raka. Mukuru wePlatform for Youth Development VaClaris Madhuku avo vari kuChipinge kwavanoti mvura yakasimba yakatotanga kunaya nezuro. No media source currently available
title: Dutumupengo Idai Rorova Zimbabwe Zvakasimba

text: Vakambove gurukota rezvemaindasitiri, VaNkosana Moyo, vanoti vari kufunga zvakadzama kukwikwidza pachigaro chekuve mutungamiriri wenyika vakazvimirira vega musarudzo dzinotarisirwa kuitwa munyika gore rinouya. Vachitaura neStudio 7 muBulawayo neChitatu manheru, VaMoyo vakati vari kufungisisa zvakadzama kuda kukwikwidza kuve mutungamiri wenyika musarudzo dzinotarisirwa kuitwa munyika gore rinouya. VaMoyo vakatiwo vachazivisa ruzhinji rwenyika zvizere pamusoro pehurongwa hwavo mukati memavhiki mashoma ari kutevera. VaMoyo vakati vakambotaurwa navo nevemapato eZapu pamwe chete neZimbabwe People First vachikumbirwa kuti vakwikwidze vakamirira mapato aya asi vakati vanoona zvakanaka kuti vakakwikwidza vaite izvi vasina bato ravakamirira. VaMoyo vakati munhoroondo yezvematongerwo enyika muAfrica vatungamiri venyika dzakasiyana-siyana havakwanise kutungamira zvinogutsa vanhu vose vemunyika idzi nekuda kwekuti vanenge vachinyanyokoshesa vanhu vanotsigira mapato avo chete. VaMoyo vakambodomwa kuve gurukutota rezvemaindasitiri muhurumende yeZanu PF, asi vakazosiya chigaro ichi vasina kunyanyoshanda vachiti vaisawirirana negwara ravainzi vashandise nebato reZanu PF pakuedza kuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika. Mukuru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaPedzisai Ruhanya, vachipa maonero avo panyaya iyi semuongorori wezvematongerwo enyika akazvimirira ega, vati havawone VaMoyo vachibudirira kana vakakwikwidza pachigaro chekuve mutungamiri wenyika vakazvimirira vega. VaRuhanya vanotiwo dambudziko revamwe vanhu vanopinda mune zvematongerwo enyika inyaya yekuti vanofunga kuti ruzivo rwavanenge vainarwo mune zvakasiyana-siyana runogona kuita kuti vabudirire mune zvematongerwo enyika. VaMoyo, avo vari kushandira vari kuSouth Africa, vaive vauya kuzove mumwe wevatauri pamusangano waizeya nezvekuti chii chingaitwe mukumutsurudza maindasitiri pamwe nehupfumi hwenyika. VaMoyo vakati zvakakosha kuti vechidiki vasangopeta maoko vakatarisa zviri kuitika munyika kana kubvuma kushandiswa nenzira isiri iyo nevezvematongerwo enyika. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vanoti vanobvumirana nemaonero aVaMoyo vachiti vechidiki vose vabve zera vanofanirwa kunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. VaMoyo vakamboshanda nebhanga reAfrican Development Bank uye pari zvino ndivo mukuru weMandela Institute for Development Studies kuSouth Africa. No media source currently available
title: VaNkosana Moyo Vokwikwidza Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weNyika Vakazvimirira?

text: Vanhu vakawanda vekuZimbabwe vari muBotswana, avo vakanga vazvipira kudzokera kumusha vachibatsirwa nemari yekufambisa, vanoti vava kuodzwa moyo nemari yavari kunzi vabhadhare kana vachida kutakurwa nemabhazi vachinosiyiwa pamuganhu weZimbabwe neBotswana. Mazana nemazana evanhu ava vanoti nepamusana pekuomerwa nehupenyu vari muBotswana, vakanga vazvipira havo kuti vadzokere kumusha zvichitevera kuvimbiswa kwavakanga vaudzwa vachinzi vachatakurwa nemabhazi. Asi vanhu ava vanoti vakazosvibiswa moyo nemashoko akabva kumuzinda weZimbabwe ekuti vose vanoda kushandisa mabhazi, vachange vachibhadhariswa mazana matatu emapula emuBotswana, inova mari yakawanda kuvazhinji vavo sezvo vasiri kuita mabasa nepamusana pehutachiona hwe coronavirus, uho hunokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19 Gwaro rakaburitswa nezuro nemuzinda weZimbabwe muBotswana rinoti munhu anenge asina mari iri kudiwa iyi, haabvumidzwe kutakurwa nemabhazi, asi anoendeswa kumarhori asina masiti ekugara. Marhori aya ndiwo anoshandiswa mukutakura vanhu vanoburitswa munyika iyi zvechisimba. Vanhu ava vanenge vasina pekugara pakanaka kwemakiromita mazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu, uye marhori aya haabvumidzwe kumira kudzamara asvika kuPlumtree, uko vanhu vanobva vaiswa mumaoko ehurumende yeZimbabwe. Mumwe wevanhu vaoreswa moyo nehurongwa uhu, Muzvare Chathrine Chandaengerwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti hurongwa uhu hwaita kuti vanhu vakawanda vasarudze zvavo kuramba vari muBotswana vachishupika, pane kuomeserwa pakudzokera kwavo kumusha. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara mudhorobha reFrancistown muBotswana, Amai Letwin Poroza, vanoti vanhu vakawanda vari muBotswana vari kurwara, uye havana mari yekuti vashandise mabhazi ane pekugara pakanaka, nekudaro zvinovaomera kuti vatakurwe nemarhori kwenzendo yakareba zvakadai vasina pekugara pakanaka. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kutaura nemumiriri weZimbabwe muBotswana, VaBatsiraishe Mukonoweshuro, sezvo vasiri pabasa mushure mekushaikirwa nemwana vavo, ukuwo mutevedzeri vavo, Amai Margret Ruparanganda, vanga vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. Kunyange hazvo vamwe vasisiri kufara nehurongwa uhu, kubva mwedzi wapera kusvika pari zvinhu, vanhu zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe chete, vatakurwa nemabhazi vachinosiyiwa kuPlumtree, uye vanhu vanodarika chiuru nemazana manomwe, vatakurwa nemarhori asina pekugara, vamwe vavo vachiita zvekumanikidzwa kubuda muBotswana. Vanhu vari kubva kuBotswana vanosvikira paPlumtree, vachigariswa paPlumtree High School, vozoendeswa kunogariswa paUnited College of Education ne Bulawayo Polytechnic muguta reBulawayo. Pasi pemutemo mutsva unobata munhu wese anopinda munyika achibva kune imwe nyika, munhu uyu ava kuchengetedzwa kwemazuva masere achiongororwa kana aine hutachiona hwe coronavirus, uhwo hunokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19. Gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Obadiah Moyo, vakaudza vatori venhau kuti Zimbabwe iri kushandisa zvikoro sema quarantine centers, sezvo zvine nzvimbo dzakafaranuka kuti vanhu vange vachigara. Asi vanhu vari kugara munzvimbo idzi vakaudza Studio7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvikoro zvavari kugariswa, izvo vanoti zviri kuisa hupenyu hwavo munjodzi yekubatwa nezvirwere. Nyanzvi mutsika nemagariro evanhu uye vachidzidzisa mutemo paGaborone University College of Law and Professional Studies, VaTafadzwa Matambo, vanoti kushupika kuri kuita vana veZimbabwe mudzimwe nyika zvinhu zvinoratidza kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muZimbabwe. Zvichakadaro, zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoti zviri kuenderera mberi zvichibatsira avo vakatarisana nenzara mudzimba dzavo sezvo Botswana isiri kubatsira nechikafu vanhu vanobva kune dzimwe nyika. Muzvinabhizinesi ane mukurumbira mukugadzira motokari mudhorobha reFrancistown, VaLoveson Manase, vaudza Studio7 kuti kutsva kwendebvu varume vanodzimurana. Kuvharwa kweBotswana, uko kuri kutarisirwa kepera mumasvondo maviri ari kutevera, kuri kuita kuti hungwandangwanda hwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara munyika iyi zviziye nenzara sezvo zvichirarama nechamuka inyama. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vagere muBotswana Vodududza paHurongwa hweKudzokera kuZimbabwe

text: Gurukota rinoona nezvedzidzo Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti hurumende iri kuronga musangano pakati payo nevashandi vayo kusanganisawo varairidzi kuyedza kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. VaMavima vaudza Studio 7 kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vane chido chekuti vaitewo mimwe misangano nevarairidzi sezvavakaita svondo rapera. Asi varairidzi vanoti musangano wesvondo rapera hauna kuvapa mukana wekutaura nemutungamiri wenyika nekuti paiita sekunge pane nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. VaMavhima vanoti VaMngangagwa avo vakasangana nevarairidzi svondo rapera vanoda kuramba vachiita misangano yakadai. No media source currently available Asi mamwe masangano evarairidzi anoti haasati asumwa nezvemusangano uyu achiti vari kutarisira kuti vangangoudzwe neMuvhuro. VaSibusiso Ndlovu vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kuda zvikuru musangano wekutaura nhunha dzevarairidzi asi havasati vapihwa tsamba yacho. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutungamiri weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe Doctor Takavafira Zhou. No media source currently available
title: Hurumende Yoronga Musangano neVashandi Vayo

text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica zvine mabhizimusi kana zvinoda kuzotanga mabhizimusi kumusha zviri muAmerica zviri kuwaniswa mukana wekusangana negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, kuti vanzwe zvinokwanisa kuitwa kuti vatange mabhizimusi kumusha. Mabiko aya, ayo ari kuitirwa kumuzinda wenyika uri muWashington D.C., akarongwa nekambani yezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri mune zvemabhizimusi muAmerica nekumusha, yeWafamba Wapota, uye akanangana nekupana ruzivo mune zvemabhizimusi kune vari kunze kwenyika. Mumwe wevari kutungamira hurongwa uhwu, uye vari mukuru wekambani yezvemari yeBitMari, VaChristopher Mapondera, vanoti chinangwa chemabiko aya ndechekupa vana veZimbabwe vari kunze mukana wekuti vabvunze nekunzwa zvavanoda kuziva kuitira kuti vakwanise kuonawo mikana iri kumusha mune zvemabhizimusi. VaMapondera vanoti vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika havafanirwe kutarisira kuti nyika yavo inovaitireyi, asi kuti ivo vatarisirewo kuti chii chavanoitira nyika. NeChipiri VaNcube vanonzi vakasangana nevakuru veInternational Monetary Fund, IMF, kusanganisira mukuru-mukuru wesangano iri, Amai Christine Lagarde, pamwe nevakuru veWorld Bank, vachivapira nezvebudiriro yavanoti iri kuitika munyaya dzezvehupfumi muZimbabwe. Kushanya kwegurukota rezvemari uku kunouya panguva iyo America neMuvhuro svondo rino yakawedzera negore rimwe chete ichiti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa haisi kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available
title: Gurukota rezveMari, Muzvinafundo Ncube, Vosangana neZvizvarwa zveZimbabwe muWashington D.C.

text: Vaimbova sachigaro weZanu-PF mubazi reYouth League muHarare uye vachinzi vaishanda nesangano raishungurudza vanhu zvakanyanya muMbare reChipangano VaJim Kunaka avo vaimbenge vabuda muZanu-PF vachinoshanda neZimbabwe People First inotungairwa naamai Joyce Mujuru vanoti vave kudzokera kuZanu-PF. VaKunaka vaudza Studio 7 kuti muZanu-PF hamuna hutongo hwejekerere uye vaona havo zvakanaka kuti vadzokere kuZanu-PF. VaKunaka vakambenge vasiya bato reZanu-PF vachiti rinoita zvemhirizhonga uye vachiti vainge vaona chiyedza. VaKunaka vakambopambwawo nevanhu vaisingazivikanwe vakaitwa kafiramberi. No media source currently available Mubato reZimbabwe People First munonzi hamuna kuwirana kuti votora gwara ripi. Sezvo tichitema tisina divi ratinorerekera tabatawo mutauriri weZimbabwe People First VaRugare Gumbo vatenda kuti mubato mavo mapindwa napongwe. VaGumbo vati VaKunaka vakangoti vaida kuona Amai Mujuru kare asi havana kutaura kuti vainge vosiya bato iri vachidzokera kuZanu-PF. Vatiwo pane humbowo hunoratidza kuti mubato ravo mune vasori vari kuda kuri paradza. Asi vati vacharamba vakamira semusambangwena. No media source currently available
title: VaJim Kunaka Vodzokera kuZanu-PF Vachisiya Amai Mujuru

text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuchema chema nekushaikwa kwezvinhu zvakawanda muzvitoto uye kudhura kwazvemwe. Munzvimbo dzakawanda munyika mange musina mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari uye zvitoro zvakawanda zveChicken Inn kunyanya muBulawayo zvainge zvisina huku nezuro zvakapa kuti zvivharwe nechimbi chimbi. Vamwe vari kuvaka vari kuchema chemawo kuti simende haisi kuwanikwa muzvitoro. Zvimwe zvitoro kuBulawayo zvinonzi zvave kuti vanhu vatenge bhodhoro rimwe chete remafuta ekubikisa nekuti ave mashoma. Mishonga yakaita seyerurindi kana kuti TB iri kushomekawo muzvipatara. Asi vachitaura nebepanhau reChronicle vari kuBeinjing China, gavhuna weRBZ VaJohn Mangudya vanoti havazivi chiri kukonzera kushomeka kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari sezvo vakapa vanotenga mafuta aya mari inokwana. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Elliot Masocha vanoti kushomeka kwezvinhu kuri kukonzerwa nekushaikwa kwemari yekunze munyika. No media source currently available
title: Mafuta eKufambisa Dzimotokari, Simende, Huku neZvimwe Zvoshaikwa muNyika

text: Vaimbova mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemitemo, VaFortune Chasi, avo vakadzingwa basa nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe neSvondo vanoti vacharamba vari nhengo yeZanu-PF uye vanotambira havo kumiswa basa. VaMugabe nesvondo vakadzinga mamwe makurukota maviri uye vatevedzeri vemakurukota mashanu. Vakadzingwa igurukota muhofisi memutungamiri wenyika, a Amai Flora Bhuka, gurukota muhofisi yemutevedzeri wenyika, VaSlyvester Nguni, vammwe vatevedzeri vemakurukota vakadzingwa ndi Amai Petronella Kagonye, VaTendai Savanhu, VaTongai Muzenda uye Dr Paul Chimedza. Vanhu ava vanonzi vari kutsigira vakadzingwa basa rekuvamutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru. Munyori wedare remakurukota, VaMisheck Sibanda, vanoti vakadzingwa ava vainge vakundikana kuita basa ravo nemazvo uye vari kubatana nevamwe vakadzingwa svondo rapera vanosanganisa vaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika Amai Joice Mujuru. Vanhu vakawanda vainge vashamisika kuti VaChasi vainge vapunyuka nepasaka reshumba sei pakadzingwa makurukota aya sezvo mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vakavapomera mhosva yekudzivisa mhuri yaVaMugabe kutora purazi reManzou kuMazowe, kuMashonaland Central. Amai Mugabe vakati VaChasi vainge vachifambawo vachiita makuhwa. Asi VaChasi vari kuramba nyaya dzose idzi. No media source currently available
title: VaChasi Vakadzingwa Basa naVaMugabe Vanoti Vacharamba Vari Nhengo yeZanu-PF

text: Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika izvo zvava kupa kuti vamwe vemakereke vatsvage nzira dzingagadzirise zviri kunetsa munyika. Vachitaura mushure memusangano waitwa neChina pakati penhengo dzeZimbabwe Council of Churches nenhengo dzeparamende muguta reHarare, Mufundisi Emmanuel Maforo, vati matambudziko ese ari munyika ari kukonzerwa nezvematongerwo enyika, nokudaro anofanirwa kugadziriswa. Nhengo yeZanu PF inomirira Harare Central muparamende, Amai Miriam Chikukwa, vati vanhu vanofanira kuregerererana kuitira kuti vagone kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika nekutaurirana. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti nhaurirano dziitwe nekuchimbidza munyika. Mumiririri weZvimba North muparamende, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, Amai Marian Chombo, vanoti dai vanhu vamira kunongedzerana votsvaga kuti vatungamiri vemapato vogara pasi seyi vachitaurirana. Amai Chombo vatiwo vashamisika kuti vakuru vedzikerereke vanoshaya mikana yekusangana nemutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vataure navo nezvenhaurirano. Mashoko Amai Chombo anotevera mashoko eZimbabwe Council of Churches ekuti iri kukundikana kubata VaMnangagwa kuitira kuti vavasume nyaya yenhaurirano. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata nhengo dzeMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa dzapinda mumusangano wanga wadaidzirwa neZimbabwe Council of Churches. Kereke iyi yakasvitsa chikumbiro chekusangana nenhengo dzeparamende kumutauriri weparamende, VaJacob Mudenda. MuZimbabwe mune gakava riripo zvichitevera mafambisirwo akaitwa sarudzo munyika idzo dzakaona Zimbabwe Electoral Commission ichidoma VaMnangagwa semunhu akakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Izvi zvakapikiswa naVaChamisa, asi dare reConstitutional Court rakapa mutongo wekuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo. Kubva ipapo, MDC yakabva yati haitambire VaMnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika, ukuwo VaMnangagwa vachitiwo vakazvipira kushanda nemunhu wese chero achicherechedza kuti ndivo mutungamiri wenyika. Nepamusana pekusagadzikana kuri munyika, pamwe nekukwira kuri kuita mitengo yezvinhu, sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rakaronga kuratidzira kwemazuva matatu richiti vashandi vava kuomerwa nehupenyu. Asi kuratidzira uku kwakasiya vanhu vanodarika gumi nevaviri vafa, vazhinji vavo mushure mekunge vapfurwa nemabara epfuti. Sangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti vanhu vanodarika makumi manomwe vakarapwa maronda emabara epfuti, vamwe vakaitwa maoparesheni ekubvisa mabara aive mumiviri yavo. Sangano iri rinotiwo vanhu vanodarika mazana mashanu vakarapwa mushure mekukuvara zvine chekuita nemhirizhonga yemazuva matatu, iyo yakaona mapurisa nemasoja achipinda mudzimba dzevanhu achivarova nekuvasunga. Masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anoti pane vanhukadzi vanodarika makumi maviri vakabatwa chibharo nevarume vaive nepfuti, uye vakapfeka mbatya dzemasoja. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvagwa, vakaudza Studio7 kuti vari kutambira mashoko emadzimai anonzi akabatwa chibharo, vakati madzimai aya anofanirwa kuzivisa mapurisa, kana kuudza masangano anoshanda akazvimirira kava achitya kuenda kumapurisa. Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, iro riri kubatsira vanhu vakawnda vakasungwa mumhirizhonga iyi, rinoti vanhu vanodarika chiuru vari muhusungwa pari zvino munyika yose, uye vamwe vacho vana vari pasi pezera asi matare achiti ari kuvatonga sevanhu vabva zera. Hurumende, kuburikidza nemutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, inoti mhirizhonga iyi yakakonzerwa neMDC inoda kumanikidza VaMnangagwa kuti vaumbe hurumende yemubatanidzwa naVaChamisa sezvakamboitika muna 2008. Vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vakabviswa pachigaro zvechisimba nemauto muna Mbudzi 2017, vakaumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, pamwe naVaArthur Mutambara muna 2008 mushure mekunge vanhu vakawanda vaurayiwa mumhirizhonga yakaitika pamberi pesarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakadzokororwa muna 2008. Sarudzo yekutanga yakaona VaTsvangirai vachikunda VaMugabe, asi vachikunda zvisina mutsindo, izvo zvakaita kuti sarudzo iyi idzokororwe. Asi VaChamisa vanoti havadi zvehurumende yemubatanidzwa, asi kuti panofanirwa kuitwa nhaurirano dzinoumba gwara rakanaka remangwana enyika. VaChamisa vanoti vari kusvitsa gakava riri muZimbabwe kumasangano anoti Southern African Development Community, African Union neUnited Nations kuitira kuti apindire sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika. Vanotiwo vava kutyira hupenyu hwavo sezvo nhengo dzavo zhinji dziri kuswera dzichishungurudzwa nemapurisa nemasoja. Kutaura kuno, pane nhengo dzeparamende dzine chitsama dziri mutirongo dzichipomerwa mhosva yekuita mhirizhonga. Nhengo idzi dzinosanganisira mumiriri weMbizvo muparamende, VaSettlement Chikwinya, mumiriri weMkoba, VaAmos Chibaya, nevamwe. Pastor Evan Mawarire vakasungwawo mukuratidzira uku uye vari panze mushure mekubvisiswa mari yechibatiso. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, uye vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Bergen kuNorway, Doctor Victor Chimhutu, vanoti zvematongerwo enyika zvikadzamara zvagadziriswa munyika, zvimwe zvinhu zvese zvinofamba negwara kwaro. No media source currently available
title: Zimbabwe Council of Churches Yoita Musangano neNhengo dzeParamende

text: Sangano rinorwira kubviswa kwemutongo werufu pasi rese reAmnesty International rarumbidza nyika dzemuSub Saharan Africa idzo rinoti zhinji dzacho dziri kubvisa mutongo uyu pamutemo yadzo. Vachitaura mushure mekuparurwa kwechinyorwa chavo che “Sub Saharan Africa Death Penalty Report,” mumwe mushandi wekuAmnesty International, VaLloyd Kuveya, vati vanhu vari kutongerwa rufu muZimbabwe vari kuderera zvakanyanya huye mugore ra2017 vanhu gumi nemumwe chete ndovakapiwa mutongo uyu nekuda kweshanduko yemubumbiro remitemo yenyika rinodzivirira madzimai, vechidiki nevakurisa kupiwa mutongo uyu. VaKuveya vanotiwo chishuviro cheAmnesty International ndechekuti mutongo werufu ubviswe zvachose muZimbabwe. VaKuveya vanoti sangano ravo rine chivimbo chekuti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa ine chido chekubvisa mutongo uyu nekudaro vachange vachisangana nemutungamiriri wenyika mwedzi uno kuti vakurukure nezvanyaya iyi. Amnesty International inoti munyika dzemuSub Saharan Africa, Botswana ndiyo inonyanyopa mutongo werufu zvakanyanya. Inotiwo vanenge vaita mhosva vanofanirwa kupihwa mukana wekugadzirisa mhosva dzavo kwete kuurayiwa. Sangano iri rinotiwo nyika dzakadai seZimbabwe dzine mutongo werufu asi dzisingaurayi dzinotambudza zvakanyanya vanopiwa mutongo uyu sezvo vanenge vachingofunga kuti vachaurayiwa rinhi. No media source currently available
title: Amnesty International Yokurudzira Zimbabwe Kubvisa Mutongo weRufu

text: Bato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa rinonzi ramisa danho rakanga ratorwa nedunhu reMatabeleland North rekudzinga meya weVictoria Falls, VaSomvelo Dlamini, richiti kudzingwa kwavo kwakaitwa zvisiri pamutemo. VaDlamini vakanga vadzingwa mubato mwedzi wapera vachipomerwa mhosva yekukanganisa mashandiro emusangano kuburikidza nekusatevera zvisungo pamwe nekuzvidza zviga zvemusangano. VaDlamini vanonzi vakaramba kuteerera kurudziro yebato yekuti vakwikwidze semutevedzeri wameya vachisiira chigaro chameya kune imwe nhengo yebato yaidiwa nehutungamiri. Asi munyori mukuru weMDC, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanonzi svondo rino vakanyorera dunhu reMatabeleland North tsamba vachirizivisa kuti rakanga risina kutevera mutemo pakudzinga VaDlamini mubato. Izvi zvinonzi ndizvo zvimwechete kune mutevedzeri wameya weBulawayo, VaTinashe Kambarami, avo vanonzi vakanga vapiwa mazuva manomwe kubva musi weMuvhuro svondo rino kuti vasiye basa, kukundikana kwavo vodzingwa mubato. Asi dunhu reBulawayo rinonzi riri kuti zvarakaita zvose zviri pamutemo webato. Mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti mutemo webato ravo wakajeka kwazvo panyaya yekuti mameya anoshanda sei, uye vese vaifanirwa kusarudzwa semameya nevakazopinda kuita mameya vakaudzwa nemutungamiri webato zvinofanirwa kuitwa. VaMafume vanoti vese vari kupomerwa mhosva dzekutyora bumbiro remitemo yebato vachamiswa pamberi pekomiti inoranga nhengo kana kuti disciplinary committee. Panyaya yameya weVictoria Falls, VaMafume vanoti vanozotaura pamusoro penyaya iyi kana chete VaDlamini vatambira tsamba inobva kukomiti inoronga nezvemusangano. No media source currently available
title: MDC Inomisa Kudzingwa kwaMeya weGuta reVictoria Falls

text: Dare repamusorosoro, reConstitutional Court, nhasi razivisa kuti richapa mutongo waro panguva yarisana kutara panyaya yakakwidzwa kudare iri nemumiriri weDzivaresekwa, VaEdwin Mushoriwa, VaBrian Crozier neVeritas yekuti Constitutional Amendment No.2 Act ibviswe sezvo yakapaswa zviri kunze kwemutemo. Vatongi vedare iri avo vange vachitungamirirwa nemutevedzedzeri wevatongi munyika, Justice Elizabeth Gwaunza, vati vachatura mutongo wavo pazuva ravasina kupa. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa muVeritas, VaLizwe Jamela, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakamirira mutongo wedare nemaziso matsvuku. Gweta raVaMushoriwa, VaCrozier neVeritas, VaTendai Biti vaudza dare kuti mutemo uyu unofanira kuraswa nekuti paramende yakatyora bumbiro remutemo apo yakapas bhiri iri. VaBiti vati bhiri rakapasiswa neparamende rakasiyana neiro rakaburitswa mugwaro rehurumende, reGovernment Gazettee rakaendeswa kune veruzhinji. Vati pane zvimwe zvikamu, zvainge zviri siri mubhiriri rekutanga zvakawedzerwa muparamende pane chimwe chikamu cheCommittee Stage. Semuenzaniso vati zvimwe zvange zvisiri mubhiri rekutanga, inyaya yekuti, mukuru wevatongi, mutevedzeri wake pamwe nevatongi veConstitutional neSupreme Court vanogona kuwedzera mamwe makore mashanu pabasa kana vasvika panguva yekuenda pamudyandigere. VaBiti vati izvi zviri kunze kwemutemo vachiti chikamu 328 chebumbiro remutemo chinosungira kuti chose chinoda kuvandudzwa pamutemo chinofanira kuburitswa muGovernment Gazzettee uye veruzhinji vanofanira kupihwa mukana wekupa pfungwa dzavo. Vatiwoo mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mangagwa, vakatyorawo mutenmo nekusaini bhiri iri vasina kuona kuti bumbiro rakatevedzwa here pakupasa bhiri iyi. Asi gweta reparamende, Advocate Tawanda Zhuwarara, vati hapana chakakanganiswa neparamende vachiti mitemo yeparemende yeStanding Rules and Orders inocherechedzwa nebumbiro uye paramende inobvumidzwa kushandura mabhiri. Gweta remutungamiriri wenyika, Advocate Thembinkosi Magwaliba vatiwo mutungamiriri wenyika haana chaakatadza pakusaina bhiri. Kupaswa kweConstitutional Amendment Number 2 Act gore rapfuura kwamutsa mutauro munyika mushure mekunge mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangwagwa vashandisa mutemo uyu kuwedzera makore pabasa emukuru wevatongi VaLuke Malaba mushure mekusvitsa makore ekuti vaende pamudyandigere. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaKudzie Kadzere vaudza Studio 7 kuti dare rikatambira chikumbiro chevatatu ava zvinoreva kuti VaMalaba vanenge vave kuenda pamudyandigere. Kunze kwenyaya nyaya yaVaMushoriwa, VaCrozier neVeritas pane mamwewo masangano akaita seLaw Society of Zimbabwe neZimrights sari kupikisa mutemo uyu muConstitutional Court. No media source currently available
title: Dare rePamusoro Soro Rozeya Kuvandudzwa Kwakaitwa Bumbiro reMitemo Kuti Mutongi Mukuru Arambe Ari paBasa

text:
Vanhu vatanga kubayiwa nhasi nhomba yechipiri munyika zvichitevera kupinda munyika kwenhomba zviuru mazana mana nemusi weChipiri. Sezvakaitika pakutanga, mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika uye vari gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vabayiwa nhomba yechipiri nhasi muHarare veruzhinji vachiona. VaChiwenga vabayiwa nhomba yechipiri pachipatara cheWilkins muHarare
nhasi mangwanani. Vachitaura mushure mekubayiwa nhomba iyi, VaChiwenga vati hurumende yakazvipira kuzivisa veruzhinji nezvekubayiwa nhomba senzira yekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. Chiremba ari kuyamura kurwisa chiwere cheCovid-19 mudunhu
reMashonaland West, Dr Paradzai Mudzengerere, vati chinhu chakanaka
chiri kuita VaChiwenga kubayiwa nhomba dzose pajekerere senzira
yekukurudzira vanhu munyika kuti vabayiwewo nhomba yeCovid-19. Dr Mudzengerere vati zvakakosha kubayiwa nhomba yechipiri sezvo
jekiseni rekutanga risina kukwana mukurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. Dr Mudzengerere vati munhu anogona kubayiwa nhomba yepiri pane imwe nzvimbo yakasiyana nenzvimbo yaakabayiwa kekutanga kunyange hazvo zvisiri kukurudzirwa.

Mumwe akambobayiwa nhomba yekutanga, VaKudakwashe Kokanai, vati havana zvakaipa zvavakanzwa pavakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga mwedzi wakapera nekudaro vakagadzirira kubayiwa nhomba yechipiri.

Kunyange pasina kuziviswa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba yechipiri nhasi, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vave zviuru mazana matatu nezvipfumbamwe nemazana matanhatu nevanomwe kana kuti 39 607. Zvichakadaro, mune imwewo nyaya ine chekuita nechirwere cheCovid-19, vanhu vana vanosanganisira mudzimai ane mwana ane mwedzi mitatu yekuberekwa, vanimwa mukana wekuti vabhadhare mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba pamhosva yavari kupomherwa yekupa magwaro emanyepo ekuti munhu haana Covid-19 iye asina kuongororwa. Mutongi wedare muChinhoyi, Amai Gladmore Mushowe, vati nekuda kwekuti mhosva iri pomerwa vana ava ine chekuita nechirwere chanetsa pasi rose, vaona zvakakodzera kuti vasapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso sezvo paine mukana wekuti vanogona kutiza sezvo mhosva yavari kupomerwa yakakura zvekuti vakabatwa nemhosva vanopihwamutongo wekugara mutirongo kwemakore akawanda. Vana ava vanoti Kudzai Chishaya, Gumisai Chiroodza, Nelson Mashanga
naWedzerai Manyere vanzi vadzoke kudare musiwa 1 Kubvumbi apo
pachatongwa mhosva yavo. No media source currently available
title: VaConstantino Chiwenga Vanobayiwa Imwe Nhombo yeCovid-19 Veruzhinji Vachiona

text: Vaimbove sachigaro vezvechikidi muZanu PF mudunhu reHarare, VaJim Kunaka, varamba mashoko ari kubuda ekuti vakatorerwa midziyo yavo nechikonzi mushure mekutadza kubhadhara mari inoita zviuru zvina zvemadhora zvavakanzi nedare vabhadhare semuripo kumunhu wavakarova. No media source currently available VaKunaka vanonzi vakarova Va Prince Jack muna 2008. Asi VaKunaka vanoti chakaitika chete ndechekuti chikonzi chakasvitsa mapepa ekuvazivisa kuti vachatorerwa zvinhu zvavo nemusi weMuvhuro svondo rinouya kana vasina kubhadhara mari iyi. Vanoti vari kupikisa danho iri uye vatuma magweta avo kuti apikise nyaya iyi kuburikidza nekukwikwidza kudare repamusoro. Gore rapera dare rakawana vakunaka vaine mhosva yekurova nekukuwadza nhengo yeMDC, VaJack, muna 2008. Nyaya iyi yakazopinda mudare muna 2009 asi VaKunaka havana kuenda kudare iri, izvo zvakazoita kuti gore rapera dare ripe mutongo wekuti VaKunaka vabhadhare mari iyi. Asi VaKunaka vanoti havana kumbobvira vawana magwaro aivadaidza kumatare, uye vari kuramba kuti vakarova nekukuwadza VaJack. Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa divi rehofisi yechikonzi, yaDeputy Sheriff, kanawo kuna VaJack.
title: VaJim Kunaka Vobatirwa Midziyo neChikonzi?

text: Mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nhasi vatoresa mhiko makurukota ehurumende yavo kusanganisira makurukota anomirira matunhu pamwe nemuchuchusi mukuru. Vachitaura mushure mekutoresa mhiko makurukota ehurumende yavo, VaMnangagwa vati vagadza makurukota awa kuti vapedzise nguva yehurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe (term). VaMnangagwa vati kunyangwe zvazvo mumazuva mashoma avatora hutungamiriri zvinhu zvakaoma, vati nechikwata chavo vane chivimbo chekukunda vakakurudzirawo kubatana nerunyararo munyika. Vagadzwa segurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJoram Gumbo vati vari kutarisira kusimudzira kugadzirwa kwemigwagwa, kumutsidzira kambani yeNational Railways of Zimbabwe pamwe nekambani yeAir Zimbabwe. VaGumbo vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kutarisira kuwana rubatsiro kubva kune dzimwe nyika nekuchinja kwakaita mutungamiriri wenyika. Izvi zvatsigirwawo negurukuta rezvehutano nekuchengetedzwa zvakanaka kwevana, Doctor David Parirenyatwa, avo vatiwo vane chivimbo chekuti kuchinja kwehurumemde kuchabatsirawo nyika kuwana mari. Doctor Parirenyatwa vati mari ikapinda munyika zvinhu zvichareruka munyaya dzezvehutano. Gurukota rezvebazi rinoona nezvemukati menyika VaObert Mpofu vatiwo zvinhu zvavachatanga kugadzirisa mubazi ravo inyaya yehuwori, maroadblocks pamwe nekugadzirisa hukama pakati pemapurisa neruzhinji rweZimbabwe. VaMnangagwa vakavandudza dare remakurukota avo neMugovera mushure mekunge vambodoma makurukota gumi asina zvigaro muparamende, asi bumbiro remitemo richivapa masimba ekudoma vanhu vashanu chete. Makurukota ehurumende yaVaMnangagwa aya akatambirwa zvakasiya-siyana munyika vamwe vachigutsikana navo, asi vamwewo vachinyunyuta. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, bato reMDC rinotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rinoti nhengo dzedare remakurukota dzatoreswa mhiko dzine basa guru kwazvo rekuona kuti nyika yadzokera painofanirwa kunge iri. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu vanoti zvinhu zvose munyika zvakafa zviri pasi pehurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe nebato ravo reZanu PF. VaGutu vanoti mutoro mukuru uri pagurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa kuona kuti mari dzawanikwa kumabhanga, uye gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJorum Gumbo, sezvo migwagwa yose yemunyika yaparara. VaGutu vanotiwo makurukota ekutongwa kwematunhu akadomwa naVaMnangagwa akadomwa zviri kunze kwemutemo, sezvo bumbiro idzva richiti bato rakawana mavhoti akawanda mudunhu iroro ndiro rinosungirwa kudoma gurukota redunhu iroro. Vanotiwo havaoni makurukota ematunhu aya achiunza shanduko kana budiriro sezvo vazhinji vavo vakambove magavhuna asi vasina chavakaburitsa. No media source currently available
title: Mutungamiri weNyika VaMnangagwa Vanotoresa Mhiko Makurukota Avo

text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvabatana nevamwe vari kumusha vari kuramba kutambira kushandiswa kwema bond note, ayo akaparurwa nebhanga guru renyika reRBZ nemusi weMuvhuro. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvabatana nevamwe vari kumusha vari kuramba kutambira kushandiswa kwema bond note, ayo akaparurwa nebhanga guru renyika reReserve bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, nemusi weMuvhuro. Vamwe vevari kutsutsumwa nedanho rehurumende iri zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuBritain, izvo zvinonzi zviri kuronga kuratidzira nemusi weMugovera munyika iyi zvichitsigira vari kumusha vari kuramba kutambira mari itsva iyi. Mumwe wevari kuronga kuratidzira uku, VaSimbarashe Mutero, vanove sachigaro wevechidiki vebato reMDC T kuSouth East London, vanoti varonga kutora danho iri nekuona kuomesa musoro kwehurumende nekuenderera mberi nekuparura mari iyi. Vanoti kunyange hazvo vana veZimbabwe vari kuramba mari iyi, hurumende yakaisa zvimiti munzeve. VaMutero vanoti mamwe masangano anosanganisira reZim Vigil, Restoration of Human Rights Zimbabwe, Tajamuka, This Flag ndemamwe ane nhengo dzichange dziri pakuratidzira kweMugovera uku. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinonzi zviri kuramba kutambira mari iyi zviri muAmerica zvinosanganisira sachigaro weMDC T mudunhu reAmerica, VaDen Moyo, pamwe nemurongi wemisangano mubato iri muAmerica, Doctor Muzi Ncube, avo vanoti bato reZanu PF riri kutsvaga nzira dzekuunganidza nadzo mari yekunze richitorera veruzhinji. Vanoti hurongwa hwekuti kana munhu ari kunze akatumira mari kumusha anopiwa mubairo hahuna musoro sezvo munhu uyu achizopiwa mari iyi iri muma bond note, kwete yekuAmerica kana kuBritain inenge yatumirwa nehama dzake. Vamwe vataurawo neStudio 7 vari kuSouth Africa neBotswana vashorawo hurongwa hwekuparurwa kwemari itsva iyi kunyange hazvo paramende isati yapedza kunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pamusoro pema bond note. No media source currently available
title: Vamwe Vari Kunze kweNyika Vorambawo maBond Note

text: Sangano remakerereke, reZimbabwe Council of Churches, ZCC, ririkuita misangano nemadzishe nevagari vemumatunhu eMatebeleland richitsvaka nekukurudzira nhaurirano pamwe chete nekugadzira nzira yekuti kusagarisana kwakaitika kare kukurukurwe pachena. Munyori we ZCC, Mufundisi Kenneth Mtata, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nezuro kuHwange sangano ravo rakaita musangano mukuru nemadzishe nevamwe vakuru vedunhu reMatebeleland North. Izvi zvinotevera misangano yavakaita kuMatebeleland South nemu Bulawayo mwedzi mishoma yapfuura. Mufundisi Mtata vati zvimwe zvezvinoramba zvichitaurwa mumisangano iyi zvinosanganisa chichemo chekuti mari inobva mukutengeswa kwezviwanikwa zvemumatunhu aya idzorerwe mumatunhu aya mekare kuti abudirire uye kuti isimudzire mabasa munzvimbo idzi. Vanoti vanhu vazhinji vanoda kuti vezvematongerwo enyika vaite nhaurirano dzekuti nyika igadzikane uye kuti ifambire mberi. No media source currently available
title: Sangano Remakereke Ratangidza Misangano Nemadzishe Edunhu reMatebeleland North

text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump nevavari kukwikwidzana navo VaJoe Biden nhasi vaita gakava raburitsa pachena kusiyana kwematanho avachatora mukutungamira nyika musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dziriko musi wa3 Mbudzi. America yasara nemazuva gumi nemaviri chete kuti iite sarudzo asi vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nemanomwe kana kuti 47 million vatovhota kare kuburikidza nekutumira mavhoti avo kana kuti mail in ballot. Nekuda kwekuparira zvakanyanya kwechirwere cheCovid-19, matunhu akawanda ari kubvumidza vanhu kuti vavhote kuitira kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 musi wa 3 Mbudzi rinova zuva rekuvhota makore ose. Gakava iri raitirwa paBelmont University muguta reNashville mundunhu reTennessee. Ange achikokera gakava iri mutori wenhau Kristen Welker wenhepenyuro yeNBC News uye ari mkutori wenhau wekambani iyi kuWhite House. Imwe nyaya yakanetsa inyaya yekuti vanhu voramba vachigara mudzimba here muhondo yekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 icho chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matatu kana kuti 223 thousand muAmerica. VaTrump vakati VaBiden vari kuda kutovhara nyika yose.  Asi VaBiden vakati ichi handichokwadi vachiti vanegwara rekuona kuti chirwere hachirambe chichipararia. MuAmerica mune kusagadzikana nenyaya yekunetsana kwemarudzi zvikuru vatema nevachena. VaTrump vati hurumende yavo iri kushanda zvakasimba mukusimudzira hupenyu hwevatema. VaBiden vati vatema nevamwe vanosarurwa vanofanira kusimudzirwa mumabasa avo nekubatsirwa nemari. Dzimwe nyaya dzakakurukurwa nezvadzo dzinosanganisira dzezvehutano, mari dzinotambiriswa vanhu, kuparwa kwemhosva uye zvemamiriro ekunze kana kuti climate change. Imwe nyaya iri kutemesa musoro ndeyekupindira musarudzo dzemuAmerica kunonzi kuri kuitwa nenyika dzakaita seChina, Iran neRussia. VaBiden vakati vakasarudzwa vacharatidza nyika idzi kuti kupindira musarudzo dzeAmerica kupinda nemwenje mudziva. Asi VaTrump vanoti VaBiden havana chavangaite kuRussia nekuti vanodyidzana nayo vachiti vainge vari muhofisi semutevedzeri wevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaBarack Obama asi vakakundikana kusimudzira vatema. Vaviri ava vakatatsuranawo nenyaya yekuti America inotambira sei vapoteri, VaBiden vakati panofanira kuve paine gwara rekuti vamwe zvikuru venyika dzeLatin America vatenderwe kugara muAmerica. Asi VaTrump vanoti America inofanira kusimbaradza mitemo ine chekuita nevapoteri. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vanoti kunyangwe varume vaviri ava vakataura zvakakosha pane zvavachaitira nyika, hapana anganzi akabaya dede nemukanwa zvekuti akabva awana vatsigiri vakawanda. Vamwe vakaona gakava iri vari muMaryland muno muAmerica ndi Doctor Isaac Mwase, vanove nhengo yebhodhi reAfrican Immigrant Cuacus, avo vanoti gakava iri rakaburitsa pachena zvinotarisirwa kuitwa nevarume ava munyika nekunze kana vakasarudzwa. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vaDewa Mavhinga avo vakaona gakava iri vari kuBritain vanoti rakakosha nekuti rinopa vanhu mukana kuti vanyotsodzamisa pfungwa pamunhu wekuvhotera. Gakava rekutanga pakati paVaTrump naVaBiden rakaonekwa nevanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 73 million uye pachiri kudorongodzwa kuti ranhasi raonekwa nevanhu vangani. No media source currently available
title: Vanhu Mamiriyoni Makumi Mana neManomwe Vakange Vatovhota muAmerica Pamberi peGakava raVaTrump naVaBiden

text: Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vakazivisa mugwaro rehurumende kana kuti Government Gazette kuti vari kuzowedzera negore kurambidzwa kutengesa pamusika weZimbabwe Stock Exchange, ZSE, kwemakambani anoti Old Mutual nePretoria Portland Cement, PPC, ayo ari kupomerwa mhosva yekukonzera kusagadzikana kwehupfumi nekuburiitsa mari kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo. Asi danho iri riri kushorwa nedzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Makambani maviri aya akatanga kurambidzwa kutengesa pamusika weZSE gore rapera apo hurumende yakati yainge yatanga kuaferefeta nekutenga nekubuditsa mari yekunze kana kuti foreign currency kunze kwenyika zvakanzi zvaikonzera kusagadzikana kwedhora remunyika uye kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. VaNcube vanoti vachiri kuongorora zvakabuda mutsvakiridzo yemashandiro aiita makambani aya. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paDurban University of Technology, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti kumiswa kwemakambani aya hakusi kupa nyika chimiro chakanaka zvikuru kune vanenge vachida kutanga mabhizimisi munyika. Vatiwo nyika iri kutorasikirwa nemari yakawanda nekusavapo kwemakambani aya paZSE sezvo achiunza mari yekunze kwenyika iri kudiwa zvakanyanya kusimudzira hupfumi. Muzvinafundo Mugano vati havo makambani aya anogona kunge aisafambisa mabhizimisi zvakanaka asi handizvo zvingape kuti arambidzwe kutengesa paZSE kwenguva yakareba. Vaimbova mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaCallisto Jokonya, vatiwo makambani aya ainge akakodzera kurangwa nekuti zvinhu munyaya dzemari yekunze pamusika wemukoto zvakagadzikana kubva zvaatorerwa matanho. Asi vatiwo zvakakosha kuti nyaya iyi ipetwe makambani aya aendeswe kumusika mutsva weVictoria Falls Stock Exchange unotendera vanhu kutenga nekutengesa nemari yekunze. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga, VaGilbert Muponda, avo vati mabasa emakambani aye ange okonzera kukwira zvakanyanya kwemitengo yezvinhu asi vakatiwo zviri nani kuti aendeswe kuVictoria Falls Stock Exchange. Vatiwo pane vanhu vakaisa mari dzavo mumakambani aya vari kuvhiringidzwa nematanho akatorwa nehurumende nekudaro nyaya iyi inofanira kugadziriswa nechimbi chimbi. Makambani maviri aya achiri kuita hawo bhizimisi pamisika yekunze kwenyika sezvo Old Mutual iri paLondon neJohannesburg Stock Exchanges ukuwo PPC iri paBotswana neJohannesburg Stock Exchanges. No media source currently available
title: VaMthuli Ncube Vokurudzirwa Kudzosa Old Mutual nePPC paZSE neChimbichimbi

text: Ko chii chaizvo chichaitika musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica sezvo mapato anoti remaDemocrats nemaRepublicans asarudza vamiriri vavo amai Hillary Clinton naVaDonald Trump. Nyanzvi munyaya dzesarudzo dzinoti kubva iye zvino kutsvaga rutsigiro kunenge kwosimbaradzwa. Vaviri ava vakapedza gore vachitsvaga rutsigiro kubva kunhengo dzemapato avo, asi ikozvino vanenge votsvaga rutsigiro kubva kune vanozviti havana bato ravanotsigira kana kuti maindependents. Sarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica dziri kuitwa musi wa8 Mbudzi. Amai Clinton naVaTrump vave kufanira kutsvaga mari yakawanda kubva kune vanobatsira kuti vakwanise kuenda kumatunhu ose vachitsvaga rutsigiro. Mari iyi inoshandiswawo kubhadhara vanhu vanenge vachishanda kukurudzira vanhu kuti vavhotere vaviri ava. Sangano re Federal Election Commission rinoongorora nyaya dzemari dzesarudzo rinoti muna Chikunguru Amai Clinton vainge vaine mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi mana nemana ukuwo VaTrump vaine mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri. Kusvika parizvino Amai Clinton vashandisa mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi matatu uku VaTrump vashandisa mari inosvika zviuru zvinomwe nechimwe. Nhoroondo yeAmerica inoratidza kuti pachine mutambo pakugadzirisa nyaya yemari yesarudzo. Muna 2012 VaObama vakashandisa mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemashanu uku VaMitt Romney vavaikwikwidzana navo vakashandisa mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana mana nemakumi matanhatu. Amai Clinton naVaTrump vachaenda kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana kunotsvaga rutsigiro. Asi kune mamwe matunhu akakosha zvikuru avanofanira kuti vakunde akaita seFlorida, Ohio nePennyslvania. Anokunda matunhu aya kazhinji ndiye anowanzokunda musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika. Musi wa 26 Gunyana, VaTrump naAmai Clinton vachaita gakava ravo rekutanga. Rimwe rechipiri richaitwa musi wa 9 Gumiguru nemusi wa19. Mutevedzeri waVaTrump gavhuna Mike Pence nemutevedzeri waamai Clinton VaTim Kaine vachaitawo gakava musi rimwe chete musi wa 4 Gumiguru. Magakava aya anoitwa kwemaminetsi makumi mapfumbamwe. Vari kukwikwidza vanenge vaudzwa misoro yenya. Pane mukanawo wekuti mumwe munhu wechitatu apinde mumagakava aya sezvo paine bato remaLibertarian riri kutungamirwa naVaGary Johnson. Asi kuti VaJohnson vapinde mugakava iri vanofanira kuve nerutsigiro rwuri pakati pezvishanu negumi kubva muzana paongororo dzinenge dzichhitwa munyika kana kuti mapolls. Muna 2012 vanhu makumi mashanu nemashanu chete ndivo vakavhota musarudzo. Zuva resarudzo muAmerica harisi zororo. Kuvhota kunoitwa musi wechipiri kwemaawa gumi nemaviri. Zvabuda musarudzo zvinotanga kubuda vanhu vachangopedza kuvhota. Anenge akunda musarudzo anozivikanwa musi mumwe chete asi anozotora mhiko musi wa 6 Ndira. MuAmerica dunhu rega rega rine mavhoti aro zvichienderana nehuwandu hwevanhu vanenge vari mudunhu racho kana kuti electoral college. Mavhoti aya kana kuti Electoral College anenge ari mazana mashanu ane makumi matatu nemasere kana kuti 538. Anenge asvitsa mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe kana kuti 270 Electoral College ndiye anenge akunda musarudzo. Muzvinafundo Francis Musona vekuUniversity of Kentucky vanoti Zimbabwe ine zvakawanda zvekudzidza kubva kuAmerica mukuita sarudzo dzakachena. No media source currently available
title: Amai Clinton naVaTrump Votatsurana Musarudzo dzemuAmerica

text:
Nhengo yeMDC Alliance, VaJohn Mupanduki, vapambwa mambakwedza nhasi pamba pavo paNyika Growth point kuBikita muchiitiko chinofungidzirwa kuti chine zvematongerwo enyika mukati. VaMupanduki vanonzi vapambwa nhasi mangwanani nevanhu vanga vaine motokari inofungidzirwa kuti ndeyemhando yeToyota Vitz. Mudzimai waVaMupanduki, Amai Sheila Zvada Mupanduki, vati vanhu vanosvika vashanu vachizviti mapurisa vagogodza pamusowo wavo vakarara nemurume wavo, vakati vanoda kutaura naye ndokubva vaenda naye kumota uko vamupinza mukati memota iyi ndokubva vaenda naye. Amai Zvada Mupanduki vati vamhangara nyaya iyi kumapurisa epaNyika growth point, uye havasati vaziva kuti murume wavo aripi sezvo nharembozha yake yave kuramba kupinda. Mutauriri wemapurisa muMasvingo, Inosector Kudakwashe Dehwa, vati
vange vasingakwanisi kupindura mibvunzo yedu sezvo vange vari mumusangano. Hatina kukwanisawo kubata mutauriri wemapurisa munyika, Assistant Commissioner, Paul Nyati, sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata.

Munyori muboka revechidiki muMDC-A muMasvingo, VaGilbert Mutubuki, vati vanofungidzira kuti mumwe wavo apambirwa zvematongerwo enyika apo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vanofungidzira kuti pane ruoko rweZanu PF pakupambwa kwaVaMupanduki.

Asi sachigaro weZanu PF muMasvingo, VaRobson Mavhenyengwa, vati
havasati vanzwa nezvechiitiko ichi vachiti bato ravo hariiti
zvemhirizhonga sezvo richikoshesa mutemo wenyika. Asi VaMutubuki vati zvaitwa pana VaMupanduki zvinoburitsa pachena kutyorwa kwekodzero dfxzevanhu vanopikisa hurumende panguva iyo nyika yava kugadzirira kuita sarudzo dzema by elections muna Kurume.

Mudzimai waVa Mupanduki ati ari kutya zvikuru uye vana vavo vatatu
vakaona kupambwa kwaitwa baba vavo. Mukuru pavana ava ane makore manomwe wekupedzisira ane matatu.
Kupambwa kwaVaMupanduki kunoitika pasina mwedzi mitatu yapfuura apo imwe nhengo MDCA, VaNyasha Zhambe Mawere, vekwaGutu, vakafa mushure mekurohwa nevanonzi vatsigiri veZanu PF. No media source currently available
title: Nhengo yeMDC Alliance Inopambwa Mambakwedza kuMasvingo

text: Vatori venhau munyika vacherechedza zuva reWorld Press Freedom Day, vachiti vave kuda kusangana nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kuti vaone kuti vangapedze seyi dambudziko rekushungurudzwa kwevatori venhau nevezvematongerwo enyika, iro riri kukura munyika. Mumashoko avo pagungano rekupemberera World Press Freedom Day iro raitwa pachikoro cheHarare Polytechnic, mupepeti mukuru wekambani yeAssociated Newspapers of Zimbabwe, VaStanely Gama, vati vematongerwo enyika vari kutyityidzira vatori venhau. VaGama vati nekurwisana kuri kuitika mubato reZanu PF pamwe nesarudzo dziri kuuya, zvave kuita kuti vematongerwo enyika vapindire mumashandiro anoita vatori venhau zuva nezuva. Vatiwo vematongerwo enyika vari kushandisa mapurisa kushungurudza vatapi venhau. Sachigaro weZimbabwe National Editors Forum, zvakare vari mupepeti webepanhau reIndependent, VaDumisani Muleya, vatiwo kunze kweve vezvematongerwe enyika, vemabhizimisi vari kuvhiringawo mashandire evatapi venhau. Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Union of Journalists, VaFoster Dongozi, avo vanove mumwe wevakabvunzurudzwa nemapurisa pasina mhosva yavapara, vati zviri pachena kuti vematongerwe enyika vari kushandisa mapurisa kutyityidzira vatapi venhau. Dzimwe nyaya dzave kukanganisa basa revatori venhau inyaya dzehuwori uhwo hwapararira nyika yose. Vakawanda vapinda mumhemberero dzanhasi idzo dzange dzakarongwa nemasangano ese anomirira vatori venhau, hurumende pamwe neUNESCO, vatiwo Zimbabwe ichine mitemo inombunyikidza vatapi venhau kunyange hazvo bumbiro renyika risingabvumidze izvi. VaMuleya vati zviri pachena kuti hurumende haina chido chekubvisa mitemo iyi yakaita seAccess to Information and Protection of Privacy Act. Mumwe mudzidzisi wezvekutapwa kwenhau pachikoro cheHarare Polytechinic, VaAlexander Rusero, vatiwo nyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzave kutokanganisa kana vadzidzi muzvikoro zvepamusoro. Vati zvikoro zvevatori venhau zviri kuita basa rakanaka chose uye vatapi venhau vanozovhiringwa vave kubasa uko vanotanga kukanganiswa nemakambani pamwe pamwe nevezvematongerwo enyika. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Thokozile Matutu, vaudza gungano iri kuti vachasvitsa chikumbiro chevatori venhau chekuda kusangana naVaMugabe kuna VaChris Mushowe gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko. Vatiwo hururmende yakazvipira kusandura mitemo yezvekutapwa kwenhau kuti ienderane nebumbiro asi vakati bazi ravo rine rimwe basa rariri kuita pari zvino. Mumashoko avo ekucherechedza World Press Freedom Day, munyori mukuru weUnited Nations, VaAntonio Guterres, vakurudzira kuti vatapi venhau varegwe vachiita basa ravo pachena vachiti izvi zvikaitika munyika munoita runyararo nebudiriro. No media source currently available
title: Vatori veNhau Vanocherechedza World Press Freedom Day Vachinyunyuta

text: NeChitatu, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakaita mabiko emanheru ekuparura zviri pamutemo bhuku rakanyorwa neumwe wevatevedzeri vavo, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vachangodzoka kubva kuChina kwavakange vaenda kunorapiwa. Bhuku iri, iro rinonzi “Goose Or Gander: The United Nations Security Council And The Ethic Of Double Standards,” rinonzi rakabuda muongororo yakaitwa naVaChiwenga pavakange vari mudzidzi kuti vapihwe gwaro repamusoro, kana kuti dhigiri, re Ph.D, kubva ku University ye KwaZulu Natal kuSouth Africa. Mabiko aya akaziviswa paTwitter nemunyori mubazi rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, avo vakashambadza pamusoro pemabiko aya emusi weChitatu manheru. Bhuku raVaChiwenga rinoshora zvikuru sangano reUnited Nations, richiripomera mhosva yekuita zvinhu risingaenzanisi. Vanodzidzisa kutapiwa kwenhau pa Indiana University, mudunhu re Pennsylvania, Muzvinafundo Stan Mukasa, vanoti matauriro, hupenyu nemagariro aVaChiwenga atinoziva hazviratidzi pfungwa dzingabudisa gwaro, kana kuti dhigiri, repamusoro iri, vachiti pane mutauro wakafanana ne wakambotaurwa mushure mekupihwa dhigiri repamusoro rakadai kuna Amai Grace Mugabe. Muzvinafundo Mukasa vanoti panofanirwa kuitwa ongororo yekuti sei zvikoro zvinozivikanwa zvichipa magwaro edzidzo yepamusoro akadai kuvanhu vanozivikanwa kuti havangakwanisi kuawana pachavo. Taedza kubata vanoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko mubato reZanu-PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, tikatadza. No media source currently available
title: VaConstantino Chiwenga Vanoburitsa Bhuku Ravo Rinoshora Sangano reUnited Nations

text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakasimuka munyika nemusi weChishanu vakananga kuPapua New Guinea kuenda kumusangano weAfrican, Caribbean and Pacific kana kuti ACP. Musangano uyu uri kuitirwa kuPort Moresby. Musangano uyu uri kutarisirwa kutaura nyaya dzekurima. Asi mapato akaita seMDC-T nePeople’s Democratic Party nevamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vanogara vachishora VaMugabe nenzendo dzavo dzekunze vachiti dziri kupedza mari yenyika. Mutauriri webato rinopikisda reRenewal Democrats of Zimbabwe VaPishai Muchauraya vashorawo VaMugabe. “Uku kutambisa mari yenyika uye kushaya gwara nekusaziva zvinhu zvakakoshera nyika. Zimbabwe inoda kuti igadzirise hupfumi hwayo uye izvi inokwanisa kuzviita ndokunge yashandisa mari shoma iripo zvakanaka”, VaMuchauraya vakaudza Studio 7. Mumavhiki apera VaMugabe vakaenda kuSingapore, South Africa neUganda. Kurwendo urwu VaMugabe vakaenda nemudzimai wavo Amai Grace Mugabe uye gurukota rezvemaindastiri VaMike Bimha. Musangano uyu uri kutanga nemusi weMuvhuro uvhipera musi weChipiri. Mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaPhelekezela Mphoko ndivo vachasara vakabata matomu.
title: VaMugabe Vonanga kuPapua New Guinea-Asi Vanopikisa Vovashora

text: Vatongi vematare maviri epamusoro soro eSupreme Court neConstitutional Court vapindawo mugakava riri panyaya yaVaLuke Malaba zvichitevera kusvitsa kwavaita magwaro avo kuSupreme Court vachipikisa mutongo wakadzikwa nedare reHigh Court uchimanikidza vaive mukuru wevatongi vematare edzimhosva, VaLuke Malaba, kuenda pamudyandigere sezvo vakange vasvitsa makore makumi manomwe ekuberekwa. Dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti zvaitika izvi zvinoreva kuti vatongi vese ava vari gumi nevanomwe havakwanise kunzwa nyaya iyi muSupreme Court kana kuti muConstitutional Court sezvo vane chekuita nenyaya iyi. Gweta zvakare vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch muSouthern Africa, VaDhewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvingave nani kana VaMalaba vakatevedza zvakatarwa nemutongo weHigh Court. Vatiwo zvaitika izvi zvinoreva kuti vatongi vose ava havachakodzera kunzwa nyaya yaVaMalaba izvo zvichaita kuti mutungumiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vadome vamwe vatongi kuti vanzwe nyaya iyi. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzemutemo wenyika isina kuda kudomwa nezita, yaudza Studio7 kuti hachisi chokwadi kuti vatongi veSupreme Court havakwanisi kunzwa nyaya iyi. Nyanzvi iyi yatiwo vatongi ava vanokwanisa kutadza kunzwa nyaya iyi chete kana pachinge paitwa chikumbiro chekuti vasanzwe nyaya, ndokunge paine zvikonzero zvakasimba zvekuisa chikumbiro chakadai kudare. Yatiwo handichokwadi kuti vatongi ava vanoda kuwedzerwa nguva vari pabasa saVaMalaba. Asi vamwe vanoziva zvemitemo vanotiwo nepamusana pekuti zviri kudiwa nemutemo wakavandudzwa uyu zvinonakirawo vatongi ava mune remangwana, zvinenge zvakakodzera kuti vazvisudurudze panyaya inobata hupenyu hwavo nemashandiro avo kana vachiremekedza hutongo hwejechetere. Vamwe vanoti vatongi ava vakasageza maoko avo panyaya iyi, zvinenge zvafanana naMambo anotonga nyaya yaakwirirwa mudare. Mukuru we Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, VaMusa Kika nemagweta echidiki eYoung Lawyers Association of Zimbabwe, vakaenda kudare reHigh Court vachipikisa danho remutungamiri wenyika rekuwedzera nguva yebasa yaVaMalaba vachishishandisa Consitutional Amendment Number 2 Act iyo iri kunzi inotyorawo bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Zvakaitwa naVaMnangagwa zvakarambwa nedare reHigh Court, asi hurumende yakapikisa mutongo uyu kumatare epamusoro soro. Hurumende yakabvuma svondo rino kuti VaMalaba vari kuenda kubasa kubva zvapikiswa mutongo weHigh Court nehurumende. Hurumende yakatiwo Amai Elizabeth Gwaunza, avo vakagadzwa zviri pamutemo semunhu akafanobata chigaro chemutongi mukuru wematare edzimhosva, vakadzokera kubasa ravo semutevedzeri waVaMalaba sezvo VaMalaba vakadzokera panyanga. No media source currently available
title: Vatongi veMatare eSupreme Court neConstitutional Court Vozvipinza Munyaya yaVaMalaba

text: Mumiriri weNorton muNational Assembly, VaTemba Mliswa, vazivisa dare iri kuti vave kukwidza hurumende kumatare edzimhosva nenyaya yekuzvidza pamwe nekusatevedza zvisungo zvedare iri. Ukuwo gurukota rinoona nezvamhando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vaudzawo paramende kuti vari kuronga kukwidza mutengo wemagetsi kuti uenderane nemutengo wemagaya kana kumatenga kubva kunedzimwe nyika. Vachitaura muNational Assembly, VaMliswa, avo vasina bato ravanomirira, vaudza vange vakabata chigaro chemutauriri wedare iri, Amai Tsitsi Gezi, kuti pane zvinhu zvakawanda zvinobvumiranwa mudare iri zvisingatevedzwe nehurumende. Vati semuenzaniso pakabvumiranwa kuti senzira yekusimudzira magariro enhengo dzedare iri, nhengo idzi dzinofanira kupihwa nzvimbo dzekuvakira dzimba asi izvi hazvisati zvaitwa. Vatiwo mari dzinotambira nhengo dzeparamended dzave pasi zvekuti hadzina zvadzinobatsira. Vatiwo chimwe chinotsamwisa ndechekuti vakabvumirana kuti nhengo dzeparamende dzitengerwe motokari dzinokosha makumi masere ezviuru zvemadhora ekuAmerica asi ikozvino vave kuzotengerwa motokari dzinokosha madhora makumi mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora chete. Vati nhengo dzeparamende dzinoita basa rakakosha zvikuru uye hurumende inofanira kudziremekedza. Vati kana hurumende ikasaita zvese zvavakabvumirana vave kukwidza nyaya iyi kuparamende. Zvichakadai gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vaudza nhengo dzeparamende kuti vari kuronga kukwidza mutemo wemagetsi kuti uenderane nemutengo wekugaya kana kuti kuatenga kubva kune dzimwe. Vachipindura mubvunzo kubva kunhengo dzedare iri, VaChasi vati chimwe chikonzero chiri kuita kuti kambani yemagetsi yeZESA itadze kuita basa rayo nemazvo inyaya yekuti mutengo wemagetsi weZESA uri pasi pemutengo wekugadzira magetsi aya. Pavabvunzwa kuti sei ZESA isiri kushambadza mazita evanhu vanezvikwereti kukambani iyi, VaChasi vati pane vanhu vakawanda vanosvika mazana masere ezviuru uye ZESA, iyo isina mari, ingarasikirwe nemari kana ikada kushambadza mazita evanhu aya mumapepnhau nemudzinhepfenyuro. Nyika yakatarisana nedambudziko guru rekushaikwa kwemagetsi zvekuti nzvimbo zhinji nyika yese dzave kuwana magetsi kwemaawa mana chete pazuva. Mumiriri weHarare East, VaTendai Biti, vaudza VaChasi kuti izvi zvave kukangananisa maindasitiri, mabhizimisi, pamwe nemararamiro evanhu munyika. Mune imwewo nyaya, nhengo dzeparamende dzange dzichida kuziva kuti hurumende iri kuita sei panyaya dzemihoro yevashandi vayo uye mutevedzeri wegurukota revashandi, VaLovemore Matuke, vati pane nhaurirano dziri kuitwa uye hurumende ichazivisa zvinenge zvabuda munhaurirano idzi mukati memazuva mashomanana ari kutevera. Pavabvunzwa kuti sei hurumende yakapa masoja mari yekubatsirikana yemazana mana emadhora pamunhu uye yainge yaronga kupa vamwe vashandi vayo madhora makumi mapfumbamwe nemadhora manomwe pamunhu, VaMatuke varamba kuti hapana zvakadaro sezvo nhaurirano pamusoro penyaya iyi dziri kuenderera mberi. Vachipindurawo mibvunzo muparamende, gurukota rezvemukati menyika, VaCain Matema, vati hurumende ichaongorora nyaya yekuti vatungamiriri vesangano reZCTU vakatumirwa mabara pamwe neyemurwiri yekodzero yavanhu, VaItai Dzamara, uye vachazivisa paramende neveruzhinji zvinenge zvabuda muongororo idzi. Mumiriri weMutare Central, VaInnocent Gonese, vabvunzwo kuti hurumende iri kuiteyi kuchengetedza mudzimai wemutungamiriri wenyika zvichetevera mashoko akabuda pamadandemutande vachiti pane vanhu vari kuvaongorora mashandiro avo nekuvatevera. Asi VaMliswa vati VaMatema vasapindure mubvunzo waVaGonese sezvo pasina humbowo hunoratidza kuti zvakabuda pamadandemutande ndezvechokwadi here.
title: VaMliswa Voronga Kuendesa Hurumende kuMatare eDzimhosva

text: Munyori anoona nezvemutemo muZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vanoti gadziriro dzesarudzo dzekutsvaga vachamirira bato musarudzo, kana kuti primary elections, dziri kufamba zvakanaka, uye vanotarisira kuti sarudzo idzi dzingangoitwa kutanga kwemwedzi unouya. Zanu-PF rwendo rwuno yakadzika mitemo iri kunzi nevamwe yakaoma ichateverwa musarudzo idzi, inosanganisira wekuti vachakwikwidza vanofanirwa kutsvaga rutsigiro vari pamwechete. Asi VaMangwana vanoti vakatora danho iri nekuti kana muri vana vemusangano mose, hamufanire kutyanana. Vanoti iri ibhora remumba, nekudaro vana vanyamunhu vose vanofanirwa kudzidza kufamba pamwechete, kana dai vamwe vakakundwa musarudzo, vanofanirwawo zvakare kubatsira vakunda kutsvaga rutsigiro. No media source currently available
title: Zanu-PF Yotanga Gadziriro yemaPrimary Elections

text: Dambudziko rekushomeka kwemafuta edzimotokari rinonzi ratowedzera zvakanyanya izvo zvava kupa kuti mitengo yezvinhu uye mari yekufambisa iwedzerwe kanodarika katatu pane dzimwe nguva. Vanasorojena vaye varere havo muhapwa dzemakomo havana havo kunge vanyanyopotsa paya pavakati mudzimu wakupa ronda wati nhunzi dzikudye. Iri ndiro rushava shava rawira Zimbabwe kuti kune vashandi vari kuratidzira, mvura yarambira mudenga, izvo zvava kupa kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo munyika. Mutungamiri wesangano revemabhizimisi, reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaSifelani Jabangwe, vanoti svondo rino dambudziko rekushomeka kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari ratonyanya kuwedzera. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vari mukuru wesangano ravana chpangamazano munyaya dzehupfumi, reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vaimbova mukuru weMISA Zimbabwe, VaRashweat Mukundu, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaCalvin Mdzingiri, avo vanodzidzisa paUniversity of the Free State kuSouth Africa, vabvuma kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka semaonero avakazviita apo vainge vashanyira Zimbabwe. VaJabangwe vanotiwo sevemabhizimisi vanoda kuti vagare pasi nehurumende kuti varovanise masoro kuti vapedze dambudziko iri. VaMukundu vatiwo vamwe vave kutotenga mafuta aya pamukoto nemari iri pamusoro zvikuru. Gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, Doctor Joram Gumbo, vati sezvo vari pazororo havana zvizhinji zvavangataure kunze kwekuti tinzwe kubva kune vakafanobata chigaro chavo, uye vari gurukota rezvekurima, VaPerence Shiri. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaShiri, kanawo kuna gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, avo vanopa mari yekunze yekutenga mafuta aya, sezvo vaviri ava vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. No media source currently available
title: Dambudziko reMafuta eKufambisa Dzimotokari Rosvika Pakaipisisa

text: Nhengo yedare reparamende inomirira Mutasa Central mudare reparamende VaTrevour Saruwaka nemusi weChipiri vakarambidzwa zvekare kupinda mudare reparamende vakapfeka bhachi ravo ranzi range riine mavara emureza wenyika.
