Mapurisa ange akapakatira zvombo panze pedare iri ndiwo arambidza VaSaruwaka kupinda mudare. VaSaruwaka vakakwidza mutauriri wedare reparamende VaJacob Mudenda kudare repamusoro reHigh Court vachivapomera mhosvayekutyora kodzero dzavo. VaMudenda vari kurambidza nhengo dzedare reparamende kupinda mudare uyu nemureza wenyika kana kupfeka mabhachi anenge aine mavara emureza wenyika. No media source currently available
title: VaSaruwaka Vodzingwazve muDare reParamende neKupfeka Bhachi Rinonzi Rine Ruvara rweMureza weNyika

text: Mudzimai wemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Va Constantino Chiwenga, Muzvare Marry Mubaiwa, vasungwa neMugovera vachipomerwa mhosva yekurova mushandi wavo, Muzvare Delight Munyoro, apo vaida kutora vana kubva kwavari ivo Muzvare Mubaiwa pavakasangana pachikoro chinopinda vana ava paHellenic School, kuBorrowdale. Izvi zvinonzi zvakaitika nemusi weChipiri. Muzvare Mubaiwa vamiswa pamberi pedare, asi havana kupihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatisomushure mekunge muchuchisi wenyaya audza dare kuti havafanirwe kupihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso sezvo vakapihwa mumwe mukana wakadai pamwe mhosva yekushandisa mhirizhonga yavakatarisana nayo. Kunyange hazvo magweta avo anzi apikisa zvakasimba panyaya iyi, Muzvare Mubaiwa vaendeswa kujeri rekuChikubi, uye vari kutarisirwa kumira zvalare mudare musi wa 15 Kukadzi. Studio7 yaedza kunzwa kugweta raMuzvare Mubaiwa, Va Taona Nyamakura, asi vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozva yavo. Asi baba vaMuzvare Mubaiwa, Va Kenny Mubaiwa, vanoti ichokwadi kuti mwana wavo aendeswa kuChikurubi Remand Prison. VaMubaiwa vanoti vachaenda kunopikisa nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro sezvo mwanasikana wavo aine kodzero yekupihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso pamhosva dzakaita seyaari kupomerwa. Muzvare Mubaiwa vakasungwa muna Zvia gore rapera vachipomerwa mhosva dzakati kuti, idzo dzinosanganisira kuda kuuraya murume wavo uyu wavari kurambana naye mumatare edzimhosva, kuburitsa mari munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo, pamwe nekufojera gwaro remuchato. Asi Muzvare Mubaiwa vari kuramba mhosva dzavari kupomerwa. Dare redzimhosva rakavabhadharisa mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti vatonge vachibva kumba kwavo. No media source currently available
title: Muzvare Marry Mubaiwa Vanosungwa Zvakare

text: Mhirizhonga inonzi iri kuenderera mberi mune dzimwe nzvimbo dzemuguta reJohannesburg kuSouth Africa dzinogara veruzhinji, zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zvichirwiswa nekuparadzirwa dzimba nezvizvarwa zvemu South Africa. Vanhu vashanu vanonzi vakaurayiwa kuburikidza nemhirizhonga iyi mudunhu reGauteng. Mhirizhonga iyi iri kuenderera mberi panguva iyo vatungamiri venyika dzemu Africa vari kusangana mu Cape Town, South Africa, kumusangano wekutengeserana weWorld Economic Forum on Africa. Vatungamiri venyika dzinoti Rwanda, Democratic Republic of Congo pamwe neMalawi vanonzi havana kuenda kumusangano uyu senzira yekunyunyuta nekurwiswa kwezvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika uku, kunyange hazvo bazi rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muSouth Africa rati hapana humbowo. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe muSouth Africa, reZimbabwe Human Rights Organisation South Africa, VaAzaria Dube Nduna, vanoti sangano ravo riri mubishi kuedza kuona kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvingani zvabatwa mumhirizhonga iyi. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF inomirira Makonde muparamende, VaKindness Paradza, vanoti zviri kuitika muSouth Africa zvinhu zvinonyadzisa zvikuru, uye zvinoshoresa nenyika dzekumawirira. VaParadza vaudza Studio7 kuti vane chivimbo chekuti sachigaro veSADC Troika on Defence and Politics, uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachakurukura nemutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, nzira dzekumisa zviri kuitika izvi nekukasika. No media source currently available
title: Kurwiswa kweVekunze Kunoendera Mberi muSouth Africa

text: Nhengo yeCitizens Coalition for Change, VaGodfrey Karembera, nhasi vabhadhariswa zviuru gumi zvemartgs kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba panyaya yavari pomerwa yekuti yavakazvidza mapurisa. Vachipa mutongo wavo, mutongi wedare, Ama Barbra Mateko, vati VaKarembera avo vano zivikanwa nerekuti Madzibaba eShanduko,vanofanira kugara pakero yavakapa kumapurisa uye vanofanira kunomhan’ara kumapurisa kukamba yeGuruve Police Station kaviri pasvondo nemusi weMuvhuro nemusi weChishanu chega chega kudzamara nyaya yavo yapera. Dare ratiwo VaKerembera havafaniri kuvhiringidza vafakazi panyaya yavo. Gweta ravo VaDoug Coltart vati kunyangwe hazvo chikumbiro chavo chekuti nyaya VaKarembera iraswe chisina kubudirira, vanofara kuti vabhadhariswa mari yechibatiso. Mudzimai waVaKarembera, Amai Enia Musora, avo vange vari mudare nhasi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanofara zvikuru nemutongo wapihwa nedare. Vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo vakarohwa zvakanyanya vave nani. VaKarembera vakasungwa nemusi weChina svondo rapfuura vakarohwa zvakaipisisa vari mumaoko emapurisa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza mapurisa nekuvati imbwa, asi mamwe mapurisa akavaudza kuti vainge varoverwa nyaya yekupfeka zvipfeko zvebato ravo reCCC. Asi VaKarembera vari kuramba nyaya iyi vachiti vakasungirwa zvisina maturo uye nezuro vakaisa chikumbiro kudare chekuti nyaya yavo iraswe sezvo vainge vagara muhusungwa kwenguva yakapfurikidzwa. Dare harina kutambira chikumbiro uye ratambira zvakataurwa nevachuchusi zvekuti VaKarembera vanofanira kutongwa sezvo pane humbowo nevakafazi zvinogona kuvabatisa mhosva. VaKarembera vachadzoka kudare musi 19 Kubvumbi apo pachatanga kutongwa nyaya yavo. Zvichakadaro, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission yazivisa kuti gadziriro dzesarudzo dzemaBy-election dzichaitwa nemusi weMugovera dziri kufamba zvakanaka uye zvinhu zvichashandiswa musarudzo idzi zvatoendeswa kumatunhu ese munyika kuri kuitwa sarudzo idzi. Zimbabwe iri kuita sarudzo dzezadzisa zvigaro makumi maviri nezvisere muNational Assembly nezvigaro zvinodarika zana mumakanzuru.
title: Madzibaba veShanduko Votarisirwa Kumiswa paMberi peDare Muna Kubvumbi

text: Vamwe varimi nevatengesi vemumugwagwa vari kuenderera mberi vachitengesa zvinhu zvavo kumativi emugwagwa mukuru weHarare-Gweru kunyange hazvo hurumende yakadzika mutemo wekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Chirwere ichi chabata vanhu gumi nevatatu, uye kuuraya vanhu vatatu muZimbabwe. Studio7 yaona vanhu vakawanda vanga vachitengesa zvinhu zvavo mumugwagwa uyu kuvanhu vanga vachipfuura nedzimotokari. Asi vatengesi ava vanga vasina kuzvidzirira kuburikidza nekupfeka magirovhosi mumaoko avo pamwe nekuisa ma mask kumeso kwavo, kuitira kuti vasabatwe kana kutapurira vamwe chirwere cheCornavirus. Izvi zvinogona kupinza vanhu vakawanda munjodzi yekubata chirwere ichi, icho chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nezvitatu pasi rose, uye kubata vanhu vanodarika miroyoni imwe chete nemazana manomwe ezviuru pasi rose. Mumwe murimi akangoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Charles, uyo anga achitengesa kunze kweguta reChegutu, audza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo nyika yakavharwa, havagoni kuchengeta zvirimwa zvavo kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe akatarwa. Murimi uyu ati acharamba achitengesa madomasi, mazai pamwe nebhinzi kuitira kuti zvisaore pasina azvitenga. Mumwe anga achitengesa magaka, VaTinotenda Ndou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havaoni pane dambudziko pakutengesa kwavo sezvo vanhu vanenge vari vashoma panzvimbo yavanenge vachitengesera. VaNdou vatiwo kunyange hazvo vachinzwa kutya nebasa ravari kuita panguva ino yechirwere cheCovid-19, vati hapana zvekuita sezvo vachirarama nekutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa. Asi vatiwo vari kutora matanho akasiyana siyana mukuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 ichi pavanenge vachitengesa kusanganisira kusabatana maoko nevatengi uye kugara vachishandisa mushonga wekuchenesa maoko avo nguva dzose. Asi VaNdou vabvuma kuti vanogona kubatirira chirwere ichi pamari yavanopihwa nevatengi sezvo vachingotengesa zvirimwa zvavo nemari yemusvo, uye vasina kupfeka magirovhosi. Mumwe anga achitengesera kunze kweguta reGweru audza Studio7 kuti kunyange achiziva kuti kutengesa uku kunomuisa panjodzi, ati ari kuenderera mberi nebasa rake kuti awane cheuviri. Studio7 yaongorora ikaona kuti mapurisa nemasoja ari kutenderera mumaguta pamwe nekuongorora vanofamba pakupinda nekubuda mumaguta asi mushure mekubuda mumaguta hakuna vari kuongorora. Mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti mapurisa achange achiongorora kuti kune vatengesi vari mumugwagwa here. VaNyathi vati zvakakosha kuti vanhu vatevedzera zvakatarwa kuti nyika ikwanise kurwisana nechirwere cheCoronavirus ichi. Asi masangano anomiririra vatengesi vemumugwagwa anoti kuvharwa kwenyika kwakaisa nhengo dzawo parumananzombe sezvo dzisina dzimwe nzira dzekuwana zvekuzviraramisa. Zimbabwe yakavharwa nemutungamiriri wenyika mwedzi wapera kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe senzira kudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 icho chasiya vanhu vanodarika mabhiriyoni mana vachigara mudzimba pasi rose. No media source currently available
title: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Voramba Vachiita Basa Ravo Vasina Kuzvidzivirira

text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoti dziri kushushikana zvikuru nehuwandu hwevanhu vari kusungwa nehurumende vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Vasungwa mukati mumwedzi mishoma yapfuura yaNdira, Kukadzi naKurume gore rino vachipomerwa mhosva iyi vanosanganisira mumiriri weHarare West muparamende, Muzvare Joana Mamombe; Pastor Evan Mawarire; munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, Va Japhet Moyo; mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa; sachigaro we Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaRashid Mahiya, nevamwe. Muzvare Mamombe vari kutarisirwa kumiswa mudare neMuvhuro zvichitevera kusungwa kwavakaitwa nemusi weMugovera, vari pamusangano wekomiti yeparamende kuNyanga. Muzvare Mamombe vanonzi vakasungirwa mashoko avakataura pakuratidzira kwakatanga musi Ndira 14 uko kwainge kwakurudzirwa neZCTU. Kuratidzira kwemazuva matatu uku kwakasiya vanhu gumi nevanomwe vafa mushure mekupfurwa nemabara epfuti. Sangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti vanhu vanodarika makumi manomwe vakarapwa maronda akakonzerwa nemabara epfuti. Vachitaura nenhepfenyuro yeFrance vari kumusangano weAfrican Union kuAddis Ababa kuEthiopia, VaMnangagwa vakati hapana humbowo hunoratidza kuti mauto akakonzeresa kufa kwevanhu kana kubatwa chibharo kwaitaurwa nevamwe vanhukadzi vaiti vakabatwa chibharo nemauto munguva yemhirizhonga. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika pamwe nekurwira kodzero dzevanhu, Va Promise Sande, vanoti hurumende yaVa Mnangagwa iri kuratidza kuti haina mutsauko nehurumende yevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo nhare mbozha yemunyori mubazi rekuburitsa mashoko, VaNick Mangwana, yanga isingabatiki. VaSande vanoti zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe iremekedze kodzero dzevanhu vanoipikisa kwete kwevatora sevapari vemhosva. VaSande vanoti mhosva dziri kupomerwa vanhu ava hadzisi mhosva dzinonzi munhu ari kuda kupidigura hurumende. No media source currently available
title: Nyanzvi Dzoshora Zviri Kuitwa neHurumende yaVaMnangagwa

text: Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika nemapato anopikisa vanoti 2021 igore range rakaoma zvikuru sezvo vanhu vakaramba vachimbunyikidzwa, pamwe nekutyorerwa kodzero dzavo pasina matanho akatorwa munyika inozviti ine hutongi hwejekerere. Mutevedzeri wemutauririri webato guru rinopikisa, VaGift Ostallos Siziba, vanoti gore rese, hurumende yeZanu PF yaishandisa denda reCovid-19 kurambidza vanhu kuita misangano, kuratidzira kana kurambidza vanhu kutaura zvavanoda. Vanoti vatungamiriri vebato ravo vakaratidzira kana kutaura pfungwa dzavo pane zvaiitika munyika, vakasungwa uye vamwe vavo vakaita senhengo yeNational Executive yechikamu chevechidki mubato ravo, VaMakomborero Haruzivishe, vari mujeri. Asi VaSiziba vati chikuru chakanyanya kuvatsamwisa inyaya yekurwiswa kwemutungamiriri webato ravo, VaNelson Chamisa, apo vakatanga kupinda mumaruwa vachisangana nevatsigiri vavo. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaWitness Dube, vatiwo havana kufara kuti Covid-19 yakashandiswa kuvarambidza kuita misangano asi bato reZanu PF raibvumidzwa kuita misangano yaro. Dzimwe nyika dzakaita seAmerica idzo dzakatemera vamwe vakuru vakuru muZanu PF nehurumende zvirango zvehupfumi dzakarega zvirango izvi zviripo dzichiti kodzero dzevanhu dzichiri kutyorwa munyika uye bumbiro remitemo yenyika harisati razadzikiswa. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paAfrica University, Dr Wellington Gadzikwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti veruzhinji vakafara chose pakapinda mutungamiiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, muna 2017 nekuti vakavimbisa kugadzirisa zvese zvainetsa panguva yevaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, mushakabvu Robert Mugabe, izvo zvakakonzeresa kuti pave nezvirango zvehupfumi. Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaSydicks Muradzikwa, vanotiwo ichokwadi kuti zvinhu zvange zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika muna 2021 sezvo mapurisa nemauto achiri kushandiswa kudzvinyirira vanhu. Dr Gadzikwa naVaMuradzikwa vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa hukama hwayo nedzimwe nyika. Asi mutauriri weZanu PF, VaChristopher Mutsvangwa, vanoti izvi zviri kutoitika vachiti kukokwa kwaVaMnangagwa kuGlassgow kumusangano wekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze muna Gumiguru ndicho chinhu chikuru chakaitika panyaya iyi. Vanotiwo kunyange hazvo paine zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe, hurumende yebato ravo iri kukwezva vekunze vakawanda kuzosima mari dzavo munyika. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti zvinhu zvinogona kugadzikana munyika hupfumi hukasimuka kana bato riri kutonga reZanu PF rikataurirana nekushanda pamwe nechete nebato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC Alliance inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. VaMutsvangwa vanoti Zanu PF yakazvipira kutaurirana neMDC Alliance pasi pegungano rePolitical Actors Dialogue vachiti chakakosha kuti mapato ese aite zvinoita kuti vanhu vagute nekugara zvakanaka. Asi VaSiziba vanotiwo MDC Alliance yakazvipira kutaurirana neZanu PF asi kwete pasi pePOLAD vachiti vanoda muyananisi asina divi raakarerekera. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachidzisa paGreat Zimbabwe, VaJoel Mukusha, vanoti kushanda pamwe kweZanu PF ne MDC Alliance kunokwanisika chete kana pakasaita kupindira kwevachena kubva kunyika dzakaita seAmerica. VaMuradzikwa vanoti hukama wagonzo nachin’ai zviri kuitwa neZanu PF neMDC Alliance hawuna kunakira nyika. Vanoti kushanda pamwe chete kwemapato makuru aya kunoita kuti zvinhu zvigadzikane sezvakaitika panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa muna 2009 kusvika muna 2013.
title: Vanoita Zvematongerwo eNyika Vozeya Zvipingaidzo Zvaiva Muna 2021

text: Vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vakapeta musangano wavo muJohannesburg South Africa neMuvhuro vachiti vari kufara zvikuru nematanho avatora mukuyedza kugadzirisa matambudziko akasangana nenyika dzemuAfrica. Musangano uyu wange urikuitwa pasi pedingindira rakanangana nenyaya dzekudzivirira kutyorwa kwekodzero dzemadzimai uye hupfumi hweAfrica kana kuti "Year Of Women Empowerment And Development Towards Africa’s Agenda 2063". Asi nyaya yemutungamiri weSudan VaOmar al Bashir ndiyo yakazonyanya kukonzera mutauro. Dare reInternational Criminal Court raida kuti vasungwe neSouth Africa nemhosva dzavari kupomerwa dzekuponda vanhu mudunhu reDafur. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vanova sachigaro weAU vakati nyika dzemu Africa dzinofanira kubuda muICC. Asi sangano reAmnesty International rashora zvikuru South Africa richiti yaifanira kusunga VaBashir kuti vapindure nyaya dzavo pamberi pedare. VaMugabe nasachigaro weAU Commission Amai Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma vakatiwo AU yazvipira kumisa nyaya yekuroodzwa kwevanasikana vasati vasvika zera. Munyarikani panyaya yekupedza matambudziko ekuroorwa kwevanasikana vasati vabva zera kana kuti Goodwill Ambassador To End Child Marriage muAU, Amai Nyaradzai Gumbonzvanda vanoti varikufadzwa zvikuru nechitsidzo chevatungamiri ichi. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, bato guru rinopikisa reMovement For Democratic Change rinoti veAU neSADC vanofanira kupindira kubatsira Zimbabwe nekuti zvinhu zvaita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye chikafu. Hurumende kuburikidza nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa inoti iri kutsvaga mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana matatu kuti itenge chikafu. MDC inoti izvi zvakonzerwa nechirongwa chehurumende chekutora minda pasina hurongwa hwakajeka hwekuti yodii. Bato iri rinoti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni manomwe vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa ukuwo hurumende haina mari. Mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vanoti zviri pachena kuti hurumende yapererwa nemazano pakupedza matambudziko akasangana nenyika. No media source currently available Asi nhengo yePolitburo VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana vanoti veMDC-T vanoti hurumende yeZanu-PF ine nhoroondo yekugadzirisa zvinonetsa. No media source currently available
title: Musangano weAfrican Union Wopera Uchitsidza Kumisa Kuroodzwa kweVanasikana Vasati Vabva Zera

text: Vamwe vemabhizinisi nemakambani pamwe nezvimwe zvikoro zvepamusoro vanoti zvirango zvehupfumi zvakatemerwa nyika zviri kuvatadzisa kuita mabasa avo zvakanaka. Asi vamwe vanopikisa vanoti huwori uye kusajeka kwegwara rezvehupfumi munyika ndiko kwakonzera kuti nyika iite seyakageza negoka munyama. Mamwe mabhanga emunyika akapinda munyatwa neAmerica akazochenurwa anosanganisirawo CBZ ne ZB Bank. VaMasiyiwa Chatekunye avo vaishanda sechipangamazano kuLiberia vanoti vakambotorerwa mari yavo kwemwedzi mitanhatu vachinzi vaishandisa banga reCommercial Bank of Zimbabwe-CBZ-iro raisabvumirwa kufambisa mari dzinobva kunyika yeAmerica. VaChatekunye vanoti ivo havaite zvematongerwo enyika. Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vanoti kuiswa kwemamwe mabhanga pazvirango achipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mitemo yeAmerica pakudyidzana nemakambani nevanhu vakatemerwa zvirango kuri kukonzera kuti Zimbabwe itadze kukwereta mari yekuvamba mabhizimisi kunze zvinozopa kuti itsvage mari ine mutero wakakura kune vamwe vashoma vachiri kuda kudyidzana nayo. Gore rino mushure mekuferefeta kwemakore mabhanga anoti Infrastructure Development Bank of Zimbabwe ne Agricultural Development Bank of Zimbabwe, bazi rezvehupfumi muAmerica re Treasury Department's Office of Foreign Assets Control rakachenura mabhanga aya zvinonzi neZimbabwe zvave kupa kuti aite basa akasungunuka. Asi kunyangwe pakabviswa mabhanga aya pane makambani ange atemerwa zvirango, America yakabva yatemerawo zvirango kambani inodyidzana zvakanyanya nehurumende yeZimbabwe asi ichipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuori zvavhiringidza hupfumi hwenyika yeSakunda Holdings pamwe nemuridzi wavo VaKudakwashe Tagwirei. No media source currently available Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce VaGodwin Muoni vakaudza bepanhau reChronicle kuti nyaya yezvirango iri kupa kuti kukwezva vekunze vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi kunetse sezvo vachiti zvirango zvinopa kuti vamwe vafunge kuti kutannga mabhizimisi munyika kuzvisikira moto muziso. Asi America inoti chiri kupa kuti Zimbabwe itadze kukwereteswa mari kunze handi zvirango asi nyaya yekusadzora zvikwereti. Kunyangwe nyika dzeEuropean Union kana America dziri kubvisa zvimwe zvirango kumamwe makambani, kambani yeZimbabwe Defense Industries haisati yabviswa ichipomerwa mhosva yekutenga zvombo zvinoshandiswa nemauto nemapurisa kutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Makambani akatemerwawo zvirango neAmerica anosanganisirawo eZanu-PF akaita seJongwe Printing and Publishing Company, ZIDCO, M And S Syndicate nemamwe. Kunze kwemakambani aya vamwe muzvikoro zvepamusoro soro vanoti vari kuvhiringidzirwao mabasa nezvirango izvi sematauriro emhudzidzisi paChinhoyi University of Technology-CUT Muzvinafundo Anderson Maminime. Asi vamwe vanoti nyaya yehuori ndiyo yapa kuti Zimbabwe iomerwe nezvinhu vachipa muenzaniso zvirango zvainge zvakatemerwa Rhodesia neUnited Nations izvo vakawanda vanoti zvainge zvakaomarara kudarika zviripo ikozvino. Rhodesia muna 1966, iri pasi pevaive mutungamiri wehurumende VaIan Douglas Smith ndiyo nyika pasi rose yakatanga kutemerwa zvirango neUnited Nations. Muna 1966, vaive mutungamiri wenyika yeBritain VaHarold Wilson vakapika kumusangano weCommonwealth kuNigeria kuti hurumende yaVaSmith yaizodonha mukati memavhiki kwete mwedzi. Asi izvi hazvina kuitika nekuti Rhodesia yakatsvaga nzira dzekuvandudza maindustry ayo kuti ikwanise kurarama. Vanokokera mabasa musangano reCitizens Manifesto VaBrigs Bomba vanoti Rhodesia yakakwanisawo kugadzira zvimwe zvinhu kuti ipunyuke mukanwa mamupere. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda neLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe Dr Prosper Chitambara vanoti chakakosha ndechekuti kunyange paine zvirango panofanirwa kunge paine hurongwa kana kuti ma policies anovandudza hupfumi mukati mezvirango. VaChitambara vanoti Zimbabwe inogona kushandisa hukama hwayo neChina kukunda zvirango sezvo China iyine mazakwatira emari yayakaisa parutivi kana kuti ma reserves Muna 2003, vaive mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaGeorge Bush vakatemera vamwe vatungamiri venyika yeZimbabwe zvirango nenyaya yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Asi vakuru vehurumende vanoti izvi zvakaitwa nekuti vainge vatora minda kubva kuvachena kuendesa kuvatema. America ine nyika dzakawanda dzayakatemera zvirango dzinosanganisira North Korea, Cuba, Iran nedzimwe. Zimbabwe yakatemerwawo zvirango nenyika dzinodyidzana neAmerica dzinosanganisa Canada, New Zealand nedziri mugungano reEU. Pazvirango zveEU, pasara kambani yeZimbabwe Defense Industries chete nevamwe vakuru muhurumende vashoma.
title: Vamwe Vemabhizimusi, Zvikoro zvePamusoro, Voti Zvirango Zviri Kuvakanganisa

text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangawa, muhurukuro yavakaita nenhepfenyuro yeZBC nebepanhau reHerald ichaburitswa pazuva rekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere nemusi weChina vakakuridzira vanhu kuti vakurukure vakasungunuka zvakaitika munguva yeGukurahundi. Izvi zvakaitika pamakore ari pakati pa1983 na 1987 apo mauto eFifth Brigade anonzi akaponda vanhu vanodarika zviuru nakumi maviri kuMatabeleland neMidlands. Asi mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba, vakaudza bepanhau reStandard kuti iyi yainge iri hondo kuchifa vanhu mativi ose. Hurumende inoti yairwisa vainge vapanduka vari kudivi reZAPU. Asi vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti pakazongourayiwa vamwe vasina mhaka. VaMnangagwa vanoti hurukuro yavakaita nemasangano ari pasi pesangano reBulawayo Collective yakazarura maziso avo pazvinhu zvizhinji zvinonetsa vanhu vemumatunhu eMatabeleland. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti hurukuro dzakanaka chose asi vanhu vanofanira kuziva zvakawanikwa muongororo yeChihambabwe Commission kuti vanhu vagoziva pekutangira. No media source currently available Tabatavo vaimbove sineta weZanu-PF, VaBelieve Gaule, avo vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu vanofanira kutaura nezvenyaya iyi sezvo vazopihwa mukana nehurumende. VaGaule vati vanhu vanofanira kutaura nehama dzavo kunzvimbo dzakawirwa nedambudziko iri kuti vataure chokwadi kuti zvinhu zvigadziriswe uye kumisa vanhu varikushandisa Gukurahundi mukutsvaka rutsigiro munezve matongerwo enyika. No media source currently available
title: VaMnangagwa Vanokurudzira Nhaurirano DzeGukurahundi

text: Dare reHouse of Assembly neChipiri rakavhota richitambira chikwereti cheReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Debt Assumption Bill kuti chive chehurumende. Izvi zvave kureva kuti hurumende ndiyo inenge yobhadhara zvikwereti zveRBZ zvinopfuura bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora. Nhengo yedare reparamende yeMDC-T, VaEddie Cross, vanoti bato ravo riri kuronga kuenda kudare repamusoro soro reConstitutinal Court richinopikisa kupasiswa kwebhiri rekuti hurumende itore chikwereti cheRBZ icho chakaitwa panguva iyo VaGideon Gono vaiva gavhuna webhanga iri. Mashoko aya atsinhirawo nevanokokera mabasa eMDC-T muparamende, VaInnocent Gonese, avo vanoti vanhu vose vakapihwa zvikwereti neRBZ havaifanirwa kuvhota muparamende padanho iri. Gweta uye vari nhengo yeMDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, VaDavid Coltart, vanotiwo pamitemo zvikuru yenyika dzaive pasi pehutongo weBritain kana kuti Commonwealth Countries, nhengo dzedare reparamende hadzitarisirwe kuti dzivhotere bhiri kana dziri idzo dzakawana chouviri pazviri. Asi gweta uye vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaJonathan Samkange, vatiwo havaone MDC-T ichibudirira panyaya iyi nokuti paramende ndiyo inodzika mitemo. Muzvinafundo munyaya dzemitemo, uye vachitungamira bato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly, VaLovemore Madhuku, vanotiwo zvinonetsa kuona MDC-T ichibudirira. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaChris Mugaga, vanoti havaone chakaipa panyaya yehurumende yekutora chikwereti ichi. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development, VaJoy Mabenge, vanoti sangano ravo harisi kufara zvachose nemabatirwo enyaya iyi nehurumende nebato reZanu-PF. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti sezvo paine vanhu vanozivikanwa kuti ndivo vakapihwa zvikwereti neRBZ, paramende yaifanirwa kutanga yaona kuti zvinhu zvose izvi zvatorwa zvotengeswa, kuitira kuti pasave nemunhu anoregererwa chikwereti iye achishandisa midziyo yaasiri kuda kubhadharira mari. Hurumende pachayo ine chikwereti chinosvika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora yairi kutadza kubhadhara kumabhanga nehurumende dzekunze. No media source currently available
title: MDC Yoronga Kuendesa Paramende kuConCourt neNyaya yeChikwereti cheRBZ

text: Mamwe mapato ezvematongerwo enyika anoti haana kushamisika nekutarwa kwakaitwa zuva ra 30 Chikunguru 2018 sezuva richaitwa sarudzo dzose dzemunyika, achiti akagara achitevera mumbiro remitemo, iro rinoti sarudzo dzinofanirwa kuitwa pakati pemusi wa 21 Chikunguru na 22 Nyamavhuvhu 2018. Asi mapato aya anotiwo VaMnangagwa vaifanirwa kuzozivisa nezvezuva resarudzo zvose zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa mumutemo wesarudzo zvagadziriswa, uye Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yatanga yaburitsa gwaro revavhoti. Vachizivisa nezvezuva resarudzo iri, VaMnangagwa vatiwo izvi zvave kureva kuti mapato achapinda musarudzo asununguka kuchitsvaga rutsigiro sezvo nguva yekutsvaga rutsigiro yaparurwa. Munyori mukuru mubato rePeople's Democratic arty inotungamirirwa naVaTendai Biti, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vanoti bato ravo rakagara rakanongedzwa kwekuenda nebumbiro remitemo yenyika, iro rinoti sarudzo dzinofanirwa kuitwa pakati pa 21 Chikunguru na22 Nyamavhuvhu gore rino. Asi VaChikwinya vanotiwo nyaya yekuti ZEC izivise kuchadhindirwa magwaro ekuvhotesa ndeimwe yenyaya dzinofanirwa kutanga dzagadziriswa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC-T inotungamirirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaObert Gutu, vanoti kunyange hazvo vari kutambira kutarwa kwezuva resarudzo, vanoona sekunge VaMnangagwa vakamhanya zvishoma nekuti vaifanirwa kuzozivisa zuva iri mushure mekunge gwaro revavhoti raburitswa neZEC. No media source currently available
title: Mamwe Mapato Anoti Akagadzirira Kare Sarudzo dzeGore Rino

text: Vachitaura nevatori venhau kumba kwavo kuBorrowdale muHarare kunozivikanwa nekuti Blue Roof nezuro, vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakati havasi kuzovhotera mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kutungamira Zanu PF parizvino. Vachipindura padandemutande ravo reFacebook, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vati zvave pachena kuti VaChamisa vaita chibvumirano naVaMugabe. Vati vanod shanduko vanofanira kuvhavhotera. Asi vachitaura kuMiekles Hotel nezuro VaChamisa vakati VaMugabe vakasunngunuka kuvhotera wavanoda uye ivo nemudzimai wavo Amai Grace Mugabe havasi kuzopihwa zvinzvimbo muhurumende yavo. Vati VaMnangagwa nevamwe vakuru-vakuru vari kuvashungurudza vakati havazofe vakavhotera vanhu vakadai. Pavakabvunzwa nevatori venhau kuti vachavhotera ani musarudzo dzamangwana, VaMugabe vakati havaone Amai Thokozani Khupe na Amai Joyce Mujuru vaine zvakawanda zvavanokwanisa kuita vachiti angosara chete pavanhu makumi maviri nevaviri vari kukwikwiodza ndiVaChamisa. Zvichakadai, imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaVivid Gwede, vati mashoko aVaMugabe anoratidza mafungiro ane veruzhinji munyika vachiti hapana chakaipa kuti VaMugabe vavhotere vaChamisa pasarudzo. Pavabvunzwa nyaya yekunzi ndivo vaipa VaChamisa mari yekutsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo, VaMugabe vatio mashoko aya haasi echokwadi vachiti havasati vambosangana naVaChamisa vachiti mutungamiri weMDC wavakapedzisira kusangana naye ndimushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai. Vaenderea mberi vachiti hurumende yavo yakanga isingabirire sarudzo vakati pavakangokundwa chete ndemuna 2008 pakahwinha VaTsvangirai sarudzo yekutanga yemutungamiri wenyika asi vasina kuwana mavhoti aikodzera kuti vavatorere matomhu. VaMugabe vakurudzira anenge akunda musarudzo kuti aone kuti panyorwa bumbiro idzva remitemo rinokoshesa zvido zveveruzhinji. Vatiwo vari kushushikana nekupambwa kwaVaItai Dzamara kunyange hazvo vachiti vakanga vasingamuzive. VaDzamara vakapambwa vachigerwa kuGlen View muno muHarare muna 2016 uye vaizikanwa zvikuru nenyaya yekuratidzira kwavaiita vachida kuti VaMugabe vasiye basa vachivapomera mhosva yekuondonga hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Kubva pakapambwa VaDzamara hapana anoziva kuti varipi kusvika parizvino. VaMugabe vakasiya basa muna Mbudzi wegore rapera mushure mekupindira kwakaita mauto munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Kunyange hazvo VaMugabe vachiramba vakatsika madziro vachiti vakabviswa pachigaro zvisiri pamutemo, matare akatura mutongo wekuti kubviswa kwavakaitwa pachigaro kuri pamutemo sezvo ivo mbune vakazonyora tsamba kumutauriri wedare reparamende vachiti vainge vosiya basa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, munyori wezvemutemo muZanu-PF vari nhengo yePolitiburo VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana vanoti VaMugabe vave kungotaurawo semunhu mukuru. No media source currently available  Sachigaro weMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa VaMorgan Komichi vanoti VaMugabe vane kodzero yekuvhotera wavanoda. No media source currently available
title: VaMugabe Vokatyamadza Vakawanda neKuramba Kutsigira VaMnangagwa

text: Bhodhi idzva reZimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation nhasi raudza paramende kuti hurumende nemakambani ayo ndivo vari kukonzera dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari kumbani iyi sezvo vasingabhadhari basa ravanoitirwa sezvinosungirwa kuitwa. Vachipa humbowo maererano nezviri kuitwa nebhodhi ravo kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana neZBC pamwe nematanho ava rikutora kuagadzirisa, sachigaro webhodhi iri Dr John Tayi vati zvikamu makumi masere kubva muzana zvemabasa ekambani yavo zvinobva kuhurumende nemakambani ayo nekudaro kusabhadhara kwainoita ndiko kwopa kuti kambani iyi itatarike. Vati kuti zvinhu zvifambe, hurumende inofanira kubhadhara basa rese rinenge raitwa. Vatiwo marezenesi haana mari ine musoro yaari kuunza mukambani iyi sezvo mari inobhadharwa iri shomanana uye yakapedzesera kukwidzwa makore gumi apfuura. Semuenzaniso vati mabhisimisi anobhadhara zana remadhora pagore vanhuwo zvavo vachibhadhara makumi matatu emadhora chete Dr Tayi vati nyaya yekuenda kwemagetsi yave kuita kuti vanhu nemakambani vatadze kushambadza nenhepfunyuro dzeZBC izvo zviri kuita kuti kambani iyi irasikirwe nemari yakawanda. Vatiwo chimiro cheZBC chakasviba nekuda kwenyaya dzezvikwereti, huwori nezvimwe zvekuti vatove mushishi rekuzvigadzirisa. Vaenderera mberi vachiti zvinhu zvinogona kutonyanya kuipira ZBC nekuti kuvhurwa kwemaisai kunoreva kuti pachave nemakwikwi kubva kune makambani achapihwa marezenisi neBroadcasting Authority of Zimbabwe. Asi kunyange hazvo vataura zvichemo nezvari kuita, nhengo dzekomiti yezvekuburitswa kwemashoko dzati bhodhi iri rinofanira kuchinja maitirwo ebasa kuZBC. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaSimbaneuta Mudarikwa, veZanu PF vati havaone chikonzero chekuti vashambadze neZBC nekuti vashandi vacho kusanganisira vatapi venhau havagone kuita basa zvine hunyanzvi. VaSettlement Chikwinya veMDC vatiwo zvinosvibisa chimiro cheZBC inyaya yakaita sekuti vamwe vatapi venhau vayo kusanganisira vamwe vakuru vakuru vanomboita zvematongerwo enyika zvakaita sekupinda musarudzo dzemumapato vodzoka kubasa kana vachinge vakundwa. Asi Dr Tayi vati havawone chakaipa pane izvi sezvo mutemo wenyika uchibvumidza vanhu kupinda musarudzo. Mukuru wesangano reMedia Institute for Southern Africa, VaTabani Moyo vaudza Studio 7 kuti havabvumirane nenyaya yekuti vatori venhau vanopinda musarudzo vachidzoka zvakare kumabasa avo kana vakundwa. Vatiwo chimwe chavanoda kuona bhodhi idzva richiita kurumura ZBC kubva kubazi rezvekuritswa kwemashoko. Nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzange dzichidawo kuziva kuti bhodhi iri richaita sei kupedza kupindira kwebazi rekuburitswa kwemshoko kukambani ZBC uko kunonzi kunoitika zvakanyaya. Dr Tayi vati bhodhi ravo richadyidzana nebazi ravo asi vakati havasi kuzobvuma kuitiswa zvinhu zviri kunze kwemutemo. Sachigaro vekomiti iyi, VaPrince Dubeko Sibanda vaudza Dr Tayi nechikwata chavo kuti vakazvipira kubatsira ZBC kupedza matamabudziko ayo. VaSibanda vatiwo vanoda kuona bhodhi reZBC iri richigadzirisa ZBC kuti iite zvido zveveruzhinji nekutevedza bumbiro remutemo wenyika iro rinoti kambani iyi inofanira kushanda isina divi rayaka rerekera. Mubhajeti yegore rino hurumende yakaisa parutivi mari inodarika mamiriyoni matanhatu emadhora ekutsigira ZBC. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube vanoti mapazi nemakambani ehurumende anofanira kubhadhara basa raanenge aiitirwa neZBC kuti kambani iyi ikwanise kuita basa rayo nemazvo. No media source currently available
title: ZBC Inoti Kusabhadhara Zvikwereti kweHurumende Kwokanganisa Basa Rayo

text: Vana chiremba vari kuramwa mabasa varatidzira pachipatara cheParirenyatwa muHarare vachiti kunyange hurumende ikaramba ichivatsityidzira, havasi kuzodzekera kumabasa kana zvichemo zvavo zvisati zvagadziriswa. Rutendo Mawere anotipa nyaya inotevera. Vana chiremba vanoti vari kushushikana zvakanyanya nekushaya hany’a kwehurumende mukugadzirisa matambudziko ari munyaya dzehutano. Mumwe chiremba, Dr Prince Butau, vati mukushanda kwavo havana zvekushandisa zvinovadzivirira zvekuti vamwe vana chiremba vari kutoshandisa makondomu semagirovhosi ekupfeka mumaoko, sezvo magirovhosi asiri kuwanikwa. Mumwe chiremba, Dr Rejoice Kututwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hazvivabatsiri kuti vamanikidzwe kudzokera kubasa vasina zvekushandisa zvakakwana zvinosanganisira mishonga. Dr Kututwa vatiwo vanodawo kurarama nekudaro havangatarisirwi kuenda kumabasa vasina cheuviri chavanowana. Mumwe chiremba asina kuda kudomwa nezita atiwo zvavari kushandisa muzvipatara hazvikurudzirwi asi kuti vanenge vachingoitirawo kubatsira varwere. Chiremba uyu atiwo sezvo zvinhu zvave kungotengeswa nemadhora ekuAmerica, vanodawo kuti vabhadharwe nemadhora aya kuitira kuti vakwanise kurarama. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, Dr Elias Muzoremba, vanoti hapana chati chanyatsobuda pahurukuro dzavo nehurumende vachiti vakangovimbiswa kuti pane mishonga yatsvakwa asi haisati yasvika kuzvipatara. Vatiwo nyaya yemararamiro avana chiremba mushure mekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu haisi kutaurwa nezvayo nehurumende. Munyori musangano raana chiremba iri, Dr Mthabisi Anele Bhebhe, vatiwo zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvekuvatyityidzira hapana zvazvinobatsira, uye hazvivavhundutsi. Kuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba kwava nemasvondo maviri, Gurukota rezveutano, VaObediah Moyo, vaakaudza vatori venhau nezuro kuti vana chiremba vanofanirwa kudzokera kumabasa matambudziko avo ogadziriswa vachishanda. VaOMoyo vakaudzawo makurukota ehurumende kutanga kwesvondo rino kuti vana chiremba vazhinji vari pamabasa. Asi ongororo yaitwa neStudio7 inoratidza kuti vana chiremba vakawanda havasi pamabasa, uye vanhu vari kudzoserwa kudzimba vachinzi muzvipatara zvehurumende hamuna vana chiremba. No media source currently available
title: Vana Chiremba Vanoti Kunyange Vakatyityidzirwa, Havadzokeri Kunoita Basa Ravo
